Vok pen a khecin a kat hangin eknel hai lo ahih manin note adingin a nin ahi hi. Tuate’ sa ne loin, a sisate zong na lawng kei ding uh hi.
“Tui sunga om khempeuh lak panin hihte na ne thei ding uh hi: phe leh lip a nei peuhmah na ne thei ding uh hi.
Phe leh lip a nei lo peuhmah na ne kei ding uh hi; tuate in no adingin a nin ahi hi.
“Vasa a siang khempeuh na ne thei ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin hihte in na nek loh dingte uh ahi hi: muvanlai, musane, lui-mu,
mupi, mu-meika, amau namciat;
va-ak nam khempeuh;
kalaoh-vasa, pengpelep, vatawt, musi nam khempeuh;
keising leh simbu, gam vatawt
leh tui vatawt, samuat ne musane leh tuimu,
gun vapi, gun vazonei nam khempeuh, huihtun leh bak ahi hi.
Kha a nei insek ganhing khempeuh no adingin a nin ahi hi; tuate kine lo ding hi.
Kha a nei insek ganhing a siangte khempeuh na ne thei ding uh hi.

“Ama thu-a a sitawm ganhing peuhmah na ne kei ding uh hi; a nek dingun na khua sung uh a, om khual mite tungah na pia thei ding uh hi; tua ahih kei leh gamdang mite tungah na zuak thei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note in Topa na Pasian uh tungah a siangtho mi na hi uh hi. “Keelno a pi’ nawizu tawh na huan kei ding uh hi.
“A kum a kumin na lo uhah a piang, na khaici pan a piang khempeuh sehsawm suah sehkhat na pia ding uh hi.

Topa na Pasian uh zahtak tawntung nading na theih nadingun, ama min a teen’ nadingin a teelna mun Topa note’ Pasian mai-ah na an, na leenggahzu, na sathau uh sehsawm suah sehkhat, leh na bawnghon leh tuuhon tacilte uh na ne ding uh hi.

Topa na Pasian un a min koih nadingin a teelna mun pen, Topa na Pasian un no thupha hong piak ciangin note kiang panin gamla lua a, no adingin lam sau luat manin na sehsawm suah sehkhat uh na paipih zawh kei uh leh,
tuate sum na suah ding uh a, na khut sung uhah a sum tunin, Topa na Pasian un teelna munah na pai ding uh a,

na deih peuhpeuh uh bawng ahi a, tuu ahi a, leenggahzu ahi a, kham theih zu ahi zongin, na duh peuhpeuh uh leina-in a sum na zang ding uh hi; Topa na Pasian uh mai tua lai munah na ne ding uh a, note leh na innkuanpite na lungdam ding uh hi.
Note bangin amau in tanh leh luah nei lo ahih manun no khuate sunga om Levi mite na mangngilh kei ding uh hi.
“Kum thum simin tua kum-a note’ an piang sehsawm suah sehkhat khempeuh hong paikhiatpihin na khua sung uhah na khol ding uh hi;

Topa na Pasian un na sepnate khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theih nadingin, note tawh kibangin amaute in tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin nei loh uh ahih manin Levi mite’ peemta, pa nei lo, leh meigong numei ahi note’ khua sunga omte hong pai-in ne-in a gilvah ding uh hi.
“Kum sagih a cin’ simin maisakna na pia ding uh hi.

Hih in maisak nading zia ahi hi: leitawi a pia mi khempeuh in a vengte tungah leitawi a, a piaksate maisak ding hi: Topa’ maisakna kigen khin ahih manin a vengpa’ sanggampa tung pan leiba siik lo ding hi.
Gam dang mite tung pan na siik thei ding uh hi; ahih hangin na sanggampate uh tung panin no’ aa ahi peuhmah na maisak ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin, tu ni-a kong thupiak ahi hih thupiakna khempeuh zui-in Topa note’ Pasian’ aw na ngaih nak uh leh note lakah a zawng om lo ding hi (bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un na neih dingun gamluah in, hong piak leitang tungah Topa in note thupha hong pia ding hi)

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un hong ciamsa bangin note thupha hong pia ding a, minam tampi tungah leitawi na pia ding uh hi, ahih hangin note in lei na tawi kei ding uh hi; minam tampite na uk ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute in note hong uk lo ding uh hi.

Topa na Pasian un note hong piak gam sunga na khuate uh khatpeuh peuh sungah na sanggam khat uh note lakah a zawng a om leh na lungsim uh khauhsak loin, na sanggam zawngpa uh huh loin na om kei ding uh hi,
ama tungah na cingh gamtat ding uh a, bangbang hita leh ama kisap zah na leitawi ding uh hi.

Na lungsim ah ngaihsutna hoih lo hong omin, ‘Kum sagihna, maisakna kum hong nai hi,’ ci-in na sanggampa gal mi etin amah bangmah na piak loh ciangin na lang khatah Topa tungah amah kiko-in, nang tungah khialhna a suah khak ding kingaihsun in.
Citna tawh amah na pia ding a, amah na piak ciangin lunghianna na nei kei ding hi; Topa na Pasian in na sepna na hihna khempeuh hih thu hangin nang thupha hong pia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh leitang tungah mizawng bei ngei lo ding hi; tua ahih ciangin, ‘Gam sungah na sanggampa, na a kisam mite’ leh mizawngte tungah na cingh mahmah ding hi,’ ci-in thu kong pia hi.

“Na sanggampa, Hebru pasal khat ahi a, Hebru numei khat ahi zongin nang tungah hong kizuak leh, amah in nangma’ na kum guk sung hong sem ding a, a kum sagih ciangin nang kiang panin suakta-in amah na paikhia sak ding hi.
Na kiang panin a suakta-in na paikhiat sak ciangin khut hawm guakin na paisak kei ding hi;
na tuuhon lak, na ancilna leh na leenggah sukna panin citna tawh tampi na pia ding hi; Topa na Pasian in nang thupha hong piak zahin amah na pia ding hi.
Izipt gamah sila na hihna leh Topa na Pasian in nang hong tatkhiatna na phawk ding hi; tua hih manin hih thu tu ni-in kong pia hi.
Ahih hangin amah in note nuam hong sa-in, nang leh na innkuante hong it ahih manin, ‘Nang kiang panin ka paikhia kei ding hi,’ hong cih leh,
phimpi khat la-in, kongkhak dapphah-in a bil na vut ding a, amah in na sila hi tawntung ding hi. Na sila numei zong tua mah bangin na hih ding hi.

Na kiang panin a suakta-in amah na paisak ciangin haksa sa kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh a kicial nasem thaman lang tawh amah in nangma na kum guk sung hong sem khin zo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa na Pasian in na hihna khempeuh ah thupha hong pia ding hi.

“Na bawnghon leh na tuuhon panun tacil a pa khempeuh Topa note’ Pasian tungah na ap ding uh hi; na bawnghon tacilte tawh na na sem kei ding uh a, na tuuhon tacilte uh zong a mul na meet kei ding uh hi.
Topa in a teelna munah a kum a kumin Topa note’ Pasian uh mai-ah nang leh na innkuante in an ne ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin poina khatpeuh, a khebai a mittaw, ahih kei leh poina lian khatpeuh peuh a neih leh, Topa note’ Pasian tungah biakna in na pia kei ding uh hi.
Na khua sung uhah na ne ding uh hi; sanang ahi a, sakhi ahi zongin a kinek bangin mi a nin leh mi a siangte in a kibangin ne thei ding uh hi.
A si bek na ne kei ding uh hi; tui bangin lei lakah na buakhia ding uh hi.
“Abib kha tang un la, Topa na Pasian uh adingin Paisan pawi bawl un; bang hang hiam cih leh Abib kha sungin Topa na Pasian un Izipt gam panin note zanin hong paikhiatpih hi.
Tuuhon pan ahi a, bawnghon pan ahi zongin Topa in ama min om nadingin a teelna munah Paisan biak piakna Topa na Pasian uh tungah na pia ding uh hi.

Silngo sawh anlum tawh na ne kei ding uh hi; ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum, gimna anlum tawh na ne ding uh hi—Izipt gam panin nawhsa-in na taikhia uh hi—Izipt gam panin na taikhiat hun uh na nuntak sung tawntung uh na phawk theih nading uh ahi hi.
Na gam sung khempeuh uhah ni sagih sung note lakah silngo kimu lo ding hi; a ni masa nitak-a biak piakna a, na piak uh sa khatpeuh peuh zong a zingsang dong zan tawntung na omsak kei ding uh hi.
Topa na Pasian un note hong piak khua khatpeuh peuh sungah Paisan biak piakna na pia thei kei ding uh hi;
Topa na Pasian un ama min om nading mun a, a teelna munah ni a tum khit nitak, Izipt panin na paikhiat hunun Paisan biak piakna na pia ding uh hi.
Topa na Pasian un a teelna munah om-in na ne ding uh hi; zingsang ciangin kihei-in na puanbukte uhah na ciah ding uh hi.
Ni guk sung silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uh hi; a ni sagih ni-in Topa na Pasian uh adingin a thupi kikhopna khat om ding hi; tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi.
“Nipi kal sagih na simto ding uh hi; ankung ding laite tungah phiaukawi na tah masak uh huna kipan a nipi kal sagih sim na kipan ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa na Pasian un note thupha hong piakna tawh kizui-in na piak ding uh ahi note khut sung panin ut-thu-a piakna tawh Topa na Pasian uh tungah nipi kal pawi na bawl ding uh hi;

Topa na Pasian uh mai, ama min om nadingin Topa na Pasian un a telna munah, nang leh na tanu leh na tapa, na nasem numei leh na nasem pasal, na khua sunga om Levi mi, peemta, pa nei lo, note lakah a om meigong numeite tawh na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.
Izipt ah sila na hihna uh na phawk ding uh hi; hih thukhamte zuih ding lim takin na ngaihsun ding uh hi.
“Na an cilna uh leh na leenggah sukna panun an na kaih khop uh ciangin ni sagih sung buk pawi na bawl ding uh hi;
na pawi sungah nang leh na tanu leh na tapa, na nasem numei leh na nasem pasal Levi mi, peemta, pa nei lo, leh na khua sunga om meigong numeite tawh na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.

Topa in a teelna munah ni sagih sung Topa na Pasian uh tungah pawi na bawl ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note na lungdam khawm theih nadingun na khawhsa leh na khut tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah Topa na Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi.

16-17 “Amah in a teelna mun, Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah pasal khempeuh kum khatin thum vei kilaak ding uh hi; silngo sawhloh anlum pawi, nipi kal pawi, leh buk pawi-ah kilaak ding uh hi. Amaute khut hawm guakin Topa mai-ah kilaak lo ding uh hi. Topa na Pasian un note thupha hong piaknasa tawh kizui-in mi khempeuh in ama hih theih bang ciatin pia ding uh hi.
“Na minam uh tawh kizui-in Topa na Pasian un note hong piakna khuate ah thukhente leh uliante na koih ding uh hi; amaute in a man thukhenna tawh mite thukhen ding uh hi.
Thutang na heikhia kei ding uh hi; angvanna na nei kei ding uh hi; sumgolh in mi pilte’ mit tawsakin thumante’ thu heikhia ahih manin sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi.
Note nungta-in Topa na Pasian un note hong piak leitang na luah theih nadingun thumanna leh thumanna bekbek na zui ding uh hi.
“Note in na bawlsa uh ahi Topa na Pasian uh biakna tau kiangah Asherah milim dingin khuam khatpeuh peuh na phut kei ding uh hi.
Topa na Pasian un a muhdah khuampi na phut kei ding uh hi.

“Bawng ahi a, tuu ahi zongin poina nei a, kisapna khatpeuh peuh a om peuhmah Topa note’ Pasian tungah biak piakna-in na pia kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in Topa note’ Pasian adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
“Topa note’ Pasian in note hong piak khua khatpeuh peuh sungah numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin, ama thuciamna palsatin, Topa na Pasian uh muhna ah a sia-a gamta kimu-in,
pasian dangte’ na semin tuate bia ahi zongin, keimah in ka kham ahi ni ahi a, kha ahi a, vantung na khatpeuh peuhte’ na semin bia ahi zongin,
no kiangah hong kigenin tua thu na zak uh leh; note in lim takin na kantel ding uh a, Israelte sungah tua bang a kihhuai na a kigamtatna thu a om mah ahih takpi leh,
numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin tua banga a sia-a gamta mi pen na kongpi uhah na paipih ding uh a, tua numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin suang tawh na denglum ding uh hi.
Teci nih ahih kei leh thum bang genna tawh a si dingpa kithat ding hi; teci khat bek thu genna tawh mi kithat lo ding hi.
A that dingin tecite masa ding a, tua khit ciangin mi khempeuh in hih ding uh hi. Tua bangin note sung panin gitlohna na siangsak ding uh hi.

“Mi khat leh khat kithah khakna, khat leh khat thu kituhna, mi khat leh khat kisiatna, note adingin a haksa lua thu khatpeuh peuh note’ khua sungah khen ding hong om leh, note kithawi-in Topa na Pasian un a teelna mun,
Levi siampite leh tua huna thukhente kiangah na pai ding uh a, amaute kiangah thu dongin, amaute in note kiangah thukhenna hong gen ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in a teelna mun panin note tungah hong gen bangun na hih ding uh hi; amaute in note tungah hong lah bangin lim takin na hih ding uh na ngaihsun ding uh hi;

amaute in note tungah hong piak thuhilhna leh note tungah hong gen uh thukhennate tawh kizui-in na hih ding uh hi; amaute in hong gen thukhenna panin tak lamah ahi a, vei lamah ahi zongin na pial kei ding uh hi.

Topa note’ Pasian mai-ah na sem dingin a ding siampipa’ thu ahi a, thukhenpa’ thu ahi zongin man’ lohna tawh a khengval a, gamta mipa si ding hi; tua bangin Israelte sung panin gitlohna na siangsak ding uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in za-in, kihta-in, a khengvalin gamta ngam nawn lo ding uh hi.

“Topa na Pasian un note hong piak leitangah tungin, note in tua leitang nei-in a tungah na teen’ uh ciangin, ‘Eite’ kimkot a, om minamte khempeuh mah bangin eite tungah kumpi khat i koih ding hi,’ na ci nuam kha ding uh hi;

Topa note’ Pasian in a teel mipa note tungah kumpi-in na koih thei takpi ding uh hi. Ahi zongin na mipihte bek uh lak panin kumpi-in mi khat na koih ding uh hi; na sanggam uh ahi lo gamdang mi khat no tungah na koih thei kei ding uh hi.

Amah in ama aituam dingin sakolte tampi pha sak lo ding hi; Topa in no kiangah, ‘Hih lampi tawnin na kileh kik ngei kei ding uh hi,’ hong ci ahih manin, amah in sakolte tampi-in khangsak lo ding hi; Izipt gamah mite a paikik nading piangsak lo ding hi.
A lungsim kihei khia kha ding ahih manin zi la thuah lo ding hi; ama ading ngun leh kham zong nakpi takin behlap lo ding hi.
“Ama kumpigam kumpi tokhom tungah a tut ciangin Levi siampite’ kep hih thukhamte panin ama adingin laibu khat sungah gelh ding hi;

19-20 hih thukham sunga thute leh hih ngeinate kemin zuihna tawh Topa a Pasian zahtak ding a theih nading, a mipihte tungah ama lungsim a kiliatsak toh loh nading, taklam hita leh vei lam hita leh thupiaknate panin a pial loh nading, Israelte sung ahi ama kumpigam sungah amah leh a tate saupi a om theih nadingin amah in a nuntak sung tawntung tua sunga thute sim ding hi.
“Levi mi siampi ahi Levi minam khempeuh in Israelte bangin tanh ahi a, luah ahi zongin nei lo ding uh hi; amaute in Topa tungah mei tawh kihal biaknate leh a kaih ngeite uh ne ding uh hi.
Amaute in a sanggamte lakah gamluah nei lo ding uh hi; amah in amaute tungah a ciam mah bangin Topa in amaute’ luah ahi hi.
Hih in bawng hita leh tuu hita leh biakna-in a pia mite tung panin siampite’ kaih hi ding hi; amaute in siampite tungah a liang leh a pang nihte leh a gilpi pia ding uh hi.
Na anpal, na leenggahzu leh na sathau, leh na meet masak uh na tuumul na pia ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Levi minamte Topa’ na a sem tawntung dingin na minam khempeuh uh sung panin Topa na Pasian un a teel ahi hi.
“Levi mi khat, Israelte sung na khuapi uh khatpeuh peuh ahi ama teen’na panin ama ut hun peuh ciangin Topa’ teelna munah hong pai thei ding hi;
tua ciangin Topa mai-ah nasem dingin a om a lawm Levi midangte khempeuh mah bangin Topa a Pasian’ min tawh na sem thei ding hi.
Amah in a gamluah a zuakna pan a sum ngahte banah nek ding a kikimin amaute tawh tanh ngah khawm ding hi.
“Topa na Pasian un note hong piak leitang na tun’ uh ciangin, tua minamte’ gamtatna a kihhuaite zuih ding na kisin kei ding uh hi.
Note lakah a tanu ahi a, a tapa ahi zongin biakna-in a zang, ai a saan, khong a khai, mai lam thu a gen, ai a tawi,
bum a zang, van a kah, si khate tawh a kiho, si kha thu a dong kuamah na om kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hihte a hih mi peuhmah Topa tungah kihhuai hi; hih bang a kihhuai gamtatnate hangin note mai panin Topa na Pasian un amaute hawlkhia hi.
Note in Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah pau’ baang loin na om ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note in na suankhiat ding uh hih minamte in khong khaite leh ai saante’ thu ngai uh hi; ahih hangin note ahih leh tua banga na gamtat ding uh Topa na Pasian un hong phal lo hi.
“Topa na Pasian un note lak ahi na sanggamte lak panun note adingin kei tawh a kibang kamsang khat hong khangsak ding hi—note in ama thu na ngai ding uh hi—
note in, ‘Si kha ding ka hih manin Topa ka Pasian’ aw hong zasak kik kei in,’ ci-in na kikhop ni-un Horeb ah Topa na Pasian uh tung pan na deih bang uh hi ding hi.
Topa in kei kiangah, ‘Amaute in a gensa uh thu in a man taktakin ci uh hi.
Amau’ sanggamte lak panin nang tawh a kibang kamsang khat amaute adingin ka khangsak ding hi; ama kam sungah ka thute ka guan’ ding a, amah ka thupiak khempeuh amah in amaute tungah gen ding hi.
Amah in keima min tawh a gen ka thute a don lo mi peuhmahte keimahmah in ka thuk ding hi.
Ahih hangin keimah in thu gen dingin thu pia lo napi-in keima min tawh thu a gen kamsangpa hita leh pasian dangte’ min tawh thu a gen kamsangpa hita leh, tua bang kamsangte si ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Na lungsim sungah, ‘Topa gen a hilo thu bangci theih ding i hi hiam?’ na cih uh leh-

kamsang khat in Topa min tawh thu genin, tua thu pen hong tung lo ahi a, a man lo ahi zongin hong hih leh, tua thu in Topa’ gen loh thu ahi hi; kamsangpa in ama ut thu a gen hi a, amah na kihtak ding uh kul lo hi.
“Topa na Pasian un amaute’ leitang note hong piak minamte beisakin, note in amaute suankhia-in, amaute’ khuapite leh innte ah na teen’ uh ciangin,
Topa na Pasian un note’ neih dingin hong piak gam sungah note adingin khuapi thum na tuam koih ding uh hi.
Mi a that khatpeuh peuh a tai theih nadingin Topa na Pasian un na neih dingun a hong piak leitang seh thumin khenin a lampite na bawl ding uh hi.

“Mi khat sing phuk dingin a vengpa tawh gamlakah pai-in, sing phuk dingin a khut tawh a hei vaanin, a heitang a ga panin kikhong-in a vengpa kha-in a sih bang danin, mi khat in sawm lohpi, a beisa hunah amah tawh kigal neihna om lopi-in a vengpa a sihsak khak leh, hih khuapite khatpeuh peuh ah amah tai-in a nuntakna hu thei ding hi;

tua bang hi kei leh, amah in a beisa hunah a vengpa tawh kigal neihna nei lo ahih manin sih nading thu om lo napi-in, a hehna tawh phu la nuampa in mi that kha-pa delhin lampi a gamlatna hangin amah pha-in a si dingin liamsak kha ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, khuapi thum tuam koih un, ci-in note thu kong pia hi.

8-9 Note in Topa na Pasian uh itin, ama lampi zuih tawntungna tawh tuni-a kong thupiak ahi hih thupiakna khempeuh lim takin na zuih uh a, amah in na pu na pate uh tungah a kiciam mah bangin Topa na Pasian un na gamgite uh hong keek sakin, na pu na pate uh piak dingin a ciam leitang note tungah hong piak leh, hih khuapi thum banah khuapi thum mah na behlap ding uh hi.
Tua hi kei leh Topa na Pasian un luah dingin note hong piak leitang tungah mawh baang lo mi kithat kha ding a, tua mi thahna hanga mawhna note tungah om ding hi.
“Ahih hangin mi khat in a vengpa mudahin, amah pang sim a, amah satin liam sakin a sihsak a, tua mipa hih khuapi khatpeuh peuh ah a tai leh,
ama khua upate in amah hong puakin hong paipih ding uh a, a sih theih nadingin phulapa tungah ap ding hi.
Note na nopsak theih nadingun amah hehpih loin, Israelte sung panin mi thatpa na beisak ding uh hi.
“Topa na Pasian un na neih dingun hong piak leitang tungah note’ kep ding na gamh luahna sung uhah khang lui mite in a phuhsa na vengte’ gi-suang na khin kei ding uh hi.

“Mi khat in a hih khak mawhna lian ahi a, khialhna khatpeuh peuh a gamtatna ah ahi zongin tua mipa’ langah teci khat guak kicing lo ding hi; teci nih ahih kei leh teci thum bang thugenna tawh mawhsakna kikipsak bek ding hi.
Elna lungsim a nei teci khat in mi khat gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhsak leh,
thu neite a lang nih tuakin, tua hun lai taka siampite leh thukhente mai, Topa mai-ah pai ding uh hi;
thukhente in lim takin kan ding uh a, teci-pa pen zuau teci hi-in, a man lopi-in a sanggampa mawhsak ahih leh,
a sanggampa tungah amah in hih dinga a sawm bang teekin ama tungah na hih ding uh hi; tua bangin note sung panin gitlohna na siangsak ding uh hi.
A om lai mite in za-in, lau-in, note lakah tua bang gitlohna bawl kik ngei nawn lo ding uh hi.
Amah na hehpih kei ding uh hi; nuntakna tang ding nuntakna, mit tang ding mit, ha tang ding ha, khut tang ding khut, khe tang ding khe hi ding hi.

“Na langte uh a do dingin pai-in sakolte leh leengte leh galkapte nomau’ aa sangin a tam zaw-in na muh uh ciangin amaute na kihta kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt gam panin note hong paikhiatpih Topa na Pasian uh note tawh hong om hi.
Gal nai na tun’ uh ciangin siampipa a mai-ah hong pai-in mite kiangah thu genin,
amaute kiangah, ‘Israelte aw, za un, tu ni-in na langte uh a do dingin na nai uh hi: na lungsim uh lausak kei un; lau kei un, liing kei un, amaute kihta kei un;
bang hang hiam cih leh note tungah gualzawhna a hong pia ding, na langte uh hong dosak dingin note tawh hong paikhawmpa in Topa na Pasian uh ahi hi,’ ci ding hi.
Tua ciangin uliante in mite kiangah thu genin, ‘Inn thak lam khinin a ap nai lo kua om na hi uh hiam? Gal sungah amah si-in midang khat in a inn ap kha ding ahih manin a innah ciahkik hen.
Leenggui lo kho khinin, a gah a ne nai lo kua om na hi uh hiam? Gal sungah amah si-in midang khat in a gah ne kha ding ahih manin a innah ciahkik hen.
A zi dingin lawm dong khinin a la nai lo kua om na hi uh hiam? Gal sungah si-in midang khat in tua numei la kha ding ahih manin a innah ciah kik hen,’ ci ding uh hi.
Uliante in mite kiangah thu gen thuah lai-in, ‘A lau a lungsim meidawi kua om na hi uh hiam? A lawmte meidawi lawh kha ding ahih manin a innah ciahkik hen,’ ci ding uh hi.
Uliante in mite kiangah thugen a man khit uh ciangin mite’ lutang dingin makai kiseh ding hi.
“A do dingin khuapi khatpeuh na nai uh ciangin kilem nading thu gen un.
Note hong dawn’na in kilem nading lam hi-in note kongpi hong hon uh leh, tua sunga om mi khempeuh in note adingin aana tawh nasemin, na na uh hong sepsak ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note tawh kilemna hong bawl loin note hong do leh, note in tua khua na umcih ding uh hi;
Topa na Pasian un note khut sungah hong piak ciangin pasal khempeuh namsau tawh na that ding uh hi;

ahih hangin numeite leh naupangte, ganhingte, khua sunga na dang khempeuh, a kinusiate khempeuh note adingin na la ding uh hi; Topa na Pasian un note hong piak ahi na langte uh vante na tang ding uh hi.
Hih lai-a minamte’ khuapi a hilo, note kiang panin a gamla khuapi khempeuh tungah tu-a bangin na hih ding uh hi.

16-18 Ahih hangin, amau’ pasiante; na a sepna uhah ahih uh a kihhuai gamtatnate khempeuh note hong hilh theih loh nading leh tua bangin Topa na Pasian uh tungah na khialh theih loh nadingun, Topa na Pasian un luah dingin note tungah hong piak hih mite’ khuapi sungah hu a diik khempeuh na hing khawi kei ding uh a, Topa na Pasian uh hong thupiaksa bangin Hit mite leh Amor mite, Kanaan mite leh Perez mite, Hiv mite leh Jebus mite, a vekpi-in amaute na susia mang ding uh hi.

“Khuapi khat na lak theih nadingun do-in sau veipi na umcih uh hangin, hei zatna tawh a singgah kungte na susia kei ding uh hi; a gahte na ne thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na phuk kei ding uh hi. Gam lak-a om singkungte in note’ sukgawp dingin na galte uh ahi hiam?
Note hong do khuapi a tuk mateng umcihna-in na zat dingun nek dinga kizang lo singkung hi, ci-a na theih teng bek uh susia in na phuk thei ding uh hi.
“Topa na Pasian un note’ neih dingin hong piak leitangah mi khat kithatin, gamlakah lum a, a that a kitheih kei leh,
na upate uh leh na thukhente uh hong paikhia-in, a kithat mipa’ omna kiim-a khuapite a gamlatna teh ding uh hi;
tua ciangin a kithat mipa’ omna tawh a kinaipen khuapi upate in a kisin nai lo, kol a kai nai lo bawngla khat la ding uh hi.
Tua khuapi upate in a kikho nai lo, khaici a kivawh nai lo, tui luang a omna kuam khatah a bawngla paipih suk ding uh a, tua kuam sungah bawngla ngawng attan ding uh hi.

Topa na Pasian un Levi mi siampite ama’ na a sem ding leh Topa’ min tawh thupha a pia dingin teel khin ahih manin amaute hong pai ding uh a, ki-thuneihna leh kitotna peuhmah amau’ thu tawh kiveng sak ding hi.
A kithat mipa tawh a kinaipen khuapi upate khempeuh in kuam sunga ngawng a kitan bawngla tungah a khut uh sil ding uh hi;
amaute in teci pangin, ‘Kote in hih mipa ka that kei uh hi, a kithah lam zong ka thei kei uh hi.

Topa aw, na tatkhiatsa Israel mite’ mawhna hong maisak in, mawhna nei lo mipa a kithahna hanga mawhna na Israel mihingte hong thuaksak kei in; mi thahna hanga mawhna panin hong maisak in,’ ci ding uh hi.
Topa muhna ah a manin na gamtat uh ciangin note lak panin mawhna nei lo mi thahna hanga mawhna tua bangin na siangsak ding uh hi.
“Na galte uh a do dingin pai khia-in, Topa na Pasian un note’ khut sungah amaute hong pia a, amaute sal-in na mat ciangun,
salte lakah numei a melhoih khat mu-in, tua nu deihin na zi dingin na lak nop leh,
na innah tua numei na ciahpih ding a, amah in a lu meet-in a cinte tan ding hi.
Amah in sal hihna puan suahkhia-in, na innah om ding a, a nu leh a pa hangin kha khat bit kap ding hi; tua khit ciangin amah na luppih thei ding a, nang in ama pasal hi-in, amah in na zi hi ding hi.
Tua ciangin, amah na deih kei leh, ama utna peuhah na paisak ding hi; ahih hangin amah daisak khin na hih manin sum-in amah zuak loin, sila bangin na bawl kei ding hi.
“Mi khat in zi nih nei a, khat itin a khat mudah a, a it leh a muhdah a zi tegel in ta nei tuakin, tapa a neih cil pen a muhdah nu tawh ahih leh,
a tapate tungah gamluah dingin ama neihsa a hawm ciangin, a muhdah nu’ tapa cil sangin deih zawkna hangin a it nu’ tapa pen a tacil-in bawl thei lo ding hi,
ama neihsa khempeuh tanh nih piakna tawh a muhdah nu’ tapa a tacil mahin sang ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuapa in a thahatna pana a piang masa pen ahi hi; tacil hihna za in ama aa ahi hi.
“Mi khat in a lungkhauh, a lehdo thei, a nu’ thu ahi a, a pa’ thu ahi zongin a mang lo, a tai hangun amau thu a ngai lo tapa khat a neih leh,
a nu leh a pa in tua mipa manin ama khuapi upate kiang, a teen’na mun kongpi-ah paipihin,
amaute in a khuapi upate kiangah, ‘Hih ka tapa uh lungkhauhin lehdo thei a, amah in ka thu uh hong mang lo hi; amah in anhai zuhai ahi hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin khuapi pasal khempeuh in suang tawh amah denglum ding uh hi; tua bangin note sung panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi; Israelte khempeuh in za-in lau ding uh hi.
“Mi khat in sihna daan thuak theih nading mawhna bawlin amah kithat a, sing tungah na khai uh leh,

zan tawntung sing tungah ama luang na omsak kei ding uh a, a ni mah-in na phum ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh khuam tungah a kikhai mi in Pasian’ hamsiat thuak ahi hi, Topa na Pasian un luah dingin note hong piakna na leitang uh na ninsak kei ding uh hi.
“Na mipihte’ bawngtal ahi a, a tuu ahi zongin a gammang na muh leh huh loin na om kei ding hi; a neipa kiangah na ciahpih kik ding hi.
Amah in na veng nai hi lo a, a nei na theih kei leh, na innah a gan na ciahpih ding a, a neipa in hong zon’ mateng na kem ding hi; hong zon’ ciangin na piakik ding hi.
Tua bangin a la zong na hih ding hi; tua bangin a puan na hih ding hi; tua bangin a mangsa na muh, na mipihte’ na a mang khatpeuh peuh na hih ding hi; huh loin na om kha kei ding hi.
Na mipihte’ la ahi a, a bawngtal ahi zongin lam gei-ah a kia na muh leh, tuate huh loin na om kei ding hi; tuate phottohsak kikna tawh amah na huh ding hi.
“Numei in pasal’ puan khatpeuh peuh zang lo ding a, pasal in zong numei’ puan silh lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih bang a hihte peuhmah Topa na Pasian uh tungah a kihhuai ahi hi.

“Vasa bu khat, sing tung ahi a, lei lak ahi zongin, a no ahi a, a tui ahi zongin omin, a pi in a no tawh a om ahi a, a op ahi zongin na muh khak zenzen leh, a pi pen a no tawh na la khawm kei ding hi;
a pi na khah ding a, nang adingin a no na la thei ding hi; hih in na nopsak nading, sau veipi na nuntak theih nading uh ahi hi.
“Na inn tung panin mi kia-in mi sihna hanga mawhna na inn sungah na tun’sak khak loh nadingin inn thak na lam ciangin na innkhum zangah tangban na khung ding hi.
“Na leenggui lo-ah khaici namnih na vawh kei ding hi, vawh lecin na vawhsa an leh na leenggui lo-ah a piang, a piang khempeuh biakna a, ding suak ding hi.
Bawngtal khat leh la khat tawh lo na kho khawm kei ding hi.
Samul leh khau, a kigan khawm puan na silh kei ding hi.
“Nangmah na kituamna na puanza kiu lite tungah puanmongteep na bawl ding hi.
“Mi khat in zi la-in, amah a luppih khit ciangin amah mudahin,
a zumhuai gamtatna tawh tua nu mawhsakin, ‘Keimah in hih numei ka la hi, amah tawh ka lupkhop ciangin ama sungah nungakna lim ka mu kei hi,’ cihna tawh tua nu tungah minsia a tut leh,
tua numei’ nu leh pa in a tanu uh’ nungakna lim a kilatna puan la khia-in upate kiang kongpi-ah paipih ding uh hi;
numei’ pa in upate kiangah, ‘Hih mipa tungah zi dingin ka tanu ka pia a, amah in mudah hi;

en un, “Na tanu sungah nungakna lim ka mu kei hi,’’ a cihna tawh a zumhuai-in amah mawhsak hi. Ahi zongin hihte in ka tanu’ nungakna a kilatna limte ahi hi,’ ci ding hi. Amaute in khua upate mai-ah a puan phah ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua khua upate in tua mipa la-in sat ding uh hi;

amaute in ngun shekel za khat daan pia ding uh a, numei’ pa tungah tuate pia ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Israel nungak tungah minsia tun’ hi; tua ciangin a numei in ama zi mah hi ding hi; a nuntak lai teng tua nu ma thei lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin a mawhsakna thu maanin, numei’ sungah nungakna lim a kimuh kei leh,

amaute in a pa’ inn kongah numei nu paipih ding uh a, ama khuapi pasalte in suang tawh amah denglum ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a pa’ inn sungah paktat gamtatna tawh Israel sungah haina tun’ hi; tua bangin note lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.
“Mi khat, midang khat’ zi tawh a lumkhawm a kimuh leh, numei tawh a lumpa leh a numei, a nih tuakun kithat ding hi; tua bangin Israel sung panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.
“A kidongsa nungak khat om a, mi khat in khuapi sungah tua nu tuakin amah tawh a lup leh,

tua khuapi kongpi ah amau tegel na paipih ding uh a, a numei khuapi sungah om napi-in mi’ huhna ngen dingin a kiko lohna hang leh, a pasal in a vengpa’ zi a va suksakna hangin, suang tawh a nih-un na denglum ding uh hi; tua bangin note lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.
“Ahih hangin mi khat in a kidongsa nungak khat gam lakah tuakin, mipa in tua nu buan-in a luppih leh, tua numei tawh a lum mipa bek si ding hi.
A numei’ tungah bangmah na hih kei ding uh hi; numei’ tungah sihna tawh daantah nading mawhna om lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu in mi khat in a vengpa do-in a thah tawh kibang hi;
hih mipa in gam lakah numei hih ahih manin, a kidongsa numei in huhna ngen dingin a kiko hangin amah a hon ding kuamah om lo hi.
“Mi khat in a kidong nai lo nungak khat tuakin, tua numei buan-in luppih a, amau tegel a kimuh leh,

numei tawh a lumpa in nungak’ pa tungah ngun shekel sawmnga pia ding a, tua numei ama zi hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a numei va su khin hi; a nuntak lai teng tua numei ma thei lo ding hi.
“Mi khat in a pa’ zi ten’pih lo ding a, a pa’ aa ahi numei tawh mawh lo ding hi.
“A ciltang a kitam ahih kei leh, a pasal na a cing lo mipa Topa ading kikhopna sungah lut lo ding hi.
“Zawlta peuhmah, Topa ading kikhopna sungah lut lo ding hi; a suan a khak khang sawmna dong nangawnin Topa ading kikhopna sungah tua bang mi kuamah lut lo ding hi.
“Ammon mite ahi a, Moab mite ahi zongin Topa ading kikhopna sungah lut lo ding uh hi; a khang sawmna dong nangawnun Topa ading kikhopna sungah lut thei ngei peuhmah lo ding uh hi;

bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt panin na paikhiat lai-un lampi ah an leh tui tawh amaute in note hong dawn lo uh a, note hong samsia dingin Mesopotamia gam Pethor khua panin Boer’ tapa Balaam cial uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa na Pasian un Balaam’ thu ngai lo hi; Topa na Pasian un note hong it ahih manin, samsiatna pen note adingin thupha-in hong heisak hi.
Amaute’ nopsak nading ahi a, a dau pai nading uh ahi zongin na khan’ tawnun kilemna na hanciam kei ding uh hi.

“Edom mite khatpeuh na mudah kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in na sanggam uh ahi hi; Izipt mi khatpeuh na mudah kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gamah peemta na hi ngei uh hi.
Amaute sung pana piang a khang thumna mite Topa’ ading kikhopna sungah lut thei ding uh hi.
“Na galte langah kuanin giahphual ah na om uh ciangin, siatna nam khempeuh panin nomau na kikem ding uh hi.
“Note lakah, zan sungin ama tungah thupiang hangin a siang lo mi a om leh giahphual pua lamah amah paikhia ding a, giahphual sungah hong pai lo ding hi;
ahih hangin nitak ciangin amahmah tui sungah kisil ding a, ni a tum ciangin giahphual sungah hong pai thei ding hi.
“Giahphual pua-ah mun khat na nei ding uh a, tua lai-ah na pai ding uh hi;
na galhiamte uh banah tulzum khat na nei ding uh hi; a pua lamah na tut uh ciangin tua tawh lei to-in, kihei-in na ek uh na vuk ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh note hong hon ding leh note mai-a na galte uh hong pia dingin Topa na Pasian uh na giahphual laizang uhah hong pai hi; tua ahih ciangin note lakah a kilawm lo nate a muh loh nading leh note kiang panin amah a paikhiat loh nadingin na giahphual uh siangtho ding hi.
“A topa kiang panin nang kiangah a hong tai sila a topa kiang mah ah na ap kik kei ding uh hi;
na khuapite uh lak panin ama teelna mun, ama lungkim penna, note lakah note tawh amah hong teeng ding hi; amah na nengniam kei ding uh hi.
“Israel ta numeite a paktat pawlin om lo ding uh a, Israel tapate zong a paktat pawlin om lo ding uh hi.

A paktatnu a kiguaihna sum ahi a, a paktatpa a kiguaihna sum ahi zongin thuciamna khatpeuh peuh piakna-in Topa note’ Pasian’ inn sungah na paipih kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih tegel in Topa note’ Pasian’ tungah a kihhuai ahi hi.
“Na sanggampa tungah a meetin, sumgum hita leh, ankhing hita leh, a meet ngaihsutna-in na khatpeuh peuh leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi.

Gamdang mi tungah a meetin leitawi na pia thei ding uh hi; ahih hangin na sanggampa tungah a meetin leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi; hih in note a luah dingin na tumna gam sungah Topa na Pasian un na sepna khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theih nading ahi hi.

“Topa note’ Pasian tungah thuciamna na bawl ciangun na ciamna uh tungsak loin na ommawk kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian un hong kal teekteek ding a, note tungah khialhna hong hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin thuciamna bawl ding pan na kikep uh leh note sungah khialhna om lo ding hi.
Na kam uh tawh na ciamsa uh thu pen Topa note Pasian tungah nomau ut-thu-a na ciam uh ahih manin na muk uh pana paikhia peuhmah na tun sak nadingun na ngaihsun ding uh hi.
“Na vengpa’ leenggui lo-ah na pai uh ciangin na ut zahzah na kham dong leenggah na ne thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na van sungah na guang kei ding uh hi.
Na vengpa’ ankung ding laite lakah na pai uh ciangin na khut uh tawh a vuite na zut thei ding uh a, ahih hangin phiaukawi tawh na vengpa’ ankung ding laite na at kei ding uh hi.

“Mi khat in zi la-in a ten’pih ciangin, tua nu tungah kilawm lohna a muh manin numei in a pasal mit-ah maipha mu lo a, amah in makna lai gelhin numei’ tungah pia-in ama inn panin sawlkhia a, a pasal’ inn panin amah kihem khia-in,
amah pai-in midang khat’ zi va suak a,
a pasal nunung in amah deih lo a, makna lai gelhin numei khut sungah koih a, a inn panin tua nu sawlkhia-in, tua ahih kei leh zi ding a, a la a pasal nunung a sih leh,

tua numei a hawlkhia a pasal masa in, tua nu a kinitsak khit ciangin, a zi dingin la kik thei nawn lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in Topa mai-ah kihhuaina hi a, Topa note Pasian un luah dinga hong piak leitang tungah mawhna na tun’pih kei ding uh hi.
“Mi khat in zi a neih tungin galkapte tawh kuankhia lo ding a, nasep khatpeuh peuh zong kisawl lo ding hi; a laksa zi tawh a lungdam khawm dingin innah kum khat sung maang ding hi.
“Kuamah in an gawina ahi a, an gawina suangpeek a tungnung ahi zongin khapna-in la lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh khapna-in nuntakna a la hi ding hi.
“Mi khat in Israel mi a sanggamte khat gu-in, amah in sila bangin bawl ahi a, a zuak ahi zongin a kimuh leh, tua gutapa si ding hi; tua bangin note lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.
“Phak natna hong tun’ ciangin Levi siampite in hong gen bangin na gamtat ding uh ngaihsun un; amaute ka thupiakna bangin na gamtat nadingun na kingaihsun ding uh hi.
Izipt panin na paikhiat lai-un lampi ah Topa na Pasian un Miriam tungah a hihna phawk un.
“Na vengte tungah na khatpeuh peuh leitawi na piak uh ciangin ama hong khapna a la dingin a innah pai kei un.
A pua lamah na ding ding uh a, leitawi na piakna mipa in nang kiangah a na khap hong paipih ding hi.
Amah mizawng ahih leh ama hong khap puan nuai-ah na lum kei ding uh hi;
ni a tum ciangin, a puanza nuai-ah amah lumin nang thupha hong piak theih nadingin tua hong na khap ama kiangah na piakik ding uh hi; tua in Topa note’ Pasian mai-ah note adingin thumanna hi ding hi.
“A zawng a cimawh a kicial nasempa, na sanggamte khat ahi a, na gam sung na khuapite sunga om peemta khatpeuh peuh ahi zongin, na nengniam kei ding uh hi;

a sep ni-in ama thaman, ni tum ma-in na pia ding uh hi (bang hang hiam cih leh amah zawng hi, tua bek ah amah kinga hi); tua hi kei leh, note langah Topa tungah amah kiko ding a, note na mawh ding uh hi.
“Tate’ tangin pate kithat lo ding a, pate’ tangin zong tate kithat lo ding hi; mi khempeuh ama khialhna hang bekin kithat ding hi.
“Peemta ahi a, pa nei lo mi thu ahi zongin tuate ading thutang na heisak kei ding uh a, meigong numei’ puan zong khapna na-in na lak sak kei ding uh hi;
Izipt ah sila na hihna uh leh Topa note Pasian in tua lai panin hong tatkhiatna na phawk ding uh hi; tua ahih manin hih banga na gamtat nading uh thu kong pia hi.

“Na lo-ah an la-in lo lai ah anlom na mangngilh uh ciangin a tawm dingin na paikik kei ding uh hi; tua in peemta, pa nei lo, leh meigong numeite’ ading ahi uh hi; hih in Topa note Pasian in na khut tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah note thupha hong piak theih nading ahi hi.
No oliv kungte na sat uh ciangin a hiangte na sat kikkik kei ding uh hi; tua in peemta, pa nei lo, leh meigong numeite ading ahi hi.
Na leenggui lo panun leenggah na kaihkhop uh ciangin a sang na nung khop kik kei ding uh hi; tua in peemta, pa nei lo, leh meigong numeite ading ahi hi.
Izipt gamah sila na hihna uh na phawk ding uh hi; tua ahih manin hih banga na gamtat nading uh thu kong pia hi.
“Mite kikalah thu kineihna om a, thukhen zumah amaute pai-in, thukhente in amau’ thu khensakin, a dikpa khahin a mawhpa lelsak a,
a mawhpa satna thuak dinga kilawm ahih leh, thukhenpa in amah lumsuk sakin a khialhna zahin ama muhin sat sak ding hi.
Sat sawmli kipia thei ding a, ahih hangin tua val hi lo ding hi; tua hi kei leh, hih sangin a tamvei zaw mi khat in sat lai lai leh note muhna ah na sanggampa uh a kineubawl suak ding hi.
“Bawng in an a cil ciangin a muk na tuam kei ding uh hi.

“Sanggam pasalte teeng khawmin, tuate khat si-in tapa a neih kei leh, a sipa’ zi pen innkuan pua lam khualmi tawh kiteeng lo ding hi; a pasal’ sanggampa in luppih-in a zi dingin amah la ding a, ama tungah pasal’ sanggampa’ nasep sem ding hi.
Ama min Israel panin a kiphiat loh nadingin tua nu in a neih masak a tapa in a pasal’ sanggampa a sisa-pa’ min zom ding hi.

Mipa in a sanggampa’ zi a lak nop kei leh, a sanggampa’ zi kongpi-ah upate kiangah pai ding a, ‘Ka pasal’ sanggampa in a sanggampa’ min Israel sungah a zop ding ut lo hi; pasal’ sanggampa’ nasep kei tungah hong sem lo hi,’ ci ding hi.
Tua ciangin mipa’ khuapi upate in amah samin, amah thu genpih ding uh hi; amah in, ‘Tua nu ka la nuam kei hi,’ a cih teitei leh,

tua ciangin upate’ omin a sanggampa’ zi ama kiangah paito-in a khe panin a khedap kaihkhiat sakin a maitang cil phih ding hi; tua ciangin tua nu in, ‘A sanggampa’ innkuan a zomto lo mipa hih bangin kibawl ta hen,’ ci khia ding hi.
Israel lakah ama innkuan pen, A khedap a kikaih khiatsak mipa’ innkuan, kici ding hi.
“Mi khat leh khat a kilai ciangin, a satpa’ kiang panin a pasal a honkhia dingin a khatpa’ zi hong pai a, a khut zanin a selsimte-in a mat leh,
tua nu’ khut na sattansak ding uh hi; amah na hehpih kei ding uh hi.
“Na ip sung uhah tawisuang nam nih, a gik leh a zang, na neikhawm kei ding uh hi.
Na inn sung uhah tehna nam nih, a lian leh a neu, na neikhawm kei ding uh hi.
Tawisuang a cing a man na nei ding uh a, tehna a cing a man na nei ding uh hi; tua in Topa note’ Pasian in hong piak leitangah na khan’ uh a sau theih nading ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang na a hihte khempeuh, a man lo-a a gamtate khempeuh, Topa note’ Pasian tungah a kihhuai ahi hi.
“Izipt panin nong paikhiat lai-un lampi ah Amalek mite in note hong bawlna,
note gimin lungkhamin na om lai takun lampi ah a hong simna, leh note nungah a nunung khempeuh hong thahna uh phawk un; amaute in Pasian kihta lo uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa note Pasian in note’ neih dingin luahin hong piak leitang tungah, Topa na Pasian un na kiim uh a, na galte khempeuh panun tawlngakna hong piak ciangin, vantung nuai panin Amalek mite a kiphawkna na phiatkhia ding uh na mangngilh kei ding uh hi.
“Topa na Pasian un luah dingin a hong piak leitangah va pai-in, tua leitang luahin a tungah na teen’ uh ciangin,

Topa na Pasian un note hong piak leitang na lak uh, lei pana piang gah khempeuh panin a gah masa pawlkhat la-in lawh khat sungah na koih ding uh a, ama min na omsak nadingun Topa na Pasian un a teelna munah na pai ding uh hi.

Tua hun lai takin na a sem siampipa kiangah pai-in ama kiangah, ‘Topa in kote piak dingin ka pate uh tungah a ciam leitangah ka tun’ khitna uh thu tu ni-in Topa na Pasian kiangah kong ko hi,’ na ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in note khut panin a lawh hong sang ding a, Topa note’ Pasian biakna tau mai-ah koih ding hi.

“Topa note’ Pasian mai-ah kam pau-in, ‘A vak kawikawi kote’ pupi in Aram mi ahi hi; amah Izipt ah paisukin tua munah a peem lai-in mi tawmno ahi hi; tua lai-ah amah a lian, a thahat, tampi a pha minam khat suak hi.
Iziptte in kote hong ngongbawlin hong gimsak a, ko tungah a haksa salsuahna hong guan uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka pu ka pate uh Pasian ahi Topa Pasian’ tungah ka kiko uh a, Topa in kote’ aw hong za-in, ka gimnate, ka nasepnate leh hong nenniamnate uh a mu hi;
Topa in a vangliatna leh a thahatna, launa lianpi, lim leh nalamdangte tawh Izipt panin kote hong paikhiatpih hi;
amah in hih mun hong tun’pihin, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na gam hih leitang ko tungah hong pia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin en in, Topa, nangmah in kote nong piaksa ahi leitang panin a gah sung pan a min masa kong paipih uh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa note’ Pasian mai-ah na koihsuk ding uh a, Topa note’ Pasian mai-ah na bia ding uh hi;
Topa note’ Pasian in note leh na innkuanpite uh tungah hong piak na a hoih khempeuhte hangin note leh Levi mite leh note lakah a om peemtate na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.

“Sehsawm suah sehkhat piak kum ahi a kum thumna kumin, amaute in na khuapite uh sungah an ne-in gilvahin a om theih nadingun Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote, leh meigong numeite tungah na piak uh, na khawhsa uh sehsawm suah sehkhat na piak khit uh ciangin,

Topa note’ Pasian mai-ah, ‘Ka inn sung panin a siangtho ding teng ka tuamkoih khin hi, tua tham loin kei nong sawlna bangin na thupiaknate khempeuh tawh kizui-in Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote, leh meigong numeite tungah ka pia khin hi; hih tungtangah na thupiakna khat zong ka khial kei a, ka mangngilh zong om lo hi;

dah-in ka kah sungin sehsawm suah sehkhat ka ne kei hi, ka nit sungin zong ka khenkhia kei hi, misite tungah zong ka pia kei hi; Topa ka Pasian’ thu ka mang hi, kei nong thupiakna khempeuh bangin ka hih khin hi.

Vantung, nangma omna a siangtho panin hong ensuk in la, kote’ pu leh pate tungah bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na gam na ciam mah bangin, na mihing Israelte leh kote nong piaksa leitang thupha hong pia in,’ na ci ding uh hi.

“Tu ni-in Topa na Pasian un hih thukhamte leh ngeina kipte na zuih ding uh note tungah thu hong pia hi; tua ahih ciangin na lungsim khempeuh leh na nuntakna khempeuh tawh na hih ding uh lim takin na ngaihsun ding uh hi.
Tu ni-in, Topa in note’ Pasian ahihna leh note in ama lampite tawnin, ama thukhamte leh ama thupiaknate leh ama ngeina kipte zui-in, ama thu na man’ ding uh na gen khin uh hi;
tu ni-in Topa in note pen amah in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin ama neih ding a manpha mi na hihna uh, leh note in ama thupiaknate khempeuh na zuih nading uh,

ama bawlsa minamte khempeuh sangin phatna leh minthan’na leh pahtawina ah lianzaw-in hong koih nading, leh ama gensa mah bangin Topa note’ Pasian adingin a siangtho mi na hih nading uh hong gen khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Moses leh Israel upate in mite thu pia-in, “Tu ni-a note kong piak thupiakna khempeuh na zui ding uh hi.
Topa na Pasian un note hong piak leitangah pai dingin Jordan na kantan ni-un suangtumpite na phut ding uh a, buan tawh na zut ding uh hi;

na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi Topa in note tungah hong ciam mah bangin bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na leitang, Topa na Pasian un note hong piakna gamah lut dingin na galkah uh ciangin tua suangte tungah hih thute na gelh ding uh hi.
Jordan na galkah khit uh ciangin Ebal Mual tungah tu-ni a, kong thupiakna tawh kisai-in hih suangte na phut ding uh a, buan tawh na zut ding uh hi.
Tua lai-ah Topa na Pasian uh adingin biakna tau, suang kibawl biakna tau khat na bawl ding uh hi; tuate tungah sik tawh a kibawl na zatte na liik kei ding uh hi.
Topa na Pasian uh adingin a kiseek lo suangtumte tawh biakna tau na bawl ding uh hi; tua biakna tau tungah Topa na Pasian uh adingin meihal biaknate na pia ding uh hi;
tua ciangin thunuam-a biaknate na pia ding uh a, tua lai munah na ne ding uh hi; Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah na lungdam ding uh hi.
Hih thute khempeuh tua suang kiphut tungah kitel takin na gelh ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses leh Levi siampite in Israelte khempeuh tungah, “Israelte aw, gamdai un la, ngai un; tu ni-in Topa note’ Pasian mi na suak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa note’ Pasian thu mangin, tu ni-a note kong piak ama thupiaknate leh ama thukhamte na zui ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Moses in tua ni mah-in mite thuhilhin,
“Jordan na galkah khit uh ciang mite thupha a pia dingin Gerizim Mual tungah a ding ding minamte in: Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakhar, Josef leh Benjamin ahi hi.
Ebal Mual tungah hamsia a pia dingin a ding ding minamte in: Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan leh Naftali ahi hi.
Levi mite in awging lianpi tawh Israel mite khempeuh tungah hih bangin ci ding uh hi:

“Topa adingin a kihhuai ahi, khutsiampa khut tawh a kibawl, a kiseek ahi a, a kisung ahi zongin milim bawlin, mun simtham ah a koih mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a zahtak lo mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘A vengpa’ gi-suang a botkhia mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Mittaw-pa lam a lak khial mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Peemta, pa nei lo, leh meigong numeite ading thutang a heikhiatsak mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Amah in pa tungah maizumna tun’ ahih manin, a pa’ zi tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Ganhing khatpeuh peuh tawh nu-le-pa mawhna a bawl mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘A nu’ tanu ahi a, a pa’ tanu ahi zongin a sanggamnu tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘A sungnu tawh a lum khawm mipa in gimna ngah ta hen’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘A vengpa a thatsim mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Mawhna baang lopa that dingin sumgolh a la mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Hih thute zuihna tawh hih thu a kipsak lo mipa in gimna ngah ta hen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.

“Note in Topa na Pasian uh thu mangin, tu ni-a note kongpiak ahi ama thupiakna khempeuh lim takin na zuih uh leh, Topa na Pasian un leitung minam dang khempeuhte sangin a lianzaw-in note hong bawl ding hi.
Topa na Pasian uh thu na man’ uh leh hih thuphate khempeuh no tungah hong tungin note hong ban ding hi.
Khuapi sungah thupha ngah mi na hi ding uh a, gamlakah zong thupha ngah mi mah na hi ding uh hi.
Note’ sung pana piangte, leh na leitang pan uh a, gahte, leh na ganhing pan uh a, piang na bawngte uh pungin, na tuuhonnote uh tungah thupha om ding hi.
Na seengte uh leh na annel meekna kuangte uhah thupha om ding hi.
Na sungtum uh ciangin thupha na ngah ding uh a, na pusuah uh ciangin zong thupha na ngah ding uh hi.
“Topa in, note langah hong pang na galte uh na mai uhah lelhna thuak sak ding hi; amaute lampi khat tawnin hong kuan ding uh a, note mai panin lam sagih tawnin taikeek ding uh hi.
Topa in note’ ansal tung leh na hihna khempeuh uhah thupha hong puak ding hi; Topa na Pasian un note hong piakna leitangah amah in note tungah thupha hong pia ding hi.
Note in Topa na Pasian uh hong thupiaknate zui-in ama lampi na tot uh leh amah in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin ama adingin a siangtho mi dingin Topa in note hong kipsak ding hi.
Topa’ min tawh note hong kisapna thu leitung mi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi; amaute in note hong kihta ding uh hi.

Note piak dingin na pu na pate uh tungah Topa in a ciamna gam sungah note’ sung pana piangte, na bawng pan uh a, piangte leh na leitang pan uh a, gahte ah Topa in note nakpi takin hong hau sak ding hi.

Note leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding leh na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dingin Topa in a na hoih kholna vantung note adingin phal takin hong hon’ ding hi; note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uh hi.

13-14 Note in tu ni-a kong thupiak limtakin zuihna tawh Topa na Pasian uh thupiaknate mangin, tu ni-a note kong thupiakna kammalte panin, pasian dangte, na semin a zui dingin, vei lam hita leh tak lamah hita leh na pial kei nak uh leh, Topa in a makai-in note hong bawl ding a, mi’ nungzui-in hong bawl lo ding hi; tung lam bekah na kah ding uh a, na nuai kiat ngei kei ding uh hi.

“Ahih hangin note in Topa na Pasian uh thu mang loin, tu ni-a note kong piak ama thupiaknate leh ama thukhamte khempeuh lim takin na zuih kei uh leh, hih samsiatna khempeuh note tungah hong tung ding a, note hong ban ding hi.
Khuapi sungah hong kisamsia ding a, gam lakah zong hong kisamsia ding hi.
Na lawhte uh leh na annel meekna kuangte un zong samsiatna ngah ding hi.
Note’ sung pana piangte leh na leitang pan uh a, gahte, na bawngte uh a pun’na, leh na tuuhon note uh in zong samsiatna ngah ding hi.
Na sungtum ciangun hamsia na ngah ding uh a, na pusuah ciangun zong hamsia mah na ngah ding uh hi.
“Note in Topa na nusiat uh a, na gamtat siat uh leh, note sia-in na sihmang khit matengun Topa in note tungah samsiatna, buaina, thuhilhna hong tung sak ding hi.
A luah dingin na lutna uh leitang panin note hong beisak matengin note lakah pulnatna a tun’ nadingin Topa in bawl ding hi.
Topa in pulnatna, leh cisa natna, meima nasia, leh a sa mahmah natna, leh keutumna, leh huihpi mutgawpna, leh a nom tawh note hong vatgawp ding hi; note na siat mateng uh tuate in hong delh ding hi.
Na lu tung uh a, om vantungte in sumngo bangin san ding a, na nuai uh a, om leitung in sik bangin sak ding hi.
Topa in na gam sung uh a, guahte tang dingin leivui leh sehnel hong zusak ding hi; note na siat matengun vantung panin note tungah tuate hong kia suk ding hi.

“Topa in na galte uh mai-ah note hong lel sak ding hi; amaute do dingin lam khatah na kuan ding uh a, amau mai-ah lam sagih ah na taikeek ding uh hi; leitung kumpi gamte khempeuh muhna ah note in a cikzet-huai na hi ding uh hi.
Note’ luang hawmte in huih lak a, leeng vasate khempeuh leh leitunga ganhingte khempeuh’ an hi ding hi; amaute a bengkhia ding mihing om lo ding hi.
Topa in note na damkik theih lohna uh Izipt meimatumte, leh meima daite leh meima lip neite leh cithak tawh note hong vatgawp ding hi.
Topa in haina leh mittawtna leh lungsim buaina tawh note hong vatgawp ding hi;

mittaw in khuamial lakah khua a zawt bangin sun-in khua na zawt ding uh a, na hihnate uhah na mavang kei ding uh hi; note hong kinengniamin na nate uh hong kisut niloh ding a, note hong huh ding kuamah om lo ding hi.
Zi dingin lawm khat na dong ding uh a, midang khat in na luppih ding hi; inn na lam ding uh a, tua sungah na teeng kei ding uh hi; leenggui lo na zuan ding uh a, a gah na khawm kei ding uh hi.

Na muh tangpi-un na bawngtal uh kigo ding a, a sa na ne kha kei ding uh hi; note’ mai panin na la uh hong kingawh laksak ding a, note kiangah hong kipia kik lo ding hi; na tuute uh na galte uh tungah kipia ding a, note hong huh ding kuamah om lo ding hi.
Na tapate leh na tanute uh minam dangte’ tungah kipia ding a, amaute ngai-in sun nilohin na mit un enin gim ding hi; nomau’ tha tawh na dal zawh ding uh hi lo ding hi.
Na theih nai loh uh minam khat in na leitang panun a gahte leh na nasepsa khempeuh uh netum ding hi; note hong kinengniamin hong kisugawp tawntung lel ding hi;
tua ahih ciangin na mit un a muh ding nate in note hong hehsak mahmah ding hi.
Topa in note na kidamsak kik theih loh ding uh a nasia meimatumte tawh na khukte leh na khete uh meimasak gawpin, na khenuai panun na luzang dong uhah na thuak ding uh hi.

“Note leh na pu na pate un a theih ngei nai loh minam khat kiangah Topa in note leh note tungah na koih uh na kumpipa hong tun’pih ding hi; tua lai-ah sing leh suang tawh a kibawl pasian dangte’ na na sem ding uh hi.
Topa in note hong paikhiatpihna mite lakah a cikzet-huai, paunak, leh ciamnuihna na suak ding uh hi.
Khaici tampi lo-ah na tuh ding uh a, ahi zongin tawmno bek na khawm ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kauphe in nemang ding hi.
Note in leenggah lo zuanin na puah ding uh a, ahih hangin leenggahzu dawn loin, leenggah zong na ne kha kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh lung in tuate ne ding hi.
Na gam sung khempeuh uhah oliv kung na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin a thau tawh note na kizut kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na oliv gahte uh pulh ding hi.
Tanute leh tapate na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute in nomau’ aa hi lo ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute galmat suak ding hi.
Na singte khempeuh uh leh na lei pan uh a, a gahte khempeuh kauphete in tang ding uh hi.
Note lakah a om peemta mite sang semsem ding uh a, note na niam semsem ding uh hi.
Amah in note tungah leitawi hong pia ding a, note in ama tungah leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi; amah a makai hi-in, note a nungzui na hi ding uh hi.

Amah in note hong piak ama thu piaknate leh thukhamte zui loin, Topa na Pasian uh thu mang lo na hih manun, note na siat matengun hih samsiatnate khempeuh note tungah hong tungin, note hong delhin hong pha ding uh hi.
Note leh na suan leh khate uh tungah a tawntungin tuate in lim leh nalamdang hi ding hi.
“Hih a tampi nate khempeuh om napi-in note in lungdamna leh lungsim kipahna tawh Topa note’ Pasian nasem lo na hih manun,

Topa in note’ langah a hong sawl ding na galte uh’ na, gilkialna leh dangtakna, pum guak-a omna, leh na khempeuh kitangsapna tawh, na sem ding uh hi; na galte un note hong suksiat matengin note’ ngawng ah sik hakkol hong thuah ding hi.

49-51 Topa in a gamlapi leimong panin muvanlai leng banga a manlang, amau’ pau na theih loh uh minam, thukhualna a nei lo minam, khangham mite a zahtak lo, khangno mite tungah maipha zong a lak tuan lo minam khat, note’ langkhatah hong paipih ding a,

note na siat matengun amaute in na ganhingnote uh leh na leitang panun a piang gahte hong neksak ding uh hi; amaute in note hong beisak matengun note adingin an, leenggahzu, ahih kei leh sathau, na ganhingte uh ahih kei leh na tuuhonnote uh zong hong nusiat lo ding uh hi.

Na gam sung uh a, a om na muan’ uh a sang a muan’ huai na kulhpite uh a cip khit dong matengin na khuapite khempeuh sungah amaute in note hong umcih ding uh hi; Topa na Pasian un note hong piaksa na gam sung khempeuh uhah a om na khuapite khempeuh sung uhah note hong umcih ding uh hi.
Hong umcihna leh na galte un hong lungkhamsak nading ahi na lungkhamna hun uhah Topa na Pasian un note a hong piaksa na sung panun a piang na tate, na tanute leh na tapate’ sate na ne ding uh hi.
Note lakah a ngeksuak, a ci-thei pen mipa in a sanggampa, a it a zi, leh amah tawh a om a tate a nunung pen’ tungah an pia nuam lo ding hi;
na khuapite khempeuh sung uhah hong umcihna leh na galte un note hong lungkhamsak nading lungkhamna hun sungah amah in bangmah nei nawn lo ahih manin ama nek a tate’ sate kuamah hawm nuam lo ding hi.

56-57 Note lakah a om a ngeksuak, a ci-thei pen numei, amah ngek-in a ci neellua ahih manin a khenuai tawh lei sik ding a ngaihsun ngei vet lo nu in, a it a pasal, a tanu leh a tapa adingin, ama sung pana a piang a tate leh ama khe kikal-a a paikhia a nau-nungzuite phal lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hong umcihna leh na galte un na khuapite uhah note hong lungkhamsak nading lungkhamna sungah bangmah neih lohna hangin amah in tuate nesim ding hi.
“Hih a minthang, zahtakhuai min, Topa na Pasian uh na kihtak theih nadingun hih laibu sunga kigelh hih thute lim takin zuih ding na ngaihsut kei uh leh,
Topa in note leh na suan na khakte uh tungah nasia-in sau vei a om gimna, gimna a tuandiak, leh a nasia, nat saute hong tungsak ding hi.
Amah in note’ kihtak Izipt natnate note tungah hong tungsak kik ding hi; note tungah tuate hong belh ding hi.
Note na siat matengun hih thukham laibu sungah a kiciamteh lo natna leh gimna khempeuh zong, Topa in no tungah hong tung sak ding hi.
Note vantung aksite bangin a tam na hihna sung uhah tawmno bek na pha ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian uh thu na mang kei uh hi.

Topa in note tungah a hoih bawlna leh note tampi phasakna ah nuam a sak mah bangin, note tungah siatna tun’sakna leh note suksiatna ah zong Topa in nuamsa ding hi; a luah dingin na lutna uh leitang panin note hong kilakhia ding hi.

Topa in leimong khat panin mong khat, minamte’ lakah note hong thehthang ding hi; tua lai-ah note leh na pu na pate un a theih nai loh sing leh suang tawh a kibawl pasian dangte’ na na sem ding uh hi.
Hih minamte lakah ol tak-a nuntakna na mu kei ding uh a, kiptak a, na om nading uh gam na nei kei ding uh hi. Topa in tua lai-ah lungsim liin’na, mit gimna, leh nuntakna tha beina hong pia ding hi;
na nuntakna uh lunghimawh-in na om tawntung ding uh hi; sun leh zanin launa sungah na om ding uh a, nuntak lungmuan’na na nei kei ding uh hi.
Na lungsim un a kihtak launa leh na mit un a muh ding nate hangin, zingsangin, ‘Nitak hi leh! na ci ding uh a, nitakin, ‘Zingsang hi leh!’ na ci ding uh hi.

Note na zinkik ngei nawn kei ding uh hi, ci-a kong ciam khualzinna, Izipt gamah teembaw tawh Topa in note hong paipih kik ding hi; tua lai-ah sila numei leh sila pasal dingin na galte uh tungah na kizuak ding uh a, ahih hangin kuamah in note hong lei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte, Horeb ah amaute tawh thuciamna a bawlsa ban-ah, Israel mite tawh Moab gamah thuciamna a bawl dingin Topa in Moses a sawl, a thuciamna kammalte ahi hi.
Moses in Israelte khempeuh samin amaute kiangah, “Izipt gam sung note’ mit muh-ah, Topa in Faro tung leh ama nasemte khempeuh leh ama gam khempeuhah a bawlna,
note’ mit in a muhsa ze-etna lianpite, limte, tua nalamdang liante khempeuh na thei khin uh hi;
ahih hangin tu ni dongin Topa in note tungah a thu na tel nading uh lungsim hita leh, na muh nading uh mit hita leh, na zak nading uh bil hita leh hong pia nai lo hi.
Kum sawmli sung gamlakah note hong makaih khin hi; note tung panin na puante uh sia nai lo a, na khe panun zong na khedapte uh sia nai lo hi;
Topa pen na Pasian uh ahihna na theih nadingun nek ding anlum, leh dawn ding leenggahzu ahi a, kham theih zu ahi zongin na ne nai kei uh a, ahi zongin na kisapna teng uh hong pia hi.
Hih mun na tun’ uh ciangin Heshbon kumpipa Sihon leh Bashan kumpipa Og, eite a do dingin hong kuankhia uh a, ahih hangin amaute i zo hi;
amaute’ leitang i la a, Reuben mite, Gad mite, leh Manasseh minam a langte tungah luah dingin i pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na hihna khempeuh uhah na daupai theih nadingun hih thuciamna kammalte khempeuh lim takin na zuih ding uh na ngaihsun ding uh hi.

10-13 “Topa na Pasian un tu ni-in note tawh a bawl, Topa na Pasian uh’ thuciamna sungah note na lut theih nading, tu ni-in amah in ama mi dingin note hong kipsak theih nading, leh note tungah hong ciamna leh na pu na pate uh Abraham, Isaak leh, Jakob tungah a kiciamsa bangin amah in note’ Pasian ahih theih nadingin, na minam lutangte, na upate, na uliante, Israel mi pasal khempeuh, na ta neute, na zite, na giahphual uhah a om peemta, na sing uh hong tomsakin na tui uh hong tawisakte akipan note khempeuh, tu ni-in Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah na ding uh hi.
Hih kiciamna note bek tawh a bawl hi lo a,
tu ni-in eite tawh Topa i Pasian’ mai-ah a ding mite tawh a bawl mah bangin tu ni-in eite tawh a om nai lo i suan i khakte tawh zong a bawl ahi hi.
“Izipt gam i teen’na leh note in na nawk uh minamte lakah i paina na thei uh hi;
a muhdahhuai amau’ na, sing leh suang a kibawl, ngun leh kham a kibawl, amaute lakah a om a milimte uh na mu khin uh hi.

18-19 Note lakah numei ahi a, pasal ahi a, innkuan ahi a, minam khat ahi zongin, tua minamte’ pasian na a sem dingin Topa i Pasian kiang panin tu ni-in a lungsim a heikhia a om khak ding kidawm un; tua hi kei leh note lakah gu a nei gah kha a gah singkung hong bang ding a, hih kiciamna kammalte za napi-in a lungsim ah amah thupha kipia tawmin, ‘Ka lungsim khauhna tawh ka gamta zongin ka suakta veve ding hi,’ a ci hong om kha ding hi. Hih in mihoih leh misia, a kibangin phiatkhiatna hong suak sak ding hi.

Topa in amah maisak lo ding a, Topa’ hehna tawh hazatna meikhu tua mipa’ lang khatah khu zawin, hih laibu sunga kigelh samsiatnate ama tungah tung ding a, Topa in vantung nuai panin ama min phiat ding hi.
Topa in hih thukham laibu sunga a kigelh thuciam samsiatnate khempeuh tawh kizui-in gimna thuak dingin Israel minam khempeuh lak panin amah tengkhia ding hi.
Hong khang lai ding mi, note nungah hong piang na tate uh leh a gamla panin hong pai gamdang mi in tua gam in a gim ngahna leh Topa in a natsakna cinatnate a muh uh ciangin—

a gambup in kaat leh ci, leh nin a kangtum, khai kituh lo, bangmah po lo, lopa zong a po zawh lohna mun Sodom leh Gomorrah, Admah leh Zeboi-im bangin a kilawnthal gawp, a hehna leh a sinsona tawh Topa’ lotgawpte tawh kibang hi, ci ding uh hi—
hi hi, minamte khempeuh in bang hangin Topa in hih bangin hih gam bawl ahi hiam? Hih hehna lian in bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?’ ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin mite in, ‘Amah in Izipt gam panin a paikhiatpih lai-in amaute tawh a bawl, a pu a pate uh Pasian ahi Topa’ thuciamna amaute in nusia in,
a theih nai loh uh pasiante leh amah in amaute tungah a piak loh pasian dangte, na va semin a biakna hang uh ahi hi;
tua ahih ciangin a mite tungah Topa’ hehna kitawh kuang a, hih laibu sunga om samsiatnate khempeuh hih leitang tungah tungsak hi;
Topa in hehna, sinsona, lungham mahmahna tawh a leitang panun amaute zunglot a, tu ni-a i muh bangin amaute gamdangah lawn hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
“Topa i Pasian in hong lahkhiat loh thusim om a, ahih hangin hih thukham sunga thute khempeuh i zuih theih nadingin a hong lahkhiat thute, eite leh i suan i khakte’ zuih tawntung ding ahi hi.
“Note mai-ah ka koih, na teel ding uh thupha leh samsiatna, hih nate khempeuh note tungah hong tungin, Topa in note hong hawlkhiatna minamte lakah hih thute phawk kikin,
Topa note’ Pasian kiangah note leh na suan na khakte uh pai kikin, na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh tu ni-a note kong thupiak ahi ama thute na man’ uh ciangin,
Topa na Pasian un note na ngei uh hong bangsak kikin, note tungah hehpihna hong nei ding a, Topa na Pasian un note hong thehthangna minamte’ lak panin amah in note hong kaikhawm kik ding hi.
A kihawlkhia na mite uh vanmong pekah a om leh zong, Topa na Pasian un tua lai panin note hong khawmin, tua lai panin amah in hong paipih kik ding hi;
note in na neih theih nadingun, na pu na pate uh neih leitangah Topa na Pasian un hong paipih ding hi; na pu na pate uh sangin a ci-thei zaw a tam zaw-in amah in note hong bawl ding hi.

Note in na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh Topa na Pasian uh itin na hin’ theih nadingun, Topa na Pasian un note leh na suan leh khakte uh tungah thuman’ nopna lungsim hong guan ding hi.
Topa na Pasian un hih samsiatnate khempeuh, no hong bawlsia na galte uh leh na langte uh tungah tungsak ding hi.
Note in Topa’ thu mang kikin, tu ni-a note kong piak ama thupiaknate khempeuh na zui ding uh hi.

9-10 Note in hih thukham laibu sunga kigelh ama thupiaknate leh ama thukhamte zuih ding ahi, Topa na Pasian uh thu na man’ uh a, na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh Topa na Pasian uh lamah na kihei uh leh, Topa na Pasian un na sepna khempeuh uh, note’ suan leh khakte, leh na ganhingte uh panin a piangte, leh na leitang panun a piang khempeuh ah nakpi takin hong daupai sak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na pu na pate uh tungah amah a lungkim mah bangin note tungah Topa hong lungkim kik ding a, note hong daupai sak kik ding hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh tu ni-a note kong piak hih thupiakna in note adingin a haksa lua hi lo a, na zuih lah ding uh zong hi lo hi.
Note in, ‘Eite in a thu za-in i sep theih nadingin kua in vantungah eite adingin hong paisakin hong laksak ding ahi hiam?’ na cih theih nadingun vantunga om hi lo hi.
Note in, ‘Eite in a thu za-in i sep theih nadingin kua in tuipi gal khatah hong paisakin hong laksak ding ahi hiam?’ na cih theih nadingun tuipi gal-a om zong hi lo hi.
A thu in hong nai mahmah hi; note in na zuih theih nadingun na kam sung uh leh na lungsim sung uhah om hi.
“Mu un, tu ni-in na teel dingun note mai-ah nuntakna leh hauhna, sihna leh siatna ka koih khin zo hi.

Topa na Pasian uh itna, ama lampite totna, ama thupiaknate leh ama thukhamte leh ama ngeina kipte zuihna tawh, tu ni-a no tungah kong piak ahi Topa na Pasian uh thupiaknate na man’ uh leh, note nungta-in tampi na pha ding uh a, a luah dingin note na lutna uh leitang tungah Topa na Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi.
Ahih hangin na lungsim uh kihei-in, note in zui loin, pasian dangte bia ding leh a na sem dingin note hong kikaihkhiat leh,
tu ni-in note tungah hih thu kong gen hi, note na sia ding uh hi; Jordan kantanin note a lut ding leh a nei dingin na paina uh leitang tungah sau vei na nungta kei ding uh hi.

Tu ni-in note lang khat ah teci a pang dingin vantung leh leitung ka sam a, note mai-ah na teel dingun nuntakna leh sihna, thupha leh samsiatna ka koih hi; tua ahih ciangin note leh na suan leh khakte uh na hin’ theih nadingun nuntakna teel un la,

Topa na Pasian uh itin, ama thu mangin, amah beel un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in na pu na pate uh Abraham, Isaak, leh Jakob tungah piak dingin a kiciamsa leitangah note na teen’ theih nadingun tua in note adingin nuntakna leh khan’ sauna ahi hi,” a ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Israelte khempeuh tungah hih thute a gen zom lai hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu ni-in kei kum za leh kum sawmnih ka pha hi; note kong mapi zo nawn kei hi. Topa in kei kiangah, ‘Hih Jordan gal khatah na pai kei ding hi,’ hong ci zo hi.

Topa na Pasian mahmah uh note’ mai-ah hong galkah ding hi; note mai-ah hih minamte amah in susia ding a, note in amaute na suankhia ding uh hi; Topa’ gensa bangin note’ mai-ah Joshua hong galkah ding hi.
Topa in amaute a suksiat lai-a, Amor kumpi Sihon leh Og tung leh amau’ leitang tungah a bawl bangin amaute tungah bawl ding hi.
Topa in note tungah amaute hong pia ding a, note kong piak thupiaknate khempeuh tawh kizui-in amaute tungah na bawl ding uh hi.
Thahat un la, hang un, lau kei un la, amaute kihta kei un: bang hang hiam cih leh note tawh hong paipa in Topa na Pasian uh ahi hi; note hong cimawhsak lo ding a, hong nusia lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in Joshua samin, Israelte khempeuh muhin ama kiangah, “Thahat in la, hang in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tungah piak dingin Topa in amau pute pate’ tungah a ciamsa leitangah hih mite tawh na pai ding hi; nangmah in tua leitang amaute na ngah sak ding hi.
Na mai-ah a paipa in Topa ahi hi; amah in nang tawh hong om ding a, nang hong cimawhsak loin, zong hong nusia lo ding hi; lau kei in la, lungkia kei in,” a ci hi.
Moses in hih thukham gelhin, Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a pua Levi mi siampite leh Israel upate khempeuh tungah pia hi.
Moses in amaute thupia in, “Kum sagih a cin’ sim, a kisehsa suahtak sakna hun, buk pawi hunin,
amah in a teelna mun Topa na Pasian uh mai-ah a kilaak dingin Israelte khempeuh a pai ciangin, amau’ zakin Israelte khempeuh mai-ah hih thukham na sim ding uh hi.

12-13 Jordan gal khatah a luah dingin na paina gam uhah na nuntak lai tengun amaute in a thu za-in Topa na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nading, leh hih thukham thute khempeuh lim takin a sep theih nading, leh hih thu a thei nai lo amau’ tate in Topa na Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nadingun, numei, pasal, leh naupangte, leh na khuapite uh sunga om peemtate, mi khempeuh khawm un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah, “En in, na sih ding hun hong nai ta hi; Joshua sam in la, amah ka sawl theih nading kikhopna buk sungah hong om un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses leh Joshua pai-in kikhopna buk sungah va om uh hi.
Tua ciangin meii khuam omna puanbuk sungah Topa kilang hi; meii khuam in puanbuk kong gei-ah ding hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Moses kiangah, “En in, na pu na pate kiang a zuan ding na hi ta hi; nang’ om nawn loh ciangin hih mite in a paina uh mite lakah a gam sung pasiante tawh paktat ding uh a, amaute in kei hong nusia in amaute tawh ka bawl ka thuciamna uh siasak ding uh hi.

Tua hun ciangin amaute tungah ka hehna so-in, amaute nusia-in ka mai ka seel ding a, amaute beimang ding uh hi; tua ni ciangin amaute in, ‘Eite lakah i Pasian a om loh manin hih siatnate i tungah hong tung hilo ahi hiam? a cih theih nadingun amaute tungah siatna leh gimna tampi tung ding hi.
Amaute pasian dangte lamah kihei uh ahih manin amau’ gamtatnasa siatnate khempeuh hangin tua hun ciangin ka mai ka seel taktak ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin hih la gelh in la, Israel mite hilh in; hih la in kei’ adingin Israel mite lang khatah teci ahih theih nadingin amaute tungah hih la hilh in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a pu a pate’ uh tungah piak dinga ka kiciamna, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na gamah amaute tunpih khinin, amaute in ne-in khamin a thau khit uh ciangin, pasian dangte lamah amaute kihei-in a na semin, kei hong simmawhin ka thuciamna siasak ding uh hi.

Siatna leh haksatnate amaute tungah a tun’ ciangin hih la in teci-in amaute lang khatah pang ding hi (bang hang hiam cih leh a suan leh khakte un mangngilh lo ding uh hi); bang hang hiam cih leh piak dingin ka kiciam leitangah amaute ka paipih ma-in, amau’ vaihawm kholh a ngimnate uh ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni mahin Moses in hih la gelh a, Israel mite hilh hi.
Topa in Nun’ tapa Joshua sawlin, “Thahat in la, hang in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute piak dingin ka kiciam leitang tungah Israel mite na paipih ding hi; nang tawh kong om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in a bei dongin hih thukham kammalte laibu sunga gelh a man ciangin,
Moses in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a pua Levi mite thu pia a,
“Hih thukham laibu la un la, note lang khatah teci dingin a om theih nadingin Topa na Pasian uh thuciamna singkuang gei-ah koih un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a lehdo mite leh a lungkhauh mite na hihna uh ka thei hi; en un, note tawh kei a nungta khawm laipi mahin, tu ni-in Topa na lehdo khin uh hi; ka sih khit ciangin bangzah takin lehdo zawlai ding na hi uh hiam!
Hih thute amaute’ bil-ah genin, amau’ lang khatah teci a pang dingin vantung leh leitung ka sap theih nadingin na minam upate leh na uliante khempeuh uh kei kiangah hong khawm un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sih khit ciangin note gamtat sia-in, note kong sawlna lampi panin na pial taktak ding lam uh ka thei hi; note’ nasepna tawh amah hehsakin, Topa muhna ah a sia gamta ding na hih manun, hong pai ding hunte ah note tungah gimna hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin hih la malte a bei dongin Israel a kikhawm khempeuhte’ zakin Moses in gen hi:
“Vantungte aw, ngai un, thu ka gen ding hi; ka thugente leitung in za hen.
Ka thuhilhna in guahmal bangin zu-in, ka thugenna daitui bangin kia hen la, longeek tunga guah phin leh ankung tunga guahzu bang ta hen.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ min ka phat ding hi. Eite’ Pasian a liatna gen un!
“Eite belh Suangpi, a nasepna kicing a, ama sepna khempeuh thumanna ahi hi. Thumanna nei-in, mawhna a nei lo Pasian hi a, amah thutangin thuman hi.
Amaute in ama tungah gamtat sia uh a, amaute’ sitban’na hangin amaute in ama tate hi nawn lo uh hi; amaute in a lampial, lungsim kawi khang mite ahi uh hi.
A hai, ngaihsutna nei lo mite aw, tua bangin Topa thuk ding na hi uh hiam? Amah in, note a hong piangsak, note hong bawlin a hong kipsak, na Pa uh hilo ahi hiam?
A beisa hunte phawk un la, khang tampi hunte ngaihsun un; na pa dong in, hong lak ding hi; na upate dong in, hong gen ding uh hi.
Sang Penpa in minam dangte tungah amau’ gamh pia a, mihingte a teen’ nading mun a seh ciangin, Pasian in a phazah tawh kizui-in mite’ gamgi a phut hi.
Ahi zongin Topa’ tanh in ama mite hi a, Jakob suante pen a kipia ama luah ahi hi.
“Amah in sehnel gam, huihpi nun’na gamlakah amaute mu hi; amah in kawi-in kem a, ama mit nauta bangin amaute kem hi.
A bu a vil, a note tungah a kha a zap, a khate zakin, a note a man, a kha tawh a note a pua muvanlai bangin,
Topa bek mah in amaute makaih a, amaute kiangah gamdang pasian om lo hi.
Amah in leitung a sangna munte tungah amaute tuang sak a, amaute in gamlak pana piangte a ne uh hi; suangpi panin amaute khuaizu hup sakin, meisuang tawh kibang suang panin sathau a ne sak hi.
Bawnghon panin bawngnawi thaukhal, tuuhon panin tuunawi, tuunote leh tuutalte’ thau tawh, Bashan bawng honte leh keelte, mangbuh hoihpente tawh leenggah tuisan na dawn uh hi.
“Israel mite thau mahmah uh a, a lehdo thei mi suak uh hi; note thau-in, lianpi pha-in, na zol uh hi; tua ciangin amaute a bawl Pasian amaute in nusia-in, amau’ a Honkhiapa thusim lo uh hi.
Amaute in pasian dangte tawh ama hazat theih nadingin gamta uh a, a kihhuai gamtatnate tawh amaute in amah hehsak uh hi.
Amaute in pasian a hilo dawite, amau’ theih ngei loh pasiante, hong suak nunung pasian thakte, na pu na pate’ theih ngei lohte’ tungah biakna pia uh hi.
Note a hong Honkhiapa na phawk kei uh a, note hong suaksak Pasian na mangngilh uh hi.
“Topa in tua thu thei a, a tapate leh a tanute in hehsak ahih manin tua ama tate a nolh hi.
Amah in, ‘Amaute kiang panin ka mai ka seel ding a, amaute’ tawpna bang hong hi hiam ka en ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a lampial khang mite hi a, cihtakna a nei lo tate ahi uh hi.

Amaute in pasian a hilote tawh ka hazat nading hong bawl uh a, a milimte uh tawh kei hong hehsak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin mi-a gentaak lote tawh amaute’ hazat theih nading ka bawl ding hi. A hai minam khat tawh amaute ka hehsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hehna in mei tawh kuang a, Leinuai thukna mun dong kuang hi, leitung leh a tunga piangte kangtum a, mualte’ bulpite’ kuangsak hi.
“Amaute tungah siatna ka khol ding a, amaute tungah ka thaltangte ka zang ding hi;

gilkialna tawh amaute bei ding uh a, meikuang sa mahmah leh gu nei natna in amaute ne-tum ding hi; keimah in amaute a pet dingin ha hiam a nei gamsate, amaute a tu dingin gu a nei gulte ka sawl ding hi.
Namsau in amaute gamlakah susia in, inn sungah launa lianpi om ding a, tangval leh nungak, naungek nawi nete sam kangsate tawh susia khawm ding hi.
Keimah in, “Amaute gamlapi ah ka thehthang ding a, mite lakah amaute a kiphawkna ka beisak ding hi,” ka ci thei ding hi,
amau’ langte in ngaihsun khialin, amaute in, “Eite i gualzo hi, Topa in hihte khempeuh bawl lo hi,” hong ci kha ding uh ahih manin galte’ hong phin ding ka lau hi,’ a ci hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ngaihsutna a nei lo minam hi a, amaute sungah thu theihtelna om lo hi.
Amaute pil hi leh, hih thu theitel ding uh a, amau’ thu tawpna mu ding uh hi!
Amau a Honkhiapa in amaute zuakin, Topa in amaute a piak khiat kei buang leh bangci-in mi khat in mi tulkhat delh mangin, mi nih in mi tulsawm do zo ding ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh i galte’ suangpi in eite’ Suangpi bang hi lo a, i galte thungetna a mawkna ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ leenggui in Sodom leenggui pan leh Gomorrah lote panin hong pai ahi hi; amau’ leenggahte in gu a nei leenggah hi a, amau’ leenggah bawkte a kha hi;
amau’ leenggahzu in gulpi gu leh a gu-pha gulgu nei’ gu ahi hi.
“Hihte kei kiangah kikholin, ka van koihna sungah kisincip hilo ahi hiam?
Phulakna leh thukkikna kei’ aa ahi hi, a hun ciangin amaute puk ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gim ngah hun ding hong nai a, amau’ siat nading hong tung pah hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ vang a beina leh sila leh sila a hilote’ a beina a muh ciangin Topa in a mite’ dikna kilangsak ding a, ama nasemte tungah hehpihna nei ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Amau’ pasiante, a bukna uh suangpi,
amaute’ biak piakna thau ne-in, leenggahzu tawh a biakna uh a dawnte koi-ah om ahi hiam? amaute thosakin note kihuh sak un la, amaute na kidalna uh hi sak un!
“Tu-in thei un, Keimah a kicipa in Kei ka hi hi, Kei sim loh pasian dang om lo hi; ka that a, ka nungta sak hi; ka liam sak a, ka dam sak hi; ka khut sung pan a honkhia zo kuamah om lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung lamah ka khutte laamto-in ka kiciam a, Keimah in a nungta tawntung ka hih mah bangin,
a tee ka namsau taatin, thukhen ka kipat ciangin, ka galte tungah phu ka la ding a, kei hong mudahte ka thukkik ding hi.
Ka thaltangte si ka tawksak ding a, ka namsau in mi that ding hi—a kithatte leh a kimante, kei hong langpangte, si ding hi,’ a ci hi.
Minamte aw Topa’ mite tawh lungdam khawm un! bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a nasemte’ phu la a, a langte thukin, ama mite’ gam adingin kilemna bawl hi,” a ci hi.
Moses hong pai-in, mite’ zakin amah leh Nun’ tapa Joshua in hih la malte khempeuh sut hi.
Moses in Israelte khempeuh tungah hih thute a gen a man ciangin,
amaute kiangah, “Hih thu khempeuh lim takin a hih theih nadingun na tate uh tungah na hilh theih nadingun, tu ni-a note tungah kong piak thu khempeuh na lungsim uhah koih un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih in note adingin a thuneu hi loin, note’ nuntakna hi a, a luah dingin Jordan gal khatah na paina gam sung uhah hih thu tawh sau veipi na hing ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ni mahmahin Topa in Moses kiangah,
Jerikho gal lam, Moab sungah a om Nebo Mual, hih Abarim mual tungah kahto in; a neih dingun Israel mite tungah ka piak Kanaan gam en in;
Hor Mual tungah na sanggampa Aaron si-in a mite kiangah a kigawm bangin, na kah tohna mual tungah si in la, na mite kiangah kigawm in;
bang hang hiam cih leh Zin gamlak, Kadesh khua gei-a Meribah tui phual, Israel mite lakah keimah nong upna na siasak hi; Israel mite lakah a siangtho-in kei nong zahtak kei hi.
Tua ahih manin na mai-ah a om gam a gal panin na mu ding hi; ahih hangin Israel mite ka piak gam sungah nang na lut kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih in, Pasian mi Moses in ama sih ma-in Israel mite thupha a piakna ahi hi.
Amah in, “Sinai panin Topa hong pai a, Seir panin eite ading hong suakkhia hi; Paran Mual panin hong taangkhia a, a taklam khutah meikuang tawi-in, misiangtho tul sawmte kiang panin hong pai hi.
Hi taktak hi, amah in a mite it a, ama tungah a ki-ap mite khempeuh a khut sungah om hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute in na khephung ah hong kun uh a, nang tung panin lamlahna ngah uh hi.
Jakob mi honte’ neih dingin Moses in kote tungah ngeina khat hong pia hi.
Mite’ makaite kikhawmin, Israel minamte khempeuh a kikaihkhop ciangin, ama mi Israelte lakah Topa in kumpi suak hi.
“Reuben nungta-in, si kei hen la, ama mite zong mi tawm hi kei ta hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah thu genin: “Topa aw, Judah’ aw ngai in la, a mite kiangah amah paipih in. Na khutte tawh ama ading do in la, a galte dona ah a huhpa hi in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Levi thu genin, “Levi tungah na Thummim pia in la, na mi a dikpa tungah na Urim pia in. Massah ah na ze-et mipa, Meribah tuite ah na kitotpihpa ahi hi;

a nu leh a pa sangin nang hong thupi ngaihsut zaw a, ‘Amaute ka thupisim kei hi,’ a ci pa ahi hi; amah in a sanggamte paai khia-in, a tate don lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in na thu mangin, na thuciamna zui uh hi.
