Tua ciangin a om lai Kohath mite in Efraim minam Dan minam leh Manasseh minam a langte tung panin aisanna tawh khuapi sawm ngah uh hi.
Gershon mite in Issakhar minam, Asher minamte, Naftali minamte, leh Bashan gam sunga om Manasseh minam a langte tung panin aisaanna tawh khuapi sawm-le-thum ngah uh hi.
Merari mite in a beh uh tawh kizui-in Reuben minam, Gad minam, leh Zebulun minamte tung panin khuapi sawm-le-nih ngah uh hi.
Topa in Moses tung tawnin a thupiak bangin hih khuapite leh a lonona gamte Israel mite in aisaanna tawh Levi mite tungah pia uh hi.
Judah minam leh Simeon minam sung panin amaute in anuai-a min kigen khuapite pia uh a,
Levi mite ahi Kohath beh sung panin Aaron’ suan-le-khakte tungah tung hi; amaute tungah a aii kia masa ahih man hi.
Amaute in Judah mualtung gam Kiriath-arba, Arba pen Anak’ pa (Hebron a cihna), a kiim-a lonona gam tawh amau tungah pia uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua khuapi’ lote leh a khua neute pen Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb tungah a neih dingin kipia khin hi.
Amaute in siampi Aaron’ suan-le-khakte tungah mithatte’ bukna khuapi Hebron a lonona gamte tawh, Libnah a lonona gamte tawh,
Jattir a lonona gamte tawh, Eshtemoa a lonona gamte tawh,
Holon a lonona gamte tawh, Debir a lonona gamte tawh,
Ain a lonona gamte tawh, Juttah a lonona gamte tawh, Bethshemesh a lonona gamte tawh hih minam nihte sung panin khuapi kua pia uh hi;
tua ciangin Benjamin minam panin Gibeon a lonona gamte tawh, Geba a lonona gamte tawh,
Anathoth a lonona gamte tawh, leh Almon a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi li pia uh hi.
Siampi Aaron’ suan-le-khakte’ khuapite a vekpi-in khuapi sawm-le-thum, a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Levi mite sung pan Kohath beh ahi a om lai Kohath mite tungah a kipia khuapite pen Efraim minamte’ aa sung pan ahi hi.
Efraim mualtung gam-a om mithatte’ ading khuapi Shekhem a lonona gamte tawh, Gezer a lonona gamte tawh,
Kibzaim a lonona gamte tawh, Bethhoron a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi li amaute tungah kipia hi;
tua ciangin Dan minam sung panin Elteke a lonona gamte tawh, Gibbethon a lonona gamte tawh,
Aijalon a lonona gamte tawh, Gathrimmon a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi li kipia hi;
tua ciangin Manasseh minam a langte sung panin Ta-anak a lonona gamte tawh, Gathrimmon a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi nih kipia hi.
Kohath mi a om lai behte’ khuapite a vekpi-in a lonona gamte tawh khuapi sawm ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Levi beh sunga om Gershon mite tungah, Manasseh minam a langte aa sung panin Bashan gam sunga om mithatte’ adingin bukna khuapi Golan a lonona gamte tawh, leh Be-eshterah a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi nih kipia hi;
tua ciangin Issakhar minam panin Kishion a lonona gamte tawh Daberath a lonona gamte tawh,
Jarmuth a lonona gamte tawh, Engannim a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi li kipia hi;
tua ciangin Asher minam sung panin Mishal a lonona gamte tawh, Abdon a lonona gamte tawh,
Helkath a lonona gamte tawh, leh Rehob a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi li kipia hi;

tua ciangin Naftali minam sung panin Galile gam sunga om mithatte’ adingin bukna khuapi Kedesh a lonona gamte tawh, Hammothdor a lonona gamte tawh, leh Kartan a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi thum kipia hi.
Gershon mite beh tuamtuamte’ khuapite a vekpi-in a lonona gamte tawh khuapi sawm-le-thum ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Levi mi a om lai Merari behte tungah, Zebulun minam sung panin Jokneam a lonona gamte tawh, Kartah a lonona gamte tawh,
Dimnah a lonona gamte tawh, Nahalal a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi li kipia hi;
tua ciangin Reuben minam sung panin Bezer a lonona gamte tawh, Jahaz a lonona gamte tawh,
Kedemoth a lonona gamte tawh, leh Mefa-ath a lonona gamte tawh—khuapi li kipia hi;
tua ciangin Gad minam sung panin Gilead gam sunga om mithatte’ ading bukna khuapi Ramoth a lonona gamte tawh, Mahanaim a lonona gamte tawh,
Heshbon a lonona gamte tawh, Jazer a lonona gamte tawh—a vekpi-in khuapi li kipia hi.
Levi beh a om lai ahi Merari beh tuamtuamte’ ading khuapi a kipiate a vekpi-in sawm-le-nih ahi hi.
Israel mite’ neihsa lakah Levi mite’ khuapi a vekpi-in a lonona gamte tawh khuapi sawm-le-giat ahi hi.
Hih khuapite in a kiim ciatah lonona gam nei hi; hih khuapi khempeuh tua bang ahi hi.
Tua bangin Topa in amau’ pate tungah piak dingin a kiciam leitang khempeuh Israel tungah pia hi; amaute in a ngah khit uh ciangin tua lai-ah teeng uh hi.

Tua ciangin a pu a pate uh tungah a ciamsa bangin Topa in amaute tungah na khempeuhah tawlngakna pia hi; Topa in a galte khempeuh uh amau khut sungah pia ahih manin a galte uh khatbeek in zong amaute nang zo lo hi.
Topa in Israel mite tungah a ciamsa thuhoih khempeuh khat zong a mawkna om lo hi; a vekpi-in tung kim hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Reuben mite, leh Gad mite, leh Manasseh minam a langte simin,
amaute kiangah, “Topa’ nasem Moses in note hong thupiak khempeuh zui-in, keimah in note kong thupiakna khempeuhah ka thu na mang khin uh hi;
tu ni dong hih hun saupi sung na sanggamte uh na nusia kei uh a, Topa na Pasian uh hong sawlna lim takin zuih ding na ngaihsun uh hi.

Tu-in Topa na Pasian un amaute tungah a ciamsa bangin na sanggamte tungah tawlngakna pia hi; tua ahih ciangin Topa’ nasem Moses in note hong piak Jordan galkhat, note’ neihsa a omna leitang na inn uh ah note kihei-in pai un.

Topa’ nasem Moses in note hong piak thupiakna leh thukham ahi, Topa na Pasian uh it ding, ama lampi khempeuh zuih ding, ama thupiakte zuih ding, amah belh ding, leh na lungsim khempeuh uh leh na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh ama na nasep ding uh lim takin ngaihsun un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in amaute thupha pia-in ciahsak hi; amaute a inn uh ah ciah uh hi.

Tu-in Manasseh minam a langte tungah Moses in Bashan gam sungah neihsa pia khin hi; ahih hangin Joshua in a langte tungah Jordan nitumna lam a sanggamte kiang uh ah neihsa pia hi. Joshua in amaute a inn uh ah sawlin thupha a piak ciangin,
amaute tungah, “Na inn uh-ah hauhna lianpi, ganhing tampi tak, ngun, kham, sumngo, sik, leh puan tampi tawh ciahkik un; na galte uh van nasuhte uh na sanggamte uh tawh hawm un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Reuben mite leh Gad mite leh Manasseh minam a langte, Moses tung tawnin Topa’ thupiakna tawh a neih uh amau leitang ahi Gilead gamah pai dingin Kanaan gam sunga om Shiloh mun-ah Israel mite tawh kikhenin a inn uh ah ciah uh hi.
Kanaan gam sunga om Jordan gam kiim teng a tun’ uh ciangin Reuben mite leh Gad mite leh Manasseh minam a langte in tua lai Jordan gun kiangah a lian mahmah biakna tau khat lam uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in, “En un, Israel mite’ aa lam pang a, om Jordan kiim gam, Kanaan gamnawl-ah Reuben mite leh Gad mite leh Manasseh minam a langte in biakna tau khat lam uh hi,” a kicihna za uh hi.
Israel mite in tua thu a zak uh ciangin amaute do dingin Israel mihon buppi khempeuh Shiloh mun-ah kikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Gilead gam-a om Reuben mite leh Gad mite leh Manasseh minam a langte kiangah siampi Eleazar tapa Finehas,
leh amah tawh ukpi sawm, Israel minam innkuan panin khat ciat, tua mite Israel behte lakah innkuan lutang ahi-te sawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gilead gam sunga om Reuben mite, Gad mite leh Manasseh minam a langte kiangah amaute pai uh a, amaute kiangah,
“Topa’ mihon buppi in, ‘Topa lehdona-in tu ni-in note adingin biakna tau khat lamna tawh Topa zuihna panin tu ni-in kihei-in Israel Pasian tungah na gamtatnasa uh ahi hih khemna in bang ahi hiam?

17-18 Topa’ mihonte tungah gimna khat a hong tungsak ahi, eite i kisian’suah nai beek lohna ahi, Peor-a i khialhna hawmthawhin, tu ni-in Topa zuihna panin kihei khia ding na hi uh hiam? Note in tu ni-in Topa na lehdo uh leh zing ciangin Israel mihon buppi tungah amah heh ding hi.

Ahih hangin tu-in note’ lakna leitang uh nin ahih leh Topa’ biakbuk a din’na mun Topa’ leitangah hong pai un la, kote lakah luah hong nei un; Topa lehdo kei un la, Topa i Pasian’ biakna tau simloh note’ ading biakna tau na lamna uh tawh kote a lehdo hong suaksak kei un.
Zerah’ tapa Akhan in a ki-ap nate-ah khialin Israel mihon khempeuh tungah hehna hong tung hilo ahi hiam? Ama mawhna hangin amah bek si lo hi,’ ci uh hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Reuben mite, Gad mite, leh Manasseh minam a langte in Israel beh lutangte dawngin,

22-23 “A Vanglian Pa, Pasian, Topa! A Vanglian Pa, Pasian, Topa! Amah in thei hi, Israel mahmah in zong thei ta hen! Lehdona ahi a, Topa tungah thuman lohna ahi zongin a hih a, Topa zuihna panin pial dingin biakna tau lam ka hih uh leh, tu ni-in kote hong zah kei hen; tua ahih kei leh zong, tua tungah meihal biakna ahi a, an tawh biakna ahi a, thunuam-a biakna ahi zongin piak nadingin a lam ka hih uh leh Topa mahmah in hong thuk ta hen.
Tua bang hi het lo hi, hong tung ding hunte-ah na tate un kote’ tate tungah, ‘Israel Pasian, Topa tawh no bang kisai na hi uh hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh no Reuben mite leh Gad mite leh ko’ kikalah gamgi-in Topa in Jordan bawl khin zo hi; Topa sungah no’ tanh bangmah om lo hi,’ a cih khak ding uh launa tawh ka bawl uh ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka tate un Topa a biak ding uh na tate un khaktan kha ding uh hi.

26-27 Tua ahih ciangin kote in, “Meihal biakna ahi a, biakpiak nading ahi zongin hi loin, ama omna-ah ka meihal biakna uh leh ka biak piaknate uh leh thu-nuam-a ka piaknate uh tawh Topa’ na ka sepna uh kote leh note kikal leh ko’ khit ciangin suan-le-khakte kikalah teci dingin bawl ni; tua bang hi kei leh hong tung ding hunte-ah na tate un ko’ tate tungah, “Topa sungah no’ tanh bangmah om lo hi,” ci kha ding uh hi,’ ka ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hong tung ding hunte-ah kote tung ahi a, kote’ suan-le-khakte tungah ahi zongin hih bangin hong kicih leh, ‘Meihal biak nading ahi a, biakpiak nading ahi zongin hi loin note leh kote kikalah teci dingin ka pu ka pate un a bawl Topa’ biakna tau lim en un,’ i ci ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun uh hi.

Ama biakbuk mai-a om Topa ka Pasian uh biakna tau longal, meihal biakna ahi a, an tawh biakna ahi a, biakpiak nading ahi zongin lamna tawh kote in Topa lehdo-in Topa zuihna panin a pial ka hi het kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Siampi Finehas leh amah tawh a om mihon ukpite, Israel beh lutangte in Reuben mite leh Gad mite leh Manasseh mite’ thugenna kammal a zak uh ciangin tua thugennate in amaute lungkim sak mahmah hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in Reuben mite leh Gad mite leh Manasseh mite tungah, “Topa tungah note zuautat nai lo na hih manun eite lakah Topa om hi, ci-in tu ni-in i thei hi; tu-in note in Topa’ daantah nading panin Israel mite na honkhia uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Eleazar, tapa Finehas leh ukpite, Gilead gam-a om Reuben mite leh Gad mite kiang panin Israel mite omna Kanaan gamah ciahkik uh a, amaute tungah thu puak kik uh hi.
Tua thu in Israel mite lungkim sak hi; Israel mite in Pasian phat uh a, Reuben mite leh Gad mite a teen'na leitang susia-in amaute gal-in do ding gen nawn lo uh hi.
Reuben mite leh Gad mite in a biakna tau pen Teci phuak uh hi; “Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Pasian ahihna thu eite kikalah teci ahi hi,” amaute in ci uh hi.
Topa in amau’ kim-a om gal khempeuh panin Israel mite tawlngakna a piak khit a sawtpi ciangin Joshua teekin a kum tampi pha hi.
Joshua in Israel khempeuh, a upate leh a lutangte, a thukhente leh a uliante uh samin, amaute kiangah, “Tu-in kei teekin ka kum tampi pha ta hi;
note’ hangin Topa na Pasian un hih minamte khempeuh tungah a bawlnate na mu khin uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note’ adingin hong dosakpa in Topa na Pasian uh ahi hi.
En un, Jordan panin nitumna lam-a Tuipi Lian dong, a om lai minamte pen ka phiat khiatsa minamte tawh na minamte uh gamh dingin note tungah kong pia khin hi.
Topa na Pasian un note mai-ah amaute lehnawt ding a, note’ muhna panin hawlkhia ding hi; Topa na Pasian un note tungah hong ciam bangin amau’ gam na luah ding uh hi.

6-8 Tua ahih ciangin note lakah a om lai hih minamte tawh kihel loin, amau’ pasiante zong gen loin, tuate tawh zong kiciam loin, amau’ na sem loin, amaute mai-ah zong note kun loin, ahih hangin tu ni-a na gamtat bangun Topa na Pasian uh na belh theih nadingun Moses’ thukham laibu sunga kigelhte khempeuh zui-in semin, tua panin tak lamah hita leh vei lamah hita leh pial loin na om nadingun khauh takin om un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in note mai-ah a lian a tha-hat minamte hawlkhia hi; note ahih leh tu ni dongin mi khat beek in hong nang zo lo hi.
Note tungah hong ciamsa bangin note adingin hong dosakpa in Topa na Pasian uh ahih manin note khat in mi tulkhat na tai keek sak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa na Pasian uh na it ding uh hoih takin ngaihsun un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note nungkikin note lakah a om lai minamte tawh kipawlin amaute tawh kitengin, note in amau’ numeite ten’pihin amaute in note’ numeite a teen’pih leh;

Topa na Pasian un note mai-ah hih minamte hawl khia nawn lo ding hi, ci-in tel takin thei un; Topa na Pasian un note hong piak hih leitang hoih panin na sih khit matengun amaute in note’ adingin thangzak leh tehlop, na pang uh a hong sat, na mit sung uh-a ling hi ding uh hi.

“Tu-in leitung khempeuh ngeina bangin kei a pai ding ka hi ta a, note khempeuh in na lungsim uh leh na nuntakna uh ah, Topa na Pasian un note tawh kisai nahoih hong ciam khempeuh khat zong mawk mai lo ahihna na thei uh hi; a vekpi-in note’ adingin hong tung a, khat zong mawkmai lo hi.

15-16 Ahih hangin, amah in note hong thupiak ahi Topa na Pasian uh thuciamna palsatin, note in pasian dangte’ na semin tuate na biak uh leh, Topa na Pasian un note tawh kisai-a a ciam nahoih khempeuh a tun’ mah bangin Topa na Pasian un note hong piaksa hih leitang hoih panin amah in note hong suksiat khit matengin Topa in note tungah siatna khempeuh hong tungsak ding hi. Tua ciangin note tungah Topa’ hehna hong so ding a, note tungah a hong piak leitang hoih panin note manlang takin na sia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Israel minam khempeuh Shekhem-ah kaikhawmin a upate, a lutangte, a thukhente, leh Israel uliante sam hi; tua ciangin Pasian mai-ah amau ciat kilaak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in mite khempeuh tungah, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi. ‘Taang lai-in Eufrates galkhatah na pu na pate uh teeng ngei a, tuate lakah Abraham leh Nahor’ pa Terah in khat ahi hi; amaute in pasian dangte’ na sem uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gungal panin na pa uh Abraham la-in Kanaan gam khempeuhah ka paipih a, a suan-le-khakte tampi ka pha sak hi. Ama tungah Isaak ka pia hi;
tua ciangin Isaak tungah Jakob leh Esau ka pia hi. A neih dingin Seir mualtung gam Esau ka pia a, ahih hangin Jakob leh a tate Izipt-ah paisuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses leh Aaron ka sawl a, a gam sunga ka sepnate tawh Izipt ka gimsak hi; tua khit ciangin note kong pai khiatpih hi.
Tua ciangin Izipt panin na pu na pate uh ka pai khiatpih a, tuipi na tung uh hi; Izipt mite in leeng leh sakol tuangte tawh na pu na pate uh San Tuipi-ah delh uh hi.

Topa tungah amaute a kiko uh ciangin, amah in note leh Izipt mite kikal-ah khuamial koih a, amaute tungah tuipi paisakin amaute tuumsak hi; Izipt tungah ka bawlna na mit un mu hi; gamlakah sauveipi na om uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jordan galkhatah a teeng Amor mite’ leitangah note kong paipih hi; amaute in note hong doin, note khut sungah amaute kong pia a, note in amau’ leitang na luah uh a, note mai-ah amaute ka susia hi.
Tua ciangin Moab kumpipa, Zippor’ tapa Balak hong khangin Israel mite hong do hi; amah in mi sawlin note hong samsia dingin Boer’ tapa Balaam samsak hi;
ahih hangin Balaam’ thu ka ngai kei hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in note thupha hong pia hi; tua ahih manin Balak’ khut sung panin note kong honkhia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jordan galkhatah pai-in Jerikho na tung uh a, Jerikho mite in note hong do uh hi. Amor mite, Perez mite, Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Girgash mite, Hiv mite, leh Jebus mite in zong hong do uh hi; note khut sungah amaute kong pia hi.
Amor kumpi nihte note mai-ah a hawlkhia tunpite keimah in note mai-ah ka sawl hi; tua in note’ namsau ahi a, note’ thal tawh ahi zongin na dona hang uh hi lo hi.
Note in na seploh uh leitang, na satloh uh khuapite, note tungah kong pia a, tuate sungah na teeng uh hi; na suanloh uh leenggui lo pan a gah leh oliv huan pan a gah na ne uh hi.’
“Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa zaktak un la, lungsim tak leh thumanna tawh ama na sem un; na pate un Gungal leh Izipt gam sungah a na a sep uh pasiante koih khia un la, Topa’ na sem un.

Topa’ na nasep nop kei uh leh, Gungal khat-a a na a kisepsak na pu na pate uh pasian ahi a, note’ teen’na gam Amor mite’ pasiante ahi zongin, a na nasep sak ding peuhpeuh uh tu ni-in teel un; ahih hangin kei leh ka innkuanpihte in ahih leh Topa’ na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mite in dawngin, “A dang pasiante’ na sem dingin Topa nusiat ding ka ngaihsun kei ding uh hi;

bang hang hiam cih leh salsuahna Izipt gam panin eite leh i pu i pate hong pai khiatpih, eite’ muhna-ah tua lim liante a bawl, i paina lampi khempeuh leh i nawk mite khempeuh lakah hong kempa in Topa i Pasian ahi hi;
Topa in eite mai-ah mi khempeuh, tua gam-a teeng Amor mite hawlkhia hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in i Pasian ahih manin kote in zong Topa’ na ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Topa’ na nasem zo kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a siangtho Pasian ahi hi; amah in a aam Pasian ahi hi; note’ thupalsatna ahi a, na khialhna uh ahi zongin hong maisak lo ding hi.
Topa nusia-in gamdang pasiante’ na nasep uh leh, note tungah a hoih hong bawl khit ciangin amah hong kihei-in note tungah siatna hong bawlin note hong beisak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mite in Joshua kiangah, “Hilo hi; Topa na’ ka sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Ama na sem dingin Topa na teel khitna uh-ah note adingin note mah in teci na hi uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kote in teci ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Tua ahih leh note lakah a om gamdang pasiante koih khia un la, Israel Pasian, Topa’ lamah na lungsim uh nga un,” a ci hi.
Mite in Joshua kiangah, “Topa i Pasian’ na ka sem ding uh a, ama thu ka mang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in Shekhem-ah tua ni-in mite tawh thuciamna bawl a, amaute adingin thukhamte leh biakna ngeina kipte a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Pasian’ thukham laibu sungah hih kammalte gelh hi; amah in suangtum lianpi khat la-in Topa’ biakinn sung tawsaw nuai-ah phut hi.

Tua ciangin Joshua in mite khempeuh kiangah, “En un, hih suangtum in eite’ langkhatah teci hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in eite tungah hong thugen khempeuh za khin hi; tua ahih ciangin note in na Pasian uh tungah a man loin na gamtat loh nadingun tua suangtum in note langkhatah teci hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in a milip-in amau’ gam ciatah, mite ciahsak hi.
Hih thute khit ciangin Topa’ nasem, Nun’ tapa Joshua si a, a khan’ kum za leh kum sawmkhat pha hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Ga-ash mual leilu lam, Efraim mualtung gam-a om Timnathserah mun-a ama gamhluah leitangah vui uh hi.
Joshua khang sung leh Joshua sangin sau a nungta zaw upate khempeuh’ khang sungin Israel mite in Topa’ na sem uh a, Israel mite’ adingin Topa in a sepna khempeuh thei uh hi.

Israel mite in Izipt panin a puak uh Josef’ guhte pen Shekhem’ pa Hamor’ tapate tung panin Jakob in dangka zakhat tawh a lei leitang Shekhem-ah kivui hi; tua leitang pen Josef’ suan-le-khakte’ luah a suak hi.
Tua ciangin Aaron’ tapa Eleazar si hi; tua ciangin amaute in Efraim mualtung gam sunga ama tungah a kipia, ama tapa Finehas’ khua Gibeah-ah vui uh hi.
Joshua a sih khit ciangin Israel mite in Topa tungah thu dong uh a, “Kote adingin Kanaan mite a do dingin kua paito masa ding ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Topa in “Judah paito ding hi; en un, ama khut sungah tua leitang ka pia zo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Judah in a sanggampa Simeon kiangah, “Kanaan mite i do theih nadingin kei tungah hong kipia gamah kei hong zui in; tua mah bangin nang hong kipia gamah keimah in zong kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Simeon in amah zui hi.
Tua ciangin Judah paito a, Topa in amaute khut sungah Kanaan mite leh Perez mite pia hi; amaute in Bezek-ah tua mite tulsawm zo uh hi.
Amaute in Bezek-ah Adonibezek tuakin amah tawh kido uh a, Kanaan mite leh Perez mite zo uh hi.
Adonibezek tai hi; ahih hangin amaute in delhin man uh a, a khutpite leh a khepite attan uh hi.

Tua ciangin Adonibezek in, “A khutpite leh a khepi a ki-attan kumpi sawmsagihte in ka sabuai nuai-ah anneng kia tawm ngei uh hi; ka gamtatnasa bangin Pasian in kei hong thuk hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Jerusalem-ah amah paipih uh a, tua mun-ah amah si hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite in Jerusalem simin la uh a, namsau tawh vatin a khuapi hal uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Judah mite, mualtung gam, Negeb gam, leh lei niamna-a teeng Kanaan mite a do dingin paisuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Hebron (Hebron min pen a ni dangin Kiriath-arba) ah a teeng Kanaan mite do dingin Judah mite paisuk hi; amaute in Sheshai leh Ahiman leh Talmai zo uh hi.
Tua lai panin Debir mite do dingin amaute pai uh hi. Debir min pen ni dangin Kiriath-sefer ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Kaleb in, “Kiriath-sefer simin a la pa tungah a zi dingin ka tanu Aksah ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kaleb naupa Kenaz tapa Othniel in la hi; amah in a zi dingin a tanu Aksah pia hi.
Tua nu ama kiangah a pai ciangin a pa kiang panin lo khat a nget nading tua nu in sawl hi; tua nu a la tung panin kum a, Kaleb in ama kiangah, “Bang ut na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in “Letsong khat hong pia in; Negeb gamah hong koih na hih ciangin tuikhukte zong hong pia in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Kaleb in ama tungah tuikhuk tungnungte leh tuikhuk nuainungte a pia hi.

Tua ciangin Moses’ sungpate nam ahi Ken’ suan-le-khakte, Judah mite tawh nisuh khuapi panin Negeb gam Arab gei-a om Judah gam lakah paito uh hi; amaute tua lai mun-ah tungin tua mite tawh teeng khawm uh hi.
Judah in a sanggampa Simeon tawh pai khawmin Zefath-ah a teeng Kanaan mite va zo-in susia mang uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua khuapi min Hormah kici hi.
Judah in zong Gaza leh a gam, leh Askhelon leh a gam, leh Ekron leh a gamte la hi.
Topa in Judah tawh om a, amah in mualtung gam teng luah hi; ahih hangin zang gam-a teeng mite amah in hawlkhia zo lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in sik leeng nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in a gensa bangin Kaleb tungah Hebron kipia hi; tua sung panin amah in Anak tapa thumte hawlkhia hi.
Ahih hangin Benjamin mite in Jerusalem-ah a teeng Jebus mite hawlkhia lo uh hi; tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin Jerusalem-ah Jebus mite in Benjamin mite tawh teeng khawm uh hi.
Josef innkuan zong Beth-el do dingin paito uh hi; Topa in amaute tawh om hi.
Tua ciangin Josef innkuante in thu kansim dingin Beth-el ah mi sawl uh hi. (Tua khuapi min pen a ni dangin Luz ahi hi.)
Thu kansimte in khuapi panin hong paikhia mi khat mu uh a, ama kiangah, “Khuapi lutna lampi hong hilh in, kong thuum uh hi, nang tungah kong diktat ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in khuapi lutna lampi amaute lak hi; amaute in namsau tawh tua khuapi vat uh a, ahih hangin tua mipa leh a innkuante suakta sak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Hit mite gamah tua mipa pai-in khuapi khat sat a, a min pen Luz ci-in phuak hi; tu dongin tua khua min in tua mah ahi hi.

Manasseh in Bethshean leh a khua neute-a teeng mite, Ta-anak leh a khua neute-a teeng mite, Dor leh a khua neute-a teeng mite, Ibleam leh a khua neute-a teeng mite ahi a, Megiddo leh a khua neute-a teeng mite ahi zongin hawlkhia lo hi; ahih hangin Kanaan mite tua leitangah teeng teitei uh hi.
Israelte a thahat ciangin amaute in aana tawh na a sem dingin Kanaan mite koih uh a, hawlkhia siang lo uh hi.
Efraim in Gezer-ah a teeng Kanaan mite hawlkhia lo hi; tua ahih manin Kanaan mite Gezer-ah amaute lakah teeng uh hi.
Zebulun in Kitron-a teeng mite ahi a, Nahalol-a teeng mite ahi zongin hawlkhia lo hi; Kanaan mite amaute lakah teengin aana tawh nasemte suak uh hi.
Asher in Akko-a teeng mite, Sidon-a teeng mite, Ahlab-a teeng mite, Aksib-a teengte, Helbah-a teengte, Afik-a teengte ahi a, Rebon-a teengte ahi zongin hawlkhia lo hi;
tua gam-a teeng Kanaan mite lakah Asher mite teeng uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in hawlkhia lo uh hi.

Naftali in Bethshemesh-a teengte ahi a, Beth-anath-a teengte ahi zongin hawlkhia loin, tua gam-a teeng Kanaan mite lakah teeng uh hi; ahi zongin Bethshemesh leh Beth-anath-a teeng mite in amaute adingin aana tawh na a sem mite suak uh hi.
Amor mite in mual gamah Dan mite notkik uh hi, amaute in zang gamah paisuk sak lo uh hi;
Amor mite, Harheres, Aijalon, leh Sha-albim-ah teeng teitei uh hi, ahih hangin Josef innkuante in amaute gawt semsem a, amaute in aana tawh nasemte suak hi.
Amor mite’ gamgi in Akrabbim kahtohna, Sela leh a tung lam pan kipan hi.

Tu-in Gilgal panin Bokhim-ah Topa’ vantungmi paito hi. Amah in, “Izipt panin note kong paipih to a, na pu na pate uh tungah piak dinga ka ciam leitangah note kong paipih hi. Keimah in, ‘Note tawh ka thuciam ka siasak ngei kei ding a,
hih gam-a teeng mite tawh thuciamna na bawl kei ding uh hi; amau’ biakna taute na susia ding uh hi,’ ka ci hi. Ahih hangin note in ka thupiak na mang kei uh hi. Hih banga na gamtat uh bang ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in keimah in, note mai-ah amaute ka hawlkhia kei ding hi; amaute in note’ ling suak ding uh a, a pasiante uh note’ adingin thang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa vantungmi in hih thute Israel mite khempeuh tungah a gen ciangin, mite nakpi-in kap uh hi.
Amaute in tua mun pen Bokhim ci-in phuak uh hi; tua lai mun-ah Topa tungah biakna pia uh hi.
Joshua in mite a ciahsak ciangin, Israel mite leitang luah dingin amau’ gamh ciatah pai uh hi.
Mite in Joshua nuntak sung leh, Israelte adingin Topa’ sepsa na lian khempeuh a mu, Joshua sanga a khan’ sau zawte khempeuh nuntak sungin Topa’ na sem uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ nasem ahi, Nun’ tapa Joshua, a khan’ kum za leh kum sawmkhat a phak lai takin si hi.
Amaute in Ga-ash Mual leilu lam, Efraim mualtung gam sung, Timnathheres-a ama luahna huan sungah vui uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua khang mite khempeuh zong a pu a pate uh kiang kizuansak hi; amaute khit ciangin Topa hita leh, Israelte adingin a septe hita leh a thei lo khang thak hong piang uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Topa muhna-ah a sia gamta-in Baalte’ na sem uh hi;

Izipt gam panin amaute a pai khiatpih a pu a pate uh Pasian’ ahi Topa amaute in nusia uh hi; amau’ kiim-a om mite’ pasiante lak panin pasian dangte nung zui uh a, tuate mai-ah kun uh hi; amaute in Topa phinin Topa hehsak uh hi.
Amaute in Topa nusia uh a, Baalte leh Asharoth pasiante bia uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israelte tungah Topa’ hehna so a, amaute’ na a sut, mi na a sut thei mite tungah amaute pia hi; a kiim-a om a galte tungah amaute pia a, amaute in a galte uh nang zo nawn lo uh hi.

Amaute, galsim dingin a kuan khit peuhmah uh ciangin, Topa in a hilhkholhsa leh Topa in amaute tungah a kiciamsa bangin amaute lang khatah a sia lamin Topa pang hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute in lungkhamna tuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin, amaute na a sut gawp mite’ vangliatna panin amaute a honkhia thukhente Topa in khangsak hi.

Ahi zongin amaute in a thukhente uh thu ngai lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in pasian dangte tawh paktatna gamta-in tuate mai-ah kun uh hi; Topa’ thupiakna a mang amau’ pute pate’ tot lampi panin amaute pial pah uh hi, amaute in Topa’ thu mang lo uh hi.

Topa in amaute adingin thukhente a khan’sak peuhpeuh ciangin thukhente tawh Topa om a, thukhente nuntak sung tawntung a galte uh khut sung panin amaute hon hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a gimsak a nengniamte’ hangin amau’ tauna in Topa’ hehpih nading piangsak hi.

Ahih hangin thukhente a sih peuhpeuh ciangin amaute kihei kikin a pu a pate uh sangin a sia zaw-in gamta uh a, pasian dangte nung zui uh a, amaute’ na semin a mai uh-ah kun uh hi; amau gamtatnate uh ahi a, a lungkhauhnate uh ahi zongin khia lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israelte tungah Topa heh mahmah a, amah in, “Hih mite in amau pute ka thupiak ka thuciamna khialin keima thu ngai lo uh ahih manin,
Joshua a sih lai-in a nusiat minamte khat zong tu-a kipanin amaute mai-ah ka hawlkhia kei ding hi,
amau’ pute pate in Topa’ lampi a zuih bangin zuih ding a don uh hiam a don kei uh hiam cih hih mite tawh Israel ka ze-et ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in tua minamte thakhatin hawlkhia loin nusia a, Joshua khut sungah amaute pia lo hi.
Tu-in Israelte khempeuh sung panin Kanaan gam sungah gal dona a thei kha nai lo Israelte ze-et nadingin Topa in a siit minamte in hihte ahi hi;
Israel mi tua khangte in gal dona a theihtheih nading, ni dangin a kithei ngei lo gal dona tua bang mite a hilh theih nading bek ahi hi.
Tua minamte in: Filistia mi ulian ngate, Kanaan mi khempeuh, Sidon mite, leh Baalhermon Mual panin Hamath lutna ciang dong Lebanon Mual tungah a teeng Hiv mite ahi hi.
Moses tung tawnin a pu a pate uh a thupiak, Topa’ thupiaknate Israelte in a mang uh hiam cih a kitheih nadingin amaute pen Israelte a kize-etna hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite, leh Jebus mite lakah Israel mite teeng uh hi;
amaute in a zi dingun a tanute uh la a, amaute tanute a tapate uh tungah pia uh hi; amaute in a pasiante uh na sem uh hi.
Topa’ muhna-ah Israel mite a sia gamta-in, Topa amau’ Pasian mangngilh uh a, Baalte leh Asheroth-te’ na sem uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israelte tungah Topa’ hehna so a, amah in Mesopotamia kumpipa Kushan-rish-athaim tungah amaute zuak hi; Israel mite in Kushan-rish-athaim’ na kum giat sem uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mite Topa tungah kiko uh a, Topa in Kaleb’ naupa Kenaz’ tapa Othniel, amaute a honkhiapa ahi honpa khat Israel mite adingin khangsak hi.

Topa’ Kha ama tungah tung a, amah in Israel mite’ thukhen a suak hi; galdo dingin kuan khia a, Topa in ama sungah Mesopotamia kumpipa Kushan-rish-athaim pia hi; Kushan-rish-athaim tungah amah gualzo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a gam in kum sawmli sung tawlngakna hun nei hi. Tua ciangin Kenaz’ tapa Othniel si hi.
Tua ciangin Topa muhna-ah Israel mite a sia gamta kik uh hi; tua ciangin Topa in Israelte lang khatah Moab kumpipa Eglon thahatsak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa muhna-ah amaute a sia gamta uh hi.
Eglon in Ammon mite leh Amalek mite ama kiangah khawm a, va kuan-in Israelte va zo hi; amaute in nisuh khuapi luah uh hi.
Israel mite in Moab kumpi Eglon’ na kum sawm leh kum giat sung sem uh hi.

Ahih hangin Topa tungah Israel mite a kiko uh ciangin, Topa in Benjamin mi, Gera tapa a veikhoi Ehud, amaute’ honpa dingin khangsak hi. Israel mite in ama tung tawnin Moab kumpipa Eglon tungah siah puak uh hi.
Ehud in ama adingin lang nih a hiam, tong khat a sau namsau khat bawl hi; amah in a puan nuai a taklam phei tungah tua namsau khih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Moab kumpipa Eglon tungah a siah sung hi. Eglon pen a thau mahmah mi khat ahi hi.
Ehud in a siah sun’ a man khit ciangin siah a puak mite ciahsak hi.

Ahih hangin Gilgal kiang suang milimte omna panin amah kileh kikin, “Kumpipa aw, nang tungah gen ding thusim khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Gam dai un,” ci-in thu pia hi. Amah a cing mi khempeuh ama omna panin paikhia uh hi.

Innkhum zang khuakhal inn inndei a votna sungah amah guak tu-in a om lai takin ama kiangah Ehud hong pai hi. Ehud in, “Pasian kiang panin nang tungah gen ding thu khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a tutna panin amah ding to hi.
Tua ciangin Ehud in a vei lam khut tawh a tak lam phei panin a namsau la-in, tua-pa’ gil sungah siatsuk hi;
a namsau banah a bul zong tum a, a thau in a namsau khakcip hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a gil panin amah in a namsau dok lo hi; tua ciangin a ek lawt khia hi.
Tua ciangin inndei pua-ah Ehud pai khia-in, innkhum zang inndei kongkhakte amah khaknelhin tuate kalh hi.
Amah a paikhiat khit ciangin nasemte hong pai hi; innkhum zang inndei kongkhakte a kikalh a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Inn vot sunga inndei ah awng hawh hi-in teh,” ci in ngaihsun uh hi.
A cih nading uh a theih loh zah dong uh ngak uh hi; ahih hangin innkhum zang inndei kongkhak amah in a hon’ loh veve ciangin, amaute in a tawhtang la-in hong uh hi; sual tungah a topa uh na si hi.
Amau’ zia kikalin Ehud tai-in suang milimte kheng a, Se-irah-ah tai hi.
Amah a tun’ ciangin Efraim mualtung gamah peengkul gingsak hi; mualtung gam panin Israel mite amah tawh paisuk uh a, amau’ lutangin amah nei uh hi.

Amah in amaute kiangah, “Ka nung hong zui un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in na gal uh Moab mite na khut sung uh ah hong pia zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama nungah amaute paisuk uh a, Moab mite kiang panin Jordan ngahmunte la-in mi khat zong galkah sak lo uh hi.
Tua hunin amaute in a thahat a siam Moab mite khempeuh, mi tulsawm bang that uh hi; mi khat zong suakta lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Moab in Israelte’ khut nuai-a suak hi. Tua gam in kum sawmgiat sung tawlngakna nei hi.
Ama khit ciangin Anath tapa Shamgar hi a, ciangkhut zum tawh Filistia mite zaguk a thatpa ahi hi; amah in zong Israelte honkhia hi.
Ehud a sih khit ciangin Israel mite in Topa’ muhna-ah a sia gamta kik uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Hazor-ah a uk, Kanaan kumpipa Jabin khut sungah amaute pia hi; ama galkapte a ukpa pen, Harosheth-ha-goiim-ah a teeng Sisera ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite huhna ngen dingin, Topa tungah kiko uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in sik leeng zakua nei a, Israel mite kum sawmnih sung nakpi takin nengniam hi.
Tua hun lai takin Lappidoth’ zi, kamsang numei Deborah in Israelte thu khen hi.
Tua nu, Efraim mualtung gam sung Ramah leh Beth-el kikal nisuh kung nuai-ah thu khen hi; thu a khensak dingin ama kiangah Israel mite pai uh hi.

Amah in mi sawlin Naftali gam Kedesh panin Abinoam’ tapa Barak samsak a, ama kiangah, “Topa, Israelte’ Pasian’ in nang thu hong pia-in, ‘Pai in, Tabor Mual-ah na mite khawm in la, Naftali minam leh Zebulun minam panin mi tulsawm la in hong ci hi lo ahi hiam?
Keimah in Jabin’ galkap mang Sisera, Kishon gun-ah nang hong dawntuah dingin a leengte leh a galkapte tawh ka kai khia ding hi; na khut sungah amah kong pia ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Barak in ama kiangah, “Kei tawh nong kuan ding leh, ka kuan ding hi; ahih hangin kei tawh nong kuan kei ding leh ka kuan kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Nang tawh kong kuan taktak ding hi; ahi zongin, na pai nading lampi in nangma minthan’ nading hong tun’pih lo ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in numei khat khut sungah Sisera pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Deborah ding-in Barak tawh Kedesh-ah pai hi.
Barak in Kedesh-ah Zebulun leh Naftali sam hi; ama kiangah mihing tulsawm kuan to uh hi; amah tawh Deborah kuanto khawm hi.
Tu-in Moses’ sungpa Hohab’ suan-le-khak Ken mite sung panin Ken mi Heber paikhia a, Kedesh kiang, Zafananim-a tawsaw ciang pekah a puanbuk lam hi.
Abinoam’ tapa Barak, Tabor Mual-ah paito khin ci-in Sisera kiangah a kigen ciangin,
Sisera in a leeng khempeuh, sik leeng zakua, leh ama kianga om mi khempeuh, Harosheth-ha-goiim panin Kishon gun-ah sam khia hi.

Tua ciangin Deborah in Barak kiangah, “Ding in! Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in na khut sungah Sisera hong piak ni ahi hi. Na mai-ah Topa pai hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mihing tulsawm in zui-in Tabor Mual panin Barak paisuk hi.
Topa in Barak mai-ah Sisera leh a leengte khempeuh leh a galkapte khempeuh taisak hi; tua ciangin Sisera a leeng tung pan tuakin a khe-in tai hi.
Barak in Harosheth-ha-goiim ciang dong a leengte leh a galkapte delh a, Sisera’ galkapte khempeuh namsau tawh kithatin bei mang uh hi; mi khat zong suakta lo hi.
Ahih hangin Sisera, Ken mi Heber’ zi Jael’ puanbuk-ah a khe-in tai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hazor kumpipa Jabin leh Ken mi Heber’ innkuante kilem uh hi.

Sisera a dawn dingin Jael pusuak a, ama kiangah, “Hong kihei in, ka Topa aw, kei lamah hong kihei in; lau kei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama lam puanbuk-ah amah pai a, tua nu in sualphah puan khat tawh amah khuh hi.

Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Hong thuum ing, dawn ding tui tawm hong pia in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka dang a tak hi,”a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in bawngnawi koihna savun thawl hong-in dawnsak a, amah khuh hi.
Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Puanbuk kongah ding in la, mi khatpeuh hong pai-in na kiangah, ‘Hih lai-ah mi khatpeuh a om hiam?’ hong cih leh, ‘Om kei,’ na ci in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Heber’ zi Jael in puanbuk khetphim khat la a, a khut-ah sek khat tawi-in, ama kiangah dam takin pai a, a lung khamna hangin ihmucip-in a om lai takin a khetphim in lei a bat dongin a paang-ah khensuk hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah si hi.

En in, Barak in Sisera hong delh ciangin amah dawn dingin Jael pusuak a, ama kiangah, “Hong pai in, na mi zon’ kong lak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua nu’ puanbuk sungah amah pai hi; tua lai-ah Sisera a paang-ah puanbuk khetphim tawh si-in na om hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Israel mite mai-ah Pasian in Kanaan kumpi Jabin nuaisiah hi.
Israel mite in Kanaan kumpipa Jabin a suksiat matengin amaute in Kanaan kumpipa Jabin tungah thuak hak semsem uh hi.
Tua ciangin Deborah leh Abinoam’ tapa Barak in tua ni-in la sa uh hi:
“Makaite in Israelte sungah makai uh a, mite amau mahmah utna tawh kipia uh hi, Topa phat un!
”Ngai un, Kumpite aw; na bil uh ngat un, Uliante aw; Topa tungah ka sa ding hi, Israelte Pasian, Topa tungah la ngaih ka sa ding hi.
“Topa aw, Seir panin na paikhiat ciang, Edom gam panin na paikhiat ciang, leitung liing hi. Vantung panin guahzu hi, hi hi, meiite in tui hong khia hi.
Topa mai-ah mualte kiliing hi, Israelte’ Pasian, Topa’ mai Sinai gal khatah.
“Anath’ tapa Shamgar’ hun lai, Jael’ hun lai-in, a honhon a, khualzinte om nawn lo a, khualzinte lam gei-ah pial uh hi.
Israel sunga lokhote khawl hi, amaute khawl hi, nang, Deborah nong khan’ mateng, Israel sungah nu banga nong khan’ mateng,
A thak pasiante a kiteel ciangin, kulh kongpi sungah gal om pah hi. Lum ahi a, tei ahi zongin Israel tul sawmlite’ lakah kimu ahi hiam?
Mite lak panin utna tawh amau a kipia tawm Israel a ukte lamah ka lungsim pai hi.
“A thu gen un, no la puang tungah a tuangte, sualphah puan hoih tungah a tute leh lampi-ah a paite aw.
Tui phual-a lasakna a tumte’ gin’na-ah, amaute in Topa’ gualzawhna, Israel sunga a lokhote in a gualzawhna genkik uh hi. “Tua ciangin Topa’ mite kulh kongpite-ah paisuk uh hi.
“Khanglo in, khanglo in, Deborah! Khanglo in, khanglo in, la khat sa in! Tho in, Barak, na gal matte pai khiatpih in, Abinoam’ tapa aw.
Tua ciangin ulianpa’ mi a om laite paisuk uh a, ama ading a dosak dingin Topa’ mite paisuk uh hi.

Amaute in Amalek ah kipan khia-in, Efraim panin ding khia uh a, tua kuam-ah pai-in amaute’ nungah Benjamin, in a behte tawh hong zui uh hi; Makhir panin a ukte hong pai sukin, Zebulun panin ulianpa’ ciangkhut a tawite hong paisuk uh hi;
Issakhar uliante Deborah tawh hong pai a, Barak tungah Issakhar thuman hi; kuam sung ama khe phungah amaute kituah uh hi. Reuben behte lakah nakpi tak-a lungsim ngaihsutna om hi.
Bang hangin tuu-khawkte lakah tuuhonte’ ading tamngai kitum ngai dingin zekai na hi hiam? Reuben behte lakah nakpi tak-a lungsim ngaihsutna om hi.
Jordan gal khatah Gilead om hi; Dan, bang hangin teembawte tawh om ahi hiam? Asher in tuipi gei-ah tu lai a, leilak a tun’na gei-ah teeng hi.
Zebulun in sihna dongin gal sungah a kipia ngam mi ahi hi; Naftali zong, gamlak a sangna mun-ah tua bangmah ahi hi.
“Kumpite hong pai-in do uh hi; tua ciangin Kanaan kumpite in Megiddo tuite gei, Ta-anak-ah do uh hi; amaute in a kinusia ngunte ngah lo uh hi.
Vantung panin aksite in do uh a, amau paina ciat panin Sisera do uh hi.
Kishon guntui khang in amaute tai a, a leeng vanvan tuikhang, Kishon tuikhang in tai hi. Thakhauh takin mai ka nawt suak ding hi!
“Tua ciangin sakolte khe, a koptaina, a sakol hangte koptaina ging hi.
“Topa’ vantungmi in, ‘Meroz samsia in, a sunga teeng mite nasia takin samsia in, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa a huh dingin a thahatpa dona ah Topa a huh dingin hong pai lo uh hi,’ a ci hi
“Numeite lakah thupha ngah pha pen Jael, Ken mi Heber’ zi, puanbuk a teeng numei lak pan thupha ngah phapen hi ta hen.
Amah in tui ngen a, tua nu in bawngnawi pia hi, ulian hai sungah tua nu in bawngnawi thau-khal paipih hi.
Amah in puanbuk khetphim a khutin zam a, a taklam khutin nasemte’ khetbuk zam hi; Sisera khatvei sat a, a lutang satkhamin, amah in phelkhamin a paang sun hi.
Amah tuk hi, amah puk hi, tua nu khe kiangah amah taang loin om hi; ama khe phungah amah tuk hi, amah puk hi; a tukna munah, amah a si-in puk hi.

“Kongvangneu panin amah khuadak a, a kikalh simsiam kawm panin Sisera’ nu khuadak hi: ‘Bang hangin a leeng hong ciah ding hih tanvei sawt hiam? A leeng khegingte bang hangin hici zekai hiam?’ a ci hi.
A numeite a pilpen nu in dawng hiam, dawng lo hi, amah leh amah kidawng hi.

‘Amaute in van kinusiate mu-in hawm hilo ahi hiam?—Mi khat ciangin nungak khat ahih kei leh nih pai; a kinusia puan kinimte Sisera adingin a kinusia puan kinim a kizemte, a kinim a kizem puan nihte ka ngawng’ ading maw?” a ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin na gal khempeuh si khin uh hi. Topa! Ahih hangin na lawmte pen a vangliatna tawh a suak ni bang ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin tua gam in kum sawmli sung tawlngakna nei hi.
Israel mite Topa muhna-ah a sia gamta uh hi; Topa in Midiante’ khut sungah amaute kum sagih sung pia hi.
Israelte tungah Midiante gualzo hi; Midiante hangin Israel mite in amau adingin mual tungah a om bukna munte, leh leihawmte leh mun muanhuaite bawl uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte in khai a tuh peuhmah uh ciangin Midian mite leh Amalek mite leh Nisuahna lam mite hong pai-in amaute do hi;

amau’ lang khatah amaute in giahphual satin Gaza kiim ciangciang dong lei pan-a piangte susia uh a, Israel sungah nuntak nading bangmah nusia loin, tuu ahi a, bawngtal ahi a, la ahi zongin nusia lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a ganhingte leh a puanbukte uh tawh hong pai-in, kauphe bangin tamin hong pai uh hi; amaute leh a kalaohte uh kisim zo lo hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute hong tun’ ciangin gam teng bei sak uh hi.
Midiante hangin Israelte kiniam koih mahmah hi; Israel mite in Topa tungah huhna ngenin kiko uh hi.
Midiante hangin Israel mite Topa tungah a kiko uh ciangin,
Topa in Israel mite kiangah kamsang khat sawl hi; amah in amaute kiangah, “Israelte’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Izipt panin note kong pai khiatpih a, salsuahna panin note kong pai khiatpih hi;
Izipt mite khut sung pan, leh note hong nengniam mite khempeuh khut sung pan note hong honkhia a, note mai-ah amaute hawl khia-in, amau’ leitang note kong pia hi;
tua ciangin note kiangah, “Keimah in Topa na Pasian uh ka hi hi; na teen’na uh Amor mite pasiante zahtakna na pia kei ding uh hi,’ kong ci hi. Ahih hangin note in ka thu na ngai kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in a tapa Gideon in Midian mite muh loh dingin leenggah sukna-ah mangbuh satin a om lai takin, Ofrah-ah Abiezer mi Joash neihsa tawsaw nuai-ah Topa’ vantungmi hong pai-in hong tu hi.
Topa’ vantungmi ama tungah kilangin ama kiangah, “Topa in nang tawh hong om hi, nang a thahat a vanglian mipa aw,” a ci hi.

Gideon in ama kiangah, “Kong thuum hi, sia aw, Topa in kote tawh hong om ahih leh, bang hangin hih nate khempeuh ko tungah hong tung ahi hiam? Ka pate un kote tungah hong genin ‘Topa in Izipt panin eite hong paipih to hilo ahi hiam?’ a cih uh a lamdang ama sepnate khempeuh koi-ah om ahi hiam? Ahih hangin tu-in Topa in kote hong paaikhia-in, Midiante’ khut sungah hong pia khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama lamah Topa kihei-in, “Hih nangma vangliatna tawh pai in la, Midiante khut sung panin Israelte honkhia in; nangmah hong sawl hilo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Kong thuum hi, Topa aw, Israelte bangci hot khiat ding ka hi hiam? En in, keimah behte in Manasseh sungah a hat lopen hi a, ka innkuan sung panin kei in a neu pen ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in ama kiangah, “Nang tawh kong om ding a, nangmah in mihing khat bang lelin Midian mite na vatgawp ding hi,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Tu-in nang tungah maipha ka muh leh, kei tawh a kiho mipa in nang na hihna lim khat hong lak in.
Kong thuum hi, ka letsong hong puakin nang kiangah hong pai-in nangma mai-ah kong koih mateng hih lai panin paikhia kei in,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Nong pai kik mateng ka na om ding hi,”a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Gideon a inn-ah pai-in keelno khat, leh annel seu khat panin silngo sawhloh moh bawl hi; a sa ciang sung khatah koihin a satui beel sung khatah koih a, tawsaw nuai ama kiangah tuate paipihin pia hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian' vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Sa leh silngo sawhloh moh la-in hih suang tungah koih in la, a tungah a satui sung in,” a ci hi. Tua mah bangin amah in hih hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in a khut sunga om ciangkhut dawn dawksakin, sa leh silngo sawhloh mohte su hi; a suang panin mei piangkhia-in sa leh silngo sawhloh moh kangtum hi; tua ciangin ama muhna panin Topa’ vantungmi mang hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in amah Topa’ vantungmi ahih lam thei hi; Gideon in, “Ala, Topa Pasian! Topa’ vantungmi mai kituahin ka mu khin kha hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Nopna na tungah om ta hen; lau kei in, na si kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in Topa adingin biakna tau khat tua lai-ah lam a, tua pen, Topa in nopna ahi hi, ci-in phuak hi. Tua pen, Abiezer mite’ neihsa Ofrah-ah tu ni dongin ding lai hi.
Tua zan-in Topa in ama kiangah, “Na pa’ bawngtal, kum sagih a pha a bawngtal nihna la in la, na pa’ neih Baal biakna tau phelin, a gei-a om Asherah milim phuk in;

tua ciangin hih lai mun muanhuai dawn-ah Topa na Pasian adingin biakna tau khat lamin, a suangte a ngeina ding bangin koih in; tua ciangin bawngtal nihna la-in, na phuk Asherah milim sing tawh meihal biakna-in pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gideon in a nasemte mi sawm la-in, Topa in ama tungah a gen bangin hih hi; ahih hangin sun-in a hih ding a innkuanpihte leh a khua mite kihta lua ahih manin zan-in a hih hi.
Tua khua mite zingsang tungin a thawh uh ciangin, en in, Baal biakna tau kiphel khia-in a gei-a om Asherah milim kiphuk a, a kilam thak biakna tau tungah bawngtal nihna kipia hi.
Amaute khat leh khat kiangah, “Hih na kua in hih hiam?” kici uh hi. Amaute in a thu kanin a dot khit uh ciangin, “Joash tapa Gideon in hih hi,” kici uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua khua mite in Joash kiangah, “Na tapa in Baal biakna tau phel khia-in a gei-a om Asherah milim phuk ahih manin a sih theih nadingin amah hong pai khiatpih in,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Joash in ama lang khatah a pang mite khempeuh tungah, “Baal pan’pih ding a, ama tupna hutpih ding na hi uh hiam? Amah a pan’pih peuhmah zingsang ciangin kithat ding hi. Amah in pasian ahih leh amah in ama ading pang tawm hen, bang hang hiam cih leh ama biakna tau kiphel khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Gideon, “Keima lang khatah Baal pangsak un,” a cih nopna ahi Jerubbaal min kiphuak hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Gideon in a biakna tau phel hi.
Tua ciangin Midian mite leh Amalek mite leh Nisuahna lam mite khempeuh hong paikhawm uh a, amaute in Jordan kantanin Jezre-el Kuam-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Ahih hangin Gideon tungah Topa’ Kha hong tung hi; amah in peengkul gingsak a, amah zui dingin Abiezer mite kisam khia hi.
Amah in Manasseh gam khempeuhah kamtaite sawl hi; amaute zong amah zui dingin kisam hi. Amah in Asher, Zebulun, leh Naftali kiangah kamtaite sawl hi; a dawn dingin amaute paito uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in Pasian kiangah, “Na gensa bangin keima tha tawh Israelte na hotkhiat ding leh,

en in, ancilna sual tungah tuumul lom khat ka koih hi; tuumul tung bekah daitui omin leilak dang khempeuh a keu leh, na gensa bangin keima tha tawh Israelte na honkhia ding hi, cih ka thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin piang hi. A zingsang ciangin tho baihin a tuumulte a tui suk a, tuumul panin tui hai khat dim suk khia hi.

Tua ciangin Gideon in Pasian kiangah, “Kei tungah hong heh kei in, tu-a khatvei bek hong pausak lai in; kong thuum hi, tuumul tawh hih khatvei bek hong sinsak lai in; kong thuum hi; tuumul tung bek keu sak in la, mun dang leitung khempeuhah daitui om sak in,” a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin Pasian in tua zan-in hih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuumul tung bek keu a, mun dang leitung khempeuhah daitui om hi.

Tua ciangin Jerubbaal (Gideon a cihna) leh amah tawh a om mi khempeuh zingsangin tho baihin Harod tuikhuk gei-ah giahphual sat uh hi; Midiante’ giahphual pen amau kiang pan leilu lam, Moreh mual kiang, kuam sungah om hi.

Topa in Gideon kiangah, “Amau’ khut sungah Midian mite piak nadingin nang tawh a omkhawm mite kei adingin tam lua hi, tua hi kei leh kei tungah Israelte kisialin, ‘Komau’ hatna hangin ka gualzo uh hi,’ ci kha ding uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in mite’ zakin taangko in la, ‘Lau-in a liing mi peuhmah Gilead panin inn-ah ciah un,’ ci in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Gideon in amaute ze-et hi; tul sawmnih leh tulnih ciah kikin, tulsawm om lai hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Gideon kiangah, “Mite tam lua lai hi; amaute tui-ah paipih in, nang adingin tua mun-ah amaute kong sinsak ding hi; nang kiangah, ‘Hih mipa nang tawh hong pai ding hi,’ ka cihpa nang tawh hong pai ding hi; nang kiangah, ‘Hih mipa nang tawh hong pai lo ding hi,’ ka cih peuhpeuhpa pai lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in tui phual-ah mite paipih suk hi; Topa in Gideon kiangah, “Ui in a liah bangin a lei tawh tui a liak mi peuhmah na tuam koih ding hi; tua mah bangin tui dawn dingin a khukdin’ suk peuhmah zong na tuam koih ding hi,”a ci hi.
Tui a liak, a khut uh a kam-ah a tuah mi zathum ahi hi; ahih hangin a dangte khempeuh tui dawn dingin khukdin’ suk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Gideon kiangah, “Tui a liak mi zathumte tawh nangmah hong honkhia-in, na khut sungah Midian mite kong pia ding hi; a dangte khempeuh amau’ inn ciatah ciahsak in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in amau’ tung panin mite’ beelte leh a peengkulte la hi; Israel a dangte khempeuh amau puanbuk ciatah ciahsak a, ahih hangin mihing zathumte khawl sak hi; Midiante’ giahphual pen ama khang lam kuam sungah om hi.
Tua zan mahin Topa in ama kiangah, “Tho in, giahphual simin pai in; bang hang hiam cih leh na khut sungah kong pia zo hi.
Ahih hangin paisuk ding na lau leh, na nasempa Purah tawh giahphual-ah paisuk in;

tua ciangin amaute’ thugen na za ding a, tua khit ciangin giahphual simin a paisuk dingin na tha hong khauh ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nasempa Purah tawh giahphual a om galkapte in a pua lamah a gal pan’na mun-ah paisuk hi.
Midian mite leh Amalek mite leh Nisuahna lam mite khempeuh kauphe bangin tamin kuam dungah om uh hi; a kalaohte uh sim zawh hilo a, a tamna pen tuipi gei-a om sehnel zah bang ahi hi.

Gideon a tun’ ciangin, mi khat in a lawmpa kiangah mang khat na gen hi; amah in, “Ngai in, mang khat ka man hi; Midiante giahphual sungah mangbuhham kibawl moh khat hong tuk sukin puanbuk hong ban a, puanbuk deng kha-in puanbuk puk a, puanbuk kilumletin lei lakah kiphah hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a lawmpa in dawngin, “Hih in, Israel mi Joash’ tapa Gideon’ namsau lo a dang hi lo hi; Pasian in ama khut sungah Midian leh mihon khempeuh pia khin hi,” a ci hi.

Gideon in mang leh a khiatna a kigenna a zak ciangin Pasian bia-in khukdin hi; Israelte’ giahphual ah ciah kikin, “Tho in, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in na khut sung uh ah Midian honte hong pia zo hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in mihing zathumte pawl thumin khenin, amaute khempeuh’ tungah peengkul leh beel sungah meilah a om beel hawmte pia hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Keimah hong en un la hih bangin hih un; giahphual nawl ka tun’ ciangin kei’ hih bangin hih un,
kei leh ka ompih khempeuh in peengkul ka tum ciangin, giahphual pang khempeuhah zong peengkulte tum un la, ‘Topa ading leh Gideon ading,’ ci-in awng un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, amaute in galvil a laih khit phet, zankim lai takin, Gideon leh amah tawh a om mi za khatte giahphual nawlah hong pai uh hi; amaute in peengkul tumin a khut sung uh a, om beelte sukham uh hi.

A pawl thum-un peengkul tumin beelte sukham uh a, a veilam khut-un meilah tawi-in, a taklam khut-un a tum ding uh peengkul tawi uh hi; tua ciangin amaute kiko-in, “Topa ading leh Gideon’ading namsau khat!” a ci uh hi.
Amaute a vekpi-in giahphual kiim-ah ding uh a, galkapte khempeuh tai uh hi; amaute kiko-in tai khia uh hi.

Amaute in peengkul zathumte a tum uh ciangin, Topa in giahphuala om mi khempeuh a namsau uh tawh amau leh amau kisat gawpsak hi; tua ciangin galkapte Zererah lam Bethshittah ciang, Tabbath kiang Abelmeholah gamgi dong tai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Naftali leh Asher leh Manassehte khempeuh panin Israel mite kisam khia a, amaute in Midiante delh uh hi.

Tua ciangin Gideon in Efraim mualtung gam khempeuhah kamtaite sawl a, “Midian mite’ lang khatah hong kuansuk un la Bethbarah ciang dong luite hong la un, Jordan zong la un,” ci sak hi. Tua ahih ciangin Efraim mite khempeuh kisam khia a, amaute in Bethbarah ciang dong luite la-in, Jordan zong la uh hi.

Amaute in Midian ulian nihte Oreb leh Ze-eb man uh hi; amaute in Midiante a delh kawm-un Oreb suangpi-ah Oreb that uh a, Ze-eb leenggah sukna-ah Ze-eb that uh hi; amaute in Jordan gal khat Gideon kiangah Oreb leh Ze-eb lutangte paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Efraim mite in ama kiangah, “Midiante do ding na pai lai-in kote nong sap loh, kote hong bangci bawl na hi hiam?”a ci uh hi. Amaute in nakpi takin amah mawhsak uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note tawh teh dingin ke’n bang hih ka hi hiam? Efraim leenggah sang kaihkhopna in Abiezer leenggah lak sangin hoih zaw hilo ahi hiam?

Pasian in note’ khut sungah Midian uliante Oreb leh Ze-eb hong pia zo hi; note tawh teh dingin ke’n bang hih zo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in hih thu a gen khit ciang-in ama tunga amau’ hehna a bei hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon, amah leh amah tawh a om mi zathumte, Jordan tungin galkah a, gimpi mahin amaute delh lai uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Sukkoth mite kiangah, “Kong thuum hi, kei hong zuite tungah anlum pia un; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute gim uh a, Midian kumpi Zebah leh Zalmunna a delh ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Sukkoth uliante in, “Na galkapte tungah anlum ka piak dingun Zebah leh Zalmunna na khut sungah om khin ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in, “Tua ahih leh pha hi, Topa in Zebah leh Zalmunna ka khut sungah hong piak khit ciangin gamlak lingte leh lingkung tawh na sa uh ka kui ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai panin Penuel-ah paito a, amaute tungah tua mah bangin gen hi; Penuel mite in Sukkoth mite’ dawn mah bangin amah na dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah Penuel mite kiangah, “Lungnuamin kong pai kik ciangin hih tausang ka su-pai ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tu-in Zebah leh Zalmunnate, Nisuahna lam mi galkap khempeuh sung pan a om lai teng, mihing tulsawm leh tulnga bang a pha a galkapte uh tawh Karkor-ah om uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh namsau a tawi mi tulza leh tul sawmnih si khin hi.
Tua ciangin Nobah leh Jogbehah nisuahna lam mihonte’ tot lampi zui-in Gideon paito-in galkapte do hi; bang hang hiam cih leh galkapte a galvil om lo hi.
Tua ciangin Zebah leh Zalmunna tai uh hi; amah in amaute delhin Midian kumpi nihte Zebah leh Zalmunna manin galkapte khempeuh kitheh thangsak hi.
Tua ciangin Joash’ tapa Gideon a gal simna panin Heres kahtohna lam tawnin ciahkik hi.
Amah in Sukkoth mi tangval khat manin thu dong hi; tua pa in ama adingin Sukkoth uliante leh upate mihing sawmsagih leh sagih a min gelhsak hi.

Tua ciangin Sukkoth mite kiangah amah tungin, “Kei tungah hong kisialin, ‘A gim na mite tungah anlum ka piak dingun Zebah leh Zalmunna na khut sungah om khin ahi hiam?’ na cih uh Zebah leh Zalmunna en un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a khuapi upate sam a, gamlak lingte leh lingkungte zong la-in, tuate tawh Sukkoth mite thuhilh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Penuel tausang su-pai-in tua khua mite that hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Zebah leh Zalmunna kiangah, “Tabor-ah na thah uh mite koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Amaute, nangmah bang uh hi; amaute in kumpipa’ tapate suun uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Amaute in ka sanggam, ka nu’ tapate ahi uh hi; Topa a nuntak mah bangin, amaute suakta sak hi le uh cin note kong that kei ding hi,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a tacil Jether kiangah, “Ding in, amaute that in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin tangvalpa in a namsau dok lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah tangval lai ahih manin lau hi.

Tua ciangin Zebah leh Zalmunna in, “Nangmah mah ding in, kote hong hih in; bang hang hiam cih leh pasal in a pasal bangin a thahat hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciang Gideon ding-in Zebah leh Zalmunna that hi; amah in amau’ kalaohte’ ngawng-a a om khade lim tawh a kibang kizepnate la hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Gideon kiangah, “Nang leh na tapa leh na tupate in zong kote hong uk un; bang hang hiam cih leh Midiante khut sung panin kote nong honkhia khin hi,” a ci uh hi.
Gideon in amaute kiangah, “Note kong uk kei ding a, ka tapa in zong note hong uk lo ding hi; Topa in note hong uk ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Gideon in amaute kiangah, “Note tung panin ngetna khat hong bawlsak un; note lakah mi khempeuh in van kinusia na top uh lak panin bilbahte hong pia un,” a ci hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Ishmael mite ahih manin bilbah nei uh hi.)
Amaute in dawngin, “Lungkim takin kong pia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in puan phah uh a, mi khempeuh in a van kinusia top uh lak pan bilbahte tua puan tungah lawn uh hi.

Ama nget kham bilbahte a gihna in kham shekel tulkhat leh zasagih ahi hi; Midian kumpite in a zat khade lim tawh a kibang kizepnate leh khainiangte leh puan dupsante, leh a kalaohte uh ngawng kimkotah a om ngawng-awhte kisim lo ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Gideon in milim-in tuate bawlin ama khuapi Ofrah khua-ah koih hi; Israelte khempeuh in tua lai mun-ah tua milim bia uh a, Gideon leh a innkuanpihte’ adingin thangzak khat suak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite mai-ah Midiante guallel uh a, amaute kihisak zo nawn lo uh hi. Gideon’ hun sungin tua gam in kum sawmli sung tawlngakna nei hi.
Joash’ tapa Jerubbaal pai-in ama aituam innah teeng hi.
Tu-in Gideon in tapa sawmsagih, ama aa mahmah nei hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in zi tampi nei hi,
Shekhem-ah a om a zineu in zong tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Abimelek phuak hi.
Tua ciangin Joash’ tapa Gideon teek sih a, Abiezer mite neihsa Ofrah khua-a om a pa Joash’ han-ah kivui hi.
Gideon a sih khit phetin Israel mite kihei kikin Baalte bia uh a, a pasian dingun Baalberith bawl uh hi.
Israel mite in, mun khempeuh panin amau’ galte’ khut sung pan a honkhia Topa a Pasian uh phawk lo uh hi;
Jerubbaal (Gideon a cihna) in Israelte tungah a bawl thu hoihte khempeuh hangin amaute in Jerubbaal innkuante tungah migitna bangmah lak lo uh hi.
Tu-in Jerubbaal’ tapa Abimelek Shekhem-a a nu’ tanaute kiangah pai-in amaute leh a nu’ innkuante beh khempeuh kiangah,

“Shekhem khuami khempeuh huau-in gen un, ‘Jerubbaal’ tapa sawmsagihte a vekpi in note hong uk ding leh khat in note hong uk ding, note adingin koi hoih zaw ahi hiam?’ a ci hi. Keimah in note’ guh note’ sa ka hihna zong phawk un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a nu’ tanaute in ama tangin Shekhem mite khempeuh tungah hih thute gen uh hi; tua ciangin amaute’ lungsim Abimelek zuih ding lamah hoi hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Amah i sanggampa ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Baalberith inn panin ngun peek sawmsagih Abimelek pia uh a, amah in ama nung a zui bangmah-a kimang lo leh thu ngaihsun thei lo mite cialna hi.
Tua ciangin Ofrah-a a pa’ innah amah pai-in, Jerubbaal’ tapa a sanggam mi sawmsagihte suang khat tungah that hi; ahih hangin amah bu ahih manin Jerubbaal’ tapa neu pen Jotham suakta hi.
Tua ciangin Shekhem khua mite khempeuh leh Bethmillo khua mite khempeuh hong paikhawm uh a, amaute in Shekhem khua-a tawsaw khuampi kiangah Abimelek kumpi suaksak uh hi.
Jotham kiangah tua thu a kigen ciangin amah pai-in Gerizim Mual dawnah ding a, nakpi-in kiko-in amaute kiangah, “No Shekhem mite aw, Pasian in note thu hong ngaih theih nadingin ka thu hong ngai un.
Khatvei, singkungte amau’ tungah kumpi-in sathau a nilh dingin paikhia uh hi; amaute in oliv kung kiangah, ‘Kote hong uk in,’ a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin oliv kung in amaute kiangah, ‘Keimah in pasiante leh mite a kipahtawina ahi ka thaunate nusia-in singkungte a uk dingin hong pai ding ka hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin singkungte in theikung kiangah, ‘Hong pai in la, kote hong uk in,’ a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin theikung in amaute kiangah, ‘Keimah in ka khumna leh ka gah hoihte nusia-in singkungte a uk dingin hong pai ding ka hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin singkungte in leenggui kiangah, ‘Hong pai in la, kote hong uk in,’ a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin leenggui in amaute kiangah, ‘Keimah in pasiante leh mite a lungnuamsak ka leenggahzu nusia-in singkungte a uk dingin hong pai ding ka hi hiam?’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin singkung khempeuh in thangling kung kiangah, ‘Hong pai in la, kote hong uk in,’ a ci uh hi.

Thangling kung in singkungte kiangah, ‘Note tungah kumpi-in lungsim tak tawh sathau hong nilh na hih uh leh, hong pai un la ka liim-ah bu un; ahih hangin tua bang ahih kei leh, thangling kung lak panin meikuang hong pai khia hen la, Lebanon taamtak kungte kangtum hen,’ a ci hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Abimelek kumpi-in na bawl uh ciangin lungsim tak leh thuman tak mah tawh a gamta na hi uh hiam?—Jerubbaal leh a innkuan tungah thuman takin gamta-in ama sepna tawh a kituakin amah a bawl mah na hi uh hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa in note ading hong do sakin a lauhuaina sungah a nuntakna pia a, Midiante khut sung panin note hong honkhia hi;

ahi zongin tu ni-in ka pa’ innkuan lang khatah note tho-in a tapate mi sawmsagih suang khat tungah na that uh a, ka pa in a nasem numei tawh a neih a tapa Abimelek pen note’ tanau ahihna hangin Shekhem khua mite tungah kumpi-in na bawl uh hi—
note in tu ni-in Jerubbaal leh a innkuanpihte tungah lungsim tak leh thuman tak tawh a gamta takpi mah na hih uh leh, Abimelek tungah note lungdam un la, note tungah amah zong lungdam hen;

ahih hangin tua bang ahih takpi kei leh, Abimelek sung panin meikuang hong paikhia hen la, Shekhem leh Bethmillo khua mite kangtum hen; Shekhem khua mite sung pan leh Bethmillo khua mite sung panin meikuang hong pai hen la, Abimelek kangtum hen,’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggampa Abimelek a kihtakna hangin Jotham taikhia-in Be-er-ah pai-in tua lai-ah teeng hi.
Abimelek in Israelte tungah kum thum sung uk hi.
Pasian in Abimelek leh Shekhem mite kikalah khagilo sawlin kigalneihna omsak hi; tua ciangin Shekhem mite in Abimelek lehdo uh hi;

tua in, Jerubbaal tapa sawmsagihte a kithahna thu tawh kisai-in, amaute a that a sanggampa uh Abimelek, leh a sanggamte thah nadingin a hanthawn Shekhem mite tungah thukkikna hong tun’ theih nadingin a kibawl mahmah ahi hi.
Tua hi a, Shekhem mite in amah pangsim dingin mual dawn-ah mi khempeuhte’ na nasut uh hi; hih thu Abimelek kiangah kigen hi.
Tua ciangin Ebed’ tapa Ga-al a tanaute tawh Shekhem-ah hong kuan hi; Shekhem mite in amah muang uh hi.
Amaute lo-ah kuanin a leenggui lo uh panin leenggah khawmin cil uh a, pawi khamin amaute’ pasian’ inn-ah pai uh a, anne tuidawnin omin Abimelek zahko uh hi.

Tua ciangin Ebed’ tapa Ga-al in, “Abimelek in kua hi a, ama na i sep dingin ei Shekhem mite in kua i hi hiam? Jerubbaal tapa leh ama ulian Zebul in Shekhem mite’ pu leh pa Hamor’ na sem hilo ahi uh hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin ama na sem ding i hi hiam?
Hih mite keima khut nuai a, om hi tazen leh Abimelek ka khin khia ding hi. Abimelek kiangah, ‘Na galkap behlap in la hong kuan khia in,’ ka ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khuapi a uk Zebul in Ebed tapa Ga-al’ kammalte a zak ciangin heh mahmah hi.
Amah in Arumah khua-a om Abimelek kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “En in, Ebed tapa Ga-al leh a tanaute Shekhem-ah hong pai-in nang langpangin tua khuapi sosuah uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang leh nang tawh a om mite zan-in pai un la gamlakah pangsim un.

Tua ciangin zingsang ciang ni a suah phetin tho baih un la khuapi bawh un; tua ciangin amah leh amah tawh a om mite nang a do dingin hong kuan khiat ciangun a hi thei bangin amaute tungah na bawl ding hi,” ci sak hi.
Tua ciangin Abimelek leh amah tawh a om mite khempeuh zan-in tho-in pawl li kisuahin Shekhem sim dingin pangsim uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ebed tapa Ga-al paikhia-in khuapi kulh kongpi lutna-ah ding hi; tua ciang Abimelek leh amah tawh a om mite a pan’simna panun ding to uh hi.
Ga-al in tua mite a muh ciangin amah in Zebul kiangah, “En in, mual dawn panin mite hong paisuk!” a ci hi. Zebul in ama kiangah, “Mual liimte mi bangin a mu na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Ga-al pau kikin, “En in, a gam laizang panin mite hong paisuk a, Aisaante’ Tawsaw lam panin pawl khat hong pai hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Zebul in ama kiangah, “Tu-in na kam han’na koi-ah om hiam, ‘Ama na i sep dingin Abimelek in kua ahi hiam?’ a ci pa aw, Hih mite in na simmawhte hilo ahi hiam? Tu-in paikhia in la amaute tawh kido in,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Shekhem mite mai-ah Ga-al kuan khia-in Abimelek tawh kido hi.
Abimelek in amah delh a, a mai-ah amah tai hi; kulh kongpi lutna dongah mi tampi liamin tuk hi.
Tua ciangin Arumah-ah Abimelek teeng hi; Zebul in Ga-al leh a tanaute hawlkhia a, amaute Shekhem-ah teeng thei nawn lo uh hi.
A zing ciangin gamlakah Shekhem mite paikhia uh hi. Hih thu Abimelek kiangah kigen hi.
Amah in a mite la-in pawlthum suahin gamlakah pangsim uh hi; tua ciangin amah khuadakin khuapi panin mite a kuankhia mu a, amaute do-in kipan a, amaute that hi.
Abimelek leh amah tawh a om a pawlte in thakhatin mainawt uh a, ama pawl dang nihte in gamlak-a om mite delhin a thah sungin khuapi kulhpi lutna-ah amaute na ding uh hi.
Abimelek in sun tawntung tua khuapi sim hi; amah in tua khuapi la-in a sunga om mite that hi; amah in tua khuapi phiatmai-in ci vawh hi.
Shekhem Tausang mite khempeuh in tua thu a zak uh ciangin Elberith’ inn mun muanhuai-ah lut uh hi.
Shekhem Tausang mite khempeuh kikaikhawm uh hi, ci-in Abimelek kiangah kigen hi.

Tua ciangin amah leh amah tawh a om mi khempeuh tawh Zalmon Mual-ah Abimelek paito hi; Abimelek in a khut-in hei khat la-in selkeu lom khat sat a, tuate la to-in a liangko tungah pua hi. Tua ciangin amah tawh a om mite kiangah, “Kei hih nong muhsa bangun kei’ hih bangbangin manlangin hih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh amau’ ading selkeu lom satin Abimelek zui-in mun muanhuai sim nadingin koih uh a, amaute in mei tawh mun muanhuai halin Shekhem Tausang mite khempeuh zong, numei leh pasal mi tulkhat bang si hi.
Tua ciangin Thebez-ah Abimelek pai a, Thebez langpangin giahphual sat a, tua khua la hi.
Ahih hangin tua khuapi sungah tausang muanhuai khat om a, tua khua numei leh pasal, tua khuami khempeuh tua tausang-ah tai-in kikhaknelh uh hi; tua ciangin tausang khum-ah amaute pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abimelek tausangah pai-in sim a, mei tawh a hal dingin tausang kongkhak naih hi.
Numei khat in an gawina suangpeek tungnung Abimelek’lu tungah khiatsukin a lu guh deeng kham hi.

Tua ciangin Abimelek in ama hiam a tawisak tangvalpa nawh sapin ama kiangah, “Na namsau dok in la kei hong that in, tua hi kei leh mite in, ‘Numei khat in, amah that hi,’ hong ci kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi. A tangvalpa in amah sun letin amah si hi.
Israel mite in Abimelek a sihna a muh uh ciangin amau’ inn ciatah ciah uh hi.
Ama sanggam sawmsagihte thatin a pa tungah a khialhna hangin tua bangin Pasian in Abimelek’ khialhna thuk hi;
Pasian in Shekhem mite khempeuh’ gitlohna amau’ lu tungah tusak kik hi; tua bangin Jerubbaal’ tapa Jotham’ samsiatnate amau tungah a tung hi.
Abimelek khit ciangin Israelte a honkhia dingin Issakhar minam Dodo’ tapa Puah’ tapa Tola hong khang hi; amah Efraim mualtung gam Shamir-ah teeng hi.
Amah in Israelte kum sawmnih leh kum thum sung thu khen hi. Tua ciangin amah si a, Shamir-ah kivui hi.
Ama khit ciangin Israelte kum sawmnih leh kum nih sung thu a khen Gilead mi Jair hong khang hi.
Amah in la sawmthum tungah a tuang tapa sawmthum nei hi; amaute in Gilead gam sunga om tu dongin Havvothjair a kici khuapi sawmthum nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jair si-in Kamon-ah kivui hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in Topa’ muhna-ah a sia gamta kik uh a, Siria mite pasiante, Sidon mite pasiante, Moab mite pasiante, Ammon mite pasiante, leh Filistia gam mite’ pasiante ahi Baalte leh Ashtaroth’ na sem uh hi; amaute in Topa nusia-in ama’ na sem lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israelte tungah Topa’ hehna so a, amah in Filistia mite tung leh Ammon mite tungah amaute pia a,
amaute in Israel mite tua kum sugawpin nengniam uh hi. Amaute in Jordan galkhat Gilead gam sunga om Amor mite’ leitangah a om Israel mite khempeuh kum sawm leh kum giat sung nengniam uh hi.
Ammon mite in Judah leh Benjamin leh Efraim minamte zong a do dingin Jordan galkah uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Israelte nakpi takin lungkham uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite Topa tungah kiko uh a, “Nang tungah ka khial khin uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kote in ka Pasian uh nusia-in Baalte’ na ka sem uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Topa in Israel mite kiangah, “Iziptte leh Amor mite, Ammon mite leh Filistia mite kiang panin hong honkhia hilo ka hi hiam?
Sidon mite, Amalek mite leh Maon mite in zong note hong nengniam uh hi; kei tungah note nong kiko uh a, keimah in amaute’ khut sung panin note kong honkhia hi.
Tua hi napi-in note in kei hong nusia-in pasian dangte’ na na sem uh hi; tua ahih ciangin note kong honkhia nawn kei ding hi.
Pai un la note’ teel pasiante tungah ko un;’ na lungkham hun-un amaute kihonkhia sak un,” a ci hi.
Israel mite in Topa tungah, “Ka khial khin uh hi; hoih na sak bangbangin ko tungah hong hih in; tu ni-in hong honkhia in, kong thuum uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in amau’ lak panin gamdang pasiante koih khia-in Topa’ na sem uh hi; tua ciangin Israelte’ gentheihna-ah amah dah hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon mite galhiam tawi dingin kisam uh a, Gilead-ah giahphual sat uh hi; Israel mite zong kikaikhawmin Mizpah-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin mite, Gilead makaite khat leh khat in, “Ammon mite do dinga a kipan ngam kua om ahi hiam? Amah in Gilead gam-a teeng mite khempeuh tungah lutang hi ding hi,” a kici uh hi.
Tu-in Gilead khua mi Jefthah in a vanglian galhang khat hi a, ahih hangin amah in a paktat numei’ tapa ahi hi. Gilead in Jefthah’ pa ahi hi.

Gilead’ zi in zong amah tawh tapate nei hi; a tapate a khan’ ciangun amaute in Jefthah notkhia-in ama kiangah, “Ka pa uh inn sungah gamh na luah kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang in numei dang’ tapa na hi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggamte kiang panin Jefthah tai-in Tob gam sungah teeng hi; bangmah manlo mite in Jefthah pawmin amah tawh mite sugawpin pai uh hi.
Tawlkhat khit ciangin Ammon mite in Israelte do uh hi.
Ammon mite in Israelte a do ciangin, Tob gam panin Jefthah a la dingin Gilead upate va pai uh hi;
amaute in Jefthah kiangah, “Ammon mite i do theih nadingin hong pai in la kote’ makai hong hi in,” va ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Jefthah in Gilead upate kiangah, “Note in kei hong mudahin ka pa’ inn pan hong hawlkhia hilo na hi uh hiam? Bang hangin thu haksa na tuah uh ciangin kei kiangah hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a na ci hi.

Tua ciangin Gilead upate in Jefthah kiangah, “Kote tawh nang hong pai-in Ammon mite do-in Gilead gam sunga teeng mi khempeuh tungah lutang nong hih theih nadingin tua thu hang mahin nang lamah hong kihei ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Jefthah in Gilead upate kiangah, “Note in Ammon mite do dingin inn-ah nong ciahpih uh a, kei tungah Topa in amaute hong piak leh keimah in note’ lutang ka hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Gilead upate in Jefthah kiangah, “Topa in eite kikalah teci hi ding hi; na cih bangin ka hi taktak ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gilead upate tawh Jefthah pai a, mite in amau’ tunga lutang leh makai-in amah koih uh hi; Jefthah in hih thute khempeuh Mizpah khua sung Topa mai-ah gen hi.
Tua ciangin Jefthah in Ammon mite kumpipa kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Ka gam sim dingin kei kiangah nong pai nadingin kei tungah bang thu om ahi hiam?” ci sak hi.

Ammon mite kumpipa in Jefthah’ kamtaite dawng a, “Izipt panin Israelte hong pai lai-in Arnon panin Jabbok leh Jordan ciang ka gam hong lak sak hang ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin tu-in thudamin hong pia kik in,” a ci hi.
Jefthah in Ammon mite kumpipa kiangah kamtaite sawl kik a,
ama kiangah, “Jefthah in hih bangin ci hi: Israelte in Moab leitang hita leh Ammon mite leitang hita leh la lo hi.
Izipt panin Israelte hong paitoh lai-in gamlak tawnin San Tuipi-ah hong pai-in Kadesh hong tung uh hi.

Israelte in Edom kumpipa kiangah kamtaite sawl a, ‘Kong thuum hi, na gam sung hong nawksak in,’ ci sak uh hi; ahih hangin Edom kumpipa in a thu ngai lo hi. Tua ciangin Moab kumpipa kiangah zong sawl uh a, ahih hangin amah thukim lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Kadesh-ah Israelte om phot uh hi.

Tua ciangin gamlak tawnin amaute khualzin uh a, Edom gam leh Moab gam kimkotin pai-in Moab gam nisuahna lam pangah tung uh a, Arnon gal khatah phual sat uh hi; ahih hangin Moab gam sungah amaute lut lo uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Arnon in Moab gamgi ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Israelte in Heshbon kumpi ahi Amor mite kumpi Sihon kiangah kamtaite sawl uh hi; Israelte in ama kiangah, ‘Kong thuum uh hi, ka gam uh a zuan dingin na gam hong nawk sak in,’ ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Sihon in ama gam nawk dingin Israelte muang lo hi; tua ahih ciangin Sihon in a mite khempeuh kaikhawmin Jahaz-ah giahphual sat a, Israelte do hi.
Topa, Israelte Pasian in Sihon leh a mite khempeuh Israelte’ khut sungah pia a, amaute in zo uh hi; tua ahih ciangin tua gam sunga teeng Amor mite’ leitang khempeuh Israelte in luah uh hi.
Amaute in Arnon panin Jabbok ciang leh sehnel gam panin Jordan ciang, Amor mite gam khempeuh luah uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa, Israelte’ Pasian in ama mi Israelte’ mai panin Amor mite paaikhia hi; tu-in nangmah in amaute luah kik ding sawm na hi hiam?
Na Pasian Khemosh in na neih dinga hong piakte tang lo ding na hi hiam? Topa ka Pasian un kote mai-ah a suankhiatte kote in ka tang ding uh hi.
Tu-in nang in Moab kumpipa Zippor’ tapa Balak sangin gina zaw na hi hiam? Amah in Israelte to ngei a, amaute do ngei ahi hiam?
Heshbon leh a khua neute, leh Aroer leh a khua neute, leh Arnon gun pang-a om khuapite khempeuh sungah Israelte a teen’ kum zathum hun sung tengin bang hangin amaute la kik lo na hi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin nang tungah ka khial kei a, kei nong dona-ah kei tungah nang nong khial hi; Topa, Thukhenpa in Israel mite leh Ammon mite kikal-ah tu ni-in thu khen hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Ammon kumpipa in ama kiangah a puak Jefthah’ thu don lo hi.
Tua ciangin Jefthah tungah Topa’ Kha hong tung a, amah in Gilead leh Manasseh nawkin Gilead gam Mizpah ah paisuak a, Gilead gam Mizpah panin Ammon mite kiangah paisuak lai hi.
Jefthah in Topa tungah thuciamna bawlin, “Ka khut sungah Ammon mite nong piak leh,
Ammon mite kiang pan gualzo-in ka ciah ciangin keimah dawn dingin ka inn sung pan hong pai peuhpeuh Topa aa hi ding a, meihal biak nadingin kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute do dingin Ammon mite kiangah Jefthah gal kah hi; Topa in amaute ama khut sungah pia hi.
Amah in Aroer panin Minnith kiimnai ciang dong khuapi sawmnih, leh Abelkeramim ciang dong mi tampi tak thatin vatgawp hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite mai-ah Ammon mite guallel hi.

Tua ciangin Mizpah-a ama inn-ah Jefthah hong ciah hi; en in, amah dawn dingin a tanu khuangneute tawh lamsa-in hong paikhia hi; tua nu in ama ta khat neihsun ahi hi; amah simloh tapa ahi a, tanu ahi zongin nei lo hi.

Amah in tua nu a muh ciangin a puan balkeekin, “Ala, ka tanu! kei nong niam koih mahmah hi, kei adingin lungkhamna lianpi nong suak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa tungah thu ka ciam khin a, ka thuciamna ka dokkik thei kei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin tua nu in ama kiangah, “Ka pa aw, Topa tungah thu ciam khin na hih leh, na kam panin a paikhia tawh kizui-in kei tungah hong bawl in, tu-in Topa in na gal Ammon mite tungah nang ading hong thuksak khin hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a pa kiangah, “Kei adingin hih bang hong hi sak in; kei pai-in mualte tungah vak kawikawi-in kei leh ka lawmte in nungak-a ka sih nading hangin ka thuum theih nadingun kha nih sung kei guak hong omsak in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Pai ta in,” a ci hi. Amah in kha nih sung amah pai khiasak in; tua ciangin amah leh a lawmte pai khia-in nungak-a a sih nading hangin mualte tungah thuum uh hi.

Kha nih a cin’ ciangin a pa kiangah amah ciahkik a, amah in ama bawlsa a thuciamna bangin tua nu tungah hih hi. Tua nu in pasal tawh a lum khawm nailo, nungak-in khan’sih hi. Tua ciangin Israelte sungah ngeina khat suak a,
Israel tanute kum khatin ni li sung kum simin Gilead mi Jefthah’ tanu hangin a thuum dingin pai uh hi.

Efraim mite galhiam tawi dingin kisam uh a, amaute Zafon-ah galkah uh a, Jefthah kiangah, “Bang hangin Ammon mite sim dingin galkahin, nang tawh a kuan khawm dingin kote hong zawn lo na hi hiam? Na inn nang tawh kong hal nelh ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jefthah in amaute kiangah, “Kei leh ka mite in Ammon mite tawh buaina lianpi khat ka nei uh hi; note kong sap ciangin amau’ khut sung panin kei nong honkhia kei uh hi.

Note in kei nong hotkhiat loh ding uh ka theih ciangin keimah mah hanciam tawmin Ammon mite do dingin ka galkah a, Topa in kei khut sungah amaute hong pia hi; tua ahih ciangin bang hangin tu ni-in kei do dingin hong kuan na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jefthah in Gilead mite khempeuh khawmin Efraim mite tawh kido uh hi; Gilead mite in Efraim mite vatgawp hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “No Gilead mite in Efraimte leh Manassehte lakah Efraim galtaite na hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Gilead mite in Efraim mite tung panin Jordan ngahmunte la uh hi. Efraim galtaite khat peuhpeuh in, “Hong galkah sak in,” a cih ciangin Gilead mite in ama kiangah, “Efraim mi na hi hiam?” ci uh hi. Amah in, “Hi kei ing,” a cih ciangin,

amaute in ama kiangah, “Tua ahih leh Shibboleth ci in,” ci uh a, tua ciangin amah in, “Sibboleth” ci hi, bang hang hiam cih leh a manin ci thei lo hi; tua ciangin amaute in amah manin Jordan ngahmunte-ah that uh hi. Tua tungin Efraim mite mi tul sawmli leh tulnih si uh hi.
Jefthah in Israelte kum guk sung thu khen hi. Tua ciangin Gilead mi Jefthah si a, Gilead gam ama khuapi sungah kivui hi.
Ama nungah Bethlehem khuami Ibzan in Israelte thu khen hi.
Amah in tapa sawmthum nei hi; ama beh pualam mite tungah tanu sawmthum mokhak a, a pualam panin a tapate adingin tanu sawmthum la hi. Amah in Israelte kum sagih sung thu khen hi.
Tua ciangin Ibzan si a, Bethlehem-ah kivui hi.
Ama nungah Zebulun mi Elon in Israelte thu khen hi; amah in Israelte kum sawm sung thu khen hi.
Tua ciangin Zebulun mi Elon si a, Zebulun gam Aijalon-ah kivui hi.
Ama sungah Pirathon mi Hillel’ tapa Abdon in Israelte thu khen hi.
Amah in la sawmsagihte tungah a tuang tapa sawmli leh tupa sawmthum nei hi; amah in Israelte kum giat sung thu khen hi.
Tua ciangin Pirathon mi Hillel tapa Abdon si a, Amalek mite’ mualtung gam Efraim leitang tung, Pirathon-ah kivui hi.
Israel mite Topa muhna-ah a sia gamta kik uh hi; Topa in Filistia mite’ khut sungah kum sawmli sung amaute pia hi.
Dan minam sung panin Zorah khuami Manoah min nei khat om hi; ama zi in tasel hi a, ta nei lo hi.
Topa’ vantungmi numei kiangah kilangin ama kiangah, “En in, na tasel a, ta na nei kei hi; ahih hangin gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kidawm in la, leenggahzu ahi a, kham theih zu ahi zongin dawn loin, a nin bangmah ne kei in;

bang hang hiam cih leh nang gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi. Ama lu tungah mulkiatna kitah lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh naupang in a suah a, kipanin Pasian tungah Nazir mi hi ding hi; amah in Filistia mite’ khut sung panin Israelte hotkhiat ding kipan ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin tua nu pai-in a pasal kiangah gen a, “Pasian’ mi khat ka kiangah hong pai a, ama meel in Pasian’ vantungmi meel tawh kibangin dipkuat-huai mahmah hi; koi pan-a hong pai cih amah ka dong kei a, amah in ama min hong gen lo hi;

ahih hangin amah in kei kiangah, ‘En in, nang gai-in tapa khat na nei ding hi; tua ahih ciangin leenggahzu ahi a, kham theih zu ahi zongin dawnkei in la, a nin bangmah ne kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh naupang in a suah-a kipan a sih dong Pasian’ tungah Nazir mi hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Manoah in Topa kunh a, “Topa aw, kong thuum hi, na hong sawl Pasian’ mipa ko kiangah hong paisak kik in la, a hong suak ding naupang ka bawl nading uh hong hilhsak in,” a ci hi.
