Pasian in Manoah’ aw ngai-in lo lai-ah tua nu tut lai takin Pasian’ vantungmi ama kiangah hong pai hi; ahih hangin a pasal Manoah amah tawh om lo hi.
Tua ciangin tua nu nawhsa-in tai-in a pasal kiangah gen a, “En in, zanhal a, kei kiangah hong pai mipa ka kiangah hong kilang hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Manoah ding-in a zi zui a, a mipa kiangah pai-in ama kiangah, “Hih nu kiangah, thu genpa in nang na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Manoah in, “Na thugente a manin hong tun’ ciangin naupang’ nuntakna zia ding bang hi a, amah in bang hih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in Manoah kiangah, “Numei kiangah ka gente khempeuh na kidawm hen.

Amah in leenggui pan-a piang peuhmah dawn thei lo ding a, leenggahzu ahi a, kham theih zu ahi zongin dawn thei loin, a nin na khatpeuh peuh ne thei lo ding hi; amah ka thupiak khempeuh tang hen,” a ci hi.
Manoah in Topa’ vantungmi kiangah, “Kong thuum hi, tawlkhat khawl in la, nang adingin keelno khat hong bawl nung,” a ci hi.

Topa’ vantungmi in Manoah kiangah, “Nong khawlsak zongin na an ka ne kei ding hi; ahih hangin meihal biak nading a baihsa-in na bawl leh Topa tungah pia in,” a ci hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh Manoah in amah Topa’ vantungmi ahi lam thei lo hi).
Manoah in Topa’ vantungmi kiangah, “Na thugente a manin hong tun’ ciangin nang kong pahtawi theih nadingun, na min bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topa vantungmi in ama kiangah, “Hih in a lamdang hi, ci-in thei napi-in bang hangin ka min hong dong na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Manoah in an-a biakna tawh a keelno la-in na lamdang a bawl Topa adingin suang tungah pia hi.
Biakna tau panin vantung lamah meikuang a paitoh ciangin, Manoah leh a zi in a et lai takun biakna tau meikuang sungah Topa’ vantungmi kahto hi; tua ciangin amaute lei lakah bok uh hi.
Topa’ vantungmi Manoah leh a zi tungah kilang nawn lo hi. Tua ciangin Manoah in amah Topa’ vantungmi ahih lam thei hi.
Manoah in a zi kiangah, “Pasian mu khin i hih manin i si taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a zi in ama kiangah, “Topa in eite thah hong sawm hi leh, i khut panin meihal biakna leh an tawh biakna hong sang lo ding a, hih nate khempeuh hong lak loin, hih bang nate zong eite tungah hong pulak lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua numei in tapa khat nei-in a min Samson phuak hi; naupang khang a, Topa in amah thupha pia hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ Kha in Zorah leh Eshtaol kikal Mahanehdan-ah amah hanthot ding kipan hi.
Samson Timnah-ah paisuk a, Timnah-ah Filistia mi nungak khat mu hi.
Tua ciangin amah paito-in a pa leh a nu kiangah gen a, “Filistia mi nungak khat Timnah-ah ka mu hi; tu in ka zi dingin amah va la un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a pa leh a nu in ama kiangah “Nang pai-in vun ki-at lo Filistia mite kiang panin zi na lak nadingin na tanaute’ lak ahi a, i mite khempeuh lakah ahi zongin numei khat beek om lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Samson in a pa kiangah, “Tua nu hong laksak in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ka lung hong kimsak mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
A nu leh a pa in hih thu pen Topa kiang pan ahih lam thei lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Filistia mite tungah paulap a zong ahi hi. Tua hun lai takin Filistia mite in Israelte uk hi.
Tua ciangin a nu leh a pa tawh Timnah-ah Samson paisuk a, Timnah leenggui lote-ah amah tung hi. En in, humpinelkai khanglai khat in, amah hawksan hi;

tua ciangin Topa’ Kha ama tungah khauh takin hong tung a, mi khat in keelno khat a bal gawp bangin amah in a khut guak tawh humpinelkai balzan hi. Ahih hangin tua bangin a hih thu a nu tung ahi a, a pa tungah ahi zongin gen lo hi.
Tua ciangin amah paisukin a numei tawh kiho hi; tua nu in Samson lungkimsak mahmah hi.
Tawlkhat khit ciangin tua nu la dingin paikik hi; humpinelkai luanghawm en dingin amah lam pial in en in, humpinelkai luanghawm sungah khuai honkhat leh khuaizu om hi.

Amah in a khut tawh tuate sawkin paisuak a, a pai kawmin ne hi; amah a nu leh a pa kiangah tungin tuate pawlkhat pia a, amaute in ne uh hi. Ahih hangin humpinelkai luanghawm sung panin tua khuaizu a lakna thu gen lo hi.
Tua ciangin numei kiangah a pa paisuk a, Samson in tua lai-ah pawi khat kham hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tangvalte’ hih ngei ahi hi.
Mite in amah a muh uh ciangin amah a uap dingin tangval sawmthum hong paipih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samson in amaute kiangah, “Note mai-ah thu-haksa khat hong gensak un; hih pawi ni sagih sungin a thu mu khia-in bang hiam cih nong gen theih uh leh saihadial puan silh sawmthum leh pawipuan silh sawmthum note kong pia ding hi;

ahih hangin bang hang hiam cih nong gen theih kei uh leh saihadial puan silh sawmthum leh pawipuan silh sawmthum kei nong pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Ka zak theih nadingun na thu-haksa hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “A ne-pa sung panin nek ding pawlkhat hong piang hi. A thahatpa sung panin a khum pawlkhat hong piang hi,” a ci hi. Ni thum sungin tua thu-haksa bang hiam cih gen thei lo uh hi.

A nili ni-in amaute in Samson’ zi kiangah, “A thu—haksa bang hiam cih hong gen nadingin na pasal zol in, tua hi kei leh nang leh na pa’ inn mei tawh kong hal ding uh a, na si ding uh hi; Kote hong zawngsak dingin hih lai-ah hong sam na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samson zi ama mai-ah kapin, “Kei nong mudah hi, kei nong it kei hi; ka gam mite tungah thu-haksa na gen a, bang hiam cih kei kiangah nong gen kei hi,” a ci hi. Amah in numei kiangah, “En in, ka nu kiangah hita leh ka pa kiangah hita leh ka gen kei hi; nang kiangah hong gen ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua nu a pawi ni sagih hun sung teng ama mai-ah kap hi; a ni sagih ni-in amah in tua nu kiangah gen hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in nakpi takin kunh hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in a gam mite kiangah tua thu-haksa gen hi.

Tua khuapi mite in a ni sagih ni, ni a tum ma-in ama kiangah gen uh a, “Khuaizu sangin bang khum zaw hiam? Humpinelkai sangin bang hatzaw hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Ka bawngla tawh lokho khawm lo hi le uh cin, ka thu-haksa na mu khia kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ Kha khauh takin ama tungah hong tung a, Ashkelon-ah amah paisukin tua khua mite sawmthum that a, amaute’ nate la-in a thu-haksa a gen mite tungah a pawi puante pia hi. Hehsa-in a pa’ inn-ah ciah san hi.
Tua hi a, Samson’ zi pen a moliahpa’ zi dingin kipia hi.
Tawlkhat khit, mangbuh lak hunin a zi kiangah a hawh dingin keelno khat tawh Samson pai hi; amah in, “Inndei sung ka zi kiangah ka lum ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a numei’ pa in amah lutsak lo hi.

Numei’ pa in, “Amah mudah taktak hi niteh ci-in ka ngaihsun hi; tua ahih ciangin na lawmpa kiangah ka pia hi. A naunu amah sangin hoihzaw hilo ahi hiam? A u’ tangin amah la in ci-in kong thuum hi,” a ci hi.
Samson in amaute kiangah, “Tu tungin amau tungah siatna ka bawlna-ah Filistia mite tawh kisai-in ka mawh kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samson pai-in ngia zathum manin meilah zong la hi; amah in a meite leh a meite kimatsakin a meite kikalah meilah khat koih hi.
A meilahte a kuan’sak khit ciangin Filistia mite’ ankung ding laite lakah ngiate khah sak a, anphualte leh ankung ding laite, leh oliv lote kangtum hi.

Tua ciangin Filistia mite in, “Kua in hih hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in, “Timnah mite’ makpa Samson in hih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a zi lak sakin a lawmte tungah piaksak hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Filistia mite hong paito-in tua nu leh a pa mei tawh hal lum uh hi.
Samson in amaute kiangah, “Hih in note’ hih ahih leh, ka kiciam hi, note kong thuk ding a, tua khit ciangin ka khawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute dawm loin tampi that hi; tua ciangin amah paisukin Etam suanghawm sungah om hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mite paito-in Judah-ah giahphual sat uh a, Lehi sim uh hi.
Judah mite in, “Bang hangin kote do-in hong paito na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in, “Samson a hen ding, ko tungah amah in hong hih bangin ama tungah ahih dingin kong paito uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Judah mite mihing tulthum Etam suanghawm-ah paisuk uh a, Samson kiangah, “Filistia mite in eite hong ukte ahihna thei lo na hi hiam? Kote tungah nang hong bawl bang ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amah in amaute kiangah, “Amaute in kei tungah hong bawl bangin amaute tungah ka bawl hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Filistia mite khut sungah nang kong piak theih nadingun nangmah a hen dingin kong paisuk uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Samson in amaute kiangah, “Note mahmah in nong hih loh nading uh kei tungah hong kiciam un,” a ci hi.

Amaute in ama kiangah, “Kong hih kei ding uh hi; nang hong hen bekin amaute khut sungah kong pia bek ding uh hi; nang kong that kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khauhual thak nih tawh amah hen uh a, tua suang panin amah pai khiatpih to uh hi.

Amah Lehi a tun’ ciangin amah dawn dingin Filistia mite hong pai-in awng uh hi; tua ciangin ama tungah Topa’ Kha khauh takin hong tung a, a baan tunga om khauhualte pen mei in a kat anthul khau tawh kibang a, amah a kikhihnate a khut panin tolhkhia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in la khaguh thak khat mu a, a khut zanin tua khaguh la-in tua tawh mihing tulkhat that hi.
Tua ciangin Samson in, “La khaguh khat tawh, a lom a lomin, La khaguh khat tawh mihing tulkhat ka that hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a thugen a man khit ciangin a la khaguh paai khia hi; tua mun pen Ramathlehi kici hi.
Tua ciangin amah dangtak mahmah a, amah in Topa samin, “Na nasempa’ tha tawh hih suahtakna lian na pia zo hi; tu-in dangtakin kei si-in vun at lote’ khut sungah puk ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in Lehi-a om komdep khat hong a, tua sung panin tui hong phul hi; amah in tui a dawn ciangin a lungsim hong dim kikin thakhauh kik hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun min Enhakkore kici hi; tu hun dongin Lehi-ah tua tuikhuk om hi.
Amah in Filistia mite’ hun sung Israelte kum sawmnih sung thukhen hi.
Samson Gaza-ah pai a, tua lai-ah numei paktat khat mu-in tua nu kiangah a giak dingin amah pai hi.

Gaza mite kiangah “Samson hong pai,” ci-in kigen a, amaute in tua mun umcihin khuapi kulh kongpi-ah zan tawntung amah pangsim uh hi. Amaute zan tawntung dai takin om uh a, “Zingsang khuavak mateng ngak ni; tua ciangin amah i that ding hi,” ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin zankim ciang dong Samson lum a, zankim ciangin tho-in khuapi kulh kongpi kongkhakte leh a khuam nihte lenin a zawlte leh a na khempeuh bot to a, a liangko tungah tuate koihin Hebron mai-ah a om mual dawnah tuate pua hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin Sorekkuam-ah Delilah a kici numei khat ngai hi.

Tua ciangin Filistia mi uliante tua nu kiangah hong pai-in, “Amah hong zol in la, ama hatna koi lai-ah om hiam cihna leh amah i nuaisiah nadingin amah i hen theih nading, amah i zawh theih nading zia hong thei in; tua ciangin kote in ngun peek tul leh peek zakhat ciat nang kong pia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Delilah in Samson kiangah, “Na thahatna lian koi lai-ah om a, mi khatpeuh in nang hong theih nadingin bang hong kici hen ding cihna thu, nong hehpihna-in hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Samson in tua nu kiangah, “Amaute in a keu nai lo thalkhau thak sagih tawh hong hen leh ka tha neem ding a, midang mah ka bang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mi uliante in tua nu kiangah a keu nai lo thalkhau sagih hong paipih uh a, tua nu in tua khaute tawh amah hen hi.

Tu-in tua nu in inndei sungnungah mi bu sak hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in ama kiangah, “Filistia mite in nang hong hih, Samson!” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, patkhaute in mei a suk khak ciangin a kitah bangin thalkhaute botsat hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama thahatna thusim kithei zo lo hi.
Tua ciangin Delilah in Samson kiangah, “En in, kei nong simmawh a, zuauthu nong gen hi; nang bang hong kici hen theih ding cih nong hehpihna-in hong gen in,” a ci hi.
Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Amaute in a kizang nai lo khauhual thakte tawh kei hong hen leh ka tha neem ding a, midang mah ka bang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Delilah in khauhual thakte la-in tuate tawh amah hen a, ama kiangah “Filistia mite in nang hong hih, Samson!” a ci hi. A busim mite inndei sungnungah om uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in mimkhau bangin khauhualte botsat ziau hi.

Tua ciangin Delilah in Samson kiangah, “Tu dong kei nong simmawh a, zuauthu nong gen hi; nang bang hong kici hen theih ding cih hong gen in,” a ci hi. Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Ka lu tunga ka sam lom sagihte siamkhau tawh ganin ciampek tawh khen bikbek lecin ka tha neem ding a, midang mah ka bang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah a ihmut lai takin a lu tunga a sam lom sagihte la-in siamin gan hi. Amah in ciampek tawh khen bikbek a, ama kiangah, “Filistia mite in nang hong hih, Samson!” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a ihmutna pan amah khanglo-in a ciampek, a siambu, leh a siam kai khia hi.

Tua ciangin numei in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin na lungsim kei tawh a om lopi, ‘Nang kong it hi,’ ci thei na hi hiam? Hih thumvei dong kei nong simmawh a, na thahatna a omna mun nong gen kei hi,” a ci hi.
A kam tawh ni simin nakpi takin a kut ciangin, sihna dong dingin amah lunggim hi.

Amah in tua nu kiangah a lungsim khempeuh gen a, amah kiangah, “Ka lu tungah mulkiatna kitah ngei lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka nu gil sunga kipan Pasian’ tungah a kipia Nazir mi ka hi hi. Ka sam kimet leh ka hatna in kei hong nusia ding a, ka tha neem ding a, midang mah ka bang ding hi,”a ci hi.

Ama tungah a lungsim khempeuh gen khin hi, ci-in Delilah in a theih ciangin amah in mi sawlin Filistia mi uliante sam a, “Tu-a khatvei hong pai un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a lungsim khempeuh kei kiangah hong gen khin zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Filistia uliante tua nu kiangah hong pai-in sum zong hong pua uh hi.
Tua nu in a khuk tungah amah ihmu sak hi; amah in mi khat samin a lu tunga a sam lom sagihte meet sak hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in amah gimsak ding kipan a, ama thahatna in amah nusia ta hi.

Tua nu in, “Filistia mite in nang hong hih, Samson!” a ci hi. A ihmutna panin amah khanglo-in, “Ni danga mah bangin pai khia-in keimah kisingin suakta ning,” a ci hi. Topa in amah a nusiat khit lam amah in thei lo hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia mite in amah manin a mitte khelkhia uh a, Gaza-ah paipihin amah sumngo kol bulh uh hi, amah in thong sung angawina-ah an gawi hi.
Ahih hangin a kimet khit ciangin a lu tunga a samte khang kik dingin hong kipan hi.

Tu-in Filistia uliante a pasian uh Dagon tungah biakna lianpi khat a pia ding leh a gualnuam dingin kikhawm uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “I pasian in i khut sungah i galpa Samson hong pia zo hi,” a ci hi.
Mite in amah a muh ciangun a pasian uh phat uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “I pasian in eite khut sungah i gam a susia-pa, eite tampi hong thatpa hong pia zo hi,” a ci uh hi.

A lungsim uh a nop ciangin amaute in, “Eite’ adingin a kimawl theih nadingin Samson sam un,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in, thong panin Samson sam khia-in amau’ mai-ah mawlpih uh hi. Khuampite kikalah amah ding sak uh hi;
Samson in ama khut a len tangvalpa kiangah, “Ka kingak theih nadingin innpi a do khuampite hong lawngsak in,” a ci hi.
Tu-in a innpi pen numei leh pasal tawh kidim hi; Samson a kimawl lai takin a en Filistia ulian khempeuh leh innkhum zangah numei leh pasal mi tulthum bang om uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samson in Topa samin, “Topa Pasian aw, kei hong phawk in, kong thuum hi, tu-a ka mittang nihte’ tang dingin Filistia mite ka thuk theih nadingin hong thahat sak in, tu-a bek kong thuum hi,” a ci hi.
Samson in innpi a do khuampi nihte manin, a khut taklam-in khat a khut veilam-in khat lenin ama gihna tawh a khuamte luai hi.

Samson in, “Filistia mite tawh hong si sak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a tha neih khempeuh tawh sawn hi; tua ciangin uliante leh a sunga om mi khempeuh tungah innpi cimsuk hi. Tua ahih ciangin a nuntak lai-a a thah sangin a sihna-a a thah a si mi tamzaw hi.

Tua ciangin a sanggam pasalte leh a innkuanpihte khempeuh hong paisukin amah la uh a, amah ciahpih to-in Zorah leh Eshtaol kikal-a om a pa Manoah’ han-ah vui uh hi. Amah in Israelte kum sawmnih sung thukhen hi.
Efraim mualtung gam mi Mikah a kici min nei mi khat om hi.

Amah in a nu kiangah, “Ngun peek tul leh peek zakhat nang kiang panin a kigu, tua tawh kisai-in na samsiat, keima zak-in zong na gen pen, en in, a ngun kei kiangah om hi; keimah in ka la hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a nu in, “Ka tapa aw, Topa in thupha hong pia ta hen,” a ci hi.

Amah in ngun peek tul leh zakhatte a nu kiangah piakik hi; a nu in, “A kiseek milim khat leh a kisung milim khat bawl nadingin ka tapa adingin Topa tungah a ngunte ka apsa ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang tungah kong piakik ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in a nu kiangah a sum a piak kik ciangin a nu in zong ngun peek zanih la-in, a kiseek milim khat leh a kisung milim khat-a a bawlsak ngun seekpa kiangah pia hi; tua pen Mikah’ inn sungah om hi.
Tua mipa Mikah in biakna phual khat nei a, amah in siampi puan khat leh innsung pasiante bawlin siampi suak dingin a tapate khat koih hi.
Tua hun lai-in Israelte sungah kumpi om lo hi; mi khempeuh amau’ hoihsak bang ciatun gamta uh hi.
Tu-in Judah gam Bethlehem khuami, Judah innkuan, Levi tangval khat om hi; amah tua lai-ah peem hi.
Tua mipa a muhna mun peuhah a teeng dingin Judah gam Bethlehem khua panin paikhia hi; tua bangin khualzinin a pai lai takin Efraim mualtung gam sunga Mikah’ inn-ah va tung hi.
Mikah in ama kiangah, “Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in ama kiangah, “Judah gam sung Bethlehem khuami Levi mi ka hi a, mun ka muhna peuhah a peem ding ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Mikah in ama kiangah, “Kei tawh hong omin kei adingin pa leh siampi hong hi in, kum khat-in ngun peek sawm, leh puan silh khat, leh annek kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Levi mipa in amah tawh a teeng khawm dingin thukim hi; tangvalpa in ama tungah a tapate khat tawh kibang hi.
Mikah in Levi mipa koihin, tangvalpa ama siampi suak in Mikah’ inn-ah om hi.
Tua ciangin Mikah in, “Topa in ka dau hong pai sak ding hi, ci-in tu-in ka thei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh siampi-in Levi mite khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua hun lai-in Israelte sungah kumpi om lo hi. Tua hun lai-in Dan minamte in a teen’ nading uh gamhluah zong uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua hun dong mateng Israel minamte sung panin amau ading gamhluah bangmah kia lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Dan mite in gam ensimin a va zong dingin amau’ minam bup khempeuh lak panin misiam nga Zorah pan leh Eshtaol panin sawl uh hi; amaute in amau kiangah, “Pai un la gam va zong un,” a ci uh hi. Amaute Efraim mualtung gam, Mikah’ inn-ah hong tung uh a, tua lai-ah taam uh hi.

Amaute Mikah inn gei-ah a om uh ciangin Levi tangval’ aw khat khen thei uh hi; amaute kihei-in ama kiangah, “Kua in hih lai-ah nang hong paipih ahi hiam? Hih lai munah bang hih na hi hiam? Hih lai-ah na nasep bang ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tua bang tua bangin Mikah in kei hong bawl hi: amah in kei hong cialin kei in ama siampi ka suak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Kote’ kuankhiat khualzinna a tangtung ding hiam cih ka theih nadingun Pasian hong dotsak in, kong thuum uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in amaute kiangah, “Lungnuamin pai un. Note paina na khualzinna uh Topa’ khut sungah om hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mi ngate pai khia-in Laish tung uh a, tua lai-a om mite, Sidon mite’ om bang danin dai takin omin bangmah in a upmawh lohna, leitungah bangmah kisam loin a hauhna, leh amaute Sidonte kiang panin gamla omin kuamah tawh kizopna a neih lohna, lungmuang tak-a a teen’na uh mu uh hi.
Amaute Zorah leh Eshtaol-a a sanggamte uh kiang hong tun’ kik uh ciangin, a sanggamte un amaute kiangah, “Bang thu gen ding na nei uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Amaute in, “Ding un, amaute do-in paito ni; bang hang hiam cih leh a leitang ka mu khin uh hi, en un, lei hoih mahmah hi. Bangmah hih loin om mawk ding na hi uh hiam? Pai ding zekai kei un, lut-in tua leitang va luah ni.
Na pai uh ciangin bangmah a ummawh lo mite kiangah na tung ding uh hi. Leitang zai mahmah hi; hi hi, Pasian in na khut sung uh ah leitungah bangmah a kisap lohna mun hong piakhin zo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Dan minamte galhiam a tawi mihing zaguk Zorah leh Eshtaol panin kuankhia uh a,
amaute paito-in Judah gam sung Kiriath-jearim-ah giahphual sat uh hi. Hih thu hangin tu hun dongin tua mun pen Mahanehdan kici hi; en in, tua in Kiriath-jearim nitumna lamah om hi.
Amaute tua lai mun panin Efraim mualtung gamah pai suakin Mikah innah tung uh hi.

Tua ciangin Laish gam a ensim dingin a pai mi ngate in a sanggamte uh kiangah, “Hih innte sungah siampi puan khat, inn sung pasiante, a kiseek milim khat, leh a kisung milim khat a omna na thei uh hiam? Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na hih ding uh ngaihsun un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kihei-in Mikah’ inn-a Levi tangvalpa omna-ah tung uh a, ama omzia dong uh hi.
Tu-in galhiam a tawi Dan mi zagukte kulh kongpi lutna-ah ding uh hi;

tua ciangin, galhiam a tawi mi zagukte tawh kulh kongpi lutna-ah siampipa a din’ lai takin gam ensim dingin a kuankhia mi ngate tumin a kiseek milim, a siampi puan, a inn sung pasiante, leh a kisung milim la uh hi.
Hih mite Mikah’ inn sungah tumin a kiseek milim, a siampi puan, a inn sung pasiante, leh a kisung milim a lak uh ciangin siampipa in amaute kiangah, “Bang hih na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Amaute in ama kiangah, “Pau kei in, na khut-in na kam hum in la kote tawh hong pai-in kote adingin pa leh siampi hong hi in. Nang adingin mi khat’ inn sungah siampi hih ding hoihzaw ahi hiam, tua ahih kei leh Israelte sungah minam leh beh siampi hih ding hoihzaw ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa a lungkim hi; amah in a siampi puan, leh a innsung pasiante, leh a kiseek milim la-in mite’ laizangah pai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute mai-ah a ta neute leh a ganhingte leh a vante uh om sakin, amaute kihei-in paikhia uh hi.
Amaute Mikah’ inn panin a gamla khop khat a tun’ uh ciangin Mikah’ inn gei-a om innte sunga om mite kisam khia-in amaute in Dan mite delhin pha uh hi.
Amaute in Dan mite otsan uh a, tua ciangin amaute hong kihei-in Mikah kiangah, “Hih bang mihon tawh nong pai nading bang thu om ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Amah in, “Note in keima bawlsa ka pasiante, leh siampipa la-in na paikhia uh hi; keimah in bang nei nawn ka hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin, ‘Bang thu ahi hiam? bang hangin hong ci thei na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Dan mite in ama kiangah, “Kote lakah na aw hong kizasak kei in, tua hi kei leh ka lawmte uh hehin nang hong hih ding uh a, na innkuanpihte tawh na si kha ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Dan mite pai uh hi; Mikah in ama adingin amaute thahat lua uh hi, ci-in a muh ciangin amah kihei-in a innah ciahkik hi.
Dan mite in Mikah’ bawlsate leh a siampipa paipihin gam dai-in a om bangmah a ummawh lo mite omna Laish tung uh a, namsau tawh amaute vatin mei tawh a khuapi hal uh hi.

Amaute in Sidon panin gamla uh ahih manin a honkhia ding om lo a, amaute in kuamah tawh kizopna nei lo uh hi. Tua mun pen Bethrehob-te’ neihsa kuam sungah om hi. Amaute in khuapi lam kikin a sungah teeng uh hi.
Amaute in tua khuapi min pen Israelte sungah a suak amau’ pian’na Dan tamin Dan phuak uh hi; ahih hangin a masa-in tua khuapi min in Laish ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Dan mite in a kiseek milim amau’ adingin phut uh hi; Moses’ tapa Gershom’ tapa Jonathan leh ama tapate in tua gam a kilak hun dongin Dan minamte adingin siampi ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Shiloh-ah Pasian’ inn a om sung teng Mikah’ bawlsa a kiseek milim phut uh hi.
Tua hun, Israel sungah kumpi a om loh lai takin, Levi mite khat Efraim mualtung gammongah peemin Judah gam Bethlehem panin zineu khat la hi.
A zineu ama tungah heh a, ama kiang panin pai khia-in Judah gam Bethlehem khua-a a pa inn-ah ciah a, tua lai-ah kha li sung khawng om hi.

Tua ciangin a pasal ding khia-in kam neem tawh a hopih ding leh a sam kik dingin tua nu kiangah pai hi. Amah in a nasempa leh a la nih tonpih hi. Tua ciangin tua nu’ pa inn-ah tung hi; numei’ pa in amah a muh ciangin lungdamna tawh a dawn dingin hong pai hi.
Tua ciangin a sungpa, numei’pa in amah taam sak a, amah tawh nithum sung om hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute in an ne, tui dawnin giak khawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin a nili ni-in zingsangin amaute tho baih uh a, kithawi uh hi; ahih hangin numei’pa in a makpa, kiangah, “An tawmkhat ne-in na tha khauhsak in, tua khit ciangin na pai thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua mi nihte tu-in ne-in dawn khawm uh hi; numei’ pa in mipa kiangah, “Tu zan taam ding lungkim in la, na lung nuamsak in,” a ci hi.
Pai dingin mipa a din’ ciangin a sungpa in a taam kik dong mateng kho hi.
Tua ciangin a ni nga ni-in a ding dingin zingsangin amah tho baih hi; numei’ pa in “An ne phot in la, ni a dialh mateng khawl lai in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in an ne uh hi.

Mipa leh a zineu leh a nasempa paikhia dingin a din’ ciangin a sungpa, numei’pa in ama kiangah, “En in, tu-in nitak nai-in ni niam ta hi; tu zan taam un. En in, ni tum dektak hi; hih lai-ah giak in la na lung nuamsak in; na lam pai nading uh zing ciang zingsangin tho baihin innah na ciah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin mipa tua zan taam lo hi; amah ding-in paikhia a, Jebus (Jerusalem a cihna) gal khat tung hi. Amah in tuan’na a kivawh la nih leh a zineu tawh ahi hi.
Amaute Jebus kiang nai a tun’ uh ciangin ni niam khin a, nasempa in a Topa kiangah, “Tu-in hong pai-in, Jebus mite’ khuapi-ah kihei-in tua lai-ah zan taam ni,” a ci hi.
A Topa in ama kiangah, “Israel mite a hilo gamdang mite’ khuapi sungah kihei-in i pai kei ding hi; Gibeah-ah i paisuak ding hi,”a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a nasempa kiangah, “Hong pai in, hih munte khatpeuhpeuh va naih-in, Gibeah ahih kei leh Ramah-ah zan taam ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khengin paisuak uh hi; tua ciangin Benjaminte’ gam ahi Gibeah khua gei-ah ni tum a,
Gibeah-ah pai in a giak dingin tua lai-ah amaute kihei uh hi. Amah pai-in khuapi sung kongzing laizangah tu hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a zan taam dingin kuamah in a innah amaute sang lo hi.
En in, puteek khat lo-a a nasepna panin nitak ciangin hong ciah hi; tua-pa in Efraim mualtung gam pan hi a, amah in Gibeah-ah a peem ahi hi; tua mun-a mite in Benjamin mite ahi hi.
Amah khuadak a, khualzinpa khuapi kongzingah mu hi; tua ciangin puteekpa in, “Koi-ah pai ding na hi hiam? Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in ama kiangah, “Keima hong pai khiatna Judah gam Bethlehem panin Efraim mualtung gam mongah a pai dingin hong nawk ka hi uh hi. Judah gam Bethlehem-ah ka pai hi; tu-in Topa inn-a ciah ka hi hi; kuamah in a inn-ah hong tungsak lo hi.
Ka late uh adingin buhtu leh gan-an, kei leh na nasemnu leh na nasemte tawh a om tangvalpa’ adingin anlum leh leenggahzu ka nei uh hi; a kisam bangmah om lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin puteekpa in, “Nopna ngah ta in; na kisapna khempeuh ka en ding hi; kongzingah giak kei hamtang in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in a innah ciahpih in late gan-an pia hi; amaute in a khe uh silin, ne-in dawn uh hi.

Amaute in a lung uh nuamsakin a om lai takun, en in, tua khuapi mi, mi gina lote in tua inn kimkotah pangin a kongkhak tum uh hi; amaute in inn neipa puteekpa kiangah, “Ama taw ka luktheih nadingun na innah a hong tung mipa hong paikhiatpih in,” a ci uh hi.
Inn neipa, tua mipa, amaute kiangah pusuakin amaute tungah, “Hi lo hi, ka sanggamte aw, tua bangin gitloh gamtat kei un; hih mipa ka innah hong tun’ na theih napi-un hih bang a sia gamta kei un.

En un, hih lai-ah ka ta nungak leh zinpa’ zineu om hi; amaute hong pai khiatpih sak un. Amaute buanin hoih na sak bangun amaute tungah hih un; ahih hangin hih mipa tungah tua bang a sia gamta kei un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin mite in ama thu ngai lo uh hi. Tua ciangin mipa in a zineu manin amaute kiangah koih khia hi; tua ciangin amaute in tua nu buan uh a, zingsang mateng zan tawntung tua nu hih uh hi. Zingsang khuavak ding hong kipat ciangin amaute in tua nu ciahsak uh hi.
Zingsang khua hong vak ciangin numei hong ciahin, ama topa a omna mipa’ kongkhak ah pukin khuavak dong om hi.
Zingsang ciangin a topa tho a, a khualzin zom dingin inn kongkhak hongin a paikhiat ciangin, en in, inn khongkhakah a zineu lumin sangkil tungah a khutte kinga hi,
Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Tho in, pai ta ni,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in dawng nawn lo hi. Tua ciangin amah in dom to-in la tungah tua nu koih hi; mipa ding-in a innah ciah hi.
A innah a tun’ ciangin amah in tem khat la a, a zineu lenin a phei a liangin seh sawm-le-seh-nih suahin sem a, Israelte gam sung khempeuhah hawm hi.
A mu mite khempeuh in, “Tu ni dongin, Izipt gam panin Israel mite a pai khiat-a kipan hih bang thu piang ngei lo a, zong kimu ngei lo hi; hih thu ngaihsun un, kikum un la gen un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh, Gilead gam zong a kihel, Dan panin Be-ersheba dong hong kuankhia uh a, Topa' kiang Mizpah-ah mihing khat bangin mihonte hong kikhawm uh hi.
Israel minam khempeuh sung pan makai khempeuh, namsau tawi khe galkap mihing tul zali, Pasian’ mite kikhopna-ah amau mahmah kipia uh hi.
(Tu-in Israel mite Mizpah-ah a paina thu Benjamin mite in za uh hi.) Israel mite in, “Hih bang tatsiatna hong pian’na thu hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin a kithat numei’ pasal, Levi mipa in dawngin, “Benjamin-te’ gam Gibeah-ah kei leh ka zineu, a zan taam dingin ka tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gibeah mite kei langah hong ding uh a, zan-in kote’ omna innkiim-ah hong pang uh hi; amaute in kei hong that nuam uh a, ka zineu buan gawpin tu-in amah si hi.
Tua ciangin ka zineu la-in ka semnen a, Israelte' luah gam sung khempeuhah ka hawm hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Israelte lakah kihhuaina leh ut luat khialhna gamta uh hi.
En un, no Israel mihingte, note khempeuh aw, na ngaihsutna uh gen un la, hih lai-ah kikum un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh mihing khat bangin ding-in, “Eite khempeuh khat zong i puanbuk-ah pai loin, eite khat zong i inn-ah i ciah kei ding hi.
Tu-in Gibeah tungah eite’ hih ding thu in: tua khua a sim dingin aisaanna tawh i pai ding a,

amaute in Israelte sungah ut luatna tawh a khialhna uh hangin Benjaminte gam Gibeah a thuk theih nadingun mite’ adingin annek tuidawn a pua dingin Israel minamte khempeuh sung panin mi zakhat sung pan mihing sawm, tulkhat sung pan zakhat, tulsawm sung pan tulkhat i la ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin khuapi do dingin Israel mite khempeuh kikhawm uh a, kipawlin mi khat bang uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel minamte in Benjamin minamte khempeuh kiangah mi sawl uh a, “Note lakah a piang thu in bangzah tatsiatna ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kote in amaute thatin Israelte sung panin siatna ka paihkhiat theih nadingun Gibeah khua sunga om a mi gina lote hong piakhia un,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Benjaminte in a sanggam uh Israel mite’ aw ngai lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite do dingin a kuan khia dingin Gibeah khuapite panin Benjamin mite kituah uh hi.
Benjamin mite in tua ni-in amau’ khuapite panin, Gibeah-ah a teeng a kiteng khia mihing zasagih ban-ah namsau a tawi mihing tul sawmnih leh tulguk khawm uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh lakah mi a kiteng khia a veikhoi zasagih om hi; amaute khempeuh in suang tawh samzang kapin a khial lote ahi uh hi.
Israel mite in Benjaminte sim loh, namsau a tawi mihing tul zali khawm uh hi; hih mite khempeuh galsiam mi ahi hi.
Israel mite ding-in Bethel-ah paito uh a, “Benjamin mite a do dingin kua pai masa ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in Pasian dong uh hi. Topa in, “Judah paito masa ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite zingsangin tho-in Gibeah khua sim dingin giahphual sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin, Israel mite Benjamin do dingin kuankhia uh hi; Israel mite amaute do dingin Gibeah-ah a gualin va naih uh hi.
Benjamin mite Gibeah pan hong kuan khia-in tua ni-in Israel mite tul sawmnih leh tulnih lei-ah that uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mite kihanthawnin a ni masa ni-a a pan'na mun mah uh ah gal pang kik uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite paito-in nitak dong Topa mai-ah kap uh hi; amaute in Topa kiangah thu dongin, “Ka sanggamte uh Benjamin mite do dingin gal phualah ka naih kik ding uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Topa in, “Amaute do dingin paito un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite a ni nih ni-in Benjamin mite do dingin hong nai uh hi.
Amaute do dingin a ni nih ni-in Gibeah panin, Benjaminte hong kuankhia a, Israel mite tulsawm leh tulgiat that uh hi; hihte khempeuh namsau a tawi mite ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh, galkap vekpi paito-in Bethel-ah tungin kap uh hi; tua lai mun Topa’ mai-ah amaute tu-in nitak dong tua ni an tang uh a, Topa mai-ah meihal biakna leh thunuam-a biakna pia uh hi.
Israel mite in Topa thu dong uh a, (bang hang hiam cih leh tua hunin Pasian' thuciamna singkuang tua lai-ah om a,

Aaron’ tapa Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in tua mai-ah tua hunin na sem hi), “Ka sanggamte uh Benjamin mite a do dingin pai kik lai ding ka hi uh hiam, tua ahih kei leh khawl ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Topa in, “Paito un; bang hang hiam cih leh zing ciangin amaute na khut sung uh ah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israelte in Gibeah kiim-ah a pangsim dingin mi koih uh hi.
Israel mite a nithum ni-in Benjamin mite do dingin kuanto uh a, ahun dang-ate mah bangin Gibeah lang khatah pang uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute do dingin Benjamin mite kuankhia uh a, khuapi panin amaute kipaikhiasak hi; a hun dang-ate mah bangin amaute in Bethel lamah a paito pen leh Gibeah lamah a pai lam lianpi, leh gam sungah Israel mite sawmthum bang that uh hi.
Tua ciangin Benjamin mite in, “A masa-a bangin i mai-ah amaute tai uh hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Israel mite in, “Eite tai-in, khuapi panin lam lianpi-ah amaute paikhia sak ni,” kici uh hi.
Israel mite khempeuh amau omna mun panin ding-in Baaltamar-ah a gualin pang uh hi; a pangsim Israel mite Geba nitumna lam amau omna panin hong diang khia uh hi.
Gibeah khua a sim dingin Israelte khempeuh sung pan a kiteng khia mi tulsawm hong kuan uh a, a galdo uh haksa mahmah hi; ahih hangin Benjamin mite in amau adingin siatna a naina thu thei lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mai-ah Topa in Benjaminte zo hi; Israel mite in tua ni-in Benjaminte zo hi; Israel mite in tua ni-in Benjaminte mihing tul sawmnih leh tulnga leh zakhat that uh hi; hihte khempeuh namsau a tawi mite ahi uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Benjamin mite in a guallelhna uh kimu uh hi. Israel mite in Benjamin mite awn uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Gibeah khua a sim dingin a koih uh a pangsimte muang uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pangsim mite manlangin hong pai-in Gibeah khua bawh uh hi; a pangsim mite hong pai khia-in namsau tawh khuapi mi khempeuh vatgawp uh hi.
Tu-in Israel mite leh a pangsim mite a kiciamna lim in amaute in khuapi sung panin meikhu lianpi a suahsak toh uh ciangin

Israel mite galdo dingin hong tum ding uh hi. Tu-in Benjaminte in Israel mite sawmthum bang vatgawpin thah ding kipan uh hi; amaute in, “A masa-a mah bangin eite mai-ah amaute kivat tuk gawp taktak hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amau' kiciamna lim meikhu khuapi sung panin suakto dingin a kipat ciangin Benjamin mite nunghei uh hi; en in, a khuapi bup a khu in vantungah kahto hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite hong kilehhei uh a, Benjamin mite lungkia uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ siat nading a naina thei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite mai panin amaute kileh kikin gamlak lam manawh uh hi; ahih hangin gal in amaute pha a, khuapi sung panin hong pai khia mite in amaute kikal-ah amaute susia uh hi.
Amaute in Nohah panin nisuahna lamah Gibeah gal ciang dong Benjamin mite delhin tuancilin vatgawp uh hi.
Benjamin-te sung pan galhang mihing tulsawm leh tulgiat tuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kihei-in sehnel gam lam Rimmon Suangpi-ah tai uh hi; amaute mihing tulnga lam lianpite-ah si uh a, Gidom ciang dong nakpi takin amaute kidelhin tulnih kithat hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in Benjamin-te a si khempeuh, namsau a tawi galhang mihing tul sawmnih leh tulnga ahi hi.
Ahih hangin mihing zaguk kihei-in gamlak lam Rimmon Suangpi-ah tai uh a, Rimmon suangpi-ah kha li sung om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Benjamin mite do dingin kihei kik uh a, namsau tawh a mi a sa-in a muh khempeuh uh vatgawp uh hi. Amuh uh khuate khempeuh mei tawh hal uh hi.
Tu-in Israel mite Mizpah-ah kiciam uh a, “Benjamin-te tungah kuamah in i tanu mo-in i kha kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Bethel-ah mite hong pai in Pasian’ mai-ah nitak dong tu uh a, amaute nakpi takin a kap uh hi.
Amaute in, “Israel’ Pasian, Topa aw, tu ni-in Israelte sungah minam khat a pelem nading, hih thu bang hangin Israelte tungah hong tung ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
A zing ciangin mite tho baihin tua lai-ah biakna tau khat lam uh a, meihal biakna leh thu-nuam-a biakna pia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in, “Topa ading kikhopna-ah Israel minamte khempeuh sung panin kua teng hong pai lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Topa kiangah a pai lo mite tawh kisai-in Mizpah-ah kiciamna lianpi khat bawl uh a, “Kithat ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Israel mite in a sanggam uh Benjamin mite khasiat uh a, “Tu ni-in Israelte sung panin minam khat bei hi.
Eite in i tanute amaute tungah zi dingin pia lo ding hi hang, ci-in Topa tawh kiciam khin i hih ciangin a om lai amaute’ zi ding bang cih ding i hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Topa kiang Mizpah-ah Israel minamte hong pai lo a om hiam?” a ci uh hi. En in, Jabeshgilead panin tua giahphual kikhopna-ah kuamah pai lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh mite a kikhop ciangin, en in, tua lai-ah Jabeshgilead-a teengte khat zong om lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mihonte in a galhangte uh mihing tulsawm leh tulnih tua lai-ah sawl uh a, “Pai un la Jabeshgilead-a teengte namsau tawh va vatgawp un; nupite leh naupang neute zong hih un.
Hih bangin na hih ding uh hi; pasal khempeuh leh pasal tawh a lum khawmsa numei khempeuh na sumai ding uh hi,” ci-in thu pia uh hi.
Amaute in Jabeshgilead-a teeng mite lakah lup khopna tawh pasal a thei nai lo nungakno zali mu uh hi; amaute in Kanaan gam-a om Shiloh giahphual-ah tuate hong paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihon buppite in Rimmon Suangpi-a om Benjamin mite kiangah thu puak uh a, amaute kiangah kilemna thu gen uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin Benjaminte hong ciahkik uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in Jabeshgilead numei a hing-a a koihte uh pia uh hi; ahih hangin amau' adingin kicing zo lo hi.
Israel minamte sungah Topa in kitapkhapna omsak ahih manin mite in Benjaminte khasiat uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihonte’ upate in, “Benjaminte sung panin numeite kithat khin ahih manin a om lai mite’ zi ding bang cih ding i hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in, “Israelte sung panin minam khat a bei loh nadingin Benjamin a suakta laite’ adingin gamhluah a om ding kisam hi.
Ahi zongin amau’ zi dingin i tanute i pia thei kei hi,” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite kiciam khinin, “Benjaminte tungah zi a pia mipa in samsiatna ngah ta hen,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in, “En un, Beth-el leilu lam, Beth-el panin Shekhem lamah a paito lam lianpi nisuahna lam, Lebonah leitaw lamah a om Shiloh-ah Topa ading kumsim pawi khamna om hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Benjamin mite thu pia-in, “Pai-in leenggui lote-ah buk un la,
vil un; Shiloh tanute laamna-ah a laam dingin hong pai uh leh, leenggui lote panin note in delhin mi khempeuh in na zi ciat ding uh Shiloh tanute man un la, Benjamin gamah ciahpih un.

Amau’ pate ahi a, a sanggampate uh ahi zongin kote kiangah lungkim lohna gen dingin hong pai ciangin kote in amaute kiangah, ‘Kote tungah hehpihna tawh amaute hong pia un; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh zi ding galkap-na sungah ka ngahsak zo kei uh a, note zong na mawh nadingun note in amaute tungah a pia na hi kei uh hi,’ ka ci ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Benjamin mite zong tua mah bangin gamta uh a, amau mi a phazah tawh kituakin a laamte lak panin a puak khiatte uh a zi dingun la uh hi; tua ciangin amaute pai-in a gamhluahna uh-ah ciahkik uh a, khuapite lam kikin a sungah teeng uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin Israel mite tua lai panin paikhia uh a, mi khempeuh amau minam leh a innkuanpih ciat, tua lai panin mi khempeuh amau’ gamhluahna ciatah ciah uh hi.
Tua hun lai-in Israelte sungah kumpi om lo hi; amau’ hoihsak bang ciatun mi khempeuh gamta uh hi.
Thukhente in a uk hun lai-in tua gam sungah kialpi tung a, Judah gam sunga Bethlehem khuami khat, amah leh a zi leh a tapa nihte tawh Moab gamah a peem dingin pai uh hi.

A mipa min in Elimelek hi a, a zi’ min in Naomi hi-in, a tapa nihte’ min in Mahlon leh Khilion ahi hi; amaute in Judah gam Bethlehem-a Efrathah mite ahi uh hi. Amaute Moab gamah pai-in tua lai-ah om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Naomi’ pasal Elimelek si a, a tapa nihte bek tawh tua nu om hi.
Hih tapate in Moab mite zi-in la uh hi; a khat’ min in Orpah hi a, adang khat min in Ruth ahi hi. Tua lai-ah amaute kum sawm bang teeng uh hi;
tua ciangin Mahlon leh Khilion si a, tua nupi a tapa nihte leh a pasal in sihsan hi.
Tua ciangin tua nu a mo tegel tawh Moab gam panin a ciahkik dingin kithawi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a mite kemin an a piakna thu Moab gam sung panin amah in za hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a omna mun panin a mo tegel tawh tua nu dingkhia a, Judah gamah ciahkik dingin lam pai uh hi.
Ahih hangin Naomi in a mo nihte kiangah, “Pai un, na inn tuak uh ah ciahkik un la, na nute uh tawh om un. A sisate hita leh kei hita leh nong limbawl uh mah bangin Topa in note hong limbawl ta hen.
Topa in na pasal kik uh inn tuakah hong nuamsa sak hen!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute namin, amaute a kap uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Hi lo hi, na mite kiangah nang tawh kong ciah ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Naomi in, “Kilehkik un, ka tanute aw, bang hangin hong zui ding na hi uh hiam? Note’ pasal hong hi thei dingin ka gil sungah tapa nei lai ka hi hiam?

Kilehkik un, ka tanute aw, na pai nading uh-ah pai un; bang hang hiam cih leh pasal nei dingin ka teek lua hi. Pasal nei dingin kilamen ing ci mah leng zong, tu nitak mahmahin pasal nei-in tapate nei phial ta mah leng zong,

amaute a khan’ khit dong ngak zo ding na hi uh hiam? Pasal neih ding khawl ding na hi uh hiam? Hilo hi, ka tanute aw, Topa in kei hong langpan’ ahih manin note sangin nakpi takin kei ka lunggim zaw hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute nakpi-in a kap kik uh hi; Orpah in a teeknu namin ciah a, ahih hangin Ruth in a teeknu beel hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “En in, na sanggamnu a mite leh a pasiante kiangah ciahkik khin hi; na sanggamnu’ nungah nang zong ciah in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Ruth in, “Nang kong nusiat nading ahi a, nang zuihna pan ka ciahkik nading ahi zongin hong cici kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na paina-ah ka pai ding a, na giahna-ah ka giak ding hi; na mite in keima mite hi ding a, na Pasian in keima Pasian hi ding hi;
na sihna-ah ka si ding a, tua munah ka kivui ding hi. Sihna cih loh buang thudang hangin kong nusiat taak leh Topa in kei hong dawm kei ta hen!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Naomi in amah a zuih ding a lungsim a khentatna a muh ciangin bangmah ci nawn lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Bethlehem a tun’ mateng a nih-un paisuak uh hi. Bethlehem a tun’ uh ciangin amaute’ hangin a khuazangpi-un luum lialua uh hi; “Hih nu Naomi ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Naomi hong ci nawn kei un, Mara hong ci un, bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglianpa in nakpi takin kei hong gim sak hi.
A dim-in ka paikhia a, Topa in a hawmin hong ciahpih kik hi. Topa in kei hong gim sakin Vanglianpa in kei tungah gimna hong tungsak ahih ciangin bang hangin Naomi hong ci lai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-a bangin Moab gam panin Naomi, Moab mi a monu Ruth tawh hong ciahkik hi. Mangbuhham lak kipat lai takin Bethlehem khua hong tung uh hi.
Tu-in Naomi in a pasal’ tanaute, Elimelek innkuan sung mi, Boaz min nei a hau mi gina khat nei hi.

Tua ciangin Moab mi Ruth in Naomi kiangah, “Lo-ah hong kuansak in la maipha ka muhna peuhpeuhpa’ nungah anvuite lak-ah a sangh hong tawm sak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Pai in, ka tanu aw,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah kuan khia-in pai a, an late’ nung lo sungah ansanghte tawm hi; Elimelekte innkuan Boaz’ lo-ah va pai kha hi.
En in, Boaz in Bethlehem panin hong pai hi; amah in an late kiangah, “Topa in note hong ompih ta hen!” a ci hi. Amaute in dawngin, “Topa in nang thupha hong pia ta hen!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Boaz in an late a uk a nasempa kiangah, “Hih numei kua ta ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin an late a uk nasempa in dawngin, “Moab gam panin Naomi tawh a hong ciahkik Moab numei ahi hi.

Tua numei in, ‘Kong thum hi, ansangh hong tawm sakin an late nungah anlomte lakah a kiate hong khawm sak in,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah hong pai-in tawlkhat zong khawl loin zingsang tunga kipan tu dong sem suak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Boaz in Ruth kiangah, “Tu-in, ngai in, ka tanu aw, midangte’ lo-ah ansang tawm dingin pai kei in la, hih lo zong nusia kei in, ka numeite’ nai-ah om cinten in.

Amaute’ an lakna lo na mitsuan in la, amaute’ nungah zui in. Nang hong bawlsiat loh nading uh tangvalte thu pia khin hilo ka hi hiam? Na dang a tak ciangin pai in la tangvalte’ tui tawisa dawn in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a mai-in lei-ah puksuk a, lei lakah kunin ama kiangah, “Kei gamdang mi khat hi napi, hih banga kei nong phawk nadingin bang hangin na mai-ah maipha ngah ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Boaz in tua nu dawngin, “Na pasal a sih khit-a kipan na teeknu’ adingin na sepnate khempeuh, leh na nu leh na pa leh na pian’na gam nusia-in nidanga na theih ngei loh mite kiangah na paina thu a kicing takin kei kiangah hong kigen zo hi.
Topa in na gamtatna sate apha tawh hong thuk a, a lim nuai beel dinga na paina Israelte’ Pasian, Topa in thaman a cingin hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin numei in, “Ka topa aw, kei tungah nong dik mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in na nasem numeite hilo napi-in na nasemnu tungah migitna kam nong pau hi,” a ci hi.

An nek hun ciangin Boaz in tua nu kiangah, “Hih lai-ah hong pai in, anlum ne in la, leenggahzu sungah na an diah in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin an late gei-ah amah tu a, tuapa in an kante tua nu khak hi; amah in a kham mateng ne a, a khamval zong pawlkhat om lai hi.
Tua nu ansang tawm dingin a din’ ciangin Boaz in a tangvalte hilh a, “Anlomte lak nangawn ah tawm sak un la, amah kosia kei un.
Anlom hente lak panin zong ama adingin pawlkhat dok khia-in ama top dingin nusia un la, amah tai kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in nitak dong lo sungah tawm hi; tua ciangin amah in a topsa teng satkhia a, mangbuhham seu khat bang pha hi.
Tua ciangin amah in pua-in khuapi sungah ciah hi; a an top teng a teeknu lakin, a an khamvalte zong la-in amah pia hi.

Tua ciangin a teeknu in ama kiangah, “Tu ni-in koi-ah tawm na hi hiam? Koi-ah na sem na hi hiam? Nang hong phawk mipa in thupha ngah ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a teeknu kiangah a naseppihte gen a, “Tu ni-a ka nasepna mipa in Boaz ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Naomi in a monu kiangah, “A dikna in a hingte hita leh, a site hita leh a mangngilh lo Topa in amah thupha pia ta hen!” a ci hi. Naomi in ama kiangah, “Tua mipa in i behte, i tanau naipente khat ahi hi,” zong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moab numei Ruth in, “Tu-a ban-ah amah in kei kiangah, “Ka an khempeuh a lak khit matengun ka nasemte kiang nai-ah om in, hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Naomi in a monu Ruth kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, ama numeite tawh na kuankhop hoih mahmah hi; tua hi kei leh lo dangah nang hong kibawlsia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Boaz numeite’ nai-ah amah omin mangbuhham lak khit dong ansangh tawm hi; a teeknu tawh amah omkhawm hi.
Tua ciangin a teeknu Naomi in ama kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, nang’ adingin a nop nadingin inn na suan’ nading kong vaihawmsak ding kilawm hilo ahi hiam?
A numeite tawh na na sepna Boaz in i tanau hilo ahi hiam? Thei in, amah in tu nitakin ancilna-ah mangbuhham haih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kisilin sathau kinuh in la, na puan hoihpente silhin ancilna-ah paisuk in; ahih hangin a nek a dawn a man mateng a mipa kiangah na pai lam kithei sak kei in.
Ahih hangin amah a lup ciangin a lupna mun encik in; tua ciangin pai in la a khe lam puan leemin lum in; tua ciangin na gamtat nading amah in hong gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Na gen khempeuh ka hih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ancilna-ah amah paisukin a teeknu in ama kiangah a gensa bang teekteekin gamta hi.
Boaz in a nek a dawn khit ciangin a lungnuam a, anphual nawl-ah lum dingin pai hi. Tua ciangin dam takin numei hong pai-in a khe lam puan leemsakin lumsuk hi.
Zankim ciangin mipa lau-in kihei a, en in, a khe-ah numei khat na lum!
Amah in, “Kua na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua nu in dawngin, “Keimah na nasemnu Ruth ka hi hi; tanaute na hih ciangin na nasemnu na puan hong zawn in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa in thupha hong pia ta hen, ka tanu aw; a hau hita leh a zawng hita leh tangvalte nung na zuih lohna-ah a masa sangin a lianzaw a tawpkhak hih dikna na gamta hi.
Tu-in ka tanu aw, lau kei in, na nget khempeuh nang adingin kong hih sak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka khuapih mite khempeuh in numei gina na hih lam thei uh hi.
Kei pen tanau nai ka hihna man hi; ahih hangin kei sangin a naizaw tanau khat om lai hi.

Tu zan om in, zingsang ciangin amah in nang tungah tanaute’ hih ding hong hih leh pha hi; amah hih sak in; ahih hangin nang tungah tanaute sep ding a sep nop kei leh, tua ciangin, Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin nang tungah tanau nasep kong sem ding hi. Zingsang dong lum in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsang dong a khe kiangah lum a, ahih hangin mi meel khat leh khat a kitheih ma-in amah tho hi; tua ciangin mipa in, “Ancilna-ah numei a paina kithei sak kei in,” a ci hi.
Mipa in, “Na puansilh hong paipih in la hong dawh in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin numei in dawh a, amah in mangbuhham lawh guk teh khia-in tua nu guan’ hi; tua ciangin khuapi sungah tua nu ciah hi.
A teeknu kiangah a tun’ ciangin amah in, “Ka tanu aw, bang na ci hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in mipa in ama adingin a hihna teng genin,
“Hih mangbuhham lawh guk hong guan’ hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, ‘Na teeknu kiangah khut hawm guakin na ciah kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in dawngin, “Ka tanu aw, a thu hong bangci suahkhiat cih na theih mateng ngak in; bang hang hiam cih leh mipa mawk om lo ding a, tu-in a thu siangsak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kulh kongpi-ah Boaz paito-in tua mun-ah tusuk hi; en in, tanaute, Boaz’ genpa hong pai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Boaz in, “Hong pai dih in, lawm aw; hih lai-ah tu dih in,” a ci hi; tua ciangin amah hong kihei-in hong tusuk hi.
Tua ciangin amah in khua upate mihing sawm sam-in, “Hih lai-ah tu dih un,” a ci hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute tusuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tanaupa kiangah, “Moab gam panin a hong ciahkik Naomi in i tanaute Elimelek’ neihsa leitang zuak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih thu nang kiangah kong gen ding ngaihsun in, ‘Hih lai-a a tu mite’ muhna leh keima mi upate’ muhna-ah lei in,’ kong ci hi. Na tat ding leh tan in; ahih hangin na tat kei ding leh, a thu ka theih nadingin kei kiangah hong gen in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang sim loh a tan ding kuamah om lo hi; tua ahih manin nang kiangah kong pai hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in “Ka tan ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Boaz in, “Naomi tung panin a lo na lei ni-a kipanin, a site, min a gamhluah ah a tun’ kik theih nadingin a sipa’ zi Moab numei Ruth zong a lei na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a tanaupa in, “Keima gamhluah siasak kha ding ka hih manin keima adingin ka tan thei kei ding hi. Keimah in tan thei lo ka hih ciangin keima tat theihna thu nangmah in tang in,” a ci hi.

Nidang lai-in Israelte sungah tatna leh kikhekna thu-ah ngeina in hih bang ahi hi; thu vaihawm khat peuhpeuh a kipsak nadingin mipa khat in a khedap suahkhia-in a lawmpa pia hi; hih banga hihna pen Israelte sungah kipsakna ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a tanaupa in Boaz kiangah, “Nang ading lei in,” a cih ciangin amah in a khedap suahkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Boaz in upate leh mi khempeuh kiangah, “Tu ni-in note in Naomi’ tung panin Elimelek leh Khilion leh Mahlon’ neihsa khempeuh ka lei khitna thu teci na hi uh hi.

A site’ min ama sanggamte leh a pian’na a khua sung panin a maiman’ loh nadingin ama gamhluahna-ah a site min a kizop theih nadingin a si khin Mahlon’ zi, Moab numei Ruth zong ka zi dingin ka lei khin hi; note in tu ni-in teci na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kulh kongpi-a om mite khempeuh leh upate in, “Kote in teci ka hi uh hi. Topa in, Israelte’ innkuan a lamto khawm Rachel leh Leah bangin na innkuan sunga hong pai numei bawl ta hen. Efrathah-ah na dau pai hen la, Bethlehem ah na minthang ta hen;
Topa in hih a khangno lai numei tawh nang hong piak na tate hangin Judah in Tamar tawh a neih tapa Perez’ innkuan tawh kibangin na innkuan piang ta hen,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Boaz in Ruth la-in ama zi suak hi; amah in a zi luppih a, Topa in tua nu gai sakin amah in tapa khat nei hi.
Tua ciangin nupite in Naomi kiangah, “Tanau nei loin tu ni-in hong om sak lo Topa in thupha ngah ta hen; Israelte sungah ama min thang ta hen!
Amah in nang adingin na nuntakna hong pia kik, leh na khanghamna-ah hong vakpa hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, tapa sagih sangin a thupizaw, nangmah hong it na monu’ neih ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Naomi in naungeek la-in a angah tawi a, amah cingnu suak hi.
A veng nupite in a min phuak uh a, “Naomi sung pan tapa khat suak,” a ci uh hi. Amaute in a min Obed phuak uh hi; amah in Jessi’ pa hi a, Jessi in David’ pa ahi hi.
Tu-in Perez’ suan-le-khakte in: Perez in Hezron’ pa,
Hezron in Ram’ pa Ram in Amminadab’ pa,
Amminadab in Nahshon’ pa, Nahshon in Salmon’ pa,
Salmon in Boaz’ pa, Boaz’ in Obed’ pa,
Obed in Jessi’ pa, Jessi in David’ pa ahi hi.
Efraim mi Zuf tapa Tohu, a tapa Elihu, a tapa Jeroham, a tapa Elkanah a kici min nei mi khat Efraim mual tung gam Ramathaimzofim-ah om hi.
Amah in zi nih nei hi; khat’ min in Hannah hi a, a khat’ min in Peninnah ahi hi. Peninnah in ta nei a, ahih hangin Hannah in nei lo hi.
Hih mipa a kum kumin a khuapi panin, Eli’ tapa nihte Hofni leh Finehas in Topa’ siampi ahihna mun Shiloh-ah mihonte’ Topa bia ding leh ama tungah biakna pia dingin pai zel hi,
Elkanah in biakna a piak ciangin a zi Peninnah leh a tanu leh a tapate khempeuh tungah tanh pia hi;
amah in Hannah a it hangin Topa in amah ta neisak lo ahih manin Hannah tungah tanh nih a pia hi.
Topa in amah ta neisak lo ahih manin amah a el a zipih a lawmnu in amah nakpi takin phin zel, hehsak zel hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a kum kumin tua bangin hih uh hi; Topa’ inn-ah amah a paitoh simin a lawmnu in amah phin zel hi. Tua ahih ciangin Hannah kapin an ne lo hi.

Tua ciangin ama pasal Elkanah in ama kiangah, “Hannah aw, bang hangin kap na hi hiam? Bang hangin an ne lo na hi hiam? Bang hangin na lungsim dah ahi hiam? Keimah in tapa sawm sangin nang adingin hoihzaw hilo ka hi hiam? ” a ci hi.
Amaute in Shiloh-ah ne-in a dawn khit uh ciangin Hannah ding hi. Tu-in Topa’ biakinn kongkhak khuam pangah siampi Eli tu hi.
Tua nu nakpi takin lungkhamin Topa’tungah thungenin nakpi takin a kap hi.

Amah in thuciamna khat bawlin, “Mihonte’ Topa aw, nangmah in na nasemnu’ gimna nong et takpi a, keimah hong phawkin na nasemnu hong mangngilh loin na nasemnu tungah tapa khat nong piak leh, Topa tungah a khan’ tawntungin amah ka pia ding a, ama lu-ah mulkiatna kitah lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa mai-ah thungenin a om lai takin Eli in tua nu’ kam na en hi.
Hannah a lungsim-ah pau hi; a mukte bek liingin a awging kiza lo hi; tua ahih ciangin Eli in tua numei zukhamin ngaihsun hi.
Tua ciangin Eli in ama kiangah, “Bang tan vei zukham ding na hi hiam? Na kiang panin na leenggahzu hemkhia in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Hannah in dawngin, “Hi lo hi, ka topa aw, keimah in nakpi takin a lungkham numei ka hi hi; leenggahzu ahi a, kham theih zu ahi zongin ka dawn kei hi, Topa mai-ah ka lungsim a sungkhia ka hi hi.
Lungkhamna leh gimna tawh a pau ka hih manin numei ginalo bangin na nasemnu hong ngaihsun kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Eli in dawngin, “Nuam takin pai in, Israelte’ Pasian in ama tungah na ngetsa thu hong pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin numei in, “Nangma mit-ah na nasemnu maipha hong musak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin numei pai-in an ne a, a maisuah dahmai nawn lo hi.
Amaute zingsangin tho baihin Topa mai-ah bia uh hi; tua ciangin amaute Ramah-a a inn uh ah ciahkik uh hi. Tua ciangin Elkanah in a zi Hannah luppih a, Topa in tua nu’ thungetna pia hi;
a hun ciangin Hannah gai-in tapa khat nei a, a min Samuel phuak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Topa tung panin amah ka nget ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elkanah leh a innkuante khempeuh Topa tungah kum sim biakna leh a thuciamna pia dingin paito uh hi.

Ahih hangin Hannah paito lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a pasal kiangah, “Naungek nawi tawh a kikhen phetin Topa’ omna mai-ah kilakin tua lai-ah a om tawntung dingin ka paipih ding hi,” a ci hi.

A pasal Elkanah in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in hoih na sak pen bangin gamta in la, amah nawi tawh a kikhen dong ngak in; Topa in a kammal hong kipsak lel ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin nupi omin nawi tawh a kikhen mateng a ta khoi hi.

Numei in amah nawi tawh a kikhensak khit ciangin kum thum a pha bawngtal khat, annel seu khat, leh leenggahzu savun thawl khat tawh amah la hi; tua ciangin Shiloh-a Topa’ inn-ah amah paipih hi; a naupang khangmoi hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a bawngtal go-in a naupang Eli kiangah paipih uh hi.
Tua nu in, “Aw, ka topa! Nangmah in a nungta na hih mah bangin ka topa aw, keimah in Topa tungah thu ngenin nangma omna hih lai mun-ah a ding nu ka hi hi.
Hih naupang ka ngen hi; Topa in keima ngetna bangin amah hong pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa tungah amah ka pia hi; a nuntak lai teng Topa tungah amah a kipia ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tua lai-ah Topa bia uh hi.
Hannah in zong thungenin, “Topa tungah ka lungdam a, Topa hangin ka kipak hi. Nong huhna hangin ka galte ka nuihsan hi.
“Topa bangin a siangtho kuamah om lo a, nang sim loh kuamah dang om lo hi; i Pasian tawh a kibang hong hu zo Suangpi dang om lo hi.
Tua bangin kiphatsakna tawh pau nawn kei in la, na kam sung pan kihihsakna gingkhiasak kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in theihna Pasian hi a, amah in gamtatnate tawikhai hi.
A thahatte’ thalte kitan a, ahih hangin a thanemte in thahatna ngah hi.
A gilvahte in an thalawh uh a, ahih hangin a gilkialte kial nawn lo hi. Tasel mi in ta sagih nei a, ahih hangin ta tampi a nei nu lungzuang hi.
Topa in thatin hingsak kik hi; amah in Leinuai-ah paipih sukin thoto sak hi.
Topa in zawng sakin hausak hi; amah in niamkhiat sukin, zong sangto sak hi.

Amah in leivui panin mizawngte phong to a, amah in a cimawhte a lungkhamna panun phong to hi. Uliante tawh tukhawmsak a, minphatna ngahsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung khuampite Topa aa hi a, tuate tungah amah in leitung pumpi koih hi.
“Amah in a thuman ama mite kalsuanna cing ding a, ahih hangin migilote khuamialna sungah kikhiasuk ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh thatang hatna tawh mi gualzo lo ding hi.

Topa’ langte tamkham ding a, amah in amaute do-in vantungah van gingsak ding hi. Topa in lei mong dongah thukhen ding hi; amah in ama kumpipa tungah thahatna pia ding a, a sathau nilhpa’ vangliatna sangsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ramah-a ama inn-ah Elkanah ciah hi. Naupang in siampi Eli omna-ah Topa’ na sem hi.
Tu-in Eli’ tapate in bangmah man lo mite ahi uh hi; amaute in Topa zahtakna nei lo uh hi.
Mite tungah siampite gamtatzia ding ngeinate don lo uh hi. Mi khatpeuh in biakna a piak ciangin a sa a huan lai takin siampipa’ nasempa sikkeu-ka-thum nei khat in a khut-ah tawi-in hong pai a,

amah in a sikkeu tawh sikbeel dai ahi a, beel-uk ahi a, beelpi ahi a, beel sungah ahi zongin sun suk hi; sikkeuka in a kaihkhiat toh khempeuh siampipa in tang hi. Tua ahih ciangin Shiloh-ah a pai Israelte khempeuh tungah amaute in tua bangin hih uh hi.

Tua tham loin a thau a kihal ma-in siampipa’ nasempa hong pai-in biakna a pia mipa kiangah, “Siampipa ading han ding sa hong pia in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in nang tung panin sa minsa hong sang loin a sial hong sang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mipa in ama kiangah, “A thau hal masasak in la, tua khit ciangin na deih zahzah la in,” a cih leh, amah in, “Hi lo hi, tu mahmah in nong pia ding uh hi; tua hi kei leh thatang hat thu-in kong laksak ding hi,” a ci ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa muhna-ah tangvalte’ khialhna lian mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mite in thusim lohna tawh Topa tungah biakpiaknate hih uh hi.
Samuel in saihadial siampi puan silhin Topa mai-ah na a sem naupang khat ahi hi.
Samuel’ nu in a pasal tawh kum sim biakna pia dingin a paitoh ciangin ama adingin puantual neu khat bawlin kum simin ama kiangah puak hi.
Tua ciangin Eli in Elkanah leh a zi thupha pia-in, “Amah in Topa tungah a piak taang dingin Topa in hih numei tawh nang ta hong neisak hi,” a ci hi; tua ciangin a inn uhah amaute ciah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Hannah thupha pia a, tua nu gai-in tanu nih leh tapa thum a nei hi. Naupang Samuel ahih leh Topa’ omna-ah khang hi.
Tu-in Eli teek mahmah a, Israelte khempeuh tungah a tapate’ gamtatnate, leh kikhopna buk lutna-ah na a sem numeite tawh a lupkhopna thute khempeuh za hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin tua bangin gamta na hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh tung panin na gamtat siatnate uh ka za hi.
Hilo hi, ka tapate aw; Topa’ mite in a genthangna thu ka zakna in thuhoih hi lo hi.

Mi khat in mi dang khat tungah a khialh leh ama adingin Pasian in pa-lai sem ding hi; ahih hangin mi khat Topa tungah khial leh ama adingin kua in va thuumsak ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amaute in a pa’ thu ngai lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in amaute a thah nadingin Topa deihna ahi hi.
Tu-in naupang Samuel a pumpi khangin Topa leh mite’ maipha a ngah toto hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mi khat Eli kiangah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi. ‘Izipt gam sung Faro’ innkuante khut nuai-ah na pupi Aaron leh a innkuante a om lai takin Aaron tungah keimah ka kilang hi.

Israel minamte khempeuh sung panin amah ka siampi ahi ding, ka biakna tau-ah a pai ding, paknamtui a hal ding, keima mai-ah siampi puan a silh dingin ka teel hi, Israel mite tung panin mei tawh kihal keimah biaknate khempeuh na pupi’ innkuan tungah ka pia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin keimah biaknate leh ka thupiak ahi keimah hong kipiaknate thusim loin, keima mi Israelte’ piak a limci pen teng-in note kithausakna tawh kei sangin na tapate pahtawi zaw na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israelte’ Pasian, Topa in thu genin: ‘Nangma innkuan leh na behte in keima mai-ah sung tumin pusuak tawntung ding hi, ci-in thu ka ciam hi,’ a ci hi; ahih hangin tu-in Topa in thu genin: ‘Tua bang hi het lo ding hi: bang hang hiam cih leh kei hong pahtawite ka pahtawi ding a, kei hong simmawhte ka simmawhbawl ding hi.
En in, nangma innkuan sung leh na beh sunga tangval hat khempeuh ka suksiat hun hong tung ding a, na innkuan sungah puteek a om loh hun hong tung ding hi.
Tua ciangin Israelte tungah ka piak daupainate khempeuh na lungkham hunin en’na mit tawh na en ding hi; na innkuan sungah puteek om ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Ka biakna tau panin ka suksiat loh na mipa pen mit lawt dongin a kap ding leh a lunggim dingin kikoih ding hi; tua ciangin na inn sung panin a khang khempeuh mite’ namsau tawh si ding hi.
Na tapa nihte, Hofni leh Finehas tungah hong tung ding hih thu in nang adingin lim hi ding hi: amaute gel a ni kikhatin si ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin ka lungsim sung leh ka ngaihsutna bangin a sem ding a citak siampi khat keima adingin ka khangsak ding hi; amah innkuan kipin ka bawl ding a, ka sathau nilhpa mai-ah amah sung tumin pusuak tawntung ding hi.

Na inn sung panin a suakta mite khempeuh ngun peek khat ahi a, anlum lum khat ngen ding ahi zongin ama kiangah pai-in, “An tawm ka nek theih nadingin siampipa omna mun khat peuhpeuh ah kei hong koih in, ci-in kong thum hi,” ci ding uh hi,’ a ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Tu-in Eli’ khut nuai ah naupang Samuel in Topa’ na sem hi. Tua hun lai-in Topa’ kammal manpha mahmah hi; mangmuh muhna om lo hi.
Tua hunin a mit a mang dingin a kipan khin Eli in khua mu thei lo a, ama omna tuam-ah lum hi;
Pasian meivak mit nai lo a, Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang a omna mun Topa’ biakinn sungah Samuel lum hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Samuel! Samuel!” ci-in sam a, tua ciangin amah in, “Hih lai-ah om ing!” ci-in,
Eli kiangah tai a, “Hih lai-ah om ing, nong sam hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Kong sam kei hi; lum kik in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in lum hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in sam kikin, “Samuel!” a ci hi. Samuel tho-in Eli kiangah pai-in, “Hih lai-ah om ing, nong sam hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Kong sam kei hi, ka tapa aw; lum kik in,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Samuel in Topa thei nai lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amah hopih ngei nai lo hi.
Topa in Samuel a thum veina samkik hi. Amah tho-in Eli kiangah pai-in, “Hih lai-ah om ing, nong sam hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in naupang a sapna thu Eli in thei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Eli in Samuel kiangah, “Pai in, lum in; amah in nang hong sap leh nangmah in, ‘Hong gen in, Topa aw, na sasempa in za hi,’ na ci ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Samuel pai-in ama omna-ah lumsuk hi.
Topa hong pai-in ding khia-in a hun dangte-a mah bangin, “Samuel! Samuel!” ci-in a sam hi. Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Hong gen in, na nasempa in za hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Samuel kiangah, “En in, a za mite khempeuh’ bil nihte a vut ding na khat Israelte sungah a bawl ding ka hi hi.
Tua ni ciangin ama innkuan tawh kisai ka gensa khempeuh a patna pan a tawpna dong Eli tungah ka tungsak ding hi.
A tapate in Pasian min daisak a, amah in a tate kham lo ahih manin, ama theih a mawhna hangin ama innkuan daan a pia tawntung ding ka hihna ama kiangah ka gen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Eli’ innkuante’ mawhna pen biakna ahi a, piakna in ahi zongin a maisak zawh ngei loh nading thu Eli’ innkuante tungah ka kiciam hi,” a ci hi.
Samuel zingsang dong lum hi; tua ciangin amah in Topa’ inn kongkhakte hong hi. A mangmuhna Eli kiangah a gen ding Samuel lau hi.
Ahih hangin Eli in Samuel samin, “Ka tapa Samuel aw,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hih lai-ah om ing,” a ci hi.
Eli in, “Amah in nang kiangah hong gen bang ahi hiam? Kei kiangah hong iim kei in. Amah in nang tungah hong gente khempeuh kei kiangah ip nong neih leh, Pasian in nang hong dawm kei ta hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in ama kiangah a vekpi-in genin bangmah iim lo hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Amah in Topa ahi hi; amah in hoih a sak bangin amah hih sak in,” a ci hi.
Samuel khang a, amah tawh Topa omin, ama kammalte khat zong lei-ah kia sak lo hi.
Tua ciangin Dan panin Be-ersheba kikal a, om Israelte khempeuh in Topa’ kamsangin Samuel a kikipsakna thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Shiloh-ah Topa kilang kik zelzel hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ thu tawh Shiloh ah Topa mahmah Samuel tungah kilang hi.
Tua ciangin Israel khempeuh in Samuel thu zui uh hi. Tu-in Israel in Filistia mite a do dingin kuankhia uh hi; amaute in Ebenezer-ah phual sat uh a, Filistia mite in Afek-ah phual sat uh hi.
Israel a do dingin Filistia mite kigual uh a, gal a kido uh ciangin Filistia mite in Israelte zoin galphual sungah mi tulli bang that uh hi.

Mihonte giahphualah hong ciah ciangin Israel upate in, “Bang hangin Topa in tu ni-in Filistia mite mai-ah eite hong taisak ahi hiam? Amah in eite lakah hong pai-in i galte’ vangliatna panin eite hong hotkhiat theih nadingin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang Shiloh panin paipih ni,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite in Shiloh-ah mi paisak uh a, Kherubte tungah a tu Vanglianpen Topa’ thuciamna singkuang tua lai panin hong pua uh hi; Eli’ tapa nihte, Hofni leh Finehas Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang tawh tua lai-ah om uh hi.
Topa’ thuciamna singkuang giahphual sung hong tun’ ciangin Israelte khempeuh nakpi takin awng uh a, lei thawn hi.

Filistia mite in awtna gamlumna a zak uh ciangin amaute in, “Hebru mite’ giahphual-ah nakpi-a hih bang otna bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Topa’ thuciamna singkuang giahphual a tun’ khitna a theih uh ciangin,

Filistia mite lau uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Giahphual ah a pasiante uh tung zo hi,” a ci uh hi. Amaute in, “Gimna ngah hi ta hang!. Bang hang hiam cih leh ni dangin hih bang piang ngei lo hi.
Gimna ngah hi ta hang! Kua in hih a thahat pasiante’ vangliatna panin eite hong honkhia zo ding ahi hiam? Hihte in gimna a tuamtuamte tawh Iziptte gamlakah a vat gawp pasiante ahi hi.
Hang un la, pasal bangin gamta un, Filistia mite aw, tua hi kei leh amaute in note’ sila hong hih mah bangin Hebru mite’ sila na suak ding uh hi; pasal lungsim nei-in do un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Filistia mite in do a, Israelte kizo in, mi khempeuh a inn ciat uhah tai uh hi; mi tampi tak kithat hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte’ khe galkap mi tulsawmthum puk hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang zong kiman hi; Eli’ tapa nihte, Hofni leh Finehas zong kithat hi.
Galphual panin Benjamin mi khat hong tai-in a puan kikeek leh a lu tungah lei khu-in Shiloh hong tung hi.

Amah a tun’in, lampi gei-ah a vilin ama tutna-ah Eli na tu hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang hangin a lungsim liing hi. Mipa khuapi sung hong tungin a thu teng a gen ciangin khuapi mi khempeuh kiko uh hi.
Eli in kikona awging a zak ciangin amah in, “Hih gamlumna bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mipa manlangin hong pai-in Eli kiangah gen hi.
Tu-in Eli kum sawmkua leh kum giat pha a, a mitte mangin khua mu thei lo hi.
Mipa in Eli kiangah, “Keimah in galphual panin hong ciahpa ka hi hi; tu ni-in galphual panin kong tai hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka tapa aw, bangci ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
A thu hong puakpa in dawngin, “Filistia mite mai-ah Israelte tai uh a, mi tampi tak zong kithat hi; na tapa nihte, Hofni leh Finehas zong si uh a, Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang kiman khin hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang a gen ciangin kulh kongpi gei a tutna mun panin Eli thalpuk hi; a ngawng kitanin si hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah puteek hi-in gik hi. Amah in Israelte kum sawmli sung thukhen hi.

Tu-in a monu, Finehas’ zi, nau paai-in suak dektak hi. Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang a kimatna leh a teekpa leh a pasal a sihna thu a zak ciangin amah kunin nau suak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a nat hun tung hi.
Amah si dektak a, ahi zongin amah a don numeite in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in, tapa khat na nei hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in dawng lo a, zong don lo hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Israelte sung panin minthan’na paikhia khin ta!” ci-in a naungek Ikhabod phuak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang a kimat hang leh a teekpa leh a pasal’ hang ahi hi.
Amah in, “Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang kiman khin ahih manin Israelte sung panin minthan’na paikhia khin ta hi,” a ci hi.
Filistiate in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang a mat uh ciangin Ebenezer panin Ashdod-ah pua uh hi,
Tua ciangin Filistiate in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang la-in Dagon inn sungah paipihin Dagon kiangah koih uh hi.
Ashdod mite a zing ciang zing tungin a thawh uh ciangin, en in, Topa’ thuciamna singkuang mai lei lakah Dagon mai puk hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Dagon la-in a omna mun-ah koihkik uh hi.

Ahih hangin a zing ciang zingtungin amaute a thawh ciangin, en in, Topa’ thuciamna singkuang mai lei lakah Dagon na mai puk leuleu a, Dagon lutang leh a khutte gel kitan khia-in sangkil tungah om hi; Dagon a pumpi bek om hi.
Tu ni dongin Dagon siampite leh Dagon inn ah a tumte khempeuh in hih thu hangin Ashdod-a Dagon sangkil tung sik lo uh hi.
Topa in Ashdod khuamite nakpi takin gawt a, amah in uilut tawh Ashdod khua leh a gamsung teng lau sakin gimsak hi.

Ashdod mite in hih bang thute a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Israelte’ Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang eite kiang pan a paikhiat loh phamawh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in eite leh i pasian Dagon hong gawt hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in mi sawlin Filistia uliante khempeuh khawm uh a, Israelte’ Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang bang cih ding i hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in dawngin, “Israelte’ Pasian thuciamna singkuang Gath-ah koihsak ni,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Israelte’ Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang tua lai-ah paipih uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in tua Gath khua-ah a tun’pih khit uh ciangin Topa in tua khuapi langpan’in apkhapna lianpi piangsak a, amah in khuapi mite a moi a hamin gimsakin amaute tungah uilut piang hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang Ekron-ah puak uh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang Ekron a tun’ ciangin Ekron mite kiko uh a, “Kote leh ka mite uh a that dingin amaute in Israelte’ Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang ko kiangah hong paipih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in mi sawlin Filistia uliante khempeuh khawmin, “Kote leh ka mite uh hong thah loh nadingin Israelte’ Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang puakkhia un la, ama omna mun-ah ciahkik sak un,” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a khuapi sung khempeuh ah sidek tak-a apkhapna om hi. Pasian in tua lai-ah amaute nak gawt mahmah hi;
a si lo mite in uilut vei uh a, khuapi sunga kahna in vantung dongah kiza to hi.
Topa’ thuciamna singkuang Filistia gam sungah kha sagih sung om hi.
Tua ciangin Filistiate in siampite leh aisante sam uh a, “Topa’ thuciamna singkuang bang cih ding i hi hiam? Ama omna mun-ah bang tawh kha ding i hi hiam hong gen un,” a ci uh hi.

Amaute in, “Israelte’ Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang na puakkhiat uh leh, a hawm guakin puak kei un, bang bang hita leh mawhna hanga biakna pia un. Tua ciangin note na dam ding uh a, note hong gawtna thu na thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Amah i piak ding mawhna hanga biakna bang ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amaute in dawngin, “Filistia uliante a pha zah tawh kizui-in uilut lim kham nga leh simbeng lim kham nga hi ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note khempeuh leh na uliante uh tungah a kibang gimna hong tung hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note in na gamsung uh hong sugawp na uilut limte uh leh na simbeng limte uh bawlin, Israelte’ Pasian’ tungah zahtakna na lak ding uh hi; note leh na pasiante uh leh na gam uh tungah amah in hong gawtna hong zangsak kha ding hi.

Izipte leh Faro in a lungsim uh a khauhsak bangin bang hangin na lungsim uh khauhsak ding na hi uh hiam? Amah in amaute a mawlpih khit ciangin amaute in mite paisakin, tua ciangin mite kihemkhia uh hilo ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in leeng thak khat bawlin a tungah kol a kibaang ngei lo bawngpi a no nawi pia lai nih la un la, a bawngpite leeng-ah vawh un; ahih hangin amau kiang panin a note la-in innah ciahpih un.

Tua ciangin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang la-in leeng tungah koih un la, mawhna hanga biakna-in na piak uh kham milimte a gei-a singkuang sungah koih un. Tua ciangin sawlkhia un la, ama lampi-ah paisak un.

Tua ciangin en un; ama gam Bethshemesh paina lampi-ah a paitoh leh hih siatna lianpi hong bawlpa in amah hi ding hi; ahih hangin a paitoh kei leh eite hong vat gawppa in amah hi lo hi; eite tungah a piang mawk hi, ci-in i thei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Mite in tua mah bangin hih uh a, a no nawi a pia lai bawngpi nih la-in leeng-ah bulh uh a, a note inn ah khum uh hi.
Amaute in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang, kham simbeng leh uilut limte a omna singkuang leeng tungah koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin bawngpite lam lian dung zui-in Bethshemesh lamah tang takin pai uh a, a pai kawmin ham uh hi; tak lam hita leh vei lam-ah hita leh kiheilo uh a, Filistia uliante in Bethshemesh gamgi ciang dong a nung zui uh hi.
Tu-in Bethshemesh mite in kuam sungah a mangbuh uh a lak laitak ahi hi; amaute khuadakin thuciamna singkuang a muh uh ciangin, a muhna uh hangin amaute lungdam uh hi.
Bethshemesh khuami Joshua’ lo-ah a leeng hong tungin tua mun-ah khawl hi. Tua lai-ah suangtum lianpi khat om hi; amaute in a leeng singte ek khamin a bawngpite Topa tungah meihal biakna-in pia uh hi.

Levi mite in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang leh kham milim a omna a gei-a singkuang la-in tua suangtumpi tungah koih uh hi; Bethshemesh mite in tua ni-in Topa tungah meihal biaknate pia-in biakpiaknate pia uh hi.
Filistia ulian ngate in tua bang teng a muh khit uh ciangin tua ni mah-in Ekron-ah ciahkik uh hi.
Filistiate in mawhna hanga biakna-in Topa tungah a piak uilut lim khamte in: Ashdod ading khat, Gaza ading khat, Ashkelon ading khat, Gath ading khat, Ekron ading khat ahi hi;

ulian ngate aa Filistia khuate kulh tawh a ki-um khuapite leh a ki-um lo khua neute a pha zah tawh kizui simbeng lim khamte zong ahi hi. Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a koihna gei uh-a suangtumpi in Bethshemesh khuami Joshua lo-ah tu ni dongin teci ahi hi.
Amaute in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang en uh ahih manin amah in Bethshemesh mite pawlkhat that hi; amah in amaute sawmsagih that a, mite lakah Topa in mi tampi that ahih manin mite thuum uh hi.
Tua ciangin Bethshemesh mite in, “Hih a siangtho Pasian, Topa mai-ah kua om zo ding ahi hiam? Eite kiang panin kua kiangah amah paisak ding i hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Kiriath-jearim-ah a teng mite kiangah kamtaite sawl uh a, “Filistiate in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang hong puakkik khin uh hi. Hong paisuk un la, no kiangah puato un,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Kiriath-jearim mite hong pai-in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang puato uh a, mual tungah a om Abinadab’ inn-ah paipih uh hi; Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a en dingin amaute in ama tapa Eleazar ap uh hi.
Kiriath-jearim-ah thuciamna singkuang a om a kipan, hun saupi, kum sawmnih bang pha a, Israel mite khempeuh in Topa ngai-in thuum uh hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Israel mite khempeuh kiangah, “Na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh Topa lamah a kihei kik na hih uh leh note lak panin gamdang pasiante leh Ashtaroth milim koih khia-in Topa lamah na lungsim uh ngat un la, ama’ na bek sem un; tua ciangin amah in Filistiate khut sung panin note hong honkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israelte in Baalte leh Ashtaroth koih khia-in Topa’ na bek sem uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Israelte khempeuh Mizpah-ah khawm un, note adingin Topa tungah thu ka ngen ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute Mizpah-ah kikhawm uh a, tui tawi-in Topa mai-ah sungkhia uh a, tua ni-in an tangin tua lai munah, “Topa tungah i khial khin zo hi,” a ci uh hi. Samuel in Israel mite Mizpah-ah thukhen hi.
Israel mite Mizpah-ah a kikhopna thu Filistiate in a zak uh ciangin Israelte a do dingin Filistia uliante paito uh hi. Israel mite in tua thu a zak uh ciangin amaute in Filistiate kihta uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Samuel kiangah, “Filistiate khut sung panin amah in eite hong hotkhiat theih nadingin Topa i Pasian tungah eite adingin thunget na khawl kei in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samuel in nawi a ne lai tuuno khat la-in Topa tungah a bup-a meihal biakna-in pia hi; Israelte’ adingin Topa tungah Samuel kiko a, Topa in amah na dawng hi.

Samuel in meihal biakna a piak lai takin Filistiate in Israelte a do dingin hong naih uh hi; ahih hangin Topa in aw lianpi tawh tua ni-in Filistiate thawn gawpin amaute buaigawp sak hi; Israelte mai-ah amaute kinotkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Mizpah panin Israel mite paikhia-in Filsitiate delh uh a, Bethkar nuai ciang dong amaute vatgawp uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in suangtum khat la-in Mizpah leh Jeshanah kikalah phut a, a min Ebenezer phuak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Tu ciangciang Topa in eite hong huh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Filistiate kizo a, Israelte’ gam sungah tumkik nawn lo uh hi. Samuel’ hun sung khempeuh Topa in Filsitiate lang pang hi.

Israelte tung panin Filistiate in a laksa khuapite, Ekron panin Gath ciang kikal sung teng, Israelte tungah kipia kik hi; Israelte in Filistiate khut sung panin a gam uh la kik uh hi. Israelte leh Amor mite kikalah zong kilemna om hi.
Samuel in a nuntak sung tawntung Israelte thukhen hi.
A kum kumin Bethel, Gilgal, leh Mizpah-ah kot pai hi; amah in hih munte khempeuh ah Israelte thukhen hi.
Tua ciangin Ramah-ah amah ciahkik zel hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah ama inn om a, tua lai-ah zong Israelte tungah thukhen na sem hi. Amah in tua lai-ah Topa ading biakna tau khat lam hi.
Samuel a teek ciangin amah in Israelte tungah thukhenin a tapate koih hi.
A ta upa’ min Joel hi a, a nihna’ min in Abijah ahi hi; amaute in Be-ersheba ah thukhente ahi uh hi;
