Ahih hangin amah in a thugen ngai lo hi; amah sangin hatzaw ahih manin thatanghat thu tawh hihin amah luppih hi.
Tua ciangin Amnon in nakpi takin amah mudah hi; amah a muhdahna in amah a itnasa sangin lianzaw hi. Tua ciangin Amnon in ama kiangah, “Ding in, paikhia in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin numei in ama kiangah, “Hilo hi, ka sanggampa aw; bang hang hiam cih leh kei nong sawlkhiatna in kei tungah nong hihsa thu sangin lianzaw hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a thu ngai lo hi.
Amah in a na a sepsak tangvalpa samin, “Ka omna panin hih numei koihkhia in la, ama nungah kongkhak kalh in,” a ci hi.
Tua nu in puantualpi ban nei khat silh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa tanute in tua bangin puansilh hi. Tua ahih ciangin a nasempa in tua nu koihkhia-in ama nungah kongkhak kalh hi.
Tua ciangin Tamar in a lu tungah vut koihin ama silh puantualpi bansau balkek hi; tua ciangin a lutungah a khut koihin paikhia a, a pai kawmin a gingin kap hi.

Tua ciangin a sanggampa Absalom in ama kiangah, “Na sanggampa Amnon in nang hong bawlsia ahi hiam? Bangbang hita leh kilungnuamsak in, ka sanggamnu aw; amah in na sanggampa ahi hi; hih thu na lungsim ah koih kei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a sanggampa Absalom’ inn-ah Tamar a dah numei-in om hi.
Kumpi David in hih thute khempeuh a zak ciangin heh mahmah hi.
Ahih hangin Absalom in Amnon kiangah a pha ahi a, a sia ahi zongin bangmah gen lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a sanggamnu Tamar thatanghat thu tawh hih ahih manin Absalom in Amnon mudah hi.
Kum nih bit khit ciangin Absalom in Efraim nai-a om Baalhazor-ah tuumul mette khawm a, Absalom in kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh sam hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah Absalom hong pai-in, “En in, na nasempa in tuumul mette khawm hi; kumpipa leh a nasemte na nasempa tawh nong pai ding kong thum hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin kumpipa in Absalom kiangah, “Hilo hi, ka tapa aw, i vekpi-in pai kei ni, pai lehang kote in nang adingin vangik ka hi kha ding uh hi.” a ci hi. Amah in ci teitei a, ahih hangin amah pai nuam loin ama thupha a tungah pia hi.

Tua ciangin Absalom in, “Tua bang hi lo ding ahih leh, ka sanggampa Amnon kote tawh nong paisak ding kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin nang tawh amah hong pai ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Absalom in Amnon leh kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh amah tawh a paisak mateng ci teitei hi.

Tua ciangin Absalom in a nasemte thu pia a, “Amnon’ lungsim leenggahzu tawh a lungnop ciangin ciamteh un la, note kiangah, ‘Amnon sat un,’ kong cih ciangin amah that un. Lau kei un; note thu hong pia khin hilo ka hi hiam? Hang un la, thahat un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Absalom’ nasemte in Absalom’ thupiaksa bangin Amnon hih uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh ding-in a la tung ciat uh ah tuangin tai uh hi.
Amaute lamkal-ah a om lai takin David kiangah thu tung a, “Absalom in kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh that a, khat beek siit lo hi,” kici hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa ding a, a puante balkeekin lei lakah lum hi; a kianga ding a nasemte khempeuh in a puan uh balkek uh hi.

Ahih hangin David sanggampa Shimeah’ tapa Jonadab in, “Amaute in kumpipa’ tapa tangvalte khempeuh that hi, ci-in ka topa in ngaihsun kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Amnon bek si hi, amah in a sanggamnu Tamar thatanghat thu tawh a hih ni-a kipanin Absalom’ thupiakna tawh hih thu a kisehkhol ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh si hi, ci-in topa in ngaihsunin lungsim-ah koih kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Amnon bek si hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Absalom tai hi. Tua ciangin galvil tangvalpa in a lu sang sakin khuadak a, en in, mual pang nai Horonaim lampi panin mi tampi hong pai hi.
Jonadab in kumpipa kiangah, “En in, kumpipa’ tapate hong tung zo hi; na nasempa’ gen bangin hong piang hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a thugen a man khit phetin, en in, kumpipa’ tapate hong tungin hong kap uh hi; tua ciangin kumpipa zong a nasemte khempeuh tawh nakpi takin kap uh hi.
Ahih hangin Absalom tai-in Geshur kumpipa a Ammihud tapa Talmai kiangah pai hi. Ni khat khit ni khat David a tapa’ hangin thum hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Absalom tai-in Geshur kiangah pai a, tua lai-ah kum thum sung om hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Absalom ngai-in hong mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah si hi, ci-in thei khin ahih manin Amnon thu-ah kihehnem hi.
Tu-in Zeru-iah’ tapa Joab in kumpipa in Absalom a ngaihna thu phawk hi.

Tua ciangin Joab in Tekoa-ah mi sawlin tua panin numei pil khat la-in ama kiangah, “A thuum mi bangin kineih in la, thuumna puante silh in; nangmah in sathau nilh kei in la, misi hangin ni tampi a thuum khin numei bangin gamta in;
tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah pai in la, hih bangin ama kiangah thugen in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Joab in ama gen ding thute a hilh hi.
Tekoa numei kumpipa kiangah a pai ciangin lei-ah mai pukin zahtakna bawl a, “Hong huh in, Aw kumpipa,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Na lungkhamna bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Kalai, meigong numei khat ka hi hi; ka pasal si hi.
Na nasemnu in tapa nih nei a, lo sungah amaute khat leh khat kitawng uh hi. Amaute a khen ding kuamah om lo a, khat in a khatpa satin that hi.

Tu-in ka beh buppi na nasemnu’ langah hong pang uh a, amaute in, ‘Ama thah a sanggampa’ nuntakna tangin amah ka thah theih nadingun a sanggampa a sat mipa hong pia in,’ hong ci uh hi; tua bangin amaute in innluahpa zong susia ding uh hi. Tua bangin amaute in a om lai ka lametna-pa beisakin leitungah ka pasal’ suan-le-khak a suakta omsak lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in numei kiangah, “Na inn-ah ciah in, nang tawh kisai-in thu ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Tekoa numei in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa aw, keima tung leh ka innkuan tungah mawhna om ta hen; kumpipa leh a tokhom mawhpeng ta hen,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in, “Nang tungah mi khatpeuh in thu khatpeuh hong gen leh kei kiangah amah hong paipih in, amah in nang hong su kik ngei nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Phulapa in that nawn loin, ka tapa a kisuksiat loh nadingin kumpipa in Topa na Pasian tungah na kiciam ding kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin, na tapa’ samzang khat zong lei-ah kia lo ding hi,” ci-in a kiciam hi.
Tua ciangin numei in, “Ka to kumpipa tungah na nasemnu kam khat gensak in, ci-in kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Gen in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin numei in, “Tua ahih leh bang hangin Pasian’ mite’ langah tua bang na hih sawm na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh hih bang lungsim khentatna na piakna-ah kumpipa in a hawlkhiatpa innah a paipih loh lai teng kumpipa amahmah mawh kipia ahi hi.

Eite khempeuh i si ding hi, a kikhawm kik thei lo lei lakah a bua tui tawh i kibang hi; ahih hangin a hawlkhiatpa a kipuasehin a koih loh nadingin lampi a zong mipa’ nuntakna Pasian in lakhia lo ding hi.
Mite in kei hong lausak ahih manin tu-in ka to kumpipa kiangah hih thu gen dingin kong pai hi; na nasemnu in, “Kumpipa kiangah thu ka gen ding hi; kumpipa in a nasemnu’ nget na sem kha ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa in za-in, Pasian gamh panin kei leh ka tapa hong susia khawm ding mipa’ khut panin a nasemnu honkhia ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsun hi.

Na nasemnu in, ‘Ka to kumpipa’ kammal in nopsakna hong pia ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsun hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka to kumpipa in a pha leh a sia a khen thei dingin Pasian’ vantungmi tawh kibang hi. Topa na Pasian in nang tawh hong om ta hen!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in numei dawngin, “Nang kong dot peuhpeuh hong im kei in,” a ci hi. Numei in, “Ka to kumpipa in gen hen,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in, “Hih thu khempeuh ah Joab’ vaihawmna tawh nang hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Numei in dawngin, “Nang in a nungta taktak na hih mah bangin, ka to kumpipa aw, ka to kumpipa’ gensa khat peuhpeuh panin tak lamah ahi a, vei lamah ahi zongin mi khat pial thei lo hi. Kei hong sawlpa in na sempa Joab ahi hi; nasemnu’ kam sungah hih thute a guangpa in amah ahi hi.
Na thu paizia khek nadingin na nasempa Joab in hih thu hih hi. Ahih hangin ka topa in leitunga om na khempeuh theih nadingin Pasian’ vantungmi pilna tawh a kibang pilna nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Joab kiangah, “Tu-in en in, hih thu kong pia hi; pai in, tangvalpa Absalom hong ciahpih kik in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Joab lei-ah maipuk suk a, zahtakna bawlin kumpipa thupha pia hi; tua ciangin Joab in, “Kumpipa in a nasempa’ ngetna a piakna-ah, tu ni-in ka to kumpipa nangma muhna-ah maipha ka muhna na nasempa in thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joab ding-in Geshur-ah pai a, Jerusalem ah Absalom ciahpih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Ama inn-ah amah tuam ten’ sak in; amah keima omna-ah hong pai lo ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Absalom ama inn-ah tuam ten’in kumpipa’ omna-ah pai lo hi.
Tu-in Israelte khempeuh sungah a mel hoihna hangin Absalom bangin tua zahin phat ding kuamah om lo hi; a khe nuai-a kipan a lu zang dongin ama tungah pauban’na om lo hi.
Amah in a sam a met ciangin (bang hang hiam cih leh kum bei simin amah in met zel hi; a sam a gih ciangin amah in met hi), amah in a sam tawikhai a, kumpipa’ gik tehna-in shekel zanih gik hi.
Absalom’ sung pan tapa thum, leh a min Tamar ahi, ta numei khat suak hi; tua nu in numei mel hoih mahmah khat ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ omna ah pai loin Absalom kum nih bit Jerusalem ah teeng hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kianga sawl dingin Absalom in Joab samsak hi; ahih hangin ama kiangah Joab hong pai lo hi. Amah in a nihveina sawl a, ahih hangin Joab hong pai lo veve hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a nasemte kiangah, “En un, Joab’ lo in keima aa zom hi a, tua lai-ah amah in mangbuhham nei hi; pai un la mei tawh hal un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Absalom’ nasemte in a lo mei tawh hal uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab ding-in Absalom kiang ama inn-ah pai a, ama kiangah, “Bang hangin na nasemte in mei tawh ka lo hong halsak ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Absalom in Joab dawngin, “En in, nang kiangah thu kong puak a, ‘Kumpipa kiangah nang hong sawlin, “Bang hangin Geshur panin hong pai ka hi hiam? Tua lai-ah om lai leng kei adingin hoihzaw ding hi,” ci-in a va dong dingin hih lai-ah nong pai nading kong gen hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kumpipa omna-ah kei hong paisak in; kei tungah mawhna a om leh amah hong that sak in,’ ka ci hi.” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah Joab pai-in ama kiangah gen hi; tua ciangin amah in Absalom sam hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kumpipa kiangah hong pai a, a mai lei ngatin kumpipa’ mai-ah kun hi; tua ciangin kumpipa in Absalom nam hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Absalom in leeng khat leh sakolte, leh ama mai-ah a tai ding mi sawmnga la hi.

Absalom tho baihin kulh kongpi lamgei-ah tu zel hi: mi khatpeuh in thu khen sak dingin kumpipa mai-ah pai nading thu a neih ciangin Absalom in amah samin “Koi lai khuapi pan na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Na nasempa in Israelte sungah tua minam tua khua hi,” a cih ciangin
Absalom in ama kiangah, “Thei in, na thugente hoihin man hi; ahih hangin na thu a khen dingin kumpipa in a koih mi om lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tham loin Absalom in, “Gam sungah kei thukhen hi leng! Thu ahi a, a hang khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a nei mi peuhmah kei kiangah hong pai ding a, keimah in ama tungah thu a tangin ka khen ding hi,” a ci lai hi.
Ama tungah zahtakna bawl dingin mi khat a nai-ah hong pai peuhmah ciangin amah in a khut zan a, amah lenin nam hi.
Tua bangin Absalom in kumpipa kiangah thu khen sak dingin hong pai Israelte khempeuh tungah hih hi; tua ahih ciangin Absalom in Israel mite’ lungsim na zo hi.
Kum li a cin’ ciangin Absalom in kumpipa kiangah, “Kei hong pai sak in la, Topa tungah ka ciamsa ka thuciam, Hebron-ah hong pia sak in, ci-in kong thum hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Aram gam Geshur-ah ka om lai takin na nasempa in thuciam khat kiciam a, ‘Topa in Jerusalem ah kei hong paipih kik taktak leh Topa tungah biakna ka pia ding hi,’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Nuam takin pai in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah ding-in Hebron-ah pai hi.
Ahih hangin Absalom in a simtham-a kamtaite Israel minam khempeuh kiangah sawl a, “Peengkul awging na zak phetun, ‘Absalom in Hebron-ah kumpi hi!’ ci un,” a ci hi.
A kisam mi zanihte Jerusalem panin Absalom tawh pai uh a, amaute lungsim hoih tawh pai uh a, bangmah thei lo uh hi.
Absalom in biaknate a piak lai takin David’ thu-lam-lakpa’ Giloh mi Ahithofel, ama khuapi Giloh panin sam sak hi. Tua ciangin sawmsimna hong hat semsem a, Absalom tawh a om mite kibehlaplap hi.
Tua ciangin kamtai khat David kiangah hong pai-in “Israel mite’ lungsim Absalom’ lamah pai khin hi,” ci-in gen hi.

Tua ciangin David in Jerusalem ah amah tawh a om a nasemte khempeuh kiangah, “Ding un, tai ni; tua hi kei leh Absalom’ kiang panin eite’ suahtak nading om lo ding hi; manlangin pai ni, tua hi kei leh amah in eite hong pha pak ding a, eite tungah siatna hong tung sakin namsau tawh khuapi hong vat ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa’ nasemte in kumpipa kiangah, “En in, ka to kumpipa in na khensat peuhpeuh a sem dingin na nasemte kiging hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa paikhia a, ama innkuan khempeuh in ama nung zui uh hi. Kumpipa in inn kem dingin zineu sawm nusia hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa paikhia a, mi khempeuh in ama nung zui uh hi; tua ciangin inn tawpna-ah amaute khawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin a nasemte khempeuh in amah nawkin pai uh hi; tua ciangin Khereth mi khempeuh, Peleth mi khempeuh, leh Gath panin amah a zui Gath mi zagukte khempeuh, kumpipa mai nawkin paisuak uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Gath mi Ittai kiangah, “Bang hangin nang zong ko tawh hong pai na hi hiam? Ciahkik in la, kumpipa tawh om in; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in gamdang mi na hi a, na inn panin gamdang ah a om zong na hi hi.

Nangmah in zan ni-a hong pai bek na hi hi, koi lai munah kei pai ding cih theih lopi-in kote tawh a kawivak dingin nang hong bawl ding ka hi hiam? Ciahkik in, na sanggamte ciahpih in; Topa in itna kip leh thumanna nang tungah hong lak ta hen,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Ittai in kumpipa dawngin, “Topa nungta-in, ka to kumpipa nungta ahih mah bangin, sih nading ahi a, hin’ nading ahi zongin ka to kumpipa a omna peuhpeuh-ah na nasempa om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Ittai kiangah, “Tua ahih leh pai in, paisuak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Gath mi Ittai, a mi khempeuh leh amah tawh a om a naupang khempeuh tawh paisuak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh a pai lai takin gamsung mi khempeuh a gingin kapkhia uh a, kumpipa in Kidron lui kantanin, mi khempeuh gamlak lamah paisuak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Abiathar hong paito a, biakpiakna pia hi; en in, Zadok zong Levi mite khempeuh tawh hong pai-in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang hong pua uh hi; mi khempeuh in khuapi a khen’ khit mateng amaute in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang nga uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Zadok kiangah, “Pasian thuciamna singkuang khuapi sungah pua kik in. Topa’ maipha na muh nak leh, amah in kei hong paipih kikin amah leh a omna mun hong musak kik ding hi;
ahih hangin amah in, ‘nang tungah lungkimna ka nei kei hi,’ hong cih leh, en in, hih lai-ah kei ka om hi, amah in hoih a sak bangin kei tungah hong hih hen,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in zong siampi Zadok kiangah, nang in thu-mu-pa hi lo na hi hiam? “En in, nuam takin nang leh Abiathar, na tapa nihte Ahima-az leh Abiathar’ tapa Jonathan tawh khuapi sungah ciahkik un.
Thei in, keimah thu zasak dingin nang kiang panin thu hong tun’ mateng gamlak tui ngahmunte-ah ka ngak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Zadok leh Abiathar in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang Jerusalem ah puakik uh hi; amaute tua lai-ah om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Oliv Mual tung kahtohna-ah David paito-in, khe guak leh lu tuamsa-in a pai kawmin kap hi; amah tawh a om mi khempeuh in a lu uh khuhin paito uh a, a pai kawmun kap uh hi.
Tua ciangin David kiangah, “Ahithofel zong mi sawmsimte lakah Absalom tawh om hi,” ci-in kigen hi. Tua ciangin David in, “Topa aw, kong thum hi, Ahithofel’ thugente haina-in na heisak in,” a ci hi.
Pasian a kibiakna mun mual dawnah David a tun’ ciangin, en in, Arkhi mi Hushai amah dawn dingin a puantungsilh balkeksa leh a lu tungah lei baang tawh hong pai hi.
David in ama kiangah, “Nang in kei tawh hong paisuak lecin kei adingin vangik na hi ding hi,

Ahih hangin khuapi sungah nang na ciahkik leh, Absalom kiangah, ‘Aw kumpipa, keimah in nangma nasem ka hi ding hi; hun beisa sungah na pa’ nasem ka hih mah bangin tu-in nangma nasem ka hi ding hi,’ ci lecin, Ahithofel thugente kei’ adingin na khaktan zo ding hi.
Siampi Zadok leh Abiathar tua lai-ah nang tawh om hi lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ inn pan na zak peuhpeuh siampi Zadok leh Abiathar kiangah gen in.
En in, amau’ tapate gel, Zadok’ tapa Ahima-az, leh Abiathar’ tapa Jonathan, amaute tawh omkhawm hi; na zak peuhpeuh amaute’ tung tawnin kei tungah nong puak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem ah Absalom a lut lai takin David’ lawmpa Hushai khuapi sungah pai hi.

David in mualdawn a khen’ khit tawmvei ciangin Mefibosheth nasempa Ziba in, anlum lum zanih, leenggah-phehkeu bawk zakhat, khuakhal singgah zakhat, leh leenggahzu savun um khat a pua van a kivawh la nih tawh amah na dawn hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Ziba kiangah, “Bang hangin hihte hong paipih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Ziba in dawngin, “Late in kumpipa’ innkuante a tuan’ nading, anlum leh khuakhal singgah in tangvalte’ nek ding, leh leenggahzu in gamlakah a gimte’ dawn ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Na topa Saul’ tupa koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, “En in, amah Jerusalem ah om hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, ‘Tu ni-in Israel mite in ka pu Saul’ kumpigam kei hong pia kik ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Ziba kiangah, “En in, Mefibosheth’ neihsa khempeuh tu-in nangma aa ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ziba in, “Kei in nangma nasempa ka hi hi; ka to kumpipa nangma muhna-ah maipha hong musak tawntung in,” a ci hi.
Bahurim-ah Kumpi David a tun’ ciangin Saul’ innsung innkuan mi, Gera’ tapa Shimei min nei mi khat hong paikhia hi; amah hong pai kawmin samsia tawntung hi.
Amah in David leh Kumpi David nasemte khempeuh suang tawh deng hi; mi khempeuh leh mi thahatte khempeuh ama taklam leh veilamah om hi.
Shimei in a samsiat kawmin, “Pai mang, pai mang, nang mi thatpa, bangmah man lo mipa!

Ama tangin na uk Saul’ innkuante na thahna hangin Topa in nangma tungah hong thuk hi; Topa in na tapa Absalom’ tungah kumpigam pia khin ta hi. Thei in, na siatna nangma tungah hong tu hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang in mi thatpa na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zeru-iah’ tapa Abishai in kumpipa kiangah, “Bang hangin hih ui si a bang lel mi khat in ka to kumpipa samsia ding ahi hiam? Hong paisak in la, a lu hong tankhia sak in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin kumpipa in, “No Zeru-iah’ tapate aw, note tawh bang kisai ahi hiam? Topa in ama kiangah, ‘David samsia in,’ a cihna hangin hong samsia ahih leh, ‘Bang hangin tua ci hih na hi hiam?’ kua in ci ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in Abishai leh a nasemte khempeuh kiangah, “En un, keima tapa mahmah in kei thah dingin hong zong hi; hih Benjamin mi in bangzahin tu-in hong zong zaw ding hiam! Ama thu-in omsak un, amah samsia sak un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amah sawl hi.
Topa in ka thuakna hong en-in, tu ni-a kei hong samsiatna hangin Topa in a hoih tawh kei hong thuk kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ama gal-khat mual pangah Shimei pai a, a pai kawmin samsia-in suangte tawh amah dengin leivui a theh lai takin David leh a mite lampi-ah paipai uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa leh amah tawh a om mi khempeuhte gim mahmahin Jordan tung uh hi; tua lai-ah amah kitawldamsak hi.
Tu-in Absalom leh Israel mite khempeuh Jerusalem hong tung uh a, Ahithofel amah tawh om hi.
Tua ciangin David lam a lakpa, Arkhi mi Hushai in Absalom kiangah hong tun’ ciangin, amah in Absalom kiangah, “Kumpipa khan’ sawt hen! Kumpipa khan’ sawt hen! a ci hi.
Absalom in Hushai kiangah, “Hih in na lawmpa’ tungah na thumanna ahi hiam? Bang hangin na lawmpa tawh pai lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Hushai in Absalom kiangah, “Hi lo hi; Topa leh hih mite leh Israel mite khempeuh adingin a kiteel mipa’ aa ka hi ding a, amah tawh ka om ding hi.
Tua banah, kua na sem ding ka hi hiam? Ama tapa hilo ding ahi hiam? Na pa’ na ka sep bangin nangma na ka sem ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Absalom in Ahithofel kiangah, “Na ngaihsutna hong pia in; bang hih ding i hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Ahithofel in Absalom kiangah, “Inn kem dingin a nusiat na pa’ zineute luppih in; tua ciangin nangmah in na pa na muhdah bawlna thu Israelte khempeuh in za-in nangmah tawh a om mite khempeuh’ thakhauhsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in innkhumzangah Absalom’ adingin puanbuk khat lam uh hi; tua ciangin Israelte khempeuh’ muhna-ah Absalom in a pa’ zineute luppih hi.
Tua hun lai-in Ahithofel’ thugente in Pasian’ kammal mahmah bangin kingaihsun hi; tua bangin David leh Absalom in Ahithofel’ thugente thupi ngaihsut uh hi.
Tua tham loin Ahithofel in Absalom kiangah, “Mi tulsawm leh tulnih hong teelsak in, keimah kuan khia-in tu zanin David ka delh ding hi.
Amah gimin lungkia-in a om lai takin amah ka hih ding a, amah ka amkhamsak ding hi; tua ciangin amah tawh a om mi khempeuh tai ding uh hi. Keimah in kumpipa bek ka satpuk ding a,
mothak in a pasal kiang inn-ah hong ciah bangin mi khempeuh nang kiangah kong ciahpih kik ding hi. Nangmah in mi khat bek’ nuntakna na zong hi, midang khempeuh nuam takin om ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua thugenna in Absalom leh Israel upate khempeuh lungkimsak hi.
Tua ciangin Absalom in, “Arkhi mi Hushai zong sam un, ama thugen za ni,” a ci hi.
Absalom kiangah Hushai hong pai ciangin, Absalom in ama kiangah, “Tua bangin Ahithofel in thugen hi; ama genna bangin i hih ding hiam? Tua ahih kei leh nang gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hushai in Absalom kiangah, “Tu tungin Ahithofel’ hong thugen hoih lo hi,” a ci hi.

Hushai in tua tham loin, “Na pa leh a mite mi thahat hi a, gam lakah a note a kilaksak vompi bangin amaute a hehna na thei hi. Tua ban-ah na pa in galdona-ah a siam ahi hi; amah in mite tawh zan-in omkhawm lo ding hi.

En in, tu nangawnin amah dum khat sungah ahi a, mun dang khatah ahi zongin bu khin ding hi. Kisim cilna-ah mi pawlkhat a tuk ciangin tua thu a za mi peuhpeuh in, ‘Absalom a zui mite lakah sihna om khin hi,’ ci ding hi.

Tua ciangin a lungtang humpinelkai lungtang a bang galhang mipa nangawn launa tawh lungkia gawp ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte khempeuh in na pa mi thahat ahihna leh amah tawh a om mite mi hangsan ahihna thei uh hi.
Ahih hangin keima ngaihsutna in, Dan panin Bersheba ciang dong, tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin a tam Israelte khempeuh nang kiangah khawmin galdo dingin nangmah mah na pai ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah i muhna mun khatpeuhah amah i hih ding a, lei lakah daitui kia bangin amah i tuam ding hi; amah leh amah tawh a om mi khempeuh khat zong kisiit lo ding hi.

Amah khuapi khat sungah a nungkik leh, Israelte khempeuh in tua khuapi sungah khauhual paipihin tua lai mun-ah suangtang khat nangawn a kimu nawn lo dingin kuam sungah tua khua i kaikhia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Absalom leh Israel mite khempeuh in, “Arkhi mi Hushai’ thugen in Ahithofel’ thugen sangin hoihzaw hi,” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Absalom tungah siatna a tun’sak theih nadingin Ahithofel’ thugen hoih tawh a zawh ding Topa in a sehsa ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Hushai in siampi Zadok leh Abiathar kiangah, “Tua bang tua bangin Ahithofel in Absalom leh Israel upate kiangah gen hi; tua bang tua bangin keimah in thu ka gen hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in manlang takin sawl in la, David kiangah, ‘Tu zanin gamlak tui ngahmunte-ah giak kei in la, bangbang hita leh gal kah in; tua hi kei leh kumpipa leh amah tawh a om mite khempeuh hong kivalhtum ding hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.

Tu-in Jonathan leh Ahima-az in Enrogel-ah ngak uh hi; nasem numei khat pai-in amaute kiangah genin, amaute pai-in Kumpi David kiangah gen zel uh hi; bang hiam cih leh amaute khuapi sungah a lut uh a kimu lo ding ahi hi.

Ahih hangin tangval khat in amaute mu-in Absalom kiangah gen hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute gel manlang takin paikhia uh a, a huang sungah tuikhuk a nei Bahurim-a mi khat’ inn-ah tung uh hi; amaute tuikhuk sungah paisuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin a numei in khuhna khat la-in tuikhuk gong tungah phah a, tua tungah an zalh hi; bangmah kithei lo hi.

Absalom’ nasemte tua nu’ inn-ah hong tun’ ciangin amaute in, “Ahima-az leh Jonathan koi lai-ah om ahi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. A numei in amaute kiangah, “amaute lui gal khatah paikhin zo uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute in zongin a muh zawh loh uh ciangin Jerusalem ah ciahkik uh hi.

Amaute a paikhiat khit ciangin tuikhuk panin mite hong paikhia uh a, pai-in Kumpi David kiangah gen uh hi. Amaute in David kiangah, “Ding in, tui gal khatah manlang takin pai in; bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang tua bangin nangma lang khatah Ahithofel in thu gen hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin David leh amah tawh a om mi khempeuh ding uh a, amaute in Jordan kantan uh hi; khuavak ciangin Jordan a kantan nai lo khat beek om nawn lo uh hi.

Ahithofel in ama thugen a kizuih loh a muh ciangin a la tutphah vawhin ama khuapi a inn-ah nuak ciah hi. Tua ciangin amah in a innkuan vai hawmsak a, tua ciangin amahmah gui-awk hi; amah si a, a pa’ han-ah kivui hi.
Tua ciangin Mahanaim-ah David tung hi. Absalom in Israel mite khempeuh tawh Jordan kantan hi.

Tu-in Absalom in Joab tangin galkapte a uk dingin Amasa koih khin hi. Amasa in Nahash’ tanu Abigail a ten’pih, Ishmael mi ahi Ithra min nei mi khat’ tapa hi a, ama nu Abigail leh Joab’ nu Zeru-iah unau ahi hi.
Israelte leh Absalom in Gilead gamah giahphual sat uh hi.
Mahanaim-ah David a tun’ ciangin, Ammon mite’ gam Rabbah panin Nahash’ tapa Shobi, leh Lodebar panin Ammiel’ tapa Makhir, leh Rogelim panin Gilead mi Barzillai,
in lupnate, kuangte, leh leibeelte, mangbuh, mangbuhham, an, ankan, bepi leh basan,

khuaizu leh bawngnawi-thaukhal leh tuu leh sathaukhalte, David leh amah tawh a om mite’ nek dingin hong puak uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Mite gam lakah gilkialin, gimin dangtak uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in amah tawh a om mite khawmin a tultul a ukte leh a zaza a ukte-in koih hi.

David in galkapte sawlkhia-in, seh-thum suah seh-khat Joab’ ukna nuai-ah, seh-thum suah seh-khat Joab’ sanggampa Zeru-iah’ tapa Abishai’ ukna nuai-ah, leh seh-thum suah seh-khat Gath mi Ittai’ ukna nuai-ah omsak hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in mite kiangah, “Note tawh kei zong kong kuankhia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin mite in, “Nang nong kuan khia kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kote tai le-ung amaute in kote phamawh hong sa lo ding hi. Kote kimkhat si le-ung amaute in kote phamawh hong sa lo ding hi. Ahih hangin nang in kote tulsawm zahin na manpha hi; tua ahih ciangin khuapi panin kote kiangah huhna hong puak lecin hoihzaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, “Note in hoih na sakpen bangun ka gamta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin galkap khempeuh a zaza leh a tultul-in a paikhiat lai takin kulh kongpi pangah kumpipa ding hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Joab leh Abishai leh Ittai thu pia-in, “Keimah nong khualna-un tangvalpa Absalom hong dawm mahmah un,” a ci hi. Kumpipa in Absalom’ thu galkapmangte tungah a vaikhakna mi khempeuh in za uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin galkapte Israelte do dingin gamlakah kuankhia uh hi; Efraim tulak-ah gal kido uh hi.
David’ nasemte in tua lai-ah Israel mite zo uh a, tua ni-a mi kithat tam a, mi tulsawmnih ahi hi.
Tua gam maitang tung khempeuhah gal kikapna om kim hi; tua ni-in namsau’ thah sangin thudang hangin tulak-a si mi tamzaw hi.

David’ nasemte in Absalom tuak kha uh hi. Absalom in a la tungah tuang a, tawsaw lianpi hiang pha nuai khatah a la pai-in, a lutang tawsaw lakah awk a, ama nuai-a om la a paisuak lai takin van leh lei kikalah amah a kikhai-in kinusia hi.
Tua ciangin mi khat in mu-in Joab kiangah gen a, “En in, tawsaw khat kawm-ah Absalom kikhai ka mu hi,” a ci hi.

Joab in ama kiangah a gen mipa kiangah, “Bang, nang amah mu maw! Bang hangin lei lakah amah satkhia suk lo na hi hiam? Nang tungah ngun peek sawm leh kawnggak khat hong pia ngel ding hi ve’ng,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin mipa in Joab kiangah, “Ngun peek tulkhat ka khut sungah koih ta lecin zong kumpipa’ tapa hih dingin ka khutmeno khat zong ka zankhia kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kote’ zakin kumpipa in nang leh Abishai leh Ittai thu hong pia in, ‘Keimah nong khualna-un tangvalpa Absalom hong dawm un,’ hong ci hi.
Thudang khatah, amah langpangin zuautat leng (Kumpipa tungah a ki-im bangmah om lo hi), nangmah mah kikang koihin nong hu kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Joab in, “Hih bangin nang tawh hun ka beisak kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in thaltang thum la-in tawsaw kawm-ah Absalom a hing lai-in a lutang sungah tuate siat hi.
Tua ciangin Joab’ galhiam tawite tangval sawm in Absalom umcih uh a, amah satin that uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in peengkul tum a, Israelte a delhna panun galkapte hong ciahkik uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Joab in amaute kho hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Absalom la-in tulak-a dum lianpi khat sungah amah paai uh-a, ama tungah suangcianlian mahmah khat ciang uh hi; tua ciangin Israelte khempeuh amau’ inn ciatah tai uh hi.

Tu-in Absalom in ama nuntak sungin khuampi khat la-in ama adingin phutin Kumpipa’ Kuam-ah om hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Keima min hong zom ding tapa ka nei kei hi,” a ci hi; tua khuampi ama min tamin phuak a, tu ni dongin Absalom’ Mual kici hi.
Tua ciangin Zadok’ tapa Ahima-az in, “Kei hong taisak in la, Topa in ama galte’ vangliatna panin amah a hotkhiatna lungdamna thu kumpipa kiangah hong puaksak in,” a ci hi.

Joab in ama kiangah, “Nang in tu ni-in lungdamna thu na puak kei ding hi; a ni dang ciangin lungdamna thu na puak thei ding hi; ahih hangin tu ni-in lungdamna thu na puak kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa’ tapa si hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in Kush mipa kiangah, “Pai in, na muhsa teng kumpipa kiangah va gen in,” a ci hi. Kush mipa Joab’ mai-ah kunin, tua ciangin tai hi.

Tua ciangin Zadok’ tapa Ahima-za in Joab kiangah, “Bangbang piang ta leh kei zong Kush mipa nungah hong tai sak in,” a ci kik hi. Joab in, “Lungdamna thu puakna hangin thaman ngah lo ding cih thei napi-in, ka tapa aw, bang hangin tai ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Bangbang piang ta leh ka tai ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Tai in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ahima-az zanglei lam tawnin tai a, Kush mipa makhelh hi.
Tu-in David kulh kongpi nihte kikalah tu hi; galvilpa kulh kongpi khumzangah paito a, amah in a lu sangsakin a khuadak ciangin amah guakin hong tai mi khat a mu hi.
Galvilpa in samin kumpipa kiangah gen hi. Kumpipa in, “Ama guak ahih leh thuhoih ahi hi,” a ci hi. Amah hong nawh tai-in hong nai hi.

Tua ciangin galvilpa in midang khat hong tai mu hi; galvilpa in kulh kongpi-ah samin, “En un, midang khat amah guak hong tai!” a ci hi. Kumpipa in, “amah in zong lungdamna thu hong paipih hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin galvilpa in, “a masapa’ tai in Zadok’ tapa Ahima-az’ tai tawh kibang hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “amah mihoih hi a, lungdamna thuhoih tawh hong pai hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah Ahima-az kiko-in, “Na khempeuh hoih hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa mai-ah lei maingatin amah kun a, “ka to kumpipa’ lang khatah a khut a liik mite nangma khut sungah a hong pia Topa na Pasian in thupha ngah ta hen,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Tangvalpa Absalom a hoihhoih hiam?” a ci hi. Ahima-az in dawngin, “Joab in na nasempa a sawl ciangin buaina lianpi khat ka mu a, ahih hangin bang hiam cih ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Kiheikhia in la, hih lai-ah ding in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah kihei khia-in taang loin ding hi.

Tua ciangin en in, Kush mipa hong tung hi; Kush mipa in, “Ka to kumpipa adingin lungdam nading thu om! Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma langah a ding mi khempeuh’ vangliatna panin tu ni-in Topa in nang hong honkhia hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in Kush mipa kiangah, “Tangvalpa Absalom a hoihhoih hiam?” a ci hi. Kush mipa in dawngin, “Ka to kumpipa’ galte, leh siat nadingin nangma lang khatah a ding khempeuh, tua tangvalpa bang ta hen,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa lungsim nakpi takin sukha a, kulh kongpi tunga inndei sungah paito-in kap hi; a pai kawmin amah in, “Aw ka tapa Absalom, ka tapa, ka tapa Absalom! Nangma tangin kei sizaw taleng. Aw Absalom, ka tapa, ka tapa!” a ci hi.
Joab kiangah, “En in, Absalom’ hangin kumpipa kapin thuum hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-a gualzawhna mi khempeuh adingin thuumna suak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua ni-in mite in, “Kumpipa a tapa’ hangin dah hi,” ci-in za uh hi.
Tua ciangin galsung pan a tai uh ciangin a maizum mite a gelsim bangin tua ni-in khuapi sungah mite lut sim uh hi.
Kumpipa in a mai khuh a, awging pha tawh kumpipa kapin, “Aw ka tapa Absalom, Aw Absalom, ka tapa, ka tapa!” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa’ inn sungah Joab hong pai-in, “Tu ni-in nangma nuntakna, leh na tanute leh na tapate’ nuntakna, leh na zite leh na zineute’ nuntakna a hong honkhia na nasemte khempeuh na maizumsak hi;

bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in nang hong mudahte itin nang hong itte na mudah hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ukte nasemte nang adingin bangmah ahih lohna tu ni-in na kitelsak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Absalom hingin kote khempeuh tu ni-in si le ung na nuam ding ka thei hi,

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ding in, paikhia in la, na nasemte tungah kam neem pau in; bang hang hiam cih leh na pai kei leh tu zan ciangin mi khat zong nang kiangah hong om nawn lo ding hi, ci-in Topa min tawh ka kiciam ngam hi; hih thu in na tangval-a kipan tu ciang dong na tungah hong tungsa siatna khempeuh sangin nang adingin siazaw ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa ding-in kulh kongpi-ah a tutna-ah tu hi. Tua ciangin mite kiangah, “En un, kulh kongpi-ah kumpipa tu hi,” ci-in kigen hi; tua ciangin kumpipa mai-ah mi khempeuh hong pai uh hi. Tu-in Israelte amau’ inn ciatah na tai khin uh hi.

Israel minam khempeuh sungah mi khempeuh thu kisel uh a, “Kumpipa in i galte’ khut sung panin hong khahkhia-in Filistiate’ khut sung panin hong honkhia hi, tu-in Absalom kiang i gam sung panin amah taikhia hi.
Ahih hangin eite tungah sathau i nilh Absalom, gal sungah si hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in bang hangin kumpipa lak kik ding bangmah gen lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi David in hih thu, siampi Zadok leh Abiathar kiangah puakin, “Judah upate kiangah gen un, ‘Israelte khempeuh’ thu kumpipa kiangah tung khinin, bang hangin note in kumpipa a inn-ah a ciahpih nunung pen hi ding na hi uh hiam?
Note in ka beh nai na hi uh a, note in keima si keima sa na hi uh hi; tua ahih ciangin bang hangin note in kumpipa a ciahpih nunung pen hi ding na hi uh hiam?” ci un.

Tua ciangin Amasa kiangah, ‘Nang in keima si keima sa hilo na hi hiam? Tu-a kipan Joab’ munah nang in ka galkapte a ukpa na hih kei tak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei ta hen, ci hi’ ci-in gen un,” a ci hi.
David’ thugen in Judah mite khempeuh’ lungsim thakhatin zo pah hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute in kumpipa kiangah thu puakin, “Nang leh na nasemte khempeuh hong ciahkik un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa Jordan-ah hong paikik hi; tua ciangin kumpipa a dawn ding leh Jordan galah kumpipa a paipih dingin Gilgal-ah Judah mite hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Bahurim panin Benjamin mi Gera’ tapa Shimei, Kumpi David dawn dingin Judah mite tawh manlangin paisuk hi;
Benjamin sung panin mi tulkhat amah tawh om hi. Tua ciangin Saul’ innsung nasem Ziba, a tapa sawm-le-nga leh a nasem sawmnihte tawh kumpipa’ mai-ah Jordan-ah taisuk a,
kumpipa innkuante a galkahpih ding leh ama deihna bangin na a sem dingin amaute in ngahmun ngap uh hi. Jordon a galkah ding ciangin Gera’ tapa Shimei kumpipa’ mai-ah bok suk a,
kumpipa kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa in Jesusalem a nusiat ni-in na nasempa’ gamtat khialhna ka topa in kei hong mawhsak kei in la, hong ciamteh kei in; kumpipa in ngaihsutin nei kei in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ka khialh khitna na nasempa in thei hi; tua ahih ciangin, en in, ka to kumpipa dawn dingin a paisuk dingin Josef minam khempeuh sung panin a masa penin tu ni-in kong tung hi,” a ci hi.
Zeru-iah’ tapa Abishai in dawngin, “Amah in Topa’ sathau nilhpa samsia ahih manin hih thu hangin Shimei thah ding hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin David in, “Note in tu ni-in kei lang bangin na om nadingun no Zeru-iah’ tapate tawh kei bang kisai i hi hiam? Tu ni-in Israel sungah mi khatpeuh kithat ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh tu ni-in Israelte tungah kumpi ka hihna thei hilo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Shimei kiangah, “Nang na si kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Kumpipa in a kiciamna ama tungah pia hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa dawn dingin Saul’ tupa Mefibosheth hong paisuk hi; kumpipa a paikhiat ni-a kipan lungnuamin hong tun’ kik ni dong, amah in a khete zeem lo, a khamul puah lo, a puante zong sawp lo hi.
Jerusalem panin kumpipa dawn dingin hong pai ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Mefibosheth aw, bang hangin kei tawh hong pai lo na hi hiam? a ci hi.

Amah in dawngin, “Ka topa, Aw Kumpipa, ka nasempa Ziba in kei hong khem hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na nasempa in ama kiangah, ‘Kei a tungah tuangin kumpipa tawh ka pai theih nadingin kei adingin la khat tutphah vawh in,’ ka ci hi. Bang hang hiam na cih leh na nasempa a khe bai hi;
Amah in ka to kumpipa kiangah na nasempa hong gensia hi. Ahih hangin ka to kumpipa in Pasian’ vantungmi tawh kibang hi; tua ahih ciangin hoih na sak bangin hih in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ka to kumpipa’ mai-ah ka pa’ innkuante khempeuh a si zah dong dingin a sia ahi hi; ahih hangin nangmah in na sabuai-ah a ne mite lakah na nasempa na koih hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa tungah ka koh ding thu bang nei thuah nawn ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin nangma thu gen lailai na hi hiam? Ka lungsim ka khentat zo hi; nang leh Ziba in leitang na hawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mefibosheth in kumpipa kiangah, “Aw, ka to kumpipa lungnuamin inn hong tung khin ahih nungsang, a vekin amah la sak in,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Rogelim panin Gilead mi Barzillai hong paisuk hi; Jordan gal khatah amah kha dingin kumpipa tawh Jordan ciang dong amah paisuak hi.
Barzillai in kum sawmgiat a pha, a khangham mahmah mi khat ahi hi; Mahanaim-ah kumpipa a om lai takin amah in an pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah mihau mahmah khat ahi hi.
Kumpipa in Barzillai kiangah, “Kei hong zui in la, Jerusalem ah kei tawh om in, nang kong vaak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Barzillai in kumpipa kiangah, “Keimah in kumpipa tawh Jerusalem ah a paito dingin ka nuntak ding kum bangzah hun nei nawn ka hi hiam?

Tu ni-in kei kum sawmgiat ka pha hi; a nuam leh a nuam lo khentel thei nawn ka hi hiam? Na nasempa in a nek ahi a, a dawn ahi zongin a limna phawk thei nawn ahi hiam? Lasa numeite leh lasa pasalte’ aw za thei nawn ka hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin ka to kumpipa tungah na nasempa in vangik kibehlap hong hi ding ahi hiam?
Na nasempa in Jordan gal khatah tomkha sung kumpipa tawh hong pai ding hi. Bang hangin kumpipa in tua bang thaman tawh kei hong din’kik ding ahi hiam?

Keima khuapi sung mah, ka nu leh ka pa’ han nai-ah ka sih theih nadingin na nasempa ciahkik sak in, ci-in kong thum hi. Ahih hangin hih lai-ah na nasempa Khimham om hi, ka to kumpipa tawh amah galkah sakin; hoih na sak bangbangin ama ading hih sak in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in dawngin, “Khimham in kei tawh hong pai ding a, nangmah in hoih na sak bangbangin ama ading ka hihsak ding hi; kei tung panin na deih khempeuh nangma adingin kong hihsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh Jordan gal-ah pai uh a, kumpipa zong pai hi; tua ciangin kumpipa in Barzillai namin thupha pia a, ama inn-ah amah ciah hi.
Gilgal-ah kumpipa paisuak a, amah tawh Khimham paisuak hi; Judah mi khempeuh leh Israel mi a kimkhatte in zong ama pai nadingah kumpipa kha uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh kumpipa kiangah hong pai-in kumpipa kiangah, “Bang hangin ka sanggam uh Judah mite in nang hong gu khia-in, kumpipa leh a innkuante, leh David’ mite amah tawh, Jordan gal-ah paipih ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Judah mite khempeuh in Israel mite dawngin, “Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa in kote tawh beh kinai ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin hih thu-ah heh na hi uh hiam? Kumpipa’ sum bei-in an ne peuhmah ka hi uh hiam? Tua ahih kei leh amah in letsong khat peuhpeuh kote hong pia ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in Judah mite dawngin, “Kumpipa sungah tanh sawm ka nei uh a, David sungah zong note sangin tam ka neizaw uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin note in kote hong simmawh na hi uh hiam? Kote in i kumpipa ciahpih kik ding a gen masate hilo ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Israel mite’ kammal sangin Judah mite’ kammal kihtakhuai zaw hi.

Tu-in tua lai-ah Benjamin mi, Bikhri’ tapa Sheba min nei, mi ginalo khat hong om kha hi; amah in peengkul tumin, “David sungah tanh i nei kei hi, Jessi’ tapa’ sungah gamh i nei kei hi; mi khempeuh na inn ciat uh-ah ciah un, Israelte aw,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mi khempeuh David kiang pan nungkik uh a, Bikhri’ tapa Sheba zui uh hi; ahih hangin Judah mite in Jordan panin Jerusalem ciang dong a kumpipa uh kip takin zui uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem a inn-ah David tung hi; tua ciangin kumpipa in inn kem dingin a nusiat zineu sawmte la-in a kivil inn khat sungah amaute koih a, amaute vaak hi, ahih hangin amaute luppih lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute a khang laipi-in meigong numei suak uh a, a sih dong uh amaute kikhumcip hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Amasa kiangah, “Ni thum sungin Judah mite kei kiangah khawm in la, nangmahmah zong hih lai-ah hong om in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judahte sam dingin Amasa pai hi; ahih hangin ama tungah a kiciam a kisehsa hun khengin amah zekai hi.

Tua ciangin David in Abishai kiangah, “Tu-in Bikhri’ tapa Sheba in Absalom sangin eite tungah siatna tamzaw hong bawl ding hi; na topa’ nasemte la in la, amah delh in, tua hi kei leh amah in ama adingin khuapi muanhuaite ngahin eite tungah buaina hong piang sak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Abishai’ nungah Joab leh Khereth mite, Peleth mite leh mi thahat khempeuh pai uh hi; Bikhri’ tapa Sheba a delh dingin Jerusalem panin amaute kuankhia uh hi.

Gibeon gam sunga suangtumpi-ah amaute a tun’ uh ciangin amaute dawn dingin Amasa hong pai hi. Tu-in Joab in galkap puan silhin, tua tungah, a kawng tungah a kigak a paai sunga om namsau tawh a kithuah kawnggak khat om a, a mailam manawhin a pai lai takin a namsau seel hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in Amasa kiangah, “Ka sanggampa aw, thuhoih ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Joab in amah a nam dingin a taklam khut tawh a khamul-in Amasa man hi.

Ahih hangin Amasa in Joab’ khut sunga om namsau mu lo hi; tua ahih ciangin Joab in tua tawh a pumpi sat a, nihvei sat kul loin a gilpi lei lakah bua khia hi; tua ciangin amah si hi. Tua ciangin Joab leh a sanggampa Abishai in Bikhri’ tapa Sheba delh uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab’ mite khat Amasa’ kiangah ding-in, “Joab a gum peuhmah leh David’aa ahi mi peuhmah in Joab zui un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin lam lianpi-a ama sisan sungah Amasa kidiahin om hi. Tua lai-a a pai mi khempeuh in amah a muh ciangin khawl hi; mi khempeuh a khawlna tua mipa in amuh ciangin amah in lam lianpi panin gamlakah Amasa puakhia-in ama tungah puan khat paai hi.
Lam lianpi panin amah a kilakkhiat khit ciangin Bikhri’ tapa Sheba delh dingin Joab nungah mi khempeuh paisuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel minamte khempeuh nawkin Abel Bethma-akah khua ah Sheba pai hi; Bikhri mi khempeuh kikhawm uh a, amah zui-in khuapi sungah tum uh hi.

Tua ciangin Joab tawh a om mi khempeuh hong pai-in Bethma-akah khua-a Abel-ah amah umcih uh hi; amaute in khuapi dona-in suangcianpi khat bawl uh a, kulhpi lang khatah ding uh hi; tua ciangin kulhpi a puk theih nadingin amaute in kulhpi nuai to uh hi.
Tua ciangin numei pil khat in khuapi panin samin, “Za un! Joab kiangah gen un, ‘Nang tungah thu kong gen theih nadingin hih lai-ah hong pai in,’ ci un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin tua nu’ nai-ah amah hong pai hi; numei in, “Nang in Joab na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Ka hi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin numei in ama kiangah, “Na nasemnu’ thugente ngai in,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin “Ka ngai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in “Taang lai-in amaute in, ‘Abel-ah thu dong sak un,’ ci thei uh hi; tua bangin amaute in thu siangsak uh hi.

Keimah in Israelte sungah tua banga kilemna a deih a thuman mi khat ka hi hi; nang in Israel sunga nu ahi khuapi khat suksiat ding na hanciam hi; bang hangin Topa’ gamhluah valhtum ding na hi hiam?" a ci hi.
Joab in dawngin, “Keimah in ka valh tum ding ahi a, ka suksiat ding ahi zongin keima ngaihsut hi dek lo, hi dek lo!

Tua thu man lo hi. Ahih hangin Efraim mual tung gam mi, Bikhri’ tapa Sheba a kici mipa in Kumpi David lehdo hi; amah bek hong pia in, tua hi leh khuapi panin ka nungkik ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin numei in Joab kiangah, En in, kulh sung panin nang kiangah ama lutang hong kilawn suk ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin ama pilna zangin mi khempeuh kiangah tua numei pai hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Bikhri’ tapa Sheba’ lu tan khia-in Joab kiangah lawnkhia uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in peengkul tum a, khuapi panin amaute kikhenin a milipin a inn ciat uh ah ciah uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa kiang Jerusalem ah Joab ciah hi.
Tu-in Joab in Israel galkap khempeuh a uk ahi hi; Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in Khereth mite leh Peleth mite a uk ahi hi;
Adoniram in aana tawh na a kisemsakte a uk ahi hi; Ahilud’ tapa Jehoshafat in thuciamtehpa ahi hi;
Sheva in lai-atpa ahi hi; Zadok leh Abiathar in siampite ahi uh hi;
Jair mi Ira in zong David’ siampi ahi hi.

Tu-in kum khat khit kum khat, David’ hun sungin kum thum sung kialpi tung hi; tua ciangin David in Topa’ kiangah thu dong hi. Tua ciangin Topa in, “Amah in Gibeon mite that ahih manin Saul leh a innkuan tungah mithah mawhna om hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in Gibeon mite sam hi. Tu-in Gibeon mite in Israel mite sung hi loin Amor mi a om laite ahi uh hi; amaute a hingkhawi ding Israel mite kiciam khin napi-in, Israel leh Judah mite ading a deih luatna-in Saul in amaute thah dingin zong hi.
Tua ciangin David in Gibeon mite kiangah, “Note adingin bang hong hihsak ding ka hi hiam? Note in Topa’ mite thupha na piak theih nadingun bangci bangin kilemna hong bawl ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Gibeon mite in ama kiangah, “Kote leh Saul ahi a, a innkuan tawh ahi zongin kikal ah kitotna om pen ngun leh kham in maisak zo lo ding hi; Israelte sungah mi khatpeuh ka thah hangun zong lungkim zawh nading om lo hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Note ading kong hihsak ding bang hi ci na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in kumpipa kiangah, “Israel gam sungah kote in mun ka neih loh nadingun kote hong netumin suksiat ding a vaihawmpa,
Topa’ mual tung, Topa mai Gibeon-ah amaute ka khai theih nadingun ama tapa sagihte hong pia in,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Amaute kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in amah, David leh Saul’ tapa Jonathan’ kikal ah a om, Topa tawh kiciamna hangin Saul’ tapa Jonathan’ tapa Mefibosheth siit hi.
Kumpipa in, Ai-ah’ tanu Rizpah’ tapa nih, Saul’ tawh a neih Armoni leh Mefibosheth; leh Saul’ tanu Merab in Meholah mi Barzillai’ tapa Adriel tawh a neih a tapa ngate la hi;
amah in Gibeon mite tungah amaute pia a, amaute in Topa mai mual tungah amaute khai uh hi, amau sagihte si khawm uh hi. Mangbuhham lak kipat hun, an lak kipat cil lamin amaute kithat hi.

Tua ciangin Ai-ah’ tanu Rizpah in puanhampi la-in an lak-a kipan van panin amau’ luanghawmte tungah guah a zuk dongin ama lup nadingin suangpi tungah phah hi; sun-in huih lak vasate ahi a, zan-in gamlak gamsate ahi zongin amau’ luanghawmte tungah amah in paisak lo hi.
Saul’ zineu, Ai-ah’ tanu Rizpah’ gamtatna thu David kiangah a kigen ciangin,

David pai-in Gilboa mual tungah Filistiate in Saul a thah ni-in Filistite in amaute a khaina mun Bethshan khua sung kongzing lampi laizang panin a guksak Jebeshgilead mite tung panin Saul’ guhte leh a tapa Jonathan’ guhte la hi;
amah in tua lai panin Saul’ guhte leh a tapa Jonathan’ guhte paipih to hi; amaute in a kikhai mite’ guh zong kaikhawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Zela khua sung Benjamin’ leitang, a pa Kish’ han sungah Saul leh a tapa Jonathan’ guhte phum uh hi; amaute in kumpipa’ thupiak khempeuh hih uh hi. Tua khit ciangin tua gam ading thuumnate Pasian in ngai hi.
Filistiate in Israelte tawh gal kido kik uh a, David a nasemte tawh paisuk khawmin Filistiate sim uh hi; Tua ciangin David gim hi.
Mithagolte’ suante khat, a teipi sumngo shekel zathum a gik, namsau thak khat a kuah Ishbibenob in David that ding ngaihsun hi.

Ahih hangin amah huh dingin Zeru-iah’ tapa Abishai hong pai a, Filistiapa simin amah that hi. Tua ciangin David mite in amah kunhin, “Galdo dingin ko tawh nong kuankhia nawn kei ding hi, tua hi kei leh Israel mite’ muan’ leh suan’pa kong taan kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Filistiate tawh Gob-ah gal kidona om kik hi; tua cangin Hushah mi Sibbekai in mithagolte’ suante khat ahi Saf that hi.
Tua ciangin Gob-ah Filistiate tawh gal kidona om leuleu hi; tua ciangin Bethelem mi Ja-areoregim’ tapa Elhanan in a teipi siamgante’ siam lawngpi cia a pha, Gath mi Goliath sanggampa Lahmi that hi.

Tua ciangin, a khut lang tuakah khutme guk, leh a khe lang tuakah kheme guk, a vekpi-in sawm-nih-le-li a nei, mi thalian khat a omna Gath-ah gal om leuleu hi; amah zong mi thagolte sung panin apiang ahi hi.
Amah in Israelte a phin ciangin, David’ sanggampa Shimei’ tapa Jonathan in amah that hi.
Hih lite in Gath-a mi thagolte’ sung pan-a piang ahi uh hi, David leh a nasemte’ khut sungah amaute tuk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in ama galte khempeuh’ khut sung, leh Saul’ khut sung panin amah a hotkhiat ni-in David in hih la kammalte Topa tungah gen hi.
Amah in, “Topa in ka suangpi leh ka kulhpi, leh keimah honkhiapa,
ka Pasian, ka suangpi, a sungah ka buknapa, ka lum leh ka kihotkhiana ki, ka munmuanhuai leh ka belh, keimah honkhiapa ahi hi; ngong hihna panin nong hon hi.
A phat taak Topa ka sam a, ka galte kiang panin kei hong kihon hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna tuihualte in kei hong tuum a, siatna tuikhang in kei hong nawk hi;
Leinuai khaute in kei hong kancip a, sihna thangte in kei hong dawntuah hi.
“Ka lungkhamna-ah Topa ka sam a, ka Pasian ka sam hi. A biakinn panin amah in ka aw hong za a, ka kikona ama bil ah tung hi.
“Tua ciangin leitung kisingin kilok a, vantung bulpite liingin taang hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah heh hi.
A nakvang panin meikhu pusuak a, a kam panin a kangtum mei pusuak hi; ama tung pan mei-am san kuangkhia hi.
Amah in vantungte niamsakin hong paisuk a, ama khe nuai-ah khuamial sahpi om hi.
Amah Kherub khat tungah tuangin leng a, huih khate tungah amah kimu hi.
Amah in a kimkotah khuamial bawl a, a tung kikhuh nadingin meii sahpi, tui kikaikhawm hisak hi.
Ama mai-a a taang sung panin mei-amte kuangkhia hi.
Van panin Topa hong awng suk a, Sangpenpa in a aw hong gingsak hi.
Amah in thaltangte lawn khia-in thehthang hi; khuaphialep phia sak a, amaute taisak hi.
Tua ciangin tuipi tawte kimu a, lei bulpite a guakin om hi, Topa’ mawhsakna, ama nakging tawh.
“Amah in a sangna mun panin hong ban a, kei hong la hi; tui thukpi panin kei hong kaikhia hi.
A hat ka galte panin kei hong honkhia a, kei hong mudahte panin hong honkhia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei adingin amaute hatlua uh hi.
Ka kamsiat ni-in amaute in kei hong simgawp a, ahih hangin Topa in keimah hong huh hi.
Amah in mun tanzau khatah kei hong paikhiatpih a, amah kei tungah lungkim ahih manin kei hong honkhia hi.
“Topa in ka thumanna tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia a, ka khutte siangthona tawh kizui-in hong dinkik hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ thu ka zui a, ka Pasian ka langpang kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ama biakna ngeina kipte ka zui a, a thukhamte panin ka pial kei hi.
Ama mai-ah kawk ka baang kei a, kisuan’na dangte panin ka kikem hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in ka thumanna, ama muhna-ah ka siangthona tawh kizui-in hong dinkik khin hi.
“Thuman mi tungah nangmah na thuman a, a kawk baang lo mi tungah nangmah a kawk baang loin na gamta hi;
“a siangtho mi tungah nangmah in a siangtho-in na gamta a, thukawi mi tungah nangmah in thupeelin na gamta hi.
Nangmah in mi niamte na honkhia a, ahih hangin a kiphasakte na niamkhiat hi.
Hi hi, nangmah in ka meivak na hi hi, Topa aw, ka Pasian in ka khuamial vaaksak hi.
Hi hi, nangma hangin galkap honkhat ka sugawp zo a, ka Pasian khuakulh khat ka kan zo hi.
Hih Pasian a thu kicing hi; Topa’ kamciamna a manna kilang hi, amah a belte khempeuh adingin amah in kidalna lum ahi hi.
“Topa longal, Pasian kua hiam? I Pasian simloh, suangpi kua hiam?
Hih Pasian in a muanhuai keima belh hi a, ka lampi lungmuanhuai sak hi.
Amah in sakhipite khe bangin ka khe kipsak a, mun sangna-ah keimah hong koih hi.
Amah in galsiam nadingin kei hong hilh a, ka khut in sumngo thal khauh pente keek zo hi.
Nangmah in na hotkhiatna lum kei nong pia a, na huhna in kei hong liansak hi.
Nangmah in ka kalsuan nading mun tanzau ka nuai-ah nong pia a, ka khe taal lo hi;
ka galte delhin ka susia a, amaute a beitum mateng ka kileh kei hi.
Amaute ka beisak hi; amaute ka sunlet a, amaute thokik lo uh hi; ka khe nuai-ah amaute puk uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in galdo nadingin keimah tha nong guan a, keimah hong dote ka nuai-ah na nengniam hi.
Nangmah in ka galte, kei hong mudahte, na nungkik sak a, keimah in amaute ka susia hi.
Amaute khuadak a, ahih hangin a honkhia ding om lo hi; Topa tungah ko uh a, ahih hangin amah in dawng lo hi.
Leivui bangin amaute ka satvui a, kongzing buante bangin amaute tuankhamin ka sikcipsuk hi.
“Mite tawh kidona panin nangmah in kei nong honkhia hi; minamte’ lutangin kei nong bawl hi, ka theih ngei loh mite in keima na hong sem uh hi.
Keimah mai-etin gamdang mite ka kiangah hong pai uh hi; amaute in ka thu a zak phetun, ka thu hong mang uh hi.
Gamdang mite lungkia uh a, a phual kip panun liingin hong paikhia uh hi.
“Topa hing hi; ka Suangpi in pahtawina ngah hen la, amah in ka Pasian, ka kihotkhiatna Suangpi, ahi hi.
hong thukkik sakin ka nuai-ah mite a koihsuk Pasian,
ka galte panin kei hong paikhiat pihpa lian ta hen; nangmah in ka langte tungah kei nong liansak a, mi ngongtatte kiang panin kei nong honkhia hi.
“Topa aw, hih thu hangin minamte lakah nang kong phat ding a, na min phatna la ka sa ding hi.
Zawhna lianpi ama kumpipa tungah pia a, a sathau nilhpa, David leh a suan-le-khakte tungah a tawntungin itna kip a lak hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in hihte in David’ kam nunungte ahi hi. Jessi’ tapa David’ thugen, a sangna-ah a kikhangto mipa, Jakob’ Pasian’ sathau nilhpa, Israel la phuak siampa’ thugen:
“Topa’ Kha in kei tung tawnin thu hong gen a, ka kam sungah ama thugente om hi.
Israel Pasian kampau khin a, Israel Suangpi in kei kiangah hong ci khin hi: Mi khat in mite tungah thutang takin ukin Pasian zahtakna tawh a uk ciangin,
amah in amaute tungah zingsang khuavak bangin taang a meii kaai loh ni zingsang-a nitaang khia, lei lak panin lopate a selkhiasak guahtui bang hi.

Hi hi, ka innkuan zong Pasian tawh tua bangmah hilo ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in tawntung thuciamna kei tawh hong bawl a, na khempeuh a hoih a kipin hih hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah hong huhin, ka deihna khempeuh tangtungsak ding hilo ahi hiam?
Ahih hangin mi ginalote ahih leh a kilawnkhia lingkungte tawh kibang hi; bang hang hiam cih leh khut tawh amaute kiman thei lo hi;
amaute a lawng mipa in sik leh teipi bul tawh kithawi a, amaute mei tawh kihaltum siang hi,” a ci hi.
Hihte in David’ neih mi thahatte minte ahi hi: Tahkhemon mi Josheb-Basshebeth; amah in mi thumte a ukpa ahi hi; amah in a teipi tawh mihing zagiat do-in hun khat sungin thatmang khin hi.
Tua ciangin mi thahat thumte lakah amah a zompa in Ahoah mi Dodo’ tapa Eleazar ahi hi. Galdo ding a kikaikhawm Filistiate to a, Israel mite a nungkik hunin David tawh amah om hi.

Amah ding-in a khut a gim mateng Filistiate sattuk a, a khut a namsau-ah kimatcip hi; Topa in tua ni-in gualzawhna lianpi piangsak hi; a kithat mite’ na a tawm ding bekin ama nungah mite hong paikik uh hi.
Ama zomah Harar mi Agee’ tapa Shammah ahi hi. Besan a dimna mun Lehi-ah Filistiate kikaikhawm uh hi; Filistiate kiang panin mite tai uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tua mun laizangah pan’mun la-in hu a, Filistiate that hi; Topa in gualzawhna lianpi piangsak hi.
Ukpa sawmthumte lakpanin mi thumte paisukin, Refaim kuamah Filistia mihonte in giahphual satin a om laitak Adullam leihawm-a David kiangah anlak hun pawlin tung uh hi.
Tua hunin munmuanhuai sungah David om hi; Filistia khuacingte Bethelehem ah om uh hi.
David in lunggulhna tawh, “Kulh kongpi gei-a om Bethlehem tuikhuk panin mi khat in tuidawn ding kei hong pia leh!” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mi thahat thumte in Filistiate’ giahphual phulin kulh kongpi gei-a om Bethlehem tuikhuk panin tui tawi khia uh a, a tui la-in David kiangah paipih uh hi. Ahih hangin amah in a tui dawn lo hi; amah in Topa adingin a tui sung a,

Topa aw, hih tui ka dawn het kei ding hi. Amau’ nuntakna khamin a pai mite’ sisan a dawn tawh ka kibang ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in dawn lo hi. Mi thahat thumte zong hih mah bangin gamta uh hi.
Tu-in Zeru-iah’ tapa, Joab sanggampa Abishai in mihing sawmthumte a ukpa ahi hi. Amah in a teipi tawh mihing zathumte do-in amaute that a, mihing thumte’ ban-ah min khat ngah beh hi.
Mihing sawmthumte sung pan amah a minthang pen hi a, amaute a ukpa suak hi; ahih hangin amah in mihing thumte ban lo hi.

Jehoiada’ tapa, Kabze-el khuami Benaiah in gal a hang, na lianpite a sempa ahi hi; amah in Moab galhang mi nih vat hi. Amah zong paisukin vuk a kiat ni khatin leihawm sunga om humpinelkai khat that hi.

Amah in a melhoih Izipt mi khat that hi. Izipt mipa in a khut sungah teipi tawi hi; ahih hangin Benaiah ciangkhut khat tawh ama kiangah paisuk a, Iziptpa’ khut sung panin a teipi sut khia-in ama teipi mah tawh amah that hi.
Jehoiada in hihte hihin a thahat mi thumte’ ban-ah min ngah hi.
Mihing sawmthumte lakah amah minthang a, ahih hangin amah in mihing thumte ban lo hi. David in amah a cingte a ukin amah koih hi.
Joab’ sanggampa Asahel in sawmthumte lakah khat ahi hi; Bethlehem mi Dodo’ tapa Elhanan,
Harod khuami Shammah, Harod khuami Elika,
Palti mi Helez, Tekoa khuami Ikkesh’ tapa Ira,
Anathoth khuami Abiezer, Hushah mi Mebunnai,
Ahoah mi Zalmon, Netofah khuami Maharai,
Netofah khuami Baanah’ tapa Heleb, Benjamin mite’ gam sunga om Gibeah khuami Ribai’ tapa Ittai,
Pirathon khua mi Benaiah, Ga-ash gei-a kuam pan Hiddai,
Betharabah khuami Abi-albon, Bahurim khuami Azmaveth,
Sha-albon khuami Eliahba, Jashen’ tapate, Jonathan,
Harar mi Shammah, Harar mi Sharar’ tapa Ahiam,
Maiakah khuami Ahasbai’ tapa Elifelet, Gilo khuami Ahithofel’ tapa Eliam,
Karmel khuami Hezro, Arbi mi Pa-arai,
Zobah khuami Nathan’ tapa Igal, Gad mi Bani,
Ammon mi Zelek, Zeru-iah’ tapa galhiam a tawi, Be-eroth khuami Naharai,
Ithri mi Ira, Ithri mi Gareb,
Hit mi Uriah, a vekpi-in sawmthum-le-sagih ahi hi.
Topa’ hehna Israelte tungah hong so kik a, amah in amaute’ lang khatah David hanthawnin, “Pai in, Israel leh Judah a mi phazah sim in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in Joab leh amah tawh a om galkap ukte kiangah, “Galdo mite a phazah ka theih nadingin Dan panin Be-ersheba ciang dong Israel minamte khempeuh lakah pai un la mi phazah sim un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Joab in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa’ mitte’ muhin Topa na Pasian in mite tu-a om zah zakhatin a tamna behlap hen; ahih hangin bang hangin ka to kumpipa in hih thu deih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa’ kamgente in Joab leh galkap ukte zo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite galdo mi a phazah a sim dingin kumpipa’ omna panin Joab leh galkap ukte paikhia uh hi.
Amaute in Jordan kantanin kuam laizang-a om khuapi Aroer panin kipanin Gad lam manawh uh a, Jazer-ah paisuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute Gilead tung uh a, tua panin Hit mite gam Kadesh tung uh hi; tua ciangin amaute Dan tung uh a, Dan panin kual pai-in Sidon tung uh a,
tua ciangin Tai-ar munmuanhuai leh Hiv mite leh Kanaan mite’ khuapite khempeuhah tung uh hi; tua panin amaute Judahte’ Negeb lam Be-ersheba-ah pai uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gam khempeuh ah amaute a pai khit uh, kha kua leh ni sawmnih a cin’ ciangin Jerusalem ah hong tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in kumpipa kiangah galdo mite a phazah a gawm pia hi: Israel sungah namsau a tawi galhang mi tulzagiat om a, Judah mi tulzanga om hi.

Ahih hangin mi a sim khit ciangin David; lungsim in amahmah gimsak hi. Tua ciangin David in Topa’ tungah, “ka gamtatnasa sungah nakpi takin ka khial hi. Ahih hangin, tu-in,Topa aw, nang tungah kong thuum hi, na nasempa, mawhna hong maisak in; bang hang hiam cih leh hai mahmahna tawh ka gamta khin hi,” a ci hi.
Zingsangin David a thawh ma-in David’ thu-mu-pa ahi kamsang Gad tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a,
”Pai in la, David kiangah hih bangin gen in, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nangma tungah thu thum kong pia hi; nang tungah kong hih theih nadingin tuate khat teel in,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin David kiangah Gad hong pai-in ama tungah genin, ama kiangah, “Na gam sung nangma tungah kum thum kialpi hong tung ding hiam? Ahih kei leh na galte in nang hong delh lai takin amaute mai-ah kha thum sung tai ding na hi hiam? Ahih kei leh na gam sungah ni thum sung natna hong om ding ahi hiam? Tu-in ngaihsun in, kei hong sawlpa kiangah bang dawn’na puakkik ding ka hi hiam khentat in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Gad kiangah, “Nakpi takin ka lungkham hi; ama hehpihna lian ahih manin Topa’ khut sungah tung ni; ahih hangin mihing’ khut sungah hong tung sak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in zingsang-a kipan a kiseh hun dingin Israelte tungah natna tungsak hi; Dan panin Be-ersheba dongin mihing tulsawm sagih si hi.

Vantungmi in Jerusalem khua a susia dingin kithawi-in a khut a zan ciangin tua tatsiatna panin Topa kisik a, mite lakah suksiatna a sem vantungmi kiangah, “Pha zo hi; tu-in na khut khawlsak in,” a ci hi. Topa’ vantungmi in Jebus mi Araunah’ ancilna gei-ah om hi.

Tua ciangin mite a vat vantungmi a muh ciangin David in Topa tungah thu gen a, “En in, ka mawh hi, a khialpa in kei ka hi hi; ahih hangin hih tuute in bang hih uh hiam? Kong thum hi, kei leh ka innkuante bek daan hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua ni-in David kiangah Gad pai-in ama kiangah, “Paito in, Jebus mi Araunah’ ancilna-ah Topa ading biakna tau khat phut in” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thupiak bangin Gad’ cihna zui-in David paito hi.
Araunah a khuadak suk ciangin kumpipa leh a nasemte ama lamah hong pai mu hi; Araunah paikhia-in amai lei ngatin kumpipa zahtakna bawl hi.

Tua ciangin Araunah in, “Bang hangin ka to kumpipa a nasempa kiangah hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. David in, “Mite’ tung panin gimna a ven’ theih nadingin Topa ading biakna tau lam nading na ancilna mun a lei ding,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Araunah in David kiangah, “ka to kumpipa in hoih na sak bangin la in la, pia in; meihal biak nadingin bawngtalte, leh a sing dingin ancilna peekte leh bawngtal kolte hih lai-ah om hi.
Kumpipa aw, Araunah in hihte khempeuh kumpipa tungah hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Araunah in kumpipa kiangah, Topa, na Pasian in nang hong sang ta hen,” a ci thuah lai hi.

Ahih hangin kumpipa in Araunah kiangah, Hilo hi, nangma tung panin hihte a man tawh kituakin kong lei ding hi; Topa ka Pasian’ tungah kei’ sum bei loin meihal biaknate ka pia kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in ngun shekel sawmnga tawh ancilna mun leh bawngtalte lei hi.

Tua ciangin David in Topa ading biakna tau khat tua lai-ah lam a, meihal biaknate leh thunuam-a biaknate pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua gam adingin thuumna Topa in ngai a, Israel tung panin gimna veng hi.
Tu-in Kumpi David teekin kum tam ta hi; amaute in amah puan a silhsak uh hangin a khua lum thei lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a nasemte in ama kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa’ adingin nungakno khat kizong hen la, amah in kumpipa enin amah a kemnu hi ta hen; ka to kumpipa a khua a lum theih nadingin na ang sungah tua nu lum hen,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Israel gamsung khempeuh ah nungak mel hoih khat zong uh a, Shunem mi Abishag mu-in, kumpipa kiangah amah paipih uh hi.
Tua nungak a mel hoih mahmah hi; amah in kumpipa a kemnu suakin ama na sem hi; ahih hangin kumpipa in amah hih zo lo hi.

Tu-in David leh Haggith’ tapa Adonijah amahmah kiliansakin: Keimah in kumpi ka hi ding hi,” a ci hi; amah in ama adingin leengte leh sakol tung tuangte, leh ama mai-ah a tai ding mihing sawmnga vaihawm hi.
Ama pa David in, “Bang hangin tua bangin gamta na hi hiam?” ci-a dotna tawh khatvei beek amah tai ngei lo hi. Amah in a mel hoih mahmah mi khat zong ahi hi; amah in Absalom zom-a a suak ahi hi.
Amah in Zeru-iah’ tapa Joab leh siampi Abiathar tawh vaihawm hi; amaute in Adonijah zui-in amah pan’pih uh hi.
Ahih hangin siampi Zadok, leh Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah, leh kamsang Nathan, leh Shimei, leh Re-i, leh David’ mi a thahatte Adonijah tawh pang lo uh hi.
Adonijah in Enrogel gei-a om Gulpi’ Suangpi kiangah tuute, bawngtalte, leh ganno thaute biakna-in pia-in, amah in kumpipa’ tapate ahi, a sanggamte khempeuh leh Judah kumpi uliante khempeuh sam a,
ahih hangin kamsangpa Nathan ahi a, Benaiah ahi a, mi thahatte ahi a, a sanggampa Solomon ahi zongin sam lo hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in Solomon’ nu Bathsheba kiangah, “Haggith’ tapa Adonijah kumpi suak khinin, i to David in tua thu a theih lohna thu za nai lo na hi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in hong pai-in, nangma nuntakna leh na tapa Solomon’ nuntakna na suahtaksak theih nadingin nang tungah ngaihsutna kong pia ding hi.

Thakhatin Kumpi David kiangah pai-in ama tungah, ‘Ka to kumpipa in na nasemnu tungah hong kiciamin, “Na tapa Solomon in keima nungah maangin, keima kumpi tokhom tungah amah tu ding hi,” ci hilo na hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin Adonijah kumpi hi ahi hiam? ci in.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah thu na gen lai takin kei zong nangma nungah hong pai-in nangma thugen teng kong pan’pih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Bathsheba a inndei sung kumpipa kiangah va pai hi (tu-in kumpipa teek mahmah a, Shunem mi Abishag in kumpipa’ na sem hi).
Bathsheba kunin kumpipa tungah zahtakna bawl a, kumpipa in, “Bang deih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua nu in ama kiangah, “Ka topa aw, na nasemnu tungah Topa na Pasian tawh kiciamin, ‘Na tapa Solomon in keima nungah maangin, keima kumpi tokhom tungah amah tu ding hi,’ na ci hi.
Tu-in en in, ka to kumpipa in na theih loh hangin, Adonijah in kumpi ahi hi.

Amah in biakna-in bawngtalte, ganno thaute, leh tuute, tampi tak piakhin a, kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh siampi Abiathar, leh galkapte a ukpa Joab sam hi; ahih hangin amah in na nasempa Solomon sam lo hi.
Ka to kumpipa aw, tu-in nangma nungah ka to kumpipa’ tokhom tungah kua tu ding ci-a amaute kiangah na gen ding ngakin Israelte khempeuh in nang hong en uh hi.
Tua bang hi kei leh ka to kumpipa a pate tawh a ihmut ciangin kei leh ka tapa Solomon a khial-in hong kiseh hun hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua nu kumpipa tawh kiho-in a om lai takin kamsangpa Nathan hong tum hi.
Amaute in kumpipa kiangah, “Hih lai-ah kamsangpa Nathan om hi,” a ci uh hi. Kumpipa mai-ah amah hong pai ciangin a mai lei lam ngatin kumpipa’ mai-ah kun hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in, “Ka to kumpipa aw, “Keima nungah Adonijah maangin ka kumpi tokhom tungah amah tu ding hi,’ ci na hi hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh tu ni-in amah paisuk khinin, bawngtalte, ganno thaute, leh tuute, tampi tak biakna-in pia a, kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh, galkapte a ukpa Joab, leh siampi Abiathar sam hi; en in, amaute in ama mai-ah ne-in dawn uh a, ‘Kumpi Adonijah a khan’ sau hen!’ ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin na nasempa keimah, leh Siampi Zadok, leh Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah, leh na nasempa Solomon, amah in hong sam lo hi.
Ka to kumpipa in hih thu piangsakin, ama khit ciangin ka to kumpipa’ tokhom tungah kua tu ding cih thu na nasemte kiangah nangmah in hong gen lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi David in dawngin, “Bathsheba ka kiangah hong sam in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ omna ah tua nu hong pai-in kumpipa’ mai-ah ding hi.
Kumpipa kiciamin, “Haksatna khempeuh panin kei hong honkhia Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin,

nangma tungah Topa, Israel Pasian tawh hong kiciamin, ‘Keima nungah na tapa Solomon maang ding a, keima taangin ka kumpi tokhom tungah amah tu ding hi,’ ka cih mah bangin; tu ni-in zong ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Bathsheba in leilak lam mai ngatin kunin kumpipa tungah zahtakna bawl a, “Ka to Kumpi David nungta tawntung ta hen!” a ci hi.
Kumpipa David in, “Siampi Zadok, kamsang Nathan, leh Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah va sam in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa mai-ah amaute hong pai uh hi.
Kumpipa in amaute kiangah, “Na topa’ nasemte paipih un la, ka tapa Solomon keima la-sakol tungah tuang sakin Gihon ah amah paipih suk un;
Israel tungah kumpi-in tua lai munah siampi Zadok leh kamsang Nathan sathau nilhsak un; tua ciangin peengkul tum un la, ‘Kumpi Solomon khan’ sau hen!’ ci un.

Tua ciangin ama nungah note nong pai ding uh a, amah hong pai-in ka kumpi tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in keima taangin kumpi hi ding hi: Israel leh Judah tungah a ukpa dingin amah ka seh khin zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in dawngin, “Hi ta hen! Topa, ka to kumpipa’ Pasian in tua bangin kipsak ta hen.
Topa in ka to kumpipa a ompih mah bangin amah in Solomon tawh om hen la, ka to kumpi David’ tokhom sangin ama tokhom lianzawsak hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin siampi Zadok, kamsang Nathan, Jehoida’ tapa Benaiah, leh Khereth mite leh Peleth mite paisukin Kumpi David’ la-sakol tungah Solomon tuangsak uh a, Gihon ah amah paipih uh hi.
Tua lai-ah siampi Zadok in puanbuk panin sathau biing la-in Solomon nilh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in peengkul tum uh hi; tua ciangin mi khempeuh kiko in, “Kumpi Solomon khan’ sau hen!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh ama tungah pai-in tamngaikop tum uh a, nakpi takin lungdam uh a, amau’ gamlumna in lei thawn kham hi.

Adonijah leh amah tawh a om leenglate khempeuh in a pawi bawl a man khit uh ciangin hih thu za uh hi. Jaob in peengkul aw a zak ciangin amah in, “Khuapi sunga hih gamlumna bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah a kam pau lai takin, en in, siampi Abiathar’ tapa Jonathan hong pai hi; tua ciangin Adonijah in, “Hong tum in, bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in mi gina na hi a, thu hoih nong puak hi,” a ci hi.
Jonathan in Adonijah dawngin, “Hilo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh i to kumpi David in kumpi-in Solomon bawl khin hi;
kumpipa in amah tawh siampi Zadok, kamsang Nathan, leh Jehoida’ tapa Benaiah, leh Khereth mite leh Peleth mite sawl khin hi; amaute in kumpipa’ la-sakol tungah amah tuangsak khin uh hi;
siampi Zadok leh kamsang Nathan in Gihon ah kumpi-in amah sathau nilh khin uh hi; tua lai panin amaute lungdamin ciah khin uh ahih manin khuapi sung gamlum hi. Nangma zak in hih gamlumna ahi hi.
Solomon in kumpi tokhom tungah tu hi.

Tua tham loin kumpipa’ nasemte i to kumpi David tungah lungdamna ko dingin pai uh a, ‘Na Pasian in nangma min sangin Solomon’ min a thangzaw-in bawl hen la, nangma tokhom sangin ama tokhom a lianzaw-in bawl hen,’ ci uh hi. A lupna tung panin kumpipa mahmah zong kun hi.
Kumpipa in zong, ‘Keima mit-a ka muhin keima suan leh khakte khat ka kumpi tokhom tungah a tu dingin tu ni-in a pia Topa, Israel Pasian in thupha ngah ta hen,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Adonijah’ leenglate khempeuh liing uh a, dingin amau’ mun ciatah pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Adonijah in Solomon kihta hi; amah dingin pai a, biakna tau kite len hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon kiangah, “En in, Adonijah in Kumpi Solomon kihta hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, en in, amah in biakna tau kite lenin, ‘Amah in a nasempa namsau tawh a thah loh nading kei tungah Kumpi Solomon hong kiciam masa hen,’ ci hi,” kici hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in, “Amah in kilawm mi ahihna a lahtel theih leh ama samzang khat zong lei lakah kia lo ding hi; ahih hangin ama sungah gitlohna a kimuh leh, amah si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Solomon in sawl a, amaute in biaknatau panin amah paikhiatpih uh hi. Amah hong pai-in Kumpi Solomon in ama kiangah, “Na innah ciah in,” a ci hi.
David’ sih ding hun a nai ciangin amah in a tapa Solomon thuhilhin,
”Leitung khempeuh ngeina bangin a pai ding ka hi ta hi. Thakhauhin pasal na hihna kilangsak in la,

3-4 amah in kei tungah hong gen, ‘Na tapate in a lungsim khempeuh uh leh a nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh keima mai-ah thuman takin pai ding lim takin a ngaihsut uh leh Israel kumpi tokhom tungah khat beek in nang hong tamasak lo ding hi,’ ci-a a thugenna Topa in a kipsak theih nading; na hihna khempeuh ah na dau a pai nadingin Moses’ thukham sungah a kigelh bangin Topa in na Pasian’ thuhilhna zui-in, ama lampite tawn in la, ama thukhamte, a thupiaknate, a biakna ngeina kipte leh a tecipan’nate zui in.

”Tham loin, Zeru-iah’ tapa Joab in kei hong bawlna, gal sunga si mite’ phu a lakna-in, gal kilem hun sungin a thah Israel galkap ukte ahi mi nih, Ner’ tapa Abner leh Jether’ tapa Amasa tungah a bawlna leh, amah in mawhna nei lo mite thatin, tua ama gamtatna hangin ka thuaknate zong na thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nangma pilna bangin gamta in la, ahih hangin lungnuam takin Leinuai-ah ama lutang paisuksak kei in.

Ahih hangin Gilead mi Barzillai’ tapate tungah thuman takin gamta in la, na sabuai-a nete bangin amaute omsak in; bang hang hiam cih leh na sanggampa Absalom’ kiangpanin ka tai lai-in amaute in tua bang thumanna tawh kei hong bawl uh hi.

Mahanaim-ah ka pai lai-in a nasia samsiatna tawh kei hong samsia, Bahurim panin hong pai Benjamin mi Gera’ tapa Shimei zong nang tawh om hi; ahih hangin Jordan ah keimah dawn dingin hong pai ciangin ama tungah Topa tawh kiciamin, ‘Namsau tawh nang kong that kei ding hi,’ ka ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in amah a mawh baang loin ngaihsun kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in mi pilna hi hi; ama tungah na bawl dinga kilawm na thei ding a, amah thatin a lutang hanah na paipih suk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama pate tawh David ihmu-in David khuapi sungah kivui hi.
Israelte tungah David in a uk hun in kum sawmli sung ahi hi; amah in Hebron ah kum sagih sung ukin, Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum leh kum thum sung uk hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a pa David’ tokhom tungah Solomon tu hi; ama kumpi gam kip takin kiphut hi.
Tua ciangin David leh Haggith’ tapa Adonijah Solomon’ nu Bathsheba kiangah hong pai hi. Tua nu in, “Thu-nuam-a hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Thu-nuam hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tuapa in, “Nang tungah gen ding khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Gen in,” a ci hi.

Tuapa in, “Kumpi gam in keima’ aa hi-in, Israelte khempeuh in keima uk ding a lamet mahmahna uh na thei hi; ahi zongin kumpi gam kihei-in ka sanggampa’ aa suak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu in Topa kiang pan ahi hi.
Tu-in nangma tung panin kong nget ding khat om hi; kei hong nial kei in,” a ci hi. Tua nu in ama kiangah, “Gen in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Kumpi Solomon kiangah nong ngetsak ding kong thum hi – amah in nang hong nial lo ding hi – Shunem mi Abishag ka zi dingin kei tungah hong piak ding,” a ci hi.
Bathsheba in, “Hoih mahmah hi; kumpipa kiangah kong gensak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Adonijah taangin ama tungah thu gen dingin Kumpi Solomon kiangah Bathsheba va pai hi. Tua ciangin tua nu dawn dingin kumpipa dingin tua nu mai-ah kun hi; tua ciangin ama tokhom tungah tu-in kumpipa’ nu’ adingin tutna khat lasak hi; tua nu ama tak lamah tu hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Nangma tungah na neuno khat nget ding ka nei hi; kei hong nial kei in,” a ci hi. Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Hong ngen in, ka nu aw; bang hang hiam cih leh kong nial kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Na sanggampa Adonijah’ zi dingin Shunem mi Abishag ama tungah kipia hen,” a ci hi.

Kumpi Solomon in a nu dawngin, “Bang hangin Adonijah adingin Shunem mi Abishag hong ngen na hi hiam? Kumpi gam zong ama adingin ngetsak lai in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ka u pasal hi a, ama lamah siampi Abiathar leh Zeru-iah’ tapa Joab pang hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon Topa tawh kiciamin, “Hih thu in Adonijah’ nuntakna a lei kei taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei ta hen!

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, kei hong phutin ka pa David tokhom tungah hong koih a, ama ciamsa bangin kei adingin innkuan khat hong bawlsak Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin, tu ni-in Adonijah kithat ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Solomon in Jehoida’ tapa Benaiah sawl hi; amah in tuapa satpuk sukin, tua ciangin amah si hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Abiathar kiangah kumpipa in, “Nangma mun leh gam a omna Anathoth ah ciah in; bang hang hiam cih leh na sih ding a kilawm ahi hi. Ahih hangin nangmah in ka pa David’ mai-ah Topa Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang na puakna leh ka pa’ gimna ah na gim khopna hangin tu tungin nang kong that kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in Topa’ siampi hihna panin Abiathar hawlkhia in, Topa in Shiloh a, Eli innkuan tawh kisai a genna thu tua bangin tungsak hi.
Hih thu Joab kiang a tun’ ciangin – bang hang hiam cih leh Joab in Absalom a huh loh hangin Adohijah huh hi – Topa’ puanbuk ah Joab tai-in biakna tau kite len hi.
Kumpi Solomon kiangah, “Topa’ puanbuk ah Joab tai hi, en in, amah biakna tau gei-ah om hi,” ci-in a kigen ciangin Solomon in Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah sawlin, “Pai in, amah satpuk suk in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa puanbuk ah Benaiah pai-in ama kiangah, “Kumpipa in thu hong pia a, ‘Hong paikhia in,’ a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Hilo hi, hih lai-ah kei ka si ding hi;” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Benaiah in kumpipa kiangah thu puak kikin, “Tua bangin Joab in thu gen a, tua bangin amah in kei hong dawng hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in amah dawng kikin, “Ama cihsa bangin hih in, amah satpuk in la, phum in; Joab in thu om lopi-in mi a thatna hangin mawhna pen keima tung leh ka innkuan tung panin tua bangin na siangsak ding hi.

Topa in ama mawhna ama lu tang mah ah tungsak kik ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa David’ theih lohin amah in Israel galkapte a uk Jether’ tapa Amasa, amah sangin thuman zaw-in a hoihzaw ahi mihing nih do-in namsau tawh that hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mi thahna hangin dantahna in Joab’ lu tung leh ama suan leh khakte’ lu tungah a tawntungin hong tungkik ding hi; ahih hangin David tung, leh ama suan leh khakte tung, leh ama innkuan tung, leh ama kumpi tokhom tungah Topa kiang panin a tawntung nopna om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah paito-in Joab satpuk sukin that hi; gamlak ama inn sungah amah kiphum hi.
Kumpipa in Joab taangin galkapte tungah Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah koih a, kumpipa in Abiathar’ taangin siampi Zadok koih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in mi sawlin Shimei samsak a, ama kiangah, “Jerusalem ah inn khat lamin tua lai-ah teng in la, tua lai mun panin mun khat peuhpeuhah paikhia kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nang paikhia-in Kidron lui na kan ni-in na sih ding tel takin thei in; na sih leh nangma khialhna hang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Shimei in kumpipa kiangah, “Na thugen hoih hi; ka to kumpipa’ gen bangin na nasempa gamta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem ah sau veipi sung Shimei om hi.
Ahih hangin kum thum a cin’ ciangin Gath kumpipa Ma-akah’ tapa Akhish kiangah Shimei’ silate nih va tai uh hi. Shimei kiangah, “En in, na silate Gath-ah om hi,” ci-in a kigen ciangin
Shimei ding-in la khat a van vawhin a silate a zong dingin Gath-a Akhish kiangah pai hi; Shimei pai-in Gath panin a silate ciahpih hi.
Jerusalem panin Gath-ah Shimei pai-in a ciahkikna thu Solomon kiangah a kigen ciangin,

kumpipa in mi sawlin Shimei samsak a, ama kiangah, “Topa tawh hong kiciamsakin, thupi takin nang hong thuhilhin, ‘Nang paikhia-in mun khat peuhpeuh ah na pai ni-in na sih ding tel takin thei in,’ hong ci hilo ka hi hiam? Tua ciangin nangmah in, ‘Na thugen hoih hi; ka mang hi,’ na ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin Topa tungah na kiciamna leh nang hong thuhilhin kong thupiakna zui lo na hi hiam? a ci hi.
Kumpipa in Shimei kiangah, “Ka pa David tungah siatna na bawlte khempeuh na lungsimah na thei hi; tua ahih ciangin Topa in nangma siatna nangma lu tung mah ah hong tun’ kik ding hi.
