Ahih hangin Kumpi Solomon thupha kipia-in a tawntungin Topa mai-ah a tokhom kikipsak ding hi,” zong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah thupia hi; amah paikhia-in Shimei satpuk sukin, tua ciangin amah si hi. Tua ahih ciangin Solomon’ khut sungah kumpi gam kikipsak hi.

Solomon in Izipt kumpipa Faro tawh numei-a kizopna bawl hi; amah in Faro’ tanu teenpih a, ama inn, Topa’ inn leh Jerusalem kimkota kulhpi lam a zawh mateng David khuapi sungah tua nu paipihin omsak hi.
Ahi zongin Topa min adingin inn kilam nai lo ahih manin mite in mual tunga biaknate ah biakna pia uh hi.
Solomon in Topa itin, a pa David’ thukhamte zui hi; ahi zongin amah in mual tunga biaknate ah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal hi.

Tua ciangin biakna pia dingin Gibeon ah kumpipa pai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in mual tunga biakna mun lianpen ahi hi; Solomon in tua biaknatau tungah meihal biakna tam veipi tak a piaknasa mun ahi hi.
Gibeon ah zanin a mang sungah Solomon tungah Topa kilang hi; Pasian in, “Nang kong piak ding hong ngen in,” a ci hi.

Solomon in, “Na nasem ka pa David tungah a lian itna kip na lak hi, bang hang hiam cih leh cihtakna, thumanna tawh nangma mai-ah gamta-in, nangma tungah lungsim thutang hi; nangmah in ama adingin hih a lian itna kip koihsakin, tu ni-in ama tokhom tungah a tu ding tapa khat na pia hi.

Tu-in, Topa ka Pasian aw, keimah in naupang no khat hi napi-in ka pa David’ munah kumpi-in na nasempa nong koih hi; bangci pusuah ding cih ahi a, bangci sungtum ding cih ahi zongin bangmah ka thei kei hi.
A lian, a tamna a kisim a kiseh thei lo, nangmah in na teelsa na mite lakah na nasempa om hi.

Tua ahih ciangin keimah in a sia leh a pha ka theih theih nadingin na mite uk nading thu theihtelna lungsim na nasempa hong pia in; bang hang hiam cih leh hih a lian a tam na mite kua in uk zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Solomon in hih thu a ngetna in Topa lungkimsak hi.

Pasian in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in hih thu hong ngenin, nangma adingin khan’ sauna ahi a, hauhna ahi a, na galte’ nuntakna ahi zongin hong ngen loin, a man thu theih nadingin nang adingin thu theihtelna hong ngen na hih manin,

en in, nangma hong ngetna bangin kong pia ding hi. En in, nangma hun ma-in nang tawh a kibang a om loh nading leh nangma khitah zong nang tawh a kibang hong khan’ loh nadingin pilna leh theihna lungsim kong pia ding hi.
Nangma hun sung tawntung kumpi dang nang tawh a kiteh theih loh nadingin nangma hong nget loh hauhna leh pahtawina zong nang kong pia ding hi.
Na pa David in a tot bangin nangmah in ka lampite tawnin ka thukhamte leh ka thupiaknate na zuih leh na khan’ ka sausak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon khanglo a, en in, hih in a mang ahi hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah amah pai a, Topa thuciamna singkuang mai-ah amah ding-in meihal biaknate leh thunuam-a biaknate pia-in, a nasemte khempeuh adingin pawi khat kham hi.
Tua ciangin numei paktat nih kumpipa kiangah hong pai uh a, ama mai-ah ding uh hi.
A numei khat in, “Aw, ka topa aw, hih numei leh kei, inn khat sungah ka omkhawm uh hi; amah a om sungin keimah in ta khat ka nei hi.
Ka ta neih khit ni thum ni ciangin hih numei in zong ta nei hi; ko bek a om ka hi uh hi; kote tawh inn sungah kuamah dang om lo a, kotegel bek inn sungah ka om uh hi.
Amah in delhphah kha ahih manin zanin hih numei’ tapa si hi.
Tua ciangin zan kim lai takin amah tho-in, na nasemnu ka ihmut lai takin ka kiang panin ka tapa la-in ama ang-ah koih a, ama tapa si keima angah hong koih hi.
Zingsangin ka ta nawi pia dingin ka thawh ciangin, en in, na si hi; ahih hangin zingsangin lim takin ka et ciangin, en in, amah in keima sung pan-a suak ta na hi lo hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a numei dang khat in, “Hilo hi, a hing naupang in keima’ aa hi a, a si naupangin nangma’ aa ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a masa nu in, “Hilo hi, a si naupang in nangma’ aa hi a, a hing naupang in keima’ aa ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua bangin kumpipa mai-ah amaute in thugen uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in “Khat in, “A nungta in keima tapa hi a, nangma tapa si hi,’ ci hi; tua ciangin a dang khat in, ‘Hi lo hi; nangma tapa si a, keima tapa in a hing pen hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Namsau khat hong la un,” a ci hi. Tua a hih ciangin kumpipa mai-ah namsau khat hong kipaipih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “A nungta naupang khen nih suah un la, khat tungah a lang pia-in, a dang khat tungah a lang pia un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a tapa a nungta numei in a lungsimah a tapa khasiat ahih manin kumpipa kiangah, “Aw, ka topa aw, a nungta naupang amah pia in; bang bang hita leh amah that kei in, a ci hi. Ahih hangin a khat in, “Hih in kei ka hi a, nang na hi zongin tang thei lo ding hi; hong hawmsak un a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in dawngin, “A masa numei tungah naupang hing pia un; bangbang hita leh that kei un; amah in a nu ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel khempeuh in kumpipa’ piak thukhenna za uh hi; thutang a sem dingin ama tungah Pasian in pilna pia hi, ci-in phawk uh ahih manin amaute in kumpipa lamdangsa-in om uh hi.
Kumpi Solomon in Israel khempeuh tungah kumpi hi a,
hihte in ama nuai-ah za lian a neite ahi hi: Zadok’ tapa Azariah in siampi ahi hi;
Shisha’ tapa Elihoref leh Ahijah in lai-atte ahi uh hi; Ahilud’ tapa Jehoshafat in thuciamtehpa ahi hi;
Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in galkapte a uk ahi hi; Zadok leh Abiathar in siampite ahi uh hi;
Nathan’ tapa Azariah in uliante tungah a uk ahi hi; Nathan’ tapa Zabud in siampi leh kumpipa lam a lakpa ahi hi;
Ahishar in kumpipa inn uk ahi hi; Abda’ tapa Adoniram in aana tawh na a semte a uk ahi hi.
Solomon in Israel khempeuh tungah ulian sawm-le-nih nei-in tuate in kumpipa leh a innkuan adingin annek tuidawn pia hi; mi khat in kum khatin kha khat sung annek tuidawn pia uh hi.
Hihte in amaute’ min ahi hi: Efraim mualtung gam sungah Benhur;
Makaz khua, Shaalbim khua, Bethshenesh khua, leh Elonbethhanan khua sungah Bendeker;
Arubboth khua sungah Benhesed (Soko leh Hefer gam khempeuh ama aa hi);
Nafathdor gamsung khempeuh ah Benabinadab (amah in Solomon’ tanu Tafath zi-in nei hi);
Ta-anak khua, Megiddo khua, leh Jezre-el khua nuai Zarethan khua pang-a om Bethshean gam khempeuh, leh Bethshean khua panin Jokmeam khua pang khat dongin Abelmeholah khua sungah Ahilud’ tapa Baana;
Ramoth-gilead gam sungah Ben-geber (Amah in Gilead sunga om Manasseh’ tapa Jair’ khua neute leh Bashan sungah a om Argob gamsung, kulhpite leh sumngo zawlte a nei khuapi lian sawmguk nei hi);
Mahanaim khua sungah Iddo’ tapa Ahinadab;
Naftali gam sungah Ahima-az (amah in Solomon’ tanu Basemath zi-in la hi);
Asher gam leh Bealoth khua sungah Hushai’ tapa Baana;
Issakhar gam sungah Paruah’ tapa Jehoshafat;
Benjamin gam sungah Ela’ tapa Shimei;
Amor mite kumpi Sihon leh Bashan kumpi Og gam ahi Gilead gam sungah Uri’ tapa Geber ahi hi. Tua ciangin hih sawm-le-nihte banah Judah gam sungah ulian khat om lai hi.
Judah leh Israelte tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin tam uh hi; amaute in ne-in dawnin lungdam uh hi.
Solomon in Eufrates panin Filistiate’ gam leh Izipt gamgi ciang dong kumpi gam khempeuh uk hi; amaute in siah hong puak uh a, a nuntak sung tawntung Solomon’ na sem uh hi.
Solomon’ ading ni khatin annek tuidawn in annel lawh sawmthum, leh an lawh sawmguk,
bawngtal a thau sawm, leh lono-a kivak bawng sawmnih tuu za khat hi a, sakhitalte, leh Siria sakhite, sanangte, leh a thau vasate kisim lo lai hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Eufrates nitumna lam gamsung khempeuh Tifsah panin Gaza ciang dong, Eufrates nitumna lam pang kumpi khempeuh tungah ukna nei hi; ama kiim mun khempeuh ah kilemna om hi.
Solomon’ hun sung khempeuh Judah leh Israel lungmuang takin omin, Dan panin Be-ersheba ciang dong nangawn mi khempeuh a leenggui leh a theikung nuai uhah om uh hi.
Solomon in a leengte adingin buk a nei ciat sakol tul sawmli leh sakol tung tuang mi tulsawm leh tulnih zong nei hi.
Tua uliante in Kumpi Solomon leh Kumpi Solomon’ sabuai-ah hong pai mite khempeuh adingin amau ciat sikh kha sung adingin annek tuidawn pia uh hi; amaute in bangmah kisamsak lo uh hi.
Amau’ nasep ciat tawh kizui-in a kisapna munah sakolte leh sakol zaptelte’ adingin mangbuhham leh buhtu zong paipih uh hi.
Pasian in Solomon tungah teh zawh lohin a thuk mahmah pilna leh theihna, leh tuipi gei-a sehnel bangin lungsim zaina pia a,
Solomon’ pilna in nisuahna lam mi khempeuh leh Izipt pilna khempeuh khuplet hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh mi dang khempeuh sangin amah pil zaw a, Ezrah mi Ethan, leh Mahol, tapa Heman, Kalkol, leh Darda sangin pil zaw hi; ama minthan’na in a kiim-a minam khempeuh lakah kizeel hi.
Amah in paunak tul thum zong genkhia hi; ama late in tul-le-nga a hi hi.
Amah in Lebanon a, om taamtaak-a kipan phungmai a, a po puknahte dongin singkung thu gen hi; amah in khe li nei ganhingte, leh vasate, leh a bokvak ganhingte, leh ngasate thu gen hi.
Mi khempeuh sungpan, leh leitung kumpi khempeuh sung panin Solomon’ pilna a za dingin ama pilna a zasate hong pai uh hi.
Amaute in ama pa’ munah kumpi-in amah sathau a nilhna thu a zak ciangin Tai-ar kumpi Hiram in a nasemte Solomon kiangah sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hiram in David it tawntung hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Hiram kiangah kam khak a,
“Topa in ama khe nuai-ah amaute a koihsak matengin amah a umcih a galte tawh kidona hangin ka pa David in Topa ama Pasian’ min dingin inn a lam theih lohna thu na thei hi.
Ahih hangin tu-in Topa ka Pasian in na khempeuh ah tawlngakna kei tungah hong pia hi; hong langpang ahi a, thusia ahi zongin om lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in ka pa David kiangah, ‘Nangma taangin na kumpi tokhom tungah ka koih ding na tapa in ka min dingin inn lam ding hi,’ a cih mah bangin Topa ka Pasian’ min dingin inn khat lam ka sawm hi.

Tua ahi ciangin Lebanon taamtaak singte kei adingin a kiphuk nading thu pia in; ka nasemte in nangma nasemte seppih ding uh a, nangma seh bangin na nasemte’ thaman ding nang tungah kong pia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Sidon mite bangin sing suih zia a thei kote lakah khat zong a om lohna na thei hi,” a ci hi.
Hiram in Solomon’ kam a zak ciangin nakpi takin a lungdam a, “Hih a lian a tam mite a uk dingin David tungah a pil tapa a pia Topa in tu ni-in thupha ngah ta hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hiram in Solomon kiangah mi sawlin, “Kei kiangah nong thu-khak ka za hi; taamtaak sing leh taaksan sing tawh kisai na deih khempeuh a hih dingin ka kiging hi.

Ka nasemte in Lebanon panin tuipi ah tuate hong puak suk ding uh hi; nangma cihna munah a pai dingin tuipi a tawn dingin keimah in tuate phongin ka bawl dinga, tua lai munah keimah in a singte phelsakin nangmah in na ngah ding hi; nangmah in ka innkuan ading an piakna tawh ka deihnate nong kicingsak ding hi,” ci sak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Hiram in ama deih taamtaak leh taaksan singte Solomon pia a,
Solomon in Hiram tungah a innkuan an dingin mangbuh beem tul sawmnih dim pia a, oliv thau bungpi tul sawmnih dim pia hi. Solomon in Hiram tungah a kum kumin hihte pia hi.
Ama tungah a ciam bangin Topa in Solomon tungah pilna pia hi; Solomon leh Hiram kikalah kilemna om hi; amaute nih in thuciamna khat bawl uh hi.
Kumpi Solomon in Israel khempeuh sung panin aana tawh na a sem mite la hi; a lak mite mihing tul sawmthum pha hi.
Amah in Lebanon ah tua mite kha khatin tulsawm a kikhelin puak hi; amaute Lebanon ah kha khat omin innah kha nih om ding uh hi; Adorniram in hih a kila mite uk hi.
Solomon in van pua mi tul sawmsagih leh mual tung gamah suangseek mi tul sawmgiat zong nei a,
na a sem mite a uk, Solomon’ nuai-ah ulian tulthum leh zathum, nasep ukte a kihel lo ahi hi.
Suang seeksa tawh inn bulpi a phuh theih nadingin kumpipa’ thupiakna tawh amaute in a lian, a manpha suangtumte suangkhuk panin tokhia uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin inn lam nadingin Solomon’ mi innlamte, Hiram’ mi innlamte leh Gebal mite in singphuk leh sing leh suang nasep sem uh hi.
Izipt gam panin Israelmite a paikhiat zawh kum zali leh a kum sawmgiatna, Israel tungah Solomon’ uk a kum lina, a kha nihna ahi Ziv kha-in amah in Topa inn lam ding kipan hi.
Kumpi Solomon in Topa adingin a lam inn in a dung tong sawmguk sau-in, tong sawmnih zai a, tong sawmthum sang hi.
Biakinn mai-a innlim in inn zaina zahin tong sawmnih sau a, inn mai lamah tong sawm sang hi.
Tua ciangin amah in inn adingin a pualam a kihui kongvangneute bawl hi.
Amah in biakna pang tuak leh a nung lam inn kawm kimkotin inn kawm tungah zong inn lam hi; amah in a kimkot a pangah inndei bawl hi.

A dawl nuainung pen tong nga zai-in, a laita tong guk zai a, a thumna tong sagih zai hi; inn kawm sungah innkam nan’na a lut loh nadingin amah in inn pualam pang kimkot adingin a nan’na singbekte bawl hi.

Inn a kilam ciangin a kitawhna panin a kibawlsa suangte tawh kilam hi; tua ahih manin a kilam lai takin hei ahi a, sek ahi a, sik nazat khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin awgingte biakinn huang sungah kiza lo hi.
A dawl nuainung pen lut nadingin inn’ leitaw lam pangah om hi; a dawl laita-ah kahlei zui-in kipai-in a dawl laita panin a thumna ah kipai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in inn lamin zo hi; amah in innkalte leh taamtaak peekte tawh inndap bawl hi.
Amah in a inn buppi tungah a lambehte zomin, dawl khat ciangin tong nga sang ciat a, taamtaak singte-in a inn tawh kizom hi.
Tu-in Topa thu Solomon tungah hong tung a,

”Nangmah in na lam hih inn tawh kisai-in, nangmah in ka thukhamte zui-in ka ngeina kipte mang a, ka thupiaknate khempeuh kemin tuate na zuih leh, na pa David tungah ka gen thu nang tungah kong kipsak ding hi.
Tua ciangin na lam inn sung Israel mite lakah ka teeng ding a, keima mi Israel ka nusia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in inn lamin zo hi.
Amah in taamtaak peekte tawh innsung kawm dap hi; inn sual panin inndap innsunte dongin amah in singtawh a sunglam tuam hi; tua ciangin amah in taaksan peekte tawh inn sual tuam hi.
Amah in sual panin innsun dong inn nung lam tong sawmnih taamtaak peekte tawh lam a, amah in Siangtho Pen Mun, biakinn sungnung dingin a inn sungah lam hi.
Biakinn sungnung mai-a inn sung in tong sawmli sau hi.
Inn sunga om taamtaak singte tungah um gah leh pak palh lim kigelh hi; a vekpi-in taamtaak hi a, suang kimu lo hi.
Amah in Topa thuciamna singkuang koih nadingin inn sung tawng penah biakinn sungnung bawl hi.
Biakinn sungnung in tong sawmnih sau-in, tong sawmnih zai a, tong sawmnih sang hi; amah in kham citak tawh zut hi. Amah in taamtaak sing biakna tau khat zong bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in kham citak tawh inn sung zut a, biakinn sungnung mai kan tanin kham khainiang khungin kham tawh zut hi.
Amah in inn khempeuh a zawh dongin inn buppi kham tawh zut hi. Biakinn sungnunga biakna tau buppi zong amah in kham tawh zut hi.
Amah in biakinn sungnungah oliv sing tawh kherub nih bawl a, tong sawm tuak sang hi.
Kherub kha lang khat in tong nga sau-in kherub kha lang dang khat in tong nga mah sau hi; a kha lang khat mong panin a mong lang khat dong tong sawm ahi hi.
Kherub adang khat zong tong sawm mah sau hi; kherubte gel asauna leh a pian’ lim kibang hi.
Kherub khat sauna in tong sawm hi a, adang kherub khat zong tua zah mah ahi hi.
Amah in inn sung tawngnung penah kherubte koih hi; kherubte’ khate kizal a, khat’ kha in kawm banin, adang kherub’ kha in a kawm lang khat ban hi; amau’ kha lang khatte gel inn laizangah kituah hi.
Amah in kham tawh tua kherubte zut hi.
Amah in a sungnung leh a puanung inndeite, a kimkot inn kawm khempeuh tungah kherubte leh nisuh kungte leh pak palhte bawl hi.
A sungnung leh a puanung inndei sunga inn sualte amah in kham tawh zut hi.
Biakinn sungnung lut nadingin amah in oliv sing kongkhak peekte bawl hi; a bangtung zawl leh kongkhak khuamte in kiu nga piangsak hi.
Amah in kherubte, nisuh kungte, leh pakpalh lim kibawlte tawh oliv sing kongkhak peek nihte tuam hi; amah in tuate kham tawh zut a, kherubte leh nisuh kungte tungah kham theh hi.
Tua mah bangin amah in kiu li nei-in biakinn sung lutna oliv sing kongkhak khuamte,
leh taaksan sing kongkhak peek nihte bawl hi; kongkhak a pek nihte kikhepin, a dang kongkhak a pek nihte zong kikhep hi.
Tuate tungah amah in kherubte leh nisuh kungte leh pakpalhte bawl hi; amah in tua a bawlte tungah a tukimin kham tawh zut hi.
Amah in a kiseek suang gual thum leh taamtaak sing gual khat tawh atual sungnung bawl hi.
A kum lina, Ziv kha-in Topa’ inn a bulpi kipan hi.
A kum sawm-le-khatna, a kha giatna ahi Bul kha-in a na khempeuh leh a kigen khempeuh bangin a inn kizo hi. Amah in tua a lamna-in kum sagih bei hi.
Solomon in ama inn ding zong kum sawm-le-thum sung lamin a inn buppi zo hi.
Amah in Lebanon Tulak ah Inn lam hi; a sauna tong za hi a, a zaina tong sawmnga hi-in, a san’na tong sawmthum hi a, taamtaak khuampi gual thum tungah taamtaak innkam kikhung tungah kilam hi.
Gual khatah sawm-le-nga a om khuampi sawmli-le-nga tunga kilam inndei tung san teng taamtaak sing tawh kituam hi.
A gual thumte tungah kongvangneute om a, a gual thum-a kongvangneute khat leh khat kitang hi.
Kongkhakte leh kongvangneu khempeuhte in a pang kikim kiu li nei a, a gual thumin kongvangneu leh kongvangneu kitang hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Khuampi Innpi bawl hi; a sauna tong sawmnga hi a, a zaina tong sawmthum ahi hi; a mai lamah khuampite a nei innlim om a, tuate mai-ah a tungkhuhna khat om hi.
Tua ciangin amah in thu a khen nading mun Thukhenna Innpi ahi Kumppi tokhom Innpi bawl hi; a sual panin a innsun ciang dong taamtaak sing tawh kituam hi.
Innpi nung tual dang khat sunga amah a ten’ nading ama inn zong tua mah bangin a kilam ahi hi. Solomon in a zi ding a, a lak Faro’ tanu adingin hih innpi tawh a kibang inn khat zong bawl hi.

Hihte khempeuh, a bulpi nangawn a, kipan a khum dong, leh Topa’ inn tual-a kipan tual lianpi dongin, lim takin tehin, a kitan, a nung leh a mai singatna tawh a ki-at a manpha suangte tawh a kibawl ahi hi.
A bulpi in a manpha suang, suang lian, pawl khat tong giat, pawl khat tong sawm a pha suangte ahi hi.
Tuate’ tunga-te in tehin a kitan a manpha suang, leh taamtaak sing ahi hi.
Tual lianpi in a kimkotah a kiseek suang gual thum leh taamtaak sing gual khat nei hi; tua mah bangin Topa’ inn tual sungnung leh innlim in zong nei hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon in mi sawlin Tai-ar panin Hiram samsak hi.

Amah in Naftali minam meigongpa’ tapa hi a, ama pa in Tai-ar khuami summgo seek na a sempa ahi hi; amah in sumngo tawh na khat peuhpeuh hih nadingin pilna, theihna, siamna tawh kidim hi. Kumpi Solomon kiangah amah hong pai-in ama na khempeuh sem hi.

Amah in sumngo khuampi nih sung hi. Khuampi khat a sauna in tong sawm-le-giat hi a, a khuam pum kimkot tong sawm-le-nih pha hi; a sung hawm a, a sahna zung li ahi hi; a khuam nihna in tua mah tawh kibang hi.
Khuampite tungah a bulh dingin amah in a kisung sumngo khuamluzepna nih zong bawl hi; khuamluzepna khat a sauna in tong nga hi a, a dang khuamluzepna a sauna in tong nga mah ahi hi.

Tua ciangin amah in khuampite lu dawn-a khuamluzepna khat adingin khainiang a kihuihek tawh a kibawl ngen banga kikalh simsiam nih bawl hi; ngen khat in khuamluzepna khat ading hi a, ngen khat in a dang khuamluzepna khat ading ahi hi.

Tua mah bangin amah in a mangkawlsing gahte bawl hi; khuampi lu dawn-a om khuamluzepna tuam nadingin ngen tawh kibangin a bawl tung kimkotah gual nih bawl hi; amah in a khuamluzepna dang khat zong tua mah bangin bawl hi,
Tua ciangin innlim-a om khuampi dawnah a om khuamluzepnate tong li pha a, tuate tungah unok pak a kibawlte om hi.

A khuamluzepnate in a khuampi nihte tung leh ngen tawh kibanga kibawl gei-a a om a bem a dawk tungah om hi; a kimkotah gual nihna mangkawlsing gah zanih om hi; a khuamluzepna dang khatah zong tua bangmah ahi hi.
Amah in a khuampite biakinn innlim-ah phut hi; amah in leitaw lamah a khuam phutin a min Jakhin phuak hi; tua ciangin amah in leilu lamah a khuam phutin a min Boaz phuak hi.
A khuampite dawnah unok pak a kibawl om hi. Tua bangin khuampite a bawl man khin hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kisung tuikuangpi bawl hi; tua in a bem hi a, a gei khat pan a gei khat tong sawm pha-in, tong nga thuk a, a kimkot tong sawmthum pha hi.
A geivial nuai tong sawmthum sung, tuikuangpi kimkotin um gahte kibawl hi; tua um gahte gual nihin om a, a tuikuangpi a kisun’in kisung khawm pah hi.

Bawngtal sawm-le-nihte tungah tua tuikuangpi kinga a, thum leilu lam nga a, thum nitumna lam nga-in, thum leitaw lam nga a, thum nisuahna lam nga hi; tuate tungah a tuikuangpi kikoih a, a nung lam uh a sung lamah om hi.
A sahna in khutpeek mai cia ahi hi; a geivial pen unok pak tawh a kibang hai geivial bangin kibawl hi; tua sungah tui tambong tulli ta hi.
Amah in sumngo kibawl din’na sawm zong bawl hi; tua din’nate tong li sau, tong li zai, tong thum sang hi.
Tua din’nate a kibawlna zia in hih bang ahi hi: tuate in a khawkte nei-in, tua a khawkte a kungah kibulh a,
tua ciangin a kungah a kibulh a khawkte tungah humpinelkai, bawngtalte, leh kherubte om hi. Tua a kungte tung, humpinelkaite leh bawngtalte’ tung leh nuai-ah a sawi-in a kikingkalh limliam om hi.

Tua tham loin tua din’nate in sumngo tawh a kibawl leengpeite leh leengpeizawlte nei ciat hi; tua ciangin a kiu lite-ah tuikuangpi nan’nate om hi. Tua nan’nate a kisung hi a, a pang ciatah pakkual om hi.
A vang pen, tong khat a san’tohna a dawn lamah om hi; a vang pen kingakna a kibawl bangin bem a, tong khat leh alang thuk hi. A vangah lim kigelhte om hi; a khawkte in sikli nei a, bem lo hi.
A leengpei lite in a khawkte’ nuai-ah om hi; leengpei zawlte in a din’na tawh sa-khat ahi hi; leengpei a san’na in tong khat leh a lang ahi hi.
A peite pen sakol leengpei bangin kibawl hi; a peizawl, a peikual, a peikalhna, leh a kalhna bulte khempeuh a kisung ahi hi.
A din’nate kiu ciatah a nan’na li om ciat hi; tua a nan’nate in a din’na tawh sa-khat ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a din’na dawnah tong lang a sang vial bem khat om hi; tua ciangin a din’na dawnah a kipsaknate leh a khawkte in a din’na tawh sa-khat ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a kipsaknate leh a khawkte tungah a mun awng zah ciat tawh kizui-in amah in kherubte, humpinelkaite, nisuh kungte gelhin a kimkotah pakkual bawl hi.
Hih bangin amah in din’na sawm bawl hi; a vekpi-in a kibangin kisungin, a liatna leh a pian’ lim kibang hi.
Tua ciangin amah in sumngo tuikuang sawm bawl hi; tuikuang khatah tambong sawmgiat ta-in, tuikuang tong li ciat pha a, a din’na sawmte adingin tuikuang khat ciat om hi.
Tua ciangin amah in din’nate, inn leitaw lamah nga, inn leilu lamah nga, koih hi. Tua ciangin amah in inn khang nisuahna lam kiu-ah tuikuangpi koih hi.
Hiram in beelte, kawbiate, leh kuangte zong bawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin Hiram in Kumpi Solomon’ adingin Topa’ inn a lam nasep khempeuh zo hi;
khuampi nihte, khuampite dawnah a om khuamluzepna kuak nihte, leh khuampite dawnah a om khuamluzepna kuak nihte tuam nading ngen tawh kibanga kibawl nihte;
leh khuampite tungah a om khuamluzepna nihte a tuam dingin ngen tawh kibanga kibawl khat adingin mangkawlsing gah gual nih ahi, ngen tawh kibanga kibawl nih adingin mangkawlsing gah zalite;
din’na sawmte, leh din’nate tungah a om tuikuang sawmte;
leh tuikuangpi khat, leh tuikuangpi nuai-ah a om bawngtal sawm-le-nihte ahi hi.
Tu-in beelte, kawbiate, leh kuangte, Hiram in Kumpi Solomon’ adingin a bawl, Topa’ inn sungah a om nazatte khempeuh in a tee sumngo tawh kibawl ahi hi.
Jordan zanglei, Sukkoth leh Zarethan kikal beel lei-ah kumpipa in tua nate sung hi.
Tam lua ahih manin Solomon in hih nate khempeuh tawi teh lo hi; sumngo gik zah kithei zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ inn sunga om nazat khempeuh Solomon in bawl hi; kham biakna tau, Ompihna Anlum adingin kham sabuai,
biakinn sungnung mai, leitaw lam pangah nga omin leilu lam pangah nga a om kham citak meivak-khuamte; kham tawh kibawl pakte, meivakte, leh taitehte;
paknamtui adingin haite, meitehte, kuangte, pakante, leh kham citak vutluahna; leh Siangtho Pen Mun inn sung tawngnung kongkhakte leh biakinn sung kongkhakte adingin kham bilte ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Solomon in Topa’ inn a hih nasep khempeuh kizo hi. Tua ciangin Solomon in a pa David in a apsa nate, ngun, kham, leh nazatte paipihin Topa’ inn vankoihna ah tuate koih hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon in Zion a kici David’ khuapi panin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a paipih dingin Jerusalem khua sung Kumpi Solomon’ mai-ah Israel upate leh minam lutang khempeuh, Israel upate leh minam lutang khempeuh, Israel beh makaite khawm hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite khempeuh a kha sagihna ahi Ethanim kha sunga pawi hunin Kumpi Solomon kiangah kikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel upate khempeuh hong pai uh a, siampite in thuciamna singkuang la uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang, kikhopna buk, leh puanbuk sunga om a siangtho nazatte khempeuh paipih uh hi; siampite leh Levi mite in tuate paipih to uh hi.

Ama mai-ah a kikhawm Kumpi Solomon leh Israel mihonte khempeuh thuciamna singkuang mai-ah amah tawh omin, tuu leh bawngtalte biakna-in tampi tak pia uh ahih manin tuate kiseh thei lo, a phazah kisim zo lo hi.
Tua ciangin siampite in kherubte’ kha nuai, Siangtho Pen Mun sung, biakinn sungnung lam-a ama munah Topa’ thuciamna singkuang paipih uh hi.
Kherubte in thuciamna singkuang omna mun tungah a kha uh zak ahih manin thuciamna singkuang leh a zawlte tungah kherubte in khuhna piangsak uh hi.
A zawlte sau mahmah ahih manin biakinn sungnung mai Siangtho Mun panin a zawl mongte kimu hi; ahih hangin a pua lam panin kimu thei lo hi; tu ni dongin tua san takah tuate om hi.
Thuciamna singkuang sungah, Izipt gam panin a paikhiat lai-un Topa in Israel mite tawh thuciamna a bawlna Horeb ah Moses in suangpeek nih a koih sim loh bangmah om lo hi.
Siangtho Mun panin siampite a paikhiat ciangin meii in Topa’ inn tuam a,
meii hangin siampite in na sem dingin om thei lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ minthan’na in Topa’ inn tuam hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in, “Topa in vantungah ni koih khin a, ahih hangin khuamial sahpi sungah amah a ten’ ding gen khin hi.
Keimah in nangma adingin a kipahtawi inn khat, na ten’ tawntung nading mun khat ka lam khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel a kikhawmte a din’ lai takin kumpipa in en kawikawi-in Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh thupha pia hi.

15-16 Tua ciangin amah in, “Izipt panin ka mi Israelte ka paikhiatpih huna kipanin keima Min a om theih nadingin inn khat lam nading Israel minam khempeuh sungah khuapi khat zong ka teel kei hi; ahih hangin ka mi Israelte tungah a uk dingin David ka teel hi,’ ci-in ka pa David tungah a kam tawh a ciamsa thu a tungsak Israel Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah ta hen.
Tu-in, Israel Pasian, Topa’ min adingin inn khat lam ding ka pa David’ lungsim sungah om hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in ka pa David kiangah, ‘Keima min dingin inn khat lam ding na lungsim sungah a omna thu-ah, tua banga na lungsimah a om hoih mahmah hi;
ahi zongin nangmah in a inn na lam kei ding a, nangma sungpan hong suak ding na tapa in ka min dingin a lam ding hi,’ a ci hi.

Tu-in ama bawlsa thuciamna Topa in tungsak khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka pa David’ munah keimah khangin, Topa’ ciamsa bangin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah ka tu a, Israel Pasian, Topa’ min dingin a inn ka lam khin hi.
Amah in Izipt leitang panin amaute a paikhiatpih lai-in amah in i pu i pate tawh a bawl Topa’ thuciamna a omna thuciamna singkuang adingin tua lai-ah mun khat ka bawlsak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh omna Topa’ biakna tau mai-ah Solomon ding a, vantung lamah a khutte zak hi;

amah in, Israel Pasian, Topa aw, tunga om vantungah ahi a, nuai-a om leitungah ahi zongin, nangma mai-ah a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh a pai, na nasemte tungah thuciamna lenin itna kip a lak, nang tawh a kibang Pasian om lo hi;
na nasem ka pa David tungah na gensa thu na kipsak hi; hi hi, nangmah in na kam tawh na gen a, tu ni-in na tangtungsak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel Pasian, Topa aw, ama tungah, ‘Keima mai-ah nang na gamtat mah bangin na tapate in keima mai-ah gamtat ding a kidop nak uh leh, Israel kumpi tokhom tungah a tu dingin keima mai-ah mi khat zong na tasam kei ding hi,’ ci-in na nasem ka pa David tungah na ciamsa thu len in.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel Pasian aw, na nasem ka pa David tungah na gensa thu kipsak in.
“Ahih hangin leitungah Pasian teeng taktak ding ahi hiam? En in, vantung leh vantung a sangpen in nang hong huam zo lo hi; keima lamsa hih inn in bangzahin nang hong huam zo lo zaw kan ding ahi hiam!
Ahi zongin na nasempa’ thungetna leh a hong thuumna hong don in la, Topa ka Pasian aw, tu ni-in nangma mai-ah na nasempa in a hong ngetna ahi a kikona leh a thungetna hong ngai in;
‘Tua lai-ah ka min om ding hi,’ na cihna mun hih inn lamah sun leh zanin na mit hak in la, na nasempa in hih mun lamah a thungetna za in.
Tua ciangin amaute in hih mun lamah hong nget uh ciangin na sempa leh na mi Israelte’ hong thuumna ngai in; hi hi, na ten’na mun vantungah na za hi; na zak ciangin na maisak hi.
“Mi khat a vengpa tungah khialin, amah in a kiciamsak a, amah hong pai-in hih inn sung nangma biakna tau mai-ah a kiciam leh,

nangmah in vantung pan za-in, gamta-in na nasemte thukhen in la, a mawhpa mawhna thuaksakin ama lu tung mah ah ama gamtatna tungsak in la, a dikpa a dikna langsakin ama dikna tawh kizui-in thaman pia in.

“Nangma tungah hong khialna hangin galte mai-ah na mi Israelte a guallelh ciangin, amaute nangma lamah hong kihei kikin nangma min hong phawk a, hih inn sungah thungenin nang tungah hong thuum uh leh,
vantung panin za-in na mi Israelte’ khialna maisak in la, a pu a pate uh tungah na piak leitangah amaute paipih kik in.
“Nangma tungah hong khialhna hangin vantung kikhakcipin guah a zuk loh ciangin, amaute in hih mun lamah thungenin na min hong phawk a, amaute na gimsak ciangin amau khialhna panin a kihei uh leh,
vantung pan za-in na mi Israel, na nasemte’ khialhna maisak in la, amaute’ zuih ding lampi hoih hilh in; tua ciangin na mite tungah gamh-in na piaksa leitang tungah guah zusak in.

“Gam sungah kialpi tungin, pulnatna ahi a, ankung natna ahi a, ankung zawngkhalna ahi a, kauphe ahi a, lung ahi zongin om a, amau’ khuapi khat peuhpeuh ah a galte un umcihin, bangbang gimna, bangbang natna hita leh,
mi khatpeuh ahi a, na mi Israelte khempeuh un ahi zongin amau’ lungsim natna thei-in hih inn lamah a khutte hong zanin bangbang thungetna hita leh bangbang thuumna hita leh hong bawl leh,

na ten’na vantung panin za-in maisak in; tua ciangin amau’ gamtatna khempeuh tawh kizui-in a lungsim uh na theih bangin amaute tungah pia ciat in (bang hang hiam cih leh nang, nang bek in mihing khempeuh lungsim na thei hi);
ka pu ka pate uh tungah na piak leitang tungah a nuntak hun sung khempeuh uh amaute in nang hong zahtak ding uh hi.
“Tua mah bangin na mi Israel a hilo gamdang mi khat nangma min hangin a gamlapi gam panin hong pai-in
“(bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a lian nangma minthan’na leh nangma mite’ adingin na sepsak na liante thu za ding uh hi), hih inn lamah amah hong pai-in thu hong nget ciangin,

na ten’na vantung panin za in la, tua gamdang mipa in nang tungah hong ngetna khempeuh tawh kizui-in hih in; nangma mi Israelte mah bangin leitung mi khempeuh in na min thei-in nang hong zahtak nading, leh hih ka lamsa inn in nangma min tawh a kilo a hihna a theih nading uh ahi hi.
“A galte uh do dingin na mite kuan khia-in, bangbang lamah amaute sawl hita lecin nangmah in na teelsa khuapi lam Topa tung leh nangma min dingin ka lamsa inn lamah thu hong nget uh ciangin,
vantung panin amau’ hong thungetna leh hong thuumna za-in amau’ vai huh in.

“Amaute nang tungah hong khialin – bang hang hiam cih leh mi a khial lo kuamah om lo hi–amaute tungah nang heh a, galte tungah amaute pia-in, amaute kimanin a galte’ gam a gamla ahi a, a nai-ah ahi zongin kipuakhia a,

ahi zongin amaute in a kipuak khiatna leitungah amaute in a lungsim uhah tua thu ngaihsunin kisikkik a, ‘Kote khialin lam pialin ka gitloh tat uh hi,’ ci-in amaute a mante’ leitang panin nang tungah hong thuum uh a,

amaute manin a puakhia a galte uh leitangah a ngaihsutna khempeuh leh a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amaute kisikkik in, nangmah in na teelsa khuapi, amau’ pute tungah na piaksa amau’ leitang, leh nangma min dingin ka lam inn lam nga-in nangma tungah thu hong nget uh leh
vantung na ten’na mun panin amau hong thungetna leh hong thuumna za-in, amau’ vai huh in la,

nang tungah hong khial na mite leh nang tunga hong gamtatna uh amau’ thupalsatnate khempeuh maisakin, amaute in amaute tungah hehpihna a neih theih nadingun amaute manin a puakhia mite’ muhna ah amaute hehpih in
(bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Izip panin na paikhiatpih, sik meiphual sung panin na paikhiatpih, nangma mi leh nangma luah ahi uh hi).
Na nasempa hong thuumna leh na mi Israelte’ hong thuumna ah maipha tawh hong en tawntung in la, nang hong sap peuhmah uh ciangin amaute na bil ngat in.
Izipt panin ka pu ka pate uh na paikhiatpih lai-in na nasempa Moses tung tawnin na gen bangin nangma luah ahi dingin leitung mi khempeuh lak panin amaute na tengkhia hi, Topa Pasian aw,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Solomon in hih thungetna leh thuumnate khempeuh Topa tungah a bawl khit ciangin, vantung lamah a khutte zan sa-in a khukdin’na mun Topa’ biakna tau mai panin amah ding to hi;
tua ciangin amah dingin awging pha tawh Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh thupha pia-in,
“Ama hong ciamsa khempeuh tawh kizui-in ama mi Israelte tawlngakna a pia Topa in thupha ngah ta hen; a nasempa Moses tung tawnin a gensa ama thuciamna hoihte khempeuh kam khat zong maimawk lo hi.
I pu i pate tawh a om mah bangin Topa i Pasian eite tawh hong om hen; eite hong nusia-in, hong taisan kei hen;
amah in i pu i pate a thupiaksa ahi ama lampi khempeuh zui ding, leh ama thupiaknate, a thukhamte, leh a ngeina kipte zui dingin ama lamah i lungsim hong awnsak hen.
Topa mai-ah ka thuumna ka kammalte sun leh zanin Topa i Pasian nai-ah om hen la, ni simin a kisam bangin a nasempa’ vai leh ama mi Israel’ vai hong huh hen;
leitung mi khempeuh in Topa in Pasian hi, kuamah dang om lo hi, ci-in thei ding uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa i Pasian tungah na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh thuman un la, tu ni-a bangin ama thukhamte zui-in a thupiaknate mang un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa leh amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh in Topa mai-ah biakna pia uh hi.
Solomon in thunuam-a biakna-in Topa tungah bawngtal tul sawmnih leh tul nih leh tuu tul za khat leh tul sawmnih pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa leh Israel in mi khempeuh in Topa’ inn ap uh hi.

Tua ni mahin kumpipa in Topa’ inn mai-a om inntual laizang ap hi; bang hang hiam cih leh meihal biakna leh an tawh biakna leh thunuam-a biakna a thaute a ta zo dingin Topa mai-a sumngo biakna tauneu lua ahih manin tua lai munah meihal biakna leh an tawh biakna leh thunuam-a biakna a thaute pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua hunin Solomon leh amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh in Topa i Pasian mai-ah ni sagih sung, Hamath lutna panin Izipt Lui dong kikhopna lianpi khat bawlin pawi khat kham uh hi.

A ni giat ni-in amah in mite ciahsak hi; amaute in kumpipa thupha pia uh a, Topa in a nasempa David leh ama mi Israel tungah hoihna a lahnate khempeuh hangin lungdamna leh lungsim kipahna tawh a inn ciat uhah ciah uh hi.
Solomon in Topa’ inn leh kumpipa’ inn leh a lam nop khempeuh a lam a man khit ciangin,
Gibeon a, ama tungah a kilahsa bangin Solomon tungah Topa a nih veina kilang hi.
Topa in ama kiangah, “Keima mai-ah na hihsa na thungetna leh na thuumna ka za khin hi; na lamsa hih inn ka ap khin a, a tawntungin keima min kemin ka kipsak ding hi; a tawntungin tua ka hu ding hi.
Nang ahih leh, na pa David a gamtat bangin lungsim thupina leh thumanna tawh ka mai-ah gamta-in, nang kong thupiak khempeuh bangin sem a, ka thukhamte leh ka ngeina kipte na zuih leh,
na pa David tungah, ‘Israel kumpi tokhom tungah mi khat zong na tasam kei ding hi,’ ci-in ka ciamsa bangin Israelte tungah na kumpi tokhom ka kipsak paisuak ding hi.

Ahih hangin nang na hi a, na tate ahi zongin, keimah zuihna panin pialin, note mai-ah ka koih ka thupiaknate leh ka thukhamnate na zuih kei uh a, pasian dangte’ na a sem ding leh a bia dingin na pai uh leh,

amaute ka piaksa leitang panin Israel ka lakhia ding hi; tua ciangin ka min dingin ka apsa inn pen ka muhna panin ka lawnkhia ding hi; tua ciangin Israel in mi khempeuh lakah paunak leh thugentehna suak ding hi.

Tua ciangin hih inn in nin bulomtang suak ding hi; a nawk kha mi khempeuh in lamdang sa-in ee! ci ding uh hi; amaute in, ‘Bang hangin Topa in hih leitang leh hih inn hih bangin hih hiam? ci ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Izipt gam panin a pu a pate uh a paikhiatpih Topa a Pasian uh amaute in nusia-in, pasian dangte len uh a, tuate bia-in a na a sepna uh hang ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin Topa in hih siatna khempeuh amaute tungah tungsak hi,’ ci ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Solomon in inn nihte, Topa’ inn leh kumpipa’ in a lam kum sawmnih a beina,
Tai-ar kumpi Hiram in Solomon’ deih zahzah taamtaak sing leh taaksan sing leh kham a piak manin, Kumpi Solomon in Galile gam sunga om khuapi sawmnih Hiram tungah pia hi.
Ahih hangin Solomon in amah a piaksa khuapite en dingin Tai-ar panin Hiram hong pai ciangin, tua khuapite tawh amah lungkim zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in “Ka sanggampa aw, kei nong piak hih khuapite a bangci khuapi ahi hiam? a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin tuate Kabul gam kici hi.
Hiram in kumpipa kiangah a piak kham talen zakhat leh sawmnih pha hi.
Hih in Topa’ inn leh ama inn, Millo leh Jerusalem kulhpi, Hazor, Meggiddon leh Gezer a lam dingin Kumpi Solomon in aana tawh nasemte a lakna thu ahi hi.
(Iziptte kumpi Faro paito a, Gezer la-in mei tawh hal a, a khuapi sunga teeng Kanaan mite thatin Solomon’ zi, a tanu’ tungah moken’ in a khuapi pia hi;
tua ahih ciangin Solomon in Gezer) leh Bethhoron nuainung
leh Baalath leh Judah gamsung, gamlakah Tamar,

leh Solomon in a neih vankoihna khuapi khempeuh, leh a leengte ading khuapite, leh a sakol tuangte’ ading khuapite, leh Jerusalem sung, Lebanon sung, leh ama ukna gamsung khempeuh ah Solomon in a lam nop khempeuh lamkik hi.
Israel mite a hi lo Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite, leh Jebus mite sung panin a om lai mi khempeuh;

Israel mite in a suksiat khit siang zawh loh, tua gamah amau’ nunga a om lai a suan leh khakte uh - Solomon in hihte aana tawh na a sem sila-in bawl a, tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin tua mah bangin om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Solomon in Israel mite sila-in bawl lo hi; amaute in galkapte, ama nuai-ah a uliante, ama nuai-ah a ukte, a galkapmangte, a leeng ukte leh a sakol tuangte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in Solomon’ nasep a uk ulianpite ahi hi: na a sem mite a uk mi zanga leh sawmnga ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Faro tanu David khuapi panin ama adingin Solomon in a lamsak ama innah paito hi; tua ciangin amah in Millo lam hi.
Solomon in Topa adingin a lam biakna tau tungah meihal biakna leh thunuam-a biakna kum khatin thum vei pia-in Topa mai-ah paknamtui hal hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a inn zo hi.
Kumpi Solomon in Edom gamsung San Tuipi gei dunga om Eloth nai-a Ezion-geber-ah teembaw hon khat bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Hiram in tua teembaw honte tawh tuipi tung nasep a thei tuipi mite ahi a nasemte, Solomon’ nasemte tawh sawlkhia hi;
tua ciangin amaute Ofir-ah pai-in tua lai panin kham talen zali leh sawmnih hong paipih uh hi; amaute in Kumpi Solomon kiangah tuate tun’ uh hi.
Tu-in Sheba kumpinu in Topa’ min tawh kisai-in Solomon’ minthan’na a zak ciangin thudotna haksate tawh amah a ze-et dingin hong pai hi.

Amah nungzui honpi, a namtui nate a pua kalaohte, leh kham tampi, leh suang manpha tampi tawh Jerusalem ah hong pai hi; Solomon kiangah a tun’ ciangin amah in a lungsim a, om khempeuh Solomon tungah gen hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in ama dotna khempeuh dawng hi; kumpipa in ama tungah a gentel theih loh, haksa lua a sak bangmah om lo hi.
Sheba kumpinu in Solomon’ pilna, ama lamsa a inn,
a sabuai-ah a an, a uliante’ omzia, leh a nasemte’ etna, a puante uh, a an piate, leh Topa’ innah a piak a meihal biaknate khempeuh a muh khit ciangin a lungsim bei hi.
Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka gamsung panin nangma thu leh na pilna ka zak a kigen thute man hi;
ahih hangin kei hong pai-in keima mit in a muh mateng a kigente ka um kei hi; tu-in, en in, a lang zong kei tungah hong kigen lo hi; na pilna leh na daupaina in ka zak thute vuknelh hi.
Na zite mi hampha! Nangma mai-ah ding tawntungin na pilna a za hih na nasemte mi hampha!

Nang sungah lungdamin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah nang hong koih Topa na Pasian in thupha ngah ta hen! Topa in Israel it tawntung ahih manin nangmah in thutang leh thuman na sepkhiat theih nadingin amah in kumpi-in nang hong bawl hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa tungah kham talen za leh sawmnih, leh a namtui nate tampi tak, leh suang manphate pia hi; Sheba kumpinu in Kumpi Solomon tungah a piak hih banga a tam a namtui nate hong pai ngei nawn lo hi.
Tua tham loin Ofir panin kham hong pua Hiram’ teembaw honte in Ofir panin cingsing leh suang manpha tampi tak hong pua hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in cingsingte Topa’ inn leh kumpipa’ inn khuamte, la sate adingin laiza la sakna leh harp la sakna-in bawl hi; tu ni dongin tua bang cingsing hoihte hong tungkik ngei lo, kimu ngei nawn lo hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Solomon in citna tawh ama tungah a piak banah ama deih a nget khempeuh Sheba kumpinu tungah Kumpi Solomon in pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kihei-in a nasemte tawh ama gamah ciahkik hi.
14-15 Tu-in sumbawlte leh sumbukte, leh Arabia kumpi khempeuh leh gamsung a ukte tung panin a ngahte banah kum khatin Solomon tungah a tung kham a gihna in talen zaguk-le-guk ahi hi.
Kumpi Solomon in a kiseek kham tawh kibawl lum lianpi za nih bawl hi; lum khatah kham shekel zaguk bei hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kiseek kham tawh kibawl lum zathum bawl hi; lum khat ciangin kham minas thum bei hi; tua ciangin kumpipa in Lebanon Tulak Inn sungah tuate koih hi.
Kumpipa in saiha kumpi tokhom a lian khat zong bawl a, kham hoihpente tawh tua tokhom zut hi.
Kumpi tokhom in kahlei cial guk nei-in, kumpi tokhom nungah bawngno lutang khat om a, a tutna pang tuakah ban ngakna omin ban ngaknate pangah humpinelkai nih ding a,
kahlei cial gukte’ mong ciatah khat ciat a om humpinelkai sawm-le-nih ding hi. Kumpi gamsung khat peuhpeuhah tua tawh a kibang kibawl ngei lo hi.
Kumpi Solomon’ dawnna haite khempeuh kham hi a, Lebanon Tulak Inn sung haite khempeuh kham citak ahi hi; khat zong ngun hilo hi; Solomon’ hun lai-in ngun bangmahin kingaihsun lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa in Hiram’ tembaw honte tawh Tarshish teembaw honkhat tuipi-ah a pai nei hi. Tarshish teembaw honte in kum thumin khat vei hong pai-in kham, ngun, saiha, zawngmaw, leh utongte hong puak zel hi.
Tua bangin Kumpi Solomon in hauhna leh pilna tawh leitung kumpi khempeuh khumkhelh hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama lungsim sunga a koih ama pilna a ngai dingin leitung buppi in Solomon’ omna zong uh hi.
Amaute khempeuh in letsong, ngun leh kham tawh kibawl nate, puante, mor paknamtuite, a kum kumin tampi tak hong puak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon in leengte leh sakol tuangte khawm hi; amah in leeng tul-le-za-li leh tuan’na sakol tulsawm leh tulnih nei a, amah in tuate, leeng khuapite leh Jerusalem ah zattawm dingin koih hi.
Kumpipa in Jerusalem ah suang bangin ngun ol sak a, amah in Shefelah theiba sing bangin taamtaak sing tamsak hi.
Solomon’ sakol lakte Izipt leh Kue pan hi a, kumpipa’ sumbawlte in Kue panin a man pia-in tuate ngah uh hi.
Izipt panin leeng khat ciangin ngun shekel zaguk, sakol khat ciangin za leh sawmnga-in kingah hi; tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ sumbawlte in Hit kumpite leh Siria kumpite khempeuh tungah zuak khia uh hi.
Tu-in Kumpi Solomon in gamdang numei tampi ngai hi; Faro’ tanu, leh Moab mi, Ammon mi, Edom mi, Sidon mi, leh Hit numeite,

Topa in Israel mite tungah, “Amaute tawh na kiteng kei ding uh a, amaute zong note tawh kiteng lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau’ pasian lamah na lungsim uh hong heikhia taktak ding hi,” a cih minamte’ lak pan ahi hi; Solomon in hihte ngai-in pom hi.
Amah in kumpi tanute, zi zasagih, leh zineu zathum nei hi; tua ciangin a zite in ama lungsim heikhia uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Solomon a teek ciangin a zite in pasian dangte lamah ama lungsim heikhia uh hi; ama pa David’ lungsim bangin ama lungsim Topa tungah thuman bup taktak lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Sidon mite’ nusian Ashtoreth, leh Ammon mite’ aa ahi a kihhuai Milkom, Solomon in bia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa muhna ah Solomon a sia gamta a, a pa David bangin Topa zui bup lo hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Jerusalem nisuahna lam mual tungah Moab mite’ aa ahi, a kihhuai Khemosh leh Ammon mite’ aa ahi a kihhuai Molek adingin mual tunga biakna khat lam hi.
Tua mah bangin amah in paknamtui halin a pasiante uh tungah biakna a pia a gamdang zite khempeuh adingin hihsak hi.

Ama tungah nih vei kilak khinin, amah in pasian dangte’ nung a zuih loh nading ama tungah thu a pia khin Topa, Israel Pasian panin a lungsim kiheikhia ahih manin Solomon tungah Topa heh hi; ahih hangin amah in Topa’ thupiaksa zui tuan lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Solomon kiangah, “Hih in nangma ngaihsutna hi-in, nang kong thupiaksa ka thuciamna leh ka thukhamte zui lo na hih ciangin, keimah in nangma tung panin na kumpigam balkeekin na nasempa tungah ka pia taktak ding hi.
Ahi zongin na pa David’ hangin nangma hun sungin ka hih kei ding a, na tapa’ khut sung panin ka balkhia ding hi.
Ahi zongin kumpigam khempeuh ka balkhia kei ding hi; ka nasempa David hang leh ka teelsa Jerusalem hangin na tapa tungah minam khat ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Solomon’ lang khatah langpang khat, Edom mi Hadad khangsak hi; amah in Edom kumpi innkuan sung mi khat ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Edom ah David a om lai, a site a vui dingin galkap a ukpa Joab a paitoh lai-in Edom sunga pasal khempeuh amah in that hi.
(Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Edom sunga pasal khempeuh a suksiat khit matengin Joab leh Israel khempeuh tua lai-ah kha guk sung om uh hi);
Ahih hangin Hadad naupangno ahih lai-in, a pa’ nasem Edom mite pawlkhat tawh Izipt ah Hadad tai hi.
Amaute Midian panin ding khia-in Paran tung uh a, Paran panin mi la-in tonpih a, ama tungah inn khat pia-in, annek ding pia-in, leitang a pia Izipt kumpipa Faro kiang Izipt gam tung uh hi.
Hadad in Faro’ mai-ah maipha lianpi mu a, amah in ama zi’ sanggamnu kumpinu Tahpenes’ sanggamnu tawh kitengsak hi.
Tua ciangin Tahpenes’ sanggamnu in amah tawh a tapa Genubath nei a, Tahpenes in Faro innah a naupang khoi hi; Faro inn sungah Faro’ tapate tawh Genubath om hi.
Ahih hangin Hadad in David a pate tawh ihmu-in galkap a ukpa Joab a sihna thu Izipt panin a zak ciangin Hadad in Faro kiangah, “Keima gamah ka ciah theih nadingin hong paikhiasak in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Faro in ama kiangah, “Nangma gamah na ciah nading na hanciam nadingin kei tawh na omna-ah bang kitangsapna nei na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Hong paisak peuh in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama topa ahi Zobah kumpi Hadadezer kiang panin a tai Eliada tapa Rezon zong Solomon a langpang dingin khangsak hi.
Amah in ama kimah mi khawmin mite’ na a sut pawl a makai suak hi; amaute Damaskas ah pai-in tua lai munah teng uh a, Damaskas ah kumpi-in amah bawl uh hi.
Hadad mah bangin Solomon’ hun sung khempeuh amah Israelte langpangin omin siatna bawl hi; amah in Israel mudah a, Siria gamah uk hi.
Solomon’ nasem, Zeredah khua sunga om Efraim mi, Nebat’ tapa, a nu’ min Zeruah hi-in meigong ahi, Jeroboam in zong kumpipa lehdo hi.
Amah in kumpipa a lehdona thu in hih ahi hi. Solomon in Millo lamin a pa David khuapi a vangte hu hi.
Jeroboam in nasep siam mahmah khat hi a, Solomon in hih a khangno mipa a kizen mi hi ci-in a theih ciangin Josef minam aana tawh na a semte khempeuh tungah a uk-in bawl hi.
Tua hun sungin Jerusalem panin Jeroboam a paikhiat ciangin Shiloni mi kamsang Ahijah in lampi ah amah mu hi. Tu-in Ahijah in puanthak khat na silh tawm hi; amau nihte gel bek gamlakah om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ahijah in ama tungah a silh a puanthak lenin seh sawm-le-nih suahin balkeek hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Jeroboam kiangah, “Nang adingin bek sawm la in; bang hang hiam cih leh, Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘En in, Solomon khut panin kumpigam a balkhia ding ka hi a, nangma tungah minam sawm kong pia ding hi
(ahih hangin ka nasem David hang leh Israel minam khempeuh sungpanin ka teelsa khuapi Jerusalem hangin amah in minam khat nei ding hi),

bang hang hiam cih leh amah in kei hong nusia a, Sidon mite’ nusian Ashtoreth, Moab pasian Khemosh, leh Ammon mite pasian Milkom bia-in, a pa David bangin keima muhna ah a manin gamtatna leh ka thukhamte leh ka ngeina kipte zuihna tawh ka lampite tawn lo hi.
Ahi zongin ama khut sung panin kumpigam bup ka la khia kei ding hi; ka thupiaknate leh ka thukhamnate a zui, ka teel ka nasem David hangin ama nuntak sung tawntung ukpa-in amah ka bawl ding hi;
ahih hangin ama tapa khut sung panin kumpi gam la-in nangma tungah minam sawm kong pia ding hi.
Ahi zongin ka min koih nadingin ka teelsa khuapi Jerusalem ah ka nasempa David in keima mai-ah suan leh khak a neih tawntung theih nadingin a tapa tungah minam khat ka pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in nang hong la-in na deih khempeuh tungah na uk ding a, nang in Israel tungah kumpi na hi ding hi.

Ka nasempa David bangin ka thukhamte leh ka thupiaknate zuihna tawh nang kong thupiak khempeuh ngai-in, ka lampite tawnin ka mit-ah a manin na gamtat leh, nang tawh hong omkhawmin, David adingin ka hih bangin nang adingin innkuan kician khat kong phuhsak ding a, nangma tungah Israel kong pia ding hi.
Hih thu hangin David suan leh khakte ka gimsak ding a, ahih hangin a tawntung ding hi lo hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in Jeroboam thah dingin zong hi; ahih hangin Jeroboam ding-in Izipt gamsung, Izipt kumpipa Shishak kiangah tai a, Solomon a sih mateng Izipt ah om hi.
Tu-in Solomon’ sep a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh leh a pilna, Solomon’ nasepna laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Jerusalem panin Israelte khempeuh tungah Solomon in a uk hun in kum sawmli sung ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon a pate tawh ihmu a, a pa David khuapi sungah kivui hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Rehoboam in uk hi.
Shekhem ah Rehoboam pai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah kumpi a suaksak dingin Israel khempeuh Shekhem ah hong pai uh hi.
Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam in tua thu a zak ciangin (bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpi Solomon kiang panin a taina Izipt ah amah om lai hi), Izipt panin Jeroboam hong ciahkik hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in mi sawlin amah sam uh hi; tua ciangin Jeroboam leh Israel mi a kikhawm khempeuhte hong pai-in Rehoboam kiangah,
“Na pa in ka hakkol uh a gikin bawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na pa’ nasep haksate leh kote tungah a gik hakkol zangsak in, tua ciangin kote in nangma na kong sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Ni thum sung va kihem un la, tua ciangin kei kiangah hong pai kik un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite paikhia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in a pa Solomon a nuntak lai-in ama mai-ah a ding ngei khangham mite thu dongin, “Hih mite ka dawn’na ding ngaihsutna hong bangci piak ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in tu ni-in hih mite’ nasem ahi dingin amau’ na semin, amaute na dawn’ ciangin kam hoih pau lecin, amaute in a tawntungin nangma nasemte hi ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin khanghamte in ama tungah ngaihsutna a piakte amah in nusia-in, amah tawh khang khawmin ama mai-ah a ding khangnote thu dong hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “‘Na pa in kote tungah hong koih hakkol zangsak in,’ kei tungah hong ci hih mite i dawn’ nading ngaihsutna hong bangci piak ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah tawh a khang khawm khangnote in ama kiangah, “Nangma kiangah, ‘Na pa in ka hakkol uh a gikin bawl hi, ahih hangin kote adingin hong zangsak in,’ hong ci hih mite kiangah hih bangin na gen ding hi; amaute kiangah, ‘Ka khutmeno in ka pa’ kawng sangin gol zaw hi.

Tu-in, ka pa in hakkol gik note tungah hong koihna munah na hakkol uh kong behlap ding hi. Ka pa in ciang tawh note hong thuhilh hi; ahih hangin keimah in ciang lingnei tawh note kong thuhilh ding hi,’ na ci ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in, “Ni thum ni-in ka kiangah hong paikik un,” a cih mah bangin Jeroboam leh mi khempeuh a ni thum ni-in Rehoboam kiangah hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in mite ngawh dawn’ a, khangham mite in ama tungah ngaihsutna a piak thute nusia-in,

khangnote’ ngaihsut piakna tawh kizui-in amaute kiangah thugen a, “Ka pa in note’ hakkol giksak hi; ahih hangin keimah in na hakkol uh ka behlap ding hi; ka pa in ciang tawh note hong thuhilh hi; ahih hangin keimah in ciang lingnei tawh note kong thuhilh ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in mite’ thu ngai lo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Shiloni mi Ahijah tung tawnin Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam tungah a gensa thu a tun’sak nadingin Topa in a pian’sak thu kiheina ahi hi.

Kumpipa in amau’ thu a ngaih lohna Israelte khempeuh in a muh uh ciangin mite in kumpipa dawng uh a, “David sungah kote in bang ngah nei ka hi uh hiam? Jessi tapa sungah gamhluah ka nei kei uh hi. Israelte aw, na inn ciat uhah ciah un. Rehoboam in ama ading vaihawm tawm hen,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israelte a inn ciat uhah kihem uh hi.
Ahih hangin Rehoboam in Judah khuapite sungah a teeng Israel mite uk hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in aana tawh nasemte a uk Adoram sawl a, Israelte khempeuh in suang tawh amah na deng lum uh hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah a tai dingin Kumpi Rehoboam a sakol leengah a tuang dingin nawh tai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin saklam Israelte in David innkuan lehdo hi.

Jeroboam hong ciahkik khitna thu Israelte khempeuh in a zak uh ciangin amaute in mi sawlin kikhopna ah amah samsak uh a, Israelte khempeuh tungah kumpi-in amah bawl uh hi. David innkuan a zui kuamah dang om lo a, Judah minam bek in zui hi.

Jerusalem ah Rehoboam a tun’ ciangin, Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam’ kumpigam ngahkik nadingin Israel mite a sim dingin Judah minam khempeuh, leh Benjamin minam, a kiteel galhang mi tul-zakhat leh tul sawmgiat khawm hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mi Shemaiah tungah Pasian’ thu hong tung hi;
“Judah kumpipa, Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam tung, leh Judah leh Benjamin minam khempeuh tung, leh a om lai mi dangte khempeuh tungah gen in,

“Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Note na kuanto kei ding uh a, na behte uh Israelte na do kei ding uh hi. Mi khempeuh a inn ciat uhah ciah hen; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu in keima kiang pan ahi hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Topa’ thu ngai uh a, Topa’ thugen bangin innah ciahkik uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jeroboam in Efraim mualtung gam sungah Shekhem khua lamin tua lai-ah teeng hi; tua ciangin tua lai panin amah paikhia-in Penuel lam hi.
Tua ciangin Jeroboam in a lungsim sungah, “Tu-in kumpigam in David innkuan ah kiheikik kha thei ding hi;

Jerusalem a, Topa’ innah biakna pia dingin hih mite paito leh, hih mite’ lungsim Judah kumpi Rehoboam, a topa uh lamah kiheikik ding a, amaute in kei hong thatin Judah kumpi Rehoboam kiangah ciahkik ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in thu kikupna khat bawl a, tua ciangin kham bawngno nih bawl hi. Tua ciangin amah in mite kiangah, “Jerusalem ah sau vei khop na paikhin ta uh hi. Israel mite aw, Izipt leitang panin note hong paikhiatpih na pasiante uh en un,” a ci hi.
Amah in Beth-el ah khat koihin, Dan ah adang khat koih hi.
Hih na in khialhna khat suak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mite Beth-el a, bia ding leh Dan a, bia dingin a gamla pekah va pai uh hi.
Amah in mual dawnte ah inn zong lamin mite khempeuh lak panin Levi mi ahi lo mite siampi-in seh hi.

Tua ciangin Jeroboam in Judah a, om pawi tawh a kibangin a kha giatna a ni sawm-le-nga ni-in pawi khat bawl a, biakna tau tungah biaknate pia hi; tua mah bangin amah in Beth-el ah bawlin ama bawlsa bawngnote tungah biakna pia hi. Tua ciangin amah in ama bawlsa mual tunga biakna siampite Beth-el ah koih hi.
A kha giatna a ni sawm-le-nga ni, ama deih kha sungin Beth-el a, ama bawlsa biakna tau ah amah paito hi; amah in Israel mite’ adingin pawi khat kipsak a, paknamtui hal dingin biakna tau ah paito hi.
En in, Topa’ thu tawh Judah panin Pasian’ mi khat Bethe-el ah hong pai hi. Paknamtui hal dingin biakna tau gei-ah Jeroboam na ding hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ thu tawh biakna tau langpangin mipa kiko a, “Biakna tau, biakna tau aw, Topa in hih bangin ci hi; ‘En in, Josiah min nei tapa khat David innkuan sungah suak ding hi; amah in nangma tungah paknamtui a hal mual tunga biakna a pia siampite nangma tungah biakna-in pia ding a, nangma tungah mihingte’ guhte kihal ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua ni mahin amah in lim khat pia a, “Hih in Topa in thu a gen khitna lim hi: ‘En in, biakna tau kiphelin a tunga om vutte kibuakhia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Beth-el a, biakna tau langpangin Pasian’ mipa’ thugenna kumpipa in a zak ciangin biakna tau panin Jeroboam in a khut zan a, “Amah lencip un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah langpangin a zankhiat a khut keu cip ahih manin ama pum lamah a khut tonsak kik thei nawn lo hi.
Topa’ thu tawh Pasian’ mipa in lim khat a piaksa tawh kizui-in biakna tau zong kiphelin biakna tau panin a vutte kibuakhia hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Pasian’ mipa kiangah, “Tu-in Topa na Pasian’ maipha kunh in la, ka khut a ngei a bat nadingin kei adingin thu hong ngetsak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa in Topa tungah kunh hi; tua kumpipa’ khut a ngei bang kik a, a ni danga mah hong bang hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Pasian’ mipa kiangah, “Kei tawh innah hong ciahin nangmah kithadimsak in; keimah in nangma tungah thaman kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa in kumpipa kiangah, “Na inn phel lang khat hong pia lecin zong na innah nang kong zui kei ding hi. Keimah in hih lai munah an ahi a, tui ahi zongin ka ne ka dawn kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ kammal in kei tungah thu hong pia khin zo a, ‘An ahi a, tui ahi zongin ne lo dawn loin, na paina lampi tawnin na ciahkik kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah lampi dangah pai-in Beth-el ah hong paina lampi tawnin ciahkik lo hi.

Tu-in kamsang khangham khat Beth-el ah teng hi. Ama tapate hong pai-in tua ni-in Pasian’ mipa in Beth-el ah a hih thu teng ama kiangah gen uh hi; kumpipa kiangah a gen thute zong, amaute in a pa uh kiangah gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pa un amaute kiangah “Koi lampi ah amah pai ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a tapate in Judah panin hong pai Pasian’ mipa a paina lam hilh uh hi.
Amah in a tapate kiangah, “Kei adingin laa van hong vawhsak un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in ama adingin laa van vawhsakin a tungah amah tuang hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa nungah amah pai a, tawsaw khat nuai-ah tu-in amah mu hi; tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Nang in Judah panin hong pai Pasian’ mipa na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Kei tawh innah hong ciahin an ne in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Nang tawh kong ciahkik thei kei ding a, nang kong zui thei kei ding hi; hih munah nang tawh an ahi a, tui ahi zongin ka ne ka dawn kei ding hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ kammal in kei tungah, “An ahi a, tui a hi zongin tua lai-ah ne lo dawn loin, na paina lampi tawnin na ciahkik kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Kei zong nangmah bangin kamsang khat ka hi a, Topa’ thu tawh vantungmi khat in kei tungah thu hong gen a, ‘Amah in an leh tui ne-in a dawn theih nadingin na innah amah paipih kik in,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in ama tungah zuau genin a phuahtawn ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in zui-in hong paikik a, ama innah an ne-in tui dawn hi.
Amaute sabuai-ah a tut lai takun amah a ciahpih kik kamsangpa tungah Topa’ thu hong tung hi;
Judah panin hong pai Pasian’ mipa tungah amah kiko a, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Nangmah in Topa thu mang loin, Topa na Pasian in hong thu piaksa thupiakna zui loin,
nang hong pai kikin, amah in, “An ne kei in la, tui dawn kei in,” hong cihna munah an ne-in tui na dawn hi; tua ahih manin na pate’ hanah na luanghawm kivui lo ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in an ne-in a dawn khit ciangin, amah in a ciahpih kik kamsangpa’ adingin laa van vawhsak hi.
Amah a paikhiat ciangin humpinelkai khat in lampi ah na dawntuahin amah that hi. Ama luanghawm lampi-ah kipaai a, a gei-ah a laa ding hi; a humpinelkai zong a luanghawm gei-ah ding hi.
En in, mite in va nawk uh a, lampi ah a luanghawm kipaai-in a luanghawm gei-ah humpinelkai a ding mu uh hi. Amaute hong pai-in kamsang khanghampa a ten’na khuapi sungah gen uh hi.

Lampi panin amah a ciahpih kik kamsangpa in tua thu a zak ciangin amah in, “Tua in Topa’ thu a mang lo Pasian’ mipa ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin Topa in ama tungah a gensa thu tawh kizui-in amah balnenin a that humpinelkai tungah Topa in amah pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a tapate kiangah, “Kei adingin laa van hong vawhsak un,” a ci hi. Amaute in vawhsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah pai a, lampi ah a luanghawm kipaai-in la leh humpinelkai a luanghawm gei-ah a ding mu hi. Humpinelkai in a luanghawm ne lo a, la zong balnen lo hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa in Pasian’ mipa luanghawm la-in la tungah koih a, kah ding leh vui dingin khuapi sungah ciahpih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama hanah a luanghawm koih hi; tua ciangin ama hangin amaute kap uh a, “Ala, ka sanggampa!” ci uh hi.
Amah a vui khit ciangin a tapate kiangah, “Kei ka sih ciangin Pasian’ mipa a kivuina hanah kei hong vui un; ama guh gei-ah kei’ guhte koih un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Beth-el a, biakna tau leh Samaria khuapite sunga om mual tunga biaknate khempeuh langpangin Topa’ thu tawh a kiko a thugenna hong tung taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Hih thu khit ciangin ama gamtat sia panin Jeroboam kihei tuan lo a, mite khempeuh sung panin mual tunga biaknate a, sem ding siampite bawl kik hi; amah in a ut peuhpeuh mualtunga biakna siampi dingin ap hi.
Hih in leitung maitang panin khen khia-in a susia zah dingin Jeroboam innkuan tungah khialhna a suak hi.
Tua hun lai takin Jeroboam’ tapa Abijah a cina hi.

Jeroboam in a zi kiangah, “Ding in la, na mel kiselin Jeroboam’ zi na hih lam kitheisak kei in la, Shiloh ah va pai in; en in, hih mite tungah kumpi ka hih nading thu a gen kamsangpa Ahijah tua lai-ah om hi.
Anlum sawm, moh pawlkhat, leh khuaizu thawl khat keng in la, ama kiangah pai in; naupang tungah a piang ding thu amah in nang kiangah hong gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jeroboam’ zi tua mah bangin gamta hi; amah ding-in Shiloh ah pai a, Ahijah’ inn tung hi. A khanghamna hangin a mitte mang ahih manin Ahijah in khua mu thei lo hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Ahijah kiangah, “En in, a tapa tawh kisai nangma kiangah thu dong dingin Jeroboam’ zi hong pai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah a cina hi. Tua bang tua bangin tua nu tungah na gen ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah hong pai ciangin numei dang khatin kineih hi.

Ahih hangin Ahijah in amah kongkhak hong tun’ a khe ging a zak ciangin, “Hong tum in, Jeroboam zi aw; bang hangin midang khat kineih na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh nang adingin thu gik khat kei tungah hong kipia hi.
Pai in la, Jeroboam kiangah hih bangin gen in, ‘Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Mite lak panin nang hong sangsakin ka mi Israelte tungah makai-in kong bawl a,

David innkuan panin kumpigam balkhia-in nangma tungah kong pia hi; ahi zongin nang in ka thupiaknate zui-in, a lungsim khempeuh tawh kei hong zui-in ka mit-ah a man nate bek a sem ka nasempa David na bang kei a,
nangmah in na mai-a om mite khempeuh sangin siatna bawl zaw-in, pai-in pasian dangte leh a kisung milimte nang adingin bawlin ka heh nadingin nong phin a, na nung lamah kei nong paai hi;

tua ahih ciangin en in, mi khat in a bei matengin ek a haltum mah bangin Jeroboam innkuan tungah siatna tungsakin, Israel sungah sal leh a suakta mi a kibangin pasal khempeuh Jeroboam’ innkuan panin ka susia ding a, Jeroboam innkuan ka bei siangsak ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jeroboam’ mi ahi khuapi sunga a si mi peuhpeuh uite in ne ding hi; gamlakah a si mi peuhpeuh huihlak vasate in ne ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in gen khin hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in.
Tua ahih ciangin ding in la, na innah ciah in. Na khua na tun’ ciangin na tapa si ding hi.

Tua ciangin Israel khempeuh ama hangin kapin vui ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, Topa tungah a lungkimhuai na khat Jeroboam innkuan sung panin ama tungah kimu ahih manin Jeroboam sung panin amah bek hanah pai ding hi.
Tua tham loin tu ni-in Jeroboam innkuan a beisak ding, Israelte’ tungah kumpi khat Topa in ama adingin khangsak ding hi. Tua huna kipanin

tui sunga pumpeng a kiliin’ mah bangin Topa in Israel vatin amau pute pate tungah a piak hih gam hoih panin Israel zung lot ding a, Eufrates gal khatah amaute thehthang ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Asherah milimte bawlin Topa a heh nadingin phin uh hi.
Tua ciangin ama khialhna leh Israelte a khialhsakna ahi Jeroboam’ khialhna hangin amah in Israel nusia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jeroboam’ zi ding-in kihemkhia a, Tirzah ah ciah hi. Amah in sangkil a kan lai takin naupang si hi.
Tua ciangin a nasem Ahijah kamsangpa tung tawnin Topa’ thugenna tawh kizui-in Israel khempeuh in amah vui-in ama hangin kap uh hi.
Tu-in Jeroboam’ gamtatna a om laite’ a galsimna a gam uknate, en in, Israel kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Jeroboam’ uk hun sung in kum sawmnih-le-nih ahi hi; tua ciangin a pate tawh ihmu a, ama tangin a tapa Nadab in uk hi.

Tu-in Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam in Judah ah uk hi. Gam uk dingin a kipatin Rehoboam kum sawmli-le-khat pha a, a min koih nadingin Topa in Israel minam khempeuh sung panin a teelkhiat khuapi Jerusalem ah amah in kum sawm-le-sagih sung uk hi. Ama nu a min in Na-amah hi a, Ammon mi ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite in Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta uh a, a pu a pate khempeuh uh hih sangin a tam zaw-in amau’ hih a khialhnate uh tawh ama hazat nading piangsak uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau’ adingin mualtung a biaknate, khuampite, leh mualsang tung khempeuh leh singnim nuai khempeuh ah Asherah milimte bawl uh hi;
pasal paktat pawlte zong gam sungah om uh hi. Topa in Israel mite mai-ah a hawlkhiat minamte’ gamtatna a kihhuai khempeuh bangin amaute gamta uh hi.
Kumpi Rehoboam’ kum ngana kumin Jerusalem sim dingin Izipt kumpi Shishak hong kuanto hi;
amah in Topa’ inn-a van manphate leh kumpipa’ inn-a van manphate lakhia hi; amah in na khempeuh lakhia hi. Amah in Solomon’ bawlsa kham lumte khempeuh zong la hi;
tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in tuate’ tangin sumngo lumte bawl a, kumpipa’ inn kongkhak a cing inncing uliante’ khut sungah tuate ap hi.
Topa’ innah kumpipa a pai simin inncingte in tuate pua-in inncin’na inndei sungah tuate koihkik zel uh hi.
Tu-in Rehoboam’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a sep khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Rehoboam leh Jeroboam kikalah galkidona om tawntung hi.
Tua ciangin Rehoboam a pate tawh ihmu-in David’ khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi. Ama nu a min in Na-amah hi a, Ammon mi ahi hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Abijam in uk hi.
Tu-in Nebat’ tapa Kumpi Jeroboam’ kum sawm-le-giatna kumin Abijam in Judah tungah uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in Jerusalem ah kum thum sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Maakah hi a, Absalom’ tanu ahi hi.
Ama mai-a a pa’ khialhna khempeuh amah in zui hi; a pu sawn David a thuman bangin Topa a Pasian tungah a lungsim thuman bup lo hi.
Ahi zongin David’ hangin Topa a Pasian in Jerusalem ah meivak khat pia a, ama khitah a tapa koihin Jerusalem kipsak hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Hit mi Uriah thu-ah cih sim loh David in ama nuntak sung tawntung Topa’ mit-ah a manin gamta-in a thupiakte khat peuhpeuh panin amah pial lo hi.
Tu-in ama nuntak sung tawntung Rehoboam leh Jeroboam kikalah kidona om hi.
Abijam’ gamtatna a om laite leh a sep khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam? Tua ciangin Abijam leh Jeroboam kikal ah galkidona om hi.
Tua ciangin Abijam a pate tawh ihmu hi; amaute in David khuapi sungah amah vui uh hi. Ama tangin a tapa Asa in uk hi.
Israel kumpi Jeroboam’ kum sawmnihna kumin Asa in Judah tungah uk ding kipan a,
amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmli-le-khat sung uk hi. Ama pi’ min in Ma-akah hi a, Absalom’ tanu ahi hi.
Asa in a pa David gamtat bangin Topa’ mit-ah a manin gamta hi.
Amah in gamsung panin pasal paktat pawlte koih khia-in a pate’ bawlsa milim khempeuh khinkhia hi.
Amah in Asherah milim dingin a kibawl a kihhuai milim khat nei ahih manin kumpinu’ nu hihna panin a pi Ma-akah zong khinkhia hi; tua ciangin Asa in tua nu’ milim phukin Kidron lui ah hal hi.
Ahih hangin mual tunga biaknate kila khia lo hi. Ahi zongin ama hun sung khempeuh Asa’ lungsim Topa tungah thuman bup hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a pa’ apsa letsongte leh ama apsa letsongte, ngun, leh kham, leh nazatte Topa’ inn sungah paipih hi.
Amau’ hun sung tawntung Asa leh Israel kumpi Baasha kikalah galkidona om hi.
Judah lang khatah Israel kumpi Baasha kuan to a, Judah kumpi Asa kiang pan kuamah paikhia thei lo, kuamah a tum theih loh nadingin Ramah khua lam hi.

Tua ciangin Asa in Topa’ inn vankoihna leh kumpipa’ inn vankoihna sungah a om lai ngun leh kham khempeuh la-in ama nasemte’ khut sungah tuate pia hi; tua ciangin Kumpi Asa in Damaskas ah a teng, Siria kumpi, Hezion’ tapa Tabrimmon, a tapa Benhadad kiangah tuate puak a,

“Ka pa leh na pa mah bangin kei leh nang kikalah kipawlna khat omsak ni: en in, ngun leh kham letsong nangma tungah kong puak hi; keima kiang panin amah a nungkik theih nadingin Israel kumpi Baasha tawh na kipawlna va sutat in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Benhadad in Kumpi Asa’ thu ngai a, Israel khuapite sim dingin a galkap a ukte sawlin, Ijon, Dan, Abelbeth-ma-akah, leh Khinneroth khempeuh, Naftali gam khempeuh tawh zo hi.
Baasha in tua thu a zak ciangin Ramah a lam khawlin Tirzah ah om hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Asa in Judah khempeuh tungah thu genzakna khat bawl a, kuamah peng loin amaute in Baasha inn lamna a, zat Ramah suangte leh a singte puakhia uh hi; tua ciangin Kumpi Asa in tuate tawh Benjamin mite’ khua Geba leh Mizpah khua lam hi.

Tu-in Asa’ gamtatna a om laite khempeuh, ama thahatna khempeuh, leh ama sep khempeuh, leh ama lam khuapite, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam? Ahih hangin a teek ciangin a khete-ah natna nei hi.
Tua ciangin Asa a pate tawh ihmu a, a pupi David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jehoshafat in uk hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum nihna kumin Jeroboam’ tapa Nadab in Israel tungah uk ding kipan hi; amah in Israel tungah kum nih sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta a, a pa’ khekhap mah tawnin, Israel a khialhsakna ama khialhna mah zui hi.
Issakhar minam Ahijah’ tapa Baasha in amah sawmsim hi; Baasha in Filistiate’ khua Gibbethon ah amah sattuk hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Nadab leh Israel khempeuh in Gibbethom umcihin om uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah kumpi Asa’ kum thumna kumin Baasha in Nadab that a, ama tangin amah in uk hi.

Amah kumpi ahih phetin Jeroboam innkuan khempeuh that hi; Topa in Shiloni mi a nasempa Ahijah tung tawnin a gensa bangin a vekpi-in a suksiat khit dongin a husang khat zong Jeroboam’ innkuan ah nusia lo hi;
tua ni ama khialhna leh Israel a khialhsakna ahi Jeroboam’ khialhnate hang leh Israel Pasian, Topa a hehsakna hang ahi hi.
Tu-in Nadab’ gamtatna a om laite leh a sep khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Amau’ hun sung khempeuh Asa leh Israel kumpi Baasha kikalah galkidona om hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum thumna kumin Ahijah’ tapa Bassha in Israel khempeuh tungah Tirzah panin uk ding kipan a, kum sawmnih-le-li sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta a, Jeroboam’ khekhap mah tawnin, Israel a khialhsakna ama khialhna mah zui hi.
Tua ciangin Baasha langpangin Hanani tapa Jehu tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a,

“Keimah in leivui lak panin nang hong sangto sakin ka mi Israelte tungah makai-in nang hong bawl napi-in, nangmah in Jeroboam’ khekhap mah tawnin ka mi Israelte na khialsak a, amaute’ khialhna tawh kei hong hehsak na hih manin,
en in, keimah in Baasha leh a innkuan ka phiat khia siang ding a, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ inn bangin na inn ka bawl ding hi.
Baasha’ mi ahi khuapi sunga a si peuhpeuh uite in ne ding hi; ama mi gamlakah a si peuhpeuh huihlak vasate in ne ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Baasha’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a septe, leh a thahatna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Baasha a pate tawh ihmu a, Tirzah ah kivui hi; ama tangin a tapa Elah in uk hi.

Tua tham loin Jeroboam innkuan bangin ama nasepna tawh amah hehsakin Topa muhna ah a sia a gamtatna khempeuh hang leh amah in Jeroboam leh a innkuan a suksiatna hangin Hanani’ tapa kamsang Jehu tung tawnin Baasha leh a innkuan langpangin Topa’ thu hong tung hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmnih-le-gukna kumin Baasha’ tapa Elah in Tirzah panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, kum nih sung uk hi.
Ahih hangin ama leengte a lang a ukpa ama nasem Zimri in amah sawmsim hi. Tirzah a, kumpi inn sung a ukpa Arza’ innah zu ne-in khamin Tirzah ah a om lai tak,
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmnih-le-sagihna kumin Zimri hong pai-in amah sat tukin that a, ama tangin uk hi.
Amah in uk dinga a kipat, kumpi tokhom tungah a tut khit phetin amah in Baasha’ innkuan khempeuh that hi; ama behte pasal khat beek ahi a, a lawmte ahi zongin khat zong siit lo hi.

Baasha’ khialhnate leh a khialhsa uh ahi a tapa Elah’ khialhnate, leh amaute in Israel khialsakin, a milimte uh tawh Israel Pasian, Topa a hehsakna uh hangin, Baasha langpangin kamsang Jehu tung tawnin Topa’ thugenna bangin Baasha’ innkuan khempeuh tua bangin Zimri in susia hi.
Tu-in Elah’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a sep khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmnih-le-sagihna kumin Zimri in Tirzah ah ni sagih sung uk hi. Tu-in Filistiate’ khua Gibbethon simin galkapte in giahphual sat uh a,
giahphual sat a, om galkapte in, “Zimri in sawmsimin kumpipa that khin hi,” a kicihna za uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Israelte khempeuh in tua ni-in giahphual ah galkap a ukpa Omri kumpi-in bawl uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Omri leh amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh Gibbethon panin paito-in amaute in Tirzah umcih uh hi.

18-19 Ama hihsa a khialhna, Topa muhna ah a siat gamtatna, Jeroboam’ khekhap a totna, leh a hihsa a khialhna, Israel a khialhsakna hangin, khuapi kila khin hi, ci-in Zimri in a muh ciangin kumpipa’ inn muanhuai sungah amah pai a, kumpipa’ inn mei tawh amah kihal nelhin si hi.
Tu-in Zimri’ gamtatna a om laite, leh ama hihsa a sawmsimna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Israel mite pawl nihin kikhen uh hi; mi a kimkhat in kumpi-in a bawl dingin Ginath’ tapa Tibni zui uh a, a kimkhat in Omri zui uh hi.
Ahih hangin Omri a zui mite in Ginath’ tapa Tibni a zuite zo uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Tibni si a, Omri kumpi suak hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmthum-le-khatna kumin Omri in Israelte tungah uk ding kipan a, kum sawm-le-nih sung uk hi; amah in kum guk sung Tirzah ah uk hi.
Amah in Shemer’ tung panin ngun talen nih-in Samaria mual lei hi; amah in kulh tawh a mual um a, tua mual a neipa Shemer’ min tamin a lamsa khuapi min Samaria phuak hi.
Omri in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta a, ama mai-a om mi khempeuh sangin a sia tamzaw gamta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ lampi khempeuh, leh Israel a khialhsakna khialhnate, a milimte uh tawh Israel Pasian, Topa a hehsakna uh zui hi.
Tu-in Omri’ gamtatnasa a om laite, leh a thahatna a lahna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Omri a pate tawh ihmu a, Samaria ah kivui hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Ahab in uk hi.
Judah kumpi Asa’ kum sawmthum-le-giatna kumin Omri’ tapa Ahab in Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, Omri’ tapa Ahab in Samaria panin Israelte tungah kum sawmnih-le-nih sung uk hi.
Omri’ tapa Ahab in ama mai-a mite khempeuh sangin Topa muhna ah a sia tamzaw gamta hi.
Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate zuih ding ama adingin a thu zang tawh a kibat mah bangin, amah in Sidon mite’ kumpi Ethba-al’ tanu Jezebel zi-in la a, pai-in Baal’ na semin bia hi.
Amah in Samaria a, a lam Baal inn sungah Baal adingin biakna tau khat dingsak hi.
Tua ciangin Ahab in Asherah milim khat bawl hi. Ahab in ama mai-a om Israel kumpite khempeuh sangin Israel Pasian, Topa hehsak nading tam hih zaw hi.

Ama hun sungin Beth-el mi Hiel in Jerikho lam hi; Topa in Nun’ tapa Joshua tung tawnin a gen bangin amah in tacil Abiram’ luang khamin a bulpi phut a, a tapa neu pen Segub’ luang khamin a kongpite phut hi.

Tu-in Gileah gamsung Tishbe khua panin Tishbe mi Elijah in Ahab kiangah, “A mai-ah ka din’na Israel Pasian, Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin keima thu tawh loin daitui ahi a, guah ahi zongin hong tung ding kumte sungah om lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiangah Topa’ thu hong tung a,
“Hih lai panin kihemin nisuahna lamah kihei in la, Jordan nisuahna lam ahi Kherith lui-ah bu in.
Nangmah in lui panin tui na dawn ding hi; tua lai-ah nangmah hong vaak dingin va-akte thu ka pia zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in Topa’ thugen bangin gamta hi; amah pai-in Jordan nisuahna lam Kherith lui gei-ah om hi.
Tua ciangin va-akte in ama kiangah zingsangin anlum leh sa puak a, nitakin anlum leh sa mah puak hi; amah in lui panin tuidawn hi.
Tua gam sungah guahzu lo ahih manin tawl khat khit ciangin a lui kang hi.
Tua ciangin ama kiangah Topa’ thu hong tung a,
“Ding in la, Sidon mite’ khua Zarefath ah pai-in tua lai-ah om in. En in, tua lai-ah nangmah hong vaak dingin meigongnu khat thu ka pia zo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah ding-in Zarefath ah pai hi; khuapi kulh kongpi a tun’ ciangin, en in, meigongnu khat in sing na tom hi; amah in tua nu samin, “Ka dawn theih nadingin beel khat sungah tui tawm hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Tua nu in paipih dingin a kisak lai takin, amah in tua nu samin, “Anlum neu khat zong hong tawi kawm in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa na Pasian in a nungta ahih mah bangin emsa bangmah ka nei kei a, beel sungah annel khut dim khat leh um sungah sathau tawmno khat bek om hi; tu-in keimah leh ka tapa’ adingin bawlin kote in ka nek theih nadingun singkang nih khawng a tom ka hi a, tua ciangin a si ta ding ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in, pai-in la, na gensa bangin hih in; ahih hangin kei adingin moh neu khat hong bawlsak masa-in kei kiangah hong paipih in la, tua khit ciangin nang leh na tapa’ ading bawl in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Topa in leitungah guah a zuksak ni matengin beel sunga annel bei lo ding a, um sunga sathau in hong tamasak lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah pai-in Elijah’ gensa bangin hih hi; tua nu, leh amah, leh tua nu’ innkuan ading nisimin an om hi.
Elijah’ tung tawnin Topa’ thugen bangin beel sunga annel bei lo a, um sunga sathau in zong tamasak lo hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin inn sung nupi ahi numei’ tapa a cina hi; a natna nasia mahmah ahih manin gim semsemin ama sungah a hu om nawn lo hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Elijah kiangah, “Pasian’ mipa aw, kei lang khatah bang thu nei na hi hiam? Ka khialhna kiphawk kiksak ding leh ka tapa’ sihna a piangsak dingin kei kiangah nong pai hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tua nu kiangah, “Na tapa hong pia in,” a ci hi. Amah in tua nu’ ang panin amah la-in ama giahna innkhum zangah puato-in ama lupna tungah sial hi.
Tua ciangin Topa tungah kiko-in, “Topa ka Pasian aw, ama tapa thahna tawh ka peemna meigongnu’ tung nangawnah gimna hong tungsak na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin naupang tungah amah thum vei kikhuangin Topa tungah kiko a, “Topa ka Pasian aw, hih naupang’ nuntakna ama sungah hong ciahkiksak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Elijah’ aw ngai hi; naupang’ nuntakna ama sungah hong ciahkikin amah hingkik hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in naupang la-in innkhumzang panin inn sungah paipih suk a, a nu kiangah amah pia hi; tua ciangin Elijah in, “En in, na tapa nungta hi,” a ci hi.
Numei in Elijah kiangah, “Nang in Pasian’ mi na hihna leh na kam sunga om Topa’ thu in thumanna ahihna tu-in ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Ni tampi khit a kum thumna kumin Elijah tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a, “Pai in, Ahab kiangah nangmah kilak in; tua ciangin keimah in leitungah guah ka zusak ding hi,” a ci hi.
