Tua ahih ciangin Ahab kiangah amah kilak tawm dingin Elijah pai hi. Tu-in Samaria ah kialpi nasia hi.
Tua ciangin Ahab in kumpi inn sung a ukpa Obadiah sam hi. (Obadiah in nakpi takin Topa zahtak hi;
Jezebel in Topa’ kamsangte a hon thah lai-in Obadiah in kamsang za khat la-in sawmnga sawmnga-in leihawm sungah seel a, amaute an leh tui tawh vaak hi.)

Tua ciangin Ahab in Obadiah kiangah, “Gamsung ciktui omna khempeuh leh kuam omna khempeuh ah va pai in; lopa mu-in sakolte leh la-sakolte i hin’ suah zo kha ding a, ganhingte pawlkhat i sumh kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a et dingun leitang hawm uh hi; Ahab mahmah mun khat lamah pai-in Obadiah mahmah a mun dang khat lamah pai hi.
Obadiah lam kalah a om lai takin, en in, Elijah in amah na dawntuah hi; Obadiah in amah thei-in a mai lei ngatin puk a, “Ka to Elijah, nang na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Keimah ka hi hi. Pai in, na topa kiangah, ‘En in, Elijah hih lai-ah om hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Hong thah dingin Ahab khut sungah na nasempa nong piak nadingin bang thu-ah khial ka hi hiam?

Topa na Pasian in a nungta ahih mah bangin nangmah zong dingin ka topa in a sawl lohna minam ahi a, kumpi gam ahi zongin om lo hi; amaute in, ‘Hih lai-ah amah om lo hi,’ a cih uh ciangin, amaute in nang hong muh lohna thu amah in kumpi gam ahi a, minam ahi zongin kiciamsak hi.
Tu-in nangmah in, ‘Pai in, na topa kiangah, “En in, hih lai-ah Elijah om hi,” ci in,’ nong ci hi.

Nang kiang panin kei ka paikhiat phetin ka theih lohna munah Topa’ Kha in nang hong pua ding hi; tua ciangin, kei pai-in Ahab kiangah genin amah in nang hong muh loh ciangin, ka khangno lai-a kipanin keimah na nasempa in Topa zahtak hi napi-in, amah in kei hong that ding hi.
Jezebel in Topa’ kamsangte a thah lai-in Topa’ kamsangte mi zakhat, sawmnga sawmnga-in leihawm sungah seelin, amaute an leh tui tawh ka vaakna thu ka topa tungah hong kigen nai lo ahi hiam?
Tu-in nangmah in, ‘Pai in, na topa kiangah, “En in, hih lai-ah Elijah om hi,” ci in,’ nong ci hi; tua ciangin amah in kei hong that ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in, “A mai-ah ka din’na Vanglianpen Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin, tu ni-in ama kiangah keimahmah ka kilak taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Ahab tawh kimu dingin Obadiah pai-in ama kiangah gen hi; tua ciangin Elijah tawh kimu dingin Ahab pai hi.
Ahab in Elijah a muh ciangin, ama kiangah, “Nang in Israel mite a lungkhamsakpa na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in dawngin, “Keimah in Israel mite ka lungkhamsak kei hi; nang in Topa’ thupiaknate nusia-in Baalte zui na hih manin nang leh na pa’ innkuan in na lungkhamsak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in mi sawl in la, Karmel Mual kei kiangah Israelte khempeuh, leh Jezebel’ sabuai-ah an a ne Baal kamsang zali leh sawmnga leh Asherah kamsang zalite hong khawm in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Ahab in Israel mite khempeuh kiangah mi sawlin, Karmel Mual-ah Israel mite leh kamsangte khawmsak hi.

Tua ciangin mi khempeuh mai-ah Elijah hong pai-in, “Ngaihsutna kibang lo thu nih-ah bang tan vei kip loin om ding na hi uh hiam? Topa in Pasian ahih leh amah zui un; ahih hangin Baal pen Pasian ahih leh amah zui un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mite in kam khat beek dawng lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in mite kiangah, “kei, kei bekbek, Topa’ kamsang sung panin ka om lai hi; ahih hangin Baal’ kamsangte mihing zali leh sawmnga om hi.

Kote tungah bawngtal nih hong pia un; amau’ adingin bawngtal khat amaute teelsak un la, sem nensakin sing tungah koihsak un la, ahih hangin a tungah mei koihsak kei un; tua ciangin keimah in a bawngtal khat bawlin sing tungah koihin, a tungah mei ka koih kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin note in na pasian tung uhah thu ngenin, keimah in Topa tungah thu ka ngen ding hi; tua ciangin thungetna mei tawh hong pia pasian in Pasian taktak ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, “Hih thugen hoih hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in Baal kamsangte kiangah, “Note tam na hih manun note’ adingin bawngtal khat teel un la, bawl masa un; tua ciangin na pasian uh tungah thungen un la, ahih hangin a tungah mei koih kei un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in amau tungah a kipia bawngtal la-in bawl uh a, zingsang-a kipan sun dong Baal tungah thu ngenin, “Baal aw, kote hong dawng in!” a ci uh hi. Ahih hangin awging om lo a, kuamah in dawng lo hi. Tua ciangin amau’ bawlsa biakna tau-ah amaute diang uh hi.

Sun ciangin Elijah in amaute zahpihin, “Amah in pasian ahih ciangin a gingin kiko un; amah in thu a lungngaih laitak, ahih kei leh mun dangah paikhia, ahih kei leh khualzin, ahih kei leh amah ihmu-in phot ding kisam hi kha thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a gingin kiko-in, amau’ ngeina bangin namsaute leh sikzumte tawh, amaute tungah si a luan’ dongin ki-at kisun uh hi.
Sunkim khit ciangin biakpiak hun dong mateng amaute awng suak uh a, ahih hangin awging om lo hi; kuamah in dawng lo a, kuamah in don lo hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in mi khempeuh kiangah, “Ka kiang nai-ah hong pai-un,” a ci hi; tua ciangin mi khempeuh ama kiang nai-ah hong pai uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ biakna tau a kisupaisa khat puah kik hi;
“Israel in nangma min hi ding hi,” ci-in Topa’ thu a tun’na Jakob tapa minam sawm-le-nihte tawh kizui-in Elijah in suangtum sawm-le-nih la hi;
tua ciangin tua suangte tawh Topa’ minin biakna tau khat lam hi. Amah in khaici lawh nih a ta dingin a lian hawklam khat biakna tau kimkotah bawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a ngeina bangin a sing koih a, a bawngtal sem nenin a sing tungah koih hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Beel li tui dim un la, meihal biakna tung leh sing tungah sung un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “A nih veina hih un,” a ci hi; tua ciangin amaute in nih veina hih uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in “A thum veina hih un,” a ci hi; tua ciangin amaute in a thum veina hih uh hi.
Tua ciangin biakna tau kimkotah tui luang a, a hawklam zong tui tawh kidim hi.

Biakpiak hun ciangin kamsang Elijah a nai-ah hong pai-in, “Abraham, Issak, leh Israel Pasian, Topa aw, nangmah in Israel sungah Pasian na hihna, leh keimah in nangma nasem ka hihna, leh hih nate khempeuh nangma thu tawh ka hihna thu tu ni-in kitheisak in,
Topa aw, nangmah in Pasian na hihna leh amaute’ lungsim na hei kikna thu hih mite in a theih nadingin hong dawng in, Topa aw, hong dawng in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ meikuang hong kia a, a meihal biakna, a sing, a suangte, leh a leivui kangtumin, hawklam sunga om tui nangawn liak tum hi.
Mi khempeuh in tua thu a muh uh ciangin a mai uh lei lam ngatin puk uh hi; amaute in, “Topa in Pasian ahi hi; Topa in Pasian ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in amaute kiangah, “Baal kamsangte man un; amaute khat zong suaktasak kei un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in man uh hi; Elijah in Kishon lui-ah amaute paipih sukin tua lai-ah amaute that hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in Ahab kiangah, “Paito in, anne-in tuidawn in; bang hang hiam cih leh guahpi huging om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a ne a dawn dingin Ahab paito hi. Karmel dawn-ah Elijah paito hi; amahmah lei lakah kun sukin a khukte kikalah a maitang phum hi.
Tua ciangin a nasempa kiangah, “Tu-in paito in, tuipi lam va en in,” a ci hi. Amah paito-in khuadak a, “Bangmah om lo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Sagih vei paikik in,” a ci hi.

A sagih veina ciangin amah in “En in, khuttum cia bang meii tawmno khat tuipi panin hong paito hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Paito in, Ahab kiangah, ‘Guah in hong khak kha ding ahih manin na leeng kithawi in la, paisuk in,’ va ci in,” a ci hi.
Tomno sungin meiite leh huih tawh van hong vom a, guah tampi zu hi. Ahab a leeng tungah tuangin Jezre-el ah pai hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vangliatna Elijah tungah om hi; amah in a kawng gakin Jezre-el lutna dongah Ahab mai-ah na tai hi.
Ahab in Jezebel kiangah Elijah’ hih khempeuh, leh namsau tawh kamsangte khempeuh a thah khitna thu gen hi.
Tua ciangin Jezebel in Elijah kiangah kamtai khat sawlin, “Zing ciang tu bang hunin amaute khat’ nuntakna bangin nangma nuntakna ka bawl kei taak leh pasiante in kei hong dawm kei ta hen,” cisak hi.
Tua ciangin amah lau a, ding-in a suahtak nadingin pai a, Judahte’ khua Be-ersheba tungin tua lai-ah a nasempa nusia hi.

Ahih hangin amahmah gamlakah ni khat lam pai-in poding kung nuai khatah tu hi; tua ciangin amah in a sih nading ngenin, “Pha zo hi; tu-in Topa aw, ka nuntakna hong la ta in; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in ka pate sangin ka hoihzaw kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah lum sukin poding kung khat nuaiah ihmu hi; en in, vantungmi khat in amah lawngin ama kiangah, “Tho in la, ne in,” a ci hi.
Amah khuadak a, en in, ama lutang gei-ah suangsa tungah a ki-em moh khat leh tui hai khat na om hi. Amah in ne-in dawnin lum kik hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi a nih veina hong pai kikin amah lawng a, “Tho in la, ne in, tua hi kei leh nang adingin khualzinna haksa lua ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah tho a, ne-in dawn a, tua an thahatna tawh Pasian’ mual Horeb ciang dong sun sawmli leh zan sawmli sung pai hi.
Tua ciangin leihawm khatah amah tungin tua lai-ah giak hi; en in Topa’ thu ama tungah hong tung a, amah in ama kiangah, “Elijah, hih lai-ah bang hih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Vanglianpen Pasian, Topa adingin ka huaiham mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite in na thuciamna nusia-in, na biakna taute lawn khia a, namsau tawh na kamsangte that hi; kei, kei bekbek ka om lai hi; amaute in kei thah dingin hong zong uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Paikhia in la, mual tung, Topa mai-ah ding in, Topa hong pai ding hi,” a ci hi. En in, Topa mai-ah suangtumte sukham a, ahih hangin huih lakah Topa om lo hi; huihpi khit ciangin ziinling om a, ahih hangin ziinling sungah Topa om lo hi;
ziinling khit ciangin meikuang om a, ahih hangin meikuang sungah Topa om lo hi; meikuang khit ciangin awneem neu khat om hi.
Elijah in a zak ciangin a puan tawh a mai tuamin paikhia a, leihawm lutna ah ding hi. En in, ama kiangah aw khat hong ging a, “Elijah, hih lai-ah bang hih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Vanglianpen Pasian, Topa adingin ka huaiham mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite in na thuciamna nusia-in, na biakna taute lawnkhia a, namsau tawh na kamsangte that hi; kei, kei bekbek ka om lai hi; amaute in kei thah dingin hong zong uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Pai in, Damaskas gamlak na lampi-ah ciahkik in; na tun’ ciangin Siria tungah kumpi dingin Hazael sathau na nilh ding hi;
tua ciangin Israel tungah kumpi dingin Nimshi’ tapa Jehu sathau na nilh ding hi; tua ciangin nangma munah kamsang dingin Abelmeholah khuami Shafat’ tapa Elisha sathau na nilh ding hi.
Jehu in Hazael’ namsau panin a suakta mipa that ding hi; Elisha in Jehu’ namsau panin a suakta mipa that ding hi.
Ahi zongin Baal mai-ah a kun nai lo, amah a nam nai lo mihing tulsagih Israel sungah ka siit ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tua lai panin amah paikhia a, ama mai-ah bawngtal kap sawm-le-nih tawh lo a kho Shafat’ tapa Elisha mu a, amah a sawm-le-nihna tawh na om hi. Elijah in ama gei nawkin ama tungah a puan lawn hi.

Tua ciangin amah in bawngtalte nusia-in Elijah nungah tai a, “Ka nu leh ka pa kam vaikhakin hong namsak phot in, tua ciangin nang kong zui ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah in ama kiangah, “Paikik in; nang tungah bang hong hih ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah zuihna panin ciahkik a, a bawngtal kolte la-in a bawngtalte go a, a sate bawngtal kolte tawh huanin mite tungah pia a, amaute in ne uh hi. Tua ciangin amah ding-in Elijah’ nung zui a, ama na sem hi.
Siria kumpipa Benhadad in ama galkapte khempeuh khawm hi; amah tawh kumpi sawmthum-le-nih, leh sakolte leh leengte om hi; amah paito-in Samaria umcihin sim hi.
Amah in Israel kumpi Ahab khuapi sungah kamtaite sawlin ama kiangah, “Benhadad in hih bangin ci hi:
‘Na ngun leh na kham keima’ aa hi; na zi hoih pente leh na tate zong keima’ aa hi,’ ci hi,” cisak hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in dawngin, “Na gen mah bangin, ka topa, kumpipa aw, kei leh ka neih khempeuh nangma’ aa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Kamtaite hong paikikin, “Benhadad in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Nang kiangah mi hong sawlin, “Kei tungah na ngun leh na kham, na zite leh na tate hong pia in,” kong cisak hi;
ahi zongin zing ciang tu bang hunin nangma kiangah ka nasemte kong sawl ding a, amaute in nangma inn leh na nasemte’ inn sung thawi-in, amau’ deih peuhpeuh hong la ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” cisak hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in gamsung upa khempeuh samin, “Tu-in ciamteh un, hih mipa in buaina a zon’na thei un; bang hang hiam cih leh ka zite leh ka tate, leh ka ngun leh ka kham la dingin hong sawl a, ama thu ka nial kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin upa khempeuh leh mi khempeuh in ama kiangah, “Don kei in la, zong thukim kei in,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in Benhadad kamtaite kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa kiangah gen un, ‘Na nasempa’ tung panin nong kalh masak ka hih ding hi; ahih hangin hih thu ka hih thei kei hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kamtaite kihemkhia-in ama tungah thu tun’ kik uh hi.
Benhadad in ama kiangah sawlin, “Samaria leivui in kei hong zui khempeuh khutkuak a dim zawh taak leh, pasiante in kei hong dawm kei ta hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in dawngin, “Ama kiangah gen un, ‘Galhiam a suahkhiapa bangin galhiam a kuahpa kiphasak kei hen; ci un,” a ci hi.
Bukte sungah kumpite tawh zu ne-in Benhadad a om lai takin hih thu a zak ciangin, amah in a mite kiangah, “Panmun la un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in khuapi langpangin panmun la uh hi.

Tua ciangin en in, Israel kumpi Ahab kiang nai-ah kamsang khat hong pai-in, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi; Hih mihon tampi khempeuh na mu khin hiam? En in, tu ni-in nangma khut sungah kong pia ding hi; tua ciangin keimah in Topa ka hihna na thei ding hi, ci in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ahab in, “Kua tawh hi ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Gamte a ukte’ nasemte tawh, ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Kua in galdona pan ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Nangmah in na pan ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in gamte a ukte’ nasemte khawm a, amaute zanih leh sawmthum-le-nih ahi hi; amaute’ khit ciangin amah in Israel mi khempeuh, tulsagih khawm hi.
Tua ciangin, Benhadad in bukte sungah amah a huh kumpi sawmthum-le-nihte tawh zu ne-in zu khamin a om laitak sun hunin amaute kuankhia uh hi.
Gamte a ukte’ nasemte kuankhia masa uh hi. Tua ciangin Benhadad in thukante sawlkhia a, amaute in ama kiangah, “Samaria panin mite hong kuankhia uh hi,” ci-in zasak uh hi.
Amah in, “Kilemna bawl dingin hong pai ahih leh a hingin amaute man un; tua ahih kei a, galdo dingin amaute hong pai ahih leh zong amaute a hing mahin man un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gamte a ukte’ nasemte leh amaute a zui galkapte, khuapi panin kuankhia uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in ama kisikpih ciat that uh hi; Siriate tai-in Israel mite in amaute delh uh a, ahih hangin Siria kumpipa Benhadad in sakol tuangin, sakol tuangte tawh taikhawm hi.
Tua ciangin, Israel kumpipa paikhia-in sakolte leh leengte man a, Siriate tampi tak that hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa kiang nai-ah kamsangpa hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Hong pai in, nangmah kithakhauhsak in la, na hih ding thu limtakin ngaihsun in; bang hang hiam cih leh khuakhal ciangin Siria kumpipa nangmah do-in hong kuanto kik ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Siria kumpipa’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Amaute’ pasiante in mual tung pasiante hi a, tua ahih ciangin eite sangin amaute hatzaw uh hi; ahih hangin zanglei ah amaute do ni; amaute sangin eite i hatzaw taktak ding hi.
Hih thu hih in: kumpite ama panmun ciat panin khinkhia in la, amaute’ munah galkap mangte koih in;

tua ciangin na taansa galkap tawh a kibang galkap, sakol tangin sakol, leeng tangin leeng khawm in; tua ciangin zanglei ah amaute i do ding a, amaute sangin eite i hatzaw taktak ding hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amau’ thu ngai-in hih hi.
Khuakhal ciangin Benhadad in Siriate khawmin Israel do dingin Afek ah kuan to hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite kikhawmin, lam-an kiguan’ a, amaute do dingin kuan uh hi; Israel mite in amaute’ mai-ah keelhon neu nih bangin giahphual sat uh a, ahih hangin Siriate in gamsung khempeuh dim hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mi khat a nai-ah hong pai-in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi. ‘Siriate in, “Topa in mualtung pasian hi a, amah in kuam sung pasian hi lo hi,” ci uh ahih manin hih a lian mihonpi khempeuh nangma khut sungah kong pia ding a, keimah in Topa ka hihna na thei ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in kimaituahin ni sagih sung giahphual satin om uh hi. A ni sagih ni-in gal kido uh hi; Israel mite in Siriate ni khat sungin khe galkap tul-zakhat vat lum uh hi.
Tua ciangin a om laite Afek khuapi ah tai uh hi; a om lai mi tul-sawmnih leh tulsagih tungah kulhpi cim hi. Banhadad zong tai a, khuapi sunga inndei sungnung khatah lut hi.

Tua ciangin a nasemte in ama kiangah, “Tu-in en in, Israel kumpite in hehpihna a nei kumpite hi, ci-in i za hi; puanhampi i kawngah tengin i lu tungah khauhual vialin Israel kumpipa kiangah pai ni; amah in na nuntakna hong suaktasak kha ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a kawng uhah puanhampi tengin a lu uhah khauhual vialin Israel kumpipa kiangah pai uh a, “Na nasempa Benhadad in, ‘Kong thuum hi, kei hong nungtasak in,’ ci hi,” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Amah nungta lai ahi hiam? Amah in ka sanggampa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tu-in mite in a lim encikin ama tung panin a theih uh ciangin, “Hi hi, na sanggampa Benhadad nungta lai hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Pai un la, amah hong paipih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin ama kiangah Benhadad hong paikhia hi; amah in leeng tung ama kiangah amah kahtosak hi.

Tua ciangin Benhadad in ama kiangah, “Ka pa in na pa’ tung panin a lak khuapite kong piakik ding hi; ka pa in Samaria ah a bawl mah bangin Damaskas ah nang adingin sumbuk na hong thei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ahab in, “Hih na thugente’ hangin nang kong paisak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in thuciamna khat amah tawh bawlin paisak hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ thupiakna tawh kamsangte’ tapate mi khat in a lawmte khat kiangah, “Hong sat in, kong thuum hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a mipa in amah sat nuam lo hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in Topa’ thu mang lo na hih manin, en in, kei kiang panin na paikhiat khit phetin humpinelkai khat in nang hong that ding hi,” a ci hi. Ama kiang panin amah a kihep khiat khit phetin humpinelkai khat in amah dawntuahin that hi.
Tua ciangin amah in midang khat mu a, “Hong sat in, kong thuum hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mipa in amah satin, vatin amah liamsak hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa kihem khia-in lam gei-ah kumpipa ngak a, a mit tungah puan tawh tuamin a meel seel hi.

Kumpipa in a nawk lai takin amah in kumpipa tungah kiko-in, “Na nasempa gal sungah kuan hi; en in, galkap khat hong kihei-in kei kiangah mi khat hong paipih a, ‘Hih mipa kem in; amah man’na khat a neih zenzen leh ama nuntakna taangin nangma nuntakna hi ding a, ahih kei leh ngun talen khat na liau ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Na nasempa hih lai hua lai-ah manlahin a om kalin amah na mang hi,” a ci hi. Israel kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Nangma thukhenna bang hi ta hen; nangmahmah in na khen tawm hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a mit panin a tuamna phel dingin nawhtat hi; tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in amah pen kamsangte khat ahih lam thei hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Suksiat dinga ka sehsa mipa paikhiasak na hih ciangin ama nuntakna taangin nangma nuntakna, ama mite’ taangin nangma mite pai ding hi,” ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa a innah lungkimlo, maikhingin pai a, Samaria tung hi.
Tu-in Jezre-el khuami Naboth in Samaria kumpi Ahab’ kumpi inn gei-ah leenggui lo khat nei hi.

Hih thu khit ciangin Ahab in Naboth kiangah, “Ka inn tawh kinai ahih manin anteh huan dingin ka neih theih nadingin na leenggui lo hong pia in; keimah in tua tang dingin leenggui lo hoihzaw khat kong pia ding hi; ahih kei leh zong nang adingin a hoih zawk ding leh a man ding sum kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Naboth in Ahab kiangah, “Ka pu ka pate’ gamh nang tungah kong piak ding Topa in hong kham hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jezre-el khuami Naboth in ama tungah a thugenna hangin hehna leh maikhin’na tawh Ahab a innah ciah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Ka pu ka pate’ gamh nang tungah kong pia kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah a lupna tungah lumin a mai hei a, an ne lo hi.
Ahih hangin a zi Jezebel ama kiangah hong pai-in, ama kiangah, “An a ne lo zah dingin bang hangin na lungsim tua zahin heh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in ama kiangah, “Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Jezre-el khuami Naboth kiangah thu genin, ‘Sum tawh lei dingin na leenggui lo hong pia in; ahih kei leh zong, na lungkim leh tua tang dingin leenggui lo dang kong pia ding hi,’ ka ci hi; amah in hong dawngin, ‘Nang tungah ka leenggui lo kong pia kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a zi Jezebel in ama kiangah, “Tu-in Israel mite a ukpa hilo na hi hiam? Tho-in an ne in la, na lungsim nuamsak in; keimah in Jezre-el khuami Naboth’ leenggui lo nangma tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in Ahab’ minin laikhakte gelhin ama min gelhna tawh tua laite tungah gelh a, ama khuapi sungah Naboth tawh a teeng upate leh uliante tungah tua laite khak hi.
Amah in a laite sungah, “An tan’ ding thu zasak un la, mite lak a sangna munah Naboth koih un;
ama mai-ah mi ginalo nih koihin ama lang khatah mawhna zongsak in, ‘Nang in Pasian leh kumpipa na samsia hi,’ cisak un. Tua ciangin amah la khia un la, denglum un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama khuapi mi, ama khuapi sungah a teeng upate leh uliante in amaute tungah Jezebel’ thupuak bangin hih uh hi. Amaute tungah a khak laite sungah a kigelh mah bangin,
amaute in an tan’ ding thu zasak uh a, mite lak a sangna munah Naboth koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin mi ginalo nihte hong pai-in ama mai-ah tu uh hi; tua ciangin mi ginalo nihte in mite’ mai-ah Naboth’ mawhna zong uh a, “Naboth in Pasian leh kumpipa samsia hi,” ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khuapi pua lamah amah paipih uh a, suang tawh amah denglum uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Jezebel kiangah thu puakin, “Suang tawh Naboth kideng zo hi; amah si hi,” a ci uh hi.

Jezebel in Naboth suang tawh kidengin a sihna a zak phetin, amah in Ahab kiangah, “Tho in, sum tawh lei dingin nangma tungah hong piak nop loh, Jezre-el khuami Naboth’ leenggui lo tang in; bang hang hiam cih leh Naboth hing nawn lo hi, si ta hi,” a ci hi.
Naboth a sihna thu Ahab in a zak phetin, a luah dingin Jezre-el khuami Naboth’ leenggui lo-ah a paisuk dingin tho hi.
Tua ciangin Tishbe khuami Elijah tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a,
“Tho in la, Samaria ah a om Israel kumpi Ahab dawntuah dingin paisuk in; en in, a la dingin a paina Naboth’ leenggui lo-ah amah om hi.

Nangmah in ama kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi; “That khinin, zong luah khin na hi hiam?” ci hi,’ na ci ding hi. Tua ciangin ama kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Uite in Naboth’ sisan a liahna munah uite in nangma sisan liak ding uh hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Ahab in Elijah kiangah, “Ka galpa aw, kei hong mu na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Topa muhna ah a sia gamta dingin nangmah kipia tawm na hih manin nangmah kong mu hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nangma tungah siatna kong tungsak ding hi; nang kong phiatkhia siang ding a, Israel sungah nangma mi sal leh a suakta mi pasal khempeuh, ka susia ding hi;
kei nong hehsakna hang leh Israel na khialhsakna hangin Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ innkuan leh Ahijah’ tapa Baasha’ innkuan bangin nangma innkuan ka bawl ding hi.
Jezebel’ thu zong Topa in genin, ‘Uite in Jezre-el huam sungah Jezebel ne ding uh hi,’ ci hi.
Khuapi sungah Ahab’ innkuan a si peuhpeuh uite in ne ding uh hi; gamlakah a si ama innkuan peuhpeuh huih lak vasate in ne ding uh hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
Ama zi Jezebel in a hanthot Ahab bangin Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta dingin amahmah a kipia tawm mi kuamah om lo hi.
Topa in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawlkhiat Amor mite bangin milimte zui-in a kihhuai mahmahin gamta hi.
Ahab in hih thute a zak ciangin a puante balkek a, a pum tungah puanhampi silhin, an tangin puanhampi tungah lum a, maikhingin vak kawikawi hi.
Tu-in Tishbe khuami Elijah tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a,

“Keima mai-ah bangzahin Ahab a kiniamkhiatna na mu hiam? Keima mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat ahih manin ama hun sungin siatna ka tungsak kei ding hi; ahih hangin a tapa’ hun sungin ama innkuan tungah siatna ka tungsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kum thum sung Siria leh Isarel galkido loin om uh hi.
Ahih hangin a kum thumna kumin Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat, Israel kumpipa Ahab kiangah paisuk hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, “Ramoth-gilead eima’ aa hi a, eite pau loin om-in Siria kumpipa khut sung panin i lakkhiat lohna thu na thei uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Ramoth-gilead ah galdo dingin kei nong zui ding hiam?” a ci hi. Jehoshafat in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Kei-a kipan ka mite leh ka sakolte in nangma’ aa ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Topa thu dong masa in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa kamsangte mihing zali bang khawmin amaute tungah, “Ramoth-gilead a sim dingin ka kuan ding hiam, ahih kei leh ka thuak ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Kuanto in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa i kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jehoshafat in, “Thu i dot theih ding Topa’ kamsang adang khat beek om nawn lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Topa thu i dot theih ding, Imlah’ tapa Mikaiah kici mi khat om lai hi; ahih hangin amah in kei’ thu a hoih gen ngei loin a sia gen ahih manin amah ka mudah hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in, “Kumpipa in tua bangin ci kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in ulian khat samin, “Manlangin Imlah’ ‘tapa Mikaiah hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Samaria kulhpi lutna ancilna ah Israel kumpipa leh Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat a kumpi tokhom tung uhah tu-in kumpi puan tawh kizemin om uh hi; kamsang khempeuh in amau’ mai-ah thu gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Khene-anah’ tapa Zedekiah in ama adingin sik kite bawl a, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Amaute a kisuksiat matengin hihte tawh Siria mite na nawt ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Kamsang khempeuh in zong tua mah bangin genin, “Ramoth-gilead ah kuanto in la, gualzo in; Topa in kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Mikaiah a sam dingin a pai kamtaipa in ama kiangah, “En in, thu kikhatin kamsangte’ thugen in kumpipa’ adingin a hoih lam ahi hi; amaute’ thugen bangin nang zong gen in la, a hoih lamin gen in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Mikaiah in, “Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin, Topa in kei tungah a hong gen thu ka gen ding hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa kiangah amah a tun’ ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Mikaiah aw, Ramoth-gilead ah galsim dingin i kuan ding hiam, ahih kei leh i thuak ding hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Kuanto in la, va gualzo in; Topa in kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Topa’ min tawh thudang gen loin thuman bek kei tungah nong gen nading bangzah vei hong thuhilh ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Tuucing a nei lo tuute bangin mualte tungah Israel mi khempeuh a kithehthang ka mu hi; Topa in, Hihte in makai nei lo hi; amaute lungnuam takin a inn ciat uhah ciah hen,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Amah in kei’ thu a hoih gen loin a sia gen ding hi, nang kiangah hong ci khin hilo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thu ngai in: Topa a kumpi tokhom tungah tu-in, ama pang a taklam khut leh a vei lamah vantungmi honpi a ding ka mu hi;
tua ciangin Topa in, ‘Amah kuanto-in Ramoth-gilead ah a tuk nadingin kua in Ahab va zol ding hiam?’ ci hi. Khat in thu khat genin adang khat in thudang khat gen hi.
Tua ciangin Kha khat hong mai dawkin Topa mai-ah ding a, ‘Keimah in amah ka zol ding hi,’ a ci hi.

Topa in ama kiangah, ‘Bang lam tawh zol ding na hi hiam?’ a ci hi. Amah in, ‘Keimah paikhia-in, ama kamsangte khempeuh’ kam sungah zuau thei kha ka va hi ding hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Nangmah in amah a va zol ding na hi a, nangmah in na zo ding hi; paikhia in la, tua bangin hih in,’ a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in en in, Topa in hih na kamsangte khempeuh’ kam sungah zuauthei kha khat koih khin hi; Topa in nang tawh kisai-in a sia gen khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Khena-anah’ tapa Zedekiah a nai-ah hong pai-in Mikaiah a paang bengin, “Nang tungah thu a gen dingin keima tung panin Topa’ Kha hong bangci pai hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “En in, nangmah a bu dingin inndei sungnung ah na pai ni ciangin na mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in, “Mikaiah man un la, khuapi sung a ukpa Amon leh kumpipa’ tapa Joash kiangah paipih kik un;
tua ciangin, ‘Kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi, “Hih mipa thong sungah koih un la, lungnuamin kei kong ciahkik matengin an leh tui tawmno cik bek tawh vaak un,” ci hi,” va ci un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Lungnuam takin nong ciahkik leh Topa in kei tung tawnin thu hong gen lo ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “No mi khempeuhte aw hih ka thugen za un,” ci thuah lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa leh Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat Ramoth-gilead ah kuanto uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Kei ka meel seelin gal sungah kong kuan ding a, ahih hangin nangmah in na kumpi puante nong silh ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in a meel seelin gal sungah kuan hi.
Tu-in Siria kumpipa Aram in ama leeng a uk mi sawmthum-le-nihte thu pia-in, “A neu ahi a, a lian tawh ahi zongin kido loin, Israel kumpipa bek tawh na kido ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Leeng a ukte in Jehoshafat a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Israel kumpipa hi taktak hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah do dingin amaute kihei uh hi; tua ciangin Jehoshafat awng khia hi.
Israel kumpipa ahih lohna leeng a ukte in a muh uh ciangin amah a delhna panin amaute nungkik uh hi.

Ahih hangin mi khat in a thal mawk lot a, a galhiam awmdal thep kikalah lutin Israel kumpipa kha hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in a leeng hawlpa kiangah, “Kei liam ka hih manin kihei in la, gal sung panin hong puakhia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ni-in gal kidona lian a, nitak a sih dong Siriate lam mai ngatin a leeng sungah Israel kumpipa kingamin om hi; a liamna panin a si luangte leeng taw lamah luang hi.
Nitum pawlin galkapte lakah kikona khat hong om a, “Mi khempeuh ama khuapi-ah, mi khempeuh ama gamah!” kici hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa si a, Samaria ah kipaipih hi; amaute in Samaria ah kumpipa vui uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Samaria bual gei-ah leeng sil uh a, Topa in a gensa thu tawh kizui-in uite in a sisan liak tumin numei paktatte tua sungah kisil uh hi.
Tu-in Ahab’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh, leh ama lamsa saiha inn, leh ama lam khuapi khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin a pate tawh Ahab ihmu hi; ama tangin a tapa Ahaziah in uk hi.
Israel kumpi Ahab’ kum lina kumin Asa’ tapa Jehoshafat in Judah tungah uk ding kipan hi.
Gam uk dingin a kipatin Jehoshafat kum sawmthum-le-nga pha a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih-le-nga sung uk hi. Ama’ nu’ min in Azubah hi a, Shilhi’ tanu ahi hi.

Amah in a pa Asa’ khekhap tawn hi; amah tua lampi panin pial loin, Topa muhna ah a manin gamta hi; ahi zongin mual tunga biaknate kilakhia lo a, mite in tuate tungah biakna pia lai-in paknamtui hal uh hi.
Jehoshafat in Israel kumpipa tawh zong kilemna bawl hi.
Tu-in Jehoshafat’ gamtatna a om laite, leh amah in a lah a thahatna, leh amah in a galdona, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
A pa Asa’ hun lai-in a om lai pasal paktat pawlte amah in gamsung panin beisak hi.
Edom ah kumpi om lo hi; Judah kumpipa khut nuai-a a huhpa khat in uk hi.
Jehoshafat in kham zongin Ofir-ah a pai dingin Tarshish teembawte bawl hi; ahih hangin Ezion-geber ah teembawte sia ahih manin amaute pai lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ahab’ tapa Ahaziah in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Teembawte sungah nangma nasemte tawh keima nasemte paikhawmsak in,” a ci hi; ahih hangin Jehoshafat ut lo hi.
Tua ciangin a pate tawh ihmu a, David’ khuapi Jerusalem ah a pate tawh kivui hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jehoram in uk hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat’ kum sawm-le-sagihna kumin Ahab’ tapa Ahaziah in Samaria panin Israel tungah kum nih sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta a, ama nu, leh ama pa, leh Israel a khialsak Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khekhap mah tawn hi.
Amah in Baal’ na semin bia a, a pa mah bangin a hihna khempeuh ah Israel Pasian, Topa hehsak hi.
Ahab a sih khit ciangin Moab gam in Israel lehdo hi.

Tu-in Samaria a, a inndei tungnung sung a kikalh simsiam panin Ahaziah kia-in a cina hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in kamtaite sawlin amaute kiangah, “Pai un, hih cinatna panin ka damkik zo ding hiam cih thu Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah va dong un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Topa’ vantungmi in Tishbe mi Elijah kiangah, “Ding in, Samaria kumpipa’ kamtaite dawn dingin paito in la, amaute kiangah, ‘Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah thu dong dingin na pai nadingin Israel sungah Pasian om nawn lo ahi hiam?’ ci in.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Nang in tu-a na lupna panin na thokik nawn kei ding hi; nang na si taktak ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Elijah pai hi.
Kamtaite kumpipa kiangah hong ciahkik uh a, amah in amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin hong ciahkik na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Kote dawn dingin mi khat hong pai a, kote kiangah, ‘Note hong sawl kumpipa kiangah paikik un la, ama kiangah, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah thu a dong dingin na sawl nadingin Israel sungah Pasian om nawn lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin tu-a na lupna panin na thokik nawn kei ding hi; na si taktak ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note a dawn dingin hong pai-in hih thute a genpa in a bangci mi ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in amah dawngin, “Amah in samul puan khat silh a, a kawngah savun kawnggak gak hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Amah in Tishbe mi Elijah ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah mihing sawmnga a ukpa a mihing sawmnga tawh sawl hi. Mual dawn khatah a tu Elijah kiangah amah paito-in ama kiangah, “Pasian’ mipa aw, kumpipa in, ‘Hong paisuk hen,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Elijah in mihing sawmnga a ukpa dawngin, “Keimah in Pasian’ mi khat ka hih leh, vantung panin meikuang hong paisuk hen la, kangtum hen,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin vantung panin meikuang hong paisukin amah leh a mihing sawmngate kangtum hi.

Kumpipa in ama kiangah mihing sawmnga a uk adang khat a mihing sawmnga tawh sawlkik hi. Tua ciangin amah paito-in a kiangah, “Pasian’ mipa aw, hih in kumpipa’ thupiakna ahi hi, ‘Manlang takin hong paisuk in!” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Elijah in amaute dawngin, “Keimah in Pasian’ mi khat ka hih leh, vantung panin meikuang hong paisuk hen la, nang leh na mihing sawmngate hong kangtum hen,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin vantung panin Pasian’ meikuang hong paisukin amah leh a mihing sawmngate kangtum hi.

Kumpipa in mihing sawmnga a uk a thumna-pa a mihing sawmnga tawh sawl leuleu hi. Tua ciangin mihing sawmnga a uk a thumna-pa paito a, Elijah’ mai-ah hong pai-in khukdin’in hong puk a, amah kun-in, “Pasian’ mipa aw, nangma tungah kong thum hi, keima nuntakna leh nangma nasem hih mihing sawmngate’ nuntakna pammaih sa-in hong hehpih in.
En in, vantung panin meikuang hong paisuk a, mihing sawmnga a uk a masa nihte a mi sawmngate uh tawh kangtum hi; ahih hangin tu-in ka nuntakna pammaih sa-in hong hehpih in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in Elijah kiangah, “Amah tawh paisuk in; amah kihta kei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah ding-in kumpipa kiangah amah tawh paisuk a,

tua ciangin ama kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi, “Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in Ekron pasian, Baalzebub kiangah thu dong dingin kamtaite na sawl khin hi, thu dot ding Israel sungah Pasian om nawn lo ahi hiam?Tua ahih ciangin tu-a na lupna panin nang na thokik nawn kei ding hi; nang na si taktak ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Elijah’ gensa Topa’ kammal tawh kizui-in amah si hi. Ahaziah in tapa nei lo ahih manin Judah kumpipa, Jehoshafat’ tapa Jehoram’ kum nihna kumin, a sanggampa Jehoram in ama tangin kumpi suak hi.
Tu-in Ahaziah’ gamtatna a sepsa a om laite, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tu-in Topa in pingpei-in vantungah Elijah a lak ding lai-in Elijah leh Elishate Gilgal panin inn zuanin lamkal-a om ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in Elisha kiangah, “Hih lai-ah khawl in, kong thuum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Beth-el ciang dong kei hong sawl hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Elisha in, “Topa a nuntak bang, leh nang mahmah na nuntak mah bangin, nang kong nusia kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute Beth-el-ah paisuk uh hi.

Tua ciangin Beth-el ah a om kamsang honkhat Elisha kiangah hong paikhia uh a, ama kiangah, “Topa in tu ni-in nangma kiang panin na topa a lakkhiat ding na thei hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Hi hi, ka thei hi; bangmah gen nawn kei un,” a ci hi.

Elijah in ama kiangah, “Elisha aw, hih lai-ah khawl in, kong thum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Jerikho-ah kei hong sawl hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Topa a nuntak bang, leh nang mahmah na nuntak mah bangin, nang kong nusia kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jerikho ah amaute tung uh hi.

Jerikho ah a om kamsang honkhat in Elisha kiangah hong naih uh a, ama kiangah, “Topa in tu ni-in nangma kiang panin na topa a lakkhiat ding na thei hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Hi hi, ka thei hi; bangmah gen nawn kei un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elijah in ama kiangah, “Hih lai-ah khawl in, kong thum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Jordan ah kei hong sawl hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Topa a nuntak bang, leh nang mahmah na nuntak mah bangin, nang kong nusia kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute a nih-un pai lai uh hi.
Kamsang mihing sawmnga zong pai a, amaute gel Jordan gei-ah a din’ lai tak, a kiang panun a gamla simah amaute ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Elijah in a puantualpi suahin zial a, tua tawh a tui sat hi; lei keu tungah amaute gel a pai theih matengin a pang khat leh a pang lang khatah a tui kikhen hi.

Amaute a galkah khit uh ciangin Elijah in Elisha kiangah, “Nang kiang panin kei hong kilak khiat ma-in nang adingin kong hihsak ding hong gen in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in, “Kong thuum hi, na kha’ tanh nih hong luahsak in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “A haksa na khat nong ngen hi; ahi zongin, nangma kiang panin kei hong kilak lai takin kei nong muh leh nang adingin tua hong piang ding hi; ahih hangin kei nong muh kei leh tua bangin hong piang lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute a pai kawmkawm a kiho lai takun, en in, mei leeng khat leh mei sakolte in amaute nih khen hi. Tua ciangin vantungah Elijah pingpei-in paito hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in tua mu-in amah kiko a, “Ka pa, ka pa! Israel mite’ leengte leh sakol galkapte!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in Elijah mu nawn lo hi. Tua ciangin amah in ama puan lenin phel nih-in balkek hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama tung panin a kiakhia Elijah’ puan tawm a, kilehin Jordan gunpang ah ding hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama tung panin a kiakhia Elijah’ puan la-in tui sat a, “Elijah’ Pasian, Topa koi-ah om na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in tui a sat khit ciangin a pang khat leh a pang lang khatah a tui kikhen hi; tua ciangin Elisha pai-in galkah hi.

Tu-in Jerikho ah a om kamsangte in amah a muh uh ciangin amaute in, “Elijah’ kha Elisha tungah om hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah dawn dingin amaute hong pai uh a, ama mai lei lakah amaute kun uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Tu-in en in, na nasemte tawh a thahat mihing sawmnga om hi; kong thum uh hi, amaute paisak in la na topa zong in; Topa’ Kha in amah manin mual tung ahih kei leh guam sungah amah khia hi kha ding hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Na sawl kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in amah a maizum dongin a cih teitei uh ciangin, amah in, “Sawl un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in mihing sawmnga sawl uh hi; amaute in ni thum sung amah zong uh a, ahih hangin amah mu lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah Jerikho ah a khawl sungin ama kiangah amaute hong paikik uh a, amah in amaute kiangah, “Note kiangah, Pai kei un, hong ci hilo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tu-in khuapi mite in Elisha kiangah, “En in, ka topa in a muh bangin, hih khuapi omzia nuam hi; ahih hangin a tui sia a, hih gamah kipung thei lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Hai thak khat hong paipih un la, a sungah ci koih un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in ama kiangah paipih uh hi.
Tua ciangin tuinak ah amah pai-in a sungah ci lawnin, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi, hih tui a hoihin ka bawl khin hi; tu-a kipanin sihna ahi a, tatolhna ahi zongin piangsak nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Elisha’ kampauna tawh kizui-in tu ni dongin a tui hoih hi.

Amah tua lai panin Beth-el-ah paito hi; lampi ah amah a paitoh lai takin khuapi panin naupang neu pawl khat hong paikhia-in amah zahko uh a, “Paito in, nang lukolhpa! Paito in, nang lukolhpa!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah a kiimah kihei a, amah in amaute a muh ciangin Topa’ min tawh amah in amaute samsia hi. Tua ciangin gamlak panin vom a pi nih hong pai-in naupang sawmli-le-nih balgawp hi.
Tua lai panin amah Karmel Mual ah paisuak a, tua ciangin Samaria ah ciahkik hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat’ kum sawm-le-giatna kumin Samaria sung Israelte tungah Ahab’ tapa Jehoram kumpi suak a, amah in kum sawm-le-nih sung uk hi.
Ama nu leh ama pa zahin a siat loh hangin amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta hi. Amah in a pa’ bawlsa Baal khuampi koihkhia tei a,
ahi zongin amah in Israelte a khialsak Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhna mah pom hi; tua panin amah kihemkhia lo hi.
Tu-in Moab kumpi Mesha in tuu khawipa ahi hi; amah in Israel kumpipa tungah kum simin tuuno tul zakhat, leh tuutal tul zakhat’ mul a piak ding ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Ahab a sih ciangin Moab kumpipa in Israel kumpipa lehdo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua lai takin Samaria panin Kumpi Jehoram kuan khia-in Israel mi khempeuh khawm hi.

Tua ciangin amah pai-in Judah kumpi Jehoshafat kiangah thu puak a, “Moab kumpipa in kei hong lehdo hi; Moab gam a sim dingin kei tawh nong kuan ding hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Kong kuan ding hi; keimah akipanin ka mite leh ka sakolte in nangma’ aa ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Koi lam tawnin kuan ding i hi hiam?” a ci hi. Jehoram in dawngin, “Edom gamlak lam tawnin,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah kumpipa leh Edom kumpipa tawh Israel kumpipa pai hi. Amaute ni sagih sung a kual paikhit uh ciangin galkapte hita leh amaute a zui ganhingte’ ading hita leh tui om lo hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in, “Ala! Moab kumpipa khut sungah a piak dingin Topa in hih kumpi thumte sam hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in, “Ama tung tawnin Topa tungah thu i dot theih nadingin hih lai-ah Topa’ kamsang om lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa’ nasemte khat in dawngin, “Elijah’ khut, tui a buak zel, Shafat’ tapa Elisha om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in, “Topa’ thu in amah tawh om hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa leh Jehoshafat leh Edom kumpipa ama kiangah paisuk uh hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Nang tawh bang kisai ka hi hiam?” Na nu’ kamsangte leh na pa’ kamsangte kiangah pai in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Israel kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Hilo hi; Moab khut sungah a piak dingin hih kumpi thumte a sampa in Topa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elisha in, “Ama na ka sep Vanglianpen Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin, Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat thupi ngaihsutna nei lo hi leng, nang hong en loin, zong kong mu kei ding hi.
Ahih hangin tu-in lasakna a tum siam khat hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Lasakna a tum siampa in a tum ciangin Topa’ kha ama tungah hong tung hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Hih a keu luitaw, tuilite tawh a dimin ka bawl ding hi,’ ci hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Huih ahi a, guah ahi zongin na mu kei ding a, ahih hangin nangmah in na dawn ding, nang, na ganhon, leh na ganpite in a dawn dingin luitaw in tui tawh kidim ding hi,’ ci hi.
Hih in Topa muhna ah a thuneu khat ahi hi; amah in Moab mite zong nangma khut sungah hong pia ding a,

nangmah in kulhpi a nei khuapi khempeuh, leh khuapi deihhuai khempeuh zo-in, singkung hoih khempeuh phukin, tuinak khempeuh na khakcip ding a, leitang hoih khempeuh suangtum tawh na kidimsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
A zingsang ciang, biakna piak hunin, en in, gam sung tui tawh a kidim matengin Edom panin tui hong luang hi.
Amaute a sim dingin kumpite a kuan tohna thu Moab mite khempeuh in a zak uh ciangin, a moipen panin a hampen dongin galhiam a tawi thei khempeuh kisamkhia uh a, gamgi ah kikhawm uh hi.
A zingciang zingsang tungin amaute tho-in, tui tungah ni a taan’ ciangin, Moab mite in amau’ gal khatah a om tuite pen sisan bangin a sanin mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hih in sisan ahi hi; kumpite khat leh khat kidoin, khat leh khat kithat hi taktak ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, Moabte aw, vankinusiate va la ni!” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Israelte’ giahphual ah amaute a tun’ uh ciangin, amaute’ mai-ah a taikhiat matengin Israel mite hong kipanin Moab mite do uh hi; tua ciangin amaute mai nawtin pai-in a pai kawmun Moab mite that uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in khuapite lawnthal uh a, suang in a khuhcip dongin leitang tung khempeuhah mi khempeuh in suang lawn uh hi; amaute in tuinak khempeuh khakcip uh a, singkung hoih khempeuh phuk uh hi; Kirhareseth ah a suangtumte bek a om dongin suanglotna tawite in umcihin vatgawp uh hi.
Moab kumpipa in galsimna pen amah a kihihna ahih lam a theih ciangin, Edom kumpipa’ santak a phukhia dingin namsau tawi mihing zasagih la hi; ahih hangin amaute in phukhia zo lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama tangin a uk ding a tapa upa pen la-in kulh tungah meihal biakna-in pia hi. Israel mite in tua bang gamtatna a muh uh ciangin a lungsim uh sukha mahmah a, amau’ kiang panin nungkikin a gamah ciahkik uh hi.

Siria kumpipa’ galkap a uk Na-aman in a topa tawh milian khat hi-in maipha lianpi a ngah mi ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama hangin Siria mite gualzawhna pia hi. Amah in a thahat a vanglian khat hi a, ahih hangin amah in a phak ahi hi.
Tu-in Siria mite in a galsimna khat uhah Israel panin numeino khat ciahpih uh a, tua nu in Na-aman’ zi na sem hi.
Amah in a tonu kiangah, “Samaria ah a om kamsangpa tawh ka topa a omkhawm hi leh! Amah in a phakna damsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Na-aman sungtumin a topa kiangah, “Tua bang tua bangin Israel gam numeino in thu gen hi,” ci-in gen hi.
Tua ciangin Siria kumpipa in, “Tu-in pai in, Israel kumpipa kiangah lai khat ka khak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in ngun talen sawm, kham shekel tulguk, leh pawi puan sawm keng hi.
Amah in Israel kumpipa tungah laikhak keng a, tua sungah, “Hih laikhak na ngah ciangin, ama phakna na damsak theih nadingin ka nasempa Na-aman nang kiangah kong sawlna thu thei in,” a ci hi.

Israel kumpipa in a laikhak a sim ciangin amah in a puante balkekin, “Mi khat a phakna damsak dingin hih mipa in kei tungah hih thu hong puak nadingin a that ding leh a nungtasak dingin keimah in Pasian ka hi hiam? Ngaihsun dih un la, kei tawh kitot nading a zon’na thei un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Israel kumpipa in a puante a balkekna thu Pasian’ mipa Elisha in a zak ciangin, amah in kumpipa kiangah mi sawlin, “Bang hangin na puante balkek na hi hiam? Israel sungah kamsang khat a omna thu amah in a theih nadingin tu-in kei kiangah amah hong paisak in,” ci sak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin sakolte leh a leengte tawh Na-aman hong pai-in Elisha’ kongah khawl hi.
Tua ciangin Elisha in ama kiangah kamtai khat sawlin, “Pai in la, Jordan sungah sagih vei kisil in, tua ciangin nangma ci-le-sa a ngei hong bang kikin nang na siang ding hi,” ci sak hi.

Ahih hangin Na-aman heh a, paikhia-in, “En in, amah kei kiangah hong paikhia-in, hong ding-in, a Pasian a Topa’ min loin, a natna mun tungah a khut vanin, mi phakpa damsak taktak ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.

Israel tui khempeuhte sangin Damakas gunte ahi Abana leh Farpar hoihzaw hilo ahi hiam? Tuate sungah kisilin siang thei lo ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kihei-in a hehsa-in paikhia hi.

Ahih hangin a nasemte a nai-ah hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Ka pa aw, kamsangpa in na lian khat hih dingin hong sawl leh hih ding hilo na hi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin amah in nang kiangah, ‘Kisil in la, siang in,’ hong cih ciangin na hih zawk ding bangzah ta-in kilawm hilo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian’ mipa kamgen bangin amah paisukin Jordan sungah sagih vei kidiah hi; tua ciangin a ci-le-sa naupangno’ ci-le-sa bangin a ngei bang kikin amah siang hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa kiangah amah leh a pawlte khempeuh kileh kikin amah hong pai-in ama mai-ah ding hi; tua ciangin amah in, “En in, leitung khempeuhah Pasian om loin, Israel sungah om hi, ci-in ka thei hi; tua ahih ciangin tu-in na nasempa tung panin letsong khat hong sang in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “A na ka sep Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin, bangmah kong sang kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a lak nading kunh teitei a, ahih hangin amah in nial hi.

Tua ciangin Na-aman in, “Tua ahih kei leh, kong thuum hi, na nasempa’ tungah la-sakol nih puak khop leitang hong pia in; bang hang hiam cih leh tu-a kipanin na nasempa in meihal biakna ahi a, biak piakna ahi zongin pasian khat peuhpeuh tungah pia loin Topa tungah ka pia ding hi.

Ahi zongin hih thu-ah Topa in na nasempa a mawhna hong maisak hen: ka topa Rimmon inn sungah a bia dingin pai-in ka ban tungah kingam a, Rimmon inn sungah kei ka kun ciangin, hih thu-ah Topa in na nasempa hong maisak hen,” a ci hi.
Amah in ama kiangah, “Nuam takin pai in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin ama kiang panin Na-aman tom khat a paikhit ciangin,

Pasian’ mipa Elisha’ nasem Gehazi in, “En un, ama tung panin ama hong puak san’ lohna tawh ka topa in Siria mi hih Na-aman khah hi. Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin, ama nungah kei tai-in ama tung panin na khat peuhpeuh ka ngah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gehazi in Na-aman nung delh hi. Tua ciangin ama nungah mi khat hong taina Na-aman in a muh ciangin amah dawn dingin a leeng panin kum a, “Thu a hoih kim hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “A vekpi-in hoih hi. Ka topa in, ‘Kamsangte nih Efraim mualtung gam panin kei kiangah tu mahmahin hong tung hi; kong thum hi, amaute tungah ngun talen khat leh pawi puan nih pia in,’ a ci dingin hong sawl hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Na-aman in, “Talen nih hong sang nuam hoh in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a san’ ding kunh a, ngun talen nih ip nihin henin pawi puan nih tawh, a nasem nihte tungah guan hi; tua ciangin amaute in Gehazi’ mai-ah tuate pua uh hi.
Tua ciangin mual tungah amah a tun’ ciangin amah in amaute’ tung panin tuate la-in inn sungah koih hi; tua ciangin mite sawl khia a, amaute kihem uh hi.
Amah sungtumin a topa mai-ah ding a, tua ciangin Elisha in ama kiangah, “Gehazi aw, koi-ah pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Na nasempa koimah pai lo hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in ama kiangah, “Nangmah dawn dingin a leeng tung panin mipa a kihei lai takin nang tawh ka kha omkhawm hilo ahi hiam? Sum leh puante, oliv huante leh leenggui lote, tuute leh bawngtalte, nasem numeite leh nasem pasalte san’ ding hun ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin nangma tung leh na suan-le-khakte tungah Na-aman’ phakna hong belh tawntung ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Gehazi ama omna panin vuk bangin kaangin a phakin paikhia hi.
Tu-in kamsangte khat in Elisha kiangah, “Thei in, nangma ukna nuai-a ka ten’na mun uh kote’ adingin neu lua hi.
Kote Jordan ah hong paisakin kote in singluang khat ciat la-in ka ten’ nading uh mun khat ko hong bawlsak in,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Pai un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute khat in, “Na nasemte tawh kuan khawm ding hong ut in,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Kong kuan ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute tawh amah kuan hi. Amaute Jordan a tun’ uh ciangin amaute in sing phuk uh hi.
Ahih hangin khat in singluang a tan lai takin a heitang tui sungah kia hi; tua ciangin amah kiko-in, “Ala, ka topa! A kikawm hi ve’n,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa in, “Koi lai-ah kia ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in a mun ama kiangah a lah ciangin amah in ciangkang khat khiakin tua munah lawn a, a sik laamsak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Lato in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut zanin la hi.
Khat vei Siria kumpipa in Israel do a, amah in a nasemte tawh thu kikumin, “Tua mun tua mun in i pan’mun hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mipa in Israel kumpipa tungah thu puak a, “Siriate in hong buksim uh ahih manin hih mun na nawk khak loh nadingin kingaihsun in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Pasian’ mipa in a genna munah sawl hi. Tua bangin amah in amah hilhkhol zel a, tua ahih manin amahmah khatvei ahih kei leh nihvei sangin a tam veizaw kihonkhia hi.
Tua ciangin hih thu hangin Siria kumpipa nakpi takin patau hi; amah in a nasemte samin amaute kiangah, “Eite sung panin Israel kumpipa lamah a pangsim mipa hong gen lo ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nasemte khat in, “Kuamah om lo hi, ka topa, kumpipa aw; ahih hangin Israel sungah kamsang ahi Elisha in na lupna inndei sunga na thugente Israel kumpipa tungah gen hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Keimah in sawlin amah ka mat theih nadingin pai in la, amah a omna mun va thei in,” a ci hi. Ama kiangah, “En in, amah Dothan ah om hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in sakolte leh leengte leh galkap hon lianpi khat tua lai-ah sawl hi; amaute zanin hong pai-in khuapi umcih uh hi.

Pasian’ mipa’ nasempa zingsangin tho baihin a paikhiat ciangin en in, khuapi kimkotah sakolte leh leengte tawh galkap na om hi. Tua ciangin nasempa in, “Ala, ka topa! Bang cih ding ihi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Kihta kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tawh a omte sangin eite tawh a omte tamzaw hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in thungenin, “Topa aw, kong thum hi, amah in a muh theih nadingin a mitte hon’sak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in tangvalpa’ mitte hon’sak a, tua ciangin amah in mu hi; en in, Elisha’ kimkot mual tung in sakolte leh mei leengte tawh kidim hi.

Amah do dingin Siriate hong paisuk ciangin Elisha in Topa kiangah thungenin, “Hih mite mittawtna tawh vatgawp in, kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Elisha’ thungetna bangin amah in mittawtna tawh amaute vatgawp hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha in amaute kiangah, “Hih in a lampi hi lo a, hih in a khuapi hi lo hi; kei hong zui un, na zon’ uh mipa kiangah note kong paipih ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in Samaria ah amaute paipih hi.

Amaute Samaria ah a lut phetin Elisha in, “Topa aw, amaute in a muh theih nadingun hih mite’ mitte hon’sak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in amau’ mitte hon’sak a, tua ciangin amaute in mu uh hi; en in, Samaria laizangah amaute om uh hi.
Israel kumpipa in amaute a muh ciangin amah in Elisha kiangah, “Ka pa aw, amaute ka that ding hiam? Amaute ka that ding hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in dawngin, “Amaute na that kei ding hi. Na namsau leh na thal tawh loin galmatin na laksate that ding na hi hiam? Amaute in ne-in dawnin a topa uh kiangah a ciah theih nadingun amaute mai-ah an leh tui lui in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute adingin pawi lianpi khat bawl hi; amaute in ne-in a dawn khit uh ciangin amah in amaute sawlkhia a, tua ciangin a topa uh kiangah amaute ciah uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel gam a sim dingin Siriate hong pai nawn lo hi.
Tua khit ciangin Siria kumpipa Benhadad in a galkap buppi khawmin paito a, Samaria umcih hi.
Amaute in a um cih lai takin, la lutang khat ngun shekel sawmgiat, leh gam lo-uih bul hai khat ngun shekel nga-in a kizuak dongin Samaria ah kialpi lianpi tung hi.
Tu-in Israel kumpipa kulh zangah a pai lai takin numei khat ama tungah kiko-in, “Hong huh in, ka topa, Aw kumpipa!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa in nang hong huh kei leh koi lai pan nang hong huh ding ka hi hiam? Ancilna phual pan ahih kei leh leenggah sukna pan hi ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in tua nu dongin, “Na lungkhamna bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Hih numei in kei kiangah, ‘Tu ni-in amah i nek theih nadingin na tapa hong pia in, zing ciangin keima tapa i ne ding hi,’ hong ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kote in ka tapa huanin amah ka ne uh hi. A zing ciangin keimah in ama kiangah, ‘Amah i nek theih nadingin na tapa hong pia in,’ ka ci hi; ahih hangin tua nu in a tapa na seel hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in numeinu’ thugente a zak ciangin ama puante balkek hi—tu-in amah kulh zangah pai hi—mite khuadak uh a, en in, amah in puanhampi a sung lamah silh hi—
tua ciangin amah in, “Tu ni-in Shafat’ tapa Elisha’ lutang a liangko tungah a om lai taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei ta hen,” a ci hi.

Elisha a inn sungah tu a, upate amah tawh tukhawm uh hi. Tu-in kumpipa in ama omna panin mi khat sawlkhia hi; ahih hangin kamtaipa a tun’ ma-in Elisha in upate kiangah, “Hih mi thatpa in ka lutang a tankhia dingin hong sawlna na mu uh hiam? En un, kamtaipa hong tun’ ciangin kong khak un la, ama lang khatah khauh takin kongkhak lencip un. Ama nungah a topa’ kheging hong kiza hilo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute tawh amah a kiho lai takin ama kiangah kumpipa hong paisukin, “Hih lungkhamna Topa’ kiang pan ahi hi! Bang hangin Topa ngak lai ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Elisha in, “Topa’ thu za in: Topa in hih bangin ci hi. Zing ciang tu bang hunin Samaria kulh kongpi ah annel lawh khat shekel khatin kizuak ding a, mangbuhham lawh nih ciangin shekel khatin kizuak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a ban tungah kumpipa a kingapna galkap ukpa in Pasian’ mipa kiangah, “Topa mahmah in vantungah kongvangneute hong bawl leh zong, hih bang thu hi thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Nangma mit mahmah tawh hih thu na mu ding a, ahih hangin nang in na ne kha kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in kulh kongpi lutna ah a phak mi li om hi; amaute khat leh khat in, “I sih dongin bang hangin hih lai-ah tu ding i hi hiam?

Eite in, ‘Khuapi sungah lut ni,’ ci lehang, khuapi sungah kialpi om a, tua lai-ah eite i si ding hi; hih lai-ah tu lehang eite i si veve ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in hong pai-un, Siriate’ phualah va pai ni; amaute in eite hong khawi leh eite i nungta ding a, ahih hangin amaute in eite hong thah leh zong a si veve ding mah i hi lel hi,” kici uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute Siriate phual ah a pai dingin phalvak tungin tho uh hi; ahih hangin amaute Siriate’ phual a nawl a tun’ uh ciangin en in, tua lai-ah kuamah na om lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in leengte, leh sakolte, galkap hon lianpi khatte’ ging Siria galkapte zasak a, tua ahih ciangin amaute khat leh khat in, “En un, Israel kumpipa in eite hong hih dingin Hit kumpite leh Izipt kumpite cial hi,” kici uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute phalvak tungin tai-in a puanbukte, a sakolte, leh a late uh nusia uh a, a phual uh a tuaci bang mahin nusia-in a suahtak nadingun tai uh hi.

Giahphual nawlah hih a phakte hong tun’ uh ciangin puanbuk khat sungah amaute lutin ne-in dawn uh a, amaute in ngun leh kham leh puan puakhia-in pai-in tuate seel uh hi; tua ciangin amaute hong paikikin puanbuk dang khatah lut uh a, tua panin vante puakhia-in pai-in tuate seel leuleu uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute khat leh khat in, “A manin i gamta kei hi. Tu ni-in thuthak a hoih i theih ni ahi hi; eite pau loin zingsang khuavak dong ngak lehang daantahna i thuak ding hi; tua ahih ciangin tu-in hong pai un, eite pai-in kumpipa’ innkuante kiangah gen ni,” ki-ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute hong pai-in kulh kongpi cingte samin amaute kiangah, “Kote in Siriate’ phualah ka va tung uh a, en in, tua lai-ah kuamah kimu lo, bangmah kiza lo, bangmah om lo, ahih hangin sakolte kikhihin, late kikhihin, puanbukte a om bang bangin om hi,” ci-in gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin kulh kongpi cingte in thu zasak uh a, kumpipa’ innkuante sungah hih thu kigen hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa zanin tho-in a nasemte kiangah, “Siriate in eite’ lang khatah a vaihawmna kong gen ding hi. Eite i kialna amaute in thei uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute gamlakah a bu dingin a phual panun paikhia uh a, ‘Khuapi sung panin amaute a paikhiat uh ciangin amaute a hingin manin khuapi sungah i lut ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsun uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a nasemte khat in, “Mi pawl khat sakol a om laite sung panin nga paipih sak ni, hih lai-ah a om laite pen a sisa Israel mi honpi bup tawh a kibang lel ihihna i thei hi; amaute sawlin en dih ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in sakol tung tuang mi nih la a, kumpipa in Siria galkapte nungah amaute sawl a, “Pai-in va thei un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute Jordan ciang dong va pai uh hi; en in, lampi khempeuh Siriate in nawhsa-in a paihkhiat uh puante leh nate tawh paak zeizai hi. Tua ciangin kamtaite hong kikin kumpipa kiangah gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin mite paikhia uh a, Siriate’ phual luh uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ gensa bangin annel lawh khat shekel khatin kizuakin, mangbuhham lawh nih ciangin shekel khatin kizuak hi.

Tu-in kumpipa in a khut tungah a kingapnapa ahi a ukpa pen kulh kongpi ukin seh hi; tua ciangin mite in kulh kongpi ah ama tung sikin pai uh a, ama kiangah kumpipa a paisuk lai takin Pasian’ mipa’ gensa bangin amah si hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ mipa in kumpipa kiangah, “Zing ciang tu bang hunin Samaria kulh kongpi ah mangbuhham lawh nih ciangin shekel khatin kizuak ding a, annel lawh khat ciangin shekel khatin kizuak ding hi,” a cih ciangin,

galkap ukpa in Pasian’ mipa dawngin, “Topa mahmah in vantungah kongvangneute hong bawl leh zong, hih bang thu hi thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Nangma mit mahmah tawh hih thu na mu ding a, ahih hangin nang in na ne kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Mite in kulh kongpi ah ama tung sikin pai-in amah si ahih manin ama tungah tua bangin piang hi.

Tu-in Elisha in a tapa a nuntakna a hin’ kiksak numei kiangah, “Ding in, na innkuan tawh kihemkhia in la, na hih theihna peuhpeuh ah peem in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kialpi khat tungsak a, gam sungah tua kialpi kum sagih sung hong tung ding hi,” ci khin zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin numei ding-in Pasian’ mipa’ thugen bangin gamta hi; tua nu a innkuan tawh pai-in Filistiate gamah kum sagih sung peem hi.
Kum sagih a cin’ khit, Filistiate gam panin numei hong ciahkik ciangin, kumpipa kiangah a inn leh a leitang a ngen dingin paikhia hi.
Tu-in Pasian’ mipa’ nasem Gehazi tawh kumpipa kiho-in, “Elisha’ sepna na lian khempeuh hong gen in,” a ci hi.

Tu-in amah in Elisha in a sisa a hin’sakna thu kumpipa kiangah a gen lai takin, en in, a tapa a hin’ kiksak numei in kumpipa kiangah a inn leh a leitang hong ngen hi. Tua ciangin Gehazi in, “Ka topa, Kumpipa aw, hih lai-ah a numei om a, Elisha in a nuntakna a hin’ kiksak a tapa hih lai-ah om hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in numei kiangah a dot ciangin tua nu in ama kiangah gen hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in a uliante khat sawlin, “Leitang a nusiat ni-a kipan tu hun dong lo pana a piang khempeuh tawh ama’ aa ahi khempeuh piakik in,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Damaskas ah Elisha hong pai hi. Siria kumpipa Benhadad a ci na hi; ama kiangah, “Hih lai-ah Pasian’ mipa hong pai hi,” ci-in a kigen ciangin,
kumpipa in ama nuai-a ulian Hazael kiangah, “Letsong khat kengin Pasian’ mipa dawn dingin pai in la, ama tung tawnin Topa thu va dong in la, ‘Hih natna panin ka damkik zo ding hiam?’ ci in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah dawn dingin Hazael pai a, Damaskas a, na hoih namkim kalaoh puak sawmli letsong a keng hi. Amah hong tungin ama mai-ah a din’ ciangin amah in, “Siria kumpipa na tapa Benhadad in nang kiangah kei hong sawlin, ‘Hih natna panin ka damkik zo ding hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elisha in ama kiangah, “Pai in, ama kiangah gen in, ‘Na damkik taktak ding hi,’ ci in; ahih hangin Topa in amah a sih taktak ding kei kiangah hong lakkhin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah a maizum dongin a etna mun mah en denin Hazael sal gega hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa kap hi.

Tua ciangin Hazael in, “Bang hangin ka topa kap na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite tungah nangmah in na bawl ding siatna ka thei hi; nangmah in amau’ mun muanhuainate mei tawh na hal ding a, namsau tawh amau’ tangvalte thatin, amau’ naupang neute lei na den’ khap nading a, naupaai amau’ numeite na phelkham ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Hazael in, “Ui a hi lel na nasempa in hih na lian a hih nadingin bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Elisha in dawngin, “Nangmah in Siria tungah kumpi na hih ding thu Topa in kei tungah hong lakkhin zo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Elisha kiang panin amah kihem khia a, ama kiangah, “Elisha in nang kiangah bang hong ci ahi hiam?” a na ci a topa kiangah va tung hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Amah in kei kiangah nang na damkik taktak nading thu hong gen hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in a zing ciangin delhphahpuan khat la-in tui sungah tua puan diah a, tua puan kawt tawh kumpipa’ maitang tuamcipin si sak hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin Hazael kumpi suak hi.
Israel kumpi, Ahab’ tapa Joram’ kum ngana kumin, Judah kumpi, Jehoshafat’ tapa Jehoram in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah kumpi a suah hunin a kum sawmthum-le-nih pha a, Jerusalem ah kum giat sung uk hi.
Ahab’ tanu in ama zi ahih manin Ahab’ innkuante’ gamtatnasa, Israel kumpite’ lampi mah amah in tawn hi. Amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta hi.
Ahi zongin amah in ama tung leh a suante tungah ukna a piak suak ding thuciam khin ahih manin a nasempa David hangin Topa in Judah susia lo hi.
Ama hun sungin Judah ukna panin Edom mite lengkhia-in amau’ ading kumpi khat koih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoram in a leengte khempeuh tawh Zair-ah kuan hi. Tua lai-ah Edom mite in amaute umcih uh a, zanin kipanin amah leh a leeng ukte in amau a umcih Edom mite vatgawp-in innah tai uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin Judah ukna panin Edom mite lengkhia hi. Tua ciangin tua hun mahin Libnah lengkhia hi.
Tu-in Jehoram’ gamtatna a om laite leh ama sep khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin Jehoram a pate tawh ihmu a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Ahaziah in uk hi.
Israel kumpi, Ahab’ tapa Joram’ kum sawm-le-nihna kumin, Judah kumpi, Jehoram’ tapa Ahaziah in uk ding kipan hi.
Ahaziah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nih pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum khat sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Athaliah ahi hi; amah in Israel kumpi Omri’ tunu ahi hi.
Amah in zong Ahab’ innkuante’ makpa ahih manin Ahab’ innkuante’ gamtatnasa bangin Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta a, Ahab’ innkuante’ lampi mah tawn hi.
Siria mite in Joram a na liamsakna mun Ramoth-gilead ah Siria kumpipa Hazael tawh galkido dingin Ahab’ tapa Joram tawh kipawlin amah kuan hi.

Tua ciangin Siria kumpipa Hazael a sim lai takin Siria mite in Ramah ah amah a liamsakna mate Jezre-el ah a kidamsak dingin Kumpi Joram ciahkik hi. Amah a cina ahih manin, Jezre-el ah Ahab tapa Joram a veh dingin Judah kumpi Jehoram’ tapa Ahaziah va paisuk hi.
Tua ciangin kamsang Elisha in kamsangte’ sung pan khat samin ama kiangah, “Kithawi in la, hih sathau um tawi-in Ramoth-gilead ah va pai in.
Na tun’ ciangin, Nimshi’ tapa Jehoshafat, a tapa Jehu tua lai-ah va zong in; tua ciangin pai-in a lawmte lak panin a paikhiat ding sawl in la, inndei sungnung khat sungah amah paipih in.

Tua ciangin sathau um la-in ama lu tungah sung in la, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Israel tungah kumpi-in sathau kong nilh hi, ci hi,’ va ci in. Tua ciangin kongkhak hong in la, tai in; zekai kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kamsang tangvalpa Ramoth-gilead ah pai hi.

Amah a tun’ ciangin, en in, galkap a ukte in thu kikupna nei uh hi; tua ciangin amah in, “Ukpa aw, nang tungah thugen ding khat ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in, “Kote lakah kua tungah nei na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Nangma tung hi, ukpa aw,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah ding-in inn sungah pai hi; tua ciangin tangvalpa in ama lu tungah a sathau sungin, ama kiangah, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, Israel mite’ tung, Topa’ mite tungah kumpi-in nang sathau kong nilh hi.
Kamsang ka nasemte a thahna leh Topa’ nasemte khempeuh a thahna hangin Jezebel tungah phu ka lak theih nadingin na topa Ahab innkuan na satpuk ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ahab innkuan sia ding hi; Israel sungah keimah in Ahab’ innkuan panin sal hita leh a suakta hita leh pasal khempeuh ka beisak ding hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ innkuan leh Ahijah’ tapa Baasha’ innkuan bangin Ahab’ innkuan ka bawl ding hi.
Tua ciangin uite in Jezre-el gam sungah Jezebel ne-in, kuamah in amah vui lo ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in kongkhak hongin tai hi.

A topa’ nasemte kiangah Jehu hong pusuah ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Thu khempeuh a hoih hiam? Bang hangin hih mi haipa nang kiangah hong pai ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “A mipa leh a thugen na thei uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tua thu ka thei kei uh hi; tu-in ko kiangah hong gen in,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Tua bang tua bangin amah in kei kiangah thu hong genin, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi, Israel tungah kumpi-in nang sathau kong nilh hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nawhsa-in mi khempeuh in a puan uh la-in ama din’ nadingin kahlei tungah koih uh a, tua ciangin amaute in peengkul tumin, “Jehu in kumpi hi,” ci-in tangko uh hi.
Tua ciangin Nimshi’ tapa Jehoshafat tapa Jehu in Joram sawmsim hi. (Tu-in Siria kumpi Hazael langpangin Ramoth-gilead ah Israel khempeuh tawh khuacingin Joram om hi;

ahih hangin Siria kumpi Hazael tawh a kido lai-in Siriate in amah a liamsakna mate Jezre-el ah a kidamsak dingin kumpi Joram ciahkik khin hi.) Tua ahih ciangin Jehu in, “Hih in na ngaihsutna uh tawh a kituah leh Jezre-el ah pai-in thu a va ko dingin khuapi panin kuamah paikhia sak kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu a leeng tungah kahin Jezre-el ah pai hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah Joram lum hi. Tua ciangin Judah kumpipa Ahaziah Joram kiangah a hawh dingin na tung khin hi.

Tu-in Jezre-el tausang tungah galvilpa ding a, amah hong pai lai takin Jehu’ pawlte amah in mukhia a, “Mi honkhat ka mu hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Joram in, “Sakol tung tuang mi khat la-in amaute dawn dingin sawl in la, ‘Thuhoih ahi hiam?’ ci sak in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin sakol tung tuangin amah dawn dingin mi khat pai a, “Kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Thuhoih ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in, “Thuhoih tawh bang hih ding na hi hiam? Kihei in la, ka nungah hong tuang in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin galvilpa in thu zasakin, “Kamtaipa in amaute kiang ban a, ahih hangin amah hong paikik lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in sakol tung tuang a nihna sawlin amaute kiangah tuapa pai a, “Kumpipa in hih bangin hong ci khin hi, ‘Thuhoih ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in dawngin, “Thuhoih tawh bang hih ding na hi hiam? Kihei in la, ka nungah hong tuang in,” a ci hi.

Galvilpa in thu zasak kikin, “Amah in amaute va ban a, ahih hangin amah hong paikik lo hi. A hawlzia in Nimshi’ tapa Jehu’ hawl tawh kibang hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in nakpi takin hawl hi,” a ci hi.

Joram in, “Kithawi un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in a leeng kithawisak uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa Joram leh Judah kumpipa Ahaziah, a sakol leeng tuak uhah tuangin dingkhia-in, Jehu dawntuah dingin pai uh a, Jezre-el mi Naboth’ leitangah amah tawh kituak uh hi.

Joram in Jehu a muh ciangin amah in, “Jehu aw, thuhoih ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Na nu Jezebel’ paktatnate leh aisannate tua zahin a tam lai teng bang thuhoih om thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joram in a sakol kamkaih leh hei-in tai a, Ahaziah kiangah, “Ahaziah aw, gal om!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu in a thaneih khempeuh tawh a thal keekin a liangko nih kikal sanah Joram kap a, a thaltang in a lungtang pailetin a leeng sungah amah puksuk hi.

Jehu in amah a huhpa Bidkar kiangah, “Amah tawmto in la, Jezre-el mi Naboth’ neihsa leitang tungah amah paai in; bang hang hiam cih nang leh kei in a pa Ahab’ nungah mai kimin i tuan’ lai takin amah langpangin Topa in hih thu a genna phawk in:

‘Zan ni-in Naboth leh a tapate a kithahna ka muh taktak mah bangin—Topa in ci hi—leitang tung hih munah nang kong thuk ding hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Topa’ thugen bangin amah tawmin tua mun leitang tungah paai in,” a ci hi.

Judah kumpipa Ahaziah in hih thu a muh ciangin Bethhaggan lamah tai hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in amah delhin, “Amah zong kap un,” a ci hi; tua ciangin amaute in Ibleam gei, Gur kahtohna san a leeng sungah amah kap uh hi. Ahi zongin amah Megiddo khuapi ciang dong tai zo lai a, tua khua panin amah si hi.
A nasemte in leeng khat tawh Jerusalem ah pua uh a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh ama hanah vui uh hi.
Ahab’ tapa Joram’ kum sawm-le-khatna kumin Ahaziah in Judah tungah uk ding kipan hi.
Jezre-el ah Jehu hong tun’ ciangin Jezebel in a thu za hi; amah in a mitte zutin a lutang zeem a, kongvangneu ah khuadak hi.
Kulh kongpi-ah Jehu hong lut lai takin amah in, “Nang Zimri, a topa a thatpa aw, bang hih-a hong pai na hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kongvangneu lamah amah khuadak to-in, “Kei lamah kua om na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Inn sung maangte nih khawng thum khawng in amah hong en suk hi.
Jehu in, “Amah hong lawnsuk un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Jezebel lawnsuk uh hi; a sisan pawlkhat kulh tung leh sakolte tungah kitheh a, tua ciangin amaute in amah tuancil uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah sungtumin ne-in dawn hi; tua ciangin amah in, “Tu-in a kisamsia hih numei mu un la, amah phum un; bangbang ahi zongin amah in kumpipa’ tanu hi buang hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah a phum dingin amaute a pai uh ciangin a luguh leh a khete leh a khut peekte sim loh amah mu nawn lo uh hi.
Amaute hong paikikin ama kiangah a gen uh ciangin, amah in, “Hih in ama nasempa, Tishbe mi Elijah’ tung tawnin Topa’ gensa ahi hi, ‘Jezre-el gam sungah uite in Jezebel’ sa ne ding uh hi;
tua ciangin Jezebel’ luanghawm in Jezre-el gam sung gamlak maitang tungah eklei tawh kibang ding a, tua ahih manin kuamah in, ‘Hih in Jezebel ahi hi,’ cih thei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tu-in Ahab’ suan-le-khak mihing sawmsagih Samaria ah teeng hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jehu in laikhakte gelh a, khuapi a ukte, upate, leh Ahab’ suan-le-khak a kemte tung Samaria a, Jezreel uliante’ tungah tua laite khakin,
“Tu-in hih lai na ngah phetun, na topa uh suante note tawh omin, leengte leh sakolte, kulh a nei khuapite zong, leh hiamte na neihna uh thei un.
Na topa uh suante a hoihpen leh a kilawmpen teelin a pa’ kumpi tokhom tungah tusak un la, na topa uh innkuan’ adingin do un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute nakpi takin lau uh a, “En un, kumpi nihte in amah nang zo lo uh hi; tua ahih ciangin eite in bangci nan’ zawh ding ihi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpi inn a ukte leh khuapi a ukte in upate leh a kemte tawh kigawmin Jehu kiangah mi sawl uh a, “Kote in nangma nasemte ka hi uh a, nong sawl khempeuh ka hih ding uh hi. Khat zong kumpi-in ka bawl kei ding uh hi; hoih na sak bang bangin hong hih in,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah a laikhak nihna gelhin, “Note in keima lamah omin, keima thu mang dingin a kiging na hih uh leh, na topa uh Ahab’ suan-le-khakte lutangte hong la un la, zing ciang tu bang hunin kei kiang Jezre-el ah hong puak un,” a ci hi. Tu-in kumpipa’ suan-le-khak mihing sawmsagihte, amaute a khoi khuapi sung makaite tawh omkhawm uh hi.
Amaute kiangah a laikhak a tun’ ciangin amaute in kumpipa’ suan-le-khakte la-in amau mihing sawmsagihte that uh a, tua ciangin a lutang uh seeng sungah guangin ama kiang Jezre-el ah puak uh hi.
Kamtaipa hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Amaute in kumpipa’ suan-le-khakte’ lutangte hong paipih uh hi,” ci-in a gen ciangin amah in, “Zingsang mateng kulh kongpi lutna ah khawl nihin koih un,” a ci hi.

Zingsangin amah a paikhiat ciangin amah ding a, mi khempeuh kiangah, “Note na paubang kei uh hi. Ka topa Joram sawmsimin amah a thatpa in keimah ka hi hi; ahih hangin kua in hihte khempeuh sattuk ahi hiam?

Ahab’ innkuan tawh kizomin Topa in a gen thu, Topa’ kammal khat zong lei-ah kia lo ding hi, ci-in thei un; bang hang hiam cih leh a nasempa Elijah’ kiangah a gensa thu Topa in sem khin zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jehu in kuamah a siit nawn loh dongin Jezre-el sungah Ahab innkuan a om laite, a behte, leh a lawm mel theihte, leh a siampite khempeuh that hi.
Tua ciangin amah dingkhia-in Samaria ah pai hi. Lam kal, Tuucingte’ buk a tun’ lai takin,

Jehu in Judah kumpi Ahaziah’ behte tawh kituak a, amah in, “Kuate na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in dawngin, “Kote in Ahaziah’ behte ka hi uh a, kumpinu’ tapate leh kumpi ta dangte kiangah a hawh dingin hong paisuk ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Hing mat un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in tuate hing mat uh hi; tua ciangin amaute thatin tua lai-a om dum-ah amaute mihing sawmli-le-nih a sisa-in lawnsuk uh a, amah in amaute khat zong hing khawi lo hi.

Tua lai panin amah a kihepkhiat ciangin amah dawn dingin hong pai Rekhab’ tapa Jehonadab tawh kituak hi; tua ciangin amah in tuapa hopihin ama kiangah, “Keima lungsim nang tungah a thuman bangin na lungsim kei tungah a thuman hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehonadab in dawngin, “Man hi,” a ci hi. Jehu in, “A man leh na khut hong khak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut khak hi. Tua ciangin Jehu in leeng sungah amah lato hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei tawh hong pai in la, Topa ading ka deih luatna hong thei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a leeng sungah amah tuang sak hi.
Tua ciangin Samaria ah a tun’ ciangin Elijah tungah a gen Topa’ kammal bangin Jehu in amaute a siakkhiat dongin Samaria sunga Ahab mi a om laite khempeuh amah in that hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu in mi khempeuh khawmin amaute kiangah, “Ahab in Baal’na tawmkhat sem hi; ahih hangin Jehu in tampi sem ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Baal kamsangte khempeuh, leh amah a biate khempeuh, leh a siampite khempeuh kei kiangah hong sam un; Baal tungah biakpiakna lianpi nei ding ka hih manin kuamah pelem sak kei un; a pelem peuhmah nungta lo ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Baal a biate a suksiat theih nadingin Jehu in ngian tawh hih hi.
Tua ciangin Jehu in thu pia-in, “Baal adingin a thupi kikhopna khat bawl un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua thu zasak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jehu in Israel sung khempeuhah thu zasak hi; Baal a bia khempeuh hong pai uh a, hong pai lo mi khat zong om lo hi. Tua ciangin Baal inn sungah amaute lut uh a, Baal inn mong khat pan mong khat dong dim uh hi.
Amah in puankoihna a ukpa kiangah, “Baal a biate khempeuh adingin puante hong la in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute’ adingin puante hong paikhiatpih hi.

Tua ciangin Rekhab’ tapa Jehonadab tawh Baal inn sungah Jehu tum hi; tua ciangin amah in Baal a biate kiangah, “Hih lai-ah Baal a biate bek omin, note lakah Topa’ nasemte a om loh nading thei un la, zong un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin biak piaknate leh meihal biaknate a pia dingin amah tum hi. Tu-in Jehu in a pua lamah mi sawmgiat koih a, “Na khut sung uhah kong piakte khat peuhpeuh a suaktasakpa in ama nuntakna tawh loh ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin meihal biakna a bawl a man khit phetin Jehu in a cingte leh uliante kiangah, “Sung tum un la, amaute that un; mi khat zong suaktasak kei un,” a ci hi. Amaute in namsau tawh a thah khit uh ciangin a cingte leh uliante in amaute lawnkhia uh a, tua ciangin Baal inn a sungnung dei-ah tumin,
Baal inn sunga a om khuampi paikhiatpihin hal uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Baal khuampi susia-in, Baal inn susia uh a, tu ni dongin ekbuk suaksak uh hi.
Tua bangin Jehu in Israel sung panin Baal siakkhia hi.
Ahih hangin Beth-el leh Dan ah a omkhawm bawngnote ahi, Israelte a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin Jehu kiheikhia lo hi.
