Tua ciangin Topa in Jehu kiangah, “Nangmah in keima mitah a man thu lim takin na sepna hang, leh ka lungsimah a om bangin Ahab innkuan tungah na bawlna hangin, na suante khang lina dongin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah tu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Jehu in a lungsim khempeuh tawh Israel Pasian, Topa’ thukham sungah lim takin gamtat ding ngaihsun lo hi; Israelte a khialhsakna ahi Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin amah kihei lo hi.
Tua hun lai-in Topa in Israel gam pawlkhat khen khiat ding kipan hi. Hazael in Israel gamsung khempeuhah amaute zo hi:
Jordan panin nisuahna lam, Gilead gam khempeuh, Gad mite, leh Reuben mite, leh Manasseh mite, Arnon kuam gei-a om Aroer panin Gilead leh Bashan gam khempeuh zo gawp hi.
Tu-in Jehu’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a sep khempeuh, leh ama thahatnate khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin Jehu a pate tawh ihmu a, amaute in Samaria ah amah vui uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tapa Jehoahaz in ama tangin uk hi.
Jehu in Samaria panin Israel tungah a uk hun in kum sawmnih-le-giat sung ahi hi.
Tu-in Ahaziah’ nu Athaliah in a tapa a sihna a theih ciangin amah kipanin kumpi innkuan khempeuh susia hi.

Ahih hangin Ahaziah’ sanggamnu, Kumpi Joram’ tanu Jehosheba in Ahaziah’ tapa Joash la-in, thah dingin a kikoih kumpipa’ tapate lak panin amah gu khia a, lupna sen’na inndei sungah amah leh a cingnu koih hi. Tua bangin tua nu in Athaliah kiang panin amah seel a, tua ahih manin amah kithat lo hi;
Athaliah in Israel gam sungah a uk sung teng tua nu tawh amah kum guk sung omin Topa’ inn sungah bu hi.

Ahih hangin a kum sagihna kumin siampi Jehoiada in mi sawlin Kar mite leh kumpi inncing a ukte sam sak a, Topa’ inn sung ama kiangah samsak hi; tua ciangin amah in amaute tawh thuciamna khat bawlin Topa’ inn sungah kiciamna nuai-ah amaute koih a, amah in amaute kiangah kumpipa’ tapa lak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute thupia a, “Note’ sep ding in hih ahi hi: sabbath ni-in nasep pengin kumpipa’ inn a cing no seh-thum suah-seh-khatte in
(adang seh-thum suah-seh-khatte Sur kulh kongpi ah omin adang seh-thum suah-seh-khatte a cingte’ nung kulh kongpi ah om hi), kumpi inn na cing ding uh hi;
tua ciangin Sabbath ni-in na semin Topa’ inn a cing no a khen nihte in,

na khut sung uhah na hiam ciat uh tawh kumpipa na umcih ding uh hi; tua ciangin no a gual a, pangte hong neh peuhpeuh kithat ding hi. A paikhiat ciang leh a sungtum ciangin kumpipa tawh om un,” a ci hi.

A ukte in siampi Jehoiada’ thupiak khempeuh bangin hih uh a, Sabbath ni-in nasep a sem dingte tawh Sabbath ni-in ama mi nasep a peng dingte hong paipih ciat uh a, siampi Jehoiada’ kiangah hong tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in a ukte’ tungah Topa’ inn sungah a om David’ aa ahi teipite leh lumte pia hi;
tua ciangin inn leitaw lam pang panin inn leilu lam pang, biakna tau leh inn kimkotah mi khempeuh a khut uhah a hiam ciat uh tawh a cingte ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa’ tapa paikhiatpihin, ama tungah kumpi lukhu koih a, tecipan’na amah pia hi; tua ciangin amaute in amah kumpi hi, ci-in tangko-in amah sathau nilh uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in a khut uh bengin, “Kumpipa khan’ sau hen!” a ci uh hi.
Athaliah in a cingte leh mite’ gamlumna a zak ciangin mite kiang Topa’ inn sungah amah pai hi;

amah a khuadak ciangin a ngeina ding bangin khuampi gei-ah kumpi thakpa ding-in kumpipa gei-ah a ukte leh peengkul tumte om a, tua gammi khempeuh in lungdamin peengkul na tum uh hi. Tua ciangin Athaliah in a puante balkekin kiko a, “Sawmsimna! sawmsimna!” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada in galkap a ukte thu pia-in, “A pua-ah tua nu paikhiatpih un; amah a pan’pih peuhmah namsau tawh that un,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh siampipa in, “Topa’ inn sungah amah that kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tua nu man uh a, kumpipa’ inn lutna Sakol Kongpi a tun’ ciangin tua lai-ah amah kithat hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoiada in amaute Topa’ mi ahih nading uh Topa leh kumpipa leh mite kikalah thuciamna khat bawl hi; kumpipa leh mite kikalah zong bawl hi.

Tua ciangin tua gammi khempeuh Baal innah pai uh a, phel keek uh hi; a biakna taute leh a milimte amaute in sukham uh a, amaute in biakna taute mai-ah Baal siampi Mattan that uh hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in Topa’ innah galvilte koih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a ukte, Kar mite, a cingte, leh tua gammi khempeuh kaikhawm hi; tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ inn panin kumpipa paipih suk uh a, a cingte’ lampi tawnin kumpipa’ innah pai uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in kumpite’ kumpi tokhom tungah a tutna hong la hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua gam mi khempeuh lungdam uh hi; kumpipa’ innah namsau tawh Athaliah a kithah khit ciangin khuapi sung gamdai hi.
Joash in uk ding a kipat ciangin ama khan’ kum sagih pha pan hi.
Jehu’ kum sagihna kumin Joash in uk ding kipan a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmli sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Zibiah hi a, Be-ersheba khuami ahi hi.
Siampi Jehoiada in amah thuhilh ahih manin Joash in ama hun sung tawntung Topa’ mitah a man gamta hi.
Ahi zongin mual tunga biaknate kila khia lo hi; mite in tuate tungah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal lai uh hi.
Joash in siampite kiangah, “Pasian’ inn sungah a kipaipih a siangtho nate’ man sum khempeuh, a milipin piak dingin a kiseh sum, leh amau’ ut thu tawh Pasian’ innah a kipaipih sumte,
amau’ nasepna mite ciat panin siampite in kaikhawm un; tua ciangin biakinn puahphat nading a, kisapna a kimuhna khempeuh puahsak un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpi Joash’ uk kum sawmnih-le-thumna kum dongin siampite in inn puah nai lo uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Joash in siampi Jehoiada leh siampi dangte samin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin inn puah lo na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na nasepna uh mite kiang panin na sum lakte uh kem nawn kei un la, a sumte inn puah nadingin hong ap un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite’ tung pan sum kaihkhop tavuan la nawn loin, inn puah ding zong tavuan a lak nawn loh ding uh siampite thukim uh hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada in singkuang, khat la-in a siin vutvang a, Topa’ inn sung tum ciangin taklam pang khuampi gei-ah koih hi; tua ciangin sangkil a cing siampite in Topa’ inn sungah a kipaipih sum khempeuh tua sungah koih uh hi.
Singkuang sungah sum tam om hi ci-in a theih peuhpeuh uh ciangin kumpipa’ lai-atpa leh siampi lianpa hong paito-in Topa’ inn sungah a om sumte amaute in simin ip tawh tun uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ inn a en nasemte’ khut sungah a teh khiat uh sumte pia uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ inn a sem khutsiamte leh innlamte tung,
leh lei-le-suang inn lam siamte leh suangsekte tung, Topa’ inn puah nadingin sing lei nading leh suang tawh nading, leh inn puahna khat peuhpeuh a, zat dingin piakhia uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa’ inn adingin ngun kuangte, meitehte, haite, peengkulte, ahih kei leh kham ahi a, ngun khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin, Topa’ innah a kipaipih sumte panin kibawl lo hi,
bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ inn a puah nasemte tungah tua sum kipia hi.
Amaute in thuman takin na sem uh ahih manin nasemte tungah piak dingin a khut sung uhah sum a apnate uh tung panin amaute in sum ciamtehna lai ngen lo uh hi.
Mawhna hanga piak sum leh khialhna hanga piak sumte Topa’ inn sungah kipaipih lo hi; tuate in siampite’ aa ahi hi.
Tua hun lai takin Siria kumpipa Hazael paito-in Gath simin la hi. Ahih hangin Hazael in Jerusalem do-in a paito dingin a mai a ngat ciangin,

Judah kumpi Joash in Judah kumpite ahi ama hun ma-a sem Jehoshafat leh Jehoram leh Ahaziahte’ apsa thuciam piakna letsongte khempeuh, leh ama thuciam piakna letsongte, leh Topa’ inn leh kumpipa’ sumkoihnate ah a om kham khempeuh la-in Siria kumpipa Hazael kiangah puak hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem panin Hazael paikhia hi.
Tu-in Joash’ gamtatna a om laite, leh ahih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Ama nasemte kipanin sawmsimna khat vaihawm uh a, Silla paisukna lampi Millo inn sungah Joash that uh hi.

Amah a sat pukte in ama nasemte’ Shimeath’ tapa Jozakar leh Shomer’ tapa Jehozabad ahi hi; tua hi a, amah si hi. Tua ciangin amaute in David khuapi sungah ama pate tawh amah vui uh a, ama tangin a tapa Amaziah in uk hi.
Judah kumpi, Ahaziah’ tapa Joash’ kum sawmnih-le-thumna kumin, Jehu’ tapa Jehoahaz in Samaria panin Israel uk ding kipan a, amah in kum sawm-le-sagih sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta a, Israelte a khialhsakna, Nabat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate zui hi; tuate panin amah kihem khia lo hi.
Tua ciangin Israelte tungah Topa heh a, amah in Siria kumpipa Hazael khut sung leh Hazael’ tapa Benhadad khut sungah amaute pia tawntung hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoahaz in Topa tungah thum a, Topa in a thu ngai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel a kinen’niamna, Siria kumpipa in amaute a nen’niamna mu hi.
(Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Israel tungah honpa khat pia a, tua ahih manin Siriate khut sung panin amaute suakta uh hi. tua ciangin a ni danga bangin Israelte a inn uhah teeng uh hi.
Ahi zongin Israel a khialhsakna, Jeroboam’ innkuante’ khialhnate panin amaute kihem khia lo uh a, amaute in tuate zui uh hi; Ahserah milim zong Samaria mah-ah om lai hi.)

Bang hang hiam cih leh Jehoahaz’ adingin galkap sakol tung tuang sawmnga leh leeng sawm leh khe galkap tulsawm bang bek om lai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Siria kumpipa in amaute susia-in ancilna a, leivui bangin amaute bawl hi.
Tu-in Jehoahaz’ gamtatna a om laite leh ama hih khempeuh, leh ama vangliatna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin Jehoahaz a pate tawh ihmu a, amaute in Samaria ah amah vui uh hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jehoash in uk hi.
Judah kumpipa Joash’ kum sawmthum-le-sagihna kumin Jehoahaz’ tapa Jehoash in Samaria panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in kum sawm-le-guk sung uk hi.
Amah in zong Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta hi; Israelte a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate, khempeuh panin amah kihem khia lo a, tua mah bangin amah gamta hi.
Tu-in Jehoash’ gamtatna a om laite, leh ama hih khempeuh, leh Judah kumpipa Amaziah a dona a thahatnate, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin a pate tawh Jehoash ihmu a, tua ciangin ama kumpi tokhom tungah Jeroboam a nihnapa a tu hi; tua ciangin Israel kumpite tawh Samaria ah Jehoash kivui hi.
Tu-in amah a sih nading natna tawh Elisha a nat ciangin, Israel kumpipa Jehoash ama kiangah paisuk a, ama mai-ah kapin, “Ka pa, ka pa! Israel mite’ leengte leh sakol galkapte!” ci-in kiko hi.
Tua ciangin Elisha in ama kiangah, “Thal khat leh thaltangte hong la in,” a ci hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in thal khat leh thaltangte la hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Thal keek in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in keek hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in kumpipa khutte’ tungah ama khutte nga hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Nisuahna lam kongvangneu hong in,” a ci hi; tua ciangin amah in hong hi. Tua ciangin Elisha in, “Lawn in,” a ci hi; tua ciangin amah in lawn hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Topa’ gualzawhna thaltang, Siria tungah gualzawhna thaltang! Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute na beisak dongin Afek-ah Siriate na do ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Thaltangte la in,” a ci hi; tua ciangin amah in la hi. Tua ciangin amah in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Tuate tawh leilak sat in,” a ci hi; tua ciangin amah in thum vei satin khawl hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ mipa ama tungah hehin, “Nga vei ahi a, guk vei ahi zongin sat ding kilawm hi; tua hi leh na beisak dongin Siria na satpuk ding hi; ahih hangin tu-in Siria thum vei bek na satpuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Elisha si a, amaute in amah vui uh hi. Tu-in Moab mihonte in sikhiau sungin tua gam sim zel uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in mi khat a vui lai takun, en in, a sim dingin a hong pai mihon khat mu uh a, amau zong a misi uh Elisha’ han sungah lawn uh hi; a misi in Elisha’ guhte a sukkhak phetin hingkik a, tua ciangin ama khe-in ding hi.
Tu-in Siria kumpipa Hazael in Jehoahaz’ hun sung khempeuh Israel nengniam hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in amaute hehpihin amaute khasiat a, Abraham, Isaak, leh Jakob tawh a thuciamna hangin amaute lamah amah kihei a, amaute susia lo hi; tu dongin zong ama mite mangngilh lo hi.
Siria kumpipa Hazael a sih ciangin ama tangin a tapa Benhadad kumpi suak hi.

Tua ciangin a pa Hehoahaz’ tung panin gal sungah Hazael in a laksak khuapite, Hazael’ tapa Benhadad tung panin Jehoahaz’ tapa Jehoash in la kik hi. Jehoash in amah thum vei zoin Israel khuapite ngah kik hi.
Israel kumpi, Jehoahaz’ tapa Jehoash’ kum nihna kumin, Judah kumpi, Joash’ tapa Amaziah in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nga pha a, Jerusalem ah amah in kum sawmnih-le-kua sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Jehoaddin hi a, Jerusalem khuami ahi hi.
Amah in Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta a, ahi zongin a pu David bang zo lo hi; a pa Joash’ hihsa na khempeuh hih hi.
Mual tunga biaknate koih khia lo hi; mite in tuate tungah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal lai uh hi.
Kumpi aana kip takin ama khut sungah a om phetin ama pa ahi kumpipa a that a nasemte amah in that hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in a thupiakna, Moses thukham laibu sungah, “Tate’ hangin pate kithat lo ding a, pate’ hangin tate zong kithat lo ding hi; ahih hangin mi khempeuh amau khialhna hangin si ding hi,” ci-in a kigelh bangin amah in mi thatte’ tate that lo hi.
Amah in Edom mite tulsawm Ci Kuam ah thatin Sela khua do-in la a, tu ni dongin a min ahi Jokthe-el a phuak hi.
Tua ciangin Amaziah in Israel kumpi, Jehu tapa Jehoahaz’ a tapa Jehoash kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Hong pai in’ khat leh khat mai kituahin kisi ni,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpi Jehoash in Judah kumpi Amaziah kiangah thu puak a, “Lebanon a, om thangling khat in Lebanon a, om taamtaak khat kiangah sawlin, ‘Ka tapa’ zi dingin na tanu hong pia in,’ ci hi; tua ciangin Lebanon gamsa khat in hong nawkin thangling tuancil hi.

Nangmah in Edom na vat khin a, na lungsim in nang hong liansak hi. Na minthan’na tawh lungkim in la, innah om in; bang hangin nang tukin, Judah tawh nang na tuk nadingin buaina piangsak ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Amaziah in a thu ngai lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa Jehoash paito a, Judahte’ gam Bethshemesh ah amah leh Judah kumpipa Amaziah khat leh khat kimaituahin gal kido uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel in Judah zo a, mi khempeuh a inn uhah tai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa Jehoash in Bethshemesh ah Ahaziah’ tapa Joash, a tapa Amaziah ahi Judah kumpipa man hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah amah hong pai a, Efraim Kongpi panin Kiu Kongpi dong Jerusalem kulhpi tong zali sung susia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in kham leh ngun khempeuh, leh Topa’ inn sung leh kumpipa’ inn vankoihna sungah a om um-le-beel khempeuh la-in, mite zong man a, tua ciangin Samaria ah ciahkik hi.
Tu-in Jehoash in ahih a gamtatna a om laite, leh a vangliatna, leh Judah kumpipa Amaziah tawh a kidona, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Jehoash a pate tawh ihmu a, Israel kumpite tawh Samaria ah kivui hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jeroboam a nihnapa in uk hi.
Israel kumpipa, Jehoahaz’ tapa Jehoash a sih khit ciangin Judah kumpipa, Joash’ tapa Amaziah kum sawm-le-nga sung nungta lai hi.
Tu-in Amaziah’ nasepna a om laite, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin amaute in Jerusalem ah amah sawmsim uh a, amah zong Lakhish ah tai hi. Ahih hangin amaute in ama nung zui-in Lakhish ah mi sawl uh a, tua lai-ah amah that uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in sakolte tungah amah hong paipih uh hi; David’ khuapi sung Jerusalem ah a pate tawh amah kivui hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite khempeuh in kum sawm-le-guk a pha Uzziah la-in a pa Amaziah’ tangin kumpi-in koih uh hi.
A pa a sih khit ciangin amah in Elath khua zo kikin lam pha a, Judah mite’ adingin ngah kik hi.
Judah kumpipa, Joash’ tapa Amaziah’ kum sawm-le-ngana kumin, Israel kumpipa, Jehosh’ tapa Jeroboam in Samaria ah uk ding kipan a, amah in kum sawmli-le-khat sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta hi; Israel a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate khempeuh panin amah kihem khia lo hi.
Amah in, Gathhefer pana kamsangpa, Amittai’ tapa, a nasem Jonah tung tawnin Israel Pasian, Topa’ thugen bangin, Hamath lutna panin Arabah Tuipi dong Israel gamgi ngahkik hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte’ thuakna nasia mahmah hi, ci-in Topa in mu hi; bang hang hiam cih leh sal ahi a, a suakta mi ahi zongin a peng kuamah om lo a, Israel a huh ding kuamah om lo hi.
Ahih hangin vantung nuai panin Israel min a phiatkhiat ding Topa in gen nai lo ahih manin Jehoash’ tapa Jeroboam’ khut tawh amah in amaute honkhia hi.

Tu-in Jeroboam’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a hihte khempeuh, leh a vangliatna, a galsimna, leh Judah in a na neih ngei Damaskas leh Hamath khuapite Israel’ adingin a ngah kikna, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Israel kumpi ahi, a pate tawh Jeroboam ihmu a, ama tangin a tapa Zekhariah in uk hi.
Israel kumpipa Jeroboam a nihna’ kum sawmnih-le-sagihna kumin Judah kumpipa, Amaziah’ tapa Uzziah in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm-le-guk pha a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga-le-nih sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Jekoliah hi a, Jerusalem khuami ahi hi.
A pa Amaziah’ sepsa khempeuh tawh kizui-in amah in Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta hi.
Ahi zongin mual tunga biaknate kilakhia lo hi; mite in tuate tungah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal lai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in phak natna tawh kumpipa vat ahih manin a sih ni dongin amah a phak hi a, inn tuam sungah amah teng hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ tapa Jotham in innkuan tungah a uk hi a, tua gam mite a uk hi.
Tu-in Uzziah’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Uzziah a pate tawh ihmu a, amaute in David khuapi sungah a pate tawh amah vui uh a, tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Jotham in uk hi.
Judah kumpipa Uzziah’ kum sawmthum-le-giatna kumin Jeroboam a nihna’ tapa Zekhariah in Samaria panin Israel tungah kha guk sung uk hi.
A pate’ hihsa bangin amah in Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta hi. Israel a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin amah kihem khia lo hi.
Jabesh’ tapa Shallum in amah sawmsim a, Ibleam ah amah sat pukin that a, tua ciangin ama tangin uk hi.
Tu-in Zekhariah’ sepna a om laite, en in, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
(Hih in Topa’ thuciamna, Jehu tungah a piak, “Na suante khang lina dongin Israel kumpi tokhom tungah tu ding hi,” a cih ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua bangin a piang hi.)
Judah kumpipa Uzziah’ kum sawmthum-le-kuana kumin Jabesh’ tapa Shallum in uk ding kipan a, amah in Samaria ah kha khat sung uk hi.
Tua ciangin Tirzah panin Gadi’ tapa Menahem hong paito-in Samaria hong tung a, tua ciangin amah in Samaria ah Jabesh’ tapa Shallum satpukin that a, ama tangin uk hi.
Tu-in Shallum’ sepna a om laite, leh amah in a hihsa a sawmsimna, en in, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.

Tua hun lai takin Menahem in Tappuah leh a sunga teng khempeuh leh Tirzah pana kipan a gam sung teng luh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ama adingin a kongpite uh hong lo uh a, tua ahih ciangin amah in luhin, tua sunga om numei naupaai khempeuh phel kham hi.
Judah kumpipa Uzziah’ kum sawmthum-le-kuana kumin Gadi’ tapa Menahem in Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in Samaria panin kum sawm sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta hi; Israel a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate khempeuh panin a nuntak sung tawntung amah kihem khia lo hi.
Assiria kumpipa Pul tua gam do dingin hong kuan hi; tua ciangin kumpi aana a letna a kipsak dingin a huh theih nading a deihna-in Menahem in Pul tungah ngun talen tulkhat pia hi.

Menahem in Assiria kumpipa tungah a piak dingin mihau khempeuh, a mi kim tung panin ngun shekel sawmnga, Israelte tung panin sum dok hi. Tua ahih ciangin Assiria kumpipa kihei kik a, tua gam sungah om lo hi.
Tu-in Menahem’ sepna a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin a pate tawh Menahem ihmu a, ama tangin a tapa Pekahiah in uk hi.
Judah kumpipa Azariah’ kum sawmngana kumin Menahem’ tapa Pekahiah in Samaria panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, amah in kum nih sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta hi; Israel a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin amah kihei khia lo hi.
Tua ciangin ama nuai-ah a ukpa, Remaliah’ tapa Pekah in Gilead mi sawmnga tawh amah sawmsim a, kumpipa’ inn sungtawng, Samaria ah amah that hi; amah a thah khit ciangin ama tangin uk hi.
Tu-in Pekahiah’ nasepna a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh, en in, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Judah kumpipa Uzziah’ kum sawmnga-le-nihna kumin Remaliah’ tapa Pekah in Samaria panin Israel tungah uk ding kipan a, kum sawmnih sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta hi; Israel a khialhsakna, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ khialhnate panin amah kihem khia lo hi.

Israel kumpipa Pekah’ hun lai takin Assiria kumpipa Tiglath-pileser hong pai-in Ijon, Abelbethma-akah, Janoah, Kedesh, Hazor, Gilead, leh Galili, Naftali gam khempeuh la hi; amah in galmatin mite Assiria ah ciahpih hi.
Tua ciangin Uzziah’ tapa Jotham’ kum sawmnihna kumin, Elah’ tapa Hoshea in Remaliah tapa Pekah sawmsimin amah satpukin that a, tua ciangin ama tangin uk hi.
Tu-in Pekah’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh, en in, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Israel kumpipa, Remaliah’ tapa Pekah’ kum nihna kumin, Judah kumpipa, Uzziah’ tapa Jotham in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawm-le-guk sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Jerusha hi a, Zadok’ tanu ahi hi.
A pa Uzziah’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin amah in Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta hi.
Ahi zongin mualtunga biaknate kikoih khia lo hi; mite in tuate tungah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal lai uh hi. Amah in Topa’ inn kulh kongpi tungnung bawl hi.
Tu-in Jotham’ nasepna a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua hunin Topa in Judah do dingin Siria kumpipa Rezin leh Remaliah’ tapa Pekah sawl ding kipan hi.
Jotham a pate tawh ihmu a, a pu David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi; ama tangin a tapa Ahaz in uk hi.
Remaliah’ tapa Pekah’ kum sawm-le-sagihna kumin, Judah kumpipa, Jotham’ tapa Ahaz in uk ding kipan hi.
Ahaz in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih pha a, Jerusalem ah kum sawm-le-guk sung uk hi. A pu David’ gamtatnasa bangin amah in a Pasian, Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta lo a,
Israel kumpipte’ khekhap mah zui hi. Topa in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawlkhiat minamte’ zat a kihhuai gamtate bangin biakna-in ama tapa nangawn hal hi.
Amah in mual tunga biaknate tung, leh mual dawnte tung, leh singniim nuai khempeuh ah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal hi.
Tua ciangin Siria kumpipa Rezin leh Israel kumpipa, Remaliah, tapa Pekah, Jerusalem gal-in a do dingin hong kuanto uh a, amaute in Ahaz umcih uh a, ahih hangin amah zo zo lo uh hi.
Tua hun lai takin Edom kumpipa Rezin in Edom gam dingin Elath la kikin Elath panin Judah mite hawlkhia hi; tua ciangin tu ni dongin amaute a ten’na ahi Elath-ah Edom mite hong pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Ahaz in Assiria kumpipa Tiglath-pileser kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Keimah in na nasempa leh na tapa ka hi hi. Hong kuanto in la, keimah a hong sim Siria kumpipa leh Israel kumpipa’ kiang panin kei hong honkhia in,” a ci hi.
Ahaz in zong Topa’ inn sung leh kumpipa’ vankoihna a, ngun leh khamte la-in Assiria kumpipa kiangah letsong khat puak hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in ama thu ngai hi; Assiria kumpipa Damaskas a do-in hong kuan to-in tua khua la a, a mite galmatin Kir-ah pua a, amah in Rezin that hi.

Assiria kumpipa Tiglath-pileser tawh kimu dingin kumpi Ahaz Damaskas ah a pai ciangin, amah in Damaskas ah a om biakna tau mu hi. Tua ciangin kumpi Ahaz in biakna tau a om dan, a neng a tawngin a lah kimna a lim khat siampi Urijah kiangah puak hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Urijah in biakna tau bawl hi; Damaskas panin kumpi Ahaz hong tun’ ma-in kumpi Ahaz in Damaskas panin a khakna tawh kizui-in siampi Urijah in a bawl hi.
Damaskas panin kumpipa hong tun’ ciangin kumpipa in biakna tau en hi. Tua ciangin biakna tau kiang kumpipa in hong naihin paito a, biakna pia hi.
a meihal biakna leh an tawh a biakna halin, leenggahzu tawh a biakna sung a, thunuam-a a biakna sisan biakna tau tungah theh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ama biakna tau leh Topa’ inn kikal, inn mai panin Topa mai-ah a om sumngo biakna tau la khia-in ama biakna tau leilu lam pangah koih hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi Ahaz in siampi Urijah thu pia-in, “Gam sung mi khempeuh’ meihal biakna, leh an tawh a biakna leh leenggahzu tawh a biakna uh tawh biakna tau lian tungah zingsang meihal biakna, leh nitakin an tawh biakna, leh kumpipa’ meihal biakna leh an tawh a biaknate hal khawm in; tua tungah meihal biakna sisan khempeuh, leh biak piakna sisan khempeuh theh in; ahih hangin sumngo biakna tau in kei adingin thu dot nading hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpi Ahaz’ thupiak bangin siampi Urijah in hih thu khempeuh hih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi Ahaz in a din’na kungte tan khia-in tuate panin a kuang la khia a, a nuai-a om sumngo bawngtalte tung panin tuikuangpi la khia sukin suang vial tungah nga hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa hangin amah in sabbath ni-in zat dingin inn sungah a kibawl tutna khuhna leh kumpipa’ lutna a puanung, Topa’ inn panin lakhia hi.
Tu-in Ahaz in a hih a gamtatna a om laite, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Ahaz a pate tawh ihmu a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Hezekiah in uk hi.
Judah kumpipa Ahaz’ kum sawm-le-nihna kumin Elash’ tapa Hoshea in Israel tungah Samaria panin uk ding kipan a, amah in kum kua sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta a, ahi zongin ama ma-a Israel kumpite bang hi lo hi.
Assiria kumpipa Shamaneser amah doin kuanto hi; tua ciangin Hoshea in ama khutnuai mi suak a, ama tungah siah puak hi.

Ahih hangin Assiria kumpipa in Hoshea a zuautatna mu hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Izipt kumpipa So kiangah kamtaite sawl a, a kum kumin a hih ngeisa bangin Assiria kumpipa tungah zong siah pia lo hi; tua ahih ciangin Assiria kumpipa in amah man a, thong sungah amah hencip hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in gam sung khempeuh simin Samaria tung a, amah in kum thum sung umcih hi.
Hoshea’ kum kua-na kumin Assiria kumpipa in Samaria la a, amah in Assiria ah Israel mite ciahpih a, Halah gam sung, leh Gozan gam a, gun om Habor, leh Media khuapite sungah amaute koih hi.
Hih thu a pian’na in, Israel mite in Izipt kumpipa Faro’ khutnuai Izipt gam panin amaute a paikhiatpih a Pasian uh Topa’ tungah khial a, pasian dangte kihta-in
Israel mite mai-ah Topa in a hawlkhiat minamte’ ngeina, leh Israel kumpite in a pian’sak ngeinate a zuihna hang uh ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Israel mite in Topa a Pasian uh langpanin a man lo na vaihawm uh hi. Amaute in amau’ adingin gal vilna bukno akipan kulh a nei khuapi dongin khuapi khempeuh ah mual tunga biakna bawl uh hi;
amaute in amau’ adingin mualsang tung khempeuh leh singniim nuai khempeuh ah khuampite leh Asherah milimte phut uh hi;
tua ciangin amaute’ mai-ah Topa in a puakkhiat minamte’ hih bangin amaute in mual tunga biakna mun khempeuh tungah paknamtui hal uh hi. Amaute in a hoih lo nate hihin Topa hehsak uh a,
Topa in amaute tungah , “Note in na hih kei ding uh hi,” a cih milimte’ na sem uh hi.

Ahi zongin Topa in kamsangte khempeuh leh thu-mu-te khempeuh tung tawnin Israel leh Judah hilhkhol a, “Na pu na pate uh ka thupiak thukhamte khempeuh, leh kamsangte ahi ka nasemte tung tawnin note kiangah thu kong puak bangin na gamtat siate panun kihei-in ka thupiaknate leh ka thukhamte zui un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in thungai lo uh a, Topa a Pasian uh a um lo a pate uh mah bangin lungsim khauh uh hi.

Amaute in ama thukhamte, leh a pu a pate uh tawh a bawl a thuciamna, leh amaute tungah a piak hilhkholhnate simmawh uh hi. Amaute in a mawkna milimte zui-in a mawkna suak uh a, amaute tawh kibangin gamta kei un ci-in Topa in a thupiak tawh kisai-in, amaute in amau’ kim-a om minamte zui uh hi.

Amaute in Topa a Pasian uh thupiakte khempeuh nusia-in amau’ adingin a kisung bawngno nih lim bawl uh hi; amaute in Asherah milim khat bawl uh a, vantung a, om nate khempeuh bia-in Baal’ na sem uh hi.
Amaute in biakna-in a tanute uh leh a tapate uh halin vankahna leh aisanna zang uh a, Topa muhna ah a sia gamta dingin amau kizuak tawmin amah hehsak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite tungah Topa heh a, ama muhna panin amaute hemkhia hi; kuamah dang om nawn loin Judah minam bek om lai hi.
Judah mite in zong Topa a Pasian uh thupiaknate zui loin Israel mite in a phuah tawm ngeinate zuihpih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Israel suan-le-khakte khempeuh nialin amaute gimsak a, ama muhna panin amaute a paihkhiat dongin a siasak mite khut sungah amaute pia hi.

Amah in David innkuan panin Israel gam a balkhiat khit ciangin Israel mite in Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam kumpi-in koih uh hi. Tua ciangin Jeroboam in Topa zuihna panin Israel hawlkhia-in khialhna lianpi amaute bawlsak hi.

22-23 Israel mite in Jeroboam’ khialhna khempeuh hih uh hi; kamsangte ahi a nasemte khempeuh tung tawnin a gensa bangin Topa in ama muhna panin Israel a hepkhiat dongin tuate panin amaute kihem lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amau’ gam panin Assiria’ah tu ni dongin Israel sal-in om hi.

Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in Babilon, Kuthah, Avva, Hamath, leh Sefarvaim panin mite paipih a, Israel mite’ tangin Samaria khuapite ah amaute koih hi; amaute in Samaria gam luahin a khuapite-ah teeng uh hi.
Tua lai-ah a ten’ cilun amaute in Topa kihta lo uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Topa in amaute kimkhat a that humpinelkaite amaute lakah khah hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Assiria kumpipa kiangah, “Nangmah in pua khia-in Samaria khuapite sungah na koih minamte in tua gam’ pasian’ thukham thei lo uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute lakah humpinelkaite khah hi, en in, amaute in tua gam’ pasian’ thukham thei lo uh ahih manin tuate in amaute that uh hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in thu pia a, “Na puakkhiatna uh mun siampite khat tua lai-ah puak un; amah pai-in tua lai-ah teengin a gamsung pasian’ thukhamte amaute hilh sak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Samaria panin a puakkhiat uh siampite khat hong pai-in Beth-el ah teng a, amaute in Topa bangci kihtak ding cih thu amaute kiangah hilh hi.
Ahih hangin minam khempeuh in amau’ pasiante bawl uh a, minam khempeuh in amau’ ten’na khuapite sung, Samaria mite’ bawlsa mual tunga biakna munte ah tuate koih uh hi;
Babilon mite in Sukkoth-benoth pasian lim, Kuth mite in Nergal pasian lim, Hamath mite in Ashima milim,
leh Avva mite in Nabhaz leh Tartak milimte bia uh hi; Sefarvaim mite in Sefarvaim pasiante ahi Adrammelek leh Anammelek biakna-in a tate uh mei tawh hal uh hi.
Amaute in zong Topa kihta uh a, mual tunga biakna siampi dingin amau sung panin mi namkim seh uh a, tuate in mual tunga biaknate tungah amau’ adingin biakna piaksak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Topa kihta uh a, ahih hangin amaute a kipuak khiatna minamte’ ngeina bangin amau’ pasiante’ na zong sem uh hi.

Tu ni dongin amaute in a ni danga ngeina bangin hih uh hi. Amaute in Topa kihta lo uh a, Israel min a phuah Jakob’ suante’ Topa in a thupiak thukhamte ahi a, ngeina kipte ahi a, zuih ding ngeina ahi a, a thupiakna ahi zongin amaute in zui lo uh hi.
Topa in Israelte tawh thuciamna khat bawlin amaute thu pia a, “Note in pasian dangte kihta loin, amaute tungah note kun loin, amau’ na zong sem loin, amaute tungah biakna zong na pia kei ding uh hi;
ahih hangin Izipt gam panin vangliatna leh thahatna tawh note a hong paikhiatpih Topa na kihta ding uh hi; ama mai-ah note na kun ding uh a, ama tungah biakna na pia ding uh hi.
Note adingin a gelh thukhamte leh ngeina kipte leh zuih ding ngeina leh thupiaknate zuih ding na kingaihsun tawntung ding uh hi. Note in pasian dangte na kihta kei ding uh a,
note tawh ka bawlsa thuciamna na mangngilh kei ding uh hi. Note in pasian dangte na kihta kei ding uh a,
ahih hangin Topa na Pasian uh na kihta ding uh hi; tua ciangin amah in na galte khempeuh uh khut sung panin note hong honkhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin hih mite in tua thu ngai lo uh a, a ni danga ngeina bangin gamta uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih minamte in Topa kihta uh a, a kiseek amau’ milimte’ na zong sem kawm uh hi; a tate uh leh a tate uh tate in zong tua bangin hih uh hi—a pu a pate uh hih bangin a suan a khakte un tu ni dongin hih uh hi.
Israel kumpipa, Elah’ tapa Hoshea’ kum thumna kumin, Judah kumpipa, Ahaz’ tapa Hezekiah in uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih-le-kua sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Abi hi a, Zekhariah’ tanu ahi hi.
Amah in a pu David’ hihna khempeuh tawh kizui-in Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta hi.

Amah in mual tunga biaknate hemkhia-in, khuampite sutan a, Asherah milim phuk pai hi. Tua ciangin amah in Moses’ bawlsa sumngo gulpi satnen hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua ni dongin Israel mite in tua tungah paknamtui hal uh hi; tua pen Nehushtan kici hi.
Amah in Israel Pasian, Topa muang hi; tua ahih ciangin ama nung a, Judah kumpite khempeuh lak hita leh ama mai-ate lak hita leh amah tawh a kibang kuamah om lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Topa kip takin len hi; amah zuihna panin kihemkhia lo a, Topa in Moses a thupiak thupiaknate zui hi.
Tua ciangin amah tawh Topa omkhawm hi; a kuankhiatna khempeuh ah mavang hi. Amah in Assiria kumpipa lehdo-in ama na sem lo hi.
Amah in galvilna bukno akipan kulh a nei khuapi dongin, Gaza leh a gamsung ciang dong Filistiate vatgawp hi.
Israel kumpipa, Elah’ tapa Hoshea’ kum sagihna kum ahi, Kumpi Hezekiah’ kum lina kumin Assiria kumpipa Shalmaneser, Samaria do-in hong kuan to-in umcih a,
kum thum a beina ah tua khua la zo hi. Israel kumpi Hoshea’ kum kua-na kum ahi, Hezekiah’ kum gukna kumin Samaria kila hi.
Assiria kumpipa in Israel mite Assiria ah la a, Halah gam sung, leh Gozan gama gun om Habor, leh Media khuapite sungah koih hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Topa a Pasian uh aw ngai lo a, ama thuciamna, Topa’ nasem Moses’ thupiak khempeuh nangawn palsat uh hi; amaute in thu ngai loin, thu zong mang lo uh hi.
Kumpi Hezekiah’ kum sawm-le-lina kumin Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib, Judah khuapi kulh a neite khempeuh a sim dingin hong kuan to-in tuate la hi.

Tua ciangin Judah kumpipa Hezekiah in Assiria kumpipa kiang Lakhish ah mi sawlin, “Ka gamta khial hi; kei kiang panin nungkik in; kei tungah nong koih peuhpeuh ka thuak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in Judah kumpipa Hezekiah tung panin ngun talen zathum leh kham talen sawmthum kal hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Topa’ innsung leh kumipa’ inn vankoihnate a, a om ngun khempeuh ama tungah pia hi.
Tua hunin Hezekiah in Topa’ biakinn kongkhakte tung pan, leh Judah kumpipa Hezekiah in a zutna kongkhak mungte panin khamte hawkkhia-in Assiria kumpipa tungah pia hi.

Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa in Lakhish panin Kumpi Hezekiah kiang Jerusalem ah galkap hon lianpi khat tawh a galkapmang lian penpa, a innsung mang lianpenpa, leh a ulian khat a sawl hi. Amaute paito-in Jerusalem tung uh hi. Amaute a tun’ uh ciangin amaute hong pai-in puansawppa’ nasepna phual zuatna lampi a, om bual tungnung tuilakna gei-ah hong ding uh hi.
Amaute in kumpipa a sap uh ciangin, amaute kiangah inn sung ukpa ahi, Hilkiah’ tapa Eliakim, leh lai-at Shebnah, leh thuciamtehpa ahi, Asaf tapa Joah hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin a ulianpa in amaute kiangah, “Hezekiah kiangah gen un, ‘Assiria kumpipa, kumpi lianpa in hih bangin ci hi: Hih na kimuan’na uh bang suang na hi uh hiam?
Note in kampau lel pen galsim nadingin thu lamlahna leh thahatna-in na ngaihsun uh hi! Note in kei nong lehdo nadingun bang suang na hi uh hiam?
En un, a tungah a kingam mipa’ khut a sun ding pumpeeng kitam kung a bang lel Izipt tu-in na suang uh hi. Amah a suangte khempeuh tungah Izipt kumpipa Faro in tua bang lel ahi hi.

Ahih hangin note in kei kiangah, “Kote in Topa ka Pasian uh ka suang uh hi,” na cih uh leh, Hezekiah in mual tunga biaknate leh a biakna taute hepkhiat sakin Judah leh Jerusalem tung a, “Jerusalem khua sung hih biakna tau mai-ah na bia ding uh hi,” a cihpa hilo ahi hiam?
Tu-in hong pai un, Assiria kumpi ka topa tawh kikhapna khat bawl un: no lam panin a tunga tuang ding na ngah nak uh leh note tungah sakol tulnih kong pia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note in leengte leh sakol tuangte tawh kisai-in Izipt a suang kimlai-in bangci-in ka topa’ nasemte lakah a neupen galkap ukpa khat lehnawh zo ding na hi uh hiam?
Tua tham loin, Topa tawh loin hih mun do a, a susia dingin hong paito ka hi hiam? Topa in kei kiangah, Hih gam do-in paito in la, susia in,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Hilkiah’ tapa Eliakim, leh Shebnah, leh Joah in a ulianpa kiangah, “Kong thum uh hi, kote in thei ka hih manun Aram pau-in na nasemte tungah thu hong gen in; kulh tunga om mite’ zakin Judah pau-in kote tungah hong gen kei in,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin a ulianpa in amaute kiangah, “Ka topa in hih thute na topa uh leh note tungah a gen dingin hong sawlin, amau’ ek mah ne-in amau’ zun mah dawn dingin note tawh a siakhawm ding kulh tunga tu mite kiangah gen lo dingin hong sawl ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a ulianpa dingin Judah pau-in a gingin kiko a: “Assiria kumpipa, kumpi lianpa’ thu za un!
Kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Hezekiah’ khemsa-in om kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in keima khutsung panin note hong honkhia zo lo ding hi.
Topa in eite hong honkhia taktak ding a, Asiria kumpipa khut sungah hih khuapi kipia lo ding hi, ci-a Hezekiah’ hong genna tawh Topa suang kei un,’ ci hi.

31-32 Hezekiah’ thu ngai kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh Assiria kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘kei tawh kilemna hong bawl un la, kei kiangah hong pai un; tua ciangin kei hong pai-in nomau leitang tawh a kibatna mun, an leh leenggahzu a omna, an leh leenggui lo a omna, oliv kungte leh khuaizu a omna gamah, note si loin na nuntak nadingun kong koih dong matengin note khempeuh in nomau leenggui gah ciat ne-in, mi khempeuh in a theigah ciat uh ne ding a, note khempeuh in na tuinak ciat uh panin tui na dawn ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in note kiangah, Topa in eite hong honkhia ding hi, ci-in note hong lamlah khialhna-ah Hezekiah thu ngai kei un.
Assiria kumpipa’ khut sung panin minamte’ pasian khatpeuh in a gam honkhia ngei ahi hiam?
Hamath leh Arpad’ pasiante koi-ah om ahi uh hiam? Sefarvaim, Hena, leh Ivvah pasiante koi-ah om ahi uh hiam? Keima khutsung panin amaute in Samaria a honkhia uh hiam?
Topa in ka khutsung panin Jerusalem a hotkhiat nadingin gam sung pasiante khempeuh lakah kua in keima khutsung panin a gam uh honkhia ngei ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin mite dai-in kam khat beek dawngkik lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa’ thupiakna in, “Amah dawng kei un,” cihna ahi hi.

Tua ciangin inn sung a ukpa, Hilkiah’ tapa Eliakim, leh lai-atpa Shebna, leh thuciamtehpa, Asaf tapa Joahte a puan uh balkeksa-in Hezekiah kiangah hong pai uh a, a ulianpa’ kammalte ama kiangah gen uh hi.
Kumpi Hezekiah in a zak ciangin, a dahna hangin a puante balkekin puanhampi silh a, Topa’ inn sungah pai hi.
Tua ciangin amah in inn sung a ukpa Eliakim, leh lai-atpa Shebna, leh siampi luite puanhampi silhsakin Amoz’ tapa kamsangpa Isaiah kiangah sawl hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Hezekiah in hih bangin ci hi: Tu ni in lungkham ni, hong kitai ni, min dai ni ahi hi; naungekte a suah hun tung a, amaute hin’ khiatna ding thatang om lo hi.

Ama topa ahi Assiria kumpipa in a nungta Pasian a zahko dingin a sawl a ulianpa’ kammalte khempeuh Topa na Pasian in za-in Topa na Pasian in a zaksa thute nial khin kha ding hi; tua ciangin a om lai mite adingin thungen in,” a ci uh hi.
Kumpi Hezekiah’ nasemte Isaiah kiangah hong tun’ ciangin,
Isaiah in amaute kiangah, “Na topa uh kiangah gen un, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Assiria kumpipa’ nasemte in kei hong simmawhna, na zaksa uh thute hangin lau kei un.
En un, keimah in ama sungah lungsim khat ka guang ding a, amah in kamdawn khat za-in a gamah ciahkik ding hi; ama gam mah ah namsau tawh amah a tuk nading ka piangsak ding hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Assiria kumpipa in Lakhish nusia khinin Libnah khua tawh a kidona thu, a ulianpa in za ahih manin, kumpipa kiangah thu a dong dingin a pai hi.
Ethiopia kumpipa Tirhakah in amah do dingin a hong kuankhiat khitna thu kumpipa in a zak ciangin, amah in Hezekiah kiangah kamtaite sawl kikin,
“Judah kumpipa Hezekiah kiangah hih bangin gen un: ‘Assiria kumpipa khut sungah Jerusalem kipia lo ding hi, ci-a hong ciamna tawh na suan’ na Pasian’ khemsa-in om kei in.
En in, Assiria kumpite in gam khempeuh a hihnasa, a suksiat mangna thu na za khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin nang hong kihonkhia ding ahi hiam?
Ka pu ka pate in a suksiat minam Gozan, Haran, Rezef, leh Telassar gam sunga om Eden mite, tua minamte’ pasiante in amaute a honkhia zo hiam?
Hamath kumpipa, Arpad kumpipa, Sefarvaim khuapi kumpipa, Hena kumpipa, ahih kei leh Ivvah kumpipa koi-ah om ahi hiam?’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Hezekiah in kamtaite’ tung panin a lai sangin sim hi; tua ciangin Topa’ innah Hezekiah paito a, Topa’ mai-ah a lai zal hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Topa’ mai-ah thu ngenin, “Topa, Israel Pasian, kherubte tungah a tupa aw, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh lakah nangmah, nangmah bek in Pasian na hi hi; nangmah in vantung leh leitung na bawl hi.
Topa aw, na bil hong ngat in la, hong za in; Topa aw, na mitte hong hak in la, hong mu in; tua ciangin a nungta Pasian a zahkona dingin a hong khak Sennakherib’ thute za in.
A taktakin, Topa aw, Assiria kumpite in minam dangte leh a gam uh siasak a,
a pasiante uh meikhuk sungah lotsak uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuate in pasian hi lo-in, mihingte’ khut tawh a kibawl sing leh suang ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin tuate kisusia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, Topa kote’ Pasian aw, leitung kumpi gam khempeuh in nang, nang bek Pasian na hihna a theih nadingun ama khut panin kote hong honkhia in, kong thum hi, Topa aw,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Amoz’ tapa Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah sawlin, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib tawh kisai kei tungah nong thungetna ka za zo hi.
Hih in amah tawh kisai-in Topa’ gensa thu ahi hi: “Zion khua pi in nang hong simmawh a, nang hong nuihsan hi; Jerusalem khuapi in na nungah a lu hong peisan hi,
“Kua zahko-in a simmawh na hi hiam? Kua langpangin na aw sang sakin kihihsakna tawh gamta na hi hiam? Israelte’ a Siangtho Pa, a simmawh na hi hi.

Na kamtaite tawh Topa na zahko a, nangmah in, ‘Ka leeng tampite tawh mual sangpen munah ka paikhin a, Lebanon gam tawng pek dong ka tung hi; a taamtaak sangpente ka phuk a, a taaksan hoihpente ka phuk hi; a gam tawng nungpen ah ka lut a, a tulak thukpen dongah ka lut hi.
Tuikhukte ka to a, gamdang tuite ka dawn a, ka khe nuai tawh Izipt luite khempeuh ka keusak hi,’ na ci hi.
“Sawt pek lai-in ka ngaihsutsa ahihna za nai lo na hi hiam? Taanglai pek panin ka geel kholhsa hi, tu-a ka tun’sak ding thute, kulh a nei khuapite nin bulomtang-in na hei nading,
a sunga teengte a hatna teng kilakhia-in, lungkia-in cih nading thei loin, gamlak singnote le longeekte bangin, innkhumzang a, lopate bangin a om lai tak; a khan’ khit ma-in a si ding hi.
“Ahih hangin keimah in na tutsukna leh na pusuahna leh na sungtumna, kei tungah na hehna ka thei hi.

Kei tungah na hehna hang leh na kiphatsakna ka bil ah hong tun’ khitna hangin, na nak ah nakpheh hong bulhin, na kam ah kamkaih kong bulh ding a, nangmah nong kuan khiatna lam mah ah nang kong lehhei kik ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah, hih in nang adingin lim hong hi ding hi: tu kumin ama thu-in a pote na ne ding a, a kum nihna ciangin tua mah bangin a selkhiate na ne ding hi; a kum thumna ciangin khai tuhin atin, leenggui suanin a gah na ne ding hi.
Tua ciangin Judah innkuan a suakta a om laite in a thuk lamah zungkha kikin a tung lamah gah hong gah to ding hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Jerusalem panin a om laite hong paikhia ding a, Zion Mual panin a suakta honkhat hong paikhia ding hi. Topa’ deihluatna in hih thu hong tungsak ding hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Assiria kumpipa tawh kisai-in hih bangin gen hi: Hih khuapi sungah amah hong pai lo ding a, thaltang khat zong lawn lo ding a, khuapi mai-ah lum khat tawh hong pai loin, khuapi dona-in phung zong ciang lo ding hi.
Amah hong paina lampi mah tawnin amah kileh kik ding a, hih khuapi sungah amah hong pai lo ding hi’ Topa in ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keima min ka khualna leh ka nasempa David tungah ka ciamsa thu hangin hih khuapi ka hu ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua zanin Topa’ vantungmi paikhia a, Assiria’ giahphual ah galkap tul zakhat leh tul sawmgiat leh tulnga that hi; zingsang tungin mite a thawh ciangin, en in, hihte khempeuh siluang hawm na hi hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib kihemkhia a, innah ciahin Nineveh ah teng hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ama pasian Nisrok’ inn sungah bia-in a om lai takin, ama tapate Adrammelek leh Sharezer in namsau tawh amah thatin Ararat gamah tai uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Esarhaddon in uk hi.

Tua hun lai takin Hezekiah a cina-in si dektak hi. Tua ciangin Amoz’ tapa kamsangpa Isaiah ama kiangah hong pai a, ama kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Na innkuan vai ding hawm in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang na si ding hi; na damkik kei ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in a mai kawm lam ngatin Topa tungah thungen a,
“Nangma mai-ah thuman tak leh lungsim khempeuh tawh ka gamtatna, leh nangma muhna ah a hoih ka sepna thu tu-in hong phawk in, kong thum hi, Topa aw,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Hezekiah nakpi takin kap hi.
Tua ciangin inntual laita panin Isaiah a paikhiat ma-in ama tungah Topa’ thu hong tung hi:

“Kileh kik in la, keima mite’ makai Hezekiah kiangah hih bangin gen in. Na pa David’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Na thungetna ka za khin a, na khituite ka mu khin hi; en in, nang kong damsak ding a; ni thum ni-in Topa’ innah na paito ding hi.

Na nuntakna kum sawm-le-nga sung kong behlap ding hi. Assiria kumpipa’ khutsung panin nangmah leh hih khuapi ka honkhia ding a, keima hang leh ka nasempa David hangin hih khuapi ka hu ding hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in, “Thei moh khat hong la un. Amah a damkik theih nadingin tuate la un la, a uilut nuh un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Isaiah kiangah, “Topa in kei hong damsakna ding, leh a ni thum ni-in Topa’ innah ka paitoh nading a lim in bang hi ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in, “Topa in a ciamsa na hong hih nadingin hih in Topa tung panin nangma tungah lim ahi hi: a liim kalsawm mai pai ding hiam, ahih kei leh kalsawm nungkik ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in dawngin, “Liim kal sawm a mainawt ding a baih khat ahi hi; liim kal sawm nungkik sak zaw in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa Isaiah Topa tungah kiko hi; tua ciangin amah in Ahaz’ ni-nai tungah a ni tumsa a liim kal sawm lehkaih hi.
Tua hun lai takin Babilon kumpipa, Baladan’ tapa Melodak-baladan in Hezekiah kiangah laikhakte leh letsong khat tawh kamtaite sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hezekiah cina, ci-in amah in za hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in amaute na zindo a, amah in amaute kiangah a vankoihna inn khempeuh, ngun, kham, a namtui nate, sathau manpha, a galvan, a vankoihna innte ah a om khempeuh lak hi; ama inn sung hita leh ama gamsung khempeuh pan hita leh Hezekiah in amaute a lah loh om lo hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi Hezekiah kiangah kamsangpa Isaiah hong pai a, ama kiangah, “Hih mite in bang gen ahi hiam? Koi lai panin nang kiangah hong pai ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Hezekiah in, “Amaute Babilon gam, a gamlapi panin hong pai uh hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Amaute in na inn sungah bang mu ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Hezekiah in dawngin, “Amaute in ka inn sunga om khempeuh mu uh hi; ka vankoihna inn sungte panin amaute ka lah loh bangmah om lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah, “Topa’ thu za in:
En in, na inn sunga om khempeuh leh na pu na pate in tu ni donga a kholte Babilon ah a kipuak ni ding hong tung ding hi; bangmah kisiit lo ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Nangma sung pan a suak na tapate pawlkhat kilakhia ding hi; amaute in Babilon kumpipa’ inn sungah innsung maangte hi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Isaiah kiangah, “Na gensa ahi Topa’ thugen in hoih hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Keima hun sungin kilemna leh lungmuan’na a om nak leh bang phamawh ding hiam?” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Hezekiah’ sepna a om laite, leh a vangliatna, leh tuili leh tuilakna bawlin khuapi sungah tui a tutna, Judah Kumpite Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Hezekiah a pate tawh ihmu hi; ama tangin a tapa Manasseh in uk hi.
Manasseh in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm-le-nih pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga-le-nga sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Hefzibah ahi hi.
Topa in Israel mite’ mai-ah a hawlkhiat minamte’ gamtatna a kihhuaite mah bangin Topa’ muhna ah amah in a sia gamta hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a pa Hezekiah’ suksiatsa mual tunga biaknate lamkik hi; tua ciangin amah in Baal adingin biakna taute phut a, Israel kumpipa Ahab’ bawl bangin Asherah milim khat bawl a, vantung a, om nate khempeuh bia-in tuate’ na sem hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Jerusalem ah ka min ka koih ding hi,” a cihna Topa’ inn sungah amah in biakna taute lam hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ inn tual nihte tungah vantung a, om nate khempeuh adingin biakna taute lam hi.
Tua ciangin amah in biakna-in a tapa hal a, aisanna leh mai lam thugen kholhnate semin, vankahtheite leh aisante tawh nasem hi. Amah in Topa’ muhna ah a sia tampi gamta a, Amah hehsak hi.

7-8 Tua ciangin Topa in David leh a tapa Solomon tungah, “Israel minam khempeuh sung panin ka teelkhiat hih inn sung leh Jerusalem ah ka min ka koih tawntung ding hi; amaute ka thupiaksa khempeuh tawh kizui, leh ka nasempa Moses in amaute a thupiak thukham khempeuh tawh kizui-in gamtat ding a kingaihsut nak uh leh, a pu a pate uh tungah ka piak gam sungah Israelte mi vakvai ka hi sak nawn kei ding hi,” a cihna inn sungah amah in ama bawlsa a kiseek Asherah milim koih hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in thu ngai lo a, Topa in Israel mite’ mai-ah a suksiat minamte’ gamtatna sangin a siazaw a gamtat nadingun Manasseh in amaute zol hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kamsangte ahi a nasemte’ tung tawnin gen a,
“Judah kumpipa Manasseh in hih a kihhuai nate gamta a, ama ma-a Amor mite’ gamtatna sangin a siazaw-in na semin a milimte tawh Judah mite zong khialsak khin hi;
tua ahih ciangin Israel Pasian Topa in hih bangin ci hi: En un, a za mite khempeuh’ bilte a vut ding siatna Jerusalem leh Judah tungah ka tungsak ding hi.
Keimah in Jerusalem tungah Samaria a kitehna khau leh Ahab’ innkuan khaukhai sikbawk ka khai ding hi; tua ciangin mi khat in pakan a nul bangin keimah in Jerusalem nulin ka lumlet ding hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in ka gamh a om laite paai khia-in amau’ galte’ tungah ka pia ding a, amaute in a galte’ adingin a mat ding mi leh vankiate suak ding uh hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a pu a pate uh Izipt panin hong paikhiat akipan tu ni dongin keima muhna ah a sia gamta-in kei hong hehsak uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua tham loin amaute in Topa’ muhna ah a sia a gamtat nadingun amah in Judah mite a khialhsakna banah, Jerusalem mong khat pan mong khat sisan tawh a kidimsak dongin Manasseh in mawhbaang lo mi tampi that hi.
Tu-in Manasseh’ sepna a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh, leh a ma hihsa a khialhna, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Manasseh a pate tawh ihmu a, Uzza’ huan sung, ama inn huan sungah kivui hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Amon in uk hi.
Amon in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nih pha a, amah in Jerusalemah kum nih sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Meshullemeth hi a, Jotbah khuami Haruz’ tanu ahi hi.
Amah in a pa Manasseh’ gamtat bangin Topa muhna ah a sia gamta hi.
Amah in a pa’ khekhap khempeuh tawn a, a pa in a na a sepsak milimte’ na mah semin tuate bia hi;
amah in a pu a pate’ Pasian, Topa nusia a, Topa’ lampi tawn lo hi.
Tua ciangin Amon’ nasemte in amah sawmsim uh a, ama inn sungah kumpipa that uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua gam mite in kumpi Amon a sawmsimte khempeuh that uh a, tua ciangin tua gam mite in ama tangin a tapa Josiah kumpi-in koih uh hi.
Tu-in Amon’ hihsa a gamtatna a om laite in Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin Uzza’ huan sung ama hanah amah kivui hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Josiah in uk hi.
Josiah in uk ding a kipatin kum giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum-le-khat sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Jedidah hi a, Bozkath khuami Ada-iah’ tanu ahi hi.
Amah in Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta-in, a pu David’ khekhap khempeuh zui cinten a, tak lamah ahi a, vei lamah ahi zongin pial lo hi.
Kumpi Josiah’ kum sawm-le-giatna kumin, kumpipa in a lai-atpa Meshullam’ tapa Azaliah, a tapa Shafan, Topa’ innah sawl a,
“Kong cingte in mite tung panin a khop uh ahi Topa’ inn sungah hong kipaipih sum phazah a theih nadingin siampi lianpa Hilkiah kiangah paito in;
tua ciangin Topa’ inn a en nasemte tungah a sum piasak in; Topa’ innah a om inn a puah nasemte tungah amaute tua sum pia sak in.
tua sum in khutsiamte, innlamte, lei-le-suang inn lam siamte tungah piak ding leh inn puah nadingin sing lei nading leh suang tawh nading zong ahi hi.
Ahih hangin thuman takin amaute gamta uh ahih manin amaute khut sungah a kipia sumte hangin amaute tung panin sazian kingen lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin siampi lianpa Hilkiah in lai-atpa Shafan kiangah, “Topa’ inn sungah thukham laibu ka mu khin hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Hilkiah in Shafan kiangah a laibu pia a, amah in sim hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah lai-atpa Shafan hong pai-in, kumpipa kiangah thu zasak a, “Na nasemte in inn sungah a om sumte la khia-in Topa inn a en nasemte’ tungah pia khin zo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin lai-atpa Shafan in kumpipa kiangah, “Siampi Hilkiah in laibu khat kei hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Shafan in kumpipa mai-ah tua laibu sim hi.
Kumpipa in thukham laibu sunga thute a zak ciangin dahna hangin a puante balkek hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in siampi Hilkiah, leh Shafan’ tapa Ahikam, leh Mikaiah’ tapa Akbor, leh lai-atpa Shafan, leh kumpipa’ nasem Asa-iah thu pia a,

“Pai un la, a kimu hih laibu sunga thute tawh kisai-in keima ading, mite ading, leh Judah mi khempeuh adingin Topa tungah thu va dong un; bang hang hiam cih leh hih laibu sunga thu, eite tawh kisai-in a kigelh khempeuh bangin gamtat ding i pu i pate in na mang lo uh ahih manin eite tungah Topa’ hehna in lian hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin siampi Hilkiah, Ahikam, Akbor, Shafan, leh Asa-iahte, puan a kem, Harhas tapa Tikvah, a tapa Shallum’ zi kamsangnu Huldah kiangah pai uh hi (tu-in tua nu in Jerusalem khua sung a Veng Nihna ah teng hi); tua ciangin tua nu tawh amaute kiho uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Kei kiangah note hong sawl mipa kiangah gen un.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi. En un, hih lai mun leh a tungah a teengte tungah Judah kumpipa in laibu sunga a sim thute khempeuh ahi siatna ka tungsak ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in kei hong nusia-in pasian dangte tungah paknamtui hal uh a, amau’ khut tawh a bawl milimte tawh kei hong hehsak uh ahih manin hih mun tungah ka hehna kitawhkuang ding a, kimitsak lo ding hi.

Ahih hangin Topa tungah thu a dong dingin note a hong sawl Judah kumpipa tungah ahih leh note in hih bangin na gen ding uh hi. Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nangmah in na zaksa thute tawh kisai-in,

amaute gamkhing leh samsiatna a ngahte a suah nadingin hih mun leh a tungah a teeng mite tungah ka kam pauna na zak ciangin na lungsim kisikin Topa mai-ah nangmahmah kiniamkhiatin, na puante balkekin ka mai-ah na kahna thu, keimah in zong ka za hi, Topa in ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, en in, na pate kiang nang kong zuansak ding a, nangmah in nuam takin na han na zuan ding a, hih mun tungah ka tun’sak ding siatna khempeuh na mit in mu lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kumpipa kiangah thu puakkik uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Judah leh Jerusalem upate khempeuh samsak a, ama kiangah hong kikhawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa Topa’ innah paito a, amah tawh Judah mi khempeuh leh Jerusalem a, teengte khempeuh, siampite, kamsangte leh mi khempeuh a neu a lian tawh pai uh hi; tua ciangin amah in amaute’ zakin Topa’ inn sungah a kimu thuciamna laibu sunga thute khempeuh simkhia hi.

Tua ciangin khuampi gei-ah kumpipa dingin hih laibu sunga a kigelh hih thuciamna kammalte khempeuh a sep nading, Topa thu mangin a thupiaknate leh a tecipan’nate leh a thukhamte, a lungsim leh a ngaihsutna khempeuh tawh a zuih nading, Topa mai-ah thuciamna khat bawl hi; tua ciangin mi khempeuh tua thuciamna ah kihel uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in siampi lian Hilkiah, a nihna siampi, leh kong cingte in Topa’ biakinn sung panin Baal leh Asherah milim’ adingin a kibawl nazatte khempeuh, leh vantung a, om nate khempeuh adingin a kibawlte hong paikhiatpih nading uh thupia hi; amah in Jerusalem pualam Kidron leikang halna munah tuate halin a vute Beth-el ah pua hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Judah khuapite leh Jerusalem kiim a, om mual tunga biaknate tungah paknamtui hal dingin Judah kumpite in a kipsaksa milim biate’ siampite hawlkhia hi; Baal tung, ni tung, kha tung, aksi honpite tung, leh vantung a, om nate khempeuh tungah paknamtui a halte zong hawlkhia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ inn panin Jerusalem pualam, Kidron lui-ah Asherah milim paikhiatpih-in Kidron lui-ah hal a, tua ciangin amah in sat vui-in mi nautangte’ han tungah a vuite lawn hi.
Tua ciangin amah in numeite in Asherah milim’ adingin a kikhaite a gatna mun Topa’ inn sunga om a paktat pawlte’ innte phelkhia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Judah khuapite panin siampite khempeuh paikhiatpih a, Geba panin Be-ersheba ciang dong, siampite in paknamtui a halna mual tunga biaknate susia hi; tua ciangin amah in khuapi kulh kongpi vei lam ahi, khuapi ukpa Joshua’ kongpi lutna ah a om dawi biakna munte phelkhia hi.
Ahi zongin, tua lai-a sem siampite ahih leh Jerusalem a, Topa’ biakna tau-ah hong paito thei lo uh a, amau’ sanggamte lakah silngo sawhloh anlum ne uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in kuamah in Molek tungah a tanu ahi a, a tapa ahi zongin biakna-in a hal theih nawn loh nadingin Hinnom Kuam sunga om Tofeth susia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a kimnai-a om, innsung ulian Nathanmelek’ inn gei, Topa’ inn sung lutna mun a, Judah kumpite in ni tungah a ap uh a sakolte koihkhia hi; tua ciangin amah in ni’ sakol leengte mei tawh hal hi.

Tua ciangin Judah kumpite in a bawlsa ahi Ahaz’ inndei tungnung khumzang a, om biakna taute, leh Topa’ inn tual nihte’ sungah Manasseh in a bawlsa biakna taute, amah in phelin satnen a, tua a vuite Kidron lui-ah paai hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa Solomon in Sidon mite’ kihhuaina Ashtoreth’ ading, leh Moabte’ kihhuaina Khemosh’ ading, leh Ammon mite’ kihhuaina Milkom’ ading a lam, Jerusalem nisuahna lam Oliv Mual leitaw lam-a om mual tunga biaknate kumpipa in susia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a khuampite satkhamin, Asherah milimte phuk a, mihing guh tawh a dim tua munte a vuk hi.

Tua tham loin Israelte a khialsak Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam in Beth-el ah a phuhsa mual tunga biakna, tua biakna mun a biakna tau tawh, amah in phelin a suangte sukham a, tuate satvui hi; amah in Asherah milim zong hal hi.

Tua ciangin Josiah kihei-in mual tunga om hante mu hi; tua ciangin amah in mi sawlin hante sung panin a guhte la sak a, hih nate a genkhol Pasian’ mipa in a gen Topa’ thugen tawh kizui-in biakna tau tungah tuate halin susia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Hua gal khat-a ka muh phawkna mual bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin khuapi sung mite in ama kiangah, “Judah panin hong pai-in Beth-el-a biakna tau tungah na bawl hih nate a genkhol Pasian’ mipa’ han ahi hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Amah tuaci omsak un; kuamah in ama guhte khin kei un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Samaria panin hong paikhia kamsangpa’ guhte tawh, ama guhte tuaci omsak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpite in a bawlsa, Topa a hehsakna uh ahi Samaria khuapite sunga om mual tunga biakna munte khempeuh zong Josiah in lakhia hi; Beth-el a, a hihsa khempeuh mah bangin tuate tungah hih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tua lai-a a om, mual tunga biakna siampite khempeuh, biakna taute tungah that a, tuate tungah mihing guh hal hi. Tua ciangin amah Jerusalem ah ciahkik hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in mi khempeuh thu pia a, “Hih thuciamna laibu sungah a kigelh mah bangin Topa na Pasian uh pahtawina-in Paisan Pawi bawl un,” a ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte thu a khen thukhente’ huna kipan hita leh, Israel kumpite ahih kei leh Judah kumpite’ hun sung khempeuhin tua bang Paisan Pawi kibawl ngei lo hi;
ahih hangin Kumpi Josiah’ kum sawm-le-giatna kumin Jerusalem ah Topa adingin Paisan Pawi kibawl hi.

Tua tham loin Topa’ inn sungah siampi Hilkiah in a muh laibu sungah a kigelh thukham kammalte amah in a kipsak theih nadingin Judah gam sung leh Jerusalem a, a om vankahte, aisante, innsung pasiante, milimte leh a kihhuainate khempeuh Josiah in hemkhia hi.

Ama hun ma-in, amah tawh a kibang, Moses’ thukham tawh kizui-in a lungsim khempeuh, a nuntakna khempeuh leh a thahatna khempeuh tawh Topa lamah a kihei kumpi om lo hi; ama nungah zong amah tawh a kibang khat zong hong khang lo hi.
Manasseh in amah a phinna ahi hih phinnate khempeuh hangin Judah tungah ama hehna, a lauhuai hih hehna lian panin Topa kihei nai lo hi.
Topa in, “Israel ka khinkhiat bangin ka muhna panin Judah zong ka khinkhia ding a, keimah in ka teelsa khuapi Jerusalem, leh ka min om ding hi, ka cihna inn ka paaikhia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Josiah’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?

Ama hun sungin Assiria kumpipa a huh dingin Eufrates gunah Izipt kumpipa Faro Neko kuanto hi. Amah khaktan dingin Kumpi Josiah kuan hi; tua ciangin Faro Neko in Josiah a muh ciangin Megiddo ah that hi.

Tua ciangin ama nasemte in Megiddo panin a sisa-in leeng khat sungah amah pua-in Jerusalem ah ciahpih uh a, a hanah amah vui uh hi. Tua ciangin tua gam mite in Josiah’ tapa Jehoahaz la-in sathau nilh uh a, a pa’ tangin kumpi-in amah koih uh hi.
Jehoahaz in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-thum pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kha thum sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Hamutal hi a, Libnah khuami Jeremiah’ tanu ahi hi.
A pu a pate’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin amah in Topa muhna ah a sia gamta hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Jerusalem a uk theih loh nadingin Faro Neko in Hamath gam sung Riblah khua-ah amah kol bulh a, tua gamte ama tungah ngun talen zakhat leh kham talen khat siah kipiasak hi.

Tua ciangin Faro Neko in a pa Josiah’ tangin Josiah’ tapa Eliakim kumpi-in koih a, ama min Jehoiakim ci-in kheelsak hi. Ahih hangin amah in Jehoahaz paikhiatpih hi; amah Izipt tung a, tua lai-ah si hi.

Tua ciangin Jehoiakim in a ngun leh a kham Faro tungah pia a, ahih hangin Faro’ thupiakna bangin tua sum a piak dingin a gam sung mite tungah amah in siah dong hi. Faro Neko tungah piak dingin amah in mi khempeuh tung panin a neihna uh tawh kizui-in a gam sung mite’ ngun leh kham dok hi.
Jehoiakim in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawm-le-khat sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Zebidah hi a, Rumah khuami Padaiah’ tanu ahi hi.
A pu a pate’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin Topa muhna ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Ama hun sungin Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar hong kuanto a, Jehoiakim kum thum sung ama nasem suak hi; tua ciangin Jehoiakim in amah lehdo hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangte ahi ama nasemte tung tawnin a gen Topa’ thugenna bangin Judah a susia dingin ama lang khatah Topa in Khaldea mihonte, Siria mihonte, Moab mihonte leh Ammon mihonte sawl hi.

3-4 Ama gamtatnasate khempeuh tawh kizui-in Manasseh’ khialhna hangin ama muhna panin amaute a khinkhiatna ding, leh a diakdiakin, amah in khialhna nei lo mite a thahna hangin Topa’ thupiakna tawh Judah tungah hih thu hong tung taktak ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a mawh lo mite’ sisan tawh Jerusalem kidimsak a, Topa in amah maisak lo ding hi.
Tu-in Jehoiakim’ sepna a om laite, leh a hih khempeuh, Judah Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin a pate tawh Jehoiakim ihmu a, ama tangin a tapa Jehoiakhin in uk hi.
Tua ciangin Babilon kumpipa in Izipt Lui panin Eufrates gun dong Izipt kumpipa’ neih khempeuh laksak khin ahih manin Izipt kumpipa a gam panin hong kuankhia kik nawn lo hi.
Jehoiakhin kumpi a suahin kum sawm-le-giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kha thum sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Nehusta hi a, Jerusalem khuami Elnathan’ tanu ahi hi.
Amah in a pa’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin Topa muhna ah a sia gamta hi.
Tua hun lai takin Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar Jerusalem ah hong kuanto a, tua khuapi ki-umcih hi.
Ama nasemte in a umcih lai takin Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar tua khuapi ah hong tung hi:

12-13 tua ciangin Judah kumpipa Jehoiakhin in Babilon kumpipa tungah amahmah, ama nu, a nasemte, a uliante, leh a kumpi inn-a zaneite kipia hi. Topa in a genkholhsa bangin Babilon kumpipa in ama uk a kum giatna kumin thongkia-in amah la a, Topa’ inn a, vanmanpha khempeuh, leh kumpipa’ inn a, vanmanpha khempeuh puakhia-in, Israel kumpi Solomon in a bawlsa, Topa’ biakinn sunga kham nazat khempeuh la hi.
Amah in Jerusalem khempeuh, a ulian khempeuh leh a thahat a vanglian khempeuh, galmatin tulsawm, khutsiamte leh sikseekte khempeuh ciahpih hi; tua gama a zawngpente simloh kuamah om nawn lo hi.
Amah in Babilon ah Jehoiakhin a ciahpih hi; kumpipa’ nu, kumpipa’ zite, ama nuai-ah a zaneite, leh tua gam sung ukpite, Jerusalem panin Babilon ah amah in galmatin la hi.
Babilon kumpipa in a vekpi-in a thahat, galdo dingin a hoih ahi mi thahat khempeuh tulsagih, leh khutsiamte leh sikseekte tulkhat, galmatin Babilon ah paipih hi.
Tua ciangin Babilon kumpipa in Jehoiakhin’ tangin ama pa’ sanggampa Mattaniah kumpi-in koih a, a min Zedekiah-in kheelsak hi.
Zedekiah kumpi a suahin kum sawmnih-le-khat pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawm-le-khat sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Hamutal hi a, Libnah khuami Jeremiah’ tanu ahi hi.
Jehoiakim’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin amah in Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ hehna hangin ama kiang panin amaute a paihkhiatna zah dong dingin Jerusalem leh Judah tungah thu hong om hi. Tua ciangin Zedekiah in Babilon kumpipa lehdo hi.

Tua ahih manin ama uk a kum kua-na, tua kum a kha sawmna, tua kha a ni sawm ni-in Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar a galkap khempeuh tawh Jerusalem a sim dingin hong pai-in tua khua umcih uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in a kimkotah umcih nading panmun bawl uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Zedekiah’ kum sawm-le-khatna kum dong tua khuapi ki-umcih hi.
A kha lina a ni kua ni-in tua khuapi sungah kialpi nasia mahmah ahih manin tua gam mite’ ading an om lo hi.

Tua ciangin khuapi kulh sulet uh hi; Khaldea mite khuapi kiimah a ompi mahin, kumpipa’ huan kiang lam kulhpi nih kikal kulh kongpi lampi zui-in kumpipa leh a galhang mi khempeuh zanin tai uh hi. Amaute Arabah lam manawhin pai uh hi.
Ahih hangin Khaldea mite’ galkapte in kumpipa delh uh a, Jerikho zanglei-ah amah pha uh hi; tua ciangin a galkap khempeuh ama kiang panin kithehthang uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in kumpipa man uh a, ama tungah thukhenna a pia, Riblah a, Babilon kumpipa kiangah amah paipih uh hi.
Amaute in Zedekiah’ muhna ah a tapate thatin, Zedekiah’ mitte khelkhia uh a, amah kol bulhin Babilon ah paipih uh hi.
A kha ngana, tua kha a ni sagih ni—Babilon kumpipa, Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar’ kum sawm-le-kuana kumin—Babilon kumpipa’ nasempa, amah a cingte a ukpa Nebuzaradan Jerusalem ah hong pai hi.
Amah in Topa’ inn, kumpipa’ inn leh Jerusalem khua sung inn khempeuh hal hi; inn lian khempeuh amah in haltum hi.
Tua ciangin a cingte a ukpa tawh a om Khaldea mi galkapte khempeuh in Jerusalem kimkot a, kulhpi susia uh hi.
Tua ciangin a cingte a ukpa Nebuzaradan in khuapi sungah a kinusia a om lai mite leh Babilon kumpipa a taisan mite, mi honpi a om lai teng khempeuh sal-in paipih khawm hi.
Ahih hangin a cingte a ukpa in leenggui lote a en ding leh lo kho dingin tua gam mi a zawngpente pawlkhat nusia hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ inn sungah a om sumngo khuampite, leh Topa’ inn sungah a om a din’nate leh sumngo tuikuangpi Khaldea mite in satnen uh a, Babilon ah a sumngo pua uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in beelte, kawbiate, taitehte leh paknamtui adingin pakante leh biakinn sung nasepna a, kizang sumngo nazatte khempeuh,
vutluahnate zong, leh haite lakhia uh hi. A cingte a ukpa in kham a hite kham mahin la-in ngun a hite a ngun mahin la hi.
Solomon in Topa’ inn a, dinga a bawl khuampi nihte, tuikuangpi khat, leh a tun’nate, sumngo tawh kibawl hih nazatte khempeuh ahih leh tawi teh zawh ding hilo hi.

Khuampi khat a san’na in tong sawm-le-giat hi a, tua tungah sumngo khuamluzepna khat om hi; khuamluzepna a san’na in tong thum ahi hi; sumngo tawh a kibawl ahi ngen banga kikalh simsiam leh mangkawlsingte khuamluzepna kimkotah om hi. A khuampi nihna in zong tua mah bangin, ngen banga kikalh simsiam tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a cingte a ukpa in siampi lianpi Seraiah, leh siampi nihna Zefaniah, leh kong a cing mi thumte la hi;

tua ciangin khuapi panin galkapte a uk ngei ulian khat, leh khuapi sungah a om kumpipa’ thukuppihte mi nga la hi; tua ciangin gamsung mite a khawm galkapte a ukpa’ lai-atpa la hi; tua ciangin khuapi sungah a om tua gamsung mi sawmguk la hi.
Tua ciangin a cingte a ukpa Nebuzaradan in amaute la-in Riblah a, Babilon kumpipa kiangah amaute paipih hi.
Tua ciangin Babilon kumpipa in amaute vat a, Hamath gam sung Riblah ah amaute that hi. Tua ahih ciangin amau’ gam panin sal-in Judah mite kilakhia hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam sungah a om lai, Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in a nusiatte tungah a uk dingin Shafan’ tapa Ahikam, a tapa Gedaliah amah in seh hi.

Tu-in gamsunga om galkap a ukte leh a mite in Babilon kumpipa in a uk dingin Gedaliah a sehna thu a zak uh ciangin amaute a mite uh tawh Mizpah a, Gedaliah kiangah hong pai uh hi; tuate in Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael, leh Kareah’ tapa Johanan, leh Netofah mi Tanhumeth’ tapa Seraiah, leh Ma-akath mi Ja-azaniah ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin Gedaliah in amaute leh a mite uh tungah kiciamin, “Khaldea mi uliante’ hangin lau kei un; gam sungah teengin, Babilon kumpipa’ na sem un, tua ciangin note’ adingin thu hong nuam ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a kha sagihna sungin kumpi innkuan sung panin Elishama’ tapa Nethaniah, a tapa Ishmael mihing sawm tawh hong kuanin Gedaliah leh Mizpah ah amah tawh a om Judah mi leh Khaldea mite simin that hi.
Tua ciangin a neu a lianin mi khempeuh, leh galkap a ukte dingkhia-in Izipt ah pai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Khaldea mite kihta uh hi.

Judah kumpipa Jehoiakhin thong sungah a om zawh kum sawmthum-le-sagihna kum, kha sawm-le-nihna, tua kha in sawmnih-le-sagih ni, Babilon kumpipa Evil-merodak in uk ding a kipat kumin, hehpihna tawh thong panin Judah kumpipa Jehoiakhin khah hi;
amah in migitna kam tawh amah hopih a, Babilon sunga amah tawh a om kumpi a mat dangte khempeuh sangin a sangzaw-in amah pahtawi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jehoiakhin in a thong puante suahkhia hi. Tua ciangin a nuntak sung ni simin kumpipa’ sabuai ah a manmanin an ne hi;
tua ciangin ama ngah thuap dingin, amah a nuntak sung tawntung ni simin tanh khat, a manman a, ngahthuapna ama tungah kumpipa in pia hi.
Adam’ ta Seth, Seth’ ta Enosh;
Enosh’ ta Kenan, Kenan’ ta Mahalalel, Mahalalel’ ta Jared;
Jared’ ta Enok, Enok’ ta Methuselah, Methuselah’ ta Lamek;
Lamek’ ta Noah, Noah in tapa thum nei a, tuate in Shem, Ham leh Jafeth ahi uh hi.
Jafeth’ tapate in: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshek, leh Tiras ahi uh a, amau’ min pua-in minam piang ciat hi.
Gomer’ suante in: Ashkenaz mite, Rifath mite, leh Togarmah mite ahi hi.
Javan’ suante in: Elishah mite, Tarshish mite, Kittim mite leh Rodanim mite ahi uh hi.
Ham’ tapate in: Kush, Izipt, Put, leh Kanaan ahi uh a, amau’ min pua-in minam piang ciat hi.
Kush’ suante in: Seba mite, Havilah mite, Sabta mite, Raamah mite, leh Sabteka mite ahi uh hi. Raamah’ suante in: Sheba mite, leh Dedan mite ahi uh hi.
Kush in Nimrod kici tapa khat nei hi; amah in leitungah a vanglian ding khatin hong kipan hi.
Izipt in Lud mite, Anam mite, Lehab mite, Naftuh mite,
Pathrus mite, Kasluh mite (Filistia mite’ hong pian’na), leh Kaftor mite’ pian’na pupi ahi hi.
Kanaan in a tacil Sidon, leh Heth,
leh Jubus mite, Amor mite, Girgash mite,
Hiv mite, Arka mite, Sin mite,
Arvad mite, Zemari mite, leh Hamath mite’ pian’napa ahi hi.
Shem tapate in: Elam, Asshur, Arpakshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, leh Meshek ahi uh a, amau min pua-in minam piang ciat hi.
Arpakshad in Shelah’ pa ahi hi; Shelah in Eber’ pa ahi hi.
Eber sung pan a piang tapa nihte: khatpa’ min in Peleg ahi hi (bang hang hiam cih leh ama hunin gam kikhen hi), a sanggampa’ min in Joktan ahi hi.
Joktan in Almodad mite, Shelef mite, Hazarmaveth mite, Jerah mite,
Hadoram mite, Uzal mite, Diklah mite,
Ebal mite, Abimael mite, Sheba mite,
Ofir mite, Havilah mite, leh Jobab mite’ pian’napa ahi hi; hihte khempeuh in Joktan’ suante ahi uh hi.
Shem, Arpakshad, Shelah;
Eber, Peleg, Re-u,
Serug, Nahor, Terah;
tua ciangin Abraham a kici Abram ahi suk uh hi.
Abraham’ tapate in: Isaak leh Ishmael ahi uh hi.
Hihte in amau’ khangsimna ahi hi: Ishmael’ tacil in Nebaioth ahi hi; tua ciangin Kedar, Adbe-el, Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Nafish, leh Kedemah ahi uh hi. Hihte in Ishmael’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Abraham’ zineu Keturah’ tapate: Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, leh Shuah ahi uh hi. Jokshan’ tapate in: Sheba leh Dedan ahi uh hi.
Midian’ tapate in: Efah, Efer, Hanok, Abida, leh Elda-ah ahi uh hi. Hihte khempeuh in Keturah’ suan leh khakte ahi uh hi.
Abraham in Isaak’ pa ahi hi. Isaak’ tapate in Esau’ leh Israel ahi uh hi.
Esau’ tapate in: Elifaz, Re-u-el, Jeush, Jalam, leh Korah ahi uh hi.
Elifaz’ tapate in: Teman, Omar, Zefi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna leh Amalek ahi uh hi.
Re-u-el’ tapate in: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, leh Mizzah ahi uh hi.
Seir’ tapate in: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer, leh Dishan ahi uh hi.
Lotan’ tapate in Hori leh Homan ahi uh hi; tua ciangin Lotan’ sanggamnu in Timna ahi hi.
Shobal’ tapate in: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shefi, leh Onam ahi uh hi. Zebeon’ tapate in: Ai-ah leh Anah ahi uh hi.
Anah’ tapa in Dishon ahi hi. Dishon’ tapate in: Hamran, Eshban, Ithran, leh Kheran ahi uh hi.
Ezer’ tapate in: Bilhan, Za-avan, leh Ja-akan ahi uh hi. Dishon tapate in: Uz leh Aran ahi uh hi.
Israelte tungah kumpi khatpeuh peuh in a uk ma-in Edom gam sungah a uk kumpite in hihte ahi uh hi: Beor’ tapa Bela hi a, ama khuapi min in Dinhabah ahi hi.
Bela a sih ciangin ama tangin Bozrah khuami Zerah’ tapa Jobab in uk hi.
Jobab a sih ciangin ama tangin Teman mite’ gam mi Husham in uk hi.
Husham a sih ciangin Moab gam sungah Midian a zopa, Bedad’ tapa Hadad in ama tangin uk hi; ama khuapi min in Avith ahi hi.
Hadad a sih ciangin ama tangin Masrekath khuami Samlah in uk hi.
Samlah a sih ciangin ama tangin Eufrates gun gei-a om Rehoboth khuami Shawl in uk hi.
Shawl a sih ciangin ama tangin Akbor’ tapa Baalhanan in uk hi.
Baalhanan a sih ciangin ama tangin Hadad in uk hi; ama khuapi min in Pai hi a, ama zi’ min in Mehetabel hi a, Mezahab’ tanu ahi Matred’ tanu ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Hadad si hi. Edom ukpite in: ukpi Timna, Aliah, Jetheth,
Ohilibamath, Elah, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel, leh Iram ahi uh hi; hihte in Edom ukpite ahi uh hi.
Israel’ tapate in: Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakhar, Zebulun,
Dan, Josef, Benjamin, Naftali, Gad, leh Asher ahi uh hi.
Judah’ tapate in: Er, Onan, leh Shelah ahi uh hi; hih thumte in Kanaan mi Bathshua tawh a neih ahi hi. Tu-in Judah’ tacil Er in Topa’ muhna ah gilo a, tua ciangin Topa in amah that hi.
A tapa’ zi Tamar in zong amah tawh Perez leh Zerah nei hi. Judah in a vekpi-in tapa nga nei hi.
Perez tapate in: Hezron, leh Hamul ahi uh hi.
Zeran’ tapate in: Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Kalkol, leh Dara, a vekpi-in nga pha uh hi.
Karmi’ tapa in: A ki-ap nate-ah a khial, Israel a nawngkaisak Akhar ahi hi;
tua ciangin Ethan’ tapa in Azariah ahi hi.
Ama sung panin a suak Hezron’ tapate in: Jerahme-el, Ram, leh Khelubai ahi uh hi.
Ram in Amminadab’ pa hi a, Amminadab in Judah tapate sung pan ulian Nahshon’ pa ahi hi.
Nahshon in Salma’ pa, Salma in Boaz’ pa,
Boaz in Obed’ pa, Obed in Jessi’ pa ahi hi.
Jessi in a tacil Eliab, a nihna Abinadab, thumna Shimea,
a lina Nethanel, a ngana Raddai,
a gukna Ozem, a sagihna David’ pa ahi hi;
amau’ sanggamnumeite in Zeru-iah leh Abigail ahi uh hi. Zeru-iah’ tapate in: Abishai, Joab leh Asahel, thum pha uh hi.
Abigail in Amasa nei a, Amasa’ pa in Ishmael mi Jether ahi hi.
Hezron’ tapa Kaleb in a zi Azubah leh Jerioth-te tawh ta nei hi; ama tapa in: Jesher, Shobab, leh Ardon ahi uh hi.
Azubah a sih ciangin Kaleb in Efrath ten’pihin, tua nu in amah tawh Hur nei hi.
Hur in Uri’ pa hi a, Uri in Bezalel’ pa ahi hi.
Tua khit ciangin kum sawmguk a phak ciangin Hezron in a ten’pih Gilead’ pa Makhir’ tanu luppih hi; tua nu in amah tawh Segub nei hi;
Segub in Jair’ pa hi a, Gilead gam sungah khuapi sawmnih-le-thum nei hi.
Ahih hangin Geshur leh Aram in amaute tung panin Havvothjair khua Kenath leh a khuaneute, khua sawmguk la hi. Hihte khempeuh in Gilead’ pa Makhir’ suan leh khakte ahi uh hi.
Hezron a sih khit ciangin Kaleb in a pa Hezron’ zi Efrath luppih a, tua nu in amah tawh Tekoa khuapi a sat Ashur nei hi.
Hezron’ tacil Jerahme-el’ tapate in: A tacil Ram, Bunah, Oren, Ozem, leh Ahijah ahi uh hi.
Jerahme-el in a zi dang khat zong nei a, a min in Atarah ahi hi; amah in Onam’ nu ahi hi.
Jerahme-el’ tacil Ram’ tapate in: Maaz, Jamin, leh Eker ahi uh hi.
Onam’ tapate in: Shammai leh Jada ahi uh hi. Shammai’ tapate in: Nadab leh Abishur ahi uh hi.
Abishur’ zi min in Abihail hi a, tua nu in amah tawh Ahban leh Molid nei hi.
Nadab’ tapate in: Seled leh Appaim ahi uh hi; Seled in ta nei loin si hi.
Appaim’ tapa in Ishi ahi hi. Ishi’ tapa in Sheshan ahi hi. Sheshan’ tapa in Ahlai ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Shammai’ sanggampa Jada’ tapate in: Jether leh Jonathan ahi uh hi; Jether in ta nei loin si hi.
Jonathan’ tapate in: Peleth leh Zaza ahi uh hi. Hihte in Jerahme-el’ suan leh khakte ahi uh hi.
Tu-in Sheshan in tapa nei loin tanu bek nei hi; ahih hangin Sheshan in Jarha min nei Izipt sila khat nei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Sheshan in a sila Jarha tungah a zi dingin a tanu pia hi; tuanu in Attai nei hi.
Attai in Nathan’ pa hi a, Nathan in Zabab’ pa ahi hi.
Zabab in Eflal’ pa hi a, Eflal in Obed’ pa hi hi.
Obed in Jehu’ pa hi a, Jehu in Azariah’ pa ahi hi.
Azariah in Helez’ pa hi a, Helez in Eleasah’ pa ahi hi.
Eleasah in Sismai’ pa hi a, Sismai in Shallum’ pa ahi hi.
Shallum in Jekamiah’ pa hi a, Jekamiah in Elishama pa ahi hi.
Jerahme-el’ sanggampa Kaleb’ tapate in: Zif’ pa ahi a tacil Mareshah ahi hi. Mareshah’ tapa in Hebron ahi hi.
Hebron’ tapate in: Korah, Tappuah, Rekem, leh Shema ahi uh hi.
Shema in Raham’ pa hi a, Raham in Jorkean’ pa ahi hi; Rekem in Shammai’ pa ahi hi.
Shammai’ tapa in Maon ahi hi; Maon in Bethzur’ pa ahi hi.
Kaleb’ zineu Efah in Haran, Moza, leh Gazez nei hi; Haran in Gazez’ pa ahi hi.
Jahdai’ tapate in: Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Efah, leh Sha-af ahi uh hi.
Kaleb’ zineu Ma-akah in Sheber leh Tirhanah nei hi.
Tua ciangin tapa nih nei leuleu a, Madmannah khuapi a sat Sha-af, leh Makbenah khuapi leh Gibea khuapi a sat Sheva ahi uh hi. Kaleb in tanu khat zong nei a, a min Aksah ahi hi.
Hihte in Kaleb’ suan leh khakte ahi uh hi. Kaleb’ zi Efrath’ tacil Hur’ tapate in: Kiriath-jearim khuapi a sat Shobal,
Bethlehem khuapi a sat Salma, leh Bethgader khuapi a sat Haref ahi uh hi.
Kiriath-jearim khuapi a sat Shobal in tapa nei hi: Haroeh leh Menuhoth mi a langte’ pian’na ahi hi.
Tua ciang Kiriath-jearim khua sungah a teengte in: Ithri mite, Puth mite, Shumath mite, leh Mishrai mite ahi uh hi; hihte sung panin Zorah mite leh Estaol mite hong piang hi.
Bethlehem khuapi a sat Salma’ suante in: Netofah mite, Atroth-bethjoab, leh Zorah mi ahi Manahath mite a lang ahi hi.
