Jabez-ah a teeng laithei minamte in: Tirath mite, Shimeath mite, leh Sukath mite ahi uh hi. Hihte in Rekhab minamte tawh a kiteeng Ken mite ahi uh hi.
David sung panin Hebron ah a piang tapate in: Jezre-el mi Ahinoam tawh a neih a ta cil Ammon; Karmel numei Abigail tawh a neih a nihna Daniel,
Geshur kumpipa Talmai’ tanu, a nu Ma-akah a hi a thumna Absalom; a nu Haggith ahi a lina Adonijah;
Abital tawh a neih a ngana Shefatiah; a zi Eglah tawh a neih a gukna Ithream;
amah in kum sagih leh kha guk sung a ukna Hebron ah ama sung panin guk suak hi. Tua ciangin amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum-le-thum sung uk hi.
Ama sung panin Jerusalem ah a suakte in: Shimea, Shibab, Nathan, leh Solomon, Ammiel’ tanu Bathsheba tawh a neih li pha uh hi;
tua ciangin Ibhar, Elishama, Elifelet,
Nogah, Nefeg, Jafia,
Elishama, Eliada, leh Elifelet, kua pha uh hi.
Hihte in, a zineute’ tapate sim lohin, David’ tapate ahi uh hi: Tamar a kici tanu khat zong nei hi.
Solomon’ suan leh khakte in: Rehoboam, a tapa Abijah, a tapa Asa, a tapa Jehoshafat,
a tapa Joram, a tapa Ahaziah, a tapa Joash,
a tapa Amaziah, a tapa Azariah, a tapa Jotham,
a tapa Ahaz, a tapa Hezekiah, a tapa Manasseh,
a tapa Amon, a tapa Josiah ahi uh hi.
Josiah’ tapate in: A tacil Johanan, a nihna Jehoiakim, a thumna Zedekiah, a lina Shallum ahi uh hi.
Jehoiakim’ suan leh khakte in: A tapa Jekoniah leh Zedekiah ahi uh hi;
Babilon ah sal a suak Jekoniah’ tapate in: A tapa Shealtiel,
Malkhiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama, leh Nedabia ahi uh hi;
Pedaiah’ tapate in: Zerubbabel leh Shimei ahi uh hi; Zerubbabel’ tapate in: Meshullam leh Hananiah hi a, Shelomith kici tanu khat zong nei hi;
tua ciangin tapa dang Hashubah, Ohel, Berekiah, Hasadiah, leh Jushabhesed, nga nei lai hi.
Hananiah’ tapate in: Pelatiah leh Jeshaiah, Refaiah, a tapa Arnan, a tapa Obadiah, a tapa Shekaniah ahi uh hi.
Shekaniah in tapa khat leh tupa nga nei a, a tapa in Shemaiah ahi hi. Shemaiah tapate in: Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah, leh Shafat, a vekin guk pha uh hi.
Neariah’ tapate in: Elio-enai, Hizkiah, leh Azrikam, thum pha uh hi.
Elio-enai’ tapate in: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah, leh Anan, sagih pha uh hi.
Judah’ tapate in: Perez, Hezron, Karmi, Hur, leh Shobal ahi uh hi.
Shobal’ tapa Reajah in Jahath’ pa hi a, Jahath in Ahumai leh Lahad’ pa ahi hi. Hihte in Zorah khua a teeng minamte pu leh pate ahi uh hi.

Hur in a pa zi Efrathah’ ta upa pen hi a, ama suan leh khakte in Bethlehem khuapi sat uh hi. Hur’ tapa thumte in: Etam, Penuel, leh Ezer ahi uh hi. Etam in tapa thum nei a, tuate in: Jezre-el, Ishma, leh Idbash ahi hi. Tanu khat zong nei a, a min in Hazzelelponi ahi hi. Penuel in Gedor khuapi a satpa hi a, Ezer in Hushah khuapi a satpa ahi hi.
Tekoa khuapi a sat Ashur in zi nih, Helah leh Na-arah nei hi;
Na-arah in amah tawh Ahuzzam, Hefer, Temeni, leh Ha-ahashtari nei hi. Hihte in Na-arah’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Helah tawh a tapate in: Zerah, Izhar, leh Ethnan leh Koz ahi uh hi.
Koz in Anub leh Zobehah pa hi a, Harum’ tapa Aharhel’ suante pupi ahi hi.
Jabez a kici mi khat in a sanggamte sangin pahtawihuai zaw hi; a nu in, “Gimpi-in amah nei ka hih manin,” ci-in a min Jabez phuak hi.

Jabez in Israel Pasian tungah thu ngen a, “Kei thupha hong pia-in ka gamgi hong keeksak in. Kei hong ompih in la, kei hong gimsak loh nadingin siatna panin hong kem in!” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in ama ngetna pia hi.
Shuhah’ sanggampa Khelub in Mehir’ pa hi a, Mehir in Eshton’ pa ahi hi.
Eshton in Bethrafa, Paseah, leh Tehinnah, tapa thum nei a, Tehinnah in Irnahash khuapi satpa ahi hi. Hih mite’ suan leh khakte, Rekah munah teeng uh hi.
Kenaz’ tapate in: Othiel leh Seraiah ahi uh hi; Othniel’ tapate in: Hathath leh Meonothai ahi uh hi.
Meonothai in Ofraih’ pa ahi hi; Seraiah in Joab’ pa hi a, Joab in Geharashim khuapi satpa ahi hi. Tua khua a teeng mite khutsiamte vive ahih manin tua min kiphuak hi.
Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb’ tapate in: Iru, Elah, Na-am ahi uh hi: Elah’ tapa in Kenaz ahi hi.
Jehallelel’ tapate in: Zif, Zifah, Tiria, leh Asarel ahi uh hi.

Ezrah’ tapa lite in: Jether, Mered, Efer, leh Jalon ahi uh hi. Mered in Faro’ tanu Bithiah ten’pih a, tanu Miriam leh tapa Shammai leh Ishbah nei hi. Ishbah in Eshtemoa khuapi satpa ahi hi. Mered in Judah minam numei khat zong ten’pih a, tua tawh tapa thum nei hi. Tuate in: Gedor khuapi a satpa Jered, Soko khuapi a satpa Heber, leh Zanoah khuapi a satpa Jekuthiel ahi hi.
Hodiah in Naham’ sanggamnu ten’pih a, amau’ suante in Keilah khua-ah a teeng Garm mite leh Eshtemoa khua-ah a teeng Ma-akath minamte ahi uh hi.
Shimon’ tapate in: Amnon, Rinnath, Benhanan, leh Tilon ahi uh hi. Ishi’ tapate in: Zoheth leh Benzoheth ahi uh hi.
Judah’ tapa khat ahi Shelah’ tapate in: Lekah khuapi a sat Er, Mareshah khuapi a sat La-adah, leh Beth-ashbea khua-ah saihadial puan a gan minamte ahi uh hi:
tua ciangin Jokim, leh Kozeba khuapi sungah a teeng mite; tua ciangin Joash leh Saraf hi uh a, amaute gel in Moab numeite ten’pihin Bethlehem khua ah teeng uh hi. (Hih pen tuanthu lui pekpek ahi hi.)
Hihte in beelseekte hi a, Netaim khua leh Gederah khua ah a teengte ahi uh hi; ama na a sem dingin kumpipa tawh tua khuate ah teeng khawm uh hi.
Simeon’ tapate in: Nemuel, Jamin, Jarib, Zerah, leh Shawl ahi uh hi;
Shawl tapa Shallum, a tapa Mibsam, a tapa Mishma ahi uh hi.
Mishma’ suante in A tapa Hammuel, a tapa Zakkur, a tapa Shimei ahi uh hi.
Shimei in tapa sawm-le-guk leh tanu guk nei hi; ahih hangin a sanggamte in ta tampi nei lo uh a, Judah minamte a pun’ bangin Simeon minamte pung lo uh hi.
Amaute Beersheba, Moladah, Hazarshual,
Bilhah, Ezem, Tolad,
Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,
Bethmarkaboth, Hazarsusim, Bethbiri, leh Sha-ariam-ah teeng uh hi. Hihte in David’ uk hun mateng amaute’ khuapite ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ khuaneute in Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tokhen, leh Ashan, khuapi nga,
Baal ciang dong hih khuapite kiim-a om a khuaneute khempeuh tawh ahi hi. Hihte in amau’ ten’na hi a, amaute in khangsimna ciamtehna nei uh hi.
Meshobab, Jamlek, Amaziah’ tapa Joshah,
Joel, Asiel’ tapa Seraiah, a tapa Joshibiah, a tapa Jehu,
Elio-enai, Ja-akobath, Jeshohaiah, Asa-iah, Adiel, Jesimiel, Benaiah,
Shemaiah’ tapa Shimri, a tapa Jedaiah, a tapa Allon, a tapa Shifi’ tapa Ziza—
a min-a a kilo hih mite in amau’ beh ciatah uliante hi uh a, amau’ beh ciat nakpi takin khang hi.
A tuuhonte uh adingin lonona zong dingin kuam nisuahna lam pang, Gedor lutna lamah khual zin uh a,
leihoih, lonona, leh gam zai-in, gamdai-in, a nopna mun mu uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah a teeng masate in Ham mite ahi uh hi.

A min-in a kiciamteh hih mite, Judah kumpipa Hezekiah’ hun sungin hong pai-a, amau’ puanbukte leh tua lai-ah a om Meunim mite susia-in tu ni dongin amaute beisak uh a, amau’ tuuhonte’ adingin tua lai-ah lonona om ahih manin amau’ munah amaute teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute pawl khat, Simeon mi zanga, Seir Mual-ah pai uh a, amaute in Ishi’ tapate Pelatiah, Neariah, Refaiah, leh Uzziel makai-in nei uh hi;
amaute in Amalek mi a suakta a om laite susia uh a, tu ni dongin tua munah amaute teeng uh hi.

Israel’ tacil Reuben’ tapate (amah in tacil ahih hangin amah in a pa’ zineute khat luppih ahih manin ama innluahza pen Israel’ tapa Josef tungah kipia a, tua ahih ciangin innluahza tawh kizui-in khangsimna ah amah kiciamteh lo hi;
Judah in a sanggamte lakah a thahat suakin ama sung panin ulian khat a om hangin innluahza pen Josef’ aa ahi hi);
Israel’ tacil Reuben’ tapate in: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron, leh Karmi ahi uh hi.
Joel’ tapate in: A tapa Shemaiah, a tapa Gog, a tapa Shimei,
a tapa Mikah, a tapa Reaiah, a tapa Baal,
a tapa Be-erah hi a, Assiria kumpipa Tilgath-pilneser in amau’ minam makai Be-erah manin sal-in a puakkhiatpa ahi hi; amah in Reuben mite a ukpipa ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ khangsimna a kiciamteh ciangin a innkuan kuanin ama behte in: Ukpi Jeiel, Zekhariah,
leh Joel mite beh sung panin Shema tapa Azaz, a tapa Bela ahi hi. Nebo leh Baalmeon ciang dong Aroer-ah a teeng uh hi.
Gilead gam sungah amau’ bawngte khangin tampi pha ahih manin Eufrates gun hih lam pang sehnel gam lutna ciang dong nisuahna lamah zong amah teeng hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ hun lai-in amaute in Hagri mite do-in zo uh hi; tua ciangin Gilead nisuahna lam gam khempeuh-a amau’ puanbukte luahin a sungah teeng uh hi.
Bashan gam Salekah dongah Reubente’ gal khatah a teeng Gad minamte in:
Ukpi Joel, a zom Shafam, Janai leh Shafat in Bashan-ah beh makai ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ beh makai dangte in: Mikhael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jakan, Zia, leh Eber, sagih pha uh hi.
Hihte pen Buz’ tapa Jahdo, a tapa Jeshishai, a tapa Mikhael, a tapa Gilead, a tapa Joroah, a tapa Huri, tapa Abihail’ suante ahi uh hi;
Guri’ tapa Abdiel’ tapa Ahi in amau’ behte sungah ukpi ahi hi;
amaute Gilead gam sung, Bashan gam leh a khuapite sung, leh Sharon gam sung lonona a kiten’ theihna ciang dongah teeng uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh Judah kumpi Jotham’ hun sung, leh Israel kumpi Jeroboam’ hun sungin khangsimna-ah kiciamteh hi.
Reuben mite, Gad mite, leh Manasseh minam a langte in mi thahat, lum leh namsau kuahin thal a tawi, gal a siam, nasem dingin a baihsa-in a om mi tul sawmli leh tulli leh zasagih leh sawmguk nei hi.
Amaute in Hagri mite, Jetur mite, Nafish mite, leh Nodab mite zo uh hi;

amaute a do dingin huhna a ngah uh ciangin Hagri mite leh amau tawh a pawl khempeuhte amaute’ khut sungah kipia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gal kidona sungah amaute in Pasian’ tungah ko uh a, amaute in amah muang ahih manin amah in amaute’ thuumna pia hi.
Amaute in amau’ ganhingte mat sak uh hi: a kalaoh uh tul sawmnga, tuu tul zanih leh tul sawmnga, la tulnih, leh mi tul zakhat hing mat uh hi.
Tua gal in Pasian’ gal ahih manin mi tampi tak kithatin puk hi. Tua ciangin amaute sal a suah dong uh amau’ munah teeng uh hi.
Manasseh minam a langte gam sungah teeng uh hi; amaute Bashan panin Baalhermon, Senir, leh Hermon Mual tungah tam pha mahmah uh hi.
Amau’ beh lutangte in: Efer, Ishi, Eliel, Azriel, Jeremiah, Hodaviah, leh Jahdiel, a thahat galhangte, mi minthangte, a beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in a pate uh Pasian’ thu palsat uh a, Pasian in amaute’ mai-ah a suksiat tua gam mite’ pasiante bia uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel’ Pasian in Assiria kumpipa Pul’ lungsim, Tilgath-pilneser a kici Assiria kumpipa’ lungsim hansuah a, amah in amaute, Reuben mite, Gad mite, leh Manasseh minam a langte pua khia-in, amaute Halah, Habor, leh Gozan gun-ah paipihin tu ni dongin tua lai-ah om uh hi.
Levi’ tapate in: Gershom, Kohath, leh Merari ahi uh hi.
Kohath’ tapate in: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, leh Uzziel ahi uh hi.
Amram’ tate in: Aaron, Moses, leh Miriam ahi uh hi. Aaron’ tapate in: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, leh Ithamar ahi uh hi,
Eleazar suan leh khakte in: A tapa Finehas, a tapa Abishua,
a tapa Bukki, a tapa Uzzi,
a tapa Zerahiah, a tapa Meraioth,
a tapa Amariah, a tapa Ahitub,
a tapa Zadok, a tapa Ahima-az,
a tapa Azariah, a tapa Johanan,
leh a tapa Azariah, (Solomon in Jerusalem ah a lam inn sungah siampi a sempa) ahi hi.
Azariah’ tapa Amariah, a tapa Ahitub,
a tapa Zadok, a tapa Shallum,
a tapa Hilkiah, a tapa Azariah,
a tapa Seraiah, a tapa Jehozadak ahi hi;
Topa in Nebukhadnezzar’ khut tawh Judah leh Jerusalem sal-in a mat ciangin Jehozadak salin pai hi.
Levi’ tapate in: Gershom, Kohath, leh Merari ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gershom’ tapate in: Libni leh Shimei ahi uh hi.
Kohath’ tapate in: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, leh Uzziel ahi uh hi.
Merari tapate in: Mahli leh Mushi ahi uh hi. Hihte in amau’ beh tawh kizui-in Levi minamte ahi uh hi.
Gershom sung pan: a tapa Libni, a tapa Jahath, a tapa Zimmah,
a tapa Joah, a tapa Iddo, a tapa Zerah, a tapa Jeatherai ahi hi.
Kohath’ suante in: a tapa Amminadab, a tapa Korah, a tapa Assir,
a tapa Elkanah, a tapa Ebiasaf, a tapa Assir,
a tapa Tahath, a tapa Uriel, a tapa Uzziah, leh a tapa Shawl ahi hi.
Elkanah, tapate in: Amasai leh Ahimoth ahi hi.
Ahimoth’ suante in: A tapa Elkanah, a tapa Zofai, a tapa Nahath,
a tapa Eliab, a tapa Jeroham, a tapa Elkanah, a tapa Samuel ahi uh hi.
Samuel tapa in: a tacil Joel, a nihna Abijah ahi uh hi.
Merari’ suante in: Mahil, a tapa Libni, a tapa Shimei, a tapa Uzza,
a tapa Shimea, a tapa Haggiah, leh a tapa Asaiah ahi uh hi.
Topa’ inn sungah thuciamna singkuang a tawlngak khit ciangin tua sungah lasak nasep a ukin David in a koih mite in hihte ahi uh hi.
Solomon in Jerusalem ah Topa’ inn a lam ciang dong amaute in kikhopna puanbuk ahi biakbuk mai-ah lasak na sem uh hi; amaute in a nasep uh a hunhun a banbanin, sem uh hi.

Hih nasep a semte khangsimna in a nuai-a bang ahi hi. Kohath mite beh sung panin: Heman in la makaipi hi a, Joel’ tapa ahi hi. Heman khang simna in a pupi Israel lam manawhin kileh sim to hi. Heman a pa Joel, a pa Samuel,
a pa Elkanah, a pa Jehoram, a pa Eliel, a pa Toah,
a pa Zuf, a pa Elkanah, a pa Amasai
a pa Elkanah, a pa Joel, a pa Azariah, a pa Zefaniah,
a pa Tahath, a pa Assir, a pa Ebiasaf, a pa Korah,
a pa Izhar, a pa Kohath, a pa Levi, a pa Israel, ahi hi.
Asaf in lasa pawl a nihna a makaipa hi a, ama khangsimna a pupi Levi lam manawhin kileh simto hi. Tuate in: Asaf, a pa Berekhiah, a pa Shimea,
a pa Mikhael, a pa Baaseiah, a pa Malkhijah,
a pa Ethni, a pa Zerah, a pa Adaiah,
a pa Ethan, a pa Zimmah, a pa Shimei,
a pa Jahath, a pa Gershom, a pa Levi, ahi uh hi.
Merari-te beh sung panin Ethan in lasa pawl a thumna a ukpa hi a, ama khang simna in a pupi Levi lam manawh in kileh simto hi. Tuate in: Ethan, a pa Kishi, a pa Abdi, a pa Malluk,
a pa Hashabiah, a pa Amaziah, a pa Hilkiah,
a pa Amzi, a pa Bani, a pa Shemer,
a pa Mahli, a pa Mushi, a pa Merari, a pa Levi hi a,
Levi mi a sanggamte uh Pasian’ inn biakbuk nasep dang khempeuh a sem dingin a kisehte ahi hi.

Ahih hangin Aaron leh a tapate in Pasian’ nasem Moses’ thupiaksate khempeuh bangin siangtho pen mun nasepnate khempeuh leh Israel mite adingin kilemna a bawl dingin meihal biakna tau tung leh paknamtui biakna tau tungah piakna bawl uh hi.
Aaron’ suan leh khakte in: Aaron a tapa Eleazar, a tapa Finehas, a tapa Abishua,
a tapa Bukki, a tapa Uzzi, a tapa Zerahiah,
a tapa Meraioth, a tapa Amariah, a tapa Ahitub,
a tapa Zadok, a tapa Ahima-az ahi hi.
Amau’ gamgi huam sungah amau’ ten’na tawh kizui-in amau’ omna munte in: Kohathte beh sung pan Aaron’ suante tungah a kipia, amau’ adingin a tanh uh om a,
Judah gam sungah Hebron leh a kiim lononate amaute tungah pia uh a,
ahih hangin khuapi lote leh a khuaneute Jefunneh’ tapa Kaleb tungah pia uh hi.
Aaron’ suante tungah amaute in a piak bukna khuapite in: Hebron, Libnah a lonona gamte tawh, Jattir, Eshtemoa a lonona gamte tawh,
Hilen a lonona gamte tawh, Debir a lonona gamte tawh,
Ashan a lonona gamte tawh, leh Bethshemesh a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi;
tua ciangin Benjamin minamte’ gam sung panin Geba a lonona gamte tawh, Alemeth a lonona gamte tawh, leh Anathoth a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi. Amau’ innkuan khempeuh’ khuapite in sawm-le-thum ahi hi.
Kohath mi a om laite tungah aisaana tawh Manasseh minam a langte’ gam sung panin khuapi sawm kipia hi.
Gershom-te beh tungah a innkuan-a kizui-in Issakhar-te’ gam, Asher-te’ gam, Naftali-te’ gam, leh Bashan-a om Manasseh-te’ gam sung panin khuapi sawm-le-thum kipia hi.
Merari-te beh tungah a innkuan-a kizui-in Reuben-te’ gam, Gad-te’ gam, leh Zebulun-te’ gam sung panin khuapi sawm-le-nih kipia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite in hih bangin Levi mite tungah khuapite a lononate tawh pia uh hi.
Amaute in Judahte’ gam, Simeonte’ gam, leh Benjaminte’ gam sung panin zong a min-a kilo hih khuapite amaute tungah pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kohathte beh pawl khat in Efraim minamte gam sung panin amau’ gam khuapite ngah uh hi.
Amaute tungah a kipia bukna khuapite in: Efraim mual tung gam sungah a om Shekhem a lonona gamte tawh, Gezer a lonona gamte tawh,
Jokmean a lonona gamte tawh, Bethhoron a lonona gamte tawh,
Aijalon a lonona gamte tawh, Gathrimmon a lonona gamte tawh,
leh Manasseh minam a langte’ gam sung panin Aner a lonona gamte tawh, leh Bileam a lonona gamte tawh hi a, hihte in Kohathte beh a om laite’ ading ahi hi.
Manasseh minam a langte gam sung panin Gershomte beh tungah a kipiate in: Bashan gam sunga Golan a lonona gamte tawh leh Astaroth a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi;
tua ciangin Issakharte’ gam sung panin: Kedesh a lononte gamte tawh, Daberath a lonona gamte tawh,
Ramoth a lonona gamte tawh, leh Anem a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi;
Asherte’ gam sung panin: Mashal a lonona gamte tawh, Abdon a lonona gamte tawh,
Hukok a lonona gamte tawh, leh Rehob a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi;
tua Naftali-te’ gam sung panin: Galile gam sunga om Kedesh a lonona gamte tawh, Hammon a lonona gamte tawh, leh Kiriathaim a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Merari-te beh a om laite tungah Zebulunte’ gam sung panin a kipiate in: Rimmono a lonona gamte tawh, Tabor a lonona gamte tawh,
Jordan nisuahna lam, Jerikho kiang Jordan gal khat sung pan: pawn-a om Bezer a lonona gamte tawh, Jahzah a lonona gamte tawh,
Kedemoth a lonona gamte tawh, leh Mefa-ath a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi;
tua ciangin Gad-te’ sung panin: Gilead gam-a om Ramoth a lonona gamte tawh, Mahanaim a lonona gamte tawh,
Heshbon a lonona gamte tawh, leh Jazer a lonona gamte tawh ahi hi.
Issakhar’ tapate in: Tola, Puah, Jashub, leh Shimron, li pha uh hi.

Tola’ tapate in: Uzzi, Refaiah, Jeriel, Jahmai, Ibsam, leh Shemuel-te hi a, amau’ beh sung panin innkuan lutangte hi a, Tola-te beh in amau’ khangin a galhangte ahi uh hi. David’ hun lai takin mihing tul sawmnih leh tulnih leh zaguk pha hi.
Uzzi’ tapa in Izrahiah ahi hi. Izrahiah leh a tapate in: Mikhael, Obadiah, Joel, leh Isshiah, mi nga, a vekpi-in ukpite ahi uh hi;

amaute’ ban-ah a pate uh innkuan kuanin khang simna-ah a kiciamtehna tawh kizui-in galsim dingin galkap honte mi tul sawmthum leh tulguk om hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in zi tampi leh tapa tampi nei uh hi;
Issakhar’ minam sungah a om, khang simna ah a kiciamteh, a galhang a thahat amau beh mi a vekpi-in tul sawmgiat leh tul sagih ahi hi.
Benjamin’ tapate in: Bela, Bekher, leh Jediael, thum pha uh hi.

Bela’ tapate in: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, leh Iri, nga pha uh a, amau beh sungah innkuan lutang, a thahat galhangte ahi uh hi; amau’ khangsimna a kiciamtehna-ah tul sawmnih leh tulnih leh sawmthum-le-li pha uh hi.
Bekher’ tapate in: Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Elio-enai, Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth, leh Alemeth ahi uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh in Bekher’ tapate ahi uh hi; amau’ khang tawh kizui-in a khangsimna a kiciamtehna ah, amau’ beh sungah innkuan lutang, a thahat a galhang mihing tul sawmnih leh zanih ahi hi.
Jedial’ tapa in Bilhan ahi hi. Bilhan’ tapate in: Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Khena-anah, Zethan, Tarshish, leh Ahishar ahi uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh in amau’ beh sungah innkuan lutang hi uh a, a thahat a galhang, Jediael’ suante gal dona-ah nasem dingin a baihsa-in a om mihing tulsawm leh tulsagih leh zanih pha uh hi.
Tua ciangin Shuppim leh Huppim in zong hih minamte sung mah hi a, Dan in Hushim kici tapa khat nei hi.
Naftali’ tapate in: Jahziel, Guni, Jezer, leh Shallum hi a, Bilhan sung pan-a piangte ahi uh hi.
Manasseh’ tapate in: A zineu Aram numei tawh a neih Asriel leh Makhir ahi hi. Makhir in Gilead’ pa ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Makhir in Huppim leh Shuppim ading zi la hi. Ama sanggamnu’ min in Ma-akah ahi hi. Makhir’ tapa a nihna’ min in Zelofehad ahi hi; Zelofehad in a tanu bek nei hi.
Tua ciangin Makhir’ zi Ma-akah in tapa nih nei a, a min Peresh leh Sheresh ahi hi; tua ciangin Peresh’ tapate in Ulam leh Rakem ahi hi.
Ulam’ tapa in Bedan ahi hi. Hihte in Manasseh’ tapa Makhir’ tapa Gilead’ suante ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Gilead’ sanggamnu Hammolekheth in Ishhod, Abiezer, leh Mahlah nei hi.
Shemida’ tapate in: Ahian, Shekhem, Likhi, leh Aniam ahi uh hi.
Efraim’ suante in: A tapa Shethelah, a tapa Bered, a tapa Tahath, a tapa Eleadah, a tapa Tahath,
a tapa Zabad, a tapa Shuthelah ahi hi. Efraim in tapa dang nih nei a, tuate in Ezer leh Elead ahi uh hi. Gath khua mite’ bawng sut dingin a kuan lai-in Gath mite in amau tegel na that uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pa Efraim ni tampi sung kap a, amah hehnem dingin a sanggamte hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Efraim in a zi luppih a, amah gai-in tapa khat nei hi; ama inn sungah siatna tung ahih manin amah in a min Beriah a phuak hi.
Ama tanu in She-erah hi a, Bethhoron nuainung leh a tungnung leh Uzzenerah khua a lamnu ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Refah kici tapa khat nei a, ama suante in: Resef, a tapa Telah, a tapa Tahan,
a tapa Ladan, a tapa Ammihud, a tapa Elishama,
a tapa Mun, a tapa Joshua ahi hi.
Amau’ neihsa gam leh a ten’nate uh in Beth-el leh a khuapite, leh nisuahna lamah Na-aran, leh nitumna lamah Gezer leh a khuapite, Shekhem leh a khuapite’ leh Azzah leh a khuapite ahi hi;
Manasseh’ suante in Bethshean leh a khuapite, Ta-anak leh a khuapite, Megiddo leh a khuapite, Dor leh a khuapite uk uh hi. Hihte sungah Israel’ tapa Josef suante teeng uh hi.
Asher’ tapate in: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah, leh a sanggamnu uh Serah ahi hi.
Beriah’ tapate in: Heber leh Malkhiel hi a, Malkhiel in Birzaith’ pa ahi hi.
Heber in Jaflet, Shomer, Hotham, leh a sanggamnu uh Shua-te’ pa ahi hi.
Jaflet’ tapate in: Pasak, Bimhal, leh Ashvath ahi uh hi. Hihte in Jaflet’ tapate ahi uh hi.
A sanggampa Shomer’ tapate in: Rohgah, Jehubbath, leh Aram ahi uh hi.
A sanggampa Hotham’ tapate in: Zofah, Imna, Shelesh, leh Amal ahi uh hi.
Zofah’ suante in: Suah, Harnerfer, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran, leh Be-era ahi uh hi.
Jether’ suante in: Jefunneh, Pispa, leh Ara ahi uh hi.
Ulla’ suante in: Arah, Hanniel, leh Rizia ahi uh hi.

Hihte khempeuh in Asher’ suan, beh lutangte a kipakta, a thahat galhangte, uliante a ukte ahi uh hi. Gal sungah nasem dingin khangsimna ah a kiciamteh amau a phazah in mihing tul sawmnih leh tulguk ahi hi.
Benjamin in a tacil Bela, a nihna Ashbel, a thumna Aharah,
a lina Nohah, leh a ngana Rafa-te’ pa ahi hi.
Bela’ tapate in: Addar, Gera, Abihud,
Abishua, Na-aman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shefufan, leh Huram, ahi uh hi.
Ehud’ tapate in (amaute in Geba a, teeng leh lutangte hi uh a, amaute Mnanhath-ah galmatin kipua hi):
Na-aman, Ahijah, leh Uzza leh Ahihub’ pa Heglam a kici Gera ahi uh hi.
Shaharaim in a zite ahi Hushim leh Baara a mak khit ciangin Moab gam sungah tapate nei hi.
Amah in a zikik Hodesh tawh a neih a tapate in: Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malkam,
Jeuz, Sakhia, leh Mirmah ahi uh hi. Hihte in amau’ beh sungah innkuan lutangte ahi uh hi.
Amah in Hushim tawh zong a neih a tapate in: Ahitub leh Elpa-al ahi uh hi.
Elpa-al’ tapate in: Eber, Misham, leh Ono leh Lod a khuapite tawh a sat Shemed,
leh Beriah leh Shema (Gath a, teengte a taisak Aijalon a, a teeng beh lutangte);
leh Ahio, Shashak, leh Jeremoth ahi uh hi.
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Makhael, Ishpah, leh Joha in Beriah’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Zebadiah, Meshullum, Hizki, Heber,
Ishmerai, Izliah, leh Jobab in Elpa-al’ suante ahi uh hi.
Jakim, Zikri, Zabdi,
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah, leh Shimrath in Shimei’ suante ahi uh hi.
Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zikri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah,
Ifdeiah, leh Penuel in Shashak’ suante ahi uh hi,
Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
Ja-areshiah, Elijah, leh Zikri in Jehoham’ suante ahi uh hi.
Hihte in amau’ khang tawh kizui-in beh lutangte, a ukpite ahi uh hi. Hihte Jerusalem ah teeng uh hi.
Gibeon khuapi a satpa Jeiel in Gibeon ah teeng a, ama zi’ minin Ma-akah ahi hi.
Ama tapa upa pen in: Abdon, tua ciangin Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zekher,
leh Mikloth (amah in Shimeah’ pa) ahi hi. Tu-in amau’ suan leh khakte zong Jerusalem a, amau’ behte’ gal khatah amau’ behte mah tawh teeng uh hi.
Ner in Kish’ pa, Kish in Saul’ pa ahi hi. Saul in Jonathan, Malkhishua, Abinadab leh Eshba-al’ pa ahi hi;
tua ciangin Jonathan’ tapa in Meribba-al ahi hi; Meribba-al in Mikah’ pa ahi hi.
Mikah’ tapate in: Pithon, Melek, Tarea, leh Ahaz ahi uh hi.
Ahaz in Jehoaddah’ pa ahi hi; Jehoaddah in Alemeth, Azmaveth, leh Zimri’ pa ahi hi. Zimri in Moza’ pa ahi hi.
Moza in Binea’ pa ahi hi; Binea’ tapa Rafah, a tapa Eleasah, a tapa Azel ahi hi.
Azel in tapa guk nei a, hihte in amau’ min ahi hi. Azrikam, Bokheru, Ishmeal, Sheariah, Obadiah, leh Hanan ahi uh hi. Hihte khempeuh in Azel’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Azel’ sanggampa Eshek’ tapate in: a tacil Ulam, a nihna Jeush, leh a thumna Elifelet ahi hi.
Ulam’ tapate in a thahat galhangte, thaltawite, tapa tampi leh tupa tampi a neite hi a, mi za leh sawmnga pha uh hi. Hihte khempeuh in Benjamin minamte ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel khempeuh khangsimna ah kiciamteh hi; Israel Kumpite’ Laibu sungah hihte kigelh hi. Amau’ thuman’lohna hangin daan piakna-in Babilon ah salin Judah mite kipaipih hi.
Tu-in amau’ neihsa amau’ khuapite’ sungah a teeng kik masate in Israel nautangte, siampite, Levi mite, leh biakinn nasemte ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah, Benjamin, Efraim, leh Manasseh mi pawl khat Jerusalem ah teeng uh a, tuate in:
Judah’ tapa Perez’ tapate sung panin Bani’ tapa Imri, a tapa Omri, a tapa Ammihud, a tapa Uthai in a makai ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Judah’ tapa Shelah mite sung panin: Innkuan lutang Asaiah in a makai ahi hi.
Judah’ tapa Zerah’ mite sung panin: Jeuel in a makai ahi hi. Judah minam sung panin innkuan zaguk leh sawmkua ahi hi.
Benjamin mite sung panin: Hassenuah’ tapa Hovadiah, a tapa Meshullum, a tapa Sallu ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoram’ tapa Ibneiah, Mikri ta Uzzi, a tapa Elah, leh Ibnijah ta Reuel, a tapa Shefatiah, a tapa Meshullam ahi hi.
Benjamin minamte sung panin innkuan za kua leh sawmnga-le-guk ahi hi. Hih min kilote khempeuhte in amau’ beh ciatah beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Siampite’ sung panin: Jedaiah, Jehoiarib, Jakhin,
leh Pasian’ inn sung a ukpipa Ahitub’ tapa Marioth, a tapa Zadok, a tapa Meshullam, a tapa Hilkiah’ tapa Azariah:
leh Malkhijah’ tapa Pashhur, a tapa Jehoram’ tapa Adaiah, leh Immer’ tapa Meshillemith, a tapa Meshullam, a tapa Jahzarah, a tapa Adiel’ tapa Ma-asai ahi hi;
hihte banah amau’ behte, a beh lutangte, Pasian’ innah nasep nadingin a siam mahmah mihing tulkhat leh zasagih leh sawmguk ahi hi.
Levi mite sung panin: Marari’ tapate sung pan Hashabiah, a tapa Azikam, a tapa Hasshub’ tapa Shemaiah;
leh Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal, leh Asaf tapa Zikri, a tapa Mika’ tapa Mattaniah;
leh Jeduthun’ tapa Galal, a tapa Shemaiah’ tapa Obadiah, leh Netofah mite’ khuaneute sungah a teeng Elkanah’ tapa Asa’ tapa Berekhiah ahi hi.
Kulhkongpi cingte in: Shallum, Akkub, Talmon, leh Ahiman hi a, Shallum in amau’ makaipa ahi hi.
Tu dongin Kumpipa’ Kulhkongpi nisuahna lam pangah a omte ahi uh hi. Hihte in Levi mite omna kongcingte ahi ngei uh hi.
A pu a pate un lutna mun a cing, Topa’ phual a ukte ahih mah bangin Korah’ tapa Ebiasaf, a tapa Kore’ tapa Shallum, leh a behte ahi Korah mite in nasepna a uk, puanbuk kong a cingte ahi uh hi.
Eleazar’ tapa Finehas in a beisa hun sungah amaute in ukpa ahi hi; Topa in amah ompih hi.
Meshellemiah tapa Zekhariah in kikhopna puanbuk lutna ah kongcingpa ahi hi.
Sangkil-ah kongcing-in a kitel hih mite khempeuh in zanih leh sawm-le-nih ahi hi. Amaute a khuaneute uh-a khangsimna ah kiciamteh uh hi. David leh thu-mupa Samuel in amau’ panmun-ah amaute phut hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute leh a suan a khakte un Topa’ inn kulhkongpite a uk, puanbuk inn a cingte ahi uh hi.
Kongpi cingte in a pang li, nisuahna, nitumna, leilu, leh leitaw lamah om uh hi;
tua ciangin amau’ khuaneute sungah a om a behte uh hih mite tawh a om dingin a hun hunin ni sagih simin hong pai ding uh a kisam ahi hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Levi mi ahi kongpi a cing ukpi lite in inn sungte leh Pasian’ inn van manpha koihnate a uk ahi uh hi.
Pasian’ inn kiimah amaute giak uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tungah vilna nasep leh zingsang simin kong a hon’ dingin nasep kiguan hi.
Amaute pawlkhat in biakinn sunga kizang um-le-beelte uk uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nazatte hong kitumpih ciang hita leh a kilakkhiat ciang hita leh a mal zah a sim ding uh kisam hi.
Amau adang pawl khatte tutphah sabuaite leh a kituam koih um-le-beel, an neelte, leenggahzute, sathaute, paknamtuite, leh a namtui nate zong a en dingin kiseh hi.
Siampite’ ta adangte in a namtui nate hel dingin bawl uh a,
tua ciangin Korah mi Shallum’ tacil, Levi mite lak pan Mattiah in biak nading moh pheengte bawl ding hi.
Kohath mi amau’ behte pawlkhat in zong sabbath simin koih ding Ompihna Anlum uk uh hi.
Tu-in hihte in lasate, Levi mi beh lutangte, nasep dangte panin pengin biakinn deite sungah a teengte ahi uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in sun leh zanin na sem uh hi.
Hihte in Jerusalem ah a teeng amau’ khang tawh kizui-in makaite, Levi mi beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Gibeon-ah Gibeon khuapi a satpa Jeiel teeng a, ama zi’ min in Ma-akah hi-in,
a tapa upa pen in Abdon, tua ciangin Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zekhariah, leh Mikloth ahi hi;
tua ciangin Mikloth in Shifeam’ pa ahi hi; amau’ suan leh khakte zong Jerusalem a, a behte uh gal khatah a behte uh tawh teeng uh hi.
Ner in Kish’ pa, Kish in Saul’ pa ahi hi. Saul in Jonathan, Malkhishua, Abinadab, leh Eshbaal’ pa ahi hi;
Jonathan’ tapa in Meribbaal ahi hi; Meribbaal in Mikah’ pa ahi hi.
Mikah tapate in: Pithon, Melek, Tahrea, leh Ahaz ahi uh hi;
Ahaz in Jarah’ pa hi a, Jarah in Alemeth, Azmaveth, leh Zimri’ pa ahi hi; Zimri in Moza’ pa ahi hi.
Moza in Binea’ pa ahi hi; a tapa Refaiah, a tapa Eleash, a tapa Azel ahi hi.
Azel in tapa guk nei a, amau’ minte in: Azrikam, Bokheru, Ishmael, Sheraiah, Obadiah, leh Hanan ahi uh hi; hihte in Azel’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Tu-in Filistiate in Israel mite sim uh hi; Filistiate mai-ah Israel mite tai uh a, Gilboa Mual tungah tuk zeizai uh hi.
Filistiate in Saul leh a tapate pha uh hi; tua ciangin Filistiate in Saul’ tapate Jonathan leh Abinadab leh Malkhishua that uh hi.
Gal kidona in Saul neh mahmah a, thaltawite in amah pha hi; thaltawite in amah liamsak hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a galvan puapa kiangah, “Na namsau dok in la tua tawh kei hong sun let in, tua hi kei leh hih dawi bia mite hong pai-in kei hong khel bawl kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a galvan puapa in hih ngam lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah lau mahmah hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul in ama namsau la-in tua tungah puk hi.
A galvan puapa in Saul a sihna a muh ciangin amah zong ama namsau tungah pukin si hi.
Tua bangin Saul si hi; amah leh a tapa thumte leh a innkuan khempeuh si khawm uh hi.

Kuam sungah a om Israel mite khempeuh in galkapte tai khinin Saul leh a tapate a sihna a muh uh ciangin amaute in a khuapite uh nusia-in tai uh hi; tua ciangin Filistiate hong pai-in khuate sungah teeng uh hi.
A zing ciangin, Filistiate in a kithatte’ nate a hawkkhia dingin hong pai ciangin Saul leh a tapate Gilboa Mual tungah a sihna mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama nate hawkkhia in, a lutang leh a galhiam la uh a, a milimte uh leh mite kiangah hih thu thak a ko dingin Filistiate gam khempeuh ah kamtaite sawl uh hi.
Amaute in amau’ pasian’ biakinn sungah ama galhiam koihin Dagon biakinn sungah ama lutang suang uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jabeshgilead mi khempeuh in Saul tungah Filistiate’ hihsa thu khempeuh a zak uh ciangin

a thahat mi khempeuh ding-in Saul’ luanghawm leh a tapate’ luanghawmte sut khia-in Jabesh ah paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Jabesh a, tawsaw nuai-ah amaute’ guh vui uh a, ni sagih sung an tang uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a thuman’lohna hangin Saul si hi; amah in Topa’ thupiakna a zuih lohna, leh vankah khat thu dongin a lamlah ding a zon’na,
leh Topa tung panin lamlahna a zon’ lohna ah Topa tungah a thuman lo ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa in amah that a, Jessi’ tapa David tungah kumpi gam hei hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh David kiang Hebron ah kikhawm uh a, “En in, kote in nangma guh leh nangma sa ka hi uh hi.

A hun beisa, Saul kumpi ahih sung nangawnin Israel a kuankhiatpih leh a ciahpih in nangmah na hi hi; Topa na Pasian in nangma kiangah, ‘Nangmah in ka mi Israelte a cingpa na hi ding a, ka mi Israelte tungah ulian na hi ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel upate khempeuh kumpipa kiang Hebron ah hong pai uh hi; tua ciangin David in Topa mai Hebron ah amaute tawh thuciamna khat bawl a, Samuel’ tung tawnin Topa’ thugen bangin amaute in Israel kumpi-in David sathau nilh uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jebus mite a ten’na, Jebus a kici Jerusalem ah David leh Israel mi khempeuh hong pai uh hi.
Jebus ah a teeng mite in David kiangah, “Hih lai-ah nang nong pai kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi. Ahi zongin David in David khuapi a kici Zion mun muanhuai la hi.
David in, “Jebus mite a va sim masa peuhpeuh in ukpi leh ukpa hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Zeruiah’ tapa Joab kuanto masa a, tua ahih ciangin amah in ukpi suak hi.
Tua ciangin mun muanhuaina sungah David teeng hi; tua ahih ciangin tua khua in David khuapi kici hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Millo panin a kualin khuapi lam hi; Joab in khuapi sung a om lai mun teng puahkik hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in amah tawh om ahih manin David lian semsem hi.
Tu-in hihte in Israel tawh kisai-in Topa’ thugen bangin amah kumpi-in a bawl dingin Israel khempeuh tawh ama kumpi gam sungah amah nakpi takin a huh David’ mi a thahat a ukpite ahi hi.
David’ mi a thahatte a kiciamtehna in: Hakmoni mi Jashobeam in mi thumte a ukpi ahi hi; amah in a teipi tawh mihing zathum do a, hun khat sungin that khin hi.
Tua ciangin a thahat mihing thumte lak panin amah a zompa in Ahoah-te beh Dodo’ tapa Eleazar ahi hi.
Filistiate galdo dingin a kikaihkhop lai takin amah in Pasdammin ah David tawh om hi. Tua lai-ah mangbuhham a dimna leitang khat om a, Filistiate kiang pan mite tai hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tua leitang laizangah panmun la-in hu a, Filistiate that hi; tua ciangin Topa in zawhna lianpi tawh amaute honkhia hi.
Refaim kuamah Filistia galkapte in giahphual a sat lai takun Adullam leihawm David kiang suangpi ah ukpi sawmthumte sung panin mihing thum paisuk uh hi.
Tua hunin mun muanhuai sungah David om hi; Filistia khua cingte Bethlehem ah om uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Kulhkongpi gei-a Bethlehem tuikhuk panin mi khat in tui dawn ding kei hong pia leh!” ci-in lunggulhna tawh pau hi.

Tua ciangin a thahat mihing thumte in Filistiate’ giahphual phulin kulhkongpi gei-a om Bethlehem tuikhuk panin tui tawi uh a, a tui la-in David kiangah paipih uh hi. Ahih hangin David in tua tui dawn lo hi; amah in Topa adingin sung a,

“Ka Pasian’ mai-ah hih bangin ka gamta het kei ding hi. Hih mihingte’ nuntakna sisan tui dawn ding ka hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a nuntakna uh khamin kei kiangah hong paipih uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in dawn lo hi. A thahat mi thumte in hih nate sem uh hi.
Tu-in Joab’ sanggampa Abishai in sawmthumte lakah a ukpi ahi hi. Amah in a teipi tawh mihing zathum doin amaute that a, mihing thumte’ banah min khat ngah hi.
Amah in mihing sawmthumte sung panin a minthang pen hi a, amaute a ukpa suak hi; ahih hangin amah in mihing thumte ban lo hi.

Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in Kabze-el khuami gal a hang, na lianpite a sempa ahi hi; amah in Moab galhang minih vat lum hi. Amah zong paisukin vuk a kiat ni khatin leihawm sunga om humpinelkai khat that hi.

Amah in Izipt mi khat, a tha gol, pi sagih leh a lang a sang khat that hi. Iziptpa in a khut sungah siamgante’ siamlawngpi cia a pha teipi khat nei hi; ahih hangin Benaiah ciangkhut khat tawh ama kiangah paisuk a, Iziptpa’ khut sung panin a teipi sut khia-in ama teipi mah tawh amah that hi.
Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in hih nate sem a, a thahat mi thumte banah min khat ngah hi.
Mihing sawmthumte lakah amah minthang a, ahih hangin amah in mi thumte ban lo hi. Tua ciangin David in amah a cingte a ukin koih hi.
Galkap lak panin a thahat mite in Joab’ sanggampa Asahel, Bethlehem khuami Dodo’ tapa Elhaan,
Harod khuami Shammoth, Pelon khuami Helez,
Tekoa khuami Ikkesh’ tapa Ira, Anathoth khuami Abiezer,
Hushah khuami Sibbekai, Ahoah-te beh Ilai,
Netofah khuami Maharai, Netofah khuami Baanah’ tapa Heled,
Benjamin mite sung panin Gibeah khuami Ribai’ tapa Ithai, Pirathon khuami Benaiah,
Ga-ash mualkuam mi Hurai, Betharabah khuami Abiel,
Baharum khuami Azmaveth, Sha-albon khuami Eliahba,
Gizon khuami Hashem, Harar khuami Shagee’ tapa Jonathan,
Harar khuami Sakher’ tapa Ahiam, Ur’ tapa Elifal,
Mekherah khuami Hefer, Pelon khuami Ahijah,
Karmel khuami Hezro, Ezbai’ tapa Na-arai,
Nathan’ sanggampa Joel, Hagri’ tapa Mibhar,
Ammon mi Zelek, Zeruiah’ tapa Joab’ galhiam puapa Be-eroth khuami Naharai,
Ithri mi Ira, Ithri mi Gareb,
Hit mi Uriah, Ahlai’ tapa Zabad,
Reuben mite’ makai khat ahi, Reuben mi Shiza’ tapa Adina, leh amah tawh mihing sawmthum,
Ma-akah’ tapa Hanan, leh Mithni mi Joshafat,
Ashterath khuami Uzzia, Aroer khuami Hotham’ tapate Shama leh Jeiel,
Shimri’ tapa Jediael, leh Tiz khuami a sanggampa Joha,
Mahavah khuami Eliel, leh Elna-am’ tapate Jeribai leh Joshaviah, leh Moab mi Ithmah,
Zobah khuami Eliel, Obed, leh Jaasiel ahi uh hi.
Tu-in Kish’ tapa Saul’ hangin a ut utin a tat theih loh lai takin Ziklag a, David kiangah hong paite in hih mite ahi hi; gal sungah amah a huh a thahatte lakah amaute a kihelte ahi uh hi.
Amaute in thaltawite hi uh a, tak lam khut ahi a, vei lam khut tawh ahi zongin thaltang leh suangte lawn thei uh hi: amaute in Saul’ behte Benjamin mi ahi uh hi.
A ukpi in Ahiezer hi a, tua ciangin Joash ahi hi, amaute gel in Gibeah khuami Shema-ah’ tapate ahi uh hi; Azamveth’ tapate Jeziel leh Pelet zong ahi hi; Anathoth khuami Berakah leh Jehu zong ahi hi.
Gibeon khuami Ishmaiah in mihing sawmthumte lakah a thahatpa leh sawmthumte a makaipa ahi hi; Gederah khuami Jeremiah, Jahaziel, Johanan, leh Jozabad zong ahi uh hi;
Harif mi Eluzai, Jerimoth, Bealiah, Shemariah, leh Shefatiah zong ahi uh hi;
Korah mi Elkanah, Issaiah, Azarel, Joezer, leh Jashobeam zong ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Gedor khuami Jeroham tapate Joelah leh Zebadiah ahi uh hi.

Gad minam sung panin gamlak a, mun muanhuai a, David kiangah a thahat a siam galhangte, lum leh teipi zat a siam, a maitang uh humpinelkai maitang bangin, mual tunga om sakhi bangin a manlang mi hong paite in:
A ukpi Ezer, a nihna Obadiah, a thumna Eliab,
a lina Mishamannah, a ngana Jeremiah,
a gukna Attai, a sagihna Eliel,
a giatna Johanan, a kuana Elzabad,
a sawmna Jeremiah, a sawm-le-khatna Makbannai ahi uh hi.
Hih Gad mite in galkap uliante hi a, a neuzawte in zakhat val, a golzawte in tulkhat val uk uh hi.
Hihte in Jordan a piau khempeuh a dimlet laitak kha masa sungin Jordan kantanin kuam sunga om mite nisuahna lam leh nitumna lamah a taisak mite ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Benjamin mi leh Judah mi pawlkhat David kiang mun muanhuai ah hong pai uh hi.

Amaute dawntuah dingin David pai khia-in amaute kiangah, “Kei kiangah kilawmtatna tawh keimah huh dingin hong pai na hih uh leh note tawh ka lungsim kihual khawm ding hi; ahih hangin keimah in bangmah khialhna nei lo napi-in ka langte tungah kei a lehhek dingin hong pai na hih uh leh, i pu i pate’ Pasian in thei hen la, note hong tai hen,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin mihing sawmthum a ukpipa Amasai tungah Pasian Kha Siangtho hong tung a, amah in, “Kote in nangma’ aa hi ung, David aw; nang tawh om ung, Jessi’ tapa aw! Nopna, nopna nang tungah om hen la, nang hong huhte tungah nopna om ta hen! Bang hang hiam cih leh na Pasian in nang hong huh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin David in amaute sang a, ama galkap uliante-in bawl hi.

Saul a do dingin Filistiate tawh David a kuan lai takin Manasseh mi pawlkhat tai-in David beel hi. (Ahi zongin David in Filistiate huh thei lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistiate a ukte in thu kikupna khat nei uh a, “Eite’ makaite’ siat nadingin a topa Saul kiangah David tai ding hi,” ci-in amah sawl khia uh hi.)
David Ziklag ah a pai lai takin Manasseh sung panin tai-in amah a beelte in: Adnah, Jozabad, Jediael, Mikhael, Jozabad, Elihu, leh Zillethai, Manasseh sungah mi a tul-in a ukte ahi uh hi.
Amaute in mi’ na a sut thei mite panin David huh uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a thahat a vanglian mi hi uh a, galkap sungah a ukte ahi uh hi.
Pasian’ galkap hon bangin galkap hon tampi a phak dongin a ni ni-in David huh dingin mi hong pai pai hi.
Hihte in Topa’ thugen bangin Saul’ kumpi gam ama tungah a hei dingin Hebron a, David kiangah a pai galkap a khen phazah ahi uh hi.
Judah mi lum leh tei a pua galkap tulguk leh zagiat ahi hi.
Simeon mite sung panin galdo dingin a thahat a vanglian mihing tulsagih leh zakhat ahi hi.
Levi mite sung panin tulli leh zaguk ahi hi.
Aaron’ suante ulian Jehoiada, leh amah tawh mi tulthum leh zasagih ahi hi.
A thahat a vanglian a khangto Zadok, leh ama beh sung panin galkap a ukte mi sawmnih-le-nih ahi hi.
Tua hun ciang dong mi a tamzaw Saul tawh a kipawl, Saul’ behte ahi Benjamin mite sung panin mihing tulthum ahi hi.
Efraim mite sung panin a thahat a vanglian, amau’ beh sungah a minthang mi tul sawmnih leh zagiat ahi hi.
Manasseh minam a lang sung panin, hong pai-in David kumpi-in a bawl dingin a min a kilo mihing tulsawm leh tulgiat ahi hi.
Issakhar sung panin Israel in bang a sep dingin kilawm cih a thei, hun pai zia a thei ukpi zanih leh amau’ ukna nuai-ah a om amau’ behte khempeuh ahi hi.
Zebulun sung panin David huh dingin lungsim a kikhat, hun khempeuh ah gal a kap thei galdo nadingin galhiam khempeuh a nei mihing tul sawmnga ahi hi.
Naftali sung galkap a ukte tulkhat leh amaute tawh a om lum leh tei a tawi mihing tul sawmthum leh tulsagih ahi hi.
Dan mite sung panin gal do dingin a kitawi mihing tul sawmnih leh tulgiat leh zaguk ahi hi.
Asher sung panin galdo dingin a baihsa-in a om hun khempeuhah gal a kap thei mihing tul sawmli ahi hi.
Jordan gal khat a, om Reuben mite leh Gad mite leh Manasseh minam a langte sung panin galhiam khempeuh tawh a kithawi mihing tul zakhat leh tul sawmnih ahi hi.

Galkap mi ahi; galsim ding a kithawi hih mite khempeuh, Israel tungah David kumpi-in koih ding ngaihsutna takpi tawh Hebron ah hong pai uh hi; tua mah bangin Israel a om laite khempeuh in zong David kumpi-in a bawl ding uh ngaihsutna kikhat uh hi.
A sanggamte un amaute’ adingin na vaihawm khol uh ahih manin amaute tua lai-ah David tawh nithum sung an ne tui dawnin omkhawm uh hi.

Israel sungah lungdamna om ahih manin a vengte uh Issakhar leh Zebulun leh Naftali ciang dong panin zong hong pai-in late leh kalaote leh la-sakolte leh bawngtalte tawh an hong pua-in, an tampi tak, thei mohte, leenggahkeu bawkte, leh leenggahzu leh sathau, bawngtalte leh tuute hong puak uh hi.
David in a tul-a ukte leh a za-a ukte leh makai khempeuh tawh kikupna khat nei hi.

Tua ciangin David in Israel a kikhawm khempeuhte kiangah, “Note in kilawm na sak uh a, Topa i Pasian’ deihna ahih leh, amaute eite kiangah hong pai khop theih nadingun Israel gam sungah a om lai i sanggamte leh lonona gam a nei khuapi sunga om siampite leh Levi mite kiangah mi sawl ni.
Tua ciangin thuciamna singkuang eite kiangah la kik ni; bang hang hiam cih leh Saul’ hun lai-in i don kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua thu mi khempeuh in hoih sa ahih manin tua bangin hih ding a kikhawm khempeuh thukim uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kiriath-jearim panin Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang a ciahpih dingin David in Izipt gam Shihor lui panin Hamath lutna ciang dong Israel khempeuh khawm hi.
Tua ciangin David leh Israel khempeuh, kherubte tungah a tu Topa’ min tawh a kilo Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang a paipih to dingin, Kiriath-jearim a kici Baalah ah paito uh hi.
Amaute in Abinadab’ inn panin leeng thak khat tungah Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang pua uh a, Uzza leh Ahio in leeng hawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin David leh Israel khempeuh in Pasian’ mai-ah la leh laiza lasakna leh harp lasakna leh khuangneute leh daltuahte leh peengkulte leh a tha neih zah uh tawh gualnopna bawl uh hi.
Amaute Khido’ ancilna phual a tun’ uh ciangin bawngtalte muktu ahih manin Uzza in thuciamna singkuang len dingin a khut va zan kha hi.
Tua ciangin Uzza tungah Topa heh hi; amah in a khut tawh thuciamna singkuang su-kha ahih manin Topa in amah vat hi; tua ciangin Pasian’ mai tua lai-ah amah si hi.
Uzza tungah Topa hehin daan pia ahih manin David zong a heh suak hi; tua mun in tu ni dongin Perez-uzza kici hi.
Tua ni-in David in Pasian kihta hi; amah in, “Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang kei kiang innah bangci ciahpih theih ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in a inn David khuapi ah thuciamna singkuang ciahpih lo a, Gath mi Obededom’ innah va koih hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang Obededom’ innkuan tawh kha thum sung om hi; Topa in Obededom’ innkuan leh a neih khempeuh thupha pia hi.
Tua ciangin Tai-ar kumpipa Hiram in David kiangah kamtaite leh taamtaak singte, ama adingin inn khat a lamsak dingin lei-le-suang inn lam siamte leh khutsiamte zong puak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Israelte tungah kumpi-in Topa in amah a kipsak khitna leh ama mi Israelte’ hangin ama kumpigam nakpi takin a lianin a kibawlna phawktel hi.
David in Jerusalem ah zi nei thuahin tapate leh tanute nei hi.
Jerusalem ah a neih a tate’ min in: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Elpelet,
Nogah, Nefeg, Jafia,
Elishama, Beel-i-ada, leh Elifelet ahi uh hi.
Israel khempeuh tungah kumpi-in David sathau a kinilhna thu Filistiate in a zak uh ciangin David zong dingin Filistiate khempeuh kuanto uh hi; David in tua thu za-in amaute do dingin kuankhia hi.
Tu-in Filistiate hong pai-in Refaim kuam sung luh uh hi.

Tua ciangin David in Pasian thu dong a, “Filistiate doin ka kuanto ding hiam? Keima khut sungah amaute nong pia ding hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, “Kuanto in, nangma khut sungah amaute kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Baalperazim ah David paito a, amah in tua lai-ah amaute zo hi; tua ciangin David in, “Tuikhang in a phulkhap bangin Pasian in keima khut tawh ka galte phulkham hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun a min in Baalperazim kici hi.
Filistiate in tua lai-ah a pasiante uh nusia uh a, David’ thupiakna tawh tuate mei sungah kihal hi.
Tua ciangin Filistiate in kuam sung luh kik lai uh hi.
David in Pasian thu a dot kik ciangin Pasian in ama kiangah, “Amaute’ nungah na kuanto kei ding hi; kual pai in la lungli kungte gal khat lam panin amaute hih in.
Lungli kungte’ dawnah kalsuan huging na zak ciangin galsim dingin pai in; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistia galkapte a vat dingin nangma mai-ah Pasian kuan khin hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian in amah a thupiak bangin David gamta a, amaute in Gibeon panin Gezer ciang dong Filistia galkapte vat gawp uh hi.
Tua ciangin David minthan’na in gam khempeuh zel a, Topa in minam khempeuh tungah amah kikihtakna tungsak hi.
David in ama adingin David khuapi sungah innte lam hi; amah in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang’ adingin mun khat bawlin puanbuk khat lamsak hi.

Tua ciangin David in, Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a pua ding leh ama na a sem tawntung dingin Topa in amaute teel ahih manin Levi mite sim loh kuamah in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang pua thei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a bawlsa, ama om nading munah Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a paipih to dingin David in Jerusalem ah Israel khempeuh khawm hi.
Tua ciangin David in Aaron’ suante leh Levi mi a khopte in:
Kohath-te beh sung panin a ukpi Uriel, a behte za leh sawmnih tawh ahi hi;
Merari-te beh sung panin a ukpi Asaiah, a behte zanih leh sawmnih tawh ahi hi;
Gershom-te beh sung panin a ukpi Joel, a behte za leh sawmthum tawh ahi hi;
Elizafan-te beh sung panin a ukpi Shemaiah, a behte zanih tawh ahi hi;
Hebron-te beh sung panin a ukpi Eliel, a behte sawmgiat tawh ahi hi;
Uzziel-te beh sung panin a ukpi Amminadab, a behte za leh sawm-le-nih tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin David in siampite Zadok leh Abiathar, leh Levi mite Uriel, Asaiah, Joel, Shemaiah, Eliel, leh Amminadab sam a,

amaute kiangah: Note in Levi mite beh lutangte na hi uh hi; ama adingin ka bawlsakna munah Israel Pasian, Topa thuciamna singkuang na paipih toh theih nadingun note leh na Levi mipihte uh nomau mah kisiansuah tawm un.
A masa lai-in no Levi mite na om kei uh a, a kisehsa bang danin kem lo i hih manin eite tungah Topa i Pasian hong hehin daan hong pia hi, a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel Pasian, Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a paipih to dingin siampite leh Levi mite amau mah kisiansuah tawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ kamgenna tawh kizui-in Moses’ thupiak bangin Levi mite in a liangko uh tungah zawlte tawh Topa’ thuciamna singkuang pua uh hi.
Lungdamna aw gin’sak nadingin, la sakna nate, harp lasakna leh laiza lasaknate leh daltuahte nakpi takin tumin la a sa dingin Levi ukpite in a mipihte uh a seh nading David in thu pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Levi mite in Joel’ tapa Heman seh uh hi; tua ciangin a behte sung panin Berekhiah’ tapa Asaf; Merari minam sung panin a behte uh Kushaiah’ tapa Ethan;

tua ciangin amaute tawh pawl nihna-in a behte uh Zekhariah Ja-aziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Banaiah, Maaseiah, Mattithiah, Elifelehu, leh Mikneiah, leh kongcingte Obededom leh Jeiel seh uh hi.
Lasate Heman, Asaf, leh Ethan-te in sumngo daltuahte a tum ding ahi uh hi;
Zekhariah, Aziel, Shemiramoth, Hehiel, Unni, Eliab, Ma-asseiah, leh Benaiah-te in a paisuak-aw-in harp lasaknate a tum ding uh ahi hi;
ahih hangin Mattihiah, Elifelehu, Mikneiah, Obededom, Jeiel, leh Azaziah-te in laiza lasaknate a un-aw-in makai ding ahi uh hi.
Levi mite sungah la makai Khenaniah in la uk ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thei hi.
Berekhiah leh Elkanah-te in thuciamna singkuang ading kongcingte hi ding uh hi.

Siampite Shebaniah, Joshafat, Nethanel, Amasai, Zekhariah, Benaiah, leh Eliezer-te in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang mai-ah peengkulte tum ding uh hi. Obededom leh Jehiah-te zong thuciamna singkuang’ adingin kongcingte hi ding uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David leh Israel upate, leh a tul-a a ukte, Obededom’ inn panin lungdamna tawh Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a paipih to dingin pai uh hi.
Pasian in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a pua Levi mite huh ahih manin amaute in bawngtal sagih leh tuutal sagih biakna-in pia uh hi.

David in saihadial puan tualpi silh a, tua mah bangin thuciamna singkuang a pua Levi mite khempeuh, leh lasate, leh lasate a uk Khenaniah-te in zong silh uh hi; tua ciangin David in siampi puan khat silh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel khempeuh in sakite leh peengkulte, leh daltuahte’ awging tawh kizui-in otna tawh Topa’ thuciamna singkuang paipih to uh a, harp lasaknate leh laiza lasaknate tawh nakpi takin la sa uh hi.

Topa’ thuciamna singkuang David khuapi hong tun’ lai takin Saul’ tanu Mikhal in kongvangneu panin na en a, Kumpi David laamin a gualnuam-a om a mu hi; tua ciangin amah in a lungsim sungah David neu-et hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang hong tumpih uh a, David in ama adingin a lamsak puanbuk sungah koih uh hi; tua ciangin meihal biakna leh thu-nuama biaknate Pasian’ mai-ah pia uh hi.
David in meihal biaknate leh thu-nuama biaknate a piak a man khit ciangin amah in Topa’ min tawh thupha pia a,
Israel mi numei leh pasal khempeuhte tungah anlum lum khat, sa bak khat, leh leenggahkeu bek khat ciat hawm hi.
Tua tham loin amah in Topa’ thuciamna singkuang mai-ah na semin thu ngen ding, lungdamna ko ding, leh Israel Pasian, Topa a phat dingin Levi mite pawlkhat seh hi.

Asaf in a ukpi hi a, amah zomah a nihnate in Zekhariah, Jehiel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Banaiah, Obededom, leh Jeiel, harp lasaknate leh laiza lasaknate a tum dingte ahi uh hi; Asaf in daltuahte a tum ding hi a,
siampite Benaiah leh Jahaziel-te in Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang mai-ah peengkulte a tum paisuak ding uh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin tua ni-in David in Asaf leh a Levi mipihte in Topa’ tungah lungdamkohna la a sak ding seh masa hi.
Topa’ tungah lungdamna ko-in, ama min lo un la, ama sepnate mite lakah kitheisak un!
Amah la sak un, phatna la amah sak un la, a lamdang ama septe khempeuh gen un!
Ama min siangtho hangin nuamin diang un la, Topa a zong mite lungdam ta hen!
Topa leh ama hatna zong un la, ama ompihna zong den un!
Ama hihsa a lamdang nasepte phawk un la, ama hih a lamdangte, a genkhiat thukhennate phawk un,
Ama nasem Abraham’ suante, Jakob’ suante, ama teel tuamte aw!
Amah in Topa eite’ Pasian hi a, ama thukhennate leitung khempeuh ah om hi.
Amah in a thuciamna phawk tawntung hi, khang tulkhat adingin a thupiakna kammal,
Abraham tawh a bawl thuciamna, Isaak tungah kiciamin a khapna,
Jakob tungah thukhamin amah in a kipsak, Israel tungah tawntung thuciamna-in a kipsak,
“Nangma tungah Kanaan gam hong pia-in, gamhluah dingin na tanh dingin kong pia ding hi,” a cihte phawk tawntung hi.
Amaute a mi-in tawmin, gen taak loin, peemta hi uh a,
minam khat pan nam khatah vak kawikawi-in, kumpigam khat pan gamdang khatah a pai lai-in,
amah in amaute kuamah nengniam sak lo hi; amaute’ hangin amah in kumpite tai a,
“Ka sathau nilhte lawng kei un, ka kamsangte tungah siatna hih kei un!” ci hi.
Leitung khempeuh aw, Topa la sak un! A ni ni-in ama hotkhiatna thu gen un.
Minamte lakah ama minthan’na gen khia un la, a lamdang ama septe mi khempeuh lakah gen un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa lian a, nakpi takin phat ding ahi hi; pasian khempeuh sangin amah lamdang sak zawk ding ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh minam dangte’ pasiante khempeuh milim hi lel a, ahih hangin Topa in vantungte a bawlpa ahi hi.
Pahtawina leh minliatna in amah umcih a, thahatna leh lungdamna in amah kimkot hi.
Leitung mi khempeuh aw, Topa thei tel un la, Topa’ minthan’na leh a thahatna thei tel un!
Ama’ min in ngah dingin a kilawm zah ciang dong minthan’na Topa tungah pia un; biakna paipih un la, ama mai-ah pai un! Biakna puan silhin Topa bia un;
leitung mi khempeuh aw, ama mai-ah ling un; hi hi, leitung kip a, kilok ngei lo ding hi.
Vantung kipak hen la, leitung lungdam hen, minamte lakah, “Topa maang hi!” amaute in ci ta uh hen.
Tuipi leh a sunga om khempeuh awng hen la, gamlak leh a sunga om khempeuh diang hen!
Tua ciangin gamlak singte in lungdamin Topa mai-ah la sa ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh leitung thukhen dingin amah hong pai hi.
Amah hoih ahih manin Topa tungah lungdamna ko un; bang hang hiam cih leh a itna kip a tawntungin a kho hi!

“Kote hong khahkhia in, ka kihotkhiatna Pasian aw, minamte lak panin hong kaikhawmin hong honkhia in, na min siangtho tungah lungdamna kong koh theih nading uh, leh nangmah phatna ah ka minthan’ nadingun,
Israel Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah ta hen, a tawntung pan a tawntung dongin!” zong ci lai un, a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, “Amen!” ci-in Topa phat uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in ni sim-a a kisam bangin thuciamna singkuang mai-ah na a sem tawntung dingin Asaf leh a Levi mipihte Topa’ thuciamna singkuang mai-ah nusia a,
Obededom leh a behte sawmguk-le-giatte zong nusia hi; Jeduthun’ tapa Obededom leh Hosah-te in kongpi cing dingte ahi uh hi.

39-40 Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ thukham sungah a kigelh ama thupiak khempeuh bangin, zingsang leh nitakin meihal biakna tau tungah Topa’ adingin meihal biaknate a pia tawntung dingin, Gibeon a, om mual dawn-a Topa’ biakbuk mai-ahsiampi Zadok leh a sanggam siampite nusia hi.
Ama itna kip kho tawntung ahih manin, amaute tawh Heman leh Jeduthun, leh Topa tungah lungdamna a ko dingin a kiteel; a minin a kilo khia a om laite om hi.
Heman leh Jeduthun in la aw dingin peengkulte leh daltuahte nei uh a, biakna la sak nadingin lasakna nate nei uh hi. Jeduthun’ tapate kulhkongpi cing dingin kiseh hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in a inn ciat uhah ciah uh a, David zong a innkuan thupha pia dingin a innah a ciah hi.
Tu-in David a innah a teen’ ciangin amah in kamsang Nathan’ kiangah, “En in, keimah in taamtaak inn hoih sungah ka teeng a, ahih hangin Topa thuciamna singkuang in puanbuk nuai-ah om hi,’’ a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in David kiangah, “Pasian in nang tawh om ahih manin na lungsim a, om khempeuh hih in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin tua zan mahin Nathan’ kiangah Topa’ thu hong tung a,
“Pai in la, ka nasempa David kiangah gen in. ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nangmah in teen’ nadingin kei adingin inn na lam kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte ka paipih toh a, kipan tu ni dongin inn sungah ka teeng kei a, puanbuk khat pan puanbuk khat, omna khat pan omna khatah ka pai kawikawi hi.

Israel khempeuh tawh ka painasa mun khempeuh ah, keima mite tuu bangin a cing dingin ka sawl thukhente khatpeuh peuh tungah, “Bang hangin lamsak lo na hi hiam?” ci-in kam khat beek ka gen hiam?’ ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka nasempa David kiangah hih bangin na ci ding hi, ‘Vanglianpen’ Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ka mi Israel tungah ulian a hi dingin lonona, tuu na zuihna panin nang kong la hi;
na paina peuhpeuh ah nang tawh kong om khin a, na mai panin na galte khempeuh ka susia hi; leitung miliante khat min bangin nang adingin min khat kong bawlsak ding hi.

9-10 Amau’ innah amaute a teen’ theih nading leh a kinawngkai sak nawn loh nadingin ka mi Israelte’ adingin mun khat sehin amaute ka phut ding hi; ka mi Israelte tungah thukhente ka seh-a kipanin a nidanga bangin mi ngongtatte in amaute beisak nawn lo ding uh hi; tua ciangin keimah in na galte khempeuh ka nuaisiah ding hi. Tua tham loin Topa keimah in nang a lianin hong bawlin, suan leh khak na neih nading thu nang tungah kong gen hi.
Na nuntakna bei-in na pate kiang na zuat ciangin nangma nungah na tapate khat ka khangsak ding a, ama kumpi gam ka kipsak ding hi.
Amah in kei adingin inn khat hong lamsak ding a, keimah in ama kumpi tokhom ka kipsak paisuak ding hi.
Keimah in ama pa ka hi ding a, amah in Keima tapa hi ding hi; nangma hun ma-a sem Saul tung panin ka lak khiat bangin ama tung panin ka itna kip ka la khia kei ding a,
ka inn sung leh ka kumpi gam sungah amah kipsak paisuakin ama kumpi tokhomkip paisuak ding hi,’ci hi,” a ci hi.
Hih kammalte khempeuh tawh kizui, leh hih mangmuhna khempeuh tawh kizui-in Nathan in David kiangah gen hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi David tumin Topa’ mai-ah tu a, “Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in hih ciang dong kei nong tun’ pih nadingin keimah in kua hi a, ka innkuanpihte in bang hi lel ahi hiam?

Hih a beisa thu in nangma mit-ah na neu khat ahi hi, Pasian aw; nangmah in a hong tung ding hunpi khat sung tangding na nasempa’ suan leh khak tawh kisai thu zong na gen khin a, mai lam a, khang dingte thu kei nong lak khin hi, Topa Pasian aw!
Na nasempa nong pahtawina ah David in nang tungah bang gen ding nei nawn ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in na nasempa na thei hi.
Topa aw, na nasempa’ hang, leh nangma lungsim bangin hih na liante khempeuh na kitheihsakna ah hih liatna khempeuh na hih hi.
Ka bil-un ka zakna uh tawh kizui-in Topa aw, nangmah tawh a kibang kuamah om lo a, nang simloh Pasian om lo hi.

Izipt panin na hotkhiatna mite mai-ah minamte hawlkhiatna tawh nang adingin a lian a lauhuai min khat na bawlna, Pasian pai-in ama mi dingin a hotkhiatna mi Israelte tawh a kibang leitungah minam dang kua om ahi hiam?
Na mi Israelte a tawntungin nangma mi ahi dingin na bawl hi; tua ciangin Topa aw, nangmah in amaute’ Pasian na suak hi.
Tu-in Topa aw, na nasempa leh a suan a khakte tawh kisai-in na gensa thu a tawntungin kip hen la, na gensa bangin hih in;
tua ciangin, ‘Israel Pasian, Vanglianpen Topa in Israelte’ Pasian hi,’ ci-in nangma min a tawntungin kipin kiliansak ding a, na nasempa David’ ukna nangma mai-ah kip tawntung ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nang ka Pasian in keima suante kumpi-in nong bawlsak nading na nasempa tungah nong lak khin zo hi; tua ahih ciangin na sempa in na mai-ah thu nget ding han’na lungsim nei hi.
Tu-in Topa aw, nangmah in Pasian na hi a, na nasempa tungah hih na hoih na ciam khin hi;

tua ahih ciangin tu-in nangma mai-ah a kizop tawntung theih nadingin na nasempa’ suan leh khakte thupha na piak ding nang hong lungkim ta in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa aw, nangmah in thupha na piaksate a tawntungin thupha ngah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin David in Filistiate zoin nuaisiah a, Filistiate’ khut sung panin Gath leh a khuaneute la hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Moab mite zo a, Moab mite David’ nasem suakin siah hong puak uh hi.
Zobah leh Hamath gam kumpipa Hadadezer-in Eufrates gun kuam gamte ngah kik nuamin kuan ahih manin, David in amah doin zo hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama tung panin leeng galkap tulkhat, sakol tuang galkap tulsagih, leh khe galkap tul sawmnih la hi; tua ciangin David in leengkai sakol galkap khempeuh a zagui atsat sak a, ahih hangin leeng za khat’ adingin a kicing siit hi.
Zobah kumpipa Hadadezer huh dingin Damaskas-a Siria mite hong pai ciangin David in Siria mite tul sawmnih leh tulnih that hi.
Tua ciangin David in Siria gam Damakas ah khuacingte koih hi; tua ciang Siria mite David’ nasem suak uh a, siah puak uh hi. David a paina peuhpeuh ah Topa in gual zawhna pia hi.
Tua ciangin David in Hadadezer’ nasemte in a puak kham kibawl lumte la-in Jerusalem ah ciahpih hi.
Tua ciangin Hadadezer khuapite Tibhath leh Kun panin David in sumngo tampi tak la hi; Solomon in tuate tawh sumngo tuikuangpi leh khuampite leh sumngo um-le-beelte a bawl hi.
David in Zobah kumpipa Hadadezer’ galkap buppi a zawhna thu Hamath kumpipa To-u in a zak ciangin,

Hadadezer simin a zawhna hangin a hopih ding leh a lungdampih dingin Kumpi David kiangah a tapa Hadoram sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hadadezer in To-u tawh kido zel hi. Amah in kham ngun, leh sumngo tawh kibawl na namkim khempeuh puak hi;
Kumpi David in hihte zong, Edom, Moab, Ammon mite, Filistiate, leh Amalek, minam khempeuh kiang panin a puak khiat ngun leh kham tawh Topa’ tungah ap khawm hi.
Tua ciangin Zeru-iah’ tapa Abishai in Ci Kuamah Edom mite tulsawm leh tulgiat that hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Edom ah khuacingte koih hi; tua ciangin Edom mite khempeuh David’ nasem suak uh hi. Topa in David a paina peuhpeuh ah gualzawhna pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Israel khempeuh tungah uk hi; amah in a mite khempeuh tungah thuman leh thutang zang hi.
Zeru-iah’ tapa Joab in galkapte a uk ahi hi; Ahilud’ tapa Jehoshafat in thuciamtehpa ahi hi;
Ahitub’ tapa Zadok leh Abiathar’ tapa Ahimelek in siampite ahi uh hi; Shavsha in lai-atpa ahi hi;
Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in Khereth mite leh Peleth mite tungah a uk ahi hi; David’ tapate in kumpipa’ nasepna-ah maang liante ahi uh hi.
Hih thu khit tawl khat ciangin Ammon mite’ kumpipa Nahash si a, a tapa in ama tangin uk hi.

Tua ciangin, David in, “Ama pa kei tungah thuman takin hong gamta ahih manin Nahash’ tapa Hanun tungah thuman takin ka gamta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in a pa huhau-in amah a hehnem dingin kamtaite sawl hi. Tua ciangin David’ nasemte amah a hehnem dingin Ammon mite’gam Hanun’ kiangah hong pai uh hi.

Ahih hangin Ammon mite’ uliante in Hanun’ kiangah, “David in nang kiangah hehnemte hong sawlna hangin na pa a pahtawi hi, ci-in ngaihsun na hi hiam? A phekleh ding leh a lumlet ding leh gam sung ensim dingin ama nasemte na kiangah hong pai hilo ahi hiam? a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Hanun in David’ nasemte manin a khamul uh metsak a, a kawngciang uhah a puante at khiatsakna tawh amaute daisakin sawl khia hi; tua ciangin amaute kihem uh hi.

Hih mite tawh kisai thu David kiangah a kigen ciangin amah in amaute a dawntuah dingin mi sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite nakpi takin maizum uh a, ciah ngam lo uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Na khamul uh a khan’ kik mateng Jerikho ah om un la, tua ciangin hong ciah un,” a ci hi.

Ammon mite in David’ muhdahin amau mah a kibawl tawmna uh a muh uh ciangin Hanun leh Ammon mite in Mesopotamia, Aramma-akah, leh Zobah panin leeng galkapte leh sakol galkapte cial nadingin ngun talen tul khat puak uh hi.

Amaute in leeng galkap tul sawmthum leh tulnih leh Ma-akah gam kumpipa a galkap tawh cial uh a, amaute hong pai-in Medeba khua kiangah phual sat uh hi. Tua ciangin a khuapite uh panin Ammon mite kikhawmin galdo dingin hong kuan uh hi.
David in tua thu a zak ciangin Joab leh mi thahat galkap khempeuh sawl hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon mite hong kuan khia-in khuapi lutna ah galdo dingin hong pang uh a, a hong kuan kumpite pen amau teng mah gamlakah om uh hi.
Gal in a nung leh a mai panin a pan’na Joab in a theih ciangin Israel mi kitengkhia mi pawlkhat teel a, Siriate a do dingin pangsak hi;
a om lai a mite amah in a sanggampa Abishai’ ukin koih a, Ammon mite a do dingin amaute kipangsak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Siria mite ka lelh tuak leh nangmah in kei nong huh ding hi; ahih hangin Ammon mite nang na lelh tuak leh keimah in nang kong huh ding hi.
Hang in, i mite ading leh i Pasian’ khuapite’ ading pasal tat ni; Topa in ama hoihsak bangin hong hih ta hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joab leh amah tawh a om mite in a do dingin Siria mite kiang nai hong naih uh hi; tua ciangin ama mai-ah amaute tai uh hi.
Siria mite a taina Ammon mite in a muh uh ciangin tua mah bangin amaute zong Joab’ sanggampa Abishai’ mai-ah tai uh a, khuapi sungah lut uh hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah Joab hong ciahkik hi.
Ahih hangin Siria mite in amaute Israel in a zawhna a muh uh ciangin, amaute in kamtaite sawlin Eufrates galkhat a, om Siria galkapte sam uh a, Hadadezer’ galkapte a ukpa Shofak a makai-in om hi.

David kiangah hih thu a kigen ciangin, amah in Israel khempeuh khawmin Jordan galkah a, amaute kiangah pai-in amaute a do dingin galkapte khawm hi. David in Siria mite do dingin gal pangsak a, Siria mite tawh kido uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israelte mai-ah Siria mite tai uh hi; tua ciangin David in Siria mite leeng hawl galkap mihing tulsagih, leh khe galkap tul sawmli that a, amau’ galkap ukpa Shofak zong that hi.

Tua khit ciangin Hadadezer’ nasemte in amaute Israelte in a zawh khitna a muh uh ciangin amaute in David tawh kilemna bawl uh a, ama khut nuai suak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Siria mite in Ammon mite huh nuam nawn lo uh hi.

Kumpite in khuakhal sungin galsimin kuankhia zel uh hi. Tua hun hoih khuakhal hong tun’ ciangin Joab in galkapte pai khiatpihin Ammon mite’ gam sugawp a, hong pai-in Rabbah khua umcih hi. Ahih hangin Jerusalem ah David om hi. Tua ciangin Joab in Rabbah khua vatin lumlet hi.

Tua ciangin David in amau’ kumpipa’ kumpi lukhu ama tung panin lak khiatsak hi; tua lukhu kham talen khat gikin a sungah suangmanpha khat a omna amah in thei hi; tua hi a, David in tua lukhu ama lu tungah khu hi. Tua ciangin amah in tua khuapi panin van kinusiate tampi tak pai khiatpih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in tua sunga om mite pai khiatpihin sing-atnate leh tuzumte leh heite tawh na a sem dingin koih hi; tua bangin Ammon mite’ khuapite khempeuh ah David in hih hi. Tua ciangin David leh mi khempeuh Jerusalem ah ciah uh hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin Gezer ah Filistiate tawh kidona hong om hi; tua ciangin Hushah khua mi Sibbekai in mithagolte’ suan leh khakte khat ahi Sippi that hi; tua ciangin Fillistiate kinuaisiah hi.
Tua ciangin Filistiate tawh kidona om kik leuleu hi; tua hi a, Jair’ tapa Elhanan in a teipi kung siamlawngpi cia a pha, Gath khuami Goliath’ sanggampa Lahmi that hi.

Tua ciangin a khut lang tuakah khutme guk a nei, a khe lang tuakah zong kheme guk mah a nei, a vekpi-in sawmnih-le-li a nei, mi thalian khat a omna Gath ah gal om kik hi; amah zong mi thagolte’ sung pana hong piang ahi hi.
Amah in Israel a to ciangin David’ sanggampa Shimea’ tapa Jonathan in amah that hi.
Hihte in Gath a, mithagolte sung pana hong piang ahi uh hi; David leh a nasemte’ khutin amaute puk uh hi.
Satan in Israel langpan’ a, Israel mi phazah a sim dingin David hanthawn hi.

Tua ahih ciangin David in Joab leh galkap a ukte kiangah, “Pai un, Be-ersheba panin Dan ciang dong Israel mi phazah va sim un la, amaute a phazah ka theih nadingin kei kiangah thu hong zasak un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Joab in, “Topa in a mite a zah za khatin behlap ta hen! Ka to kumpipa aw, amaute khempeuh ka topa’ nasemte hilo ahi uh hiam? Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin ka topa in hih kisam sa na hi hiam? Bang hangin Israel tungah mawhna tun’ ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in Joab thu-zawh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Joab kihem khia-in Israel sung khempeuh ah pai a, tua ciangin Jerusalem ah hong ciahkik hi.

Tua ciangin Joab in David kiangah galkap thei ding mi phazah pia hi. Israelte khempeuh sungah galkap thei ding mihing awn khat leh sang khat om a, Judah sungah galkap thei ding mi tul zali leh tul sawmsagih om hi.
Ahih hangin Joab in kumpipa’ thupiakna hoih sa het lo ahih manin a simna ah Levi minam leh Benjamin minamte hel lo hi.
Ahih hangin hih thu ah Pasian lungkim lo a, amah in Israel vat hi.

Tua ciangin David in Pasian kiangah, “Hih na ka sepna ah nakpi takin ka khial hi. Ahih hangin tu-in nang tungah kong thuum hi, na nasempa’ mawhna hong maisak in; bang hang hiam cih leh a haihuai mahmahin ka gamta khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in David’ thu-mupa Gad tungah thu gen a,
“Pai in la, David kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi; ‘Nangma tungah thu thum kong pia hi; nang tungah kong hih theih nadingin tuate khat teel in,’ ci hi, ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David kiangah Gad hong pai-in ama tungah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Na lak ding khat teel in;

kialpi kum thum sung; ahih kei leh na langte in nang hong simgawp lai takin na galte’ mai-ah kha thum sung galtaina; ahih kei leh gam sungah pulnatna leh Topa’ vantung mi in Israel sung khempeuh ah suksiatna ni thum sung a piangsak Topa’ namsau,’ ci hi. Tu-in kei hong sawlpa kiangah ka ciahpih ding dawn’ nading khentel in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in Gad kiangah, “Keimah in lungkhamna lianpi khat ka tuak hi; ama hehpihna lian mahmah ahih manin Topa’ khut sungah hong puksak in; ahih hangin mihing’ khut sungah hong puksak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Israel tungah pulnatna khat tung sak hi; Israel mi tul sawmsagih puk hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in a susia dingin Jerusalem ah vantungmi sawl hi; ahih hangin amah in a suksiat ding lai takin Topa in mu a, tua thusia ah amah kisik hi; tua ciangin amah in a susia vantungmi kiangah, “Pha zo hi; tu-in na khut khawlsak in,” a ci hi. Jebus mi Ornan’ ancilna gei-ah Topa’ vantungmi a din’ laitak ahi hi.

Tua ciangin David khuadak to a, leitung leh vantung kikalah Topa’ vantungmi ding-in a khut sungah a kidoksa namsau khat omin Jerusalem tungah a zan mu hi. Tua ciangin David leh a upate puanhampi silhin mai puk uh hi.

Tua ciangin David in Pasian kiangah, “Mi phazah a sim dingin thu a piapa in keimah hilo ka hi hiam? Khialin a gitloh gamtat mahmahpa in keimah ka hi hi. Ahih hangin hih mite in bang gamta khial ahi uh hiam? Topa ka Pasian aw, kong thuum hi, keimah leh ka innkuan daan hong pia in; ahih hangin na mite tungah gimna tungsak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David paito-in Jebus mi Ornan’ ancilna phual tungah Topa adingin biakna tau khat a lam nading a gen dingin Topa’ vantungmi in Gad sawl hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ min tawh a gen Gad’ kammal bangin David paito hi.
Amah tawh a om a tapa lite bu uh a, Ornan in mangbuh a cilcil lai takin a khuadak leh Topa’ vantungmi mu hi.
Ornan kiangah David hong tun’ ciangin, Ornan khuadak a, David mu-in ancilna panin hong paikhia a, a mai lei lam ngatin David tungah zahtakna bawl hi.

Tua ciangin David in Ornan kiangah, “Mite kiang panin gimna a ven’ theih nading Topa’ ading biakna tau ka lam theih nadingin na ancilna mun hong pia in—a man a cingin piak dingin hong pia in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ornan in David kiangah, “La in, ka to kumpipa in hoih na sak bangin hih in; thei in, meihal biaknate a, zat dingin bawngtalte, a sing dingin ancilna singte, leh an tawh biak nadingin a mangbuhte kong pia hi. A vekpi-in kong pia hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Kumpi David in Ornan kiangah, “Hi lo hi, a man a cing tawh kong lei ding hi; Topa’ adingin nangma’ aa ka la kei ding a, keima sum bei loin meihal biaknate zong ka pia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in Ornan tungah a mun lei nadingin kham shekel zaguk a gik a pia hi.

Tua ciangin David in tua lai-ah Topa’ adingin biakna tau khat lamin meihal biaknate leh thu-nuama biaknate bawlin Topa’ tungah thu ngen a, tua ciangin amah in a thungetna a piakna-in a meihal biakna a hal dingin vantung panin meikuang pia suk hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ thupiakna tawh vantungmi in a namsau a pai sungah siat kik hi.
Tua hunin, Jebus mi Ornan’ ancilna phual ah Topa in ama nget a piakna David in a muh ciangin amah in tua lai-ah a biak piaknate bawl hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Moses in gamlakah a bawl Topa’ biakbuk leh meihal biakna tau pen tua hunin Gibeon mualdawn ah om lai hi;
ahih hangin amah in Topa’ vantungmi’ namsau kihta ahih manin Pasian’ tungah thu a dong dingin tua lai-ah David pai ngam lo hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Hih lai-ah Topa Pasian’ inn om ding a, hih lai-ah Israel’ ading meihal biakna tau om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Israel gam sunga om gamdang mite a kaihkhop nadingun David in thu pia a, tua ciangin amah in Pasian’ inn lam nadingin suang seeksate a bawl dingin suang seekte koih hi.
David in kongpi kongkhak a, zat dingin siktukkilh leh gak nadingin sik tampi koihin, teh zawh lohin sumngo tampi tak zong koih a,
taamtaak singte sim zawh hi lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Sibon khuamite leh Tai-ar khuamite in David kiangah taamtaak tampi tak puak uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh David in, “Ka tapa Solomon khangno-in pumpi tawh sinna om nai lo a, Topa’ adingin a kilam ding inn in gam khempeuh ah minthan’na leh pahtawina ah alian mahmah ding ahi hi; tua ahi ciangin keimah in tua inn dingin ka kiging khol ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in a sih ma-in na tampi tak koih khol hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a tapa Solomon sam a, Israel Pasian, Topa adingin inn khat a lam ding gen hi.
David in Solomon kiangah, “Ka ta aw, Topa ka Pasian’ min dingin inn khat lam ding ka lungsimah om hi.

Ahih hangin kei tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a, ‘Nangmah in mi tampi thatin gal lianpipi na sim hi; nangmah in keima mai leitungah sisan tua zahta luangsak na hih manin ka min dingin inn na lam kei ding hi.

En in, nangma sung panin tapa khat hong piang ding hi; amah in kilemna mi hi ding hi. Keimah in a kimkot a, a galte khempeuh panin ama tungah kilemna ka pia ding hi; Ama min in Solomon hi ding a, ama hun sungin Isreal tungah kilemna leh daihna ka pia ding hi.
Amah in keima min dingin inn khat lam ding hi. Amah in ka tapa hi-in keimah in ama pa ka hi ding a, Israel sungah ama kumpi tokhom ka kipsak paisuak ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tu-in ka ta aw, amah in nangma thu a gensa bangin Topa na Pasian’ inn na lamna ah na tangtun’ theih nadingin Topa in nang hong ompih ta hen.
Amah in Israel tungah nang hong uksak ciangin Topa na Pasian’ thukham na zuih theih nadingin Topa in ngaihsut pilna leh thutelna nang tungah hong pia ta hen.
Tua ciangin Israelte’ adingin Topa in Moses a piak thukhamte leh biakna ngeina kipte zuih ding na kidop nak leh na maa vang ding hi. Thakhauh in la, hang in. Lau kei in; lungkia kei in.

Gimna lianpi tawh Topa’ inn dingin kham talen tul zakhat, ngun talen awn khat, leh teh zawh lohin sumngo leh sik ka koih khin zo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tam mahmah hi; sing leh suang zong ka koih zo hi. Nangmah in hihte na behlap ding hi.
Nangmah in na a sem ding mi tampi na nei hi: suangseekte, lei-le-suang inn lam siamte, khutsiamte, leh sim zawh lohin siamna nam khempeuh a nei,
kham, ngun, sumngo, leh sik sep a siamte na nei hi. Kithawi in la, sem in! Topa in nang hong ompih ta hen!” a ci hi.
David in zong Israel makaite khempeuh in a tapa Solomon a huh nading thu pia a,

“Topa na Pasian uh note tawh om hilo ahi hiam? Amah in na kiim khempeuh uhah kilemna hong pia hilo ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in gam sungah teeng mite keima khut sungah hong pia khin hi; Topa leh ama mite mai-ah gam sung khempeuh kinuai-siah hi.

Tu-in Topa na Pasian uh a zong dingin na ngaihsutna uh leh na lungsim uh kipsak un. Topa’ min dingin a kilam inn sungah Topa’ thuciamna singkuang leh Pasian’ um-le-beel siangthote a kipaipih theih nadingin kithawi un la, Topa Pasian’ biakinn lam un,” a ci hi.
Tu-in David teekin kum tampi pha a, amah in Israel tungah kumpi-in a tapa Solomon koih hi.
David in Israel makai khempeuh leh siampi leh Levi mite khawm hi.
Levi mite kum sawmthum panin a tungsiah teng kisim a, a vekpi-in pasal tul sawmthum leh tulgiat pha hi.
David in, “Hihte tul sawmnih leh tulli in Topa’ inn sungah nasep uk ding a, tulguk in mangte leh thukhente hi ding a,
tulli in kongcingte, leh tulli in phatna ding a, ka bawlsa lasaknate tawh Topa’ tungah phatna pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Levi mite a beh behin pawl thum suah a, tuate in: Gershon pawl, Kohath pawl, leh Merari pawl ahi uh hi.
Gershon’ tapate in Ladan leh Shimei ahi uh hi.
Ladan’ tapate in: A ukpi Jehiel, leh Zetham, leh Joel, thum pha uh hi.
Shimei’ tapate in: Shelomoth, Haziel, leh Haran, thum pha uh hi. Hihte in Ladan’ beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Shimei’ tapate in: Jahath, Zina, Jeush, leh Beriah ahi uh hi. Hih lite in Shimei’ tapate ahi uh hi.
Jahath a ukpi hi-in, Zina a nihna ahi hi; ahih hangin Jeush leh Beriah-te in tapa tampi nei lo uh ahih manin innkuan khat kisuak sakin sim khatin kisim khawm hi.
Kohath’ tapate in: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, leh Uzziel, li pha uh hi.

Amram’ tapate in: Aaron leh Moses ahi uh hi. Amah leh a tapate in Topa’ mai-ah paknamtui a hal tawntung ding leh ama na semin ama min tawh thupha a piak tawntung theih nadingin a siangtho pen nate a ap dingin Aaron kituam koih hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mipa Moses’ tapate ahih leh Levi minamte lakah kisim hi.
Moses’ tapate in: Gershom leh Eliezer ahi uh hi.
Gershom’ tapate lakah Shebuel in a ukpi ahi hi.
Eliezer’ tapate lakah Rehabiah in a ukpi ahi hi; Eliezer in tapa dang nei lo a, ahih hangin Rehabiah’ tapate tam mahmah hi.
Kohath’ tapa nihna Izhar’ tapate lakah Shelomoth in a ukpi ahi hi.
Kohath’ tapa thumna Hebron’ tapate lakah: Jeriah a ukpi, Amariah a nihna, Jahaziel a thumna leh Jekameam a lina ahi hi.
Kohath’ tapa lina Uzziel’ tapate lakah: Mikah a ukpi, leh Issiah a nihna ahi hi.
Merari’ tapate in: Mahli leh Mushi ahi hi. Mahli’ tapate in: Eleazar leh Kish ahi hi.
Eleazar in tapa nei loin si a, tanu bek nei hi; amau’ tanau, Kish’ tapate in amaute ten’pih uh hi.
Mushi’ tapate in: Mahli, Eder, leh Jeremoth, thum pha uh hi.
Hihte in Topa’ inn nasepna ah na a sem ding, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah, a mi mi-in a minin a mi phazah zui-in a kiciamtehna bangin beh lutangte, a beh behin Levi’ suante ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh David in, “Israel Pasian, Topa in a mite tungah kilemna pia zo hi; tua ciangin amah in Jerusalem ah om tawntung hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Levi mite in puanbuk hita leh tua tawh kisai nasep nading nate khat peuhpeuh hita leh a puak ding uh kisam nawn lo hi,” a ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh David’ thupiakna a nunung pen tawh a kisim hihte in kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah Levi mi a phazah ahi hi—

“ahih hangin amaute’ nasep in Topa’ inn nasepna ah Aaron’ suante huhin, inntualte leh inndeite kemin, biakna na khempeuh a siangtho sak ding, leh Pasian’ inn nasepna ah hih ding khat peuhpeuh a sem ding ahi uh hi;
Ompihna Anlum, an tawh biak nadingin annel, silngo sawh loh anlum moh, a ki-em piakna, sathau tawh a kihel piakna, leh a tam tehna, ahih kei leh a lian tehna nasep khempeuh zong a huh ding ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute zingsang simin ding ding uh a, lungdamna koin Topa phatin, nitakin zong tua mah bangin hih ding uh a,
a mal zah a kisam bangin sabbath nite, khadet nite, leh pawi nite-in Topa tungah meihal biakna a kipiak peuhpeuh ciangin a tawntungin Topa mai-ah om ding uh hi.
Tua bangin Levi mite in kikhopna puanbuk leh biakinn kemin, Topa’ inn nasepna ah amau’ behte ahi Aaron’ suante huh ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Aaron’ suante a kisehkhennate in hihte ahi hi. Aaron’ tapate in: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, leh Ithamar ahi uh hi.
Ahih hangin a pa uh sih ma-in Nadab leh Abihu si-in ta nei lo uh ahih manin Eleazar leh Ithamar-te siampi suak uh hi.
Eleazar’ suan Zadok, leh Ithamar’ suan Ahimelek’ huhna tawh David in amau’ nasepna ah a kiseh bangin Aaron’ suante a koih hi.
Ithamar’ suante lak sangin Eleazar’ suante lakah ukpi tam om zaw ahih manin, amaute in Eleazar’ suante pawl sawm-le-guk suahin, Ithamar’ suante pawl giat suah hi.
Eleazar’ suante leh Ithamar’ suante lakah biakinn uliante leh Pasian’ uliante om tuak uh ahih manin amaute in a kibangin aisaanna tawh amaute koih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Levi mi Nethanel’ tapa ahi lai-atpa Shemaiah in Kumpipa, leh uliante, leh siampi Zadok, leh Abiathar’ tapa Ahimelek, leh siampite leh Levi mi beh lutangte’ omna ah amaute ciamteh hi; Eleazar’ suante’ adingin khat kiteelin, tua ciangin Ithamar’ suante adingin khat kiteel a, kilaih sak niloh uh hi.
Aisaanna a masa pen Jehoiarib tung, a nihna Jedaiah tung,
