a thumna Harim tung, a lina Seorim tung,
a ngana Malkhijah tung, a gukna Mijamin tung,
a sagihna Hakkoz tung, a giatna Abijah tung,
a kuana Jeshua tung, a sawmna Shekaiah tung,
a sawm-le-khatna Eliashib tung, a sawm-le-nihna Jakim tung,
a sawm-le-thumna Huppah tung, a sawm-le-lina Jeshebeab tung,
a sawm-le-ngana Bilgah tung, a sawm-le-gukna Immer tung,
a sawm-le-sagihna Hezir tung, a sawm-le-giatna Happizzez tung,
a sawm-le-kuana Pethahiah tung, a sawmnihna Jehezkel tung,
a sawm-nih-le-khatna Jakhin tung, a sawmnih-le-nihna Gamul tung,
a sawmnih-le-thumna Delaiah tung, a sawmnih-le-lina Ma-aziah tungah tu hi.
Hihte in Israel’ Topa Pasian in amah a thupiak bangin a pupi uh Aaron in amaute’ adingin a kipsakna ngeina bangin Topa’ inn sungah pai dingin amau’ nasep uh ahi a kiseh nasep nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Levi’ suante a om laite lakah: Amram’ suante sung panin Shubael’ suante Jehdeiah ahi hi.
Rehabiah’ suante sung panin Isshiah a ukpi ahi hi.
Izhar’ suante sung panin Shelomoth’ suante Jahath ahi hi.
Hebron’ suante lakah: Jeriah a ukpi, Amariah a nihna, Jahaziel a thumna, Jekameam a lina ahi hi.
Uzziel’ suante sung panin Mikah’ suante Shamir ahi hi.
Mikah’ sanggampa in Isshiah ahi hi; Isshiah’ suante sung panin Zekhariah ahi hi.
Merari’ suante in: Mahli, Mushi, leh Ja-aziah ahi hi.
Merari’ suante Ja-aziah’ sung panin Beno, Shoham, Zakkur, leh Ibri ahi hi.
28-29 Mahli in tapa nih, Eleazar leh Kish nei hi. Eleazar in tapa nei lo a, Kish in Jerahme-el a kici tapa khat nei hi.
Mushi’ tapate in: Mahli, Eder, leh Jerimoth ahi uh hi. Hihte in a beh tawh kizui-in Levi’ suante ahi uh hi.

Hihte in zong a behte uh ahi Aaron’ suante mah bangin kumpi David, Zadok, Ahimelek, leh siampite leh Levi mi beh lutangte’ muhna ah beh lutangte leh a nau pasalte ciat in a kibangin ai saanna tawh nasepna tavuan la uh hi.

David leh nasepna ah a ukpite in zong laiza lasaknate, harp lasaknate, leh daltuahte tawh mai lam thu a genkhol dingin Asaf, Heman, leh Jeduthunte’ tapate pawlkhat nasepna-a dingin koih tuam uh hi. Na a semte leh amau’ nasepte in:
Asaf’ tapate sung panin: kumpipa’ makaihna nuai-ah mai lam thu a genkhol Asaf’ makaihna nuai-ah Asaf tapate Zakhur, Josef, Nethaniah, leh Asharelah ahi hi.

Jeduthun sung panin Jeduthun’ tapate in: lungdamkohna leh Topa phatna-in laiza lasakna tawh mai lam thu a gen khol a, a pa uh Jeduthun’ makaihna nuai-ah Gedaliah, Zeri, Jershaiah, Shimei, Hashabiah, leh Mattibiah, guk pha uh hi.
Heman sung panin Heman’ tapate in: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti, Romamtiezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, leh Mahazioth ahi hi.
Hihte khempeuh in Pasian thuciamna bangin amah a pahtawi dingin kumpipa’ thu-mupa Heman’ tapate ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in Heman tungah tapa sawm-le-li leh tanu thum pia hi.

Amaute khempeuh Pasian’ inn nasep nadingin Topa’ inn sungah daltuahte, harp lasaknate, leh laiza lasaknate tawh la lam sangah a pate uh ukna nuai-ah om uh hi. Asaf, Jeduthun, leh Hemante in kumpipa’ thupiakna nuai-ah om uh hi.
A Levi mipihte uh tawh Topa’ ading lasakna lamah sinna a nei a siam mi a vekpi in zanih leh sawmgiat-le-giat ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a neu a lian, sia leh a sinte a kibangin, amaute in amau’ nasep ding uh aisaan uh hi.
Asaf behte adingin ai masa Josef tungah tu hi; a nihna Gedaliah, leh a sanggamte leh a tapate, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a thumna Zakkhur, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a lina Izzri, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a ngana Nethaniah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a gukna Bukkiah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sagihna Jesharelah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a giatna Jeshaiah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a kuana Mattaniah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawmna Shimei, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawm-le-khatna Azarel, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawm-le-nihna Hashabiah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawm-le-thumna Shubael, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawm-le-lina Mattithiah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawm-le-ngana Jeremoth, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawm-le-gukna Hananiah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawm-le-sagihna Joshbekashah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawm-le-giatna Hanani, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawm-le-kuana Mallothi, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawmnihna Eliathah, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawmnih-le-khatna Hothir, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawmnih-le-nihna Giddalti, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawmnih-le-thumna Mahazioth, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi;
a sawmnih-le-lina Romamtiezer, leh a tapate leh a sanggamte, sawm-le-nih tung tu hi.
Kongcingte a kiseh khennate in: Korah behte sung panin, Asaf innkuan sung panin Kore’ tapa Meshelemiah ahi hi.
Meshelemiah’ tapate in: Zekhariah a tacil, Jediael a nihna, Zebadiah a thumna, Jathniel a lina,
Elam a ngana, Jehohanan a gukna, Elieho-enai a sagihna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Obededom’ tapate in: Shemaiah a tacil, Jehozabad a nihna, Joah a thumna, Sakar a lina, Nethanel a ngana,
Ammiel a gukna, Issakhar a sagihna, Peullethai a giatna ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in Obededom thupha pia hi.
Ama tapa upa pen Shemaiah sung panin zong a beh sungah ukte ahi tapate suak hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in siamna lian a nei mite ahi uh hi.
Shemaiah’ tapate in: Othni, Refael, Obed, Elzabad leh a sanggamte siamna a nei ahi Elihu, leh Semakhiah ahi hi.
Hihte khempeuh in Obededom’ tapate leh amau’ tapate leh a sanggamte uh tawh, nasepna dingin siamna a nei mikician ahi uh hi; Obededom sung panin sawmguk-le-nih pha uh hi.
Tua ciangin Meshelemiah in siamna a nei tapate leh sanggamte, sawm-le-giat nei hi.
Tua ciangin Merari’ innkuan sung panin Hosah’ tapate in: Shimri a ukpi (amah tacil ahih loh hangin a pa in a ukpi-in amah bawl hi),
Hilkiah a nihna, Tebaliah a thumna, Zekhariah a lina ahi hi. Hosah’ tapate leh a sanggamte khempeuh sawm-le-thum pha uh hi.
Innkuan pasal lutangte kongcingte ahi uh hi; amaute in a sanggamte uh tawh Topa’ inn sungah nasep nei uh hi;
amaute in a neu a lian a kibangin a pate uh innkuan kuanin amau’ kongpi ding ai saan uh hi.
Nisuahna lam adingin ai, Shelemiah tungah tu hi. A tapa, a pil thulamlakpa Zekhariah’ adingin zong ai saan uh a, leilu lam-a dingin ama ai pha hi.
Obededom adingin leitaw lamah hong suak a, a tapa tungah vankoihna inn kipia hi.
Shuppim leh Hosah adingin lampi a pai tohna, Shallekheth kongpi san, nitumna lamah kia hi. Galvil leh galvil kimaituah hi.
Vankoihna inn kongah nih nih-in a om mah bangin ni simin nisuahna lamah guk omin, ni simin leilu lamah li omin, ni sim mah-in leitaw lamah li om hi;
tua ciangin nitumna lam a, om lampi inn adingin a lampi ah li omin a lampi innah nih om hi.
Hihte in Korah mite leh Merari’ tapate lakah kongcingte a kiseh khenna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Levi mite sung panin Ahijah in Pasian’ inn van manpha koihleh a ki-ap letsong koihnate uk hi.
Gershom-te beh sung panin Ladan in innkuan tampi a pian’ khiatna mi khat hi a, Jehiel innkuante zong ama sung panin a piang ahi hi.
Jehiel’ tapate, Zetham leh a sanggampa Joelte in Topa’ inn van manpha koihnate uk uh hi.
Amram mite, Izhar mite, Hebron mite, leh Uzziel mite sung panin—
Moses’ tapa Gershom-te beh sung panin Shebuel in van manpha koihna a ukte’ lakah a ukpi ahi hi.
Gershom sanggam Eliezer’ suan Shelomoth tawh zong beh kinai ahi hi. Eliezer’ sung panin a tapa Rehabiah, a tapa Jeshiah, a tapa Joram, a tapa Zikri, a tapa Shelomoth ahi hi.
Hih Shelomoth leh a sanggamte in, kumpi David, leh beh lutangte, leh a tul tul leh a za za-a uk uliante, leh galkap a ukte in a ap uh ahi, a ki-ap letsongte a kikoihna khempeuh uk uh hi.
Gal sungah a ngah vankinusiate sung panin Topa’ inn puah nadingin amaute in letsongte ap uh hi.
Thu-mupa Samuel, leh Kish’ tapa Saul, Ner’ tapa Abner, leh Zeru-iah’ tapa Joab in a apsate khempeuh zong, a ki-ap letsong khempeuh Shelomoth leh a sanggamte’ kepna sungah om hi.
Izhar mite sung panin Khenaniah leh a tapate pen Israel adingin uliante leh thukhente-in a pualam nasepna ah kiseh hi.
Hebron mite sung panin Hashabiah leh a sanggamte, siamna a nei mihing tulkhat leh zasagih in Jordan nitumna lam Israel tungah Topa’ nasepna khempeuh leh kumpipa’ nasemna ah uk uh hi.
Hebron mite sung panin Jerijah in a ukpi ahi hi. (David’ uk a kum sawmlina kumin kikantelna bawl uh a, Gilead gam sung Jazer ah amaute sung panin siamna lian a nei mihing kimu hi.)

Kumpi David in Jerijah leh a sanggamte, siamna a nei mihing tulnih leh zasagih, a beh sungah lutang ahite, Pasian tawh a kisai na khempeuh leh kumpipa’ vaite ah, Reuben mite, Gad mite, leh Manasseh a langte tungah a uk dingin a seh hi.

Tu-in Israel mite, beh lutangte, a tul leh a za-a a ukte, leh khen khatah mi tul sawmnih leh tulli a om, kum tawntung kha khat khit kha khat hong tungin a kuankhia a khente tawh kisai-in na khempeuh ah kumpipa’ na a sem a uliante in:
Zabdiel’ tapa Jashobeam in a kha masa sungin a khen masa a uk ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
Amah in Perez’ suan leh khak hi a, a kha masa sungin galkap a ukte khempeuh a ukpi ahi hi.
Ahoah-te beh Dodai in a kha nihna sunga a khen a ukpi ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
A kha thumna adingin a uk a thumna-pa, siampi Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in a ukpi ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
Hihpa in mihing sawmthumte sungah a thahat, mihing sawmthumte a uk Benaiah ahi hi; ama tapa Ammizabad in ama khen a ukpa ahi hi.
Joab sanggampa Ashahel in a kha lina adingin a lina hi a, ama nungah amah a liah dingin a tapa Zebadiah om hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
A kha ngana adingin a uk a ngana-pa in Izrah-te beh Shamhuth ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
A gukna, a kha gukna adingin Tekoa khua mi Ikkesh’ tapa Ira ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
A sagihna, a kha sagihna adingin Efraim’ suante sung panin Pelon khua mi Helez ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
A giatna, a kha giatna adingin Jerah mi sung panin Hushan khua mi Sibbekai ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
A kuana, a kha kuana adingin Benjamin mi sung panin Anathoth khuami Abiezer ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
A sawmna, a kha sawmna adingin Zerah mi sung panin Netofah khua mi Maharai ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
A sawm-le-khatna, a kha sawm-le-khatna adingin Efraim suante’ sung panin Pirathon khuami Benaiah ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
A sawm-le-nihna, a kha sawm-le-nihna adingin Othniel suante’ sung panin Netofah khuami Heldai ahi hi; ama khen sungah tul sawmnih leh tulli om hi.
Israel minamte tungah a ukpite in: Reuben mite’ adingin Zikri’ tapa Eliezer ahi hi; Simeon mite’ adingin Ma-akah’ tapa Shefatiah ahi hi;
Levi adingin Kemuel’ tapa Hashabiah ahi hi; Aaron adingin Zadok ahi hi;
Judah’ adingin David, sanggamte’ sung panin Elihu ahi hi; Issakhar’ adingin Mikhael’ tapa Omri ahi hi;
Zebulun’ adingin Obadiah’ tapa Ishmaiah ahi hi; Naftali adingin Azriel’ tapa Jeremoth ahi hi;
Efraim mite’ adingin Azaziah’ tapa Hoshea ahi hi; Manasseh minam a langte’ adingin Pedaiah’ tapa Joel ahi hi;
Gilead gam sunga Manasseh minam a langte adingin Zekhariah’ tapa Iddo ahi hi; Benjamin adingin Abner’ tapa Ja-asiel ahi hi;
Dan adingin Jeroham’ tapa Azarel ahi hi. Hihte in Israel minamte’ makaite ahi uh hi.
Israel mite vantung aksi zahin a tamin a bawl nading Topa in thuciam khin ahih manin David in kum sawmnih nuaisiah a pha mite sim lo hi.

Zeru-iah’ tapa Joab in sim ding kipan a, ahih hangin zo man lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu hangin Israel tungah Pasian’ hehna hong tung a, Kumpi David’ khang tangthu sungah tua a kisimte kikhum lo hi.

Kumpipa’ van manpha a ukte in: Kumpipa’ van manpha koihnate ah Adiel’ tapa Azmaveth ahi hi; tua ciangin gam sunga van manpha koihnate, khuapi sungate, khuaneute leh tausangte, sunga omte tungah Uzziah’ tapa Jonathan ahi hi;
tua ciangin lo kho dingin lo nasep a sem mite tungah Khelub’ tapa Ezri ahi hi;
tua ciangin leenggui lote tungah Ramah khuami Shimei ahi hi; tua ciangin leenggui lo panin a piang leenggahzu koihnate’ adingin Shifmoth khuami Zabdi ahi hi.
Shefelab gam sunga om Oliv leh theiba kungte tungah Gederah khuami Baalhanan ahi hi; tua ciangin sathau koihnate tungah Joash ahi hi.
Sharom gam sungah a gamta ganhonte tungah Sharon khuami Shitrai ahi hi; kuam sunga om ganhonte tungah Adlai’ tapa Shafat ahi hi;
Kalaohte tungah Ishmael mi Obil ahi hi; tua ciangin la a nute tungah Meronoth khuami Jehdeiah ahi hi.
Tuuhonte tungah Hagri mi Jaziz ahi hi. Hihte khempeuh in Kumpi David’ neihsa a kemte ahi uh hi.
David’ pano Jonathan in thu thei mi leh lai thei mi ahih manin thu-lam-lakpa ahi hi; amah leh Hakmoni’ tapa Jehiel in kumpipa’ tapate cing uh hi.
Ahithofel in kumpipa’ thu-lamlakpa hi a, Arkhi mi Hushai in kumpipa’ lawmpa ahi hi.
Ahithofel a sih ciangin Benaiah’ tapa Jehoiada leh Abiathar in laih uh hi. Joab in kumpipa’ galkapte a ukpa ahi hi.

David in Jerusalem-a Israelte lakah zaneite, minamte sungah zaneite, kumpipa’ na a sem a khente sungah uliante, a tul tul a, a ukte, a za za-a a ukte, neihsa khempeuh leh kumpipa’ ganhingte leh a tapate a kemte pen, kumpi inn a, zaneite, a thahat mite, leh gal a hang tawntungte khempeuh tawh khawm hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpi David a khe-in ding to in, “Ka sanggam leh ka mite aw, ka thugen hong za un. Topa’ thuciamna singkuang ading leh i Pasian’ khengak nadingin tawlngakna inn khat lam ding ka lungsim sungah a om hi; tua ciangin a lam nading ka kiging hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in kei kiangah, ‘Nangmah in galhang khat hi-in sisan tampi luangsak na hih manin keima min dingin inn na lam kei ding hi,’ hong ci hi.

Ahi zongin Israel Topa’ Pasian in Israel tungah kumpi ahi tawntung dingin ka pa’ innkuan khempeuh panin kei hong teel hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in makai-in Judah teel a, tua ciangin Judah innkuan panin ka pa innkuan teel a, tua ciangin ka pa’ tapate lak panin Israel khempeuh tungah kumpi-in kei hong bawl ding kei tungah amah lungkim hi.
Tua ciangin ka tapate khempeuh lak panin (bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kei tungah tapa tampi hong pia hi) Israel tungah Topa’ kumpi tokhom tungah a tu dingin amah in ka tapa Solomon teel khin hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, ‘Ka inn leh ka inntualte a bawl dingpa in na tapa Solomon ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka tapa dingin amah ka teel khin a, keimah in ama pa ka hi ding hi.
Amah in ka thupiaknate leh ka biakna ngeina kipte tu ni-a mah bangin zuih ding a ngaihsut paisuak nak leh ama kumpi gam ka kipsak tawntung ding hi,’ hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin tu-in note in hih leitang hoih nei-in note khit na tate uh tungah gamh-in na nusiat tawntung theih nadingun Topa’ mai-ah kikhopna ahi Israel khempeuh’ muhna, leh i Pasian’ zakna ah Topa na Pasian uh’ thupiaknate khempeuh zui-in zong un.

“Tu-in nang, ka tapa Solomon aw, na pa’ Pasian thei in la, na lungsim khempeuh leh utna lungsim tawh ama na sem in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in lungsim khempeuh zong a, ngimna leh ngaihsutna khempeuh thei hi. Nangmah in amah na zon’ leh nangmah in amah na mu ding hi; ahih hangin amah na nusiat leh amah in nang hong paaikhia paisuak ding hi.
Biakinn dingin inn khat a lam dingin Topa in nang hong teel khin ahih manin tu-in kingaihsun in; thahat in la, sem in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in a tapa Solomon tungah biakinn innlim, leh a innte, a van manpha koihnate, a dawl tungnungte, leh a dei sungnungte, leh hehpihna tokhom’ adingin inndei a geelna;
leh Topa’ inn a tualte adingin a lungsimah a ngaihsut khempeuh, a kimkot a, inndeite khempeuh, Pasian’ inn van manpha koihnate, leh a ki-ap letsongte ading van manpha koihnate;
siampite leh Levi mi a khente, leh Topa’ inn sungah nasepna khempeuh ading; Topa’ inn sungah nasep nading um-le-beel khempeuh ading,
nasepna ah zat ding kham tawh kibawl um-le-beel khempeuh a gihna, nasepna ah zat dingin ngun tawh kibawl um-le-beelte a gihna,
nasepna ah meivak khuam a kizat ciatna bangin kham meivak khuamte leh a meivakte a gihna, a meivak khuam leh a meivakte a gihna zah ciat, meivakkhuam khat leh a meivakte ngun a gihna,
Ompihna Anlum adingin sabuai kham a gihna ciat, ngun sabuaite adingin ngun a gihna,
leh sikkeukate, kuangte, leh haite ading kham citak a gihna; kham haipite leh a gihna ciat; ngun haipite leh a gihna ciat;
a kisiangsaksa kham tawh kibawl paknamtui biakna tau ding leh a gihna zah ding a geelna; a khate uh zakin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a khuh kherubte’ kham leeng ding a geelna zong pia hi.
Nasep ding khempeuh geelsa bangin sep dingin hih thu tawh kizui-in Topa’ genna bangin lai-in gelhna tawh amah in hihte khempeuh a siangin hih hi.

Tua ciangin David in a tapa Solomon kiangah, “Thakhauhin hang in la, sem in. Lau kei in, lungkia kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian, kei’ Pasian nangawn nang tawh om hi. Topa’ inn sung nasepna khempeuh a nasepna khempeuh a kizawh matengin amah in nang hong tamasak lo, hong nusia lo ding hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ innah nasep khempeuh a sem dingin siampite leh Levi mi a khenkhente om hi; nasepna khatpeuh peuhah siamna a nei mi, nasepna khempeuhah nang tawh hong om ding hi; uliante leh mi khempeuh zong nangma thupiakna bangbangin gamta ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi David in a kikhawm khempeuhte kiangah, “Pasian in amah bek a teelsa ka tapa Solomon pen khangno-in pumpi tawh sinna om nai lo a, nasep ding pen lian hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih inn lianpi in mihing ading hilo a, Topa Pasian’ ading ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ka Pasian’ inn dingin ka hih theih zah ciang, phuh dingin onik suang, suangpak, mel tuamtuam a nei suang, suangkang, leh suangmanpha nam khempeuh tampi takte ban-ah kham zat nading nate ah kham, ngun zat nading nate-ah ngun, leh sumngo zat nading nate ah sumngo, sik zat nading nate ah sik, leh sing zat nading nate ah sing ka koih khin zo hi.
Tua tham loin, a siangtho inn adingin ka koihte khempeuh banah, ngun leh kham keima aa mahmah zong om a, ka pa Pasian’ inn ka ngaihsutna hangin ka Pasian’ innah ka piakte in:
Kawm zut nadingin Ofir gam kham ahi kham talen tulthum, leh a kisiangsaksa ngun talen tulsagih,

leh siamneelte in a hih ding nasepna khempeuh adingin kham zat nading nate ah kham leh ngun zat nading nate ah ngun ahi hi. Kua in utna lungsim tawh Topa tungah tu ni-in amahmah kipia-in ki-ap ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin beh lutangte in ut thu-a piakna bawl uh a, minam makaite, a tul tul-a a ukte leh a za za-a a ukte, leh kumpipa’ nasepna ah a uk uliante in zong hih uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian’ inn nasep nadingin kham talen tulnga leh kham darik tulsawm, ngun talen tulsawm, sumngo talen tulsawm leh tulgiat, leh sik talen tul zakhat pia uh hi.
Suangmanpha a nei peuhmah in Gershon mi Jehiel’ kepna sung, Topa’ inn van manpha koihna ah pia uh hi.

Tua ciangin hih mite in utna lungsim tawh pia uh ahih manin mite lungdam uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in lungsim khempeuh tawh Topa tungah cingtakin pia uh hi; kumpi David zong nakpi takin lungdam hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a kikhawmte khempeuh’ omna ah David in Topa phat hi; tua ciangin David in: “Nang, Topa, ka pu uh Israel Pasian aw, a tawntungin thupha ngah ta in.

Topa aw, liatna, leh vangliatna, leh minthan’na, leh gualzawhna, leh min liatna in nangma’ aa ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh vantung leh leitungah a om khempeuh in nangma’ aa ahi hi; Topa aw, kumpigam in nangma’ aa hi a, tuate khempeuh tungah nang a lutangin hong kisangsak hi.
Hauhna leh minphatna nangma kiang pan hong pai a, nangmah in na khempeuh tungah na uk hi. Na khut sungah vangliatna leh thahatna om hi; liatsak nading leh thakhauhsak nading na khut sungah om hi.
Tu-in nangma tungah ka nuam uh hi, kote’ Pasian aw, a minthang na min ka phat uh hi.

“Ahih hangin kote in hih bangin utna tawh ka piak nadingun keimah in kua hi a, ka mite in bang hi lel ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh na khempeuh nang kiang pan hong pai hi a, nangma’ aa mah nang tungah kong pia uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pu ka pate khempeuh uh mah bangin kote in nangma mai-ah mikhualte leh peemtate ka hi uh hi; ka hunte uh leitungah nilim bang hi a, a kip om lo hi.
Topa kote’ Pasian aw, na min siangtho pahtawi nadingin nang ading inn lam nadingin ka piaksa uh hih a tampite in nangma khut sung panin hong pai hi a, a vekpi-in nangma aa mah ahi hi.

Nangmah in lungsim entelin thumanna ah na lungkimna ka thei hi, ka Pasian aw; lungsim thumanna tawh hih nate khempeuh citna tawh kong pia khin a, tu-in nang tungah citna leh lungdamna tawh a hong pia, hih lai-ah a om na mite ka mu zo hi.
Ka pute uh Abraham, Isaak, leh Israel Pasian, Topa aw, na mite’ lungsim sungah tua bang ngimnate leh ngaihsutnate omsak tawntung in la, amaute’ lungsim nangma lamah kai in.

Amah in a lungsim khempeuh tawh na thupiaknate, na tecipannate, leh na thukhamte kemin a vekpi-in sem a, keimah in ka vaihawmsa inn lianpi amah in lam theih nading ka tapa Solomon tungah utna lungsim guan in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in a kikhawmte khempeuh tungah, “Topa na Pasian uh phat un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a kikhawmte khempeuh in a pute a pate uh Pasian Topa phat in, a lu uh kun uh a, Topa bia-in kumpipa tungah zahtakna bawl uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Topa tungah biakpiakna bawl uh a, a zing ciangin Topa tungah meihal biakna bawngtal tulkhat, tuutal tulkhat, leh tuuno tulkhat, a leenggahzu tawh a biakna teng tawh, leh Israel khempeuh adingin biak piakna tampi pia uh hi;

tua ciangin amaute in tua ni-in lungdamna lianpi tawh Topa mai-ah pawi khamin om uh hi.Tua ciangin amaute in David’ tapa Solomon kumpi-in a nihveina bawl uh a, amaute in Topa adingin amah kumpi-in sathau nilhin, siampi dingin Zadok sathau nilh uh hi.
Tua ciangin a pa David tangin Topa’ kumpi tokhom tungah kumpi-in Solomon tu hi; tua ciangin amah a dau pai a, Israel khempeuh in ama thu mang uh hi.
Makaite khempeuh leh a thahat mite, leh Kumpi David’ tapate khempeuhte in zong Kumpi Solomon tungah a thuman ding uh thu ciam uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Israel khempeuh muhna ah Solomon tungah minthan’na lianpi pia a, Israel sungah ama ma-in kumpi khatpeuh peuh tungah a kipia ngei nai lo kumpi min liatna guan hi.
Tua bangin Jessi’ tapa David in Israel khempeuh tungah kumpi ahi hi.
Israel tungah ama uk hun in kum sawmli sung ahi hi; amah in Hebron ah kum sagih sung, Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum-le-thum sung uk hi.
Tua ciangin a khangham, a ni cing, hauhna leh minphatna tawh si hi; tua ciangin a tapa Solomon in ama tangin uk hi.
Tu-in Kumpi David’ gamtatnate a patna pan a tawpna dongin, thu-mupa Samuel’ Khang Tangthu sung, leh kamsang Nathan’ Khang Tangthu sung, leh thu-mupa Gad’ Khang Tangthu sungah,
ama ukna leh ama vangliatnate khempeuh leh ama tung leh Israel tung, leh gamsung kumpi gamte khempeuh tungah a tung thute a kiciamtehna tawh kigelh khawm hi.
David’ tapa Solomon in ama kumpi gam kho takin lenkip hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa ama Pasian in ompih a, a lian mahmahin amah bawl hi.
Solomon in Israel khempeuh tung, a tultul leh a zaza-a a ukte tung, thukhente tung, leh Israel khempeuh sunga makai khempeuhte tung, leh beh lutangte tungah thu gen hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon, leh amah tawh a om a kikhawm khempeuh, Gibeon-ah a om mual dawn-a biak piakna munah pai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ nasem Moses in gamlak ah a bawlsa Pasian’ kikhopna buk tua lai-ah om hi.

Ahih hangin David in Kiriath-jearim panin ama adingin a bawlsaknasa munah Pasian’ thuciamna singkuang paipihto khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Jerusalem ah tua adingin puanbuk khat lamsak khin hi.
Tua tham loin Hur’ tapa Uri, a tapa Bezalel in a bawl sumngo biaknatau pen Topa’ biakbuk mai tua lai-ah om hi. Tua ciangin Solomon leh a kikhawm mite in Topa thu dong uh hi.
Tua ciangin kikhopna bukah a om, Topa mai-a sumngo biaknatau ah Solomon paito-in tua tungah meihal biakna ganhing tulkhat pia hi.
Tua zanin Solomon tungah Pasian kilang a, ama kiangah, “Nang kong piak ding hong ngen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Pasian kiangah, “Nangmah in ka pa David tungah a lian leh a kip itna na lak khin a, ama taangin kumpi-in keimah nong koih khin hi.
Topa Pasian aw, leitung leivui zahin a tam mi tungah kumpi-in kei hong koih khin na hih manin ka pa David tungah na thuciamna tu-in hong tung sak in.
Hih mite ka uk theih nadingin tu-in pilna leh theihna hong pia in; bang hang hiam cih leh hih zah-a a tam hih na mite kua in uk zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Pasian in Solomon dawngin, “Hih thu na lungsim sungah om a, nangmah in neihsate, hauhna, pahtawina, ahih kei leh nang hong mudahte’ nuntakna ngen loin, a tungah kumpi-in nang kong koihna ka mite na uk theih nadingin nang adingin pilna leh theihna hong ngen na hih manin,

pilna leh theihnate nangma tungah hong kipia hi. Nang ma-a kumpite kuamah in a neih ngei loh, nang khit-ate kuamah in zong tua bang a neih loh ding, hauhnate, neihnate, leh pahtawina zong, nangma tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Gibeon-a om mual dawn-a biak piakna mun, kikhopna buk mai panin Jerusalem ah Solomon hong pai hi. Tua ciangin amah in Israel tungah a uk hi.
Solomon in leengte leh sakol tung tuangte kaikhawm hi; amah in leeng tulkhat leh zali leh sakol tung tuang mi tulsawm leh tulnih nei a, leeng khuapite sung leh Jerusalem ah tuate koih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Jerusalem ah suang bangin ngun leh kham olsak a, taamtaak singte pen Shefelah theiba sing bangin tam sak hi.
Solomon in gamdang panin sakol a laknate in Izipt leh Kue pan hi a, kumpipa’ sumbawlte in a man ding pia-in Kue panin tuate ngah uh hi.

Amaute in Izipt panin leeng khat ciangin ngun, shekel za gukin la uh a, sakol khat ciangin za leh sawmnga-in la uh hi; tua mah bangin amaute in zuakkhiat kik dingin Hit kumpite leh Siria kumpite khempeuh tung panin zong sakol leh leeng la uh hi.
Tu-in Solomon in Topa’ min dingin biakinn khat leh ama adingin kumpi inn khat lam ding sawm hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in van pua ding mi tul sawmsagih leh mual tung gamah suang to ding mi tul sawmgiat, leh tuate a vaan dingin mi tulthum leh zaguk seh hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Tai-ar kumpi Huram’ kiangah thu puak a: “Teen nading inn khat a lam nadingin ka pa David tungah taamtaak sing na puak mah bangin kei tungah zong hong puak in.

En in, Israelte’ adingin a tawntung ading a kikipsaksa bangin, ama mai-ah a namtui nate ahi paknamtui hal nading leh Ompihna Anlum piak tawntung nading, leh sabbath nite leh khadet nite leh Topa i Pasian’ adingin a kisehsa pawi nite-in zing leh nitakin meihal biaknate piak nadingin Topa ka Pasian’ minin inn khat lamin ama tungah a ap ding ka hi hi.
Kote’ Pasian in pasian khempeuh sangin lianzaw ahih manin ka lam ding inn in lian ding hi.

Ahih hangin vantung, a sangpen vantung nangawn in amah huam zo lo ahih manin ama adingin kua in inn lam zo ding ahi hiam? Ama mai-ah paknamtui hal nading cih sim loh ama adingin inn a lamsak dingin kei in kua ka hi hiam?

Tua hi a, tu-in ka pa David in a sehsa, Judah leh Jerusalem ah kei tawh a om nasep siamte tawh a semkhawm dingin kham, ngun, sumngo, leh sik, leh a ausan, a dupsan, puandumte, leh na sepna-ah zong siamna a nei mi khat hong puak in.

8-9 Taamtaak, taaksan, leh cingsing zong, Lebanon panin hong puak in; bang hang hiam cih leh na nasemte in Lebanon sing phuk ding zia a theihna ka thei hi. Tua ciangin kei adingin sing tampi a sem dingin nangma nasemte in keima nasemte tawh om ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka lam ding inn in lianin lamdang ding hi.
Sing nasem sing a phukte’ adingin a kisuvui mangbuh beem tul sawmnih, mangbuhham beem tul sawmnih, leenggahzu tambong tul sawmli, leh sathau tambong tul sawmli ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Tai-ar kumpi Huram in lai-in thuk-in Solomon kiangah khak a, “Topa in a mite it ahih manin amaute tungah kumpi-in nang hong koih hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a lai sungah gen thuah lai a, “Topa adingin biakinn khat, leh ama adingin kumpi inn khat a lam ding, thu theihna leh thu telna tawh a kidim tapa pil, David tungah pia-in, van leh lei a bawl Israel Topa Pasian in thupha ngah ta hen.

13-14 “Tu-in Dan minam numei khat’ tapa, thutelna tawh a kidim, siamna a nei, siapa Huram kong puak hi; ama pa in Tai-ar khuami ahi hi. Amah in kham, ngun, sumngo, sik, suang leh sing, leh a ausan, a dum, leh a dupsan puante leh saihadial puan, leh zepna nam khempeuh sem ding leh ka topa ahi na pa David’ mi khutsiamte ahi nangma mi khutsiamte tawh a semkhawm dingin ama tunga a kipia nasep khatpeuh peuh a sem dingin sinna neisa ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka topa in a gensa mangbuh leh mangbuhham, sathau leh leenggahzute, na nasemte tungah puak in;

tua ciangin na kisap sing peuhmah Lebanon panin kong phuk ding uh a, nangmah in Jerusalem ah na puaktoh theih nadingin phong-in tuipi tungah Joppa dong nang kiangah kong paipih ding uh hi,” zong ci lai hi.
Tua ciangin a pa David in mi phazah a sim mah bangin, Solomon in Israel gam sunga om gamdang mi khempeuh mi phazah simna bawl hi; mi tulza khat leh tul sawmnga leh tulthum, leh zaguk pha hi.
Amah in van pua dingin amaute tul sawmsagih, mual tung gamah suang to dingin tul sawmgiat, leh mite’ nasep a vaan dingin tulthum leh zaguk seh hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in Jerusalem sung Moriah Mual tung a, a pa David tungah Topa a kilahna mun, David in a seh-nasa mun ahi, Jebus mi Ornan ancilna phual-ah Topa’ inn lam ding kipan hi.
Amah in ama uk a kum lina a kha nihna ni nih ni-in lam ding kipan hi.
Pasian’ inn lam nading Solomon’ geelna in: a dung nidanga kizang tong-in, tong sawmguk hi a, a vai tong sawmnih ahi hi.
Inn mai-a innliim in inn vai tawh kikimin tong sawmnih sau hi; tua ciangin a san’na in tong sawmnih ahi hi.
Amah in taaksan tawh a innpi kawm dapin kham hoih tawh zut a, tua tungah nisuh leh khainiang bawl hi.
Amah in suang manpha phutin a inn zeem hi. A kham in Parvaim kham ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in a inn—a innsunte, a sangkilte, a kawmte, leh a kongkhakte, kham tawh zut hi; tua ciangin a kawmte tungah kherubte bawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah in siangthopen mun bawl hi; a dung in inn vai tawh kizui-in tong sawmnih hi a, a vai in tong sawmnih mah ahi hi; amah in kham hoih talen zaguk tawh zut hi.
A kilhnate a gihna in kham shekel sawmnga ahi hi. Tua ciangin amah in a inn dawl tungnungte kham tawh zut hi.
Amah in siangtho pen mun sungah sing kherub nih bawlin kham tawh tuate zut hi.
Tua kherub tegel kha a kizalin tong sawmnih ahi hi; a khat’ kha khat in tong nga hi-in inn kawm ban a, tua ciangin a kha lang khat tong nga in a kherub dang khat’ kha ban hi.
Tua mah bangin a kherub dang khat’ kha lang khat in tong nga hi-in inn kawm lang khat ban a, tong nga mah a sau a kha lang khat in a kherub masa’ kha tawh kizom hi.
Hih kherubte’ khate in tong sawmnih huam hi; kherubte amau’ khe-in ding-in innpi sung lam nga uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a dum leh a ausan leh a dupsan puante leh saihadial tawh a dalna puan bawl a, tua tungah kherubte bawl hi.
Amah in inn mai san-ah tong sawmthum-le-nga a sang, a dawn tuakah tong nga a pha khuamluzepna a nei khuampi nih bawl hi.
Amah in ngawng-a awhte bangin khainiangte bawlin khuampite dawnah koih hi; tua ciangin amah in mangkawlsing zakhat bawlin khainiangte tungah koih hi.
Amah in tua khuamte, khat leitaw lam, a khat leilu lam, biakinn mai-ah phut hi; amah in leitaw lam-a om pen Jakhin phuakin, leilu lam-a om pen Boaz phuak hi.
Amah in sumngo biaknatau, a dung tong sawmnih, a vai tong sawmnih a sang tong sawm a pha khat bawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kisung tuikuangpi bawl hi; tua in a bem hi a, a gei khat pen a gei khat dong tong sawm pha-in, tong nga sang a, a kimkot tong sawmthum pha hi.
Tuikuangpi kimkot a nuai tong sawmthum sungah um gah limte om hi; tua um gahte gual nihin om a, tuikuangpi a kisun’in kisungkhawm pah hi.

Bawngtal sawm-le-nihte tungah tua tuikuangpi kinga a, thum leilu lam nga a, thum nitumna lam nga-in, thum leitaw lam nga a, thum nisuahna lam nga hi; tuate tungah a tuikuangpi kinga a, a nung lam uh a sung lamah om hi.
A sahna in khutpeek mai cia ahi hi; a geivial pen unok pak tawh a kibang hai geivial bangin kibawl hi; tua sungah tui tambong tulguk val ta hi.

Amah in kisil nading tuikuang dang sawm zong bawl a, leitaw lamah nga, leilu lamah nga koih hi. Amaute in meihal biakna a, a zatte uh hihte sungah silsiang ding uh a, tuikuangpi in siampite’ kisil nading ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kigelhsa bangin kham meivakkhuam sawm bawl a, biakinn sung leitaw lamah nga, leilu lamah nga koih hi.
Amah in sabuai sawm zong bawl a, biakinn sung leitaw lam pangah nga, leilu lamah nga koih hi. Tua ciangin amah in kham kuang zakhat bawl hi.
Amah in siampite’ inntual, leh inntual lian, leh inntual kongkhakte bawl a, a kongkhakte sumngo tawh zut hi.
Tua ciangin amah in inn khang nisuahna lam kiu-ah tuikuangpi koih hi.
Huram in beelte, kawbiate, leh kuangte zong bawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin Huram in Kumpi Solomon’ adingin Pasian’ inn a bawl nasep a zawhte in:
Khuampi nihte, kuang-ukte, leh khuampite lu dawnah a om khawmluzepna nihte; leh khuampite lu dawnah a om khuamluzepna kuang-uk nihte a tuam dingin ngen bang-a kibawl nihte,
leh khuampite tungah a om khuamluzepna kuang-uk nihte a tuam dingin ngen banga kibawl khat adingin mangkawlsing gual nih ahi ngen banga kibawl nihte adingin mangkawlsing zalite ahi hi.
Amah in a din’nate, leh din’nate tungah a kikoih tuikuangte,
leh a tuikuangpi khat, leh tua nuai-a om bawngtal sawm-le-nihte zong bawl hi.
Topa’ inn dingin Kumpi Solomon’ adingin siapa Huram in a kihal sumngo tawh beelte, kawbiate, sikkeukate, leh hihte’ adingin nazat khempeuh a bawl hi.
Jordan zanglei sung Sukkoth leh Zeredah kikal beel lei-ah kumpipa in hihte sung hi.
Solomon in hih nate tampi tak bawl a, sumngo a gik zah kithei zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in Pasian’ inn sunga om na khempeuh a bawlte in: kham biakna tau, Ompihna Anlum adingin sabuaite,
a kigelhsa bangin biakinn sungnung mai-ah vak dingin kham citak meivakkhuamte leh a meivakte;
kham siangpen tawh a kibawl a pakte, a meivakte, leh a tehte;

kham siangtho tawh a kibawl a taitehte, kuangte, paknamtui adingin pakante, leh vutluahna hi a, siangthopen mun pai nading kongkhak sungnungte’ ading leh biakinnpi sung kongkhakte’ adingin biakinn kongkhak bilte in kham ahi hi.

Tua bangin Topa’ inn ding Solomon in ahih nasep khempeuh kizo hi. Tua ciangin a pa David in a apsa nate Solomon in paipihin, Pasian’ inn van manpha koihnate sungah a ngunte, a khamte, leh um-le-beelte khempeuh a seng hi.
Tua ciangin Zion a kici David khuapi sung panin Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a paipih to dingin Solomon in Israel upate, minam lutang khempeuh, leh Israel beh makaite, Jerusalem ah kaikhawm hi.
Tua ciangin a kha sagihna-a pawi hun sung kumpipa’ mai-ah Israel mi khempeuh kikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel upate khempeuh hong pai uh a, Levi mite in thuciamna singkuang la uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in thuciamna singkuang, leh kikhopna buk, leh puanbuk sunga om a siangtho um-le-beel khempeuh pua to uh hi; siampite ahi Levi mite in tuate pua to uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi Solomon leh ama mai-ah a kikhawm Israelte khempeuh thuciamna singkuang mai-ah om uh a, biakna-in tuu leh bawngtal tampi tak pia uh ahih manin a phazah kisim zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin siampite in kherubte’ kha nuai, siangthopen mun sung, biakinn sungnung sung ama munah Topa’ thuciamna singkuang paipih uh hi.
Kherubte in thuciamna singkuang tungah a khate uh zak ahih manin kherubte in thuciamna singkuang leh a zawlte tungah khuhna khat suak uh hi.
A zawlte sau ahih manin siangtho mun panin biakinn sungnung mai-ah a mongte kidawk hi; ahih hangin a pua lam panin kimu thei lo hi; tu ni dongin tua lai-ah tuate om hi.
Amaute Izipt panin hong paikhiat lai-in Topa in Israel mite tawh thuciamna a bawlna mun Horeb-ah Moses in suangpeek nihte a koih sim loh thuciamna singkuang sungah bangmah om lo hi.
Siangtho mun panin siampite hong pusuakin (bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ pawlte cih tuam om loin tua lai-a om siampite khempeuh amau mahmah kisian’suah uh hi;

tua ciangin Levi mi lasate Asaf, Heman, leh Jeduthun, amau’ tapate leh a behte, saihadial puan tawh kizemin, daltuahte, harp lasaknate, leh laiza lasaknate tawi-in peengkul tum siampite za leh sawmnih tawh biakna tau nisuahna lamah ding khawm uh hi;

aw kikhatin phatin Topa tungah lungdam koh ding pen peengkul tumte leh lasate’ nasep ahi hi), peengkulte leh daltuahte leh adang lasaknate tawh, “Topa tungah lungdam koh ding hoih hi, bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi,” ci-in Topa phatna-in la a kisak ciangin, Topa’ inn in meii tawh kidim a,
meii hangin siampite in na sem zo lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ minthan’na in Pasian’ inn sung a dim hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in, “Khuamial sahpi sungah teen ding a teel Topa aw,
a tawntungin na teen nading mun, a lian inn khat, hih lai-ah kong lamsak khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in en kawikawi a, Israel mi a kikhawmte khempeuh a din’ laitakin amaute khempeuh thupha pia hi.

4-6 Tua ciangin amah in, “‘Izipt gam panin ka mite ka paikhiatpih ni-a kipanin keima min a om nadingin Isreal minam khempeuh sungah inn khat lam nading khuapi khat zong ka teel kei a, keima mi Israel tungah kumpi dingin mi khat zong ka teel kei hi; ahih hangin tu-in ka min a om theih nadingin Jerusalem teelin ka mi Israel tungah a uk dingin David ka teel khin ta hi,’ ci-in gen in, ka pa David tungah a kam tawh a thuciamna a khut tawh a tungsak Israel Pasian, Topa in thupha ngah ta hen.
Tu-in Israel Pasian, Topa’ min dingin inn khat lam ding ka pa David’ lungsim sungah om hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in ka pa David tungah, ‘Na lungsimah keima min dingin inn khat lam ding na ngaihsun a, tua na ngaihsutna hoih mahmah hi;
ahi zongin keima min dingin tua inn a lam dingpa in nangmah hi loin, nangma sung pan hong piang ding na tapa hizaw ding hi,’ a ci hi.

Tu-in Topa in a bawlsa thuciamna tungsak khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ thuciam bangin ka pa David’ munah hong khangin Israel kumpi tokhom ah kong tu a, Israel Pasian, Topa’ min dingin inn ka lam khin hi.
Amah in Israel mite tawh a bawl Topa’ thuciamna a kikoihna singkuang tu-in tua lai-ah ka koih khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh omna Topa’ biaknatau mai-ah Solomon ding-in a khut zan hi.

Solomon in a dung tong nga, a vai tong nga, a sang tong thum a pha sumngo tau khat bawlin inntual ah koih khin hi; tua ciangin tua tungah amah ding hi. Tua ciangin Israel a kikhawmte khempeuh muhin amah khuk din’in van lamah a khut zan hi;

tua ciangin, “Israel Pasian, Topa aw, vantungah ahi a, leitungah ahi zongin thuciamna lenin a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh nangma thu hong mang na nasemte tungah itna kip a lak, nang tawh a kibang Pasian om lo hi;
ama tungah na gensa bangin na nasem ka pa David tungah a tungsakpa na hi hi; hi hi, na kam tawh thu na gen a, na khut tawh tu ni-in na tungsak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel Pasian, Topa aw, ama tungah thuciamin, ‘Keima thu nang na man’ bangin na suan na khakte in ka thukham zui-in a gamtatna uhah a kidop nak uh leh Israel kumpi tokhom tungah a tu dingin keima mai-ah mi khat beek na kitasam kei ding hi,’ na cihsa bangin na nasem ka pa David tawh na thuciamsa kipsak in.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel Pasian, Topa aw, na nasempa David tungah na gensa na kammal kipsak in.
“Ahih hangin Pasian in mite tawh leitungah hong teeng takpi ding ahi hiam? En in, vantung leh a sangpen vantung in nang hong huam zo lo hi; hih keima lamsa inn in hong huam zo lo zawkan ding hi!
Ahi zongin na nasempa’ thungetna leh hong thuumna don in; Topa ka Pasian aw, na nasempa in na mai-ah hong kikona leh hong nget thungetna ngai in;
na nasempa in hih mun lamah hong thungetna na zak theih nadingin nangmah in na min koih nadingin na ciamsa mun hih inn lam sun leh zanin na mit tawh en in.
Amaute in hih mun lam nga-in thu hong nget uh ciangin na nasempa leh na mi Israelte’ hong thuumnate nangmah in ngai in; hi hi, na teen’na mun vantung panin za in; na zak ciangin maisak in.
“Mi khat a vengte tungah khialin kiciamna kiciamsak a, hong pai-in hih inn sung na biakna tau mai-ah a kiciamna hong kiciam leh,
vantung panin za-in gamta in la, na nasemte thukhenin, a mawh mi a gamtatna ama lu tung mah-ah tusakin thuk in la, a thuman mi a thumanna tawh kizui-in thaman piakna tawh langsak in.
“Na mi Israelte nang tungah hong khialhna hangin a galte uh mai-ah guallelin, amaute hong kihei kikin na min hong phawkin hih inn sung nangma kiangah thungenin thuumna hong bawl ciangin,
vantung panin nangmah in za in la, na mi Israelte’ khialhna maisakin amaute leh a pu a pate uh tungah na piak leitungah amaute paipih kik in.

“Amaute nangma tungah hong khialhna hangin vantung kikhakcipin guah a zuk loh hun, amaute na gimsak hun ciangin, amaute in hih mun lam nga-in thu ngen a, na min hong phawkin amau’ khialhna panin a kihei uh leh,
amaute a pai nading lampi hoih hih in la, vantung panin za-in na nasemte, na mi Israelte’ khialhna maisak in; tua ciangin na mite tungah gamh-in na piak na leitang tungah guah zusak in.

“Gam sungah kialpi tungin, pulnatna ahi a, ankung natna ahi a, ankung zawngkhalna ahi a, kauphe ahi a, lung ahi zongin om a; amau’ khuapi khatpeuh peuh ah a galte un umcihin; bang bang gimna, bang bang natna hi taleh;

mi khatpeuh ahi a, na mi Israelte khempeuh in ahi zongin amau’ natna leh a dahna ciat uh thei-in hih inn lamah a khut uh hong zanin bangbang thungetna hi taleh bangbang thuumna hi taleh hong bawl leh;

na teenna mun vantung panin za in la, maisakin,amau’ gamtatna khempeuh tawh kizui-in a lungsim uh na theih bangin amaute tungah pia ciat in (bang hang hiam cih leh nang, nang bek in mihing’ lungsim na thei hi);
tua hi leh ka pu ka pate uh tungah na piak leitang tungah a nuntak hun sung khempeuh uh amaute in nang hong zahtakin nangma thu hong zui ding uh hi.
“Tua mah bangin na mi Israel a hilo gamdang mi khat a lian nangma min hang leh, nangma thahatna hangin a gamlapi gam panin hong pai-in, hih inn lam nga-in thu hong nget leh

na teenna mun vantung panin za in la, gamdang mipa in na tungah hong ngetna khempeuh tawh kizui-in hih in; tua hi leh nangma mi Israelte mah bangin leitung mi khempeuh in na min thei-in nang hong zahtak ding uh a, keima lamsa hih inn in nangma min tawh a kilo ahihna thei ding uh hi.

“A galte uh do dingin na mite kuan khia-in, bangbang lamah amaute sawl hita lecin, nangmah in na teelsa hih khuapi lam nangma tung leh nangma min dingin ka lamsa inn lam nga-in amaute in thu hong nget uh leh,
amau’ hong thungetna leh hong thuumnate vantung panin za-in amau’ vai huh in.
“Amaute nang tungah hong khialin (a khial lo kua om hiam?) amaute tungah nang heh a, galte tungah amaute pia-in, amaute a gamla gam ahi a, a nai-ah ahi zongin galmatin kipua khia a;

ahi zongin galmatin a kipuakna gamah amaute in a lungsim sung uhah tua thu ngaihsunin kisik kik a, ‘Kote khialin lam pialin ka gitloh tat uh hi,’ ci-in amaute galmatin a omna gam panin nang tungah hong thuum a;

amaute galmatin a kitutna, galmatin a omna leitangah a ngaihsutna khempeuh uh leh a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh amaute kisik kikin, na teelsa khuapi leh nangma min dingin ka lamsa inn, nangmah in amau’ pute pate tungah na piak amau’ leitang lam nga-in thu hong nget uh leh,
na teenna vangtung panin amau’ thungetna leh thuumnate za in la, amau’ vai huhin nang tungah hong khial na mite maisak in.
Ka Pasian aw, tu-in na mit hak in la, hih lai muna thungetna na bil hong ngat in.
“Tu-in ding-in Topa Pasian aw, na tawlngakna ding munah, na vangliatna singkuang tawh pai in. Topa Pasian aw, na siampite, gupna tawh zem in la, na hoihna ah na mi siangthote lungdam ta hen.
Topa Pasian aw, na sathau nilhpa nial kei in! Na nasempa David na itna sa hong phawk in,” a ci hi.
Solomon a thunget a tawp ciangin, vantung panin meikuang hong pai sukin meihal biakna leh biak piaknate haltum a, tua ciangin Topa’ minthan’na in biakinn hong dim hi.
Topa’ minthan’na in Topa’ inn dim ahih manin Topa’ inn sungah siampite lut thei lo uh hi.

Israel mite khempeuh in meikuang hong pai sukin Topa’ minthan’na biakinn tungah a om a muh uh ciangin suangphah tungah lei lam maingatin kun uh a, bia-in Topa tungah lungdamna ko-in, “Topa tungah lungdam koh ding hoih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa leh mi khempeuh in Topa’ mai-ah biakna pia uh hi.
Kumpi Solomon in biakna-in bawngtal tul sawmnih leh tulnih leh tuutal zakhat leh tul sawmnih pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa leh mi khempeuh in Pasian’ inn ap uh hi.

Siampite amau’ panmun uhah ding uh hi; Levi mite zong, Kumpi David in Topa tungah lungdam koh nadingin a bawl Topa’ tungah la sak nading lasaknate tawh ding uh hi—bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi—David in amau’ nasepna tawh phatnate a bawl ciangin tua bangin hih uh hi; amaute tawh a kigalsai-ah siampite in peengkulte tum uh hi; tua ciangin Israel khempeuh ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon in Topa’ inn mai-ah a om inntual laizang ap hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Solomon in a bawl sumngo biakna tau-ah meihal biakna leh an tawh biakna leh a thaute ta zo lo ahih manin tua lai munah amah in meihal biakna leh thunuam-a biakna thaute pia hi.
Tua hun lai takin Solomon leh amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh mihon tampi in Hamath lutna panin Izipt lui ciang dongah ni sagih sung pawi a kham uh hi.
Tua ciangin a ni giat ni-in amaute in a thukhupna kikhopna khat nei uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in biakna tau apna ni sagih sung pawikham uh hi; pawi dang ni sagih sung kibawl beh lai hi.
A kha sagihna a ni sawmnih leh ni thum ni-in, Topa in David leh Solomon leh ama mi Israel tungah a hoih a bawlna hangin amah in lungdamna leh kipahna tawh a inn uhah mite ciah khia sak hi.
Tua bangin Solomon in Topa’ inn leh kumpi inn zo hi; Solomon in Topa’ inn leh ama inn sungah hih dinga a geel khempeuh nuam takin zo hi.
Tua ciangin zanin Solomon’ tungah Topa kilangin ama kiangah: “Na thungetna ka za khin a, keima adingin biakpiakna inn dingin hih mun ka teel khin hi.
Keimah in vantungte khakcipin guah a zuk loh ciang ahi a, gam sung a netum dingin kauphe thu ka piak ciang ahi a, ka mite lakah natna ka tun’sak ciang ahi zongin,

keima minin a kisam ka mite amau mahmah kiniamkhiatin, thu ngenin ka mai hong zong a, amau’ gitlohnate panin a kihei uh leh, tua ciangin keimah in vantung panin ka za ding a, amaute’ khialhna maisakin a leitang uh ka hoihsak kik ding hi.
Tu-in ka mitte hakin hih lai munah a kingen thungetna ka bilte in ngai ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a tawntungin ka min a om theih nadingin keimah in hih inn teelin ka ap khin hi; ka mitte leh ka lungsim a tawntungin tua lai-ah om ding hi.
Nang adingin ahih leh, na pa David a gamtat bangin keima mai-ah na gamtat a, nang kong sawl khempeuh bangin semin ka thukhamte leh ka biakna ngeina kipte na zuih leh,
na pa David tawh kiciamin, ‘Israel a uk dingin mi khat zong na kitasam kei ding hi,’ ka cih bangin na kumpi tokhom ka kipsak ding hi.
“Ahih hangin note kihei-in, na mai uhah ka koihsa ka thukhamte leh ka thupiaknate nusia a, pai-in pasian dangte’ na semin tuate na biak uh leh,
note tungah kong piaksa leitang panin note kong botkhia ding hi; tua ciangin ka min dingin ka apsa hih inn ka muhna panin ka lawnkhia ding a, mi khempeuh lakah paunak leh gentehna ka suaksak ding hi.
Tua ciangin a minthangsa hih inn a nawkkha khempeuh in lamdangsa-in, ‘Bang hangin hih bangin Topa in hih gam leh hih inn bawl ahi hiam?’ ci ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, ‘Bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt gam panin amaute a paikhiatpih a pu a pate uh Pasian ahi Topa amaute in nusia uh a, pasian dangte pom uh a, tuate bia-in a na sem uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in hih siatna khempeuh amaute tungah tungsak hi,’ ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Solomon in Topa’ inn leh ama inn a lam khit kum sawmnih a cin’ ciangin,
Kumpi Huram in ama tungah a piaksa khuapite Solomon in lampha-in tuate sungah Israel mite teeng sak hi.
Tua ciangin Hamathzobah-ah Solomon pai-in tua gam la hi.
Amah in gam sungah Tadmor khua satin Hamath gam sungah vankoihna khuapite khempeuh lam hi.
Amah in khuapi kulh, kongpite, leh zawlte a nei Bethhoron Tungnung leh Bethhoron Nuainung,

leh Baalath, leh Solomon’ neih vankoihna khuapite khempeuh, leh a leengte’ adingin khuapite khempeuh, leh a sakol tung tuangte’ ading khuapite, leh Solomon in Jerusalem, Lebanon sung leh ama ukna gam sung khempeuh ah a lam nop khempeuh zong lam hi.
Israel a hilo Hit mite, Amor mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite, leh Jebus mite sung panin a om lai,
Israel mite in a suksiat nai loh amau nungah a suan leh khak uh tua gam sungah a om laite—Solomon in aana tawh siah a pia dingin bawl a, tua bangin tu ni dongin amaute om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel mite ahih leh Solomon in ama na a sem dingin sal-in bawl lo hi; amaute in galkapte, leh ama nuai-ah uliante, a leengte a ukte, leh a sakol tung tuangte ahi uh hi.
Hihte in Kumpi Solomon’ ulian ukpite hi a, mite tungah aana a zang mihing zanih leh sawmnga ahi uh hi.

Solomon in David khuapi panin Faro’ tanu ama zi paipihin ama adingin a lamsak innah tun’pih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Topa’ thuciamna singkuang a tun’nasa munte siangtho ahih manin Israel kumpi David’ inn sungah ka zi teeng lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

12-13 Tua ciangin sabbath nite, khadet nite, leh kum simin a kinei pawi thum—silngo sawh loh anlum pawi, nipi kal pawi, biakbuk pawite’ adingin Moses’ thupiakna tawh kizui-in ni simin piakna nasep ding a kisam ahih mah bangin innlim mai-a a lam Topa’ biakna tau tungah Solomon in meihal biakna Topa tungah pia hi.

A pa David’ biakna ngeina kip tawh kizui-in, amau’ nasepna dingin siampite a pawlpawlin a kikhennate, leh ni simin nasepna-ah a kisam bangin siampite’ mai-ah Levi mite phatna panmunte leh nasepna, leh kongpi tampite’ adingin kongcingte amau’ pawl kikhenna ciatah amah in seh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua bangin Pasian’ mipa David in thu pia hi.
Thu khatpeuh peuh leh van manpha koihnate tawh kisai-in kumpipa in siampite leh Levi mite a thupiakna bang teekteekin amaute in sem uh hi.
Tua bangin Topa’ inn bulpi a kiphuh ni-a kipan a kizawh dongin Solomon’ nasep khempeuh kimansiang hi. Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ inn kizo hi.
Tua ciangin Edom gam sung tuipi gei-a om Ezion-geber leh Eloth khuate-ah Solomon pai hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi Huram in teembawte leh tuipi a thei a nasemte tawh ama nasemte sawl a, Solomon’ nasemte tawh Ofir-ah pai khawmin tua lai panin kham talen zali leh sawmnga pua-in kumpi Solomon kiang tun’ pih uh hi.

Tu-in Sheba kumpinu in Solomon’ minthan’na a zak ciangin thudotna haksate tawh amah a ze-et dingin Jerusalem ah hong pai a, nungzui honpite leh a namtui nate leh kham tampi leh suangmanphate a pua kalaohte hong keng hi. Solomon kiangah amah hong tun’ ciangin a lungsim-a om khempeuh ama tungah gen hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon in ama dotna khempeuh dawng hi; Solomon in ama tungah a gentel theih loh haksa a sakluat bangmah om lo hi.
Sheba kumpinu in Solomon’ pilna, a ma lamsa inn,
a sabuai-ah a an, a uliante’ omzia, leh a nasemte’ etna zia leh a puansilhte, a anpiate leh a puansilhte, leh Topa’ inn ah a piak a meihal biaknate a muh khit ciangin a lungsim bei hi.
Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka gam sung panin nangma thute leh na pilna ka zak a kigen thute man hi;
ahih hangin kei hong pai-in ka mit in ka muh matengin a kigen thute ka um kei hi; a tak takin, na pilna a liatna alang zong kei kiangah hong kigen lo ahi hi; ka zaksa thute sangin na thupizaw hi.
Na zite mi hampha! Na mai-ah ding tawntungin na pilna a za hih na nasemte mi hampha!

Na tungah lungkimin Topa na Pasian adingin kumpi-in a kumpi tokhom tungah nang hong tusak Topa na Pasian in thupha ngah ta hen! Na Pasian in Israel itin a tawntungin amaute kipsak ding ahih manin, nangmah in thutang leh thuman na sepkhiat theih nadingin amaute tungah kumpi-in nang hong koih hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa tungah kham talen zakhat leh sawmnih, leh a namtui nate tampi tak, leh suangmanphate pia hi. Sheba kumpinu in Kumpi Solomon tungah a piak tua bang a namtui nate zahin a hoih om ngei lo hi.
Tua tham loin Ofir panin kham hong pua kumpi Huram’ nasemte leh Solomon’ nasemte in cingsing leh suangmanphate hong pua uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Topa’ inn leh kumpi inn-a cingsing kahlei ding leh lasate’ adingin laiza lasaknate leh harp lasaknate-in zong bawl hi; tua hun ma-in Judah gam sungah tua bang kimu ngei lo hi.

Tua ciangin kumpinu in amah a puakte a thukna-in letsong a piakte banah, a deih khempeuh, a nget khempeuh, Sheba kumpinu tungah Solomon in pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kihei-in a nasemte tawh ama gamah ciah kik hi.
Tu-in kum khat sungin Solomon tungah a tung kham a gihna in kham talen zaguk leh sawmguk-le-guk hi a,
sumbawlte leh sumbukte’ tutte a kisim lo ahi hi; Abrabia kumpite khempeuh leh gamsung a ukte in Solomon kiangah kham leh ngun puak uh hi.
Kumpi Solomon in kham a kiseek lumpi zanih bawl hi; lum khat ciangin a kiseek kham shekel zaguk bei hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a kiseek kham lum zathum bawl hi; lum khat ciangin kham shekel zathum bei hi; tua ciangin kumpipa in Lebanon tulak kumpi inn sungah tuate koih hi.
Kumpipa in saiha kibawl kumpi tokhom a lian khat zong bawl a, kham citak tawh zut hi.
Kumpi tokhom in cial guk leh kham a kibawl khengakna khat nei-in, tuate kumpi tokhom tawh kimat a, tutna pang tuakah ban ngaknate leh a ban ngaknate pangah humpinelkai nih ding a,
kahlei cial guk mong ciatah khat ciat, humpinelkai sawm-le-nih ding hi. Kumpi gam khatpeuh peuh ah tua tawh a kibang kibawl ngei lo hi.
Kumpi Solomon’ dawnna haite khempeuh kham hi a, Lebanon tulak inn sung um-le-beelte khempeuh kham citak ahi hi; Solomon’ hun lai-in ngun bangmahin kingaihsun lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpi Huram’ nasemte tawh kumpipa’ teembawte, Tarshish ah pai hi; Tarshish teembawte kum thum simin khatvei hong tungin kham, ngun, saiha, zawngmaw, leh zawngpi hong puak zel hi.
Tua bangin kumpi Solomon in hauhna leh pilna tawh leitung kumpi khempeuh khupnelh hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama lungsim sungah a koihsak pilna a za dingin leitung kumpi khempeuh in Solomon’ omna hong zong uh hi.
Amaute khempeuh in a letsong ciat uh, ngun leh kham tawh kibawl nate, puante, mirrah paknamtuite, a namtui nate, sakolte, le la-sakolte, a kum kumin tampi tak hong puak uh hi.
Solomon in sakolte leh leengte adingin buk tulli, leh sakol tuang mi tulsawm leh tulnih nei a, leeng khuapite leh Jerusalem khua ah amah tawh tuate omsak hi.
Amah in Eufrates panin Filistiate gam ciang, leh Izipt gamgi ciang dong kumpi khempeuh uk hi.
Kumpipa in Jerusalem ah suang bangin ngun ol sak a, Shefelah theiba sing bangin taamtaak sing tamsak hi.
Solomon’ adingin Izipt leh gam khempeuh panin sakolte kila hi.

Tu-in Solomon’ gamtatna a om laite, a kipatna pan a tawp dong, kamsang Nathan’ tangthu sung, leh Shiloh khua mi Ahijah’ thugen kholhna sung, leh Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam’ thu tawh kisai-in thu-mupa Iddo’ mangmuhna sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Solomon in Jerusalem panin Israel khempeuh tungah kum sawmli sung uk hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon a pate tawh ihmu a, a pa David khuapi sungah kivui hi; tua ciangin a tapa Rehoboam in ama taangin uk hi.
Amah kumpi a suaksak dingin Israel khempeuh Shekhem ah pai ahih manin Shekhem ah Rehoboam pai hi.
Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam in tua thu a zak ciangin (bang hang hiam cih leh kumpi Solomon kiang panin a taina Izipt ah amah om hi), Izipt panin Jeroboam hong ciahkik hi.
Amaute in mi sawlin amah sam kik uh a, tua ciangin Jeroboam leh Israel khempeuh hong pai-in Rehoboam kiangah,
“Na pa in ka hakkol uh gik sak hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na pa’ nasep haksa leh kote’ tungah a gik ama hakkol zang sak in la, kote in nangma na kong sem ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Nithum sung a hun hong pia un la, tua ciangin hong pai kik un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi Rehoboam in a pa Solomon a nuntak lai-a a mai-ah a ding khangham mite thu kuppih a, “Hih mite ka dawn’ nading ngaihsutna hong bang ci piak na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ama kiangah, “Hih mite tungah nang dik a, amaute lungkimsak in, amaute tungah kam hoih pau lecin, amaute in nangma nasemte hi tawntung ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin khanghamte in a ngaihsutna a piak nusia-in amah tawh a khang khawm, ama mai-ah a ding khangnote thu kuppih hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Kei kiangah, ‘Na pa in kote tungah hong suat hakkol zang sak in,’ hong ci hih mite i dawn’ nading bang ngaihsutna hong pia na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah tawh a khang khawm khangnote in ama kiangah, “Nangma kiangah, ‘Na pa in ka hakkol uh giksak hi; ahih hangin kote’ adingin hong zangsak in,’ hong ci mite kiangah hih bangin gen in, ‘Ka khutmeno in ka pa’ kawng sangin lianzaw hi.

Tu-in ka pa in note tungah hakkol gik hong koihna ah keimah in na hakkol uh ka behlap ding hi. Ka pa in ciang tawh note hong thuhilh hi; ahih hangin keimah in ciang ling nei tawh note kong thuhilh ding hi,’ ci in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in, “Kei kiangah ni thum ni-in hong pai kik un,” a cih mah bangin Jeroboam leh mi khempeuh a ni thum ni-in Rehoboam’ kiangah hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in amaute ngawh dawnin khangham mite’ ngaihsut piakna nusia a,

“Ka pa in na hakkol uh giksak hi; ahih hangin keimah in ka behlap ding hi; ka pa in ciang tawh note hong thuhilh hi; ahih hangin keimah in ciang ling nei tawh note kong thuhilh ding hi,” ci-in khangnote’ ngaihsut piakna bangin kumpi Rehoboam in amaute kiangah gen hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in mite’ thu ngai lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Shiloh khuami Ahijah tung tawnin Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam tungah a thugente Topa in a tun’sak theih nadingin Pasian a pian’sak thu kiheina ahi hi.

Kumpipa in amaute’ thu a ngaih lohna Israel khempeuh in a muh uh ciangin, mite in kumpipa dawngin, “David’ sungah kote in bang ngah nei ka hi uh hiam? Jessi’ tapa’ sungah gamluah ka nei kei uh hi. Israelte aw, na inn ciat uhah ciah un, Rehoboam in ama ading vaihawm tawm hen,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel khempeuh a inn ciat uhah kihem uh hi.
Ahih hangin Judah khuapite ah a teeng Israel mite tungah Rehoboam in uk hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi Rehoboam in aana tawh na kisemsakte a uk nasep ukpa Hadoram Israelte kiangah sawl a, Israel mite in suang tawh amah na denglum uh hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah a tai dingin kumpi Rehoboam a leeng tungah tuang dingin nawhtat hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin Israel in David innkuan lehdo hi.

Jerusalem ah Rehoboam hong tun’ ciangin a kumpi gam a ngah kik nadingin Israelte a do dingin amah in Judah minam leh Benjamin minam a kitengkhia galhang mihing tul zakhat leh tul sawmgiat kaikhawm hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mi Shemaiah tungah Topa’ thu hong tung hi:
“Judah kumpi Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam leh Judah leh Benjamin sunga om Israel khempeuh tungah gen in,

‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Note na kuanto kei ding uh a, na mipihte uh na do kei ding uh hi. Mi khempeuh na inn uhah ciahkik un; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu in keima kiang pan ahi hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Topa’ thu ngai-in ciahkik uh a, Jeroboam a do dingin kuan lo uh hi.
Jerusalem ah Rehoboam teeng a, kihut nadingin Judah gam sungah khuapite lam hi.
Amah in Bethlehem, Etam, Tekoa,
Bethzur, Soko, Adullam,
Gath, Mareshah, Zif,
Adoriam, Lakhish, Azekah,
Zorah, Aijalon, leh Hebron, Judah leh Benjamin gam sunga om kulh a nei khuapite lam hi.
Amah in mun muanhuaite a muanhuai-in bawlin, tuate sungah a ukte, leh an, sathau, leh leenggahzu koih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in khuapi khempeuh ah lum leh tei koih a, a muanhuai mahmahin bawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin Judah gam leh Benjamin ama aa suak hi.
Tua ciangin Israel tungah a om siampite leh Levi mite khempeuh in amau’ teenna mun khempeuh panin amah beel uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Jeroboam leh a tapate in Topa’ siampi a sepna panun amaute hawlkhia-in, mual dawn a, biakpiakna munte, dawi gilote, leh ama bawlsa bawngno milimte’ adingin ama siampi tuam teel ahih manin Levi mite in amau’ taang gam leh amau’ neihsate nusia-in Judah leh Jerusalem ah hong pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel’ Topa Pasian zon’ ding a lungsim uhah a khentat khin mite in amau’ pute pate Pasian, Topa tungah biakna pia dingin Israel minam khempeuh sung panin amau’ nung zui-in Jerusalem ah hong pai uh hi.

Amaute in Judah kumpi gam thakhauh sak uh a, amaute in Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam lungmuangin kum thum sung koih uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kum thum sung David leh Solomon’ thu zui-in amaute gamta uh hi.
Rehoboam in Mahalath teenpih hi, Mahalath’ pa in David’ tapa Jerimoth hi a, a nu-in Jessi’ tapa Eliab’ tanu Abihail ahi hi.
Tua nu in amah tawh tapate, Jeush, Shemariah, leh Zaham nei hi.
Tua nu’ khit ciangin amah in Absalom’ tanu Ma-akah la a, amah tawh Abijah, Attai, Ziza, leh Shelomith nei hi.
Rehoboam in a zi dangte leh a zineute khempeuh sang Absalom’ tanu Ma-akah itzaw hi (amah in zi sawm-le-giat leh zineu sawmguk la a, tapa sawmnih-le-giat leh tanu sawmguk nei hi);
tua ciangin Rehoboam in Ma-akah’ tapa Abijah, a sanggamte lakah ulian penin seh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpi-in amah koih sawm hi.
Amah pil gamtat a, Judah leh Benjamin gam sung, kulh nei khuapite khempeuh ah a tapa pawlkhat khen hi; amah in amaute tungah na tampi pia a, amaute’ adingin zi zon’sak hi.
Rehoboam’ ukna kipin a thahat ciangin, amah leh amah tawh a om Israel khempeuh in Topa’ thukham nusia uh hi.

2-3 Topa’ tungah amaute citak lo uh ahih manin Rehoboam’ kum ngana kumin Jerusalem a sim dingin Izipt kumpipa Shishak, leeng galkap tul-le-za-nih leh sakol tung tuang galkap tulsawm leh tulguk tawh hong kuanto hi. Izipt panin amah tawh hong kuan mite—Libia mi, Sukki-im mi, leh Ethiopia mi hi a, a tamna sim zawh hi lo hi.
Amah in kulhnei khuapite la-in Jerusalem ciang dong hong tung hi.

Tua ciangin Shishak’ huhau-in Jerusalem ah a kikhawm Rehoboam leh Judah uliante kiangah kamsang Shemaiah hong pai-in amaute kiangah, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Note in kei nong nusia uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Shishak’ khut sungah note kong pia khin hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel uliante leh kumpipa kiniamkhiatin “Topa thuman hi,” a ci uh hi.

Amaute a kiniamkhiatna thu Topa in a muh ciangin Shemaiah tungah Topa’ thu hong tung hi: “Amaute kiniamkhiat ahih manin ka susia kei ding hi; amaute ka suaktasak liai-liai tei ding a, Shishak’ khut tawh Jerusalem tungah ka hehna ka tungsak kei ding hi.
Ahi zongin amaute in keima nasepna leh gam sung kumpite’ nasepna a theih nadingun amaute in ama nasemte suak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem a simin Izipt kumpipa Shishak hong kuanto hi; amah in Topa’ inn-a vanmanphate leh kumpipa’ inn-a vanmanphate lakhia hi; amah in na khempeuh la khia hi. Amah in Solomon’ bawlsa kham lumte zong lakhia hi;
tua ciangin kumpi Rehoboam in tuate’ taangin sumngo lum bawl a, kumpipa’ kongcing ahi inncing a ukte’ khut sungah tuate ap hi.
Topa’ innah kumpipa a pai simin a cingte hong pai-in tuate keng uh a, tua ciangin cin’na inndei sungah tuate koih kik uh hi.
Amah in a kiniamkhiat ciangin siat cimitna a pian’ loh nadingin ama tung panin Topa’ hehna kiheikhia hi; tua tham loin Judah gam sungah thu-paizia zong hoihsak hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpi Rehoboam amahmah Jerusalem ah kikipsakin uk hi. Rehoboam in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmli-le-khat pha a, Israel minam khempeuh sung panin a min koih nadingin Topa in a teelkhiat khuapi Jerusalem ah amah in kum sawm-le-sagih sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Naamah hi a, Ammon mi ahi hi.
Amah in Topa zon’ ding a lungsim ah koih lo ahih manin a sia gamta hi.
Tu-in Rehoboam gamtatnate, a kipatna pan a tawpna dong, kamsang Shemaiah leh thu-mupa Iddo’ khang tangthu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam? Rehoboam leh Jeroboam kikalah gal kidona om tawntung hi.
Tua ciangin Rehoboam a pate tawh ihmu a, David khuapi sungah kivui hi; tua ciangin a tapa Abijah in ama taangin uk hi.
Kumpi Jeroboam’ uk kum sawm-le-giatna kumin Abijah in Judah tungah uk ding kipan hi.
Amah in Jerusalem ah kumthum sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Mikaiah hi a, Gibeah khuami Uriel’ tanu ahi hi. Tu-in Abijah leh Jeroboam kikalah gal kidona om hi.
Gal sim dingin Abijah kuankhia a, a kitengkhia mi tul zali a pha, a thahat galhang galkap hon nei hi; tua ciangin Jeroboam in amah do dingin a kitengkhia galhang tul zagiat tawh pang hi.
Tua ciangin Efraim mualtung gamah a om Zemaraim Mual tungah Abijah ding to-in, “Jeroboam leh Israel khempeuh aw, ka thu ngai un!
Israel Topa Pasian in David leh a suante tungah Israel kumpi hih nading thu thuciamna kip tawh a piakna na theih ding uh kilawm hilo ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin David’ tapa Solomon’ nasempa, Nebat’ tapa Jeroboam kipanin a topa lehdo hi.
Rehoboam khangno lai a, thu khentat thei nai loin, amaute a nial zawh nai loh hun lai takin mi gina lo honkhat Solomon’ tapa Rehoboam’ kiimah kikhawmin amah dem uh hi.
“Note mi tampi na hihna uh leh note’ pasian dingin Jeroboam in hong bawlsak kham bawngnote note tawh a om manin, David’ suante’ khut sung panin Topa’ kumpi gam do ding tu-in na ngaihsun uh hi.

Note in Aaron’ suan, Topa’ siampite, leh Levi mite hawlkhia-in, gamdang mite bangin note’ adingin siampite bawl khin hilo na hi uh hiam? Bawngtalno khat tawh ahi a, tuutal sagih tawh ahi zongin a ki-ap dingin a hong pai peuhpeuh, pasian a hilote’ siampi suak pahpah hi.
Ahih hangin kote ahih leh, Topa ka Pasian uh hi a, amah ka nusia kei uh hi. Topa’ na a sem, Aaron’ suan ahi siampite leh amau’ nasepna ah a huh dingin Levi mite ka nei uh hi.

Amaute in Topa’ tungah zing leh nitak simin meihal biaknate leh a namtui nate ahi paknamtui pia a, kham citak sabuai tungah Ompihna Anlum koihin, nitak simin a meivakte a kuan’ nadingin kham meivakkhuamte don uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kote in Topa ka Pasian uh hong sawlnate ka zui uh a, ahih hangin note in amah na nusia uh hi.

En un, kote’ lutang-in kote tawh Pasian hong omkhawm a, note a do ding sapna peengkul a tum dingin a siampite a galkap peengkulte tawh hong om uh hi. Israel’ mite aw, na pu na pate uh Pasian, Topa do kei un; bang hang hiam na cih uh leh na tangtung kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A nunglam panin amaute ahih dingin a pangsim ding pawlkhat Jeroboam in kualpai sak hi; tua ahih ciangin Judah mite’ mai-ah ama galkapte om a, a pangsimte amau’ nungah om hi.
Judah mite a khuadak ciangin, en in, amau’ mai leh a nung uhah gal om hi; tua ciangin Topa’ tungah amaute kiko uh a, siampite in a peengkulte uh tum uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite in a galdona aw kiko uh hi. Judah mite a kiko uh ciangin Abijah leh Judah mite’ mai-ah Pasian in Jeroboam leh Israel khempeuh zo hi.
Judah mite’ mai-ah Israel mite tai uh a, Pasian in amau’ khut sungah amaute pia hi.
Abijah leh a mite in amaute tampi tak that uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Israel mi a kitengkhia mihing tul zanga a kithatin tuk hi.
Judah mite in a pu a pate uh Pasian, Topa suang uh ahih manin gualzo uh a, tua hunin Israel mite kizo hi.
Tua ciangin Abijah in Jeroboam delh a, ama tung panin khuapite, Beth-el a khuaneute tawh, Jeshanah a khuaneute tawh, leh Efron a khuaneute tawh la hi.
Jeroboam in Abijah hun sungin ama vangliatna ngahkik lo hi; tua ciangin Topa in amah vat a, amah si hi.
Ahih hangin Abijah a thahatna khang hi. Amah in zi sawm-le-li la a, tapa sawnih-le-nih leh tanu sawm-le-guk nei hi.
Abijah’ gamtatna a om laite, ama ziate leh ama thugente, kamsang Iddo’ tangthu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Abijah a pate tawh ihmu a, amaute in David khuapi sungah amah vui uh hi; tua ciangin ama tangin a tapa Asa in uk hi. Ama hun sungin tua gamah kum sawm sung gal dai hi.
Tua ciangin Asa in ama Pasian, Topa’ mit-ah a hoih leh a man na sem hi.
Amah in gamdang biaknataute leh mual dawn-a biakpiakna munte la khia-in, khuampite supai-in Asherah milimte phuk a,
amau’ pute pate’ Pasian, Topa zongin thukham leh thupiaknate a zuih nadingun Judah mite thu pia hi.
Amah in Judah khuapi khempeuh panin mual dawn a, biakpiakna munte leh paknamtui biaknataute zong la khia hi. Tua ciangin ama nuai-ah kumpi gam sung gal dai hi.
Tua gamah gal dai ahih manin Judah sungah kulh a nei khuapite lam hi. Topa in ama tungah kilemna pia ahih manin tua kum sungin amah in galdona nei lo hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Judah mite kiangah, “Hih khuapite lamin kulhpite leh tausangte, kulhkongpite leh zawlte tawh um ni; eite in Topa i Pasian zong i hih manin leitang in eima’ aa hi lai hi; eite in amah i zong a, amah in i kiim khempeuh panin kilemna hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in khuapi lam uh a, mavang uh hi.

Asa in Judah mite sung panin lumgol leh teipi a tawi galkap tul zathum, leh Benjamin mite lumneu pua-in thal a keek tul zanih leh tul sawmgiat nei hi; hih mite khempeuh in a thahat galhang mite ahi uh hi.
Amaute a sim dingin Ethiopia mi Zerah, galkap awn khat leh leeng galkap zathum tawh hong kuan khia a, Mareshah ciang dong hong tung hi.
Tua ciangin amah a dawntuah dingin Asa kuankhia a, Zefathah leh Mareshah kuamah galdo nading pan’na bawl uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ Pasian tungah Asa kiko a, “Topa aw, a thahat leh a zawngkhal kikalah a huh dingin nang tawh a kibang kuamah om lo hi. Kote hong huh in, Topa kote’ Pasian aw, bang hang hiam cih leh nang kong suang uh a, nangma minin hih mihonpi do dingin kong pai uh hi. Topa aw, nangmah in kote’ Pasian na hi hi; mite kizosak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Asa leh Judah mite mai-ah Ethiopia mite zo a, tua ciangin Ethiopia mite tai uh hi.

Asa, leh amah tawh a om mite in Gerar ciang dong amaute delh uh a, a hing kuamah a om nawn loh dongin Ethiopia mite puk uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa leh ama galkapte mai-ah amaute kisusia hi. Judah mite in van kinusia tampi tak puakhia uh hi.
Topa kikihtakna amaute tungah om ahih manin amaute in Gerar kiim a, khuapi khempeuh vat uh hi. Amaute in khuapi khempeuh luh uh a, tuate sungah van kisutte tam mahmah hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in gan omna puanbukte vat uh a, tuu leh keel tampi leh kalaohte puakhia uh hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah ciahkik uh hi.
Oded’ tapa Azariah tungah Pasian’ Kha hong tung a,

tua ciangin Asa dawntuah dingin amah pai-in ama kiangah, “Ka thu ngai un, Asa leh Judah mite leh Benjaminte aw: Note in amah tawh na om lai teng uh Topa in note tawh om hi. Amah na zon’ uh leh amah na mu ding uh a, ahih hangin amah na nusiat uh leh amah in note hong nusia ding hi.
Hun saupi sung Israel in Pasian man tawh om lo, thu a hilh siampi tawh om lo, thukham tawh om lo hi;
ahih hangin a lungkham uh ciangin Israel Pasian, Topa’ lamah kihei uh a, amah zongin amaute in amah mu uh hi.
Tua hun lai-in mite’ nasemin a zinsuk a zintohna uhah lungmuanna om lo hi; gam khempeuh ah buaina om hi.
Pasian in lungkhamna nam khempeuh tawh buaisak ahih manin minam khat leh minam khat, khuapi khat leh khuapi khat kido-in amaute kitamkham uh hi.
Ahih hangin nang, hang in! Na sepna thaman hong kipia ding ahih manin na khut zawsak kei in,” a ci hi.

Asa in Oded’ tapa Azariah’ thugenkholh, hih thute a zak ciangin amah hong hangin, Judah gam khempeuh leh Benjamin leh Efraim mualtung gam panin a laksa khuapite panin a kihhuai milimte lakhia a, Topa’ innlim mai-a om Topa’ biaknatau puah hi.

Tua ciangin amah in ‘Judah leh Benjamin mi khempeuh, leh Efraim, Manasseh, leh Simeon sung panin amaute kiangah a peemte khawm hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa a Pasian amah tawh a omna thu amaute in a muh uh ciangin Israelte kiang panin mi tampi tak ama kiangah tai uh hi.
Asa’ uk kum sawm-le-ngana a kha thumna sungin Jerusalem ah amaute kikhawm uh hi.
Tua ni-in amaute in gal sung panin a ciahpih uh nate sung panin bawngtal za sagih leh tuu tul sagih tawh Topa tungah biakna pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin a lungsim khempeuh uh leh a nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh a pu a pate uh’ Pasian, Topa a zon’ nading uh,
leh Pasian, Topa a zong lo peuhmah, a moi ahi a, a ham ahi a, numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin a kithah nading uh thuciamna khat bawl uh hi.
Amaute in awging pha, leh otna, leh peengkulte, leh sakite tawh Topa’ tungah kiciamna bawl uh hi.

Tua ciangin Judah mi khempeuh tua kiciamna ah lungdam uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh kiciamin deihna taktak tawh amah zong a, tua ciangin amaute in amah mu uh a, Topa in a kiim uhah amaute gal daihna pia hi.
Ama nu Ma-akah in Asherah milim dingin a kihhuai milim khat a bawlna hangin kumpipa’ nu hihna za panin kumpi Asa in a nu lakhia hi. Asa in a nu’ milim phuksakin satnen a, Kidron lui-ah hal hi.
Ahih hangin Israel gam sung panin mualdawn a, biak piaknate kila khia lo hi. Ahi zongin ama hun sung tawntung Asa’ lungsim paubaang lo hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a pa’ apsa letsongte leh ama apsa letsongte, ngun, leh kham, leh nazatte, Topa’ innah paipih hi.
Asa’ uk kum sawmthum-le-nga ciang dong gal kidona om nawn lo hi.

Asa’ uk kum sawmthum-le-gukna kumin Judah do-in Israel kumpipa Baasha paito a, Judah kumpipa Asa kiang pan kuamah a paikhiat theih loh nading leh ama kiangah kuamah a pai theih loh nadingin Ramah khua phut hi.
Tua ciangin Asa in Topa’ inn leh kumpipa’ inn-a van manpha koihnate panin ngun leh kham la-in, Damaskas-ah a teeng Siria kumpipa Benhadad kiangah tuate puakin,

“Ka pa leh na pa a kipawl mah bangin kei leh nang i kipawl hi; en in, ngun, leh kham kong puak hi; kei kiang panin amah a nungkik theih nadingin pai in la, Israel kumpipa Baasha tawh na kipawlna va sutat in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Benhadad in kumpi Asa’ thu ngai-in Israel khuapite a do dingin a galkap ukte sawl a, amaute in Ijon, Dan, Abelmaim, leh Naftali vankoihna khuapite zo uh hi.
Baasha in tua thu a zak ciangin Ramah khua a lam khawl a, a nasep tawpsak hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi Asa in Judah mi khempeuh khawmin thu pia a, Baasha in inn lamna a, a zat Ramah suang leh a singte amaute in puakhia a, tuate tawh Geba leh Mizpah lam uh hi.

Tua hun lai takin Judah kumpi Asa kiangah thu-mupa Hanani hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Nangmah in Siria kumpipa suangin, Topa na Pasian suang lo na hih manin, Siria kumpipa’ galkapte in nang hong suaktasak hi.
Ethiopia mite leh Libia mite in leeng tampi tak leh sakol tung tuang tampi tak tawh a om galkap tampi hilo ahi hiam? Ahi zongin Topa suang na hih manin, amah in na khut sungah amaute hong pia hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ama lamah a lungsim a paubang lo mite’ tangin ama vangliatna a lak dingin Topa’ mit in leitung khempeuh en kawikawi hi. Hih thu-ah na hai gamtat khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tu-a kipanin galdonate na nei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin thu-mupa tungah Asa heh a, amah kol bulhin thong sungah koih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu hangin ama tungah nakpi takin heh hi. Tua hun mahin Asa in mi pawl khat zong gitlohna tawh gimsak hi.
Asa’ gamtatnate, a patna pan a tawpna dong, Judah leh Israel Kumpite’ Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Ama uk a kum sawmthum-le-kuana kumin Asa in a khe-ah natna nei-a, a natna nasia mahmah hi; ahi zongin ama nat hun nangawn ah amah in Topa zong lo a, zato siamte’ huhna zong hi.
Tua ciangin Asa a pate tawh ihmu a, ama uk a kum sawmli-le-khatna kumin si hi.

David khuapi sungah amahmah in a khuak han sungah amaute in vui uh hi. Paknamtui bawl siamte in a bawl a namtui a nam tuamtuamte tawh a kidim hankuang sungah amah sial uh hi; tua ciangin amah zahtakna-in amaute in meiphual lian mahmah khat cih uh hi.
Tua ciangin a tapa Jehoshafat in ama taangin uk a, Israel lang pangin amahmah kithakhauhsak hi.
Amah in Judah khuapi kulhneite khempeuh ah galkapte koih a, Judah gam sung, leh a pa Asa in a laksa Efraim khuapite sungah khuacingte koih hi.
Amah in a pa’ gamtat nasate zui ahih manin Jehoshafat tawh Topa om hi; amah in Baalte bia lo hi;
Israelte’ gamtat bang hi loin, ama pa’ Pasian zongin ama thupiakna zui hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in ama khut sungah kumpi gam kipsak hi; tua ciangin Judah mi khempeuh in Jehoshafat tungah siah puak uh hi; amah in a lian hauhna leh minthan’na nei hi.
Topa’ lampite ah ama lungsim hang hi; tua ciangin amah in Judah gam sung panin mual dawn-a biak piaknate leh Asherah milimte lakhia lai hi.
Ama uk kum thumna kumin ama uliante, Benhail, Obadiah, Zekhariah, Nethanel, leh Mikaiah, Judah khuapite ah thuhilh dingin sawl hi;
amaute tawh Levi mi, Shemaiah, Nethaniah, Zebadiah, Ashel, Shemirahmoth, Jehonathan, Adonijah, Tobijah, leh Tabodonijah sawl hi; tua ciangin hih Levi mite tawh, siampi Elishama, leh Jehoram sawl hi.
Amaute in Topa’ thukham laibu kengin Judah sungah hilh uh hi; Judah khuapi khempeuh ah amaute pai kawikawi-in mite lakah hilh uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam kimkotah a om khuapi gam khempeuh tungah Topa kihtakna om a, amaute in Jehoshafat do ngam nawn lo uh hi.

Filistiate pawlkhat in Jehoshafat tungah letsongte leh siah dingin ngun puak uh hi; tua ciangin Arabte in zong ama tungah ganhon tuutal tul sagih leh za sagih, leh keeltal tul sagih leh za sagih puak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat hong lianzaw semsem hi. Amah in Judah gam sungah mun muanhuaite leh vankoihna khuapite lam a,
amah in Judah khuapite sungah van tampi nei hi. Amah in a thahat galhang galkapte Jerusalem ah nei hi.
A beh ciat uh tawh kizui-in amaute a phazah in: Judah sung pan a tul-a a ukte: Adnah in a ukpa hi a, a thahat galhang mi tul zathum tawh ahi hi.
Ama zomah a ukpa in Jehohanan hi a, mi tul zanih leh tul sawmgiat tawh ahi hi.
Ama zom-ah Topa’ nasep nadingin a kipia Zikri’ tapa Amasiah hi a, a thahat galhang mi tul zanih tawh ahi hi.
Benjamin sung panin: A thahat a galhang Eliada, thal leh lum a tawi mi tul zanih tawh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin ama zomah Jehozabad hi a, galdo dingin hiam a tawi mi tul zakhat leh tul sawmgiat tawh ahi hi.
Hihte in, kumpipa in Judah gam sung khempeuh a, kulhnei khuapite ah a koihte banah kumpipa’ na a semte ahi hi.
Tu-in Jehoshafat in hauhna leh minthan’na lianpi nei hi; amah in Ahab tawh numei-a kizopna bawl hi.

Kum tawmkhat khit ciangin Samaria-a Ahab kiangah amah paisuk hi. Tua ciangin Ahab in amah leh amah tawh a hong pai mite’ adingin tuu tampi leh bawngtal tampi go a, Ramothgilead sim dingin amah zol hi.

Israel kumpipa Ahab in Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat kiangah, “Ramothgilead-ah kei tawh nong kuan ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Keimah in nangmah bang ka hi a, ka mite in nangma mite mah bang ahi hi. Kote in galdona ah nang tawh kong kuan ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in Israel kumpipa kiangah, “Topa thu dong masa in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in kamsangte mihing zali khawmin amaute kiangah, “Ramothgilead sim dingin kuanto ding i hi hiam, tua ahih kei leh thuak ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kuanto in; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jehoshafat in, “Eite in i dot theih ding Topa’ kamsang a dang hih lai-ah om lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Eite in Topa’ thu i dot theih nading Imlah’ tapa Mikaiah kici mi khat om lai hi; ahih hangin amah in kei tawh kisai a hoih thu genkhol ngei loin a sia bekbek gen tawntung ahih manin amah ka mudah hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in, “Tua bangin kumpipa in ci kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in ulian khat samin, “Imlah’ tapa Mikaiah manlang takin hong paipih in,” a ci hi.

Tu-in Israel kumpipa leh Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat a kumpi tokhom tung uhah tu-in a puantualpi uh tawh kizem uh hi; Samaria kulh kongpi lutna munah amaute tu uh hi; amaute’ mai-ah kamsangte khempeuh in thu genkhol uh hi.
Tua ciangin Khena-anah’ tapa Zedekiah in sik kite bawl tawmin, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Amaute a siat matengin hihte tawh Siria mite na nawt ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kamsang khempeuh in zong tua mah bangin genkhol uh a, “Ramothgilead-ah kuanto in la, gual zo in; Topa in kumpipa’ khut sungah hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Mikaiah a sam dingin a pai kamtaipa in ama kiangah, “En in, thu kikhatin kamsangte’ thu gen pen kumpipa’ adingin a hoihlam ding ahi hi; amaute’ gen bangin gen in la, a hoih lamin gen in,” a ci hi.
