Ahih hangin Mikaiah in, “Topa in a nungta ahih mah bangin, ka Pasian’ gen thu ka gen ding hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa kiangah amah hong tun’ ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Mikaiah aw, Ramothgilead-ah galdo dingin kuan ding i hi hiam, tua ahih kei leh thuak ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Kuanto in la, gual zo in; na khut sungah amaute hong kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Topa’ min tawh thudang gen loin thuman bek kei tungah nong gen nading bang zah vei hong thuhilh ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “A cing nei lo tuu bangin mualte tungah Israel mi khempeuh a kithehthang ka mu hi; tua ciangin Topa in, ‘Hihte in to nei lo hi; nuam takin a inn ciat uhah ciahsak un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Amah in kei tawh kisai a hoih genkhol loin a sia bek gen ding hi, ci-in nang kiangah hong gen hilo ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ thugen za in: Topa a kumpi tokhom tungah tu a, a taklam leh a veilam ah vantung mihon khempeuh a ding ka mu hi;
tua ciangin Topa in, ‘Israel kumpipa Ahab kuanto-in Ramothgilead-ah a puk nadingin kua in amah zol ding ahi hiam?’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin khat in thu khat gen a, adang khat in thudang khat gen hi.
Tua ciangin Kha khat hong madawkin, Topa mai-ah ding a, ‘Keimah in amah ka va zol ding hi,’ ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in ama kiangah, ‘Bang lam tawh zol ding na hi hiam?’ a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Keimah pai khia-in ama kamsangte khempeuh’ kam sungah zuau thei Kha khat ka va hi ding hi,’ a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Nangmah in amah na va zol ding a, na zo ding hi; pai khia in la, tua bangin hih in,’ a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin en in, Topa in hih na kamsangte’ kam sungah zuau thu thei Kha khat koih khin hi; Topa in nang tawh kisai-in siatna gen khin zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Khen-anah’ tapa Zedekiah a nai-ah hong pai-in Mikaiah a paang bengin, “Cik hun akipanin Topa’ Kha in kei hong nusia-in, nang tungah thu hong gen ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “En in, nangmah a bu dingin inndei sungnung ah na pai ni ciangin na thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in, “Mikaiah man un la, khuapi ukpa Amon leh kumpipa’ tapa Joash kiangah paipih kik un;
tua ciangin, ‘Hih bangin kumpipa in ci hi; Hih mipa thong sungah koih un la, lungnuam takin kong ciahkik mateng an leh tui tawmno bek tawh vaak un, ci hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, “Lungnuam takin nong ciahkik leh, kei tung tawnin Topa in thu a gen lo ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Mi khempeuh aw, tu-a ka thugen za un!” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Isreal kumpipa leh Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat Ramothgilead-ah kuan to uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Keimah meel kiseelin gal sungah kong kuan ding a, ahih hangin nangmah in na puantualpite nong silh ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa a meel kiseel hi; amaute gal sungah kuan uh hi.
Tu-in Siria kumpipa in a leeng a ukte thu pia khin a, “A neu tawh ahi a, a lian tawh ahi zongin kido loin, Israel kumpipa bek tawh na kido ding uh hi,” ci hi.

Leeng galkap a ukte in Jehoshafat a muh uh ciangin, “Israel kumpipa hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah do dingin amaute kihei uh hi; tua ciangin Jehoshafat kikokhia a, Topa in amah huh hi. Pasian in ama kiang panin amaute kaikhia hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh Israel kumpipa ahih lohna leeng galkap a ukte in a theih uh ciangin amah a delhna panin kilehhei kik uh hi.

Ahih hangin mi khat in a thal mawk lot a, Israel kumpipa a galdal thep leh a awmdal kikal kha hi; tua ahih ciangin amah in a leeng hawlpa kiangah, “Kei liam ka hih manin kileh in la, galphual panin hong puakhia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ni-in galkidona nasia mahmah a, nitak dong Siria mite mai ngatin a leeng sungah Israel kumpipa kingam hi; tua hi a, nitum laitakin amah si hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat lungmuang takin Jerusalem a, ama innah ciahkik hi.

Ahih hangin amah dawn dingin thu-mupa Hanani’ tapa Jehu hong paikhia a, Kumpi Jehoshafat kiangah, “Migilote huhin Topa a mudahte it ding na hi hiam? Hih thu hangin Topa’ hehna nang tungah hong tung zo hi.
Ahi zongin nang na hoihna khat om hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in gam sung panin Asherah milimte susia-in Pasian zon’ ding na lungsimah na ngaihsun hi,” a ci hi.
Jerusalem ah Jehoshafat teeng hi; tua ciangin Be-ersheba panin Efraim mual tung gam ciang dong mite lakah zin kawikawi a, amau’ pute pate’ Pasian, Topa kiangah amaute tun’pih kik hi.
Amah in gam sunga Judah khuapi kulhnei khempeuh a khuapi a khuapi-ah thukhen dingte seh a,
thukhente tungah, “Note in mi ading hi loin Topa’ adingin a khen na hih manun na hih dingte uh ngaihsun un; thukhenna na piaknate uhah amah in note tawh hong om hi.
Tu-in note in Topa zahtak un la, na hihnate uhah kingaihsun un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa i Pasian in thuman hei khiatna, mi deidanna, leh sumgolh laknate deih lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua tham loin, Topa adingin thukhenna a pia ding leh thu neite a khensak dingin Levi mite leh siampite leh Israel mi beh lutangte pawlkhat, Jehoshafat in Jerusalem ah seh hi. Amaute in Jerusalem ah a phual ding uh nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in amaute thuhilh a: “Hih bangin Topa zahtakna, cihtakna, leh na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh na hih ding uh hi:

a khuapi uhah a teeng na sanggamte uh tung panin mi kithahna thu, thukham ahih kei leh thupiakna, upadi ahih kei leh biakna ngeina kipte tawh kisai-in thu khatpeuh peuh no tungah hong tun’ ciangin, amaute in Topa’ mai-ah mawhna a pian’sak loh nading leh note leh na sanggamte uh tungah hehna hong tun’ loh nadingin amaute na hilh ding uh hi. Tua bangin na gamta ding uh a, mawhna na piangsak kei ding uh hi.

En un, Topa’ thu tawh kisai thute khempeuh ah siampi lian Amariah in no tungah om hi, tua ciangin kumpipa tawh kisai thute khempeuh ah Judah mite a ukpa Ishmael’ tapa Zebadiah om hi; tua ciang Levi mite in note tungah ulian na hong sem ding uh hi. Hang takin gamta un, thumante tawh Topa hong om ta hen!” a ci hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin Moab mite leh Amon mite, leh Meunim mite pawlkhat in Jehoshafat a sim dingin hong kuan uh hi.
Mi pawlkhat hong pai-in Jehoshafat kiangah, “Tuipi gal khat Edom, panin mihon tampi khat nangmah sim dingin hong kuan hi; en in, amaute Hazazontamar (En-gedi a kici) ah om uh hi,” ci-in gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat lau a, amahmah in Topa’ lamlah nading zong a, Judah gam khempeuh ah antan’ ding thu zasak hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ tung pan huhna zong dingin Judah mite hong kikhawm hi; Judah khuapi khempeuh panin Topa thu dong dingin amaute hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ inn sung, inntual thak mai, Judah leh Jerusalemte’ kikhopna sungah Jehoshafat ding a,

“Topa, ka pu ka pate uh Pasian aw, nang vantungah Pasian hilo na hi hiam? Minamte’ kumpigam khempeuh tungah nang in uk hilo na hi hiam? Na khut sungah vangliatna leh thahatna om a, kuamah in nang hong nang zo lo hi.
Kote’ Pasian aw, hih gamah a teeng mite na mi Israelte’ mai-ah hawlkhia-in, na lawmpa Abraham’ suan leh khakte tungah a tawntung dingin pia hilo na hi hiam?
Amaute hih gamah teengin nangma min dingin hih lai-ah biakinn khat lam uh a,

Eite tungah siatna, namsau, thukhenna, ahih kei leh natna, ahih kei leh, kialpi hong tun’ leh, hih inn sungah ama min om ahih manin hih inn mai-ah ding-in i gimna hunah ama tungah i kiko ding a, amah in hong za-in hong hon ding hi,’ ci uh hi.
Tu-in en in, Izipt gam panin Israelte hong paikhiat lai-in na simsak loh, amaute in pelhin a suksiat loh uh Ammon mite leh Moab mite leh Seir Mual gam mite—
en in, ka luah dingun kote tungah nong piaksa nangma neihsa panin kote hawlkhia dingin hong paina tawh amaute in kote hong lehthuk zawsop uh hi.

Kote’ Pasian aw, amaute’ tungah thu khen lo ding na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh kote do dingin a hong pai hih mihon tampite a do dingin thahatna ka nei kei uh hi. Ka cih nading uh ka thei kei uh a, nangmah bek kong mitsuan uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin Topa mai-ah Judah mi khempeuh a taneute, a zite, leh a naupangte uh tawh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin a kikhawmte lak, Levi mite Asaf suante sung pan Mattaniah, a tapa Jeiel, a tapa Benaiah, a tapa Zekhariah, a tapa Jahaziel tungah Topa’ Kha hong tung hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Judah gam khempeuh leh Jerusalem a, teeng khempeuh leh kumpi Jehoshafat aw, ngai un: Topa in hih bangin note tungah hong gen hi, ‘Kihta kei un la, hih a tam mi honpi hangin lungkia kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh galdona in note’ aa hi loin Pasian aa ahi hi.
Zing ciangin amaute do-in paisuk un; en un, Ziz kahtohna lampi tawnin amaute hong kuanto ding uh hi; Jeruel gamlak nisuahna lam kuam mongah amaute na mu ding uh hi.

Note in hih kidona-ah na do ding uh kisam lo hi; Judah gam mite leh Jerusalem khua mite aw, na panmun uh la-in taang loin ding un la, note taangin Topa’ gualzawhna mu un,’ ci hi. Kihta kei un la, lungkia kei un; zing ciangin amaute do-in pai un, Topa in note tawh hong om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoshafat in a maitang lei lam ngatin kun a, tua ciangin Judah gam leh Jerusalem-a teeng mite khempeuh in zong Topa’ mai-ah pukin Topa bia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kohath mite, Korah mite sung pan Levi mite awging pha mahmah tawh Israel Pasian, Topa a phat dingin dingto uh hi.

Tua ciangin zingsangin amaute tho baihin Tekoa gamlakah paikhia uh hi; amaute a paikhiat lai takin Jehoshafat ding-in, “Judah leh Jerusalem a, teengte aw, ka thugen za un! Topa na Pasian uh um un, tua hi leh note na kip ding uh hi; ama kamsangte um un, tua hi leh na mavang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in mite tawh thu a kikup khit ciangin, galkapte mai-ah amaute a pai kawmin, “ Topa tungah lungdamna ko un, bang hang hiam cih leh ama itna kip tawntung hi,” ci-in biakna puan silhin Topa tungah la sa-in amah a phat dingte seh hi.
Amaute in la sa-in phat ding a kipat uh ciangin, Judah mite do dingin a hong pai Ammon mite, Moab mite, leh Seir Mual gam mite a pangsim ding Topa in koih a, amaute kizo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ammon mite leh Moab mite in Seir Mual-a teengte do dingin kipanin amaute susia mang uh a, Seir-a teengte a beisak khit uh ciangin amaute khat leh khat kisusia uh hi.
Gamlak-a galvilna tausang ah Judahte hong tun’ ciangin mihonpite’ omna lam en uh hi; en in, amaute in lei lakah a puk mi si luanghawm vive na hi hi; a suakta kuamah om lo hi.

Van kinusiate a tawm dingin Jehoshafat leh a mite hong pai ciangin bawngte, vante, puante, leh na manphate tampi tak mu uh a, a puak zawh loh ciang dong uh amau’ adingin la uh hi. Van kinusiate tam mahmah ahih manin ni thum sung tawm uh hi.
A ni li ni-in Berakah kuamah amaute kikhawm uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in tua lai-ah Topa phat uh hi; tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin tua mun in Berakah Kuam kici hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mi leh Jerusalem mi khempeuh, Jehoshafat makai-in lungdamna tawh Jerusalem ah ciah uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amaute a galte uh hangin lungdam sak hi.
Amaute, harp lasaknate leh laiza lasaknate leh peengkulte tawh Jerusalem Topa’ innah tung uh hi.
Topa in Israelte’ galte a dona thu a zak uh ciangin kumpi gamte khempeuh tungah Topa a kizahtakna hong om hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jehoshafat’ ukna gam sung gamdai hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a Pasian in ama kiimah galdaihna pia hi.
Tua bangin Jehoshafat in Judah tungah uk hi. Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmthum-le-nga pha a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih-le-nga sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Azubah hi a, Shilhi’ tanu ahi hi.
Amah in a pa Asa’ lampi mah zui a, tua lampi panin pialkhia lo hi; Topa’ muhna-ah a man na sem hi.
Ahi zongin mual dawn a, biakpiaknate kilakhia lo hi; mite in a lungsim uhah a pu a pate uh’ Pasian ngaihsun nai lo uh hi.
Tu-in Jehoshafat’ gamtatna a om laite, a patna pan a tawp dongin, Israel Kumpite’ Laibu sunga a kiciamteh, Hanani’ tapa Jehu’ khang tangthu sungah kigelh hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat in a gilo-a gamta, Israel kumpipa Ahaziah tawh kipawl hi.
Tarshish a, a pai ding teembawte bawlna ah amah pawl a, amaute in Eziongerber ah teembawte bawl uh hi.

Tua ciangin Mareshah khuami Dodavahu’ tapa Eliezer in Jehoshafat langpangin thu genkholin, “Nangmah in Ahaziah tawh kipawl na hih manin Topa in na bawlsate uh susia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin teembawte kisia a, Tarshish ah pai thei lo hi.
Jehoshafat a pate tawh ihmu a, David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi; tua ciangin a tapa Jehoram in ama taangin uk hi.
Jehoshafat’ tapa ama sanggam pasalte in: Azariah, Jehiel, Zekhariah, Azariah, Mikhael, leh Shefatiah ahi uh hi; hihte khempeuh in Judah kumpipa Jehoshafat’ tapate ahi hi.
A pa un amaute tungah letsong lianpite, ngun, kham, leh a manpha neihsate, Judah gam sunga kulh nei khuapite tawh pia hi; ahih hangin amah ta upa ahih manin Jehoram tungah kumpigam pia hi.
A pa’ kumpi tokhom ah Jehoram kahin a kip ciangin namsau tawh a sanggam pasal khempeuh that a, Judah ulian pawlkhat zong that hi.
Jehoram kumpi a suahin a kum sawmthum-le-nih pha a, Jerusalem ah kumgiat sung uk hi.
Amah in Ahab innkuan mah bangin Israel kumpite’ lampi zui hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Ahab’ tanu in ama zi ahi hi. Topa’ muhna ah amah a sia gamta hi.
Ahi zongin, David tawh a bawlsa a thuciamna hang, leh ama tung leh a suante tungah ukna za a piak suak nading a ciam khitna hangin Topa in David suante susia lo hi.
Ama hun sungin Judah ukna panin Edom leengkhia-in amau’ kumpi tuam phuan uh hi.
Tua ciangin ama nuai-a a ukte leh a leengte khempeuh tawh Jehoram galkah a, zanin amah tho-in amah leh a leeng ukte a umcih Edom mite vat hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin Judah ukna panin Edom lengkhia hi. Jehoram in a pu a pate’ Pasian, Topa nusia ahih manin, tua hun lai takin Libnah zong ama ukna panin lengkhia hi.
Tua tham loin amah in Judah mual tung gamah mual dawn a, biak piaknate bawl a, Jerusalem a, teeng mite citak loin om sak a, Judah mite lam pial sak hi.
Tua ciangin kamsang Elijah tung panin ama kiangah laikhak khat hong tung a, “Na pu David’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Na pa Jehoshafat’ lampi ahih kei leh Judah kumpi Asa’ lampi tawn loin,

Israel kumpite’ lampi tawnin, Ahab innkuan in cihtak lohna ah Israel a paipih bangin Judah leh Jerusalem a, teeng mite cihtaklohna ah na paipih a, nang sangin a hoihzaw, na pa’ innkuan sung panin na sanggam pasalte zong na that hi;
en in, na mite, na tate, na zite, leh na neih khempeuh tungah Topa in gimna lianpi khat hong tungsak ding a,
na natna hangin a ni ni-in na gil a tolhkhiat dongin, nangmahmah in gilnatna lianpi khat na nei ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Ethiopia mite kiangah a om Filistiate leh Arab mite, Jehoram tungah a heh nadingin toklo hi;
tua ciangin Judah simin amaute hong kuanto-in luh uh a, kumpipa’ innah a om a muh uh na khempeuh, leh a tapate leh a zite zong puakhia uh a, a tapa neupen Jehoahaz simloh a tapa a kinusia om lo hi.
Hih thute khempeuh khit ciangin Topa in a dam thei lo natna tawh a gil nasak hi.
A hun a cin, kum nih beina ciangin a natna hangin a gil tolh khia a, nakpi takin na sa-in si hi. A pate adingin mei a cih uh bangin, a mite in amah zahtakna-in mei cih lo uh hi.

Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmthum-le-nih pha a, Jerusalem ah kumgiat sung uk hi; kuama dahpih lohin amah kihemkhia hi. Amaute in David khuapi sungah amah phum uh a, ahih hangin kumpite’ han sungah kiphum lo hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem a, teengte in ama taangin a tapa neupen Ahaziah kumpi-in koih uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Arab mite tawh giahphual ah hong pai mite in a tapa golzawte khempeuh that khin uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Judah kumpi Jehoram’ tapa Ahaziah in uk hi.
Ahaziah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmli-le-nih pha a, Jerusalem ah kum khat sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Athaliah hi a, Omri’ tanu ahi hi.
Ama nu in a sia-a a gamtatna ah lamlak ahih manin amah in zong Ahab innkuan lampite mah tawn hi.
Ahab innkuan mah bangin Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a pa’ sih khit ciangin ama siatna dingah thulamlakte in amaute ahi uh hi.
Amah in amaute’ thugen nangawn zui a, Ramothgilead ah Siria kumpi Hazael tawh a kido dingin Israel kumpi Ahab’ tapa Jehoram tawh kuan hi. Tua ciangin Siria mite in Jehoram liamsak uh a,

Siria kumpi Hazael a do lai takin Ramah ah a ngah a liamnate Jezre-el-ah a kidamsak dingin kilehkik hi. Tua ciangin Jezre-el ah Ahab’ tapa Jehoram a cina ahih manin amah a en dingin Judah kumpipa Jehoram’ tapa Ahaziah hawhsuk hi.

Ahih hangin Jehoram kiangah hawh dingin a paina tawh Ahaziah’ puk nading a tun’ nading Pasian’ sehsa a hi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah amah hong pai ciangin, Ahab innkuan a susia dingin Topa in sathau a nilhsa Nimshi’ tapa Jehu tawh a kimu dingin Jehoram tawh paikhia hi.
Jehu in Ahab innkuan tungah thukhenna a piak lai takin Judah uliante leh Ahaziah’ na a sem, Ahaziah’ sanggam pasalte’ tapate tuak a, amah in amaute that hi.

Amah in Ahaziah zong a, Samaria ah a buk lai takin amah kiman a, tua ciangin Jehu kiangah amah kipai pihin kithat hi. Amaute in amah vui uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Amah in, a lungsim khempeuh tawh Topa a zong Jehoshafat’ tupa ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Ahaziah innkuante in kumpigam a uk zo ding mi khat zong nei nawn lo uh hi.
Tu-in Ahaziah’ nu Athaliah in a tapa a sihna a muh ciangin amah kipanin Judah sung pan kumpi innkuan khempeuh susia hi.

Ahih hangin kumpipa’ tanu Jehoshabeath in Ahaziah’ tapa Joash la a, a kithat ding kumpipa’ tapate’ lak panin amah gukhia-in lupna inndei sungah amah leh a cingnu koih hi. Amah in Ahaziah’ sanggamnu ahih manin, Kumpi Jehoram’ tanu ahi, siampi Jehoiada’ zi Jehoshabeath in tua bangin Athaliah kiang panin amah seel a, tua nu in amah that kha lo hi;
tua ciangin Athaliah in gam sung a uk lai takin Pasian’ inn sungah bu-in kum guk sung amaute tawh amah om hi.

Ahih hangin a kum sagihna kumin Jehoiada amah kihanthawnin a za-a a ukte, Jeroham’ tapa Azariah, leh Jeroham’ tapa Ishmael, leh Obed’ tapa Azariah, leh Ada-iah’ tapa Ma-aseiah, leh Zikri’ tapa Elishafatte tawh thukimna khat bawl hi.
Tua ciangin amaute Judah gam sungah pai kawikawi-in Judah khuapite khempeuh panin Levi mite, leh Israel mi beh lutangte khawmin Jerusalem ah hong pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin a kikhawm khempeuh in Pasian’ inn sungah kumpipa tawh thuciamna khat bawl uh hi. Tua ciangin Jehoiada in amau kiangah, “En un, kumpipa’ tapa! Topa in David’ suante tawh kisai-in a gen bangin amah uk sak un.
Hih in note’ hih ding ahi hi; sabbath ni-in nasep a peng no siampite leh Levi mite sung panin seh-thum-suah-seh-khat kulhkongpi cingte na hi ding uh a,
tua ciangin seh-thum-suah-seh-khat kumpipa’ innah omin seh-thum-suah-seh-khat Khuabul Kulh kongpi-ah na om ding uh hi; tua ciangin mi khempeuh Topa’ inn tualte’ sungah na om ding uh hi.
Siampite leh na a sem Levi mite sim loh, Topa’ inn sungah kuamah lut sak kei un; amaute siangtho ahih manin amaute lut thei ding uh a, ahih hangin mi khempeuh in Topa’ sawlna na mang ding uh hi.

Levi mite in a khut sungah a galhiam ciat uh tawh kumpipa cing ding uh a, tua ciangin biakinn sungah a lut peuhpeuh kithat ding hi. Hong tum ciang hita leh a pusuah ciang hita leh a paina peuhpeuh ah kumpipa tawh om un,” a ci hi.

Siampi Jehoiada’ thupiak khempeuh bangin Levi mite leh Judah mi khempeuh gamta uh hi. Amaute in amau’ mi ciat sabbath ni-in na a sem ding mite tawh sabbath ni-in nasep a peng ding mite hong paipih uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh siampite Jehoiada in nasep a peng ding a khen pawlte ciahsak lo hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada in a ukte tungah Topa’ inn sungah a om, Kumpi David’ aa ahi ngei teipite leh lum lian leh lumneute pia hi;
tua ciangin amah in mi khempeuh a galhiam ciat uh tawh kumpipa a cingin, inn leitaw lam pang pan inn leilu lam pang, biakna tau leh innkim ah koih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kumpipa’ tapa paikhiat pihin ama tungah kumpi lukhu koih a, ama tungah teci pan’na pia hi; tua ciangin amaute in kumpi-in amah taangko uh a, Jehoiada leh a tapate in amah sathau nilhin, “Kumpipa khan’ sau hen!” ci uh hi.
Mite tai-in kumpipa a phatna uh gamlumna Athaliah in a zak ciangin mite’ omna Topa’ innah pai hi.

Amah a khuadak ciangin, inn lutna a, om a khuampi gei-ah kumpipa ding-in, a ukte leh peengkul tumte kumpipa’ gei-ah om-in, gam sung mi khempeuh lungdamin peengkulte tum uh a, lasate a lasakna nate uh tawh tua pawi makai-in a na om uh mu hi. Tua ciangin Athaliah in a puante balkekin kiko a, “Sawmsimna, Sawmsimna!” ci hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada in galkapte tungah a kikoih a ukte paikhiat pihin amaute tungah, “A gual-a a pangte lak panin a pua-ah amah paikhiatpih un; amah a pan’pih mi khatpeuh peuh namsau tawh kithat ding hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh siampipa in, “Topa’ inn sungah tuanu that kei un,” ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in tuanu man uh a, tua ciangin kumpipa’ inn Sakol Kongpi vang-ah paikhiat pihin tua lai-ah amah that uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ mi ahih nading uh Jehoiada in amah leh mi khempeuh leh kumpipa kikal ah thuciamna khat bawl hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh Baal innah pai-in a inn lai khia uh hi; amaute in a biakna taute leh a milimte sukham uh a, amaute in biakna taute mai-ah Baal siampi Mattan that uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jehoiada in David hih ngei bangin, Moses’ thukham sungah a kigelh bangin lungdamna leh lasakna tawh, Topa’ tungah meihal biakna a pia dingin, Topa’ biakinn a en dingin David in a vaihawmsa Levi siampite leh Levi mite’ ukna nuai-ah Topa’ biakinn adingin galvilte koih hi.
Lam khat peuhpeuh ah a nin mi khat peuhpeuh hong lut loh nadingin Topa’ biakinn kulhkongpite ah amah in kulh kongpi cingte koih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in galkap ukte, miliante, mi a ukte, leh gam sung mi khempeuh paipih hi; tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ biakinn panin kumpipa’ inn kulhkongpi tungnung tawnin kumpipa paipih suk uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kumpi tokhom tungah kumpipa tusak uh hi.
Tua ciangin gam sung mi khempeuh lungdam uh hi; namsau tawh Athaliah a kithah khit ciangin khuapi sung nuam pah hi.
Joash in uk ding a kipatin kum sagih pha a, Jerusalem ah kum sawmli sung uk hi; ama nu’ min in Zibiah hi a, Be-ersheba khuami ahi hi.
Joash in siampi Jehoiada’ hun sung khempeuh Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta hi.
Jehoiada in ama adingin zi nih laksak a, amah in tapate leh tanute nei hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin Joash in Topa’ biakinn a ngei batsak kik ding ngaihsun hi.

Amah in siampite leh Levi mite khawmin amaute kiangah, “Judah khuapite ah pai un la, na Pasian uh inn a kum kumin puah nadingin Israel khempeuh tung panin sum khawm un; hih thu na nawh hih ding uh thei un,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Levi mite kinawh lo uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in amau’ ukpi Jehoiada samin ama kiangah, “Topa’ nasem Moses in tecipan’na puanbuk’ adingin Israel mihonte tung panin a khon mangmu bang hangin Judah leh Jerusalem panin Levi mite khawm sak lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua a gilo numei Athaliah leh a pawlte in Pasian’ inn luh uh hi; Topa’ inn-a om a ki-ap nate khempeuh zong Baalte’ adingin zang uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in thu pia a, amaute in singkuang khat bawlin Topa’ inn kulh kongpi pua lamah koih uh hi.
Gamlakah a om lai-un Pasian’ nasem Moses in Israel mite a piaksak mangmu Topa adingin hong puak nadingun Judah leh Jerusalem sung khempeuh ah thuzaksakna kibawl hi.
Tua ciangin ulian khempeuh leh mi khempeuh lungdamin a mangmu uh hong sung uh a, a man khit mateng uh singkuang sungah khia uh hi.

Levi mite in kumpipa’ uliante kiangah a singkuang paipih a, a sungah sum tampi a om lam a muh peuhpeuh uh ciangin, kumpipa’ lai-atpa leh siampi liante a ukpa hong pai-in singkuang sunga sum teng bung khia-in la uh a, tua ciangin a omna ngei-ah a singkuang koih kik uh hi. Tua bangin a ni ni-in amaute in hih uh a, sum tampi khawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa leh Jehoiada in Topa’ biakinn nasep a ukte tungah tua sumte pia uh a, amaute in Topa’ biakinn a ngei a bangsakkik dingin lei-le-suang nasep a siamte leh khutsiamte, leh Topa’ biakinn a puahkik dingin sik leh sumngo nasep siamte zong cial uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua nasepna ah a kisehte in na semin amau khut sungah puahkikna nasepna in mainawt a, amaute in a ngei bangin Topa’ biakinn bawl kikin kipsak uh hi.

Amaute in a zawh khit uh ciangin, kumpipa leh Jehoiada kiangah sum a om laite hong paipih uh a, amaute in tuate tawh Topa’ biakinn ah nasep nading leh meihal biakna dingin nazatte, leh paknamtui adingin pakante, leh kham leh ngun beelte bawl uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in Jehoiada’ nuntak sung khempeuh a tawntungin Topa’ biakinn sungah meihal biaknate pia uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jehoiada teekin a hun kicing a, tua ciangin si hi; a sihin kum za khat leh kum sawmthum pha hi.
Amah in Israel sung, leh Pasian’ na leh Pasian’ innah nasep hoih sem ahih manin amaute in David khuapi sung kumpite lakah amah vui uh hi.
Jehoiada a sih khit ciangin Judah uliante hong pai-in amau’ thu a zuih nadingin kumpipa tungah thu va gen uh a, kumpipa in zong amaute’ thu ngai hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a pu a pate uh’ Pasian, Topa’ biakinn nusia uh a, Asherahte leh milimte’ na sem uh hi. Hih amau’ mawhna hangin Judah leh Jerusalem tungah Pasian’ hehna hong tung hi.
Ahi zongin Topa’ lamah amaute a paipih kik dingin amah in amaute lakah kamsangte puak hi; hihte in amau lang khatah teci pang a, ahih hangin amaute in don lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin siampi Jehoiada’ tapa Zekhariah’ sungah Pasian’ Kha hong lut hi; tua ciangin amah ding-in mite en sukin mite kiangah, “Pasian in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Bang hangin na mavan’ theih loh nadingun Topa’ thupiaknate palsat na hi uh hiam? Note in Topa nusia na hih manun amah in note hong nusia hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in amah sawmsim uh a, kumpipa’ thupiakna tawh amaute in Topa’ inn tual-ah suang tawh amah denglum uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi Joash in Zekhariah’ pa Jehoiada in ama tungah a lah dikna phawk nawn loin ama tapa thah sak mawk hi. Amah a sih ding ciangin, “Topa in mu hen la, thuk ta hen!” a ci hi.

Kum bei ciangin Joash simin Siria galkapte hong kuanto hi. Judah leh Jerusalem ah amaute hong pai-in mite lak panin mite’ ulian khempeuh that uh a, a van ngahte khempeuh uh Damasakas kumpipa kiangah puak uh hi.

Siria galkapte mi tawmno hong pai hi napi-in amaute in a pu a pate uh’ Pasian, Topa nusia ahih manin Topa in amaute khut sungah galkap tampi ahi mite pia hi. Tua bangin amaute in Joash tungah thukhenna pia uh hi.

Amah nakpi tak a liam sa-in nusia-in, ama kiang panin Siriate a kihepkhiat khit uh ciangin, siampi Jehoiada’ tapa a thahna hangin a nasemte in amah sawmsim uh a, a lupna tungah amah that uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah si hi; David’ khuapi sungah amah vui uh a, ahih hangin amaute in kumpite’ han-ah amah vui lo uh hi.
Amah a sawmsim mite in Ammon numei Shimeah’ tapa Zabad, leh Moab numei Shimrith’ tapa Jehozabad ahi uh hi.
Ama tapate’ thute, leh amah a kigensiatna thute, leh Pasian’ inn a kilamkikna thute, Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Amaziah in ama taangin uk hi.
Amaziah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih-le-kua sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Jehoaddan hi a, Jerusalem khuami ahi hi.
Amah in Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta a, ahi zongin lungsim paubaang lo hi zo nai sam lo hi.
Ama khut sungah kumpi vangliatna kip takin a om khit phetin a pa ahi kumpipa a that a nasemte that hi.

Ahih hangin Moses laibu sungah, “Tate’ hangin pate kithat lo ding a, pate’ hangin tate kithat lo ding hi; mi khempeuh ama khialhna hangin si ding hi,” ci-in Topa in a thupiakna thukham sungah a kigelh mah bangin amah in amau’ tate that lo hi.

Tua ciangin Amaziah in Judah mite khawm a, a tul-a ukte leh a za-a ukte khut nuai-ah Judah mi leh Benjamin mite a beh behin a pawl pawlin koih hi. Amah in kum sawmnih leh a tungsiah a pha mite khawm a, galsim dingin a hoih, teipi leh lum a zang thei a, a kitengkhia mihing tul zathum pha hi.
Amah in Israel sung panin ngun talen zakhat tawh a thahat galhang mi tul zakhat zong cial hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian’ mi khat ama kiangah hong pai-in, “Kumpipa aw, Israel mi ahi hih Efraim mite khempeuh, Topa in ompih lo ahih manin Israel galkapte nang tawh kuankhawm sak kei in.

Ahih hangin hih bang lam-a hihna tawh galdona ah thahat dingin kingaihsun kha na hih leh, Pasian in galte mai-ah nang hong paai ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in huh nading ahi a, paihna ding ahi zongin vangliatna nei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Amaziah in Pasian’ mipa kiangah, “Ahi ta zongin Israel galkapte tungah ka piaksa talen zakhat thu bang cih ding i hi hiam?” a ci hi. Pasian’ mipa in dawngin, “Topa in hih sangin nakpi takin a tamzaw hong pia thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Amaziah in Efraim panin hong pai galkapte innah a ciahkik dingin paikhia sak hi. Tua ciangin Judah mite tungah amaute heh mahmah uh a, heh mahmahna tawh innah ciahkik uh hi.
Ahih hangin Amaziah kihanthawnin a mite paikhiatpih a, Ci Kuam ah pai-in Seir gam mite mihing tulsawm that hi.
Judah mite in a dang tulsawm hing mat uh a, suangpi dawn khatah amaute paipihin suangpi dawn panin amaute lawnsuk uh hi; amaute khempeuh them len’ hi.
Ahih hangin Amaziah in gal sungah amah tawh pai sak loin, innah a sawl kik galkap mite in Samaria panin Bethhoron dong Judah khuapite na sim uh a, tuate sungah mi tulthum thatin van tampi la uh hi.
Seir gam-a Edom mite a thahna panin Amaziah hong ciah ciangin amah in Seir gam mite’ pasiante hong ciahpih a, ama pasian dingin tuate koih a, tuate bia-in tuate tungah biakna pia hi.
Tua ciangin Amaziah tungah Topa hehin ama kiangah kamsang khat sawl a, tuapa in, “Bang hangin nangma khut panin amau’ mite a honkhia lo, mi pawlkhatte’ pasiante beel na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in thu a gen lai takin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Kumpi tungah ngaihsutna a pia dingin nang hong koih ka hi uh hiam? Khawl in! Bang hangin nang hong kithat ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kamsangpa khawl a, ahih hangin, “Nangmah in hih bang gamta-in ka thugenna ngai lo na hih manin Pasian in nang hong suksiat ding a lungsim a khentatna ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah kumpipa Amaziah in ngaihsutna a lak khit ciangin Israel kumpi, Jehu’ tapa Jehoahaz’ tapa Joash kiangah mi sawlin, “Hong pai in, khat leh khat kimai tuah ni,” ci sak hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa Joash in Judah kumpipa Amaziah kiangah thu puak a, “Lebanon a, thangling kung in Lebanon a, taamtaak tungah thu puak a, ‘A zi dingin ka tapa tungah na tanu pia in,’ ci hi; tua ciangin Lebanon gamsa khat hong pai-in thangling tuancil hi.

Nangmah in, ‘Mu in, Edom mite ka vat khin hi,’ na ci a, na lungsim in nang hong kisathei sak hi. Tu-a na minthan’na zah tawh innah om in; bang hangin nangmah leh Judah mite na pukkhawm nadingun buaina piangsak ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Amaziah in mang lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Edom pasiante bia ahih manin, Pasian in amau’ galte khut sungah amaute a piak theih nadingin tua in Pasian’ vaihawmna ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel kumpipa Joash kuanto hi; tua ahih ciangin Judahte’ gam Bethshemesh ah amah leh Judah kumpipa Amaziah khat leh khat gal sungah kimaituah uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in Judah mite zo-a, mi khempeuh a inn uhah tai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Israel kumpipa Joash in Bethshemesh ah Ahaziah’ tapa Joash tapa Amaziah ahi Judah kumpipa manin Jerusalem ah paipih a, Efraim Kongpi panin a Kiu Kulhpi ciang dong tong zali sung Jerusalem kulh phelkhia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in kham leh ngun khempeuh, leh Pasian inn sungah a kimu um-le-beelte khempeuh tawh Obededom man khawm hi; amah in kumpipa’ inn-a van manphate la-in luang khapna ding mite zong man a, tua ciangin Samaria ah ciahkik hi.
Israel kumpi, Jehoahaz’ tapa Joash’ sih zawh Judah kumpi Joash’ tapa Amaziah kum sawm-le-nga sung hing lai hi.
Tu-in Amaziah’ nasep a om laite, a patna panin a tawpna dong, Judah leh Israel kumpite’ Laibu sungah kigelh hilo ahi hiam?
Topa kiang panin amah a kiheikhiat a, kipanin amaute in amah sawmsimna khat Jerusalem ah bawl uh a, tua ciangin Lakhish ah amah nungdelh sak uh a, tua lai-ah amah that uh hi.
Tua ciangin sakolte tungah amah pua-in kiciahpih hi; tua ciangin David khuapi sungah a pate tawh kivui hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mi khempeuh in kum sawm-le-guk a pha Uzziah la-in a pa Amaziah tangin kumpi-in koih uh hi.
Kumpi ahi ama pa a sih khit ciangin amah in Eloth khua la kikin Judah gam dingin ngah kik hi.
Uzziah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm-le-guk pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga-le-nih sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min Jekoliah hi a, Jerusalem khuami ahi hi.
A pa Amaziah’ hihsa khempeuh bangin amah in Topa’ mitah a maan sem hi.
Pasian zahtak ding ama tungah a hilh Zekhariah’ hun sung teng amah in Pasian zong hi; amah in Topa a zon’ lai teng, Pasian in amah daupai sak hi.
Amah kuankhia-in Filistiate va sim a, Gath khuapi kulh, Jabneh khuapi kulh leh Ashdod khuapi kulh sucim hi; tua ciangin amah in Ashdod gam sung leh Filistiate gam sung mun dangte ah khuapite lam hi.
Filistiate leh Gurba-al ah a teeng Arab mite, leh Meunim mite a dona ah Pasian in amah huh hi.
Ammon mite in Uzziah tungah siah puak uh a, amah a thahat mahmah suak ahih manin a minthan’na in Izipt gamgi ciang dong nangawn zel hi.
Tua tham loin Uzziah in Jerusalem a Kiu Kongpi leh a Kuam Kongpi leh a Keen Kulh san-ah tausangte lam a, tuate kulh tawh um hi.

Tua ciangin amah in gamlakah tausangte lam a, Shefelah leh zanglei ah ganhon tampi nei ahih manin tuikhuk tampi to a, amah in lei nasep uk ahih manin mual tung leh lei hoihna gamte ah lokhote leh leenggui puahte nei hi.

Tua tham loin Uzziah in kumpipa’ khut nuai-ah galkap ukte khat ahi Hananiah’ ukna nuai-ah, lai-at Jeiel leh ulian Ma-aseiah in a khop lai-in a khen khenin a koih a mi phazah mah bangin, galsim dingin a hoih galkap tampi nei hi.
A thahat galkap mang a vekpi in tulnih leh zaguk ahi hi.
Amaute’ ukna nuai-ah galdona ah kumpipa a huh dingin thahatna tawh gal a do thei ding galkap tul zathum leh tul sagih leh zanga om hi.
Uzziah in galkap khempeuh adingin lumte, teipite, siklukhute, sikpuante, thalte, lot ding suangtangte bawl hi.

Amah in thaltangte leh suang liante lot nadingin tausang omna munte leh a kiute ah koih ding, mi a siamte in a bawltawm sette, Jerusalem ah bawl hi. Amah a thahat dong a lamdangpi khatin kihuh ahih manin ama minthan’na in gamlapi zel hi.

Ahih hangin amah a thahat ciangin a siat nadingin a kiphatsakna hong khang hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa a Pasian tungah amah khial a, paknamtui biakna tau tungah paknamtui hal dingin Topa’ biakinn sungah lut hi.
Ahih hangin Topa’ siampi Azariah, a thahat mihing sawmgiat tawh ama nungah pai hi;

tua ciangin amaute in kumpi Uzziah nialin ama kiangah, “Uzziah aw, Topa tungah paknamtui hal ding pen nangma hih ding hi lo hi; paknamtui hal dingin a ki-ap, Aaron’ suan siampite hih ding ahi hi. Biakinn sung panin paikhia in; bang hang hiam cih leh na gamta khial a, hih bang hihna in Topa Pasian tung panin nang tungah pahtawina hong tun’ lo ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Uzziah heh hi. Tu-in amah in paknamtui hal dingin a khut sungah paknamtui beel tawi a, siampite tungah a hehna hangin, paknamtui biakna tau gei, Topa’ biakinn sung siampite’ muhin ama taltang ah phaknatna hong suakkhia hi.

Tua ciangin siampi lian Azariah leh siampi khempeuh in amah a et uh ciangin a taltangah phak natna na nei hi. Tua ciangin amaute in manlang takin amah sawnkhia uh a, Topa in amah vat khin ahih manin amahmah zong a paikhia dingin nawhtat hi.

Tua ciangin a sih ni dong Kumpi Uzziah a phak hi a, amah mi phak ahih manin inn tuam khatah teeng hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ biakinn panin amah kipuaseh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Jotham in kumpipa’ innkuan tungah uk a, amah in tua gam mite uk hi.
Tu-in Uzziah gamtatna a om laite, a patna panin a tawpna dong, Amoz’ tapa, kamsang Isaiah in gelh hi.

Tua ciangin Uzziah a pate tawh ihmu a, amaute in kumpite’ neihsa kivuina munah a pate tawh vui uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Amah in a phak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Jotham in ama tangin uk hi.
Jotham in uk ding a kipatin kum-sawmnih-le-nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawm-le-guk sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Jerushah hi a, Zadok’ tanu ahi hi.
A pa Uzziah hihsa khempeuh bangin amah in Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta hi—ahih hangin a pa bangin Topa’ biakinn sungah amah va mawk lut lo hi. Ahih hangin mite in a sia gamtatnate zui lai uh hi.
Amah in Topa’ biakinn kulh kongpi tungnung lam a, Ofel kulh tungah zong inn tampi lam hi.
Tua tham loin amah in Judah mual tung gamah khuapite, leh sing tamna mualte tungah mun muanhuaite leh tausangte lam hi.

Amah in Ammon kumpipa tawh kido a, amaute zo hi. Tua ciangin Ammon mite in tua kumin ama tungah ngun talen zakhat, leh mangbuh lawh tulsawm leh mangbuhham lawh tulsawm mah puak uh hi. Ammon mite in ama tungah a kum nihna leh a kum thumna kumin tua zah mah puak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa a Pasian’ mai-ah Jotham a va hoih tatna hangin a vang lian hi.
Tu-in Jotham’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a galsimnate, leh a omziate, en in, Israel leh Judah Kumpite’ Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Amah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nga pha a, Jerusalem ah kum sawm-le-guk sung uk hi.
Tua ciangin a pate tawh Jotham ihmu a, David khuapi sungah amaute in amah vui uh hi; tua ciangin a tapa Ahaz in ama taangin uk hi.
Ahaz in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawm-le-guk sung uk hi. Amah in a pu David bangin Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta lo a,
Israel kumpite’ khekhap zui hi. Amah in a kisung milimte nangawn Baalte’ adingin bawl hi;
tua ciangin amah in Hinnom’ tapa’ kuamah paknamtui hal a, Topa in Israel mite mai-ah a hawlkhiat minamte in a zat uh a kihhuai gamtatnate mah bangin biakna ah a tapate hal hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mual dawn a, biak piaknate, leh mual neute, leh singniim nuai khempeuh ah biakna pia-in paknamtui hal hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Siria kumpipa khut sungah amah pia a, amah in zo-in a mi tampi salin Damaskas ah ciahpih hi. Israel kumpipa khut sungah zong amah kipia a, amah zo-in tampi tak that hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a pu pate uh’ Pasian, Topa nusia uh ahih manin Remaliah’ tapa Pekah in ni khat thu-in amaute galhang mihing tul zakhat leh tul sawmnih, Judah gam sungah that hi.
Tua ciangin Efraim mi a thahat Zikri in kumpipa’ tapa Ma-aseiah leh kumpi inn a uk Azrikam leh kumpipa zom-ah aana a nei Elkanah that hi.
Israel mite in amau’ beh Judah mite lak panin numeite, tapate, leh tanute, mihing tul zanih sal-in man uh hi; amaute in amau’ kiang panin van tampi zong la-in tua vante Samaria ah ciahpih uh hi.

Ahih hangin Oded min nei Topa’ kamsang khat tua lai-ah om hi; tua ciangin Samaria ah hong tung galkapte a dawn dingin amah pai khia a, amaute kiangah, “En un, na pu na pate uh’ Pasian Topa in Judah tungah heh ahih manin note khut sungah amaute hong pia a, ahih hangin note in heh mahmahna tawh amaute na that uh a, tua in vantung dong ban hi.
Tu-in note in Judah mi leh Jerusalem mi, numei leh pasalte, na sal dingun nuaisiah na sawm uh hi. Topa na Pasian uh tungah nomau mahmah in khialhna nei hilo na hi uh hiam?
Tu-in ka thugen hong za un la, na behte uh kiang panin na lak uh na galmatte uh puak kik un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ hehna a lauhuai in note tungah om hi,” a ci hi.
Efraim mi ukpite pawl khat, Johanan’ tapa Azariah, Meshillemoth’ tapa Berekhiah, Shalum’ tapa Jehizkiah, leh Hadlai’ tapa Amasa, gal sung panin hong tungte’ lang khatah pang a,

amaute kiangah, “Tu huna i khialhnate leh i mawhna behlapin Topa’ tungah mawhna eite tungah tun’pih hong sawm na hih manun hih lai-ah galmatte nong tun’pih kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh i mawhna lian khin zo a, Israel tungah a lauhuai hehna om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin galhiam tawi mite in uliante leh a kikhawm khempeuh’ mai-ah galmatte leh a lak uh nate nusia uh hi.

Tua ciangin tua na sem dingin a kiseh mite dingin galmatte la uh a, amaute lakah guaktang a, a omte, a vanlakte uh sung panin puante silh sak uh hi; amaute puan silhsak uh a, khedapkaihte pia-in an leh tui vaak uh a, sathau nilh uh hi; tua ciangin amaute lakah a thaginalote late tungah pua uh a, nisuh khuapi ahi Jerikho khua amau’ behte kiangah paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin Samaria ah amaute ciahkik uh hi.
Tua hun lai takin Kumpi Ahaz in Assiria kumpipa kiangah huhna ngen dingin sawl hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Edom mite in Judah sim kikin zo uh a, galmatin puakhia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Filistiate in Shefelah leh Judahte’ Negeb gam sung khuapite luh uh a, Bethshemesh, Aijalon, Gederoh, Soko a khuaneute tawh, Timnah a khuaneute tawh, leh Gimzo a khuaneute tawh la hi; tua ciangin amaute tua lai munah teeng uh hi.
Judah kumpipa Ahaz in Judah mite tungah kihihsakna tawh gamta-in Topa’ tungah citak lo ahih manin ama hangin Topa in Judah mite niam koih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Ahaz ngetna zui-in Assiria kumpipa Tilgath-pilneser hong kuan hi. Ahi zongin amah tha khuahsak zaw loin gimsak zaw hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ahaz in Topa’ biakinn, kumpipa’ inn leh uliante’ inn panin la-in Assiria kumpipa tungah siah pia hi; ahih hangin hihte khempeuh a kiman’na om lo hi.
Hih Kumpi Ahaz mah pen—a lungkham hunin Topa tungah citak lo zawlai hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amah a zo Damaskas’ pasiante tungah biakna pia-in, “Siria kumpite’ pasiante in amaute huh ahih manin amaute in kei hong huh theih nadingin amau’ tungah biakna ka pia ding hi,” ci hi. Ahih hangin tua pasiante in amah leh Israel khempeuh’ siatna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Ahaz in Pasian’ inn-a um-le-beelte khawmin satnen a, tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn kongkhakte kalhcip hi; tua ciangin ama ading Jerusalem kiu khempeuh ah biakna tau bawl hi.
Amah in pasian dangte tungah paknamtui hal nadingin Judah khuapi khempeuh ah mual dawn a, biak piaknate bawl a, a pu a pate’ Pasian, Topa a heh nadingin phin hi.
Tu-in ama gamtatna a om laite leh a omzia khempeuh, a patna panin a tawpna dong, en in, Judah leh Israel Kumpite’ Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin Ahaz si a, amaute in Jerusalem khuapi sungah vui uh hi; ahi zongin Judah kumpite tawh vui khawm lo uh hi. Tua ciangin a tapa Hezekiah in ama tangin uk hi.
Hezekiah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmnih-le-kua sung uk hi. Ama nu’ min in Abijah hi a, Zakhariah’ tanu ahi hi.
A pu David’ hihnasa khempeuh bangin Topa’ mit-ah a man gamta hi.
A uk a kum khatna, a kha masa sungin, amah in Topa’ biakinn kongkhakte hongin tuate puah hi.
Amah in siampite leh Levi mite paipihin nisuahna lam mun-awngah amaute khawm a,
tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Levi mite aw, ka thugen hong za un! Tu-in nomau kisian’suah un la, na pu na pate uh Pasian, Topa’ biakinn siangtho sakin siangtho mun panin ninte nawn khia un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh i pu i pate citak lo a, Topa i Pasian’ muhna ah a sia gamta uh hi; amaute in amah nusia-in, Topa’ teen’na panin a mai uh heikhia uh a, a nung uh ngat uh hi.
Amaute in innlim kongkhakte zong khakin meivakte sumit uh a, siangtho munah paknamtui halna leh meihal biaknate Israel Pasian tungah bawl lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah leh Jerusalem tungah Topa’ hehna hong tung a, note’ mit mahmah tawh na muh uh mah bangin amah in amaute a cikzethuai, lamdangsakna, leh a dipkuathuai-in bawl hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh en un, hih thu hangin namsau-in i pate puk uh a, i tapate leh i tanute leh i zite galmatin om uh hi.
Tu-in a lauhuai a hehna eite tung pan a kiheikhiat theih nadingin Israel Pasian, Topa tawh thuciamna khat bawl ding ka lungsim ah om hi.
Ka tapate aw, Topa in ama na sem ding, leh ama nasemte hi-in ama tungah paknamtui a hal dingin note hong teel khin ahih manin tu-in mawk om kei un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Levi mite, Kohath’ beh sung panin Amasai’ tapa Mahath, leh Azariah’ tapa Joel; Merari’ beh sung panin Abdi’ tapa Kish, leh Jehallelel’ tapa Azariah; Gershon beh sung panin Zimmah’ tapa Joah, leh Joah’ tapa Eden;
Elizafen’ beh sung panin Shimri leh Jeuel; Asaf beh sung panin Zekhariah leh Mattaniah;
Heman’ beh sung panin Jehuel leh Shimei; Jeduthun’ beh sung panin Shemaiah leh Uzziel kipan uh hi.
Amaute in a sanggamte uh khawmin amau kisian’suah uh a, Topa’ genna tawh kumpipa’ thupiak bangin Topa’ biakinn a puahsiang dingin tum uh hi.

A puahsiang dingin Topa’ biakinn sung tawngnung ah a siampite lut uh a, Topa’ biakinn sunga a muh uh nin khempeuh Topa’ biakinn tual-ah hong paikhiatpih uh hi; tua ciangin Levi mite in la-in Kidron lui-ah puakhia uh hi.

Kha masa a ni masa ni-in amaute in sian’suah ding kipan uh a, tua kha a ni giat ni-in Topa’ biakinn lim-ah amaute hong pai uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in ni giat sung Topa’ biakinn sian’suah uh a, a kha masa a ni sawm-le-guk ni-in zo uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa Hezekiah’ kiangah amaute tumin, “Topa’ inn khempeuh, meihal biakna tau leh a nazatte khempeuh, leh Ompihna Anlum sabuai leh a nazatte khempeuh ka puahsiang khin uh hi.
Kumpi Ahaz a cihtak loh lai takin ama uk sungin a paihkhiat nazat khempeuh a baihsa-in bawlin ka sian’suah uh hi; en in, Topa’ biakna tau mai-ah tuate om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa Hezekiah tho baihin khuapi sung ukna-za neite khawm a, tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn ah paito hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in kumpigam leh biakinn leh Judah’ adingin khialhna hanga biakna-in bawngtal sagih, tuutal sagih, tuuno sagih, leh keeltal sagih hong paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ biakna tau tungah tuate a pia dingin Aaron’ suan siampite sawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a bawngtalte go uh a, siampite in a sisan la-in biakna tau theh uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in tuutalte goin a sisan biakna tau theh uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in tuunote goin a sisan biakna tau theh uh hi.
Tua ciangin khialhna hanga biak nading keeltal sagihte kumpipa leh a kikhawmte kiangah hong kipaipih a, tua ciangin amaute in tuate tungah a khut uh nga a,

tua ciangin Israel khempeuh adingin pumkhat suahna bawl nadingin siampite in goin tuate’ sisan tawh biakna tau tungah khialhna hanga biakna bawlna bawl uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel khempeuh adingin meihal biakna leh khialhna hanga biakna a bawl ding uh kumpipa in thu pia hi.

Tua ciangin amah in David leh kumpipa’ thu-mupa Gad leh kamsang Nathan’ thupiakna bangin Topa’ biakinn sungah daltuahte, harp lasaknate, leh laiza lasaknate tawh Levi mite koih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua thupiakna in a kamsangte’ tung tawnin Topa kiang pan hong pai ahi hi.
David’ lasaknate tawh Levi mite ding uh a, peengkulte tawh siampite ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin biakna tau tungah meihal biakna a kipiak nading Hezekiah in thu pia hi. Meihal biakna a kipat ciangin Topa’ tungah lasakna zong kipan a, Israel kumpi David’ lasaknate in peengkulte pawm hi.
A kikhawm khempeuh in bia-in, lasate in sa uh a, peengkul tumte in tum uh hi; meihal biakna a kiman mateng hihte khempeuh hih paisuak uh hi.
Biak piakna a kiman ciangin kumpipa leh amah tawh a om khempeuhte in kunin bia uh hi.

Tua ciangin David’ kammalte leh thu-mupa Asaf’ kammalte zangin Topa’ tungah phatna la a sak nadingun kumpipa Hezekiah leh uliante in Levi mite thu pia uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in lungdamna tawh phatna late sa uh a, kunin bia uh hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in, “Tu-in Topa tungah nomau mah na ki-ap khin uh hi; a nai-ah hong pai un la, Topa’ biakinn ah biak piaknate leh lungdam piaknate hong paipih un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin a kikhawmte in biak piaknate leh lungdam piaknate hong paipih uh hi; tua ciangin a lungsim ah piak nopna lungsim a nei khempeuh in meihal biaknate hong paipih uh hi.
A kikhawmte in a hong paipih meihal biakna a phazah in bawngtal sawmsagih, tuutal zakhat, leh tuuno zanih ahi hi; hihte khempeuh in Topa tungah meihal biakna khat ahi hi.
A ki-ap biaknate in bawngtal zaguk leh tuu tulthum ahi hi.

Ahih hangin siampite a mi tawm lua uh ahih manin meihal biaknate khempeuh a vun hawk khin zo lo uh a, siampi dangte a kisian’suah ma sung teng, a sanggam uh Levi mite in nasep a kizawh mateng amaute huh uh hi—bang hang hiam cih leh kisian’suahna thu-ah siampite sangin Levi mite ngentel zaw uh hi.
Meihal biakna a tampite banah thu-nuama biakna thaute, leh meihal biakna adingin leenggahzu tawh biaknate om hi. Tua bangin Topa’ biakinn sungah nasepna kiomsak kik hi.
Pasian in mite’ adingin a bawlsak thute bangin Hezekiah leh mi khempeuh lungdam uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua thu thakhatin hong piang vat hi.

Israel Pasian, Topa’ Paisan Pawi a bawl dingin Jerusalem a, Topa’ innah amaute hong paina dingun Hezekiah in Israel khempeuh leh Judahte kiangah mi sawl a, Efraim mite leh Manasseh mite tungah zong laikhakte gelh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa leh a uliante leh Jerusalem a, a kikhawm khempeuh in Paisan Pawi a kha nihna sungin bawl ding kikum khin uh hi—
siampite mi a kicingzah ding amau kisian’suah nai lo uh a, mite zong Jerusalem ah kikhawm nai lo uh ahih manin a hunin bawl thei lo uh hi—
hih geelna pen kumpipa leh a kikhawm khempeuh adingin hoih leh kilawm hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mite hong pai-in Israel Pasian, Topa adingin Jerusalem ah Paisan Pawi a bawl nadingun Be-ersheba panin Dan ciang dong Israel sung khempeuh ah taangkona khat a bawlna ding uh thukhentatna khat bawl uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh bawl dinga a kigen bangin amaute in a lianpi-in bawl ngei lo uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa leh a uliante kiang pana laikhakte tawh Israel khempeuh leh Judah sungah laitaite pai uh a, kumpipa’ thupiakna, “Israel mite aw, Assiria kumpite’ khut sung panin a suakta, a om lai note lamah amah hong kihei kik theih nadingin Abraham, Isaak, leh Israel Pasian, Topa’ lamah kihei kik un.
Note in na theih uh bangin, amau’ pute pate’ Topa Pasian tungah a cihtaklohna hangun amaute gamkhingin amah in a bawl na pute na pate uh leh na sanggamte uh bang kei un.

Tu-in na pute na pate uh bangin lungkhauh kei un la, note kiang panin a lauhuai ama hehna a kiheikhiat theih nadingin Topa’ lamah kipia un la, amah in a tawntung dingin a sian’thosaksa a biakinn ah pai-in Topa na Pasian uh, bia un.

Bang hang hiam na cih leh Topa’ lamah note na kilehkik uh leh, na sanggamte uh leh na tate un amau a mante’ tung panin hehpihna ngahin hih gamah hong ciahkik ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian uh dikna leh hehpihna a nei hi a, ama lamah na kiheikik nak uh leh note kiang panin a maitang heikhia lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin laitaite Efraim leh Manasseh gam sung khuapi khat pan khuapi khat, leh Zebulun ciang dong pai uh hi; ahih hangin amaute in amaute nuihsanin zahpih uh a, na simmawh bawl uh hi.
Asher mi, Manasseh, leh Zebulun mi tawmkhat bek kiniamkhiatin Jerusalem ah hong pai uh hi.
Topa’ thupiakna tawh kumpipa leh uliante’ sawlna a sem dingin Judah mite tungah Pasian in lungsim kikhatna guan hi.
Tua ciangin a kha nihna sungin silngo sawh loh anlum pawi a bawl dingin Jerusalem ah mi tampi, mihon tampi tak hong pai uh hi.
Amaute nasem dingin kipanin Jerusalem a, om biakna taute hemkhia uh a, paknamtui halna ding biakna taute khempeuh amaute in la khia-in Kidron kuamah paai uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in a kha nihna ni sawm-le-li ni-in Paisan Pawi tuuno go uh hi. Tua ciangin siampite leh Levi mite nakpi takin maizum uh a, tua ahih ciangin amau mah kisian’suahin Topa’ inn sungah meihal biaknate hong paipih uh hi.
Pasian’ mipa Moses’ thukham hangin amaute in amau’ panmun ngei hong la uh hi; siampite in Levi mite khut tung panin a ngah uh sisan theh uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a kikhawm lakah amau mah a kisian’suah nai lo tampi om uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Topa tungah a siangtho-in a kibawl nadingin a nin khempeuh adingin Levi mite in Paisan Pawi tuuno a gawh ding uh kisam hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh mi tampi tak, Efraim, Manasseh, Issakhar, leh Zebulun sung pan tampi tak, amau mah kisiangthosak nai lo uh a, ahi zongin ngeina lopi-in amaute in Paisan Pawi ne uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Hezekiah in amaute adingin thungenin, “Ka pute ka pate uh’ Pasian a dik Topa aw,
biakinn siangthona ngeina om bangin a sian’ loh uh hangin lungsim tak tawh nang hong biate khempeuh’ mawhna maisak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Hezekiah’ thungetna pia-in mite mawhna maisak a, gimna ngahsak lo hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah a om Israel mite in lungdamna lianpi tawh ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum pawi bawl uh hi; tua ciangin Levi mite leh siampite in a hatna khempeuh uh tawh Topa la sak uh a, a ni ni-in Topa phat uh hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Topa’ nasepna ah a siamna hoih uh a lak Levi mite khempeuh tungah hanthotna thugen hi. Tua ahih ciangin mite in pawi an ni sagih sung ne uh a, thu-nuama biakna pia-in a pu a pate uh Pasian, Topa tungah lungdamna ko uh hi.
Tua ciangin a dang ni sagih sung mah tua pawi a bawl thuah lai ding uh a kikhawm khempeuh thukim uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amaute in lungdamna tawh adang ni sagih sung mah bawl thuah uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah kumpipa Hezekiah in biakpiak nadingin a kikhawmte tungah bawngtal tulkhat leh tuu tulsagih pia a, uliante in a kikhawmte tungah bawngtal tulkhat leh tuu tulsawm pia uh hi. Siampite in tampi tak amau mah kisian’suah uh hi.

Judah mi a kikhawm khempeuh, leh siampite leh Levi mite, leh Israel panin hong paikhia a kikhawm khempeuh, leh Israel gam panin hong paikhia leh peemtate, leh Judah gam sungah a teng peemtate, lungdam uh hi.
Israel kumpi David’ tapa Solomon’ huna kipanin Jerusalem ah hih bang om ngeilo ahih manin Jerusalem ah lungdamna lianpi om hi.
Tua ciangin siampite leh Levi mite ding-in mite thupha pia uh a, amau’ awging kiza-in, amau’ thungetna in vantung a, a siangtho ama teen’na banto hi.

Tu-in hihte khempeuh a man ciangin, tua lai-a a om Israel khempeuh Judah khuapite ah pai-in khuampite sat khamin Asherah milimte phukin, Judah leh Benjamin sung, leh Efraim leh Manasseh sunga mual dawn-a biak piaknate leh biakna taute a suksiat khit mateng uh phelkek uh hi. Tua ciangin Israel mi khempeuh, a mi kimin amau’ inn omna a khuapi ciat uhah ciah uh hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah in siampite leh Levi mite amau’ nasep ciat tawh kizui-in a khen a khenin seh a, siampite leh Levi mite in meihal biaknate leh thu-nuama biaknate pia-in, Topa’ inn sung phual tuamtuamte huang sungah nasemin lungdam kohna leh phatna a bawl ding ahi uh hi.

Kumpipa in ama neihsa sung panin a piakte in meihal biak nading ahi hi; Topa’ thukham sungah a kigelh mah bangin zing leh nitak-a meihal biaknate, sabbath nite, khadet nite, leh a kiseh pawite’ adingin meihal biaknate ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ thukham sepna ah siampite leh Levi mite a kibup piak theih nadingun amau’ ngah ding a kilawm nate, Jerusalem a, teeng mite in amaute tungah a piak nadingun amah in sawl hi.

Tua thupiakna a kitheihthang phetin Israel mite in anpalte, leeggahzu, sathau, khuaizu, leh lo-a piang khempeuh tampi tak hong pia uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in na khempeuh sung pan seh-sawm suah seh-khat ahi tampi tak hong paipih uh hi.

Tua ciangin Judah khuapite sungah a teeng Israel mite leh Judah mite in zong bawng leh tuu seh-sawm suah seh-khat, leh Topa a Pasian uh tungah a kipiasa a ki-ap nate hong paipih uh a, a lom lomin koih uh hi.
A kha thumna sungin amaute in tua a lomte cian ding kipan uh a, a kha sagihna sungin man siang uh hi.
Hezekiah leh uliante hong pai-in a lomte a muh uh ciangin amaute in Topa leh ama mi Israelte thupha pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in a lomte thu, siampite leh Levi mite dong hi.

Zadok’ suan ahi, siampi lian Azariah in amah dawngin, “Amaute in amau’ piakte uh Topa’ inn sungah paipih ding hong kipat uh a, kipan kote in an ka ne uh a, a kicing nei-in tampi val lai hi; Topa in ama mite thupha pia ahih manin hih na tampi a om lai i nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Topa’ inn sungah inndeite a bawl nading uh Hezekiah in thupia hi; tua ciangin amaute in a deite bawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a piaknate, seh-sawm suah seh-khat leh a ki-ap nate cihtakna tawh hong paipih uh hi. Tuate a en ulian penpa in Levi mi Konaniah hi a, a sanggampa Shimei in amah a huhpa ahi hi;

Kumpipa Hezekiah leh Pasian’ inn ukpipa Azariah’ sehna tawh Jehiel, Azariah, Nathan, Asahel, Jerimoth, Jozabad, Eliel, Ismakhiah, Mahath, leh Benaiahte in Konaniah leh a sanggampa Shimei huhin a ukte ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin nisuahna lam kulhkongpi cingpa, Levi mi Innah tapa Kore in Topa’ ading leh siangthopen biakna adingin koihcing dingin, a kipiate a sehkhen dingin, Topa’ tungah ut thu-a piaknate a ukpa ahi hi.

Eden, Miniamin, Jeshua, Shemaiah, Amariah, leh Shekaniahte in siampite’ khuapite sungah a moi a ham a kibangin a khen khenin, a ngah ding ciat a sanggamte uh tungah a hawm dingin cihtakna tawh amah huh uh hi.

Khang-simna a, amau’ kiciamtehna tawh kisai-in a kipia hi tuan loin, a khen khenin amau’ panmun tawh kizui-in ni simin nasepna ah a kisam bangin Topa’ inn sungah a lut, kum thum leh a tungsiah a pha pasal khempeuh tungah tanh kipia kim hi.
Siampite a beh zui-in nasepna kipia hi. Levi mi kum sawmnih leh a tungsiahte a khen khenin amau’ panmun tawh kizui-in nasep kipia hi.
Siampite a naupangte khempeuh, a zite, a tapate leh a tanute uh tawh a mihon buppi-in kiciamteh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a siangtho-in a kikepna uhah amaute citak uh hi.

Amau’ khuapite aa ahi taang gam lote ah a Aaron’ suan siampite’ adingin ahih leh, a kiciamteh siampite lak leh Levi mite lakah pasal khempeuh tungah amau ngah dingte a hawm dingin a minin a kiseh mite, khuapi tampite sungah om hi.
Tua bangin Hezekiah in Judah gam sung khempeuh ah hih hi; amah in Topa a Pasian mai-ah a hoih leh a man gamta-in cihtakna tawh sem hi.
Amah in Pasian’ inn sung nasepna leh thukham leh thupiaknate tawh kizui-in a hihna ah ama Pasian zongin, a lungsim khempeuh tawh sem a, a ma vang hi.
Hih thute khempeuh leh citak-a hih banga na a kisep khit ciangin Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib hong pai-in Judah simin kulhnei khuapite lang khatah phual sat a, amah adingin lak sawm hi.
Sennakherib hong pai-in Jerusalem sim ding a sawmna thu Hezekiah in a theih ciangin,
amah in a uliante leh a mi thahatte tawh khuapi pua lam-a luangkhia tuinakte khakcip ding vaihawm hi; amaute in amah huh uh hi.
Mi tampi tak kikhawm uh a, gam sungah a luang tuinak leh lui khempeuh khakcipin “Bang hangin Assiria kumpite hong pai-in tui tampi mu ding ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.

Amah in lungsim kho takin sep ding kipan a, a cimsa kulh khempeuh ciang pha-in tua tungah tausangte koihto a, tua pua lamah kulh dang khat ciang hi; amah in David khuapi sungah Millo a muanhuai-in bawlpha hi. Amah in galhiam leh lumte zong tampi bawl hi.
Amah in mite a uk dingin galdona ah a ukte koih a, khuapi kulh kongpi mun-awngna ama kiangah amaute khawmin amaute tungah hanthotna tawh thu genin,
“Thakhauh un la, hang un. Assiria kumpipa leh amah tawh a om mihon khempeuh mai-ah lau kei un la, zong lungkia kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh amah tawh a omte sangin eite tawh a ompa lianzaw hi.
Amah tawh mihing thatang om hi; ahih hangin eite hong huhin i gal hong dosak dingin Topa i Pasian in eite tawh hong om hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin mite in Judah kumpipa Hezekiah’ kammalte muang uh hi.
Hih thu khit ciangin a galkap khempeuh tawh Lakhish a umcih, Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib in Judah kumpipa Hezekiah leh Jerusalem ah a om Judah mi khempeuh kiangah Jerusalem ah a nasemte sawlin,
“Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Note in Jerusalem umcihna na nan’ nading uh bang suang na hi uh hiam?

Hezekiah in note kiangah, “Assiria kumpipa khut panin Topa i Pasian in eite hong honkhia ding hi,” hong cih ciangin, note gilkial dangtakin a hong si sak dingin amah in note hong makai khial hilo ahi hiam?

Hih Hezekiah mah in mual dawn a, a biak piaknate leh ama biakna taute la khia-in Judah leh Jerusalem thu pia a, “Biakna tau khat mai-ah note in bia-in tua tungah na biak piaknate uh na hal ding uh hi,” ci hilo ahi hiam?
Keimah leh ka pu ka pate in gamdang mi khempeuh tungah ka hihnasate uh thei lo na hi uh hiam? Tua gam minamte’ pasiante in keima khut sung panin a gam uh honkhia zo ahi uh hiam?
Na Pasian un keima khut sung panin note hong honkhiat theih nadingin ka pu ka pate in a suksiat mang tua minamte’ pasian khempeuh lakah kua in a mite honkhia zo ngei ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note, Hezekiah’ khemsa-in ta kei un la, hih bangin kimakai khial sak kei un, amah um kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh minam khatpeuh, kumpigam khatpeuh’ pasian in keima khut ahi a, ka pu ka pate’ khut pan ahi zongin a mite honkhia zo ngei nai lo hi. Keima khut sung pan na Pasian un note hong honkhia zo lo zawkan ding hi,’ ci un,” ci sak hi.
Tua ciangin ama nasemte in Topa Pasian leh a nasempa Hezekiah langpangin thu tam gen zawlai uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Israel Pasian, Topa’ heh nading leh amah a langpan’na in laikhakte gelh a, “Ka khut sung panin a mite a honkhia lo gam sung minamte’ pasiante mah bangin ka khut sung panin Hezekiah’ Pasian in a mite honkhia lo ding hi,” ci hi.
Amaute in khuapi a lak theih nadingin khuapi mite lau-in a linglawn’sak nadingun kulh tungah a om Jerusalem mite tungah Judah pau tawh nakpi takin kiko uh hi.
Amaute in, mite’ khut tawh kibawl, leitung mite’ pasiante a gen bang lel-un Jerusalem Pasian gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa Hezekiah leh Amoz’ tapa, kamsangpa Isaiah in hih thu hangin thu ngenin vantung lamah kiko uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Assiria kumpipa’ giahphual ah a thahat galhang khempeuh leh galkap ukte leh uliante a susia vantung mi khat sawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama gamah maizumna tawh ciahkik hi. Ama pasian’ inn sungah amah a tun’ ciangin ama tapate pawlkhat in namsau tawh amah satlum uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib’ khut leh ama galte khempeuh panin Hezekiah leh Jerusalem a, teengte honkhia hi; tua ciangin amah in mun khempeuh panin galdaihna amaute tungah pia hi.
Tua ciangin mi tampi in Jerusalem khua Topa kiangah letsongte hong puakin, Judah kumpipa Hezekiah kiangah na manphate hong puak uh a, tua huna kipanin minam khempeuh muhna ah amah kisangtawi hi.
Tua hun lai-in Hezekiah cina-in si dektak a, amah in Topa tungah thu ngen hi; tua ciangin amah in a ngetna pia-in ama tungah lim khat pia hi.
Ahih hangin a lungsim kiphasak ahih manin ama tungah phattuamna a kibawl bangin Topa tungah Hezekiah lungdam lo hi. Tua ahih manin amah leh Judah leh Jerusalem tungah Topa’ hehna hong tung hi.
Ahih hangin Hezekiah a lungsim kiphatsakna thu-ah amah leh Jerusalem a, teeng mite kiniamkhiat uh ahih manin amaute tungah Topa’ hehna hong tung lo hi.
Hezekiah hau mahmahin minthan’na ngah hi; amah in ngun, kham, suangmanphate ading, a namtui nate, lumte, a manpha um-le-beel nam khempeuh adingin van manpha koihnate bawl hi;
an, leenggahzu, leh sathau koih nading van koihnate zong bawl hi; ganhing nam khempeuh adingin ganbukte, leh tuubukte bawl hi.
Amah in tua mah bangin amahmah adingin khuapite leh tuuhonte leh ganhonte tampi koih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in ama tungah neihsa tampi tak pia hi.
Hih Hezekiah mah in Gihon tui tungnungte khaktanin David khuapi nitumna lam pangah luang sak hi. Hezekiah a nasepna khempeuh ah a ma vang hi.

Tua ahih ciangin gam sung omzia lim a kan dingin ama kiangah kisawl Babilon uliante’ kamtaite tawh kisai-in, amah a ze-et nading leh ama lungsim sungah bang om hiam cih a vekpi-in a theih nadingin Pasian in ama thu-in amah om sak hi.
Tu-in Hezekiah’ gamtatna a om laite, leh ama nasep hoihte, en in, Judah leh Israel Kumpite’ Laibu sung, Amoz’ tapa, kamsang Isaiah’ mangmuhna sungah kigelh hi.

Tua ciangin Hezekiah a pate tawh ihmu a, amaute in David’ suante’ han paina mual pangah amah vui uh hi; Judah khempeuh leh Jerusalem a, teengte in a sihin amah zahtakna bawl uh hi. Tua ciangin ama tapa Manasseh in ama tangin uk hi.
Manasseh in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm-le-nih pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmnga-le-nga sung uk hi.
Topa in Israel mite mai-ah a hawlkhiat minamte’ zat a kihhuai gamtatnate mah bangin, amah in Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a pa Hezekiah in a suksiatsa mual dawn-a biak piaknate amah in lamkikin, Baalte adingin biakna taute phut a, Asherah milimte bawlin vantung nate khempeuh bia a, tuate’ na sem hi.
Topa in, “Jerusalem ah ka min om tawntung ding hi,” a cihna Topa’ inn sungah amah in biakna taute lam hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ inn tual nihte’ sungah vantung nate khempeuh adingin biakna taute lam hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Hinnom’ tapa kuamah biakna-in a tapate hal a, aisanna, leh mai lam thugen kholhna leh khongkhaina zang a, vankah theite leh aisante tawh na sem hi. Amah in Topa’ muhna ah siatna tampi bawl a, amah hehsak hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in David leh a tapa Solomon tungah, “Amaute ka thupiak khempeuh, thukham khempeuh, ngeinate, leh Moses tung tawnin a kipia biakna ngeina, kipte zuih ding a kidop nak uh leh, Israel minam khempeuh sung panin ka teelkhiat hih inn sung leh Jerusalem sungah ka min ka koih tawntung ding hi; tua ciangin na pu na pate uh adingin ka sehsa gam panin Israelte ka khinkhia nawn kei ding hi,” a cih Pasian’ inn sungah amah in ama bawlsa milim koih hi.
Manasseh in Judah leh Jerusalem a, tengte zol ahih manin, Israel mite’ mai-ah Topa in a suksiat minamte sangin amaute in a sia tamzaw gamta uh hi.
Topa in Manasseh tung leh ama mite tungah thu gen a, ahih hangin amaute in don lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Assiria kumpipa’ galkap ukte amau kiangah paipih a, amaute in sikkawite tawh Manasseh manin sumngo khau tawh khihin Babilon ah paipih uh hi.
Amah a lungkham ciangin Topa a Pasian’ maipha kunh-in a pu a pate’ Pasian mai-ah nakpi takin amah kiniamkhiat hi.

Amah in ama kiangah thungen a, tua ciangin Pasian in ama kutna saangin, a thuumna ngai hi. Amah in Jerusalem ah amah paipih kikin a kumpigam pia kik hi. Tua ciangin Topa in Pasian ahihna Manasseh in thei hi.

Tua khit ciangin amah in kuam sung, Gihon nitumna lam, David khuapi ah, Ngasa Kongpi lutna lamah kulh puanung khat ciang a, Ofel kiimah ciang suakin a sang mahmahin ciangto hi; amah in Judah gam sunga kulh nei khuapi khempeuh ah zong galkap a ukte koih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Topa’ inn panin gamdang pasiante leh milim lakhia a, Topa’ inn mual tung leh Jerusalem a, ama lamsa biakna tau khempeuh lakhia-in, khuapi pua lamah tuate paai hi.
Amah in Topa’ biakna tau zong koih kikin tua tungah thunuam-a biakna leh lungdam kohna pia hi; tua ciangin amah in Israel Pasian, Topa’ na a sep nadingun Judahte thu pia hi.
Ahi zongin mite in mual dawn-a biak piaknate ah biakna pia lai uh a, ahih hangin Topa amaute’ Pasian tung bekah biakna pia uh hi.

Tu-in Manasseh’ gamtatna a om laite, leh a Pasian’ tungah a thungetna, leh Israel Pasian, Topa’ min tawh ama tungah thu a gen thu-mu-te’ thungennate, en in, Israel Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu sungah om hi.

Tua ciangin ama thungetna, leh ama kutna Pasian in a san’na, leh ama khialhna leh a cihtaklohna khempeuh, leh amah a kiniamkhiat ma-in mual dawn a, biak piaknate bawlin Asherahte leh milimte a koihna munte, en in, Thu-mu-te’ Khang Tangthu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Manasseh a pate tawh ihmu a, amaute in a inn sungah amah vui uh hi; tua ciangin a tapa Amon in ama tangin uk hi.
Amon in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nih pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kumnih sung uk hi.
A pa Manasseh’ gamtatnasa khempeuh bangin amah in Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta hi. Amon in a pa Manasseh’ bawlsa milim khempeuh tungah biakna pia a, tuate’ na sem hi.
A pa Manasseh a kiniamkhiat bangin Topa mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat lo a, hih Amon in mawhna tam piangsak semsem hi.
Tua ciangin ama nasemte in amah sawmsimin ama inn sungah amah that uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua gam mite in Kumpi Amon a sawmsim khempeuh that uh hi; tua ciangin tua gam mite in ama tangin a tapa Josiah kumpi-in koih uh hi.
Josiah in uk ding a kipatin kum giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum-le-khat sung uk hi;
Amah in Topa mit-ah a man gamta a, a pu David’ khekhap zui hi; tak lamah ahi a, vei lamah ahi zongin amah lam pial lo hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ama uk a kum giatna sung, amah naupang ahih laipi mahin, amah in a pu David’ Pasian zon’ ding kipan hi; a kum sawm-le-nihna ciangin amah in Judah leh Jerusalem panin mual dawn a, biak piaknate, Asherah milimte, leh a kiseek leh a kisung milimte beisiang sak ding kipan hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Baalte’ biakna taute ama muhna ah supai sak hi; tua ciangin amah in tuate tungah a om paknamtui biakna taute phuk hi; tua ciangin amah in Asherah milimte, leh a kiseek leh a kisung milimte sukhamin gawivui a, tuate tungah biakna a pia mite’ han tungah theh hi.
Amah in amau’ biakna taute tungah siampite’ guhte zong hal a, Judah leh Jerusalem siang sak hi.
Tua ciangin Manasseh, Efraim, leh Simeon, leh Naftali khuapi ciang dong, mun awngte leh a kim a pamah,
amah in biakna taute sukhamin Ashera milimte leh milim dangte satvui a, Israel gam sung khempeuh ah paknamtui biakna taute satvui hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah amah ciahkik hi.

Tu-in ama uk a kum sawm-le-giatna, gam leh inn a sian’sak khit ciangin, Topa a Pasian’ inn a puah dingin amah in Azaliah’ tapa Shafan leh khuapi sung ukpa Ma-aseiah, leh thuciamtehpa ahi, Joahaz’ tapa Joah sawl hi.

Siampi lianpa Hilkiah kiangah amaute hong pai uh a, kongcingte ahi Levi mite in Manasseh leh Efraim leh Israel a om laite khempeuh leh Judah leh Benjamin khempeuh leh Jerusalem a, teeng mite tung panin a khop ahi, Pasian’ innah hong kipaipih sumte pia uh hi.
Amaute in Topa’ inn a vaan nasemte tungah tua sum pia uh hi; tua ciangin Topa’ innah a sem nasemte in a inn puah nading leh a ngei batsakkik nadingin pia uh hi.
Amaute in a kito suangte lei nading, leh Judah kumpite in a siatsak, tep nadingin singte leh inn lam nadingin innkamte lei nadingin khutsiamte leh innlamte tungah pia uh hi.

Tua ciangin mite in cihtakna tawh na sem uh hi. Amaute tungah a en dingin Levi mi Merari beh sung pan Jahath leh Obadiah, leh Kohathte beh sung pan Zekhariah leh Meshullam kikoih hi. Levi mi, lasakna nazatte ah siamna a nei khempeuh,
vangik puate a uk hi a, nasepna namkim a sem khempeuh makaih uh hi; tua ciangin Levi mi pawlkhatte in laigelhte, leh za neite, leh kulhkongpi cingte ahi uh hi.
Amaute in Topa’ innah a kipaipih sumte a lakkhiat lai takun siampi Hilkiah in Moses tung tawnin a kipia Topa’ thukham laibu mu hi.
Tua ciangin Hilkiah in lai-atpa Shafan kiangah, “Topa’ inn sungah thukham laibu ka mu hi,” ci hi; tua ciangin Hilkiah in Shafan tungah a laibu pia hi.
Shafan in kumpipa kiangah a laibu paipih a, kumpipa kiangah, “Na semte tungah a kipia khempeuh amaute in a sepsan laitak uh ahi hi.
Topa inn sungah a kimu sumte amaute in lakhia a, nasep vaante leh nasemte tungah pia uh hi,” ci-in gen thuah lai hi.
Tua lai-atpa Shafan in kumpipa kiangah, “Siampi Hilkiah in kei tungah laibu khat hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Shafan in kumpipa mai-ah tua laibu sim hi.
Kumpipa in thukham kammalte a zak ciangin a puante balkek hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Hilkiah, Shafan’ tapa Ahikam, Mikah’ tapa Abdon, lai-atpa Shafan, leh kumpipa’ nasempa Asaiah thu pia-in,

“Pai un la, a kimu laibu sunga kammalte tawh kisai-in keima ading leh Israel leh Judah ah a om lai mite adingin Topa thu na dong un; bang hang hiam cih leh i pu i pate in hih laibu sungah a kigelh khempeuh bangin sep ding Topa’ kammal na zui lo uh ahih manin eite tungah Topa’ hehna lian hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Hilkiah leh kumpipa in a sawl mite, puan a kem Hasrah, a tapa Tokhath, a tapa Shallum’ zi ahi kamsangnu Huldah kiangah pai-in (tu-in tua nu Jerusalem sung a Veng Nihna ah teeng hi) tua thu tawh kisai ama kiangah va gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua nu in amaute kiangah, “Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Kei kiangah note a hong sawlpa kiangah gen un,
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: En un, Judah kumpipa mai-ah a kisim laibu sunga kigelh samsiatnate khempeuh ahi siatna hih mun leh a tungah a teeng mite khempeuh tungah ka tung sak ding hi.
Amaute in amau’ gamtatna tawh kei hong hehsak theih nadingun amaute in kei hong nusia in, pasian dangte tungah paknamtui hal uh ahih manin hih mun tungah ka hehna kisungin dai lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin Topa thu a dong dingin note a hong sawl Judah kumpipa tungah hih bangin na gen ding uh hi. Israel Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Na zaksa thute tawh kisai-in,

hih mun leh a tunga teengte langpan’na ama kammal na zak ciangin na lungsim kisikin Pasian mai-ah na kiniamkhiat a, keima mai-ah nang kiniamkhiatin na puante balkekin ka mai-ah kap na hih manin, kei zong nang kong za hi, Topa in ci hi.

En in, na pate kiang kong zuan sak ding a, nuam takin na han na zuan ding a, hih mun leh a tunga teengte tungah ka tun’sak ding siatna khempeuh na mit in mu lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in kumpipa kiangah thu puak kik uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in mi sawlin Judah leh Jerusalem upa khempeuh kaikhawm hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa, Judah mite leh Jerusalem-a teeng mite leh siampite leh Levi mite khempeuh, mi khempeuh a lian a neu tawh, Topa’ innah paito hi; tua ciangin amah in Topa’ inn sungah a kimu thuciamna laibu sunga thute khempeuh amau’ zakin sim hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa ama munah ding-in, hih laibu sungah a kigelh thuciamna kammalte a sem dingin a lungsim khempeuh leh a nuntakna khempeuh tawh Topa’ nung a zuihna ding leh ama thupiaknate leh ama tecipan’nate leh a thukhamte a zuihna ding, Topa’ mai-ah thuciamna khat bawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Jerusalem leh Benjamin sunga om mi khempeuh hih thu zui sak hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem a, teeng mite in amau’ pute pate’ Pasian ahi Pasian’ thuciamna bangin gamta uh hi.

Tua ciangin Josiah in Israel mite’neihsa gam sung khempeuh panin kihhuainate khempeuh lakhia a, Israel sunga om mi khempeuh Topa amaute’ Pasian na a sem sak hi. Ama nuntak sung khempeuh amau’ pute pate’ Pasian ahi Topa zuihna panin amaute kiheikhia lo uh hi.
Josiah in Topa’ adingin Jerusalem ah Paisan Pawi bawl hi; amaute in a kha masa a ni sawm-le-li ni-in Paisan Pawi tuuno go uh hi.
Amah in siampite amau’ panmunte ah seh a, Topa’ inn sunga nasepna ah amaute hanthawn hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Israel khempeuh hilhin Topa tungah a siangtho Levi mite tungah, “Israel kumpipa, David’ tapa Solomon in a lam inn sungah thuciamna singkuang siangtho koih un; na liangko tung uhah na puak ding uh kisam nawn lo hi. Tu-in Topa na Pasian uh leh ama mi Israelte’ na sem un.
Note a khen khenin na beh uh tawh kizui-in kithawi un la, Israel kumpipa David’ lam lahna leh a tapa Solomon’ lam lahna zui un.
Tua ciangin mi nautang na sanggamte uh beh kikhenna tawh kizui-in siangtho munah ding un la, Levi minam beh tuamtuamte sung pan kihel kim un.
Tua ciangin Paisan Pawi bawlna ganhing goin nomau mah kisian’suah un la, Moses tung tawnin Topa’ thugen bangin na sanggamte uh adingin kithawi un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Josiah in tua lai-a a om mi khempeuhte’ adingin Paisan Pawi piakna-in mi nautangte tungah ganhon panin tuunote leh keelnote tul sawmthum ciang dong, leh bawngtal tulthum pia hi; hihte in kumpipa’ neihsa pan ahi hi.

Tua ciangin ama uliante in utna lungsim tawh mite tung, siampite tung leh Levi mite tungah pia hi. Pasian’ innah ulianpite ahi Hilkiah, Zekhariah, leh Jehiel-te in siampite tungah Paisan Pawi bawl nadingin tuuno leh keelno tulnih leh zaguk leh bawngtal zathum pia uh hi.
Levi mi ukpite Konaniah, Shemaiah, leh a sanggam Nethanel, Hashabiah, Jeiel leh Jozabab-te in Paisan Pawi piak nadingin Levi mite tungah tuuno leh keelno tulnga leh bawngtal zanga pia uh hi.
Nasep nading a kithawi khit uh ciangin, siampite amau’ munah ding a, kumpipa’ thupiakna bangin Levi mite amau’ khen sungah om uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Paisan tuuno go uh a, Levi mite in savun a hawk lai takun siampite in amau’ tung panin a ngah uh sisan theh uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, Moses laibu sungah a kigelh bangin Topa tungah piak dingin mi nautang sungah a innkuan a pawl tawh kizui-in a hawm theih nadingun meihal biaknate tuam koih uh hi. Tua bangin amaute in bawngtalte hih uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in biakna ngeina kip tawh kizui-in Paisan tuuno mei-ah hang uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in beel sung, beelpi sung, leh sikbeel daite sungah siangtho piaknate huan uh a, mi nautang khempeuh kiangah tuate manlang takin puak uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin amau’ ading leh siampite adingin amau mah kithawi uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Aaron’ suan siampite zankim ciang dong meihal biaknate pia-in manlah uh hi; tua ahih ciangin Levi mite, amau’ ading leh Aaron’ suan siampite’ adingin kithawi uh hi.

David’ thupiak bangin Asaf behte ahi lasate, leh Asaf, leh Heman, leh kumpipa’ thu-mupa Jeduthunte amau’ munah om uh hi; kulhkongpi cingte kulhkongpi ciatah om uh hi; amau’ sanggam Levi mite in amau’ adingin kithawi sak uh ahih manin amau’ nasepna pan amau a paikhiat ding uh kisam lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpi Josiah’ thupiakna bangin Paisan Pawi bawl nading leh Topa’ biakna tau tungah meihal biaknate piak nadingin tua ni-in Topa’ nasep nading khempeuh kithawi hi.
Tua lai-ah a om Israel mite in tua hunin Paisan Pawi, leh Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi ni sagih sung bawl uh hi.

Kamsang Samuel’ huna kipan tua bang Paisan Pawi Israel tungah kibawl ngei lo hi; Josiah, leh siampite leh Levi mite, leh tua lai-ah a om Judah leh Israel khempeuh, leh Jerusalem a, teeng mite in a bawl Paisan Pawi tawh a kibang, Israel kumpite kuamah in bawl lo hi.
Josiah’ uk a kum sawm-le-giatna kumin hih Paisan Pawi kibawl hi.
Hih thute khempeuh khit, Josiah in biakinn a bawl khit ciangin, Eufrates gun gei Karkhemish ah galdo dingin Izipt kumpipa Neko hong kuanto a, amah do dingin Josiah kuankhia hi.

Ahih hangin amah in ama kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Judah kumpipa aw, eite gel khat leh khat i kihih nading bang om ahi hiam? Tu ni-in nang a do dingin hong kuan ka hi kei hi; ka galte a do dingin hong kuan ka hi hi; ka kinawh nading Pasian in kei tungah thu hong pia khin hi. Kei tawh a omkhawm Pasian na nialna khawl in, tua hi kei leh nang hong susia ding hi,” ci sak hi.

Ahi zongin ama kiang panin Josiah kihei khia nuam lo a, amah tawh a kido theih nadingin a meel kiseel hi. Amah in Pasian’ kam pana Neko’ thugente ngai lo a, Megiddo zanglei a, galkidona ah va pawm hi.
Tua ciangin thaltawite in Kumpi Josiah kap hi; tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, “Nakpi takin liam ka hih manin kei hong pai khiatpih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a nasemte in leeng sung panin amah la khia-in ama leeng nihna sungah amah pua-in Jerusalem ah paipih uh hi. Tua ciangin amah si a, a pate’ han sungah kivui hi. Judah gam leh Jerusalem khuami khempeuh Josiah’ hangin kap uh hi.

Jeremiah in zong Josiah hangin kah la phuak hi; pasal lasate leh numei lasate khempeuh in tu ni dongin amau’ kahna ah Josiah tamlawh uh hi. Amaute in Israel sungah hih thu biakna ngeina kipin bawl uh hi; en in, Kah La sungah tuate kikhum hi.
Tu-in Josiah’ gamtatna a om laite, leh Topa’ thukham sungah a kigelh bangin a nasep hoihte,
leh ama gamtatna, a masa leh a nunung, en in, Israel leh Judah Kumpite’ Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
Tua gam mite in Josiah’ tapa Jehoahaz la-in Jerusalem ah a pa’ tangin kumpi-in koih uh hi.
Jehoahaz in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-thum pha hi; amah in Jerusalem ah khathum sung uk hi.
Tua ciangin Izipt kumpipa in Jerusalem ah amah zakiasak a, siah ngun talen zakhat leh kham talen khat, tua gam kipiasak hi.
Tua ciangin Izipt kumpipa in Judah leh Jerusalem tungah a ukin Jehoahaz’ sanggampa Eliakim koih a, ama min Jehoiakim-in khelsak hi; ahih hangin Neko in a sanggampa Jehoahaz la-in Izipt-ah paipih hi.
Jehoiakim in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-nga pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawm-le-khat sung uk hi. Amah in Topa a Pasian’ mai-ah a sia gamta hi.
Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar amah do-in hong paito a, Babilon ah a paipih dingin amah kol bulh hi.
Nebukhadnezzar in Topa’ inn-a um-le-beel pawlkhatte zong Babilon ah pua-in Babilon a, a kumpi innah tuate koih hi.

Tu-in Jehoiakim’ gamtatna a om laite, leh ama hih kihhuainate, leh amah a hoih lohna a kimute, en in, Israel leh Judah Kumpite’ Laibu sungah kigelh hi; tua ciangin a tapa Jehoiakhin in ama tangin uk hi.
Jehoiakhin in uk ding a kipatin kum sawm-le-giat pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah khathum leh nisawm sung uk hi. Amah in Topa’ muhna ah a sia gamta hi.
Tua kum khuakhal sungin Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar in mi sawl in Topa’ inn a, um-le-beel manphate tawh amah Babilon la sak a, Judah leh Jerusalem tungah Jehoiakhin’ sanggampa Zedekiah kumpi-in koih hi.
Zedekiah in uk ding a kipatin kum sawmnih-le-khat pha a, amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawm-le-khat sung uk hi.
Amah in Topa a Pasian’ muhna ah a sia gamta hi. Topa’ kam panin thu a gen kamsang Jeremiah’ mai-ah amah kiniamkhiat lo hi.
