Pasian tawh a kiciamsak Kumpi Nebukhadnezzar zong amah in lehdo hi; Israel Pasian, Topa’ kiang zuan kik nuam lo a, zong kisik nuam loin a lung khauhsak hi.
A makai siampite leh mi khempeuh zong tua mah bangin citak lo mahmah uh a, minamte’ kihhuainate zui uh hi; amah in Jerusalem ah a siangtho-in a koih Topa’ inn amaute in ninsak uh hi.
A mite leh ama teen’na mun khasiat ahih manin amau’ pute pate’ Pasian, Topa in a kamtaite amaute kiangah sawl teitei hi;
ahih hangin a mite tungah Topa’ hehna a suah ciang dong, a hehna a kidamsak zawh nawn loh ciang dongin amaute in Pasian’ kamtaite zahpihin, a thute simmawhin, a kamsangte thusim lo niloh uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in Khaldea mite’ kumpipa amaute’ lang khatah paipih a, amah in amau’ biakna inn sungah namsau tawh a tangvalte uh that a, tangval ahi a, nungak ahi a, a teek ahi a, a ham ahi zongin khasiat lo hi; amah in a vekpi-in ama khut sungah pia hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ inn a, um-le-beel khempeuh a lian a neu, leh Topa’ inn a, vanmanphate leh kumpipa leh a uliante’ vanmanphate khempeuh amah in Babilon ah paipih hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Pasian’ inn halin Jerusalem kulh nusia uh a, a kumpi inn khempeuh mei tawh halin a um-le-beel manpha khempeuh susia uh hi.
Amah in namsau panin a suakta mite Babilon ah salin la a, Persia kumpi in a uk hun mateng amah leh a suan leh khakte’ nasem a suak uh hi.

Tua sungin Israel leitang in a sabbathte a kicingin na tang hi. Kamsang Jeremiah tung tawnin Topa’ thugen a tun’ nadingin kum sawmsagih a cin’ nadingin leitang a kinusiat sung khempeuh leitang in sabbath tawlngakna a tang ahi hi.

Tu-in Persia kumpipa Sairas’ kum khatna kumin, Jeremiah’ kam pana Topa’ thugen a tangtun’ theih nadingin, Topa in Persia kumpipa Sairas’ lungsim hanthawn a, amah in a kumpigam sung khempeuh ah taangkona khat bawl a, lai-in zong gelh hi.

“Persia kumpipa Sairas in hih bangin ci hi, ‘Vantung Pasian, Topa in leitung kumpi gam khempeuh kei hong pia khin a, Judah gam sung Jerusalem khua ah ama adingin inn khat ka lamsak ding hong sawl hi. Note lakah ama mi ahi khempeuh, Topa a Pasian uh in ompih ta hen. Inn lam dingin Jerusalem ah amaute paito sak un,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Persia kumpipa Sairas’ kum khatna kumin, Jeremiah’ tung tawnin Topa’ thugen a tun’ theih nadingin, ama gam sung khempeuh ah tangkona khat bawlin lai-in zong a gelh nadingin Persia kumpipa Sairas’ lungsim ah Topa in suak sak hi. Amah in hih bangin hih hi:

“Persia kumpipa Sairas in hih bangin ci hi: Vantung Pasian, Topa in leitung kumpi gam khempeuh keima tungah hong piakhin a, Judah gam sung Jerusalem khua ah ama adingin inn khat ka lamsak ding hong sawl hi.
Note’ lakah ama mi peuhmah a Pasian in ompih hen la, Judah gam sung Jerusalem khua-ah paito hen la, Israel Pasian, Topa’ inn lam kik hen— amah in Jerusalem ah a om Pasian ahi hi;

tua ciangin koi lai koi lai muna om hi taleh Judah mi a om lai khempeuh, a omna mun mite in Jerusalem-a om Pasian’ inn adingin ut thu-a piakna a piakte uh banah, ngun leh kham, nate leh ganhingte tawh zong huh uh hen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah leh Benjamin sunga innkuan lutangte, leh siampite leh Levi mite, Jerusalem khua-a a om Topa’ inn lamkik dingin a lungsim sung uhah Pasian in a suahsak mite khempeuh kithawi uh hi;
tua ciangin a veng a pamte un thatang tawh a huh uh banah ngun tawh kibawl um-le-beel, kham, van tuamtuamte, ganhingte leh letsong manphate tawh huh thuah uh hi.
Tua tham loin, Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem panin puakhia-in ama pasiante’ inn sungah a koihsa ahi Topa’ inn-a om ngei um-le-beelte zong kumpipa Sairas in pusuah hi.
Persia kumpipa Sairas in hihte pusuahin sumkempa Mithredath’ khut sungah ap hi; tuapa in Judah ukpa Sheshbazzar’ adingin a mal zah simin sazian bawlsak hi.
Tua nate a phazah in: kham kuang-uk sawmthum, ngun kuang tulkhat, tem nam tuamtuam sawmnih-le-kua,
kham kuang sawmthum, ngun kuang-uk anam tuamtuam zali sawmkhat leh um-le-beel adang tulkhat ahi hi.
Kham leh ngun kibawl um-le-beelte khempeuh a vekpi-in tulnga leh zali pha hi; tua hi a, Babilon panin salte a kiciahpih kik ciangin Sheshbazzar in tua nate khempeuh Jerusalem ah ciahpih hi.
Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in a zawhna gam panin Babilon ah sal-in a lakte sung panin hih mite Jerusalem leh Judah ah a ciahkikte hi a, amau’ khua ciatah a ciah uh hi.
Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Seraiah, Re-elaiah, Mordekai, Bilshan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum leh Baanahte makai-in tua mite ciahpih uh hi. Israel mi phazahte in:
Parosh suante tulnih zakhat leh sawmsagih-le-nih ahi hi.
Shefatiah suante zathum leh sawmsagih-le-nih ahi hi.
Arah suante zasagih leh sawmsagih-le-nga ahi hi.
Pahathmoabte beh sung panin Jeshua leh Joab suante tulnih zagiat leh sawm-le-nih ahi hi.
Elam suante tulkhat zanih leh sawmnga-le-li ahi hi.
Zattu suante zakua leh sawmnga-le-nga ahi hi.
Zakkai suante zasagih leh sawmguk ahi hi.
Bani suante zaguk leh sawmli-le-nih ahi hi.
Bebai suante zaguk leh sawmnih-le-thum ahi hi.
Azgad suante tulkhat zanih leh sawmnih-le-nih ahi hi.
Adonikam suante zaguk leh sawmguk-le-guk ahi hi.
Bigvai suante tulnih leh sawmnga-le-guk ahi hi.
Adin suante zali leh sawmnga-le-li ahi hi.
Ater a kici Hezekiah suante sawmkua-le-giat ahi hi.
Bezai suante zathum leh sawmnih-le-thum ahi hi.
Jorah suante zakhat leh sawm-le-nih ahi hi.
Hashum suante zanih leh sawmnih-le-thum ahi hi.
Gibbar suante sawmkua-le-nga ahi hi.
Bethlehem khuami zakhat leh sawmnih-le-thum ahi hi.
Netofah khuami sawmnga-le-guk ahi hi.
Anathoth khuami zakhat leh sawmnih-le-giat ahi hi.
Beth-azmaveth khuami sawmli-le-nih ahi hi.
Kiriath-Jearim khua, Khefirah khua, leh Be-eroth khuami zasagih leh sawmli-le-thum ahi hi.
Ramah khua leh Geba khuami zaguk leh sawmnih-le-khat ahi hi.
Mikmas khuami zakhat leh sawmnih-le-nih ahi hi.
Beth-el khua leh Ai khuami zanih leh sawmnih-le-thum ahi hi.
Nebo khuami sawmnga-le-nih ahi hi.
Magbish khuami zakhat leh sawmnga-le-guk ahi hi.
Elam adang khat suante tulkhat zanih leh sawmnga-le-li ahi hi.
Harim suante zathum leh sawmnih ahi hi.
Lod khua, Hadid khua leh Ono khuami zasagih leh sawmnih-le-nga ahi hi.
Jerikho khuami zathum leh sawmli-le-nga ahi hi.
Sena-ah gam mi tulthum zaguk leh sawmthum ahi uh hi.
Siampite sung panin: Jeshua-te beh panin Jedaiah suante zakua leh sawmsagih-le-thum ahi hi.
Immer suante tulkhat leh sawmnga-le-nih ahi hi.
Pashhur suante tulkhat zanih leh sawmli-le-sagih ahi hi.
Harim suante tulkhat leh sawm-le-sagih ahi uh hi.
Levi mite sung panin: Hodaviahte beh panin Jeshua suante leh Kadmiel suante sawmsagih-le-li ahi uh hi.
Lasate sung panin: Asaf suante zakhat leh sawmnih-le-giat ahi uh hi.
Kongcingte nam sung panin: Shallum suante, After suante, Talmon suante, Akkub suante, Hatita suante, leh Shobai suante, a vekpi-in za khat leh sawmthum-le-kua ahi uh hi.
Biakinn nasemte sung panin: Ziha suante, Hasufa suante, Tabbaoth suante,
Keros suante, Siaha suante, Padon suante,
Lebanah suante, Hagabah suante, Akkub suante,
Hagab suante, Shamlai suante, Hanan suante,
Giddel suante, Gahar suante, Reaiah suante,
Rezin suante, Nekoda suante, Gazzan suante,
Uzza suante, Paseah suante, Besai suante,
Asnah suante, Meunim suante, Nefisim suante,
Bakbuk suante, Hakufa suante, Harhur suante,
Bazluth suante, Mehida suante, Harsha suante,
Barkos suante, Sisera suante, Temah suante,
Neziah suante, leh Hatifa suante ahi uh hi.
Solomon’ nasemte nam sung panin: Sotai suante, Hassofereth suante, Peruda suante,
Ja-alah suante, Darkon suante, Giddel suante,
Shefatiah suante, Hattil suante, Pokereth-hazzebaim suante, leh Ami suante ahi uh hi.
Biakinn nasemte khempeuh leh Solomon’ nasemte’ suan-le-khakte khempeuh a vekpi-in zathum leh sawmkua-le-nih pha uh hi.
Telmelah, Telharsha, Kherub, Addan, leh Immer khuate panin a hong ciahkik, Israel mi hi napi-in amau’ beh leh phung a kan thei lo mite in:
Delaiah suante, Tobiah suante, leh Nekoda suante, mi zaguk leh sawmnga-le-nih ahi uh hi.
Siampite sung panin zong: Habaiah suante, Hakkoz suante, leh Barzillai suante (amah in Gilead mi Barzillai’ tanute khat ten’pihin tua min tawh a kilo pah) ahi uh hi.
Hih mite in khang kiciamtehna ah amau’ min a zon’ uh hangin amau’ min na om lo ahih manin amaute a siang loin seh uh a, siampi nasep sem sak thei lo uh hi;
Urim leh Thummin aisanna tawh ai a san ding siampi khat a om mateng amaute in biakna an siangpente a nek loh nading uh gam ukpa in gen hi.
Mi a vekpi-in tulsawmli leh tulnih leh zathum leh sawmguk pha uh a,
amaute’ nasem numei leh pasal mihing tulsagih zathum leh sawmthum-le-sagihte kisim lo hi; amaute in lasa numei leh pasal mihing zanih nei uh hi.
Amau’ sakolte zasagih leh sawmthum-le-guk, amau’ la-sakol zanih leh sawmli-le-nga,
amau’ kalaoh zali leh sawmthum-le-nga, leh a la uh tulguk zasagih leh sawmnih pha hi.
Amaute Jerusalem-a Topa’ inn a tun’ uh ciangin Pasian’ inn ama mun ngei-ah lamkik nadingin innkuan lutangte pawlkhat in Pasian’ inn adingin piakna bawl uh hi;
amaute in ahih zawhna zah uh tawh kizui-in tua nasep nadingin vanmanpha koihna ah kham darik tulsawmguk leh tulkhat, ngun mina tulnga, leh siampi puan zakhat pia uh hi.
Siampite, Levi mite, leh mi pawlkhatte Jerusalem leh a kim nai-ah teeng uh hi; lasate, kongcingte, biakinn nasemte, leh Israel khempeuh amau’ khuapi ciatah teeng uh hi.
Salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik mite in Israel Pasian Topa adingin biakinn khat a lamna thu Judah leh Benjamin mite’ galte in a zak uh ciangin,

Zerubbabel leh Jeshua leh innkuan lutangte kiangah va pai uh a, amaute kiangah, “Inn lamna ah ko zong hong kihel sak un; bang hang hiam cih leh note mah bangin ko zong na Pasian uh ka bia uh a, hih lai-ah kote hong koih Assiria kumpipa Esarhaddon’ hun lai-a kipanin note’ Pasian tungah biakna ka pia uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Zerubbabel, Jeshua leh Israel sunga innkuan lutang a om laite in amaute kiangah, “Kote’ Pasian’ adingin ka lam uh inn in note hong lunghihmawhpih ding hi lo hi. Persia kumpipa Sairas in kote hong thupiaksa bangin Israel Pasian, Topa adingin ko teng bek mah in ka lam ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua gam a, midang teengte in Judah mite lungkia sakin inn a lam lai ding uh lausak uh hi;
amau’ ngimna a tangtun’ theih loh nadingin amaute a langpang dingin zum nasemte golhguk pia uh hi. Persia kumpipa Sairas’ uk huna kipan kumpi Darias hun dong hih bangin hih ngitnget uh hi.
Ahasu-eras in uk ding hong kipat ciangin Judah gam leh Jerusalem a, teengte’ khiatna thu tua gam a, a na teengsate in lai-in gelh uh hi.
Tua ciangin Persia kumpi Artakzaksis hun ciangin Mithredath, Tabeel leh a lawmte uh thukimna tawh kumpipa tungah laigelh uh a, a lai pen Aram lai-in kigelh a, Aram pau mahin kisim khia hi.
Menzipipa Rehum leh lai-atpa Shimshai in Kumpi Artakzaksis tungah Jerusalem tawh kisai thu anuai-a bangin gelh uh hi:
Menzipipa Rehum, lai-at Shimshai, leh a lawmte khempeuh, thukhente, mangpite, thuvante, uliante, Erek khuami leh Babilon khuami, Susa khua-a om Elam mite,
leh a lian a minthang Ashurbanipal in hong puakkhia-in Samaria khuapi ah hong ten’sak mite leh Eufrates gun lang khat a kizawhna gam sunga om mite tung panin lai puak, ci uh hi.
A lai sung thu hih anuai-a bang ahi hi: “Artakzaksis kumpipa tungah, Eufrates Gungal gam-a om na nasemte in hopihna kam kong puak uh hi:

Nangma kiang panin ko kiangah a hong pai Judah mite, Jerusalem ah tu-in tung khin uh a, a gilo, mi lehdo thei ahi khuapi pen amaute in lamkikin, amaute in a khua bulpi vel khinin kulhpi cian’ a kipat khitna thu thei in.
Amau’ khuapi kilam kikin kulhte kizo leh amaute in siah ahi a, mangmu ahi a, lo sapna ahi zongin hong pia nawn lo ding uh a, a tawpna-ah kumpipa hong sukkhak ding thu thei in.

Kote in kumpipa tawh thuciamna kip a nei khin ka hih manun kumpipa’ minsiatna ka muh ding uh kilawm lo ahih manin, nangma mai a, a semte’ thuciamtehna laibute a ki-et theih nadingin kumpipa tungah thu kong zasak uh hi. Thuciamtehna laibute sung en lecin hih khuapi in a lehdo thei khuapi, kumpipa tung leh a ukna gamte tungah siatna a piangsak, kumpi dona a khua sungah a om tawntungna thu na mukhia ding hi. Hih khuapi a kisukcipna in hih thu hang mah ahi hi.
Hih khuapi kilam kikna a kulhte kizo khin leh Eufrates gungal gam na uk nawn loh nading thu, nangma tungah kong theikhol sak uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in hih bangin a lai uh thuk hi: “Menzipipa Rehum, lai-atpa Shimshai, leh Samaria leh Eufrates gungal gam sunga om na lawmte khempeuh uh tungah hopihna lai kong khak hi.
Keima tungah nong khak uh lai pen a kitel takin keima zakna-ah hong kisim khin hi.
Keimah in hih thu a kikan nading thu ka pia a, tu-in kikan khin ta hi. Tang lai-a kipanin hih khuapi in kumpite langah pangin, hih khua sungah lehdona leh kumpi dona a om ngitngetna thu kimukhia hi.
A vanglian kumpite in Jerusalem ah uk ngei-in, Eufrates Gungal gam bup tungah aana zang uh a, siah leh mangmu leh losapte tua kumpite tungah kipia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin hih mite in nasep a khawl nading uh thupia in. Keimah in thu kong piakkik mateng hih khuapi kilamkik lo ding hi.
Hih thu tawh kisai-ah na sep ding don loin ommawk kei in; tua hi kei leh kumpi tungah siatna leh gimna hong khang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Menzipipa Rehum, lai-at Shimshai, leh amau’ lawmte’ zakna ah kumpi Artakzaksis tung panin a kingah lai a kisim ciangin, Jerusalem ah amaute pai pahin Judah mite a nasep uh zawhthawh thu tawh khawlsak uh hi.
Tua huna kipanin Jerusalem a, om Pasian’ inn a kisepna khawl hi; Persia kumpi Darias’ uk a kum nihna dong tua bangin khawlcip phot hi.
Tu-in kamsangte Haggai leh Iddo’ suan Zekhariah in Judah gam leh Jerusalem a, om Judah mite hanthawnin, Israel Pasian’ min tawh thu genkhol uh hi.
Tua ciangin Shealtiel’ tapa Zerubbabel leh Jozadak’ tapa Jeshua in Jerusalem a, Pasian’ inn lamkik ding kipan pah uh a, Pasian’ kamsangte in amaute ompihin huh uh hi.

Tua lai takin Eufrates Gungal gam sung teng a uk sawn Tattenai, Shetharbozenai, leh amau’ lawmte hong pai pahin amaute kiangah, “Note in hih inn lamkikin a nate na bawl nading uh kua in thu hong pia ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Hih inn lam nasepna-ah a sem mite’ min zong amaute in dong uh hi.
Ahi zongin Judah upate in Pasian’ vilna sungah nasem hi uh a, Darias’ kiangah a thu va tungin ama tung panin thu a kingah kik hun dong a nasep zomna uh kikhaktan lo hi.
Eufrates gungal gam a uk sawn Tattenai, Shetharbozenai, leh Eufrates gungal gam sung thu a vaan ama lawmte in kumpi Darias’ tungah laikhak uh hi.
Amaute in thuzaksakna lai hih bangin a gelh uh hi: “Kumpi Darias tungah thupha namcin hong tung ta hen.

Judah gam, alian Pasian’ innah ka va paina uh kong theisak uh hi. Tua inn pen suang lianpite tawh kilamin a kawmte sing tawh kibawl hi; hih inn lim takin kisemin amau’ makaihna tawh a nasep uh telh mahmah uh hi.
Hih inn a lamkik nading leh a nate a zawh nadingin kua in thupia hiam? cih thu hih upate tungah ka dong uh hi.
Nangmah in a makai teng na theih nadingin amaute’ min zong ka dong uh hi.
Amaute in hih bangin hong dawng uh hi: ‘Kote in vantung leh leitung Pasian’ nasemte ka hi uh a, kum tampi lai-a a kilamsa inn a lamkik ka hi uh hi; a lian Israel kumpi khat in lamin a zawhsa ahi hi.

Ahi zongin ka pu ka pate un vantung Pasian hehsak kha uh ahih manin Babilon kumpipa, Khaldea mi Nebukhadnezzar’ khut sungah amaute pia hi; tua kumpipa in hih inn susia a, a mite Babilon ah ciahpih hi.
Ahi zongin Babilon kumpipa Sairas’ uk a kum khatna kumin hih Pasian’ inn a kilamkikna ding amah in thupia hi.

Tua tham loin Jerusalem a, biakinn sung panin Nebukhadnezzar in la-in Babilon biakinn sunga a koih ahi Pasian’ inn sunga kham leh ngun tawh kibawl um-le-beelte zong kumpipa Sairas in Babilon biakinn panin la khia-in gam uk a, a hong koih Sheshbazzar min neipa tungah ap hi;
kumpipa in ama tungah, “Hih um-le-beelte paipih in la, Jerusalem a, biakinn ah va koihkik in; tua lai-a Pasian’ inn pen a mun ngei mah ah lamkik sak in,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Sheshbazzar hong pai-in Jerusalem a, Pasian’ inn a bulpi hong phut hi; tua huna kipanin tu dong inn lamkik kisem suak a, ahi zongin kizo nai lo hi,’ a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hoih na sak leh, Jerusalem a, hih Pasian’ inn a kilamkik nading thu kumpipa Sairas in thupia taktak hiam, pia taktak lo hiam cih a kitheih nadingin Babilon khua sunga om laibu koihna inn sung zong sak in. Tua khit ciangin kumpipa in na deihna hong zasak in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpipa Darias in thupia a, Babilon khua sunga lai manphate a kisen’na innte sung kizong hi.
Ahi zongin Babilon khua sungah na om lo a, Media gam sung kumpi khuapi Ekbatana-ah laizial khat kimu a, tua sungah hih anuai-a bangin a kiciamteh kimu hi:

“Kumpi Sairas’ kum khatna kumin Jerusalem khua a, Pasian’ inn tawh kisai-in kumpipa in hih thu pia hi: Biakna kipia-in meihal biakna a kipaipihna munah inn lamsak kik un; a mai panin a san’na tong sawmguk, a vai tong sawmguk mah hi ding a,
a kawm pen suang thuap thum leh sing thuap khat tawh a kibawl thuap li hi ding hi; hih sum beinate ahih leh kumpi sum panin kipia ding hi.

Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem biakinn panin la khia-in Babilon ah a hong tun’pih Pasian’ inn sunga om kham leh ngun tawh kibawl um-le-beelte zong kipia kik ding hi; tuate khempeuh Jerusalem biakinn ah kipuak kik ding a, Pasian’ inn sunga a omna mun mun ciatah kikoih kik ding hi,” ci-in kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi Darias in hih bangin thupia hi: “Tu-in, Eufrates Gungal gam a uk Tattenai, Shetharbozenai, leh Eufrates Gungal gam sung a vaan na lawmte, tua mun panin na kihemkhia ding uh hi;
Judah mi a ukpa leh a upate in hih Pasian’ inn a lamkik theih nadingun na tua ci omsak ding uh hi; ama mun ngei mah ah a inn lamsak kik un.

Hih a kigen Pasian’ inn a kilam kik theih nadingin hih Judah upate’ adingin na hih dingte uh zong thu kong pia hi. Hih nasepna a mawk khawl loh nadingin, Eufrates gungal gam sung panin a kingah siahte ahi kumpi sum sung panin beina khempeuh a cingin kipia ding hi.

Vantung Pasian’ tungah meihal biakna-in piak dingin a kisam khempeuh— bawngtalnote, tuutalte, ahih kei leh tuunote na pia ding uh a, Jerusalem-a siampite’ hong ngetna bangin mangbuh, ci, leenggahzu, ahih kei leh sathaute, kitasam loin ni simin amaute tungah pia sak un.
Tua hi leh amaute in vantung Pasian’ tungah a namtui biaknate pia-in kumpipa leh a tapate’ nuntak nading thu hong ngetsak thei ding uh hi.

Tua tham loin, mi khatpeuh in hih thupiakna a siatsak leh ama inn panin a innkam khat kidawh khiatsakin tua tungah amah kihen cipin kisat gawp ding a, tua banah a inn zong a kisuksiat nading thu kong pia thuah lai hi.

Hih ka thupiakna a siasak nuam, Jerusalem a, Pasian’ inn a susia nuam kumpi khatpeuh ahi a, mi khatpeuh ahi zongin a om leh, ama min om nading a, tua mun a bawl Pasian in tua mipa lawnthal ta hen. Keimah Darias in thu kong pia hi; ka thupiak bang tektekin sep ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi Darias in amaute tungah a thupiak bang tektekin Eufrates gungal gam sung a uk sawn Tattenai, Shetharbozenai, leh a lawmte in sem uh hi.

Tua hi a, kamsang Haggai leh Iddo’ suan Zekhariah’ thugenkholhna hangin Judah upate in a inn lam uh zom suakin mavang uh hi. Israel Pasian’ sawlna leh Persia kumpi Sairas leh Darias leh Artakzaksis-te’ thupiakna tawh amaute in a inn lam uh a zo uh hi;
tua hi a, kumpi Darias’ kum gukna, Adar kha a ni sawmnih-le-thum ni-in a inn kizo hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite, siampite leh Levi mite leh sal a suaksa hong ciahkik mi khempeuh in lungdamna lianpi tawh Pasian’ inn apna bawl uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian’ inn apna-in bawngtal zakhat, tuutal zanih, leh tuuno zali go uh a, mawhna hanga biak nadingin Israelte khempeuh adingin a minam phazah tawh kizui-in keeltal sawm-le-nih pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses laibu sungah a kigelh bangin Jerusalem a, Pasian’ nasep nadingin siampite amau’ panmun ngei-ah pangsak uh a, Levi mite amau nasepna ngei-ah sem sak kik uh hi.
A kha masa a ni sawm-le-li ni-in sal a suaksa hong ciahkik mite in Paisan Pawi bawl uh hi.

Siampite leh Levi mite a vekpi-un kisian’suah khin uh a, a vekpi-un zehsiang khin uh hi; tua hi a, amaute in sal suaksa a hong ciahkik khempeuh ading, a siampi pihte uh leh amau mahmah adingin Paisan tuuno go uh hi.
Salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik Israelte leh Israel Pasian, Topa bia dingin tua gam-a midang teengte leh a nitna uh pan amau leh amau a kihemkhia tawm mite khempeuh in tua Paisan Pawi an ne uh hi.

Tua hi a, amaute in lungdamna tawh ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum pawi bawl uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ lungdam nading a om theih nadingin Topa in Assiria kumpipa’ lungsim amau tungah a nuam dingin bawlsak a, tua ahih manin Israel Pasian ahi Pasian’ inn a sepna uhah kumpipa in amaute huh hi.
Hih thu teng khit ciangin Persia kumpipa Artakzaksis uk hun sungin Ezra, a pa Seraiah, a pa Azariah, a pa Hilkiah,
a pa Shallum, a pa Zadok, a pa Ahitub,
a pa Amariah, a pa Azariah, a pa Meraioth,
a pa Zerahiah, a pa Uzzi, a pa Bukki,
a pa Abishua, a pa Finehas, a pa Elazar, a pa, siampi lian Aaron—

hih Ezra pen Babilon panin hong paito hi. Amah pen Israel Pasian, Topa in a piak Moses thukham a siam lai thei mi khat ahi hi; Topa ahi ama Pasian in ompih ahih manin ama nget khempeuh kumpipa in pia hi.
Kumpi Artakzaksis in a uk a kum sagihna kumin Israel mite, siampite, Levi mite, lasate, kongcingte, leh biakinn nasemte pawlkhat zong, Jerusalem ah Ezra tawh paito uh hi.
Kumpipa’ uk kum sagih a cin’ kum, a kha ngana sungin Jerusalem tung uh hi;
a kha masa a ni khat ni-in Babilon panin dingkhia dingin Ezra in a ni sehkhol a, a kha ngana a ni khat ni-in Jerusalem tung uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in amah ompih hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Ezra in Topa’ thukham a sin ding, a zui ding, leh Israel mite a hilh dingin amah kipia hi.
Kumpi Artakzaksis in siampi ahi, lai theipa lah ahi, Israelte’ adingin Topa’ thupiaknate leh thukhamte a siam Ezra tungah a piak lai in hih bang ahi hi:
“Kumpite’ kumpi ahi Artakzaksis kiang panin vantung Pasian’ thukham a siam, siampi hi-in lai theipa lah ahi Ezra tungah:

Ka lungsim khentatna in hih bang ahi hi. Ka gam sunga om Israel mi khatpeuh ahi a, a siampite ahi uh a, Levi mite ahi zongin, Jerusalem ah a painuam khempeuh in nang hong zuih theih nadingun thu ka pia hi.
Nang tungah hong kipia ahi na Pasian’ thukham tawh kisai-in Judah leh Jerusalem ah thu bangci om hiam cih a va thei dingin kumpipa keimah leh thu hong lamlak mihing sagihte in kong sawl uh hi.
Kumpipa leh a thu lamlakte in lungkim takin Jerusalem ah a teeng Israel Pasian tungah a piak ngun leh khamte zong,
Babilon gam sunga na muh uh ngun leh khamte, leh Jerusalem a, note’ Pasian’ inn dingin mite leh siampite in lungkim takin a piakkhiat zuahzuahte uh tawh a va puakkhawm ding na hi hi.

Hih ka thupiakna tawh kizui-in hih sumte pen Jerusalem a, note’ Pasian inn-a biakna tau tungah piak dingin bawngtalte, tuutalte, tuunote, leh a an tawh biaknate leh a leenggahzu tawh biak nadingte lei nading bekin na zang ding uh hi.
Tua banah ngun leh kham a val a om lai leh, note’ Pasian’ deihna tawh kituakin hoih na sak bangun na lawmte tawh na zang thei ding uh hi.
Na Pasian’ inn ah zat dingin hong kipia um-le-beelte pen Jerusalem Pasian tungah na va pia ding hi.
Na Pasian’ inn adingin a kisam, na piak ding a phamawh a om khak zenzen leh kumpipa’ sum sung panin na zang thei ding hi.

“Tua hi a, kumpipa keimah Artakzaksis in Eufrates gungal gam sunga kumpi vankemte khempeuh tungah hih bangin thu ka pia hi: Vantung Pasian’ thukham a siam lai a thei, siampi Ezra in note tung panin a kisapna hong nget ciangin,
ngun talen zakhat, mangbuh seu zakhat, leenggahzu tambong zanih, sathau tambong zanih ciang, leh ci a deih zahzah na pia ding uh hi.
Vantung Pasian in a deih peuhpeuh, vantung Pasian’ inn adingin lim takin hih un; tua hi kei leh kumpipa’ tapate leh kumpigam tungah amah hong heh kha ding hi.

Siampite, Levi mite, lasate, kongcingte, biakinn nasemte, ahih kei leh hih Pasian’ inn-a nasemte khat peuhpeuh tung panin siah ahi a, mangmu ahi a, lo sap ahi zongin lak nading thu na neih lohna uh zong kong zasak uh hi, ka ci hi.

“Tua hi a, nang Ezra in nang tungah hong kipia na Pasian’ pilna tawh kizui-in Eufrates Gungal gam sunga mite thu a khen dingin na Pasian’ thukham a thei mite seh in; nang leh amaute in na Pasian’ thukham a thei lote na hilh ding uh hi.

Na Pasian’ thukham leh kumpipa’ thukham a mang lo peuhmah, sihna ahi a, hawlkhiatna ahi a, neihsa matna ahi a, thongkiatna ahi zongin, a ngah ding a kilawm thukhenna tawh khauh takin dan kitat ding hi,” a ci hi.

27-28 Tua ciangin Ezra in, “Jerusalem a, om Topa’ inn tua bangin a minthangsak thuah dingin kumpipa lungsim ah suak sak a, kumpipa leh a thulamlakte leh a uliante kei tungah a thunuam dingin a bawl i pu i pate’ Pasian ahi Topa in thupha ngah ta hen!” a ci hi. Tua hi a, Topa ka Pasian in kei hong ompihna thei ka hih manin ka lungsim hong hang a, kei hong zui dingin Israel makaite ka khawm hi.
Kumpi Artakzaksis’ uk hun sungin Babilon panin kei tawh hong ciahto khawm a behbeh-in a kiciamteh beh lutangte in:
Finehas-te panin Gershom ahi hi. Ithamar-te beh panin Daniel ahi hi. David-te beh panin Shekaniah’ tapa Hattush ahi hi.
Parosh-te beh sung panin Zekhariah hi a, amah tawh pasal zakhat leh sawmnga kiciamteh hi.
Pahathmoab-te beh panin Zerahiah’ tapa Elieho-enai hi a, pasal zanih tawh ahi hi.
Zattu-te beh panin Zahaziel’ tapa Shekaniah hi a, pasal zathum tawh ahi hi.
Adin-te beh panin Jonathan’ tapa Ebed hi a, pasal sawmnga tawh ahi hi.
Elam-te beh panin Athaliah’ tapa Isaiah hi a, pasal sawmsagih tawh ahi hi.
Shefatiah-te beh panin Mikhael’ tapa Zebadiah hi a, pasal sawmgiat tawh ahi hi.
Joab-te beh panin Jehiel’ tapa Obadiah hi a, pasal zanih leh sawm-le-giat tawh ahi hi.
Bani-te beh panin Josifiah’ tapa Shelomith hi a, pasal zakhat leh sawmguk tawh ahi hi.
Bebai-te beh panin Bebai’ tapa Zekhariah hi a, pasal sawmnih-le-giat tawh ahi hi.
Azgad-te beh panin Hakkatan’ tapa Johanan hi a, pasal zakhat leh sawmkhat tawh ahi hi.
A nunung penin Adonikam-te beh pan hi a, amaute’ min in: Elifelet, Jeiel, leh Shemaiah hi uh a, pasal sawmguk tawh ahi uh hi.
Bigvai-te beh panin Uthai leh Zabbud hi uh a, pasal sawmsagih tawh ahi uh hi.
Ahava gam lamah lui gei khatah amaute ka khawm a, tua lai-ah ni thum ka taam uh hi. Mite leh siampite ka etphat ciangin Levi mite khat zong na om lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a lawmte lakah a makai Eliezer, Ariel, Shemaiah, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zekhariah, leh Meshullamte, leh thu ngaihsut a siam Jo-i-arib leh Elnathante ka sam a,
Kasifia mun a, a makaipipa Iddo kiangah va pai-in, tua lai-a biakinn nasem amah leh a behte in, eite’ Pasian’ inn-a na a sem ding mihing hong puak ding uh a ngen dingin ka sawl hi.
Tua hi a, hehpihna a nei eite’ Pasian in hong ompih ahih manin Levi mi Mahli-te beh sung panin thu ngaihsut siam mi ahi Sherebiah, a tapate leh a behte tawh pasal sawm-le-giat,
leh Merari-te beh panin Isaiah, a behte leh amau’ tapate mi sawmnih leh Hashabiah tawh,
leh Levi mite’ na a sem dingin David leh a uliante in a tuamkoih ahi biakinn nasem zanih leh sawmnih hong pia hi. Hih mite khempeuh amau’ min ciat tawh a kisam ahi hi.

Tua ciangin eite’ Pasian’ mai-ah kote kiniamkhiat thei-in kote leh ka naupangte uh leh ka neihsa khempeuh uh nuam takin ka khualzinna uhah ka pai theih nading uh Pasian’ tung pan ka nget theih nadingun Ahava lui-ah antan’ nading thu ka taangko hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa kiangah, “Ka Pasian un amah a zong mite khempeuh ompihin amau’ adingin a hoih na sem a, amah a nusiate khempeuh tungah amah heh hi,” ci-in gen khin ka hih manun lampi-ah kote hong kha dingin galkapte leh sakol tung tuangte kumpipa kiangah ka nget ding ka maizum hi.
Tua hi a, kote in an ka tang uh hi; nuamtak-a ka khualzin theih nading uh i Pasian tungah ka ngen uh a, amah in ka thungetna uh hong pia hi.
Tua ciangin siampi liante sung panin, mi sawm-le-nih, leh Sherebiah, Hashabiah, leh amau’ behte mi sawm, ka tuam koih hi.
Tua ciangin, i Pasian’ inn nasep nadingin kumpipa leh a thulamlakte leh a uliante leh tua lai-a om Israel mi khempeuh in a tuam khenkhiat uh ngun leh kham leh um-le-beelte, amaute tungah ka ap hi.
Amaute tungah ngun talen zaguk leh sawmnga, talen nih a gik ngun tawh kibawl um-le-beel zakhat, kham talen zakhat,
kham darik tulkhat a man tawh kibawl kuang-uk sawmnih, leh kham zah-a a manpha sumsan hoih tawh a kibawl beel nih ka pia hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Topa tungah note hong ki-ap hi; um-le-beelte zong biakna vante ahi hi; ngun leh khamte ahih leh na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi Topa tungah citna tawh a kipia na ahi hi.
Siampi liante leh Levi mite leh Israel mi leh lutangte’ muh-in Jerusalem khua a, Topa’ inndei sungah na piak dong mateng uh vilin kem un,” ka ci hi.
Tua ahih manin siampite leh Levi mite in Jerusalem a, i Pasian’ inn ah puak dingin ngun leh kham leh um-le-beelte hong sang uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem zuan dingin kha masa a ni sawm-le-nih ni-in Ahava lui panin ka dingkhia uh hi; i Pasian in eite hong ompih ahih manin lam kal-ah galte leh pan’simna a tuamtuamte tawh hong kipelhsak hi.
Jerusalem khua ka tun’ uh ciangin ni thum sung ka tawlnga uh hi.

A ni li ni-in Uriah’ tapa siampi Meremoth’ tavuan lakna tawh i Pasian’ inn sungah ngun leh kham leh um-le-beelte kiseng hi; Finehas’ tapa Eleazar in amah huh a, Levi mi Jeshua’ tapa Jozabad leh Binnui’ tapa Noadiah in amau tegel huh uh hi.
Vante a ki-ap ciangin lim takin kivel a, a ki-ap na khempeuh ciamtehna lai khat kibawl hi.

Tua ciangin salsuahna panin inn hong zuankik mite in Israelte khempeuh’ adingin Israel Pasian’ tungah meihal biakna-in bawngtal sawm-le-nih, tuutal sawmkua-le-guk, tuuno sawmsagih-le-sagih, leh mawhna hanga biakna-in keeltal sawm-le-nih pia uh hi; hihte khempeuh pen Topa tungah meihal biakna ahi hi.

Amaute in, Eufrates Gungal gam sung tenga kumpipa’ nuai-ah a uk sawn a lianpente leh uliante tungah kumpipa’ thupiaknate zong va gen uh hi; tua hi a, amaute in mite leh Pasian’ innlam nasep huh uh hi.

Hih thute khempeuh a kisep khit ciangin keima kiangah makaite pawlkhat hong pai-in, “Hih gam-a teeng gamdang mite’ nitna leh Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Jebus mite, Ammon mite, Moab mite, Izipt mite, leh Amor mite’ gamtat a kihhuaite panin Israel mi, siampite leh Levi mite nangawn zong, a siangtho-in tuam om lo uh hi.

Amaute leh a tapate un hih gam-a teeng mi namdangte’numeite ten’pih uh a, tua thu hangin a siangtho minam pen tu-in gamdang mite tawh a kihel suak ta hi. Tua hi a, hih thu-ah makaite leh thukhen uliante pen a khial masa ahi uh hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Hih thu ka zak ciangin dah mahmahin ka puante balkekin, ka sam leh ka khamul botin, cih nading thei loin ka om hi.
Tua ciangin sal a suak hih mite’ cihtaklohna hangin Israel Pasian’ dantah ding lau-in a liing mite khempeuh keima kiangah hong kikhawm uh a, nitak biakpiak hun dong cih nading thei loin ka om hi.
Tua hi a, nitak biakpiak hun ciangin khua phawk kikin ka puan keekpi mah silh kawmin khukdin’in Topa ka Pasian’ lamah ka khut zaakin,
“Ka Pasian aw, ka mawhnate un ka lu dawn uh hong vuknelhin vantung dong banto ahih manin nangma lam kong et ding maizumin ka mai san hi, ka Pasian aw.

Ka pu ka pate uh huna kipanin tu hun dong mawhna lianpi ka nei uh hi. Tua thu hangin ka kumpite uh leh ka siampite un gamdang kumpite khut sungah sihna, salsuahna, neihsa kisuhna, leh maizumna thuak uh a, tu hunin zong tua bangmah ka thuak uh hi.

Ahi zongin tu-in Topa ka Pasian un tomkha sung kote hong hehpih a, a suakta pawlkhat hong omsakin ama mun siangtho ah siksan ding mun hong pia hi. Amah in ka mit uh hong vaak sak kikin ka salsuahna uhah ka nuntakna uh ka thak pat theih nading uh kalsuan cilna hong pia hi.

Kote in sal ka hi takpi uh hi; ahi zongin ka salsuahna uhah ka Pasian un hong nusia lo a, kote’ Pasian’ inn puahkikin ka din’sakkik theih nading uh leh Judah leh Jerusalem ah kidalna kulh ka neih theih nadingun kipat thakna a hong piak theih nadingin Persia kumpite ko tungah a thunuam dingin hong bawlsak hi.

10-12 “Kote’ Pasian aw, hih bang hi khin ahih ciangin kote in bang gen thei nawn ding ka hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh kamsang na nasemte tungah thu pia-in, ‘Note va lutin na luah ding uh gam in, tua gam a, a na teeng gamdang mite in ninsakin, a kihhuai a gamtatnate uh tawh mong khat pan mong khat dongin a ninsa gamnin ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin na tanute uh amau’ tapate tawh kitengsak kei un la, na tapate uh zi dingin amau’ tanute zong la kei un. Amaute’ phattuam nading leh mavan’ nading hanciam kei un. Tua bang hi leh note tha hatin tua gam-a piangte nuam takin na ne ding uh a, na tate un a luah tawntung dingin tua gam na piasawn thei ding uh hi,’ ci-in na thupiaknate ka zui kei uh hi.

Tu-in, kote’gamtatsiate leh a lian ka mawhnate uh hangin hih bang gimna lian ka thuak uh hi; ahi zongin nangmah in kote’ tuah dinga kilawm zah dan hong tuaksak loin, tu-a banga a nungta lai-in nong omsak zaw hi;

hih banga ka thuak khit uh ciangin kote in na thupiaknate mang lo kikin, a kihhuai-in a gamta mite tawh kitengin kizom kik ding ka hi uh hiam? Tua bang hi kik le ung, a suakta, a nungta ka om nawn loh dongun kote tungah na hehna hong tung sak ding hilo na hi hiam?

Israel Pasian, Topa aw, nang na thutang a, ahi zongin tu ni-a a om lai ko teng nong suakta sak veve hi. Na muhna ah kote a mawhpi mah hita le ung hong hehpih in; bang hang hiam cih leh mawhna hangin nangma mai-ah kuamah om thei lo hi,” ci-in thu ka ngen hi.

Ezra in tu-a bangin thu ngenin mawhna pulakin khitui naptui tawh Pasian’ inn mai-ah kunin a om lai takin Israel mi numei, pasal, naupang, mi tampi tak ama kiim-ah hong kikhawmin amaute khempeuh zong nakpi takin a kap uh hi.

Tua ciangin Elam-te beh sung panin Jehiel’ tapa Shekaniah hong pau-in Ezra kiangah, “Hih gam-a teng gamdang numeite ten’pihna tawh i Pasian’ tungah i khial hi. Ahi ta zongin Israel mite’ adingin lametna om lai hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, ka Topa uh nangma ngaihsutna leh i Pasian’ thupiakna a kihta mite’ ngaihsutna bangin hih i zite leh a tate uh i mak nading thu i Pasian’ tungah kiciam ni; tua ciangin thukham sunga om bangin gamta ni.
Ding in, nangma nasep ding ahi hi; kote in kong huh ding uh hi. Hang in la, sem in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ezra ding-in a kigensa bangin amaute a gamtat nadingun a kiciam dingin siampi liante, Levi mite leh Israel khempeuh sawl a, amau zong kiciam pah uh hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ inn panin Ezra paikhia-in Eliashib’ tupa Jehohanan’omna inndei ah pai-in tua lai-ah giak hi; salsuahna pan hong ciahkik mite’ khialhna hangin dah ahih manin amah in an leh tui ne zo lo hi.
Tua ciangin Judah leh Jerusalem sunga a om a hong ciahkik salte khempeuh Jerusalem ah a hong kikhop nading uh,
leh ni thum sungin a hong tung lo a om leh uliante leh upate’ hoihsakna bangin a neihsa khempeuh kimanin, sal suaksa mihonte panin a kihawlkhiat theih nading thu taangkona khat kibawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Judah leh Benjamin mi khempeuh ni thum sungin Jerusalem ah hong kikhawm uh hi; tua in a kha kuana a ni sawmnih ni ahi hi. Tua hi a, Pasian’ inn mai inntual ah hih thu hangin mi khempeuh patau-in guah lakah liingin tu uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Ezra ding to-in amaute kiangah, “Note in gamdang numeite zi-in la-in Israel mite’ mawhna na behlap uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na pu na pate uh Pasian ahi Topa tungah na mawhna uh pulak un la, ama deihna bangin gamta-in hih gam-a teeng gamdang mite leh gamdang mi ahi na zite uh tawh kikhenin tuam om un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a kikhawm mi khempeuh in dawngin kiko uh a, “Hi ta hen; na gen bangin ka hih ding uh hi.

Ahi zongin mi tampi hi hang a, guahzuk laitak zong ahi hi; hih guah lakah ka omsuak zo kei ding uh hi. Tua tham loin hih thu ah eite in mawhna lianpi hih kha ihih manin ni khat ni nih sungin hih nasep a kizo thei ding hi lo hi.

A kikhawm mihonpite’ tangin i makaite semsak in la, hih thu hangin eite tungah Pasian’ hehna a dam matengin, i khuapite sung khempeuh a, gamdang numei a ten’pih mi khempeuh amau khua sung upate leh thukhente ciat tawh a kiseh hunin i makaite kiangah va kilak uh hen,” a ci uh hi.
Asahel’ tapa Jonathan leh Tikvah’ tapa Jahzeiah tegel bek in nial uh a, Levi mi Meshullam leh Shabbethai in pan’pih uh hi.

Tua hi a, thukham omsa bangin hong ciahkik salsuakte gamta uh hi. Siampi Ezra in amau’ beh ciat tangin beh lutang pawlkhat tengkhia a, tuate khempeh a minin a kilo khia ahi hi. A kha sawmna a ni khat ni-in hih mite a thukan ding uh kipan uh a,
a kha masa a ni khat ni-in gamdang numei a ten’pih mite thu a kanna uh zo uh hi.
Siampite beh lak panin Jozadak’ tapa Jeshua leh a sanggamte beh sung panin Ma-aseiah, Eliezer, Jarib, leh Gadaliahte in gamdang numei a ten’pihna kimu hi.
Amaute in a zite uh a mak ding uh kiciam uh a, amau’ mawhna hangin biakna-in tuuhon panin tuutal khat hong paipih uh hi.
Immer-te beh sung panin Hanani leh Zebadiah ahi uh hi.
Harim-te beh sung panin Ma-aseiah, Elijah, Shemaiah, Jehiel, leh Uzziah ahi uh hi.
Pashhur-te beh sung panin Elio-enai, Ma-aseiah, Ishmael, Nethanel, Jozabad leh Elasah ahi uh hi.
Levi mite sung panin Jozabad, Shimei, Kelaiah (Kelite a kici), Pethahiah, Judah leh Eliezer ahi uh hi.
Lasate sung panin Eliashib ahi hi. Kongcingte sung panin Shallum, Telem leh Uri ahi uh hi.
Israel midang sung pan: Parosh-te beh panin, Ramiah, Izziah, Malkhijah, Mijamin, Eleazar, Malkhijah, leh Benaiah ahi uh hi.
Elam-te beh panin Mattaniah, Zekhariah, Jehiel, Abdi, Jeremoth, leh Elijah ahi uh hi.
Zattu-te beh panin Elio-enai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, Jeremoth, Zabad, leh Aziza ahi uh hi.
Bebai-te beh panin Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, leh Athlai ahi uh hi.
Bani-te beh panin Meshullam, Malluk, Adaiah, Jashub, Sheal leh Jeremoth ahi uh hi.
Pahathmoab-te beh panin Adna, Khelal, Benaiah, Ma-aseiah, Mattaniah, Bezalel, Binnui leh Manasseh ahi uh hi.
Harim-te beh panin Eliezer, Isshijah, Malkhijah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
Benjamin, Malluk, leh Shemariah ahi uh hi.
Hashum-te beh panin Mattenai, Mattattah, Zabad, Elifelet, Jeremai, Manasseh leh Shimei ahi uh hi.
Bani-te beh panin Ma-adai, Amram, Uel
Benaiah, Bedciah, Kheluhi,
Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,
Mattaniah, Mattenai, leh Ja-asu ahi uh hi.
Binnui-te beh panin Shimei,
Shelemiah, Nathan, Adaiah,
Maknadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
Azarel, Shelemiah, Shemariah,
Shallum, Amariah, leh Josef ahi uh hi.
Nebo-te beh panin Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jaddai, Joel leh Benaiah ahi uh hi.
Hih mite khempeuh in gamdang numei ten’pih uh a, amaute in a zite uh a tate uh tawh ma khawm uh hi.
Hakaliah’ tapa Nehemiah’ thugen in hih bang ahi hi. A kum sawmnihna Khislev kha sungin kumpi khuapi Susa-ah ka om lai takin,

ka sanggampa Hanani leh midang pawlkhat Judah gam panin hong tung uh hi; tua ciangin keimah in Jerusalem khua thu leh sal-a matna panin a suakta ahi a om suak Judah mite’ thu tawh kisai amaute kiangah ka dong hi.
Salsuahna panin a suakta, tua gam-a a om suakte in haksatna lianpi leh maizumna a ngahna uh, leh Jerusalem kulh kicimin kulhkongpite mei in a kattumna thu hong gen uh hi.
Hih thu ka zak ciangin tusukin ka kap niloh a, ni tampi sung an tangin, vantung Pasian kiangah thu ka ngen hi.
Ka thungetna-ah, “Aw vantung Pasian, Topa, nang hong itin na thupiakna a zuite tungah na thuciamna lim takin a zui, a lian a kihtak-huai Pasian aw,

Israel mi ahi, na nasemte’ taangin sun leh zanin kong thunget nilohna a ngai dingin na bil hong ngat in la, na mit hong hak in. Nangma tungah ko Israel mite ka khialhna uh, keimah leh ka pu ka pate zong ka khialhna uh ahi ka mawhnate uh kong pulak uh hi.
Nangma tungah kong khial khin uh a, na nasempa Moses tungah na piak ahi thupiaknate, thukhamte, leh ngeinate ka zui kei uh hi.
Na nasem Moses tungah, ‘Na cihtak kei uh leh mi namdangte lakah kong thehthang ding hi;

ahi zongin kei kiangah hong ciahkikin ka thupiaknate zui-in na sep uh leh leimong dongah a kithehthangsa na mite uh kaikhawmin keima min om nadingin ka telnasa munah amaute ka ciahpih ding hi,’ ci-a na thugen hong phawkkik in.
Topa aw, amaute pen na vangliatna leh a thahat na khut tawh hotkhiatsa na nasemte leh nangma mite ahi uh hi.

Keima hong thungetna leh nangma min a zahtak nuam na nasemte’ thungetna na bil hong ngat in. Tu ni-in kei tungah mavan’na hong pia in la, kei tungah hih kumpipa hong migit nading lungsim guan in,” ka ci hi.

Kei pen kumpipa’ anpiapa ka hi hi. Kumpi Artakzaksis’ kum sawmnihna Nisan kha sungin khatvei, a leenggahzu a baihsa-in a om khit ciangin la-in kumpipa ka pia a, ama mai-ah ka om lai takin ka mai a khing hi.
Amah in, “Ci na lopi-in bang hangin na mai khing ahi hiam? Na dahna khat om hi ding hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin lau mahmahna tawh
kumpipa ka dawng a, “Kumpipa nungta tawntung in. Ka pute ka pate a kivuina khuapi sia gawp a, a kongpite kangtum ahih ciangin maikhing loin bangci om theih ding ka hi hiam?” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Kei tungah bang hong ngen nuam na hi hiam?” hong ci hi. Kei zong ka lungsim tawngah vantung Pasian kiangah thu ka ngen a,

tua khit ciangin kumpipa dawngin, “Kumpipa na lungkim a, dik nong sak leh, ka puah phatkik theih nadingin Judah gamsung ka pute ka pate a kivuina khuapi-ah nong paisak nading kong thuum hi, topa,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in (kumpinu gei-ah tu kawmin), “Bang tan vei sawt ding a, cik ciangin hong ciahkik ding na hi hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in ka ngetna hong thukimpih a, kei zong ka ciahkik ding hun ka gen hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah, “Kumpipa na thukim leh, Judah gam ka tun’ dong amaute in kei hong paisuak sak theih nadingun Eufrates Gungal gamsung a uksawn mite ka piak ding laikhakte,

leh biakinn hut nading mun muanhuai kongpi ding, leh khuapi kulh ding, leh ka om nading inn lam nadingin sing hong piak theih nadingin kumpipa’ tulak a kem Asaf tungah piak ding laikhak zong, kei tungah hong pia in,” ka ci hi. A dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompih ahih manin kumpipa in ka ngette hong pia hi.
Tua ciangin Eufrates Gungal gam a uksawn mite kiang ka tung a, kumpipa’ laikhakte amaute tungah ka pia hi. Kumpipa in galkap mangte leh sakol galkapte kei hong kha sak hi.
Ahih zongin Israel mite’ phattuam nading a sem dingin mi khat hong paina thu Horonaim khuami Sanballat leh Ammon mi sal ahi Tobiah in a zak uh ciangin nakpi takin lungkim lo uh hi.
Jerusalem ka tun’ ciangin ni thum sung ka tawlnga hi.

Tua ciangin zan-in vak khia-in mi tawmkhat ka tonpih hi; ahi zongin Jerusalem’ adingin ka bawlsak ding ka Pasian in ka lungsim ah hong suahsak thu kuama kiangah ka gen kei hi. Keima tuan’na sim loh ganhing dang ka kizuisak kei hi.
Kuam Kongpi tawnin Gulpi Tuikhuk leh Nin Kongpi lamah ka pai a, a kicimsa Jerusalem kulhpi leh mei in a kattumsa a kongpite ka en hi.
Tua ciangin Tuinak Kongpi leh Kumpipa’ Bual-ah ka paisuak hi; ahi zongin ka tuan’na ganhing a paisuak theih nading mun om lo hi.
Tua hi a, a zanpi mahin kuam lamah pai-in khuapi kulh ka vel hi; tua ciangin Kuam Kongpi mah tawnin khuapi sungah ka lut kik hi.

Tua hi a, khua sung upate in ka paina mun ahi a, ka sep ahi zongin thei lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih nasep tavuan a la ding Judah mite, siampite, uliante, khua sung upate, leh adangte tungah ka gen nai kei hi.

Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “I lungkhamna thu na thei uh hi. Jerusalem a siasa-in omin, a kongpite mei in kangtum hi. Hong pai un, zahkona i ngah nawn loh nadingin Jerusalem kulh ciang pha ni,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin a dik ka Pasian in kei hong ompihna leh kumpipa in kei tungah hong gen thute zong amaute tungah ka gen hi. Tua ciangin amaute in, “Tu-in nasep kipan ni,” hong ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin lawp mahmah leh ngimna hoih tawh nasep kipan uh hi.

Ahi zongin Horonaim khuami Sanballat leh Ammon mi sal ahi Tobiah leh Arab gam-a a sem Geshem in tua thu a zak uh ciangin, kote zahpihna leh simmawhna tawh, “Hih na sep uh bang ahi hiam? Kumpipa lehpan’ na hi uh hiam?” hong ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute dawngin, “Vantung Pasian in ka ma uh hong telhsak ding a, ko ama nasemte in nasep a kipan ta ka hi uh hi; note in ahih leh Jerusalem tawh kisai-in na siksan ding uh ahi a, thu ahi zongin, bangmah kimematna na nei kei uh hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin siampi lian Eliashib leh a siampi pihte in nasep kipanin Tuu Kongpi bawl uh hi. Amaute in a khuamte leh a zawlte bawlin a kongkhakte bulh uh hi; amaute in Mi Za Khat Tausang ciang banah Hananel Tausang dong sem uh a, tua ciangin Pasian tungah ap uh hi.
Ama zomah Jerikho khuamite in sem uh hi. Amaute’ zomah Imri’ tapa Zakkur in sem hi.
Tua ciangin Hassena-ah’ tapate in Ngasa Kongpi bawl uh hi; amaute in a zawlte khungin a kongkhakte a kalhna tawh bulh uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Hakkoz’ tapa Uriah, a tapa Meremoth in ama khawk sung puah hi; tua zomah Meshezabel’ tapa Berekhiah, a tapa Meshullam; tua zomah Baana’ tapa Zadok in puah hi;
a zom kikah Tekoa khuamite in puah uh a, ahi zongin amau’ uliante in nasem makaite nuai-ah na sem nuam lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Paseah’ tapa Joiada leh Besodeiah’ tapa Meshullam in Jeshanah Kongpi puah uh hi; amaute in a zawlte khungin a kongkhakte a kalhnate tawh bulh uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Gibeon leh Mizpah khuami ahi, Gibeon mi Melatiah leh Meronoth khuami Jadon in Eufrates Gungal gam a uk sawnpa’ zum dong puah uh hi.
Tua zomah khamseekpa Harhaiah’ tapa Uzziel in puah hi; a zomah paknamtui bawlpa Hananiah in puah hi; amaute in Kulh Zai ciang dong a ngeina bangin Jerusalem bawlkik uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Jerusalem gam phel khat a uk, Hur tapa Refaiah in puah hi.
A zomah Harumaf tapa Jedaiah in ama inn mai san teng puah hi; tua ciangin a zomah Hashabneiah’ tapa Hattush in puah hi.
Harim’ tapa Malkhijah leh Pahathmoab’ tapa Hasshub in Meikhuk Tausang a huam khawk dang khat sung puah uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Jerusalem gam a phel khat a uk Hallohesh’ tapa Shallum in a tanute tawh puah uh hi.
Hanun leh Zanoah khua-a teeng mite in Kuam Kongpi puah uh hi; amaute in tua kongpi bawl pha-in a kongkhakte a kalhnate tawh bulh uh a, Nin Kongpi ciang dong tong tul khat sung kulh puah uh hi.
Bethhakkherem gam a uk, Rekhab’ tapa Malkhijah in Nin Kongpi puah hi; amah in tua kongpi bawl pha-in a kongkhakte a kalhnate tawh bulh hi.

Mizpah gam a uk, Kolhozeh’ tapa Shallum in Tuinak Kongpi puah hi; amah in tua kongpi bawl pha-in a kongkhakte a kalhnate tawh bulh hi; tua ciangin amah in kumpipa’ huan gei-a Shelah Bual a kulh ciang a, David Khuapi pan-a hong paisuk kahlei ciang dong sem hi.
Ama zomah Bethzur gam phel khat a uk, Azbuk’ tapa Nehemiah in David’ han san ciang, a kibawltawm bual leh Galkap Inn ciang dong puah hi.
Ama zomah a puah Levi mite in: Bani’ tapa Rehum; ama zomah Keilah gam phel khat a uk Hashabiah in ama gam taangin puah hi.
Ama zomah a puah a behte in: Keilah gam a phel khat a uk, Henadad’ tapa Bavvai in puah hi;
a zomah Mizpah gam a uk Jeshua’ tapa Ezer in a Kiu-a galvan koihna kahtohna san khawk khat puah hi.
Ama zomah Zabbai’ tapa Baruk in a Kiu panin siampi lian Eliashib’ inn kongkhak ciang dong khawk khat sung puah hi.
Ama zomah Hakkoz’ tapa Uriah, a tapa Meremoth in Eliashib’ inn kongkhak panin Eliashib’ inn mong ciang dong khawk khat sung puah hi.
Ama zomah Jerusalem kiim nai-a om siampite in puah uh hi.
A zomah Benjamin leh Hasshub in amau’ inn mai san puah uh hi. A zomah Ananiah’ tapa Ma-aseiah, a tapa Azariah in ama inn gei san teng puah hi.
Ama zomah Henadad’ tapa Binnui in Azariah’ inn panin a Kiu,
leh kulh kiu ciang khawk khat sung puah hi. Uzai’ tapa Palal in a Kiu gal san teng leh kumpipa’ inn panin hong dawk khia, zum cingte’ omna ahi tausang tungnung teng puah hi.
Amah zomah Parosh’ tapa Pedaiah leh Ofel mualtung a teeng biakinn nasemte in nisuahna lam manawhin Tui Kongpi gal san ciang leh tausang dawk puah hi.
Ama zomah Tekoa khuamite in a lian tausang dawk panin Ofel mualbo kulh ciang, khawk dang khat sung puah uh hi.
Sakol Kongpi tung san teng ahih leh siampite in amau’ inn mai san ciat puah uh hi.
Amaute’ zomah Immer’ tapa Zadok in ama inn mai san puah hi. Ama zomah Nisuahna Kongpi a cing, Shekaniah’ tapa Shemaiah in puah hi.
Ama zomah Shelemiah’ tapa Hananiah leh Zalaf tapa gukna Hanun in khawk dang khat sung puah uh hi. Amau zomah Berekhiah’ tapa Meshullam in ama inndei mai san teng puah hi.
Ama zomah khamseekpa Malkhijah in Kikaihkhopna Kongpi mai san-a om biakinn nasemte’ inn leh sumbukte’ inn ciang, leh a kiu-a inndei tungnung ciang dong puah hi.
Tua ciangin khamseekte leh sumbukte in a kiu-a inndei tungnung leh Tuu Kongpi kikal puah uh hi.
Sanballat in kote’ kulh cian’na thu a zak ciangin lungkim loin heh mahmah a, Judah mite hong zahko hi.

Amah in a kikholhpihte leh Samaria galkapte’ kiangah, “Hih Judah mi niangnuangte in bang hih dinga kipan ahi uh hiam? Hih mun bawlpha ding a, kingaihsun ahi uh hiam? Biakna pia-in, a nasep uh ni khat sungin zo dingin kilamen ahi uh hiam? Amaute in a kangtumsa nin bulomtang panin suangtum bawl kik thei ding ahi uh hiam?” ci hi.
Ama kiangah a om Ammon mi Tobiah in, “Amaute in bangbang ciang ta leh amau’ kulh cian’ tungah ngia khat kah leh kicim lel ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin keimah Nehemiah in thu ka ngen a, “Hong za in, kote’ Pasian aw, kote hong kisimmawh hi; kote hong zahkona amau lu tungah lehtuk sak in la, gamdang khatah sal suakin mi’ bawlsiatin amaute omsak in.
Amaute in a lang tangin kulh ciangte mai-ah nang hong kosia uh ahih manin amau’ mawhna maisak kei in la, na muhna panin zong a mawhna uh sumit kei in,” ka ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kulh ka ciang uh a, nasep a kim ciang bang kizo hi; mite in utna lungsim tawh sem uh hi.
Ahi zongin Sanballat, Tobiah, Arab mite, Ammon mite, leh Ashod mite in Jerusalem kulh cian’ nasep kizom suakin, kulh vang teng huk ding a kipat khitna thu a zak uh ciangin heh mahmah uh hi.
Tua hi a, Jerusalem hong simin buaina a piangsak dingin amaute kipawlin vaihawmna khat nei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka Pasian uh tungah thu ka ngen uh a, amaute a en dingin sun leh zanin galvil ka koih uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite in, “Nasemte a tha uh zaw ta a, ahi zongin nin tampi om lai hi; eima tha tawh kulh cian’ i zo ngei kei ding hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka galte un, “Amau’ phawk loh kalun amaute lakah pai-in i that ding a, a nasep uh i beisak ding hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Amaute lakah a teeng Judah mite khuapi sungah hong pai ciangin, ka galte uh a omna khempeuh ciat panun hong pai-in kote hong sim nading thu, sawm vei tak hong hilhkhol uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kulh nung lam mun niampenna mun awng tengah a namsau uh, a teipi uh, leh a thal uh tawh, a innkuankuan-un ka mite ka pangsak hi.

Mite’ launa ka muh ciangin, uliante leh mi ukte leh mikhempeuh tungah, “Amaute kihta kei un. Na sanggamte, na tapate, na tanute, na zite uh leh na inn na lote uh adingin hong dosak, a lian a kihtak-huai Topa phawk un,” ka ci hi.
Amau’ hong sawmna thu kote in ka phawkna uh leh Pasian in amau’ geelna a suksiatna thu ka galte un thei hi; tua ahih ciangin ka nasepna ciat uh kulh tungah ka vekpi-un ka kuankik uh hi.
Tua hun-a kipanin ka khut nuai-a om mite kimkhat in na sem a, a kimkhat in a teipite, a lumte, leh a thalte uh tawi-in sikpuan silhin ding uh hi; uliante in kulh a ciang Judah mite khempeuh uk uh hi.
Kulh-a cian’ ding na a nawn mite in khut lang khat in a van puak uh lenin a khut lang khat uhah galhiam tawi uh hi.
Kulh ciangte in na a sep kawmun a kawng ciat uhah a namsau uh kuah uh hi. Peengkul tumpa ahih leh keima kiangah om hi.
Tua ciangin uliante leh mi ukte leh mi khempeuh tungah, “I nasepna lian a, zaipi tak huam hi; eite kulh tungah kikhenin khat leh khat i kigamla hi.
Peengkul kitum na zakna peuhpeuh panun ko kiangah hong kikhawm un. I Pasian in eite adingin hong dosak ding hi,” ka ci hi.
Tua hi a, ni simin khuavak-a kipan nitak aksi suah dong, mi kimkhat in teipi tawi-in, mi kimkhat in na ka sem uh hi.
Tua hun mahin mite kiangah, “Zanin galvil, sunin nasemin nong om theih nadingun mi khempeuh na nasemte ciat uh tawh Jerusalem khua sungah hong giak un,” ka ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah-a kipan ka behte, ka nasemte, leh kei hong cingte, a kuamah peuh puan suah man om loin, mi khempeuh in ka khut uhah galhiam ka tawi den uh hi.
Tu-in mi nautang numei leh pasalte in a Judah mipihte uh tungah lungkim lohna kam hong gingsak uh hi.
Mi pawlkhatte in an lei nadingin a tanute uh leh a tapate uh a piakna thu gen uh hi.
Pawlkhatte in kial tun’ huhau-in an lei nadingin a lote, a leenggah lote, leh a innte uh a piakna hong gen uh hi.
Pawlkhatte in kumpipa tungah siah piak dingin a lote uh leh a leenggui lote uh khamin a piakna uh hong gen uh hi.

Amaute in, “Kote in ka behte uh mah bangin si-le-sa kibang hi-in, ka naupangte uh zong amau’ naupangte mah bangin a hoih hi napi-in, ka tanute uh leh ka tapate uh sal suak dingin ka phum uh hi. Ka tanute uh pawlkhat zong sal suak khin a, ka lote uh leh ka leenggui lote uh midangte’ aa suak khin ahih manin amaute tat nadingin ka hih zawh uh bangmah om lo hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Amaute’ kikona leh hih thute ka zak ciangin ka heh mahmah hi.
Kei zong hih thu lim takin ka ngaihsun a, tua ciangin uliante leh thukhente tai-in amaute kiangah, “No leh no lei kibat manin ameet na kila uh hi,” ka ci hi. Amaute nakpi takin tai-in,

”Mi namdangte tungah sal-a kizuaksa i Judah mipihte ahi zo zahzahin i tanh kik hi; tua hi napi-in note in na mipihte uh na zuak uh a, tu-in amaute i tat kik ding hi zel hi!” ka ci hi. Amaute pau loin om uh a, a gen ding mel uh thei lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, “Note’ gamtatna hoih lo hi. I gal ahi mi namdangte’ zahkohna i ngah loh nadingin i Pasian zahtakna tawh na gamtat ding uh kilawm hi.
Kei leh ka behte leh ka nasemte in zong an leh sum leitawi-in ka pia khia uh hi. Leiba ameet kilakna phiat ni.
Tu ni mahmah-in a lote, a leenggui lote, a oliv lote, a innte uh leh a meet-a na lak uh sum, an, leenggahzu, leh sathaute, amaute tungah pia kik un,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hihte khempeuh ka pia kik ding uh a, amaute tung panin bangmah ka kal nawn kei ding uh hi; na gen bangin ka gamta ding uh hi,” hong ci uh hi. Tua ciangin siampite ka sam a, a ciamsa bangun a gamtat nadingun kiciamna ka bawlsak hi.

Tua ciangin kei zong ka puan singin, “Hih thuciamna a tungsak lo peuhmah a inn leh a neihsa panin Pasian in singkhia ta hen. Hih bangin kisingkhia hen la, hawmsuak hen!” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin a kikhawmte khempeuh in, “Amen,” ci uh a, Topa phat uh hi. Tua hi a, a ciamsa bangun mite gamta uh hi.

Tua tham loin, Judah gam a uk dingin hong kiseh hun-a kipan, Kumpi Artakzaksis’ kum sawmnihna pan a kum sawmthum-le-nihna dong, kum sawm leh kum nih sung, kei leh ka behte in gam ukte’ ngah ngei ante ka ne kei uh hi.

Keima hun ma-in a ukte in mite tungah vangikpi suan uh a, amaute tung panin ni simin an leh lenggahzu ngun shekel sawmli man la uh hi. Amau’ nasemte nangawn mite tungah kiliansak lai uh hi. Ahi zongin Pasian ka zahtakna hangin tua bangin kei ka gamta kei hi.
Hih kulh cian’na ah tua tangin keimahmah in zong ka sem a, kei adingin leitang bangmah ka la kei hi; keima mite khempeuh nasem ding bekin tua lai-ah kisutuah uh hi.
I kiim i paam-a mi namdangte’ kiang pan hong paite banah, ni simin ka sabuai ah an a ne, thukhente leh Judah mi a kihelin leengla za leh sawmnga bang ka nei den hi.

Nisim in innsung annek tawm dinga kibawl bawngtal khat leh tuu limci guk ahi hi; tua mah bangin ak zong kibawl a, ni sawm simin leenggahzu a um tampipi-in kihih hi; tua zahin bei ta se leh gam ukte’ ngah theih ahi, an leh tui ka kal kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mite genthei lua hi.
Pasian aw, hih mite’ adingin ka bawlna khempeuh kei’ adingin a hoih lamin hong phawk in.
Kongpite ah kongkhak ka bulh nai loh hangin, kulh ka cian’ khitna leh a vang khat zong a om nawn lohna thu, Sanballat, Tobiah, Arab mi Geshem, leh ka gal dangte khempeuh un a zak uh ciangin,
Sanballat leh Geshem in Ono zanglei sunga om Hakkefirim khua-ah pai-in amaute tawh thu kikum dingin hong sam uh hi; hih pen kei hong suksiat nopna uh ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kei zong amaute kiangah kamtaite ka sawl a, “Tu lai takin nasep thupi ka nei hi, kong pai thei kei ding hi. Kei hong pai leng, kong pai sung ka om loh kal teng nasep kitawlnga ding hi,” ka ci hi.
Amaute in tu-a mah bangin li vei tak hong sam uh a, kei zong a li vei mahin tu-a bangin ka dawng kik hi.
Tua mah bangin Sanballat in a nga veina hong sam a, tua tung tangin a kamtaipa in laikhak khat hong pia hi.

A laikhak sungah, “Mi namdangte lakah a kigen, Geshem in zong tua a kigen thu man hi, ci-a a gen thu in, nang leh Judah mite in kumpi lehdo ding na sawm uh a, tua thu hangin kulh na ciang uh hi; tua banah nangmahmah zong kumpi na utna kigen lai hi.

Judah in kumpi khat nei ta hi, ci-in, nang kumpi na hihna thu Jerusalem ah a taangko dingin kamsangte pawlkhat a koih-in zong hong kigen hi. Kumpipa in hih thu za pelmawh ding hi.Tua ahih ciangin thakhatin hong pai in la, hih thu kikum ni,” ci-in kigelh hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, “Tua na gen bangin bangmah om lo hi; tua thu in nangma phuahtawm ahi hi,” ci-in ka thuk hi.
Kote in ka hanciamna uh khiamin nasep a kizawh loh nading deihna tawh amaute in kote hong lausak theih nading uh a hanciam uh ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka hahkat semsem zaw hi.

Mehetabel’ tapa Delaiah, a tapa Shemaiah a innah omcip ahih manin ni khat ama kiangah ka pai leh amah in, “Pasian’ inn sung, siangtho munah kituahin biakinn kong kikhak nelh ni; bang hang hiam cih leh nang hong that dingin amaute hong pai uh a, zanin amaute in nang hong that ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Ahih hangin keimah in, “Kei bang mite tai ding ahi hiam? Kei tawh kibang mite a suahtak nadingin biakinn sungah lut ding ahi hiam? Ka pai peuhmah kei ding hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin a thusim ka phawk khia hi. Pasian in tua bang thu gen dingin amah a sawl hi lo a, Tobiah leh Sanballat in tua bangin thugen dingin golhguk a na pia na hi a, ama thugenna in keimah suksiat nopna ahi hi.
Ama thugen bangin gamta-in mawhna ka bawl theih nadingin keimah hong lausak dingin a kicial ahi hi; tua bangin zui kha leng kei hong minsia sakin hong simmawh ding uh hi.
Ka Pasian aw, amau’ sepnate’ hangin Tobiah leh Sanballat thei in la, keimah lausak dingin a hanciam kamsangnu Noadiah leh kamsang dang khempeuh zong thei in.
Elul kha ni sawmnih leh ni nga ni-in kulh kizo a, ni sawmnga leh ni nih sung hun bei hi.
Ka galte un hih thu za-in, ka kiim uh-a om mi namdangte in a theih uh ciangin lamdang sa uh a, kote’ Pasian’ huhna tawh hih nasep kizo ahihna phawk uh hi.
Hih hun sung teng khempeuh Judah uliante in Tobiah kiangah lai tampi khak uh a, Tobiah’ laikhakte zong amaute tungah tung hi.
Tobiah pen Arah’ tapa Shekaniah’ makpa hi a, ama tapa Jehohanan in Berekhiah’ tapa Meshullam’ tanute khat ten’pih ahih manin Judah gamsunga mi tampi amah tawh kipawl hi.
Amaute in ama hoihnate zong keima zakna ah hong gen uh a, keima sepna teng zong ama kiangah na puak uh hi. Tua hi a, Tobiah in zong ka lau theih nadingin kei tungah lai tampi hong khak hi.
Kulh kiciang khinin, kongkhakte ka bulh khin a, kongcingte, lasate, leh Levi mite a kiseh khit ciangin,
ka sanggampa Hanani leh galdalna inn a uk Hananiah in a et dingin Jerusalem ka pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Hananiah in midang tampi sangin a citakzaw, Pasian a zahtakzaw mi khat ahi hi.

Tua hi a, amaute tungah, “Sun mateng Jerusalem kongpite hong sak kei un; tua ciangin ni om lai mahin kongte khak sakin kalh sak un. Jerusalem khua sunga teengte lak panin khuacing dingte seh un la, pawlkhatte galvilna munah, pawlkhatte amau’ inn mai ciatah omsak un,” ka ci hi.
Khuapi lianin zai a, ahi zongin a sungah mi tawm bek om a, innte a kilam om nai lo hi.

Tua ciangin uliante, thukhente, leh mite a innkuan kuanun ciamteh nading ka lungsimah Pasian in hong suaksak hi. Tua hi a, hong ciahkik masate’ khang ciamtehna laibu ka mu hi. Tua sungah ka muh a kigelhte in:

6-7 Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in a zawhna gam panin sal-in a lak mite sung panin hihte in, Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Azariah, Ra-amiah, Nehamani, Mordekai, Bilshan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum leh Baanahte’ makaihna tawh Jerusalem leh Judah gam sung amau khua ciatah a hong ciahkik mite ahi uh hi. Israel mite sung panin mi a phazah in:
Parosh suante mi tul nih za khat leh sawmsagih-le-nih ahi hi.
Shefatiah’ suante mi za thum leh sawmsagih-le-nih ahi hi.
Arah’ suante mi za guk leh sawmnga-le-nih ahi hi.
Pahathmoabte’ beh sung panin Jeshua leh Joab suante mi tul nih za giat leh sawm-le-giat ahi hi.
Elam’ suante mi tul khat za nih leh sawmnga-le-li ahi hi.
Zattu’ suante mi za giat leh sawmli-le-nga ahi hi.
Zakkai’ suante mi za sagih leh sawmguk ahi hi.
Binnui’ suante mi za guk leh sawmli-le-giat ahi hi.
Bebai’ suante mi za guk leh sawmnih-le-giat ahi hi.
Azgad’ suante mi tul nih za thum leh sawmnih-le-nih ahi hi.
Adonikam’ suante mi za guk leh sawmguk-le-sagih ahi hi.
Bigvai’ suante mi tul nih leh sawmguk-le-sagih ahi hi.
Adin’ suante mi za guk leh sawmnga-le-nga ahi hi.
Ater a kici Hezekiah’ suante mi sawmkua-le-giat ahi hi.
Hashum’ suante mi za thum leh sawmnih-le-giat ahi hi.
Bezai’ suante mi za thum leh sawmnih-le-li ahi hi.
Harif’ suante mi za khat leh sawm-le-nih ahi hi.
Gibeon’ suante mi sawmkua-le-nga ahi hi.
Bethlehem leh Netofah khuami za khat leh sawmgiat-le-giat ahi hi.
Anathoth khuami za khat leh sawmnih-le-giat ahi hi.
Bethazmaveth khuami sawmli-le-nih ahi hi.
Kiriath-jearim, Khefirah, leh Be-eroth khuami za sagih leh sawmli-le-thum ahi hi.
Ramah leh Geba khuami za guk leh sawmnih-le-khat ahi hi.
Mikmas khuami za khat leh sawmnih-le-nih ahi hi.
Beth-el leh Ai khuami za khat leh sawmnih-le-thum ahi hi.
Nebo khuami sawmnga-le-nih ahi hi.
Elam adang khat suante tul khat za nih leh sawmnga-le-li ahi hi.
Harim khuami za thum leh sawmnih ahi hi.
Jerikho khuami za thum leh sawmli-le-nga ahi hi.
Lod, Hadik, leh Ono khuami za sagih leh sawmnih-le-khat ahi hi.
Sena-ah khuami tul thum za kua leh sawmthum ahi hi.
Siampite sung panin: Jeshua-te beh panin Jadaiah suante mi za kua leh sawmsagih-le-thum ahi hi.
Immer’ suante mi tul khat leh sawmnga-le-nih ahi hi.
Pashhur’ suante mi tul khat za nih leh sawmli-le-sagih ahi hi.
Harim’ suante mi tul khat leh sawm-le-sagih ahi uh hi.
Levi mite sung panin: Hodevah-te beh panin Jeshua’ suante leh Kadmiel’ suante mi sawmsagih-le-li ahi hi.
Lasate sung panin: Asaf’ suante mi za khat leh sawmli-le-giat ahi hi.
Kongcingte nam sung panin: Shallum’ suante, Ater’ suante, Talmon’ suante, Akkub’ suante, Hatita’ suante leh Shobai’ suante mi za khat leh sawmthum-le-giat ahi uh hi.
Biakinn nasemte sung panin: Ziha’ suante, Hasufa’ suante, Tabbaoth’ suante,
Keros’ suante, Sia’ suante, Padon’ suante,
Lebana’ suante, Hagaba’ suante, Shalmai’ suante,
Hanan’ suante, Giddel’ suante, Gahar’ suante,
Reaiah’ suante, Rezin’ suante, Nikoda’ suante,
Gazzam’ suante, Uzza’ suante, Paseah’ suante,
Besai’ suante, Meunim’ suante, Nefushesim’ suante,
Bakbuk’ suante, Hakufa’ suante, Harhur’ suante,
Bazlith’ suante, Mehida’ suante, Harsha’suante,
Barkos’ suante, Sisera’ suante, Temah’ suante,
Neziah’ suante leh Harifa’ suante ahi uh hi.
Solomon’ nasemte’ suan leh khakte sung panin: Sotai’ suante, Sofereth’ suante, Perida’ suante,
Ja-ala’ suante, Darkon’ suante, Giddel’ suante,
Shefatiah’ suante, Hattil’ suante, Pokhereth-hazzebaim’ suante, leh Amon’ suante ahi uh hi.
Biakinn nasemte leh Solomon’ nasemte’ suan leh khakte mi a vekpi-in za thum leh sawmkua-le-nih pha uh hi.
Telmelah, Telharsha, Kherub, Addon, leh Immer khuate panin a hong ciahkik, Israel mi hi napi-in amau’ beh leh phung a kan thei lo mite in:
Delaiah’ suante, Tobiah’ suante, Nekoda’ suante, mi za guk leh sawmli-le-nih ahi uh hi.
Siampite’ sung panin zong: Hobaiah’ suante, Hakkoz’ suante, Barzillai’ suante (amah in Gilead mi Barzillai’ tanute khat ten’pihin tua min tawh a kilo pah) ahi uh hi.
Hih mite in khang ciamtehna sungah a kiciamteh mite lakah amau min a zon’ uh hangin mu lo uh ahih manin amaute a siang loin seh uh a, siampi nasep semsak thei lo uh hi;
tua hi a, Urim leh Thummim aisanna tawh aisan ding siampi khat a om matengin amaute in biakna an siangthopente a nek loh nading uh gam ukpa in gen hi.
Mi a vekpi-in tul sawmli leh tul nih leh za thum leh sawmguk pha a,
amaute’ nasem numei leh pasal tul sagih leh za thum leh sawmthum-le-sagihte kisim lo lai hi; tua banah amaute in lasa numei leh pasal za nih leh sawmli-le-nga nei uh hi.
Amau’ sakol uh za sagih leh sawmthum-le-guk, a la-sakol uh za nih leh sawmli-le-nga,
a kalaoh uh za li leh sawmthum-le-nga, leh a late uh tul guk za sagih leh sawmnih pha hi.
Beh lutang mi pawl khat in nasep nadingin nate pia uh hi. Gam ukpa in vanmanpha koihna ah kham darik tul khat, kuang-uk sawmnga, leh siampipuan za nga leh sawmthum pia hi.
Tua ciangin beh lutang pawl khatte in vanmanpha koihna ah kham darik tul sawmnih leh ngun mina tul nih za nih pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin mi dangte’ piakte in kham darik tul sawmnih, ngun mina tul nih, leh siampipuan sawmguk-le-sagih ahi hi.

Tua ciangin siampite, Levi mite, leh mi pawl khatte Jerusalem khua leh a kiim-ah teeng uh a, kongcingte, lasate, biakinn nasemte, leh Israel mi dangte amau’ khuapi ciatah teeng uh hi. Kha sagihna hong cin’ ciangin Israel mite amau’ khuapi ciatah teeng khin uh hi.

Tua ciangin Tui kongpimai tualpi ah mi khempeuh khe khat khai bangin hong kikhawmtuah diam hi; tua ciangin Topa in Israel mite tungah a piak ahi, Moses’ thukham laibu pen lai theipa Ezra in hong paipih nadingin gen uh hi.
Tua hi a, a kha sagihna a ni khat ni-in numei pasal, leh thu telthei ding a kikhawm khempeuh’ mai-ah siampi Ezra in thukham laibu hong paipih hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Tui Kongpi mai-a om tualpi lam mai ngatin zingsang tung-a kipan sun ciang dong, numei pasal leh thu a telthei ding mite’ zakin tua laibu sunga thute sim a, mi khempeuh in tua thukham laibu sunga thu kisimte lim takin ngai uh hi.

Tua ciangin thugen nadinga sing tawh kibawl tau tungah lai theipa Ezra dingto a, ama taklam pangah Mattithiah, Shema, Anaiah, Uriah, Hilkiah, leh Ma-aseiah ding uh a, a veilam pangah Pedaiah, Mishael, Malkhijah, Hashum, Hashbaddanah, Zekhariah leh Meshullam ding uh hi.
Mi khempeuh sangin a sangzaw munah amah ding ahih manin mi khempeuh’ muh theih dingin Ezra in a laibu hong hi; a laibu a hon’ ciangin mi khempeuh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ezra in a lian Pasian, Topa thupha pia a, mi khempeuh in a khut uh laamto-in, “Amen, Amen,” ci-in dawng uh hi; tua ciangin a lu uh kunin lei lam mai ngatin Topa bia uh hi.

Mite amau’ omna san ciatah a om sungun mite in thukham a teltheih nadingun Levi mi Jeshua, Bani, Sherebiah, Jamin, Akkub, Shabbethai, Hodiah, Ma-aseiah, Kelita, Azariah, Jozabad, Hanan, Pelaiah-te in a khiatna hilh uh hi.
Amaute in Pasian’ thukham laibu sung panin a kitel takin sim uh a, a cihnopna a kitelin gen uh a, tua a kisim thute a tel nadingun hilh uh hi.

Tua ciangin gam ukpa Nehemiah, leh lai theipa lah hi-in siampi lah ahi Ezra, leh mite a hilh Levi mite in amaute khempeuh kiangah, “Tu ni in Topa note’ Pasian adingin biakna ni siangtho ahi hi; a kap a mau om kei un,” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thukham kammalte a zak uh ciangin mi khempeuh kap uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Tu-in ciah un; an lim tui lim ne-in thadim un la, a nei zo lote zong va kholh un; bang hang hiam cih leh i Topa’ adingin tu ni in biakna ni siangtho ni ahi hi; dah kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa sungah lungdamna in note’ thahatna ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Levi mite in mite gamdai sak a, “Dai takin om un; bang hang hiam cih leh tu ni in biakna ni siangtho ni ahi hi; dah kei un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh an ne tui dawnin midangte a kholh ding leh lungdam-a om dingin ciah uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tungah a kigen thute amaute in theitel uh hi.
A ni nih ni-in thukham sin dingin siampite leh Levi mite tawh beh lutang khempeuh lai theipa Ezra kiangah hong kikhawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin, a kha sagihna pawi hun sungin sawlbuk sungah Israel mite a om nading thu, leh amaute in a khuapi khempeuh uh leh Jerusalem ah taangko-in, “A kigensa bangin sawlbuk lam nadingin gam lakah pai un la, oliv hiangte leh gamlak oliv hiangte, mui sing hiangte leh nisuh hiangte, leh a teh tam singhiang dangte va sat un,” ci-in a gen ding uh, Moses tung tawnin Topa in a thupiakna pen thukham sungah a kigelh lam mu uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite kuan khia-in tua singhiangte hong pua-in amau’ innkhumzang ciat, a inntual uh, Pasian’ inntual, Tui Kongpi tual leh Efraim Kongpi tual-ah sawlbuk lam uh hi.

Tua hi a, salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik a kikhawm mite khempeuh in sawlbuk lamin tuate sungah om uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Nun’ tapa Joshua’ hun-a kipanin tua ni dongin Israel mite in tua bangin pawikham ngei lo uh hi. Tua hi a, amaute lungdam mahmah uh hi.

Tua hi a, akipat ni-a kipan abei ni dong Ezra in ni simin Pasian’ thukham laibu simkhia hi. Amaute in ni sagih sung tua pawikham uh a, a ngeina om bangin a ni giat ni-in pawi khupna a thupi kikhopna khat om hi.
Tua kha mah a ni sawmnih-le-li ni-in an tang dingin Israel mite kikhawm uh a, puanhampi silhin a lu tung uhah lei kibuak uh hi.
Tua hi a, gamdang mi khempeuh panin Israel mite tuam om uh a, amaute in din’sa-in amau’ khialhnate leh a pu a pate uh mawhnate pulak uh hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ omna mun ciat uhah ding-in Topa amau’ Pasian’ thukham laibu nai thum sung sim uh a, a dang nai thum sung amaute in mawhna pulakin Topa a Pasian uh zahtakna bawl uh hi.
Levi mite’ kahlei tungah Jeshua, Bani, Kadmiel, Shebaniah, Bunni, Sherebiah, Bani, leh Khenani ding uh a, Topa amaute’ Pasian tungah nakpi-in kiko uh hi.

Tua ciangin Levi mi Jeshua, Kadmiel, Bani, Hashabneiah, Sherebiah, Hodiah, Shebaniah, leh Pathahiah-te in, “Ding un, Topa na Pasian uh phat un la, ‘A tawntung pan a tawntung dongin a minthang na min in thupha ngah a, thupha khempeuh leh phatna dang khempeuh sangin sangzaw hi.

Nang bek in Topa na hi hi; nangmah in van sangpen vantung a, aksihonpite tawh, leitung leh a tunga om khempeuh, tuipi leh a sunga om khempeuh na bawl hi. Nangmah in tuate khempeuh na piangsak a, vantungmi honpi in Nang hong bia uh hi.
Nangmah in Abram teelin Khaldea gam Ur khuapi panin paikhiatpihin Abraham min a phuak Pasian, Topa na hi hi.

Nangma tungah amah a cihtakna na mu a, Kanaan mite gam, Hit mite gam Amor mite gam, Perez mite gam, Jebus mite gam, leh Girgash mite gam, amah leh a suan leh khakte tungah piak dingin ama tungah thuciamna khat na bawl hi. Nangmah thuman na hih manin na thuciamna na tungsak hi.
“ ‘Nangmah in Izipt gamsunga ka pute ka pate uh gimna mu-in huhna ngenin San Tuipi-ah hong kikona uh na za a,

amaute in ka pute ka pate uh kihihsakna tawh a hih gawpna thei na hih manin Faro leh a nasemte leh a gam mi khempeuh langpanin lim leh nalamdang na bawl hi; tua hi a, tu ni dongin a kip min khat nangma adingin na ngah hi.
Amaute’ mai-ah tuipi phelkham na hih manin tuipi laizang leikeu tungah amaute paisuak uh a, ahi zongin tuilianpi sunga suang lot bangin tui thukna sungah amau a delhte na lawn hi.
Sunin meii khuam khat tawh amaute lam na lak a, amau’ lam paina khua a vaksak dingin zanin mei khuam khat tawh lam na lak hi.
Sinai Mual tungah kumsukin, vantung panin amaute hopihin, amaute tungah a man thukhenna, thukham taktak, a hoih ngeinate leh thupiaknate na pia a,
na nasempa Moses tung tawnin amaute tungah na sabbath siangtho na theisak a, thupiaknate, ngeinate, leh thukhamte na pia hi.

A gilkialna uh a vahsak dingin vantung panin an na pia a, a dangtakna uh a phasak dingin suangpi panin tui na phulsak a, amaute tungah piak dingin na kiciamsa gamah lutin a luah nadingun amaute na sawl hi.
“‘Ahi zongin kote’ pute pate kihisakin lung khauh uh a, na thupiaknate mang lo uh hi.

Amaute in thu mang nuam lo uh a, amaute lakah na bawl nalamdangte ngaihsun kha lo uh hi; amaute lung khauh niloh uh a, a salsuahna uh Izipt-ah a paipih kik dingin makai khat seh uh hi. Ahi zongin nang in mawhna a maisak nuam, dikin hehpihna a nei, lungduai-in itna kip a nei Pasian na hi a, amaute na nusia tuan kei hi.
Amaute in a kisung bawngno khat amau mah adingin bawlin, “Hih in Izipt panin note hong pai khiatpih na Pasian uh ahi hi,” ci-in gendai-mawhna lianpi a bawl uh ciangin zong,
nang in na hehpih mahmah manin amaute gamlakah na nusia kei hi. Sunin lam a lak meii khuam in amaute nusia lo a, zanin a pai nading uh lampi a vaksak mei khuam in zong amaute nusia lo hi.
Amaute a thuhilh dingin a hoih na Kha Siangtho na pia a, na manna an zong amaute kiang panin na la kik kei a, a dangtakna uh a phasak dingin tui na pia hi.
Kum sawmli tawntung gamlakah amaute na vak a, amaute in bangmah tangsapna nei lo uh hi; a puante uh zong sia lo a, a khe uh zong bawk beek lo hi.
Nangmah in amaute tungah kumpi gamte leh mite na pia a, tuate in gal sung van ngah dingin na piak ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Heshbon kumpipa Sihon’ gam leh Bashan kumpipa Og’ gam luah uh hi.
Nangmah in amau’ suan leh khakte van-a aksi zahin sim zawh lohin na tamsak a, a pu a pate un a luah dingin piak dingin na ciamsa gamah amaute na paipih hi.
A suan a khakte uh tua gamah lutin a lak uh ciangin, amau’ mai-ah tua gam-a teeng Kanaan mite na nuaisiah a, a ut bang bangun a bawl dingun a kumpite leh a mite amau’ khut sungah na pia hi.

Tua hi a, amaute in kulh nei khuapite leh gam hoihte la uh a, na hoih tampi tawh a kidim innte, suang kikhuak tuibeemte, leenggui lote, oliv lote, leh nek theih singgah kung tampi luah uh hi; amaute in tuate ne-in gilvahin thau uh a, nangma hoihna hangin nuamsa mahmah uh hi.

“‘Ahi zongin amaute in dem nopna lungsim nei-in nang hong lehdo uh hi; amaute in na thukham nungngat uh a, nangma lamah hong ciahkik nadingun amaute a hilhkhol na kamsangte that uh a, amaute in gendai-mawhna lianpi bawl uh hi.

Hih thu hangin a galte uh khut sungah amaute na ap a, a galte un amaute hih gawpgawp uh hi. Ahi zongin amau a kihih gawpgawp hun ciangin nang tungah hong ko uh a, nangmah in vantung panin na za a, na hehpihna lianpi tawh amau’ galte kiang panin a honkhia ding honkhiate na puak hi.

Ahi zongin a tawldam khit uh ciangin nangma muhna ah a sia gamta zel uh a, nangmah in amau’ galte khut sungah na nusia a, a galte un amaute ukgawp uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute in nang tungah huhna hong nget uh ciangin vantung panin amau’ ngetna za-in na hehpihna tawh amaute tam veipi na honkhia hi.

Tua hi a, na thukham lamah amaute hong kihei kik nading lim takin amaute na hilhkhol a, ahi zongin amaute kihisakin na thupiaknate don lo uh hi; a zuite tungah nuntakna a pia thei ahi na ngeina kip tungah amaute khial uh hi. Lung khauhin phengphi-in amaute kiheikhia uh a, thu mang nuam lo uh hi.

Kum tampi sung lungduaina tawh amaute na thuak a, na kamsangte tung tawnin na Kha Siangtho tawh amaute na hilhkhol hi; ahi zongin amaute in ngai nuam lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin gamdang mite khut sungah amaute na pia hi.
Ahi ta zongin na hehpihna lian hangin amaute beisak loin, zong na nusia kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in dikna leh hehpihna a nei na hi hi.

“‘Tua ahih ciangin tu-in a lian, a vanglian, a kihtakhuai, itna tawh kipawl thuciamna kip takin a len kote’ Pasian aw, Assiria kumpite’ hun-a kipan tu ni dongin ka kumpite uh, ka uliante uh, ka siampite uh, ka kamsangte uh, ka pu ka pate uh leh ko mi khempeuh tungah hong tung gimnate hong neu ngaihsut sak kei in.
Kote tungah hong tungsa thu khempeuh ah nangmah a thutang na hi a, nang citakin a om na hi a, ko a khial gamtat kha ka hi uh hi.
Ka kumpite uh, ka uliante uh, ka siampite uh leh ka pu ka pate un nangma thukham zui lo uh a, amaute tungah na piak ahi na thupiaknate leh na hilhkholhnate zong don lo uh hi.

Amaute tungah na piak gamzai leihoih ah omin, amaute tungah na piak hauhna lianpi tawh nuamsa-in amau’ kumpite’ khut nuai-ah a om laitak nangawn-un amaute in nangma’ na hong sem lo uh a, gamtat hoih lote uh nusia lo uh hi.
Tu-in kote sal ka hi uh hi; ka pu ka pate un a leitang pan-a piangte ne-in a na hoih khempeuhte nuam tak-a a ngah nadingun na piak gam hih lai munah kote sal ka hi ta uh hi.

Tu-in leitang tunga piang khempeuh pen kote’ mawhna hangin kote tungah nong koih kumpite tungah tung ta hi. Tua kumpite in kote pumpi tungah thu hong nei-in, ka ganhingte uh a ut ut-un hong hihsak uh a, kote lungkham mahmahin ka om uh hi,’ ci un,” a ci uh hi.
Hih thute khempeuh hangin a kip thuciamna khat bawlin lai-in ka gelh uh a, ka uliante uh, ka Levi mite uh leh ka siampite un zong tua lai tungah a min uh gelh uh hi.
Tua lai tungah a min a gelh mite in Hakaliah’ tapa, gam ukpa Nehemiah, Zedekiah,
Seraiah, Azariah, Jeremiah,
Pashhur, Amariah, Malkhijah,
Hattush, Shebaniah, Malluk,
Harim, Meremoth, Obadiah,
Daniel, Ginnethon, Baruk,
Meshullam, Abiah, Mijamin,
Ma-aziah, Bilgai, Shemaiah; hih teng pen siampite ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin Levi mite sung pan: Azaniah’ tapa Jeshua, Henadad’ suante sung pan Binnui, Kadmiel,
Shebaniah, Hodiah, Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,
Mika, Rehob, Hashabiah,
Zakkur, Sherebiah, Shebaniah,
Hodiah, Bani, Beninu ahi uh hi.
Ukpite’ sung panin: Parosh, Pahathmoab, Elam, Zattu, Bani,
Bunni, Azgad, Bebai,
Adonijah, Bigvai, Adin,
Ater, Hezekiah, Azzur,
Hodiah, Hashum, Bezai,
Harif, Anathoth, Nebai,
Magpiash, Meshullam, Hezir,
Meshezabel, Zadok, Jaddua,
Pelatiah, Hanan, Anaiah,
Hoshea, Hananiah, Hasshub,
Hallohesh, Piha, Shobek,
Rehum, Hashabnah, Ma-aseiah,
Ahiah, Hanan, Anan,
Malluk, Harim, Baanah-te ahi uh hi.
A om lai mite siampite, Levi mite, kongcingte, lasate, biakinn nasemte, a zite a tapate leh a tanute, thu teltheihna a nei, Pasian thukham hangin gamdang mite panin a tuam om mi khempeuh in

a sanggam uh ahi, amau’ makaite pawmin, Pasian’ nasem Moses in a piak Pasian’ thukham zui-in, eite’ Topa ahi Topa’ thupiakna khempeuh, ama ngeinate leh ama thukhamte a zuih nading uh kiciamna bawl uh hi.
Gamdang mite tungah i tanute i kha kei ding a, i tapate’ zi dingin zong i la kei ding hi.

Hih mite in sabbath ni-in van ahi a, an ahi zongin hong zuak leh sabbath ni leh ni siangtho khat peuhpeuh ni-in i lei kei ding hi. Kum sagihna-a an piangte lo-ah nusia-in tua kumin leiba khempeuh i maisak ding hi.

Eite’ Pasian’ innah nasep nading ahi Ompihna Anlum, a man manin an tawh biakna, a man manin meihal biakna, sabbath ni, khadet ni, a kiseh pawite, biakna letsongte, leh Israel mite’ tangin a kibawlsak ahi kilemna bawl nadingin mawhna hanga biaknate, leh i Pasian’ innah sep ding a kisam dangte khempeuh-a zat dingin kum simin shekel khat seh-thum-suah-seh-khat piak ding ka kiciam uh hi.

Tua ciangin thukham sunga a kigelh bangin a kiseh hunin a kum kumin Topa eite’ Pasian’ biakna tau tungah beh a ban banin i Pasian’ inn sungah cih dingin sing a kitut nadingin siampite, Levi mite, leh ko mi vekpite in sing pua ding sehna ai ka saan uh hi.
I leitang panin a piang anpalte leh singgah kungte panin a gah masa khempeuh a kum kumin Topa’ innah i puak ding ka kiciam uh hi;

thukham sunga a kigelh mah bangin, i Pasian’ innah a om, i Pasian’ inn sungah na a sem siampite kiangah zong i tapa upapente leh i bawngte’ tacilte, leh i ganhonte’ tacilte leh i tuuhonte’ tacilte i paipih nading,

leh annel lom i meek masakpen siampite tungah i puak ding, leh gah nei sing khempeuh panin a gah masa, sathau leh leenggahzu thakte khempeuh i Pasian’ inn vankoihna-ah i puak ding, leh lo khawhna i khuaneute khempeuh ah sehsawm suah sehkhat a kaikhawmte in Levi mite ahih manin i leitang panin i sehsawm suah sehkhat khempeuh Levi mite kiangah i puak ding ka kiciam uh hi.

Levi mite in sehsawm suah sehkhat a khop uh ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite tawh hih khawm ding uh hi; tua ciangin Levi mite in i Pasian’ inn sunga vankoihna a kilawm mun inndeite ah sehsawm suah sehkhat sungpan sawm-ah khat puak ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh biakinn um-le-beelte a kikoihna inndeite leh na a sem siampite, kongcingte leh lasate a giahna inndeite ah Israel mite leh Levi mite in a kipia ante, leenggahzute leh sathaute a paipih ding uh ahi hi. Eite’ Pasian’ inn kin loin i om kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah mi makaite teeng uh hi; tua lo midang teng, amau’ lak pan mi sawm-ah khat, khuapi siangtho Jerusalem ah a teeng dingin aisaanna tawh kiteel uh a, a om lai mi sawm-ah kuate ahih leh khuapi dangte ah om uh hi.
Tua hi a, sawl lohin, Jerusalem ah amau thu-in a teeng tawm nuam khempeuhte tungah mite lungdam uh hi.

Hih anuai-ate in Jerusalem-a a teeng a uksawn ukpite ahi hi; ahi zongin Judah khuapi dangte ah Israel midangte, siampite, Levi mite, biakinn nasemte, leh Solomon’ nasemte’ suan leh khakte teeng uh a, amau’ neihsa, a khuapi ciat uhah teeng uh hi.
