Judah minam leh Benjamin minam sung panin mi pawlkhat zong Jerusalem ah teeng uh hi. Judah minam sung panin: Perez’ suan Mahalalel, a tapa Shefatiah, a tapa Amariah, a tapa Zekhariah, a tapa Uzziah, a tapa Athaiah’ suante,
leh Shelah’ suan Zekhariah, a tapa Jo-i-arib, a tapa Ada-iah, a tapa Hazaiah, a tapa Kolhozeh, a tapa Baruk, a tapa Ma-aseiah’ suante ahi uh hi.
Jerusalem ah a teeng Perez’ suante khempeuh in galhang mi za li leh sawmgiat-le-giat pha uh hi.
Benjamin minam sung panin: Jeshaiah’ tapa Ithiel, a tapa Ma-aseiah, a tapa Kolaiah, a tapa Pedaiah, a tapa Joed, a tapa Meshullam, a tapa Sallu’ suante,
leh a beh Gabbai leh Sallai hi uh a, mi za kua leh sawmnih-le-giat pha uh hi.
Zikri’ tapa Joel in amau’ mapi hi a, Hassenuah’ tapa Judah in khuapi uk a nihnapa ahi hi.
10-11 Siampite’ sung panin: Pasian’ inn a uk Ahitub’ tapa Meraioth, a tapa Zadok, a tapa Meshullam, a tapa Hilkiah, a tapa Seraiah, a tapa Jo-i-arib, a tapa Jedaiah
leh inn nasep a sem a behte hi uh a, mi za giat leh sawmnih-le-nih pha uh hi; tua ciangin Malkhijah’ tapa Pashhur, a tapa Zekhariah, a tapa Amzi, a tapa Pelaih, a tapa Jeroham, a tapa Ada-iah,
leh beh lutang ahi a beh dangte hi a, za nih leh sawmli-le-nih pha uh hi; tua ciangin Immer’ tapa Meshillemoth, a tapa Ahzai, a tapa Azaral, a tapa Amashai,
leh a thahat a vanglian a behte hi a, mi za khat leh sawmnih-le-giat pha uh hi; Haggedolim’ tapa Zabdiel in amau’ mapi ahi hi.
Levi mite sung panin: Bunni’ tapa Hashabiah, a tapa Azrikam’ tapa Hashub’ tapa Shemaiah,
leh Pasian’ inn pualam nasep a uk, Levi mi ukpite ahi Shabbethai leh Jozabad,

leh lungdam koh thungetna patkhiat ding a makai Asaf, a tapa Zabdi, a tapa Mika, a tapa Mattaniah, leh a sanggamte lakah a nihna ahi Bakbukiah, leh Jeduthun’ tapa Galal, a tapa Shammua, a tapa Abda’ suante beh ahi uh hi.
Khuapi siangtho sunga Levi mi a om khempeuh mi za nih leh sawmgiat-le-li pha uh hi.
Kongpite a vil kongcingte in Akkub, Talmon leh a behte hi uh a, mi za khat leh sawmsagih-le-nih pha uh hi.
A om lai Israelte, siampite leh Levi mite ahih leh Judah khuapi dangte ah om uh a, amau’ luah leitang ciatah teeng uh hi.
Ahi zongin biakinn nasemte ahih leh Ofel mualbo-ah teeng uh a, Ziha leh Gishpa in amaute uk uh hi.
Jerusalem a, Levi mite ukin Pasian’ inn nasepna a vaanpa in Mika’ tapa Mattaniah, a tapa Hashabiah, a tapa Bani, a tapa Uzzi hi a, amah in lasa Asaf’ suante sung pan ahi hi.
Tuate beh in kumpipa’ thupiakna tawh nasem uh a, tua lasate in ni simin na a sep ding uh kisam hi.
Tua ciangin Judah’ tapa Zerah, a tapa Meshezabel, a tapa Pethahiah in mite tawh kisai thu khempeuh ah kumpipa zatpen ahi hi.
Khuaneute leh a kiim-a lote tawh kisai-in: Judah mi pawlkhatte’ teenna in, Kiriath-arba leh a khuaneute, Dibon leh a khuaneute, Jekabze-el leh a khuaneute,
Jeshua, Moladah, Bethpelet,
Hazarshual, Be-ersheba leh a khuaneute,
Ziklag, Mikonah leh a khuaneute,
Enrimmon, Zorah, Jarmuth,
Zanoah, Adullam, a khuaneute uh, Lakhish leh a lote, Azekah leh a khuaneute ahi hi. Tua hi a, amaute in Be-ersheba panin Hinnom Kuam dongah teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Geba, Mikmash, Aija, Beth-el leh a khuaneute,
Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah,
Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim,
Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,
Lod, Ono, leh Geharashim khuate-ah Benjamin mite teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah gam a, Levi mite pawlkhat Benjamin gamah kigawm hi.
Shealtiel’ tapa Zerubbabel leh Jeshua tawh hong ciahkik siampite leh Levi mite in: Seraiah, Jeremiah, Ezra,
Amariah, Malluk, Hattush,
Shekaniah, Rehum, Meremoth,
Iddo, Ginnethoi, Abijah,
Mijamin, Ma-adiah, Bilgah,
Shemaiah, Jo-i-arib, Jedaiah,
Sallu, Amok, Hilkiah, leh Jedaiah-te ahi uh hi. Hihte in Jeshua’ hun lai-in siampite leh a sanggamte uh lakah a ukpite ahi uh hi.
Levi mite sung panin: Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmiel, Sherebiah, Judah leh Mattaniah hi a, amah in a sanggamte tawh lungdam kohna late a uk hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggamte uh Bakbukiah leh Unni in amaute tawh kigal sai-in nasem uh hi.
Tua hi a, Jeshua in Joiakim’ pa, Joiakim in Eliashib’ pa, Eliashib in Joiada’ pa,
Joiada in Jonathan’ pa, Jonathan in Jaddua’ pa ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Joiakim’ hun lai-in beh lutang ahi siampite in: Seraiah’ suante sung panin Meraiah; Jeremaiah suante sung panin Hananiah;
Ezra’ suante sung panin Meshullam; Amariah’ suante sung panin Jonathan;
Mallukhi’ suante sung panin Johohanan; Shebaniah’ suante sung panin Josef;
Harim’ suante sung panin Adna; Meraioth’ suante sung panin Helkai;
Iddo’ suante sung panin Zekhariah; Ginnethon’ suante sung panin Meshullam;
Abijah’ suante sung panin Zikri; Miniamin’ suante sung panin mi khat; Moadiah’ suante sung panin Piltai;
Bilgah’ suante sung panin Shammua; Shemaiah’ suante sung panin Jehonathan;
Jo-i-arib’ suante sung panin Mattenai; Jedaiah’ suante sung panin Uzzi;
Sallai’ suante sung panin Kallai; Amok’ suante sung panin Eber;
Hilkiah’ suante sung panin Hashabiah; Jedaiah’ suante sung panin Nethanel ahi uh hi.
Eliashib, Joiada, Johanan, leh Jaddua-te’ hun lai-a beh lutangte leh siampite ahih leh Persia kumpipa Darias hun ciang dong Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kiciamteh hi.
Levi mite beh sung panin beh lutangte pen Eliashib’ tupa Johanan’ hun ciang dong Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.

Tua ciangin Levi mi ukpite in: Hashabiah; Sherebiah, Jeshua, Binnui, leh Kadmiel hi uh a, Pasian’ mi David’ thupiakna bangin a ban banin phatna lasa ding leh lungdam ko dingin a sanggamte uh tawh na a sem ding uh ahi hi.
Mattaniah, Bakbukiah, Obadiah, Meshullam, Talmon, leh Akkubte in vankoihna kongpite a cing kongcingte ahi uh hi.
Hih in Jozadak’ tapa Jeshua, a tapa Joiakim’ hun leh gam ukpa Nehemiah leh siampi hi-in lai theipa zong ahi Ezra-te’ hun lai-a vaihawmna ahi hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in daltuahte, harp lasaknate, laiza lasaknate tawh lungdam ko-in lasa-in lungdamna tawh kulhpi apna a bawl dingin Jerusalem ah hong pai theih nadingun Levi mite a omna khempeuh uhah zong uh hi.
Tua hi a, Jerusalem kiim leh Netofah mite’ khuaneute panin Levi mi lasate hong kikaikhawm uh hi.
Bethgilgal khua leh Geba kiimnai leh Beth-azmaveth khua panin zong hong pai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh lasate pawl in Jerusalem kiimah amau’ adingin khuaneute sat uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampite leh Levi mite amau mah kisian’suah tawm uh a, tua khit ciangin mite leh kongpite leh kulhpi sian’suah uh hi.
Tua ciangin khuapi kulhzang ah Judah mi uliante ka paipih a, lam pai kawmin lungdamna ko dingin pawl lian nih ka seh hi. Kulhzang panin pawlkhatte taklam manawhin Nin Kongpi lamah pai uh hi.
Tuate’ nungah Hoshaiah leh Judah uliante kimkhat,
leh Azariah, Ezra, Meshullam,
Judah, Benjamin, Shemaiah, leh Jeremiah,
leh siampi pawlkhat peengkul tawh: Asaf tapa Zakkur, a tapa Mikaiah, a tapa Mattaniah, a tapa Shemaiah, a tapa Jonathan, a tapa Zekhariah,
leh ama behte Shemaiah, Azarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Ma-ai, Nethanel, Judah, Hanani-te, Pasian’ mi David’ lasakna nate tawh pai uh a, tuate lakah lai theipa Ezra masa hi.
Tuinak Kongpi panin kulh kahtohna David khuapi kahlei ah paito-in, David’ inn khengin nisuahna lam manawhin Tui Kongpi dongah pai uh hi.
Lungdamna a ko a pawl dang khat pen veilam manawhin pai uh a, mi a kimkhat tawh amaute ka zui hi. Kulh tungah pai-in Meikhuk Tausang pan Kulh Zai-ah,

tua panin Efraim Kongpi, tua ciangin Jeshanah Kongpi, tua ciangin Ngasa Kongpi, tua ciangin Hananel’ Tausang, tua ciangin Mi Za Khat Tausang, tua ciangin Tuu Kongpi-ah pai uh a, tua ciangin Thong Kongpi-ah khawl uh hi.
Tua hi a, lungdamna a ko hih pawl nihte, Pasian’ innah ding uh a, uliante kimkhat leh kei ka omkhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampi Eliakim, Ma-aseiah, Miniamin, Mikaiah, Elio-enai, Zekhariah, leh Hananiahte a peengkulte uh tawh om uh a,
Maaseiah, Shemaiah, Eleazar, Uzzi, Jehohanan, Malkhijah, Elam, leh Ezer zong om uh hi. Tua hi a, Jezrahiah makai-in lasate in lasa uh hi.

Pasian in nakpi takin amaute lungdamsak ahih manin amaute in tua ni-in biak piakna lian tampi pia-in lungdam uh hi; numei naupangte zong lungdam uh hi. Tua hi a, Jerusalem khua sungah lungdamna awging gamlapi pek pan nangawnin kiza hi.

Tua ciangin khuapite kiimah lo omte a golna leh a neuna tawh kizui-in siampite leh Levi mite’ adingin thukham sunga om bangin a kaihkhop ding uh a kipia nate, anpalte, leh sehsawm suah sehkhatte a koih nading uh vankoihna innte a uk dingin mi kiseh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh siampite leh Levi mite’ nasepna hangin Judah mi khempeuh lungdam mahmah uh hi.
Tua hi a, David leh a tapa Solomon’ thupiakna tawh kizui-in lasate leh kongcingte mah bangin amaute in amau’ Pasian’ nasepte leh sian’suah nasep sem uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh David’ hun lai-in lasate a ukpi leh phatna leh Pasian tungah lungdam kohna a makai-in Asaf om hi.

Zerubbabel leh Nehemiah’ hun lai-in Israel mite khempeuh in lasate leh kongcingte’ adingin a nisim tanh uh pia uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in Levi mite’ ading tuam koih uh hi; tua ciangin Levi mite in Aaron’ suante ading tuam koih sawn leuleu uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in mipi’ zakin Moses’ laibute sim uh a, Pasian’ mite’ kikhopna ah Ammon mi leh Moab mite a kihel ngei loh nading thu kiphawk khia hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in an leh tui tawh Israel mite na dawn lo uh a, amaute a samsia dingin Balaam cial zawsop uh hi. Ahi zongin i Pasian in tua samsiatna thupha-in hong heisak hi.
Mite in hih thukham a zak uh ciangin Israel mite lak panin gamdang suan peuhmah khenkhia uh hi.
Ahi zongin tua hun ma-in, i Pasian’ inn sung vankoihna inndeite a uk dingin a kiseh, Tobiah tawh a kimeltheih siampi Eliashib in,

Levi mite, lasate, leh kongcingte’ adingin piak dingin a kisawl an tawh biakna, paknamtui, um-le-beelte, an sehsawm suah sehkhat, leenggahzu, leh sathau, leh siampite’ adingin a kipia nate a koihna ngei uh inndei lianpi khat, Tobiah’ adingin bawlsak hi.

Babilon kumpi Artakzaksis in a uk kum sawmthum-le-nihna kumin ama kiangah pai ka hih manin hih thu a pian’ lai takin Jerusalem ah ka om kei hi. Tawl khat khit ciangin kumpipa kiangah a khuan ka ngen a,
Jerusalem ah ka ciahkik hi. Tua ciangin Tobiah’ adingin Pasian’ inn huang sungah inndei khat a vaihawmsakna thu, Eliashib’ gamtat hoih lohna ka phawk khia hi.
Hih thu ah lungkim hetlo ka hih manin inndei sung panin Tobiah’ van teng ka lawnkhia hi.
Tua ciangin tua inndei a sian’sak nading uh, leh Pasian inn a, um-le-beelte an tawh biakna leh paknamtui tawh a koih kik nadingun thu ka pia hi.
Levi mite’ ngah dingte amau’ tungah kipia lo ahih manin Levi mite leh lasate in a nasep ngeite uh nusia-in a lote uhah na a sepna uh zong ka phawk khia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin uliante tungah ka lungkim kei a, “Bang hangin Pasian’ inn kinusiacip ahi hiam?” ka ci hi. Tua hi a, amaute kaikhawm kikin amau sepna ngei mun ciatah ka pangsak kik hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite khempeuh in an, leenggahzu, leh sathau sung pan sehsawm suah sehkhat hong paipihin vankoihna innte ah hong tun’ uh hi.

Tua ciangin tua vankoihna innte a kem dingin siampi Shelemiah, lai thei Zado, leh Levi mi Pedaiah, leh amaute a huh dingin Mattaniah’ tapa Zakkur, a tapa Hanan ka seh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in mi muanhuai ahi uh hi. Amau’ nasep in a sanggamte uh tungah amau’ tanh ciat uh a hawmkhia ding ahi uh hi.
Ka Pasian aw, hih thu tawh kisai-in kei hong phawk in la, ka Pasian’ inn leh a nasep nadingin ka sepsa gamtat hoihte maimangsak kei in.

Tua hun lai-in Judah gam sungah mite in sabbath ni-in leenggah sukin, a khawhsate uh khawmin laate tungah suanin, leenggahzu, leenggah, theigah, leh van namkim, sabbath ni-in Jerusalem ah hong puakna ka mu hi; tua ni-in a an zuakna uh hangin ka lungkim lohna amaute tungah ka gen hi.
Jerusalem khua sunga teeng Tai-ar khuamite in zong ngasa leh van namkim hong paipihin Judah mite tung leh Jerusalem khua sungah sabbath ni-in zuak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah uliante tungah ka lungkim kei a, amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin hih bangin hoih lohna gamta-in, sabbath ni ninsak ngam na hi uh hiam?

Na pu na pate uh tu-a bang teekin a gamtat manin eite tung leh hih khuapi tungah hih bang siatna khempeuh hong tung hilo ahi hiam? Tua hi napi-in note in sabbath nitsakna tawh Israel tungah hehna tamzaw na tungsak uh hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua hi a, sabbath ni ding khuamial ciangin kongpite a kikhak nading ka sawl a, sabbath bei khit mateng a kihon’ loh nadingin thu ka pia hi. Tua ciangin, sabbath ni-in khua sungah van hong kilutpih loh nadingin kongpite a cing dingin ka nasemte pawlkhat ka koih hi.
Tua ciangin sumbukte leh na nam tuamtuam a zuakte, khatvei nihvei khawng Jerusalem pua lamah giak uh hi.

Ahi zongin amaute hilhkholin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin kulh gei-ah giak na hi uh hiam? Nong giah kik uh leh note tungah thu kong bawl ding hi,” ka ci hi. Tua huna kipanin sabbath ni-in amaute hong pai nawn lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin sabbath ni a siangtho-in a omsak theih nadingun amaute kisian’suah tawmin kongpite hong cin’ nadingun Levi mite ka sawl hi. Ka Pasian aw, hih thu ah zong hong phawk in la, na itna tawh kizui-in siatna panin kei hong pengsak in.
Tua hun lai mah-in zong Judah mite in Ashdod numei, Ammon numei, leh Moab numeite a ten’pihna,
leh a tate uh kimkhat in Ashdod kampau a zatna, leh Judah kampau zang thei loin, amau’ pau ciat bek a zat theihna thu ka mukhia hi.

Amaute tai gawpin ka samsia a, pawlkhat satin a sam uh ka bawhsak gawp hi. Tua ciangin Pasian’ min tawh amaute ka kiciamsak a, “Note in amau’ tapate’ zi dingin na tanute na pia kei ding uh a, na tapate uh zi dingin ahi a, nomau’ zi dingin ahi zongin amaute’ tanu na la kei ding uh hi.

Israel kumpipa Solomon zong tua bang numeite’ hangin khial hilo ahi hiam? Minam tampite lakah amah tawh a kibang kumpi khat zong om lo a, ama Pasian in amah itin, Israel khempeuh tungah kumpi-in amah koih hi; ahita zongin gamdang numeite in amah nangawn khialsak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin note’ gamtatnate hong zui-in, gamdang numeite teen’pihna tawh hih siatna lian khempeuh gamta-in i Pasian tungah hong zuautat ding ka hi uh hiam?”ka ci hi.
Siampi lian Eliashib’ tapa Jehoiada’ tapate khat in Horonaim khuami Sanballat’ makpa na hi hi; tua ahih manin keima kiang panin amah ka hawlkhia hi.
Ka Pasian aw, amaute in siampi nasepna leh siampite leh Levi mite’ thuciamna siasak ahih manun amaute thei in.
Tua bangin gamdang tawh a kizom nate khempeuh panin amaute ka siangsak a, siampite leh Levi mite a nasep ngei mah uh ka semsak kik hi.
Tua ciangin a kiseh hunin zat dingin cih ding sing tawh biakna leh anpal tawh biak nading ka vaihawmsak hi. Ka Pasian aw, a hoih lamin kei hong phawk in.
Hih lai-a kigen thu piangte pen India gam panin Ethiopia gam dong, gamneu za khat sawmnih-le-sagih a uk Ahasu-eras’ hun lai-a piang thu ahi hi.
Hih hun lai takin kumpi khua ahi Susa khuapi sunga a kumpi tokhom tungah amah tu hi.

Ama uk a kum thumna kumin ama nuai-a a uliante khempeuh leh a nasemte’ adingin pawi khat bawksak hi. Ama khut nuai-a om Persia leh Media galkapmangte leh ama nuai-a uliante leh a ma nuai-ah gam a uk sawnte a om lai takin,
a kumpi gam hauhna leh ama thupi ziazuana ni tampi sung, ni za leh ni sawmgiat sung tak lak hi.
Hih pawi hun a bei khit ciangin kumpi khua Susa khuapi sunga om mi lian mi neu mi khempeuh adingin kumpipa in pawi khat bawl hi; tua pawi pen kumpi inn huang sungah kibawl a, ni sagih kibawl hi.

Tua huang sungah suangkang khuamte kiphut a, khau malneu leh khau dupsan tawh ngun kualte ah kikhihin a kikhai dalna puan pakte kikhungin, suangmanpha a san, a dum, a kang, leh a vom, a nam tuamtuamte kizangin a kizeem suangphah kiphah tungah kham leh ngun kibawl lupnate kikoih hi.
Khamhai nam tuamtuamte tawh zu kihawm a, kumpipa’ hauhna tawh kituakin deih deihin zu kizang hi.
Tua lai-ah zu nekna zia pen kihah piak cih om lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in amau’ duh zahzah bek a neksak nading uh kumpipa in ama nuai-a uliante thupia hi.
Tua banah Kumpinu Vashti in zong numeite’ adingin Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ inn sung mah-ah pawi khat bawl hi.

A ni sagih ni, zu nekna hangin a lungnop ciangin kumpipa in ama na asem a innsung mang sagihte Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha, Zethar, leh Karkas-te sam a, mite leh uliante mai-ah ama meel hoihna a lah theih nadingin Kumpinu Vashti a kumpi lukhu khu sa-in ama kiangah a paipih nadingun sawl hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu a meel a hoih takpi mah ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Kumpinu Vashti in innsung mangte’ thu puak kumpipa’ sapna nial hi. Hih a nialna thu ah kumpipa heh mahmah a, a hehna hangin a sin sung so hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in upadi siam a mi pilte thu dong hi; bang hang hiam cih leh upadi leh biakna lam thu theite khempeuh thu dotpen kumpipa’ zat ngei khat ahi hi;

ama gei nai pen ah a tu, hun omzia a thei, Persia leh Media gam ulian sagihte ahi Karshena, Shethar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marsena, leh Memukante hi uh a, kumpipa kiangah a hawh thei, kumpi gam sungah ulian pente ahi uh hi.
“Innsung mangte’ tung tawnin keimah Kumpi Ahasu-eras’ thupiakna bangin gamta lo ahih manin Kumpinu Vashti tungah upadi tawh kizui-in bangci kihih ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa leh uliante’ zakin Memukan in dawng a, “Kumpinu Vashti khial hi; kumpipa tung bek hi loin Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ ukna gam sung khempeuh a, om uliante leh mi khempeuh tungah zong a khial ahi hi.

Kumpinu’ gamtatna thu numei khempeuh in thei ding uh a, hih thu hangin numeite in a pasalte uh simmawh ding uh hi; amaute in, ‘Kumpipa Ahasu-eras in ama kiangah a pai dingin Kumpinu Vashti thu pia napi-in pai lo hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
Hih banga kumpinu’ gamtatna thu a za Persia leh Media gam numei liante in kumpipa nuai-a uliante tungah tu ni mahmah-in hih thu gen ding uh a, kisimmawhna leh kizahtak lohna tampi piangsak ding hi.

Kumpipa in hoih nasak leh, kumpi thupiakna khat paisak in la, Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ mai-ah Vashti a kilaak kik nawn loh nadingin a kikhel kik ngei nawn lo ding Persia mite leh Media mite’ upadi sungah gelhsak in; tua ciangin amah sangin a kilawm zaw numei khat ama za luahsak in.
Tua banga kumpipa’ thupiakna thu kumpigam sung khempeuh ah a kizak ciangin numei khempeuh in a neu a lian amau’ pasal ciat zahtak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa leh uliante in hih ngaihsutna hoih sa uh a, Memukan’ gen bangin kumpipa gamta hi.
Pasal khempeuh in ama innsung ukpa ahih nading leh ama kam a kizuih kim nadingin kumpipa’ ukna gam khempeuh ah amau’ lai ciat, leh mi khempeuh tungah amau’ pau ciatin laikhakte kigelh hi.
Hih thu teng a pian’ khit, Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ hehna a dam ciangin, amah in Vashti phawkin, Vashti’ gamtatna leh amah tawh kisai-in a thupiakna zong thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Kumpipa’ adingin a meel hoih nungak khangnote zongsak in.

Kumpi khua ahi Susa khuapi-a numeite’ omna-ah a meel hoih nungak khangno khempeuh hong paipih nadingun na ukna gam tuamtuam khempeuh ah uliante sawl in. Tua numeite pen numeite a uk, kumpipa’ innsung mang Hegai’ kep dingin ki-ap hen. Tua ciangin tua numeite tungah paknamtui tuamtuamte kiguan hen.
Tua sung panin kumpipa’deih pen nungak in Vashti’ tangin kumpinu suak hen,” a ci uh hi. Kumpipa in hih ngaihsutna hoih sa a, tua bangin gamta hi.
Tu-in kumpi khua Susa khuapi sungah Benjamin minam Kish, a tapa Shimei, a tapa Jair, a tapa Mordekai a kici Judah mi khat om hi.
Amah pen, Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem panin Judah kumpipa Jekoniah tawh a lak galmatte lak-a kihelte khat ahi hi.

Amah in a innlak pate khat tanu’ a min masa Hadassah, a nung ciangin Esther a kici, khoi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a nu leh a pa om nawn lo hi; tua numei a meel hoih-in a ngaih bang mahmah khat hi a, a nu leh a pa a sih ciangin Mordekai in ama tanu dingin la hi.
Kumpipa’ thupiakna kithei kimin, Hegai’ kep dingin ap dingin kumpi khua Susa khuapi-ah numei tampi hong kipaipih ciangin, numeite a uk Hegai’ tungah ap dingin kumpipa’ innah Esther zong kipaipih hi.

Amah in tua nungak hoihsa-in pakta mahmah ahih manin paknamtuite leh a annek ding pia pah a, kumpipa inn sung panin a kiteel nasem numei sagih zong guan a, amah leh a nasem numeite tungah numeite’ omna a hoih pen mun pia pah hi.
Mordekai in khaam ahih manin Esther in ama nam leh phung gen khia lo hi.
Esther bangci om a, ama tungah bang piang hiam cih a theih nadingin numeite’ omna inntual mai-ah ni simin Mordekai va pai zel hi.
Numeite a kigin’ kholh hun a vekpi-in kha sawm-le-nih sung hi a, sathau leh mirrah paknamtui tawh kha guk sung kipuahin, paknamtui tuamtuamte leh kipuahna dangte tawh kha guk sung mah kipuah uh hi.
Kigin’ kholhna hun cing a, Kumpipa Ahasu-eras kiangah numeite a pai ciangin numeite’ omna panin kumpipa’ innah a deih peuhpeuh uh kikengsak hi.

Nitak-in kumpipa kiangah va pai a, a zingsang ciangin numeite’ omna a mun dang khatah kiciahsak a, kumpipa’ zineute a uk, kumpipa’ innsung mang Sha-ashgaz in kem hi. Kumpipa in a deihkik kei leh kumpipa kiangah pai kik nawn lo hi; kumpipa in a deih leh a min-in kisam kik hi.

Mordekai in ama tanu dingin a lak a innlak pa Abihail’ tanu Esther pen kumpipa kiangah a pai ding hun a tun ciangin, numeite a uk kumpipa’ innsung mangpa Hegai’ gen teng lo buang bangmah dang gen lo hi. Tu-in Esther a mu mi peuhmah in hoih sa kim hi.
Ama uk a kum sagihna, kha sawmna a hi Tebeth kha sungin kumpi inn sung Kumpi Ahasu-eras’ kiangah Esther a kipaipih ciangin,
kumpipa in ama numei dangte khempeuh sangin it zaw a, a nungak dangte khempeuh sangin lim bawl zaw hi. Tua hi a, kumpi lukhu amah khusakin Vashti’ taangin kumpinu suaksak hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Esther pahtawina-in ama uliante leh a nasemte khempeuh’ adingin pawi lianpi khat bawl hi. Amah in ama ukna gam khempeuh ah tua ni nasep khawlin zum a khak nading uh zong thu zasak kim a, kumpipa’ min tawh a kilawm a kituak letsongte zong hawmkhia hi.
Kumpipa’ kongtual-ah Mordekai om hi;
ama hilhna tawh kizui-in Esther in ama minam ahi a, a innkuan ahi zongin pulak lo hi; Mordekai’ kep sungin ama thu a man’ mah bangin tu-in zong Mordekai’ gen bangin gamta hi.
Ni khat, kongtualah Mordekai a om lai takin, kongcing ahi kumpipa’ innsung mangte Bigthana leh Teresh heh uh a, Kumpipa Ahasu-eras thah ding sawm uh hi.
Hih thu Mordekai in phawkin Kumpinu Esther kiangah ko a, Esther in Mordekai’ hong thupuak ci-in kumpipa kiangah gen sawn hi.
A thu kikanin a manna a kitheih ciangin khuampite tungah tua mi nihte gel kikhai lum hi. Hih thu piangte khempeuh kumpipa’ theihin kumpi Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kiciamteh hi.
Hih thute khit ciangin Kumpipa Ahasu-eras in Agag-te beh Hammeda-tha’ tapa Haman a za khangsak a, amah tawh a semkhawm ulian dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzaw-in bawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpi huang sunga om kumpipa’ nasem khempeuh in Haman zahtak bawlin ama mai-ah kun uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua banga a hih ding uh kumpipa in thupia hi. Ahih hangin Mordekai in amah zahtakna limin a mai-ah kun lo hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa huang sunga om kumpipa’ nasemte in Mordekai kiangah, “Bang hangin kumpipa’ thupiak mang lo na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Ni simin amaute in Mordekai kiangah gengen uh a, ahih hangin amah in mang nuam lo hi; Judah mi ahihna thu amaute kiangah gen khin ahih manin tua banga ama nialna a kimang ding mah ahi hiam cih a theih nadingun Haman’ kiangah a thu ko uh hi.
Ama mai-ah Mordekai a kun lohna, amah a zaktak bawl lohna a theih ciangin Haman nak heh mahmah hi.
Amah in Mordekai’ mipihte a theih ciangin amah bek suk taak sa lo a, Ahasu-eras’ kumpi gamsung khempeuh a, a om Judah mi khempeuh, Mordekai leh a minam buppi-in a suksiat theih nading lampi zong hi.

Kumpi Ahasu-eras’ uk a kum sawm-le-nihna, kha masa pen ahi Nisan kha-a kipanin a ni ni a kha kha-in Pur a kici aisanna tawh Haman’ muhin ai kisaan a, a kha sawm-le-nihna Adar kha a ni sawm-le-thum ni-in ai pha hi.

Tua ciangin Haman in Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ kiangah, “Na ukna gam tuamtuam sunga mite lakah a om kawikawi, amau a tuam om mi pawl khat om hi. Amau’ ngeinate pen midangte’ aa tawh kibang lo hi; amaute in nangma thukhamte zui lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih mite na hici khahkhong ding kilawm lo hi.

Kumpipa in hoih nasak leh amaute a kisuksiat nading thu pia-in lai-in gelh in; tua hi leh nangma sumkholna sungah koih dingin na khut nuai-a na uliante tungah ngun talen tul sawm ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in ama khut tung panin a min thuhna zungbuh suahin Judah mite’ gal, Agag-te beh Hammedatha’ tapa Haman tungah pia hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Haman kiangah, “Na sum cihte leh na mi cihte nangmah kong pia hi; na ut bangbangin bawl in,” a ci hi.

A kha masa a ni sawm-le-thum ni-in kumpipa’ lai-atte khempeuh kisam a, Haman’ genna tawh kizui-in kumpipa’ nuai-ah gam tampi a uk sawnte, gam khat a uk sawnte leh gam uk sawnte’ khut nuai-ah a mi tuamtuamte lakah uliante tungah lai kipaisak hi. Gam khempeuh ah amau’ lai ciat, mi khempeuh tungah amau’ pau ciatin kigelh hi. Hih lai pen Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ min tawh kigelhin kumpipa’ min thuhna zungbuh tawh min kithuh hi.

Tua bangin kumpipa’ ukna gam khempeuh ah laitaite lai kipiasak a, Adar kha ahi a kha sawm-le-nihna a ni sawm-le-thum ni, ni khat sungin Judah mi a moi a ham, numei naupang, a vekpi-in susia-in, thatin, a beisak mang nading uh, leh a neihsate uh a laksak nadingun thu kipia hi.
Tua a ni seh ni-in amaute a baihsa-in a om theih nadingun hih thupiakna lai pen gam khempeuh ah dal khat ciat kipuakin tua thu pen a gamsung mi khempeuh tungah a kizasak kim ding ahi hi.
Kumpipa’ thupiakna tawh laitaite kinawh sawl a, hih thupiakna pen kumpi khua Susa khuapi panin a kihawmkhia ahi hi. Kumpipa leh Haman zu ne-in om uh a, ahi zongin Susa khuapi sung buai mahmah hi.
Mordekai in hih thu piang teng a theih ciangin a puan balkekin puanhampi silhin vut kibuak a, nakpi takin kap kawmin khua sungah vak kawikawi hi.
Puanhampi silh kawmin kongpi-ah kuamah kilutsak lo ahih manin kumpi inn kongpi panin a kimuhna mun ciangah pai hi.
Kumpipa’ thupiakna a tun’na gam Judah mite’ omna khempeuh ah nakpi tak-a thuumna leh tauna, an tan’na, kahna, leh dip humna om hi. Mi a tamzaw in puanhampi silhin vut lakah lum uh hi.

Esther’ nasem numeite leh a innsung mangte hong pai-in ama kiangah tua thu a gen ciangin kumpinu in lamdangsa mahmah hi. A puanhampi a laih nadingin amah in Mordekai ading puante khak a, ahih hangin Mordekai in tuate na sang lo hi.

Tua ciangin Esther in ama na a sem dingin a kiseh, kumpipa’ innsung mangte lak panin Hathak a kici mipa samin hih thu in bang hi a, bang a cih nopna hiam ci-in Mordekai tung panin thu a va kan dingin sawl hi.
Kumpi inn kongpi mai-a om khuapi kongzing tualpi-a om Mordekai kiangah Hathak va pai a,
Mordekai in ama tunga thu piangte khempeuh leh Judah mite sukmang nadingin kumpipa’ sumkholna-ah Haman in piak ding a sum ciam zah thute khempeuh ama kiangah na gen hi.

Amaute a kisukmang nadingin Susa khua panin a kihawmkhia lai dal khat zong Mordekai in ama tungah pia a, amah in Esther tungah tua lai na pia-in a thu a na gentel nading leh, kumpipa kiangah Esther na pai-in ama mipihte adingin a na thuumsak ding zong sawl hi.
Hathak zong ciahin Mordekai’ thugen teng Esther kiangah va gen hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in Hathak mah sawl kikin Mordekai tungah thu zasak a,

“Numei ahi a, pasal ahi zongin sap lohpi-in mi khat peuhpeuh kumpipa’ omna inn sungah a va lut leh upadi khat bek om a, tua in: thah ding ahi hi; kumpipa in ama lamah a kham kumpi ciangkhut a na zan leh tua mipa suakta bek ding ahihna thu kumpipa’ nasemte leh ama ukna gam mi khempeuh in a theih ciat uh ahi hi. Tu-in kumpipa kiangah a pai dingin hong kisap loh zawh ni sawmthum bang pha ta hi,” a ci hi.
Tua hi a, Esther’ thugen teng Mordekai tungah gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Mordekai in Esther a dawn’ kikna thu amaute mah puasak a, “Kumpi inn sungah na omna hangin Judah mi khempeuh lak panin nang a suakta tuan dingin kingaihsun kei in.

Hih bang hunin bangmah hih lo-in na om cip leh, Judah mite’ suahtak nading leh noptuam nading thu mun dang khat pan hong piang veve ding a, ahi zongin nangmah leh na innkuanpihte i si mang ding uh hi. Hih kumpi inn na tun’na pen hih bang hun-a mah dinga tung na hih mel zong kua’n thei ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in Mordekai a dawn’na amaute puasak a,

“Pai-in Susa khua sunga om Judah mi khempeuh khawm in la, keimah ngaihsutna-in an na tang un; a sun a zan ci loin ni thum sung an ne lo, tui dawn loin na om un. No tan’ mah bangin kei leh ka nasem numeite in zong ka na tang ding uh hi. Tua khit ciangin ngeina ahih loh hangin kumpipa kiangah ka va pai ding hi; ka sih leh zong a si ka hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Mordekai pai-in Esther’ sawl bang teekteekin gamta hi.
A ni thum ni-in Esther in a kumpi puan silhin kumpipa’ inntual sung nungah ding-in kumpi inn lam nga hi; kumpi inn sung a kumpi tokhom tungah kumpipa tu-in kongpi lam nga hi.

Inntual ah Kumpinu Esther ding-a om kumpipa in a muh ciangin Esther in kumpipa’ maipha ngah a, kumpipa in a khut-a a tawi kham ciangkhut pen Esther’ lamah zan hi. Tua ciangin Esther in hong naihin tua ciangkhut dawn va lawng hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Kumpinu Esther aw, bang thu ahi hiam? Kei tungah nong nget peuhpeuh, ka kumpi gam phel khat ciang dong, nang tungah hong kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in, “Nong hehpih zawh leh, kumpipa’ adinga kong bawlsak nitak an ne dingin tu ni-in Haman tawh hong pai un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Esther’ deih bangin i gamtat theih nadingin manlangin Haman va sam un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih manin Esther’ bawlsa nitak an ne dingin kumpipa leh Haman hong pai uh hi.
Amaute in zu a nek lai takun kumpipa in Esther kiangah, “Nong nget peuhpeuh hong kipia ding hi. Nong nget peuhpeuh ka kumpi gam phel khat ciang dong hong kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Esther in dawngin, “Nang tung panin kong nget nop kong thum nop thu in:

“Topa aw, nong hehpih zawh a, na lung a kim a, kong nget thu nong piak zawh ding leh, note gel’ adingin ka na bawl an ne dingin zing ciangin kumpipa leh Haman hong pai un. Zing ciangin nong cih bangin ka deihna kong gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lungdam kipakin tua ni-in Haman ciah hi. Ahih hangin kongpi-a om Mordekai in amah zahtakna limin ama mai-ah ding lo, kun lo-a om a muh ciangin Mordekai tungah nakpi takin heh hi.
Ahi zongin Haman ki-iip tentanin innah ciah hi. Tua ciangin a lawmte leh a zi Zeresh sam a,

ama hauhna teng, a tapa neih teng, kumpipa in amah a pahtak manin a za khan’ sakna teng, leh kumpipa’ nasemte leh ulian dangte khempeuh sangin a lianzawin amah a koihna thute khempeuh amaute tungah gen in lak hi.

Tua ciangin Haman in, “Hih teng bek hi nai lo lai hi; Kumpinu Esther nangawn in ama bawlsa an kumpipa tawh a ne khawm dingin kei sim loh mi dang kuamah paisak lo hi. Zing ciangin zong kumpipa tawh kei hong sam khawm hi.
Ahi zongin kumpipa’ kongpi-a tu Judah mi Mordekai ka muh lai teng hih thute khempeuh a mawkna suak zel hi,” ci lai hi.

Tua ciangin a zi Zeresh leh a lawmte khempeuh in ama kiangah, “Pi sawmsagih-le-nga a sang khuam phutsak in la, tua tungah Mordekai a kikhai lup nadingin zing ciangin kumpipa kiangah gen in; tua ciangin nitak an ne dingin lungnuam takin kumpipa tawh pai in,” a ci uh hi. Haman in hih ngaihsutna hoih sa a, a khuam phutsak hi.
Tua zan-in kumpipa ihmu thei lo a, nisim thupiang ciamtehna Khang Tangthu Laibu lasak a, ama zakin tua laibu kisim hi.
Tua banga kisim ciangin, kongcingte’ sung panin innsung mang Bigthana leh Teresh in Kumpipa Ahasu-eras thah a sawmna thu pen Mordekai in a genna thu a kiciamtehna sim kha uh hi.

Tua thu a zak ciangin kumpipa in, “Hih thu hangin Mordekai’ tungah pahtawina ahi a, minliatna ahi zongin bang kipia ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua lai-a a om kumpipa’ nasemte in Mordekai tungah bangmah a kipiak lohna thu gen uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Hih kiim nai-ah kua om hiam?” a ci hi. Tua lai takin Mordekai thah nadingin a phuhsa khuam tungah Mordekai khai lup nading thu kumpipa kiangah a gen dingin kumpi huang sungah Haman hong tum hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Hih lai-ah Haman om hi, inntual ah ding hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Amah hong tumsak un,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Haman hong tum a, kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa tungah bang kihih leh hoih na sa hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Haman in a lungsimah ngaihsun a, “Kumpipa in kei sangin a pahtawi nop zawk ding kua om zenzen ding hiam?” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih manin Haman in kumpipa kiangah, “Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa adingin
kumpipa mahmah in a silh kumpi puante, leh kumpipa a tuan’na sakol a lukhu tawh lasak in.

Tua ciangin kumpipa’ ulian pen khat tungah tua kumpi puante leh sakol apsak in. Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa pen amah zeemsak in la, tua ciangin khua sung kongzing lampi-ah sakol tungah a tuangsa-in na ulian penpa kaisak in la, ama mai-ah kiko sakin, ‘Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa tungah hih bangin kibawl ding hi,’ cisak in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Haman kiangah, “Na cihsa bangin manlangin kumpi puante leh sakol la pah in la, kongpi-a om Judah mi Mordekai tungah hih thute khempeuh hih in. Na gensate khat beek siit kei in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Haman in kumpi puante leh sakol la-in Mordekai zeem a, khuapi sung kongzing lampi-ah amah tuangsakin, “Kumpipa in a pahtawi nop mipa tungah hih bangin kibawl ding hi,” ci-in taangko hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa’ kongpi-ah Mordekai ciahkik hi. Haman ahih leh kilukhuhsa-in a thuum kawmin a innah ciah pah vingveng hi.

Tua ciangin Haman in a zi Zeresh leh a lawmte khempeuh tungah ama tunga thu piang teng gen hi. Tua ciangin a zi Zeresh leh a lawmte in ama kiangah, “Tu-a na lelhtaak Mordekai in Judah mi ahih leh amah na zo kei ding a, amah in nang hong zo zaw ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua bangin Haman tawh amaute a kiho lai takin kumpipa’ innsung mangte hong pai a, Esther’ bawlsa nitak an ne dingin amah pai khiatpih pah uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kumpinu Esther tawh an ne dingin kumpipa leh Haman va pai uh hi.

A ni nih ni, amaute in zu a nek lai takun kumpipa in Esther’ kiangah, “Kumpinu Esther aw, nong nget nop bang ahi hiam? Nong nget peuhpeuh ka kumpi gam phel lang khat dongin hong kipia ding hi,” ci kik leuleu hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpinu Esther in dawngin, “Kumpipa in nong hehpih zawh a, kumpipa in hoih nasak leh, kong nget kong thum nopna thu in keimah leh ka mite sihna tawh nong kipelhsak nading ahi hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh kei leh ka mite suksiat ding, thah ding, beisak mang dingin hong kizuak hi. Kote, numei pasal a kibangin sal dingin hong kizuak hi leh bangmah ka pau kei ding hi; tua bang lel tawh kumpipa nawngkaisak taak lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpipa Ahasu-eras in Kumpinu Esther’ kiangah, “Hih banga gamtat ding a ngaihsun kua hi a, koi-ah om ahi hiam? a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in, “Hong langpang ka galpa! Hih mi gilo Haman!” a ci hi. Tua lai takin kumpipa leh kumpinu’ mai-ah cih nading thei loin Haman om hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa hehsa-in an nekna pan ding khia-in kumpi huan sungah pai hi. Ahi zongin Haman ahih leh tua lai mah-ah omin Kumpinu Esther in a nuntakna a suahtaksak nading thuum hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa in amah thah dingin a ngaihsutna lungsim thei hi.

Kumpi huan panin a annekna mun uhah kumpipa hong paikik ciangin Esther’ tutna lamah Haman na awn phei-a om mu a, kumpipa in, “Ka inn sung ka muhna nangawn-ah hih mipa in kumpinu hih ding ahi hiam?” ci hi. Kumpipa in tua thu a cih phetin amaute in Haman’ mai puan khuh uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa’ na a sem innsung mangte lakah Harbona in, “Ni dangin kumpipa’ na hoih takin a sem ngei Mordekai thah nadingin Haman mahmah in a phuhsak, pi sawmsagih-le-nga a sang khuam pen Haman’ innah tu mah-in om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Tua tungah amah khailum un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Mordekai khailup nadingin a phuh khuam tungah Haman khai lum uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ hehna dam hi.

Tua ni mahin Kumpipa Ahasu-eras in Judah mite’ gal ahi Haman’ neihsa khempeuh Kumpinu Esther tungah pia hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ omna-ah Mordekai hong tung hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah tawh a kinaina zia, kumpipa kiangah Esther in gen hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Haman’ tung panin a lakkiksa minthuhna zungbuh pen suahkhia-in Mordekai pia hi. Tua hi a, Haman’ neihsa khempeuh a uk dingin Esther in Mordekai koih hi.
Kumpipa’ mai-ah Esther khatvei va pai kikin khitui naptui tawh a khe mai-ah va puk a, Agag mi Haman’ vaihawm siatna liante leh Judah mite a sawmna thu a kipelh kik theih nadingin va thuum hi.
Kumpipa in Esther lamah a kham ciangkhut na zan a,

tua ciangin Esther tho to-in kumpipa mai-ah ding-in, “Kei nong hehpih zawh a, hih ka ngaihsutna man nasak a, hoih nasak leh, na ukna gamsung khempeuh ah a om Judah mite thah nading a sawmna-in Agag-te beh Hammedatha’ tapa Haman in a laigelhte dawhkik nadingin lai khat gelhsak in.
Ka mipihte tungah hih siatna liante a tung ka muh ding bangci thuak zawh ding ka hi hiam? Ahih kei leh ka innkuanpih tungah a tung hih siatna ka muh ding bangci thuak zawh ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpipa Ahasu-eras in Kumpinu Esther leh Judah mi Mordekai tungah, “Haman in Judah mite thah hong sawm ahih manin sing tungah amah kikhai lum khin a, Haman’ neihsa khempeuh Esther tungah kong pia khin hi.

Kumpipa’ min tawh kigelhin, kumpipa’ minthuhna tawh a kithuh khinsa lai pen kidok kik thei nawn lo ahih manin, tu-in Judah mite tawh kisai-in hoih dinga na up bangin kumpipa’ min tawh a dang thupiakna khat gelh in la, tua khit ciangin kumpipa’ minthuhna zungbuh tawh thuh in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a kha thumna ahi Sivan kha a ni sawmnih-le-thum ni-in kumpipa’ lai-atte kisam a, Mordekai’ gen bang teekteekin Judah mite tung, leh India panin Ethiopia dong, gam za khat leh sawmnih-le-sagih a uk ahi gam tampi a ukte, gam khat a ukte leh tua gamsunga uliante tungah lai kihawm kik a, amau’ lai ciat leh amau’ pau ciatin kigelh hi; Judah mite’ ading zong amau’ lai leh amau pau mah-in kigelh hi.
Tua lai pen Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ minin kigelhin kumpipa’ minthuhna zungbuh mah tawh kithuh a, kumpi sakol bukah a kikhawi kumpipa’ sakolte tungah laitaite kituangsakin lai kihawmsak hi.

Kha sawm-le-nihna ahi Adar kha a ni sawm-le-thumna ni khat sungin Kumpi Ahasu-eras’ ukna gamsung khempeuh ah Judah mite in amau a sim ding mite, ahih kei leh gamte’ hih nading panin khua khempeuh ah amaute na kipawlin na kihu-in, tua banga amaute a hih dingte pen a numei a naupangin susia-in, thatin, a beisak nading uh leh a neihsate uh a laksak theih nadingun lai piakna tawh kumpipa in Judah mite tungah hih theih nading thupia hi.
Tua thupiakna lai pen gam khempeuh ah kihawmin mi khempeuh kitheisakin, amau’ galte a thukkik nading ahi tua ni tawh kisai-in Judah mite a kigin’ kholh ding uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ sakolte’ tungah laitaite tuangin kumpipa’ thu-kin sawl mah bangin nawh tai uh hi; tua ciangin Susa khuapi sungah zong tua thupiakna lai kihawm hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi puansan leh a kang silhin, kham tawh kibawl kumpi lukhu lianpi khu-in, saihadial puan neel leh puansan silhsa-in kumpipa’ omna panin Mordekai paikhia hi; tua ciangin Susa khuapi sunga mi khempeuh lungdamin awng uh hi.
Tua hi a, Judah mite in suahtakna, lungdamna, leh pahtawina ngah uh hi.

Kumpipa’ thupiakna a tun’na gam leh khua khempeuh ah Judah mite adingin lungdamna leh kipahna, pawi bawlna leh nasep khawlin zumkhakna om hi. Tua hi a, mite in Judah mite kihta uh ahih manin tua gam-a om mi tampi tak in Judah mi ka hi uh hi, ci uh hi.

A kha sawm-le-nihna ahi Adar kha a ni sawm-le-thum ni-in kumpipa’ thupiakna bangin sepkhiat nading hun hong tung hi. Judah mite’ galte in gualzo ding a, a ki-up ni teek pen amau a mudah mite’ tungah Judah mite a gualzawh ni ding hong hi hi.

Tua ni-in amaute’ siat nading a geelte a su dingin Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ ukna gam khempeuh-a amau’ khuapite sungah Judah mite kikhawm uh hi. Mi khempeuh in Judah mite kihta uh ahih manin kuamah in Judah mite nang ngam lo uh hi.
Mordekai kihta uh ahih manin gam tampi a ukte leh gam khat a ukte leh gamsunga ulian tuamtuamte leh kumpi ulian khempeuh in Judah mite pan’pih uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpi inn sungah Mordekai ulianpi khat suak a, a vangliatna a khan’ semsem mah bangin gam khempeuh ah ama minthan’na kizel hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah mite in namsau tawh a galte uh tampi tak that lum uh a, amaute a mudahte a ut ut-un hih gawp uh hi.
Kumpi khua Susa khuapi sung mahmah-ah Judah mite in mi za nga thatin susia uh hi.

7-10 Tua hi a, amaute in Judah mite’ gal ahi Hammedatha’ tapa Haman’ tapa sawmte Parshandatha, Dalfon, Aspatha, Poratha, Adalia, Aridatha, Parmashta, Arisai, Aridai, leh Vaizatha-te zong that uh hi; ahi zongin amau’ neihsate suksak lo uh hi.
Kumpi khua Susa khuapi sunga a kithat zah tua ni mahmahin kumpipa kiangah kizasak hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Kumpinu Esther kiangah, “Kumpi khua Susa khuapi sungah Judah mite in mi za nga that uh a, Haman’ tapa sawmte zong that uh hi. Ka ukna gam dangte sungah zong bangzah that ding kithei lo hi. Tu-in bang deih lai na hi hiam? Nong nget peuhpeuh hong kipia lai ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Esther in, “Kumpipa in hoih nasak leh, tu ni-a mah bangin zing ciang zong Susa khuapi sunga om Judah mite tungah hih theihna thupia in la, Haman’ tapa sawmte’ luanghawm khuam tungah khaisak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin tua banga a hih nadingin kumpipa in sawl hi; Susa khuapi sungah hih thu suakkhiasak a, khuam tungah Haman’ tapa sawmte kikhai hi.
Susa khuapi sunga om Judah mite Adar kha a ni sawm-le-li ni-in kikhawm kikin Susa khua sungah mi za thum that uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute’ neihsate suksak lo uh hi.

Tua mah bangin kumpipa’ ukna gam tuam tuam-a om Judah mite in zong amaute’ galte panin a kihut nadingun kikhawm uh hi. Amau a mudah mihing tul sawmsagih leh tul nga thatin a galte uh tungah phu la uh hi. Ahih hangin a neihsate uh suksak lo uh hi.
Hih banga a hih pen Adar kha a ni sawm-le-thum ni hi a, a ni sawm-le-li ni-in tawlnga uh a, pawi bawlin lungdamin om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Susa khua sunga om Judah mite in ahih leh a ni sawm-le-thum leh sawm-le-li ni-in kikaikhawm uh a, a ni sawm-le-nga ni tawlnga uh a, pawi bawlin lungdamin om uh hi.
Hih thu hangin gam sung khuaneute-a teeng Judah mite in Adar kha a ni sawm-le-li ni pawibawlna leh lungdam ni dingin tawlngak ni-in nei uh a, anlimnono kikholhna ni-in zang uh hi.
Tua ciangin Mordekai in hih thupiangte khempeuh lai-in ciamteh a, a nai a gamla-a om Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ ukna gamsung khempeuh a, om Judah mite tungah lai paisak hi.
A kum kumin Adar kha ni sawm-le-li ni leh sawm-le-nga ni a tan’ nadingun thupia hi.

Tua nite pen Judah mite a galte uh tung panin a suahtak ni, dahna leh thuumnate lungdamna leh lungnopna a suah kha ahi hi. Tua ahih manin amaute in pawi bawl ni leh lungdam ni-in nei-in, anlimnono khat leh khat kikholh ni leh mi zawngte tungah letsong piak ni-in a zat dingun thupia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Mordekai’ laigelhna tawh kizui-in Judah mite in a patsa uh hih banga a hihnate uh zom uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah mi khempeuh’ gal ahi, Hammedatha’ tapa’ Agag-te beh Haman in Judah mite sugawpin a suksiat nadingin Pur kici ai saan-in Judah mite suksiat ding sawm hi.

Ahih hangin kumpipa in hih thu a theih ciangin, Judah mite suk nadingin Haman in a geelsa thuhoih lopen Haman’ lutung mah a lehtuk nading, leh amah leh a tapate khuam tungah a kikhai nading lai-in gelhin thupia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Pur min tam-in hih hun sung teng Purim ci-in phuak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin hih lai sunga a kigelh thute khempeuh, leh hih thute amau’ mit tawh mu-in a pumpi uh tawh a tuahna uh hangin,
Judah mite amau mahmah, leh a suan a khakte uh, leh amau a pawlpih khempeuh in lai sunga kigelh bangin a kiseh hunin kum simin hih ni nihte peel loin a tan’ nading uh kipsak uh a,

a khang khangin innkuan sim, gam sim, khuapi simah hih nite kiphawkin a kitan’ nading leh Judah mite lakah hih Purim nite a kitan’ ngitnget nading ahi a, a suan-le-khakte un zong hih thu a mangngilh ngei het loh nading uh ahi zongin kho takin len uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abihail’ tanu Kumpinu Esther in Purim thu tawh kisai hih laikhak nihna a kipsak nadingin Judah mi Mordekai tungah aana a kicingin a piakna, lai-in gelh hi.
Kumpi Ahasu-eras’ ukna gam za leh sawmnih sagih sungah a om Judah mite khempeuh tungah kilemna leh nopna a om nading deihsakna laite kikhak a,

Judah mi Mordekai in a gelhsa bang, a kisehsa bangin hih Purim nite a tan’ nadingun thu kipia hi. Tua mah bangin amaute leh a suan-le-khakte uh adingin an tan’ nading leh thuumna bawl nading ngeinate gelh uh hi.
Kumpinu Esther’ thupiakna in hih Purim bawl nading ngeinate kipsak a, lai thupite sungah hih thu kiciamteh hi.
Kumpipa Ahasu-eras in a ukna gam leitung leh tuikulh tunga teengte tung panin siah kai hi.
Ama vangliatna leh a thahatna tawh a sepnate khempeuh, leh Mordekai tungah a piak minphatnate, Media leh Persia Kumpite’ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpipa Ahasu-eras’ zomah Mordekai in a za lianpen nihna ahi hi; Mordekai in ama mite’ phattuam nading leh a suan-le-khakte uh a khan’toh nading hanciam ahih manin Judah mite lakah milian khat hi a, a gam mihonpite in it kim uh hi.
Uz gamah Job kici min nei mi khat om hi; tua mipa a paubaang lo, a thutang, Pasian a zahtak mi khat hi a, amah in gamtat hoih lo peuhmah pel hi.
Amah in tapa sagih leh tanu thum nei hi.
Amah in tuu tulsagih, kalaoh tulthum, bawngtal kap zanga, leh la a pi zanga, leh nasem tampi tak nei hi; tua ahih manin nisuahna gam sungah Job in a haupen khat ahi hi.
Ama tapate in inn khat panin inn khatah a ban banin pawi bawlin pai kawikawi uh a, tua pawi siim dingin a sanggam numei thumte uh zong sam uh hi.

Tua banga a pawi bawl uh vial khat a kikhit ciangin Job in a tapate samin amaute sian’suah a, zingsangin tho baihin a ta phazah tawh kizui-in meihal biakna pia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Job in, “Ka tate khialin, a lungsim sung uh ah Pasian samsia kha thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Hih bangin Job in hih tawntung hi.
Nikhat ni-in Topa’ omna-ah vantungmite hong pai uh a, tuate lakah Satan zong hong pai hi.
Topa in Satan kiangah, “Koi pan-a hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Satan in Topa dawngin, “Leitung khempeuh a lu pan a taw dong vak kawikawi-in ka va pheklekna mun panin kong pai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “Ka nasem Job na phawk kha hiam? A paubaang lo a thutang, Pasian zahtakin gamtat hoih lo a pel, amah tawh a kibang midang leitungah na mu kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Satan in Topa dawngin, “Job in Pasian hong mawk zahtak ahi hiam?
Amah leh a innkuan leh a neihsate khempeuh na hutna-in a kimkotah dai khan hilo na hi hiam? Ama hihna khempeuh ah thupha na pia a, gen zawh lohin ama neihsa pung hi.
Ahi zongin na khut zanin ama neihsa khempeuh suksak lecin na maitang mahmah-ah nang hong samsia pah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “En in, ama neihsa khempeuh na khut sungah kong ap hi; ahi zongin ama pumpi ahih leh na sukha kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ omna panin Satan paikhia hi.
Nikhat ni-in a tapate leh a tanute in a u pen uh inn-ah an ne zu ne-in om uh hi;
kamtai khat Job kiangah hong tungin, “Bawngtalte in lo kho-in, tuate gei-ah late gamta uh hi;
tua lai takin Seba mite hong pai-in ganhingte hong sut a, namsau tawh gancingte that khin uh hi; hih thu hong zahsak thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tungin, “Vantung panin keek hong kia a, tuute leh tuucingte kha-in kangtum uh hi; hih thu nang kiangah hong ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.

Tuapa in thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu-in, “Khaldea mite honthum in kalaohte hong sut a, namsau tawh kalaoh tung tuangte khempeuh that hi; hih thu nang kiangah a ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a thugen a khit ma-in kamtai dang khat hong tung leuleu a, “Na tapate leh na tanute a u pen uh inn-ah an ne zu ne-in om uh hi;
tua lai takin sehnel gam panin huihpi pingpei hong nungin a inn mut paai-in na tate denglum hi; nang kiangah hih thu a ko thei dingin kei bek kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu a zak ciangin Job dah lua-in a puan balkek a, tua ciangin a sam met khia-in lei lakah bok sukin Pasian bia hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka nu sung panin guaktangin ka suak a, Guaktang mahin ka ciahkik ding hi. Topa in hong pia a, Topa mah in hong lakik hi; Topa’ min kiphat ta hen,” a ci hi.
Hih thu khempeuh ah Job khial lo a, Pasian zong mawhsak lo hi.
Nikhat ni-in Topa’ omna-ah vantungmite hong paikik uh a, Satan zong amaute lakah hong kihelin Topa’ omna mah-ah hong pai hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “Koi lai panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Satan in Topa dawngin, Leitung khempeuh a lu pan a taw dong vak kawikawi-in ka va pheklekna mun panin kong pai hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “Ka nasem Job na phawk hiam? A paubaang lo, a thutang, Pasian zahtakin gamtat hoih lo a pel, amah tawh a kibang midang leitungah om lo hi. Thu om lopi-in amah susia dingin kei nong kampau sak a, ahi zongin, ama hoihna bangmah hem tuan lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Satan in Topa dawngin, “Vun bek in vun mah lei zo bek, ci-in paunak a om mah bangin mi khat in ama nuntakna a hutna-in a neih khempeuh pia ngam ding hi.
Tu-in na khut zan in la, ama sa leh a guh suksak lecin nangma maitang mahah pel loin nang hong samsia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Satan kiangah, “En in, na khut sungah amah kong ap hi; ahi zongin amah sisak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ omna panin Satan paikhia a, Job a khetul pan a luzang dongin a kihhuai meima veisak hi.
Tua ciangin Job in beel kitam them khat la-in tua tawh kikhuatin vut lakah tu hi.
Tua ciangin a zi-in, “Na upna khiam tuan lo ding na hi hiam? Pasian samsia in la, si suk in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in a zi kiangah, “Numei haite’ kampau bangin na pau hi. Pasian’ tung panin a hoih sang i hih ciangin siatna zong sang lo ding i hi hiam?” a ci hi. Hih thu khempeuh ah Job in a kampau nangawnin khial lo hi.

Job’ lawmte thum, Teman khuami Elifaz, Shuah gammi Bildad, leh Na-amah gammi Zofar-te in Job’ thuak gimna thu teng a zak uh ciangin a inn ciat panun amah hehnem ding leh a hanthawn dingin kituahin hong paikhawm uh hi.
Amaute in a gamla sim mun panin Job a muh tungun amah thei pah lo uh hi; tua ciangin amaute a gingin kap khia uh a, a puan uh balkeekin a lu tung uh a tu dingin leivui lawn to uh hi.
Tua ciangin lei lakah sun sagih leh zan sagih sung amah tawh tukhawm uh a, ama thuakna a nasiat mahmah lam tak mu uh ahih manin kuamah in kam khat beek a paupih ngam kei uh hi.
Hih bang teng khit ciangin Job in thugen hong kipan a, mihing-a a pian’ni samsia hi.
Tua ciangin Job in,
“Ka suah ni, leh ‘pasal naungeek khat suak hi,’ a kicih zan beimang hen!
Tua ni khimzin’ ni suak hen! Van-a Pasian in phawkin nei kei hen la, tua ni-in khuavak taang kei hen.
Khua niim leh khuamial in khuhcip hen. Tua ni-in meiipi zing hen la, tua ni awk in valh tum hen.
Tua zan—khuamial sahpi in mancip hen! Kum khat sunga ni om dangte tawh kisim khawm kei hen la, kha khat sunga ni om dangte lakah kiseh khawm kei hen.
Tua zan-in ta piang thei kei hen la, lungdam otna awging tua zanin ging nawn kei hen.
Phuisamna tawh gulpi a khiim thei, a mitphiat uh tawh tuipi ganhing a hencip thei mite in tua zan samsia ta hen.
Tua ni zingsang, aksite mial hen. A vak ngei lo ding khuavak ngak niloh hen la, zingsang phalvak mu ngei kei hen:
bang hang hiam cih leh kei hong kipaaina naugil na khakcip lo a, kei’ muhna panin lungkhamna hong hepkhiat sak lo hi.
Bang hangin a sisa-in suak lo a, bang hangin ka suah phetin si hoh lo ka hi hiam?
Bang hangin ka nu’ khuk tungah hong kitawi a, a nawi hong kiteepsak se ahi hiam?
Tua hi zenzen kei leh nuam takin han-ah ka lum hithiat khin ding hi; sihna sungah ihmu-in ka tawlnga khin ding a,
amau’ adingin inn hoih nono a lam leitung kumpite leh a uliante,
a inn uh ngun leh kham tawh a kidim a hau uliante tawh han-ah ka tawlnga khin ta ding hi.
Bang hangin a hun cing nai lo-a suak naungeek bang, khuavak mu man lo-a si naungeekte bangin hong kiselcip hoh lo ahi hiam?
Tua lai-ah a migilote in siatna sukha nawn lo ding a, a gimte tawlnga hithiat ding hi.
Tua lai-ah galmat salte in nopna ngah ding a, nasem ukpa’ aw za nawn lo ding uh hi.
Tua lai-ah milian mineu omkhawm a, silate nangawn a topa’ kiangpan suakta hi.
Bang hangin lungkhamna a thuak mipa tungah khuavak kipia a, nuntakna haksa a sa mahmah mipa tungah nuntakna kipia hiam?
sih ding lunggulh ngeungau napi a si thei lo, sum phum zon’ sangin sih ding a lim zon’ zaw,
han sung a tun’ ciangin a nuam mahmah, hankhuk a tun’ ciangin nuam lua-in a diang gawp mite’ khuavak mu dingin mi-in piang laizang ahi hiam?
Bang hangin mai lam thu ding thei lopi-in a mot om ding, a kimkotah Pasian in dai a khaknelh mipa, mi-in piang zenzen ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh khuisatna in ka annek suak a, ka tauna in luipi ging bang ahi hi.
Ka kihtaktak ka tungah hong tung a, ka laulau ka tuak ta hi.
Lungnopna ahi a, daitak-a om hithiat theihna ahi zongin ka nei kei hi; lungkhamna in hong nawk niloh a, tawldam hun ka nei kei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Teman khuami Elifaz in thu gen a,
“Mi khatpeuh in thu hong genpih leh na heh ding hiam? Kua in a kam ip zo nawn ding ahi hiam?
Lunghiang mite na hanthotna, khut kha, ban khate na khauhsakna,
a puk mite na thugenna tawh na kipsakna, khuk zaw mite na hatsak ngeite ngaihsun in.
Ahi zongin nang tungah tuate hong tung a, na thuak zo kei hi; tuate in nang hong su a, na lung niam hi.
Na biakna in hong hehnem zo lo ahi hiam? A paubaang lo, na nuntakna in lametna hong pia zo lo ahi hiam?
Tu-in ngaihsun in, midik kimlai kua sia ngei ahi hiam? A thutang mi a kisuksiatna koi-ah na mu ngei hiam?
Mawhna bawlin buaina ahih mi in a gamtatna bangin a gah a atna ka thei hi.
Pasian’ husan’na tawh tua bang mite sia a, ama hehna in tua bang mite kangtum hi.
Humpinelkai bangin migilote hawkna dai ta a, Pasian in amau hate suktan sakin gamdai ta uh hi.
An nek ding mu loin a thahat humpinelkai bangin si uh a, a tate uh kithehthang hi.
Tu-in kei kiangah thu khat hong tung khian a, ka bil in tua thu ginghiau a za hi.
Mi a ihsip hun zankim laitak, zan mangmat hun lai takin,
launa leh liin’na kei tungah hong tung a, ka pumpi liin’na in kei hong lausak hi.
Huih in ka mai hong mut a, ka khuasikmul hong suaksak hi.
A meel ka khen theih loh lim khat hong ding a, ka mai-ah mihing lim khat hong om a, tua ciangin aw-uun duadua khat ka za a,
‘Pasian mai-ah mi khatpeuh paubaang loin om zo ngei ding ahi hiam? Amah a Bawlpa’ mai-ah sitbaang loin om zo ngei ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in ama nasemte mahmah muang zo loin, a sawltakte a mawhna mu ahih leh,
inn umna kawm dingin buan-a kizatna inn sunga teeng mite, a inn bulpi leivui ahi, vasa bu bangin a kimeekcip thei,
zing kal nitak kal-a a kisusia thei sungah a omte, bangzah ta-in kuama don lohin sia cipin,
amau’ liatna in taisan pak ding a, pilna ngah ngei loin si pak kan zawn ding ahi hiam?’ hong ci hi.
Tu-in na thu ko in; nang hong huh ding om ahi hiam? A siangthote kua pen’ lam zuan ding na hi hiam?
Mihaipa in ama hehna sih lawh a, muhdahna in sihna piangsak hi.
Mihaipa in lim takin zung kha ngei napi, ama inn thakhatin kizunglot ka mu ngei hi.
A tapate kuama suahtaksak zawh ding hi nawn lo hi; kulh kongpi gei-ah amaute kisugawp a, amaute a honkhia ding kuamah om lo hi.
Midangte in a neihsate liah tumsak a, amah sangin a hatzawpa in a um a beel sunga omte nangawn laksak a, a neih a lam duhgawh deihgawh hi.
Lei lak panin gimna hong piang tawm lo a, lei sung panin lungkhamna hong pokhia tawm hi lo hi;
mei-ek a tolen’ ngei mah bangin mihing in ama lungkham nading mah piangsak hi.
Nang hi leng, ka Pasian tungah ka thuum ding a, ama tungah ka thu ka ap ding hi.
Amah in na liante leh kuama phawk zawh loh thute sem a, genzawh lohin a lamdang na tampi bawl hi.
Amah in leitungah guah zusak a, lo khempeuh tui a buak hi.
Amah in miniamte sang koih a, a dahte lungnuam sak hi.
Amah in migilote’ geelna suksiatsak ahih manin amaute in a ngimna uh tangtun thei lo uh hi.
Amah in migilote amau’ gitlohna mah-ah awk sak a, ngian a zangte’ geelna lumlet sak hi.
Suntangpi-in amaute khuamial sung kiden’na a, suntangpi-in zan bangin mialzawt uh hi.
Ahi zongin amah in amau’ kiang panin pa nei lote honkhia a, mi thahatte kiang panin mi cimawhte honkhia hi.
Tua ahih manin mizawngte in lametna nei kik uh a, thuman lote ahih leh kihencip hi.
Pasian in a taii mite minuamsa hizaw ahih manin, Vanglianpa’ taiina thupisan’ in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a liamsak hangin a liamma tun ding a, ama satna liamma a damsak ding hi.
Lungkhamna guk vei dong na tuahna-ah amah in hong hon ding a, a sagih veina dingah siatna in nang hong su nawn lo ding hi.
Kialpi sungin na sih nading pan hong honkhia ding a, gal sungah namsau panin hong suakta sak ding hi.
Gensiatna pan nang hong kihu ding a, siatna hong tun’ ciangin na lau kei ding hi.
Suksiat ding leh puksih dingte na nuihsan lel ding a, leitung gamsate na kihta kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh na lo sungah suang om lo ding a, gamlak gamsate in hong su lo ding hi.
Na inn sung lunghimawh nading om lo hi ci-in na thei ding a, na inn kiim na et ciangin a kitasam bangmah om lo ding hi.
Na suan na khakte tampi pha ding hi, ci-in na thei ding a, na sunga piangte leitung lopa zah pha ding hi, ci-in na thei ding hi.
A hun ciangin ancilna phual-ah buhlom a tun’ mah bangin teek sihin han na zuan ding hi.
Hih thu khempeuh ka kantel uh a, a thuman a na hi hi, za in la, nang adingin zang in.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Ka lunggimna kitawikhai hen la, ka haksatna khempeuh kitawi teh leh!
Tuipi sehnel khempeuh sangin gikzaw ding ahih manin ka kampaute thakhauh mahmah hi.
Vanglianpa’ thaltangte in kei hong kha a, ka sungah a thal gu kidiah hi. Pasian in a kihtakhuai-in kei hong su hi.
Gam late in lopa a nek lai takin ham a, bawngtal in an a nek lai takin ham ahi hiam?
An lim lote, ci sawh loin kine thei a, aktui da kang in limna nei ahi hiam?
Ka kam in tuate ciam nuam lo a, tuate in a luaksuahhuai an tawh kibang hi.
Ka ngetna ngah thei hi leng a, Pasian in ka deihna hong pia ding hi leh,
Pasian in kei hong sucip hen la, a khut zanin kei hong that vet leh!
Tua hi leh keima kihehnepna hi ding a, hih zahta ka thuakna-ah nuamin ka diang ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Siangtho Pa’ thu ka nial khat zong om lo hi.
Ka thuak lai nadingin bang hatna nei nawn a, lungduai a ka omna dingin lamet ding bang om nawn ahi hiam?
Ka thahatna in suang bang hi a, ka pumpi in sumngo tha paai ahi hiam?
Kei leh kei’ sungah huhna bangci ngah tawm ding ka hi hiam? Kei hong kihuh nading ka nget nading kuamah om lo hi.
“Pasian ka nusia a, ka nusia kei zongin, hih bang lungkham hunin lawm citak ka kisam hi.
No ka lawmte pen, lui tuikhang bang, a mangthang pak luitui let bang,
nin a khaknelh vuk leh tuikhal bangin na zuautat uh hi.
Khua a lum ciangin tua tui mangthang a, ni a sat ciangin a kang hi.
Tua tui zong dingin khualzin mite pai kawikawi a, gamsung tengah kawi pai-in a mangthang uh hi.
Tema khua mi khualzinte in zong tua tui zong uh a, Sheba mite in zong tua tui muan’in a nei uh hi.
Ahi zongin tua a lametna uh ah cimawh uh hi; tua tui zuan uh a, a om loh ciangin cih nading thei loin kam ka uh hi.
Tu-in zong kei adingin note tua mah bang na hi uh hi; ka gimna teng nong mu uh a, na lau uh hi.
No kiangah, ‘Na khat peuhpeuh hong pia un, ka suahtak nadingin sum tawh hong huh un,
ka galte’ kiang panin hong honkhia un, kei hong nengniamte’ khut sung panin hong tan khia un,’ hong ci ngei zenzen ka hi hiam?
“Hong hilh thei le uh cin, pau loin ka om pah ding hi: Ka khialhna hong theih telsak dih un.
Lungsim takpi tawh thugennate heh loin kisang thei a, ahi zongin no hong taiina un bang phatuam sak ahi hiam?
Kamging mawkmawk hehtaak sa a, huih letmang cihmawh kamte thupi ngaihsut na hi uh hiam?
Mi cimawh khat suksiat sawm a, na lawm khat uh hih gawp sawm na hi uh hiam?
“Tu-in kong thuum hi; kihei un la kei hong en un, Na maitang uh ah zuau gen dingin kilawm ka hi hiam?
Ngaihsun pha un, a kilawmlopi-in hong hih kei un. Ngaihsun pha un, ka hoihna hong kize-et hi lel hi.
Ahi zongin zuau gen mahin nong ngaihsun lai veve uh a, a sia leh a pha khen thei loin nong seh lai veve uh hi.
“Leitungah mihing in nasep haksa nei a, ama hun in thacial nasempa’ aa bang hilo ahi hiam?
Sila nasemte in niliim lunggulhin, a kicial nasempa in a thaman a ngak tawh kibang hilo ahi hiam?
A mawkna-ah kha tampi sung ka om a, zan thapai lungkhamna in keima tanh ahi hi.
Nitak ka lup ciangin, ‘Cik ciangin khuavak in ka tho tam,’ ka ci hi. Ahi zongin zan sau a, zingsang khuavak mateng ka kigawigawi hi.
Ka pumpi khempeuh than dim a, ka vun tung khempeuh meima in tuamcip hi.
Ka hunte in siamgante’ siam ciangtang sangin manlang zaw a, lametna om loin a mong tung pak hi.
“Pasian aw, ka nuntakna in husan’ bang bek ahihna hong phawk in; ka mit in hun nuam mu kik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Kei hong mu ngeipa in kei hong mu nawn lo ding a, na hong et laitak mahin ka mangthang ding hi.
Meiilum kaite bei-in a man’than’ bangin Leinuai-a paisukpa hong ciahkik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
A inn-ah amah hong ciahkik nawn lo ding a, ama omna ngei mun in amah thei nawn lo ding hi.
“Tua ahih manin pau loin ka om kei ding hi; ka lungkham manin kam ka pau ding a, ka gim luat manin ka phun ding hi.
Kei hong cing ding na koih nadingin, kei tuipi ganhing hong sa na hi hiam?
Lum leng nuam ding a, ihmu leng ka phunna phatuam ding hi, ci leng lah,
a lauhuai mang nong man’sak a, a lauhuai mangmuhna tawh nong lau sak hi.
Tua ahih manin gui-awk ding ka ut zaw a, hih bang ka thuak sangin ka si nuam zaw hi.
Ka lungkham a, ka nungta nuam nawn kei hi. Ka nuntakna in husan’ bang hi lel ahih manin kei guak hong hici om sak hoh in, kimanna om lo hi.
Nang in hih zahin na thupi ngaihsut dingin na lungsimah na ngaihsut dingin,
zingsang simin daantat dingin ama kiangah pai-in amah na ze-et themthum nadingin mihing in bang hi lel ahi hiam?
Tom kha sung beek hong pelh lo ding a, ka hu beek hong sang sak man lo ding na hi hiam?
Mihingte a encikpa aw, a khial ka hih leh zong, nang tungah bang hong gamta ka hi hiam? Bang hangin kei hong ngim a, bang hangin na muitum suak ka hi hiam?
Bang hangin ka khialhna hong maisak lo a, ka mawhna hong paihkhiat sak lo na hi hiam? Tu-in han sungah ka lum ding a, nong zon’ hangin ka na om kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Shuah gammi Bildad in dawng a,
“Tua bang thu bangtan vei gengen ding a, bangtan vei paupau ding na hi hiam?
Pasian in thutang zang lo ahi hiam? Vanglianpa in thuman zang lo ahi hiam?
Na tate ama tungah khial a, amau’ mawhna amaute a tuaksak hi.
A hun lai-in Pasian zong in la, Vanglianpa’ hehpih ding thuum lecin,
nang dikin thutang kisa na hih leh pel loin amah in nang hong en ding a, na thumanna tawh kizui-in thaman hong pia na ding hi.
Tua hi leh, na zawn’ mahmah khit hangin a tawpna-ah na hau kik ding hi.
“Khangluite thu kantel in la, pute pate’ tuahsa thute ngaihsun in.
Eite in zan mah mi i hi a, bangmah i thei kei hi; leitunga i nuntaknate in niliim bang hi lel hi.
Amaute in nang hong hilhin, a thu hong genin, amau’ phawksa thute hong gen ding hilo ahi hiam?
“Ciknawng om lohna-ah laiphai kungte po thei ahi hiam? Tui om lohna-ah pumpeng kungte pung thei ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin tuate a pak kimlai a phuk hun nai lopi-in lopa dang khempeuhte sangin keu masa zaw hi.
Pasian a mangngilh mi khempeuh tua mah bang ahi hi; Pasian a don lo mite’ lametna a bei hi.
Ama kimuan’na maimom khau bang hi lel a, ama ki-upna maimom bu bang hi lel hi.
A inn tungah kingam a, a inn hoi hi, a inn lencip a, ahi zongin kip zo lo hi.
Amah in nitaang sungah a khang kungno, a huan sungah a dawn hilhhelh kungno ahi hi.
Ahi zongin suangtum lakah a zung a kivial, suangtawphah a phukha zung suak hi.
Tua ciangin mi khatpeuh in a phung pan zung bawh a, ‘Nang hong thei ngei zenzen kei ing,’ ci-in lawnkhia hi.
Hih bang danin ama nuntakna bei a, lei sung panin kung dangte hong po khia hi.
“Thei tel in Pasian in mawhbaang lo mi nil khia lo ding a, gamtatsia mite huh lo ding hi.
Na muk-ah nuihna hong omsak ding a, na kam-ah lungdam-a kikona hong omsak ding hi.
Nang hong mudahte in maizumna ngah ding uh a, migilote’ puanbuk maimang ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Kuamah in Pasian a zawhzawh lohna a tel takin ka thei ta hi.
Mi khat in Pasian tawh thu kinial ding hi leh tulkhat sungah khatvei nangawn dawng thei lo ding hi.
Ama pilna thukin, ama vangliatna zai hi; kua in khauh takin nial a, nial pai suak zo ahi hiam?
Pasian in mualte liingsak a, tawlnga sak lo hi; a hehna tawh mualte lumlet hi.
Amah in leitung lokgawp a, a khuampite kiliing hi.
Amah in ni a suah loh nadingin thu pia a, aksite sin cip hi.
Amah bek in vanpi zal a, tuipi tuihualte tuancil hi.
Amah in van-a om Khawlei-uikai, Zawlzawng, Seguk, leh Khanglam aksite a bawlpa ahi hi.
Amah in kuama theihkhiat zawh loh na lian tampi bawl a, kuama sim zawh loh na lamdang tampi sem hi.
Ka kiangah amah hong pai a, ke’n amah ka mu thei kei hi; amah gamtangtang a, ahih hangin amah ka thei kei hi.
Amah in la khia nuam leh kua in khaktan zo ding hiam? Bang hih na hi hiam, kua in ci thei ding ahi hiam?
“Pasian in ama hehna dokkik het lo mah ding hi; Rahab’ pawlte a khe nuai-ah kun uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ke’n amah bangci dawn thei loh zaw kan ding a, amah ka nial nading kammal bangci muh ding ka hi hiam?
Kei ka dik hangin amah ka dawng thei kei hi; kei hong mawhsakpa tungah hong hehpih ding ka nget kul hi.
Thukhen zumah amah samin hong pai leh zong ka thuumna hong ngai dingin ka um tuan kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh thu themno khat hangin nakpi takin kei hong hih a, thu om lopi-in gimna tampi hong thuaksak hi.
Ka hu nangawn hong sang sak man lo a, lungkhamna tawh hong kidimsak hi.
Thatang hat thu ding hi leh, amah hat mahmah a, thutang kituh hi leeng, kua in thukhen zumah amah sam zo ding ahi hiam?
Kei ka dik hangin keima kam mah in hong man ding a, mawhbaang lo ka hih hangin ka kampau hong lehhei sak ding hi.
Paubaan’ na ka neih loh hangin kei ka kithupi ngaihsut tuan het kei a, ka nuntakna ka kih hi.
Thu khat bek om hi; tua ahih ciangin, amah in a paubaang lote leh a gilote susia khawm hi, ka ci hi.
Lauhuai lianpi hong tung pakin sihna a om ciangin mawhbaanglote’ thuumna nuihsan lel hi.
Migilote khut sungah leitung kipia a, amah in thukhen-mangte’ mit tunsak hi—amah hi kei leh kua ahi ding ahi hiam?
“Laitaite sangin ka hun nawh tai zaw a, bei pak ahih manin nopna ngah kha lo hi.
Pumpeng gunkuang bangin nawh pai a, muvanlai sa bawh bangin nawh len’ hi.
Ka dahnate kimangngilh bawlin, kimaitaisak ning ci ta leng zong,
a dikin nong seh loh ding lam tak thei khin ka hih manin ka thuak dingte’ hangin ka lau hi.
Kei a mawh-a hong kiseh ding ahih leh bang hangin a mawkna-in na sem ding ka hi hiam?
Satpiang tawh kei kisilin, vuttui tawh ka khutte sawp ta leng zong,
buan sungah kei nong hencip ding a, ka puante in kei a kihhuai hong suaksak ding hi.
Amah ka dawn’ theih nadingin amah in kei bangin mi hi lo a, thukhen zum-a thu kineihpih theih ding hi lo hi.
Ko tegel kikalah thu hong khen ding khat om thei hen la, ko tegel tungah a aana hong zang ding khat om hi leh,
kei hong kisatna ciang hong paih khiatsak ding a, kei tungah lauhuaina lianpite hong om nawn lo ding hi.
Bang bang ahi zongin amah kihta loin ka pau ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kei omzia ding banga ka om loh lamtak ka kithei hi.
“Ka nuntakna ka cimtak ta hi; ka dahna thu ka ut utin ka gen ding a, ka lungkham manin ka paupau ding hi.
Pasian kiangah hih bangin ka ci ding hi: Kei hong mawhsak kei in; kei nong langpan’na thu hong gen in.
Na khut tawh na sepsate simmawh bawlin, migilote’ vaihawmna pan’pihin, hih bangin nong netniamna-ah bang phattuam ngah na hi hiam?
Mihingte bang lelin gamta na hi hiam?
Na nuntakna kote’ aa tan bang lelin ngaihsun na hi hiam?
Bang hangin ka mawhna khempeuh sulzuih-in, ka khialhna khempeuh kantel na hi hiam?
Ka mawh lohna na thei a, nang kiang panin kei hong hon ding a om lohna na theihsa mah ahi hi.
Nangma khut in kei hong lomin nong piangsak a, tu-in nangma khut mah in kei hong leh suksiat kik hi.
Leivui panin kei nong bawlna phawkkik in; leivui mah-in hong dengvui kik ding na hi hiam?
Kei ka pian’ nadingin ka pa tungah thatang na guan’ a, ka nu’ sungah kei nong khangsak hi.
Guh leh thaguite tawh ka pumpi ding nong bawl a, sazang leh vun tawh tua guhte nong tuamsak hi.
Kei tungah nuntakna hong pia-in nong it tawntung a, nangma hong kepna hangin ka nungta hi.
Ahi zongin a beisa hun sung khempeuh-ah kei adingin thusim khat na na neihna tu-in ka thei hi.
Ka khialh khakna hong ensim niloh na hih manin ka mawhna nong maisak nuam kei hi.
Ka khialh phetin gimna nong pia a, ka gamtat hoih ciangin nong pakta tuan kei hi. Keimah in mindaina leh maizumna tawh ka kidim hi.
Mavan’na khatpeuh neisun leng zong, humpinelkai bangin ka siat nading nong zong a, kei’ gim theih nadingin nalamdang nangawn na bawl hi.
Kei a hong langpang dingin teci na nei tawntung a, kei tungah na hehna khang semsemin, kei nong suk nading thu thak na mu tawntung hi.
“Pasian aw, bang hangin ka nu’ sung pan hong piangsak peuhmah na hi hiam? Kuama’ hong muh ma-in a si hi zaw leng!
Ka nu’ sung pan hankhuk zuat pah ding pen, mihing-a pian’ loh zah mahin a hoih ahi hi.
Ka nuntakna bei dektak ta hilo ahi hiam? Hong hici om sak hoh in! Ka hun neih lai sun teng nuamtak hong zangsak in.
Kei a pai baih ta ding ka hi a, kong ciahkik ngei kei ding hi, khuamial, lungzin’na gam,
khuavak nangawn khuamial ahihna, khuamial gam, lungzin’na gam, lungkhamna gam a zuan ta ding ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Na-amah gammi Zofar in dawng a,
“Kampau hihzahta hong kidawng lo ding sa a, kam tam pauna hangin thumanin hong kiseh ding sa na hi hiam?
Job aw, na thugente hong dawng thei lo ding hong sa na hi hiam? Na simmawh kampaute hong kidawng mawh ding sa na hi hiam?
Na thugente a man na sa kha a, Pasian’ muhna-ah a siangtho-in na kingaihsun kha hi.
Pasian in na thugente hong dawngkik leh ut mahmah ing!
Pilna nam tampi a omna thu, mihingte’ theih zawh loh thuthuk a omna thu hong gen ding hi. Na mawhna zahin Pasian in hong daantah lohna thu thei in.
“Pasian’ thuthuk thei khin zo ding na hi hiam? Vanglianpa’ hih theihna thei khin zo ding na hi hiam?
Pasian in vantung sangin sang zaw a, ahi zongin tua vantung nangawn na ban zo kei hi. Pasian in Leinuai thu thei a, ahi zongin nangmah in tua thu na thei kei hi.
Pasian’ liatna in leitung sangin golzaw a, tuipi sangin zaizaw hi.
Pasian in nang manin thu hong sit leh amah a khaktan ding kua om ahi hiam?
Pasian in mi hoihlote thei takpi hi; mawhna a muh ciangin thu don lo ding ahi hiam?
Gam sung late mihing suak ngei ding a mihaite pil ngei ding ahi hiam?
“Job aw, na lungsim a hoihin bawl in la, Pasian’ lam kihei in.
Khialhna na bawl khak leh paaikhia in la, na inn-ah gitlohna omsak kei in.
Tua hi leh kisuan’na om loin na khuadak ngam ding a, na lungnuamin launa na nei kei ding hi.
Na lungkhamnate veng ding a, tuikhang pak bangin na phawk kha nawn kei ding hi.
Tua ciangin na nuntakna in sun sangin taangzaw ding a, nuntak lungzin pen hun in phalvak sangin taangzaw ding hi.
Lungnuam tak leh lametna nei-in na om ding a, Pasian in nang hong hu-in tawldamna hong pia ding hi.
Kuamah kihtak nei loin nuam takin na om ding a, mi tampi in nangma maipha hong zong ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin migilote ahih leh cimawhin khuadak ding uh a, suahtak nading lampi mu lo ding uh hi. Amau’ ngah ding ahih leh sihna bek ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Note pen theihna kicing na kisa mah uh a, pilna a nei na kisa mah uh hi.
Ahi zongin note zah mahin kei zong thu ka thei a, note sangin themkhat zong ka niamzaw tuan kei hi. Midangte sangin na theih zawk uh bang om tuan ahi hiam?
Ka lawmte nangawn in tu-in kei hong nuihsan uh a, kei dikin paubaang lo napi hong nuihsan uh hi; ahi zongin Pasian in ka thungetna hong piak hun om hi.
Note in lungkhamna na nei kei uh a, ahi zongin kei nong ciamnuih bawl uh hi; a puk dektak mipa na satgawp uh hi.
Guta mite nuam takin om hit-hiat a, Pasian simmawhte nuam takin nungta hi.
“Ahi zongin, gamsate va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi; vasate va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi;
lei tunga bokvak ganhingte va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi; tui sung ngasate zong va dong un, hong hilh ding uh hi.
Pasian’ khut in amaute a bawlna thu, a vekpi-in thei kim uh hilo ahi hiam?
Ama pian’saksate’ nuntakna a ukpa in Pasian ahi hi; mihing khempeuhte’ nuntakna ama khut sungah om hi.
Leii in an a ciap mah bangin, bil in thu ngai tel hilo ahi hiam?
Khanghamte in pilna nei a, nuntak saute in thu thei tel uh hi.
“Pasian in pilna leh vangliatna nei a, amah thukip-in thu theitel hi.
Pasian in phelkeek leh kuamah in lamkik zo lo a, Pasian in thong-ah mi koih leh kuamah in suaktasak zo lo hi.
Pasian in guah a khaktan ciangin leitung keugaw a, tui a khah ciangin tui hong khang hi.
Pasian thahatin gualzo tawntung a, mi khemte leh khemna a thuakte Pasian’ ukna nuai-ah om hi.
Amah in mipilte’ pilna susia-in, makaite pen mihai bangin gamta sak hi.
Amah in kumpite za kia sak a, thong-ah a khia hi.
Amah in siampite mihai suaksak a, mi vangliante lawnthal hi.
Amah in mi’ muante a pau thei loin bawl a, khanghamte’ pilna paihkhiatsak hi.
Amah in mi vangliante mindaisak a, mi thupite’ kihihsakna beisak hi.
Amah in khuamial sung panin thuthukte kalkhia a, a kithei zolo thute kitelsak hi.
Amah in minamte thahatsakin liansak a, ahi zongin amah in tuate zo gawpin susia hi.
Amah in minam makaite’ pilna paihkhiatsak a, lampi om lohna gamlakah a vakvai sak hi.
Khuavak om loin khuamial lakah amaute in mialzawt uh a, zukham bangin amaute hoi-hoi uh hi.
“Na gen thu khempeuh uh ka muhsa hi a, ka bil-in ka zaksa, ka theihsa thu ahi hi.
Note’ theih khempeuh, kei zong ka thei hi. Note sangin ka neuzaw tuan kei hi.
Ahi zongin note tawh kam kinial hi loin Pasian tawh kinial ka hi hi. Pasian tawh hih thu ka kinial nuam hi.
Note in na haina uh zuauthu tawh na melh uh a, kuamah a damsak zolo zato siam-a kineite tawh na kibang uh hi.
Pau het loin om hi le-uhcin, mipilpi mah hong kisa zaw ding hi ve’n.
Tu-in ka thugen hong ngai un la, ka gen laitak limtak ngai un.
Pasian’ min dingin a man lo genin, ama adingin zuauthu gensak ding na hi uh hiam?
Pasian angvan ding a, ama ading gensak ding na hi uh hiam?
Pasian in lim takin note hong entel leh note sungah hoihna mu ding ahi hiam? Mihingte na khem bangun Pasian khem thei dingin kingaihsun na hi uh hiam?
A simthamin angvanna na zat uh leh amah in note hong taai taktak ding hi.
Ama vangliatna in note hong lausak ding a, note tungah amah kihtakna hong tung ding hilo ahi hiam?
Na thugennate uh vut khu bang hi lel a, na siksante uh leikhal bang hi lel hi.
Pau kei un la, kei thu hong gensak dih un, a piang peuhpeuh a piang hi mai hen.
Keimah in ka nuntakna pia ngamin, ka nuntakna ka ap ngam hi.
Pasian in kei hong that mah taleh zong, ke’n phamawh ka sa kei hi. Ahi zongin ama mai-ah ka thu ka gen veve ding hi.
Pasian’ mai-ah migilote’ pai ngam lo ahih manin, ka han’na in ka gualzawhna hi ding hi.
Ka thugente limtak ngai un la, ka lahtelnate na za un.
Ka thu a gen dingin a baihsa-in ka om a, thu ka zawh ding ka tel theih hi.
Pasian aw, kei hong mawhsak ding na hi hiam? Nong mawhsak leh, pau loin a si dingin ka kiging hi.
Thu nih kong ngen hi, hong pia in; tua ciangin nang tungah bangmah kong im kei ding hi.
Kei hong daantat nawn kei in la, launa hong thuaksak nawn kei in.
Pasian aw, hong hopih masa in, kong dawng ding hi. Kei, thu hong gensak in la, nang’ hong dawng in.
Ka mawhna ka khialhna bangzah pha hiam? Ka mawhna leh ka khialhna teng hong thei sak in.
Bang hangin kei hong peel a, gal bangin hong ngaihsun na hi hiam?
Keimah, lausak ding hanciam na hi hiam? Kei, singteh bang lel hilo ka hi hiam? Anvai themkhat gal-in do ding na hi hiam?
Nangmah in kei tungah thusiapi nong zong a, ka neu lai-a ka gamtatna nangawn tawh nong mawhsak hi.
Nangmah in ka khe sikkol nong bulh a, ka kalsuanna khempeuh leh ka khekhap nangawn na entel hi.
Tua huhau-in singmuat bangin ka puk a, nget in a nek puan bangin ka zangawp hi.
“Mihingte a nuntak hun tom a, lungkhamna tawh kidim hi.
Amaute pakpalh bangin khangin keu pak uh a, niliim bangin pai hanhanin mangthang uh hi.
Pasian aw, tua bang lel mi kei hong en a, thukhenna thuak dingin na mai-ah hong sam na hi hiam?
Mihing banga a ninte sung panin a siang bangmah hong piang lo ding hi.
Ama nuntak tan ding kisehkhol a—a nuntak ding kha phazah kiciangtan khin hi. Nangmah in na ciangtan khin a, kikheel thei lo hi.
Amah en loin tuaci omsak mai in la, a nuntakna haksa mah zomsak hoh in.
“A kiphuksa singkung nangawn in lametna nei a, a bul sel-in nungta kik thei hi.
Lei sungah a zungte a teek zongin, lei sungah a bulsum a si zongin,
guahtui ngahin, singkungno bangin hong sel kik hi.
Ahi zongin, mi si a, amah maimang pah hi; amah a beina tungta a, koi-ah om nawn ahi hiam?
Gun tuite leh tuipi tuite a kan hun om thei ding hi.
Ahi zongin vanpi a om lai tengin, misite tho kik ngei lo ding a, a ihmutna panun khanglo ngei lo, tang ngei lo ding uh hi.

Hih gimna tawh ka kipelh theih nadingin nong phawk loh nading mun misite’ gam sungah hong busak in. Misite hing kik thei lo ahih manin, a hingin hong omsak peuh lecin, tua lai-ah ka ut hi. Na hehna a dam ciangin hong phawkkik ding hi peuh lecin, tua lai-ah ka ngak nuam hi.
Tua ciangin kei na hong sam ding a, kong dawng ding hi; nangma bawlsa ahi keimah na hong lunggulh ding hi.
Tua ciangin ka kalsuanna khempeuh nong en ding a, ahi zongin ka khialhnate nong sulzuih nawn kei ding hi.
Ka khialhnate hong maisakin, nong paihkhiatsak ding hi; ka mawhna khempeuh nong phiat khiatsak ding hi. Tu-a bangin a piang thei hi leh ka ut mahmah hi.
“Ahi zongin a tak takin ci lehang, mualte a puk ding hun, suangkeente nangawn a cip ding hun hong tung ding hi.
Tui in suangte nawt khia-in, guahtui in lei a nawt khiat bangin, nangmah in mihingte’ lametna na beisak hi.
Nangmah in mi khat zo gawpin amah bei hi; A meel kheksak gawpin na hawl mang hi.
A tapate in amah pahtawi dingin hong pai ta leh zong bangmah phawk zo nawn lo a, a tapate mindai ta leh zong bangmah phawk zo nawn lo hi.
A pumpi sunga a natnate leh a lungsim gimna bek phawk in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Teman khua mi Elifaz in dawng a,
“Job aw, mawk paupau kei in! Nang’ pau bangin mipilte pau ngei lo a,
bangmah-a kimang lo kam pau lo a, phattuamna om lo dingpi-in thu seel lo uh hi.
Ahi zongin nangmah in Pasian zahtak nading na beisak a, ama mai-ah thu gen nading na khaktan hi.
Tu-in na mawhna thu na kam panin hong gingkhia a, ngian zangin na kampau tawh na mawhna na seel hi.
Na mawhna thu kei’ hong gen kisam lo a, na pauna khempeuh in na mawhna hong langsak ta hi.
“Mihing a piang lakah nang a masa pen kisa na hi hiam? Pasian in mualte a bawl lai-in nang a piang khin kisa na hi hiam?
Pasian’ vaihawmnate a zasimin kingaihsun na hi hiam? Nang bek in pilna khempeuh a nei-in kingaihsun na hi hiam?
Ko’ theih loh thu bang thei tuan na hi hiam? Ko’ muh loh nang bang mu tuan na hi hiam?
Na pa’ pian’ ma-a piang puteek samkangte tung panin kote in ka pilnate uh ka ngah uh hi.
Pasian in nang hong hehnem hi; bang hangin nialnial na hi hiam? Kam khum kam nem tawh Pasian’ taangin nang tungah thu kong gen uh hi.
Ahih hangin nang na lung khauhin, kote nong heh et hi.
Pasian’ tungah a heh na hi a, amah a simmawh na hi hi, tua bang thu gen kei in.
Mihing-a piang peuhmah paubaang loin siangtho taktak zo ding ahi hiam? Pasian’ tungah a thuman zo kua om ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in a siangtho vantungmite nangawn muang lo ahih leh, ei mawhnei mite bang hong ci muan’ mah ding ahi hiam?
Mihing in tui i dawn bangin siatna i dawndawn a, mihing pen siahuai-in bangmah i man kei hi.
“Job aw, tu-in ka thutheihte na ngai in.

18-19 Amaute tung bekah gam kipia ahih manin, amaute a pial khiatpih ding gamdang mi tawh a kihel lo, a pu a pate un bangmah im loin thu a hilh suksuk uh, mipilte’ thugente kong gen ding hi. Tua a gen uh thute in:
Mi dang a nengniam migilopa in a khan’ tawntungin lungkhamna thuak ding hi.
Lau nading awging a bil-ah za ngitnget ding a, lungmuangin a om lai takin gutate in buluh ding hi.
Lungzin’na pan suahtak nading lametna om lo a, amah that dingin mun khatah namsau in ngak khinkhian a,
amah ne dingin musanete in ngak uh hi. A mai lam thu lungzin’huai ahihna thei hi.
A thahat kumpi khat bangin lungkhamna leh lungzin’na in amah hih gawp dingin a ngak hi.
