Pasian langpangin a khuttum a lahsan, Vanglianpa a dem mipa in hih bang thute thuak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in khauhtakin Pasian langpangin, a lum sahpi tawh lehdo hi.
A thatang muan’huai-in a pumpi a liat hangin,
ama teen’na khuapi sia-in, ama inn kisusia ding a, a sawt loin nin bulomtang suak ding hi.
Amah sauvei hau lo ding a, a neihsate kip lo ding hi. Ama liim nangawn maimang ding a,
khuamial panin suakta lo ding hi. Amah pen, a hiangte mei in a kattumsak, a pakte huih in a letkhiatsak singkung tawh kibang ding hi.
Amah in gitlohna suan’in nei ahih manin, gitlohna bek mah ngah kik ding hi.
A hun a tun’ ma-in amah bei ding a, singhiang bangin keu-in hing kik nawn lo ding hi.
A min ma-in a gahte a pulh leenggui bang ding a, a pakte a pulh mangkhin oliv kung bang ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian ngaihsun lote mi cimang suak a, sumgolh tawh kilam innte mei in kangtum hi.
Hih bang mite in siat nading bek ngaihsunin sem uh a, a lungsim uh ah khem ding bekbek ngaihsun uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Tua bang thute ka za ngei khin hi; hehnepna in gim nading bek ahi hi.
Khawl hun nei loin gengen lai ding na hi uh hiam? Na gen ding uh omom lai ahi hiam?
Note leh kei kikheek thei hi lehang, note’ gen khempeuh kei zong ka gen thei ding hi. Note ka lu hong pei sanin, thu tampi tak mah kong gen thei ding hi.
Ahi zongin, keimah in note hong tua cih loin, thu hoih tawh note hong hehnemin, note hehnep nading thu ka gen ding hi.
“Thu gen leng ka natna nuamtuam lo a, pau kei ta leng zong, phatuam tuan lo hi.
Pasian aw, kei nong paatsak ngiingei a, ka innkuan teng na si sak khin hi.
Kei nong mancip a, ka gal na suak hi. Ka vun guak leh ka guh guak bek-in ka om a, keima mawhna a kilatna-in mite in ngaihsun uh hi.
Pasian in a hehna tawh hong balnen ngiingei a, a ha hong gawi sanin hong heh et hi.
Mite in kei hong zahko uh a, ka paang a beng dingin hong kikhawmtuah uh hi.
Pasian in migilote khut sungah kei hong pia hi.
Kei nuamtakin a om kim lai, Pasian in ka gawl-in hong manin, hong balgawpin hong sugawp hi. Pasian in a muitum dingin kei hong suang a,
ka kimkot panin a thaltangte tawh hong kap hi. Tua thaltangte in kei hong kha-in hong liamsak a, tua bang nangawn ah hong hehpih lo hi.
Amah in kei hong liamsak thuahthuah a, galkap a hehpa bangin hong hih gawp hi.
Kei thuum-in puanhampi ka silh a, guallel-in leivui lakah ka om hi.
Ka kah kahna-in ka mai khempeuh sangawp a, ka mitkhute bawkin hong liahcip hi.
Ahi zongin ngongtatna themkhat zong ka zang kei a, Pasian’ tungah ka thungetna in lungsim takpi tawh ahi hi.
“Leitung aw, a man lo-a kei hong kibawlna seelcip kei in! Thuman deih-a ka kikona aw daicip sak kei in.
Kei’ adingin a ding ding, kei hong pan’pih ding mi khat a sanglam vantungah om hi.
Keima tang-a sempa in ka lawmpa ahi hi, Pasian in ka khitui luan’na bangin ka thungetna hong za leh ka ut hi.
Mi khat in a lawmpa’ ading a thuumsak bangin, mi khatpeuh in Pasian kiangah kei ading hong thuumsak leh ka ut hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka hun nai mahmah ta a, ka lehzuih nawn loh ding lampi zui-in a pai ka hi ta hi.
Ka bei ding naikuan ta hi. Ka hu ka sang zo nawn kei a, kei adingin hankhuk cih loh bangmah dang om nawn lo hi.
Ka heina khempeuh ah mite in hong zahko a, amau’ hong phinna in hong lungzingsak hi.
“Pasian aw, kei hong hu in. Ka thugente hong pan’pih ding kuamah dang om lo hi.
Nangmah in amaute thuman a mu lo dingin bawl na hih manin amaute na gualzosak kei ding hi.
Paunak in, sum ngah nop manin mi khat in a lawmte a lehhek leh, a tate in tua gitlohna thaman thuak hi, kici hi.
“Tu-in amaute in kei tungah hih paunak hong bulh uh a, mite in hih thu za-in kei hong cilpih uh hi.
Ka dahna hangin ka mit mial a, ka khut ka khete ciangkang bang hi.
Mi hoih-a kineite in lamdang hong sa uh a, migilo-in kei hong seh uh hi.
Mite’ zahtak-a kinei mite in, amau’ ngaihsutna man sa semsem uh hi. Thuman sem mite in thahat semsem ding hi.
Ahi zongin amaute khempeuh hong pai-in ka mai-ah hong ding le uh, amaute lakah mipil khat zong ka mu kei ding hi.
Ka hun bei ta hi; ka geelna teng maimang a, ka lametna teng bei ta hi.
Ka lawmte in, zan khuamial pen sun khuavak, ci uh hi; khuavak hong nai ta hi, ci uh a, ahi zongin khuamial sung mah ah kei ka om lai veve hi.
Kei’ lamet nading misite’ gam bek om lai a, tua khuamial sungah lumin ka ihmu ding hi.
Hankhuk pen ka pa hi, ka ci ding a, kei hong ne thante pen ka nu leh sanggam numeite, ka ci ding hi.
Kei’ lamet ding tua lai-ah bang om ahi hiam? Ka lamet ding tua lai-ah kua in nong muhsak uh hiam?
Misite’ gam Leinuai-ah ka pai ciangin nopsakna in kei hong zui lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Shuah gammi Bildad in dawng a,
“Job aw, khawl hun nei thei lo ding na hi hiam? Hong khawl phot lecin, ko zong thu kong gen thei ding uh hi.
Bang hangin bawng bang lelin kote hong ngaihsun a, mihaipi-in kote hong seh na hi hiam?
Na hehna tawh nangmah a kigimsak bek na hi hi. Nangma hangin leitung kinusia ding a, mualte kikhin khia ding sa na hi hiam?
“Migilopa’ meivak kisumit ding a, cikmah hunin a kuangkik ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Ama buk sungah khuamial ding a, a meivak mit ding hi.
A khe kip ngei a, ahi zongin tu-in a khe bai ta hi. Amah in a ngaihsut khialhna puklawh hi.
Thangsiahna ngen sungah bungbu tuk a, gum sungah amah kia hi.
Thang-ah a khetul-in awk a, thangkhau in amah gakcip hi.
Amah siahna-in lei lakah khauzak kitung a, a pai nading lampi-ah thang kisiah hi.
A ciangciang-ah lauhuaina in amah pang a, a kalsuanna khempeuh ah sulzuih hi.
Siatna in amah ngak a, siatna in su dingin amah ngak gige hi.
A kihtakhuai natna in a pum khempeuh tuam a, a khut leh a khete muatsak ta hi.
Lungmuang tak-a a omna inn panin kikaikhia a, Sihna Kumpipa kiangah kitunpih hi.
Ama sihna hangin a inn zatui tawh a kisian’suah khit ciangin a ut peuhpeuh tua inn-ah teeng thei pah ding hi.
Lei sunga ama zungte keu in, a tunga ama hiangte a si ta hi.
Inn leh gam-ah a minthan’na bei ta a, kuamah in amah phawk kha nawn lo hi.
A nungtate’ gam panin amah kihawl khia ding a, khuavakna mun panin khuamialna-ah kihawl khia ding hi.
Amah in suan-le-khak nei lo a, a teen’nasa mun-ah ama gui zom ding om lo hi.
Nisuahna pan nitumna dong ama thuakna a za peuhmah kigaih-in launa tawh liing uh hi.
Migilote, Pasian a ngaihsun lote’ thu tawpna in hih bang mah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
Bangtanvei thu gengenin, kei hong gimsak ding na hi hiam?
Kei nong simmawh niloh a, tua banga na gamtatna ah maizumna mel na nei thei kei hi.
A khial takpi mah hita leng zong, nang’ lainat nading bang om ahi hiam?
Keimah sangin a hoih zaw-in nang na kingaihsun a, ka thuaknate pen ka mawhna hang hi, ci-in na ngaihsun hi.
Hih thu hong piangsakpa in Pasian ahih lam mu thei lo na hi hiam? Kei hong mat nadingin amah in thang hong siah hi.
Hong ngong bawlna ka nial hangin kuamah in hong don kei hi. Thuman ka deih hangin hong kipia kei hi.
Pasian in ka lampi khaktan a, ka paisuak zo kei hi. Amah in ka pai nading lampi khua mialcipsak hi.
Amah in ka hauhna khempeuh hong lakkhiatsak a, ka min hoih kimlai hong siasak hi.
Amah in ka pumpi khempeuh hong satgawp hi. Ka nopsakna teng hong zunglot sakin, vul gawpin a si dingin hong nusia hi.
Kei’ tungah Pasian’ hehna sogawp a, ama gal lian penin kei hong ngaihsun hi.
Amah in keimah sim dingin a galkapte hong sawl a, galkapte in dum to-in ka buk hong umcih uh hi.
“Pasian in ka sanggamte hong taisan sak a, kei hong theisate kiangah mikhualpi ka suak hi.
Ka behte leh ka lawmte bei ta hi.
Ka inn-ah hong tung ngei ka zinte in hong mangngilh ta a, ka na a sem numeite in mikhual bangin hong bawl a, amau’ mai-ah midangpi ka suak hi.
Ka nasemte khatpeuh ka sap ciangin hong dawng nuam lo uh a, hong huh nading ka thuum ciang nangawnin hong thudon lo uh hi.
Ka zi in ka gimnam nam zo lo a, ka sanggamte mahmah in zong hong naih nuam lo uh hi.
Naupang melmawl nangawn in kei hong simmawh uh a, kei hong muh uh ciangin hong nuihsan uh hi.
Ka lawm it pente nangawn in kei hong muhdah et uh a, ka it pente nangawn in kei hong lang bawl uh hi.
Ka guh tungah ka vun kol dihdiah-in om a, a nungta liai-liai bekin ka om hi.
Hong hehpih un! Hong hehpih un! Ka lawmte hilo na hi uh hiam? Pasian in kei hong satpaai hi.
Pasian’ hong bawlsiat bangin bang hangin no zong hong bawlsia ding na hi uh hiam? Nong gimsakna uh kicing ta hoh hilo ahi hiam?
“Ka thugente mi khatpeuh in ciamteh hen la, laibu khat sungah khum leh ut mahmah ing!
Tua ahih kei leh zong, ka thugente, sikkhu khat tawh suang tungah khen hen la, a mang ngei nawn lo dingin gelh leh ut ing!
Ahi zongin a tawpna-ah kei hong pan’pih ding a nungta tawntung mi khat, vantungah a omna thu ka thei hi.
Natna in ka vun a nektum khit hangin, hih ka pumpi mahmah tawh Pasian ka mu ding hi.
Keima mit tektek tawh amah ka mu ding a, amah in kei hong mikhual et lo ding hi. Ka lungsim han’na bei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Amah bang i ci gimsak thei ding hiam?” na ci uh hi. Kei nong suk theih nadingun paulap khatpeuh na zong uh hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in namsau kihta un—tua namsau in a mawhte tungah Pasian’ hehna hong sem ding hi; tua ciangin thu a khen ding khat a om lam na thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Na-amah gammi Zofar in dawng a,
“Job aw, ka heh nong suaksak a, kei ka ki-iip zo nawn kei hi.
Na thugente khempeuh kei nong simmawhna kam hi a, ahi zongin kong dawn’ nading ka thei hi.
Tanglai pek-a kipan, leitungah mihing a om cil-a kipanin,
migilote’ nopsak hun a tomna thu, Pasian a thudon lote’ lungdam hun a tomna thu thei lo na hi hiam?
Migilopa lianin vantung a banto zongin, lian mahmah in a lutang in meii lak a banto zongin,
leivui them bangin maimang lel ding hi. Amah a thei ngei mite in, ‘Amah koi-ah om ta hiam?’ ci-in lamdangsa ding uh hi.
Amah pen zan-a mangmat bang leh mumaang bangin maimang ding a, cik mah hunin kimu kik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
Ama teen’na ngei mun panin amah mangthang ding a,
mizawngte’ na a suhsakte, a tate in a lohsak kik ding uh hi.
A pumpi moisuahin a thahat hangin, a sawt loin leivui suak pak ding hi.
“Ama kam sungah gitlohna lim sa mahmahin, namtui sa-in a leii tawh lop melmel a,
amah in muam muam nuamin siakhia nuam lo a, lim sa-in a dangtawng den’na-in a neih hangin,
a gil sungah a kha mahmah an suakin, gulgu a khapen zahin kha deidai hi.
Migilopa in a guksa hauhnate luakhia kik a, a gil sung nangawn panin Pasian in a lakkhiatsak hi.
Migilote’ nekte in gu tawh kibang a, gulgu neite’ tuk bangin amah si sak hi.
Amah in bawngnawi leh khuaizu guntui bangin a luang mu kha lo ding hi.
Amah in a nasepna thaman khempeuh nusia ding a, a hauhna zang kha man lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in mizawngte bawlsia-in don lo a, midangte’ inn lamsate sutin a tang hi.
“A huaihamna bei ngei lo a, a duh khempeuh siit nei lo hi.
Amah in a nek ciangin a khamval om nawn lo a, tu-in a hauhna teng bei ta hi.
A cihtheih pen hun lai takin, ama tungah lungkhamna lianpen tung ding hi.
Amah in a duh duh ne mai hen! Pasian in hehna tawh daantat ngawn ding hi.
Amah in namsau pelhin a taina-ah sumngo thal in kaptuk ding hi.
Thaltang khat in a pumpi pailet a, a te-dildel thaltang muk-ah si taak keuhkeuh a, ama tungah a kihtak huaipi hong tung hi.
Ama kholsa khempeuh kisusia a, mihing’ tawh loh meikuang in amah leh a innkuan khempeuh kangtum hi.
Vantungte in hih mipa’ mawhna pholak a, leitung in ama langah teci pang hi.
Pasian’ hehna hangin, ama hauhna khempeuh kisusia ding hi.
Migilote’ ngah ding a Pasian’ piak, migilote’ ngah in tu-a bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Ka thugennate lim takin hong ngai un la, Ka thu nong ngaihna uh nong hehnepna uh hi sak ni.
Thu ka gen theih nading hun hong pia un la, ka gen khit ciangin na ut uh leh hong zahpih un.
Kei’ kitotpihpa in mihing hi lo hi. Bang hangin lungtom lo ding ka hi hiam?
Kei hong en dih un. Lamdang na saktaak ding khat uh hilo ka hi hiam?
Keima tunga thu piang ka ngaihsut ciangin, lamdang sa-in lau-in ka liing hi.
Bang hangin Pasian in migilote khan’to sak a, hau sakin liansak ahi hiam?
A tate uh nuam takin a khan’tohna, leh a u a nau, a suan a khakte uh a pun’na a mu ding dongin nungta uh hi.
Pasian in amaute’ inn sungah lungkhamna tungsak lo a, amaute in lauhuaina thuak kha ngei lo uh hi.
A bawngte uh pung a, ta tolh cih zong om lo hi.
Tuuno bangin a naupangte uh tai khia-in kimawl uh a,
tamngai leh harp lasakna aw tawh kituakin lam uh hi.
Amaute a nuntak sungun ci-thei mahmah uh a, gentheihna thuak se loin si hiat uh hi.
Migilote in Pasian nawlkhin uh a, Pasian in amau’ nuntak nadingin a deihsaknate thei nuam lo uh hi.
Pasian’ nasep ding kisam sa lo uh a, Pasian’ kianga thunget a phattuamna om kei, ci uh hi.
Amau’ thahatna hang bek tawh a gina kisa uh a, amau’ ngaihsutna leh kei aa kigamla hi.
“Migilopa’ meivak kisukmit sak ngei ahi hiam? Amaute khatbeek in lungkhamna tuak ngei ahi uh hiam? Pasian in migilote hehna tawh daantat ngei ahi hiam?
Huih in a letkhiat buhkungte bang, huihpi in a mutkhiat buhsi bangin bawl ngei ahi hiam?
Pasian in a pa’ khialhna hangin a ta daantat hi, na ci uh hi. Tua bang hilo! Pasian in a mawhte mahmah daantat hen la, amau’ mawhna hangin daantat ahihna thei sak hen.
Mawhneite amau’ mawhna daan thuaksak hen la, Vanglian Pasian’ hehna theisak hen.
Mi khat a nuntakna a bei ciangin, a tate’ nopsakna phawk thei ahi hiam?
Mi khat in Pasian tungah thu hilh thei ding ahi hiam? Mi khat in Vanglian Pasian tungah thu khen thei ding ahi hiam?
Mi pawlkhatte a ci-thei mahmah-in si a, lungmuang lungnuamin om uh a,
annek tuidawn kicingin cidam hi.
Pawlkhatte ahih leh nopsak cih thei kha ngei loin, lunggim lungkhamin si uh hi.
Ahi zongin a kibangin a vekpi-in si-in kivui a, than in amaute tuamcip hi.
“Na lungsim sung uh ah na ngaihsutna, kei nong siatsak nopnate uh ka tel mahmah hi.
Siatna a gamta, mi lianpa’ inn, koi-ah om ta ahi hiam; na ci uh hi.
Khualzinin mite tawh kiho ngei lo na hi uh hiam? Amaute’ thugente thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Pasian hehin daan a piak ciangin, migilote peng tawntung zawsop hi.
Migilopa a gamtatna bangin a thukkik ding, migilopa mawhsakin a langpang ding kuamah om lo hi.
Migilopa han-ah a kivui ciangin, a hankhuk kicing a,
mi tul tampite in amah kha-in, damtak leh kangtakin lei tawh kivuk hi.
Tu-in note in amawknapi tawh hehnep nong sawm uh hi. Na gen thu khempeuh uh zuauthu bek hi lel hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Teman khua mi Elifaz in dawng a,
“Mihing a pil pente i cih nangawn, ama pumpi’ ading cih loh buang, Pasian’ ading a kiman’na om lo hi.
Na gamtat hoihna in Pasian’ phattuam nading piangsak lo a, na hoihna in Pasian hoihsak tuan lo hi.
Nangmah in Pasian na zahtakna hangin, amah in nang hong tai-in hong ze-et hilo hi.
Na mawhna a tamna hang, na gitlohna a liatna hang hizaw hi.
Na sanggampa’ hong sum bat taang dingin, a silh ding siitsak loin a puan teng na laksak hi.
A dangtakte tui na pia nuam kei a, a gilkialte an na pia nuam kei hi.
Na vangliatna leh na za liatna zangin, gam khempeuh na la khin hi.
Meigong numeite a huh nuam lo bek hi loin, mi tagahte bawlsia-in a neihsa uh na sut hi.
Tua ahih manin na kimkotah thang hong siah a, thakhat thu-in launa in hong buaisak hi.
Khuavak kimlai khuamial hong suak vatin khua na mu thei kei a, tuikhang in nang hong tuumcip hi.
“Van a sang pen dawn-ah Pasian om a, a sang mahmah a om aksite hong suk et lai hi.
Ahi zongin nangmah in, Pasian in bang thei ding ahi hiam? Meii in Pasian tuamcip hi—eite’ thu bang hong ci khen theih ding ahi hiam?’ na ci hi.
Van khumzangah Pasian a pai kawmin, meii pailetin Pasian in hong musuk thei lo ding hi, ci-in na ngaihsun hi.
Migilote’ gamtat ngeite mah gamtat ding ngaihsun na hi hiam?
Amau’ hun tung lopi-in tuikhang in amaute taai hi.
Hih mite pen Pasian a nial, Pasian in amaute bangmah a cih thei lo dinga a ki-umte ahi uh hi.
Tua hita se leh amaute a daupaisakpa in Pasian hi a, migilote’ ngaihsutna kei aa tawh kigamla hi.
Migilote a kidaantatna a muh uh ciangin mi hoihte nuamin, pauban’na nei lo mite in nuihsan uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh migilote’ neih khempeuh kisusia a, a om lai sunte nangawn mei in kangtum hi.
“Job aw, tu-in Pasian tawh kilem in la, amah galbawl nawn kei in; tua hi leh amah in nang thupha hong pia ding hi.
Ama hong hilhnate zui in la, ama thute na lungsimah ciamteh in.
Lungsim tak tawh Vanglianpa lamah kihei in la, na innsung pan gamtatsia khempeuh bei sak in la,
na kham neihte leivui bang lelin ngaihsunin, na Ofir khamte gunsuang bang lelin ngaihsunin,
Vanglian Pasian pen nangma kham, leh nangma ngun hi sak lecin,
Pasian na muang tawntung ding a, na lungdamna bulpi in amah ahih lam na thei ding hi.
Thu na nget ciangin amah in na ngetna hong pia ding a, na thuciamnate na tungsak ding hi.
Na hih khempeuh na taangtun’ dinga na maa vang ding hi.
Pasian in mi kiphasakte niamkhiat a, mi niamte gum hi.
Nang a mawhbaang lo a, na gamtatna a man ahih nak leh amah in nang hong hon ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“Tu lai takin Pasian tungah phun lo, heh lo in ka om thei kei a, thuum loin ka om thei kei hi.
Amah ka zon’na ding dan thei-in, ama kiang ka tun’na ding zia thei hi leng,
ama mai-ah ka thu ka gen ding a, kei ka dikna thu a kicingin ka gen ding hi.
Ama hong gen ding thute leh kei hong dawn’ nading thute ka thei nuam hi.
Pasian in a thaneih khempeuh tawh kei hong langpan’ ding ahi hiam? Langpan’ lo ding hi, ka thugenna ngai ding hi.
Kei a thuman ka hi a, Pasian kiangah ka gen thei ding hi; kuama phel zawh nawn loh dingin kei’ dikna genkhia ding hi.
“Ahi zongin Nisuahna lam ka zong a, Pasian ka mu thei kei hi; Nitumna lam ka zong a, amah ka mu thei tuan kei hi.
Leilu lam ka zon’ hangin amah ka mu thei kei a, Leitaw lam ka zon’ hangin zong amah ka mu thei tuan kei hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in ka kalsuanna khempeuh thei a, kei hong ze-et khit ciangin kham bangin ka sian’thona a mu ding hi.
Ama hong lamlahna citakin ka zui a, lam ka pial ngei kei hi.
Pasian’ thupiakna bangin ka gamta ngitnget a, keima utna zui loin, ama deihna ka zui hi.
Amah in a lungsim kheel mi hi lo a, kuamah in amah nial zo lo hi. Ama hihnopte kuamah in khaktan zo lo hi.
Tua ahih manin kei’ adingin a geelsate amah in tungsak ding hi. Amah in hih banga geelna tampi nei hi.
Tua hi a, ama omna-ah kei ka lau mahmah a, ka ngaihsut khak ciangin amah ka kihta hi.
Vanglian Pasian in ka lungsim hanna hong maimangsak hi.
Khuamial in ka mit hong mialsak hangin keima kihtak in khuamial hilo a, Pasian ahi hi.
“Pasian in bang hangin thu a khen ni ding hun seh lo a, ama na a semte thutang ahihna a lah ni ding seh lo ahi hiam?
Mite in leitang gol a ngah theih nadingun gisuangte khinsim uh a, tuute gu-in amau’ tuuhon tawh khawl khawm uh hi.
Mi tagahte’ la neihsunte guksak uh a, meigong numei in a leiba a loh khit dong a bawngtal matsak uh hi.
Mizawngte’ ngah theih dingte khaktan uh a, mizawngte notkhia uh ahih manin amaute bucip uh hi.
Tua ahih manin gamlak la bangin gam keuna sungah a an ding zong tawm uh a, a tate uh an ding koi mah-ah mu zo lo uh hi.
Midangte’ lo sungah anlak na sem uh a, migilote’ leenggui lo-ah leenggah loin om uh hi.
Zan-in puan silh loin lum uh a, khuadampi lakah silh ding nei loin om uh hi.
Mualtung pan-a hong zu guahtui in amaute kawt ciimsak a, suangpi pang peuh belin toncip uh hi.
Migilote in pa nei nawn lo naupangte sila-in nei uh a, mizawngte’ tate leiba taangin la uh hi.
Tua mizawngte in puan silh loin na sem uh a, gil kialpi-in anlak na sem uh hi.
A thau ngah nadingin oliv gahte gawi-in, leenggahzu ngah nadingin leenggahte cil napi-in, gilkial dangtakpi-in ki-omsak hi.
Khuapi sungah a liam a site’ kikona kiza napi-in Pasian in amau’ thungetnate don lo hi.
“Sun khuavak a nial, tua khuavak thuzia a thei lo, khuavak lampi a pelh mi pawlkhat om hi.
A zawng a cimawhte a that dingin khuavak ma-in mithatpa kuankhia a, zan sungin mi’ na guksak hi.
Numei tunga mawh mipa in khuamial ding ngakin om a, mite’ theih loh dingin ama meel seel hi.
Gutate in sun a ciamtehsa teng zan-in inn luh uh a, sunin amaute bu- in khuavak peel uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh zan khuamial pen amaute khempeuh’ adingin zing khuavak bang hi a, zan khuamial lauhuai sung nuamsa uh hi.
“Tua bang migilote tuikhang in taai a, ama neih leitangte Pasian in samsia a, tua leenggui lote-ah nasemin kikuan nawn lo hi.
Nisat hun leh khuakhal hunin vukkhalte a manthan’ bangin mihingte’ gamsung panin mawhnei mi mangthang hi.
Amah kiphawk kha nawn lo a, a nu nangawn in zong mangngilh ta hi; thante in amah ne tum a, amah maimang ta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang mi in numei tacingte’ neihsa tawh kivak a, meigong numeite’ phattuam nading bangmah bawl lo hi.
Pasian in a thahatna tawh mi vangliante susia a, amah a gamtat ciangin migilopa si pah hi.
Pasian in amah a lungnuamin nungta sak a, ahi zongin amaute langpanin, encik tawntung hi.
Migilopa tomkha sung a liat hangin, kiak bangin vulkik pahin, a kisattan ankung bangin keu pah hi.
Hih thu kua-in nial zo ding na hi uh hiam? Ka thugennate man lo hi, ci-in kua in hong sel zo ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Shuah gammi Bildad in dawng a,
“Pasian vanglian a, mi khempeuh in a zahtak ding ahi hi. Ama vantung kumpi gam, nuam takin a omsak zo hi.
Ama na a sem a vantungmite a phazah kua in sim zo ding ahi hiam? Pasian’ khuavak in a bat lohna koi lai mun om ahi hiam?
Pasian’ muhna-ah kua dik zo ding a, kua siangtho zo ding ahi hiam?
Ama mit-ah khapi nangawn taang sa zo lo a, aksite nangawn siang sa zo lo hi.
Tua ahih leh, lungno, ganhing no ahi lel mihing pen bangci ding hiam? Mihing in Pasian’ muhna-ah bang man lel ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
“A hehpihhuai kei nong huhna, a tha zawngkhal kei nong hotna, hih bang ahi hiam?
Kei bang mihai tungah thumanpha nong gen a, pilna thu tampi nong pulak hi.
Tua bang thu gen dingin kua in hong sawl a, kua’ lungsim hong pulak khia na hi hiam?
Misite’ gam kiling a, a sunga teengte launa tawh ling uh hi.
Pasian’ muhna-ah misite’ gam kilang sinsen a, a muh theih lohna dingin a liah bangmah om lo hi.
Pasian in mun awng tungah vanpi zal a, bangmah in len lopi-in leitung khai lingleng hi.
Amah in meiilom lakah tuite khol a, tua tui gihna meii a pua zo sak hi.
Amah in kha a liah ding bawl a, meii tawh kha a khuh hi.
Amah in muh tawpna-ah git dinden-in, khuavak leh khuamial khen hi.
Amah in vanpi a pua khuampite a tai ciangin, tua khuampite lau-in ling uh hi.
Ama thahatna tawh tuipi zo a, ama siamna tawh tuipi ganhing golpi Rahab thatlum hi.
A hu a san’ ciangin vantung teng siang pah a, ama khut in a taikhia gulpi thatlum hi.
Hihte in ama vangliatna themkhat bek hi pan a, i zak thute a heem lam bek hi pan hi. Pasian a liatna taktak kua in thei khin zo ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in thu gen kik a,
“Keima dikna hong seelcipsak Pasian, ka lungsim hong gimsak Vanglianpa a nungta ahih mah bangin,
ka sungah nuntakna a om lai teng, Pasian’ hu, ka nak-ah ka diik lai teng,
ka muk tawh thusia peuhmah ka gen kei ding a, ka kam tawh zuauthu peuhmah ka gen ngei kei ding hi, ci-in ka kiciam hi.
Note a thuman hi, kong ci ngei peuhmah kei ding a, ka nuntak lai teng, kei a thuman hi’ing, ka cihna ka khia ngei kei ding hi.
Kei’ thuman ka kisakna ka khia ngei kei ding hi; ka lungsim-ah kisuanna om loin siang mahmah hi.
“Kei hong langpan’ kei hong dote in, migilote leh thumanlote bangin daan thuak ta hen.
Pasian in amaute’ nuntakna a laksak hun ciangin, migilote’ ading bang lametna om ahi hiam?
Lungkhamna a thuak uh ciangin, Pasian in amau’ kikona aw ngai ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in a piak ding lungdamna a deih ding uh kilawm ahih manin, ama tungah thu a nget tawntung ding uh a kilawm ahi hi.
Pasian’ vangliatna bangzahin lian cih hong gensak un la, Vanglian Pasian’ geelsa teng hong laktel sak dih un.
Ahi zongin tuate khempeuh na theih khitsa uh ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin bang hangin mawk pau na hi uh hiam?
“Vanglian Pasian in mi gilote’ mi ngongtatte, daan a piakna hih bang ahi hi.
Tapa tampi a neih hangun, a vekin gal sungah si mang khin ding uh hi; a tate uh gilkial tawntung ding uh hi.
A nungta lai sunte zong pulnatna tawh si ding uh a, meigong numeite in misite kah zo lo ding uh hi.
Migilote in kuama sim zawh loh ngun tampi tak nei ding uh a, gen zawh lohin nikten puansilh ciang venvan ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin mihoih pawlkhat in tua puante silhin, thuman mi pawlkhat in tua ngunte tang lel ding uh hi.
Migilote’ lam innte kho lo a, maimom bu, ahih kei leh lo hon’na buk tawh kibang lel hi.
Amaute a hau sa-in lum uh a, ahih hangin a hausa-in a lumkik nawn kei ding uh hi. Zingsang a khan’lawh ciangun a neihsa teng uh na bei ta hi.
Lauhuaina in tuikhang pak bangin nawk gawp ding a, zan ciangin huihpi in amaute mut khia mang ding hi.
Nisuahna huihpi in amaute len khia-in, a inn panun gamlapi-ah len khia ding hi.
Amaute in a suahtak theih nading a hanciam tantan kim lai mah, hehpih ngaihsut loin len khia mang ding hi.
Amaute a tai lai takun huih in nawk gawpin, a susia dingin mutgawp hi.
“Ngun a kitawh khiatna ngunkhuk om a, kham a kisian’ sakna mun mah a om hi.
Mihingte in lei sung panin sik tokhia a, suang sung panin sumsan huantui uh hi.
Mihingte in khuamial thuk pen sung zongin, lei sung a thukpi dong zong uh a, khuamial thuk tawng sung pan suang tokhia uh hi.
Mihingte’ teen’na panin a gamlapi mun, kuamah a pai ngei lohna sungah, lei sung sumte tokhia uh hi. Tua lai-ah amau guak in na sem uh a, leithuk sungah khauhual tawh kivei suk kivei to uh hi.
Lei tungah an nek ding hong pokhia a, ahi zongin lei nuai thuk sung mei bangin sa hi.
Lei sunga om suangte sungah sapfeiros suangmanpha om a, a leivuite sungah kham om hi.
“Simbung in zong tua lampi thei ngei lo a, luimu zong tua lai-ah va leng ngei lo hi.
Humpinelkai ahi a, a kihtakhuai ganhing dangte ahi zongin, cik mahin tua lai-ah va pai ngei lo uh hi.
“Mihingte in suang sak pente to uh a, mualte’ bul lei sung panin tokhia uh hi.
Suangte a tawhvang uh ciangin, suangmanphate mu uh hi.
Amaute in tuinak kipatna dong lei sung to uh a, a kiphumcip nate hong suahkhia uh hi.
“Ahi zongin koi lai-ah pilna kimu ding ahi hiam? Koi lai-ah thutheihna nak om ahi hiam?
A kimuh nading lampi mihingte in thei lo a, mihingte’ gam sungah lah om lo hi.
A thuk mahmah tuipi liante in, ‘Ko sungah om lo hi,’ ci uh a, tuipite in, ‘Ko kiangah om lo hi,’ ci uh hi.
Pilna pen kham tawh a kilei zo hi lo a, a man zong ngun tawh a kiseh thei hi lo hi.
Ofir kham tawh a kilei zo hi lo a, suangmanpha pen tawh zong a kilei zo hi tuan lo hi.
Pilna a manphatna kham leh limlang tawh teh theih hi lo a, kham hoihpen kibawl nate tawh zong lei zawh hi lo hi.
Pilna manphatna pen suangkhi leh limlangte tawh genteh theih hi lo a, pilna themkhat in kep sangin manpha zaw lai hi.
Ethiopia gam-a piang Topaz suangmanphate tawh teh theih ding hi lo a, kham citak pente tawh zong kiteh thei tuan lo hi.
“Tua ahih leh pilna koi lai pan hong piang ahi hiam? Thutheihna koi lai-ah om ahi hiam?
Nuntakna nei sungpan a mu thei kuamah om lo a, a leeng thei vasate nangawn in mu thei lo hi.
Sihna leh siatna nangawn in, a thu hem zak bek ung, ci uh hi.
“Pasian bek in pilna lampi thei a, amah in pilna a omna mun thei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in leimong khempeuh dong mu a, vantung nuai-ah a om na khempeuh mu thei hi.
Pasian in huih a gik nading zah bawlin, tuipi liat nading zah a seh laitak,
guah a zuk nading mun thu pia-in, vangingte’ zuih ding lampi a bawlsak laitak nangawnin,
amah in pilna mu-in a manphatna entel a, amah in hoih sa-in kipsak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mihingte tungah, ‘Topa zahtakna in pilna ahi hi, siatna pelhna in thu theihna ahi hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in a thu gen kik a,
“Ka nuntakna nidanga bang hi kik hen la, Pasian in kei hong et hun lai bang hi kik leh ka ut hi.
Tua hun lai-in Pasian in kei hong ompih tawntung a, khuamial sungah ka pai laitakin Pasian in khuavak hong pia hi.
Tua hun in ka cih theih pen hun laitak hi a, Pasian in ka innkuan hong hut laitak ahi hi.
Tua hun lai-in Vanglian Pasian in kei hong ompih a, ka kimkotah ka tate om uh hi.
Ka bawngte leh ka keelte in nawi deih zahzah hong pia uh a, suang tam penna leilak nangawn-ah ka oliv kungte hoih mahmah hi.
Khua sung upate a kikhop ciangin, amaute lakah kikhawm dingin ka pai ciangin,
kei hong muh phetin khangnote in tutna hong awn uh a, kei hong zahtakna limin papite na ding uh hi.
Khua sung uliante a kiho na khawl pah uh a, a khut uh tawh a kam uh na hum uh hi.
Mi thupi pente nangawn na gamdai pah uh a, kuamah pau loin na om uh hi.
Ka thugen a za mi peuhmah in a hoih lamin na za uh a, hong mu mi peuhmah in dik hong sa uh hi.
Mizawng ka theih peuhmah ka huh a, cih nading thei lo tagahte ka huh hi.
A lungkham a cimawhte in kei hong phat uh a, meigong numeite lungnuamin ka omsak hi.
Thumanna puan bangin ka silh a, thuman in hong tuam hi. Thutang pen puanpi bangin ka silh a, thutang in hong tuam hi.
Mittawte’ adingin mit ka hi a, khebaite’ adingin khe ka hi hi.
Mizawngte’ adingin a pa uh ka hi a, lungkhamna a thuak ka theih loh mite ka pan’pih hi.
Migilote’ gitlohna ka sugawp a, amau’ sukgawp mite ka honkhia hi.
Ka kum sehnel zah-a tam dingin ka ngaihsun a, nuamtakin inn-ah a si dingin ka kilamen hi.
A zung in tui a ngah tawntung singkung tawh ka kibang a, a hiangte daitui in a nomsak tawntung singkung tawh ka kibang hi.
Mi khempeuh in kei hong phat tawntung uh a, ka tha a hat tawntung hi.
“Mite in ka thugen ngai-in hong ngak uh a, ka thugente pau loin lim takin hong ngai uh hi.
Thu ka gen khit ciangin a genthuah ding uh bangmah thei nawn lo uh a, ka thugennate hoih takin na sang pah uh hi.
Lokhote in khuapi-guah deihin a ngak bangin, ka thugente hoih takin na sang uh hi.
Amaute, itna tawh ka nuihsat ciangin lungnuam uh a, ka mai a tai ciangin a mai gumna uh a bei hi.
Amaute ukin a vai ding uh ka hawmsak, a kumpipa in a galkapte a makaih bangin ka makai a, a lungkham uh ciangin amaute ka hehnem hi.
“Ahi zongin tu in, a pate uh mah bangin a kimang ngei lo, tuute a cing dingin ka uite tawh a kuan khawm dinga zong ka deih loh, kei sanga khangno zawte in kei hong ciamnuih bawl ta uh hi.
Amaute’ hatna bei khinta ahih manin, amau’ hatna kei adingin banga kimang nawn ding ahi hiam?
Amaute zawng mahmahin gilkial uh ahih manin gamlak singzung keu peuh teep lel ding uh hi.
Amaute in singkungnote botin ne uh a, limna alna a nei lo poding zung nangawn ne uh hi.
Gutate otkhai-in a kidelh bangin, mite lak panin amaute kihawlkhia hi.
Amaute hawkguam sung leh luihawm sung, leihawm leh keenhawm sung peuhah a teen’ uh kul hi.
Amaute ganhing bangin gamlakah ham uh a, sawlkawm nuai-ah kilomin omkhawm uh hi.
Bangmah-a kimang lo misia honte, mite omna gam sung panin kihawlkhia hi.
“Tu-in amaute in kei simmawhin hong nuihsan uh a, amau’ ciamnuihna bek ka suak ta hi.
Amaute in kei hong kih uh a, kei tawh tehna-in amaute hoih lua kisa uh a, amaute in ka maitang nangawn cil hong phih uh hi.
Pasian in kei hong zawngkhalsak hong cimawhsak ahih manin amaute in a ut utin kei hong bawlsia uh hi.
Hih mihonte in kei hong simgawpin, kei hong taikhia sak uh a, ka sih nadingin ka mai-ah na pang uh hi.
Ka suahtak theih nading lampi khaktan uh a, keimah suksiat ding hanciam uh hi; amaute a kho ding kuamah om lo hi.
Kei ka bukna leihawm-ah hong tuaksuk uh a, kei hong sucip suk uh hi.
Launa tawh ka kidim a, ka thupina teng huih letkhiat bangin beimang a, ka cihtheihna teng meii bangin theng ta hi.
“Tu-in a si ding ka hi ta a, ka gimna pan noptuam ngah nading om nawn lo hi.
Zan thapai-in ka guh sung ka taang sung khempeuh na a, hong pet tawntung natna pen dai ngei lo hi.
Pasian in ka puan ngawng pan hong manin, ka puan tawh hong heekcip hi.
Buannawng sungah kei hong lawn a, nin bulom bang lel ka hi ta hi.
Pasian aw, nang kong sam a, nong dawng ngei kei hi; nang tungah thu kong ngen a, nong don het kei hi.
Kei tungah nong gilo mahmah a, nong hih theih zahin kei nong bawlsia hi.
Kei huih lakah hong lawnin huih nong lensak a, huihpi in kei hong lawnsuk hong lawnto hi.
Mi khempeuh adingin a kisehkholsa ahi, sihna-ah hong paipih na hihna ka thei hi.
“Na hehpih ding a hong thuum cih loh buang, bangmah dang ahih thei nawn lo misiapa, bang hangin sugawp na hi hiam?
A lungkham mite tawh kei kap khawmin, a cimawhte dahpih hilo ka hi hiam?
Lungdamna leh khuavakna ka lamet lai takin, lungkhamna leh khuamialna hong tung zawsop hi.
Lunggimna leh natna in kei hong sugawp a, gimna ka thuk ding cih loh bangmah dang om nawn lo hi.
Lungkham sinkhamin ka om a, mihon lakah ding-in huhna ka ngen hi.
Kei in gamkhing sunga om ngiate leh kalaoh vasate tawh a kipawl, a kikhawl ta ka hi hi.
Ka vun vomin dulh khia a, ka pumtangin ka ci sa gawp hi.
Nidangin lungdamna la kisa ka zakna mun-ah, thuumna leh kahna aw bek ka za ta hi.
“Lunggulhna tawh nungak khatpeuh ka et ngei loh nading, lim takin kiciamna ka bawl khin hi.
Vanglianpen Pasian in eite bang hong cih a, mihing gamtatna bangci thukkik ahi hiam?
A man loin a gamtate tungah siatna leh gimna tungsak hi.
Pasian in ka gamtatna khempeuh thei a, ka kalsuanna khempeuh hong mu hi.
“A giloin ka gamtat ngei het lohna, kuamah ka khem ngei het lohna thute-ah ka kiciam ngam hi.
Pasian in a man tawikhaina-ah hong tawikhai hen, ka pauban’ het lohna hong mu ding hi.
Lampi man panin ka pial a, siatna lam ka zuih a, ka khut tungah mawhna a baan’ taak leh,
Ka khawhsa ante midangte’ nek suak hen la, ka an khempeuh maimang ta hen.
“Ka vengte’ zi zawlmit-in, a kong gei-ah ngakin ka buk taak leh,
Ka it ka zi in midang’ an suksak hen la, midang’ ang-ah lum ta hen.
(Tua bang mawhna in a siahuai hi a, sihna daan a thuak ding ahi hi.
Ka neih khempeuh a kangtum mei husia tawh a kibang ahi hi.)
“Ka nasemte khatpeuh peuh kei tungah a phun ciangin, a thu ngai-in lim takin ka bawl hi.
Tua ci kei leng, Pasian’ mai bangci muh ngam ding ka hi hiam? Pasian in keima thu a khen dingin hong pai ciangin bang gen ding ka hi hiam?
Kei hong piangsak Pasian mah in ka nasemte zong a piangsak ahi hi.
“Mizawngte ka huhkhial ngei kei a, meigong numeite ka guaksuaksak ngei kei hi.
Keimah in an ne ne-in, tagahte gilkialin ka koihkhong ngei kei hi.
Ka khang tawnin tua bangte ka en tawntung hi.
Mi a cimawh, puansilh ding a lei zo lo, a zawng lua ka muh ciangin,
Ka tuuhon panin ka ngah tuumul puan kibawl ka pia hi. Amah in a lungsim neih khempeuh tawh kei hong phat hi.
Zum thukhenna-ah zo na ning cih ngaihsutna tawh tagah khatpeuh ka kheem taak leh,
ka khutte buisum hen la, ka liang bul panin kilong khia ta hen.
Pasian’ daan piak ding kihta ka hih manin, tua bang peuhmah ka gamta ngei kei ding hi.
“Leitung hauhna muan’ leh suan’in ka nei ngei kei a,
ka hauhna zong ka kisaktheihpih ngei kei hi.
A taang mahmah ni ahi a, a hoih mahmah kha ahi zongin, cik mahin ka bia ngei kei hi.
Tua bang hih ding ngaihsutin zong ka nei ngei kei hi.
Tua bang mawhna in sihna daan a thuak ding hi a, tua bang mawhna in Vanglian Pasian nialna ahi hi.
Ka galte in gimna a thuak ciangin ka kipak ngei kei a, haksatna a tuah ciangun ka lungdam ngei kei hi.
A sih nading uh deihna tawh cik mahin ka samsia ngei kei hi.
Zin leh leeng lim takin ka do tawntungna thu, ka na hong sepsak mi khempeuh in thei uh hi.
Ka inn-ah khualzinte ka tungsak a, kongzing lakah ka lumsak ngei kei hi.
Midangte in a mawhna uh iim a, ahih hangin kei aa ka iim ngei kei hi.
Midangte, hong kampau ding kihtakin ka nei ngei kei hi; amau’ simmawh ding kihtakna hangin pau loin ka om ngei kei a, ka bucip ngei kei hi.

Ka thugente kuamah in na ngai lo ding ahi hiam? Ka gen khempeuh man hi, ci-in ka kiciam hi. Vanglian Pasian in hong dawng ta hen. Ka langte in kei hong mawhsakna thute ka tawi theih dingin lai sungah kigelh hi leh,
tua mawhsaknate kisialhna tawh ka ngawng-ah ka ok ding a, mi khempeuh in a muh dingin ka sangsak ding hi.
Ka gamtatna khempeuh Pasian kiangah ka gen ding a, ama muhna-ah lungnuamin kihihsakna tawh ka om ding hi.
“Ka khawh leitang ka guk ahih a, a nei taktakpa tung pan ka suh ahih a,
tua leitang-a piang ante ka nek a, tua lo a khote puksi-in ka omsak taak leh,
tua lo-ah mangbuh leh mangbuhham tangin, kiak leh ling po ta hen,” a ci hi. Job’ thugente bei ta hi.
Job amahmah dik kisa tawntung ahih manin hih mihing thumte in Job’ thugente dawn’ ding ngaihsun nawn lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ram minam, Buz-te beh, Barakhel’ tapa Elihu a heh hong suak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Job amah kidiksakin Pasian mawhsak zawsop hi.
Job’ lawm thumte tungah zong a heh suak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Job a dawn’na ding uh thei lo uh ahih manin Pasian a khial tawh hong kibang hi.
Elihu in amaute lak panin a khangno pen ahih manin a dangte a pau kim khit mateng bangmah pau loin om hi.
Ahi zongin hih mihing thumte in Job a dawn’ theih loh a muh ciangin a hehna thuak zo nawn lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Buz-te beh Barekhel’ tapa Elihu in thu gen ding hong kipan a, “Kei a khangno hi-in, note a khangham na hih manun, ka ngaihsutna note lakah kong gen ngam kei hi.
No a khanghamzawte in thu a gen ding kilawm hi, ci-in keimah in ka ngaihsun hi.
Ahi zongin mihingte tunga hong tung pilna pen Vanglian Pasian’ Kha pan ahi hi.
Khanghamna in mi pilsak lo a, thuman zong theisak tuan lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka thugen nong ngaih ding uh ka deih hi; keima ngaihsutna hong gensak dih un.
“Na thugen lai takun lungduai takin kong ngaingai a, thugen ding na zon’zon’ lai takun kong ngak hithiat hi.
Lim takin kong ngai a, na cihmawhna uh ka thei hi; Job’ thugente a man lohna na gentel thei kei uh hi.
Bangci-in pilna nei-in kigen thei ding na hi uh hiam? Note in lel na hih manun Pasian in Job dawng ding hi.
Job in note tungah thu hong gen a, kei tungah hong gen lo hi; ahi zongin note’ dawn’ bangin ka dawng ngei kei ding hi.
“Job aw, hih mite in nang hong lel uh a, nang hong dawn’ nading thei lo uh hi.
Amaute pau loin a om ciangun kei zong ngak lai ding ka hi hiam? Amaute in gen ding thei nawn loin ommawk uh hi.
Tu-in kei zong kong dawng ding a, ka ngaihsutna kong pulak ding hi.
Ka thugen ding ka ngak lah a, ka kam ka ki-iip zo kei hi.
Thu gen theih nading hun nei lo hi leng, leenggahtui thak a kithun leenggahtui um bangin ka puakkham ding hi.
Ka thuak zo nawn kei a, ka dawng ta hi.
Hih ka thugenna-ah kuamah ka pawlpih kei ding a, kuamah ka phattuam kei ding hi.
Kuamah ka mawk phat thei kei hi; tua ci mawk phat leng Pasian in kei hong sumang pak ding hi.
“Job aw, tu-in ka thugen khempeuh lim takin ngai in.
Ka lungsim sunga om thute, a hong gen ding ka hi hi.
Ka gen khempeuh lungsim takpi tawh ka gen hi a, aman thu a gen ka hi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ Kha in kei hong bawl a, Vanglianpa in kei tungah nuntakna hu hong pia hi.
Nong dawn’ theih leh hong dawng in. Nong sel nading kiging in.
Job aw, nang leh kei, Pasian’ muhna-ah a kibang i hi a, ei tegel in leivui pan-a piang tuak i hi hi.
Tua ahih manin kei nong kihtak nading om lo a, nang kong zawhthawh nading om lo hi.
Keima zakin thu na gen khin a, na genna kamgingte ka za khin hi.
Nangmah in, ‘Kei ka mawh kei hi; khialhna bangmah ka gamta kei hi. Ka paubaang kei a, mawhna ka sukha kei hi.
Pasian in kei hong suk theih nading thu zong a, gal bangin kei hong bawl hi.
Amah in ka khe kol hong bulh a, ka gamtatna khempeuh hong encik hi,’ na cihna ka za hi.
“Ahih hangin, Job aw, nangmah na khial hi. Pasian pen mihing sangin lianzaw hi.
Mihingte’ phunna don ngei lo hi, ci-in bang hangin Pasian mawhsak na hi hiam?
Pasian in a lam tuamtuamin thu hong gen napi-in, ama thugen kuamah in don lo hi.
Zan-in mite a ihmut hun ciangin, mang leh mangmuhna sungah Pasian in thugen hi.
Pasian in mite kiangah thu gen a, ama hilhkholhna hangin mite lau mahmah uh hi.
Mite in khialhna a bawl nawn loh nading, mi kiphasakte a suah khak loh nading, a deihna-in Pasian in mite kiangah thu gen hi.
Pasian in mihingte siatna thuaksak lo a, sih nading panin amaute honkhia hi.
“Pasian in ci natsakna tawh mihing thuhilh a, a pum khempeuh natna tawh kidimsak hi.
Cinapa in an ne zo lo a, an a lim pen nangawn a kihtha suak hi.
A ci a sa khempeuh kiam a, a guh guak bekin om hi.
Amah a bei nading a nai hi ta a, misite' gam a zuan ding ahi ta hi.
Mihingte a tavuan uh a phawksak, Pasian’ vantungmi tul tampite lak panin vantungmi khat amah huh dingin hong pai kha ding hi.
Vantungmi in amah a hehpihna hangin, ‘Amah suaktasak in! Misite' gamah amah pai sak kei in. Amah tatkhiat nading hih lai-ah om hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Tua ciangin ama pumpi khangno suak kikin, a thahat pen hun laitak bang kik ding hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in ama thungetna pia ding a, amah in lungdamna tawh Pasian bia ding a, Pasian in ama adingin thu a hoih lamin heisak kik ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mihonpite’ zakin, ‘Kei ka khial khin hi. A manin ka gamta kei a, ahi zongin Pasian in hong suaktasak hi.
Misite’ gam ka tun’ nading panin amah in kei hong kem a, tu-in kei ka nungta lai hi,’ ci ding hi.
“Pasian in hih thute khempeuh mihing tungah, hih kik zelzel a,
sih nading panin honkhia kikin, nuntakna nuam pia kik hi.
Job aw, tu-in ka thugen hong ngai in la, gamdai-in om in la, kei thu hong gensak in.
Ahi zongin gen nop mahmah na neih leh hong gen in; bang hang hiam cih leh midik na hih ding kong deihsak hi.
Ahi zongin gen nop na neih kei leh, keima thugen hong ngai in, mipil na hih theih nading thu kong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elihu in,
“No mipilte aw, ka thugente ciamteh un, no thuthei mite aw, ka thugente ngai un.
An na ciap uh ciangin a lim leh a lim lo na thei uh hi; thu kigen na zak uh ciangin pil kampau leh hai kampau na thei ding uh hi.
Thuman bang hiam cih teng khia ni; thuhoih bang hiam cih mu khia ni.
Job in lah, ‘Kei ka dik hi, Pasian in kei a thumanin hong seh nuam lo hi,
kei thuman napi thuzuau genin hong seh hi, kei khial lo napi-in gimna thuakin ka cimawh hi,’ a ci hi.
Hih Job tawh a kibang mi na mu ngei uh hiam? Amah in Pasian zahtakna lim nei thei lo hi.
Amah in migilote tawh kikholh nuam sa a, mawhneite tawh vak kawikawi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, ‘Pasian’ deihna i zuih hangin, bangmah phattuamna om lo hi,’ a ci hi.
“Ahi zongin no thu ngaihsun theite in ka thugenna hong ngai un. Pasian in gitlohna gamta ngei ding a, Vanglianpa in a man lo sem ngei peuhmah ding ahi hiam?
Pasian in mite a gamtatna tawh kizui-in thaman pia a, a thuak ding uh a kilawm bangin daantat hi.
A taktakin ci lehang, Pasian a man loin gamta ngei lo a, thutang kimlai a khialin heisak lo hi.
Pasian in a vangliatna mi khatpeuh tung pan ngah ahi hiam? Leitung khempeuh a uk dingin mi khatpeuh in a koih ahi hiam?
Pasian in a ngaihsutna kheel hen la, nuntakna hu dok kik hi leh
nuntakna nei khempeuh si pah ding a, mihingte, leivui suakkik ding hi.
“Job aw, mipil-a kinei na hih leh ka thugennate hong ngai in.
Vanglianpa in thutang deih lo dingin ngaihsun na hi hiam? Nang in a thuman Pasian mawhsak na hi hiam?
Kumpite leh uliante bang mahin kimang loin a gitloh uh ciangin, amaute a mawhsak ngampa in Pasian ahi hi.
Pasian pen mi khempeuh a piangsakpa hi a, amah in uliante panpih tuan lo a, mizawngte sangin mihaute thupi ngaihsut zaw tuan lo hi.
Mihingte zan khat thu-in si pak thei hi. Pasian in mite sat pukin si sak thei a, nakpi-in hih kul loin mi thahatte zong that thei hi.
“Pasian in mihingte gamtatna khempeuh hong encik a, i kalsuanna themno dongin hong mu khin hi.
Gamtatsia mite a buk theih nadingun a seel zo ding, khuamial khuazing koi mah-ah om lo hi.
Pasian mai-ah mihingte in thukhenna a thuak ni ding, a kisehkhol hun om tuan lo hi.
Amah in thu kan kul loin mi vangliante sugawp a, amau’ tangin mi dangte koih hi.
Amah in amaute’gamtatnate thei ahih manin, zan khat thu-in amaute lumletin susia gawp hi.
Pasian in mi khempeuh’ muhna-ah mawhneite daan pia hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a thu mang nawn lo uh a, a thupiaknate khempeuh don nawn lo uh hi.
Amaute in mizawngte kapsak gawp uh a, mizawngte’ huhngetna awging Pasian in za hi.
Pasian in bangmah hih het kei taleh zong, kuamah in Pasian mawhsak zo lo ding hi. Amah in hong maingat het kei leh zong, kuamah in bangmah cih zo tuan lo ding hi.
Migilote hong uksak ta leh zong, tua panin suahtak nading kuamah in vaihawm zo lo ding hi.
“Job aw, Pasian tungah na khialhnate pulakin, na khialh nawn loh nading thu ciam nai na hi hiam?
Pasian in na khialhnate hong lah nading ngenin, na gamtat siat nawn loh nading ut nai na hi hiam?
Nangmah in Pasian nial na hih manin, nangma utna bang hong hihsak ding ahi hiam? Hih thu in kei’ ngaihsut ding hi loin, nangma lungsim khentat ding ahi hi. Tu-in na ngaihsutna hong gen in.
Thu ngaihsun theih peuhmahte in man hi, hong cihpih ding uh a, ka thugenna a za mipil peuhmahte in,
“Thu thei lopi-in Job in thugen a, a gen peuhmah a khiatna nei mel om lo hi.
Job’ thugente ngaihsun le uh cin, migilo banga kampau ahihna na thei ding uh hi.
Amah in a khialhna khawl nuam lo a, eite khempeuh mai-ah Pasian simmawhin zahpih hi,’ ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Elihu mah in,
“Job aw, Pasian’ muhna-ah ka paubaang kei hi, na cih ding kilawm lo hi.
Pasian kiangah, ka khialh hangin nang bang phamawh sa na hi hiam? Khialhna ka bawl loh manin bangmah phattuamna ka ngah kei hi, na cih ding kilawm lo hi.
Nang leh na lawmte tungah, thu kong gen ding hi.
Vantung en to dih in, Meiite bangzah takin sang ahi hiam?
Mawhna na bawl manin, Pasian bangmah sukha lo hi. Tampi tak khial ta lecin amah sukha tuan ahi hiam?
Na thumanna hangin Pasian in phattuamna ngah ahi hiam? Pasian in nang kiang panin bangmah deih lo hi.
Na khialhna hangin na mipihte bek in thuak a, na gamtat hoihna hangin na mipihte bek in phattuamna ngah hi.
“Mite in gimna a thuak uh ciang tau uh a, amaute a hon dingin midang khatpeuh sam uh hi.
Lungziin’ pen hun lai takin thahatna a pia, amau a Piangsakpa Pasian’ lam nga lo uh hi.
Eite mipil-in a hong bawl, ganhingte leh vasate sangin a pil zaw-in a hong bawl Pasian’ lam nga lo uh hi.
Amaute migilo mi kihisakte ahih manin, huh ding a nget hangun Pasian in pia lo hi.
Ngetnget, gengen a phattuamna bangmah om lo hi. Vanglian Pasian in na mu lo, na ngai lo hi.
Job aw, nang in, Pasian ka mu thei kei a, ahi zongin ka thu ama khut sungah om a, lungduai takin ka ngak niloh hi, na ci hi.
Pasian in kuamah daan pia lo a, khialhna zong thupi ngaihsut lo hi, ci- in na ngaihsun hi.
Tua banga kam na paupau a mawknapi hi a, na gen mel zong a thei lo na hihna kilang hi,” a ci hi.
Elihu in a thugen zom lai a,
“Lungduai-in tawmkhat hong ngai lai in: Pasian’ tangin ka gen ding pawlkhat om lai hi.
Kei hong Piangsakpa Pasian thuman hi, ci-in kong lah nadingin thu tampi kaikhawmin kong gen ding hi.
Ka thugennate a khial om het lo a, na mai-ah thugenpa in mipil khat ahi hi.
“Pasian thahat mahmah napi-in kuamah simmawh lo hi. Ama theih loh bangmah om lo hi.
Amah in mimawhte daupaisak lo a, a zawng gimna thuakte tungah a manin gamta hi.
Amah in thuman mite hu a, kumpi ukna za pia a, pahtawina ngahsak tawntung hi.
Ahi zongin mite sikkol kibulh a, a gamtatnasate hangin gimna a thuak uh leh,
Pasian in amau’ mawhna leh a kiphatsaknate uh a lakkhia ahi hi.
A gamtat siatna panun a khawl nadingun amau’ bil-ah thu a gengen ahi hi.
Amaute in Pasian' thu mangin ama na sem leh amaute nuam sa-in a khan’ uh sau hi.
Ahi zongin ama thu mang kei le uh, namsau tawh si ding uh a, misite' gam zuan ding uh hi.
“Migilote a heh-in ni tum uh a, gimna a thuak ciang nangawn-un ama huh ding ngen lo uh hi.
Amaute khan’sih uh a, zumhuaipi-in bei uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in gimna tawh mite thuhilh a, mite in khua a phawk theih nadingin gimna zang hi.
Pasian in lungkhamna panin nang hong pai khiatpihin, lungnuam takin nang hong om sak a, na sabuai tungah anlim nono kilui venvan hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in na ngah dinga kilawm daan a thuak ta na hi hi.
Sumgolh’ khemsa-in ta kei in la, leitung nate’ bawlin lam kipialsak kei in.
Huh ding na nget hangin bangmah phattuamna om nawn lo a, na hauhna na liatna in hong huh thei nawn lo hi.
Mihingte a beimang hun ding, zan khuamial hong tun’ ding lunggulh kei in.
Siatna lamah na kihei khak loh nadingin kidawm in; na siat khak loh nadingin gimna hong kithuaksak ahi hi.
Pasian’vang bangzah takin lian hiam cih phawk in; Pasian in sia khempeuh lakah a lianpen ahi hi.
Kuamah in Pasian a gamtat nading sawl thei lo a, Pasian gamtat sia hi, ci-in zong kuamah in mawhsak zo lo hi.
“Pasian a nasepna hangin mi khempeuh in a phat tawntung mah bangin, nang zong amah phat zaw in.
Mi khempeuh in Pasian’ sepsate mu uh a, thei kim zo loin lamdangsa uh hi.
Pasian’ liatna a kicingin i thei zo kei a, ama kum phazah zong i sim zo kei hi.
Amah in tuipi panin tuite la to a, tua tuite guahtui-in a bawl hi.
Amah in meii sung panin guah piangsak a, mihing khempeuh adingin guahzusak hi.
Meiite a pai henhanna thu hita leh, van-ah van a gin’na thu hita leh kuamah in thei zo lo hi.
Amah in van-ah khua phiasak a, ahi zongin tuipi thuk sung mialsak hi.
Amah in hih bang lam tawh mihingte hong vak a, annek ding tampi hong pia hi.
Amah in keek thu pia a, a kap nop pen a kha dingin sawl hi.
Amah a heh ciangin huihpi sam a, vanging pen ama hong pai nading a kitheihna ahi hi.
“Hih huihpi in ka dip hong kuasak a, ka dip van-a khai hong bangsak hi.
Ama kam panin hong gingkhia hih vanging, Pasian’ pauna awging ngai un.
Amah in van-ah khua phiasak a, leimong khat pan mongkhat dong taan’ hi.
Tua ciangin a vanglian vanging ahi, ama awging hong kiza a, tua sung mahin khua phiaphia hi.
Pasian’ sawlna tawh na lamdang pipi piang a, eite’ theih zawh loh thute hong piang hi.
Amah in leitungah vuk a khia dingin sawl a, guah tampi tak a zu sak hi.
Amah in mihingte’ nasep khawlsak a, amah a gamtaang ahihna lak hi.
Gamsate in a lupna ngei delh uh a, a kua sungah bucip uh hi.
Leitaw lam pan guahpi hong zu a, leilu lam pan huihpi hong nung hi.
Pasian’ husan’na in tui khalsak a, tui lianpite khalin sik bangin sak sak hi.
Amah in meiipi nomsak a, meiipi-in khua a phiasak hi.
Pasian’ deihna zui-in kikhin kawikawi hi. Leitung mun khempeuhah pai- in, Pasian’ sawl teng sem uh hi.
Pasian in mihingte daantah nading ahi a, a pahtakna a lah nading ahi zongin, leitungah tu-a bangin a piangsak hi.
“Job aw, tawlkhat khawlin ngai in la, Pasian’ bawl na lamdangte ngaihsun in.
Pasian in thu pia a, meii lak panin khua a phiatsakna na thei hiam?
Bangmah in len lopi-in vantungah meii a om sak theihna, a lamdang hih ama siamna na thei hiam?
Leitaw lam huihvot a nun’ lai takin, na puan sungah khua-ul kai-in na om hi.
Limlang bangin a sak van peekpi, ama hih bangin zal zo na hi hiam?
Pasian kiangah ka gen ding uh hong hilh in; a hawmpi-in ka om uh a, ka gen ding uh bangmah om lo hi.
Pasian kiangah, thu hong gensak in, ka ci kei ding hi. Kei hong suksiat nadingin bang hangin kipia ding ka hi hiam?
“Tawlkhatkhat khuavak kimu lo a, guahpi meiipi in a liah hi. Tua ciangin huih hong nungin a mut siang hi.
Kham meel khuavak leilu lam pan hong taang a, Pasian’ minthan’na in zahtakna tawh hong kidimsak hi.
Pasian’ vangliatna lian mahmah a, eite’ theih zawh hi lo hi. Amah thuman a, mite tungah thutangin na sem hi.
Tua ahih manin mi khempeuh in amah a zahtakna, mipil a kisate amah in a don lohna, lamdang sak ding hilo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin huihpi lak panin Topa in Job tungah thu gen a,
“Kei’ pilna a nial dingin nang kua na hi hiam? Thu na theih loh lam a kilangsak na hi bek hi.
Kipasal sakin dingto in la, kong thudot dingte hong dawng in.
“Leitung ka bawl lai takin nang om na hi hiam? Thei kisa na hih leh tua thu hong gen in.
Bang cia-in golsak ding cih kua in seh ahi hiam? Kua in a gol nading zah khau kai ahi hiam? Hihte khempeuh thei kisa na hi hiam?
Leitung a pua khuampite, bang tungah kiphut ahi hiam? Kua in leitung bulpi phut ahi hiam?
Tua ni-in zingsang aksite in la sakhawm uh a, Pasian’ tapate lungdamin kiko uh hi.
“Leisung panin tuipi hong suah khiat lai takin, tua tuipi a khaktan ding kongpi kua in na khak ahi hiam?
Meii tawh tuipi a tuamcippa, khuamial tawh a vialcippa in keimah ka hi hi.
Tuipi gamgi ding ciamteh sakin, ama huang sung ding bek-ah ka omsak hi.
Tuipi kiangah, ‘Hih ciang bek na pai ding a, a ban na kin nawn kei ding hi; na tuihualte, hih ciang bek pai ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Job aw, na nuntak sung tawntung, tu ni khuavak in, ci-in thu pia thei ngei na hi hiam?
Zing khuavak in leitung a mong-in manin, a kawm-a bu migilote a sin’ khiat ding, thu pia thei ngei na hi hiam?
Khuavak in mual leh guamte kilang khia sak a, puan a ton-a kikoih tawh a kibatna kilangsak hi.
Migilote’ adingin sun khuavak taang lua a, siatna a gamtat nading uh a kham hi.
“Tuipi sung tawng tuinak-ah pai ngei na hi hiam? Tuipi nuai leitam tungah lampai ngei na hi hiam?
Misite gam khuamial kongkhakpi, mi khatpeuh in nang hong lak ngei ahi hiam?
Leitung bang cia-in lian ding cih na thei hiam? Hih thute khempeuh thei na hih leh hong dawng in.
“Khuavak hong kipat khiatna mun ahi a, khuamial hong paikhiatna mun ahi zongin, thei na hi hiam?
Nangmah in amau’ omna mun ciang dong thei a, tua ciang dongah va kha kik thei na hi hiam?
Na nuntakna sawt ta a, leitung a pian’ in nang suak khin na hih manin, tua thute khempeuh thei mah ni teh.
“Vuk a kikoihna mun-ah va lut ngei a, gial a kikholna mun va mu ngei na hi hiam?
Tuate, lungkham hun ciang ading, gal om hun ciang adingin ka koihcing ahi hi.
Ni hong suah khiatna mun-ah ahi a, nisuahna huihpi hong kipat khiatna munah ahi zongin, nang va tung ngei na hi hiam?
“Kua in guahzuk nading tuilam bawlsak a, kek’ lampi ding sialsak ahi hiam?
Mihing a om lohna mun lei lakah, kua in guah zusak ahi hiam?
Lopate a po theih nadingin, kua in lei keute tui buak ahi hiam?
“Guah in pa nei ahi hiam? Daitui in pa nei ahi hiam?
Kua sung panin tuikhal hong piang a, kua’ sung panin van-a vukte hong suak ahi hiam?
Tua tuite suang bangin sak a, tuipi tui teng khalcip hi.
“Van-a om Seguk henkop thei a, Zawlzawng, a kikhihna phel thei na hi hiam?
Ama hun hunin aksite lam lak thei a, Khawlei uikai a pai nading lampi lak thei na hi hiam?
Vompi leh anote, vantung-a om nate’ zuih ding ngeina bawl thei a, leitunga om nate’ zuih ding ngeina bawl thei na hi hiam?
Van-a om meiite in guah hong zuksak theih nading, nangmah in sawl thei na hi hiam?
Khua phia in, ci-in thu pia lecin, ‘Nong sawl bangin ta ning,’ hong ci ding ahi hiam?
Nail gun a khan’ ding a thei gun vapite kua in hilh a, guahzuk a thei akluite kua in hilh ahi hiam?
37-38 Leivuite khalcipin, leitang a sak ciangin, meiite thu pia-in vantung tuibeem a hong dingin, kua in pilna nei ahi hiam?
39-40 “Humpinelkai leh a note leihawm sungah bu-in, a kua sung uh ah lumin ngakin a om lai takin, a an ding uh zon’ sak thei a, a note’ gilkialna vahsak thei na hi hiam?
Va-akte gilkialin leeng kawikawi-in, a note in an duhin kei tungah hong nget ciangin, tua va-akte an a piapa in kua ahi hiam?
“Sathakte a suah hun ding thei ngei na hi hiam? Sakhite a suah laitakin nau va dom ngei na hi hiam?
Nangmah in tuate a ni ciamtehin, a suah hun ding uh thei na hi hiam?
A no suak dingin, lei-ah a bawhsuk hun thei na hi hiam?
A note gamlakah khangin, a nute kiangpan paikhia-in ciahkik nawn lo uh hi.
“Kua in gam-late tungah suahtakna pia ahi hiam? Kua in khahin a ut utin vaksak ahi hiam?
Amau’ om nadingin gamlak ka pia a, bangmah po zawh lohna zanglei- ah ka teengsak hi.
Gamlumna mun khuapite tawh kigamla-ah om uh a, kuamah in zualsak zo lo, na semsak zo lo uh hi.
Mualte tungah an zongin vak kawikawi uh a, nek theih ding singkung lopa a hing peuhpeuh zuan kawikawi uh hi.
“Gam-bawngtal in nangma na hong sem ding ahi hiam? Na ganbuk-ah hong giak nuam ding ahi hiam?
Nangmah in khauhual tawh khih zo ding a, na lo-ah na lokhawhna leng kaisak zo ding na hi hiam?
Nasem dingin a hat mahmah hangin, nangma’ na hong sepsak dingin lamen ngam na hi hiam?
Lo-a na an piangte hong kaihkhopsakin, na ancilna-ah an khawm dingin um na hi hiam?
“Kalaoh vasate in a kha uh bangzah takin nawhzap thei hiam! Ahi zongin gun vapi bangin kalaoh vasa leng thei lo hi.
Kalaoh vasa in lei lakah a tui nusia a, a tuite luumsak dingin leilak ap hi.
Mi khatpeuh in a khe tawh a tuite a sikkhap khak ding, gamsa khatpeuh in a sikkhap khak ding, phawk khol lo hi.
A tuite ama aa bangin ngaihsun khol lo a, ka gimna a mawkna suak kha in teh, ci-in lunghimawh lo hi.
Amah a hai-a a bawlpa, ama tungah pilna a guan lopa in keimah ka hi hi.
Ahi zongin amah a tai ciangin, sakol sangin hatzaw hi.
“Job aw, sakolte a hatsakpa in nang na hi hiam? Sakol zangmul a posakpa in nang na hi hiam?
Sakolte, kauphe bangin diangsak thei-in, mite’ kihtak dingin phitsak thei na hi hiam?
Amaute in lawpna tawh a khe-un lei khuat uh a, gal sungah a tha neih khempeuh uh tawh diang uh hi.
Amaute in launa meel thei lo uh a, namsau kihta-in nungkik lo uh hi.
Amau’ tungah a tuang mite’ galhiam, luum leh teite tee zalzal hi.
Lawp mahmahna tawh sakolte in mainawt uh a, peengkul a kitum ciangin omkhong thei lo uh hi.
Peengkul a kitum ciangin ham uh a, gal nai a tun’ ma-un galgim za uh a, galkapmangte’ thupiakna awging za uh hi.
“Simbung in a kha zalin leitaw lamah a len’ theih nading, nangma kiang panin hong sin ahi hiam?
Muvanlai sang len’in mual tungah bu a tom nading, nang’ thupiakna hong ngak ahi hiam?
Suang sangpi dawn-ah bu bawl uh a, suangheng kawmte phualpi-in nei uh hi.
Tua lai mun panin khuadak kawikawi a, manin a nek theih ding an gal-et hi.
Gan sihna kimkotah musanete kikhawm uh a, a note in sasi dawn uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Job kiangah,
“Job aw, nang in Vanglian Pasian na dem hi; tu-in khawl ding na hi hiam, tua ahih kei leh ama thugen dawng ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in Topa dawng a,
“Topa aw, ka haipau kha hi. Hong bangci dawn’ theih ding ka hi hiam? Bangmah ka pau nawn kei ding hi.
Ka gen dinga kilawm zah val gen kha ka hih manin, tu-in ka pau nawn het kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin huihpi sung panin Topa in Job tungah thu gen kik a,
“Kipasal sakin dingto in la, ka thudotnate hong dawng in.
Kei a thutang loin hong seh a, nang thutang kisa-in kei hong mawhsak na hi hiam?
Kei zahin nang hat na hi hiam? Kei’ awging zahin nang aa ging zo ding ahi hiam?
Na ngap nak leh na minthan’ nading leh na kihihsak nadingin kipan in la, minthan’na leh minliatna nei in.
A kiphasak mite en in la, na hehna tawh amaute niamkhiat gawp in.
Mi kiphasakte enin niamkhiat in la, migilote amau omna mun mun-ah tuancil in.
Lei sungah amaute phumcip in la, misite' gam sungah amaute khihcip in.
Tua bang na hih zawh nak leh, keimah in nang a hong phat masa penpa, nang a gualzo na hihna hong phawk masa penpa ka hi ding hi.
“Tui-sakol ganhing golpi ngaihsun dih in; amah leh nang a piangsakpa in keimah ka hi hi. Amah in bawngtal bangin lopa ne a,
ahi zongin ama pum sungah bangzah thahatna om a, bangzahin a sazang khauh ahi hiam?
Ama mei in taamtaak sing bangin khauhin tal po a, a khe-a a sazangte hat mahmah hi.
Ama guhte sumngo bangin khauh a, a khete sikzawl bangin khauh hi.
“Ganhing khempeuh lak pan a lamdang pen hi a, Amah a Piangsakpa bekin zo zo hi.
Gamsate a omna mualtung panin, ama an ding lopa kipuak hi.
Amah lingkungte nuai-ah lum a, nawng sunga pumpeng lakah bu hi.
Lingkungte leh lui gei-a gialheek kungte in ama ading nilim piangsak uh hi.
Amah in guntui khangte kihta lo a, tui in a maitang a nawk gawp hangin nuam takin om thei hi.
Kua in ama mit tawsakin man zo ding ahi hiam? Kua in a nakpheh-ah khau vawh zo ding ahi hiam?
“Nang in ngasa siahna sikkawi tawh Awle man zo ding a, khauhual khat tawh a lei hen zo ding na hi hiam?
A nakpheh-ah khau vawh zo ding a, sikkawi tawh a khaguh sunlet zo ding na hi hiam?
Amah in na khah ding hong thuum ding a, na hehpih ding hong ngen ding ahi hiam?
Nangmah sila ahi tawntung dingin, nang tungah thu hong ciam ding ahi hiam?
Na nasem numeite na mawlpih bangin mawlpih zo ding a, vasa khawi bangin bawl zong ding na hi hiam?
Ngasa bengte in lei dingin hong deek ding a, sazuakte in zuak dingin a sa sem ding ahi hiam?
Ngasa khawhna teipi tawh a vun khawhlet zo ding a, teipi lingnei tawh a lutang khawhlet zo ding na hi hiam?
Khatvei sukhin lecin na hih kik nawn het kei ding a, tua na sutna thu na mangngilh nawn kei ding hi.
Awle a mu mi peuhmah lau-in, lei-ah puk uh hi.
A heh ciangin kihtakhuai mahmah a, a mai-ah kuamah om ngam lo hi.
Leitunga om mihingte lakah, awle su-a a sihlawh lo kua om ahi hiam?
“Keimah in Awle khete, a guh a taang, a thahatna gen loin ka om thei kei hi.
Kua in a puan tungnung hawk khiatsak zo a, a sik puanpi sunlet zo ahi hiam?
A kam sungah a kihtakhuai a hate om ahih manin, kua in phensak ngam ahi hiam?
A nungzang suk-ah a lipte lum bangin kithuap suk cinten a, suang bangin sakin kimatcip bikbek ciat hi.
Tua alipte khat leh khat kithuapcip bikbek ahih manin, a kikal-ah huih nangawn thawl zo lo hi.
Tuate kinak mat lua ahih manin, bangmah in phelkhia zo lo hi.
A hetthiai ciangin taang zaizai a, a mittangte nisuak tung bangin taang hi.
Ama kam panin mei kuangkhia a, mei-ek leengkhia zaizai hi.
A nak panin meikhu suak a, selkeu kikhul khu tawh kibang hi.
A husan’ in mei tawhkuang a, a kam panin meikuang suakkhia hi.
A ngawng thakhauh mahmah ahih manin, a gim thei lo thatang nei hi.
A vun tung khempeuh a nipna mun mahmah om lo a, sikpeek bangin sak kim hi.
A lungsim suangtum bangin kihtak nei lo a, angawina suang bangin sakin dolah nei lo hi.
Amah hong kithawi ciangin mi thahat pente nangawn lau a, kihta in cih nading thei loin om uh hi.
Namsau tawh a kisut hangin bun zo lo a, teipi leh thaltangte in zong bun zo lo hi.
Ama adingin sikte, buhkung bangin nip a, sumngote zong singmuatsa bang lel hi.
Amah khua a phawksak zo ding thaltang om lo a, suang tawh a kiden’ ciangin a tunga anvai them tu bang lel hi.
Ama adingin molhtum pen buhkung bang hi lel a, mite in teipi tawh a khawh ciangin nuihsan lel hi.
A khecinte, belpei kitam a hiamte tawh kibang a, lam a pai ciangin leilak kuikeek gawp hi.
Amah in tuipi tokin beel sunga tuiso bangsak zo a, sathau sa sunga tui tu bangin tuipi phuansak zaizai zo hi.
A painasa-ah tuihual om dandan a, tuipi phuansak pheuphau hi.
Amah tehpih theih ding leitungah bangmah om lo a, bangmah kihtak a nei het lo ganhing ahi hi.
Amah in ganhing kihisak pente nangawn nuai et a, gamsa khempeuhte’ kumpi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Job in Topa dawng a,
“Topa aw, vangliatna khempeuh na neihna, na hih nop khempeuh na hih theihna thu ka thei hi.
Kei bangmah thei loin a om kim lai, bang hangin ka pilna hong dem ngam na hi hiam, nong ci hi. Keimah in ka tel zawh loh thu, kei’ theih dingin a lamdang lua thu a gengen ka hi hi.
Thu na gen lai takin ka na ngaih nading, leh na thugente kong dawn’ ding, nong gen hi.
Ni dangin mi’ gensawn bekin nang kong thei a, tu-in keima mit mahmah tawh nang kong mu ta hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka paunasate khempeuh hangin ka maizum a, tu-in vut leh vai khu-in nakpi takin ka kisik hi,” a ci hi.

Topa in hih thute khempeuh Job tungah a gen khit ciangin, Teman khuami Elifaz kiangah, “Ka nasempa Job bangin, keima thu na gen ding uh a, kilawm bangin gen lo na hih manun, nang leh na lawm tegel tungah ka heh hi.

Tu-in bawngtal sagih leh tuutal sagih la-in Job kiangah paipih un la, note’ adingin biakpiakna-in nei un. Job in note’ adingin thu hong ngetsak ding a, keimah in ama thungetna ka pia ding hi. Note’ haina zahin kong minsiasak kei ding hi. Note in Job’ gen bangin keima thu a manin na gen kei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ sawl bangin Elifaz, Bildad, leh Zofar gamta uh a, Topa in Job’ thungetna a pia hi.
Job in a lawm thumte’ ading thu a ngetsak khit ciangin, Topa in Job citheisak kik a, ni danga a neih ngei zah nihin neihsa lamsa guan hi.

Tua ciangin Job’ sanggam pasalte, a sanggam numeite, leh a lawm ngeite a innah hong hawh uh a, a innah pawi bawlin lungdamin omkhawm uh hi. Topa in ama tungah a tun’sak gimnate hangin a khasiatpihnate uh genin hanthawn uh hi. Amaute in sum leh kham zungbuh khatciat tawh va pha uh hi.
Tua tham loin Topa in Job’ nuntakna a masa lam sangin a nunung lamah thupha lim piakzaw hi. Job in tuu tulsawm leh tulli, kalaoh tulguk, bawngtal kap tulkhat, leh la a pi tulkhat nei hi.
Amah in tapa sagih leh tanu thum nei kik a,
a tanu upa pen Jemimah phuak a, a nihna Keziah phuak a, a tum pen Kerenhappuk phuak hi.
Job’ tanute zahin a meelhoih leitungah numei dang khat zong om lo a, a pa un a sanggam pasalte uh tawh a kibangin gamh luah khawmsak hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Job kum za leh kum sawmli sung nungta lai a, a tute ciang bek hi loin a tusawnte dong a mu hi.
Tua khit ciangin khan’ khinin teek sih ta hi.
Jerusalem khua sungah kumpi a sem, David’ tapa Thugen Siampa’ thugente;
Thugen Siampa in hih bangin ci hi: A mawknapi, a mawknapi, na khempeuh a mawknapi,
Gimpi-a nisa thuak-a nasepna-ah mihing in bang noptuamna ngah ahi hiam?
Khang khat bei-in khang khat hong khang a, ahi zongin leitung kibang bang niloh hi.
Ni hong suakin ni tum a, a suakkik dingin tumzel hi.
Leitaw lam-ah huih nungin, leilu lam-ah nung leuleu a, a zuihna ngei teng mah zui-in, nungnung niloh hi.
Lui khempeuh tuipi-in luangsuk a, ahi zongin tuipi dim nai lo hi; tuinak-ah tuite tung kik zelin, a nak panin hong luangsuk kik zel hi.
Na khempeuh lunggim huai a, kuama gen zawh ding hi lo hi; Mit in a muh cim thei lo a, bil in a zak cim thei lo hi.
A omsa mah bangin hong piang kik ding a, a kisemsa bangin hong kisem kik ding hi. Leitungah a thak na khat beek om lo hi.
Hih in a thak ahi hi, a kici thei ding khat beek om lo hi. Eite’ khan’ ma-in, a omsa vive ahi hi.
A beisa nate kiphawk kha nawn lo a, hong tung lai ding thute zong a khang kikte in phawk nawn lo ding hi.
Thugen siampa keimah in Jerusalem khua-ah Israel kumpi ka hi ngei hi.
Hih leitungah a kisem na khempeuh en telin a thu kan ding ka ngaihsun hi. Pasian in tua bang nasep ei tungah hong guat pen a nuam het lo nasep khat ahi hi.
Leitungah a kisem khempeuh ka mu khin a, tuate khempeuh a mawknapi na hi a, huihpi nungdelh tawh kibang hi.
A kawisate kimamsak thei lo a, a om lopi a omin kiseh thei lo hi.
“Pilna sangpi ka nei a, keima mai-ah Jerusalem a uk midangte khempeuh sangin ka pilzaw hi; pilna leh theihna a kici khempeuh ka theih loh om lo hi,” ka kici hi.
Pilna leh haina, theihna leh mawkna, a kilamdan’na ka zong hi. Ahi zongin tua bang ka hahkatna zong a mawknapi ahih lam ka phawk hi.
Pil semsem lehang kilunghimawh semsem a, tam thei semsem lehang hong gim sak semsem zawsop hi.
Lungdamna zongin, nuam ka sak bang bangin om ning, ci-in ka ngaihsun leuleu hi. Tua zong a mawknapi ahihna ka phawk zel hi.
Nuihna in haina ahihna, leh nopna in bangmah-a a kiman’ lohna ka mukhia hi.
Mihingte in leitungah tomno a nuntak sungin bangci om leh hoih ding hiam, cih ka muh theih nadingin, pilna ka deihna mah tawh, zu nekna tawh ka lung nuamsakin, ka utut ka sep ding ka hamciam hi.
Na a lianpi tampi tak mah ka sem zo hi. Keima adingin inn tampi tak ka lam a, leenggui lo tampi tak mah ka nei hi.
Huan bawlin singno cin’na lo zong ka nei a, ka huan sungah nek theih namkim kidim hi.
Tua singnote tui piak nadingin tuikhukpi zong ka bawl hi.
Ka inn-ah a suak silate’ ban-ah, sila a nu a pa-in tampi tak ka nei thuah hi; tuuhonte leh bawnghonte zong tampi tak ka nei a, Jerusalem a om ngei dangte khempeuh sangin ka hauzaw hi.
Ka zawhsa kumpite’ sumkholna panin keima adingin ngun leh kham zong ka la hi. Ka lungnop nadingin la a sa ding lasiam numei leh pasal tampi ka nei a, zi zong ka deih zahzah ka nei zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keima hun ma-in Jerusalem-ah a om ngei mite khempeuh sangin ka lianzaw a, ka pilna zong bei tuan lo hi.
Ka deih khempeuh ka nei a, ka ut bang bangin omin ka gamta hi. Ka sepna khempeuh ah nuam ka sa hi; tua nopsakna in ka nasepna hangin ka phattuamna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin ka sepsa na khempeuh, leh tua banga haksapi-a ka sepnate ka ngaihsut kik ciangin, na khempeuh a mawknapi ahihna leh leitungah bangmah phattuamna a omlohna ka phawk hi.
A hi-in ci lehang, kumpi khat in ama ma-a kumpipa’ hihsa teng mah a hih thei bek ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin pilna, haina, mawkna i cih in bang hiam, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Tua banga ka ngaihsut ciangin, khuavak in khuamial a zawh bangin, pilna in haina zawhna ahih lam ka mu hi.
Mipilte in a pai nading mun mu thei a, mihaite in a pai nading mun mu thei lo hi. Ahi zongin a pil leh a hai in a kibang khat a tuah tuak ding ka thei hi.

Tua ciangin, “Mihaite tungah a piang thu in kei tungah zong hong piang ding ahih manin, ka pil mahmah manin bang phattuamna ngah ka hi hiam?” ka ci a, “Bangmah ngah kei ing, themkhat zong ngah kei ing,” ci-in ka kidawng hi.
Mihaite a kiphawkphawk loh mah bangin, mipilte zong kiphawkphawk tuan lo hi; mai lam hun-ah i vekpi-in hong kimangngilh lel ding hi. A pil a hai-in, i vekin i si ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih leitunga sepna khempeuh in lungkhamna cih loh hong piak theih ding bangmah om lo ahih manin, hih leitunga hin’na in kei adingin bangmah akiman’na om lo hi. A mawknapi, huih hawm guak bek hi lel hi.
Keimah hong laih dingpa tungah ka neih ka lam khempeuh ka nusiat ding thei ka hih manin, nakpi tak-a sem-a ka gimpih nate in kei’ adingin a phattuamna om lo hi.
Amah pil ta leh hai ta leh, ka pilna ka siamna khempeuh zang-a ka sepsa nate luahin a ukpa hi ding hi. Hih in a mawknapi taktak ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin hih leitungah nakpi takin ka na sepna ka kisik hi.
Pilna, siamna, theihna siit loin na kisem a, themkhat zong a gimpih het lo mi khat’ adingin nusiat ding hi zenzen hi. Hih thu in a man het lo, a mawknapi taktak ahi hi.
Mi khat in hih leitungah lunghimawhna thatang sanin na a sepna-ah bang phattuamna ngah ahi hiam?
Sepna bawlna khempeuh ah lungkhamna leh sinkhamna bekbek hi a, zan nangawnin ihmut mawhpih hi. Hih in a mawknapi taktak ahi hi.
Mihing khat in a nasepna thamanin an ne tui dawnin nuam sa-in a om sangin a hoihzaw bangmah dang om lo hi. Ahi zongin tua nangawn zong, Pasian’ hang ahihna ka phawk hi.
Pasian kihel loin kua in an ne-in nuamsa thei ding ahi hiam?

Pasian in amah a lungdamsakte tungah pilna, theihna, leh lungdamna pia a, ahi zongin a hehpihhuai mi mawhte ahih leh a sep bek sisakin, amau’ thalawhsa khempeuh, amah a lungdamsakte tungah piaksak hi. Hih in a mawknapi taktak, huihpi nung delh bang bek ahi hi.
Hih leitungah a piang thu khempeuh Pasian in ama pian’ hun dinga a sehsa hunin a pian’sak ahi hi.
Suah hun om a, sih hun om hi. Suan hun om a, bawhkhiat hun om hi.
Gawh hun om a, khawi hun om hi. Phel hun om a, lam hun om hi.
Kah hun om a, nuih hun om hi. Dah hun om a, lam hun om hi.
Lupkhop hun om a, tuam lup hun om hi. Kikawi hun om a, kikhahkhiat hun om hi.
Zon’ hun om a, mansuah hun om hi. Kep hun om a, paihkhiat hun om hi.
Balkeek hun om a, phop hun om hi. Daih hun om a, pau hun om hi.
It hun om a, muhdah hun om hi. Kido hun om a, kilem hun om hi.
Na a sem mipa in a sepna khempeuh thamanin bang ngah ahi hiam?
Pasian in eite’ manlahpih dinga hong piak nasep ka thei hi.
Amah in na khempeuh ama hun tawh a kituak dingin bawl hi. Amah in mai lam thu theih nopna lungsim eite sungah hong guan’ a, ahi zongin ama sepnate a cing-a theih zawh nading hong guan lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mihingte in a nuntak lai teng a siam tawp-un gamta-in lungdam-a a om ding a thupi pen ahihna ka phawk hi.
Eite khempeuh in an ne tui dawnin, i sepna thaman tawh lungdamin i om ding kilawm a, tua in Pasian’ hong piak letsong ahi hi.

Pasian’ sep khempeuh a kip tawntung ding ahihna ka thei hi; i behlap theih ding om lo a, i paihkhiat theih ding zong om lo hi. Amah i zahtak theih nadingin Pasian in tua bang ding mahin a bawl ahi hi.

A piang khat peuhpeuh pen a piang ngeisa mah na hi a, a piang lai ding khat peuhpeuh zong a piang ngeisa mah na hi lel hi. Pasian in ama hun hunin a piang ngeisa mah piang sak kik zelzel hi. Leitungah Thumanlohna
Tua tham loin, hih leitungah gitlohna in thuman thutang a suankhiatna zong ka mu hi.
Pasian in sepna bawlna leh na khempeuh ama hun ding sehkhol khin ahih manin, midikte leh migilote thu khen ding hi.
Mihingte pen ganhing bang lel ahihna uh a lahtel nadingin Pasian in mihingte ze-et hi, ci-in ka lungsimah ka ngaihsun hi.

A tawpna-ah ci lehang, mihingte leh ganhingte in a tuah ding uh kibang a, ganhing mah bangin mihing zong si hi. Mihing leh ganhing in a kibangin nuntakna hu nei a, mihing leh ganhing nuntakna a kiman’na bangmah om lo ahih manin, mihing in ganhing sangin a hoih zawkna bangmah om tuan lo hi.
A nih tuakin mun khatah tungkhawm ding uh a, leivui pan-a piang uh ahih mah bangin leivui mah suakkik ding uh hi.
Mihingte’ kha van-ah kahtoin, ganhingte’ kha lei-ah lutsuk hi, cih a thei zong kuamah om lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mihing in a sep thaman uh ne-in nuamsa-in a om ding uh a hoih pen ahihna ka phawk hi. Tua lo ahih theih ding uh bangmah dang om lo hi. I sih khit ciangin bang piang ding cih theih theihna om lo hi.

Leitungah thuman lo-a a kigamtatnate khempeuh ka ngaihsun kik leuleu hi. Nenniamna a thuak mite kap uh a, ahi zongin kuamah in amaute hehnem lo hi. A nengniam mite thahat lua uh ahih manin kuamah in thuk ngam lo hi.
A hing lai mite sangin a si khinsa mite hampha ka sa zaw hi.
Mihing-a hong piang nai lo, hih leitung gitlohna teng a mu nai lote hampha zawlai sawnsawn hi.
Mi khat leh khat, hauh nop man-a kidemna hangin nakpi-a na kisem ahihna ka mu hi. Hih zong a mawknapi hi a, huihpi nung delh mah tawh kibang bek hi.
Mihaite in na sem loin a khut zepin om uh a, a tawpna-ah gil kialin sih lawh uh hi.
Nakpi-in na sem a, a mawknapi ahi ding khut nih dim sangin, lungsim nuam-a khut khat dim neihna hoihzaw hi.
Nuntakna sungah a mawknapi ahi thudang khat ka mu leuleu hi.

Mi khat in a tapa ahi a, sanggam ahi zongin nei lo napi-in, a tawntungin nasemin a neihsa tawh lungkim hun nei thei lo hi. Kua adingin gimpi-in na sem a, a ut utin ta hoh lo ahi hiam? Hih in zong a mawknapi mah, a dahhuai nuntakna khat ahi hi.
Mi khat sangin mi nih hoihzaw hi; amau’ sepna thaman ngah uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh khat cimawh leh a khat in huh a, mi khat guak pen cimawh zenzen leh a huh ding om lo ahih manin a dahhuai pha mahmah ahi hi.
Khua a dam ciangin mi nih lumkhawm leh khua lum hi; khat guak bangci khua lum thei ding ahi hiam?
Mi khat bek hi leh zawh nop kisa a, nih pha leh kizo zo lo hi. Zang thum-a kiheek khauhual bawhsat hak hi.
Mi’ thugen a sang thei nawn lo, teek leh hai a thuah kumpipa sangin, zawng napi-in a pil tangval khat hoihzaw hi.
Mi khat pen thong panin suakta-in kumpi suak thei a, zawng napi-in ama gam sungah kumpi suak thei hi.
Hih leitungah a teeng mi khempeuh’ thu ka ngaihsun a, tua mite lak panin kumpipa’ za a luah ding khangno pawlkhat a omna ka phawk hi.
Kumpipa’ uk mite sim zawh lohin tam a, ahi zongin amah a sih ciangin a nasepna hangin a lungdam khat beek om lo hi. Hih in a mawkna taktak, huihpi nung delh bang bek ahi hi.
Biakinn-ah na pai ciangin lim takin kingaihsun in. Aman leh aman lo a khen thei lo mihaite’ biakpiaknate tawh a kibang piakna sangin thungai dingin biakinn-a paina hoihzaw hi.
Thu ngaihsun masa-in pau in la, Pasian’ tungah thu mawkciam pak kei in. Vantungah Pasian om a, leitungah nang om na hih manin na pau dinga kilawm zah val pau kei in.
Na lunghimawh semsem leh na mang sia semsem ding a, tam pau semsem lecin na haina kilang semsem ding hi.
Pasian tungah thu na ciam ciangin manlangin tung sak pah in. Amah in mihaite dik sa lo hi. Na thuciamna bangin tung sak in.
Na thuciamna bangin na tunsak loh ding sangin thuciamna neih vet loh ding hoihzaw hi.

Pasian’ siampipa’ mai-ah ka khial kha hi ci-in na gen ding kisam kha ding ahih manin na kampauna hangin khial kha kei in. Tua bangin gamta kha lecin nangma tungah Pasian heh ding a, na sepsa khempeuh hong suksiatsak ding hi.
Mang tam man leeng a mawkna mah tam a, kam tam pau leeng zong a kituak mahin a mawkna thu mah kibeh laplap hi; bangbang ahi zongin Pasian zahtak lai veve in.
Kumpite in mizawngte gim ngah sakin, thuman thutangin na a kisep kei leh, lamdang sa kei in. Uliante pen amau’ tunga uliante in en uh a, tuate tungah a en sawn a lianzaw khat om lai hi.
Gam khat peuhpeuh in a kumpipa in lokhawhna lamsang a lunghimawh kumpi kisam hi.
Sumdeihna lungsim na neih leh lungkim hun cih na nei ngei kei ding hi; na hauh nop hangin na deih khempeuh na ngah ngei kei ding hi; hih in a mawknapi ahi hi.
Hau semsem lecin na vak ding mi tam semsem a, hauzaw ing, ci-a na theih cih bek simloh bangmah phattuamna na ngah kei hi.
Na a sem mipa in a nek ding nei taleh nei takei leh lungnuam takin ihmu thei a, a haute ahih leh lungnuam takin ihmu thei lo uh hi.
A hoih het lo na khat hih leitungah ka mu hi: mite, amau’ lunggim nadingin hau uh hi.
Na a sep khialh manin a neihsa teng uh suplawh uh a, a tu a tate’ luah ding bangmah om nawn lo hi.
I nute’ sung panin bangmah nei loin tangguakin i suah mah bangin tangguak mahin i ciahkik hi. I sepnate, i ciahpih kik theih bangmah om lo hi.
A dahhuai mahmah thu in: i suah hun lai-a mah bang tektekin i ciahkik ding hi; a mawknapi dinga i sepna-ah bang phattuamna ngah i hi hiam?
I nuntak sung teng lungzin’na, dahna, lunghimawhna, natna satna leh hehna bek tawh hun bei lel hi.
Keimah in ka phawk khiat thu in: Pasian in tomkha nuntak hih leitungah hong piak sungin, i sep thaman ne-in dawnin, nuamsa-in i om ding a hoihpen ahi hi. Hih in mihingte’ thumong ahi hi.
Pasian in mi khat neih leh lam guan’in, a hauhna nuam takin a nek sak leh, amah lungdamin a sepna thaman ne-in a om ding ahi hi. Tua nopsakna in Pasian’ kiang pan ahi hi.
Pasian in lungdamin om sak ahih manin a nuntak tom lam phawkin nei kha lo ding hi.
Hih leitunga mihingte tungah a man het lo-a hong kibawlna ka phawk hi.

Pasian in mi khatpeuh tungah neih leh lam, leh hauhna leh pahtawina pia-in, a deih khempeuh neisak napi-in, tua nate nuam takin zang sak loin, midang khat in nopsak lawh laizang hi. Hih in a mawknapi, a thuman het lo khat ahi hi.

Mi khat in ta zakhat nei-in, kum saupi zong nungta thei kha ding hi; bangzahin sauveipi a nungta ahi zongin leitungah nopsakna ngah loin, lim tak-a vuina a ngah kei leh, a sisa-a suak naungek hoihzaw lai hi.
A sisa-a suak naungek a kiman’na om lo hi; khuamial sungah suakin, khuamial sung mah-ah mangthangin kiphawk nawn lo hi.
Sun khuavak mu kha loin, nuntakna bangci hiam, cih a theih khak loh hangin tawlngakna a ngah hi buang hi.
Nuntakna-ah nopsakna a ngah lo mipa kum tulnih a hing zongin, a tawpna-ah a sisa-a suak naungek mah tawh a tun’na mun kibang lel hi.
Mihingte’ nasepna in a nek tawm ding bek a ngaihsutna hi napi-in, a kham khop ngah zo tuan lo hi.
Tua ahih manin mihaipa sangin mipilpa a hamphat zawkna bang om tuan ahi hiam? Mihaipa in nuntak nading zia a theih hangin bang phatuam tuan ahi hiam?
Na dang dang deih thuah ngitngetna sangin i neihsa teng tawh lungkimna hoihzaw hi. Hih zong a mawknapi, huihpi nung delh mah tawh a kibang bek ahi hi.
A piang thu khempeuh, a tuaci ding mahin tangtawng-a kisehsa hi a, mi khat in amah sangin a thahatzaw khat a nial zawh lohna thu i vekpi-in i thei hi.
Sauvei kinial lehang a mawkna hi semsem a, a phattuamna bang om hiam?
Nilim bangin a pai hanhan, a mawknapi hih nuntak tom sungah mihing’ ading a hoihpen kua in thei ding ahi hiam? Ama sih khit ciangin leitungah bang piang ding cih kua in gen thei ahi hiam?
A manpha paknamtui sangin minpha hoihzaw a, i suah ni sangin i sih ni hoihzaw hi.
Pawi simna sangin si galna hoihzaw hi; sih ding bek a ngak ahihna mihing khempeuh in a phawk ding kilawm hi.
Nuihna sangin dahna hoihzaw hi; na mai hong gumsak zah in na thu theihna hong khangsak hi.
Mipilte, dahna lakah om tual a, mihaite, nopna lakah om tual hi.
Mihaite in pahtawina la hong sak sangin, mipilte’ hong taina hoihzaw hi.
Mihaite’ nuihna in meikuang sunga selkeu kikhul a puak zaizai tawh kibang a, khiatna nei lo, a mawknapi ahi hi.
Mipil khat in midangte a khem ciangin, mihai bangin a gamta ahi hi. Sumgolh lakna in a lapa’ gamtat hoihna siasak hi.
Na khatpeuh a kipatna sangin a tawpna hoihzaw a, kiphatsakna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw hi.
Heh pahpah kei in, hehna in haihuai hi.
“Bang hangin nidang lai-in hih sangin hoihzaw tham pek hiam?” ci-in dong kei in. Tua in pil thudotna hi lo hi.
Pilna in hauhna zahin hoih a, mihingte’ adingin phattuamna ahi hi.
Sum in hong lungmuan’sak bangin pilna in zong hong lungmuang sak hi. Pilna a manphatna in a pilte a nuntaksak theihna ahi hi.
Pasian’ sepsate ngaihsun dih in. Pasian in a kawi-a a bawlsate, kua in mamsak kik thei ahi hiam?
Nopna na ngah lai takin lungdam in; haksakna na tuah ciangin hih thu ngaihsun in: Lungdamna leh lungkhamna hong piapa in Pasian hi a, mai lam-ah bang piang ding cih kuamah in thei lo hi.
Ka nuntakna a mawknapi hi a, ahi zongin ka nuntak sungin thu khempeuh ka thei hi. Mi khat hoih napi-in si a, mi khat siahuai napi-in a khan’sau hi.
