Tua ahih ciangin hoih lua kei in la, lah sia lua kei in. Bang hangin nang kisiasak tawm ding na hi hiam?
Gilo lua, hai lua kei in. Bang hangin khan’sih laizang ding na hi hiam?
A nih tuakin lenkip in. Pasian na zahtak nak leh, khatpeuhpeuh na zuihna-ah na ma vang ding hi.
Khuapi a uk mihing sawm sangin pilna in mi khat hatsak zaw hi.
A manin a gamta, a khial ngei het lo, leitungah mi khat zong om het lo hi.
Mi’ gen khempeuh thudonin nei kei in; na nasempa’ hong samsiatna na za kha ding hi.
Nang zong midang na samsiat zelzelna, tel takin na kithei hi.
Hihte khempeuh ka pilna tawh ka ze-et a, pil ding ka hahkat hangin kei’ bat zawh ding hi lo hi.
Mihing nuntakna, kua in thei khia zo ding ahi hiam? Eite adingin thuk lua a, tel hak lua hi.
Keimah in, pilna siamna ka theih nading pilna mu-in, thupiangte a hang ka theih nadingin, nakpi takin hanciamin ka lungsim ka pia a, haina a hoihlohna leh a haihuaina ka thei khia hi.

Sihna sangin numei a siahuai zawkna ka theikhia hi. Ama hong piak itna in thang bangin hong tepcip a, ama hong kawina khut in sikkhau bangin hong hencip hi. Pasian’ deihna banga gamtate in tua bang numei pel thei a, ahi zongin a mawh nuamte a thang ah awk uh hi.
Thugen siampa in hih bangin ci hi: Thu ka kankan ciangin, aban banin thu ka phawk khia hi.

A thudang ka zon’zon’ hangin, bangmah ka mu zo tuan nawn kei hi. Pasal tulkhat sung panin khat bang a pil a om khak theihna, ahi zongin numei lakah a pil cih bang a om lohna, keimah in ka phawkkhia hi.
Keima theihkhiat thu in: Pasian in eite a thuman dingin hong bawl napi-in, eite in paulap tuamtuam zongin, i kikai-awk sak hi.
Mipilte bek in na akhiatna taktak theithei uh hi. Pilna in mipilte maitaisak a, a hehmai bei sak hi.
Kumpipa hong sawl bangin gamta in la, Pasian’ tungah thu mawkciam pak kei in.
Kumpipa in a ut peuhpeuh hih thei ahih manin, ama kiang panin paikhia in la, ama lungkim lohna hih teitei kei in.
Kumpipa in aana neihna tawh gamta hi; ama gen bangin gamta in; kuamah in amah nial zo lo hi.
Ama thu a mangte in haksakna tuak kha lo ding hi; mipilte in a gamtat nading zia leh a hun hoih thei uh hi.
Na khatpeuh i hih ding ciangin a kilawm hun, leh a ngeina man om a, ahi zongin eite in bangmah i thei kei hi.
A hong piang ding thu i thei kei a, a hong gen thei zong kuamah om lo hi.
A sih ding a pelh thei, a sih ding hun a phiat thei kuamah om lo hi. Gal a om ciangin gal launa a pelh thei, siatna sungah a lut ciangin a peng thei kuamah om lo hi.
Leitunga gamtatnate ka ngaihsut ciangin, hih thute ka mukhia hi. Mi khat in midang tungah vangliatna nei-in, a uk sung mite a gimsak gawp hun om hi.
Migilote si-in kivui a, a siat gamtatna khua sunga mite mah in han panin a ciah ciangun amah a phat vevena uh ka mu hi.
A mawhte kidaantat pahpah lo ahih manin, mihingte in khialh ding haksa sa lo uh hi.
Mawhnei khat in zavei dong siatna bawl napi-in, a khan’ sau veve hi. Ahi zongin, “Pasian a zahtakte adingin, thu khempeuh nuam ding hi.
Migilote’ adingin, thu nuam lo ding a, amaute in Pasian zahtak lo uh ahih manin, a nuntak hun uh nilim bangin bei pak ding a, khan’sih ding uh hi,” kici hi.

Ahi zongin hih thugenna a mawknapi ahi hi. Leitunga thupiangte ngaihsun dih in: khatveivei midikte’ in migilote’ daantuah ding teng tuak zawsop a, migilote in midikte’ thaman ngah ding teng ngah zawsop uh hi. Hih thu in a hai vai, a mawkna taktak ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin mihing in hih leitungah nuam a sak theih ding adang om lo ahih manin, an ne tui dawnin nuamsa-in a om ding bek ahi hi. Pasian in hih leitungah nuntak a piak sung teng, a sep thaman a ngah theih ding hih bek om hi.
Pil ding hahkatin, leitunga thupiangte ka theih ciangin, sun leh zanin ihmu lo liangin i om hangin,
Pasian’ nasepna i theih zawh lohna ka phawk hi. Mihingte in bangzahin i hahkat hangin kithei khia zo lo hi. Mipilte in thei a kisak hangun, bangmah thei lo uh hi.

Nakpi takin sauveipi ngaihsun a, ka phawk thu in: mipilte leh midikte’ gamtatna khempeuh Pasian in uk a, Pasian’ itna hang hizaw hiam, a muhdahna hang hizaw hiam, kuamah in thei lo hi. Amau’ mai lam thu khempeuh a mawkna hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh thumong kibang a, midikte leh migilote, mihoihte leh misiate, misiangte leh mininte, biakna piate leh a pia lote, a thu tawpna a vekpi-in kibang lel hi. Mawhneipa sangin mihoihpa hampha zaw tuan lo a, thuciamna a bawl lopa sangin a bawlpa hampha zaw tuan lo hi.

Mi khempeuh’ thumong kibang kim a, hih thu in leitunga thupiang lakah a man het lo khat ahi hi. Mihingte a nuntak lai teng, gitlohna leh a mawkna thu tawh a lungsim uh kidim a, theih kholh lohin mihingte si pak uh hi.
Ahi zongin a hing laite’ ading lametna om thei hi; a sisa humpinelkai sangin a hing lai ui hoihzaw hi.
A hing laite in a si ding ahih lam thei thei uh a, a sisate in bangmah thei nawn lo hi. A sisate in thaman bangmah nei nawn lo uh a, amaute kiphawk kha nawn lo hi.
Amau ading itna, muhdahna, hanciamna cihte om nawn lo a, leitunga om nate, khat beek thei kha kik nawn lo ding uh hi.
An ne-in lungdam in la, zu ne-in lungnuam in: na gamtatna peuhpeuh, Pasian in hoih a sa hi.
Na puante siangin paaksak tawntung in la, na sam gumsak ngei kei in.
Pasian in hih leitungah nang a hong piak, tomkha sung na nuntak lai teng, na it na zi tawh a nuam thei thei-in om in. Leitung lungkhamna sungah na lawhtak tua bek mah hi ding hi.
Na mai-ah sep ding a om khempeuh, na tha neihzah tawh sem in. Bang hang hiam cih leh, nangmah in na zuat ding sihna gam sungah, nasepna leh thungaihsutna, pilna leh theihna cihte om lo hi.

Hih leitungah ka phawk thudang khat in: a tai hat mite in tai kidemna-ah zo tawntung lo a, galhang thahatte in gal zo tawntung lo hi. A pilte in an a kham ngah tawntung lo a, a pilte hau tawntung lo hi. Hih theih siamna a neite milian suak tawntung lo hi. Mi khempeuh tungah kamsiatna vive tung hi.
Mihing in ama hun ding thei ngei lo hi. Thang-ah a awk vasate, ngen-ah a awk ngasate tawh i kibang hi. Lam-et loh hun laitak keekin, hun sia sungah mihingte i tung hi.
Thudang khat zong ka mukhia hi: Hih leitungah pilna a hoihna gentehna a hoih khat om hi.
Mi tawmno bek a omna khua khat om a, a vanglian kumpi khat in tua khua sim hi. Amah in tua khua umcihin, a khuasung luhgawp dingin ngaihsun hi.
Tua khua sungah azawng mipil khat om a, ama pilna tawh tua khua hu zo hi. Ahi zongin kuamah in tua mizawngpa phawk kha lo hi.
Thahatna sangin pilna hoihzaw ka ci a, ahi zongin kuamah in mizawngte a pil dingin ngaihsun lo a, mizawngte’ thugen kuamah in thudonin nei lo hi.
Mihai hon lakah gam-ukpa in, thu a gen lualua sangin, mipilpa in dam taka a gen hiathiat ngaih huaizaw hi.
Galhiamte sangin pilna hoihzaw a, ahi zongin khialhna khat in a hoih tampi susia thei hi.
A sisa thote in paknamtui bung sunga om paknamtui uih sak thei a, haitatna themno khat in pilna lianpen susia thei hi.
Mipilte a man-a a gamtat ding a ngeina hi a, mihaite a sia-a gamtat ding a ngeina ahi hi.
Mihaite, lampi-ah a pai kawm nangawnin haitat uh a, a haina uh mi khempeuh theisak uh hi.
Nang tungah gam-ukpa a heh leh, na nasepna za taisan pah kei in. Dai tak-a om hithiatna in khialhna lianpi maisak thei hi.
Hih leitungah a thuman lo, gam-ukte’ pian’sak ka muhte in:
Mihaite, za lianpi kipia a, mihaute kiniam koih suk hi.
Sakol tungah silate tuang a, miliante sila bangin a khe-un pai uh hi.
Gum a tote, gum sung mah-ah kia ding a, mi’ phung a phelsakte, gul in tu ding hi.
Suang tokhiate, suang mah in liam sak ding a, sing-ekte, sing ehna mah-ah liam ding hi.
I hei mawl napi-in i tat kei leh, nakpi takin sat kul a, ngaihsut masak ding pil huaizaw hi.
Gul khiim thei napi-in i khiim kei leh, a kiman’na om tuan lo hi; gul in hong tu veve ding hi.
Mipilte’ kampauna in pahtawina ngahsak a, mihaite’ kampauna in amau mah siasak hi.
Thugen a kipatun bang tum lo tawh kipan pah malam uh a, gitloh hai vai teng tawh thugen khup lel uh hi.
Mihaite in thu gengenin ciakciak uh hi. Mai lam-a thupiang ding kuamah in thei lo a, i sih khit-a thupiang ding hong gen thei om lo hi.
A inn zuat nading lampi a thei lo mihai luate bek, a innlam zon’na in gim ding uh hi.
A kumpipa mite’ cih bang bangin gamta lel a, zan khuavakin zu ne makai a nei, gam khatpeuh in lungkhamna thuak hi.
A kumpipa in lungsim khentatna nei thei a, a makaite in annek tuidawn a hun thei a, amau ki-uk thei-in zu a kham lo makai a nei, gam khat peuhpeuh, a hampha gam ahi hi.
Thadah lua-a a inn vang nangawn a hu nuam lopa, a inn keh ding a, a innpi nangawn in puklawh ding hi.
An in lung damsak a, zu in lung nuamsak a, sum in ahih leh na khempeuh a kicingsak hi.
Na lungsim nangawn-ah, kumpipa gensia kei in la, kuama zak lohna mun na lupna tung nangawn-ah, mihaute samsia kei in. Thopi in na thugen teng na puak kha ding hi.
Tui tungah na anlum khia in, ni tampi khit ciangin na mu kik ding hi.
Na neihsate, mun sagih ahi a, mun giat-ah ahi zongin khen kawikawi in. Hih leitungah bang thusia hong piang ding cih na thei khol kei hi.
Meii sungah tui a tamluat ciangin, leitungah guah-in hong zusuk a, singkung khatpeuh a puk ciangin, a pukna san san-ah om paisuak hi.
Huih leh guah ngakin, khuahun hoih dong a ngak mi in, khaici tuh ngei lo ding a, an zong la ngei lo ding hi.
Nupi gai khat sungah nuntakna thak bangci kipat hiam, ci-in na theih zawh loh mah bangin, na khempeuh a bawl Pasian’ nasepna, na thei zo ngei kei ding hi.
Zingsang-a kipan khaici tuh in la, nitak dong mateng khawl kei in. A vek-a a po kim ding ahi a, khat sia-in, khat a po ding ahi zongin, bangmah na theih kholh om lo hi.
Khuavak hoih mahmah a, i mit in nitaang a muh ciangin nuam mahmah hi.
Mi khat sau veipi a nuntak leh a nuntak sung nuam takin om ta hen. Sau veipi tak a hing zongin, a sih khit hun a sau vei zawkna phawk ta hen. Mai lam-ah a lam-ethuai bangmah a om kei hi.

Khangnote aw, na khangno uh nuam sa un la, na khangno lai-un lungdam un. Na hih nop peuhpeuh uh hih un la, na ut bang bangun gamta un. Ahi zongin na gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in, Pasian in thu hong khen ding lamtak phawk gige un.
Note kilunggimsak kei un la, na pumpi uh gentheisak kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh na khangno hun sung uh sau vei lo ding hi.
Na lungkham hun ding hong tun’ ma, “Nuntakna nuamsa kei ing,” na cih ma hun, na khangno lai takin nang hong Piangsakpa phawk in.
Lungkham hun i cih in: Nang adingin nitaang, khataang, aksi taangte a dialh hun, meiipi kai a then’ nawn loh hun,
na muan’ na suan’ a thahat na khut, na baan, na khete, a thanem hun, an hai nadingin na hatang tawm lua ta-in, na mitmangin khua na lim muh theih nawn loh hun,
khuasung gamlumnate na bil in za thei nawn loin, ansukna gingte na zak theih phat nawn loh hun, la kisate za thei nawn loin, vasa ham nangawn in hong phawn’ zawh nawn loh hun,

keen sangte-ah pai ngam nawn loin, lam pai ding a haksat hun, na samte hong kang-in, na khangno thahatna teng bei ta-in, na tha a kiam hun ding ahi hi. Eite in i tawntung inn ding a zuan ding i hi a, khuasung lampi-ah kahna awging kiza ding hi.
I ngun meivak khaina khau kitatin, i kham meivak kia-in kitam ding a, i tuikhaina khau kitatin, i tuikhaina beel kitam ding hi.
I pumpi, lei suak kik ding a, i nuntakna a hong pia Pasian’ kiangah, i kha ciahkik ta ding hi.
Thugen Siampa in, “A kiman’na a om lo, a mawknapi, na khempeuh a mawknapi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Thugen Siampa, mipil ahih ban-ah ama theih teng, mite tungah hilh hi. Amah in paunakte, lim takin sin a, aman ahihna thu hoih takin entel hi.
Thugen Siampa in a zaknophuai kammal khawm a, ama gelh kammalte, aman taktak ahi hi.
Mipilte’ thugente in, tuucingte in tuu hawlna-in a zat ciangkhut hiam tawh kibang hi. Tua thute pen, eite khempeuh tuucin’ banga hong Cingpa Pasian’ piak ahi hi.
Ka ta aw, na phawk ding thudang khat om hi. Lai gelh-a a bu-a bawlna in bei hun nei thei lo a, lai tam sin luatna in pumpi gim-sak hi.
Hih thute khempeuh banah, gen ding thu khat bek om hi. Mihing hong kipian’sakna, a thu bulpipen in: Pasian zahtakna, leh a thupiaknate man’na ahi hi.
Apha hita leh asia hita leh, a simtham-a i hih simte nangawn, i hihna khempeuh ah, Pasian in thu hong khen ding hi.
Solomon’ la ngaihpente: Nungak:
Na muk tawh nong tawptawp a, nong itna in leenggahzu sangin khumzaw hi.
Na omna khempeuh nam vuauvuau a, na min kizaza a, nang hong ngai lo om lo hi.
Hong kai in la, paikhawm ni. Ka kumpi hong hi in la, na innah hong ciahpih in. Nang tawh om leeng i lung dam a, leenggahzu ne-in nuam sa ni. Nang kong ngaih khak tuahpha ing.
Jerusalem nungakte aw, ka vom hangin ngaih baang ing. Savun puanbuk bangin ka ang hiuhiau a, Solomon’ puankhaite ka bang hi.
Ka vom manin hong enneu kei un. Nisa ka thuakna hang ahi hi. Ka ute in kei hong gawtbawl uh a, lo hong kuan saksak uh a, keima pumpi ka don man kei hi.
Ngaihno aw, hong gen dih in. Koi lai-ah na tuu cing ding a, sun-in koi lai-ah khawl ding na hi hiam? Bang hangin tuucing dangte lakah nang hong zong kawikawi phot ding ka hi hiam? Tangval:
Nungak khempeuh lak-a a ngaih baang pen nungak aw, a mun thei lo na hi hiam? Tuuhonte zui-in na keelte hong khah in la, tuucingpa’ puanbuk gei-ah hong cing in.
Ngaihno aw, Faro’ sakoltal in sakolpite a delh bangin, nang hong kidelh hi.
Na biang tuak-a na samphek kaisukte ngaih baang a, suangmanpha bangin na liangko tungah kinga hi.
Nangma adingin kham khainiang bawlin, na kizep nading zong ngun tawh bawl ni. Nungak:
Ka kumpipa a lupna tungah a om lai takin ka paknamtui hong kizeel hi.
Ka ang-ah ka ngaihno hong lup lai takin, mirrah paknamtui bangin namtui viauviau hi.
Ka ngaihno in, En-gedi gam leenggui lo-a, a palh lihleh paak hoihte tawh kibang hi. Tangval:
Ngaihno aw, na meel hoih a, na mit zong ngaih baang hi. Nungak:
Ngaihno ngiingeei aw, na etlawm a, na ngaihhuai hi.
I lupna in lopa tung hi ding a, taamtaak kungte, i innkhuam hi-in, taaksan hiangte, i inn tungdap hi ding hi.
Keimah in, Sharon gam sunga om gamlak paak, mual kuam sunga unok paak ka hi lel hi. Tangval:
Tua bang hilo a, ka ngaihno in numei khempeuh lak panin, ling lak-a om unok paak tawh kibang hi. Nungak:
Ka ngaihno, tangval dang tawh teh lehang, gamlak singkung lak-a apple kung tawh kibang hi. Ama liim-ah ka tu nuam a, a gahte lim ka sa hi.
An nekna phual-ah hong paipih in la, itna mai tawh hong en in.
Lungzuang, duangvul ka hih manin, leenggahkeu tawh hong vaak in la, apple gah tawh hong thadim sak in.
A vei lam baan hong kham sak a, a taklam khut-in kei hong kawi hi.
Jerusalem nungakte aw, ko’ kingaihna nong suknawi loh nadingun, sakhi leh sanang tawh kei tungah hong kiciam un.
Ka ngaihno’ awging ka za hi. Mualtung tawnin hong tai a, mualte kantanin kei hong zuan hi.
Ka ngaihno in sanang tawh kibang a, sakhitalno tawh zong kibang hi. Ka inn pualam uhah ding a, kongvangneu-ah hong dak zial-in, kawmvang panin hong engiau hi.
Ka ngaihno in ka kiangah thu hong gen a, “Hong pai in, ngaihno aw, hong zui in, it luat aw,
Phalbi veng ta a, guahzu nawn lo hi.
Gam sung tengah paakte palh a, lasak hun hong tung ta a, gam sung tengah vakhu hamte kiza ta hi.
Theite zong minmin ta a, leenggah paak gim namtui zong kiza ta hi. Hong pai in, ngaihno aw, Hong zui in, it luat aw. Tangval:
Suangheng kawm-a vasa bangin nang na bubu niloh hi. A ngaih baang na mai hong musak in la, a lungzuan’ huai na awging hong zasak in.
I leengguite paak ta ahih manin, ngiano hon in a suksiat ma-in man ni,” hong ci hi.
Ka ngaihno in keima aa hi; kei in ama aa hi’ng. Amah in unok paakte lakah a tuu cing a,
nitak huih vot mateng, nitak nitum mateng a cing hi. Sanang bangin, mual tunga sakhitalno bangin, it luat aw, hong paikik in.
Zan sialin, ka lup kawmin, ka ngaihno ka lungngaingai a, amah ka zon’zon’ hangin ka mu zo kei hi.
Tho-in khua sung tengah ka vak a, kongzing kong kawm tengah ka pai a, ka ngaihno ka zong a, ka zon’zon’ hangin ka mu zo kei hi.
Khuasung cing a, pai kawikawite ka tuak a, “Ka ngaihno na mu uh hiam?” ci- in ka dong hi.
Khua sung cingte tawh ka kikhen khit phetin, ka ngaihno tawh ka kimu hi. Amah kawi-in ka lencip a, ka pian’na ka nu’ inndei sung, ka nu’ inn dong ka tun’pih mateng ka khah kei hi.
Jerusalem nungakte aw, ko’ kingaihna nong suknawi loh nadingun, sakhi leh sanang tawh kei tungah hong kiciam un.
Mirrah paknamtui leh saledi paknamtui kihel tawh a kibang, sumbuk-a paknamtui om khempeuh, a kihal khin a khu tawh a kibang, gamlak a, hong khu to henhan bang ahi hiam?
En un, Solomon, kumpi luai-in hong kizawng hi! Israel gam sunga om galkap hoihpen, galkap sawmguk in amah cing hi.
A vekpi-in namsau zat a siam vive hi a, galdo a siam vive hi khin uh hi. A vekpi-in namsau kuah kim uh a, mi’ hih khak ding cing uh hi.
Sing hoihpen tawh a kibawl luai-in, Kumpi Solomon hong kizawng hi.
A luai khuamte, ngun tawh kizut a, a tungah, kham tawh kizem puan kilam hi. A tut nading puansan kibawl a, a sungah savun kidap hi.
Jerusalem nungakte aw, hong pai un la, Kumpi Solomon en dih ve un. A zi neih ni, a lungdam ni, a nu in amah a khuksak Kumpi lukhu hong khu hi.
It luat aw, na ngaih baang a, na lu khuhna puan vang panin, a ngaih baang na mit hong tee kelkel hi. Gilead mual tunga keelhon diang leklek bangin, na samphekte phe velvel hi.
Na hapaak singsengte zong, a mul a kimet khin phet, a kisawpsiang tuute tawh kibang hi. Na ha khat zong tok lo a, a vekpi-in kituak dimdiam hi.
Na mukte in puansan tawh kibang a, na kampau, ngaihngaih nop huai hi. Na lu khuhna puan sung panin, na kho, hong san lehleh hi.
Na ngawng in a tungah galhangte’ zat lum tangzang tulkhat a kikhai zeizaina, David’ tausang tawh kibang hi.
Na nawite in, unok pak lakah a takhawm helhel sanang nih tawh ahi a, a takhawm hialhial sakhi peeng tawh ahi zongin kibang hi.
Zingsang huih vot a nun’ mateng zingsang khuavak hong tun’ mateng, mirrah paknamtui mual tungah om suakin, saledi paknamtui lakah ka bual ding hi.
Ngaihno aw, na ngaih baang mahmah a, kawk baan’ nading na nei kei hi.

Ka lawm ngaih aw, Lebanon Mual panin hong pai in la, Lebanon Mual panin kei hong zui in. Humpinelkaite leh kamkeite a ten’na, Amana Mual dawn panin hong taisuk in la, Senir Mual leh Hermon Mual panin hong paisuk in.
It luat, ka lawm ngaih aw, na mit hah in ka lung kuai a, na khi-awh in ka lungsim hong zo hi.
It luat, ka lawm ngaih aw, nang tawh kingaih, nuam mahmah hi. Na itna in leenggahzu sangin khumzaw a, na paknamtui in paknamtui dang khempeuh sangin namtuizaw hi.
Lawm aw, na muk, khuaizu bangin khum a, na leii in bawngnawi leh khuaizu ahi hi. Na puante in, Lebanon Mual tunga paknamtui namkim a nam hi.
Ka lawmnu, ka naunu, a ki-umcip huan hi a, a kinei tuam tuinak ahi hi.
Tua huan sungah singkungte hoih takin khang a, mangkawlsing cin’na huan tawh kibang hi. Singgah limcipente tua lai-ah gah a, henna leh nard sing namtuite a po hi.
Nard sing leh saffron sing, thalsing leh kinnamon kung, a namtui a gah namkim kung po a, mirrah leh aloses, a namkim om hi.
Lebanon Mual tung panin lui hong luangsuk a, ciktui luangte, luitui luangte, tua huan sungah tungsuk hi. Nungak:
Saklam huih aw, hong nungsuk in la, khanglam huih aw, hong nungto in. Ka huan sung teng hong namtui sak un. Ka ngaihno, ka huan ah hong paisak un la, a gah limcipente hong ne sak un.

It luat, ka lawmnu aw, ka huan sung hong tung zo ing, Ka paknamtuite ka kaikhawm hi. Ka khuaizu leh ka khuailuzu ka ne a, ka leenggahzu leh ka bawngnawite ka dawn hi. Nungak dangte: Nungak leh tangval aw, na lungkim piikpeek dongun, ne-in dawnin nuam sa un. Kikhen Man-a Lunggimna Nungak:

Ka lup hangin ka lungsim ihmu lo a, ka ngaihno in ka kong hong kiuh ka za hi. Tangval: It luat, ngaihno, ka lungtup aw, kei hong tumsak in. Ka lu tungah daingo kia a, meiilum in ka sam kawtsak hi. Nungak:
Ka puan teng suah khin zo ing, ka puante silh kik ding ka hi hiam? ninsak ding ka hi hiam?
Ka ngaihno in kongkhak hong len khin napi, hong taisan kik hi.
Ka ngaihno, tumsak dingin ka kithawi a, ka khutte mirrah paknamtui tawh ka zut a, ka khutmete, mirrah paknamtui tui ka nuh a, kong hong dingin a hon’na ka len hi.
Ka ngaihno, lutsak dingin kong ka hon’ a, amah na taikhia khin ta hi. Amah a taikhiat manin ka dah lua a, amah ka zon’ hangin ka mu kei a, amah ka sap hangin hong dawng lo hi.
Khuasung a cing mite tawh ka kituak a, kei hong satin hong liamsak a, kulhzang-a a kileh den khuacingte in ka puantungsilh hawkkhia uh hi.
Kong thuum hi, Jerusalem nungakte aw, ka ngaihno na muh uh leh, lungzuangin ka sih dekna, na gensak un. Nungak in a Lawmpa Phat Nungak dangte:
Nungak lak-a a hoihpen aw, na ngaihno a bangci hiam, hong gen dih in. Tua banga kong gen liang ding uh, bangzahta-in lamdang ahi hiam? Nungak:
Ka ngaihno, a mel hoih a, a tha hat hi; mi tulsawm lakah tehpih ding dang om lo hi.
A sam sau-in kil thiuhtheuh a, a sam hoih-in vom dikdek a, kham sangin zong manphazaw hi.
A mittangte ahih leh, tuisiang phuan lakah a kisilsiang, luitui luang gei-a a om, vahuite tawh kibang hi.
A biangte pen paknamtui a dim-a kithun, thawlsan kiuhkeuh tawh kibang hi, A mukte pen, mirrah paknamtui tawh a kidim, unok paak tawh kibang hi.
A khutte etlawmin hi linlian a, suangmanpha a kiphut zungbuhte a bulh hi. A pumpi in, suangmanpha a kiphut dimdiam, saiha pak tawh kibang hi.
A khete in, kham citak a kiphuh dimdiamna, suangngo khuamte tawh kibang a, ama duang in Lebanon mual sang, taamtaak kung hoih bangin thupi suah hi.
A kampaute, khum zungzung a, a vekpi-in, deih loh ding, khat zong om lo hi. Ka ngaihno, hih bang teng hi. Jerusalem nungakte aw.
Nungak lak-a hoihpen nu aw, na ngaihno, koi-ah pai hiam? Na ngaihno, koi lam pai hiam? Amah hong zon’ pih nu’ng. Nungak:
Ka ngaihno, paaknamtui kung a pona, a huan sungah pai hi. A huan sungah a tuu cing a, unok paakte a lo hi.
Ka ngaihno, kei aa hi a, kei in ama aa hi’ng. Amah in unok pak lakah a tuute gamtasak hi. Tangval in A Lawmnu Phat Tangval:
Ngaihno aw, Jerusalem khuapi bangin na etlawm a, Tirzah khuapi bangin na hoih a, vantung aksi bangin na deihhuai hi.
Keima lam hong nga kei in. Na mai in hong lenglua hi. Gilead mual tunga keelhon diang leklek bangin na samphekte phe velvel hi.
Na hate zong, a kisil khin phet tuuhon bangin, pak singseng hi. A tok khat zong om lo a, a vekpi-in kituak dimdiam hi.
Na lu khuhna puan sung panin, na kho hong san lihleh hi.
Kumpi-zi sawmguk, kumpi zineu sawmgiat, sim zawh lohin nungak om kha mah ding a,

ahi zongin khat bek ka ngai a, amah in vahui bangin it-huai hi. Amah in a nu’ tanu neihsun hi a, a nu’ ta itpen khat ahi hi. Minam numeite in amah mu-in thupha pia-in, kumpi’ zineute in amah phat uh hi.
Zingsang khuavak tawh a kibang, hih nungak, kua ahi hiam? Amah a mel hoih mahmah a, nitaang khataang, a bang hi.
Kuam sunga singkungnote a en ding, leenggui a pak nai hiam cih a en ding, mangkawlsing a pak nai hiam, cih a en dingin, singno huan ah ka paisuk hi.
Galdo ding a, kithawi sakol hawlpa a liin’ bangin, nang kong ngaihna hangin ka liingliing hi. Nungak dangte:

Hong ciahkik in, hong ciahkik in, Shulam numei aw, nang kong muh theih nadingun, hong ciahkik in, hong ciahkik in. Tangval: Shulam nungak, khanglui lai lam-a a laamte bangin, bang hangin mu nuam na hi uh hiam?
Kumpi meel pua, a ngaih baang nungak aw, na khete leh na khedap kilawm mahmah! Na phei leh na tanzumte, sing suih siamte’ suih bang hiuhiau hi.
Na kalkawm in, leenggahzu lim tawh a kilawi lo, hai bangin uk kiukeu hi. Na kawng in, unok paak tawh a ki-um, buhlom hen tawh kibang hi.
Na nawite in, a takhawm helhel sakhi peeng, a omkhawm hialhial sanang nih tawh kibang hi.
Na ngawng in, saiha tausang tawh kibang hi. Na mitte in, Heshbon khuapi kulh gei-a om, tuilite tawh kibang hi. Na nak in Damaskas khuapi lam a nga, Lebanon tausang bangin hoih hiuhiau hi.
Na lutang in, Karmel Mual bangin kitawito a, na samphekte san hiuhiau a, a etlawmna in kumpipa’ mit la vangvang hi. Nungak leh Tangval A Kideih Tuakna
It luat aw, na ngaih baang a, na meel muh, nuam zungzung hi.
Tumkung bangin na etlawm a, na nawite in, nisuh gah bawk pha tawh kibang hi.
Tumkung tungah kahto-in, a gah ka lo ding hi. Na nawite in, kei adingin leenggah bawk tawh kibang a, na gimnam in apple min bangin namtui hi.
Na kam in, leenggahzu bangin khum zungzung hi. Nungak: Ka ngaihno tungah leenggahzu khum luang hen la, a muk a ha tawk kim hen.
Ka ngaihno’ aa ka hi a, amah in kei hong deih hi.
Ngaihno aw, gam lakah paikhia-in, leenggui lo-ah va giak ni.
Zingsangin tho baihin, leengguite a sel nai hiam, leengguite a pak nai hiam, mangkawlsing kungte a pak nai hiam, i en ding hi. Tua lai munah kong itna letsong ka hong pia ding hi.
Tua lai-ah zawl-ai kung namtui gim na za ding a, singgah lim namcin i kong gei-ah om hi, Ngaihno aw, a gah alui leh athak, nang adingin na duhduh kong koihsak hi.
Ka nu sung pana piang ka sanggampa hi lecin, kei ka ut hi. Tua hi leh, lam kal-ah hong tuak taleng zong, kong tawptawp ding a, kuamah in phamawh sa lo ding hi.
Keimah pian’na, ka nu inndei sungah, nang kong paipih ding a, tua lai-ah kei nong kawi ding hi. Tua lai-ah leenggahzu lim, mangkawlsing tui, kong tulh ding hi.
A veilam khut hong khamsak a, a taklam khut-in kei hong kawi hi.
Jerusalem nungakte aw, ko’ kingaihna nong suknawi loh nadingun, kei tungah hong kiciam un. Itna in Sihna Zahin Khauh Nungak dangte:
Gamlak panin a lawmpa tawh khut kilensa-in, a hong paikhia kua ahi hiam? Nungak: Nangmah na pian’na mun, na nu in nang hong neihna mun, apple kung nuai panin nang kong phong hi.

Kei sim loh, kuamah ngai kei in la, kei sim loh, kuamah na ang-ah kawi kei in. Itna in sihna zahin thahat a, ngaihna in sihna zahin khauh hi. Itna in mei bangin kuangkhia a, meikuang lianpen a suak hi.
Tui tampi tawh kisumit zo lo a, tui sungah i phumcip hangin mit zo lo hi. Mi khat in a neihsa sum khempeuh tawh, itna lei dingin hong kithawi leh, kinuihsan lel ding hi. Nungak dangte:
Sanggam numeino khat ka nei uh a, ama nawite neu mahmah hi. Tangval khat in hong hel zenzen leh, ka sanggamnu uh bangci huh ding ka hi uh hiam?
Amah khua umna kulh hi leh, ngun kibawl tausang tawh ka hu ding uh a, amah kulh kongpi hi leh, taamtaak sing peekte tawh ka dal ding uh hi. Nungak:
Keimah in khua kulh ka hi a, ka nawite in a tausang ahi hi. Lim takin kei hong kihutna, ka ngaihno in thei ding hi. Tangval:
Baalhamon a kici munah Solomon in leenggui lo khat a nei hi. Amah in tua lo a en dingin lo khote sawl a, lo-a piangte’ man dingin lo khote khat in ngun dangka tulkhat ciat a piak ding uh ahi hi.
Keimah in keima aituam leenggui lo khat ka nei hi. Solomon aw, na ngun dangka tulkhat la in la, lo khote tungah amau’ tanh ding za nih pia in.
Huan sunga om ka ngaihno aw, ka lawmte in hong ngai dide ahih manin, nangma aw zong, hong zasak dih in. Nungak:
Ka ngaihno aw, sanang bangin, paknamtui kung a pona mun, mual tunga om sakhitalno bangin, kei kiangah hong pai in.
Judah gam kumpite ahi Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz leh Hezekiahte’ hun lai in, Amoz’ tapa Isaiah in Judah gam leh Jerusalem khua tawh kisai a muh mangmuhnate in:
Vantungte aw, za un, leitung aw, ngai un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in thu hong gen khin zo hi: “Ka pattahsa tapate in kei hong lehdo uh hi.
Bawng in amah a neipa thei a, la in ama topa’ an piakna mun thei buang hi; ahih hangin Israel in thei lo hi, keima mite in thei-thei lo hi,”

Ah, a khial minam, mawhna tawh a gik mite, siatna a bawlte’ suan leh khakte, a gamtatsia tapate! Amaute in Topa nusia khin uh a, amaute in Israelte’ Siangtho Pa simmawh khin uh hi; amaute in amah nungngat uh hi.
Bang hangin note hong kisat beh lailai nadingin lehdo teitei na hi uh hiam? Israel aw, na lutang khempeuh liamma dim a, na lungsim leh na ngaihsutna gim mahmah hi.
Khe nuai-a kipan lutang dong nangawnin a cidamna om lo a, satnim gawpnate leh meimapite leh si luang liammate om hi; tuate pen a nai kisaal lo, kitun lo, sathau tawh kinomsak lo hi.
Na gam uh khing a, na khuapite uh mei tawh kihal hi; na muh tangpi mahun gamdang mite in na gam uh hong laksak a, theih ngei lohte’ lotthal bangin na khempeuh susia gawp uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi bek om lai a, leenggui lo-a buk, tangmai lo sunga hampheng bangin kuama’ hut lohin kinusia a, a ki-umcih khuapi tawh kibangin kinusia hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in eite tawmno khat a nungta-in hong siit hi kei leh, eite pen Sodom khua bang khinin, Gomorrah khua bang i suak khin ta ding hi.
Sodom a uk mangte aw, Topa’ thu za un! No Gomorrah mite aw, i Pasian’ hilhna ngai un!

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Note’ biak piakna a tampite pen kei’ tungah bang hi leltak ahi hiam? Tuutalte leh ganhing thaute’ sathau tawh meihal biaknate ka kham ta hi; bawng talte, tuunote, keltalte’ sisan-ah kei ka lungkim kei hi.
“Kei’ mai-ah kilaak ding a, nong pai uh ciangin hih banga ka huang sung na tuatcil gawpna uh kua in hong deih ahi hiam?
Bangmah-a kimang lo piaknate hong paipih nawn kei un; paknamtui halna ka kih hi. Khadet ni, sabbath ni leh thupi tak-a na kikhopnate uh mawhna tawh kidim ahih manin ke’n ka thuak zo kei hi.
Note’ khadet nite leh na pawite uh ka mudah hi; tuate pen kei’ adingin van gikpi khat suak khin a, tuate ka puakna-in ka gim hi.

Thu ngenin na khutte uh nong zaak uh ciangin note kiang pan ka mai ka seel ding a, thu tampi na nget uh hangin, ke’n ka ngai tuan kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh note’ khut in sisan tawh kidim hi.
Note kisil tawm un la, a siangtho-in kibawl un; keima muhna-ah na gamtat siatnate uh paikhia un; siatna na bawlte uh khawl un la,
gamtat hoih ding kisin un; thumanin gamta un la, nenniamna kheel un; pa nei lote huu un la, meigong numei pan’pih un.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Tu-in hong pai un la, thu kikum khawm ni; na mawhnate uh puansan a bat hangin vuuk bangin hong ngo ding hi; na mawhnate uh si bangin a san hangin tuumul bangin hong kaang ding hi.
Note in utna lungsim nei-in thu na man’ nak uh leh lei pan-a piang a gah hoihte na ne ding uh hi;
Ahih hangin note in kei hong nialin nong lehdo uh leh namsau in note hong vatmai ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih thu gen khin zo hi.”
A thutak khuapi, thutang tawh a kidim ngeisa, bang ci-a a paktat numei tawh kibang ta ahi hiam! Ama sungah thumanna om ngei a, ahih hangin tu-in mi thatte bek a om hi.
Jerusalem khuapi aw, nguntang na bang ngei a, tu-in ngun-ek na suak hi. Leenggahzu limci na bang ngei a, tu-in tui mawkmawk na bang ta hi.
Na uliante, mi lehdote hi a, gutate tawh a kikhawlte ahi hi. Mi khempeuh in sumgolh leh letsong deih uh hi. Amaute in pa nei lote pan’pih lo uh a, meigongnu’ thu amaute in sang lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, Topa, Vanglianpen Topa, Israelte’ Vanglian Pa in hih bangin ci hi: “Ah, ka lang ahi note tungah ka hehna kong khahkhia ding a, ka gal ahi note tungah keimah in kong thuk ding hi.
Note kong langpan ding a, meikhuk-a haltui bangin na saam-ek teng uh tuikhia sakin, na kihelpih na nin khempeuh uh ka lakhia ding hi.
A masa-a bangin na thukhente, a kipat cil-a bangin na upate ka koih kik ding hi. Tua khit ciangin nang pen, thuman khuapi, thutak khuapi, hong kici ding hi.”
Topa thutang ahih manin Jerusalem khuapi honkhia ding a, a sunga teeng a kisik mi khempeuh zong dikna tawh honkhia ding hi.
Ahih hangin a lehdo mite leh a khial mite pen kisusia khawmin Topa a nusiate pen kibeimangsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tawsaw kungte na biakna hangun note na maizum ding uh a, biakna huan na bawlna hangun zahhuai-in na mai uh san ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note pen, a teh a vul tawsaw kung leh tui a ngah lo huan tawh na kibang ding uh hi.
A thahat mipa pen patlom tawh kibang ding a, ama nasepna pen mei-ek suak ding hi; kuamah in phelh zo loin amaute gel kangtum khawm ding uh hi.
Judah gam leh Jerusalem khua tawh kisai Amoz’ tapa Isaiah muhna thu in:
Nidang ciangin Topa’ inn omna mual pen, mual liante lakah a sang penin kikipsak ding a, mual neute tungah kisangsak ding hi; tua-ah minamte khempeuh pai muamua ding uh a,

mi tampite hong pai-in: “Hong pai un, amah in ama zia-le-tongte eite hong hilh theih nading leh ama lampite i zuih theih nadingin Jakob’ Pasian’ inn, Topa’ mual-ah paito ni,” a ci ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Zion panin thu hong gen ding a, Jerusalem khua panin Topa’ thuhilhna hong paikhia ding hi.

Amah in minamte khat leh khat kikal ah thukhenin, mi tampite’ thu khentat sak ding hi; amaute in a namsaute uh lo khawh na tu, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in seek ding uh hi; Minam khat leh minam khat kido nawn lo ding a, galdo dingin kithawi nawn lo ding uh hi.
Jakob’ suan leh khakte aw, hong pai un, Topa’ khuavak sungah gamta ni.
Amaute pen nisuahna lam gam khongkhaite leh Filistia mite bangin aisante tawh kidim uh a, gamdang mite’ ngeina zui uh ahih manin, Jakob suan leh khakte, na mite nang na nial hi.
Amau gam in ngun leh kham tawh kidim a, amau sumte in bei hun cih nei lo hi; amau gam in sakolte tawh kidim a, amau leengte in bei hun cih nei lo hi.
Amau gam in milimte tawh kidim hi; amau’ khut tawh a bawlsate, a khutmete tawh a bawlsate amaute in bia uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite kiniamkhiat sukin, mite a niamin kikoih suk hi. Amaute’ mawhna maisak kei in:
Topa kihtakna leh a lian ama minthan’na panin suanghawm sungah lut in la, leivui sungah bu in.
Mite’ kiliatsakna pen kiniam koih ding a, mihingte’ kiphatsakna pen kiniam khiat ding hi; tua ni ciangin Topa bek a lianin kikoih ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglianpen Topa in a sehsa ni nei hi, a kiphasak leh a kiliansak khempeuh, a kisangsak leh a sangte khempeuh niamkhiat suk ding hi;
a sang, a kilamto, Lebanon mual taamtaak singkungte khempeuh; Bashan mual tawsaw kungte khempeuh;
alian mual sangte khempeuh leh a sang mual neute khempeuh;
tausang khempeuh leh a muanhuai kulhte khempeuh;
Tarshish teembaw khempeuh leh teembaw hoih khempeuh, a niam koih ding ni khat a nei hi.
Mite’ kiliatsakna kiniamkhiat ding a, mite’ kiphatsakna a niamin kikoih suk ding hi; tua ni ciangin Topa bek a lianin kikoih ding hi.
Milimte mangthang khin ding hi.
Leitung liingsak gawp dingin Topa a thawh ciangin, amah kihtakna leh alian ama minthan’na panin, suanghawm sung leh leihawm sungah mite bu ding uh hi.

20-21 Amah pen leitung liingsak gawp dingin a thawh ni hun ciangin, Topa kihtakna leh alian ama minthan’na panin suang hawmpite sung leh keen hawmte sungah a buk theih nadingun, mite in biak ding a, amau bawl ngun milimte leh kham milimte pen buite leh bakte paih ding uh hi.
Ama’ nakvang sungah husan’na a om mipa muang kei in; Ama’ husanna pen banga sim tham ding ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh, en un, Topa, Vanglianpen Topa in Jerusalem khua leh Judah gam panin nuntakna leh lu hin’na, nuntakna an khempeuh leh nuntakna tui khempeuh;
mivanglianpa leh galkappa, thukhenpa leh kamsangpa, aisanpa leh upa-pa,
mi sawmnga a uk bupa leh zalian a neipa, thu lamlakpa leh khut siampa leh bum siamte lakhia hi.
Amaute’ ulian dingin naupangte ka bawl ding a, naungeekte in amau uk ding uh hi.
Mite khat leh khat, mi khempeuh in a lawmte ciat, mi khempeuh in a veengte ciat, kinencip gawp ding uh hi; khangnote pen uhamte tungah, migina lote pen miliante tungah kiphasak ding uh hi.
Mi khat in ama pa’ inn sungah a sanggampa lenin, “Nang in puan na nei hi; nang in kote’ makaipa nong hi ding a, hih a sia lomtangte pen nangma khut sung hi ding hi,” a cih ni ciangin,
amah in: “Kei in a damsakpa ka hi kei ding hi; ka inn sungah an leh puan om lo hi; mite a makai-in nong bawl kei ding hi,” ci-in genkhia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, amau kampaute leh amau gamtatnate in Topa langpangin, a minthang ama omna dem uh ahih manin, Jerusalem khua kipukin, Judah gam kia hi.

Amau’ maiput in amau langah teci pang hi; Sodom bangin amaute in a mawhna uh genkhia uh hi, amaute in iim lo uh hi. Amaute in gimna ngah ta hen! Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau tung mah ah siatna kitun’ uh hi.
Amaute tungah thu hoih ding hi, ci-in thuman mite kiangah gen un, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in amau gamtatna hoih a gah ne ding uh hi.
Mi gilo in gimna ngah ta hen! Ama khut in a hihsate ama tung mah ah kithukkik ding ahih manin ama tungah thu sia ding hi.
Keima mite ahih leh—khangnote in bawlsia uh a, numeite in zong uk uh hi. Ka mite aw, na makaite un note lam hong lak khial a, note’ lampi zuih pen hong siasak hi.
Topa in, thu pang dingin thukhenna munah ama panmun hong la a, ama mite thukhen dingin a ding hi.
Topa in, upate leh ama mite’ uliante tawh thukhen dingin kipan a; “Leenggui lo a ne tumte pen note na hi uh a, mizawngte’ na a kisutte note’ inn sungah om hi.
Ka mite sucip-in, mi zawngte na gawina uh, bang na cih nopna uh ahi hiam? Vanglianpen Topa Pasian in ci hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Jerusalem numeite kiphasakin ngawng doksa-in lam pai a, kiphatsakna tawh a mit uh hei pampam-in hi tuihtuihsa-in pai uh a, a khe uh tawh gingsak sualsual ahih uh ciangin;
Topa in Jerusalem numeite lutang meima sakin, Topa in amau’ lutang kolhsak ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Topa in, khebuh hoihte, lutuam leh khade lim tawh a kibang kizepnate;
bilbah tualte, taaute leh mai-sitnate;
lukhute, banbulhte, kawngtente, paknamtui bungte leh a kivom aite;
min gelhna zungbuhte leh nakbuhte;
pawi puante, puanza neute, puanpite leh khutkhai ipte;
puanza neu vang siseihte, saihadial puan sungsilhte, dialkhipte leh kikhuhna puante lakhia ding hi.
Paknamtui tangin uihna; kawnggak tangin khauhualpi; lim tak-a kizem sam tangin lu kolhna; puan hoih tangin puanhampi; mel hoihna tangin maizumna hun hong tung ding hi.
Na mite pen namsau tawh si ding uh a, a vanglian na mitepen gal sungah kisia ding uh hi.
Khuapi kongpi pen tau-in thuum ding hi; khuapi pen gamkhing suakin, a tangguak-a om nupi bangin lei lakah tucip ding hi.

Tua ni ciangin, nupi sagih in papi khat nei khawm ding uh a, “Kote in komau’ an ciat mah ne-in, komau’ puanciat mah ka silh ding uh hi, kote pen, nangma zi cih min bek hong pua sak in; ka minsiatna teng uh hong hum in,” ci ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin Topa’ bulsel pen mel hoihin minthang ding a, leitung pan-a a piang gahte pen, a suakta Israel mite’ kiphatsakna leh minthan’na hi ding hi.

Topa in thukhenna leh meihalna tawh Zion numei’ nitna teng siangsakin, Jerusalem khua sung panin mithahna teng a beisak ciangin, Zion-ah a om lai mi, Jerusalem ah a om lai mi khang tawntunga Jerusalem ah om dingin a kiciamtehsa mite khempeuh pen a siangtho kici ding hi.
Tua ciangin Zion Mual tung khempeuh leh ama kikhopnate tungah, sun-in meii sungah, zan-in meikuang khu tawh Topa in hong bawl ding a, Topa’ minthan’na tung khempeuh ah a kizal khat om ding hi.
Tua pen, sun ciangin nisa liah ding leh huihpi guahpi panin bukna leh belhna hi ding hi.
Ka lawm itpa’ tangin, a leenggui lo a itna la hong sa ning: Ka lawm itpa in, lei hoih mahmahna mual tung khatah leenggui lo khat a nei hi.

Amah in lei to-in suangte paikhia a, leenggui hoihte a suan hi; amah in a laizangah tausang khat lam a, tua sungah leenggah sukna khuk khat a to hi; amah in leenggah hoih hong gah ding lamen a, ahih hangin gam leenggah hong gah mawk hi.
Tu-in, Jerusalem khua-a teengte leh Judah mite aw, kei leh ka leenggui lo kikal-ah thu nong khen nading uh kong thuum hi.
Ka leenggui lo’ adingin ka hih nai loh ka hih ding a kilawm bang om lai ahi hiam? Leenggah hoih gah ding ka lamet lai takin bang hangin gam leenggah hong gah mawk ahi hiam?
Tu-in, ka leenggui lo tungah ka hih ding note tungah kong gen ding hi. A daai ka lakhia ding a, kinemang ding hi; a gawl ka susia ding a, kituancil ding hi.
Lo khul-in ka bawl ding hi; kipuah loin, kikho lo ding a, lingkung leh lingte khang ding hi; ama tungah meiite in zong guah a zuksak loh nadingin thu ka pia ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglianpen Topa’ leenggui lo pen Israel mite hi a, Judah mite pen lungdamna tawh a suan kungte ahi hi; amah in thutan’na lamen a, ahih hangin sisan luan’na om hi; thumanna lamen a, ahih hangin kahna om hi:
Leitang tungah amau guak a teeng zah dongin midang’ adingin mun khempeuh a bei matengin inn khat leh khat, lo khat leh khat, gawmin a la thuah tawntung mite in gimna ngah ta hen.
Vanglianpen Topa in ka zakna-ah hih bangin kiciam hi: “Aman takin, inn tampi tak hawmsuak ding a, a lian a hoih innte ah a teeng om lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh leenggah lo eeka sawm in phelpi khat dim bek gah ding a, khaici beem khat in an seu khat bek piangsak ding hi.”
Zingsang tungin tho-in, kham theih zu delhin, leenggah zu in amaute a satsak pialpual matengin nitakin a tut kho mite in gimna ngah ta hen!
Amaute in a pawi sung uhah laiza la sakna leh harp la sakna, khuang, tamngai leh leenggahzu tampi nei uh hi; ahih hangin amaute in Topa’ sepnate don lo uh a, a khut tawh a bawlte zong mu lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin thu theihlohna hangin ka mite sal suak uh hi; amau’ mi liante gilkialin si dek uh a, a mihonte uh dangtakin keu uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Leinuai in a duhna khangsakin, bangmah tawh kiteh theih lo zahin a kam ka beba a, Jerusalem’ hoihna leh a mipite, a mihonte leh ama sunga lungdam mite a nawmvalh hi.
Mite a niamin kikoih suak a, mite kiniamkhiat suk hi, a kiphasakte kiniamkhiat suk hi.
Ahih hangin thutang sepna tawh Vanglianpen Topa in a liatna hong kilangsak a, a Siangtho Pasian in a mite a thukhenna tawh ama siangthona hong kilangsak hi.
Tua ciangin tuunote in amau’ tatna gamlak mun bangin lopa ne ding uh a, a thau ganhingte leh keelnote in a siasa khuapi sungah gamta ding uh hi.

Amaute in, “I muh theih nadingin amah manlang sakin, ama nasep kinawh sak ni; Israelte’ Siangtho Pa’ deihna i theihtheih nadingin nai sakin, tung sak ni!” ci-in ganhing kaih bangin khauzen tawh mawhna kai-in, khauhualpi tawh khialhna kai uh ahih manin gimna ngah ta uh hen.
A phate sia ci-in, a siate pha ci a, khuavak dingin khuamial koihin, khuamial dingin khuavak koih a, a khum dingin a kha koihin, a kha dingin a khum a koihte in gimna ngah ta hen!
Amau’ mit-ah pil kisa a, amau’ muhna-ah siam a kisate in gimna ngah ta hen!
Leenggahzu tampi a dawnte, kham theih zu nek a hatte,
mimawhte sumgolh tawh khah a, midikte a mawhsakte in gimna ngah ta hen!

Tua ahih ciangin, mei in buhkung keute kangtum a, meikuang sungah lopa keute a kattum bangin, amaute’ zung pen muatna hi ding a, amaute’ pak palhte pen leivui bangin van-ah leengto ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglianpen Topa’ thu nialin, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa’ thu simmawh uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, Topa’ hehna ama mite’ tungah hong khangin, a khut zanin amaute vat gawp a, mualte liing hi; amaute’ luang hawmte pen kongzing lampite ah nin bangin om hi. Hih bang teng hangin zong a hehna dam nai lo a, ama khut kizan lai hi.
Amah in, gamlapi-a om minam khat a sapna-in lim khat lak a, lei mong panin hong pai nadingin a sam hi; manlang takin hong paipah hi.
Tua a hong pai mite kuamah gim lo uh hi, kuamah tuk lo uh hi, kuamah lusu lo, ihmu lo uh hi, dialkaih khat zong kol lo hi, khedap khau khat zong tat lo hi;
amau’ thaltangte hiam a, a thal khempeuh uh a kikeeksa ahi hi, amau sakolte’ khecinte pen meisuang bangin sak a, a leengpeite uh pingpei bangin manlang hi.
Amaute’ kikona pen humpinelkai hawk tawh kibang a, humpinelkai khanglaite bangin amaute hawk uh hi; amaute humhamin a sa nek ding uh man uh a, amaute in puakhia-in kuamah in honkhia zo lo hi.
Tua ni ciangin amaute in tuipi ging bangin Israel tungah ngik ding uh hi. Mi khatpeuh in leitang en leh, khuamialna leh lungzin’na bek om hi; meiite in khua mialsak hi.
Uzziah Kumpipa a sih kumin, a sang mahmah, a lian kumpi tokhom tungah Topa a tu ka mu hi; ama kumpi puanpi pen biakinn sung teng dim hi.
Ama tungah serafim vanmite ding uh hi; tuate in kha guk ciat nei uh hi; nih tawh ama mai liah-in nih tawh ama khe tuamin, nih tawh leeng uh hi.
Amaute khat leh khat kisamin: “Vanglianpen Topa, siangtho, siangtho, siangtho hi; leitung khempeuh ama minthan’na tawh kidim hi,” ci-in awng uh hi.
Tua kikona aw tawh biakinn kongkhak khuam bulpite kiling a, inn sung teng meikhu tawh kidim hi.

Tua ciangin keimah in, “Gim ngahpa hi ta ing! Bang hang hiam cih leh a mawknapi ka hi hi; ka kam-a ka thugen khempeuh mawhna vive hi a, a thugen khempeuh uh mawhna leh nitna ahi mite’ lakah ka teeng kha hi. Vanglianpen Topa, Kumpipa ka mu kha khin ta hi,” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin serafim vanmite khat, biakna tau panin taiteh tawh a teh mei-am khat a khutah tawi-in, keima kiangah hong leeng hi.
Amah in ka kam hong bi a, “En in, hih in na muk su-kha zo hi; na mawhna beita a, na khialhna kimaisak zo hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin, “Kua sawl ding a, eite’ adingin kua va pai ding ahi hiam?” Topa’ cihna aw ka za hi. Tua ciangin ke’n, “Hi lai-ah kei om ing! Kei hong sawl in,” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Pai in la, hih mite tungah hih bangin ci in: ‘Za za napi, tel lo; mu mu napi, thei lo,

amaute in a mit uh tawh a muh loh nading, a bil uh tawh a zak loh nading, a lungsim uh tawh thu a theihtel loh nading, amaute kihei-in damna a ngah lohna dingun hih mite lungsim mawl sak in la, amau bil uh ngong sak in la, a mit uh va si sak in,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin keimah in “Topa aw, bang tanvei sawt ding ahi hiam?” ka ci hi. Amah in, khuapite-ah a teeng kuamah om loin hawm suakin, innte ah kuamah om loin kinusia a, leitang pen gamkhing suak kiuhkeuhin,
Topa in gamlapi-ah mite khinkhia-in, leitungah a kinusia mun tampi a om dong, tua tan hong sawt ding hi, hong ci hi.

Mi, seh sawmsuah seh khat bang a om lai hangin, taak kung leh tawsaw kungte a kiphuk khit ciangin a bulsum om laite mei tawh a kihal kik bangin amaute zong kisusia ding hi. A siangtho khaici pen, tua a bulsum ahi hi, ci hi.

Uzziah’ tapa Jotham, Jotham’ tapa Ahaz ahi Judah kumpipa’ hun lai takin, Siria kumpipa Rezin leh Remaliah’ tapa Pekah ahi Israel kumpipa in Jerusalem khuapi sim dingin kuanto uh a, ahih hangin amaute in zo zo lo uh hi.
“Siriate pen Efraim mite tawh kikop,” ci-a David’ innkuante’ tungah a kigen ciangin, huih in gamlak-a singte a mut bangin amah leh a mihingte’ lungsim kiliing hi.
Topa in Isaiah’ tungah, “Ahaz tawh kimu dingin Puansawppa’ nasepna phual zuatna-a lampi kianga a om, bual tungnung tui lakna mongah nang leh na tapa Shearjashub pai un la,
ama tungah, ‘Kidawm in la, om khinkhian in; lau kei in, Siria gam kumpipa Rezin leh Remaliah’ tapa’ hehna pen, sing tumbang nih a khute tawh kibang lel ahih manin kilunggim sak kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Siria kumpi-a kipan Remaliah’ tapa leh Efraim mite in nang hong sawm uh a,
“Judah gam do dingin pai-in va sugawp ni, eima adingin va zo ni, tua gamah kumpi dingin Tabe-el’ tapa va koih ni,” ci uh hi,
Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Tua thu pen kip lo ding a, hong tangtung lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Siria’ lutang pen Damaskas khuapi hi a, Damaskas’ lutang in Rezin ahi hi. (Kum sawmguk leh kumnga sungin minam a hi zo nawn lo zah dongin Efraim kitamzan gawp ding hi.)
Efraim’ lutang in Samaria hi a, Samaria’ lutang in Remaliat’ tapa ahi hi. Hih thu upna kho na neih kei leh, nang na kip kei ding hi,’ va ci in,” ci-in a gen hi.
Topa in Ahaz kiangah thu genkik a,
“Topa, na Pasian’ kiang panin lim khat ngen in la, a thuk Leinuai panin ahi zongin, a sang vantung panin ahi zongin ngen in,” ci hi.
Ahih hangin Ahaz in, “Ka ngen kei ding hi, Topa ka ze-et kei ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in, “David innkuan aw, ngai un! Mite na lunggim sakna uh thu neu sa a, ka Pasian zong lunggim sak na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin Topa mahmah in note’ tungah lim khat hong pia ding hi. En un, nungak khat gai-in tapa khat nei ding a, ama min Immanuel kici ding hi.
Amah in a hoih lote nial-in a hoihte a teel theih hun ciangin bawngnawi thau khal leh khuaizu ne ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh naupang in a hoih lote nial-in a hoihte a teel theih hun ma-in na kihtak uh kumpi nihte’ gam kinusiacip ding hi.
Efraim mite pen Judah mite kiang pan a, a paikhiat-a kipan nidanga piang ngei lo thu ahi, Assiria kumpipa nang leh na mite leh na pate’ innah Topa in hong tungsak ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ni ciangin Izipt luite’ nak-a a om Izipt mite, thopi hon bangin hong pai nading leh Assiria mite, a gam panun khuaipi hon bangin hong pai nadingun Topa in sam ding hi.
Tuate khempeuh hong pai-in, keenhawmte sung leh suangpi heengte sung leh lingkung kawmte leh ganhing tatna mun khempeuh ah dim ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin Topa in Gun gal khat pan a, a kikawm temta ahi Assiria kumpipa zangin a sam leh a khemul mettol ding a, a khamul zong metkhia ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin mi khat in bawngla khat leh keel nih bang bek suahtak zo ding a,
ahi zongin tuate in nawi tampi a piakna hangin amah in bawngnawi thaukhal ne zo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gam sunga a om lai mi khempeuh in bawngnawi thaukhal leh khuaizu ne ding hi.
Tua ciangin ngun shekel tul khat a man leenggui tul khat a omna mun khempeuh pen lingkungte leh lingte suak ding hi.
Gam khempeuh lingkungte leh lingte tawh kidim ding ahih manin, thal leh thaltangte tawh tua munah mihingte gamvak ding uh hi;
lingkungte leh lingte na kihtakna hangin tu-peek tawh a kikho ngei mual neute-ah na pai ngam kei ding hi; tua munte pen bawng khahna leh tuute’ gamtatna mun suak ding hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Suangpeek lianpi khat la in la, tua tungah mihingte’ theihkim lai tawh, ‘Mahershalalhasbaz’ ci in gelh in,” hong ci hi.
Hih thu a thei dingin a muanhuai teci, siampi ahi Uriah leh Jeberekhiah’ tapa Zekhariah ka nei hi, hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangnu tawh ka lumkhawm a, amah gai-in tapa khat hong nei hi. Tua ciangin Topa in ka tungah, “Ama min pen Mahershalalhasbaz, ci-in phuak in:
bang hang hiam cih leh naungek in, Nu aw, pa aw, a cih a theih ma-in Damaskas khua’ hauhna leh Samaria khua sunga a kisut vante, Assiria kumpipa in la-in masuan ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong genkik a,
“Hih mite in, dam tak-a a luang didi Shiloah tuite nial uh a, Rezin leh Remaliah’ tapa’ mai-ah launa tawh liing liang uh ahih ciangin;
en in, Topa in Assiria kumpipa leh ama minthan’na khempeuh ahi, hat a, a tam mahmah Gun tuite, amaute’ lang khatah piangsak ding hi; tui in a batna ngei teng tum-in, a piau khempeuh dimlet hi;
Judah gam dong hong nawtsuk ding a, dimlet-in pai suaksuak-in, ngawng ciang dong tum ding hi,” hong ci hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in eite hong ompih a, a kizal ama khate in i gam hong hu ding hi.

No minam dangte aw, galsim dingin awng un, thei un la, kitamzan un; gamlapi-a om gamte khempeuh aw, ngai un; kigalging un, ahih hangin lungkiatna na thuak veve ding uh hi; kigalging un, ahih hangin lungkiatna na thuak veve ding uh hi.
Thu na vaihawm khawm uh hangin a mawkna suak ding hi; thu khat peuhpeuh na gen uh hangin kip lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kote tawh Pasian omkhawm hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama vangliatna tawh nakpi takin kei tungah thu hong gen a, hih mite’ lampi ka zuih loh nadingin hong hilhkhol a,
“Hih mite’ sawmsimna pawlpih kei un. Amaute’ kihtakte kihta kei un la, lau kei un.
Ahih hangin Vanglianpen Topa pen a siangtho-in na ngaihsun ding uh hi; amah note’ zahtak leh note’ launa na hi sak ding uh hi.

Amah pen, bukna hi ding a, a siangtho’ luatna hangin mite’ kitukna leh puk theihna suangtum tawh kibang hi. Judah leh Israel kumpigam mite leh Jerusalem khua-a teeng mite a awk nading thangzak tawh kibang ding hi.
Mi tampi tak tuk ding uh hi; amaute tukin kitamzan gawp ding uh hi; amaute awk-in kiman ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Ka nungzuite aw, Pasian in kei tungah hong piak hih teci thute, lim takin kemin koih cing un.
Jakob innkuante’ kiang panin a maitang a seel Topa ngakin amah ka muang ding hi.
En un, Topa in kei hong piak ka tate leh keima pumpi pen, Zion Mual tunga a teeng Vanglianpen Topa’ tung panin Israel mite sungah lim leh kihilna ka hi uh hi.

Amaute in note kiangah, “Phun suau-suau-in a pau mualmual vankah theite leh aisan theite kiangah thu dong un. Mite in amaute’ pasian thu dongin, mihingte’ thu pen misite dot ding mah hilo ahi hiam?” hong ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin note in, “Topa hong hilh thute leh teci panna thute ngai un. Aisante’ thu ngai kei un. Amaute in zing khuavak nei lo ahih manin hong gen thute a kiman’na om lo hi,” ci-in dawng un.
Mite pen gam sungah vak kawikawi-in, nakpi takin lungkhamin gilkial ding uh hi; amaute a gil uh a kial ciangin lungham gawp ding uh a, a kumpipa uh leh a Pasian uh hamsiat-in van dak ding uh hi;
amaute in lei lak a et suk hangun, lungkhamna leh khumialna, lungzing-a gimna bek om hi; khuamial ngeungau sungah amaute kihawlkhia ding hi.

Zebulun minamte leh Naftali minamte’ teen’na gamte in lungkham thuak ding uh a, mai lamah pahtawina ngah kik ding uh hi. Mediterranean tuipi akipanin nisuahna lam Jordan gun gal, minam dangte’ teenna Galile gamsung pen minthang kik ding hi.
Khuamial sunga a pai mite in khuavak lianpi mu khin ta hi; sihna lim thukna gam sunga a teeng mite tungah khuavak taang khin zo hi.
Nangmah in amaute na pung sak a, a lungdamna uh na khang sak hi; anlak hun ciang-a lungdamna leh mite in vankisutte a hawm ciangun a lungdam bangun, nangma mai-ah amaute lungdam uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Midian mite a kizawh ni-a bangin nangmah in gik a sak uh a hakkol uh, amau liangko tunga singzawl leh amaute a nengniamte in a satna ciangkhut na kuaihtan sak a, nangma mi a bawlsia minamte na zo gawp hi.
Gal kikapna sunga gal hangte’ khedap khempeuh leh si a baang puan khempeuh mei-in kicih ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh eite adingin naungek khat hong suak a, eite tungah tapa khat hong kipia hi; ama liangko tungah ukna om ding a, ama min pen, “Lamdang, Thulakpa, Vanglian Pasian, Tawntung Pa, Nopsakna Kumpi,” kici ding hi.

Tua huna kipanin a tawntungin David kumpi tokhom tungah maangin ama gam sungah thutan’na leh thumanna phutin a kipsak nadingin, alian semsem ama ukna leh nopsakna in mong nei lo ding hi. Vanglianpen Topa’ deih luatna in hih thu hong tungsak ding hi.
Topa in Jakob tungah thu khat khah a, Israel tungah hong tung ding hi;

9-10 “Leisekte kicim khin hi; ahih hangin suangseek tawh i lam ding hi; theithek singte kisia khin hi, ahih hangin taamtaak sing tawh i khek ding hi,” ci-a kiphasakin lungsim kihisak Efraim mite leh Samaria gam sunga teeng, mi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in, Rezen do dingin a langpang ding bawl a, amau’ galte hanthawn hi.
A mai-a om Siria mite leh a nunga om Filistia mite in kamka-in Israel netum uh hi. Hih thute khempeuh hangin ama hehna dam zo nai lo a, ama khut kilamto lai hi.
Amaute a satpa’ lamah mite kihei lo a, Vanglianpen Topa zong lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in Israel sung panin a makaite leh a mihonte, a lu panin a mei dongin, nisuh hiang leh pumpengte anihin ni khat thu-in vat mai hi.
Upate leh a zahtak huai mite pen a lutang hi a, zuauthu a hilh kamsangte pen a mei ahi hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh hih minam a makaihte in lam khialsak a, amaute’ makaite in lampialsak uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amau’ tangvalte tungah Topa lungdam lo a, pa nei lote leh a meigong numeite uh tungah hehpihna nei lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in Pasian’ thu khual loin siatna a bawl vive hi a, kam khempeuh in haina thu gen uh hi. Hih thute khempeuh hangin ama hehna dam zo nai lo a, ama khut kilamto lai hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh gitlohna pen mei bangin kuang a, lingkungte leh lingte kangtum sak hi; gamlak lopa phate kuang sak a, meikhu lomtangin van lamah kizialto uh hi.
Vanglianpen Topa’ hehna hangin meikuang bangin gamsung kang a, mite pen mei-a kicih sing tawh kibang uh hi; kuamah in a sanggampa zahtuan lo hi.
Amaute in taklam-a omte ne uh a, ahih hangin gilkial lai uh hi, amaute in veilam-a omte ne uh a, ahih hangin kham nai lo uh hi; mite in amau’ vengte’ sa ne ciat uh hi,
Manasseh in Efraim, Efraim in Manasseh ne-in tua tegel in Judah langpang khawm uh hi. Hih thute khempeuh hangin ama hehna dam zo nai lo a, ama khut kilamto lai hi.

1-2 A cimawh ka mite thutang heikhiat sakin, keima mite sungah a zawngte’ thuneihna sutkhia-in, meigong numeite’ neihsate amau’ aa suaksakin, pa nei lote’ neihsa a sut a man lo thukhensatna pia a, nenniamna thu lai-a, a gelhte in gimna ngah ta hen!
Dan piak ni hun, gamlapi panin siatna hong pai ciangin note in bang cih ding na hi uh hiam! Huhna ngenin kua kiangah tai ding a, na neihsa uh koi-ah koih ding na hi uh hiam?
Thongkiate’ lakah tonbucip-a om ding leh a kithat mite’ lakah tuk ding bek a om hi. Hih thute khempeuh hangin ama hehna dam zo nai lo a, ama khut kizan lai hi.
Assiria-te in gimna ngah hen, keima hehna molhtum leh ka lungdamna ciangkhut ahi uh hi.
Pasian thu a ngaihsun lo minam leh keimah hong hehsak mite’ neihsa sutin lak sakin, amaute pen konglak buannawng bangin a tuancil dingin amaute sawlin thu ka pia hi.
Ahih hangin amah in tua bang bek sawm lo a, a lungsim in zong tua bang bek ngaihsun lo hi; ama lungsim sungah minam tampi suksiat nopna thu om hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Ka galkap mangte pen kumpi vive hi khin hilo ahi hiam?
Kalno khuapi pen Karkhemish khuapi tawh kibang hilo ahi hiam? Hamath khuapi pen Arpad khuapi tawh kibang hilo ahi hiam? Samaria khuapi pen Damaskas khuapi tawh kibang hilo ahi hiam?
Jerusalem leh Samaria milimte sangin milim lianzaw a nei milim kumpi gamte ka khut in ban khin ahih ciangin,
Samaria leh a milimte tunga ka bawl bangin Jerusalem leh a milimte’ tungah bawl lo ding ka hi hiam?” ci hi.
Topa in Zion Mual leh Jerusalem khua-ah ama nasep ding teng a zawh khit ciangin, amah in Assiria kumpipa kihisakin a kisialhna leh a kiphatsakna daantat ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in: “Keimah in thu theihtelna nei ka hih manin keima thahatna leh keima pilna tawh ka hih khin hi; mihingte’ gamgite lakhia-in amau’ sumte ka sut khin hi; keimah in a vanglianpa bangin amau kumpite ka sugawp hi.
Vasa bu-mek bangin mihingte’ hauhna ka la ziau hi; a kinusia vasa tuite mite in a lak bangin leitung khempeuh ka la khin hi; a kha a zap, a kam a ka, a ham khat beek om lo hi,” ci hi.

Amah a liikto-pa pen molhtum-in a zang ding bang keek, sing a hilo mipa pen ciangkhut-in a liikto ding bang keek-in, hei in phuk nading a, amah a zangpa’ tungah kisial thei ding ahi hiam, sing-attem in amah a zangpa’ tungah kiliansak thei ding ahi hiam!
Tua ahih ciangin Topa, Vanglianpen Topa in ama mi thahat galkapte lakah natna lianpi tungsak ding a, tua natna in amaute sungah meikuang bangin kuang niloh ding hi.
Israel’ khuavak pen mei suakin, ama Siangtho Pa pen meikuang suak ding hi; ni khat sungin ama lingkungte leh lingte kang-in beitum ding hi.
Gah tampi a piangsak ama leitang leh ama gamlak a minthan’na pen nuntakna leh pumpi dong takin Topa in susia khawm ding a, mi cina khat a bei tawh kibang ding hi.
A om lai ama gamlak singkungte pen tawm mahmah a, naupang khat nangawn in khat khatin sim khin thei hi.
Tua ni-a kipan, Israel a om laite leh Jakob innkuan a suakta laite in amau a sugawppa suang nawn loin, Topa ahi, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa pen thuman tawh suan’ in, nei ding uh hi.
Jakob’ innkuan a om laite, a vanglian Pasian kiangah ciahkik ding hi.
Na mi Israelte pen tuipi sehnel zah bang ahih hangin, amaute a om lai tawm khat bek hong ciahkik ding hi. Thuman mahmahna tawh siatna thu kikhen ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa, Vanglianpen Topa in a thukhennasa bangin leitung khempeuh ah bei siangna bawl ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa, Vanglianpen Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Zion-ah a teeng ka mihingte aw, Izipt mite’ hih bangin amaute in molhtum tawh hong satin a ciangkhut uh hong liik ciangin Assiria mite kihta kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a sawt loin note tungah ka thangpaihna bei ding a, ka hehna amaute’ tung tuin, amaute sia ding uh hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in Oreb suangpi-ah Midian mite a sukgawp bangin, amah in amaute khau tawh sat ding a, Izipt ah a hih bangin amah in a ciangkhut tuite tungah vaan ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin na liangko panun ama vangikpi kinkhia ding a, ama hakkol pen na ngawng panun kilakhia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na thau luatna hangin, hakkol ki sukham ding hi.”
Galte pen Rimmon gampan hong kipanin Ai-ath khua hong tung uh a, amaute in Migron khua kantanin hong pai uh a, Mikmas khua-ah a van uh hong seng uh hi.
Amaute in mualciang kantanin Geba khua-ah zan khat giak uh hi; Ramah khua mite lau-in liing uh a, Saul’ teen’na Gibeah khua mite tai uh hi.
Gallim khuamite aw, nakpitakin kiko un; Laisah khuamite aw, ngai un! Anathoth khuamite aw, amah dawng un:
Madmenah khuamite taikhia a, Gebim khua-a teeng mite suakta dingin tai uh hi.
Tu ni mahmah-in Nob khua-ah galte tungin khawl uh a, Zion Mual ahi, Jerulasem khuapi, a khuttum uh sin’san uh hi.
En un, Topa, Vanglianpen Topa in a kihtak huai vangliatna tawh sing hiangte heuh ding hi; a kung sangte kiphuk ding a, a kisangsakte a niam-in kikoih ding hi.
Amah in tulak singte hei tawh phuk ding a, Lebanon mual pen Vanglian Pa’ mai-ah puk ding hi.
Jessi’ phungsung panin a sel khat hong khangkhia ding a, a zungte panin a hiang khat hong gah ding hi.
Ama tungah, Topa’ Kha ahi, lungpilna leh thu theihtelna Kha, thu lamlah siamna leh vangliatna Kha, theihna leh Topa kihtakna Kha om ding hi.
Amah in Topa’ kihtakna ah lungdam ding hi. Amah in a mit-a a muhna tawh thukhen loin, a bil-a a zakna tawh thu khentat lo ding hi;

a kitangsam mite thumanna tawh thukhensak ding a,, mizawngte’ thu a tangin khensak ding hi; ama kam pan a, molhtum tawh leitung mite daan kitat ding a, a muk pan a, a husan’na tawh mi gilote si ding uh hi.
Amah in dikna tawh a kawnggakin thumanna dial a kawng ah thuah ding hi.
Keivom pen tuuno tawh omkhawm ding a, kamkei gialbem pen keelno tawh lum khawm ding hi, bawngno leh humpinelkai leh ganhing thaute omkhawm ding uh a, naupangno khat nangawn in tuate hawl ding hi.
Bawngpi leh vompi in an nekhawm ding uh a, amau’ note lum khawm ding uh hi; humpinelkai in bawngtal mah bangin buhkung ne ding hi.
Nawine naungeek in gulgilo’ kuavangah kimawl ding a, nawine nawn lo naupang in gul gunei’ bu a sawk hangin tu lo ding hi.

Ka mual siangtho buppi tungah amaute khat leh khat kiliamsak lo ding uh a, kisusia lo ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuite in tuipi omna a tuamcip mah bangin leitungah Topa’ thu theihna kidim ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Jessi’ zung pen mihingte’ tungah lim khat hi ding hi; minamte in ama kiangah kikhawm ding uh a, ama tawlngakna mun pen minthang mahmah ding hi.

Tua ni ciangin Topa in, Assiria gam, Izipt gam, Pathros gam, Ethiopia gam, Elam gam, Shinar gam, Hamath gam leh tuipi gei-a gamte panin ama mi a om laite a ngahkik nadingin a vangliatna zang kik ding hi.
Amah in minamte’ adingin lan khat khai ding a, Israel mi a kihawlkhiate kaikhawmin, leitung kiuli panin Judah mi a kikhenthangte kaikhawm ding hi.
Efraim in hazatna a neihnate bei ding a, Judah mi a galbawlte kisusia ding hi; Efraim in Judah haza nawn lo ding a, Judah in Efraim galbawl nawn lo ding hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in, nitumna lam-a om Filistia mite sim khawm ding uh a, nisuahna lam-a om mite luh khawm ding uh hi. Amaute in Edom mite leh Moab mite zogawp ding uh a, Ammon mite in amau’ thu mang ding uh hi.
Topa in ama huihsa nungsakin Nail gunpi leh Eufrates gunpi tuite tungah a khut zanin kangsak ding a, mi khempeuh in nuam takin khedap tawh a kantan zawh ding luineu sagih bek siit lai ding hi.
Izipt gam panin Israel mite hong paitoh ciangin amau’ ading lam lianpi khat a om mah bangin, ama mi a om laite’ adingin zong Assiria gam panin lam lianpi khat om ding hi.
Ni khat ni ciangin mite in, “Topa aw, kei’ tungah na heh hangin na hehna dam a, nangmah in kei hong hehnem na hih manin nang kong phat ding hi.

“En in, Pasian in keima kihotkhiatna ahi hi; amah ka muang ding a, ka lau kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian in thahatna leh vangliatna hong pia a, amah in keimah hong honkhiapa ahi hi,” a cih hun uh hong tung ding hi.
Tui siangtho in a dangtakte a lungdamsak mah bangin, Pasian’ hotkhiatna tuikhuk in a mite lungdamsak ding hi.
Ni khat ni ciangin mite in, “Topa’ tungah lungdamna ko un la, a min lo-in, ama hong huh ding ngen un; minamte khempeuh lakah ama septe kitheisak un la, ama min kiliansak hi, ci-in gen un.
“Amah in minthang takin sem khin ahih manin Topa’ tungah phatna la sa un; leitung khempeuh ah hih thu kitheisak un.
Zion-a teeng mite aw, nomau’ lakah Israelte’ Siangtho Pa lianin om ahih manin awng un la, lungdamin la sa un,” a cih hun uh hong tung ding hi.
Amoz’ tapa Isaiah in Babilon siatna ding tawh kisai a muhnate a genna:
Mual kolh tungah lan khat khai to un la, galkapte tungah nakpi takin kiko un; mi liante’ kongpi-ah a lut nadingun amaute khut vaan un.
Keimah mah in ka tuamkoihsa mite thu pia khinin, ka hehna thu a sem khia dingin, ka gualzawhna ah a lungdam ka mi thahatte ka sam khin hi.
Ngai un, mihonpi gamlum bangin mual tungte ah gamlumna! Ngai un, minamte’ kumpi gamte kikhawmin a gamlumna! Vanglianpen Topa in galdo dingin mihon khat kaikhawm hi.
Leitung buppi susia dingin Topa leh ama hehna galhiamte gamlapi van mong panin hong pai hi.
Topa’ ni hong nai ahih manin nakpi-in kap un; Vanglian Pa’ kiang panin suksiatna hong tung ta ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin khut khempeuh zaw-in, mi khempeuh’ lungsim tui suak ding a,

amaute lau ding uh hi. Amaute in gim mahmahna leh nat velvalna thuak ding uh a, numei nausuak ding bangin na sa ding uh hi. Amaute khat leh khat lamdang sakna tawh ki-en ding uh a, a maitangte uh meikuang bang ding hi.
En un, leitung gamkhing suaksakin, leitung mawh neite a susia dingin gitlohna, hehna leh sinso-na tawh Topa’ ni nasia takin hong tung hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung aksite leh amau’ aksi honpite in khuavakna piakhia lo ding hi; ni a suah tung akipan mial ding a, kha in khuavak taangkhia sak lo ding hi.
Leitung mite a tatsiatna hangin, migilote a mawhna hangin daan ka pia ding hi; mi kihisakte’ kiphatsakna bei sakin, a kisatheite’ kiliatsakna ka niamkhiat ding hi.
Mihingte pen kham hoihte sangin a tawmzaw, minam pen Ofir gam khamte sangin a tawmzaw-in ka bawl ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ama sinso ni-in Vanglianpen Topa’ hehna hangin vantung lau-in ka liingsak ding a, ama omna panin leitung kisingkhia ding hi.
A kidelh sanang leh a cing om lo tuu bangin mi khempeuh pen amau mite lam ciatah kihei-in, mi khempeuh amau gam ciatah tai ding hi.
A kimu mi peuhmah kithat ding a, a kiman mi peuhmah namsau tawh si ding hi.
Amau’ muhna mah ah a naungeekte uh leilak kiden’ gawp nading hi; amaute’ inn kiluhin, a zite uh kibuansak ding hi.
En un, ngun leh kham tawh a lungkim lo Media mite pen amaute do dingin ka hanthawn hi.
Amau’ thalte in tangvalte that ding hi; amaute in gil sung pan a, piang naungeekte hehpih lo ding uh hi; amaute’ mit in naupangte khasiat lo ding hi.
Khaldel mite’ vangliatna leh kiphatsakpih, kumpigam a minthang bel Babilon khua pen Pasian in Sodom leh Gomorrah a siatsak lai hun bang ding hi.
Khang tawntungin tua lai-ah kuamah teeng lo, om ngei nawn lo ding hi; Arabia mite kuamah in tua lai-ah a puanbuk lam lo ding a, tuucingte kuamah in tua lai-ah a tuute lum sak lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin tua munah gamsate lum ding uh a, tua mun a, innte pen se-alte tawh kidim ding hi; tua munah kalaoh-vasa golpite teengin, tua munah gamkeelte laam ding uh hi.
Munmuanhuai sungah ngiate, kumpi inn nuam sungah se-alte ham ding uh hi; Babilon khuapi siat ding hun hong nai ta a, a ni sawt nawn lo ding hi.
Topa in Jakob hehpihin Israel teel kik ding a, amaute pen a gam uhah koih kik ding hi, khual mite in amaute pawlin Jakob innkuan beel ding uh hi.

Minamte in amaute la-in amau omna munah paipih ding uh hi. Israel mite in minamte nei ding uh a, Topa’ gam sungah amaute pen sila numei sila pasal dingin nei ding uh hi; amaute a man ngei mite pen tu-in amaute in leh mat ding a, amaute a nengniam ngei mite tungah tu-in ukna nei ding uh hi.
A haksa nasep hong kisep sakna, gimna, salsuahna leh lungkhamna panin Topa in note tungah tawldamna hong piak ciangin,
Babilon kumpipa’ tungah hih zahkona kam na zang ding uh hi; “A nengniampa koi ci bei! a hehna koi ci khawl!
5-6 Tawlnga loin mihingte satna a, a kizang, hehna tawh minamte ukin nakpi takin a bawlsia, migilote’ ciangkhut leh gam-ukte’ kumpi ciangkhut pen Topa in kuaitan khin hi.
Leitung khempeuh tawlnga-in gamdai takin om ta uh a, amaute la sa-in kiko uh hi.
Taksing kungte nang tungah lungdamin, Lebanon mual taamtaak singkungte in, “Nang hong kiniam koih khit nungsang kote phuk dingin kuamah hong pai nawn kei,’ ci uh hi.

Nang na paisuk ciangin hong dawntuah dingin Hansunga misite’ khate kihanthawn a, nangmah hopih dingin leitungah a lian ngei misi uliante kipusuaksak hi; a minamte’ kumpite khempeuh amau kumpi tokhom panin hong tho uh hi.
Amaute in nang hong hopih-in, ‘Nang zong kote mah bangin na thahat kei hi! Kote mah na bang ta hi!’ hong ci ding uh hi.
Nangma harp lasakna awte, nangma liatna hanah kipaipih suk hi; thante pen nangma delhphah hi a, thante pen nangma silh ahi hi.
Nang Khuavak’ ta, Zingsol, Babilon kumpipa aw, vantung panin nang bangci kiat na hi hiam! Minamte a niam koihpa ahi nangmah lei lak dongah hong bangci kiphukpai ahi hiam!

Nang in na lungsim sungah, ‘Van tungah ka kahto ding hi; a sangna mun, Pasian’ aksite’ tung pekah ka kumpi tokhom ka koih ding a, leilu lam pek a, kikhopna mual tungah a sang pen mual siangtho tungah ka tu ding hi;
meiite’ tung pekah ka kahto ding a, Sang Penpa bangin ka kibawl ding hi,’ na ci hi.
Ahih hangin nang pen, han sung, leihawm thuk penna Leihawm sungah hong kikoih suk ding hi.
Nangmah hong mu mite in nang hong en gega-in, nangma thu lungngai dedu ding uh a, ‘Hih mipa pen, leitung a liingsakpa, kumpi gamte a lok gawppa,
Leitung pen sehnel gam suaksakin, khuapite a susia-pa, thong sungah a khum mite pen innah a ciahsak lopa pen hihpa hilo ahi hiam? hong ci ding uh hi.
Minamte’ kumpite khempeuh pen amau’ hankhuk sung ciat uhah minthangin lum uh hi;
ahih hangin nang pen, namsau tawh a kithat misite tawh na kituam a, Suanghawmpi sunga a paisukte, khe tawh a kisikcip si luang hawmte bangin, na hankhuk pua lamah hong kilawnkhia hi.
Nangmah in na gam susia-in, na mihingte that khin na hih manin, amaute tawh nangmah hong kivui khawm lo ding hi. “Siatna a bawlpa’ suan leh khakte’ min kilo ngei nawn kei ta hen!
Amaute khangto-in leitung a neih loh nading leh leitung maitang teng khuapi tawh a kidimsak loh nadingin amau’ pate’ mawhna hangin ama tate’ kithah nading vaihawm in.”
Vanglianpen Topa in, “Amaute’ lang khatah ka pang ding a, “Babilon min leh a om lai mite, tate leh suan leh khakte ka susia ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Simbute’ om nadingin tua khuapi bawlin, bualtui ka suaksak ding a, siatna munphiah tawh ka phiat khia siang ding hi,” Vanglianpen Topa in ci hi.
Vanglianpen Topa kiciam khin a: “Ka geelsa bangin piang ding a, ka ngimsa bangin kip ding hi,
Keimah in ka gam sungah Assiria mi ka susia ding a, ka mual tungah ka sikcip ding hi; ka mite’ tung panin Assiriate hakkol, amaute’ liangko panin Assiriate’ vangik kia khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih ngimna pen leitung buppi’ adinga a kingim ahi hi, hih ka khut pen minam khempeuh daanpiak nadingin a kizan ahi hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in ngim khin ahih manin kua in phiat zo ding ahi hiam? Ama khut kizan khin hi, kua in kaiton kik zo ding ahi hiam?
Ahaz Kumpipa a sih kumin hih thu hong tung hi:

“Filistia mite khempeuh aw, note hong kisatna ciangkhut a kitan manin lungdam kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh singbul panin a sel a om mah bangin gulpi a sih khit ciangin, a siahuai-zaw gul gunei hong om ding a, tuate pen a leng thei gulpi hong hi ding uh hi.

Mizawngte in keima gan khahna sungah an ne ding a, a cimawhte lungmuang takin lum hit-hiat ding hi; ahih hangin no Filistia mite, kialpi tawh kong that ding a, a suakta kha a omte laite keimah in ka that ding hi.

Filistia khuapi kongpite aw, nakpi-in kap un; khuapite aw, kiko un; Filistia mi khempeuh aw, lau-in liing un! Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lam panin galkap honte’ hong paina leivui khu hong kitung a, tua galkapte lakah a meidawi khat beek om lo hi.”
Filistia mite’ hong sawl kamtaite, mi khatpeuh in bangci dawn’ ding hiam? “Topa in Zion kipsak khin a, gimna a thuak ama mite in tua sungah buk nading mu uh hi,” ci in dawng ding hi.
Moab gam tawh kisai thu: Zan khat thu-in Ar khua kisiasak ahih manin Moab gam bei hi; zan khat thu-in Kir khua kisiasak ahih manin Moab gam bei hi.
A sangna munte ah a kap dingin Dibon khuamite pai to uh hi; Nebo leh Medeba khuate’ hangin Moab mite nakpi takin kap uh hi. Dahna limin lu khempeuh kimettol a, khamul khempeuh kimetmai hi;
kongzing lakah amaute in puanhampi teng uh hi; innkhumzang leh kongzing lampi kituahnate ah mi khempeuh nakpi-in kapin khitui tawh kawt uh hi.
Heshbon khua leh Elealeh khua kiko a, amau’ kahna awging Jahaz khua ciang dongah kiza hi; tua ahih ciangin Moab gammi galhiam tawite lau-in nakpi takin kiko uh hi; amaute liing uh hi.

Moab gam adingin ka lungsim kiko hi; a galtai ama mite Zoar khua, Eglath-shelishiah khuate ah tai uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Luhith lampi-ah amaute kapsa-in paito uh hi; Horonaim khua zuatna lampi ah amaute in siatna a thuakna uh hangin nakpi-in kiko uh hi;
Nimrim lui tuite kang hi; lopa keu-in, ankungte beita a, lopa hing om nawn lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a ngahsa uh leh a kholsa uh na tampite pua-in Gialheek Lui-ah paipih uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Moab gam kim khempeuh ah kahna aw ging hi; kahna in Eglaim khua ban a, kahna in Be-er-elim khua ban hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Dimon lui tuite pen sisan tawh kidim hi; ahi zongin Dimon khua in a thuak ding a nasia zaw om lai a, Moab gam panin a suakta mi leh gam sunga a om lai mite khempeuh humpi khat in negawp ding hi.
Moab mite in Zion Tanu’ mual, gam ukpa tungah Sehnel gam Sela khua panin siah dingin tuunote puak uh hi.
A bu a kipaih khiatsak ciangin cih nading thei loin a leeng kawikawi vasate bangin, Arnon guntui ngahmun ah Moab mite om uh hi.
“Amaute tungah thu hoih lak in la, thutangin gamta in; sunkim lai tak-a nangma liahna liim pen zan khuamial bangsak in; a kihawlkhia mite seel un la, galtai mite hek kei in;

a kihawlkhia Moab mite note lakah teengsak un; amau a susiate’ kiang panin amaute’ belh hi un. A nengniampa om nawn loin, suksiatna hun bei a, gam sung panin a khe tawh a sik mipa a man’than’ ciangin,
itna kip tawh kumpi tokhom khat kiphut ding a, thuman sep ding a manlang, thutang zongin, thu a khen mipa pen David’ buk sunga tua tokhom tungah thuman tawh tu ding hi.”
Moab’ kiphatsakna thu i za khin hi, amah kiphasak mahmah hi; a kiliatsakna, a kiphatsakna, a kihihsaknate— ama kisialhnate a mawkna ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin a thuakna uh hangin Moab mite kap hen la, mi khempeuh zong Moab— mite’ hangin kap ta hen. Nakpi takin gimna a thuak lai takun Kirhareseth khua a, a an lim nekte uh a phawk khak uh ciangin khasia-in kap uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a hiang zai-in tuipi kantan a, Jazer khua banin sehnel gam dongah a zaam ama hiangte, minamte’ tote in sattan ahih manin Heshbon lo laite leh Sibmah leengguite vul ta hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jazer khuamite a kah bangin Sibmah leengguite’ hangin kei ka kap hi; Heshbon leh Elealeh khuate aw, ka khitui tawh note kong kawtsak hi; na singgahte uh minta a, na anlakna uh hangin lungdamna tawh kikonate dai ta hi.

An tampi a pian’ ngeina lo lai-ah lungdamna leh nuamna om nawn lo hi; leenggui lote sungah lasakna om lo a, lungdam-a kikona om nawn lo hi; leenggah cilna ah kuamah in leengtui suk lo hi; leenggah lawh cianga kikona aw kidaisak ta hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moab gam hangin laiza la sakna bangin ka lungsim kisat gaihgaih a, Kirhareseth khuapi hangin keimahmah zong ka kisat gaihgaih hi.
Moab amahmah hong kilaakin, a sangna munah lungkhamin hong pai a, ama siangtho munah thu a nget ciangin bangmah ngah lo ding hi.
Hih bang thu pen, Topa in a beisa hun lai-in Moab tawh kisai-in thu a gensa ahi hi.

Ahih hangin tu-in Topa in, “Nasem ding a, a kicial kum hunte sung bangin, kumthum sungin, ama mihon tampite om tase leh Moab’ minthan’na in simmawhna thuak ding a, a suakta lai mite pen tawm mahmahin, thanem ding hi,” a ci hi.
Damaskas tawh kisai thu:— En in, Damaskas in khuapi hi nawn loin, ninbulomtang suak ding hi.
Ama khuapite ahi Aroer kinusiacip paisuak ding hi; tuuhonte’ omna ding suak ding a, amaute lum hithiatin bangmah in lausak lo ding hi.
Efraim gam panin kulhpi bei-in, Damaskas khua panin kumpi gam mangthang ding hi; Siria mi a suakta laite pen Israel mite vangliatna mah bang ding uh hi, Vanglianpen Topa in ci hi.
Tua ni ciangin Jakob’ liatna bei ding a, ama hauhna mangthang ding hi.

An a la mi in ankung a ding laite kaikhawmin a khut in ante a lak khit ciangin leitang hawm guak ahi a, mi khat in Refaim Kuam sunga ansang a kaihkhop khit ciangin lo lai hawm guak tawh ahi zongin kibang ding hi.
Oliv kung a kisin’ ciangin a hiang sang pen dawnah pumnih pumthum, singkung hiang dawnah pumli pumnga a om lai tawh kibang ding hi, Israelte’ Topa Pasian in ci hi.
Tua ni ciangin mite in amaute a Bawlpa pi ngaihsut ding uh a, amaute’ mit in Israelte’ Siangtho Pa en ding uh hi;
amaute in ama’ khut tawh a bawlsa uh biakna taute don lo ding uh a, amau’ khutme tawh a bawlsa uh Asherah milimte hita leh paknamtui halna biakna taute hita leh suang ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin amau’ khuapi muanhuaite pen, Hiv mite leh Amor mite in Israel mite’ hanga a nusiat uh lingkung pona mun tawh kibang ding a, gamkhing suak ding hi.
Note in, nomau’ kihotkhiatna Pasian mangngilhin,nomau’ belh Suangpi phawk lo na hih manun note in biakna huan bawlin kung hoihte suan a, leenggui kung namdangte tawh peh-in,
tuate na suan ni mah-un khang a, na tuh ni uh a zingsang mahin a pak hangin a gah om lo ding, cinatna leh a dam theilo natna hong tun’ ni hi ding hi.
Ah, mi tampite’ kikona, tuipi ging bang! Ah, minamte’ otna, tui lianpi ging bang!

Tui lianpi a ging bangin minamte awng uh hi, ahih hangin amah in amaute tai ding a, gamlapi-ah amaute taikhia ding uh hi; mual tunga huih mai-ah ansi leeng bang leh huihpi mai-a pingpei bangin amaute lengkhia mang ding uh hi.
En un, nitakin hong lausak vat a, zingsang ma-in amaute bei ta! Hih bang thute pen, eite hong susia-in eite hong luh gawpte’ thuak ding ahi hi.

1-2 Ah, Ethiopia gunte’ gal a, puankhai gunkuangpi a omna gamte in gim ngah hen! Nail tawnin tui tungah pumpeng laisah tawh kibawl gunkuangpite tungah tuangin tangmi hong sawl hi. No a zaptel kamtaite aw, amau’ gam gunpi in a phelkhap, a vanglian a gualzo minam, a nai a gamla ah a kikihta mite, a tun sang mi, a ci nel minamte kiangah va pai un.
Leitunga teeng mi khempeuh, leitang tunga om mi khempeuhte aw, mualte tungah lan khat hong kilah ciangin, en un! Peengkul hong kimut ciangin, ngai un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kei tungah, “Nitaang sunga nisa silsel, anlak nisa sunga meiizun bangin, ka omna panin daitakin ka en ding hi” hong ci hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh leenggah lawh hun ma deuh, leenggui a pak khit, leenggah a puamcin’ lai takin, amah in singhiang heuhna temkawi tawh a selte atkhia ding a, a zam zeizai a hiangte heuhkhia ding hi.
Tuate khempeuh pen mual tunga vasate’ nek ding leh leitunga ganhingte’ nek dingin kinusia ding hi. Khuakhal hun ciangin vasate in ne ding a, phalbi hun ciangin leitunga ganhingte in ne ding uh hi.

Tua hun ciangin, amau’ gam gunpi in a phelkhap, a vanglian a gualzo minam, a nai a gamla ah a kikihta mite, a tun sang mi, a ci nel mite kiang panin, Vanglianpen Topa’ min omna mun Zion Mual, Vanglianpen Topa’ tungah letsong hong kipuak ding hi.
Izipt gam tawh kisai thu: A manlang mahmah meii tungah Topa tuangin Izipt gamah pai hi; ama mai-ah Izipt gam milimte liing ding a, Izipt mite’ han’na bei ding hi.

Izipt mite amau leh amau ka kitawngsak ding hi, mi kim in sanggam khat leh khat ama vengte ciat do ding a, khua khat leh khua khat kido-in, mi khat leh khat, kumpigam khat leh khat kumpi-za kituh ding hi;
Izipt mite’ lungsim hawmsuak ding a, amau’ geelnate ka siasak ding hi; amaute in milimte leh khongkhai theite, vankah theite leh aisan theite thu dong ding uh hi;
Izipt mite pen a haksa kumpi khut sunga ka pia ding a, a kihtak huai a gilo kumpipa in amaute uk ding hi, Topa ahi Vanglianpen Topa in ci hi.
Nail gun tuite keu ding a, gun pen kangcip-in keu ding hi;
lei zui a, tui kilate uih-in, Izipt gam Nail gun hiangte kiamin keucip ding a, pumpeng kung leh phai kungte muat ding hi.
Nail gun gei, Nail gun kiang ankungte kolh ding a, Nail gun kianga kituh khempeuh keucip-in huih in leenkhia-in om nawn lo ding hi.
Nail gun sunga nga-siahna sikkawi a khia, ngabengte thuumin tau ding uh a, tui tungah ngeen a paii mite thanem ding hi.
Anthul khau ciing a, na a semte leh patpuan a gante lungkham ding uh hi.
Gamsung makai mite kisusia cip ding a, a kicial nasemte dah ding hi.

Zoan uliante hai cihtakin hai uh a, Faro’ mipil thu lamlakte in thu haihuai gen uh hi Nang in Faro’ tungah, “Mi pilte khat ka hi a, tanglai kumpipite’ nungzui ka hi hi,” bang ci a, ci thei ding na hi hiam?
