Tua ahih leh Izipt kumpipa Faro aw, na mi pilte koi-ah om ahi hiam? Vanglianpen Topa in Izipt gam daantah ding a ngimna thu, na mipilte in nangma tungah hong gen thei kha ding hi.
Zoan uliante mihai suak khin a, Memfis uliante zong hai khin uh hi: minamte a makaih ding a, kineite mah in Izipt mite lam khialhpih khin hi.
Topa in amaute lungsim kitukalhsak khin zo hi; zukhampa pen ama luak sung mahah a puk bangin Izipt gam mite’ hihna khempeuh khialin hoi mang khin hi.
A hau a zawng, alian aneu, mi khat beek in Izipt’ adingin a hih sak theih ding bangmah om lo ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Izipt mite pen numei bang ding uh a, Vanglianpen Topa in amaute tungah a khut a sin’sanna hangin lau-in liing ding uh hi.
Judah gam pen Izipt mite’ kihtak hong suak ding hi; Vanglianpen Topa in amaute daantah ding a ngimna hangin, hih thu a kigenna mi peuhpeuh lau ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin, Izipt gam sungah khuapi nga in, Kanaan mite’ kampau zangin Vanglianpen Topa tungah thuman ding thuciam ding hi. Hih khuapi khat pen Ni khuapi kici ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Izipt gamah Topa’ adingin biakna tau khat, a gamgi-ah Topa’ ading khuampi khat om ding hi.

Tua pen, Vanglianpen Topa’ adingin Izipt gam sungah lim leh teci hi ding hi; a nengniam mite’ bawlsiatna hangin Topa’ tungah amaute a kiko ciangin, amah in amaute’ tungah honpa khat sawl ding a, amaute hu’ in khahkhia ding hi.

Topa in Izipt mite tungah amahmah kitheisak ding hi; tua ni ciangin Izipt mite in Topa thei-in biak piakna leh meihal tawh bia ding uh a, amaute in Topa’ tungah thuciamna bawl-in, tua thuciamnate sem ding uh hi.
Topa in Izipt mite pulnatna tawh vat ding a, ahi zongin damsak ding hi; Topa’ lamah amaute kihei kik ding uh a, amah in amaute’ thuumna donin amaute damsak ding hi.

Tua ni ciangin Izipt gam panin Assiria gamah lam lianpi khat pai-in, Assiria mite Izipt gamah hong pai ding a, Izipt mi Assiria gam sungah pai-in, Izipt mite in Assiria mite tawh bia khawm ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin Israel, Izipt leh Assiria hih thumte pen leitung khempeuh adingin thupha hi ding uh a,
Vanglianpen Topa in amaute thupha pia in, “Ka mihingte ahi Izipt leh ka khut tawh ka sepsa ahi Assiria leh keima luah ahi Israel in thupha ngah ta hen,” ci-a thupha a piakte hi ding uh hi.
Assiria kumpipa Sargon in a sawl galkap mang lian penpa in Filistia khuapi Ashdod-ah pai-in, tua khua va do hi.

Tua hun ma kum thum lai takin Topa in Amoz’ tapa Isaiah tung tawnin thu genin, “Na puanhampi suah in la, na khe panin na khedapte suah in,” a ci hi. Amah zong tua mah bangin gamta-in, tangguak leh kheguak tawh lam pai hi.
Ashdod khua a kilak khit ciangin Topa in, “Izipt leh Ethiopia’ lang khatah lim leh siahil dingin ka nasempa Isaiah tangguak leh kheguak tawh kum thum sung lam a pai mah bangin,
Assiria kumpipa in, Izipt gam mite’ maizumna ahi, a moi a hamin, tangguak kheguakin, tawbo dawksa-in, Izipt mite gal-in manin, Ethiopia mite sal-in manin paikhiatpih ding hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ muan Ethiopia leh amau’ kisialhpih Izipt’ hangin amaute lungkia-in a maizum ding uh thei lo ding uh hi.

Tua ni ciangin hih tuipi gei-a teeng mite in, “En un, eite’ muan Assiria kumpipa’ kiang pan a, eite huhin honkhia dingin i belh mite’ tungah hih bang piang khin ta hi. Eite bangci suahtak ding i hi hiam?’ ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Babilon gam tawh kisai thu: Pingpeite leitaw lam panin hong kipat mah bangin, a lauhuai gam panin siatna hong pai hi.

A kihtak huai mangmuhna khat kei tungah hong kigen hi; A lehheekpa in lehheekin a sut thei mipa in sut hi, a susia thei mipa in susia hi. Elam galkapte aw, kuan to un, Media galkapte aw, umcih un; Babilon’ pian’sak ahi, khuisatnate khempeuh Pasian in beisak ta hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ka pumpi na hi; nausuak numei in na a sak bangin na ka sa hi; khuaza thei lo zah dongin a kuncip-in ka om a, ka muh nate hangin lamdang sa in ka om hi. khua mu thei lo zah dongin lungkia-in ka om hi.
Ka lung vai a, kihtakna in hong si daang sak hi; keima lunggulh zan khuamial pen keima liin’na a suak hi.
Amaute in sabuai phahin, sual puante phah uh a, ne-in, dawn uh hi. Uliante aw, tho un, lumte sathau nuh un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kei tungah: “Pai in, galvil khat koih in la, ama muh bangbang gensak in.
Amah in sakol tung tuang mite a kopkopin, la tungah a tuangte, kalaoh tungah a tuangte a muh ciangin limtak, pha takin ngai hen,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin a mu-pa kiko a: “Topa aw, tausang tungah sun tawntung ka ding a, ka vilna munnah zankhuavak ka om hi.
En in, sakol leeng tuangte a kopkopin hong pai!” ci hi. A dang khat in, “Babilon cim hi, cim hi; ama milim pasiante khempeuh leilak dongah amah in suksiat sak hi,” ci-in dawng hi.
A kicilsa, a kiseepsa keima’ aa-te aw, Israelte’ Pasian, Vanglianpen Topa’ tung pana ka zaksa teng note tungah ka hong gen hi.
Edom gam tawh kisai thu: Seir mual tung panin khat in kei hong sam a, “Gal vilpa aw, tu zan bangci hiam? Gal vilpa aw, tu zan bangci hiam?” hong ci hi.
Gal vilpa in, “Zing ni hong suak a, zan khua zong hong mial hi. Thukan nuam na hih leh, hong paikik in la, hong kan in,” a ci hi.
Arabia gam tawh kisai thu: Dedan mi khualzin honte aw, Arabia gamsung gamlakah na giak ding uh hi.
Tema gam a, teeng mite aw, a dangtakte, tui puak un la, galtaite, an tawh dawn un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen namsau, a kidoksa namsau, a kikeek thal leh gal in a phutna panin hong tai uh ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in keima tungah, “Thacial kum hunte sung mah bangin kum khat sungin Kedar mite’ minthan’na khempeuh bei ding hi;
Kedar mi thaltawi siam a om laite tawm ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, Topa, Israelte’ Pasian in hih thu gen khin zo hi,” hong ci hi.

1-2 Kuam sunga mangmuhna tawh kisai thu: Kikona tawh a kidim, a gamlum khuapi, lungdam a, a diang khua aw, note khempeuh, innkhum zangah na kahtoh uh bang na cihnopna uh ahi hiam? A kithat nangma mite pen namsau tawh kithat lo a, galsunga si hi lo uh hi.
Note hong uk mite tai uh a, thal zat kul loin amaute kiman hi. Amaute gamlapi ah a tai uh hangin, hong kimu note khempeuh hong kiman hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah in, “Kei hong en kei un la, khitui tampi luangin nakpi-in hong kapsak un; ka mite tampi a sihna hangin keimah hehnem ding hong hanciam kei un,” ka ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglianpen Topa Pasian in mangmuhna kuam sungah buaina leh tuatcil gawpna leh kitawhzauna, kulhte suksiat gawpna leh launa mualte tungah kikona ni hong tungsak hi.
Sakol leengte leh sakol tung tuangte tawh Elam galkapte in thallawng pua a, Kir galkapte in a lumte uh a baihsa-in nei uh hi.
Nomau’ teel Judah kuamte pen sakol leeng tawh kidim a, sakol tuangte in Jerusalem kulh kongpite ah pang uh hi.
Judah a kihutna teng khempeuh kihong khia khin ta hi. Tua ni ciangin Tulak Inn sunga kikoih galhiamte na suang ding a,
David khuapi mun tampi tak a siatna mu-in, bual nuainung tuite na khawm a,
nangmah in Jerusalem innte a phazah simin, kulhpi siate puah nadingin innte na phel hi.
Nangmah in, bual lui pan a, tuite khol nadingin kulhpi nih kikal ah tui beempi khat na bawl hi. Ahih hangin nangmah in, tua na a na bawlpa phawk loin, sawt pek a, a na geelpa na don kei hi.
Tua ni ciangin Vanglianpen Topa Pasian in kahna leh thuumna, sam mettolna leh puanhampi silh ding thu hong pia hi;
ahih hangin note in lungdamna leh kipahna, bawngtalte leh tuute gawhna, sa nekna leh leenggahzu nekna na nei zawsop uh a, “Zing ciangin si ding i hih ciangin ne-in dawn ni” na ci uh hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in kazakna ah thu hong gen a, “Na sih matengun hih mawhna hong kimaisak lo taktak ding hi,” Vanglianpen Topa Pasian in hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Vanglianpen Topa Pasian in, “Hong pai in, innsung na teng a uk, neihsa kempa Shebna kiangah pai in la, ama tungah hih bangin gen in:
Hih lai-ah nangma ading hankhuk a to, a sangna munah hankhuk a bawl, na om nading suang a khuak mipa aw, nang in hih lai-ah bang hih a, vui ding kua nei na hi hiam?
En in, nang mi thahatpa aw, Topa in nang hong lawnkhia gawp ding hi. Amah in nakpi takin nang hong lenin,
hong pingpeipei ding a, lei tanzau munah bawlung bangin hong lawn ding hi; na topa’ inn sung’ adingin maizumna ahi nang pen tua munah si-in, na kisaktheihpih na sakol leengte lakah na tuk ding hi.
Na nasepna phual panin nang kong nawtkhia ding a, na omna panin nang hong kilawn khiasuk ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Hilkiah’ tapa ahi ka nasempa Eliakim ka sam ding a,
nangma puantualpi amah silh sakin, nangma kawnggak tawh amah ka gak ding a, nangma ukna ama tungah ka pia ding hi; amah pen Jerusalem khua a, teengmite leh Judah mite tungah pa hi ding hi.
David suan leh khakte’ khut nuai-ah aana neihna tawhtang pen ama liangko tungah ka pia ding hi; amah in hong-in, kuamah in khak lo ding hi; amah in khak-in, kuamah in hong lo ding hi.
Amah pen a kician mun khatah vankhaina bangin ka khenkip ding a, ama phung sungah pahtawi ngahna phungpi suak ding hi.
Ahi zongin a beh a phung, a suan a khakte khempeuh ama adingin vangikpi hi ding a, um-le-beel, kuang leh keute, hai akipan thawl dongin vankhai ah a kikhai bangin ama tungah kibom ding uh hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in, tua ni ciangin mun hoihna a, a kikheen vankhai in lel ding hi; Topa in gen khin ahih ciangin, amah pen kitanin kia ding a, ama tunga vangik teng kisia ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tai-ar khua tawh kisai thu: Tarshish teembaw hawlte aw, Tai-ar khua kisia a, inn leh khawlmunte om nawn lo ahih manin, kap un! Saipras gam panin hih thu amaute in za uh hi.
Tuikulh-a teeng mite aw, thuumin tau un, Sidon sumbukte aw, na sawltakte un tuipi kantanin tui lianpite tungah om uh hi;
Izipt gam a, piang ante lei-in na zuak uh a, minam khempeuh tawh sumbawlin na kizom uh hi.

Sidon aw, maizum in bang hang hiam cih leh tuipi in thu gen khin hi, tua tuipi munmuan huai in: “Keimah in nau paii-in na ka sa ngei kei a, nau ka nei ngei kei hi; ta numei ka khoi ngei kei a, ta pasal zong ka khan’suah ngei kei hi,” ci hi.
Izipt gamah hih thu a kizak ciangin, Tai-ar tawh kisai thu hangin amaute in na sa ding uh hi.
Tuipi gei-a teeng mite aw, Tarshish khua-ah tai un la, kap un!
Taang lai pek pan a, a piang, gamlapi pek panin a kiphut hih khuapi pen nomau’ lungdampih pen mah ahi hiam?
Kumpi khuapi ahi, ama sumbukte ulian ahi; ama sum bawlte leitungah a kipahtawite ahi, Tai-ar khuapi hih bang a pian’ nading kua’ vaihawm ahi hiam?
Topa’ vaihawm ahi hi. Mi liante’ kiphasaknate a beisak nading, leh a kipahtawi uliante a niamkhiat nadingin a bawl ahi hi.
Tarshish mite aw, tu-in kuankhia un la, lo kho un. Na sum bawlna teng uh maimang khin ta hi.
Topa in tuipi tungah a khut zan a, kumpi gamte kiliingsak gawp hi; Sum bawlna phualpite a kisuksiat nading Topa in thupia zo hi.
Amah in, “Sidon Tanu Siangtho aw, na lungdamna teng bei khin ta hi. Na mite in nenniamna thuak uh a, Saipras tuikulh ah a va tai uh hangin, tua lai nangawnah lungnopna hun nei lo ding uh hi,” ci hi.

Tai-ar khuapi, gamsate’ phualpi a suaksate in; Assiria mite hi lo a, Babilon mite ahi hi. Babilon mite in khuapi luh nading panmun bawl uh a, Tai-ar khuapi kulhte susia-in, khuapi sung khempeuh a sia suah uh hi.
Tarshish teembaw hawlte aw, na muan uh khuapi kisia ahih manin thuumin kap un.

Tua a siat huna kipanin kumpi khat nuntak hun sung tan ahi, kum sawmsagih sung Tai-ar khuapi kimangngilh ding hi. Kum sawmsagih a cin’ ciangin, paktat numei’ la sunga mah bangin Tai-ar khuapi tungah’ piang ding hi:
“Kuama’ phawk loh numei paktat aw, harp la sakna khat la in la, khuapi kimkotah pai in! Nang hong kiphawk theih nadingin la ngaih phuak in la, la tampi sa in.”
Kum sawmsagih a cin’ ciangin Tai-ar khuapi ah Topa hawh ding a, Tai-ar khuapi in ama sep ngei paktatna sem kikin, leitung kumpigam khempeuh tawh kizomin sumbawlna sem ding hi.
Ama sumbuk vante leh ama sepna panin a ngah nate pen Topa tungah kipia ding hi; ahih hangin tuate kikholcip mawk loin, Topa a bia mite’ an ding leh puan hoih nono leina-in kizang ding hi.
En un, Topa in leitung hawmsuak sakin gamkhing suaksak ding a, amah in lei maitang huiheek gawpin, a tunga teeng mite thehthang ding hi.
Mi khempeuhte’ thuakna kibang kim ding hi. Siampite leh mi mawkmawkte, silate leh a tote, vanleite leh van zuakte, sum neite leh leibate, ahau azawng, a thuakna uh kibang ding hi.
Leitung kihawmsuak sakin kisiacip ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih thu genkhin zo hi.
Leitung vulin keugaw a, leitung buppi thanemin vul gawp hi; leitung a, a kipahtawite vulgawp hi.
Ama tunga teengte in leitung ninsak uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in thukhamte mang loin, ngeina kipte palsat uh a, tawntung thuciamna peel uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in leitung samsiatin susia a, a tunga teeng mite in amau’ mawhna hangun kangtum uh hi; tua ahih ciangin leitunga teeng mite tawm semsem hi.
Leengguite vulin, leenggahzu kang a, a lungdam mi khempeuh khuisa ta uh hi.
Lungdamna khuang gingte daii-in, lungdam a, gamlumnate om nawn lo a, lungdam a, laiza tawh la saknate daii ta hi.
Zu phungah lungdam a, la sakna om nawn lo a, zu khempeuh sia-in kha gawp hi.
Khuapi hawm suak pen kisiacip suk a, kuamah a tum theih loh nadingin inn khempeuh kikhakcip hi.
Leenggahzu a duh manun kongzing ah mite kiko uh hi; lungdamna khempeuh lungkhamna suak a, leitung kipahna kibeisak ta hi.
Khuapi sungah gamkhin’na bek om a, kongpite kisat khamin kisia hi.
Hih in leitung a, om minam khempeuh tungah a tung ding thu ahi hi. Oliv kung a kisin’ khit ciang, leenggah kilo khinin a sangh a kikaih khop khit ciangin a kinusia lo hawmte tawh kibang ding hi.
A suakta sun mite in lungdamin la sa ding uh hi. Nitumna lam a, om mite in Topa a liat mahmahna thu gen ding uh a,
Nisuahna lama, om mite in Topa phat ding uh hi. Tuipi dunga a teeng mite in Topa, Israelte’ Pasian’ min phat ding uh hi.

Lei mong a gamla pen pek pan nangawnin “a thuman Pa in vanglian ta hen’ cih la i za ding hi. Ahih hangin keimah in, “Ka lungkham hi, ka lungkham hi. Gimna ngah hi ta ing! Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khemte in khemkhem lai-in sia semsem uh a, khem zawh thu ciam lailai uh hi,” ka ci hi.
Leitung a, teeng mihingte aw, note’ adingin launa, gum, leh thangzakte om hi.

Lauhuaina panin a tai mipa gum sungah kia ding a, gum sung panin a taikhiat ciangin thangzak sungah awk ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh van panin guahpi hong bua ding a, leitung bulpite kiling ding hi.
Leitung khang kham-in, kilok gawp ding a, kiphelkham ding hi.
Leitung pumpi zukham bangin hoi ding a, huihpi in a mut buk bangin awn ding hi. Ama mawhnate in nengcip gawp ding a, amah pukin thokik zo nawn ngei lo ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Topa in vantung a, om vangliatnate, leh leitung kumpite daantat ding hi.
Gum sunga om thongkiate bangin amaute kikaikhawm ding hi; thong sungah amaute kikhaknelh ding a, ni tampi khit ciangin amaute kidaantat ding hi.

Tua ciangin khapi mial ding a, ni taang nawn lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglianpen Topa in Zion Mual tung leh Jerusalem khua sungah uk ding a, ama upate’ mai-ah ama minthan’na kilangsak ding hi.

Topa aw, nang in keima Pasian na hi hi; nangmah kong liansak ding a, nangma min ka phat ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang in a lamdang nate na semkhin a, tanglai pek a, na geelnate a kip a thumaan takpi ahi hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in khuapi pen ninbulomtang na suah a, a muanhuai khuapi a sia na suaksak hi; mi kiphasakte’ mun muanhuai pen khua hi nawn lo a, cik mah hunin kilam nawn lo ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi thahatte in nang hong minthang sak ding a, thukhual lo minamte’ khuapite in nang hong zahtak ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen mizawngte’ adingin mun muanhuai, a cimawh mi’ adingin a lungkhamna ah mun muanhuai, huihpi panin bukna leh nisa panin nilim na hi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh thukhual lo mite’ hihna pen huihpi in kulh a nawk tawh kibang a,
mun keuna a, nisa tawh kibang hi. Nang in khualmite’ gamlumna na daisak hi; meii liim in nisa a votsak bangin thukhual lo mite’ la sakna kitawpsak hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in hih mual tungah mi khempeuh adingin anlim nekna pawi, a ciil mahmah leenggahzu nekna pawi, guhngek tawh a kidim an nekna, a siangtho leenggahzuciil nekna pawi bawl ding hi.
Amah in, mi khempeuh in a khuk uh dahna puan leh minam khempeuh’ silh dahna puante, hih mual tungah susia ding hi.
Amah in sihna beimang sak ding a, maitang khempeuh panin khitui nul ding hi; leitung khempeuh panin ama mite a kizahkona lakhia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih thu gen zo hi.
Tua ni ciangin, “En un, amah in eima Pasian hi; eite hong hon dingin amah i muang hi. Amah in eima Topa hi; amah i ngak hi; amah in eite hong gumkhia ahih manin lungdamin kipak ni,” kici ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih Zion Mual hu ding a, ahi zongin Moab mite ahih leh ninkholna dum sungah buhkungte a kisikcip bangin kisikcip gawp ding hi.
Tuipeekpa in tuipeek dingin a khutte a van bangin amaute in a khut uh vanvan ding uh a, ahih hangin a khut uh a van simin a kiphatsaknate uh Pasian in niamsuk sak ding hi.
Amah in, Moab mite’ kulh muanhuaite suksiat sakin leilak den’ nading a, leivui suak mang khin ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Judah gam sungah hih la kisa ding hi: “Khuapi muanhuai khat i nei hi; Topa mahmah in i kulhte leh i panmun kipte hong hut sak hi.
Upna ah a kip thuman minamte a lut theih nadingin kulh kongpite hong ta un.
Topa aw, nang hong muang a, nangma tungah a lungsim kip mipa, lungnopna kicing na pia ding hi.
Topa Pasian in tawntung Suangpi ahih manin, Topa muang tawntung un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a kiphasak mite niamkhiat hi. Amau’ teen’na khuapi muanhuai suksiat sak a, a kulhpite den’ khapsakin leivui suah hi.
A zawng, a cimawh, a kinengniam mite in tu-in tua khua tuancil uh hi.”
Midikpa’ lampi tamkim a, nangmah in midikpa’ lampi na neel sak hi.
Topa aw, nangma thukham deihna kong zui uh a, nang kong ngak uh hi; nangmah in kote’ deih kicin’na na hi hi.

Ka lungsim khempeuh tawh zanin nang kong deih a, zingsang khuavak ciangin lungsim tak tawh nang kong zong hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung leh a mite tungah thu na khen ciangin leitung a, teeng mite in thuman i cih bang hiam, cih phawk ding uh hi.
Mi gilote tungah na migit hangin a maanin gamtat ding thei thei tuan lo uh a, lungsim thutang mite’ gam sungah khialhna bawl lai veve uh hi. Amaute in Topa’ min liatna hong phawk nuam lo uh hi.

Topa aw, na khut kisang lap a, na galte in mu lo uh hi. Amaute, maizumna thuak sak in la, amaute’ adingin na geelsa meite, amaute haltum sak in. Na mite ading na hanciamna thu, na galte tungah kilangsak in.
Topa aw, kote’ tungah daihna hong pia in. Kote’ matut zawhna khempeuh, nangma hong sepsakna hang ahi hi.
Topa kote’ Pasian aw, nang ahi lo to dangte in ko tungah hong uk hangin, nangmah min bek mah kote in ka zahtak uh hi.

Amaute si a, hingkik lo ding uh hi; amaute mangthang ta uh a, omkik nawn lo ding uh hi; tua bang a pian’ theih nadingin nangmah in amaute tungah siatna na tung sak a, amaute a kiphawkna khempeuh na beisak hi.
Ahih hangin nangmah in ko minam nong khangsak hi, Topa aw, nangmah in minam na khangsak a, gamgi khempeuh na keeksak khin hi. Hih thu hangin nangma min a thang hi.
Topa aw, amaute a cihmawhna uhah nang hong zuan uh a, nangmah in amaute thu na hilh a, a thungetna uh ging zo lo hi.
Topa aw, nangma hangin kote pen naupaii numei a hun a nai ciangin na sa-in kiheek a, a kap tawh ka kibang uh hi;

kote in numei naupaii-in nausuak ding a, kithawi bang ka hi uh a, huih bek a hingkhia tawh ka kibang uh hi. Kote in leitung mite ading bangmah ka suakkhia sak kei uh a, leitunga teeng ding kuamah ka hingkhia kei uh hi.

Nangma mi a site hingkik ding a, amaute’ pumpi tho ding hi. Han sunga a lum mite aw, tho un la, lungdamin la sa un! Bang hang hiam cih leh zing daitui in leitung a nosak kik bangin, sawtpi a, a si mite, Topa in hingkik sak ding hi.
Ka mite aw, hong pai-in na inn sung uhah tum un la, na kongte uh khak un; hehna a dam matengin tawlkhat sung bu un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh en un, amau’ mawhna hangin leitung a, teeng mite daan pia dingin ama omna panin Topa hong paikhia a, leitung in ama tunga a luang sisante laakkhia ding a, a kithat ama mite sincip nawn lo ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Topa in, a sak, a lian, a to namsau tawh a taikhia gulpi ahi tuipi ganhing, a kikual vial gulpi ahi tuipi ganhing daantat ding a, amah in tuipi sunga om tua gulpi that ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin: “A gahpha leenggah lo thu la-in sa un!
Keimah, Topa in tua lo hongpa ka hi a, a hun hunin tui ka buak hi. Khatpeuh in a suksiat loh nadingin sun leh zan-in ka hong a,
Leenggui lo tungah ka heh nawn kei hi. Lingte leh lingkungte om hi leh keimah kuan khia-in tuate ka haltum ding hi.
Tua ahih kei leh keima hutna sungah amaute om hen la, amaute in kei tawh kilemna bawl-in, amaute kei tawh kilem ta uh hen.”
Hong pai ding hunte sungah Jakob in zung kha ding a, Israel palhin dawnkhia ding a, leitung khempeuh gah tawh dimsak ding hi.
Amau’ galte a vat gawp bangin Pasian in Israelte vat gawp ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh amau a thatte a kithah bangin amaute kithat ahi hiam?
A kithukkim dingin amah in amaute sal suahsakna tawh daan pia hi; nisuahna huihpi a nun’ ni-in amah in a kihtak huai a ging pha tawh amaute khinkhia hi.

Amah in suang tawh kibawl biakna tau khempeuh suangkang satvui a bat sak ciangin Asherah milimte leh paknamtui taute a ding lai om nawn lo hi; hih thu hangin Jakob’ mawhna kimaisakin, a mawhna kilakkhiat sak hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a muanhuai khuapi pen gamlak bangin amah guakin omin, mite’ teen’na mun pen kitaisan-in kinusia hi; tua lai-ah bawngno gamta-in, lum a, a hiangte kheuh hi.

A hiangte a keu ciangin kitan hi: nupite hong pai-in mei-in cih uh hi. Hih mite in khentel theihna nei lo ahih ciangin amaute a bawlpa in amaute hehpih lo ding a, amaute a piangsakpa in amaute tungah maipha lak lo ding hi.
Israel mite aw, tua ni ciangin Eufrates gunpi panin Izipt Luipi dongin Topa in tuancil ding a, note khat khatin hong kikaikhawm ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin peengkul lianpi khat kitum ding a, Assiria gam sunga a mangthang mite leh Izipt gam sunga a kihawlkhia mite hong pai-in Jerusalem mual siangtho tungah Topa bia ding uh hi.
Efraim minam zukhamte’ kisaktheihna leihoih zangkuam i lutunga kisuang, a vulgawp paak ahi, a vanglian ama hoihna tawh zukham a, a pukte’ kisak theihna tua kumpi lukhu in gim ngah ta hen!
En un, Topa in vanglian-in a hat mahmah mi khat nei hi; a susia huihpi gialpi, tuikhanglet leh a thahat huihpi bangin amah in leilak den’ gawp nading hi.

Efraim zukhamte’ kisaktheihpih ahi tua kumpi lukhu kituancil ding hi. Leihoih zangkuam’ lutung a, a kisuang a vulgawp paak ahi a vanglian ama hoihna in anlak hun ma-a a min theithekgah tawh kibangin, mi khatpeuh in a muhphetin lo in, a khut sungah tawi-in, a valh bangin maimang ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Vanglianpen Topa pen ama mi a om laite’ adingin minthan’na kumpi lukhu leh hoihna lukhu hi ding hi;
thukhen a, a tupa tungah thutang lungsim guan ding a, khuapi kulh hong luh galte a notkhia mite tungah han’na lungsim guan ding hi.

Hih mite zong leenggahzu tawh hoi-in kham theih zu tawh awn uh hi: siampite leh kamsangte nangawn zu khamin hoi uh hi. Kamsangte in zu kham lua ahih manin Pasian’ muhsak mangmuhnate thei thei lo uh a, siampite in zong zu kham lua uh ahih manin a thukhen dingte uh khen thei lo uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh sabuai khempeuh a luak uh tawh kidim a, a nit lohna mun om lo hi.
Amaute in kei hong phunsan uh a, “Amah in kua tungah hilh a, kua tungah thugen-a kinei ahi hiam? Ang sung panin a kilakhia nawi tawh a kikhentung naungeekte hilh-a kinei ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh malkhat khit malkhat, gualkhat khit gualkhat, thukhat khit thukhat, cih bang hi lel hi,” hong ci uh hi.
A mantakin, note in ka thugen na ngaih kei uh leh Topa in hih mite kiangah a pau na theih loh uh gamdang mite, note tungah thu hong hilhsak ding hi.
Topa in note tungah tawlngakna leh lungnopna hong pia napi-in! note in ama thu na ngai kei uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in note tungah, malkhat khit malkhat, gualkhat khit gualkhat, thukhat khit thukhat, cih bangin hong hilh ding ahi hi. Tua ciangin na kalsuanna khempeuh uhah na puk ding uh a, note liamin, thang-ah awk-in, sal-in hong kipaipih ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem khua sungah hih mite a uk, midangte a kote aw, Topa’ thu za un!

“Eite in sihna tawh thuciamna khat i bawl khin a, Leinuai tawh thukimna khat i nei zo hi; a tuumcip ding tuiciin in hong nawk ciangin ei hong ban lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh zuau thu i beel a, zuauna ah i bu hi,” na ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in, “En un, keimah in Zion sungah bulpi ding khat, suang, a kize-etsa suang, a manpha innkiu suang, bulpi muanhuai khat ka koih hi: Tua suang tungah, ‘Hih a um mi in lungkhamna tuak lo ding hi,” ci-in kigelh hi.
Keimah in thutan’na pen khau khai bangin ka bawl ding a, thuman’na pen khaukhai sikbawk bangin ka bawl ding hi; gial in na zuau buk uh dengkhia ding a, tui in na bukna mun uh susia ding hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin sihna tawh na thuciamna uh kiphiat ding a, Leinuai tawh na thukimna uh kip lo ding hi; a tuumcip ding tuiciin in hong nawk ciangin note hong sugawp ding hi.

Hong nawk sial-in note hong tai ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh zingsang khat khit zingsang khat, sun leh zan-in hong nawk tawntung ding hi; Topa tung panin na zak uh thute a ban banin launa lianpi vive hi ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh paunak sungah, khe khuan’ nadingin lupna tom lua a, silh dingin puanza neu lua in nang hong tuam zo lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a lamdang ama bawlna bawl ding leh a tumdang ama nasep sem dingin Perazim Mual tung a, a sep bangin Topa in hong sem ding a, Gibeon kuama a heh bangin amah hong heh ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, note hong kikhihna, a to-in kibawl kha ding ahih manin thusim loin om kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglianpen Topa Pasian tung panin gam buppi-ah siat nading thukhenna ka za khin hi.
Na bil uh hong ngat un la, ka aw za un; ngai un la, ka thugenna za un.
Lo khopa in khaici dingin lo kho niloh ahi hiam? amah in lei kalkhamin git niloh ahi hiam?
Amah in lei a zalhtam khit ciangin masala tang vawh-in, kummin tang tuh a, mangbuhte a gualgual-in tuhin, mangbuhham ama omna ding san-ah tuh a, mangbuhmante a nawl hui-ah tuh hilo ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah a manin kihilh hi; ama Pasian in amah hilh hi.
Masala-te pen buhcilna tawh kicil lo a, kumminte tungah buhcilna pei kihual lo hi; ahih hangin masala-te ciangkang tawh kisatkhia a, kumminte molhtum tawh kisat hi.
Mi khatpeuh in antang cilvui ahi hiam? Hi lo hi, amah in cil paisuak ngitnget lo hi; a sakol tawh buhcilnapei a kihualsak ciangin amah in kitamvui-sak lo hi.
Hih zong Vanglianpen Topa’ kiang pan a, hong pai thu ahi hi; amah pen thu lamlahna-ah lamdang a, pilna-ah lian mahmah hi.
Pasian’ biakna tau ahi Jerusalem khuapi, David in a sat khuapi in gim ngah ta hen. Kumte, a ban banin paipai sak un la, pawite a ngeina bangin kot paipai sak un.
Ahih hangin keimah in ‘Pasian’ biakna tau, a kici tungah gimna ka tungsak ding hi. Thuumna leh tauna om ding a, tua khuapi pen, biakna halna biakna tau suak ding hi.
Na kimkotah hong umcih-in, tausangpite tawh kong um ding a, nangmah umcih nading dum ka bawl ding hi.

Tua ciangin leithuk sung panin nang na pau ding a, a niamna mun leivui sung panin nangma kammal hong ging ding hi; nangma aw pen lei sung panin sikha’ aw bangin hong ging ding a, na thugenna pen lei sung panin hong phun suausuau ding hi.
Ahih hangin nangma gal honpite leivui neel leeng bang ding uh a, thukhual lo mi honpite ansi leeng bang ding uh hi. Tua ciangin tomkha sungin thakhat thu-in,
Vanglianpen Topa in vanging, zinliing, a ging lianpi, pingpei leh huihpi, leh a kangtum thei meikuang tawh hong pai ding hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ biakna tau a do minam honpite khempeuh, tua khuapi leh a kulhpi simin a lungkham sakte khempeuh, zan-a mangmat tawh kibangin maimang ding uh hi.

A gilkial mipa in a mangin an ne a, a khan’ lawh ciangin a gil a vah tuan lo, a dangtak mipa in a mangin tui dawn a, a dangtak pha tuan loin a gim mahin a khan’ lawh mah bangin, Jerusalem a do minam honpite khempeuh zong tua ci ding uh hi.
Lamdang kisa sak un la, lamdang a sa hi un, ki-mittawsak un la, a mittaw hi un! Leenggahzu dawn lopi-in a kham hi un; kham theih zu ne lopi-in hoi un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in note tungah nakpi ihmut nopna lungsim hong guang a, nomau’ mit ahi kamsangte mitsi sak-in, nomau’ lutang ahi thu mutheite khuhcip hi.

Hih mangmuhnate khempeuh pen note’ adingin ahih leh a kimatcip laibu sunga thu om tawh a kibang suak hi. Mite in lai a sim theipa khat tungah, “Hih lai sim dih in,” a cih ciangin amah in, “Kimatcip ahih manin ka sim thei kei hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in lai a sim thei lopa kiangah, “Hih lai sim dih in,” a cih uh ciangin amah in, “Ka sim thei kei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in: “Amaute’ lungsim kei tawh kigamla napi-in hih mite in a kam uh tawh kei kiangah hong nai uh a, a muk uh tawh kei hong pahtawi-in, amaute in kei hong kihtakna pen mihingte’ thupiak a zuihna uh ahi lel hi;

tua ahih ciangin en un, hih mite tungah a tumdang leh a lamdang ahi a lamdang nate ka bawlkik ding hi; amau’ mipilte’ pilna kisia ding a, amau’ thu mutel theite’ thu muhtel theihna kiseel ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa’ kiang panin ama’ thu vaihawmna a seel cip, khuamial sungah a gamta, “Kua in hong mu ding hiam? Kua in hong thei ding hiam?’ a cite in gimna ngah ta hen.

Note in na khempeuh a leh lamin na koih uh hi. Beel seekpa pen tungman bangin kingaihsun ding a, a kibawlsa na in a bawlpa tawh kisai-in, “Amah in kei hong bawl lo hi,” cihna ahi zongin, a beel in a sekpa tungah, “Amah in theihna nei kei,” ci ding ahi hiam?
Lebanon mual pen singno lo hoih suakin, singno lo hoihpen tulak a suahna ding hun tomno sung bek hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ni ciangin bilngongte in laibu sunga thute za ding a, lungzin’na leh khuamialna sung panin mittawte’ mit in mu ding uh hi.
Lungniamkhiat mite in Topa sungah lungdamna thak ngah ding uh a, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa’ sungah mizawngte lungdam ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh kampauna tawh a khialh nadingun mite bawlin, kongtual sungah mi a panpihpa thang siahin, a thuman mipa pen zuau teci tawh a thutanna a heikhia, thukhual lo mite beimang in, mi a thu sim lo mite bei-in, siatna hih ding a sawm mite khempeuh kisusia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Abraham a honkhia Topa in Jakob innkuan tawh kisai thu a gen-inah: “Jakob maizum nawn lo ding a, a mai khing nawn lo ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh keima khut tawh ka bawlsa ahi amau’ tate a muh ciangin, amaute in keima min siangthosak ding uh hi; amaute in Jakob’ Siangtho Pa, a siangtho ahihna phawk ding uh a, Israel’ Pasian zaktakin kihta ding uh hi.
Kha lamah a pialkhia mite in thu theitel ta ding uh a, a phunphun mite in thuhilhna ngai ta ding uh hi.”

1-2 Topa in, kei’ ngimna hi lopi-in thu vaihawmna a sem khia, kei’ kha tawh lopi-in kipawlna dang a bawl manun khialhna a bawl thuahthuah; keimah thu hong dong lopi-in Faro’ hutna sung a beel ding leh Izipt’ liahna bukna a zong dingin Izipt gamah paisuk ding a, a kuankhia a genhak naupangte in gimna ngah ta hen!” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro’ hutna pen na maizumna uh hi ding a, Izipt’ liahna sunga na bukna uh nomau’ zahhuaina hi ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ uliante in Zoans khua-ah va tung a, amau’ tangmite in Hane khua a va phak uh hangin,
amaute tungah phattuamna a pia thei lo, maizumna leh mindaina cih loh buang huhna leh phattuamna a pia thei lo mite hangin Judah mi khempeuh in maizumna ngah ding uh hi.

Negeb gam-a ganhingte tawh kisai thu: Amaute in, humpinelkai nu leh humpinelkai pa, gul gu nei leh a leengthei gulpi a omna, lungkhamna leh gimna gam nawk-in, amau’ hauhnate la nungzang leh amau sumte kalaoh thuvum tungah suanin amaute bangmah phattuamna a pia thei lo mite tungah puak uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt’ huhna bangmah man loin a hawmpi hi a, tua ahih manin, “Tang lo a, a tu hithiat Rahab” ci-in min ka phuah hi.
Tu-in pai in la, hong tung lai ding hunte ah teci ahi ngitnget dingin amaute’ mai-ah suangpeek tungah gelh in la, laizial khat sungah at in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen, a lehdo mite, a zuau thei tapate, Topa’ hilhna thu a ngai nuam lo mite ahi uh hi;
amaute in thu mutheite tungah, “Mu nawn kei un,” ci-in, kamsangte tungah “Kote’ tungah thuman hong gen kei un; kote’ tungah thuzol bek hong gen un la, thutak ahi lote genkhol un,
lampi nusia-in, lamzin panin pial un la, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa’ thu hong zasak nawn kei un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israelte’ Siangtho Pa in, “Note in hih thu simmawh-in, zawhthawhna leh khemna suangin, tuate muang na hih manun;
hih mawhna pen note’ adingin kulh sangpi khat khangkham-a lawtkhia-in a cim dektak, theih kholh lohin thakhat a, a cim vat tawh kibang ding hi;
tua cipna pen iplah loin a kidengkham beel seekpa’ beel themte lak pan meikhuk a, mei lak nading ahi zongin, tuikhuk a, tui dip nading ahi zongin a om het lo tawh kibang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israelte’ Siangtho Pa, alian Pasian in, “Kihei kikna leh khawlna bek tawh note in suahtakna na ngah ding uh hi; daii tak-a omna leh muanna in nomau’ thahatna hi ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin note na tuaci kei uh a,
“Hi lo! Sakol tungah manlang takin i tai ding hi,” ci na hih uh ciangin note na taikhia ding uh a; “Sakol zaptel tungah i tuang ding hi,” ci na hih uh ciangin note hong delh mite zong zaptel ding hi.

Mual sang dawn a, dial khuam bang ahi a, mualtunga dial tawh kibangin ahi zongin, note hong kinusiat dong matengin, mi khat’ tawn’na tawh tulkhat tai-in, mihing nga’ tawn’na tawh note na taimang ding uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin note hehpih nuamin Topa in hong ngak hi; note tungah hehpihna hong lah ding amah kipakta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa pen a thutang Pasian ahi hi; amah a muangte khempeuh thupha ngah ahi hi.

Hi hi, Jerusalem khua sunga a teeng Zion sunga a om mite aw, note na kap nawn kei ding uh hi. Note’ huh ngen a, kahna aw hangin amah in hong hehpih taktak ding a, amah in a zak ciangin note hong dawng ding hi.
Topa in note tungah cihmawhna leh gimna an hong piak hangin, na Siate uh kiseel nawn lo ding uh a, amaute na mit mahmah uh tawh na mu ding uh hi.
Taklam na kihei ciang uh hita leh veilam na kihei ciang uh hita leh, “Hih pen lampi hi, hih tawn un,” cihna aw, na nung lam panun na bil un a za ding hi.

Tua ciangin note in ngun tawh a kizut na milimte uh leh kham a kiluan’ a kisung na milimte uh numei nindalna puan bang hi. Nin bangin tuate na thehthang ding uh a, tuate tungah, “Bei mang un!” na ci ding uh hi.
Amah in, khaici na tuh nadingun guah hong zusak ding a, lei pan-a piang an hoih tampi tak hong pia ding hi. Tua ni ciangin gankhahna mun zaina-ah na ganhingte un lopa ne ding uh hi;
lo a kho bawngtalte leh late in kawbia leh tu-ka tawh a kitoksa an al ne ding uh hi.
Na galte uh’ tausangte pukin mi tampi a sih ni-in, mualsang leh mual neute tung khempeuh ah lui tui luang ding hi.
Tua tham loin, Topa in ama mite’ liamna tuamin ama satna meimate a damsak ni ciangin kha taang pen ni taang bang ding a, ni taang pen ni sagih sunga taang zah bangin a zah sagih-in taang ding hi.
En un, Topa’ Min gamlapi panin kimu thei hi. Ama hehna meikuangpi leh meikhu in hong kilangsak a, ama kampaunate, mei bangin a kuang hi.
Ama husan in, ngawng dong a banto, a taii tuikhang bang ahi hi. Amah in minamte’ thuak siatnate haihna sungah a haih hi; amah in lamkhialsak kamkaihna pen mite’ khaguh ah a thuah hi.

Ahi zongin no Pasian’ mite in ahih leh, biakna pawi a kikham ni zan a, bangin la na sa ding uh hi; Israelte’ Suangpi, Topa’ mual-ah a pai dingin tamngai aw gin’na zui-in a kuankhiate bangin na lungdam ding uh hi.
Topa in heh mahmahna leh a kangtum thei meikuang sung panin vanging leh huihpi leh gialpi tawh, ama liatna minthan’na aw kizasakin, ama khut a viik sukna kimusak ding hi.
Amah in a ciangkhut tawh a sat ciangin, Assiria mite in Topa’ aw kihta mahmah ding uh hi.
Topa in amaute daan pia-in ciang tawh a satna a gingte tawh kituakin khuang leh laiza lasaknate tumin na gingsak ding uh hi. Amah in a khut viik-in amaute do ding hi.

Tofeth a kihal nading mei phualpi mun, sawt pekin kibawl khin zo hi; hi hi, kumpipa’ adingin a baihsa-in kikoih a, a mi-halna pen lianin kisangsak a, sing a sangpi-in vum venvan hi. Topa in kaat kuang hu sang khia ding a, tua meiphualpi tawh kuang ding hi.

Izipt gamah huhna ngen dingin paisuk a, sakolte suan’ in a nei, leengte a tam manin muang a, sakol tuangte a hat mahmah manin a suang, ahih hangin Israelte’ Siangtho Pa a suang lo, Topa thu a dong lote in gimna ngah ta hen!
Ahih hangin amah pil-in gimna tungsak a, a thu gensate dokkik loin, siatna bawl mite leh mawhna nasep a seppihte daan a pia hi.
Izipt mite mihing hi a, Pasian hilo hi; amau’ sakolte in sa hi a, kha hilo hi. Topa in a khut a zan ciangin a huhpa puk-in, huhna a ngahpa tuk ding a, amaute khempeuh siakhawm ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in keima tungah hih bangin hong ci a, humpinelkai ahi a, humpinelkai khanglai in ahi zongin a sa nek ding a ngik ciangin, amah do dingin tuucingte honpi khat kisamkhia-in, amaute’ otna hangin lau tuan loin , amaute’ gamlumna hangin a sin a dawilok tuan loh mah bangin, Vanglianpen Topa zong Zion Mual tungah galdo dingin hong kuansuk ding hi.
A kot lamlam vasate bangin Vanglianpen Topa in Jerusalem dal ding hi; amah in dalin khahkhia ding a, amah in khengsuakin, suakta sak ding hi.
Israel mite aw, nakpi tak-a na dopa uh’ lamah kihei kik un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a kuamah peuh in no adingin na bawlsa uh, mawhna ahi na ngun milimte uh leh na kham milimte uh na paihkhiat hun uh hong tung ding hi.

“Assiria pen mihing’ namsau ahi lo, namsau khat tawh puk ding a, mihing namsau ahi lo, namsau khat in susia ding hi; namsau panin tai ding uh a, a tangvalte uh zawhthawh thu tawh nasem dingin kikoih ding hi.
Amau’ belh a mun muanhuai uh, launa hangin tai ding a, buaina hangin a uliante in a lim uh taisan ding hi,” ama meikuang Zion ah a om, ama meikhuk Jerusalem khua ah a om Topa in ci hi.
En un, ni khat ni ciangin thumanna tawh kumpi khat hong maang ding a, thutan’na tawh uliante in hong uk ding uh hi.
Amaute pen, huihpi panin belhna, guahpi panin bukna bang ding uh a, sehnel gam sunga tui luang bangin, nisa gam sunga om suangpi liim bang ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amau’ mit si loin, mi cimawhte’ kisapna mu ding a, amau’ bil in mi cimawhte’ thugen ngai ding uh hi.
Amaute lungtomin hi phangphang nawn lo ding uh a, deihsakna lungsim tawh tel takin thugen hiathiat ding uh hi.
Mi haite pen mi thupi kici nawn lo ding a, mi ginalote pen mi zahtakhuai kici nawn lo ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh mi hai in haina thu gen a, a lungsim ah gitlohna om a, a hoihin gamtat loh ding, Topa’ thu a hilopi-in gen ding, a gilkialte’ an duhna a phat lohna ding leh dangtakte in tui dawn ding a neih theih loh nadingin, ama lungsim in mawhna bawl ding sawm hi.
Mi gina lote’ ginat lohna in sia hi; zuauna kam tawh mizawngte siasak leh mi cimawhte’ thu a thuman ciang nangawnin a siasak dingin amah in gitloh nasepna bawl hi.
Ahih hangin mipi lungsim a nei mi in na hoihte geel a, thu hoih nate ah a pang hi.
Nuam tak-a a om hithiat numeite aw, tho un la, ka aw za un; nomau tum tak-a a lungmuang tanute aw, ka thugenna na ngai un.
Nomau thu tum tak-a a lungkim numeite aw, kumkhat val zek khit ciangin na liinglawng ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh leenggah kum hong sia ding a, singgah lawhna hun hong tung lo ding hi.
Nuam tak-a om hithiat numeite aw, liing un, nomau tum tak-a a lungmuangte aw, liinglawng un; na puan uh hawkkhia-in na tangguakun om un la, na kawng uhah puanhampi teeng un.
A hoih mahmah lote leh tampi a gah leengguite a siatna, keima mite’ leitangah ling leh lingkungte a pona, leh lungdamna khuapi sunga lungdamna a omna innte a siatna hangin dahin na awm uh beng un.
Munmuanhuaite kinusia-in, mi tampi a omna kumpi khuapi kilawi ding hi. Mual leh tausangte zong kisia gawp ding a, late leh tuuhonte in gamtatna munin nei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian in a Kha Siangtho hong puakkik ding hi. Leitang siate lo hoih hong suakkik ding a, lo-a ante hoih mahmah-in tulak bang ding hi.
Tua ciangin gamsung mun khempeuh ah thutang om ding a, thu a manin kisem ding hi.
Tua ciangin thumanna hangin nopna om ding a, thumanna hangin daihna leh lungmuan’ tawntungna om ding hi.
Ka mihingte pen kilem tak-a teen’na lungmuang tak-a omna inn, daii tak-a tawlngakna munah om ding uh hi.
(Tua ciangin gial in tulak kolh siangsak ding a, a khuapi pen cimzan ding hi.)
Tui tampi a omna-ah khai tuh a, bawngtal leh late a ut utna-ah a ta sak note in mi lungdam na hi uh hi.

Hong kisusia nai lo, mi a susiapa aw, gimna a ngah ding na hi ta hi. Kuamah in hong khem nai loh mi khempa aw, gimna a ngah ding na hi ta hi. Na suksiat nawn loh ciangin nang hong kisusia ding a, na khem nawn loh ciangin nang hong kikhem ding hi.
Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in; nang kong muang uh hi. Zing simin kote hatna hong hi in la, lungkham hunin hong honkhia in.
Vanging a bang nangma’ aw hangin mite tai a, nangma thawhtohna hangin minamte kithehthang hi;
tangngol in na a khop bangin amau’ van nusiatte kikaikhawm a, kauphe honpi bangin van tawmin mite phe zaizai hi.
A sangna munah teeng ahih manin Topa kipahtawi hi; amah in thutang leh dikna tawh Jerusalem dimsak ding hi;
amah pen nangma hunte a kipna, hohkhiatna a kicin’na, pilna leh theihna hi ding hi; Topa kihtakna pen ama sumgum hi ding hi.
En un, galhangte huhna ngenin kiko uh a, kilem nading palai semte nakpi takin kap uh hi.
Lam lianpite gambulak suak a, lampi ah kuamah khualzin ngam nawn lo hi. Thuciamnate kipeksat-in, thukimnasate kipalsat a, khat leh khat kizahtakna om nawn lo hi.
Leitang kinusia cipin ommawk hi. Lebanon mual-a tulak singte vulgawp a, Sharon gam leihoih pen sehnel gam bang ta hi; Bashan mual leh Karmel mual-a singtehte pulh mang khin ta uh hi.
Topa in, minam dangte kiangah, “Tu-in ka tho to ding a, ka vangliatna ka lak ding hi; tu-in kei hong kipahtawi ta ding hi.
Lopa keu na paii-a buhkung na suaksak hi. Na husan in nang hong kangtum mei ahi hi.
Leikang ngah nadingin suangkang kihal bangin na vui suak ding uh a, meikhuk sunga a kihaltum lingkungte na bang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Gamlapi-a om mite aw, ka sepna thu za un; a nai-a om mite aw, ka vangliatna thei un.

Zion-a om mawhnei mite lau uh a, Pasian thu a ngaihsun lo mite lau-in lingcip uh hi. Amaute in, “Pasian’ thukhenna in a kuang tawntung mei tawh kibang hi. Tua bang meikuang kua in thuak zo ding i hi hiam?” ci uh hi.

Thuman in gamta-in thutang na gen uh leh na suakta ding uh hi. Na vangliatna uh mizawngte khemna-in zang kei un la, sumgolh deih kei un. Mi that ding a vaihawmte’ thu ngai loin siatna lang khatah mit si un.
Hih in a san’na munte ah teengin, kulh mualpi bukna-a a zang ding mipa ahi hi. Amah an kipia in, a dawn ding tui kitasam lo ding hi.
Tua ciangin a hoih kumpipa na mu ding uh a, a zai mahmah a gam zong na en ding uh hi.
Ni dangin na kihtak uh gamdang mi siahdongte leh siahkhawmte, tausang a cingte na phawk kha nawn kei ding uh hi.
Na theihtheih loh, a kitello kampau a zang, na tel theih loh-un a pau bualbual, mi kihisakte na mu nawn kei ding uh hi.
Pawite i bawlna khuapi Zion en un! Daii tak-a a kiteen’na mun, a khetphimte a tat ngei lo, a kikhin thei lo puanbuk a bang, Jerusalem khuapi, na mu ding uh hi.

Tua khua sungah Topa in a thahat Pa hi in, a minthan’na hong langsak ding a, a zai gunte leh a zai lui geite-ah i teeng ding hi. Tua tuite tungah ei hong do ding gal gunkuang hong kihot nawn lo ding a, gal teembaw hong pai nawn lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa pen eite’ thukhen, Topa pen eite thukham hong piapa, Topa pen eite’ kumpi ahi hi; amah in eite hong honkhia ding hi.

Gal teembaw khaute kol a, ama om nading mun sanah gunkuang puan khuam lenkip zo lo a, gunkuang puan zal thei lo hi. Tua ciangin galte’ neihsate kihawm keek ding a, khebaite nangawnin van ngah ding uh hi.
I gam-a teeng mite kuamah in, “Ka ci na,” ci nawn lo ding uh a, mawhna khempeuh kimaisak ding hi.
Minamte aw, thu za dingin hong nai un, mihingte aw, ngai un. Leitang leh a tunga om khempeuh aw, ngai un; leitung leh a tung pan a, hong paite khempeuh in ngai un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh minamte khempeuh tungah Topa lungham-in, amaute khempeuh tungah heh mahmah a, a siamang dingin amaute koih-in, thah dingin pia khin ta hi.
A kithat amau’ mite kilawnkhia ding a, a si-luanghawmte uih semsem ding hi; amau’ sisan in mual khempeuh sansak ding hi.
Vantung-a om khempeuh maimang ding a, laidal bangin vantungte kizial ding hi. Leenggui panin a tehte pulh-in, theikung panin a tehte a pulh bangin aksi hon khempeuh pulh ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka namsau in vantungah a sep ding khempeuh a zawh khit ciangin, en un, a siamang ding a, ka sehsa Edom mite tungah thukhen dingin hong kum suk ding hi.

Topa in namsau khat nei hi; sisan tawh kidim ding a, biakna piakna tuuno si leh keel si, tuutalte’ kalthau tawh a zol bang ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Bozrah khua ah hih biakna piakna nei ding a, Edom gamah hih bang tampi thahna omsak ding hi.
Gamsial talte amaute tawh tukkhawm ding a, bawngtalno gehsate leh bawngtal hatte tukkhawm ding hi. Amau gam pen sisan tawh kidiah ding a, amau’ leitang pen sathau in nipsak ding hi.
Topa in Zion a hotkhiat ding, phulak ni khat nei hi. A galte a thuksak ding hun khat nei hi.
Lui tui khempeuh kultal tui suak ding a, leitang pen kaat suak ding hi; gamsung pen a kuang kultal tui suak ding hi.
Sun leh zanin mit lo ding a, vanah a khu kahto ngitnget ding hi. Khang khat pan khang khat, a hawm guakin om ding hi; kuamah in nawk ngei nawn het lo ding hi.

Ahih hangin gamlak simbu leh leh a ham zalzal simbu in, gamsung teng luah ding uh a, simbupi leh muu om ding uh hi. Pasian in Edom gam tungah buaina a khaukhai khai sukin kisiatna khaukhai sikbawk khia ding hi.
Kumpi Gam Om Lo, ci-in amaute in min phuak ding uh a, a ulian khempeuhte a mawkna hi ding uh hi.
Kumpi inn liante sungah lingkung po ding a, kulh a nei khua sungah laho kung leh thangling kung po ding hi. Ngiate’ an zon’na mun suakin, kalaoh-vasate’ omna hi ding hi.
Gamlak ganhingte leh ngiate kikhawl ding a, gamkeel in a lawmte sam ding hi; zan a, gamta ganhingte zong hong tuak sukin ama om nading mun zong ding hi.
Tua munah keising in bu tomin, tui-in, keuhin, ama kha liimah a note huai ding hi; musite zong kikhawm tuahin a nupa ciat-un om ding uh hi.

Topa’ laizial sung panin zong un la sim un: Hih ganhingte khempeuh khat beek zong mangthang lo ding a, lawmsam khat zong om lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ kam in thu pia khin zo a, amahmah in amaute kaikhawm ding hi.
Amah in amaute’ tan dingin leitang hawmsak ding a, amau’ tanh ding ciat pia ding hi. Amaute in tua gam nei tawntung ding a, khang khat pan khang khat dongin teeng paisuak ding uh hi.
Gamlak leh lei keuna gam lungdam ding a, sehnel gam lungdamin palhkhia ding hi; unok pak bangin

tampi takin palhkhia ding a, lung nopna leh lasakna tawh lungdam ding hi. Lebanon mual a minthan’na, Karmel mual leh Sharon mual, a min liatna ama tungah kipia ding hi. Amaute in Topa’ minthan’na, i Pasian’ liatna mu ding uh hi.
A zaw khutte khauhsak un la, a no khukte kipsak un.
Lungsim lauthawng mite kiangah, “Thakhauh un, lau kei un! En un, na galte uh tungah phu hong laksak dingin Pasian hong pai ding a, amah in note hong honkhia ding hi,” ci un.
Tua ciangin mittawte’ mit kihong ding a, bilngongte’ bil kihong ding hi;

tua ciangin khebai mipa pen sakhi bangin diangin lam ding a, a pau thei lo mipa in lungdamin la sa ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh gamlakah tui hong phulkhia ding a, sehnel gam sungah lui tui hong luang ding hi;
a sa mahmah sehnelte bualtui hong suak ding a, a keugaw leitang pen ciktui tawh hong kidim ding hi; ngiate’ omna ngei leitang pen nawngpi suakin, lopa, pumpeng leh mau po ding hi.
Tua lai-ah lam lianpi khat om ding a, Lampi Siangtho kici ding hi; a siang lo mite in tua tung tawn ngei lo ding a, mi haite in tua lam a zui mite khialsak nawn lo ding hi.
Tua lai-ah humpinelkai om lo ding a, sasialne ganhing khat peuhpeuh hong pai lo ding hi; tua lai-ah ganhing lauhuaite kimu lo ding hi. Topa’ tatkhiatsa mite in tua lampi tawnin hong ciah ding uh hi.

Topa’ tatkhiatsa mite hong ciah kikin, lungdam tawntungna mai pua-in lasa kawmin Jerusalem hong tung ding uh hi; amaute in lungdamna leh kipahna ngah ding uh a, dahna leh khuisatna om nawn lo ding hi.
Hezekiah Kumpipa in a uk zawh kum sawm leh lina kumin Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib in Judah gam sunga khuapi muanhuai khempeuh do-in a la hi.

Lakhish khua panin Assiria kumpipa in Jerusalem khua a, Hezekiah Kumpipa a lut ding a gen dingin anuai-a ulian khat leh galkap honpi a sawl hi. Puansawppa’ nasepna phual zuatna lampi-a bual tungnung tui lampi gei-ah a ulianpa khawl hi.
Tua ciangin amah tawh kimu dingin Hilkiah’ tapa ahi kumpi inn sung saipa Eliakim leh lai-atpa Shebna leh Asaf tapa ahi thuciamtehpa Joah hong paikhia uh hi.
Tua ciangin a galkap manglian in amaute kiangah a genna panin, “Hazekiah’ kiangah, ‘Kumpi lian ahi, Assiria kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi. Hih na lungmuanna uhah bang siksan na hi uh hiam?
Kampau lel pen galdo nadingin vaihawmna leh vaang-in ngaihsun na hi uh hiam? Kei nong lehdo nadingun kua suang na hi uh hiam?
En un, ama tunga a kingam mipa’ khut a sun ding, a kikuaitansa pumpeng ciangkhut tawh a kibang, Izipt na suang uh hi. Amah a muang khempeuhte tungah Izipt kumpipa Faro, tua pumpeng bang hi lel hi.

Ahih hangin note in, “Topa ka Pasian uh ka suang uh hi,” a ci-a kinei na hih uh leh ama mun sangte leh biakna taute Hezekiah in lakhia-in, Judah leh Jerusalem tungah, “Hih biakna tau mai-ah na bia ding uh hi,” ci hilo ahi hiam?
Tu-in hong pai un la, ka topa Assiria kumpipa tawh kiciamna khat bawl un: A tunga tuang ding mi na ngah zawh nak uh leh sakol tulnih kong pia ding hi.
Izipt mite’ leengte leh sakol muanna tawh ka topa’ leengte lak panin a neu pen khat ahi galkap mang khat bek nangawn bangci-in not zo ding na hi uh hiam?
Tua tham loin, hih gam a susia Topa’ thu loin hong pai ka hi hiam? Topa in kei kiangah, “Pai to-in hih gam do in la, susia in,” hong ci hi,’ ci-in gen un,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin Eliakim, Shebna leh Joah in a ulianpa kiangah, “Kote in thei ngawn ka hih manun na nasemte tungah Aram pau tawh hong gen hoh in; kulh tunga om mite’ zakna-ah Judah pau tawh thu nong gen loh nadingin kong thuum uh hi,” ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin a ulianpa in, “Hih thute na topa uh leh note tung bekah gen ding a, amau’ ek mah ne-in amau’ zun mah dawnin note tawh a siakhawm ding kulh tunga tu mite tungah a gen lo dingin ka topa in hong sawl sa na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a ulianpa dingto-in, Hebru pau-in nakpi takin kiko a: “Assiria kumpi, kumpi lianpa’ thu za un!
Kumpipa in, ‘Amah in note hong honkhia thei lo ding ahih manin Hezekiah’ khemsa-in om kei un.
“Topa in eite hong honkhia taktak ding hi; hih khuapi pen Assiria kumpipa’ khut sungah kipia lo ding hi,” ci-a Hezekiah in hong genna tawh na Topa uh muang kha kei un.

16-17 Hezekiah’ thu ngai kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh Assiria kumpipa in hih bangin ci hi. Kei tawh kilemna bawl un la, kei kiangah hong pai un; kei hong pai-in, note’ gam tawh a kibang gam khat, an leh leenggahzu gam, an leh leenggui gamah kong koih matengin note khempeuh in nomau leenggah ciat, nomau theigah ciat, na tuikhuk panun nomau tui ciat na ne ding uh hi.

Hezekiah in, ‘Topa in eite hong honkhia ding hi,” ci-in lam hong khialsak kha ding ahih ciangin kidawm un. Assiria kumpipa’ khut sung panin minamte’ pasian khatpeuh in ama gam honkhia zo ngei ahi hiam?
Hamath gam leh Arpad gam pasiante koi-ah om ahi hiam? Sefarvaim gam pasiante koi-ah om ahi hiam? Amaute in ka khut sung panin Samaria honkhia zo ahi hiam?
Topa in ka khut sung panin Jerusalem khua a hotkhiat nadingin, hih gamte khempeuh’ pasiante’ lakah kua in ka khut sung panin a gam uh honkhia zo ahi hiam?’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa in, “Dawng kei un,” ci-in thu pia khol khin ahih manin amaute daii takin om uh a, kam khat beek dawng lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin Hilkiah’ tapa ahi kumpi-inn sung a sai Eliakim leh a lai-at Shebna leh Asaf tapa ahi thuciamtehpa Joah in a puan uh balkeekin Hezekiah’ kiangah pai uh a, a ulianpa’ thugen teng va gen uh hi.
Hezekiah Kumpipa in a zak ciangin dahin ama puante balkeek a, puanhampi silhin Topa’ inn sungah pai hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, inn sung saipa Eliakim, lai-atpa Shebna leh siampi khangham teng dahna limin puanhampi silh kawmin Amoz’ tapa kamsangpa Isaiah kiangah sawl hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Hezekiah in, ‘Tu ni pen lungkham ni, tai ngah ni, mindai ni ahi hi; naungeek a suah hun tung napi-in a hingkhia zo lo nupi tawh i kibang hi.

A nungta Pasian zahko dingin ama topa, Assiria kumpipa in a sawl a galkap mangpa’ thugennate, Topa na Pasian in za hen la, tua bang thu a gente daantat ta hen. Tua ahih ciangin a om lai i mite’ adingin thungen in,’ a ci hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Kumpipa Hezekiah’ nasemte Isaiah kiangah a tun ciangin,
Isaiah in amaute tungah, “Na Topa uh kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Assiria kumpipa’ nasemte in keimah a hong simmawhna na zaksa uh thute hangin lau kei un.

En un, ama sungah kha khat ka guan ding a, amah in kamlengsawn khat za-in, ama gamah a ciahkik nading lungsim ka guan’ ding hi; ama gam sungah namsau tawh amah ka tuksak ding hi,’ ci-in gen un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a galkap mangpa ciahkik a, Assiria kumpipa in Libnah khua a dona-ah va pai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa in Lakhish khua a nusiat khitna thu za zo ahih manin tua lai va zuan pah hi.
Tu-in, Ethiopia kumpipa Tirhakah in Assiria gam sim dingin Izipt galkap honpi tawh hong kuanna thu kumpipa in a za hi. Hih thu a zak ciangin Assiria kumpipa in Hezekiah kiangah kamtaite sawl a,
“Judah kumpipa Hezekiah kiangah hih bangin gen un: ‘Assiria kumpipa’ khut sungah Jerusalem kipia lo ding hi, ci-a thu hong ciam na suan’ Pasian’ khemsa-in om kei in.
En in, Assiria kumpite in gam khempeuhah a bawlna, a suksiat mang khitna na za zo hi. Nang hong kisuaktasak tuan ding ahi hiam?
Ka pu ka pate un a suksiat minamte, Gozan minam, Haran minam, Rezef minamte leh Telassar khua-a om Eden mite pen amau’ pasiante in honkhia zo ahi hiam?
Hamath kumpipa, Arpad kumpipa, Sefarvaim khuapi kumpipa, Hena kumpipa ahih kei leh Ivvah kumpipate koi-ah om ahi hiam?’ va ci un,” ci-in a gen hi.
Hezekiah in kamtaite tung panin a lai puak uh saangin, a lai sim hi; Topa’ innah Hezekiah pai to-in, Topa’ mai-ah a lai zal hi.
Hezekiah in Topa’ tungah thungenin:
“Vanglianpen Topa, Israelte’ Pasian, Kherubte tunga a tupa aw, leitung kumpi gam khempeuhte’ tungah nang bek Pasian na hi hi; nangmah in vantung leh leitung na bawl khin hi.
Topa aw, na bil hong ngat in la, hong za in; Topa aw, na mit hak in la, hong mu in; Sennakherib in a nungta Pasian a zahkona, hong khak thute khempeuh za in.
Topa aw, Assiria kumpite in minamte leh a gam khempeuh susia mang khin taktak a,
amaute’ pasiante pen meikhuk sungah paihsakin susia khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen pasian hi loin, mite’ khut tawh a kibawl sing leh suangte ahi hi; tua ahih ciangin tuate kisusia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa aw, nang bek Pasian na hihna leitung kumpi gam khempeuh in a theih nadingin, tu-in ama khut sung panin kote hong honkhia in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Amoz’ tapa Isaiah in Hezekiah tungah thu puak a, “Israelte’ Pasian, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Nang in Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib tawh kisai thu, kei kiangah thu hong ngen khin na hih ciangin,
amah tawh kisai-in Topa’ thugen in hih ahi hi: ‘Sennakherib aw, Zion tanungak siangtho in nang hong simmawh in hong zahko uh hi; Jerusalem mite in na nungah a lu hong peisan lel uh hi.
‘Nang in kua zahko-in kua gensia na hi hiam? Nang in kua tungah na aw sangsakin, kiphasak na hi hiam? Israelte’ Siangtho Pa, kei tungah hong tuaci na hi hi.

Nangmah in na nasempa zangin, Topa na zahko a, Lebanon mual dong pek, mual sangte tungah ka leeng tampite tawh ka pai khin hi; taamtak sing a sang pente, taksing hoih pente ka phuk khin hi; a sang pen mun, tulak a thuk penna munah ka paikhin hi.
Tuikhuk to-in, tui ka dawn a, Izipt lui tuite khempeuh ka galkapte’ khe nuai tawh ka keusak hi, na ci hi.

26-27 ‘Sawt pek-a kipan ka sehsa hi a, ka geelsa ahih lamtak za lo na hi hiam? Nang in khuapi muanhuaite siasakin suang kiciang bang na suahsak nading, a sunga teeng mite a thahatna uh bei-in, lungkia-in a om mawk nading leh amaute pen, lo lai-a kungnote leh lopa ngeekte, innkhum zang a, a po, a khan’khit ma-a a keutum lopate tawh a kibat nading, tu huna ka tun’sak thute pen tang lai pek pan-a ka ngaihsutna ahi hi.
‘Na omna mun, na pusuahna, na sungtumna leh keima tungah na hehna ka thei hi.
Keima tungah nang hehin, na kiphatsakna thu kei tungah hong tung ahih manin, na nak-ah sikkawi bulhin, na kamah kamkaih hong bulhin, nong paina lampi lam mahah nang kong ciahkik sak ding hi,’ ci hi.

“Nang Hezekiah’ adingin hih in lim hong hi ding hi: tu kumin anli pote na ne ding uh a, a kum nihna ciangin tua bangmah-a pote na ne ding uh hi; a kum thumna ciangin khaituhin an na la ding uh a, leenggui suanin a gah na ne ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin, Judah minam sung panin a suakta lai mite in singkung bangin zung khasuk kikin, gah na gahto kik ding uh hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh a om laite Jerusalem pan ahi zongin, a suakta teng Zion Mual panin ahi zongin paikhia ding uh hi. Vanglianpen Topa’ deihluatna in hih thu hong tungsak ding hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin Assiria kumpipa tawh kisai-in Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Hih khuapi sungah amah hong pai loin, thaltang lawn lo ding a, lum tawh hong pai loin, galdo nading panmun hong bawl lo ding hi.
Hong paina lampi mahmah ah amah ciahkik ding a, hih khuapi sungah hong pai lo ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah leh ka nasempa David ka khualna-in hih khuapi a suahtak nadingin ka hu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi kuankhia-in Assiria mite’ giahphual ah mihing tulza leh tulsawmgiat leh tulnga that hi; zingsang ciangin mite a thawh ciangin hihte khempeuh mi si luang bekbek a na hi hi.
Tua ciangin Assiria kumpipa Sennakherib taikhia a, innah ciahin Nineveh khua-ah teeng hi.
Amah in ama pasian Nisrok innah bia-in a om lai takin, ama tate Adrammelek leh Sharezer in namsau tawh amah that uh a, Ararat gamah tai uh hi. Ama tapa Esarhaddon in ama tangin kumpi suak hi.

Tua hun lai takin Hezekiah a ci na-in si dektak hi. Amoz’ tapa, kamsangpa Isaiah ama kiangah hong pai-in, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Na innsung thu ding vaihawm in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang na si ding hi, na damkik zo kei ding hi, hong ci hi,” ci-in gen hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah kawm lam nga-in Topa’ tungah thungen a,
“Topa aw, lungsim khempeuh leh thuman tak tawh nangma mai-ah gamta-in, nangma muhna ah a hoih nate ka sepna thu, tu-in nong phawk nadingin kong thuum hi,” a ci hi. Hezekiah nakpi takin kap hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah tungah Topa’ thu hong tung a:
“Pai in la, Hezekiah kiangah gen in, Topa, na pa David’ pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Na thungetna ka za khin a, na khitui ka mu khin hi; en in, na nuntakna kumsawm leh kumnga kong piak beh ding hi.
Assiria kumpipa’ khut sung panin nang leh hih khuapi kong honkhia ding a, hih khuapi ka hu ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
Isaiah in, “Amah in hong ciamsa thu Topa in hong bawl nadingin, hih pen Topa’ tung panin nangma adingin lim ahi hi:
En in, Ahaz kumpipa’ ni-nai tungah nitum kuan-a liim pen kalsawm ka nungkiksak ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a tum khinsa ni pen ni-nai tungah kalsawm nungkik hi.
Judah kumpipa Hezekiah a ci na-in, a natna panin a dam khit ciangin a gelh lai in:
Ka hat saan lai takin a si ding ka hi ta a, ka kum om lai teng khempeuh sihna kong ah a om dingin hong kiseh hi ta hi, ka ci hi.
A hingte gam sungah Topa ka mu nawn kei ding a, leitunga a teeng mite lakah mihing ka en nawn kei ding hi, ka ci hi.

Tuucingpa’ puanbuk bangin ka omna inn kibotkhia-in kei kiang panin kilakhia hi; siamgante in a hial bangin ka nuntakna kihial khin a, amah in siambu panin kei hong at khia hi; sun leh zan tawntung gimna hong kithuaksak a,
zingsang dong lungduai takin, huhna ngenin ka kiko hi; humpinelkai bangin amah in ka guh khempeuh kuaitan a, sun leh zan tawntung gimna hong kithuaksak hi.
Phialphiah ahi a, gun vapi bangin ahi zongin ka haam a, vakhu bangin ka tau hi. Vantung lam kong et etna-in ka mitte gim hi. Topa aw, kei hong kinengniam hi; keimah huh dingin hong paita in!
Ahih hangin ke’n bang gen thei ding ka hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in kei tungah hong gen khin a, amahmah in hih thu hong bawl hi. Ka lunggim lua a, ka nuntak sung ka kiniamkhiat ding hi.
Topa aw, nang adingin kong nungta ding a, nang ading bek bekin nong nungta sak ding hi. Ka ci hong damsak kik in la, hong nungtasak in!
Gimna lianpi ka thuakna in keima metna hong suak ding hi. Lauhuaina khempeuh panin kei nong honkhia a, ka mawhna khempeuh na nungzang ah na koih hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh han-a om mite in nang tungah lungdamna hong ko thei lo a, a site in nang hong phat thei lo uh hi; gum sunga a pai sukte in nangma thumanna hong muang thei lo uh hi.
Tu ni-a keima bawl bangin, a hing mi, a hing mi bekin nang tungah lungdamna hong ko thei hi; pate in tate tungah nangma thumanna gen sawn uh hi.
Topa in kei hong hon ding a, Topa’ inn sungah i nuntak sung tawntung khausai lasakna i tum ding hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah, “Theigah la sak in la, na damkik nadingin na meimate nuh sak in,” ci hi.
Hezekiah in, “Topa’ innah ka paitoh zawh nadingin bang lim om ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Tua hun lai takin Baladan’ tapa, Babilon kumpi ahi Merodakbaladan in Hezekiah a ci na-in a dam kikna thu za ahih manin ama kiangah laikhak leh letsong tawh mite a sawl hi.

Hezekiah in amaute lim takin zin na do hi; amah in ama dangka inn, ngun, kham, paknamtuite, sathau manpha, a galvan koihna inn khempeuh, a van koihna sunga a kimu theite khempeuh amaute na lak hi. Ama inn sung hita leh, ama gamsung khempeuh a, omte hita leh Hezekiah in amaute a lah loh om lo hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpipa Hezekiah kiangah kamsangpa Isaiah hong pai-in, “Hih mite in bang gen ahi hiam? Koi lai panin nang kiangah hong pai ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Hezekiah in, “Amaute, a gamlapi, Babilon gam panin kei kiangah hong pai uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Amaute in na inn sungah bang mu uh hiam?” a ci hi. Hezekiah in, “Amaute in ka inn sunga om khempeuh mu khin uh hi; ka van koihna innte sunga nate amau ka lah loh om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Isaiah in Hezekiah kiangah, “Vanglianpen Topa’ thu ngai in:
En in, na inn sunga omte khempeuh leh na pu na pate in tu ni dong a, a kholsate, Babilon-ah a kipuak ding ni hong tung ding hi; bangmah kinusia lo ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Nang sung pan-a a suak, nangma tapate kimkhat kipaikhiatpih ding a, Babilon kumpipa’ inn sungah innsung mang nasep kisemsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Hezekiah in Isaiah kiangah, “Nong gensa Topa’ thu hoih hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Kei’ hun sungin nopna leh lungmuanna om ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Ka mite hehnem un, hehnem un, na Pasian un ci hi.
Dam takin Jerusalem hopih un. Ama gimna hun bei ta a, ama mawhna kimaisakin, ama khialhnate khempeuh hangin Topa in a zah nih in daantat khin zo hi, ci-in ama tungah gen un.
Awging khat in: “Gam lakah Topa’ lampi sial un la, sehnel gam sungah i Pasian’ ading lam lianpi khat a tangin bawl un.
Kuamthuk khempeuh kisangtosak ding a, mual liante leh mual neute kiniamsak ding hi; a tamkimlo munte kitamkim sak ding a, suanghum omna munte kizalhtam ding hi.
Topa’ kam in gen khin ahih manin, Topa’ minthan’na hong kilang ding a, mi khempeuh in mu khawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Awging khat in, “Kiko in!” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin keimah in, “Bang thu kiko ding ka hi hiam?” ka ci hi. Mi khempeuh in lopa bang hi a, ama hoihnate khempeuh pen gamlak-a paak tawh kibang hi.
Topa’ hu in a mut ciangin lopa vul-in, paak pulh hi; mihingte pen lopa bang lel hi taktak hi.
Lopa vul a, paak pulh hi; ahih hangin i Pasian’ thu kho tawntung ding hi.

Zion ah lungdamna thu hong puakpa aw, mualsang dawnah kahto in. Jerusalem ah lungdamna thu hong puak pa aw, nakpi takin awng in la, lungdamna thu taangko in. Nakpi takin kiko in la, lau kei in. Judah gam khuapite tungah, “Na Pasian uh hong pai ta hi,” ci-in gen in.
En un, Topa Pasian hong pai a, vangliatna tawh hong pai a, a banin ama adingin uk ding hi. En un, ama sep thamante hong pua a, a gualzawhna thamante hong masuan hi.
Amah in tuucingpa bangin a tuuhonte an vak ding a, amah in a tuunote a khut sungah kaikhawmin, amah in tuate a ang sungah pua ding a, no ngeek a neite pen dam takin paipih ding hi.
Kua in ama khut kuak sungah tuite tehin, ama khaap tawh vantungte teh a,lawh sung khatah leitung leivui khempeuh guang-in, pongkhaina tawh mual liante khai a, tawi tehna tawh mual neute teh ahi hiam?
Kua in Topa’ lungsim tel a, thu lamlakpa bangin kua in amah hilh ahi hiam?
Thu a kicing a, a muh nadingin amah in kua dong a, kua in amah lampi man hilhin, ama tungah thu theihna hilh a, thu theihtelna lampi lak ahi hiam?
En un, minamte pen tui phelkhai khat pan-a tuimal taak khat tawh kibang a, tawi tehna tunga leivui neng baang bangin kingaihsun hi; en un, amah in tuikulhte pen leivui neel bangin tawmto lel hi.
I Topa biak nadingin Lebanon sing kicing lo ding a, a ganhingte zong meihal biak nadingin kicing lo ding hi.
Minam khempeuhte ama mai-ah bangmah tham hi lo a, amaute pen bangmah a om lo leh, a hawm guak sangin a tawmzaw-in amah in ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian pen kua tawh tehkak ding a, amah pen bang lim tawh kibang ci ding na hi uh hiam?
Milim tawh teh theih ding hi lo hi. Milim a bawlpa in sung-in, khamsekpa khat in tua pen kham tawh zut-a, tua milim’ adingin ngun khainiangte sun’sak hi.
A gina lo khinta mipa in biakna a piak ding a muat lo ding sing teel hi; a taang thei lo milim khat a kituk lo dingin khutsiam mipa khat amah in zong hi.
Note in thei nai lo na hi uh hiam? Note in za nai lo na hi uh hiam? A kipat cilin note tungah hong kigen khin hilo ahi hiam? Leitung a pian’ akipan thei khinta hilo na hi uh hiam?
Leitung-a teeng mite kauphe tawh kibang, tua leitung kimkot tunga kumpi tokhom tungah a tu-pa; vantungte pen puan bangin zal-in, a sungah teen theih nadingin puanbuk bangin a zalpa;
uliante a mawkna suaksakin, leitung ukte pen bangmah lo a suaksakpa in amah ahi hi.

Amaute pen a gina-in kisuan lo, a gina-in kivawh lo, amau’ kungte in a gina-in lei sungah zung kha lo uh a, amah in amaute a mut ciangin amaute vul a, huihpi in nahpa keu bangin amaute a len’ khiatpih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kei kua tawh hong tehkak ding na hi uh hiam? Siangtho Pa in ci hi.

A sangna vantung lam ento un la, mu un: kua in hihte piangsak ahi hiam? Amau’ aksi honpite khat khatin piangsakin, a lian ama thahatna tawh amaute khempeuh a min un a sampa ahi hi; vangliatna-ah thahat ahih manin khat beek pelem lo hi.
“Topa’ kiang panin keima lampi kiliah a, keima Pasian in ka thuneihna don lo hi,” Jakob aw, bang hang-a ci a, Israel aw, bang hang-a tuaci pau na hi hiam?
Thei nai lo na hi hiam? Za nai lo na hi hiam? Topa pen tawntung Pasian hi a, leitung mong khempeuh a Piangsakpa ahi hi. Amah gim lo a, zong tawl lo hi; ama thu theihtelna kigen zo lo hi.
Amah in a gim mi tungah thahatna pia a, thahatna a nei lo mi a thahatna khangsak hi.
Khangnote nangawn gim-in kituk ding a, khanglai mite a tha uh bei ding hi;
Ahih hangin Topa a ngak mite a tha uh dimkik ding a, muvanlai bangin kha tawh leengto-in, amaute tai napi-un tawl lo ding uh a, amaute lam pai napi-un gim lo ding uh hi.
Tuikulh gamte aw, gamdai takin ka thu ngai un; na mite a tha uh dimsak un la, amaute a mai-ah hong paisak un. Amaute thugen theihna ding hun ngah ding uh hi. Thukhen zumah kei tawh kisi nung.

A nasem dingin dikna tawh samin, nisuahna pan-a mipa kua in hanthawn ahi hiam? Amah in ama khut sungah minamte piakhia ahih manin, amah in kumpite tuancil hi; amah in a namsau tawh amaute leivui bangin bawl a, ama thal tawh nahpa leeng bang sak hi.
Ama khe in a tot ngei loh lampite zui-in amah in amaute delh a, nuam takin pai suak hi.
A kipat cil-a kipan a khang khang-a mite a sam, hih nasep semin a bawl kua ahi hiam? A masa leh a nunung, Topa ahi keimah ka hi hi; kei in Amah ka hi hi.
Tuikulh gamte in mu khinin lau uh a, leimongte liing uh hi; amaute in hong nai-in hong pai uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in a vengte ciat huh a, a sanggamte ciat kiangah, “Tha hat un,” ci hi.

Khutsiampa in kham sekpa hanthawnin, sek tawh milim a nel puahpa in sekpi tawh a satpa hanthawn a, sumtui a luan’na uh “Hoih hi,” ci uh hi; a tuk thei lo dingin amaute in tua milim siktukkilh tawh khen kip uh hi.
Ahih hangin, nang, ka nasempa Israel, ka lawmpa Abraham’ suan leh khak, kong teelsa Jakob aw,
lei mong panin kong lakkhiat, leimong kiu gamla pen pan-a kong sap khiat, “Nang in ka nasempa na hi a, nangmah kong teel khin zo a, nangmah kong nilkhia kei hi,” kong cihpa aw,
nang tawh hong om ka hih manin lau kei in, na Pasian ka hih manin lungkia kei in; nang hong thakhauh sakin kong huh ding a, nang hong hu-in ka dikna khut taklam tawh kong honkhia ding hi.
En in, nangma tunga a heh mite khempeuh maizumna kithuaksakin kikoih khong ding hi; nangmah hong dem mite pen a mawkna suakin siatna thuak ding uh hi.
Nangmah hong langpangte na zon’ hangin amaute na mu nawn kei ding hi; nangmah hong dote pen bangmah hi het lo ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah Topa na Pasian in na khut taklam ka len hi; Lau kei in, nangmah kong huh ding hi,” nang tunga hong cipa in keimah ka hi hi.
Lungno bang ahi lel Jakob, Israel mite aw, lau kei un! Note kong huh ding hi, Topa in ci hi; note hong Tanpa in Israelte’ Siangtho Pa ahi hi.
En un, note pen, a thak, a hiam, ha a nei buhcilna-in kong bawl ding hi; note in mual liante cilin na suvui ding uh a, mual neute pen ansi bangin na gawi zan ding uh hi;
amaute na haih ding uh a, huih in amaute mutkhia ding a, huihpi in amaute thehthang ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa’ hangin na lungdam ding uh a, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa’ hangin na minthang ding uh hi.
Keima mite in tui duhin tui zong uh a, a dang uh a taak ciangin, amau’ hong thungetna ka pia ding a, Israelte’ Pasian ahi keimah in amaute ka nusia kei ding hi.
Bangmah om lohna a sangna munte panin gunte ka luangsak ding a, kuamte’ laizangah tuikhukte ka omsak ding hi; gamlak pen bualtui ka suaksak ding a, lei keuna mun pen ciktui ka suaksak ding hi.
Gam lakah taamtaak sing, singkha sing, mui sing leh oliv kungte ka posak ding hi; sehnel gam sungah taaksan sing, hiangpa sing leh taak sing ka suankhawm ding hi;
Topa’ khut in hih nate bawl hi, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa in hih nate piangsak hi, ci-in mite in mu-in a theih nading, ngaihsunin a thu a teltheih nading uh ahi hi.
Na thu uh sung un, Topa in ci hi; na lahtel nopna teng uh gen un, Jakob’ Kumpipa in ci hi.

Amaute in a thu uh hong paipih hen la, a piang ding thu hong gen uh hen. Eite in i ngaihsut theih nading a, a hong piang ding thu i theih nadingin a beisa hun-a om nate bang teng hiam cih hong gen uh hen; tua ahih kei leh zong, a hong piang ding thu eite tungah hong gen ta uh hen.

Note pen pasiante na hihna uh ka theih nadingun tu khit ciang-a hong piang ding thute kote tungah hong gen un; kote lungkia-in ka lau nadingun phatna ahi a, siatna ahi zongin khat peuhpeuh hong bawl dih un.
En un, note, bangmah na hi kei uh a, na nasepnate uh a mawkna ahi hi; note hong teelpa in a etsathuai ahi hi.

Leilu lam gam panin mi khat ka hanthawn a, amah hong kuan khin hi, nisuahna lam panin amah in ka min hong lo ding hi; beel sekpa in buan a cil bang, sum sunga a kisu gawp bangin, amah in gam ukte tuancil gawp ding hi.

Eite in i theih nadingin a kipat cil-a kipan kua in hong genkhia a, “Amah man hi,” i cih theih nadingin a hun ma-in kua in gen ahi hiam? Kuamah in gen khia lo, kuamah in pulak lo a, kuamah in no’ thu za lo hi.
Topa ahi keimah in Zion tungah hih thu ka pulak masa a, Jerusalem tungah lungdamna thutak ka gen hi.
Ahih hangin tua mun ka et ciangin kuamah om lo hi; thu ka dot ciangin hong dawng ding om lo a, thu lamlak amaute lakah om lo hi.
En un, amaute khempeuh zuaupi vive ahi hi; amau’ nasepnate a mawkna ahi hi; a kisung amau’ milimte pen huih hawmpi ahi uh hi.
Keimah in ka huh, keima teel, ama sungah ka lungkimna ka nasempa en un; ka Kha tawh amah ka kidimsak a, amah in minam khempeuh tungah thuman tungsak ding hi.
Amah kiko loin, awng khia lo a, kongzing lakah zong thu gen zakzak lo ding hi;
amah in a kisunimsa pumpeng sukham lo ding a, a khu suak mei khau sumit lo ding hi. Amah in thumanna tawh mi khempeuh tungah thutang thu sem khia ding hi.
Amah in leitungah thutang thu a phuh khit matengin lungsi lo, lungkia lo ding hi; tuikulh gamte in ama thukham sungah lametna nei ding uh hi.

Vantungte piangsakin a zal, leitung phah-in a tung pan-a hong paikhia nate a piangsak, leitung a, om mite tungah husan’na pia-in, leitung a, a paite khempeuh husan’na a guan Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi;

6-7 “Keimah in Topa ka hi a, thumanna tawh nangmah hong samin, ka khut tawh nang hong lenin kong kem hi; mittawte a vaksak ding, leinuai thong sung panin thongkiate a lakhia ding, thong sung a mialna mun a, a tu mite a lakhia dingin, mite tungah thuciamna ahi ding, Gentailte tungah khuavak ahi dingin nang kong koih khin hi.
Keimah in Topa ka hi a, Topa pen keima min ahi hi; Pasian dang’ tungah keima minthan’na ka ngahsak kei a, a kisui milimte tungah zong keimah hong kiphatnate bang ka ngah sak kei hi.
En un, hun beisa-a nate in hong kheng a, tu-in a thak nate kong gen hi; tuate a hong pian’ khiat ma-in note tungah a thute kong gen khol hi.”
Topa’ tungah la thak sa un la, leimong panin amah phatna sa un! Tuipi leh a sunga omte, tuikulh gamte leh a tunga teeng mite aw, lasa un.
Sehnel gam leh a khuapite, Kedar mite’ teen’na khua neute a aw uh sangkhai sak un; Sela gam-a teeng mite lungdamna tawh lasa sak un la, mual dawn panin amaute awng sak un.
Topa a minthan’na ama tungah gen un la, tuikulh gamte ah amah phatna gen sak un.
Mi thahatpa bangin Topa kuankhia a, gal a do mipa bangin ama hanciamna so sak hi; amah kiko-in nakpi takin awng khia a, ama hatna a galte tungah a lak hi.
Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Sau veipi sung ka dai om a, keimah leh keimah kikhamcip-in ka hi hit-hiat hi; tu-in numei nau suak ding bangin ka kiko khia ding a, ka kam ka-in ka tung-nak ding hi.
Mual liante leh mual neute ka susia ding a, a po kungte khempeuh ka keusak ding hi; gunte pen tuikulh ka suaksak ding a, bualtuite ka kangsak ding hi.

Amau’ theih loh lampi ah mittawte ka paipih ding a, amau’ theih ngei loh sul zuihpih-in ka kha ding hi. Amau’ mai-ah khuamial pen khuavak suaksakin, a phokna munte a tam-in ka bawl ding hi. Hihte pen keima hih ding nate hi a, tuate sem loin ka nusia kei ding hi.
A kisui milimte muangin, a kisung milimte kiangah, “Note in komau’ pasiante na hi uh hi,” a ci mite kinolh ding a, maizum mahmahin ki-om sak ding hi.
Bilngongte aw, za un; mittawte aw, na muh theih nadingun en un!
Ka nasempa bangin kua a mit taw a, keima sawl ka kamtaipa bangin kua a bil ngong ahi hiam? Keima thuciampihpa bangin kua a mit taw a, Topa’ nasempa bangin kua a mit taw ahi hiam?
Israel in na tampi mu a, ahih hangin tuate encian lo hi; ama bilte kihong a, ahih hangin amah in khua za lo hi.
Ama dikna a khual manin Topa in a thukham liansakin vanglian sak nuam hi.

Ahih hangin ama mite pen a kiluh, a kisut mite hi a, leihawm sungah amaute khempeuh kikiasak a, thonginn sungah kiseel hi; amaute pen, a hon ding om lo, nek ding-a kiman ganhing suak khin uh a, kuamah in “Hong pia kik in,” a cih loh vankisutte suak khin ta uh hi.
Note’ lakah khat peuhpeuh in hih thu na ngai ding uh hiam? Tu-a kipanin lim takin na ngai ding uh hiam?

Kua in a sut gawppa tungah Jakob pia a, a luh gawpte’ tungah Israel pia ahi hiam? Topa mahmah in a piak hilo ahi hiam? Ama tungah eite i khial hi. Ama’ hong deih bangin i zui kei a, ama hong thuhilhnate i mang kei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in, ama hehna-so leh gal kidonate eite tungah hong tungsak hi. Israel mi khempeuh lakah mei bangin ama hehna hong kuang a, ahih hangin eite in bangmah i thei kei hi. Tua i thuakna hangin bangmah i phawk khia thei tuan kei hi.

Ahih hangin, Jakob aw, nangmah hong piangsakpa, Israel aw, nangmah hong bawlpa, Topa in tu in hih bang ci hi: “Nangmah hong honkhia khin ka hih manin lau kei in; na min tawh nang kong sam khin zo a, nang in kei’ aa na hi hi.

Nangmah in tuite na kantan ciangin nang tawh kong omkhawm ding a, gunte na kantan ciangin tui in hong tuum lo ding hi; mei kantanin na pai ciangin na kang kei ding a, a meikuangte in nang hong kangtum lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Topa na Pasian, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa, nangmah hong Honpa ka hi hi. Nangmah tat nadingin Izipt ka pia a, nangmah khek nadingin Ethiopia leh Seba ka pia hi.
Nang pen keima mit-ah manpha-in, pahtakhuai in, nangmah hong it ka hih ciangin nangma tangin mite ka pia a, nangma nuntakna khek nadingin mihingte ka pia hi.
Nang tawh hong omkhawm ka hih manin lau kei in; nisuahna lam panin na suan leh khakte kong paipih ding a, nitumna lam panin na mite kong kaikhawm ding hi.

Keimah in leilu lam kiangah, Pia khia un, leitaw lam kiangah, Len nawn kei un; keima pian’sak ka bawlsa, keima minthan’ nading a, ka bawl, keima min tawh a kilote khempeuh ahi, ka tapate gamlapi panin, ka tanute leimong panin hong paipih un, ka ci ding hi.”
Mit nei napi-a mit a taw mite, bil nei napi-a bil a ngong mite hong paikhiatpih un!

Minamte kikaikhawm sak un la, mihingte kikhawm sak un. Amaute’ lak panin kua in hih thu hong genkhol thei-in, a beisa hun-a nate kua in hong lak thei ahi hiam? Amau’ dikna a langsak dingin a tecite uh hong paipih sak un la, amaute a thu za sakin, man mah hi, ci sak un.

“Note in keima tecite na hi uh hi,” Topa in ci a, “Kei pen Amah ka hihna thu, nangmah in thei-in keimah nong up nading leh na theihtel theih nadingin kong teelsa ka nasempa na hi hi. Kei’ ma-in pasian om lo a, kei’ khit ah zong kuamah om lo ding hi.
Kei, keimah in Topa ka hi a, kei sim loh honpa dang om lo hi.
Note lakah pasian dang a om ma-in honkhia-in, pulak-in, ka gen khol hi; tua ahih ciangin note in keima tecite na hi uh hi,” Topa in ci hi.
“Kei in Amah ka hi a, a kipat cil-a kipanin zong kei in Amah ka hi hi; keima khut sung panin a lakhia zo kuamah om lo hi; keimah in na ka sem a, kua in hong nokkhak zo ding ahi hiam?

Israelte’ Siangtho Pa, note hong Honpa, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Note’ hangin Babilon ah puakin, Babilon mite galtaite bangin a kisak theihpih a teembawte sungah Khaldea mite’ kikona ka guangsuk ding hi.
Keimah in Topa, note’ Siangtho Pa, Israel a Piangsakpa, note’ Kumpi ka hi hi.”

16-17 Tuipi sungah lampi bawlin, tui lianpi sungah pai nading sul bawl a, leeng leh sakolte, kaikhia in, galkapte leh galhangte a paikhiatpih; amaute a tho thei nawn lo dingin a lum sak, amaute pen meivak khau kisumit bangin a mitsak Topa in hih bangin ci hi:
“Masa lam-a nate ciamteh kei un la, a beisa nate ngaihsun kei un.
En un, a thak na khat ka bawl hi; tu-in hong piang khia hi, note in thei lo na hi uh hiam? Gam lakah lam lianpi khat ka bawl ding a, sehnel gam sungah gunte ka bawl ding hi.

20-21 Gamsate, ngiate leh kalaoh-vasate in kei hong pahtawi ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keima adinga ka pian’sak mite in keimah phatna a genkhiat theih nadingun, keima teel mite’ dawn dingin gam lakah tui pia-in, sehnel gam sungah gun ka pia hi.
“Ahih hangin Jakob aw, ka min nong lo kei hi; Israel aw, kei nong cimtaak hi!

Meihal biakpiak nadingin kei kiangah na tuu nong paipih kei a, biak piakna tawh kei nong pahtawi kei hi. Piakna tawh nang kong vangik sak nai kei a, paknamtui piak nading kalhna tawh kong gim sak nai kei hi.

Kei’ adingin sum tawh paknamtui nong lei sak nai kei a, nangmah in biakna sa a thaute tawh nong taii sak nai kei hi. Ahih hangin nang in na khialhna tawh kei tungah vangik nong suan khin a, na mawhna tawh kei nong gimsak khin hi.
“Na thupalsatnate hong phiatkhiatsakpa in keimah Pasian ka hi a, kei ka hih manin na khialhnate ka ciamteh kei ding hi.
Kei hong phawksak in la, thu kikum khawm ni; na dikna a kilat nadingin na thu hong sung khia in.
Na pu na pa masate khial a, na makaite uh zong kei tungah hong khial hi.
Na uliante un ka biakinn mindaisak uh ahih manin, Israel tungah zahhuaina ka tungsak a, Jakob ka siasak hi.
