“Ahih hangin, ka nasempa Jakob aw, ka teelsa Israel aw, tu-in za in!
Nangmah a hong bawl, gil sung panin nang a hong piangsak, nang a hong huh ding Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Ka nasempa Jakob aw, ka teelsa Israel aw, lau kei in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a dangtak leitang tungah tui ka sung ding a, leikeu tungah lui tui ka luangsak ding hi; na suan leh khakte tungah ka Kha ka pia ding a, na tu na tate tungah ka thupha ka pia ding hi.
Amaute pen lopa dumna-a a po lopa bangin, tui sung pan-a pokhia, lui tui luang gei-a a om gialheek kungte bangin po khia ding uh hi.

Khat in, ‘Keimah in Topa aa ka hi hi,’ ci-in, a dang khat in Jakob’ min tawh ama min lo ding a, a dang khat leuleu in, ‘Topa aa,’ ci-in ama khut tungah gelhin, Israel min tawh amahmah kinophuah ding hi.”
Topa, Israel Kumpipa leh amah Honpa, Vanglianpen Topa in hih bangin gen a: “Keimah in a masa pen leh a nunung pen ka hi hi; kei sim loh Pasian dang om lo hi.

Kua in kei tawh kibang ahi hiam? Amah gensak-in pulak sak un la, keima mai-ah gen sak un. A tung ding nate thu tanglai pek panin kua in tangko ahi hiam? Hong tung ding nate thu amaute genkhol sak dih un.

Lau kei un la, kihta kei un; tanglai pek panin note kiangah hong genin pulak khin hilo ka hi hiam? Note in keima tecite na hi uh hi! Kei sim loh Pasian dang om ahi hiam? Suangpi dang om lo hi; khat beek ka thei kei hi,” ci hi.
Milim a bawl mite khempeuh a mawkna hi a, amau’ deih milimte in phattuamna piangsak lo hi; milim a biate in khuamu thei lo, thu theithei lo a, amaute in maizumna thuak uh hi.
Bangmah-a kimang lo pasian kua in bawl a, milim kua in sung ahi hiam?

En un, ama kikholpih mite khempeuh in maizumna ngah ding hi, khutsiamte pen mi hi lel uh hi; amaute khempeuh kikhawm sakin ding sak un, amaute nakpi takin kilausak ding a, a vekpiun maizumin kikoih khawm ding hi.
Sikseekpa in seekin hol tawh na sem hi; amah in sek tawh seek-in a thahat a khut tawh a sat hi; amah a gil kialin a tha zaw a, amah in tui dawn loin a gim hi.

Sing nasep khut siampa in khau khungin laikung tawh ciamteh hi; amah in singnawtna tawh nawt a, tehna kual khat tawh ciamteh hi; amah in, inn sunga a teeng ding mihing mel hoih lim khat bangin mihing lim-in bawl hi.

Amah in taamtaak sing kungte phuk hi; tua ahih kei leh sesing kung khat ahi a, tawsaw kung khat ahi zongin teng khia a, gamlak singte lakah khang sakin gol sak hi; amah in taamtaak kung khat suanin guah in khang sak hi.

Tua ciangin tua kung pen mi khat adingin mei sing suak hi; amah in tua sing kimkhat la-in a khua lum nadingin mei-in cih a, amah in mei tawh-in moh em hi; amah in pasian khat zong bawlin bia a, amah in milim khat bawlin tua milim mai-ah kun hi.
Amah in a sing kimkhat mei khuk-ah cih hi; a dang kimkhat tawh an ne a, amah in sa hang-in a gil vah hi; amah in mei awi-in, “Ah, ka khua lumta, mei mu khin ing!” ci hi.
Amah in a val lai teng, ama milim pasian khatin bawl hi; tua milim mai-ah kunin bia hi; amah in tua milim tungah thungen a, “Nang in keima pasian na hih ciangin kei hong honkhia in!” ci hi.

Amaute in bangmah thei lo, amaute in bangmah khentel thei lo uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in bangmah a muh loh nadingun amah in a mit uh humsakin, bangmah a theih loh nadingun a lungsim uh khaksak hi.

A kimkhat meikhuk-ah cihin, a aam tungah moh zong ka em a, sa hang-in ka ne khin zo hi; a om lai teng a kihhuai-in bawl buang ding ka hi hiam? Sing bek khat’ mai-ah kun buang ding ka hi hiam? a ci ding, thu a ngaihsun, theihna leh thu muhna a nei khat beek om lo hi.

Amah pen vut a nete tawh kibang lel hi; khemna lungsim haina in amah lam pialpih khin a, amah leh amah kihonkhia thei loin, “Ka khut sungah ka tawi milim pen a haihuai hilo ahi hiam?” cih zong phawk thei lo hi.
Jakob aw, hih thu phawk in. Israel aw, ka nasempa na hi hi. Nang kong bawl a, nang in keima nasem na hi hi; Israel aw, keimah in nang kong mangngilh kei ding hi.
Na thupalsatnate meiipi bangin, na khialhnate meiilum bangin ka phiatkhia khin zo hi; nang hong tan khin ka hih ciangin kei kiangah hong ciahkik in.

Vantungte aw, Topa in tua thu sem khin ahih manin lungdam in la sa un; Anuai-a om leitung aw, awng un; mualte aw, la sa-in awng khia un, tulak leh a sunga sing om khempeuh aw, awng un! Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Jakob tankhia khin a, Israel sungah amah kiminthangsak ding hi.
Gil sung panin nangmah a hong piangsak, nangmah hong Tanpa, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Keimah in na khempeuh bawlin, keimah guakin vantungte zal-in, kuama seppih lohin leitung ka zal hi;
zuau thu gente’ hilhkholhna limte a siasakpa, aisante pen mihai a suaksakpa, mi pilte lehhei kikin, amau’ thu theite haina a suaksakpa;
a nasempa’ thu kip sakin, a kamtaite’ thugente a tangtungsak; ‘Jerusalem khua-ah mi teengin, Judah khuapite kilamkik ding a,, a kisia khuate ka lamkik ding hi’;
tui thukpi kiangah, ‘Keu in, na gunte ka keusak ding hi’;
Sairas kumpipa in ka tuucingpa hi a, ka deihna teng tung sak ding hi’; ‘Jerusalem kilam ding a,’ biakinn pen, ‘Na bulpi kiphut ding hi,’ a ci Topa ka hi hi.”

Kulh kongpite a kikhak loh nadingin ama mai-ah kongkhakte a honsak ding, kumpite’ vangliatnate a lakkhiat sak ding, ama mai-ah minamte a zawh sak dingin, a taklam khut a len, a sathau nilhpa Sairas tungah Topa in hih bangin ci hi:
“Nangma mai-ah kei pai-in mualte zalhmai-in, sumngo kongkhakte satzan-in a sikzawlte ka sattan ding hi.
A mialna mun sunga sum kikoihte leh mun simtham-a sum kiseelte, nangma tungah kong pia ding a, tua thu hangin kei-in Topa, na min tawh hong sam Israelte’ Pasian ka hihna nong thei ding hi.
Ka nasempa Jakob leh ka teelsa Israel ka ngaihsutna-in, nang pen na minin kong sam a, nong theih loh hangin min thak kong phuah hi.

5-6 Keimah in Topa ka hi hi, kuamah dang om lo a, kei sim loh Pasian om lo hi; nisuahna pan hita leh, nitumna pan hita leh, kei sim loh a dang a om lohna thu mite in a theih nadingin, nong theih loh hangin nangma tungah a kisam thahatna kong guan hi; keimah in Topa ka hi a, a dang om lo hi.
Keimah in khuavak leh khuamial piangsakin, a pha nate leh a sia nate ka piangsak a, hih nate khempeuh a bawlpa in keimah Topa ka hi hi.

“Vantungte aw, tung lam panin thumanna zusak un la, vantungte in thumanna buasuk ta un. Hotkhiatna a po khiat theih nadingin leitang kihong sak un la, thumanna zong po khiato sak un; keimah Topa in hih thu ka bawl khin zo hi.

“Amah a Bawlpa tawh a kido mipa, beel seekpa tawh a kido lei beel in gimna ngah ta hen! Tungman in amah a seekpa kiangah, ‘Nang in bang bawl na hi hiam, na nasep in khut nei lo hi,’ ci-in a thu sel ngam ahi hiam?
A pa kiangah, ‘Nang in kua piangsak na hi hiam?’ a cipa hita leh, a nu kiangah, ‘Nang in nausuak dingin kua gimpih na hi hiam?’ a cipa in gimna ngah ta hen.”
Amah a Bawlpa, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa, Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Nang in keima tate’ thu hong dongin, ka khut tawh ka bawlsate tawh kisaite-ah thu hong pia ding na hi hiam?
Keimah in leitung ka bawl a, tua tungah mi ka piangsak hi; keima khut in vantungte zal a, keimah in vantung na honpite khempeuh thu ka pia hi.

Thumanna sungah amah khua ka phawksak a, keimah in ama lampi khempeuh ka mamsak ding hi; amah in nasep thaman ahi a, letsong ahi zongin ngaihsun loin keima khuapi lamin sal-a om ka mite khahkhia ding hi,” Vanglianpen Topa in ci hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Izipt pan a piangte leh Ethiopia sumbuk vante leh a tun a sang Seba mite nangma kiangah hong pai-in nangma aa hi ding uh a, amaute in nang hong zui ding uh hi; amaute sikkhau kibulh-in hong pai-in nangma kiangah hong kun ding uh hi. Amaute in nangma kiangah thuum ding uh a, ‘Nangmah bek tawh Pasian omkhawm a, kuamah dang om loin, amah sim loh pasian dang om lo hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi.”
A taktakin, Israelte’ Pasian, Honpa aw, nangmahmah a bucip Pasian na hi hi.
Milim a bawl amaute khempeuh in maizumna thuakin cih nading thei loin om ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel pen Topa in tawntung hotkhiatna tawh honkhia hi; nang in cikmah hunin maizumna na thuak kei ding hi.

Vantungte a piangsakpa (amah Pasian!) leitung piangsakin a bawlpa (a kipsakpa; a awngthawl dingin bawl loin, teen’ nading a, leitung a piangsakpa!) Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Keimah in Topa ka hi a, kuamah dang om lo hi.

Keimah in mun simtham, khuamialna gam sungah thu ka gen kei hi; Jakob’ suan leh khakte kiangah, ‘A awngthawl mun sungah kei hong zong un,’ ka ci kei hi. Keimah Topa in thuman ka gen a, a man nate ka pulak hi.

“Minam sung panin a suakta lai note aw, nomau kikaikhawmin hong pai un la, hong nai un! Amau’ sing milim a pua kawikawi mite in theihna nei lo uh a, a honkhia thei lo pasian tungah thu ngenngen uh hi.

Na thu uh sung un la, gen un; amaute kikum khawmsak un! Hih thu sawt pekin kua in genkhol ahi hiam? Tang lai-in kua in pulak ahi hiam? Keimah Topa hilo ka hi hiam? Thuman Pasian leh Honpa ahi, kei sim loh Pasian dang om lo hi; kei sim loh kuamah dang om lo hi.
“Leitung mong khempeuhte aw, kei lamah hong kihei un la, hotkhiatna ngah un! Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Pasian ka hi a, kuamah dang om lo hi.

Keimahmah ka kiciam khin a, a kikhel kik nawn lo ding thu in, ‘Keima mai-ah mi khempeuh hong khukdin ding a, keima tungah thuman dingin hong kiciam ding uh hi,’ cihna, kei’ kam sung panin thumanna tawh pusuak khia khin zo hi.
“Topa’ hang bekin dikna leh thahatna kingah hi, hong kici ding hi; kei hong mudahte khempeuh mindai-in maizum ding uh hi.
Israel suan leh khakte khempeuh in Topa’ hangin midik tangin a kisial ding uh hi.”
Bel pasian puksukin, Nebo pasian kunsuk a, tua milimte pen ganhing leh bawngte tungah kipua hi; note’ puak hih nate pen, a gim mahmah ganhingte tungah vangik om bangin note’ tungah hong gik hi.
Amaute kunin, amaute puksuk khawm uh a, amaute in vangik pengsak thei lo uh a, amaute mahmah zong galte’ matna sungah tung uh hi.
“Na suah-a kipan kong tawi, gilsung pan-a kong puak, Jakob innkuan, Israel innkuan a suakta laite khempeuh aw, keima thu hong ngai un;
na tek dongun keimah in Amah ka hi a, na sam uh a kan hun dongin note kong kem ding hi. Ka bawl khin a, ka don ding hi; keimah in hong tawi-in kong honkhia ding hi.
“Note in kei, kua tawh hong kibang sakin hong kikim sak ding a, ka kibatpih dingin kua tawh hong enteh ding na hi uh hiam?
Sumbawm panin khamte uang zatin tawi-tehna tawh ngunte a tehkhiate in kham seekpa cial a, amah in tua nate pen pasian-in seeksak hi; tua ciangin amaute kunin tua milim bia uh hi.

Amaute in tua pasian pen a liangko tung uhah ngato-in pua uh a, ama om nading munah amaute in koih a, tua lai-ah om niloh hi; ama omna panin amah kinkhia thei lo hi. Mi khatpeuh in amah sam leh amah in dawng thei lo a, ama lungkhamna panin zong honkhia thei lo hi.
“Thu a palsat mite aw, hih thu phawkin ngaihsun un la, lungngai pha un.
Hun lui nate phawk un; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in Pasian ka hi a, a dang om lo hi; keimah in Pasian ka hi a, kei tawh a kibang a dang om lo hi.
A kipat cilin a tawp nading thu ka pulak a, tanglai pek panin a piang nai lo nate genin, ‘Ka ngimna kip ding a, ka sepnop khempeuh ka sem ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Nisuahna gam panin sasialne vasa khat samin, keima thu a sem khia dingin gamlapi panin mi khat ka sam hi. Thu ka gen khin a, ka tungsak ding hi; ka geel khin a, ka sem ding hi.
“Dikna tawh a kigamlate, a lungsim khauh mite aw, ka thu hong ngai un:
Ka dikna kong tungsak ta a, gamla nawn lo hi; ka hotkhiatna zekai lo ding hi; keima minthan’na ahi Israel adingin, Jerusalem ka honkhia ding hi.”

Nungak a bang Babilon aw, hong paisuk in la, leivui lakah tu in; nungak a bang Khaldea aw, tokhom om lohna lei lakah hong tusuk in! Bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen, a moi milmel, a ngeek dikdek, hong kici nawn lo ding hi.
An gawina suangte la in la, an gawi in; na kikhuhna puan lakhia in la, na nik na puan suah-in gunte kantan in.
Na selsim teng kilang ding a, na maizumna teng kimu ding hi. Keimah in kong thukkik ding a, kuamah ka zah kei ding hi.
Eite hong Tanpa— Vanglianpen Topa cihna min a neipa— in Israelte’ Siangtho Pa ahi hi.
Babilon aw, gamdai takin tu in la, khuamialna sungah pai in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen, kumpi gamte’ kumpinu hong kici nawn lo ding hi.
Ka mite’ tungah ka heh a, keima luah gamh ka ninsak hi; nangma khut sungah amaute kong pia a, nang in amaute na hehpih kei hi; a khangham mite tungah na hakkol na giksak mahmah hi.
Nangmah in, “Kei pen, tonu ka hi tawntung ding hi,” ci na hih manin hih thute na lungsim ah koih loin, bang thu piang thei cih zong na ngaihsun kha kei hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, a nuam bek a ut, lungmuang tak-a a tu hit-hiat, na lungsim sungah, “Keimah hi’ng, kei sim loh midang om kei’ meigongin om kei ning, ta-khuai cih zong sin kei ning,” a ci khuapi aw, hih thu za in:
Aisan siamnate leh mibum siamna vang lianpi na neih hangin ta khuaisuahna leh meigon’na, hih thu nihte thakhat thu-in ni khat sungin a kicing takin nang tungah hong tung veve ding hi.
Na gitlohna ah nang na lung muang a, “Kuamah in kei hong mu lo hi,” na ci hi; na pilna lehna theihnate in lam hong pialsak a, na lungsim sungah, “Keimah hi’ng, kei sim loh midang om kei,” na ci hi.

Ahih hangin nangmah in na beisak theih loh tuahsiatna na tungah hong tung ding hi; nangmah in maisakna na ngah theih loh gimna nang tungah hong tung ding hi; nang in a thu na theih hetloh siatna na tungah thakhatin hong tung ding hi.
Na neu lai-a kipan na sep ahi na mibumna leh na aisannate ah kip takin om in; phattuamna na ngah kha ding a, mite na lausak zo kha ding hi.
Nang tungah hong kilak thu tampite in nang hong gimsak hi; vantungte a seh-in khenin, aksite en a, khadet simin nang tunga thu piang ding hong genkhol mite ding sak in la, nangmah kihonsak in.

En in, amaute pen buhkung tawh kibang uh a, mei in amaute kangtum hi; meikuang’ vangliatna panin amau leh amau kihontawm thei lo uh hi. Hih pen khua lum nading mei-am hi lo a, awi ding mei zong hi lo hi.
Nang tawh na a semkhawm, na neu lai-a kipan nang tawh na a semkhawmte tungah hih thute hong tung ding hi; amaute pen amau’ tum ciatah zauvak uh hi; nang hong hon ding kuamah om lo hi.
Israel min tawh a kilo, Judah sung pan-a a piangkhia; Topa’ min tawh thuciam in Israel min lo napi-in, thuman thutak tawh Israel Pasian a pulak lo, Jakob innkuan aw, hih thu ngai un.
Note tua bang hi napi-in, khuapi siangtho sunga a teeng mite hi a, Israel Pasian i muang hi. Ama min in vanglian Topa ahi hi, ci-in na kisathei zaw lai uh hi.
“A masa lam-a nate thu tanglai-in ka gen a, keima kam panin tuate gingkhia-in ka kithehthang sak hi; tua ciangin thakhat thu-in keimah in ka sem a, hong piang hi.
Note pen paupeng-in, na ngawng uh sik thagui bang hi-in, na taltang uh sumngo banga sak a hihna thei ka hih manin,

note in, ‘Ka milim un hihte bawl a, a kisui ka milim leh a kisung ka milim un thu pia hi,’ na cih theih loh nadingun tanglai-a kipanin hih thute note tungah kong gen a, tuate hong pian’ ma-in note tungah kong zasak khol hi.
“Ka gensa thu khempeuh hong tung ta a, Ka gennate man hi, na cih ding uh hi ta hi. Tu-a kipanin, na a thakte, na theih ngei loh uh hong tung ding a ki-im nate, kong gen ding hi.
Hihte pen, tu hunin a piangsak ka hi a, a beisa hun ah hih bang piang nai lo hi. A piang khinsa thu hi leh, ka theih uh thu hi, na ci kha ding uh hi.
Note pen a lehheek thei na hih lam uh ka thei a, na suah tung uh akipan mi lehdo thei na hihna uh ka thei hi. Tua ahih manin tanglai akipan na bil uh kihong ngei lo a, zong na thei ngei kei uh hi.
“Note kong suksiat khak loh nadingin ka min ka ngaihsutna tawh ka hehna diah-in, keimah hong kiphatna ka ngaihsutna-in note tungah ka ki-ip hi.
En un, meikhuk sungah ngun a kisian’sak bangin, gimna meikhuk sungah note kong ze-et hi. Ahi zongin note pen bangmah-a kimang lo na hihna uh hong kimu khia hi.
Keimah ka kikhualna, keimah ka kingaihsutna-in hih bangin kong hih hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka min a siat ding kilawm ahi hiam? Midang khat tungah keima minthan’na ka pia kei ding hi.
“Jakob leh keima hong sap Israelte aw, ka thu ngai un! Kei in amah ka hi a, keimah in a masa hi-in, keimah in a nunung zong ka hi hi.
Ka khut in leitung bulpi koih a, ka khut taklam in vantungte zal hi; amaute ka sap ciangin amaute omkhawm pah uh hi.

“Note khempeuh kikhawm un la, hong za un! Amaute’ lakah kua in hih ka sep ding nate genkhol thei ahi hiam? Ka teel kipawl pihpa in Babilon tungah keima ngimna sem ding a, Khaldea mite’ lang khatah kei ka pang ding hi.
Kei, keimah in thu genin amah ka sam a, kei in amah ka paipih a, amah a daupai ding hi.
Kei kiangah hong nai un la, hih thu za un: a kipat cil-a kipanin a simthamin thu ka gen kei a, tua thu hong pian’ akipanin kei ka om hi. (Tu-in Topa Pasian in a Kha tawh kei hong sawl hi.)
Israelte’ Siangtho Pa, nangmah hong Tan, Topa in: Keimah in, phattuamna na ngah nading a, a hong hilh, na zuih ding a, kilawm lampi-ah a hong paipih Topa na Pasian ka hi hi.
Ka thupiakna a ngai hi hoh leteh! Nangma nopsakna pen gunpi bang ding a, na thumanna pen tuipi tuihualte tawh kibang ding hi;
na suan leh khakte sehnel zah pha-in, na tu leh tate sehnel vui zah pha ding hi; keima mai-ah amaute’ min kiphiat khia lo, kisusia ngei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Babilon panin paikhia-in, Khaldea gam panin tai in la, lungdamna tawh hih thu gen in la, tangko-in leimong dongin puak in; “Topa in ama nasem Jakob tankhia khin zo!” ci-in gen in.
Amah in sehnel gam kantanin amaute a paipih ciangin a dang uh taak lo hi; suangpi panin amau adingin amah in tui luangsak hi; amah in suangpi khangkham sak a, tui phulkhia hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin mi gilote’ adingin nopna om lo hi,” Topa in ci hi.
Tuipi kulh gamte aw, ka thu ngai un la, gamlapi-a om mihingte aw, ngai un. Ka suah ma-in Topa in kei hong sam a, ka nu’ sungah ka om lai-in amah in ka min hong phuak hi.
Amah in ka kam, namsau hiam bangsak a, ama khut liim tawh kei hong hu hi; amah in a kinawtngil thaltang bangin kei hong bawl a, a hiamsa-in zat pah dingin a thallawng sungah kei hong koih hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, “Nang in, keima liatna a kilangsak ding ka nasempa Israel na hi hi,” hong ci hi.

Ahih hangin keimah in, “Na ka sem a, ahi zongin a kiman’na om lo hi; Ka thatang khempeuh ka beisak a, ahi zongin bangmah ka tangtun kei hi. Ahi zongin ka ngah ding na, Topa’ khut sungah om a, ka sepna thaman Pasian kiangah om hi.

Ama kiangah Jakob paipih kik a, ama kiangah Israelte a kikaihkhop theih nadingin, Topa’ mai-ah kei hong kipahtawi a, Pasian pen keima thahatna suak-in, ama nasem dingin ka nu gilsung panin keimah hong piangsak Topa in tu-in thu hong gen a—

amah in, “Jakob minamte a laamto ding leh ka kepsa Israel mite a ngei uh a bangsak kik ding in keima nasem na hihna pen a baih lua mahmah nasep ahi hi; keima hotkhiatna in lei mong dong a tun’ theih nadingin Gentailte tungah khuavak dingin nang kong pia ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Israel a Tankhia-pa leh ama Siangtho Pa ahi Topa in, nakpi takin simmawhna a thuak, minamte in a muhdah, gam ukte’ nasempa tungah: “Nangmah hong teel, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa, a thuman Topa’ hangin, mite na hotkhiatna thu kumpite in a muh ciangun zahtakna tawh na mai-ah hong ding ding uh a, na mai-ah uliante, hong kun ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

Topa in ama mite kiangah, “Note hotkhiat ding hun a tun ciangin maipha kong pia ding a, huhna nong ngetna uh kong pia ding hi. Note hong kemin kong hu ding a, note tung tawnin mi khempeuh tawh thuciamna ka bawl ding hi. A kinusia na gam puahpha in a sung uhah, note a luah dingin kong teengsak kik ding hi.

Thongkia mite tungah, ‘Hong paikhia un,’ ci-in, khuamial sunga om mite tungah, ‘Hong pusuak un,’ ka ci ding hi. Amaute pen lam tawntung ah an a ne, mualpawn a sang munte khempeuh ah, nuam takin a gamta tuute tawh kibang ding uh hi.

Amaute gil kial lo, dangtak lo ding uh a, huihsa in hita leh nisa in hita leh amaute sukha lo ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute a hehpihpa in amaute lamkaih ding a, lui tui kiangah amaute paipih ding hi.
Keimah in ka mite’ adingin mual liante kantanin lampi ka ziik sak ding a, ka lam lianpite ka phongto ding hi.
Ka mite a gamlapi panin hong pai ding uh a, leilu lam gam leh nitumna lam gamte panin hong pai-in, pawl khatte, leitaw lam Sinim gam panin hong ciah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Vantung aw, lungdamin la sa un, leitung aw, lungdamin diang in; mual liante aw, lungdamin la sa-in awng khia un! Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama mite hehnem ta a, gimna a thuak ama mite hehpih ding hi.
Ahih hangin Jerusalem mite in, Topa in eite hong nusia khin a, i Topa in eite hong mangngilh khin hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in, “Ama gilsung pan-a a suak nau hehpih lo ding zahin nupi khat in ama nawi a teep naungek mangngilh thei ding ahi hiam? Hihte nangawn in mangngilh kha thei ding hi, ahi zongin ke’n kong mangngilh kei ding hi.
Jerusalem aw, ka khut peekte sungah nang kong gelh khin zo a, na kulhpite ka mai-ah om den hi.
Nang hong bawlte in nang hong susiate nuai-siah ta uh a, nang hong siasakte nang kiang panin taikhia ta uh hi.

Na kimkotah khuadak to in la, mu in; na mi khempeuh hong kikhawm uh a, nang kiangah amaute hong ciah uh hi. Keimah in a nungta Topa ka hih mah bangin, na mite khempeuh hangin na kisial ding a, mothak nu in a zat bangin amaute khempeuh kizepna-in na ok ding hi.
“A kisia, a kinusia nangma munte leh a kisusia nangma gamte in, nangma tunga a teeng mite’ adingin kawcik lua taktak ding a, nang hong valhtum mite pen gamlapi-ah om ding uh hi.
Na kikhen uh hun, na dah hun sungun a suak mite in nangma kiangah, ‘Kote’ adingin mun kawcik lua hi; ka om nading uh mun hong bawlsak in,’ hong ci ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin nang in na lungsim sungah: ‘Kua in kei adingin hihte hong hin’ khiatsak ahi hiam? Kei dah in tang-awl-in ka om a, sal-in hong kikoihin, hong kinial hi, hihte kua in hong khoisak ahi hiam? En un, keimah guakin hong kinusia hi; tua ahih ciangin koi lai panin hihte hong piang ahi hiam? na ci ding hi,” a ci hi.

Topa Pasian in: “En un, Gentailte tungah ka khut ka laamto ding a, mite tungah ka lim ka lakto ding hi; amaute in a ang sung uhah na tapate tawi-in hong paipih ding uh a, a liangko tung uhah na tanute hong pua ding uh hi.

Kumpite pen nang hong kem pate hi ding a, kumpinute pen nang hong khoi na nute hi ding hi. Amaute in a maitang uh lei lak ngatin nang kiangah hong kun ding uh a, na khe-a leivuite liak ding uh hi. Tua ciangin keimah in Topa ka hihna na thei ding hi; kei sungah a lamente maizum lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Galhangpa kiang panin nate kilakhia zo ding a, thu khauhpa’ mat mite kihonkhia zo ding ahi hiam?
Topa in: “A galhangpa’ mat salte kilakhia ding a, thu khauhpa’ na kilakhia ding hi; nang hong dem mite ke’n ka dem ding a, na tate ka honkhia ding hi.

Nang hong nengniam mite pen amau’ satak mah ka ne sak ding a, zukham bangin amau’ si mah kham ding uh hi. Tua ciangin, kei pen, Jakob’ Vanglian Pa, nang hong Tankhiapa, nang hong Honpa Topa ka hihna mi khempeuh in thei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Topa in: “Amah ka ciahsakna, na nu a kimakna lai koi-ah om ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh, nang kong zuakna ka lei batnate koi pen ahi hiam? En un, nomau’ mawhna hangin note hong kizuak a, nomau’ khialhna hangin na nu uh kipaikhiasak hi.

Bang hangin, kong pai ciangin mi khat zong om lo ahi hiam? Kong sap ciangin hong dawng ding khat zong om lo ahi hiam? Hong hon zo lo zah dingin ka khut tom lua ahi hiam? Tua ahih kei leh note khahkhiatna ding thahatna nei lo ka hi hiam? En un, keima taiina tawh tuipi ka keusak a, gunte pen sehnel gam ka suaksak hi; tui om loh manin a ngasate uih a, dangtakin si uh hi.
Vantungte khuamial ka silhsak a, amau’ kituam nadingin puanhampi ka bawl hi,” a ci hi.
Thugenna tawh a lunggim mite tha a pia thei kammal ka theih nadingin, Topa Pasian in ka gen ding thu hong hilh khin hi. Ama hong hilhnate a ngai dingin zingsang simin hong phong hi.
Topa Pasian in ka bil hong honsak a, amah ka lehdo kei a, ka nungngat kei hi.
Hong satte tungah ka nung ka dawh a, ka khamul hong kai mite tungah ka paang ka dawh hi; maizumna leh cilphihna panin ka maitang ka hei kei hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian in kei hong huh hi; tua ahih ciangin cih nading thei loin ka om kei hi; tua ahih ciangin ka mai pen a sak suang ka bangsak a, kei hong maizum sak lo ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi;

ka thumanna a langsakpa Pasian a nai-ah hong om hi; kei langah kua’n hong mawhsak ding ahi hiam? Thukhen zumah kimaisak nung, Thukhen zumah kua’n hong khia nuam ahi hiam? Hong langpang dingin hong kuan ta hen.
En un, Topa Pasian in kei hong huh hi; kua in kei mawh hi ci-in gen thei ding ahi hiam? En un, amaute khempeuh puan bangin paatkhia ding uh hi; nget in amaute netum ding hi.
Topa kihta a, a nasempa’ thu a mangte khempeuh in, khuamial sungah khuavak nei loin na pai hangun, Topa muang un la, Pasian suan’ in nei un.

Ahih hangin mei vaksak a, meilah kuang a kiguan note khempeuh aw, tu-in na meivakna leh na meilah kuang pana khuavak sungah pai-in, kalsuan un; hih in ka khut pana na ngah ding uh ahi hi. Lungkhamin na lumsuk ding uh hi.
Dikna a zui, Topa a zongte aw, ngai un; note hong ki-eu khiatna suangpi leh note hong kitawh khiatna khuk en un.
Na pa uh Abraham leh note’ pian’na Sarah ngaihsun dih un; bang hang hiam cih leh khat bek ahih lai takin amah ka sam a, amah thupha pia-in tampi ka phasak hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Zion hehnem ding hi; a kisia ama munte khempeuh puah pha-in, ama gamlakte Eden huan ka bang sak ding a, a kizang thei lo ama gamte Topa’ huan ka bang sak ding hi; ama sungah lungdamna leh kipakna, lungdam kohna leh la sakna aw om ding hi.
“Ka mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai un. Minamte tungah thukham ka hilh a, keima thutan’na in amaute tungah khuavak tun ding hi.

Manlangin hong pai-in amaute ka honkhia ding hi. Ka gualzawh ding hun hong naita hi. Keimah in minamte ka uk ding hi. Tuipi gei-a gamte in kei hong muang uh a, amaute in keima hotkhiat ding hong ngak uh hi.

Dakto-in vantungte en un la, leitung zong ensuk un; bang hang hiam cih leh vantungte in meikhu bangin mangthang-in, leitung in puan bangin paatkhia ding a, ama tunga teengte pen thokang bangin si ding uh hi; ahih hangin keima hotkhiatna kip tawntung ding a, keima dikna bei ngei lo ding hi.
“Thumanna a thei, na lungsim sung uhah keima thu a vom mite aw, ka thu ngai un; mihingte’ kosiatna kihta kei un la, amaute’ simmawhna hangin lungkia kei un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh nget in puan a nektum bangin amaute beimang ding a, lungno in samul puan a pehtum bangin amaute maimang ding hi; ahih hangin keima dikna om tawntung ding a, khang tawntungin ka hotkhiatna kip ding hi.”
Khanglo in, Khanglo in, thakhauh in, Topa’ khut aw; khang sawtpi, hun lui lai-a bangin na vangliatna zangin hong huh in. Rahab a satzan gawppa, gulpi a sunpa nangmah hilo na hi hiam?
Tuipi, tui thukpite a keusak; a kitankhia mite’ kantan dingin tuipi thukte lampi-in a bawlpa nangmah hilo na hi hiam?

Topa tatsa mi a kithehthangte hong ciahkik ding a, lasakna tawh Zion ah hong pai ding uh hi; amaute, lungdam tawntung ding uh a, amaute in lungdamna leh kipakna ngahin dahna leh khuisatna nei nawn lo ding uh hi.
“Kei, keimah in note hong hehnempa ka hi hi; lopa bang ahi, a si thei mi, mihing tate lellelte bang hangin kihta na hi uh hiam?

Vantungte zal-in, lei bulpite a koih note a hong bawl Topa hong mangngilh khin ta na hi uh hiam? Note hong susia dingin a kithawi, no a hong nengniamte’ hehna, bang hangin kihta-in om tawntung na hi uh hiam? Amaute’ hehna in note hong sukha zo het lo ding hi.
Thong sunga kikhum mite kikhah baih ding hi; amaute sau veipi nungta ding uh a, annek tuidawn kitasam lo ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in tuipi tok gawpin tuihualte a hawksak Topa, note’ Pasian ka hi hi—Vanglianpen Topa in ama min ahi hi.
Vantungte zalin, lei bulpi ka phut a, Zion kiangah, ‘Nang in keima mi na hi hi. Na kam ah ka thu kong koih khin a, ka khut lim tawh nang kong hu hi,’ ka ci hi,
Topa’ khut sung panin ama hehna hai a dawn khin, hoina haipi a tawdat dongin a dawn khin Jerusalem aw, nangmah khanglo in nangmah khanglo in la, dingto in.
Na tate khempeuh sung panin nang a hong makaih ding om lo a, na khoisa tapate khempeuh lak panin na khut a hong len ding om lo hi.
Nang tungah siatna leh maiman’na, kialpi leh namsau hih gentheihna thu nih hong tung zo hi—kua in nang hong dahpih ding ahi hiam? kua in nang hong hehnem ding ahi hiam?
Na mite gim khin a, ngenthang sunga sanang a awk bangin lamlian kiu khempeuh ah amaute lum uh hi; Topa’ hehna, na Pasian’ taiina amaute in thuak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gimna a thuak, zu ne lopi-a zukham a bang note in hih thu za un:
Ama mite’ a hu Topa, Topa ahi, na Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: “En un, note’ khut sung panin hoina hai ka lakhia khin hi; ka hehna haipi na dawn nawn kei ding uh hi;

note kiangah, ‘Na tung uhah kong pai theih nadingun kunsuk un,’ hong ci no hong bawlsiate’ khut sungah tua haipi ka koih ding hi; note in na nungzang uh lei lak bangin bawlin, amaute’ pai nadingin kongzing bangin na bawl khin uh hi,” a ci hi.

Zion aw, khanglo in, khanglo in la, na tha khauhsak in; khuapi siangtho Jerusalem aw, na puan hoihte silh in; bang hang hiam cih leh vun ki-at lo mite leh a nin mite nang sungah hong pai nawn lo ding hi.
A kimancip Jerusalem mite aw, leivui panin kising un la, ding to un; a kiman Zion mite aw, na ngawng panun hong kihenna khaute sut un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in: “Man nei loin note hong kizuak a, sum pia loin note hong kitankhia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Izipt gamah peemta dingin ka mite a masa in pai a, thu om lopi-in Assiria mite in amaute nengniam uh hi.
Tu-in Babilon ah tua mah bangin amaute tungah piang leuleu hi. Thu om lopi-in sal-in om uh hi. Amau a ukte, kihihsakna tawh awng uh a, sunthapai-in keima min kisimmawh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin ka mite in keima min hong thei ding uh a, thu a genkholpa pen keimah ka hihna tua ni ciangin amaute in hong thei ding uh hi; keimah in hih lai-ah ka om hi,” a ci hi.
Thu hoih hong puak, kilemna thu a genzaak, thu hoih thupha hong puak, hotkhiatna thu a genzaak, Zion tungah, ‘Na Pasian in uk hi,’ ci-in mualte kantanin thu hong gente’ khe bangzahin hoih ahi hiam?
Ngai un, na galvilte un a aw uh sangsak a, amaute lungdamin lasa khawm uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Zion ah Topa hong pai kikna amaute in maitang kituahin mu uh hi.
A kisia Jerusalem munte aw, lasa-in kiko khawm un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ama mite hehnem ta a, Jerusalem tankhia khin ta hi.
Topa in minam khempeuh mai-ah ama khut siangtho lakkhia khin a, ama mite honkhia hi. Lei mong khempeuh in i Pasian’ hotkhiatna mu ding uh hi.
Kihem un, kihem un, Babilon panin paikhia un la, a nin nate lawng kei un; Topa’ beel leh kuang a puate aw, ama sung panin paikhia un la, nomau kisian’suah tawm un.
Note’ mai-ah Topa pai ding a, Israel Pasian pen note’ nungah hong cingpa hi ding ahih manin, note pen galtai-in paikhia loin, kinawhsa-in na paikhia kei ding uh hi.
Topa in, “En un, ka nasempa pilna tawh gamta-in, amah a lianin kikoihin kilaam to ding a, sang mahmah ding hi.
Mi tampite in amah lamdang sa uh hi— mihing a bang nawn lo zah dongin nakpi takin a mai sia a, mihing a sun nawn lo zah dongin a meel sia hi—

tua ahih ciangin amah in minam tampite dipkua sak ding a, ama hangin kumpite in a kam uh cih ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tunga a kigen ngei lo nate mu ding uh a, amaute in a zak ngei loh uh nate theitel ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin mite in, “I zaksa thu kua in um thei ding ahi hiam? Hih bang thu-ah Topa’ vangliatna khut kua in bang ci muh theih ding ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen kungno khat leh leikeu sunga zung khat bangin ama mai-ah khangto hi; eite’ et dingin ama’ limin deihhuaina mel nei lo a, eite’ deih dingin hoihna nei lo hi.
Amah pen mite in simmawhin nusia hi; gimna leh natna a thuak mi ahi hi; mite in en nuam loin a mai uh a humsan mipa bangin amah kisimmawh a, eite in amah i thusim kei hi.
Amah in eite’ natna teng thuakin, eite’ gimna teng pua khin taktak hi; ahi zongin eite in amah pen, Pasian in a gimsak, a vuak, gimna a thuakpa-in i ngaihsun hi.
Ahih hangin eite’ khialhna hangin amah kiliamsak a, eite’ mawhna hangin amah kisatnim hi; Ama gimthuakna hangin nopna i ngah a, ama liamna hangin damna i ngah hi.
Eite khempeuh in tuu bangin lam i khial khin a, eite khempeuh eimau san ciatah i pai khin hi; Topa in eite khempeuh’ mawhnate ama tungah suan hi.

Amah kinengniam-in, amah gimna a kithuaksak hangin amah kam khat beek pau lo hi; sa gote kiangah a kipaipih tuuno leh a mul mette mai-ah a kipaipih tuu a ham loh mah bangin, ama kam khat beek pau lo hi.
Nenniamna leh thukhenna tawh amah kipaikhiatpih hi; a hingte’ gam panin amah kikhenkhia-in, ama mite’ khialhna hangin amah in gimna thuak hi, ci-in ama khang mite kua in thei ahi hiam?
Amah in mawhna bawl lo, amah in zuau gen ngei lo napi-in, amaute in, mi gilote tawh hankhuk kibang, siatna bawlte tawh hanphual kibang bawl sak uh hi,” ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin amah a kisatnim ding pen Topa’ deihna ahi hi; amah in natna thuak sak hi; mawhna hangin ama pumpi a kipiak ciangin amah in a suan leh khakte mu ding a, ama khan’ sau ding hi; Topa’ deihna ama khut sungah pung ding hi;
Amah in a thuak khit ciangin nuntakna khuavak mu-in, a lungkim ding hi; ama theihna tawh a dik ka nasempa in mi tampi diktangsak ding a,, amah in amaute’ mawhnate pua ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah pen mi liante tawh nate ka hawmsak ding a, amah in mi hatte tawh nate hawm ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in sihna dongin a nuntakna piakhia a, khialhna a nei mite tawh kisim khawm hi; ahih hangin amah in mi tampi’ mawhna pua a, khialhna neite’ adingin thuumna bawlsak hi.

Ta a suak lo a ciing numei aw, lasa in; nausuak natna a thuak ngei lo mi aw, lasa khia in la, lungdamna tawh kiko in! Bang hang hiam cih leh a kinusia nu’ tate pen a kiten’pih nu’ tate sangin tamzaw ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Na buk mun khan in la, na teen’na puanbukte kizalsak in; cil bawl kei in, na khaute sau sak in la, na khetphimte kip sak in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh taklam leh veilamah nangmah kizeelin, na suan leh khakte in minamte luah ding uh a, a kinusia khuapite mi tawh dim sak ding uh hi.

“Lau kei in, maizumna na thuak kei ding hi; cih nading thei loin om kei in, maizumin nang hong kikoih lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na khangno lai-a na zumhuaina leh meigon’na hanga hong kikonate na phawk kha nawn kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah hong Bawlpa in na pasal hi a, ama min in Vanglianpen Topa ahi hi; Israelte’ Siangtho Pa in nangmah hong Tankhia-pa hi a, amah pen leitung buppi’ Pasian kici hi.
Khangno lai-a zi neih a kima, kinusia-a a dah zi bangin Topa in nang hong samkik hi, na Pasian in ci hi.
Tomno sung nang kong nusia pak a, ahih hangin hehpihna lianpi tawh nang kong lakik ding hi.
Heh luatna hangin tomno sung nang kiang panin ka maitang ka seel a, ahih hangin tawntung itna tawh nang tungah hehpihna kong nei kik ding hi, nangmah hong Tankhia Topa in ci hi.

“Bang hang hiam cih leh hih pen kei adingin Noah’ hun mah tawh kibang hi: Noah’ tuite leitungah hong pai nawn lo ding ci-a ka kiciam mah bangin nang tungah heh nawn loin nang hong tai nawn lo dingin ka kiciam hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh mual liante kihemin, mual neute a kikhin zongin nang kiang panin ka itna kip paikhia ngei lo ding a, na nopsakna ding keima thuciamna kiin lo ding hi, nang hong hehpih Topa in ci hi.
“Gimna a thuak, huihpi’ nawk gawp, hehnepna a ngah lo khuapi aw, en in, na suangte, suangvui hoih tawh ka ciang ding a, na bulpite pen suangmanpha tawh ka hih ding hi.
Na khum dawnte suangmanpha tawh, na kulh kongpite suangsan tawh, na kulh khempeuh a manpha suang tawh ka bawl ding hi.
Topa in na tapate khempeuh hilh ding a, na tapate daupai mahmah ding hi.
Thumanna tawh nang hong kikipsak ding hi; nenniamna tawh na kigamla ding a, nang na lau kei ding hi; kihtakna tawh na kigamla ding a, nang nai-ah hong pai lo ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in kidona a pian’sak leh, tua pen keima kiang pan hilo hi; note tawh kidona a piangsak peuhmah note’ hangin puk ding hi.
En un, pum zaap-in ama kizat nading ciat a sem dingin hiam a bawl siksekpa ka piangsak khin hi. A susia dingin a susia gawp theipa zong ka piangsak khin hi;

nangmah do nading a, a kibawl hiam peuhmah mavang lo ding a, thukhenna sungah nangma langa a pang mi khempeuh na nial gawp zo ding hi. Hih in, Topa’ nasemte’ gamluah leh keima kiang pan-in amaute’ dikna a kilahna ahi hi, Topa in ci hi.”
A dangtak mi peuhmah tui phualah hong pai un; an nei lote aw, hong pai-in lei un la, ne un! Hong pai un, sum leh a man ding pia loin leenggahzu leh bawngnawi lei un.

An ahi lo nate’ adingin bang hangin na sum uh zang a, hong gilvah sak thei lo nate adingin bang hangin na sem na hi uh hiam? Keima thu lim takin ngai-in, a hoih nate ne un la, an limte ah nuamsa-in om un.

Ka mite aw, ka thu ngai un la, kei kiangah hong pai un; nuntakna na ngah theih nadingun hong za un; David tungah ka kamciam mah bangin, keima itna kip ahi tawntung thuciamna note tawh ka bawl ding hi.
En un, amah pen mite tungah teci ding, mite a makai ding leh a ukpa dingin ka koih hi.

En un, note in na theih loh uh minamte na sam ding uh a, amah in note hong minthang sak zo ahih manin, Topa na Pasian leh Israelte’ Siangtho Pa’ hangin note hong thei lo minamte note kiangah hong tai ding uh hi.
“A kimuh theih hun lai-in Topa zong un la, a nai om lai-in amah sam un;

mi gilopa ama gitlohna nusia sak un la, thuman lopa ama ngaihsutna nusia sak un; amah in a hehpih theih nadingin Topa tung leh i Pasian tungah amah paikik sak un, bang hang hiam cih leh a mawhna maisiangsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh keima ngaihsutnate nomau’ ngaihsutna bang hi lo a, ka paiziate nomau’ paizia bang hi lo hi, Topa in ci hi.
Vantungte pen leitung sangin a san’ zawk mah bangin, keima paiziate, nomau paizia sangin sangzaw a, ka ngaihsutnate, nomau’ ngaihsutna sangin sangzaw hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh vantung panin guahtui leh vuuk hong pai-in, amaute ciahkik loin leitung kawtsakin, kungnote meengin selkhia sak a, khaivawhpa khaici pia-in a nepa tungah an a piak mah bangin,
keima kam panin a paikhia ka thu zong tua mah bang ding hi; a hawmpi-in kei kiangah hong tungkik lo ding a, keima ngimna-sa bangin tangtung sakin, amah ka sawlna thu tangtun’ ding hi.

“Bang hang hiam cih leh lungdamna tawh Babilon panin na paikhia ding uh a, nopsakna tawh hong kipaikhiatpih ding hi; note mai-a mual liante leh mual neute in lasa-in awng ding uh a, gamsunga sing khempeuh in a khut uh beeng ding uh hi.
Ling tangin taksing hong po ding a, lingkung tangin mui kung hong po ding hi; tua pen Topa’ adingin phawk tawntungna, a kilakhia lo ding a tawntunga om lim khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Sawt loin note hong honkhia ding a, ka dikna hong lakkhia ding ka hih manin thutang un la, thumanin gamta un.
Hih banga a gamta mite, hih thu a lenkip mihingte, sabbath tangin a siasak lote, siatna bawl nading panin a kikemte in thupha ngah mi ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Topa pawlin a beel gamdang mipa in, “Topa in ama mite kiang panin kei hong khenkhia taktak ding hi,” ci kei hen la; a kiget mipa in, “En un, keimah in Pasian mite lakah a kihel thei ding ka hi kei hi,” ci kei hen.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Keima sabbath nite tangin, kei hong lungdamsak thei nate teel a, ka thuciamna a lenkip a kiget mite tungah,
ka innsung leh ka huang sungah tapa leh tanute sangin a hoihzaw phawkna leh min ka pia ding a, a mang ngei nawn lo ding tawntung min, amaute tungah ka pia ding hi.
“Ama na a sem ding, Topa’ min a it ding, ama nasem hi dingin Topa pawlin a beel gamdang mite, sabbath ni tangin a siasak lo mi, ka thuciamna a lenkip mi peuhmah—

hih mite ka mual siangtho ah paipihin keima thungetna inn sungah ka lungdam sak ding a, amaute’ meihal biakna leh biak piaknate ka biakna tau tungah kisang ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka inn pen mi khempeuh’ adingin thungetna inn kici ding hi.
Israel a kikhenthangte a kaikhawm Topa Pasian in, a kikaikhawmsa mite banah midangte ama kiangah ka kaikhawm lai ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
Lo sunga om ganhing khempeuhte— gamlak-a om ganhing khempeuhte aw, a netum dingin hong pai un.
Ama galvilte mit taw uh a, amaute khempeuh in bangmah thei lo uh hi, amaute khempeuh ui a ham thei lote hi uh a, amaute in tawng thei lo uh hi, mot paupau, lum lum, lu su-su-in om nuam sa uh hi.

Uite in nakpi takin duhna lian nei uh a, amaute in kham hun cih nei ngei lo uh hi. Tuucingte in zong thu theihna nei lo uh hi; amaute khempeuh amau tum ciatin gamta uh a, a vekpi-un amaute’ ngah nading lam lam ciatah kihei uh hi.
Amaute in, “Hong pai un leenggahzu la ni, kham theih zu ne-in gilvah ni; zing ciangin zong tu ni mah bangin gen zawh lohin nuam ding hi,” ci uh hi.
Thuman mipa si a, kuamah in a lungsim sungah tua thu ngaihsutin nei lo hi, kuamah in a theih loh kalin thuman mite si uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuahsiatna panin thuman mipa kilakhia a;
nopsakna sungah amah tum hi, thutang-a gamta mite in a sihna uhah nopna ngahin tawlnga uh hi.
No, aisan numeite’ tapate, numei tawh a mawh mite leh numei pangtatte’ tu-le-tate aw, hih lai-ah hong nai un.

Note in kua mawlpih gawpgawp na hi uh hiam? Kua’ tungah na kam uh ka beba-in na leii uh phen na hi uh hiam? Tawsaw kung lak, singkung hing khempeuh nuai-ah pasian biakna-in nu-le-pa mawhna a bawl, kuam sung, suanghawm nuaite-ah a tate uh a that note pen, khialhna’ tate, zuauna’ tu-le-tate hilo na hi uh hiam?

Kuam sunga suangmaite lakah milimte na la uh a, tua suangmaite na bia uh hi. Tuate tungah tui tawh biak piakna sungin, an tawh biak piakna na paipih uh hi. Hih thute’ hangin kei lungdam ding ka hi hiam?
A lian a sang mual tungah nu-le-pa mawhna na bawl uh a, tua munah biakna pia dingin na paito uh hi.

Kongkhak leh kongkhakmung nungah nangmah in na milimte na suang hi; nang in keimah hong nusia-in, na puante na suah a, nang hong luppih dingin na cialte tawh na lupna zai deda tungah na kahto uh a, tua lai-ah na hukna teng na kamsak hi.
Molek kiangah pai dingin sathau tawh khual na zin a, na paknamtuite tawh na siam tawpin na kipuah hi; nang in gamlapi-ah na kamtaite na sawl a, Leinuai dong nangawn ah na sawl hi.
A gamla na khualzinna tawh nang na gim a, ahih hangin nangmah in, “Lametna om kei,” na ci kei hi; nangmah in thahatna thak na ngah a, tua ahih manin na gim kei hi.
Nang zuau-in, kei hong phawk loin, kei nong ngaihsut loh nadingin na kihtak hih pasiante bang ahi hiam? Sau veipi sung pau loin ka om hit-hiat manin kei hong zahtak lo na hi hiam?
Na gamtatna a manin na ngaihsun hi. Ahih hangin na gamtatnate ka pholak ding a, na milimte in nang hong huh zo lo ding hi.

Nang cimawh-in na kiko ciangin na milim kaihkhopte kihonsak in! Huih in amaute mutkhia-in, husan’na in amaute seem khia ding hi. Ahih hangin kei hong beel mi in leitang ngah ding a, ka mual siangtho luah ding hi.
“Zik un, zik un, lampi bawl khol un, ka mite’ lampi a dongkhak thei ding na khempeuh lakhia un,” kici ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a sang, a lian, tawntung sunga a teeng Pa, ama min Siangtho ahi pa in hih bangin ci hi: “Keimah in a sangna mun leh a siangtho munah ka om a, a kiniamkhiat mite’ lungsim leh a kisik mite’ lungsim a thakhauhsak kik dingin kisikna leh kiniamkhiatna lungsim a neite tawh zong ka omkhawm hi.
Ka mite tungah nuntakna hu ka pia hi. Amaute ka mawhsak paisuak kei ding a, amaute tungah ka heh tawntung kei ding hi.
Amau’ huaiham-mawhna hangin ka heh a, ka heh lungsim tawh amaute daan pia-in ka mai ka sel hi. Ahih hangin amaute a lungsim khauhin, a gamtat ngei bangun gamta veve uh hi.
Amau’ mawh gamtatnate ka mu khin a, ahih hangin amaute ka damsak ding hi; amaute makaih-in hehnepna ka pia ding a, a dah a kapte muk panin phatna ka piangsak ding hi.
Nopsakna, nopsakna, a gamla leh a nai mi khempeuh tungah om ta hen; keimah in amaute ka damsak ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Ahih hangin mi gilote pen a kilok tuipi tawh kibang uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuipi khawlcip thei lo a, a tuite in buan leh ninte laamto uh hi.
Mi gilote’ adingin nopsakna om lo hi, ka Pasian in ci hi.
“Na aw sit loin nakpi takin kiko in la, peengkul aw bangin gingsak in; ka mihingte tungah amau khialhnate gen in la, Jakob innkuan tungah amau mawhnate gen in.

Amaute pen, thuman-a a gamta, amaute’ Pasian’ biakna ngeina kipte a nusia lo minam bang keekin, ni simin amaute in kei hong zong uh a, keima lampite thei nuam uh hi; amaute in keima kiang panin a maan thukhenna hong ngen uh a, Pasian kiangah nai nuam uh hi.

“Kote in an tang napi-in bang hangin hong mu lo na hi hiam? Kote kiniamkhiatin om napi-in bang hangin hong thei kha lo na hi hiam? ci uh hi. En un, note in an na tan’ ni-un nomau’ deihna na zong uh a, na nasemte uh na nengniam uh hi.
En un, note in a kitawng ding leh a kilai ding leh giloin khuttum tawh a kitum ding bekin an na tang uh hi. Tu ni-a hih bang lel-a antangin na thungetna uh hong kingai ding ahi hiam?

Maugua kun bangin na lu uh kunsakin, puanhampi leh vut tungah lumin, nomau na kiniamsak tawmnate uh kei’ deih antan’na sa na hi uh hiam? Hih bang hihna pen antan’na leh Topa’ san’ theih hi ci ding na hi uh hiam?
“Kei’ deih antan’na pen hih bang ahi hi! Gitlohna khaute phelin, hakkol savun khaute phel a, a kinengniam mite khahkhia-in, hakkol khempeuh suktan ding ahi hi.
Na an uh a gilkialte tawh ne khawmin, inn nei lo mi zawngte a buk nading vaihawm sakin; tangguak-a om mi na muh uh ciangin puansilhsak a, na mi pihte uh kiang panin bu lo ding hilo na hi uh hiam?

Tua ciangin ka maipha pen phalvak tung bangin note tungah hong taang khia ding a, manlang takin na liamnate uh hong dam ding hi. Note dikna na mai uh ah om ding a, note hong honin, na nung uh kong dal ding hi.
Tua ciangin thu nong nget uh ciangin kong pia ding a, nong sap uh ciangin kong dawng ding hi. Mi bawlsiatnate khawlin, mi simmawhna khutme tawh kawk in kam gilo na paunate uh na khawl uh a,
gilkial mite an pia-in, a kinengniam mite tungah amau’ kisapnate na piak uh leh, na kimkot uh a, khuamial pen khuavak hong suak ding a, na lung ziin’na uh sun nitaang hong bang ding hi.

Tua ciangin note lam kong lak tawntung ding a, ni tangin a kap leitangah na kisapnate uh kong lungkim sak ding hi. A cidam a thahatin kong om sak ding hi. Tui tampi a ngah tawntung huan, a kang ngei lo ciktui tawh na kibang ding uh hi.

Tang lai-a a kisia na munte uh na lamkik ding uh a, khang tampi sung a kisia bulpite na dingtosak kik ding uh hi; note pen, kulhsia a puahkik, teen’ nadingin mun siate a ngei a bangsak kikte hong kici ding hi.

“Note in sabbath siangthosakin, keima ni siangtho ni-in na nasepna panun khawlin, sabbath ni pen deihhuai sa-in, Topa’ ni siangtho pen pahtawi-huai na cih uh a, note in pahtawi-in, note’ deihna bang zui loin, note’ ut bang hih loin mot pau loin na om uh leh,

Keimah biakna hangin lungdamna na ngah ding uh a, leitang a sanna munte ah kong tungsak ding hi. Na pu uh Jakob tungah ka piak leitang luahin nuam na sa ding uh hi. Topa ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khin hi,” a ci hi.
En un, a honkhia zo lo dingin Topa a ban tom lo a, khua a za thei lo dingin a bil ngong lo hi;
ahih hangin note’ mawhnate in note leh na Pasian uh kikhenna piangsak a, amah in hong zak theih loh nadingin na khialhnate un ama maitang liah hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh na khutte uh mi thahna sisan tawh nin a, na khutmete uh mawhna tawh nin hi; na mukte un zuau thu gen a, na leii un gitlohna thu gen hi.

Kuamah in thutang tawh thu na nei kei uh a, thuman tak tawh kuamah thukhen zumah na pai kei uh hi; note in bangmah lopi suan’in nei-in zuau thu na gen uh a, siat nading thu ngaihsunin, gitlohna na piangsak uh hi.
Na ngaihsutnate uh gul gunei tuii bangin gu nei hi a, na vaihawmnate uh maimom khau puan tawh kibang lel hi. Gul gunei tuii khat sukham lehang a dang khat hong tui zel hi.
Na maimom khau puante uh kizang thei lo ding a, kuamah in silh lo ding uh hi. Gitlohna gamta uh a, ngongtatna a khut sung uhah om hi.
Siatna bekbek na gelgel uh a, na hih ding uh na ngaklah mahmah uh hi. Mawh nei lo mite sisan luan ding haksa na sa kei uh hi. Na paina khempeuh uhah siatna vive om kawikawi hi.
Note’ Omna peuhah Kuamah lungmuang thei lo a, note’ sepna khempeuh ah thuman khat beek om lo hi. Na lungsim uh lampi kawite bang a, hong zui khate in thunuam mu ngei lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, thutang eite tawh kigamla-a, eite hong gimsakte kiang panin Pasian in hong hotkhiat lohna thu i thei hi. Eite in khuavak i lamen a, ahi zongin khuamial bekbek i tuak hi.
Mittaw bangin kawm i zawt a, mit nei lote bangin i mai hi; suntang laipi-in khuamial sung bangin i tuk a, a hat mite lakah mi si tawh i kibang hi.
Eite khempeuh vom bangin i humham a, vakhu bangin i thuumthuum hi; eite in thutang i zong a, ahih hangin khat zong i mu kei hi; hong hotkhiat ding i ngen a, ahih hangin bangmah hong piang lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma tungah kote’ thu-palsatnate tampi pha a, ka mawhnate uh in kote’ langah teci hong pang hi; kote’ thu-palsatnate, ka mawhnate uh ka thei uh hi.
Nangmah hong lehdo-in, nang kong nungngat uh a, nangma thu kong zui kei uh hi. Midangte nengniamin nang kong lehdo uh hi. Ka ngaihsutnate uh khial a, ka thugente uh zuau thu vive ahi hi.
Thutang kihawlkhia a, thuman in hong naih thei lo hi. Mi honpite kikhopna munah thuman kizang lo a, thutang tum thei lo hi.
Thuman om lo lua ahih manin siatna a pelh mipa pen mi hai-in kingaihsun zawsop hi. Topa in hih thu mu a, thutang om lo ahih manin amah a lungkim lo hi.
Amah in kuamah mu lo-a, nenniamna a thuak mite a huh ding mi khat beek a om lohna mu hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute a honkhia ding, leh a dikna a kip nadingin ama khut a zang ding hi.

Amah in thumanna pen awm dalna lum bangin silh ding a, gualzawhna pen sik lukhu bangin khu ding hi. Na khempeuh a manin bawlkik nopna, gimna a piangsakte daan pia-in thukkikna puansilhin, kinna puan tawh kitun ding hi.
Amau’ gamtatna bangin amah in thukkik ding a, amah a lang pangte daan pia ding a, ama galte tungah a hehna thukkik ding hi. A gamla pek-a om tuikulh gamte tungah zong thukkikna pia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nisuahna pan nitumna kikal-a om mi khempeuh in amah zahtakin, a vangliatna kihta ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ huih nung bang, tuipi khang bangin amah hong pai ding hi.
Topa in ama mite tungah, “Note a hupa Jerusalem ah kong pia ding a, mawhna panin a kihei khia mi peuhmah kong honkhia ding hi.

Note tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl hi: Nang tunga a om ka kha leh na kamsung a, ka koih keima thukhamte leh ka thuhilhnate note tungah kong pia khin a, tu-a kipanin a tawntungin note in tua thute zui-in na suan na khakte uh kam pan paikhia lo ding a, a khang khangin na maimangsak kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jerusalem khuapi aw, tho in la, sun nitaang bang in! Topa minthan’na in nangma tung hong taan’ zo hi.
Khuamial in leitung tuam a, minam dangte khuamial in tuamcip ding a, ahi zongin nangma tungah Topa’ khuavak hong taang ding hi. Ama minthan’na in nang hong ompih ding hi.
Nangma khuavak sungah minam dangte hong pai ding uh a, nangma taan’khiatna sungah kumpite hong pai ding uh hi.
Na kimkotah khuadak in la, mu in; na mite kikaikhawmin a ciah dingin nang kiangah hong pai uh hi; na tapate gamlapi panin hong ciah ding a, naungek bangin na tanute’ ang sungah hong kipua ding hi.

Tua ciangin nangmah in mu-in na maitai ding a, na lungsim liingin lungdam ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tuipi tung tawnin nangma tungah van hong kipuak ding a, minamte’ hauhna khempeuh nangma tungah hong tung ding hi.

Midian mite leh Ephah mite’ kalaohnote, kalaoh honpite in nang hong tuam ding uh a, Sheba gam sunga om khempeuh hong pai ding uh hi. Amaute in kham leh paknamtui hong paipih ding uh a, Topa phatna taangko ding uh hi.

Kedar gam tuu honte khempeuh nangma kiangah hong kipuak ding a, Nebaioth mite’ tuutalte nangma deihna ah kizang ding hi; keima biakna tau tungah piak dingin tuate hong kipaipih ding a, keimah in a minthang ka inn ka minthangsak semsem ding hi.
Meiipi leeng bangin hong pai henhan hih teembawte, vakhute a buk-ah a leeng bangin hong leeng henhante kua ahi hiam?

Hih teembawte pen, tuipi gei leh tuikulh-a om teembawte hi a, Tarshish teembaw lianpite in hong makaih hi. Topa in nang hong minthangsak khin ahih manin, gamlapi panin tua teembawte in nangma mite hong puak uh a, a ngun a khamte uh tawh hong puak khawm hi. Topa na Pasian, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa Pahtawina-a hong puak uh ahi hi.

Gamdang mite in na kulhte ciangkik ding a, amau kumpite in nangma na hong sem ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka hehna tawh nang kong vat gawp khin a, ahih hangin tu-in keima maipha tawh nang tungah hehpihna kong nei khin hi.
Kigual diudeu-a paina ah a kumpite un hong makai-in, mite in minamte’ hauhna nang kiangah hong paipih theih nadingin na kulh kongpite kihong tawntung ding hi; a sun a zanin kikhak lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma na hong sem lo minam leh kumpi gam beimang ding hi; tua minamte kisia maimang ding hi.
Keima biakinn mun a meel hoihsak dingin, Lebanon mual minthan’na ahi, taaksan sing, hiangpa sing leh taaksingte nangma kiangah hong tung ding hi; keima khe ngakna mun ka minthang sak ding hi.

Nangmah hong nengniamte’ tate nangma mai-ah kunsa-in hong pai ding uh a, nangmah hong simmawh mi khempeuh na khe mai-ah hong bok ding uh hi; amaute in nang pen Topa’ Khuapi, Israelte’ Siangtho Pa’ Zion, hong ci ding uh hi.
Hong kinusia, hong kimudah, kuama hong nawk loh nang pen, a tawntungin kisak theihna leh khang khat pan khang khat lungdamna ahi dingin kong bawl ding hi.

Nupi khat in a ta nawi pia-in limtakin a kep bangin, ninamte leh kumpite in nang hong vakin hong kem ding uh hi. Tua ciangin kei pen Topa, nangmah Honpa, nangmah Tankhiapa, Jakob’ Vanglian Pa ka hihna na thei ding hi.

Sumngo tangin kham kong paipih ding a, sik tangin ngun kong paipih ding hi; sing tangin sumngo, suang tangin sik kong paipih ding hi. Nuam na sak nadingun na mangliante uh bawlin, na nasem ukte thuman thutang tawh na ka semsak ding hi.
Na gam sungah ngongtatna kiza nawn lo ding a, na gam sungah siatmai-na leh suksiatna om nawn lo ding hi; nangmah in na kulhte pen Hotkhiatna, na kulh kongpite pen Phatna, na ci ding hi.
Sun hunin ni pen nangma khuavak hi loin, zan hunin kha pen nangma khuavakna hi nawn lo ding hi; Topa pen a tawntung nangma khuavak hi ding a, na Pasian pen nangma minthan’na hi ding hi.
Na ni tum nawn loin na kha zong tumkik nawn lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa pen tawntung nangma khuavak hi ding a, nangma thuumna hunte bei ding hi.
Na mihingte khempeuh thuman ding hi; keima min a than’ nadingin keima suansa kung, ka khut tawh ka sepsa ahi gam pen amaute in nei pai suak ding uh hi.
A ngek pen mipa in minam khat suak ding a, a neu pente in minam lianpi suak ding hi; keimah in Topa ka hi hi; a hun ciangin keimah in thakhatin hih thu ka tungsak ding hi.

A zawng mite tungah lungdamna thu puak dingin Topa in kei sathau hong nilhin hong sawl ahih manin kei tungah Topa Pasian’ kha hong om hi; lungsim kitamzante a damsak ding, sal-a a kimante tungah suahtakna thu a gen ding, a kihen mite’ adingin thong kong a hong ding;
Topa maipha ngah kum, a galte tungah Pasian phulak ding hun a tun’na thu a gen ding, a thuum mi khempeuh a hehnem ding;

amaute pen a thuman mite kici-in, amah a kiminthan’sak theih nadingin Topa’ suan kungte a kicih theih nadingin, Zion ah a om a dah mite tungah vut tawh kibuak a, lukhu khuk tangin a hoih kumpi lukhu khuksak nading, tauna tangin lungdamna sathau nilhsak theih nading, a lunggimna tangin Pasian phatna puan a silh theih nadingun amah in kei hong sawl zo hi.
Amaute in tang lai-a a siasate lampha ding uh a, a kisiamai-sate ding kiksak ding uh hi; amaute in khang tampi sung a kisia maisa khuapi siate puahkik ding uh hi.
Gamdang mite in na tuu honte uh vak ding a, khual mite pen note’ lo kho leh leenggui puahte hi ding uh hi;

ahih hangin note pen Topa’ siampite hong kici ding a, mihingte in note pen i Pasian’ nasemte ci-in hong gen ding uh hi; minamte’ hauhna note in na ne ding uh a, amau’ hauhna note in na kisaktheihpih ding uh hi.

Note’ maizumna tangin nopna a zah nih na ngah ding uh a, note’ mindaina tangin nomau’ ngahna sungah na lungdam ding uh hi; tua ahih ciangin na gam sung uhah a zah nih na luah ding uh hi; note’ aa pen tawntung lungdamna hi ding hi,
Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah Topa in thutang deihin, mi’ nate suhna leh khialhna ka mudah hi; amaute tungah amau thaman thuman takin ka pia ding a,, tawntung thuciamna amaute tawh ka bawl ding hi.

Amau suan leh khakte pen minamte lakah kithei ding a, amau tu-le-tate pen mite laizang ah kithei ding hi; amaute pen Topa in thupha a piak mite hi, ci-in a mu mi khempeuhte in thei-in sang ding uh hi.

Topa hangin nakpi takin ka lungdam ding a, ka Pasian hangin kipakin ka diang ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh zipipa in a lu kizemin, mo thaknu a suangmanphate tawh a kizep mah bangin amah in hotkhiatna puan kei hong silhsakin, thumanna puanpi tawk kei hong tuam khin hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung in a dawn meeng sakin, huan in a kituhte a posak mah bangin, Topa PASIAN in minam khempeuh mai-ah thumanna leh phatna po khiasak ding hi.

Zion a kihotkhiatna thu meilah kuang bangin a taan’ khiat mateng, ama dikna thu zing khuavak bangin a taan’ khiat matengin, Zion ka ngaihsutna-in gamdai-in ka om mawk kei ding a, Jerusalem ka ngaihsutna-in ka khawl mawk kei ding hi.
Minamte in nangma gualzawhna mu ding uh a, kumpi khempeuh in nangma minthan’na mu ding uh hi; Topa in nang hong phuah min thak tawh nang hong kisam ding hi.
Nang pen, Topa khut sunga hoihna lukhu, na Pasian khut sunga kumpi lukhu tawh na kibang ding hi.

Nang pen a kinusia, hong kici nawn lo ding a, na leitang pen Gamkhing, kici nawn lo ding hi. Nang pen ama tungah ka lungkimna om, hong kici a, na leitang pen Kiten’pih, kici ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nangma tungah Topa lungkim a, na leitang pen a kiten’pih zi bang ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh tangval khat in nungak khat a ten’pih mah bangin nang hong lamkippa in nang hong tenpih ding a, zipipa mothak nu tungah a lungdam mah bangin na Pasian nang tungah lungdam ding hi.

6-7 Jerusalem aw, na kulhte tungah galvilte ka koih khin hi; sun tawntung leh zan tawntungin amaute tawlnga ngei lo ding uh hi. Amaute in a thuciamna Topa phawksak ding uh a, amah in Jerusalem kipsakin leitungah phatna-in a bawl kik matengin amaute tawlnga lo ding uh hi.
Topa in lim takin thuciamna bawl khin zo a, a vangliatna tawh tungsak ding hi: “Na galte’ an dingin na ante ka piakik nawn kei ding a, nangma sepsa leenggahzu gamdang mite in dawn nawn lo ding hi;
ahih hangin a kholte in ne-in Topa phat ding a, a kaikhawmte in keima biakinn huang sungah dawn ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Jerusalem mite aw, kulh kongpite panin paikhia un la, hong ciahkik na mipihte’ adingin lampi bawlkhol un; zik un, lam lianpi zik-in, suangtumte paikhia un la, mite’ muh dingin lim khat khaito un.
En un, lei mong dongah Topa tangko khin hi: Jerusalem mite tungah, “En un, no hong honkhiapa hong pai hi; en un, ama sep thamante hong pua a, a gualzawhna thamante hong masuan hi,” ci un.
Amaute pen A siangtho mi, Topa’ tatkhiat mite kici ding a, nang pen a Kizongkhia, a kinusia lo khuapi hong kici ding hi.

Edom gam, Bozrah khua panin puan ausan silhin a hong pai, a puan silhna-ah minthan’na nei-in, ama thahatna tawh hong paipa kua ahi hiam? A honkhia zo dingin hatna a nei, gualzawhna thu a zasak dingin a hong paipa in Topa ahi keimah ka hi hi.
Bang hangin na puan san a, na puan silhte, leenggah cilna-a leenggah a cilpa’ puan tawh kibang ahi hiam?

Mite’ lak panin kuamah in hong huh loin keimah guak in leenggah cil bangin minamte ka cil hi; sin sona tawh amaute ka cil a, hehna tawh amaute ka tuancil hi; ka puan tungah amaute’ sisan hong kitheh gawp a, ka puan khempeuh tungah sisan hong baang hi.
Ka mite ka hotkhiat nading hun ta ka sa a, a galte uh phulak ding hun hi ta hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Hong huh ding mi ka zong a, ahi zongin kuamah om lo hi. Kei hong huh ding a om loh ciangin lamdang ka sa hi. Ahih zongin ka hehna in hong thahatsak a, keimahmah khut tawh ka kigumkhia hi.
Ka sin sona tawh mihingte cil-in, ka hehna hangin amaute zu kham ka bang sak a, amaute’ sisan leitungah ka thehthang hi.

Topa’ itna kip, Topa phatnate, Topa in eite tunga hong piak na hoihte khempeuh tawh kizui leh, ama hehpihna tawh kizui, a lianpi ama itna kip tawh kizui-in amaute tunga a piak, Israel innkuan tunga ama hoihna lianpite ka gengen ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in, “Amaute pen keima mi taktak hi a, amaute in kei hong khem lo ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih manin a lungkhamna panun amaute a honkhia suak hi.
Ama ompihna vantungmi in amaute honkhia hi. Ama itna leh ama hehpihna tawh amaute tankhia a, amah in a beisa hun lui khempeuh ah amaute domto-in a pua hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in amah lehdo uh a, a Kha Siangtho dahsak uh hi; tua ahih ciangin amah pen amaute’ gal suak a, amahmah in amaute a do hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in hun lui lai, ama nasem Moses’ hun phawk uh hi. Ama tuuhonte a cing tuucingpa, tuipi sung pan a, a paikhiatpih Topa koi-ah om ta ahi hiam? Amaute’ tungah a Kha Siangtho a piapa,
Moses, tung tawnin a vangliatna khut zangin na lianpipi a sempa, ama mite’ mai-ah tuite khenkhamin, amah a minthan’ tawntung nadingin hih bang nate a sempa, tu-in koi-ah om ta ahi hiam, ci uh hi.
Topa in tui thuk kantanin amaute a paipih ciangin leilak a, sakol pai bangin kip mahmah uh a, amaute puk lo uh hi.
Lonona kuamsung a zuansuk bawngte bangin, Topa’ Kha in amaute tawldamna a pia hi. Tua bangin Topa in a mite lamlak ahih manin ama minthang tawntung hi.

A siangtho, a minthang nangma omna vantung pan a sangna kumpi tokhom panin, hong ensuk in la, hong mu in. Nangma deihna leh nangma vangliatna koi-ah om ta ahi hiam? Na lungduaina leh nong lainatna kote’ adingin kikhaktan ta hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh, Abraham in kote hong huh loin, Israel in kote hong phawk loh hangin, nangmah in kote’ Pa na hi hi; Topa aw, nangmah in kote’ Pa na hi a, nangmah in tanglai pek pan kote hong Tankhia-pa na hi hi.
Topa aw, kote in nang kong kihtak loh nadingun bang hangin na lampite panin hong khialsakin ka lungsim uh khauhsak na hi hiam? Nangma nasemte, nangma luah minamte na ngaihsutna-in hong kihei kik in.
Nangma misiangthote in na biakinn tawl khat sung bek nei uh hi; ko hong langpangte in tua pen tuancil gawp khin hi.
Kote pen, nangmah in cik mah a, na uk ngei loh mite, nangma mi ahi ngei lo mite tawh a kibang ka suakkhin uh hi.

1-2 Nangma langte tungah na min na theihsak nading leh nangma omna-ah minamte lau-in a lin’ nadingin—mei in selkeu kuang sakin, mei in tui a sosak bangin—na mai-ah mualte a lin’ nadingin bang hangin na vangliatna tawh vantungte balkeekin hong paisuk lo na hi hiam?
Kote’ lamet lohpi-in nang hong pai-in a lauhuai nate na bawl ngei a, na mai-ah mualte a liing hi.
Amah in a ngakte’ ading na a sempa’ thu tanglai pek panin kuamah in thei ngei lo, kuama bil in za ngei lo, kuama mit in nang sim loh Pasian dang mu ngei lo hi.

Thuman nasep lungdam takin a semte, nangma deih bangin a nungtate, nangmah in na limbawl hi. En in, kote tungah nang na heh a, ahih zongin kote ka khial lai veve uh hi; tanglai pek-a kipanin ka mawh ngitnget uh hi. Tua bangpi-in kote hong kihon ding ahi hiam?

Kote khempeuh mawhnei mi ka hi khin uh a, ka gamtat hoih khempeuh uh zong puansianin tawh kibang veve hi. Kote khempeuh singteh bangin ka vul uh a, ka mawhna hangun, huih letkhiat nahthel keu ka bang uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nangmah hong pom dingin a hanciam tawm, nangma min a lo kuamah om lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kote kiang panin nang in na maitang na seel a, mawhna khut sungah kote nong pia hi.
Ahi zongin, Topa aw, nangmah in kote’ Pa na hi hi; kote tungman bang hi-in, nang in beel seekpa bang na hi hi; kote khempeuh nangma bawl mite ka hi uh hi.
Topa aw, nakpi takin sinso kei in la, mawhna ciamtehteh kei in. En in, kote khempeuh nangma mi ka hihna uh hong ngaihsun in.
Nangma khuapi siangthote gamlak suak a, Zion zong gamlak suak a, Jerusalem khua gamkhing a suak hi.
Kote’ biakinn a siangtho leh a hoihte, ka pate un nangmah hong phatna munte uh mei in kangtum khin a, kote’ neihsa na manpha khempeuh a sia suak khinta hi.
Topa aw, hih nate ah nangmah ki-ip cip ding na hi hiam? Nang dai takin om dide-in nakpi takin kote hong gimsak ding na hi hiam?
Hong ngen lo mite kiangah kei ka kilak hi; kei hong zong lo mite in kei hong mu uh hi. Ka min a lo lo gam khat kiangah, “Hiah om ing, hiah om ing,” ka ci hi.
A hoih loin gamta-in, amau’ ngaihsutna bang a zui teitei a genhak mite lam nga-in, sun ni tawntungin ka khut ka zak hi.
Ka maitang ah a tawntungin kei hong hehsak denin, biakna huan sungah biak piakna bawlin dawi biakna tau tungah paknamtui a hal mite,
han sungah tu-in, mun simtham ah zanin mi site thu a dong mite, voksa ne-in amau beel sungah dawi biakna sa mehtui a nei mite,

“Note kiang panin kote hong kituam koih ahih manin kihemkhia un la, ko kiangah hong pai kei un,” ci-in midangte tungah a gen mite in ni khat tawntung a kuang mei leh ka nak sunga meikhute bang ahi uh hi.

6-7 En un, amaute daan piak ding ka khentat khin a, amaute’ thuak dingte lai sungah kiciamteh khin hi. Amau’ mawhnate mawk koih in, ka dai om kei ding a, a bit-in ka thukkik ding hi. Amau’ mawhna leh a pu a pate’ mawhnate a phei tungah ka thukkik ding hi; amaute in mual liante tungah paknamtui hal-in mual neute tungah kei hong simmawh uh ahih ciangin amau’ gamtatna tawh kizui-in a bit-in ka thuk ding hi, ci hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Leenggahzu pen leenggah bom panin kingah a, mite in, ‘Tuate kimang thei ahih ciangin susia kei un,’ a cih mah bangun kei zong a minam bupin susia loin, keima na hong semte ka suakta sak ding hi.
Jakob sung panin Judah minamte thupha ka pia ding a, amau’ suan leh khakte in mualtung gam a luah ding uh hi. Keima na hong sem, keima teel mite, tua gamah teeng ding uh hi.
Amaute in kei hong zong ding uh a, Sharon gam pen amau’ tuu hon gamtatna mun suaksakin, Akhor Kuam pen amau’ bawng honte’ lupna mun a suaksak ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin kei a hong nusia, keima mual siangtho a mangngilh, Gad pasian’ adingin sabuai phahin, Meni pasian’ adingin zu helsa hai sungah a dim note pen;

namsau tawh a si dingin kong seh ding a, hong that dingte’ mai-ah na ngawng uh na dawh ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kong sap ciangin note in nong dawng kei uh a, thu ka gen ciangin nong ngai kei uh hi. Keima thu, man’ loh ding mah na utzaw uh a, a sia na gamta uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: En un, ka nasemte in ne ding a, ahih hangin note na gilkial ding uh hi; en un, ka nasemte in dawn ding uh a, ahih hangin note na dangtak ding uh hi; en un, ka nasemte lungdam ding uh a, ahih hangin note na mai uh zum ding hi;
en un, ka nasemte in lungdamin lasa ding uh a, note in lungsim na-sa-in kiko-in, lungsim gimna hangin na thuum ding uh hi.
Keima teel mite in ciamsiatna-in na min uh zang ding uh a, Topa Pasian in note hong that ding hi; ahih hangin ama nasemte pen min dang phuah ding hi.

Leitungah thupha a kipiak ding a ngenpa in thuman Pasian min tawh thupha a kipiak ding ngen ding a, leitungah thuciamna a lapa in thuman Pasian min tawh a ciam ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a beisa huna haksatnate kimangngailh khin a, beimang khin ta hi.
En un, vantung thak leh leitung thak ka piangsak hi; a beisa nate kiciamteh nawn lo, kiphawk kha nawn lo ding hi.
Keima pian’saksa sungah lungdamin kipakin om tawntung un; bang hang hiam cih leh en un, Jerusalem khua lungdamna-in bawlin, a mite lung nuamin ka bawl hi.
Jerusalem’ hangin ka lungdam ding a, ka mite hangin ka kipak ding hi; tua khua sungah kahna aw leh cimawh a, kikona aw om nawn lo ding hi.
Naupangte a ngeek sih om lo ding a,, puteek khat in sauveipi nungta ding hi. Kumza bek a nungtate a khan’ sihin kingaihsun ding a,, kumza cing loin a site, hamsiatna ngahin kiciamteh ding hi.
Amaute in inn lam ding uh a, a sungah teeng ding uh hi; amaute in leenggui lo bawl ding uh a, a gah ne ding uh hi.

Amaute in inn lamin midang teeng cih om lo ding hi; amaute in suan-in adang khat in ne cih om lo ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keima mihingte’ hun pen singkung khat’ nuntak tan bang sawt ding a, keima teel mite in amau khut tawh a sepsa nate lungdamin ne suak ding uh hi.

Amaute in a mawkna dingin na sem lo ding uh a, lungkham nadingin ta nei lo ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen Topa’ thupha piak suan leh khakte hi ding uh a, amau’ tate amaute tawh nungta khawm ding uh hi.
Amaute in hong sap ma-in ke’n ka dawng ding a, thu a gen laitakun ka za ding hi.

Keivom leh tuuno in an ne khawm ding uh a, humpinelkai in bawngtal bangin buhkung ne ding hi; leivui pen gulpi’ an hi ding hi. Keima mual siangtho tung tengah amaute kiliamsak lo, kisusia lo ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi, a ci hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Vantung in keima tokhom hi a, leitung in keima khe ngakna ahi hi; kei’ adingin koi lai-ah inn lam ding a, keima tawlngakna mun koi lai ahi hiam?

Hih nate khempeuh keima khut in a bawlsa hi a, tua ahih ciangin hih nate khempeuh kei’ aa ahi hi, Topa in ci hi. Ahih hangin, kiniamkhiatin kha lamah lungsim a kitamzan mipa, keima thu-ah lau-in a liing kelkelpa pen keima deih mipa ahi hi.

“Biakna-in bawngtal a gopa in mihing zong that hi; biak piakna-in tuuno a gopa in ui ngawng zong tan hi; an tawh biak piakna a bawlpa in vok si zong pia hi; paknamtui tawh phawkna biak piakna a bawlpa in milim zong bia-in thupha pia hi. Hih mite in amau’ ut bang ciatin gamta uh a, amau’ kihhuai gamtatna uhah nuam sa uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute tungah gimna ka tungsak ding a, amau’ kihtak thute mah amau tungah ka tungsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sap ciangin kuamah in hong dawng lo a, thu ka gen ciangin kuamah in hong ngai lo uh hi; keima thu man’ loh ding mah ut zaw uh a, a sia-in gamta uh hi, a ci hi.

Ama thu ah lau-in a liing mite aw, Topa’ thu za un: Kei tungah note nong cihtakna hangun na mipihte pawlkhat un note hong mudahin hong hawlkhia ding uh a, zahpihna tawh note hong hopihin, “Lungdamin na om ding uh hong deihsak ka hih manun, Topa in ama liatna hong lak hen la, note hong honkhia ta hen,” hong ci vial ding uh hi. Hih banga hong paute pen mindaina a thuak ding mite ahi uh hi.
Ngai un, khuapi sunga gamlumna! Biakinn sunga aw ging! Topa in a galte a daanpia a, a thukkikna huging ahi hi.
Ka khuapi siangtho pen nausuak natna a thuak ma-in nau a suak nupi tawh kibang hi; nausuak gimna a tun’ ma-in amah in tapa khat nei hi.

A tuaci bang kua’n za ngei na hi uh hiam? A tuaci bang kua’n mu ngei na hi uh hiam? Ni khat thu-in gam khat piang ngei ahi hiam? Tomno khat sungin minam khat piangkhia ngei ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh Zion in nausuak gimna a thuak phetin a minamte suak khia pah hi.
Nau suah hun tungsak napi-in suakkhia sak lo ding ka hi hiam? Topa in ci hi; nau a suakkhiasak keimah in naugil khakcip ding ka hi hiam? na Pasian un ci hi.

10-11 Naungeek in a nu’ nawi teepin nuam a sak mah bangin, Jerusalem in nuam a sakna ah nuam na sak khawm theih nadingun, amah a it khempeuhte aw, Jerusalem tawh lungdam un la, ama hangin kipak un; ama hangin kapin a thuum khempeuhte aw, ama lungdamna ah amah tawh lungdam khawm un, ci hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “En un, gunpi bangin nopsakna leh tui letkhia bangin minamte’ hauhna ama tungah ka tungsak ding hi; note pen a nu’ nawi teepin, a ang-ah kipua a, a khuk tungah a diang naungeek bangin hong kemin na lungkim ding uh hi. Ama hauhna ah na lungdam ding uh hi.
A nu in a ta a hehnep bangin note kong hehnem ding a, note in Jerusalem khua sungah hehnepna na ngah ding uh hi.

Hih thu hong piang na muh uh ciangin na lungdam ding uh hi; na guhte uh lopano a hing kilkel tawh kibang ding hi. Tua ciangin ka nasemte tungah ka huhna, leh ka galte tungah ka hehna ka lahna thu na thei ding uh hi, ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh en un, heh mahmahna tawh ama sin sona leh meikuang tawh daan a pia dingin meikuang sungah Topa hong pai ding a, huihpi bangin a leengte hong pai ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in mei tawh thukhenna sem ding a, a mawh mi khempeuh tungah a namsau tawh thukhen ding hi; Topa in a thah mite tam mahmah ding hi.
Biakna huan sungah pai dingin amaute kisian’ suahin a kisiangthosak, a laizang-a om pen a zuite, voksa leh kihhuaina leh zusa a nete beimang khawm ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amau nasepnate leh amau ngaihsutnate ka thei a, minam khempeuh a khawm dingin ka hong pai hi; amaute hong pai-in ka minthan’na mu ding uh hi.

Amaute’ lakah lim khat ka khai ding hi. Amau kiang panin, a suakta lai mite pen, minamte tung, Tarshish mite tung, Put mi leh Lud mite tung, Meshek mite tung, Tubal mi leh Javan mite tung, ka min hoihna a za ngei lo, ka minthan’na a mu ngei lo tuipi gei-a om gammite tungah ka sawl ding hi; amaute in minamte lakah ka minthan’na genthang ding uh hi.

Israel mite in an tawh amau biakpiakna beel siangtho sungah tawi-in Topa’ innah hong paipih uh mah bangin, amaute in minam khempeuhte lak panin Topa’ tungah piak dingin na sanggamte khempeuh uh, sakolte, leengte, taalte, late, kalaoh hatte tungah hong pua-in ka mual siangtho Jerusalem ah hong paipih ding uh hi; Topa in ci hi.
Amaute kimkhat zong, siampite leh Levi mite a suak dingin ka la ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Ka bawl ding vantung thak leh leitung thak pen ahih leh keima mai-ah kip ding hi; tua mah bangin na suan na khakte uh leh na min uh kip ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
Khadet khat pan khadet khat, sabbath khat pan sabbath khat, kunsukin keimah a bia dingin Jerusalem ah mi khempeuh hong pai ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi.

Amaute a ciah uh ciangin kei hong lehdo mite’ luanghawmte en ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau a ne thante si ngei loin, amau a kihalna mei mit ngei lo ding a, amaute pen mi khempeuh’ kih hi ding uh hi, a ci hi.
Benjamin gam Anathoth khua-a siampi khat ahi, Hilkiah’ tapa Jeremiah thu gente hih bang ahi hi.
Amon’ tapa Josiah, Judah gamah kumpi a suah zawh kum sawm leh kum thum a cin’ kum-in Topa in Jeremiah a hopih hi.

Josiah’ tapa Jehoiakim kumpi a suah ciangin Topa in Jeremiah a hopih leuleu hi. Tua khit ciangin Josiah’ tapa Zedekiah kumpi a suah zawh kum sawm leh kum khat a phak kum, a kha ngana, Jerusalem khua mite sal tang dinga a kipuak khiat dong tam veipi a hopihpih hi.
Topa in kei hong hopih-a,
“Gil sungah kong bawl ma-in nang kong thei khin zo hi; na suah ma-in kong teelkhia khin zo a, minam dangte’ tungah kamsang dingin kong koih khin zo hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, “Ah, Topa Pasian aw, en dih in! Thu gen ka siam kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh naupang khat ka hi lel hi,” ka ci hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in, “‘Naupang khat ka hi lel hi,’ ci kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh kong puakna khempeuhte’ kiangah na pai ding a, kong sawl peuhpeuh na gen ding hi.
Amaute kihta kei in, bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah hong dal dingin kong ompih hi, Topa in kong ci hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in a khut tawh hong zam phei-in ka muk hong lawn sak-a hong hopih hi. “En in, ka thute na kam sungah kong koih khin zo hi.

Gam khempeuh leh kumpi khempeuhte’ tungah a botkhia ding leh a phelkhia dingin ahi zongin, a susia ding leh a suankhia dingin ahi zongin, a lam ding leh a phut dingin ahi zongin, tu ni-in za, nang kong pia zo hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei tungah, “Jeremiah aw, bang na mu hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Kei zong, “Ngak a kici almond singhiang khat ka mu hi,” ci-in ka dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Na maan hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka thu gente ka tangtun’ sak nadingin kei zong ka ngak hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in a nih veina hong hopih leuleu-a, “Bang na mu hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Kei zong, “Beel a so khat ka mu-a, a leilu lam panin hong awnsuk hi,” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Leilu lam panin hih gam mi khempeuhte’ tungah siatna hong sosuk ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu-a om gam khempeuh keimah in ka sam a, amaute hong pai-in Jerusalem khua kongpite-ah ahi zongin, khua kimkot-a kulh kimte-ah ahi zongin, Judah gam khuapi khempeuh kimte-ah ahi zongin a kumpi tokhomte uh hong phut ciat ding uh hi.
Ka mite in kei hong taisan uh ahih manin a mawhna uh hangin amau’ tungah thu ka khen ding hi; pasian dangte meihal biakna a pia uh a, a khut uh tawh a bawlsa milimte a bia uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Jeremiah aw, na kawng gak in, Tho in la, kong sawl khempeuh amaute’ kiangah va gen in. Amaute kihta kei in; na kihtak leh amau mai-ah kong lau sak zawlai ding hi.

En in, hih gambup langah ding dingin, Judah kumpite, uliante, siampite leh hih gam mi khempeuh langpan’ dingin tu ni-in nang, khuapi muanhuai khat bangin ahi zongin, sik khuampi khat bangin ahi zongin, sumngo kulhpi khat bangin ahi zongin kong bawl hi.
Amaute in nang’ lang khatah hong do ding uh hi. Ahih hangin a hong zo kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, Topa in kong cih-inah, nangmah hong dal dingin kong ompih ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei hong hopih a,
“Pai in la, Jerusalem khua’ zak dingin va tangko in: Topa in hong cih-inah, Na khangno lai-a nong kipiakna, na mothak lai-a nong itna, a kikho nai lo gamlak-a kei’ nung nong zuih hun lai ka phawk hi.
Israel mite Topa’ ading-a a tuam om hi a, ama’ an lakna-ah an palte ahi uh hi. Amaute a ne peuhpeuh a mawh suak uh a, gimna a thuak uh hi, Topa in hong ci hi, ci-in va gen in,” hong ci hi.
Jokob’ suan leh Israel innkuan khempeuhte aw, Topa’ kammal ngai dih un.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Na pute na pate un kei kiang panin gamlapi paikhia-in, bangmah-a kimang lo milim peuh bia-in, amau mahmah zong bang mah-a kimang lo a suah khit nadingun kei’ tungah bang mawhna mu uh ahi hiam?

Amaute in, ‘Izipt gam panin eite hong paikhiatpih-a sehnel lak leh dum lak, leikeu lak leh a lauhuai khuamial bekbak lak, kuama’ pai ngei lohna mun, kuama’ teen’ lohna gamlak-ah a hong makaih Topa koi-ah a om hiam?’ ci beek lo uh hi.
Singgah leh a hoih nate na nek theih nadingun an tamna munah kong tun’pih hi. Ahih hangin no nong pai uh ciangin ka gam na nin sak uh a, ka neihsa gam a kihhuai mun na suak sak tazen uh hi.

Siampite in, ‘Topa koi-ah a om hiam?’ ci-in dong lo uh hi. Thukham theite nangawn in kei hong thei lo uh hi. Kumpi uliante kei’ tungah hong khial khin uh a, kamsangte in Baal min tawh thu genin, kiman’na nei lo nate’ nung a zui uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih-inah, note kong mawhsak lai ding a, na tate-uh’ tate zong ka mawhsak ding hi.

Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh nitumna lamah Saipras tuikulh mong dong kantan un la, va en dih un. Nisuahna lam Kedar gamah mi sawl un la, limtak kan dih un; tua bang na a piang ngei peuhmah hiam, en dih un.
Gam khat in pasian ahi taktak beek lo a pasiante uh nangawn a khek ngei peuhmah uh hiam? Ahih hangin ka mite in a minthan’na uh ahi, keimah pen bangmah-a kimang lo na peuh tawh hong khek tazen uh hi.
Tua thu phawk un la, lau un, vantungte aw, dah mahmah un la, liing un, Topa in kong ci hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka mite in mawhna nam nih a bawl zo uh hi: nuntakna ciktui ahi keimah a hong taisan zo uh hi; tuikhuk a to tawm uh a, tuikhuk keh-in tui a vung thei kei hi.
“Israel sal ahi hiam? Sila namte ahi zenzen hiam? Hi lo ahih leh bang hangin a galte in luhgawp zo ahi hiam?
Humpite bangin a galte in amah hawk uh a, nakpi takin a hawkgawp uh hi. A gam uh gam simtham a suah uh a, a khuapite cim-in kuamah teeng lo hi.
Tham loin, Memfis leh Tahpanhes mite in zong a luguh a suktap sak zo hi.
Israel aw, Topa na Pasian in lampi-ah hong makaih laitakin amah na nusiat manin hih teng nang’ tungah hong tung hilo ahi hiam?

Tu-in Izipt gamah na pai manin bang phattuamna ngah ding na hi hiam? Nail guntui va dawn lel ding na hi hiam? Assiria gamah na pai manin bang phattuamna ngah ding na hi hiam? Eufrates guntui va dawn lel ding na hi hiam?

Na gitlohna mah in nangmah hong thu hilh ding-a, na thu up nawn lohna in nangmah hong mawhsak ding hi. Topa na Pasian nong nusiat ciang, kei nong kihtak nawn loh ciangin, nuam hetlo-a kha keei hi, cih thu thei in la, mu in, a vanglian Topa Pasian in kong ci hi.

“Sawt pek lai-a kipanin ka hakkol kuaitan-in ka ukna nong nial a, hong kihenna khau sutat-in, ‘Na na ka sem kei ding hi,’ nong ci hi. Hi hi, numei paktat na bang a, mualsang tung teng leh singliim nuai tengah milim na bia kawikawi hi.
A kiteelteel leenggah gui ci hoihte bangin nang kong suan khin zo-a, ahih hangin nang kisia kik-in bang hangin leenggah gui a hoihlote na suak kik tazen hiam?
