Vuttui tawh na kisil-a satpiang tampi na zang zongin na mawhna nin ka mu lai veve hi, Topa Pasian in kong ci hi.

Bangci bangin nangmah in, ‘Kei ka nin kei hi, Baal pasiante’ nung ka zui kei hi,’ na ci thei peuhmah ding hiam? Mualkuam zang-a na lampi totte en dih in; na hih sate mu dih in— a leh tai kawikawi kalaoh huk na bang tazen hi.
Gamlak nuam a sa laano hukte na bang zen hi! A huk lai-in kua in khaam zo ding hiam? Amah a zong nuam peuhpeuh in gim kul se loin, a huk hunin a ngah lel ding uh hi.
Na khe guakin lam pai kei in la, na dang taksak kei in, kong cih hangin, nangmah in, ‘Bang phamawh hiam? Khual mite ka it a, amau’ nung ka zui ding hi,’ na ci hi.
“Guta khat a kimat cianga a zum bangin, Israel mite, a kumpite uh, uliante, a siampite uh leh a kamsangte uh zong a zum ding uh hi.

Amaute in singtawng khat kiangah, ‘Nang ka pa na hi hi,’ peuh a ci uh a, suangtum khat kiangah, ‘Ka pian’na ka nu na hi hi,’ peuh a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in kei hong nungngat uh a, a hong maingat kei uh hi. Ahih hangin haksatna a tuah uh ciangin, ‘Tho in la, hong hon in,’ hong ci uh hi.

No ading-a na bawl uh na pasiante uh koiah om ahi hiam? Haksatna na tuah uh ciangin, a hong hot theih leh kihon sak ta ve un; bang hang hiam cih leh Judah gam aw, na khuapi zahzah-ah pasian na nei tazen uh hi.
“Bang hangin kei hong mawh sak khin na hi uh hiam? Na vekpi-un nong langpan’ khin uh hi. Topa in kong ci hi.
Na tate uh thu hilh-in ka sat hangin a mawkna suak zo hi, amaute kibawlpha tuan lo uh hi; na namsaute un humpi an zong bangin na kamsangte uh a that khin zo uh hi.

No khangthakte aw, Topa’ kammal limtak ngai dih un. Israel mite adingin keimah in gamlak bang hi ngei ka hi hiam? A mial mahmah gam bang hi ngei ka hi hiam? Tua ahih leh bang hangin ka mite in, ‘Ko ka suakta uh hi, nang kiangah kong pai nawn kei ding uh hi,’ ci uh ahi hiam?
Nungak khat in a kizepnate a mangngilh thei hiam? A kipi mothak nu in a mothak puante a mangngilh thei hiam? Ahih hangin ka mite in sim zawh loh ni tampi a hong mangngilh uh hi.
“Na lawm ngaih ding na zon’ siam mahmah a, numei gilote nangawn na lampi na hilh zen hi!
Mawhnei lo mizawngte’ sisan na puan tungah a baang hi; amaute in na inn hong luh ngei beek lo uh hi. Tua bang teng hi napi-in,
nangmah in, ‘Kei ka mawh kei hi; kei tungah Pasian heh nawnlo taktak hi,’ na ci hi. En in, ‘Kei ka mawh kei hi,’ na cih manin nang’ tungah thu kong khen ding hi.
Bang hangin na lungsim khel ziauziau na hi hiam? Assiriate in nang hong maizumsak ngei bangin Iziptte in zong hong maizum sak ding uh hi.
Nangmah in zong tua gam panin maizumna tawh na lu tungah khut koih sa-in nong paikhia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na muan’ mite Topa in ka nial zo-a, amaute’ hangin na zo ngei kei ding hi.

“Mi khat in a zi ma hen la, tua nu in zong amah nusia-in, pasal dang khat’ zi suak leh, a pasal masa in tua nu la kik thei ding ahi hiam? Tua gam teng a nin suaksak khin ding hilo ahi hiam? Nang in numei paktat suak-in mi tampi tawh kingai khin zo napi cin tu’n kei’ kiang hong zuankik ding na hi hiam? Topa in kong ci hi.

Khuadak in la, mualsang dawnte en dih in! Hong kilup khoppih lohna mun koi lai takah om ahi hiam? Arab mite in a suam dingun gamlakah mi a ngak uh bangin nang in lam geiah tu-in luppih ding mi na ngak hi. Na paktatna leh na gitlohna tawh hih gam na ninsak zo hi.
Tua hang mah-in guahtui kikang sak a, guah nunung hong zu lo hi; ahih hangin numei paktatte bang hi napi-in, na zum thei kei lailai hi.
Tu mahin kei nong sam a, ‘Ka pa aw, ka neu lai pek pan-a ka lawm na hi hi—
nang heh tawntung ding na hi hiam, a tawp dongin lungham den ding na hi hiam?’ nong ci hi. En in, tua bang na cih hangin, na hih theih siatna khempeuh na hih khin zo hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa Josiah a maan’ laitakin Topa in kei hong hopih a, “A zulhzau Israel, mual sang tung khempeuh-ah pai a, sing liim nuai khempeuh ah numei paktat banga om kawikawina na mu khin zo hiam?
‘Hih teng a hih khit ciangin kei’ kiangah hong kilehkik ngawn ding hi,’ ci-a ka up hangin amah hong kilehkik tuan lo hi; tua pen numei gina lo a sanggam nu Judah in zong a mu hi.

A zulhzau Israel, midang tawh a khialhna hangin kimaakna lai pia-a ka hawlkhiat zong amah in a mu hi. Ahih hangin numei gina lo Judah lau tuanloin pai a, amah zong numei paktat khat mah a va suak veve hi.
Tua bang hih ding amah in baih ngaihsut lel ahih manin suangtum leh singtawng peuh bia-in a khial a, gam a ninsak hi.
Hih bang teng hi napi a sanggamnu, numei gina lo Judah, a lungsim khempeuh tawh hong kilehkik loin, a kilehkik hong kineih bek hi, Topa in kong ci hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei hong hopih-a, “A zulhzau Israel in numei gina lo Judah sangin a mawhna tamzaw hi.

Pai in la, leilu lam Israel gamah hih bangin va tangko in: ‘Hong kilehkik in, a zulhzau Israel aw, Topa in kong ci hi. Hehna tawh nang kong en kei ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh a hehpih thei pa ka hi hi, Topa in kong ci hi; ka heh tawntung kei ding hi.
Na mawhna na phawk ding bek kisam hi, Topa na Pasian na langpan’na, singliim nuai khempeuh-ah khualmite tawh na khialh kawikawina leh ka thu nong man’ lohnate pulak in, Topa in kong ci hi.

Hong kilehkik un, a zulhzau ka tate aw, Topa in kong ci hi; bang hang hiam na cih uh leh keimah in note’ Topa ka hi a, khuapi khat panin mi khat ta leh beh khat sung panin nih ta hong la-in, Zion khua-ah kong puak ding hi.
“‘Ka lungsim bang tuucing kong pia ding-a, amaute in pilna leh siamna tawh note hong uk ding uh hi.

Tua hun ciangin gam sungah note pungin na tam uh ciangin Topa in kong cih-inah, mite in, “Topa’ thuciamna singkuang” ci-in genin a nei nawn kei ding uh hi. Amaute in ngaihsun kha lo ding uh a, phawk kha loin, zong a goih beek kei ding uh hi. Tham loin zong a kibawl kik nawn kei ding hi.

Tua hun ciangin Jerusalem khua pen Topa’ kumpi tokhom kici ding a, Jerusalem khua Topa’ omna ah Topa’ min pahtawi dingin, gam khempeuh hong kikhawm ding uh hi. Amaute in amau’ mawh nopna lungsim uh a zui tentan nawn kei ta ding uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin Judah mite in Israel mite hong pawlpih ding uh a, leilu lam gam panin na pute na pate-uh’ luah dinga ka piak sa gamah hong paikhawm ding uh hi.

“‘Israel aw, ka tapa bangin nang hong bawlin, gam khempeuh lakah a hoihpen luah dingin, gam nopci khat nang hong pia ning, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi. Ka Pa aw, ci-a hong sam ding leh ka nung hong zui den ding kong sa kha hi.
Ahih hangin thuman lo zi in a pasal a nusiat bangin Israel mite aw, Topa in kong cih in ah, no zong kei’ tungah nong thuman kei uh hi,’ ci-in va tangko in,” hong ci hi.
Mual tung pan awging khat kiza hi, Israel mite’ kahna leh tauna aw ahi hi. Lam a pialna hang uh leh Topa a Pasian uh a mangngilhna hang uh ahi hi.
Topa in, “Hong kilehkik un, a zulhzau ka tate aw, na zulhzauna uh kong damsak ding hi,” a ci hi. Amau in zong, “En in, nang kiangah kong pai uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa kote’ Pasian na hi hi.
Mual tungte leh mualsang tung-a gamlum lialuanate zuaupi taktak hi a, Israel mite hotkhiatna ahih leh Topa i Pasian’ sung bekah om takpi hi.
“Ahih hangin i neu lai-a kipan a zumhuai Baal pasian i biakna hangin i pute i pate’ nasep sa ahi tuute leh bawngte, a tapate le a tanute uh khempeuh i sum khin zo hi.

Tua ahih manin, zumin lum ni: i minsiatna silh ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh i neulai akipan tu ni ciang dong eite leh i pu i pate in Topa i Pasian’ tungah i mawh khin zo hi. Topa i Pasian’ thu i mang kei khin zo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Topa in, “Israel mite aw, na kilehkik uh leh kei’ kiangah hong kilehkik un. Na kihhuainate uh kei kiang pan na paihkhiat uh a, na tai kawikawi kei uh leh,
‘Topa a nuntak bangin,’ ci a, thuman tak, kip tak, thu tang tak-a thu na ciam nak uh leh, gam khempeuh in thupha ka piak ding hong ngen ding uh a, kei sungah amaute a lungdam ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Judah gam mite leh Jerusalem khuamite’ tungah Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Na lote uh kal un la, ling lakah vawh kei un.

Judah mite leh Jerusalem khua mite aw, Topa’ tungah vun at un la, na lungtang uh vun at un. Na tua cih kei leh na bawl uh mawhnate hangin, ka hehna mei bangin hong kuangkhia ding a, a phelh zo kuamah om lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Judah gamah va gen un la, Jerusalem khua-ah va tangko un. Gam sung khempeuh-ah peengkul mut-in awng un la, va gen un. ‘Hong kikhawm un la, khuapi muan’ huaite sungah va lut ni!’ va ci un.
Zion mual lampi kihilh un la, na suahtak nadingun tai un, zekai kei un! Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lam panin siatna lianpi kong puaksuk hi.

Humpi khat a bukna sawl kawm lak pan hong kuankhia zo a, gamte susia dingpa hong paikhia khin zo hi. Na gam uh a kisia sak ding leh na khuapite uhah kuamah a teen’ loh nadingin a susia dingin ama’ omna panin hong kuankhia khin zo hi.
Tua ahih manin ippi puan silh un la, tau-in kap un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ hehna lauhuaipi eite’ kiang pan kiheikhia nai lo hi.
Topa in, “Tua ni ciangin kumpipa leh kumpi uliante a lungkia ding uh a, siampite lau mahmah-in, kamsangte a dipkua ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin keimah in, “Aa, Topa Pasian aw, nangmah in hih mite leh Jerusalem khuamite khem cih tak-in na khem khin zo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ kiangah, ‘Nopna hong om ding hi,’ ci napi cin, amau a sunlum dingin namsau khat a om gige hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua hun ciangin hih mite leh Jerusalem khuamite’ kiangah, “A sa mahmah huih sehnel gam a sang mun panin ka mite’ tungah hong nung ding a, tua huih pen an vaite zapsiang dinga a nung huih bang hi lo hi.
Ka sawl huih in tua bang dingin hat lua ding hi. Tu-in keimah in amaute’ tungah thu khen-in ka gen hi,” a kici ding hi.
En un, i galpa meii bangin hong pai a, a sakol leengte pingpei tawh kibangin, a sakolte muvanlaite sangin manlang zaw hi. Gimna i thuak ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh gallel ding i hi ta hi.
Jerusalem khua aw, nang hong kihotkhiat nadingin, na lungsim sung panin gitlohna sawpkhia in. Na sungah gitlohna lungsim bang tan vei kem cip ding na hi hiam?
Ngai un, Dan gam pan aw khat hong ging a, Efraim Mual pan kisiat nading thu hong kitangko hi!
Minamte’ kiangah va gen un la, Jerusalem’ kiangah va tangko un. “Gamlapi panin galte hong pai uh a, Judah gam khuapite’ lang khatah hong kiko uh hi.
Judah gam in kei hong langpan’ ahih manin a galte in lo hongte bangin a kimkot-ah a pang dimdiam uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Na lungsim leh na gamtatnate hangin hih thu nang’ tungah hong tung hi. Hih in nangma’ gitlohna hang hi a, kha-in na lungtang hong vut hi.”
Aw, ka lungtang, ka lungtang! Na ka sa mahmah hi! Ka lungtang kisai vanvan a, ka om hithiat thei kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh peengkul mutna aw, gal kisimna aw ka za hi.
Siatna khat khit ciang’ khat hong tung a, gamsung khempeuh kisia khin hi. Tha khat thu-in ka bukte hong kisuksiat sak a, ka puan khaite hong kek gawp hi.
Bang tan vei gal kisimna ka mu lai ding hiam? Bang tan vei peengkul aw ka za lai ding hiam?
Topa in, “Ka mite hai uh a, kei hong thei lo uh hi; naupang haite bang uh a, bangmah thei lo uh hi. Siatna bawl siam bek uh a, hoihna, bawl thei lo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Leitung ka et leh lim-le-mel nei lo a, vantungah lah khuavak om lo hi.
Mualte ka et leh kiliing damdam uh a, mualneute kileh kawikawi uh hi.
Ka khuadak leh mi khat beek ka mu kei a, van-a vasate zong a leeng mang khin uh hi.
Ka et leh, logam leihoih teng sehnel gam suak khin-a, Topa’ mai leh a hehna lianpi mai-ah, khuapi khempeuh kisia khin uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in, “Gam buppi gamlak suak ding a, ahih hangin ka susia suak sam kei ding hi.
Tua hangin leitung kap ding a, vantung a mial ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka gensa, ka khensat sa hi-a, ka kisikkik loh bangin ka lungsim zong ka khelkik kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Sakol tunga tuangte leh thal tawite’ aw a kizak ciangin mi khempeuh galtai mang uh a, gamlak-ah tai-in, suang lakah a kahto uh hi; khuapi khempeuh kinusia khin a, kuamah teeng nawn lo hi.

A kisia ding nangmah in bang cih ding na hi hiam? Puan san silh-a kham tawh na kizep liatluat hangin, na mitte zemin na golsak hangin, a mawkna-a kizem na hi ta hi. Na lawm ngaihte in nang hong paaikhia uh a, hong that nuam uh hi.

Nau suak ding numei kiko bang khat ka za hi, tacil a suak numei khat’ tauna tawh kibang hi. Zion’ tanu husam liang-a a kikona aw hi a, a khut tegel zakin, “Gimna ka thuak ding hi! Kei hong that ding uh hi!” a ci hi.
Jerusalem khua sungah kileh kawikawi un. Khuadak un la, en dih un! A thuman gamtat leh thuman a zong mi khat beek na mu uh hiam, zong dih un. Na muh uh leh tua khua a mawhna ka maisak ding hi.
“Topa a nuntak bangin,” ci-in a kiciam uh hangin a zuaupi uh ahi hi.

Topa aw, nangmah in thuman en gige hilo na hi hiam? Nangmah in amaute na sat hangin a awlmawh tuan kei uh hi; na sukgawp hangin na thu hilhna a ngai tuan kei uh hi. Amaute’ maitang suangtum sangin sakzaw a, a kisik nuam kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, “Hih mite mihai hi a, a hehpih huai uh hi: Topa’ lampi thei lo uh a, amau’ Pasian’ deihna a thei kei uh hi.

Mi liante’a kiangah pai-in, ka va kiho ding uh hi; amaute in Topa’ lampi a thei uh a, amau’ Pasian’ deihna a thei uh hi,” ci-in ka ngaihsun hi. Ahih hangin a vekpi-in ka ukna hong nial khin uh a, ka hakkol kuaitan-in ka henna khaute a sutat khin zo uh hi.

Tua ahih manin tuulak panin humpi khat in amaute that ding a, sehnel gam panin keivom khat in a petgawp ding hi. Kamkei khat in a khuapite uh vil gige a, a pusuak khia peuhpeuh balzan gawp ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ mawhna uh tamlua a, kei hong taisan mun lua uh hi.

“Na mawhna uh hong koici maisak ding ka hi hiam? Na tate un kei hong nusia zo uh a, pasian ahi lopi peuh tawh kiciam zo uh hi. Amaute a gilvah dong uh an ka vak khit ciangin, ang kawmin numei paktatte’ innah a hon om uh hi.
Sakol gilvah a lante bangin a innvengte’ zite uh neh-in a tau huthut uh hi.
Hih thute hangin amaute daantat lo ding ka hi hiam? Topa in ka gen-inah, hi ci bang minam’ tungah thukkik lo ding ka hi hiam?
“A gual-a a kisuan a leenggah huan sungah pai in la, suksiat sak in; ahi zongin suk maimangsak sam kei in. A hiangte heuh khiatsak in, bang hang hiam cih leh tuate Topa’ aa hi lo hi.
Israel minamte leh Judah minamte, Topa in ka cih-inah, kei tungah hong thuman nawn het lo uh hi.
Amaute in Topa hong nial uh a, ‘Amah in bangmah hih lo ding hi; i tungah siatna hong tung lo ding a, gal ahi zongin kial ahi zongin i thuak kei ding hi.
Kamsangte lah huih bang hi lel uh a, a sung uhah thu teeng lo hi. Amau’ gen bangun amau mah in a thuak ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa, a vanglian Pasian in hong gen-inah: “Amaute in tu-a bangin gen uh ahih manin na kam sunga mei banga ka kuan’sak ka thute in sing tawh kibang hih minamte kangtum zaw ding hi.

En un, Israel minamte aw, Topa in kong cih-inah, gamlapi panin note hong sim dingin gam khat kong kuansak ding hi. Tua gam in tanglai peka a om sa, a hat mahmah, amaute’ pau na theih loh uh gam khat ahi hi.
Thal tawh a kap uh ciangin sisak lianlian uh a, a vekpi-in gal hang kim uh hi.

Amaute in lo-a na ante leh na an huante uh hong gaihsak ding uh a, na tapate leh na tanute uh hong thahsak ding uh hi. Na tuu honte leh na bawng honte uh hong gaihsak ding uh a, na lenggahte leh na thei gahte uh hong nek mangsak ding uh hi. Na muan’ mahmah kulhpi tawh a ki-uum na khuapite uh, namsau tawh hong suksiat sak ding uh hi.”
“Ahih hangin tua bang hun ciang nangawnin, Topa in kong cih-inah, note kong su maimang khin sam kei ding hi.

Na mipihte un, ‘Bang hangin Topa i Pasian in hih bangin ei’ tungah hong bawl hiam? a cih uh ciangin nangmah in, ‘Topa nusia-in na gam sung uhah gamdang pasiante’ na na sep uh bangin, note’ gam ahi lo gam dangah, gamdang mite’ na na sem ding uh hi,’ na ci ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Jakob’ suante tungah gen in. Judah mite tungah hih bangin ci in:
“Ngai un, ngaihsutna nei lo mihaite aw, mit nei napi-a mu lote, bil nei napi-a za lote aw.

Kei hong kihta lo na hi uh hiam? Topa in kong ci hi. Ka mai-ah liing lo na hi uh hiam? Tuipi mongah sehnel keima’ koih hi-a, tui ka dal sak tawntung hi. Tuihualte in a lawhlawh hangin zozo lo uh a, a gin’ zuazua uh hangin kantan zo tuan lo uh hi.
Ahih hangin hih mite lungsim khauhin hong langpan’ zen uh hi; hong kihei san uh a, hong paisan uh hi.
A lungsim sung uhah, ‘A hun-a guah hong zusak a, tukguah khalguah hong pia a, anlak hun ding a hong sehsak den, Topa i Pasian zaktak ni,’ a ci kei uh hi.
Na khialhnate un hih na hoihte khaktan a, na mawhnate hangun tuate na taan lawh uh hi.
Ka mite lakah mi gilote kihel uh a, vasa thang siah bangin mite thang siah-in man uh hi.
Bawm sung dimtak a, vasa kikhum bangin khemna tawh a ngah uh vante tawh a inn uh dim hi. Tua ahih manin amaute lianin hau uh a,
thau-in a mai uh zol hi. Gitlohna lamah a hun bek a theithei kei uh hi. Tagahte’ phattuam nading khual loin thu a man lo pi-in khen uh a, mizawngte tungah thuman lo uh hi.
Hih thute hangin amaute daantat lo ding ka hi hiam? Topa in ka ci hi. Hih bang minam’ tungah thukkik lo ding ka hi hiam?”
A dipkuat huai, a patauh huai thu khat gam sungah a piang khin zo hi.
Kamsangte in thuman gen lo uh a, siampite in amau’ ut bangun a uk uh hi; ka mite in phamawh a sa kei sawnsawn uh hi, a tawpna hun hong tun’ ciangin bang na cih ding uh hiam?

Benjamin’ suante aw, na suahtak nadingun tai un! Jerusalem khua taisan un! Tikoa khua-ah peengkul mut un la, Bethhakkherim khua-ah theihsakna meikhu suaksak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lam panin, gimna leh siatna lianpi a hong pai ding hi.
A mel hoih, a ngek dikdek, Zion’ tanu ka susia ding hi.
Kumpite in a galkapte uh tawh ama’ kiang hong tung ding uh a, a kimkotah giah phual sat-in a deih peuhpeuh uh a la ding uh hi.
Amau in, “Jerusalem khua sim dingin kisa un. Tho un, sun ciangin i sim ding hi,” a ci ding uh hi. Ahih hangin amau mah in, “Citciat aw, zekai lua hang! Ni tum dektak-a i liimte sau keei ta hi.
Kithawi un, zan ciangin i sim ding a, a kumpi innte uh i susia ding hi,” a ci ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a vanglian Topa in, “A singte phuksak un la, Jerusalem khua sim nadingin phungin ciang un. Hih khuapi daantah kul hi, bang hang hiam cih leh kinet niamna bekbek tawh a dim hi.
Tuikhuk panin tui siang hong phul bangin, Jerusalem khua panin siatna phul hi. Khua sungah ngongtatna leh kisuksiatna ka za ngitnget a, cinatna leh liamnate ngentang ka mu hi.
Jerusalem khuapi aw, kidawm in! Na tua cih kei leh kong taisan ding a, kuama’ teen’ lohna gam simtham na suak kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
A vanglian Topa in kei hong hopih-a, “Lenggah lo-a a sanghte a kilawh kik bangin Israel mi a omlai sun teng losiang vet in,” hong ci hi.
Keimah in ka dawngkik a, “Amaute in a zaktheih dingun kua’ kiangah va gen ding ka hi hiam? En in, a bil uh bing a, khua za thei lo uh hi. Topa’ thu simmawh uh a, lungdamna-in la lo uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa aw, na hehna tawh ka dim a, ka thuak zo nawn kei hi,” ka ci hi. Tua ciangin Topa in hong hopih-a, “Ka hehna kongzing lak-a naupangte’ tungah bua in la, tangvalte’ kikhopna-ah zong bua in. Papite leh nupite zong kilakhia ding a, pitek putekte zong a kipai khiatpih ding hi.
A innte uh midang in luah ding a, a lote leh a zite uh a taan ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, hih mite’ lang khatah ka khut zan-in daan ka tat ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a neupen pan a lianpen dongin, thuman lopi tawh sum zongin a huaiham uh hi. Kamsangte-a kipan siampite dongin thuman lo khin uh hi.
Amaute in ka mite’ thuaknate thupisim sak lo uh a, hoihna om keei lopi, ‘Hoih hi, hoih hi,’ ci mawkmawk uh hi.

Hih a kihhuai nate a sep uh ciangin a maizum beek uh hiam? Maizum beek lo uh hi, kisuang thei beek lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin a site’ lak mahah amau zong a si ding uh a, ka daantah ni ciangin a kilawnkhia ding uh hi,” Topa in hong ci hi.

Topa in mite tungah, “Lamka bomah ding un la, khuadak un. Lam hoih ahi, lampi luite dong un la, tawn un. Na kha uh ading tawldamna na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amau in, “Ka tawn kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Topa in, “Peengkul tumna aw ngai dingin galvil ding mi ka koih hi,’ kong ci hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amau in, “Ka ngai kei ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa in: “Gamdangte aw, ngai un. Mite aw, amau’ tungah bang tung ding hiam, cih thei un.
Leitung aw, ngai in! En in, hih mite tungah a thuak ding mah uh-a kilawm siatna ka tung sak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka thu hong ngai lo uh a, ka thukhamte a nial uh hi.
Bang deihna tawh Sheba gam panin paknamtuite hong pai a, gamlapi panin singnamtui hong tung ahi hiam? Na meihal biaknate uh ka sang kei a, nong thoihnate uh deihhuai ka sa kei hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih-inah, En un, hih mite puk nadingin a mai uhah suangtum ka koih ding-a, pate leh tate, inn vengte leh lawmte pukin a si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in, “En un, leilu lam gam panin mi hong pai uh a, leimong gamlapen panin gam lian khat galsim dingin kithawithawi hi.
Thal leh teipi tawi uh a, giloin hehpihna lungsim nei loin, a husa uh tuipi ging tawh kibang hi. Zion’ tanu aw, amaute sakol tungah tuangin, nangmah do dingin a kithawi uh hi!” a ci hi.
Tua thu i za khin zo a, bangmah i cih thei kei hi. Lungkhamna in hong hencip a, nupi nau suak ding bangin na i sa hi.
Gamlakah paikhia kei un la, lampi ah zong pai dah un; bang hang hiam cih leh i galte in namsau a tawi uh a, i kimkot khempeuh lauhuai khin hi.
Ka tanu aw, ippi puan silh in la, vut lakah kikhuk in. Tapa khat neihsun sih suah bangin kap vangvang in, bang hang hiam cih leh a hong susia dingpa thakhat thu-in hong pai ding hi.
“Jeremiah aw, ka mite ze-et dingin nang kong koih hi. Ze-et in la, a omdan uh thei in.
A vekpi-un hong langpan’ tentan uh a, zuauthu gen kawikawi uh hi. Sumngo leh sik bangin khauh uh a, a vekpi-un a siat gamtat khin uh hi.
Nakpi takin pum a kizap hangin a ninte tui thei loin luangkhia lo hi. Pum a kizapzap hangin a mawkna a suak hi, bang hang hiam cih leh mi gilote om lai veve hi.
Amaute a kideih lo ngun a kici ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in amaute ka deih kei hi.”
Topa in Jeremiah kiangah hih bangin hopih hi:
Topa’ biakinn kongkhakpi kiangah ding in la, hih thu teng va tangko in: Topa bia ding-a kongkhak sung-a hong tum Judah mite aw, Topa’ kammal ngai dih un.
A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin hong ci hi. Na nuntakzia uh leh na gamtatnate uh kikhel un. Tua hi leh hih munah kong teengsak bek ding hi.
‘Hih in Topa’ biakinn ahi hi, Topa’ biakinn ahi hi, Topa’ biakinn ahi hi,’ a kicici zuauthute um kei un.
“Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh na nuntakzia uh leh na gamtatnate uh na kikhel uh a, khat leh khat kikal-ah thuman thutak-a na vaihawm uh leh,
nam dang mite, pa nei lote leh meigongte na nuaisiah kei uh a, hih munah mawh nei lo mite that nawnloin, note’ gim nading mah ahi pasian dang peuh na biak nawn kei uh leh,
tanglai-a na pute na pate un a neih tawntung ding uh-a ka piak hih gam sungah ka hong teengsak ding hi.
“En un, phattuamna a om het lo zuauthu na um tazen uh hi.
Note in na gu-in, tual that-in, angkawmin, a hi lopi kiciam-in, Baal kiangah meihal biakna pia-in, na theih ngei loh uh pasian dangte delhin,

tua ciangin ka min tawh a kilo hih biakinn sungah ka mai-ah hong pai-in hong ding-in, ‘Hong kihonkhia zo hi,’ na cih khit uh ciangin hih a muh thadah huai nate khempeuh va hih kik zel ding na hi uh hiam?
Ka min tawh a kilo hih biakinn no’ ngaihsutna-ah misuam buluhte’ bukna mun bang-a ngaihsun na hi uh hiam? Keimah in note’ hih khempeuh kong mu khin hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Ka min ka teen’sak masakna Shiloh khua-ah va pai un la, ka mi Israel mite’ gitlohna hang-a ka nasepna va en dih un.
Tu-in zong, hih nate khempeuh na hih uh a, kong gengen hangin hong ngai tuan loin kong sap hangin hong dawng lo na hih manun, Topa in kong cih-inah,
ka min tawh a kilo, note in na muan’ uh hih biakinn leh note leh na pu na pate-uh’ kiang-a kong piak hih mun, Shiloh tunga ka hih bangin ka hih ding hi.
Efraim’ suan-le-khak ahi leilu lam-a na behte khempeuh uh ka paihkhiat bangin note zong ka muhna panin kong paaikhia ding hi.
“Jeremiah aw, hih mite adingin thu ngetsak kei in. Amau adingin kapin kei’ tungah hong thuumsak kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nong thuumna kong ngai kei ding hi.
Judah gam khuapite sung leh Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah bang hih uh cih mu lo na hi hiam?
Naupangte in sing tom-in, a pate un mei a tawh uh a, nupite in a nusian uh vantung kumpinu’ ading tangho a su uh a, kei hong hehsak nadingun, pasian dangte’ dawn dingin biakna a pia tazen uh hi.
Topa in kong cih-inah, tua hangin gimna a thuak, kei hi zenzen ka hi hiam? Hilo hi. Amau’ zum nadingin amau mah in thuak uh hi zaw lo ahi hiam?

Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih-inah: En in, ka hehna leh ka thangpaihna hih munah ka bua ding-a, mihingte tung leh ganhingte tung, lo lai-a singkungte leh lei laka singgahte tungah ka sung ding hi. Ka hehna a kuang ding a, a kisumit kei ding hi.
“A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin kong ci hi: Mei tawh haltum ding na meihal biaknate uh hal nawnloin, sa nek theih kithoihnate tawh kibangin ne vet un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Izipt gam panin na pute na pate uh ka lak khiat lai-in ka hopih kei-a meihal biakna pia ding leh kithoihna bawl dingin thu ka pia kei hi.
Ahih hangin, ‘Ka thu hong mang un; tua hi leh note’ Pasian ka hi ding-a, note in ka hoih zawk nadingin na khempeuh-ah kong thupiak bang na zui un,’ ci-in thu ka piazaw hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in ka thu hong mang lo uh a, a bil uh hong ngat lo uh hi. Amau’ gitlohna lungsim uh zui-in amau’ thuthu-in a omzaw uh a, mainawt loin a nungkin zaw uh hi.
Na pu na pate uh Izipt gam pan-a a hong paikhiat ni uh-a kipan tu ni ciang dong, ni khat khit ni khat, ka nasemte ahi kamsangte ka sawl tawntung a,
ahih hangin amau in ka thu hong ngai loin, a bil uh hong ngat lo uh a, a lung uh a khauhsak uh hi. A pute a pate uh sangin a siazaw uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin Jeremiah aw, hih thute amau kiangah na va gen ding hi; ahih hangin amau in a hong ngai kei ding uh hi. Amaute na sap hangin a hong dawng kei ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in amaute’ kiangah, ‘Hih gam in, Topa amaute’ Pasian’ thu a mang lo gam hi a, thuhilhna sang loin, thuman om nawn lo a, genin zong a nei nawn kei uh hi,’ na ci ding hi.
Jerusalem mite aw, na lu uh mettol un la, na sam uh paaimang un; mual tungah va kap un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hih a gilo khang mite ka nial zo a, ka taisan khin zo hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh, Topa in kong cih-inah, Judah mite in hoih ka sak loh nate a hih khin zo uh hi. Ka min tawh a kilo ka biakinn a nit sak nadingun kihhuai milimte a koih uh hi.
Ben-Hinnom mualkuam-ah a tapate a tanute uh mei sungah a hallup nading uh Tofeth a kici biakna tau khat a bawl uh hi. Tua pen kei’ sawl lah hi loin, zong ka ngaihsun kha beek kei hi.

Tua ahih manin en un, Topa in kong cih-inah, tua mun pen Tofeth ahi zongin Ben-Hinnom mualkuam ahi zongin a kicih nawn loh hun hong tung ding hi. Kithahna mualkuam a kici zaw ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Tofeth ah mun awng om nawn lo zah dongin mi site a kivui ding hi.
Misiluangte huih laka leeng vasate leh leitunga om ganhingte’ an suak ding uh a, tuate a delhmang ding kuamah om lo ding hi.

Tua ciangin Judah gam khuapite leh Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah gualnopna leh lungdamna awte leh zi nei thakte leh mothakte’ awte ka gingsak nawn kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua mun kinusia ding hi.
“Tua hun ciangin, Topa in kong cih-inah, Judah gam kumpite’ guhte uliante’ guhte, siampite’ guhte, kamsangte’ guhte le Jerusalem khuamite’ guhte a han sung uh panin kilakhia ding a,

amaute in a it uh, a na a sepsak uh, a delh uh, a zon’ uh leh a biak uh ahi ni leh kha leh van-a om nate khempeuh’ mai-ah a kipho khia ding hi. Tua guhte kikhawm nawn loin a kiphum nawn kei ding a, lei laka ek kinusia bang ahi lel ding hi.
Hih a gilo minamte’ laka a omlai sun teng in ka hawlkhiatna munah nuntak ding sangin sih ding a teelzaw ding uh hi, a vanglian Topa in kong ci hi.
“Jeremiah aw, Topa in hih bangin gen hi, ci-in amaute’ kiangah va gen in: Mi khat a puk ciangin thokik buang hilo ahi hiam? Mi khat in lam a khialh ciangin hong kilehkik buang hilo ahi hiam?
Tua ahih leh bang hangin hih mite lam khial-in nungkin paisuak lawmlawm uh ahi hiam? Amau in pasian zuau milimte lenkip uh a, hong kilehkik nuam lo uh hi.
Amau’ thu gente ka ngaihsak a, kuamah in thuman gen lo uh hi. A gitlohna uh kuamah kisik lo a, ‘Bang hih ka hi hiam?’ ci lel uh hi. Sakol galsim ding a tai bangin amau’ tum ciat-in a pai uh hi.
Van-ah tui vapite nangawn in lal hun ding a thei uh a, sumkuangte, phialphiahte leh gun vapite in zong a hun ciangin hong tung zel uh hi. Ahih hangin ka mite in Topa ngeina kipte a thei kei uh hi.
“Bangci bangin note in, ‘Ko ka pil uh a, Topa’ thukham ka nei uh hi,’ ci thei ding na hi uh hiam? En un, thuman lo laitheite in tua thukham zuauthu a suah uh hi.
Na mipilte uh a maizum ding uh hi; lungmang-in a cih nading a thei kei ding uh hi. En un, amaute in Topa’ thu a nial uh hi, bang pilna a nei nawn uh hiam?

Tua ahih manin a zite uh midangte ka piaksak ding a, a lote uh zong midangte ka luahsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a neupen pan a lianpen dongin thuman lopi tawh sum zongin a huaiham uh hi. Kamsangte akipan siampite dongin thuman lo khin uh hi.
Amaute in ka mite’ thuaknate thupi simsak lo uh a, hoihna om keei lopi, ‘Hoih hi, hoih hi,’ ci mawkmawk uh hi.

Hih a kihhuai nate a sep uh ciangin a maizum beek uh hiam? Maizum beek lo uh hi; kisuang thei beek lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin a site’ lak mahah amau zong a si ding uh a, ka daantah ni ciangin a kilawnkhia ding uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi.

Topa in kong cih-inah, amaute ka susia khin ding a, a lote uhah lenggah a om nawn kei ding hi; thei in zong gah a nei nawn kei ding hi. A tehte nangawn a keu ding a, amaute ka piaksa nate a bei ding hi.

“Tua ciangin mite in, ‘Bang hangin tutu lai i hi hiam? Kikai khawm un la, khuapi muanhuaite va beel ni, tua laiah va si ni; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa tungah i mawh manin Topa i Pasian in eite a si dingin hong koih khin zo hi, i dawn dingin gutui hong piakhin zo hi.
Nopna i zonga nopna hong pai lo hi. Cidamna i lamen-a siatna bek i ngah hi.

Leilu lam Dan khua pek panin galte’ sakol nak ging kiza hi; a sakol hatte’ hamna awging in gam teng lei teng liingsak hi. Amau in i gam leh a sunga om teng tawh khuapi leh a sung-a teeng teng tawh a hong susia khin ding uh hi,’ a ci ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh en un, no lakah gul kong khah ding hi. A kikhim zo lo gulgu neite kong khah ding a, note hong tu ding uh hi,” Topa in hong ci hi.
Ka dahna dam thei lo a, ka lungsim na mahmah hi.

Ngai un, gamsung mun khempeuh panin ka mite’ tanute kap uh hi: “Zion khua-ah Topa om nawn lo ahi hiam? A kumpipa uh om nawn lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Topa in dawng kik a, “Bang hangin a milim bawl tawmte uh leh a gamdang milimte uh tawh kei hong hehsak uh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Mite in, “An lah kila khin zo a, khuakhal hun zong bei ta a, eite lah hong kihon nai kei lailai hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ka mite’ thuakna hangin ka lungsim kisia hi. Lung kham lua-in ka kap hi.
Gilead-ah zatui om lo ahi hiam? Zato siam om lo ahi hiam? Bang hanga ka mite dam thei lo uhahi hiam?
Aw, ka lu tuikhuk hi-in, ka mitte khitui nak hi tazen leh pawh, ka mite’ kithahlupna hangin a sun a zanin kapkap mai ning!
Sehnel gamlakah khawl nading bukno khat nei thei-in ka mite nusia-in taisan thei hi leng maw! A vekpi-un angkawm hat hi khin uh a, thuman lo kim uh hi.
A leii uh thalpeu bangin zang uh a, zuauthu a lawnkhia khia uh hi; gam sungah thuman om loin zuauthu bekbek a dim hi. Siatna lam manawh tektek uh a, Kei hong thei lo uh hi, Topa in a ci hi.
Mi khempeuh in a inn vengte uh kidawm uh hen la, a sanggamte uh muang kei uh hen; bang hang hiam cih leh sanggamte khempeuh khemhat ciat uh a, innvengte khempeuh zong gensiat hat ciat uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in a innvengte uh khem ciat uh a, thuman gen kuamah om lo hi; a leii uh zuauthu gen dingin kisinsak uh a, mawhna a bawl manun tawllua-in a kisikkik zo nawn kei uh hi.
Khat khit khat-in mite a bawl sia uh a, zuau zong a phuakphuak uh hi. Kei hong thei nuam lo uh hi, Topa in ci hi.
Tua ahih manin a vanglian Topa in a cih-inah: “En un, amaute a sian’tho nadingun ka suangtui dinga ka ze-et ding hi. Tua lo ka mite bang ka cih nawn ding hiam?
A leii uh thaltang lauhuai bang hi a, zuauthu a gen hi. A kam uh tawh a innvengte’ kiangah a awzol uh hangin, a sih nading uh a lungsim sung uhah a ngaihsun veve mawk uh hi.
Hih thute hangin daantat lo ding ka hi hiam? Topa in kong ci hi. Hih bang minam khat tungah ka phu la lo ding ka hi hiam?

“Mualte adingin kap-in tau un la, gamlak lo nona munte adingin thuum un. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate keu gawp a, kuamah pai nawn lo hi, bawng ham zong kiza nawn lo hi; van-a leeng vasate leh gamsate a taimang ta uh hi.
Jerusalem khua ninkholna ka bangsak ding a, se-alte’ teen’na ka suak sak ding hi. Judah khuapite gamlak ka suak sak ding a, kuamah a teeng nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih thu a tel thei ding mipil kua ahi hiam? Hih thu a genkhia dingin Topa in kua hopih na hi hiam? Kuamah in hih gam a kantan nawn loh nadingin bang hangin kisia-in gamlak tawh kibang ahi hiam?
Topa in, “Amaute in a mai uh-a ka lah ka thukham a nusia uh a, ka thu hong mang loin ka cih bangin ta lo uh a,
amau’ lungsim’ deihna zui tentan-in a pu a pate-uh’ hilhna bangin Baal nung a zuih man uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih-inah: En in, hih mite gamsai-in ka vak ding a, gutui ka dawnsak ding hi.
Amaute le a pute a pate’ theih ngei lohna gamdangah ka kithehthang sak ding a, a sih khit dong uh namsau ka nungdelh sak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin a vanglian Topa in a cih-inah: “Ngaihsun un la, numei kapte hong pai dingin va sam un; a kahsiam tata vaikhak un.
Va kinawhsak un la, i khitui a luan’ theih nading, i mitkhu a kawt theih nadingin eite hong kah uh hen.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Zion khua pan-a kiza kahna aw ging in, ‘I kisia khin zo hi! I zumhuai mahmah khin zo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amau in i innte hong suksiat sak uh ahih manin, i gam i nusia ding hi,’ ci-in a gen hi,” a ci hi.
Numeite aw, Topa’ kammal ngai dih un, a kam pan-a hong gingkhia thu na bil uhah lut sak un; na tanute uh kahdan hilh un la, na inn vengte ciat uh kah la hilh un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh tawlet vangte panin sihna hong lutin, kumpipa’ inn sungah zong hong lut hi. Kong zinga naupangte a vatmang a, sumbuka tangvalte a vatlum hi.
“Topa in, ‘Gamlaka kitha ek bangin misiluang a kipaaithang ding a, buhlom atsa kinusia bangin kuamah in a khawm kei ding hi,’ ci-in a gen hi, va ci in,’ hong ci hi.
Topa in a gen-inah: “Mipilte in a pilna uh kisak theihpih kei uh hen la, mihatte in a hatna uh kisak theihpih kei uh hen. Mihaute in zong a hauhna uh kisak theipih kei uh hen.
A kisa theite in, keimah, leitungah migitna, thumanna leh thu tan’na zang ka hihna leh tuate sungah nuam a sapa ka hi hi, cih hong telna leh hong theihna uhah kisathei uh hen,” Topa in kong ci hi.
“En un, Topa in kong cih-inah, vun ki-at hi napi-a vun ki-at taktak lote khempeuh ka daantah ni hun hong tung ding hi.

Izipt mite, Judah mite, Edom mite, Ammon mite, Moab mite leh a sam uh a mettom sehnel gam-a omte khempeuh zong ka daantah ding hi. Bang hang hiam na cih leh hih gamte khempeuh in vun a at kei uh a, Israel mi khempeuh zong a lungsim sung uhah vun at lohpi ahi uh hi.
Israel mite aw, note hong hopihna Topa’ kammal ngai dih un.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Gamdangte’ omdan ciing kei un la, vantunga lim lamdangte lunghih mawhna-in ngaihsun kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh gamdang mite in tuate a lunghih mawhpih uh hi.
Hih mite’ ngeinate a kiman’na om lo hi. Gamlakah sing khat kiphuk a, khut siampa in a hei tawh milim-in a bawl hi.
Mite in tua pen kham leh ngun tawh a zem uh a, a kilakkhiat thei loh nadingin sik tawh a kilh uh hi.

A milimte uh, tangmai huan-a vasate’ lau nading-a kikhai milimte tawh kibangin a pau thei kei uh a, lam pai thei lo uh ahih manin puak kul hi. Tuate kihta kei un; siatna bangmah bawl thei lo uh a, phatna zong bangmah bawl thei lo uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa aw, nang bang mi kuamah om lo hi; nang na lian a, na min vanglian mahmah hi.

Gam khempeuhte’ Kumpipa aw, kua in nang hong kihta lo ding ahi hiam? Nang, kihtak ding mah na hi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung mipil khempeuhte’ lak leh amau’ gamsung khempeuh lakah, nang bang mi kuamah om lo hi.
A mi pilte uh mihai mimawl ahi uh hi; sing milim in amaute bangci hilh theih mah ding ahi hiam?
Tarshish khua panin ngun sek sa va la uh a, Uphaz khua panin kham va la uh hi. Khut siamte leh kham sekte in milim-in bawl uh a, siamgat siamte’ gat ahi, puan engdup leh puan sandup tawh zem uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in Pasian man hi a, amah in a nungta Pasian leh tawntung Kumpipa ahi hi. A heh ciangin lei ki-liing-a, gamte in a hehna nang zo lo hi.
Amaute tungah, “Vantungte leh leitung a bawl lo pasiante, leitung mun khempeuh panin a mangthang ding uh hi,” ci-in na gen ding hi.
Pasian in ama’ vangliatna tawh leitung bawl a, ama’ pilna tawh leitung piang sakin, ama’ siamna tawh vantung a zalh hi.
Amah a pau ciang vantungah tuite ging hunhun-a, leimong panin tuikhu a suaksak hi. Guah zuk nadingin khua phiasak a, a saal sung panin huih a nung sak hi.
Mi khempeuh hai-in pilna nei lo hi khin uh a, kham sekte khempeuh in a milimte uh a maizum lawh uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a milimte uh zuau hi lel a, naak thei lo uh hi.
Kiman’na nei lo, a haihuaipi hi a, a kidaantah ni ciangin a kisia ding uh hi.
Jakob’ Pasian in tua bang hi lo a, amah in na khempeuh a piangsakpa ahi hi. Ama’ mi dingin Israel mite teel a, Ama’ min in a vanglian Topa ahi hi.
Galte’ umcih a thuak mite aw, na puanlom uh zial un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in, “En un, tu-in hih gam sunga teeng mite ka lawnkhia ding a, a theih nadingun a tung uhah lungkhamna ka tungsak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ka thuakna hangin ka gim hi! Ka liamna nasia mahmah hi. Ahih hangin, “Hih gimna ka thuak ding mah hi,” ka ci hi.

Ka puanbuk hong kisuksiat sak a, a kikan’na khau khempeuh kitat khin hi. Ka tate in hong taisan uh a, tu-in om nawn lo uh hi; ka puanbuk a hong lamsak ding leh ka kongkhak puante hong khaisak ding kuamah om nawn lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh makaite hai khin uh a, Topa’ deihna dong lo uh hi; tua hangin amaute maapai lo uh a, a mite uh kikhenthang mang hi.
Ngai dih un, thu khat kigen veh! Judah khuapite gamlak a suaksak ding leh se-alte’ kua a suaksak dingin leilu lam gam panin buaina lianpi khat hong pai veh!
Topa aw, mihing’ omdan ama’ uk theih hi lo hi, cih ka thei ta hi; ama’ kalsuan nading ama’ geel theih hi lo hi.
Topa aw, a hoih bek tak-in, heh loin kei hong hilh in; hong heh lecin kei ka si ding hi.
Nangmah hong thei lo gamte tung leh nangma’ min a hong lo ngeilo mite’ tungah na hehna sungsuk in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Jakob’ suan leh khakte that mangin a ma’ teen’na susia khin uh hi.
Topa in kei hong hopih-a,
“Hih thuciamna thute ngai in la, Judah mite leh Jerusalem khua mite kiangah va gen in.
Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih-inah, hih thuciamna a mang lo mi peuhmah in haamsiatna thuak ta hen, ci-in va gen in.

Na pute na pate uh, sik haltuina meikhuk tawh a kiang Izipt gam pana ka lakkhiat ni-a ka thuciammna ahi hi. Tua ni-in, ka thu hong ngai a, kong thupiakna bangin na sep uh leh, note ka mi na hi ding uh a, keimah in note’ Pasian hi-in,

tua bang na hih uh leh na pute na pate tung uh-a ka ciamsa, tu-a na neih uh bawngnawi leh khuaizu luan’na gam kong pia ding hi, ci-in thu ka pia hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin keimah in, “Hi ta hen, Topa aw,” ci-in ka dawng kik hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah, “Hih thuciamna thute ngai-a a sep nadingun Judah gam khuapite leh Jerusalem thute ngai-a a sep nadingun Judah gam khuapite leh Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah va tangko in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh na pute na pate uh tungah Izipt gam pana ka lakkhiat pan-a kipan tuni ciang dong ka thu hong mang un, ci-in tam veipi, nakpi takin ka hilh ngitnget hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in ka thu hong mang loin a bil uh hong ngat lo uh a, a gitlohna lungsim uh a zui tentan uh hi. Hih thuciamna a zuih ding uh thu ka piak hangin hong nial uh ahih manin tua sunga thute a vekpi-in ka tung sak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in hong hopih leuleu a, “Judah minamte leh Jerusalem khuamite in kei hong langpan’ uh hi.

Ka thu a ngai nuam lo a pu a pate uh’ mawhna lamah a kileh hei khin zo uh a, pasian dangte’ na sem dingin a zui khin zo uh hi. Israel mite leh Judah mite in a pu a pate uh tawh ka bawlsa uh ka thuciamna a palsat khin zo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa in kong cih-inah, en un, a suahtak theih loh uh gimna amau’ tungah ka tungsak ding a, kei kiangah a hong kap liang uh zongin ka dawng nawn kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin Judah mite leh Jerusalem khua mite in meihal biakna tawh a biak uh a pasiante uh kiangah pai-in na va thuum ding uh a, ahih hangin hih gimna hong tun’ ciangin a honkhia thei tuan kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, Judah aw, na khua om zahzah uh pasian na nei uh a, Jerusalem khua kongzing om zahzah meihal biakna tawh Baal biak nading a zum huai biakna taute na bawl tazen uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin Jeremiah aw, hih mite ading thungetsak kei in la, amau’ taangin thuumsak kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau gim ngah a, hong sap uh ciangin ka ngai kei ding hi.

Ka itte in siatna a bawl khit uh ciangin ka biakinn sungah bang thu nei thei nawn ding uh ahi hiam? Nong kamkhapte uh leh na kithoihna sate un na kisiat nading uh hong kipelh sak thei ding ahi hiam? Tua ciangin note na lungdam thei ding uh hiam?
Khat vei lai-in Topa in note, a hing dikdek a gah pha oliv kung tawh kong genteh hi. Ahih hangin kong hal ding a, na hiangte kang tumin a ging huhu ding hi.
Israel mite leh Judah mite in mei halna tawh Baal bia-in hong heh sak-a siatna a bawl manun, nang a hong phut keimah a vanglian Topa in nang’ tungah siatna tun’ nading thu kong pia zo hi,” a ci hi.
Ka galte in kei hong sawmna uh Topa in nong hilh a, tua ciangin ke’n ka thei pan hi.

A kithatlum dinga kipaipih mawhna nei lo tuuno bang ka hi hi. Amaute in, “Singkung a gah phat hun lai takin phuktan ni; ama’ min a kiphawk nawn loh nadingin, amah that lum ni,” ci-in a gen uh, kei hong sawmna uh ahih lam ka thei kei kha hi.
Ahih hangin thuman tak-a thu khen a, mite’ lungsim leh ngaihsutna a entel a vanglian Topa aw, amaute na thukkikna kei hong musak in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang’ tungah ka thu kong ap khin hi.
Tua ahih manin hong that nuam a, “Topa’ min tawh thu hilh kei in. Na hilh leh kote’ khutlum-in na si ding hi,” a hong ci Anathoth khua mite tawh kisai-in
a vanglian Topa in “En un, amaute ka daantat ding hi. A tangvalte uh namsau-in a si ding uh a, a tapate leh a tanute uh kial-in a puksi ding uh hi.
Anathoth khua mite tungah siatna tungsak a, ka daantah hun ciangin a nungta lai kuamah a om nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa aw, nang tawh thu i kisel ciangin nang a tawntungin na man den hi; ahih hangin thu khat nang tungah kong dong nuam lai hi. Bang hangin mi gilote a dau pai a, mi khem hatte gualzo sese ahi hiam?
Nangmah in amaute na suan a, amau in zong zung kha-in, hong khangin, gah hong gah uh hi. A kam uh tawh nang hong phat uh a, a lungsim uh nang tawh kigamla hi.

Ahih hangin Topa aw, nangmah in kei nong thei a, ka gamtatnate nong mu a, nang bang zah-a hong it cih nong entel hi. Amaute gawh dinga kikoih tuu bangin kaikhia in la, a kigawh ni a tun’ mateng tuam koih in.

Ka gam bang tanvei a thuum ding hiam? Mun khempeuhah lopate bang tan vei a keu ding hiam? A teeng mite’ gitlohna hangin, gamsate leh vasate a mangthang sak khin uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau in, “I gamtatnate Pasian in hong mu kei ngawn,” a ci uh hi.

Topa in, “Jeremiah aw, mite tawh tai kidem a, nang hong gimsak zo uh ahih leh, sakol bangci dem zawh ding na hi hiam? A nopna munah tuk lailai na hih leh Jordan gungei singkawm lakah bang cih ding na hi hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh na sanggamte leh na innkuanpihte nangawn in nang hong zuak uh a, nang hong do ding mi honpi a kaikhawm uh hi. Kamkhum tawh nang a hong zol uh hangin um kei in,” ci-in hong dawng kik hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Ka inn ka nusia khin a, ka luahsa mite ka paaimang ta hi. Ka it mahmah ka mite, a galte’ khut sungah ka pia ta hi.
Ka luah ding a ka teelsa mite in gamlak-a humpinelkai bangin kei’ lang khatah pangin hong hawksan uh a, tua ahih manin ka mudah hi.
Ka mite in, sa sial ne vasa gial khat sa sial ne vasa dangte in a kimkot pan a tuk nainai uh tawh kibang hi. Gamsate aw hong kikhawm un la, pawi hong siim un.
Tuucing dang tampi in ka lenggah lo hong suksiat sak uh a, kei aa teng hong tuatcilsak uh hi. A hoih mahmah ka lenggah lo pawn lak, gamlak suaksak uh hi.
Pawn lak hong suaksak uh a, dah-in ka kap hi. Gamsung khempeuh a kisiat khit hangin kuamah in phamawh sa lo sawnsawn hi.
Sehnel gam mualsang panin a susia dingte hong pai zo uh hi. Gam mong khat panin gammong khat dongah a lungmuang kuamah om lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ namsau in mi khempeuh a vattuk hi.
Amau in mangbuh a tuh uh-a ling aat uh hi. Nasep a hahkat mahmah uh hangin bangmah a ngah kei uh hi. A kihtak huai Topa’ hehna hangin an lak hun ciangin a maizum ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in ka mi Israel mite luah dinga ka piak gamh a susia nuam a gilo vengte tawh kisai-in ka cih-inah: “En un, a gam uh panin amau ka botkhia ding a, amau’ sung panin Judah mite ka lakhia ding hi.
Ahih hangin amaute ka lakkhiat khit ciangin ka hehpih kik ding a, amau’ luah ding amau’ gam ciatciat uhah ka koihkik ding hi.

Tua ciangin, ka mite’ omdan hoih takin a sin uh a, Baal min tawh kiciam dingin ka mite a sinsak mah bangun ‘Topa a nuntak bangin,’ ci-a kei’ min tawh kiciam ding a sin uh leh ka mite’ lakah kip takin a om ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin gam khatpeuh peuh in ka thu hong ngaih kei leh tua gam ka botkhia ding a, ka susia ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi.”
Topa in kei’ tungah, “Pai in la, patpuan dialkaih khat na lei khit ciangin kawtsak loin teng in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong Topa’ hong gen mah bangin dialkaih khat ka lei-a ka teng hi.
Topa in a nih veina hong hopih a,
“Na kawng-a na teen’na dialkaih lui la in. Tho in la, Eufrates gunah pai in. Tua lai-ah suang hawm sungah va seel in,” hong ci leuleu hi.
Kei zong ka pai a, Topa’ hong sawlna bangin Eufrates gun geiah ka seel hi.
Tua zawh ni tampi khit ciangin Topa in kei kiangah, “Tho in. Eufrates gun-ah pai in la, na seel dinga kong sawl na dialkaih va la kik in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong Eufrates gunah ka pai-a dialkaih ka seelna mun khuat kik-in ka la hi. Dialkaih a na ngot gawp zo a, zat theih ding ahi nawn kei hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei hong hopih a,
“Topa in kong cih-inah, hih mah bangin Judah mite’ kisaktheihna leh Jerusalem khua mite’ ki-uatsaknate ka susia ding hi.

Ka thu hong ngai nuam lo-a, amau’ ngaihsutna bang bek-a a pai tentan nuam, pasian dangte’ nasem ding leh bia dinga a nung zuih hih mi gilote in zat theih ding ahi nawn lo, hih dialkaih bang ahi ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh dialkaih in mite’ kawng tungah a belh cinten mah bangin Israel mi khempeuh leh Judah mi khempeuh kei tungah hong belh cinten dingin ka bawl hi. Tua hi leh amaute ka mi ahi ding uh a, ka minthan’na, ka hoihna leh ka vangliatna ding ahi ding uh hi. Ahih hangin amau in ka thu hong mang lo uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi,” hong ci hi.

“Jeremiah aw, amau kiangah, ‘Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a hong gen-inah, “Zu beel khempeuh leenggahzu tawh a kidim ding hi,” hong ci hi,’ va ci in. Amaute in nang kiangah, ‘Beel khempeuh leenggahzu tawh kidim ding, cih kote in thei lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong cikik ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin nangmah in amaute kiangah, ‘Topa in hong cih-inah, En un, David’ tokhom tung-a tu kumpite, siampite, kamsangte leh Jerusalem khua-a teeng mi khempeuh-a kipan gamsunga om mite khempeuh zu tawh kidim sakin ka khamsak ding hi.
Pate leh tate-a kipan amaute khat leh khat ka kiphusak ding a, Topa in kong cih-inah, hehpih lo, dawm lo, it loin ka siasak ding hi, a ci hi,’ va ci in.”
Ngai un la, na bil uh ngat un; kisathei kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in thu a gen zo hi.
Topa in khua mialsak a, khuamialna mual tungah na tuk ma-un na lamet uh khuavak pen khua mial bikbek a suah ma-in, Topa na Pasian uh pahtawi un.
Ahih hangin ka thu nong ngaih kei uh leh na kisaktheihna uh hangin ka kapsim ding a, khitui luangin nakpi takin ka kap ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ tuu honte sal dingin kikai zo hi.
Kumpipa leh a nu’ kiangah, “Na kumpi tokhomte tung panin hong tuaksuk un, bang hang hiam cih leh na kumpi lukhute uh na lu tung pan-un kiakhin zo hi,” va ci un.
Negeb gam khua kongpite lah kikhak a, kuamah lut thei nawn lo hi; Judah mite zong salin kikai a, a vekpi-un salin kikai khin uh hi.
“Jerusalem khua aw, khuadak in la, leilu lam pan-a hong paite en dih in. Nang a hong kipia a hoih mahmah na tuu honte koi-ah om ahi hiam?
Nangma’ lawm ding a, na bawl mite teekteek in nang hong uk ni ciangin bang na ci ding hiam? Numei nau suakte in na a sak uh bangin nang zong na na sa ding hi.
‘Bang hang-a hih thute kei’ tungah hong tung ahi hiam?’ ci-a na ngaihsut leh na mawhna a liatluat hang ahi hi. Tua hangin na nik hong kihawk gawp sak a, a hong kibuan gawp hi.
Ethiopia mivomte in a vun uh a khek thei uh hiam? Kamkei in a gial a khek thei hiam? A khek theih uh leh siatna bawl ding a zongsang khin note in zong hoihna na bawl thei ding uh hi.
Sehnel gam pan-a hong nung huih in buhvai a mutmang bangin note kong thehthang ding hi.
Hih pen nangma’ tan’ dinga kong sehsa ahi hi, Topa in kong ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei nong mangngilh a, pasian zuau peuh na um hi.
Keimahmah in na nik kong hawksak ding a, kong maizum sak ding hi.

Na kihhuainate, na ang kawmna, na hukna leh gamlak mual tunga numei paktat banga milim pasian peuh na biak kawikawinate ka mu zo hi. Jerusalem aw, gimna ngah ta in! Na sian’tho nadingin bang tanvei sawt ding ahi hiam?”
Guahzu lo-a khua keuna tawh kisai-in Topa in Jeremiah hih bangin a hopih hi:
“Judah gam kap a, a khuapite maimang dekdek hi. A mite in puanvom khu-in lei lakah a bok uh a, Jerusalem khua mite’ kahna aw ging hi.
Uliante in a nasemte uh tui tawi dingin sawl uh a, tuikhuk a zuat uh leh tui na om lo hi. A beel hawm uh tawh hong kilehkik uh a, lungkhamin cih nading thei loin a lu uh puan a khuh uh hi.
Lokhote a lungmang uh a, a lu uh puan a khuh uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh guahzu lo ahih manin lei a keugawp hi.
Lopa om lo lua ahih manin gamlak-ah sazuk in a no a nusia liang hi.
Gam sakolte in bangmah om lohna mual tungah se-alte bangin a nak huhu uh hi. Lopa om lo ahih manin a hak zo kei uh hi.
Ka mite in kei tungah, “Topa aw, ka mawhna-un in kote’ lang khatah hong pang ahi ta zongin, nangma’ min hangin hong hehpih in. Kote in tam veipi kong nungngat uh a, nang tungah kong khial zo uh hi.
Israel mite’ lamet pa aw, haksat hun ciangin ko a hong honkhia pa na hi hi. Bang hangin ka gamsung uhah mikhual bangin om-in khualzin, zan khat bek a taam bangin hong om na hi hiam?

Bang hangin mi lungkia gawp bangin omin, a honkhia thei lo galkappa bangin om na hi hiam? Ahih hangin Topa aw, kote’ laizangah nangmah na om-a, nangma’ min-in kote hong kisam hi; hong nusia kei ta in,’ hong ci uh hi.”

Hih mite tawh kisai-in Topa in hih bangin a gen hi: “Amaute in hih bangin kei kiang panin vakkhia kawikawi nuam uh a, a kidek kei uh hi. Tua ahih manin Topa in amaute ka sang kei a, a khialhnate uh phawk-in, a mawhnate uh ka daantat ding hi.”
Topa in kei hong hopih a, “Hih mite’ thupha ngah nadingin thu hong gen nawn kei in.

An a tan’ uh hangin amau’ thuumna ka ngai kei ding a, meihal biakna leh an tawh biaknate hong piak uh hangin ka sang kei ding hi. Amaute namsau tawh ahi zongin, kial tawh ahi zongin, pulnatna tawh ahi zongin ka sisak zaw ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin keimah in, “Aa, Topa Pasian aw, en dih in, Kamsangte in amaute kiangah, ‘Note in namsau ahi zongin, kial ahi zongin na mu kha kei ding uh a, hih munah lungnopna kip Pasian in hong pia ding hi,’ a ci uh hi,” ka ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in, “Tua kamsangte in kei’ min suang-in zuauthu hong gen uh hi. Amaute ka sawl kei a, thu ka pia kei a, zong ka hopih kei hi. Note kianga hong gen uh thute a manlo mangmuhna, bangmah kimang lo aisanna leh amau leh amau’ lungsim kikhem tawmna thute ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ka sawl lohpi, ‘Hih gam sungah namsau ahi zongin, kial ahi zongin hong tung lo ding hi,’ ci-a kei’ min suanga thu a gen kamsangte tawh kisai-in Topa in ka cih-inah, namsau leh kial tawh hih kamsangte a si khin ding uh hi.

A hilh uh mite in zong kial leh namsau thuak-in amaute-a kipan a zite uh, a tapate uh leh a tanute uh Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah kipaaithang dinga, kuamah in a vui kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gitlohna amau tung mahah ka buaksuk ding hi,” hong ci hi.

“Jeremiah aw, amaute’ kiangah hih bangin va ci in: ‘Sun-le-zanin ka khitui luangluang hen la, kang ngei kei ta hen; bang hang hiam cih leh ka mite in nakpi-in liamna a thuak uh a, nakpi takin a kisat hi.

Lo lai-ah paikhia leng, namsau-a kithat lumte bekbek ka mu a, khuapi sungah lut leng, kial-a puksite bekbek ka mu hi! Kamsangte leh siampite in koi-ah pai ding cih thei lo pi-in gam sungah an ngenin a vak kawikawi uh hi,’ ci-in va gen in.”

Topa aw, nangmah in Judah gam nial khin siang zo na hi hiam? Zion khua kihhuai sa na hi hiam? Bang hangin kote hong thuaksak a, hong damsak nawn lo na hi hiam? Lungnopna ka lamen uh a, hoihna bangmah a hong tung kei hi; dam nading hun ka lamen uh a, lauhuaina bekbek ka mu uh hi.
Topa aw, ka gitlohna uh leh ka pute ka pate’ gitlohna uh kong pulak uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang’ tungah kong mawh khin uh hi.
Nangma’ min hangin kote hong nolh kei in; a vanglian na tokhom mindai sak kei ta in. Kote tawh nong thuciamna phawk in la, hong ciam pel kei ta in.

Gamdang pasian zuaute lakah guahzu sak thei khat beek a om hiam? Ahih kei leh vantung in ama’ thu-in guahzu tawmsak thei ahi hiam? Tua bang a hih thei nang bek hilo na hi hiam? Topa kote’ Pasian aw, Nangmah in tuate khempeuh hih na hih manin nang sungah lametna kong nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei hong hopih a, “Moses leh Samuel nangawn ka mai-ah a hong ding zawzen zongun ka lungsim hih mite lam a nga tuan kei ding hi. Ka muhna panin hawlkhia un la, paikhia sak un!

Amaute in, “Koi-ah ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-a hong dot uh leh hih bangin gen kik in: ‘Topa in, “Pulnatna tawh a si dingte a si ding uh a, namsau tawh a si dingte a si ding uh hi; kial tawh a puksi dingte a puk si ding uh a, sal-a kikai dingte zong a kikai ding uh hi,” a ci hi,’ va ci in.

“Amaute’ sih nadingin gimna nam li ka tungsak ding hi. A kithah nading uh namsau, a keizan gawp dingin ui, a valhtum ding leh a susia gawp dingin huih lak-a vasate leh lei lak-a ganhingte ka koih ding hi.
Judah kumpipa Hezekiah’ tapa Manasseh in Jerusalem khua-a a bawl thu hangin leitung gam khempeuhte’ lau nadingin ka koih ding hi.
“Kua in nang a hong hehpih ding hiam? Jerusalem aw, kua in nang hong kah ding hiam? Kua, hong lam baangin dam-le-nat kitheih sakna-in hong hawh ding ahi hiam?
Nangmah in kei nong taisan zo hi, Topa in kong ci hi, kei nong nungngat niloh hi; tua ahih manin ka khut kong zan-a kong susia hi—ka hehna ka ki-ipip zo nawn kei hi.

Na gamsung khua kongpite-ah huihpi’ mut bangin note kong mutmang ding hi. Na tate uh ka beisak ding-a, ka mite ka susia ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na gitlohna uh leh na om dan hoihlo panun na kiheikik kei uh hi.

Tuipi-a sehnel om zah sangin nupi meigong ka tamsak zaw ding hi; na tangvalte uh a khan’ cin laitakin ka that ding a, a nute uh ka thuaksak ding hi. No’ tungah thakhat thu-in lungkhamna leh launa kong tungsak ding hi.

Ta sagih a nei nupi nu khakham vei-in, a sibup hi. Sun kimlai hi napi ama adingin khuamial bang a, maizumna leh mindaina a thuak hi. No a nungta lai teng na galte un namsau-a a hong satlup dingun kong pia ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi.”

Gimna ka thuak hi, ka nu aw, gamsung khempeuh-a mite tawh kitawng kisel ding a, kei nong suahsak se se! Ka sumte kuamah lah leitawi sak loin kuama’ aa lah leitawi lo napi a vekpi-un kei hong haamsiat teitei uh hi.
Topa aw, amaute’ hoih nadingin nang tungah kong thuumsak kei a, gimna leh haksatna hun ciangin ka galte adingin nang tungah kong ngetsak kei leh tua haamsiatnate kei tungah hong tung ta hen!
Mi khat in sik kuaitan zo lo ding ahih leh leilu lam-a sik le sumngo kihelkhawm kuaitan zo zaw ding ahi hiam?
Topa in, “Na gam sung teng-a na bawl uh mawhna khempeuhte hangin na neih na lam uh leh na sum na paiite uh man ngah loin na galte uh ka tuahsak mang ding hi.
Na theih ngei loh uh gam khatah na galte’ na ka hong semsak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka hehna kitawh kuang a, a mit nawn kei ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Topa aw, nang’ na thei hi, hong phawk in la, hong veh in; kei hong bawlsiate tungah phu hong laksak in. Hong thuak in kei hong lakhia kei in la, nangma’ hangin minsiatna thuak ka hih lam hong thei in.
Na thute in kei hong kem a, an bangin ka ne hi. Na thute kei adingin kipahna leh lungdamna ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma’ min-in kei hong kilo hi, Aw, Topa, a vanglian Pasian aw,
Mi gualnuam mawkmawkte tawh ka kikhawl kei a, zong ka lungdam kei hi. Nangmah in na khut ka tungah hong nga-in, hehna tawh hong kidimsak na hih manin, kei guak bek ka tu hi.
Bang hangin ka natna dai thei lo a, ka liamna dam thei loin dam ding ut lo ahi hiam? Kei adingin nang, tui a kang lui tawh kibangin hong lungkia sak ding na hi hiam?

Tua ahih manin Topa in, “Nong kilehkik leh kong koihna ngei ah kong koih ding a, ka na na semkik ding hi. Thu manpha lo gen loin thu manpha na gen leh, ka kamsang-in kong zang ding hi. Amaute nang kiangah hong pai ding uh a, nang na hih leh amau’ kiangah na pai kei ding hi.

Hih mite tungah sumngo tawh a kibawl khua kulhpi kong bang sak ding a, amaute in a hong sim uh hangin a hong zo kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a hong honkhia ding leh a hong suahtak dingin nang kong om pih hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Mi gilote’ khut sungpan nang kong suahtak ding-a mi lauhuaite’ khut kol pan nang kong tankhia ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei hong hopih a,
“Hih bang munah zi nei kei in la, tanu tapa zong nei kei in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mun-a a suak tanu tapate leh a nute a pate uh tawh kisai-in Topa in ka cih-inah:

Natna lian tawh si ding uh a, kuamah in kah loin kuamah in lah a vui kei ding uh hi. Lei laka ek kitha bang ahi lel ding uh hi. Namsau kial tawh a si ding uh a, a siluangte uh huih laka leeng vasate leh lei laka ganhingte in a ne ding uh hi.

“Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, mi’ kahna inn sungah lut kei un la, thuum-in kuamah va kah se kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh lungnopna lianpi leh ka hehpihna hih mite kiang panin ka lakhia khin zo hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Hih gamah miliante leh mineute a si ding uh a, kivui loin, amau adingin kuamah kap loin, kuamah in a pumpi uh kui liam loin, a sam uh a met kei ding uh hi.
Misi kahte hehnem dingin kuamah in an a lui kei ding uh a, a nu ahih kei leh a pa a site nangawn kuamah in hehnepna hai a pia kei ding hi.
Pawi kibawlna innah na pai kei ding a, amau tawh nekhawm dawnkhawm dingin na tu kei ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin kong ci hi: En un, hih mun panin note’ muh tektekin, note’ theih hun sung mahin gualnopna, lungdamna awte leh zi nei thakte, pasal neithakte’ awte ka gingsak nawn kei ding hi.

“Hih thu teng hih mite tungah na gen ciangin amaute in, ‘Bang hangin Topa in hih gimna lianpi eite tungah hong tungsak ahi hiam? I khialhna bang ahi hiam? Topa i Pasian tungah bang mawhna bawl i hi hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in amaute’ kiangah, ‘Topa in, “Na pu na pate un kei hong taisan khin uh a, kei hong nusia-in ka thukham a zui kei uh hi.
Note in na pu na pate sangun na siahuai zaw uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, en un, note’ utna bang ciat na zui tentan uh a, ka thu nong ngai nuam kei uh hi.

Tua ahih manin hih gam panin note leh na pu na pate un na theih ngei nai loh uh gamah kong nawhkhia ding hi. Tua lai-ah sun-le-zan-in pasian dangte’ na na sem niloh ding uh hi; bang hang hiam na cih uh leh note kong ang-van nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi,’ na ci ding hi.
“Tua ahih manin, en un, Topa in kong cih-inah kuamah in, ‘Izipt gam pan-a Israel mite a hong lakhia Topa a nuntak bangin,’ ci-in kei’ minin a kiciam nawn loh hun hong tung ding hi.

Amaute in, ‘Leilu lam gam leh eite hong hawlkhiatna gam khempeuh pana Israel mite a hong lakhia Topa a nuntak bangin,’ a ci zaw ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pu a pate uh ka piaksa, amau’ neihsa gamah amaute ka lakik ding hi.

“En un, Topa in kong cih-inah, nga beng tampi ka khah ding a, amaute ka mansak ding hi. Tua khit ciangin sa beng tampi ka khah ding a, amaute in mual tung khempeuh leh suanghawmte panin amaute a bengmang ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a omdan khempeuh uh ka mit-in ka mu a, kei’ kiang pana a kiseel bangmah om lo hi. A khialhna khempeuh uh zong ka mit panin a kiseel kei hi.

Amaute’ khialhna leh a mawhnate uh a zah nih-in ka thuk ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a muh thadah huai siluang hawmte tawh kibang milimte tawh ka gam a ninsak uh a, kihhuaina tawh ka gam a dimsak uh hi,” hong ci hi.

Aw Topa, ka hatna leh ka kulhpi, lungkham hun cianga ka bukna aw, leitung mong panin gamdang mite nang’ kiangah hong pai ding uh a, “Ka pu ka pate un zuauthu leh bangmah a, kimang lo milimte longal bangmah a luah kei uh hi.
Mi in ama’ pasian ding bawltawm thei ahi hiam? Tuate pasian hi lo hi!” a ci ding uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin, en un, amaute ka hilh ding hi. Tu tung peuhmahin ka min in Topa hi, cih a theih nadingun ka vangliatna leh ka hatna ka theisak ding hi,” ci-in Topa in a gen hi.
“Judah mite’ mawhna sik laikung khat tawh kigelh hi. Suangmanpha muk zum tawh amaute’ lungtang pek tung leh biakna tau kite tungah khuak-in ki-at hi.
A tate un singlim nuai khempeuh leh mualsangte’ tunga a biakna taute uh leh a nusian uh Asherah milimte a phawk veve uh a,
zanglei-a om mualte tungah zong tua mawhna a kilang hi. Na gam sung khempeuh uh-a na bawl uh mawhnate hangin na neih na lam uh leh na sum na paite uh, na galte uh ka tuahmang sak ding hi.
Nang kong piak na gam zong na taan ding a, na theih ngei loh uh gam khatah na galte’ na ka hong semsak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka hehna kitawh kuang a, a mit nawn kei ding hi.
Topa in kong cih-inah: Mi bek muangin mi’ hatna bek suanga a lungsim Topa tawh a kilehngat mi in haamsiatna a ngah hi.
Amah in sehnel gam-a po sawlbawk bang hi a, khangin a bawk pha zo kei ding hi. Kuama’ teen’ lohna ci gam, keugaw gamah amah a teeng ding hi.
“Topa muangin, Topa a beel mi in thupha a ngah hi.
Amah in gun gei-a kisuan singkung bang hi a, lui geiah a zung kha hi. A tehte hing den ahih manin nisa kihta lo hi. Kitatsat loin gah den ahih manin guah zuk loh kum ciangin zong lungkham tuan lo hi.
“Lungsim in na khempeuh lakah a khem hatpen hi a, a kisia pha mahmah hi; kua in a thei thei ding hiam?
Keimah Topa in mi khempeuh’ nuntak zia leh gamtatna tawh kizui-a piakhia dingin ngaihsutna ka entel a, lungsim ka sittel hi.”
Thu manlo pi tawh a hau mi in ama’ tui lopi keuhsak dinga a op sim vasa tawh kibang hi. A khan’ lai-in a neihsa teng a taan ding a, a tawpna-ah mihaipi a suak ding hi.
I biakinnpi in a kipat cila mual tunga om a minthang kumpi tokhom tawh kibang hi.

Aw Topa, Israel mite’ lametpa aw, nang a hong taisan mite a zahhuai ding uh hi. Nang a hong lehngat san mite leivui laka min gelh bangin a mang thang ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nuntakna ciktui ahi Topa a hong taisan zo uh hi.
Topa aw, hong damsak lecin kei ka dam ding a, hong honkhia lecin ka suakta ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nang kong phatpa na hi hi.
En in, amaute in, “Topa’ hong tawn’nate koi lai takah om ahi hiam? Tu-in hong tung ta hen!” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute tungah gimna na tun’ sak ding kong ngen kei a, siatna ni hong tun’ ding ka deihsak loh lam zong nong thei hi. Ka kam pan-a hong gingkhia thu khempeuh na thei khin hi.
Kei hong lausak kei in; gimna hong tun’ cianga kong belhpa na hi hi.

Kei a hong bawl siate na zahhuaisak in la, ahih hangin kei hong zahhuai sak kei in. Amaute na lungamsak in, ahih hangin kei hong lungamsak kei in. Amaute’ tungah siatna ni tungsak in la, a zah nih-in susia in!
Topa in hih bangin kei hong hopih hi: “Va pai in la, Judah gam kumpite’ lutna le pusuahna Mipite’ Kongpi leh Jerusalem khua kongpi khempeuh ah va ding in la, hih bangin va gen in:
‘Hih kongpi sunga hong lut no Judah gam kumpite, Judah mi khempeuh leh Jerusalem khua mi khempeuhte aw, Topa’ kammal ngai un.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Na nuntak nop lai uh leh kidawm un la, sabbath ni-in van pua kei un. Jerusalem khua kongpite-ah bangmah hong lutpih kei un.
Sabbath ni-in na inn panun bangmah puakhia kei un la, bangmah sem kei un. Na pu na pate uh ka thupiak mah bangin sabbath ni siangthosak un.
Ahih hangin na pu na pate un ka thu hong ngai lo uh a, a bil uh hong ngat lo uh hi. Hong mang loin ka hilhna a theih loh nadingun a lung uh a khauhsak uh hi.
“Ahih hangin Topa in kong cih-inah, note in ka thu nong ngaih uh a, sabbath ni-in hih khua kongpite pan bangmah hong lutpih loin, sabbath ni siangtho sakin na na sep kei uh leh,

na kumpite uh leh na uliante un David’ neih bang kumpi vangliatna a nei ding uh hi. Amaute in Judah mite leh Jerusalem khua mite tawh sakol leeng leh sakolte’ tungah tuangin hih khua kongpite-ah hong lut ding uh a, hih khuapi-ah zong mi a teeng tawntung ding hi.

Mite in Judah gam khuapite leh Jerusalem khua kim panin ahi zongin, Benjamin gam, Shefelah zanglei gam, mualtung gam leh leitaw lam Negeb gamte panin ahi zongin meihal biakna leh kithoihnate, an tawh biakna, paknamtui leh lungdam biak piaknate Topa’ biakinn-ah hong keng uh hi.

Ahih hangin ka thu nong ngaih kei uh a, sabbath ni siangthosak loin, sabbath ni-in Jerusalem khua kongpite pan van pua-in nong lutpih uh leh, tua kongpite ka hal ding hi. A mei in Jerusalem khua kumpi innte lawhin a kangtum ding a, mei a kiphelh zo kei ding hi,’ va ci in,” hong ci hi.
Topa in Jeremiah hong hopih-a,
“Tho in, Beel sekpa’ innah paisuk in la, tua lai-ah ka thute kong hilh ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong bel sekpa’ innah ka paisuk leh a bel sek laitak ka tuak hi.
Buan tawh a bawl a beel ama’ khut sungah kisia ahih manin beelsekpa in hoih a sak bangin beel dang khatin a sek pha hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah,

“Israel mite aw, Topa in kong cih-inah hih beel sekpa’ hih bangin note zong hong hih thei lo ding ka hi hiam? En un, beelsekpa’ khut sunga buan tawh kibangin, Israel mite aw, note kei’ khut sungah na om uh hi.
Minam khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin gam khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin bot khia-in, khen kham-in, ka suksiat nadingin hun khat peuhpeuh lai-in ka gen khin zo ahi zongin
tua ka gen sa minam leh gam in a siatna panin a kihei kik leh, ama tung-a siatna tun’ sak ding-a ka seh sa pen ka kisikkik ding a, ka tungsak nawn kei ding hi.
Minam khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin, gam khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin lam ding leh phut dingin hun khat peuhpeuh lai-in ka gen khin zo ahi zongin,
amah in ka thu hong ngai lo-a hoih ka sak lohte a bawl teitei leh, ama tung-a hoihna bawl dinga ka sehsa pen ka kisikkik dinga ka bawl nawn kei ding hi.

Tua ahih manin tu-in, Judah mite leh Jerusalem khua mite kiangah, ‘Topa in a cih-inah, En un, note’ siat nadingin ka gal-a note’ langkhat ah ngimna khat ka nei hi. Na vekpi-un na siatna uh pan kilehkik un la, na dan uh leh na nasepnate uh bawlpha un,’ va ci in.
Amau in, ‘Tua bang gen kul lo hi. Ko’ ngimna bangin ka zui ding uh a, mi khempeuh in ama’ lungsim sia’ deihna bangin ka gamta ding uh hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih-inah: Minam dangte lakah, hih bang thu a kiza ngei hiam, dong dih un. Ka mituam Israel in a mulkimhuai na khat a hih zo hi.
Lebanon mualtung vuk in nusia ngei ahi hiam? Mualtung pan-a hong luang a vot kilkel luite kang ngei ahi hiam?

Ahih hangin ka mite in kei hong mangngilh khin uh a, milim pasiante kiangah paknamtui a hal uh hi. Amau’ tot ding lampi-ah tuk uh ahih manin a tot ngei uh lampi lui zui nawnloin, lampi lopi a tawn uh hi.
Amau’ gam uh a mulkimhuai leh simmawhna tawh a kiphitsan den ding gam a suaksak uh hi. A kantan mi khempeuh a mulkim uh a, lamdang sa-in a lu uh a pei uh hi.
Ni suahna lam huih in nin a mut mang bangin a galte’ mai-ah amaute ka theh thang ding hi. Haksatna a tuah ni-un ka nungngat ding a, ka maingat kei ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hong pai un, Jeremiah sawm ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh eite hong hilh dingin siampite ahi zongin, i dot dingin mipilte ahi zongin, Pasian’ thu hong gen dingin kamsangte ahi zongin i nei hi. Hong pai un, amah mawhsakin ama’ thu peuhmah mal khat zong i mang kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Hong en in, Topa aw, ka galte hong langpan’nate hong ngai in.

Hoihna pen siatna tawh a kituak ding mah ahi hiam? Ka kiat nadingin dum a to uh hi. Nangma mai-ah kong ding a, amau ading thuhoih kong gensak a, na hehna amau tungah na tun’sak loh nading kong gennate hong phawk in.

Tua ahih manin a tate uh kial tawh puksi sak in la, amaute namsau-in si sak in. A zite uh tasel sak in la, meigong suaksak in. A pasalte uh pulnatna tawh si sak in la, a tangvalte uh gal sungah namsau tawh kithatlumsak in.
Amau a thatlum ding galkapte thakhat thu-in paisak in la, amau’ innte panin kahna aw kizasak in! Bang hang hiam cih leh ka kiat nadingin dum a to uh a, ka khete a awk nadingin thang hong siah uh hi.

Ahih hangin Topa aw, amaute in thah dinga a hong sawmna uh nang na thei hi. Amau’ khialhna na maisak kei in la, nangma’ muhna panin amau’ mawhnate phiatmang sak kei in. Nangma’ mai-ah amaute guallelsak in la, na heh ni mahin hih ek in.
Topa in hong hopih a, “Beel sekpa’ kiangah pai in la, leibeel khat va lei in. Mite’ lakah upa pawlkhat leh siampi upa pawlkhat tonpih in la,
ni suahna lam kongpi gei, Ben-Hinnom Mualkuamah pai-in, tua lai-ah kong gen thute tangko in.

Nangmah in, ‘Topa’ kammal ngai un, Judah kumpite leh Jerusalem khua mite aw, a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong cih-inah: En un, hih munah kong tun’sak ding siatna lian lua ahih manin a za mi khempeuhte’ bil sungah ging den ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite in kei hong taisan khin zo uh a, amaute-a kipanin a pu a pate uh leh Judah kumpite’ theih ngei loh pasian dangte’ kiangah paknamtui a hal uh a, hih mun a ninsak uh hi. Hih mun mawhna nei lo mite thahna sisan tawh a dimsak uh a,
ka thupiak, ka sawl lah a hi lo, ka ngaihsut khak beek zong a hi lo, a tate uh meihal biakna tawh Baal biak nadingin Baal biakna tausangte a lam khin zo uh hi.
Tua ahih manin, en un, Topa in kong cih-inah, hih mun pen Tofeth ahi zongin Ben-Hinnom Mualkuam ahi zongin a kicih nawn loh hun hong tung ding hi. Kithahna Mualkuam a kici zaw ding hi.

Hih munah Judah mite leh Jerusalem mite’ ngimna ka tangtung sak kei ding a, a galte’ namsau leh a that nuamte’ khutlum-in amaute ka sisak ding hi. Amau’ si luangte huih laka leng vasate leh lei lak a ganhingte’ an dingin ka pia ding hi.
Hih khuapi a mulkimhuai leh a simmawh huai ka suak sak ding a, a kantan mi khempeuh in khuapi kisiatna hangin lamdang sa-in zahpih-in a phitsan ding uh hi.
A galte uh leh a that nuam mite in hong sim uh a, nek ding om lo lua ahih manin a tapate leh a tanute-uh’ sa ka nesak ding a, mi khempeuh in a innvengte’ sa a ne ding uh hi,’ va ci in.
“Tua ciangin na tonpihte’ muhin na beel sukham in la,

amaute kiangah, a vanglian Topa in a cih-inah, hih beelsekpa’ beel kisukham a, a kibawl phatkik theih nawn loh mah bangin hih mite leh hih khuapi ka sukham ding hi. Mun dangah si vui nading mun om nawn lo ding ahih manin Tofeth nangawn-ah a kivui ding uh hi.
Topa in kong cih-inah, hih mun leh hih mun-a teeng mite tungah tu-a bangin ka hih ding a, hih khuapi Tofeth ka bang sak ding hi.

Jerusalem khua-a innte leh Judah kumpite’ innte—inn khum tung pan vantunga aksite khempeuh tungah paknamtui hal biakna kipiakna innte leh pasian dangte tunga dawn ding biakna a kibuakna innte khempeuh a vek-in Tofeth mun bangin a nin a suak ding hi, a ci hi,’ va ci in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in thu gen ding a, hong sawlna Tofeth panin ka ciahkik a, Topa’ biakinn sungah ding-in mi khempeuh’ kiangah,

“A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a cih-inah, En un, hih khuapi leh a kim-a khuaneute’ tungah ka gensa siatna khempeuh ka tung sak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a lung uh a khauhsak uh a, ka thute a ngai nuam kei uh hi, a ci hi,” ka ci hi.
Jeremiah in hih thu a gente Immer’ tapa, Topa’ biakinn uk pipa ahi, siampi Pashhur in a za hi.
Tua ciangin Pashhur in kamsangpa Jeremiah sat a, Topa’ biakinn Benjamin Kongpi sak nungah kol a bulh hi.
A zing ciangin Pashhur in a kol bulhna panin Jeremiah a khahkik ciangin Jeremiah in, “Topa in nang Pashhur ci-in hong sam nawn lo a, Mun khempeuhah Launa ci-in hong sam ta hi.

Bang hang hiam na cih leh Topa in hong cih-inah, ‘En in, keimah in nang leh nang’ lau nadingin ahi zongin na lawmte’ lau nadingin ahi zongin nang kong bawl ding hi. Amaute a galte in namsau tawh a thahlup na mu ding hi. Judah gam khempeuh Babilon kumpipa’ khut sungah ka pia ding a, amah in sal dingin amaute Babilon khua-ah a paipih ding a, namsau tawh a thatlum ding hi.

Tua tham loin khuapi sunga hauhna khempeuh, a nasep sa uh khempeuh, a neih a lam thupi teng khempeuh leh Judah kumpite’ sum leh pai khempeuhte a galte’ khut sungah ka pia ding a, amau in sutin, manin, Babilon khua-ah a paipih ding uh hi.

Pashhur aw, nang leh na inn sung uh a, omte khempeuh sal dingin Babilon khua-ah na pai ding uh a, tua lai munah nang na si ding hi. Nang leh a man lopi-a na thuhilh a ngai na lawmte khempeuh tawh hong kivui ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topa aw, kei nong khem a, khemna ka thuak takpi hi. Kei sangin nang na hatzaw a, keimah nong zo hi. Ni simin mite’ nuihsat lel ka hi a, Mi khempeuh in hong zahko uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh thu ka gen simin, “Ngongtatna leh kisiatna!” ci-in ka kiko den hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ kammal ka genkhiatna hangin ni simin simmawhna leh zahpihna ka thuak lawh hi.

Keimah in, “Ama’ thu ka gen kei ding a, ama’ min ka lo nawn kei ding hi,” ci mah taleng zong, ama’ thu ka lungsim sungah meikuang bangin hong om a, ka guh ka tang sungah kikhum cip ahih manin ka ki-ip ipna-in ka gim lua a, gen loin ka om thei kei hi.

Mite’ kihuau simna tampi ka za a, mun khempeuh lauhuai hi. Ka lawm itte khempeuh in, ka cihmawh ding hong ngak gige uh a, “A mawhna pulak un! A mawhna pulak ni! Amah i khem zo kha ding hi. Tua hi leh i zo pah ding a, tua ciangin i thukkik ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in a kihtak huai gal hangpa bangin, kei tawh hong omkhawm gige hi. Tua ahih manin kei hong bawlsiate a tuk ding uh a, kei hong zo lo ding uh hi. A tawntunga a mindaina uh kimangngilh ding hi.
A thuman mite a en tel, lungsim leh ngaihsutna a mu a vanglian Topa aw, amaute na thuh kikna hong musak in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma’ kiangah ka thu kong ap khin hi.
Topa’ tungah la sa un la, Topa phat un! Mi gilote’ khut sung pan amah in mi cimawhte a honkhia hi.
Ka suah ni in hamsiatna thuak ta hen! Ka nu in kei a hong suahkhiat sak ni in thupha ngah kei ta hen!
Ka pa kiangah, “Tapa khat na nei hi,” ci-a va ko-a a lungdamsakpa in haamsiatna thuak ta hen.
Topa in hehpih lo-a a lumlet khuapite bangin tuapa hi ta hen. Zing sangin kahna aw za hen la, sun ciangin gal patauhna aw za ta hen.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ka nu’ gil sungah hong that loin, ka nu ka han hong suaksak lo a, a gil sungah paai densak lo hi.
Gimna leh dahna mu ding leh ni sim-a maizum den dingin bang hangin a gil sung panin suak khia sese ka hi hiam?
Zedekiah kumpipa in Malkhiah’ tapa Pashhur leh Ma-aseiah’ tapa Zefaniah-te Jeremiah kiangah a sawl-a,

“Kote adingin Topa’ kiangah thu hong dot sak in. Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in hong sim hi. Topa in a nalamdangte khat kei tungah hong sem leh amah a kilehkik sak kha thei ding hi,” ci-in a dong sak hi.
Tua ciangin Jeremiah in dawng kik a, “Zedekiah kiangah hih bangin na gen kik un.

‘Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a gen-inah, En un, khua kulhpi pua lam-a a hong umcih Babilon kumpipa leh Khaldea mite na dona uh ahi, na khut sung-ua na kep na galhiamte uh bangmah a, kimang lo ka suaksak ding a, amaute khempeuh hih khuapi laizangah kong paipih ding hi.
Keimahmah in hehna leh thangpaihna lianpi tawh ka ban zan-in, a hat mahmah ka khut tawh note kong do ding hi.
Hih khuapi sunga teengte a mi a sa ci loin ka thatlum ding a, pulnatna tawh a gam khin ding uh hi.

Tua khit ciangin, Topa in kong cih-inah, Judah kumpipa Zedekiah leh a nasemte leh, pulnatna, namsau leh kial-a si lo a nungta lai teng pen, amaute a that nuam Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar leh a galte uh’ khut sungah ka pia ding hi. Amah in amaute namsau tawh a that ding a, hehpih loin, zong a siit kei ding a, itna lungsim a nei kei ding hi,’ va ci un,” a ci hi.
Topa in Jeremiah hopih a, “Jeremiah aw, hih mite kiangah, ‘Topa in a cih-inah, En un, na mai uhah nuntakna lampi leh sihna lampi ka khung hi.

Hih khuapi sunga a om mi peuhmah namsau tawh ahi zongin, kial tawh a hi zongin, pulnatna tawh a hi zongin a si ding uh hi. Ahih hangin pusuak khia-a, note a hong do Khalde mite kianga a lut peuhmah a nungta ding uh a, a suakta liailiai ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, hih khuapi’ hoih nading hi lo siat nadingin ka lungsim ka khensat khin zo hi. Babilon kumpipa’ khut sungah ka pia ding a, amah in mei tawh a hal ding hi,’ na ci ding hi.
“Judah kumpite innkuan tungah hih bangin va gen in: ‘Topa’ kammal ngai dih un,

David’ suante aw! Topa in a cih-inah: Zingsang simin man takin thu khen un la, mi bawlsiapa’ khut sung pan a bawlsiatpa hon khia un. Tua bang na hih kei uh leh na siatna bawlnate hangun ka hehna mei bangin a kuang ding a, kuamah in a phelh zo kei ding hi.

“Mualkuam zang pan kilam to a, zanglei laka suangtum banga sang to Jerusalem aw, Topa in kong cih-inah, nang’ lang khatah ka pang hi. Nangmah in, ‘Kua in kei hong simsuk ding a, i omna-ah kua hong lut ding hiam?’ na ci hi.

Na nasepna gahte tawh kituakin nang kong daantat ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi. Tuulak-a sing hoihte tawh a kilam na kumpi innte uh mei tawh kihal ding a, a kimkot khempeuh ka kangtum sak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in hong hopih a, “Judah kumpipa’ innah va paisuk in la, hih bangin va hopih in.
David’ tokhom tunga tu Judah kumpipa aw, nang leh na nasemte akipan hih kongpi-a hong lut na gammite khempeuh in Topa kammal ngai dih un.

Topa in a cih-inah, thumanin diktat un la, bawlsiatna a thuakte a bawlsiate’ khut sung panin honkhia un. Minam dangte, pa neilote leh meigongte simmawh bawl kha loin amau tungah ngongtat kha kei un la, hih munah zong mawhna nei lo mite that kei un.

Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh note in hih kammal na ngaih takpi uh leh David’ suante kumpi a suak tawntung ding uh a, amaute, a nasemte uh leh a mite uh sakolleeng leh sakolte’ tungah tuangin hih inn kongpite-ah hong lut ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note in hih kammalte na ngaih kei uh leh keimah Topa in kong gen-inah, hih in gamlak suaksak dingin ka kiciam hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah kumpi inn tawh kisai-in Topa in kong cih-inah: Nangmah in Gilead gam bangin ahi zongin Lebanon mualvum bangin ahi zongin na hoih hi. Ahih hangin nang sehnel gam kong suaksak ding a, kuamah teen’ lohna khua kong suaksak ding hi.
Nang’ lang khatah a hong susia ding mi ka kithawisak ding a, a hei uh hong keng ding uh hi. Amaute in na sidar khuam hoihpente hong phuksak ding uh a, mei-ah hong khul sak ding uh hi.
“Tua ciangin minam dang tampi in hih khuapi a kantan ding uh a, a inn sak a inn khangte’ kiangah, “Bang hangin hih khuapilian hi ci bawl ahi hiam?” ci-in khat leh khat a kidong ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin, “A Pasian uh Topa’ thuciamna taisan uh a, pasian dang peuh bia-in a na a sepsak man uh ahi hi,” ci-in a kidawng kik ding uh hi,’ va ci in,” hong ci hi.
Judah mite aw, misipa Josiah kah kei un la, khasiat kei un. A kipai khiatpih Shallum adingin nakpi takin kap zaw un, bang hang hiam cih leh a pian’na gam mu dingin amah hong kilehkik nawn lo ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah kumpipa Josiah’ za luah a tapa, hih mun pan-a paikhiapa Shallum’ thu tawh kisai-in Topa in, “Amah hong kilehkik nawn kei ding a,
