sal-a a kikaihna munah a si ding hi. Hih gam a mukik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Thumanlo pi-a inn lam a, zuauthu tawh in dei tungnung a lam mi, a mawkna-a ama’ na a innvengte a semsak mi, a thaman a pia lo mi in gimna thuak ta hen.
“Inn dei tungnung zapi a awng inn gol khat ka lam ding hi,” ci-a tawlet vangte bawl a, Taamtaak singpek tawh thuap sawm a, zasan a zut mi in gimna thuak ta hen.
Taamtaak sing tawh inn na lam manin kumpi kisa na hi hiam? Na pa in an ne tui dawn a, thumanna leh diktatna tawh na a sep manin a maa pai hilo ahi hiam?
Amah in mizawngte leh mi cimawhte thuman tawh thukhen a, na khempeuh hoih pah hi. Tu-a banga hihna in kei nong theihna-uh hilo ahi hiam? Topa in kong ci hi.
Ahih hangin note in thu manlo tawh ngah nading ahi zongin, mimawh lote’ sisan luan’ nading ahi zongin, mi nuaisiahna leh ngongtat nading ahi zongin, na mitte uh leh na lungsim uh na zang uh hi.

Tua ahih manin Judah kumpipa Josiah’ tapa Jehoiakim’ thu tawh kisai-in Topa in hih bangin kong ci hi: “Amaute in, ‘Sanggampa aw,’ ‘Sanggamnu aw,’ ci-a a sih ciang uh a, a kikah bangun amah a sih ciangin a kah kei ding uh a, ‘Topa aw,’ ‘Kumpipa aw,’ ci-in a kah kei ding uh hi.
La si kivui bang lelin amah a kivui ding a, Jerusalem kongpi pua lamah kikai tal-in kipaai ding hi.
Jerusalem khua mite aw, Lebanon Mual tungah kahto un la, awng un; Bashan gamah va kiko un. Abarim mual tungah va kiko un, bang hang hiam cih leh na pawlte un gal a lel khin uh hi.
Na daupai laitak-un kong hopih hangin na hong ngai nuam kei uh hi. Na neu tung-ua kipan nong tua cih ngitnget uh a, ka thu nong mang ngei kei uh hi.
Na makaite uh huih in hong mut mangsak ding a, na pawlte uh sal-in kiman ding uh hi; tua ciangin na gitlohna uh hangin maizum-in na lunggam ding uh hi.
Lebanon gam pan-a kila taamtaak inn sungah nuam takin na teeng uh hi. Ahih hangin gimna hong tun’ ciangin bang zah takin na tau ding uh hiam? Numei nausuak dingte na bang ding uh hi.
Topa in Jehoiakim’ tapa Judah kumpipa Jekoniah’ tungah, “Kei a nungta Pasian ka hih mah bangin, nangmah in ka taklam khut-a khut zungbuh na hih hangin nang kong lakhia ding a,
na kihtak, nang hong that nuamte’ khut sungah kong pia ding hi. Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar leh Khaldea mite’ khut sungah nang kong pia ding hi.
Nangmah leh nang hong paai na nu, na suahna mun a hi lo gam dangah kong lawnkhia ding a, tua lai takah na si ding uh hi.
Na ciahkik nopna gam uhah na ciahkik thei nawn kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jekoniah in kuama’ deih loh a kipaimang beel kitam tawh kibang ahi hiam? Bang hangin amah leh a tate kilawnkhia a, a theih loh gamah kipaai mang ahi hiam?
Aw, ka gam, ka gam, ka gam aw, Topa! Kammal ngai dih ven!
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Hih pa, taselpa, a khan’ tawntung a gualzo ngeilo pa hi, ci-in ciamteh un. Ama’ suan leh khakte khat beek in David’ tokhom luahin, Judah gam a uk kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in a gen-inah: “Ka mite sisak a, a kikhenthang sak gam ukte in gimna ngah ta hen!” a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin ka mipihte a kem gam ukte tawh kisai-in Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong gen-inah, “Note in ka mite kikhenthang sakin na hawlkhia mang uh a, amaute na don kei uh hi. En un, Topa in kong cih-inah, na gamtat siate uh hangin daan kong pia ding hi.
Ka mite a om lai sun teng, ka hawl khiatna gamte panin ka kaikhawm kik ding a, a gam uhah ka ciahkik sak ding hi. Amaute pung-in a khang ding uh hi.
Amaute don ding makaite ka koih ding a, lau nawn lo, lungkham nawn loin khat beek a mangthang nawn kei ding uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi.

“En un, Topa in kong cih-inah, keimah in David’ suan lak panin kumpi dingin a diktat Hiang khat ka khan’ khiatsak ni hong tung ding hi. Amah gam uk siam ding a, gam sungah thuman thutang tawh thu hong khen ding hi.
Ama’ hun hong tun ciangin Judah mite a kihonkhia ding a, Israel mite lungmuang takin a teeng ding uh hi. Amah a kilawh nadingin a min, Topa IN EITE’ DIKTATNA AHI HI, ci-in a kiphuak ding hi.
“Tua ahih manin, en un, Topa in kong cih-inah, mite in, ‘Izipt gam panin Israel mite a hong paikhiatpih Topa a nuntak bangin,’ ci-in a kiciam nawn kei ding uh a,

‘a hawlkhiatna leilu lam gam leh gam dangte khempeuh panin Israel mite’ suan leh khakte pai khiatpih a, a makaih Topa a nuntak bangin,’ ci-in a kiciam zaw ding uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute, amau’ gamsung mah ah a teeng ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Kamsangte tawh kisai-in: Topa’ hang leh ama’ thu gen kammal siangthote’ hangin ka sungah ka lungsim kitam kham a, ka guh ka tang a liing hi. Zu tam ne lua-a a kham mipa tawh ka kibang hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh mun khempeuh ah angkawmte dim hi. Topa’ haamsiatna hangin gamsung tengah kahna dim a, gamlak lonona munte a keumang hi. Amaute gitlohna lamah pai uh a, a thuneih theihnate uh a man lopi-in a zang uh hi.
Topa in a cih-inah: “Kamsangte leh siampite in Pasian a zahtak kei uh hi. Ka biakinn sung nangawn ah amau’ gitlohna ka mu hi.

Tua ahih manin amaute’ lampi in, khuamial lak lam nal-a pai tawh a kibang ding a, amaute kinawhkhia gawpin a tuk ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ thuakna hun hong tun’ ciangin amaute’ tungah gimna ka tung sak ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Samaria kamsangte’ sungah, a muhthadah huai khat ka mu hi; Baal min suangin thu a hilh uh a, Israel ka mite lam a pialpih uh hi.

Ahih hangin Jerusalem khua-a kamsangte sungah a mulkimhuai zaw na khat ka mu hi. Angkawmin zuauthu a gen uh a, mite a gitlohna uh pan a kikhel loh nadingin mi hoihlote a hanthawn zawlai uh hi. A vekpiun kei’ muhna-ah Sodom khua mite tawh kibang khin ka sa a, Gomorrah khua mite tawh zong kilamdang lo uh hi.

Tua ahih manin tua kamsangte tawh kisai-in a vanglian Topa in kong gen-inah:“En un, keimah in amaute gamsai tawh ka vak ding a, gu kisawh tui ka dawnsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Jerusalem khua kamsangte’ kiang panin gamsung mun khempeuh ah Pasian zahtak lohna hong kizel hi,” a ci hi.

A vanglian Topa in, “Note kiangah thu hong hilh a, a hong lamen khialsak kamsangte’ thu gennate ngai kei un. Amaute in a lungsim sung uh-a a geltawm uh hong gen uh ahi a, keima kiang pana hong pai thu ahi kei hi.

Keimah Topa’ thu genna a hong ngai lo mite kiangah, hong hoih na ve, ci-in a gen tawntung uh hi. Amau’ lungsim’ deihna bang ciat bek a zui tentan mi khempeuhte kiangah zong, gimna hong tung zenzen lo ding hi, ci-in a gen uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute’ lakah kua in Topa tawh thu kikum khawm ngei-a, a thu gennate va thei ngei, va za ngei ahi hiam? Kua in ama’ kammal va ngai ngei a, va thupi ngaihsut ngei ahi hiam?
En un, Topa’ huihpi nung! A hehna hong kinuai nainai-in hong paikhia ta a, mi gilo pa’ lutang hong kiden’na ding hi.
A lungsim sunga a tupna teng a tangtun’ sak matengin, Topa’ hehna kilehkik lo ding hi. Hong pai lai ding hunte ah note in siang takin na telzaw semsem ding uh hi.
Topa in, “Keimah in ka sawlkhiat hi lo napi-in tua kamsangte a kuankhia teitei uh hi. Thu bangmah ka gen lohpi, kei’ min-in thu a gen mawkmawk uh hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in ka lungsim tawng dong thei uh hi leh ka thu gente ka mite tungah a tangko ding uh a, a nuntakna hoihlote panin kikhel sakin, a gamtat hoih lote panin zong a kikhelsak khin zo ding uh hi.
“Keimah in mun khat bek-a om Pasian ka hi hiam? Mun khempeuh-a om Pasian hilo ka hi hiam? Topa in kong ci hi.
Mi khat peuhpeuh kei’ muh loh dingin busim thei ding ahi hiam? Topa in kong ci hi. Leitung, vantung mun khempeuh ah ka om lamtak thei lo na hi uh hiam? Topa in kong ci hi.
Ka min tawh zuau phuak-in, ‘Mang man zo ing, mang man zo ing,’ ci-a a gen kamsang zuau theite’ thuhilhnate zong ka za khin zo hi.
Zuauthu tawh thu hilh a, a phuahtawm uh thu a hilh kamsangte’ lungsim sungah zuauthu bang tanvei teeng lai ding ahi hiam?
A pute a pate in kei’ min hong mangngilh in Baal a biak uh bangin a mangmat uh a gen kawikawina uh tawh ka mite in ka min hong mangngilh ding uh hi, ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi.

Kamsangpa in mang a mat leh a mang bek mah gen hen la, ahih hangin ka thu genna a za mipa in ka thu genna mah man takin gen ta hen. Buhtu leh buhtang bangci kibat theih ding ahi hiam? Topa in kong ci hi.
Ka kammal in mei tawh ahi zongin, suangtum a sat nen zo sek tawh ahi zongin kibang hilo ahi hiam? Topa in kong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, en un, Topa in kong gen-inah, ka thu gente khat leh khat tung pana a gusim kamsangte’ langkhat-ah kei ka pang hi.
En un, Topa in kong gen-inah, amau’ ngaihsut tawm thu gen napi a, ‘Topa in ci hi,’ a ci khem kamsangte’ lang khatah kei ka pang hi.

En un, Topa in kong gen-inah, ka sawl lohpi zuau mang manin tua thu hilh a, a zuauthu uh leh a kiphatsakna uh tawh ka mite a makaih khialhpih mite’ lang khatah kei ka pang hi. Ka mite adingin, amaute a kiman’na uh themkha beek om lo hi, Topa in kong ci hi.

Jeremiah aw, ka mite khat peuhpeuh in ahi zongin, kamsang khat ahi kei leh siampi khat peuhpeuh in ahi zongin, ‘Topa’ thugen in bang ahi hiam?’ ci-a hong dot leh nangmah in, ‘Topa’ thugen in nangmah na hi a, nang in vangik khat na hi hi. Topa in nang, kong paaikhia ding hi, hong ci hi,’ ci in la, gen in.
Kamsang khat, ahih kei leh siampi khat, ahih kei leh ka mite khat peuhpeuh in, ‘Topa’ thugen in vangik khat ahi hi,’ a cih leh tua pa leh a innkuanpihte khempeuh daan ka tat ding hi.
Mi khempeuh in a lawmte’ kiangah ahi zongin, ‘Topa in bangin hong dawng hiam? Topa in bangin hong gen hiam?’ ci-in na kidong zaw ding uh hi.

‘Topa’ thugen in vangik khat ahi hi,’ ci-in a gen nawn kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh note’ thu genna note’ vangik ding ahi zaw hi. Note in eite’ Pasian ahi a nungta Pasian, a vanglian Topa’ thu gennate na lumlet gawp uh hi.
Kamsangpa kiangah, ‘Topa in bangin hong dawng hiam! Topa in bang hong gen hiam?’ ci-in dong zaw un.
Ahih hangin note in, ‘Topa’ thu gen in vangik ahi hi,’ na cih peuhmah uh leh Topa in kong cih-inah, note in na cih loh ding-ua kong hilh pen ci teitei na hih manun
en un, keimah in note leh na pu na pate ka piaksa khuapi ka domto ding a, ka omna panin ka lawnkhia taktak ding hi.
A tawntungin simmawhna leh maizumna kong thuaksak ding a, cik mah hunin na mangngilh ngei nawn kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem khua panin Jehoiakim’ tapa Judah kumpipa Jekoniah leh Judah kumpi uliante, khutsiamte leh siksek siamte, Babilon khua-ah sal dingin a pai khiatpih khit ciangin Topa in hih mang hong musak hi. Topa’ biakinnpi mai-ah theigah bawm nih dim ka mu hi.
Bawm khat sunga theigahte, a min masate tawh kibangin limci mahmah hi. Ahih hangin a bawm khat pen sunga theigahte limci het loin nek theih ding bang hi dek lo hi.

Topa in hong hopih a, “Jeremiah aw, bang na mu hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Kei zong, “Theigah ka mu hi. A limcite limci mahmah a, a limci lote limci lo lua ahih manin nek theih ding bang hi lo hi,” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Topa, Israel mite Pasian in kong cih-inah:
Hih mun panin Khaldea mite’ gam a, ka puakkhiat Judah mi sal tangte hih theigah hoihte bangin a hoih-in ka ngaihsun ding hi.
Amaute lim takin ka kem ding a, hih gamah ka lakik ding hi. Amaute ka khangto sak ding a, ka susia kei ding hi; ka suan ding a, ka botkhia kei ding hi.

Keimah Topa ka hih lam theihtheihna lungsim ka pia ding hi. Amaute in a lungsim khempeuh uh tawh kei kiangah hong kileh ding uh ahih manin amaute ka mi ahi ding uh a, keimah in amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding hi.

“Ahih hangin Topa in kong cih-inah: Judah kumpipa Zedekiah leh ama’ gam uk uliante-a kipan hih gama a om suak Jerusalem khua sunga a om lai sun teng leh Izipt gama teengte limci lo lua-a kine thei lo theigahte bangin ka bawl ding hi.
Amaute ka hawlkhiat nading mun khempeuh mite in kihaamsiatna a, a zat dingun simmawhna leh zahkonate ka thuaksak ding a, amaute’ thuakna hangin leitung gam khempeuh ka lausak ding hi.
Namsau tawh kithahna, kialpi leh pulnatnate ka tungsak ding a, amaute leh a pu a pate’ kianga ka piaksa gam sungah khat beek ka nungta sak nawn kei ding hi.
Josiah’ tapa Jehoiakim, Judah gamah kumpi a suah zawh kumli a cin’ kumin Judah mite tawh kisai-in Topa in Jeremiah a hopih hi. (Hih hun in Babilon ah Nebukhadnezzar kumpi a suah kum ahi hi.)
Kamsangpa Jeremiah in zong Judah gam mi khempeuh leh Jerusalem khuami khempeuhte’ tungah hih bangin a gen sawn hi:

“Amon’ tapa Josiah, Judah gamah kumpi a suah zawh a kum sawm leh thum kum pan tu ciang dong kum sawmnih leh kumthum sung Topa in kei hong hopih a, ke’n zong note kiangah kong gen sawn tawntung hangin note in na ngai kei uh hi.
Topa in ama’ nasem ahi kamsangte khempeuh hong sawl tawntung hi napi-in note in ngai loin na bil uh na dawh kei uh hi.

Amaute in, ‘Tu-in na vekpi-un na giltohna uh leh na gamtat khialhnate uh panin na kihei uh leh Topa in note leh tanglai-a na pute na pate uh tungah na neih tawntung ding uh a, a hong piak gam sungah na teeng thei ding uh hi.
pasian dangte’ nung delh loin, a na sem loin na biak kei uh a, na khut uh tawh na bawl uh milimte peuh bia-in nong hehsak kei uh leh, note bangmah kong cih kei ding hi,’ ci-in hong gen uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in kong cih-inah, note in ka thu nong ngai kei uh a, note’ daan thuak nading mahin na khut uh tawh milim bawlin nong hehsak uh hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin a vanglian Topa in kong cih-inah, ka thu note in hong mang lo na hih uh ciangin,

en un, leilu lam-a om minam khempeuhte leh ka nasempa ahi Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadzezzar ka vaikhak ding a, hih gam leh a sunga teeng mi khempeuh leh hih kim-a om gam khempeuh a sim dingin ka va la ding hi. Keimah in amaute ka susia khin mang ding a, amaute a tawntungin siacip-in simmawhna ka thuaksak ding hi, ci-in Topa in kong gen hi.
Tua tham loin lungdamna leh kipahna awte, zi nei thak pa leh mothaknu’ awte, angawina suang gingte ka gingsak nawn kei ding a, meivak taangte ka sumit ding hi.
Gamsung khempeuh kisia-in gam simtham suak ding a, hih mite khempeuh kum sawmsagih sung Babilon kumpipa’ sal-in a om ding uh hi.
Kum sawmsagih a cin’ khit ciangin Topa in kong cih-inah, Babilon kumpipa leh a gam amau’ mawhna hangin daan ka tat ding a, tua gam a tawntungin gam simtham ka suaksak ding hi.
Tua gam kisiat na’ng a, ka gensa thute khempeuh hih laibu sungah kigelh a, Jeremiah in gam khempeuhte kiangah a gen hi. Tuate khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh gam tampi leh kumpi liante in amaute salin a man ding uh a, amau’ gamtatna amau tungah ka thukkik ding hi.”
Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin kei hong hopih a, “Ka khut tung panin hehna tawh a kidim hih leenggah tui hai la in la, kong sawlna gamte khempeuh dawn sak in.
Amaute in a dawn ding uh a, amaute kiang-a ka sawl namsau hangin hoi dangdangin a hailawh ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ahih manin kei zong Topa’ khut tung panin tua hai ka la a, Topa’ hong sawlna gamte khempeuh ka dawn sak hi.
Jerusalem leh Judah gama khuapite, a kumpite uh leh a gam uh uliante ka dawn sak a, tuni dongin gam simtham suakin, mite’ simmawhna thuakin, a min uh haamsiat nadingin a kizang hi.
Izipt kumpipa Faro leh a nasemte, a kumpi uliante, a mite khempeuh leh
amau’ lak-a teeng gamdang mite khempeuh; Uz gam sunga kumpite khempeuh leh Filistia gam sunga Ashkelon, Gaza, Ekron khuapite leh Ashdod khuapi-a om lai sunte’ kumpite khempeuh;
Edom, Moab leh Ammon mite;
Tai-ar kumpite khempeuh, Sidon kumpite khempeuh leh tuipi gei-a kumpite khempeuh;
Dedan, Tema, Buz leh a sam uh a tom met khempeuhte;
Arabia kumpi khempeuh leh sehnel gam sunga teeng minam kigawm khawmte’ kumpite khempeuh;
Zimri kumpite khempeuh, Elam kumpite khempeuh, leh Media kumpite khempeuh;

a gamla hi taleh a nai hi taleh leilu lama a om kumpite khempeuh khat khit ciangin khat ka dawn sak a, tua khit ciangin leitunga om gam khempeuh ka dawn sak hi. A tawpna ah Babilon kumpipa in a dawn ding hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in hong hopih a, “Amaute kiangah, ‘A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Dawn un. Kham un la, lua un. Note’ kiangah namsau hong pai sak ding ka hih manin tuk un la, tho zo nawn kei un,’ va ci in.
“Amaute in na khut tung panin hai la-a dawn ding a, hong nial uh leh, amaute kiangah, ‘A vanglian Topa in hong gen-inah: Na dawn uh kul ding hi!

Bang hang hiam cih leh, en un, ka min tawh a kilo khuapi sungah suksiatna ka pan ding hi. Note in bangmah a thuak lo ding kisa na hi uh hiam? Daan thuak loin na om kei ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh a vanglian Topa in kong cih-inah, leitung-a teeng mi khempeuh that dingin namsau khat ka sawl hi,’ ci in.

“Tua ahih manin nangmah in amaute thu na va hilh ding a, hih bangin na va gen ding hi: ‘Topa a sang vantung pan hong hawk ding a, a teen’na siangtho panin hong paukhia ding hi. Ama’ mite’ lang khatah nasia takin hong hawkgawp ding a, leenggah cil mite bangin, leitung mi khempeuhte’ lang khatah hong kiko ding hi.
A awging in leitung mong dongah kithawn ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh gamte’ lang khatah Topa pang hi. Amah in mi khempeuh thu sit ding a, mi gilote namsau tawh a thatlum ding hi, Topa in ci hi.
“A vanglian Topa in a cih-inah: En un, gam khat panin gam khatah siatna a paipai hi. Leitung a gamlapen mun panin huihpi hong nung hi!

“Tua ni-a Topa’ thahlup mite leitung mong khat panin mong khat dongah a kithehthang ding uh hi. Amaute kuamah in a kah kei ding a, kikaikhawm loin kiphum lo ding uh ahih manin lei lakah ek nusiat bangin a kinusia ding uh hi.

“No makaite aw, tau un la, kap un, no uliante aw, vut lakah kikhuk un. Bang hang hiam cih leh hong kithahlup ni ding leh na kikhenthang ni ding uh hong tung zo hi; tuutal teelte bangin hong kithatlum ding hi.
Makaite adingin buk nading om lo ding a, uliante adingin suahtak theih nading om lo hi.
Ngai dih un, makaite’ kahna aw leh uliante’ tauna aw kiza hi! Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a gam uh suksiat sak hi.
A lauhuai mahmah Topa’ hehna hangin a nop mahmah a gam uh kisiagawp hi.
Topa’ namsau hangin ahi zongin a lauhuai ama’ hehna hangin ahi zongin, amau’ gam in gam simtham suak khin ahih manin humpi in a kua a nusiat bangin Topa in a mite a nusia zo hi.
Josiah’ tapa Jehoiakim, Judah gamah kumpi a suah tungin, Topa in hih bangin Jeremiah hopih a,

“Topa in kong cih-inah, Topa’ biakinnpi huang sungah va ding in la, Topa’ biakinnpi sunga bia dinga hong pai Judah gam khuapite khempeuh kiangah gen ding a, kong sawl khempeuh va gen in. Kam khat beek im kei in.
Amaute in na thu gen hong ngai-in, a gitlohna uh pan a kihei kha thei ding uh hi. Tua hi leh amau’ gitlohna hanga amau suksiat ding a, ka ngaihsut sa ka khelkik ding hi.
Nangmah in amaute’ kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Note in ka thu hong ngai loin, note’ mai-a kong lah sa ka thukham bangin na gamtat kei uh a,
note in a thu na man’ ngei loh uh ahi, kong sawl zelzel ka nasem kamsangte’ thu na thupisim kei uh leh
hih biakinnpi Shiloh khua ka bawl bangin ka bawl ding a, hih khuapi leitung gam khempeuhte’ kihaamsiatna-in ka zangsak ding hi,’ na ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Siampite, kamsangte leh mi khempeuh in Topa’ biakinnpi sunga Jeremiah in hih thu a gen teng a za uh hi.
Mi khempeuh’ tunga Topa in gen dinga a sawl teng Jeremiah in a gen khit ciangin, siampite, kamsangte leh mi khempeuhte in a man uh a, “Nang na si ding hi.

Bang hangin, ‘Hih biakinnpi in Shiloh tawh kibang ding a, hih khuapi-ah a teeng om loin gam simtham a suak ding hi,’ ci-in Topa’ minin thu hilh na hi hiam?” ci-in a gen uh hi. Topa’ biakinnpi sungah mi khempeuh in Jeremiah a umcih uh hi.
Judah gam uk uliante in hih thu a zak uh ciangin kumpipa’ inn sung pan Topa’ biakinnpi ah hong paito uh a, Topa’ biakinnpi lutna Kongpi Thakah a tu uh hi.

Tua ciangin siampite leh kamsangte in kumpi uliante leh mi khempeuhte’ kiangah, “Note in na bil uh tawh na zak ciat uh mah bangin hihpa in hih khuapi langpan’in thu hilh ahih manin sihdaan piak tuak hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jeremiah in kumpi ulian khempeuhte leh mi khempeuhte’ kiangah, “Topa in na zaksak uh ahi hih biakinnpi leh hih khuapi lang khatah ka gen thu khempeuh a gen dingin kei hong sawl hi.
Tua ahih manin tu-in na nuntakdante uh leh na gamtatziate uh khel un la, Topa na Pasian uh’ thu ngai un. Tua hi leh Topa in note’ kisiat nading a gensa pen a khelkik ding hi.
Ahih hangin kei ka hih leh, en un, note’ khut sungah ka om hi. Note in hoih na sak uh leh man na sak uh bangin kei tungah hong bawl un.

Kei nong thah uh leh bel, mawhnei lo mi khat na thah manun note mahmah-a kipan hih khuapi leh a sunga teengte in na thuak ding uh hi, cih thei ta un. Bang hang hiam cih leh na bil mahmah a, na zak dingun hih thute a gen dingin Topa’ hong sawl taktak ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi uliante leh mi khempeuhte in siampite leh kamsangte tungah, “Hih pa in Topa in Pasian’ min tawh thu hong gen ahih manin sihdaan piak tuak lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Gamsung upa pawlkhat in zong, ding-in tua a kikhawm mi khempeuhte kiangah,

“Judah kumpipa Hezekiah a maan’ laitakin Moresheth khuami Mikah in Judah mi khempeuhte’ kiangah: ‘Lo dingin Zion mual a kikho ding hi; Jerusalem khua a kisiazan ding a, biakinn mual in gamlak a suak ding hi, ci-in a vanglian Topa in a gen hi,’ a ci hi.

Judah kumpipa Hezekiah leh Judah mi khempeuhte in amah that zenzen uh ahi hiam? Kumpipa in Topa zahtakin Topa’ pahtak ding a nget ciangin Topa in zong amau’ tunga siatna tun’sak dinga a gensa khelkik zaw hilo ahi hiam? Ahih hangin eite in eite’ tungah siatna lianpi khat i tungsak dekdek hi,” a ci uh hi.
Kiriath-Jearim khua panin zong Topa’ min tawh thu a hilh Shemaiah’ tapa Uriah a kici midang khat a om lai hi. Jeremiah’ gen mah bangin amah in zong hih khuapi leh hih gam lang khatah thu a gen hi.

Jehoiakim kumpipa leh a galkapmang khempeuh leh kumpi ulian khempeuhte in ama’ thugente a zak uh ciangin kumpipa in thah dingin a zong hi. Ahih hangin Uriah in tua thu a zak ciangin lau-in Izipt gamah a taisim hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoiakim kumpipa in Akbor’ tapa Elnathan leh midang pawlkhat Izipt gamah sawl a,
amau in zong Izipt gam panin Uriah manin Jehoiakim kumpipa’ kiangah a puak uh hi. Amah in tua pa namsau tawh that-in a luanghawm mi mawkmawkte’ kivuina munah a paai hi.
Ahih hangin Shafan’ tapa Ahikam in Jeremiah hu ahih manin mite’ khut sungah kipia loin thahna a thuak kei hi.
Josiah’ tapa Zedekiah, Judah gamah kumpi a suah tungin Topa in Jeremiah hong hopih hi.
Topa in kei’ tungah, “Savun khau tawh a kithuah hakkol bawl in la, na ngawngah thuah in.

Edom kumpipa tung, Moab kumpipa tung, Ammon mite’ kumpipa tung, Tai-ar kumpipa tung leh Sidon kumpipa tungah Judah kumpipa Zedekiah tawh kimu ding a, Jerusalem khua-a hong pai a kumpi taangmite-uh tung tawnin thu zasak in.
Amaute in a kumpite uh tungah, a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen uh hen.
‘Keimah in a lian mahmah ka vangliatna tawh ka khut zan-in, leitung leh leitung-a om mite leh ganhingte ka bawl a, piaktuak ka sakte’ tungah ka pia hi.
Tu-in hih gamte, ka nasempa ahi Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ khut sungah ka pia khin zo hi. Gamsate nangawn ama’ nasem dingin ka pia lai hi.
Ama’ gam kisiat hun a tun’ mateng gam khempeuh in amah-a kipan a tapa leh a tupa’ na a sepsak ding uh hi. Tua khit ciangin gam tampi leh kumpi liante in amah salin a leh neih kik ding uh hi.

“‘Ahih hangin gam khat peuhpeuh ahih kei leh kumpi khat peuhpeuh in Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ na sem loin, Babilon kumpipa’ hakkol a ngawngah a puak kei leh, amah ka ukcip sak mateng tua gam, namsau tawh, kialpi tawh, pulnatna tawh ka daantat ding hi,’ Topa in kong ci hi.

Tua ahih manin Babilon kumpipa’ na sem kei un, ci-a note’ kianga a hong gen na kamsangte uh, na aisan theite uh, na mang man’ theite uh, na khutlamen theite uh leh na mangsan theite uh’ thu gennate um kei un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ kianga hong gen uh thu in zuauthu hi a, tua hangin na gam uh panin gamla pi-ah note hong kipai khiatpih ding hi. Keimah in note kong hawlkhia ding a, note na si ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Babilon kumpipa’ hakkol pua a, ama’ na a sem gam pen, lo kho-a a teen’ theih nadingin ama’ sung mahah ka omsak ding hi, ci-in Topa in hong gen hi,’ ci-in gen uh hen,” hong ci hi.
Judah kumpipa Zedekiah’ kiangah zong tua mah bangin ka gen-a, “Na nuntak theih nadingin Babilon kumpipa’ hakkol pua in. Amah leh a mite’ na va sem in.
Bang hangin nang leh na mite, namsau tawh, kialpi tawh, pulnatna tawh si ding na hi uh hiam? Babilon kumpipa’ na a sem lo gam khat peuhpeuh tua ci sih ding hi, ci-in Topa in a gen hi.
Babilon kumpipa’ na sem kei un, ci-a note’ kiang-a hong gen kamsangte’ thu gennate um kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note kiang-a hong gen uh thu in zuauthu ahi hi.

Topa in kong cih-inah, keimah in amaute ka sawl kei hi. Ahih hangin amaute in kei’ min tawh a man lopi-in thu hilh uh a, tua hangin note leh note’ kianga thu hong hilh kamsangte kong hawlkhia khawm ding a, na si ding uh hi,” ci-in ka gen hi.

Tua ciangin siampite leh hih mi khempeuhte kiangah, “Topa in kong gen-inah, ‘En un, Topa’ biakin beelte, Babilon khua panin kila kik baih ta ding hi,’ ci-a note kianga na kamsangte-uh’ hong thu gente um kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note kianga hong gen uh thu in zuauthu ahi hi.
Amau’ thu na mang kei un. Na nuntak theih nadingun Babilon kumpipa’ na na sem zaw un. Bang hangin hih khuapi gam simtham suak laizang ding ahi hiam?

Amaute kamsang taktak ahih uh a, Topa in ka hopih taktak ahih uh leh, Topa’ biakinnpi sung, Judah kumpipa’ inn sung leh Jerusalem khua sunga a kinusia lai beelte Babilon khua-ah a kipuak khiat nawn loh nadingin a vanglian Topa kiangah hong thuum uh hen.

19-20 Bang hang hiam cih leh, Jehoiakim’ tapa Judah kumpipa Jekoniah leh, Judah gam leh Jerusalem khua pan Babilon khua-ah Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in sal dingin a pai khiatpih laitakin, a nusiat lai khuampite, tuikuangpite, a kingaknate leh hih khuapi sunga kinusia lai beelte tawh kisai-in ahi zongin
Topa’ biakinnpi sung, Judah kumpipa’ inn sung leh Jerusalem khua sunga a kinusia lai beelte tawh kisai-in ahi zongin a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah:
Tuate Babilon khua-ah kipuakhia ding a, ka kan mateng tua lai-ah a om suak ding hi. Tua khit ciangin tute ka la kik ding a, hih munah ka koih kik ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi,” ci-in ka gen hi.

Tua kum mahin (Judah gamah Zedekiah kumpi suah zawh kum li leh kha nga a phak kum) Gibeon khua pana hong pai Azzur’ tapa kamsang Hananiah in Topa’ biakinnpi sungah siampite leh mi khempeuh’ om kim laitakin hong hopih a,
“A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong gen-inah: Babilon kumpipa’ hakkol ka kuaitan zo hi.
Kum nih sungin Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in hih mun pan lakhia-in Babilon khua-a a puak, Topa’ biakinnpi sunga beelte hih munah ka la kik ding hi.

Jehoiakim’ tapa Judah kimpipa Jekoniah leh Judah gam pana Babilon-a sal a, a paite khempeuh zong hih munah ka la kik ding hi, Topa in hong ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Babilon kumpipa’ hakkol ka kuaitan ding hi, a ci hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah in Topa’ biakinn pi sungah ding-a a om siampite leh mi khempeuhte’ om kim laitakin kamsangpa Hananiah hopih a,

“Amen! Topa in tua bangin sem ta hen. Topa in na thu bangin sem ta hen. Topa in na thu genkholhna bangin hong tangtung sak hen la, Babilon khua panin Topa’ biakinnpi sunga beelte leh sal-a kimante khempeuh hih munah hong la kik tapeuh hen.
Ahi zongin tu-in nang leh mi khempeuhte’ zak a, kong gen ding hih thu na ngai ta un.
Nang leh kei’ ma-a a om, tang lai-a kamsangte in gam tampi leh gam liante tungah gal ahi zongin, kial ahi zongin, pulnatna ahi zongin hong tung ding hi, ci-in a gen khol zo uh hi.
Ahi zongin, nopna hong tung ding hi, ci-a a gen kamsangpa pen Topa’ hong sawl kamsangpa hi taktak hiam, cih kamsangpa’ gen bang hong tun’ ciangin a kithei pan ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa Hananiah in kamsangpa Jeremiah’ ngawng panin a hakkol lakkhiat sak a, a kuaihtan sak hi.

Hananiah in zong mi khempeuhte’ om lai takin thu gen a, “Topa in, tu-a bangin Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ hakkol, kum nih sungin gam khempeuhte’ ngawng panin ka kuaihtan sak ding hi, a ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi. Tua ciangin Jeremiah a paikhia hi.
Kamsangpa Hananiah in Jeremiah kamsangpa’ ngawng panin a hakkol lakhia a, a kuaihtan sak zawh tawlkhat khit ciangin Topa in Jeremiah hopih a,
“Pai in la, Hananiah kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin hong ci hi: Nangmah in sing tawh kibawl hakkol na kuaitan zo hi. Ahih hangin keimah in sik tawh kibawl hakkol khat tawh ka laih ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a vanglian Topa Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah: Hih gam khempeuhte’ ngawngah sik hakkol ka thuah khin zo a, amaute in Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ na a sem ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh gamsate nangawn ama’ tungah ka pia khin zo hi,’ va ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah in zong Hananiah kamsangpa kiangah, “Na ngai in, Hananiah aw! Topa in nang hong sawl lohpi, hih mite zuauthu na umsak hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa in a hong gen-inah: ‘En in, hih leitung panin nangmah kong lakhia ding hi. Topa langpan’na thu gen na hih manin tu kum sung mahin na si ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua kum mah a kha sagih kha-in kamsangpa Hananiah a si ta hi.

Jerusalem khua panin Nebukhadnezzar in Babilon khua-ah sal-a a paikhiat pih ulian om laite, siampite, kamsangte leh mi khempeuhte’ tungah kamsangpa Jeremiah in Jerusalem khua panin lai khat a khak hi.
Tua hunin Jekoniah kumpipa leh a nu, a kumpi inn mangte, Judah gam leh Jerusalem khua-a makai upate, khutsiamte leh sik sekte, Jerusalem khua panin kipaikhiatpih khin zo hi.
Tua laitak pen Shafan’ tapa Elasah leh Judah kumpipa Zedekiah in Babilon khua Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa’ kiang-a kumpi taangmi dinga a puak Hilkiah’ tapa Gemariah-te a puasak hi. Tua sungah:
“Jerusalem pana Babilon-a hong kipuakkhia sal tang mi khempeuhte’ tungah a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hih bangin hong ci hi:
Inn lam un la, a sungah teeng un. Huan bawl un la, a sunga na ciin’te uh ne un.
Zi pi un la, tanu tapa nei un. Na tapate uh ading mo la un la, na tanute uh mo khak un; tua hi leh amau in zong tanu tapa hong nei ding uh hi. Kiam kei un la, pung zaw un.

Note sal-a kong koihna khuapi’ phattuam nading bawl un la, tua khuapi adingin Topa tungah thu ngetsak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua khuapi in phattuamna a ngah leh no zong phattuamna a ngah mah na hi uh hi.
A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah: note lak-a om na kamsangte uh leh na aisan theite uh’ khem sa-in ta kei un la, a mang mat hong gente uh na ngai kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka min tawh no’ tunga hong gen uh thute zuauthu hi a, ka sawl lohpi ahi uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
“Topa in kong cih-inah: Babilon khua-ah kum sawmsagih na om khit uh ciangin, note kong kan kik ding a, kong kamciamna sa hong tangtung sakin, hih munah kong la kik ding hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh Topa in kong cih-inah, note’ mai lamah lametna kong piak ding, na siat nading uh hi loin na phattuam nading uh geelna ka neihte kei bek in ka thei hi.
Tua hun ciangin note in kei hong samin, hong pai-in thu nong ngen ding uh a, ke’n zong kong dawng ding hi.
Note in kei nong zong ding uh a, na lungsim khempeuh uh tawh nong zon’ uh ciangin nong mu ding uh hi.

Topa in kong cih-inah, note in nong mu ding uh a, na saltan’na uh hong bei sakin, kong hawlkhiatna gam khempeuh leh mun khempeuh panin kong kaikhawm kik ding a, note kong lak khiatna gam mahah kong tun’pih kik ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
“Note in, ‘Eite adingin Topa in Babilon khua-ah kamsang hong koihsak hi,’ ci-in gen na hih manun
David’ tokhom tunga tu kumpipa leh hih khuapi sunga om, note tawh sal tang ding a, a paikhawm lo na innkuan pihte khempeuh uh tawh kisai-in Topa in kong gen-inah:
En un, amaute tungah namsau tawh kithahna, kialpi leh pulnatna ka tungsak ding a, amaute, a kine thei lo theigah muat ka bang sak ding hi.

Amaute namsau, kialpi leh pulnatna tawh ka nung delh ding a, ka hawlkhiat nading mun khempeuh ah mite in kihaamsiatna-a a zat dingun simmawhna leh zahkonate ka thuaksak ding a, amaute’ thuakna hangin leitung gam khempeuh ka lausak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, Topa in kong cih-inah, ka nasem ka kamsangte’ tung tawnin kong puak ngitnget thute amaute in thupisim loin a hong mang kei uh hi.
Jerusalem khua pana Babilon khua-a kong puakkhiat, no sal tangte khempeuh aw, Topa kammal ngai dih un:

A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kei’ min tawh note’ kianga zuauthu a hong hilh Ko-laiah’ tapa Ahab leh Ma-aseiah’ tapa Zedekiah-te tawh kisai-a kong gen-inah: En un, keimah in amaute Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ khut sungah ka pia ding a, amah in no’ muhin amaute a thatlum ding hi.

Amaute’ hangin Judah gam pana Babilon khua-a sal tang mi khempeuh in: “Babilon kumpipa in Zedekiah leh Ahab, a hing tanga mei sunga a em bangin Topa in nang hong hih hen,” ci-in kihaamsiatna-in a zang ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute Israel gamah hai gamtat uh hi: a innvengte’ zite mawhpih uh a, thu ka piak lohpi ka min tawh zuauthu a gen uh hi. Keimah Topa in ka mu a, teci ka hi hi, hong ci hi,” ci-in a gelh hi.

24-25 Nehelam khuami Shemai-ah’ kiangah a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in Jeremiah sawl a, “Nangmah in nangma’ min tawh Jerusalem khua-a om mi khempeuhte’ kiang leh siampi Ma-aseiah’ tapa Zefaniah leh siampi khempeuhte’ kiangah lai na khak a, tua sungah Zefaniah’ kiangah,

‘Topa in siampi Jehoiada taangin nangmah siampi-in hong koih khin zo a, Topa’ biakinnpi sungah a ukpi ding na hi ta hi. Tua ahih manin thu a hilh mawkmawk kamsang bang a, a gamta mihaite thongkia sakin kol na bulh ding hi.
Bang hangin note’ kiang a, thu hong hilh Anathoth khuami Jeremiah taai lo na hi hiam?

Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Babilon khua-ate lai hong khakin, sawt veipi saltang ding na hih manun, inn lamin a sungah teeng un la, huan bawlin a sunga na ciin’te uh ne un, hong ci hi, ci-in na gen hi,’ ci-in Zefaniah kiangah lai na khak hi,” ci-a Shemai-ah kianga gen dingin Pasian in Jeremiah a sawl hi.
Siampipa Zefaniah in hih laikhak kamsangpa Jeremiah’ kiangah a simkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Jeremiah hopih a:
“Sal tang mi khempeuhte kiangah Nehelam khuami Shemai-ah tawh kisai-in Topa in kong cih-inah: Kong sawl lohpi Shemai-ah in note kiangah thu hong gen a, zuauthu hong um sak ahih manin,

Topa in kong cih-inah: En un, keimah in Nehelam khuami Shemai-ah leh a suan a khakte daan ka tat ding hi. Amah in keimah hong langpan nading thu gen ahih manin ka mite ading-a a hoih ka bawl ding nate, amah leh a suan a khakte khat beek in a mu kei ding uh hi,” Topa in kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Jeremiah hopih a,
“Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah: Kong gensa thute khempeuh laibu khat sungah khum in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, Israel leh Judah ka mite, a saltan’na uh kong beisak kik ni a hong tung ding hi. A pute a pate-uh’ tunga ka piaksa gamah ka tun’pih kik ding a, amaute in tua gam a tang kik ding uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Israel leh Judah mite tawh kisai-in Topa in hih bangin a gen hi:
“Topa in kong cih-inah: Launa leh patauhna aw ka za a, lungnopna aw ka za kei hi.
Tu-in ngaihsun dih un. Pasalte nau a suak ngei uh hiam? Tua ahih leh bang hangin pasal khempeuh in numei nausuak dingte bangin, a taai uh hum ahi hiam? Bang hangin a mai uhah si teeng lo ahi hiam?
Nu ei! tua ni lianpi hong tung ding a, nidang tawh teh theih hi lo ding hi! Jakob’ suante’ gimna ngah hun hi ding a, ahih hangin amau a suakta veve ding uh hi.
“A vanglian Topa in kong cih-inah, tua ni ciangin amau’ ngawng panin a hakkolte uh ka kuaihtan sak ding a, a khaute ka sutat ding hi. Amaute in gamdang mite’ sal-in a om nawn kei ding uh hi.
Topa, amau’ Pasian’ na ahi zongin, amaute’ kumpi-a ka koih ding David’ na ahi zongin a sem zaw ding uh hi.

“Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih-inah; Ka nasempa Jakob’ suante aw, lau kei un. Israel mite aw, patau kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh gamlapi gam panin no kong honkhia ding a, na suan na khakte-uh’ saltan’na panin kong honkhia ding hi. Jakob’ suante hong ciahkik ding uh a, nuam takin a teeng kik ding uh hi. Kuamah in amaute a lausak nawn kei ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, a hong honkhia dingin note kong ompih hi. Note kong theh thangna gamte khempeuh ka susia khin ding a, ahih hangin note kong susia kei ding hi. A kilawm zahin kong thuhilh ding a, daantat loin kong mawk nusiat kei ding hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah: Na liamna uh dam thei lo a, na meima uh nasia mahmah hi.
Note a hong don ding kuamah om lo a, na liamma uh ading zatui om loin, note’ dam nading om lo hi.

Na lawm ngaihte un hong mangngilh khin uh a, hong don nawn lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na khialhnate uh lian lua-in, na mawhnate uh nasia lua ahih manin, galte bangin note kong bawl-a, nasia takin daan kong thuaksak hi.
Bang hangin na sa-in kapkap na hi uh hiam? Na natna uh a dam thei ding hi lo hi. Na khialhnate uh lian lua-in, na mawhnate uh nasia lua ahih manin hih bangin note kong thuak sak hi.
Tua ahih manin no hong thatte kithat ding a, na galte khempeuh uh sal-in kiman khin ding hi. No hong buluhte kibuluh ding a, a hong mante, matin om zaw ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, na galte un note paampaih mi pawl, hong ci-in, ‘Kuama’ don loh Zion na hi hi,’ hong cih uh hangin note kong cidamkik sak ding a, na liammate uh ka damsak ding hi.

“Topa in kong cih-inah: En un, keimah in Jakob’ suante’ bukte ka lamkik ding a, a teen’nate uh ka hehpih ding hi. Khuapi zong a omna sa mualtung mah ah ki lamkik ding a, kumpipa’ inn zong a omna sa mah ah omkik ding hi.
Tuate sung panin lungdamna la kisa ding a, gualnopna aw kiza ding hi. Amaute ka pungsak ding a, tawmkha bek a hi kei ding uh hi. Amaute ka kipahtawi sak ding a, ka neusak kei ding hi.
A tate uh nidang bang mahin a omkik ding uh a, a mite uh zong kip takin ka mai-ah ka phut ding a, amau a bawlsiate ka daantat ding hi.

A kumpi ding uh amaute khat mah hi ding a, amaute a uk ding amau’ sung mah pan a piang ding hi. Keimah in amah ka kai ding a, amah kei kiangah hong pai ding hi. Tua hi kei leh, ama’ thu-a kei kiang hong zuan ngam ding kua om ahi hiam? Topa in kong ci hi.
Tua ciangin note in ka mite na hi ding uh a, keimah in note’ Pasian ka hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
En un, Topa’ huihpi nung! A hehna hong kinuai nainai-in hong paikhia ta a, mi gilopa’ lutang hong kiden’na ding hi.
A lungsim sunga a tupna teng a tangtun’sak matengin, Topa’ hehna a lauhuaipi kilehkik lo ding hi. Hong pai lai ding hunte ah note in na telzaw semsem ding uh hi.
“Topa in kong cih-inah, tua hun ciangin keimah in Israel mi khempeuhte’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute in ka mite ahi ding uh hi.”
Topa in hong gen-inah: “Namsau tawh thahna a thuak kha lote in, gamlakah hehpihna a mu ding uh hi. Israel mite in tawldam nading a zon’ laitakun,
gamlapi pek panin Topa ka kilang hi. Keimah in nang tawntung itna tawh kong it a, tua ahih manin nang’ tungah kong thuman tawntung hi.
Aw, nungak siangtho ahi Israel aw, nang kong bawl pha kik ding hi. Na khuangte na man kik ding a, a gual nuamte’ laamna-ah na va kihel ding hi.
Samaria gam mualtung tengah leenggah na suan kik ding a, huan bawlte in suan-in a gah ne-in nuam a sa ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Efraim mualtung panin gal vilte in, ‘Tho un! Zion khua-ah, Topa, i Pasian kiangah va pai ni,’ ci-a hong kiko hun uh hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, “Jakob adingin lungdamna tawh ngaih takin la sa un la, gam khempeuh lak a, gam lianpen adingin awng un. ‘Topa in Israel mi a om laite, ama’ mite hong honkhia khin zo hi,’ ci-in tangko un la, phat un.

En un, keimah in leilu lam gam panin amaute ka la ding a, leitung a gamla pen mun panin ka kaikhawm ding hi. Mittawte leh khelbaite zong hong kihel ding uh a, nupi gaite leh nau suak ding numeite-a kipan mi honpi hih lai munah hong ciahkik ding uh hi.

Amaute kap kawmin hong pai ding uh a, keimah in hehnemin ka pikik ding hi. Tui omna lui geiah ka paipih ding a, lam nuamah paipih-in a tuk kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite’ pa ka hi a, Efraim in ka tapa upapen ahi hi.

“Aw, gamdangte aw, Topa’ kammal ngai un la, gamla pi, tuipi gei-a omte kiangah va gen sawn un. ‘Israel mite a kithehthangsak pa in a kaikhawm kik ding a, tuucingpa in a tuute a cin’ bangin a cing ding hi,’ va ci un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Jakob ka tankhia khin zo a, a zawhzawh loh khutte sung pan ka lakhia khin zo hi.

Amaute hong pai-in Zion mual tungah ngaihtakin la a sa ding uh a, Topa’ hehpihna ahi, buh, leenggah tui, sathau leh tuuno, bawngnote’ hangin amaute a lungdam mahmah ding uh hi. A nuntakna uh, tui kibuak huan bang ahi ding a, a lungkham ngei nawn kei ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin nungakte laam-in a lungdam ding uh a, tangvalte leh papite zong a nuam ding uh hi. Amaute’ kahnate lungdamna ka suaksak ding a, hehpihin a dahnate uh kipahna ka suaksak ding hi.
Siampite an limpen tawh ka vaak ding a, ka mite khempeuh in ka hoihna hangin a lungkim ding uh hi, Topa in ka ci hi.”
Topa in hong cih-inah: “Ramah khua ah aw khat kiza a, tauna leh kah ngutngutna aw ahi hi. Rachel in a tate adingin a kap hi. A tate om nawn lo ahih manin kinem zo lo hi.”

Topa in hong cih-inah: “Kap nawn kei un la, na khitui uh nul un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, na nasepna uh thaman na ngah ding uh hi. Amaute galte’ gam panin hong ciahkik ding uh hi.
Na mailam uh adingin lametna a om hi, Topa in kong ci hi, na tate uh zong na gam mah uhah hong ciahkik ding uh hi.
Efraim’ kahna aw ka za zo a, ‘Topa aw, bawngtal sin loh bangin keimah nong thuhilh khin zo hi. Kong ciahkik theih nadingin hong la kik in, bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in Topa ka Pasian na hi hi.
Nangma’ kiang pan ka paikhiat khit phet-in ka kisik kik a, Nong thuhilh khit ciangin dah-in ka kun hi. Ka neu lai-a ka min siatna teng pua ka hih manin mai zumin ka lungam hi,’ a ci hi.

Efraim, ka it ka tapa ahi hiam? Amah ka ngaihno ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh ama’ thu ka gen simin amah ka phawk lailai hi. Tua ahih manin amah ka ngaihsun tawntung a, ka hehpih taktak ding hi, Topa in ka ci hi.

“Lampi-ah ciamtehna bawl un la, lam lahnate phut un. Na paikhiatna uh lampi mah limtakin hong zong kik un. Hong kilehkik un, nungak siangtho tawh a kibang Israel mite aw, na khuapi uh hong zuankik un.
Bang tan vei lungka ding na hi hiam? a zulhzau ka tanu aw, Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in leitungah na thak khat ka bawl a, numei in pasal a hon zo hi.”

A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong gen-inah: “Keimah in amaute a gam uhah ka omkik sak ciangin, Judah gam leh a khuapite uhah amaute in, ‘Thuman thutak teen’na mual siangtho aw, Topa in thupha hong pia ta hen,’ ci-in a genkik leuleu ding uh hi.
Judah gam leh khuapite sungah lokhote leh tuucing a, vak kawikawi mite a teeng khawm ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a gim mite ka tawldam sak ding a, gil kial a, a tha zawm mite khempeuh an ka vak kham ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin ka khanglo-a ka khua dak hi. Ka khan’ lawh nuam ka sa mahmah hi.
“En un, Topa in kong cih-inah Israel gam leh Judah gam, mihing leh ganhing tawh ka dimsak hun hong tung ding hi.

Amaute a kibet khiat nading leh a kitap zan nading ahi zongin, a kisuan khiat nading leh a kisiat nading ahi zongin ka vaihawm mah bangin, Topa in ka cih-inah, amaute a kilam nading leh a kiphuh nadingin ka vaihawm ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin amaute in: ‘Pate in leenggah thuk a ne uh a, a tate uh’ ha a kim hi,” cih paunak a zang nawn kei ding uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in amau’ mawhna ciat uh hang bekin a si ding uh hi. Leenggah thuk a nete’ ha bek a kim ding hi.
“En un, Topa in kong cih-inah, Israel minamte leh Judah minamte tawh thuciamna thak khat ka bawl ni hun hong tung ding hi.

Tua pen, a pu a pate uh, Izipt gam pana ka lakkhiat nadingin a khut uh tawh ka kaih khiat huna ka bawl uh thu thuciamna tawh kibang lo ding hi. Tua lai-in amaute’ pasal ka hih hangin ka thuciamna a hong palsat uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi.

Ahih hangin Topa in kong cih-inah, tua hun hong tun’ ciangin Israel minamte tawh hih bangin thuciamna ka bawl ding hi: amaute sungah ka thukham ka koih ding a, amaute’ lungtang tungah ka gelh ding hi. Keimah in amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amaute in keima’ mite ahi ding uh hi.

Kuamah in midangte leh a sanggamte uh’ kiangah, ‘Topa thei in,’ ci-in a kihilh nawn kei ding uh hi: bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, amaute a neupen panin a lianpen dongin, a vekpi-un kei a hong thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ khialhnate ka maisak ding a, amaute’ mawhnate zong phawkin ka nei nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in sun-a khuavak dingin ni hong pia a, zan-a khuavak dingin a kikhel ngei lo kha leh aksite hong pia hi. Tuipi a lawh ciangin tuihualte ging zuazua a, ama’ min in Vanglian Topa kici hi.
Amah in, “Topa in kong cih-inah, hih a kip mahmah leitung, vantung ngeinate a kikhel hun ciang bekin, Israel mite’ suan leh khakte in gam a nei ngei nawn kei pan ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Topa in hong gen-inah, “Vantung a kiteh theih ciang leh leinuai-a leitung bulte a kivel theih ciang bek-in Israelmite’ suan leh khakte khempeuh a mawhna uh hangin ka lawnkhia mang pan ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi,”
“En un, Topa in kong cih-inah, nisuahna lam Hananel Tau sangpi panin nitumna lam khua kulh Kiu Kongpi dongin khuapi a kibawl phat hun hong tung ding hi.
Tua lai panin khuapi huang dingin nitumna lamah Gareb mual dong kiteh suak ding a, Goah lamah a kihei ding hi.

Misi luangte leh vutte a kibuakna kuam buppi leh, Kidron lui phak ma-a lo teng khempeuh tawh, tua panin nisuahna lam-a Sakol Kongpi kiu ciang dong, Topa adingin mun siangtho a suak ding hi. Cikmah ciangin tua khuapi kisusia-in a kisuankhia ngei nawn kei ding hi.”
Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa a maan’ zawh kum sawm leh kum giat a phak kumin, Judah gamah Zedekiah kumpi a suah zawh kum sawm pha ta a, tua kumin Topa in Jeremiah a hopih hi.
Tua hun laitakin Babilon kumpipa’ galkapte in Jerusalem khua a sim laitak hun hi a, kamsangpa Jeremiah zong Judah kumpipa’ inn huang sunga thong sungah a kikalhcip laitak ahi hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Judah kumpipa Zedekiah in ama’ kiangah, “Bang hangin nangmah in thu genkhol a, ‘Topa in a cih-inah: En un, hih khuapi Babilon kumpipa’ khut sungah ka pia ding a, amah in a la ding hi.
Judah kumpipa Zedekiah zong Khaldea mite’ khut sung pan a suakta kei ding a, Babilon kumpipa’ khut sungah a kipia taktak ding hi. Amah tawh maitang kimu-in a ki-en ding uh a, a kiho ding uh hi.

Amah in Babilon khua-ah Zedekiah a la ding a, ama tungah na ka sep mateng tua lai-ah a om ding hi. Khaldea mite na do uh hangin na zo kei ding uh hi, Topa in hong ci hi,’ ci-in bang hangin thu hilh na hi hiam?” ci-in thong sungah a khum ahi hi.
Jeremiah in zong, “Topa in kei hong hopih a,

En in, na pano Shallum’ tapa Hanamel nang’ kiangah hong pai ding a, ‘Anathoth khua-a ka lo hong lei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh a lei thei ding lak panin ka kinaipihpen nangmah na om hi,’ ci-in hong gen ding hi, hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ hong cihna mah bangin thong sungah ka inn lak sanggampa hong pai takpi-a hong hopihin, ‘Benjamin gam Anathoth khua-a ka lo hong lei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh, i ngeina bangin a nei ding leh a tankhia ding nangmah na hi hi. Nang’ adingin lei in,’ hong ci hi. Tua ciangin keimah in Topa’ hong hopihna taktak hi, ci-in ka thei hi.
“Keimah in zong ka innlak sanggampa Hanamel’ kiang panin Anathoth khua-a lo ka lei a, ama adingin ngun shekel sawm leh sagih ka tehkhia hi.
Thukimna lai bawlin, min gelhin, gip khenin, a hong theihpih ding mite zong ka lak khit ciangin tawi khaina-ah sum ka teh hi.
Tua ciangin ka kithukimna teng uh a kigelhna, gip a kikhen lai pen leh gip a kikhen lo lai pen ka la a,

Nariah’ tapa ahi, Mahseiah’ tupa Baruk kiangah ka pia hi. Tua laite, ka innlak sanggampa Hanamel tawh, tua kileina laite tunga a min uh a gelh a hong theipih mite tawh, thong huang sunga a tu Judah mite tawh a om kim laitak-un ka pia hi.
Amaute’ om laitakin Baruk kiangah,
‘A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a hong gen-inah: Hih gip a kikhen lai leh gip a kikhen lo lai tegel la in la, sia lo-a sau veipi a kikep thei nadingin leibel khat sungah koih in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a hong gen-inah: Hih gamah innte, lote leh leenggah lote mite in a lei kik ta ding hi, hong ci hi,” ci-in ka gen hi.
“Neriah’ tapa Baruk kiangah kileina lai ka piak khit ciangin Topa’ kiangah thu ka ngen a,
‘Topa Pasian aw! Nangma’ vangpi leh na khut kizankhia tawh vantung teng leh leitung na bawl khin zo hi! Nang adingin a haksa lua khat beek om lo hi.
Nangmah in mi tul tampite’ tungah a kikhel ngeilo itna na lak a, ahih hangin pate’ mawhnate tate’ tungah na thuk hi. A vanglian Topa a kici a lian mahmah a hat mahmah Pasian aw,
na ngimnate lian mahmah a, na sepnate thupi mahmah hi. Mite’ nuntakzia khempeuh na mu a, amau’ nuntakdan leh a nasepna gahte tung tawnin mi khempeuh’ tungah thaman na pia kim hi.
Izipt gamah lim leh nalamdangte na lak a, tu-in zong Israel gam leh minam dang khempeuhte’ tungah lakin, tu-in mun khempeuh ah na min lian mahmah hi.
Na mi Israel mite Izipt gam panin lim leh nalamdang tawh ahi zongin, a khauh mahmah a kizan khia na khut tawh ahi zongin lauhuaina lianpi tawh ahi zongin na lakhia-a,
a pute a pate uh’ tunga piak ding a, na ciamsa, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na hih gam na pia hi.

Amau zong hong lut-in a luah pah uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in na thu hong mang loin, thukham hong zui lo uh a, hih ding a, na thupiakte khat beek a hih kei uh hi. Tua ahih manin amau’ tungah hih siatna khempeuh na tungsak hi.

En in, khuapi lak nadingin kan a to khin zo uh hi. Namsau tawh kithahna hang, kialpi hang leh pulnatna hangin a sim Khaldea mite’ khut sungah khuapi a kipia ding hi. Na gensa bangin hong tun’ loh phamawh ahih manin en in, nangmah in na mu ta hi.

Ahih hangin Topa Pasian aw, hih khuapi Khaldea mite’ khut sung tung ding hi napi, nangmah in, “A hong theihpih ding mi sam in la,tua lo lei in,” ci-in nong sawl teitei hi,’ ci-in thu ka ngen hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Jeremiah hopih a,
“En in, Keimah in Topa ka hi a, mi khempeuhte’ Pasian ka hi hi. Kei adingin a haksa lua bang om ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin, Topa in kong cih-inah: En in, hih khuapi Khaldea mite’ khut sung leh Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ khut sungah ka pia ding a, amah in a la ding hi.

Hih khuapi a sim Khaldea mite hong pai-in khuapi mei tawh a hal ding uh a, ka heh nading-a inn khum tunga Baal milimte paknamtui halna tawh a biakna innte uh leh pasian dangte’ kianga tuidawn biakna a piakna uh innte zong a haltum ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite leh Judah mite in a neu lai pek uh a, kipan ka muhna-ah siatna bekbek a bawl uh a, keimah Topa in kong cih-inah, Israel mite in a khut uh tawh milim a bawlna uh hangin kei hong heh sak uh hi.
Hih khuapi in, a kisat cil-a kipan tu ni ciang dong hong hehsakin hong thangpaisak ahih manin ka muhna panin ka hemkhia ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel mite leh Judah mite, a kumpite uh leh a kumpi uliante uh, a siampite uh leh a kamsangte uh akipan Judah mite leh Jeursalem khua mite khempeuh in kei hong heh sak nadingin siatna a bawl uh hi.
Amaute in kei hong nung ngat-in hong thudon lo uh a, ka hilh tawntung hangin ka hilhna a hong mang kei uh hi.
Amaute in ka min tawh a kilo biakinn sung nangawn ah a kihhuai milimte a koih uh a, a ninsak uh hi.

En-Hinnom Mualkuam-ah a tapate leh a tanute uh meihal biakna tawh Molek pasian a biak nadingun Baal biakna tau sangte a bawl uh hi. Hih a kihhuai na semin, Judah mite mawhna a bawl sak nadingun amaute ka sawl kei a, zong ka ngaihsun kha ngei beek kei hi.

“Jeremiah aw, nangmah in hih khuapi, namsau tawh thahna, kial leh pulnatna tawh Babilon kumpipa’ khut sungah kipia ding hi, na ci hi. Tu-in tua bang na cihna hih khuapi tawh kisai-in Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah:
En in, Ka hehna, ka thangpaihna leh ka lungkimlohna lianpi tawh ka hawlkhiatna gam khempeuh panin amaute ka kaikhawm ding a, hih munah tun’pih kikin, lungmuang takin ka teengsak ding hi.
Amaute ka mi ahi ding uh a, keimah in amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding hi.
Amaute’ hoih nading leh amaute’ nung-a a tu a tate uh’ hoih nadingin a tawntungin kei hong zahtak nadingun lungsim kikhat leh nuntakdan kikhat ka pia ding hi.

Amaute’ tungah a tawntungin hoihna ka bawl det nadingin amaute tawh tawntung thuciamna khat ka bawl ding hi. Kei’ kiang panin a kiheikhiat loh nadingun amaute’ sungah kei hong zahtakna lungsim ka koih ding hi.
Amaute’ tungah hoihna ka bawl manin ka lungdam ding a, ka lungsim khempeuh leh ka kha khempeuh tawh thuman takin hih gamah amaute ka phut ding hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, hih siatna khempeuh hih mite tungah ka tun’sak mah bangin, amaute tunga ka khapsa hoihna khempeuh zong ka tungsak pelmawh ding hi.
Nangmah in hih gam in mihing leh ganhing’ teen’ lohna gam simtham hi a, Khaldea mite’ khut sungah kipia ding hi, ci-a na gen hangin hih gamah lo kilei kik ding hi.

Benjamin gam, Jerusalem khua kimkot leh, Judah gam khuapite-a kipan mual tunga khuapite, Shefelah zanglei-a khuapite leh leitaw lam Negeb gama khuapite-ah sum tawh lo kilei ding a, a theihpih mite tawh thukimna min gelhin gip tawh a kikhen ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in amaute a gam mah uhah ka om sak kik ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Thong huang sungah Jeremiah a kikalhcip laitak mahin Topa in a nih veina hopih a:
“Leitung bawla a kipsak Topa, a min Topa a kici Topa in kong gen-inah:
Kei nong sap leh kong dawngkik ding a, na theih ngei nai loh a ki-im cip thu lianpite kong gen ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh galte’ kan tawhna leh namsaute do nadingin kizanga a kisusia gawp ding hih khuapi sunga innte leh Judah kumpite’ innte tawh kisai-in, Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih-inah:

Ka hehna leh ka thangpaihna tawh ka thahlup ding misi luangte tawh a kidimsak dingin Khaldea mite in a hong sim ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih khuapi sunga om mite’ gitlohna hangin hih khuapi panin ka mai ka seel hi.
Ahih hangin en in, keimah in hih khuapi ka damsak ding a, cidamin ka om sak ding hi. A mite cidam sakin nopna leh lungmuan’na a kicing ka lak ding hi.
Judah mite leh Israel mite ka hausak kik ding a, nidang-a a om ngei bangun ka om sak kik ding hi.
Kei tunga hong bawl uh mawhna khempeuh panin amaute ka siangsak ding a, kei tunga hong mawhnate uh leh a hong langpan’na khempeuhte uh ka maisak ding hi.
Jerusalem khuapi in kei adingin lungdamna, minphatna leh minthan’na ahi ding hi. A sunga om mite tungah hoihna leh hauhna ka tun’sakna thu a za minam dangte in lau-in a liing ding uh hi.

“Topa in kong cih-inah, note in, ‘Hih munah mihing, ganhing om loin mun dai suak hi,’ ci-in na gen uh mah bangin Judah gam khuapite leh Jerusalem khua kongzingte awng a, mihing ganhing kuamah a teeng kei hi.

Ahih hangin lungdamna aw leh kipahna awte, zi nei thakte leh mothakte’ awte kiza kik ding hi. Mite in Topa’ biakinn ah hong pai-in lungdam biakna pia-in: ‘A vanglian Topa tungah lungdamna pia un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa hoih a, ama’ itna kip kho tawntung hi!’ ci-a a lasakna awte uh a kiza kik ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah a masa-a mah bangin hih gam ka hausak kik ding hi.
“A vanglian Topa in kong cih-inah, mihing ganhing om lo-a mun awng ahi hih mun leh a khuapi khempeuhte ah tuucingte in tuu cing a, a teen’ theih nading mun hong om ding hi.

Mual tunga khuapite, Shefelah zanglei-a khuapite leh leitaw lam Negeb gama khuapite, Benjamin gam, Jerusalem khua kimkot leh Judah gam khuapite ah, Topa in kong cih-inah tuucingte in a tuute uh a sim ding uh hi.
“En un, Topa in kong cih-inah: Israel mite leh Judah mite’ tunga ka khapsa ka tangtun’ sak hun hong tung ding hi.
Tua ni tua hun ciangin David’ suan lak panin kumpi dingin a diktat Hiang khat ka khangsak ding a, amah in gam sungah thuman thu tang tawh thu hong khen ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin Judah mite kihonkhia ding a, Israel mite lungmuang takin a teeng ding uh hi. Amah a kisap nadingin a min, Topa in eite’ Diktatna ahi hi, ci-in a kiphuak ding hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah: Israel mite’ kumpi dingin David’ suan lak panin mi om lo ngei lo ding hi.
Levi minam lak panin zong meihal biaknate, an tawh biakna leh kithoihnate a hih tawntung dingin ka mai-a ding ding siampi kitasam ngei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Jeremiah hopih a,
“Topa in kong cih-inah: Sun hun leh zan hun a hun manman-a a hong tun’ loh theih nadingin sun tawh ka thuciamna leh zan tawh ka thuciamna na siat sak zawh ciang bek-in
keimah leh ka nasem pa David tawh ka thuciamna a kisia pan ding a, amah in a kumpi tokhom luah ding tapa nei loin, ka na a sem siampi Levi minamte tawh ka thuciamna zong a kisia hi pan ding hi.
Vana aksite kisim zo loin, tuipi-a sehnelte a kiteh zawh loh bangin keimah in ka nasempa David’ suan-le-khakte ahi zongin, siampi Levi’ minamte ahi zongin ka pungsak den ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in Jeremiah hopih-a,

“Hih mite in, Topa in a teelsa Israel leh Judah minam tegel a nusia ta hi, ci-a a gen uh thei kha lo na hi hiam? Tua bangin amaute in ka mite a simmawh uh a, amau’ muhna-ah gam khatin zong a sim nawn kei uh hi.
Topa in kong gen-inah: Sun leh zan tawh ka thuciamna ahi zongin, vantung leh leitung ngeina kipte ahi zongin kipsak khin nai lo hi leng

Jakob leh ka nasempa David’ suante ka nial ding a, Abraham, Isaak leh Jokob’ suante a uk dingin amaute’ lakah mi khat ka teel kei ding hi. Tu-in tua bang hi loin amaute ka hausak kik ding a, ka hehpih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in a galkapte khempeuh tawh, a ukna gam khempeuh leh a mi khempeuh tawh Jerusalem khua leh a kim-a khuapite a sim laitakin Topa in Jeremiah hopih a:

“Topa Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih inah: Judah kumpipa Zedekiah kiangah pai in la, hih bangin va gen in; ‘Topa in hong gen-inah, En in, keimah in hih khuapi Babilon kumpipa’ khut sungah ka pia ding a, amah in mei tawh a hal ding hi.

Ama’ khut sung panin na suakta kei ding a, hong kimanin ama’ khut sungah nang hong kipia taktak ding hi. Nangmah in Babilon kumpipa tawh maitang kimu-in na kiho ding uh a, Babilon khua-ah na pai ding hi.
Judah kumpipa Zedekiah aw, Topa’ kammal ngai lai dih in. Topa in nangmah tawh kisai-a hong gen-inah, nang in namsau tawh thahna na thuak kei ding hi.

Nuam takin na si ding a, nangma’ ma-a kumpi a suak na pute na pate adingin paknamtui a kihal mah bangin nang adingin zong paknamtui hong kihal ding a, “Aw, Topa aw!’ ci-in hong kah ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in hong gen khin zo hi,’ ci-in va gen in,” a ci hi.
Jeremiah in zong hih thu teng khempeuh Jerusalem khua-a Judah kumpipa Zedekiah kiangah a gen hi.
Tua laitakin Babilon kumpipa’ galkapte in Jerusalem khuapi leh Judah gama khuapi muanhuai lakah a om lai Lakhish khua leh Azekah khua tegel zong a sim laitak uh ahi hi.

8-9 Zedekiah kumpipa in numei ahi zongin pasal ahi zongin Hebru mipih silate khah khia-in, kuamah in a mipih Judah mite sila-in khawi thei lo ding hi, ci-in suahtak nading thu zasak a, Jerusalem khua-a mi khempeuh tawh thuciamna a bawl khit ciangin Topa in Jeremiah a hopih hi.

Mi khempeuh in a silate uh numei ahi zongin, pasal ahi zongin khah khia-in sila-in khawi kik thei nawn lo ding hi, ci-a thuciamna a nei kumpi uliante-a kipan mi khempeuh in mang uh a, a khahkhia uh hi.
Ahih hangin tua nung ciangin a lungsim uh khel kik-in a khahkhiat sa uh numei leh pasal silate a la kik uh a, sila mahin a zang kik mawk uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Jeremiah hopih a:
“Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah, keimah in na pu na pate uh koltan’na Izipt gam pan ka lakkhiat laitakin amau tawh thuciamna khat ka bawl uh a,

note kianga nasem dinga hong kizuak na Hebru mipihte uh in no adingin kum guk na hong sep sak khit a kum sagihna sungin na khah khia ding uh a, na na uh na sem sak nawn kei ding uh hi, ka ci hi. Ahih hangin na pute na pate un ka thu hong ngai lo uh a, hong mang lo uh hi.
Zan diakin no na kisik kik uh a, na mipihte ciat uh suaktak nading tangko-in, ka min tawh a kilo biakinnpi sung ka mai-ah thuciamna na bawl uh a, ka muhna-ah a kilawm na khat na sem khin zo uh hi.
Ahih hangin na lungsim uh na lehhei kik leuleu uh a, amau’ utna banga na khahkhiat sa uh sila numei leh pasalte na la kik uh a, na na uh sem sakin ka min nong daisak uh hi.

Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih-inah “Mi khempeuh in na sanggam na mipihte uh khahkhia loin suahtakna pia lo-a ka thu hong mang lo na hih uh leh en un, Topa in kong cih-inah, note kong khahkhia-a, suahtakna kong pia ta hi. Namsau tawh kithahna, pulnatna leh kialpite tawh na sih nadingun note kong khah khia a, kong suaktasak hi. Leitung gam khempeuhte’ hong lipkhap dingin kong bawl ding hi.

18-19 Mite in kei’ mai-ah thuciamna a bawl uh ciangin bawngno phel nih suahin a kikalah a pai uh hi. Judah gam kumpi uliante, kumpi innsung mangte, siampite-a kipan bawngno phel nih kikal a, a pai khinsa gam sunga ka mite khempeuh in, ka thuciamna hong mang loin, thuciamna sunga om thute a zuih kei uh leh amaute tua bawngno ka bangsak ding hi.
A galte’ khut sungah amaute ka pia ding a, a that nuam mite’ khut sungah ka pia ding hi. A siluangte uh van-a vasate leh leitunga gam sate’ an a suak ding uh hi.
Judah kumpipa Zedekiah leh a kumpi uliante, a galte uh’ khut sungah pia-in, amaute a that nuam mite leh note kiang pan-a a kilehkik khin zo Babilon kumpipa’ galkapte’ khut sungah ka pia ding hi.

En un, Topa in kong cih-inah, keimah in thu ka pia ding a, hih khuapi-ah kong la kik ding hi. Amau in hih khuapi hong simin, hong la-in, mei tawh hong halsak ding uh hi. Judah gam khuapite kuama’ teen’ lohna mun awng ka suaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Josiah’ tapa Jehoiakim, Judah gamah kumpi ahih laitakin Topa in Jeremiah hopih a:
“Rekhab behte kiangah pai in la, amau tawh na kiho khit ciangin Topa’ biakinn ah hong paipih in la, inndei khat sungah tumpih-in, tua ciangin a dawn dingin lenggahzu pia in,” ci-in a sawl hi.
Tua ciangin Habazziniah’ tupa ahi Jeremiah dang khat’ tapa, Ja-azaniah leh a sanggamte, a tate khempeuh leh Rekhab behte khempeuh ka sam hi.
Amaute, Topa’ biakinn sung, kumpi uliante’ inn dei gei, Shallum’ tapa kongpi uk biakinn upa lian Ma-aseiah’ inndei tung-a, Igdaliah’ tapa, Pasian’ mi ahi Hanan’ tate’ inndei sungah ka lutpih hi.
Tua ciangin Rekhab behte’ mai-ah leenggahzu a dim-a kikoih hai leh keute ka pia a, leenggahzu dawn un, ci-in ka sawl hi.

Ahih hangin amaute in “Kote in leenggah zu ka ne kei ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Rekhab’ tapa, ka pa uh Jonadab in thu hong pia a, ‘Note-a kipan na tu na tate un leenggahzu na ne ngei peuhmah kei ding uh hi.

Inn na lam kei ding uh a, khaici na tuh kei ding uh hi. Singno na suan kei ding uh a, leenggah lo na bawl kei ding uh hi. Ahih hangin na teen’ pakna uh gam sungah sau veipi na teen’ theih nadingun na nuntak hun sung teng uh puanbuk sungah na teeng ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi.
Kote in Rekhab’ tapa ka pa uh Jonadab’ hong thupiak khempeuh ka mang uh a, ka nuntak hun sung teng uh ko-a kipan ka zite uh, ka tapate uh leh ka tanute uh in leenggahzu dawn loin,
teen’ nading inn ka lam kei uh hi. Leenggah huan, lo leh khaici bangmah ka nei kei uh hi.
Ka pu uh Jonadab’ hong sawl bangbangin ka mang uh a, puanbuk sungah ka teeng den uh hi.

Ahih hangin Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in hih gam hong sim ciangin kote in, ‘Hong pai un. Khaldea galkapte leh Siria galkapte kihta i hih manin Jerusalem khua-ah pai ni,’ ka kici uh a, tua mah bangin tu-in Jerusalem khua-ah ka teeng uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Jeremiah hopih a:

“A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih-inah: Pai in la, Judah mite’ kiang leh Jerusalem khua-a teeng mite’ kiangah, Topa in, Ka thuhilhna hong sang loin ka thu hong ngai lo ding na hi uh hiam?

Rekhab’ tapa Jonadab in a tate’ tunga leenggahzu a dawn loh nading uh a thupiakna a zui uh a, tuni ciang dong bangmah a dawn kei uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in a pa uh’ thupiakna a mang uh hi. Keimah in note kong hopih tawntung hangin ka thu nong mang kei uh hi.

Ka nasem ahi kamsangte khempeuh note kiangah hong sawl tawntungin, ‘Tu-in note khempeuh na hoih lohna-uh panin kihei un la, na gamtat hoihlote uh kipuah pha un. pasian dangte nung delh loin, ama’ na na sep kei uh leh note leh na pute na pate’ kianga kong piak gam sungah na teeng ding uh hi,’ ci-in hong gen uh hi. Ahih hangin note in na bil uh nong ngat kei uh a, ka thu nong ngai kei uh hi.
Rakhab’ tapa Jonadab’ tate in a pa uh’ thupiakna a man’ uh hangin hih mite in ka thu hong mang lo uh hi.

Tua ahih manin keimah Topa, a vanglian Pasian, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah: En un, Judah mite leh Jerusalem khua-a teeng mi khempeuh tungah a tung ding a, ka gen khiatsa siatna khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau tungah ka gen hangin amau in ka thu hong ngai lo uh a, amaute ka sap hangin hong dawngkik lo uh hi, ci hi, ci-in va gen in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Jeremiah in Rekhab behte’ kiangah, “A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong gen-inah: Na pa uh Jonadab’ hong thupiakna mangin, a hong thuhilhna bangin zui-in, a hong sawl khempeuh sem khin na hih manun

a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih-inah: Rekhab’ tapa Jonadab’ suante’ lak panin ka mai-a a ding ding ka nasem ding pasal khat beek nei loin a om ngei kei ding hi, hong ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Josiah’ tapa Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim a maan’ zawh kum li a phak kumin Topa in Jeremiah hopih a:
“Laizial khat la in la, tua sungah Josiah kumpi a suah kum, nang kong hopih masak hun-a kipan tuni ciang dong Israel gam, Judah gam leh gamdang khempeuhte’ lang khatah ka thugente khempeuh gelh in.

Judah mite in amau tunga tun’sak dinga ka ngaihsut siatna khempeuh za-in mi khempeuh in a siatna lampi-uh panin kiheina-in a nei kha thei ding uh a, keimah in zong amau’ khialhna leh amau’ mawhnate ka maisak kha thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jeremiah in Neriah’ tapa Baruk sam a, Topa in ama’ tunga a gen khitsa thu khempeuh sit-in Baruk in laizial khat tungah a gelh hi.
Jeremiah in Baruk sawl a, “Topa’ biakinn ah pai dingin kei hong kiphal lo ahih manin

nang na pai in la, an tan’ ni ciangin Topa’ biakinn sunga om mi khempeuhte’ zak dingin kong sit hih laizial sunga na gelh Topa’ kammalte na sim ding hi. Amau’ khuapite pana hong paikhia Judah mi khempeuhte’ zakin zong na sim ding hi.

Amaute in Topa tungah thuum-in a vekpi-un a hoihlohna uh panin a kihei kha thei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite tungah Topa in tun’sak dinga a gensa a hehna leh a thangpaihna lian mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
Neriah’ tapa Baruk in zong Topa’ biakin sungah laizial sunga Topa’ kammal sim khiat dinga kamsangpa Jeremiah’ sawl bangbangin a hih hi.

Josiah’ tapa Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim a maan’ zawh kum nga a phak kum, a kha kua kha-in Jerusalem khua-a om mi khempeuh leh Judah gam khuapite pana Jerusalem khua-a hong pai mite khempeuh in Topa’ mai-ah an tan’ ding thu a zasak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ biakinn sung, a Kongpi Thak tumna gei, adei tungnunga Shafan’ tapa thuvan pipa Gemariah’ inndei sungah mi khempeuh’ zak-in Baruk in laizial sunga Jeremiah’ kammalte a simkhia hi.
Gemariah’ tapa, Shafan’ tupa ahi Mikaiah in laizial sunga thu teng khempeuh a zak ciangin

Kumpipa’ inn sung, thuvanpipa’ inndei sungah a paisuk a, tua lai munah thuvanpipa Elishama, Shemiah’ tapa Delaiah, Akbor’ tapa Elnathan, Shafan’ tapa Gemariah, Hananiah’ tapa Zedekiah-te akipan kumpi ulian khempeuh tu-in a na om uh hi.
Tua ciangin Mikaiah in, mi khempeuh’ zak-a Baruk in a sim a zaksa thu teng khempeuh a gen hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi ulian khempeuh in, Kushi’ tusawn ahi, Shelemiah’ tupa, Nethaniah’ tapa Jehudi, Baruk kiangah a sawl uh a, “Mite kianga na sim na laizial hong la in la, hong pai in,” ci-in a sam sak uh hi. Tua ciangin Neriah’ tapa Baruk in zong tua laizial la-in amau kiangah hong pai hi.
Amaute in, “Tu in la, hong sim dih in,” ci-in a gen uh hi. Baruk in zong amau kiangah a sim hi.
Tua thute khempeuh a zak khit uh ciangin lau-in khat leh khat a ki-en gapgap uh a, Baruk kiangah, “Hih thute khempeuh kumpipa’ kiangah i koh kul ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Baruk’ kiangah, “Hih thute khempeuh bangci gelh na hi hiam? Jeremiah in hong sit ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Baruk in zong, “Amah in hih thu khempeuh hong sit a, ke’n zong laizial sungah laitui tawh ka gelh hi,” ci-in a dawng kik hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi uliante in Baruk’ kiangah, “Pai in la, nang leh Jeremiah va bu un. Na omna mun-uh kuamah thei sak kei un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in thuvanpipa Elishama’ inndei sungah tua laizial a koih uh a, kumpipa’ omna inndei sungah a lut khit uh ciangin kumpipa kiangah tua thu khempeuh a gen uh hi.
Kumpipa in zong tua laizial a la dingin Jehudi sawl a, amah in thuvanpipa Elishama’ inndei sung pan a va lakhia hi. Kumpipa leh kumpipa kianga ding ulian khempeuhte’ zakin Jehudi in a sim hi.
Kha kua kha pen phalbi laitak ahih manin kumpipa zong a phalbi inn sungah tu-a meikhuk-a mei a awi hi.
Jehudi in khawk thum khawk li bang a sim khit ciangin kumpipa in temta neu khat tawh aat khia-a, meikhuk sungah a khul hi. Tua bangin laizial buppi a kattum dong meikhuk sungah a paaipaai hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa ahi zongin hih thute a za khin a nasemte khat beek ahi zongin lau tuan loin, kisikkik lo uh ahih manin a puan uh balkek lo uh hi.
Elnathan leh Delaiah leh Gemariah te in kumpipa’ kiangah laizial a hal loh nading a khoh uh hangin amah in a mang kei hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in kumpipa’ tapa Jerahme-el tawh, Azriel’ tapa Seraiah tapa, Abde-el’ tapa Shelemiah tawh a sawl a, kumpi thuvanpipa Baruk leh kamsangpa Jeremiah man dingin thu a pia hi. Ahih hangin Topa in amau tegel a seel sim hi.
Jeremiah’ sit banga, Baruk in a gelh laizial kumpipa in a haltum khit ciangin Topa in Jeremiah hopih-a:
“Laizial dang khat la in la, tua tungah, Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim in a haltum a masa laizial sunga thu om teng khempeuh gelhkik in.

Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim’ thu tawh kisai-in hih bangin ama’ kiangah va gen in: ‘Topa in hong gen-inah, Nangmah in, “Jeremiah aw, bang hangin Babilon kumpipa hong pai taktak-in hih gam hong susia ding a, mihing leh ganhing a teeng sak nawn kei ding hi, ci-in hih lai sungah gelh na hi hiam?” ci-in na gen-a tua laizial na haltum hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim’ thu tawh kisai-in Topa in kong gen-inah, amah in David’ tokhom tunga tu ding suan leh khak a nei kei ding a, ama’ luang in sun laitak-a ni sa kap ding leh zan laitaka vuksan vukngo tuam dingin a kipaaidak ding hi.

Amah leh a suan a khakte leh a nasemte a mawhna uh hangin ka daantat ding a, amau’ tung leh Jerusalem khua-a teengte’ tunga kipan Judah mite’ tungah tun’sak dinga ka gensa gimna khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ka thu hong ngai lo uh hi,’ ci-in va gen in,” ci-in Jeremiah a sawl hi.

Tua ciangin Jeremiah in zong laizial dang khat la a, Neriah’ tapa thuvanpipa Baruk a pia hi. Amah in zong Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim in meikhuk sunga a khul tumsa laizial sunga thu kigelh khempeuh, Jeremiah’ sit bangbangin a gelh hi. Kammal kibang zong tampi a kibehlap hi.
Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in Jehoiakim’ tapa Koniah’ taangin Judah gam uk dingin Josiah’ tapa Zedekiah a koih hi.
Ahih hangin amahmah a, kipan a nasemte leh a gamsung mite in kamsangpa Jeremiah’ tung tawna Topa’ thugennate a ngai kei uh hi.
Zedekiah kumpipa in kamsangpa Jeremiah’ kiangah, Shelemiah’ tapa Jehukal leh Ma-aseiah’ tapa siampipa Zefaniah sawl a, “Topa i Pasian’ kiangah kote’ adingin thu hong ngetsak in,” ci-in a gen sak hi.
Hih hunin Jeremiah thongkia nai lo ahih manin mi lakah a vak kawikawi hi.

Tua hun laitakin Khaldea mite in Jerusalem khua a sim laitak uh hi a, tua hun laitak mahin Faro kumpipa’ galkapte in galsim dingin Izipt gam panin hong kuankhia hi, cih thu a zak uh ciangin Jerusalem khua panin a nungkik uh hi.
Tua ciangin kamsangpa Jeremiah Topa in hopih a:

“Topa ahi, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih-inah: Kei tung-a thu dong ding a, hong sawl Judah kumpipa kiangah hih bangin na va gen ding hi: ‘En in, nang hong huh ding a, hong pai Faro kumpipa’ galkapte a gam uhah ciahkik ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Khaldea mite hong kileh kikin hih khuapi hong sim ding uh a, khuapi la-in mei tawh a hal ding uh hi.
Topa in kong cih-inah, Nang leh nang kikhemin, “Khaldea mite in hong kilehkik nawn lo taktak ding uh hi,” ci kha kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau hong kilehkik ding uh hi.

Nangmah in na gal Khaldea galkap khempeuh zo lua kisa-in buk sunga milian teng bek na suakta sak kha phial ahi zongin, amaute hong tho teitei ding uh a, hih khuapi hong hal sak veve ding uh hi,’ ci-in va gen in,” a ci hi.
Faro galkapte Jerusalem khua hong naih ciangun Khaldea galkapte a nungkik uh hi.
Tua laitakin Jeremiah zong Jerusalem khua panin a behte kiangah a gamh luah teng la dingin Benjamin gamah pai dingin a dingkhia hi.
Benjamin Kongpi a tun’ ciangin Shelemiah’ tapa, Hananiah’ tupa Irijah a kici kong cingpa in kamsangpa Jeremiah kiangah, “Nang Khaldea mite lama tai sim ding na hi hi,” ci-in a na man hi.
Tua ciangin Jeremiah in zong, “Hi lo hi’ng; Khaldea mite’ lamah ka tai sim kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Irijah in ama’ cihna ngai loin Jeremiah man a, kumpi uliante’ kiangah a paipih hi.
Kumpi uliante zong Jeremiah tungah heh mahmah uh a, a sat khit uh ciangin thong ding a, a kizang sa, kumpi thuvanpipa Jonathan’ innah thong a kia sak uh hi.
Jeremiah zong lei sung thong mial sungah ni tampi a om khit ciangin

kumpipa Zedekiah in a samsak hi. Kumipa in zong a inn sungah samin, “Topa’ hong thugenna kam khat beek a om hiam?” ci-in a dong sim hi. Jeremiah in zong, “Om mah hi,” a cih khit ciangin, “Babilon kumpipa’ khut sungah nang hong kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jeremiah in kumpipa Zedekiah’ kiangah, “Kei thong nong kiatsak nadingin nang tungah ahi zongin, na nasemte’ tung leh hih mite tungah ahi zongin bang khialhna hong bawl ka hi hiam?
Nang’ kiang a, ‘Babilon kumpipa in nang leh hih gam hong sim lo ding hi,’ ci-a thu a hong genkhol, na kamsangte tu-in koiah om uh ahi hiam?

Tu-in ka Topa kumpipa aw, ka thugen nong ngaih nadingin kong thuum hi. Kumpi thuvanpipa Jonathan’ innah nong puak kik nawn loh nadingin na mai nuai-ah kiniamkhiatna tawh kong thuum hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nong puakkik leh tua lai-ah ka si taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih manin kumpipa Zedekiah in kumpi thonginn sungah a kiat zawk nading thu pia a, khua sunga anlum a bei matengin anlum sai panin ni simin anlum khat ta a piasak den hi. Tua ahih manin kumpipa’ thong sungah Jeremiah a om suak hi.
Mattan’ tapa Shefatiah, Pashhur’ tapa Gedaliah, Shelemiah’ tapa Jehukal, leh Malkhiah’ tapa Pashhur-te in mi khempeuh’ tunga Jeremiah’ thugenna a za uh hi.

Jeremiah in mite’ kiangah, “Topa in hong cih-inah, Hih khuapi sunga a om mi peuhmah namsau tawh ahi zongin, kial tawh ahi zongin, pulnatna tawh ahi zongin a si ding uh hi. Ahih hangin pusuak khia-in Khaldea mite a beel peuhmah a nungta ding a, a suakta liailiai ding uh hi.
Topa in hong cih-inah, Babilon kumpipa’ khut sungah hih khuapi kipia taktak ding a, a kila ta ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa’ uliante in kumpipa’ kiangah, “Hih mipa i thatlum ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih thute a gen manin hih khuapi sunga a om lai galkapte leh mi khempeuhte lungkia sakin thazaw sak hi. Hih mipa in i gam mite’ phattuam nading zong loin a gim ngah nading uh a zong zaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
Kumpipa Zedekiah in, “En un, amah note’ khut sungah om hi, keimah in note kong kho thei kei hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in Jeremiah a man uh a, thong huang sunga om kumpipa’ tapa Malkhiah’ tuikhuk sungah khau tawh a khiasuk uh hi. Tuikhuk sungah tui om loin buan bek om a, Jeremiah buan sungah a tum hi.
Kumpipa’ inn sunga na a sem kumpi ulian khat ahi Ethiopia mi Ebedmelek in tuikhuk sungah Jeremiah a kikhiat lam a za hi. Tua laitakin Benjamin Kongpi-ah kumpipa tu-in a om hi.
Ebedmelek zong kumpi-inn panin hong paikhia a, kumpipa’ kiangah
“Ka Topa kumpipa aw, hih mite in kamsangpa Jeremiah, tuikhuk sungah a khiatsuk uh a khial uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh khua sungah anlum om nawn lo ahih manin anngawlin a puk si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Ethiopia mipa Ebedmelek sawl a, “Hih lai panin mi thum tonpih in la, kamsangpa Jeremiah a sih ma-in tuikhuk sung pan va kaikhia un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ebedmelek in zong a mite tonpih a, kumpipa’ innah pai-in van koihna sungah a lut khit uh ciangin tuikhuk sung pan Jeremiah khau tawh a kaihkhiat nading uh puansia sa leh puanlui pawlkhat a la uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ethiopia mipa Ebedmelek in Jeremiah’ kiangah, “Na lenuai leh khau kikalah puansiate dap in,” ci-in a sawl hi. Jeremiah in zong tua bangin ahih hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in tuikhuk sung panin khau tawh Jeremiah a kai khiato uh hi. Jeremiah zong thong huang sung mahah a om lai hi.
Kumpipa Zedekiah in kamsangpa Jeremiah a vaikhak a, Topa’ biakinn lutna kongkhak tumna-ah a sam hi. Kumpipa in Jeremiah kiangah, “Thu khat kong dong ding hi: bangmah hong im kei in,” a ci hi.
Jeremiah in zong Zedekiah’ kiangah, “Thuman bangin hong gen leng kei nong that taktak ding hi. Ka ngaihsutna hong pia leng lah nong mang nuam kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa Zedekiah in Jeremiah’ kiangah, “Eite nuntakna a hong pia Topa a nuntak bangin kong si sak kei ding a, nang a hong that nuam hih mite’ khut sungah zong kong pia kei ding hi,” ci-in kiciamna a pia sim hi.

Tua ciangin Jeremiah in Zedekiah kiangah, “Topa, a vanglian Pasian, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong gen-inah, Babilon kumpipa’ uliante na belh leh na nuntakna hong kihu ding a, hih khuapi in zong mei tawh hal tumna thuak loin nang leh na innkuanpihte na suakta ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Babilon kumpipa’ uliante na belh kei leh hih khuapi Khaldea mite’ khut sungah kipia ding a, amau in mei tawh hal-in amaute’ khut sung pan na suakta kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa Zedekiah in Jeremiah kiangah, “Khaldea mite’ kianga a tai Judah mite ka kihta hi. Amaute’ khut sungah kei hong kipia leh amaute in kei hong bawlsia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Jeremiah in, “Amaute kiangah nang hong kipia lo ding hi. Tu-a kong gen bangin Topa’ thu mang in. Tua hi leh nang adingin hoih ding a, na nuntakna hong kihu ding hi.
Ahih hangin na lut nop kei leh, Topa in ka mangmuhna sungah hih bangin hong lak hi:

En in, Judah kumpipa’ inn sunga a kinusia numei khempeuh Babilon kumpipa’ uliante kiangah kipaipih uh a, tua numeite in Zedekiah’ kiangah, ‘Na lawm muan’te in hong khem uh a, nang hong zo ta uh hi; na khe buan sungah tum ahih manin, hong nungngat ta uh hi,’ ci-in a gen uh hi.

Na zite leh na tate khempeuh Khaldea mite kiangah kipaipih ding a, nangmahmah zong amaute’ khut sung panin na suakta kei ding hi. Babilon kumpipa in hong man ding a, hih khuapi mei tawh a kangtum ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zedekiah in Jeremiah’ kiangah, “Hih thute kuamah thei sak kei in. Tua hi leh na si kei ding hi.

Ahih hangin kumpi uliante in nang kong hopih lam a zak khak uh a, nang’ kiangah hong pai-in hong hopih-in ‘kumpipa’ kianga na gen thute leh kumpipa in nang kianga hong gen thute hong gen in. Bangmah hong im kei lecin kong that kei ding uh hi,’ ci-a hong gen khak uh leh,
amau’ kiangah, ‘Kumpipa in kei, Jonathan’ innah a si dingin hong puakkik nawn loh nadingin a thuum hi’ng’ ci in la, dawng in,” ci-in a gen hi.

Kumpi ulian khempeuh Jeremiah’ kiangah hong pai takpi uh a, thu a dong uh hi. Amah’n zong kumpipa’ vaikhakna bangin a dawng kik hi. Tua ciangin amau a gen ding uh om nawn lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa tawh a kihona a za sim kuamah a om kei uh hi.
Tua hi a, Jerusalem khua a kilak ciang dong Jeremiah zong thong huang sung mahah a om lai hi.
Judah gamah Zedekiah kumpi a suah zawh kum kua leh kha sawm a phak laitakin, Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar leh a galkap khempeuh Jerusalem khua sim dingin hong pai uh hi.
Zedekiah a maan’ zawh kum sawm leh kum khat, a kha lina, a ni kua ni-in, kumpipa’ khuapi kulh a phulet uh hi.

Jerusalem khua a kilak laitakin, Nergalsharezer, Samgarnebo, galkapmang Sarsekhim leh sakol galkap mang Nergalsharezer-te akipan Babilon kumpipa’ kumpi uliante khempeuh hong pai-in kongpi laita penah hong tu uh hi.

Judah kumpipa Zedekiah leh galkap khempeuh in amaute a muh uh ciangin a tai sim uh hi. Zan laitakin kumpipa’ huan sung tawnin kulh tegel kikal-a kongpi kan tan-in khuapi sung pan a paikhia uh a, Arabah leizang lam a manawh uh hi.
