Ahih hangin Khaldea galkapte in a nung delh uh a, Jerikho leizangah Zedekiah a pha uh hi. A mat khit uh ciangin Hamath gam Riblah khua-ah, Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ kiangah a paipih uh a, amah in thukhenna a pia hi.
Riblah khua-ah Babilon kumpipa in Zedekiah’ muh mahin a tapate thahlup sak a, Judah gam kumpi ulian khempeuh zong a thatlum hi.
Zedekiah’ mittang a khelkhiat sak khit ciangin kol bulh a, Babilon-ah a ciahpih hi.
Khadea mite in kumpipa’ inn leh midangte’ innte a hal uh a, Jerusalem khua kulhpi a susia uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi cing galkap mangpa Nebuzaradan in khuapi sunga a kinusia lai mite tawh, ama kianga a tai mite tawh, a omlai mite tawh, Babilon-ah sal dingin a paipih hi.
Kumpi cing galkap mangpa Nebuzaradan in bangmah a nei lo mizawng pawlkhat Judah gamah nusia-in leenggah huan leh lo a pia hi.
Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in Jeremiah’ thu tawh kisai-in kumpi cing galkap mangpa Nebuzaradan thu pia a,
“Jeremiah la un. Limtak-in kem un la, bawlsia kei un. Ama’ deih bangbangin na gamta un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi cing galkapmang Nebuzaradan tawh, galkap mang Nebushazban leh sakol galkap mang Nergalsharezer-te akipan Babilon kumpipa’ ulianpite khempeuh in
thong huang sung panin Jeremiah a lakhia uh hi. Ahikam’ tapa ahi, Shafan’ tapa Gedeliah kiangah, inn a, a ciahpih dingin a ap uh hi. Tua ahih manin Jeremiah a mipihte’ lak mahah a teeng hi.
Jeremiah thong huang sungah kikalh cipa a om laitak-in Topa in hopih a:

“Ethiopia mi pa Ebedmelek’ kiangah pai in la, ‘A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong gen-inah: En in, Hih khuapi hoih nading hi lo, a siat nading ka gen sate ka tungsak ding a, tua ni a hong tun’ ciangin nangmah in zong na mu ding hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in kong cih-inah, tua ni ciangin nang kong honkhia ding a, na kihtak mite’ khut sungah hong kipia kei ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh nang kong honkhia taktak ding a, namsau tawh thahna na thuak kei ding hi. Topa in kong cih-inah, kei hong muang na hih manin na nuntakna na suahtak liailiai ding hi, hong ci hi,’ ci-in va gen in,” a ci hi.

Jeremiah kol kibulh-in Jerusalem khua leh Judah gam-a saltangte khempeuh tawh Babilon khua-ah a kipuak khit ciangin Ramah khua panin kumpi cing galkapmang Nebuzaradan in a khahkhia kik hi. Tua khit ciangin Topa in Jeremiah a hopih hi.
Kumpi cing galkap mangpa in Jeremiah samkhia a, hopihin, “Topa na Pasian in hih mun siat nadingin thu gen khin zo hi.
Ama’ gen mah bangin Topa in tu-in zong a hih khin zo hi. Note in Topa’ tungah mawhin a thu mang lo na hih manun, note’ tungah hih na hong tung ahi hi.

Tu-in, en in, na khuta kibulh kolte, tu ni-in kong sutkhiat sak kong khah khia ta hi. Babilon khua-ah kei tawh pai ding hoih na sak leh hong pai in. Keimah in nang lim takin kong kem ding hi. Ahih hangin Babilon khua-ah kei tawh pai ding hoih nasak kei leh hong pai kei in. Gam khempeuh na mai-ah om a, na pai nopna peuhpeuh ah na pai thei hi,” a ci hi.

Jeremiah a pai loh ciangin Nebuzaradan in, “Babilon kumpipa in Judah gam khuapite uk ding a, a koih, Ahikam’ tapa, Shafan’ tupa Gedaliah, kiangah paikik in. Amah tawh na mipihte lakah teeng in. Na teen’ nop kei leh lah na pai nopna peuhpeuh ah pai in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpi cing galkap mangpa in amah an leh letsong pia-in a paisak hi.
Tua ciangin Jeremiah zong Ahikam’ tapa Gedaliah’ omna Mizpah khua-ah pai-in gam sunga a om lai a mipihte tawh a teeng khawm hi.

Babilon kumpipa in Ahikam’ tapa Gedaliah, gam uk dingin koih a, Babilon khua-a sal dinga a kipaipih lo gam sunga mizawng pente ahi papi, nupi leh naupangte a en dinga a koihna thu gamsung khua neu-a om galkap mangte leh a galkapte un a zak uh ciangin
Mizpah khua Gedaliah’ kiangah a pai uh hi. Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael, Kareah’ tapa Johanan, Tanhumeth’ tapa Seraiah, Netofah khua Efai’ tate, Ma-akath mi Jezaniah leh a galkapte a pai uh hi.

Ahikam’ tapa, Shafan’ tupa Gedaliah in zong amaute kiangah kiciam-in gen a, “Khaldea mite’ khut nuai-a na om ding uh kihta tuan kei un. Hih gam sung mah ah teeng un la, Babilon kumpipa’ na sepsak le uh cin, no tungah thusia bangmah om lo ding hi.

Kei ka hih leh Mizpah khua mah ah ka teeng ding a, eite kianga hong pai ding Khaldea mite’ kiangah no’ taangin ka ding ding hi. No na hih uh leh leenggah zute, khuakhal ante leh sathaute khawm un la, na bel sung uhah koih un. Na laksa uh khua sung ciat mah ah na teeng un,” a ci hi.

Tua mah bangin Moab gam, Ammon gam, Edom gam leh gamdang a, teeng Judah mi khempeuh in, Babilon kumpipa in Judah gamah mi pawlkhat om sak lai a, tuate a uk dingin Ahikam’ tapa, Shafan’ tupa Gedaliah koih hi, cih thu a za uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mi khempeuh a kitheh thangna mun khempeuh panin Judah gamah hong ciahkik uh a, Mizpah khua Gedaliah’ kiangah hong pai uh hi. Lenggahzu leh khuakhal an tampi a kaikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kareah’ tapa Johanan leh gamsung khua neu-a om galkap mangte khempeuh Mizpah khua Gedaliah’ kiangah hong pai uh a,
“Ammon kumpipa Baalis in nang hong suam dingin Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael a sawl lam na thei hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Ahih hangin Ahikam’ tapa Gedaliah in amau’ gen a um kei hi.

Tua ciangin Kareah’ tapa Johanan in Mizpah khua-a Gedaliah kiangah, “Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael hong that sak in. Kuamah in hong thei lo ding uh hi. Nang hong kithat leh nang hong beel Judah mite kikhenthang ding a, Judah mi a om lai sun teng in zong bei lawh ding uh ahih manin bang hangin amah in nang hong that laizang ding ahi hiam?” ci-in a hopih sim hi.
Ahih hangin Ahikam’ tapa Gedaliah in Kareah’ tapa Johanan kiangah, “Tua bangin hih kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Ishmael’ thu na genna man lo hi,” a ci kik hi.

Kha sagih kha hong tun’ ciangin Nethaniah’ tapa, Elishama’ tupa, kumpi nam leh kumpipa’ ulian pente khat ahi Ishmael, mi sawm tawh Mizpah khua Ahikam’ tapa Gedaliah’ kiangah hong pai uh hi. Mizpah khua-ah amaute in an a nek khawm laitak-un,
Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael leh tua mi sawmte in, Babilon kumpipa in gam uk ding a, a koih Ahikam’ tapa, Shafan’ tupa Gedaliah pen namsau tawh a sat uh a, a thatlum uh hi.
Ishmael in Mizpah khua-a Gedaliah tawh a omkhawm Judah mi khempeuh leh tua laitaka a om Khaldea galkapte zong a that hi.
Gedaliah a kisuam ni zing ciang kuama’ theih ma-in

Shekhem, Shiloh leh Samaria khuate panin mi sawmgiat hong pai uh hi. Amaute in a khamul uh metin a puan uh bal kek-in, a pumpi uh a kikui gawp sa-in Topa’ biakinn ah an tawh biakna leh paknamtui tawh biakna a piak ding uh hong tawi khawm uh hi.
Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael zong Mizpah khua panin kap kawmin hong paikhia a, amau hong dawn tuah hi. Amau tawh a kimuh ciangin amah in “Ahikam’ tapa Gedaliah hong en dih un,” ci-in a sam hi.
Khuapi sung a tun’ uh ciangin Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael leh a mi sawmte in amaute a that uh a, a luang uh tuikhuk sung khatah a paai uh hi.

Ahih hangin amaute’ lakah mi sawm in Ishmael’ kiangah, “Ko hong that kei in! Mangbuh, mangbuhham, sathau leh khuaizu ka seelsim uh lo lai-ah tampi a om hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih manin amaute leh a lawmte a that kei uh hi.

Ishmael in a thah sa misi luang khempeuh a paihna tuikhuk pen a gol khat hi a, kumpipa Asa in Israel kumpipa Baasha a gal nan’ nading a, a bawl ahi hi. Nethanniah’ tapa Ishamael in a thah sa mi si luangte tawh tua tuikhuk a dimsak hi.

Tua ciangin kumpi cing galkapmang Nebuzaradan in, Ahikam’ tapa Gedaliah’ uk dinga a piak kumpipa’ tanute leh Mizpah khua-a a kinusia mite khempeuh-a kipan Mizpah khua-a a om lai mi vannuai khempeuh Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael in a man a, Ammon gam lam zuanin a paikhiatpih hi.
Ahih hangin Kareah’ tapa Johanan leh amah tawh a omkhawm galkapmang khempeuh in Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael’ tatsiatna khempeuh a zak uh ciangin
a galkap khempeuh uh tawh Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael sim dingin a kuankhia uh hi. Gibeon tuikhuk pi a tun’ uh ciangin a pha uh hi.
Ishmael’ mat mi khempeuh in Kareah’ tapa Johanan leh a hong tonpih galkap mangte khempeuh a muh uh ciangin a nuam uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Mizpah khua pan-a Ishmael in manin a pai khiatpihte khempeuh hong kileh hei kikin Kareah’ tapa Johanan a bel uh hi.
Ahih hangin Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael leh mihing giat Johanan’ khut sung panin a suakta uh a, Ammon gamah a tai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Kareah’ tapa Johanan leh a paipih galkap mangte khempeuh in, Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael in Mizpah khua-ah Ahikam’ tapa Gedaliah a thah khit ciang manin a paikhiatpih galkapte, nupite, naupangte leh kumpi inn sung mangte akipan a om lai mite khempeuh Gibeon khua panin a ciahpih kik uh hi.
Amaute Izipt gam zuan dingin a pai uh a, Bethlehem khua gei Khimham Khawlmun-ah a khawl uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Khaldea mite a kihta uh hi. Babilon kumpipa in gam uk dinga a koih Ahikam’ tapa Gedaliah, Nethaniah’ tapa Ishmael in suamlum ahih manin a kihta uh ahi hi.
Tua ciangin galkap mangte khempeuh, Kareah’ tapa Johanan, Hoshaiah’ tapa Azariah leh a neupen pan-a kipan a lianpen dongin mi khempeuh hong paipih uh a,

kamsangpa Jeremiah’ kiangah, “Kong thuumna uh hong ngai in la, hih a hong kinusia teng adingin Topa na Pasian’ kiangah, thu hong ngetsak in. Bang hang hiam cih leh khat vei lai-in mi tampi ka hih uh hangin tu-in nong muh mah bangin, mi tawmno khat bek ka hi ta uh hi.
Topa na Pasian in ka lam pai nading uh ahi zongin, ka nasep nading uh ahi zongin a hong lah nadingin thu hong ngetsak in,” a ci uh hi.

Kamsangpa Jeremiah in zong amaute’ kiangah, “Nong genna-uh ka thei khin zo hi. En un, Topa na Pasian uh’ kiangah nong ngetna bangun thu ka ngen ding a, Topa’ hong dawn’ kikna bangbang ka hong gen ding hi. Bangmah kong im kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Jeremiah kiangah, “Topa na Pasian in kote’ ading-a nang’ tunga a hong gen bangbang ka zuih kei tak mah uh leh Topa in man takin thei ta hen.
Nang kong sawlna uh Topa i Pasian’ hong gen bangbang hoih taleh sia taleh ka mang ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa i Pasian’ thu mang leng, ei’ adingin na hong hoih ding hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Tua zawh ni sawm khit ciangin Topa in Jeremiah a hopih hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Kareah’ tapa Johanan, amah tawh a omkhawm galkap mangte khempeuh leh a neupen pan-a kipan a lianpen dongin mi khempeuh a sam a,
amaute kiangah, “Na deihna uh kong thuumsak nadinga nong sawlna uh Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a hong gen-inah:
Hih gamah note na om suak uh leh note kong lam ding a, kong phel kei ding hi. Kong phut ding a, kong botkhia kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ tungah siatna kong tun’ sak manin ka dah hi.
Na kihtak uh Babilon kumpipa kihta nawn kei un. Topa in kong cih-inah, lau nawn kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah’ khut sung pana hong honkhia ding leh hong lakhia dingin keimah in kong ompih hi.
Amah in note hong hehpih-in na gam mah uhah na teen’ suak theih nadingun keimah in note kong hehpih ding hi.
Ahih hangin note in, Topa na Pasian uh’ thu mang loin, ‘Hih gam sungah ka teeng nawn kei ding uh hi.
Gal om lohna, peengkul kitum lohna, an duh gilkial lohna Izipt gamah pai-in tua laiah ka teeng ding uh hi,’ na cih uh leh
Judah mi a om laite aw, Topa’ kammal ngai un. A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih-inah: Izipt gam-a teeng dingin na pai teitei uh a, na teen’ teitei uh leh
na kihtaktak uh namsau in Izipt gamah note hong that veve ding a, na kihtaktak uh kialpi in zong Izipt gamah note hong nung delh veve-in tua lai munah na si veve ding uh hi.
Izipt gamah pai-in a teeng khempeuh namsau tawh ahi zongin, kialpi tawh ahi zongin, pul natna tawh ahi zongin a si ding uh hi. Amaute’ tunga ka tun’sak ding gimna panin kuamah a suakta kei ding hi.

“Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih-inah: Jerusalem khua-a teeng mite’ tungah ka hehna leh ka thangpaihna a kibuak mah bangin Izipt gam na pai uh leh note tungah ka hehna hong kibua ding hi. Mite in note hong lipkhap ding a, kihaamsiatna-in hong zangin hong zahko ding uh hi. Note in hih mun na mu kik nawn kei ding uh hi, ci-in a gen hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jeremiah in Judah gama a om lai sunte kiangah, “Topa in note’ kiangah, Izipt gamah pai kei un, hong ci hi. Tu ni-in note kong hilh kholhnate tel takin thei un.

Na sih nadingun lam na pial khin uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa na Pasian uh’ kiangah, kei nong paisak uh a, ‘Ko adingin Topa i Pasian kiangah thu hong ngetsak in. Topa i Pasian in a hong gen peuhpeuh ko kiangah hong gen in. Ko zong ka mang ding uh hi,’ nong ci uh hi.
Topa na Pasian un note’ kianga gen ding a, hong sawl teng tu ni-in kong gen khin zo hi. Ahih hangin note in khat beek na mang kei uh hi.
Tua ahih manin na teen’ nopna mun uhah namsau tawh thahna, gilkialna leh pulnatna tawh sihna na thuak ding uh hi, ci-in tu-in tel takpi-in thei ta un,” a ci hi.
Topa Pasian in mi khempeuh kiangah gen ding a, a sawl hih thu teng Jeremiah in a gen khit ciangin

Hoshaiah’ tapa Azariah leh Kareah’ tapa Johanan-a kipan mi gilo dangte khempeuh in Jeremiah kiangah, “Nang in zuau na phuak hi. Topa i Pasian in, ‘Izipt gamah a teeng dingin pai kei un,’ ci-a gen dingin nang hong sawl lo hi.

Neriah’ tapa Baruk in Khaldea mite’ khut sungah kote hong pia nuam-in hong kithah nading ahih kei leh Babilon-ah sal tang dinga hong kilak theih nading deih ahih manin ko a hong langpang dingin nang hong zang ahi zaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Kareah’ tapa Johanan leh galkap mangte khempeuh-a kipan mi khempeuh in Judah gama om suak nading Topa’ thugenna a mang kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Kareah’ tapa Johanan leh galkap mangte khempeuh in, a kihawl khiatna uh gam khempeuh panin a hong ciahkik Judah mi a om lai sun teng Izipt gamah a paipih uh hi.

Papi, nupi, naupang, kumpipa’ tanute-a kipan kumpi cing galkap mang Nebuzaradan in Ahikam’ tapa, Shafan’ tupa ahi Gedaliah’ kep dinga a nusiat mi khempeuh a paipih uh hi. Kamsangpa Jeremiah leh Neriah’ tapa Baruk zong a kipaipih hi.
Amaute in Topa’ thu mang lo uh a, Izipt gamah pai-in Tahpanhes khua a tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin Tahpanhes khua-ah Topa in Jeremiah hopih a:
“Suangtum gol pawlkhat la in la, Tahpanhes khua Faro kumpi inn lutna suangphah nuaiah phum in. Na phum lam Judah mite khempeuh kimusak in.

Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong gen-inah: En un, Keimah in ka nasempa ahi Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar ka la ding a, hih ka suang phumte’ tungah ama’ kumpi tokhom a phut ding a, tuate tungah a kumpi puanbuk a lam ding hi.
Amah hong pai-in Izipt gam hong simgawp ding a, pulnatna tawh a si ding mite pulnatna tawh si-in, sal-a mat dingte sal-in kiman-in, namsau-a si ding mite namsau tawh kithat ding uh hi.

Izipt pasiante a kibiakna biakinnte a hal ding a, a pasiante uh hal-in a puakhia ding hi. Tuucingte in a puan uh tung-a khahte paai khia-a a sian’sak uh bangin amah in Izipt gam a siangsak ding a, tua khit ciangin ngaihmuang tak-in a ciahkik ding hi.
Amah in Izipt gam Heliopolis khua-a mualsuangte a susia ding a, Izipt pasiante kibiakna biakinnte mei tawh a halsak ding hi, a ci hi,’ ci-in va gen in,” a ci hi.
Izipt gam Migdel khua, Tahpanhes khua, Memfis khua leh leitaw lamah a teeng Judah mite tawh kisai-in Topa in Jeremiah hopih a,

“A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah: Note in Jerusalem khua leh Judah gam khuapi khempeuh tungah ka tun’sak gimna na mu zo uh hi. En un, tu ni-in tua khuate a siasa mahin om lai-a kuamah teeng lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ka heh nadingin gitlohna bawl uh a, amaute-a kipan note leh na pute na pate un a theih ngei loh uh pasiante’ na semin paknamtui hal-in a bia uh hi.
Ahih hangin note kiangah ka nasem kamsangte khempeuh kong sawl a, ‘Ka muhdah hih a kihhuai na na hih nawn kei un,’ ci-in kong gensak tawntung hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in ka thu hong ngai loin a bil uh hong dawh lo uh a, a gitlohna uh panin kihei loin, pasian dangte’ kiangah paknamtui hal veve uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Judah gam khuapite’ sung leh Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah ka hehna leh ka thangpaihna ka bua-a ka kuangsak hi. Tu ni-a na muh uh bangin tuate kisia-in gamlak suak khin ta hi.

Tu-in a vanglian Topa Pasian, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah: Bang hangin’ note in hih bangin note’ siat nadingin mawhna lianpi bawl na hi uh hiam? Judah gam sungah papi, nupi, naupang leh naungek-a kipan a nungta lai kuamah om nawn kei hen, cih na deihna uh ahi hiam?

Note in si-in, leitunga minam dang khempeuhte in kihaamsiatna-a hong zat ding uh leh a hong simmawh nadingun bang hangin na khut uh tawh milim bawl-in na teen’ nadingun na zuat uh Izipt gamah pasian dangte’ kiangah paknamtui hal-in kei hong hehsak na hi uh hiam?
Judah gam leh Jerusalem khua kongzing laka na pute na pate uh’ gitlohna, Judah kumpite’ gitlohna, a zite uh’ gitlohna, note mahmah’ gitlohna leh na zite uh’ gitlohnate mangngilh khin na hi uh hiam?
Amaute in tuni ciang dong kiniamkhiat lo uh a, hong zaktak loin, note leh na pute na pate kianga kong piak ka thukhamte leh ka ngeinate na zui kei uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah: En un, note susia dingin na langkhat uhah kei ka ding ding a, Judah gam khempeuh ka susia ding hi.

Izipt gama teeng ding a, lungsim a khensat khin Judah mi a om laite, a vekpi-un ka si sak khin ding hi. Izipt gamah namsau tawh kithat sakin kial tawh ka puksisak ding hi. A neu penpen-a kipan a golpen dongin namsau leh kialpi tawh a si ding uh a, mite’ lipkhap, mite in kihaamsiatna-in a zat leh, mite’ simmawh ka suaksak ding hi.
Jerusalem khua ka siatsak bangin Izipt gama teeng mite namsau tawh, kialpi tawh, pulnatna tawh sihna ka thuaksak ding a,

Izipt gamah pai-a a teeng Judah mi a om laite in a zuatkik nop uh ahi Judah gamah ciahkik thei nawn loin khat beek suakta loin, zong a nungta suak kei ding uh hi. Galtai pawl khat longal khat beek a suakta kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a zite un pasian dangte kiangah paknamtui a hal lam a thei papi khempeuh leh tua lai-a ding nupi khempeuh-a kipan Izipt gam leitaw lama teeng mi khempeuh, a vekpi-in mi tampi tak in Jeremiah’ kiangah:
“Topa’ min a, nong gen thute kong mang kei ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin ka ciamsa uh bangin kote, ka pute ka pate, ka kumpite uh leh kumpi uliante in Judah gam khuapite leh Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah ka hih ngei uh bangin vantung kumpinu kiangah paknamtui hal-in tuidawn biakna ka hih zaw ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka tuacih uh ciangin an tampi ka nei uh a, hau-in gimna zong ka thuak kei uh hi.
Ahih hangin vantung kumpinu kiangah paknamtui halna leh tuidawn biakna ka hih nawn loh uh-a kipan bangmah ka nei nawn kei uh a, namsau leh kial in hong thatlum zawsop hi,” a ci uh hi.

Nupite in zong, “Vantung kumpinu’ tungah ama’ lim a suun dingin moh bawl-in paknamtui halna leh tui dawn biakna ka bawl uh ciangin ka pasalte uh’ thukim loh pi-a bawl ka hi zenzen uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jeremiah in tua bang a, a dawng kik papi, nupi-a kipan mi khempeuh kiangah,

“Judah gam khuapite leh Jerusalem khua kongzing lakah note, na pute na pate uh, na kumpite uh leh kumpi uliante akipan gamsung mi khempeuh in paknamtui halna na bawl uh ciangin Topa in tua pen a phawk lo sa na hi uh hiam? A ngaihsun lo sa na hi uh hiam?

Topa in na hoihlohnate uh leh na bawl uh kihhuainate hangin no hong thuak zo nawn lo hi. Tua ahih manin tuni mahmah-in zong na gam uh gamlak suak khin a, mite’ kihaamsiatna suakin kuamah teeng nawn lo hi.

Note in paknamtui halin Topa tungah mawh tham loin, Topa’ thu mang loin ama’ thukhamte, a ngeinate leh a hong thupiakte zui lo na hih manun tuni mahin zong hih gimna note tungah hong tung ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jeremiah in mi khempeuhte’ kiang leh nupi khempeuhte kiangah a gen laina-ah, “Topa’ kammal ngai dih un, no Izipt gama om Judah mite khempeuh aw,

a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in hong gen-inah: note leh na zite un na khut bek uh tawh na sep uh hi loin na kam mahmah uh tawh, ‘Vantung kumpinu tungah paknamtui hal ding leh tui dawn biakna piak dinga ka kiciamna sa uh bangin ka sem taktak ding uh hi,’ ci-in na gen khin zo uh hi. Tua ahih leh na kiciamna uh kip sak ta un la, na kiciamna uh bangin sem dih ve un!

Ahih hangin Topa’ thugenna hong ngai un, no Izipt gama om Judah mite aw; en un, Topa in kong cih-inah, Izipt gama om Judah mi khat beek in, ‘Topa a nuntak bangin,’ ci-in ka min zangin a kiciam nawn loh nadingun ka min lianpi tawh ka kiciam khin zo hi.
En un, keimah in amaute tungah hoihna tung loin siatna a tun’ nadingin ka bawl ding hi. Izipt gam-a om Judah mite khempeuh namsau leh kialpi tawh a si ding uh a, khat beek a suakta kei ding uh hi.
Namsau tawh thahna a thuak kha lo, mi tawmkhate in Izipt gam panin Judah gama teeng dingin a pai a nungta lai sunte in kei’ kammal leh amau’ kammal koi zaw, a manin tung cih a thei ding uh hi.
Note’ siat nading ka gen sa thute a hong tung takpi ding ahihna thu na theih nadingun Topa in kong cih-inah, hih lim note kong pia ding a, hih munah kong thuaksak ding hi:

Topa in kong gen-inah, En un, Judah kumpipa Zedekiah, a galpa ahi amah a that nuam Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ khut sungah ka piak mah bangin Izipt kumpipa Faro Hofra, a galte’ khut sung, amah a that nuam mite’ khut sungah ka pia ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Josiah’ tapa Jehoiakim, Judah gamah kumpi a suah zawh kum li a cin’ ciangin Neriah’ tapa Baruk in kamsangpa Jeremiah’ gen bangbang laibu khat sungah a gelh hi. Tua ciangin Jeremiah in Baruk kiangah:
“Baruk aw, Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in nang hong hopih hi.
Nangmah in, ‘Gimna ka thuak hi! Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in ka dahna leh ka natna hong behlap hi. Ka tautauna-in ka gim khin zo a, ka tawlnga thei kei hi,’ na ci hi.
Topa in nang’ tungah hih bang a gen dingin hong sawl hi: En in, keimah in ka lam sate ka phel kik a, ka phuh sate ka bot khia kik hi. Keimah in leitung buppi tua bangin ka hih ding hi.

Tua panin nang a peng thei tuam dingin kingaihsun na hi hiam? Tua bangin kingaihsun kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh, en in, Topa in kong cih-inah, mi khempeuh’ tungah gimna ka tung sak ding hi. Ahih hangin nang pen na paina mun khempeuh ah kong suakta sak liailiai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Gamdangte’ thu tawh kisai-in Topa in Jeremiah hopih hi.

Josiah’ tapa Jehoiakim, Judah gamah kumpi a suah zawh kum li a phak hunin Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in Eufrates gun gei Karkhemish khua-ah Izipt kumpipa Faro Neko simin a zo hi. Izipt kumpipa’ galkapte tawh kisai-in hih bangin a hopih hi:
“Na lumte uh la un la, galsim dingin kuankhia un!
Sakol vante vawh un la, tuang ta un, sakol galkapte aw. Na sik lukhute uh khu un la, na teipite uh tat hiam-in, na sik puante uh silh un.
A bangci mawk a hia? Amaute lungmangin lah a nungkik ta uh-a! A galkapte uh kileh hawl a, lau-in taikek mang mawk uh hi. Kinunglehhei kik lo uh hi, mun khempeuh ah launa vive! Topa in a ci hi.
A manlang pente zong paikhia thei tuan lo uh a, galkapte zong suakta lo uh hi. Leilu lam Eufrates gun geiah, hoi-in a tuk uh hi.
“Nail gunpi bangin hong khang a, guntui khang a bang kua ahi hiam?
Nail gunpi bangin Izipt gam hong khang a, guntui khang hong bang hi. Amah in, kei ka khang ding a, leitung khempeuh ka tuam ding hi. Khuapite leh a sunga teeng mite ka susia ding hi, a ci hi.
Sakolte aw, mai nawt un, sakol leengte aw, hat un! Lum tawi Ethiopia mite leh Put mite aw, thal tawisiam Lud mite aw, na galkapte uh kuan sak un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh tu ni-in a vanglian Topa Pasian’ ni hi a, phu a lak kik ni, a galte a thuhkik ni ahi hi. Namsau in amaute that ding a, a kham mateng a si uh a dawn ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a vanglian Topa Pasian in, Eufrates gun gei leilu lamah amaute biakna piakna-in a nei hi.
Gilead gamah pai un la, damna zatui va la un, Izipt-te’ nungakte aw! Zatui tampi na zat khit uh hangin, damna na ngah kei uh hi.
Gamdangte in na zum huaina uh hong za khin uh a, leitung bup-ah na kahna aw uh kiza hi. Na galkapte uh khat leh khat kiphu kha-in, a nihun a pukkhawm uh hi,” a ci hi,
Izipt gam sim dingin Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar’ hong paina tawh kisai-in Topa in kamsangpa Jeremiah hih bangin a hopih hi:

“Izipt gam leh Migdol khua-ah va gen un; Memfis khua leh Tahpanhes khua-ah va tangko un: ‘Kigalging sa leh kithawi sa-in om un, bang hang hiam cih leh namsau-in note hong kithat khin ding hi,’ va ci un.
Bang hangin na bawngtal pasian uh Apis guallel-in taimang ahi hiam? Topa in amah a vattuk hang ahi hi.

Na mi uh tampi tak hoi-in a tuk uh a, amaute in khat leh khat kiangah, ‘Kithawi dih un, i mipihte kiangah, i suahna gamah va paikik ni; tua hi leh hih namsau tawh kithahna pan i suakta ding hi,’ a kici uh hi.
Izipt kumpipa Faro, min thak khat pia un la, ‘Kam si bek-a hun mawk beisakpa’ ci un.
“A vanglian Topa keimah in Kumpipa ka hi hi. Taber mual in mual khempeuh sangin sang zaw-in Karmel mual in tuipi tungah sangpi-in a dawktoh bangin, no hong simpa’ thahatna a lian mahmah ding hi.
Sal-a hong kipaipih ciang ading na puanlomte uh, zial khol un, no Izipt gama teengte aw! Bang hang hiam cih leh Memfis khua in gamlak suak ding a, kisia-in kuamah teeng lo ding hi.
“Izipt gam in bawngla hoih mahmah tawh kibang hi. Leilu lam panin hong leeng cippi in amah a pet hi.

A galkap cialte nangawn amau lakah bawngno dawng hat lote a bang lel uh hi. Pangin do tentan lo uh a, nungkikin a tai kek uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ kisiat ding ni, amau’ daan thuak ding ni hong tung zo hi.
“A galte in do dingin hong kuan uh ahih manin Izipt mite in gul tai bangin zut khat a kisuah uh hi. A galte in sing phuk ding bangin, hei tawh hong kuan uh hi.
Gam pha lua-in a kiphut zawh loh hangin a galte un a singte uh a phukmai sak teitei ding uh hi, Topa in a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute kauphe sangin tamzaw uh a, sim zawh loh zahin tam uh hi.
Izipt-te’ nungakte a maizum ding uh hi, Leilu lam pana hong pai mite’ khut sungah, amaute a kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.

A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in: “En un, Keimah in Thebes khua-a Amon pasian leh Faro kumpipa-a kipan Izipt gam, a pasiante uh leh a kumpite uh, Faro kumpipa leh amah a muang mi khempeuh tungah daan ka tat ding hi.
Amaute a that nuam Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar leh a uliante’ khut sungah amaute ka pia ding hi. Tua khit ciangin Topa in kong cih-inah, nidang lai bangin Izipt gamah mi a teeng kik ding hi.

“Ahih hangin lau kei un, ka nasempa Jakob’ suante aw; patau kei un, Israel mite aw, Bang hang hiam cih leh gamlapi panin no kong honkhia ding a, na suan na khakte uh saltan’na gam panin kong honkhia ding hi. Jakob’ suante hong ciahkik ding uh a, nuam takin a teeng ding uh hi. Kuamah in amaute a lausak nawn kei ding hi.

Topa in kong cih-inah, ka nasem pa Jakob’ suante aw, lau kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note kong ompih hi. Note kong thehthangna gamte khempeuh ka susia khin ding a, ahih bangin note kong susia khin kei ding hi. A kilawm zahin kong thuhilh ding a, daantat loin kong mawk nusiat kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Faro kumpipa in Gaza khua a sim ma-in Filistia mite tawh kisai-in Topa in kamsangpa Jeremiah a hopih hi.

Topa in a cih-inah: “En un, leilu gam panin tui hong khang a, a let khia-in hong luang ding hi. Gamsung leh gam sunga om khempeuh hong tum ding a, khuapi leh khuapi sunga teeng khempeuh hong tum ding hi. Mite kiko-in, gam sunga om mite khempeuh a kap ding uh hi.
Sakol khe gingte za-in, sakol leeng gingte leh a pei kigawi gingte a zak uh ciangin, pate in a khut uh zaw lua ta ahih manin a tate uh a don zo nawn kei uh hi.

Filistia mite khempeuh kisia-in, Tai-ar leh Sidon pana huhnate khaktan-in, suksiat ni ding hong tung ta hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Filistia mite leh Kaftor tuipi gei-a a om laite ka susia ding hi.
Gaza khua-te maizum ta uh a, Ashkelon khua kisia ta hi. Aw, no Anakim mi a om laite aw, bang tan no leh no kisuliam ding na hi uh hiam?
Note in, ‘Aa, Topa’ namsau aw, Tawlnga nai lo ding na hi hiam? Na paai sungah lut kik in la, taang loin khawl dide in,’ na ci uh hi.
Topa in ka sawl nak leh bangci-in khawl dide thei ding ahi hiam? Ashkelon khua leh tuipi gei teng sim dingin ka sawlsa ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Moab gam tawh kisai-in a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in a gen-inah: “Nebo mite in gimna a thuak ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh a gam uh a kisia ding hi. Kiriathaim khua kila khin zo a, a kulhpite uh cim khin hi. A mite in maizumna thuak uh a,

Moab gam minthan’na bei ta hi. Heshbon khua-ah a galte un a sim nading uh a vaihawm uh a, ‘Hong pai un, Moab gam i beimang sak ding hi,’ a ci uh hi. Madmen khua aw, nang zong na gamdai ta ding hi. Namsau in nang hong nungdelh ding hi.
“Ngai dih un! Horonain khua-ah mi kiko veh! ‘Ngongtatna leh siatna lianpi!’ ci uh hi.
Moab gam kisusia khin ta a, a kahna aw uh Zoar khua dongin kiza hi.
Luhith mual kahtohna lampi-ah, a pai kawm-un a kap uh hi. Horonain khua-ah a tuahsuk laitakun khuapi sia-a a kikona aw uh a za uh hi.
‘Tai un! Na suahtak nadingun tai un! Sehnel gam a, gamlak laate bangin taimang un!’ a ci uh hi.
Na hatnate uh leh na neihsate uh na suan’ manun note zong hong kipai khiatpih ding hi. Na pasian uh Khemosh zong a siampi teng leh a ulian teng tawh, kipai khiatpih ding hi.
Khua khempeuh kisia khin ding a, khat beek a suakta kei ding hi. Topa in ka gen sa bangin, mualkuam leh zangleite a kisia ding uh hi.
Moab mite a leen’ khiat theih nadingun vasa’ kha pia un. A khuapite uh gamlak suak ding a, kuamah a teeng kei ding hi.
“Topa’ na citak-a sem lopa in haamsiatna thuak ta hen. Thah nading a, a namsau a dok lopa in haamsiatna thuak ta hen.

“Moab gam in a neu lai-a kipanin nuam takin a om den hi. Gam dangah kipaikhiatpih ngei lo a, thawl khat pan thawl khat-a tei kawikawi lenggahzu tawh kibang lo hi. A limna kilamdang ngei loin a gimnam zong kikhel ngei lo hi.

“Tua ahih manin, en un, Topa in kong cih-inah, Moab mite leenggahzu buak banga a bua khia ding mi kong paisak hun hong tung ding hi. Amaute in a thawl a hawm dong bung khia-in tua khit ciangin thawl a sukham zan ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite, a muan’ uh Bethel pasian in a maizum sak mah bangin, Moab mite, a biak uh Khemoshpasian in a maizum sak ding hi.
“Note in bang hangin, ‘Galhangte ka hi uh a, galsim hatte ka hi uh hi,’ ci thei na hi uh hiam?
Moab gam leh a khuapite susia dingpa hong paito ta hi. A tangval hoihpente uh thahlup dingin a kipaipih khin zo hi, ci-in a vanglian Topa a kici keimah Kumpipa in kong gen hi.
Moab gam kisiat ding sawt nawn lo hi; a gim nading hong nai ta hi.
A kim-a teengte leh a min a thei mite aw, Moab gam kah un. ‘A minthan’na bei khin ta a, a vangliatna kumpi ciangkhut kitan ta hi,’ ci un.
“Dibon khua-a teeng mite aw, na minthan’na mun sang panin hong kumsuk un la, leivui lakah hong tu un! Bang hang hiam cih leh Moab gam hong sim dingte hong pai-a na kulhte uh hong suksiatsak zo uh hi.
Aroer khua-a teeng mite aw, lam geiah dingin na en un! A hong galtai numei leh pasalte kiangah, ‘Bang thu piang ahi hiam?’ ci-in dong un.
Moab gam kisia khin zo hi, zumhuaina thuak khin zo hi. Thuum un la, kah un! Arnon gun dungah, Moab gam kisiatna thu va gen un.
“Pasian’ thukhenna mualtung gam teng leh Holon khua, Jahzah khua, Mefa-ath khua,
Dibon khua, Nobo khua, Bethdiblathaim khua,
Kiriathaim, Bethgamul khua, Bethmeon khua,
Kerioth khua leh Bozrah khua-a kipan Moab gam sung a gamla, a nai-a om khuapi khempeuh ah hong tung zo hi.
Topa in kong cih-inah, Moab gam’ hatna teng bei khin ta hi. A ki ki-at tansak a, a ban kikuaihtansak hi.
“Moab, zukham sak un, bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Topa langpanin kiliansak hi. Tua ahih manin amah in ama’ luak lakah a bual ding a, mi khempeuh in awi-in a nuihsan ding uh hi.
Moab aw, nang zong Israel mite nuihsan hilo na hi hiam? Ama’ thu na gen simin na lu na sin’sin’, amah guta sa na hi hiam?
“Moab gam a, teeng mite aw, khuapite nusia un la, kawl lakah teeng un! Ken pang-a vakhu bu bawl bangin va om un.
Moab kiphatsakna ka za khin zo uh hi—kiphasak pha mahmah hi. Kilian sak-in kisathei a, kuamah thu sim loin mite neu-et hi.
Ama’ hehna ka thei a, a kisialhna teng zuaupi hi-in, a sepna teng zong zuaupi ahi hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Tua ahih manin Moab adingin ka tau hi; Moab gam mi khempeuh adingin ka kap a, Kirheres khua adingin zong ka thuum hi.

Sibmah khua aw, Jazer khua ading sangin nang’ adingin ka nak kah zaw hi. Nang in leenggah gui zam bangin na hiangte in tuipi kantan a, Jezer khua dongah na zamsuak hi. Na khuakhal ante na leenggah gahte hong kisuksiat sak ta hi.

Lei hoih mahmah Moab gam panin lungdamna leh kipahna kila khia ta hi. Leenggah cilna panin leenggahtui ka luang khiasak nawn kei a, lenggah cil-in kuamah lungdamin a kiko nawn kei hi; a kikona uh lungdam kikona hi lo hi.

“Heshbon khua panin Elealeh khua leh Jahaz khua dongah; Zoar khua panin Horonaim khua leh Eglath-sheli-shiah khua dongah mite’ kahna aw kiza hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Nimrim tui nangawn keu ta a, kisusia ta hi.
Moab gam mual sang tunga kithoihna bawl-a, milim pasiante’ tunga paknamtui a hal mite, Topa in kong cih-inah, tua bang ka hih sak nawn kei ding hi.
Tua ahih manin Moab adingin ka kap a, Kirheres khua mite adingin misi vuina tamngai kitum bangin ka kapkhia hi: bang hang hiam cih leh a neih a lam khempeuh uh kisia mang khin ta hi.
“Mi khempeuh in a lu uh met tol uh a, a khamul uh kiatsiang uh hi. A khutte uh kui kek uh a, a kawng uhah ippi puan a teeng uh hi.
Moab gam innkhum khempeuh leh lam lianpi khempeuh ah kahna bekbek a om hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah, leibeel suktap bangin Moab gam ka sutam a, kuamah in phamawh a sa kei hi.
Moab gam kitam ta hi! A mite kap uh hi! Maizum-in hong nungngat ta uh hi! Tua ahih manin Moab in a kim-a om mite’ nuihsat ding leh lipkhap ding a suak zo hi.
“Topa in kong cih-inah: En in, muvanlai leeng bangin manlang takin gam khat hong leeng ding a, Moab gam sim dingin a kha hong zal ding hi.
Khuapite kila-in kulhpite zong kila ding hi. Tua ni ciangin Moab galkapte in nupi nausuak dingte bangin a lau ding uh hi.
Moab kisusia ding a, a minam-in a om nawn kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa dem-in kiliansak uh hi.
Moab gama teeng mite aw, Topa in kong cih-inah, launa, dum leh thangte in no hong pang hi!

Lauhuaina pana a taisim mite dum sungah a kia ding hi. Dum sung pan a, a hong kah khia mite, thang ah a awk veve ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Moab ka daantah ni-in hih nate ka tung sak ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi.

A bah gawp galtaite in Heshbon khua hong beel uh hi. A hih hangin Sihon kumpipa a maan’na ngei Heshbon khua panin meikuang hong kipan khia veve hi. Galsim nuam mite’ teen’na Moab gam gammong dongin mualsangte zong a kangtum hi.
Moab aw, gimna na thuak ding hi! Khemosh pasian a bia mite si khin ta uh hi. Na tapate uh sal dingin kipaipih khin a, na tanute uh zong thongkia dingin kipaipih hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in kong cih-inah, nidang ciangin Moab gam a ngei bang sakin ka hausak kik ding hi,” a ci hi. Moab gam thukhenna tu-a zah ahi hi.

Ammon mite tawh kisai-in Topa in a gen-inah: “Israel mite in tapa nei lo uh ahi hiam? Inn luah ding nei lo uh ahi hiam? Bang hangin Milkom pasian biate in Gad gam la-in a khuapite sungah teeng uh ahi hiam?

Tua ahih manin, en un, Topa in kong cih-inah, Ammon gam Rabbah khua kisim a, galdona aw a kizak hun ka tung sak ding hi. Tua khuapi kisusia mang ding a, khuaneute kihaltum ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa in kong cih-inah, Israel mite in a gam uh a lak sak mite kiang panin a gam uh a ngah kik ding uh hi.

“Heshbon khua mite aw, kap un! Ai khua kisia khin zo hi! Aw, Rabbah khua numeite aw, kap un! Ippi puan silh un la, kap un; Khua lakah lung-am-in kawi taitai un. Bang hang hiam cih leh na Milkom pasian uh leh a siampite leh a uliante hong kilak khiatsak ding hi.
A zulhzau numei aw, bang hangin na hatna kisaktheihpih na hi hiam? ‘Kua in hong sim zo ding hiam?’ ci-in bang hangin na hauhna suang na hi hiam?

En in, a vanglian Topa Pasian in kong cih-inah, na kim na pam panin nang tungah gimna kong tung sak ding hi. Nang hong kihawlkhia ding a, mi khempeuh amau’ tum ciatin a tai kek ding uh a, hong kaikhawm kik ding kuamah om lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in kong cih-inah, nidang ciangin Ammon mite a ngei bang sakin ka hausak kik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Edom gam tawh kisai-in, a vanglian Topa in a gen-inah: “Teman gamah pilna om nawn lo ahi hiam? Thu ngaihsut siamte in ngaihsun thei nawn loin a pilna uh bei ta ahi hiam?
Dedan gama teengte aw, Kihei un la, gal tai un; guam sungah bu un! Bang hang hiam cih leh ka daantat ni ciangin Esau’ suan leh khakte tungah siatna ka tung sak ding hi.
Mite in leenggah a lawh uh ciangin a gui tungah tawm a nusia lai uh hi. Zan-in gutate in na a guk uh ciangin a deih teng bek uh a gu uh hi.’

Ahih hangin Esau’ suan le khakte khempeuh ka guaksuak sak a, a bukna munte uh ka kilangkhia sak hi; tua ahih manin a bu thei nawn kei uh hi. A tate uh, a sanggamte uh leh a innvengte uh, si khin a, khat beek a suakta kei hi.
A tagah na tate uh ka kiangah hong koih un; ke’n amau ka kem ding hi. Na meigong numeite uh zong, kei hong muangsak un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah: Daan thuakna hai dawn ding a, kilawm lo mite nangawn in dawnin thuak veve uh ahih leh note in zong thuak loin om ding na hi uh hiam? Note in daan thuak loin na om kei ding uh a, hai na dawn uh kul ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in kong cih-inah Bozrah khua in mite’ lipkhap ding, zahpih ding, nusiat ding leh kihaamsiatna a, a zat ding uh a suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa kiang pan thu ka za a, gam khempeuh ah thugen dingin mi khat kisawl hi: “Hong kikaikhawm un la, Edom gam sim dingin hong kithawi un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh, en in, keimah in gamdangte sangin nang kong neusak zaw a, mite kong simmawhsak ding hi.

Na kihtakhuaina leh na kisaktheihna in nang hong khem zo hi. Suangken lakah na teeng a, mualsang tungah na teeng hi. Muvanlai bu zahin sangpi-in na teen’ hangin tua lai mun panin kong lakhia suk veve ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
“Edom gam in a mulkim huai gam suak ding a, a kantan mi khempeuh in a siat gawpna hangin lamdang sa-in a mulkim ding uh hi.
Topa in kong cih-inah, Sodom khua, Gomorrah khua leh a kim-a khuate a kisiat gawp bangin, tua lai munah kuamah teeng lo ding a, kuamah a baang pak beek kei ding hi.

En un, lonona a, nuam taka om tuute, Jordan gam tuulak pan a, a hong paito humpi in a delhmang bangin keimah in amaute a gam uh nusia-in thakhat thu-in ka tai mangsak ding a, a gam uh a uk dingin ka deih peuhpeuh ka seh ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei bang mi kua om ahi hiam? Ka to ding kua om lai ahi hiam?

Ka mai-ah kua kumpi hong ding ngam ding ahi hiam? Tua ahih manin Edom mite’ thuak nading leh Teman gama teengte’ gim nading-a Topa’ gelna leh ngimnate ngai dih un. A tangeekte nangawn uh kikaikhia ding hi. Mi khempeuh lau taktak ding uh hi.
A pukna uh gin’ ngaih lua ahih manin leitung a kiliing ding hi. A kahna aw uh San Tuipi dongah kiza ding hi.

En un, galte in muvanlai bangin manlang takin hong leengin Bozrah khua tungah a sim dingin a kha hong zal ding uh hi. Tua ni ciangin Edom galkapte in nupi nausuak dingte bangin a lau ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Damaskas khua tawh kisai-in, “Hamath khua leh Arpad khuate in thusia za uh ahih manin lung mangin a om uh hi. Tuipi dai thei lo bangin a launa uh dai thei lo hi.
Damaska khua mite thazaw uh a, taimang dingin a kithawi uh hi. Lungkhamna, dahna leh launa in amau lencip a, nupi nausuak ding bangin a om uh hi.
Tua khuapi minthang’ lungdamna khuapi, tu-in kinusia ta hi!
Tua ahih manin a vanglian Topa in kong cih-inah, tua ni ciangin khuapi laizang-ah tangvalte si ding uh a, galkap khempeuh zong a kithat khin ding uh hi.
Damaskas khua kulhpi mei tawh kihal ding a, Benhadad kumpipa’ inn zong a kangtum ding hi,” a ci hi.
Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in a zawh Kedar minamte leh Hazor khua ukte tawh kisai-in, Topa in a cih-inah: “Kisa un, Kedar mite va sim un! Nisuahna lama om amaute va thatlum un!
A puan bukte uh leh a tuu honte uh-a kipan a buk kongkhak puante uh leh a nate khempeuh uh kilak sak ding hi. A kalaohte uh kipai khiatpih ding a, ‘Mun khempeuh ah launa!’ ci-in a kiko ding uh hi.

Hazor khua-a teeng khempeuhte aw, Topa in kong cih-inah: gamla pi-ah taimang un la, guamthuk sungah bu un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in no hong langpang dingin gelna leh ngimna a nei khin zo hi.
“Babilon kumpipa aw, tho in. Nuamtak, ngaihmuang taka a om gam va sim in. Tua khuapite in kongpi lah nei loin a kalhna siktawn lah neilo uh a, a tuaci om mawk uh hi.

A kalaohte uh kisutkhiat sak ding a, a bawnghonte uh kilakmang sak ding hi. A sam uh a met tom amaute mun khempeuh ah kithehthang sak ding hi. Mun khempeuh panin amau tungah siatna ka tung sak ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Hazor khua in se-alte’ teen’na a suak ding a, a tawntung-a a kisia den khua a suak ding hi. Kuamah teeng lo ding a, tawm vei beek zong a va zin kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Judah gamah Zedekiah kumpi a suah tungin Elam gam tawh kisai-in Topa in kamsangpa Jeremiah a hopih hi.
A vanglian Topa in a cih-inah: “En in, Elam gam’ hatna bulpi ahi a thalpite ka kuaitan ding hi.
Vantung mun li panin huihpi ka mutmang sak ding a, Elam gam pana ka hawlkhiatte mun khempeuh ah kikhen thangsak-in a tun’ lohna uh gam khat beek ka omsak kei ding hi.
Amaute a that nuam, a galte uh’ mai-ah Elam mite ka lausak ding a, Topa in ka cih-inah, a lauhuai ka hehna amau’ tungah ka tung sak ding hi. Amaute ka thah siang mateng namsau ka nungdelh sak ding a,
Topa in ka cih-inah, Elam gamah a kumpipa uh leh kumpi uliante that-in ka kumpi tokhom ka phut ding hi.
“Ahih hangin nidang ciangin Elam gam nidang a, a ngei bangin om sakin ka hausak kik ding hi, Topa in ka ci hi,” a ci hi.
Khaldea mite’ gam Babilon khuapi tawh kisai-in Topa’ thugenna, kamsangpa Jeremiah in a gen-inah:

“Gam khempeuh ah genin tangko un; dial khai un la, im kei un. ‘Babilon’ khuapi kila ta hi. Bel pasian maizum ta, a Merodak pasian kitangawp ta hi. A milimte uh maizum ta a, a pasiante uh kisiagawp ta hi,’ ci-in tangko un.
“Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lam panin Babilon gam a sim ding leh gamlak a suaksak dingin gam khat hong pai ding hi. Gam sungah kuamah teeng lo ding a, a mihing a ganhingin a taimang ding uh hi.
“Topa in kong cih-inah, tua ni tua hun ciangin Israel mite leh Judah mite kap kawmin, hong pai khawm ding uh a, Topa a Pasian uh hong zong ding uh hi.
Zion khua lampi a dong ding uh a, tua khua lam maingat-in, ‘Hong pai un. A kimangngilh ngei nawn lo ding tawntung thuciamna khat Topa’ tungah ciam khawm dih ni,’ a ci ding uh hi.

“Ka mite tuu mangthang bang ahi khin uh hi. Makai tuucingte in mualtung tengah lam khialin a gam man’ pih uh hi. Mual khat panin mual khatah a pai kawikawi uh a, a giahna inn uh a thei nawn kei uh hi.
Amau a mute in na negawp uh hi. A galte un, ‘Ko bangmah khialhna ka nei kei uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pute a pate uh a muan’ leh a lametna uh ahi Topa’ tungah amaute a mawh uh hi,’ a ci uh hi.
“Israel mite aw, Babilon khuapi pan taikhia un. Khaldel gam panin paikhia un. Kel hon laka keltal bangin a paikhia masa ding kituh un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh, en un, keimah in leilu lam gam panin gam pawlkhat ka hanthawn ding a, Babilon ka simsak ding hi. Amaute in Babilon khua kimkotah gal pang-in tua khua a la ding uh hi. Galkap siamte’ lot bangin a thaltangte un khak loh a nei kei uh hi.
Khaldel gam kiluhgawp ding a, Topa in kong cih-inah a luh khempeuh in a lungkim dong uh a la ding uh hi.
“Babilon mite aw, note in ka gamh ahi, Israel mite na luhgawp uh a, lungdamin na kipah uh hangin, lopa kham bawngno bangin omin sakol bangin na ham uh hangin,
na nu uh Babilon khuapi maizum ding a, no’ pian’na na nu uh a mindai ding hi. En un, na gam uh gam khempeuh lakah a gina lo pen hi ding a, leikeu, gamlak, sehnel gam a suak ding hi.
Topa’ hehna hangin kuamah teeng lo ding a, gamlakpi a suak ding hi. Babilon khua a kantan khempeuh in lamdang sa-in khuapi siatna hangin zahko-in a phit san ding uh hi.
No thal tawite khempeuh aw, Babilon khua sim dingin a kimkotah gal pang un. Thaltang khat beek siit kei un la, kap un; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ tungah a mawh zo uh hi.

Khuapi sim dingin a kimkotah awng un. Babilon khua in hong lel khin zo hi. A galdalte uh cim khin a, a kulhte uh puk khin hi. Hih in Topa’ phulakna ahih manin, amau’ tungah phu la un; mite’ tung-a ahih bangun amau tungah bawl un.
Babilon khua khaici tuhte thatlum un la, an la ding a, phiaukawi tawite beisak un. Galte’ namsau kihta-in mi khempeuh in a mipihte lak mah uh zuankik ciat-in, a gam mah uhah a taikik ding uh hi.”
“Israel mite humpi in a delhmang tuu tawh a kibang uh hi. A masa-in Assiria kumpipa in a ne a, tu-in a tawpna ah Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in a guh dongin a teep tum hi.
Tua ahih manin a vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong cih-inah: En un, Assiria kumpipa daan ka piak mah bangin Babilon kumpipa leh a gam ka thuak sak ding hi.
Israel mite pen a omna sa uh mun mah ah ka omsak kik ding a, Karmel leh Bashan mual ah an ne-in Efraim mual Gilead mualah lungkim takin a om ding uh hi.

Tua ni tua hun ciangin, Topa in kong cih-inah, Israel gamah khialhna kizong ding a, kimu lo ding hi. Judah gamah mawhna kizong ding a, kimu lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka nuntaksak, ka nusiat lai mite a mawhna uh ka maisak ding hi,”
“Merathaim gam sim dingin pai un la, Pekod mite zong va sim un. That un la, a vekpi-in susia mang un, Topa in kong ci hi. Kong sawl khempeuh hih un.
Gam sungah gal simna aw kiza a, na tampi kisia hi!
Leitung khempeuh sekpi bang a, a khen Babilon khuapi, tu-in tua sekpi kitanin kitam ta hi! Gamdangte’ lakah Babilon khuapi tu-in a mulkimhuai suak ta hi!
Babilon khua aw, nang thang kong siah a, na awk pah hi; nang lah na thei kei hi. Topa langpang na hih manin, nang hong kimu-in hong kiman hi.
Topa in a galhiam koihna hong zo a, a hehna galhiamte a lakhia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Babilon gamah a vanglian Topa Pasian in sep ding khat a nei hi.
Mun khempeuh panin hong sim un; A an sal uh hon’sak un. An cian’ bangin amaute ciang un; A vekpi-in susia un la, bangmah nusiat nei kei un.
A galkap hangte khempeuh uh thahsak un. Amaute in gimna a thuak ding uh hi, a thuak ni ding uh hun hong tung zo hi.
“Ngai dih un! Topa i Pasian’ thuhkikna, ama’ biakinnpi hang-a a phulakna thu Zion khua-a tangko dingin ka mite in Babilon gam panin suakta-in a tai uh hi.

“Babilon khua sim dingin thal kap siam, thal tawi theite va sam un. Khuapi umcih un la, kuamah suakta sak kei un. Ama’ hihna tawh kituak-in, ama tungah hih un. Ama’ hih ngei mah bangin ama tungah bawl un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in kisa thei-in Topa ahi, Israel mite’ Siangtho Pa a simmawh hi.
Tua ahih manin khua sung laizangah a tangvalte uh si ding uh a, tua ni ciangin a galkapte uh a beimang khin ding uh hi. Topa in kong ci hi.
“En un, a vanglian Topa Pasian in kong cih-inah, Nang a kisa thei Babilon aw, nang kong langpan hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang kong daantah hun ding na ni hong tung zo hi.
A kisathei gam, hoi-in tuk ding a, kuamah in a phongto kei ding hi. A khuapite mei tawh ka hal ding a, a kim-a om khempeuh a kangtum ding hi.
“A vanglian Topa in kong gen-inah: Israel mite leh Judah mite in netniamna a thuak uh a, sal ding-a a paipih mite in lencip-in a ciahsak kik nawn kei uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute a Tankhiapa hat a, a vanglian Topa kici hi. Amah in leitungah kilemna a om nading leh Babilon mite in gimna a ngah nadingin, amaute adingin a sem ding hi.
“Topa in kong cih-inah, Khaldea mite, Babilon khua-a teengte a kumpi uliante leh a mipilte namsau tawh kithat uh hen.
Kamsang zuau mihaite namsau tawh kithat uh hen! A meidawi a galkapte namsau tawh kithat uh hen!
Sakolte leh sakol leengte, numei tawh kibang a galkap cialte uh, namsau tawh kithat uh hen! A sum a pai khempeuh uh, kituahmang sak hen!
Guahzu kei hen la, a gunte uh kang hen! Bang hang hiam cih leh milim biakna gam hi a, milimte a hailawh uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin gamsate leh se-alte Babilon khua-ah a teeng ding uh a, kalaoh-vasapi zong a teeng ding hi. A khang a khangin, a tawntungin mi kuamah a teeng ngei nawn kei ding hi.
Topa in kong cih-inah, Sodom khua, Gomorrah khua leh a kim-a khuate Pasian in a suksiat bangin tua lai-ah kuamah a teeng kei ding a, kuamah zong a va baang pak beek kei ding hi.
“En un, leilu lam gam panin mi hong pai uh a, gamlian khat leh kumpi tampi leimong gamlapen panin galsim dingin kithawhthawi hi.
A thal uh leh a teipi uh tawi uh a, giloin hehpihna lungsim nei lo uh hi. A husa uh tuipi ging bang hi a, sakol tungah tuangin Babilon mite aw, nangmah do dingin a kithawi uh hi!
“Babilon kumpipa in tua thu a za khin zo a, bangmah a cih thei kei hi. Lungkhamin lumcip a, nupi nausuak ding bangin na a sa hi.

“En un, lo nona-a nuam taka om tuute, Jordan gam tuulak pana hong paito humpi in a delh mang bangin keimah in amaute, a gam uh nusia-in thakhat thu-in ka taimang sak ding a, a gam uh a uk dingin ka deih peuhpeuh ka seh ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei bang mi kua om ahi hiam? Ka to ding kua om lai ahi hiam? Ka mai-ah kua kumpi hong ding ngam ding ahi hiam?
Tua ahih manin Babilon khuapi’ thuak nading leh Khaldea gam’ gim nading a, Topa’ geelna leh ngimnate ngai dih un, A tangeekte nangawn uh kikaikhia takpi ding a, mi khempeuh a lau taktak ding uh hi.
A pukna uh gin’ ngaih lua ahih manin leitung a kiliing ding hi. A kahna aw uh, gam khempeuh ah a kiza ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in a cih-inah: “En un, Babilon khuapi leh Khaldea gama teengte susia dingin keimah in huih ka nungsak ding hi.

A zap siang ding mi Babilon-ah ka sawl ding a, amaute in tua gam a zapsiang ding uh hi. Gimna ni hong tun’ ciangin amah a sim dingin mun khempeuh panin hong pai ding uh a, gam sungah bangmah a omsak nawn kei ding uh hi.
Thal tawite a thal uh lawnsak man kei un la, sikpuan silhte dingsak man kei un. A tangvalte uh hawi kei un la, a galkap honpi khempeuh uh nuaimang khin un.
Khaldea gamah kongzing lakah a liamgawp ding uh a, a si ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel leh Judah mite Israel mite’ Siangtho Pa tungah a mawh uh hangin, amaute’ Pasian, a vanglian Topa in taisan nai lo hi.
“Babilon khuapi sung panin taikhia un; mi khempeuh kisuahtak tek un! Babilon’ mawhna sihpih kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh a mawhna banga a thuak nadingun hih hun in Topa’ thuhkik hun ahi hi.
Babilon khuapi in Topa’ khut sunga khamhai tawh kibang a, leitung buppi zu a khamsak hi. Gamdangte in a zu a dawn manun, a hai khin uh hi.
Thakhat thu-in Babilon puk a, kisiagawp hi. Amah kah ngutngut un! A liammate adingin zatui la un; dam zo kha thei lai ding hi.
Babilon khua i damsak nop hangin, a dam thei kei hi. Nusia ta un la, i gam ciat zuanin ciah ni. Ama’ tunga thukhenna in vantung dong ban a, van dawn dong a phato hi.
Topa in thuman i hihna hong kilangkhia sak zo hi. Hong pai un, Topa i Pasian’ nasepna Zion khua-ah va tangko ni.
“Thaltangte hiam un! Lumte la un! Topa in Babilon khua susia nuam ahih manin Media kumpite a hanthawn hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih in a biakinnpi hanga Topa’ thuhkikna ahi hi.

Babilon khua kulhpi tungah dial khai un; galvil ding tampi koih un. Cing sak un la, galte buk sim dingin kithawi un. Bang hang hiam cih leh Babilon khua mite tawh kisai-a Topa in a gensa teng, a geel khin zo a, a sem khin zo hi.
Aw, no tui tamna gei-a teengte, no sum a haute aw, na hun uh bei ta a, na nuntakna khau uh kitat ta hi.
A vanglian Topa in; ‘Kauphe zah a, tam mite kong simsak ding a, Amaute in note hong zo-in a kiko ding uh hi,’ ci-in keima’ min tawh ka kiciam khin zo hi.
“Pasian in ama’ vangliatna tawh leitung bawl a, ama’ pilna tawh leitung piangsakin, ama’ siamna tawh vantung a zalh hi.
Amah a pau ciangin vantung-ah tuite ging hunhun a, leimong panin tuikhu a suaksak hi. Guahzuk nadingin khua phiasak a, a saal sung panin huih a nungsak hi.
Mi khempeuh hai-in pilna nei lo hi khin uh a, kham sekte khempeuh in a milim uh a maizum lawh uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a milim uh zuau hi lel a, nak thei lo hi.
Kiman’na nei lo, a haihuaipi hi a, a kidaantah ni ciangin a kisia ding uh hi.
Jakob’ Pasian in tua bang hi lo a, amah in na khempeuh a piangsakpa ahi hi. Ama’ mi dingin Israel mite teel a, ama’ min in a vanglian Topa ahi hi.
“Babilon aw, nangmah in ka sekpi leh ka galhiam na hi a, nang hong zangin gamdangte ka satnen a, kumpi gamte ka susia hi.
Nang hong zangin sakolte leh a tunga tuangte, sakollengte leh a hawlte,
Papite leh nupite, khanghamte leh khangmoite, tangvalte leh nungakte,
tuucingte leh a tuute, lokhote leh a tute, kumpite leh ukpite ka satnen hi.
“Topa in kong cih-inah, Babilon khua leh Khaldea gam-a teengte khempeuh in Zion khua-a siatna a bawl manun note’ muhna ah ka thuk ding hi.

“En in, mualpi banga lian a, leitung khempeuh a susia zo Babilon aw, nang kong langpan’ hi, Topa in kong ci hi. Keimah in nang’ lang khatah ka khut ka zan ding a, mualdawn panin nang hong khuk khia-in, kong kangtumsak ding hi.
Na suangte innkiu suangin kiciang lo ding a, innbul suangnuai phahin kizang lo ding hi. A tawntungin gam simtham na suak ding hi, Topa in kong ci hi.

“Leitungbup galsim dingin thu pia un; gamdangte kiangah peengkul mut un. Amah sim dingin kithawi sak in; Ararat, Minni leh Ashkenaz gamte sim sak un. Makai khat teel un la, kauphe honpi bangin sakolte va la un.
Amah sim dingin gamdangte kithawisak un; Media kumpipa, makaite, uliante leh a ukna gam khempeuh kithawi sak un.
Babilon gam in na sa-in, kitom-in a liing hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama tunga Topa’ ngimna a tangtung a, Babilon gam simtham suak sakin kuamah a teengsak kei hi.
Babilon galkapte in a do nawn kei uh a, a phualpi uhah a khawl uh hi. A tha uh om nawn lo a, numei tawh a kibang uh hi. A innte uh kihal sak a, a khua kongpi kalhna siktawnte uh a kitan hi.
Babilon kumpipa kiangah, thu ko ding a, hong pai kamtaite, a ciah leh a kuan kiphamat uh a, mun khempeuh panin galte in Babilon khua hong sim-in,
gun-a ngah mun teng la khin uh a, gal pan’na teng mei tawh kihalin, galkapte a lau mahmah uh hi, a ci uh hi.
A vanglian Topa, Israel mite’ Pasian in kong gen-inah: Babilon mite tawlkhat khit ciangin anlak bangin a kila ding a, sual tunga ancil bangin, a kicilgawp ding hi.”

“Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadznezzar in Jerusalem khua hong valhtum a, hong sukham gawp hi. Beel hawm bangin a hawmin hong koih a, gulpi bangin hong nawm valh hi. Ka neihsa a lim nono tawh amah kivak kham a, kei a hong hawlkhia hi.

Kei’ tung leh ka mipihte’ tunga hong kibawl ngongtatna Babilon mite tungah tung ta hen, ci-in Zion khua-a teengte ci sak un. Khaldea mite in ka sisan man thuak ta uh hen, ci-in Jerusalem khua cisak un.”
“Tua ahih manin Topa in kong cih-inah: En un, na thu uh kong sepsak ding a, no adingin kong thuk sak ding hi. A bual ka keusak ding a, a ciktui ka kangsak ding hi.
Tua ciangin Babilon khuapi pen innsia losia suak ding a, se-alte’ teen’na mun suakin, a lipkhaphuai, simmawhna tawh a kiphitsan, kuama’ teen’ lohna mun a suak ding hi.
“Babilon mite in humpi bangin a hawk khawm ding uh a, humpino bangin a ciak lualua ding uh hi.
Ka hehna tawh amaute an ka vak ding a, khua a phawk nawn loh dong uh zu ka khamsak ding hi. A tawntungin a thuum paisuak ding uh a, a khanglo nawn kei ding uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Thahlup ding a, kipaipih tuuno bangin ahi zongin, tuutal leh keeltal bangin ahi zongin, amaute ka paipih suk ding hi.
“Leitungbup’ pahtawi Babilon khuapi kila ta hi! Gamdangte’ lakah Babilon khua, a mulkimhuai suak ta hi!
Babilon gamah tuipi hong kahto a, tuihual lauhuaite in tuam ta hi.
A khuapite a mulkimhuai suak ta a, leikeuna sehnel gam suak ta hi. Gam sungah kuamah teeng lo a, kuamah in kantan ngei lo hi.
Babilon khuate’ pasian Bel zong ka daantat ding a, a na guksa teng ka lak khiatsak kik ding hi. Gamdangte in amah a bia nuam kei ding uh hi; Babilon khua kulhpi a cim ta hi.
“Ka mite aw, amau’ lak pan hong paikhia un! A lauhuai Topa’ hehna panin mi khempeuh kisuahtak ciat un!

Gam sunga kam dawn kigen sawnte hangin, lungkia kei un, lau kei un. Kum khatin thu khat kigen a, a kum kik ciangin thudang khat kigen lel hi. Gam sungah ngongtatna thu om a, kumpi khat leh kumpi khat kidona thu kigen thei hi.
“Tua ahih manin, en un, Babilon khua-a milimte ka dantah hun hong tung ding hi. A gam buppi ka zumhuaisak ding a, khua sungah kithatin a tuk ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin vantung teng leh leitung leh, a sunga om nate khempeuh in Babilon’ hangin lungdamin la a sa ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leilu lam panin amau a susia ding mi hong pai ding uh hi, Topa in kong ci hi.
Babilon khua in leitung khempeuh a, om mite a sihsak mah bangin, Israel mi tampi a sihsak manin tu-in amah in sihna a thuak ding hi.
“Namsau in a hong thah khak loh a nungta lai note aw, pai un, dingding kei un! Gamlapi pek panin Topa hong phawk un la, Jerusalem khua zong mangngilh kei un.

Note in, ‘Kote in maizumna ka thuak uh a, simmawhna kam ka za khin uh hi. Minsiatna in ka maitang uh hong tuam khin hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ biakinn siangtho, gamdang mite in a hong lak sak uh hi,’ na ci uh hi.
“Tua ahih manin, en un, Topa in kong cih-inah, Babilon khua-a a milimte uh’ tungah thu ka khen ni hun hong tung ding a, gam sung khempeuh ah a liamte in a tau ding uh hi.
Babilon khua vantung-ah a kahtoh theih a, a sangpi-ah kip takin gal dalna a bawl theih hangin, Topa in kong cih-inah, kei’ kiang panin amah susia ding mi a hong pai teitei ding hi.
“Ngai un! Babilon khua-ah mi kiko hi. Khaldea gam pana hong pai mite’ suksiatna lianpi hanga kahna aw ahi hi!
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in Babilon khua a maimangsak a, a gamlumna zong a daisak hi. Galte in tuihual lum henhan bangin hong lut uh a, awng-in a gamlum henhan uh hi.

Babilon khua a susia ding mi khat hong pai khin zo hi, A galkapte uh kiman khin a, a thalte uh a tum a tel suak khin hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a thukkik thei Pasian hi a, a thukkik taktak ding hi.
A kumpi uliante leh a mipilte uh akipan ukpite, uliante leh galkapte zu ka khamsak ding a, a tawntungin ihmu-in a khanglo nawn kei ding uh hi, ci-in a vanglian Topa a kici Kumpipa in kong gen hi.

“A vanglian Topa in kong gen-inah: A sah Babilon khua kulhpi lei lakah cimsuk ding a, a sang khua kongpite zong mei tawh a kihal ding hi. Mite’ nasepna a mawkna suak a, minamte’ hanciamna vut leh vai suak hi,” a ci hi.

Neriah’ tapa, Mahseiah’ tupa, Seraiah in Zedekiah kumpipa’ thuvanpa ahi hi, Kumpipa Zedekiah Judah gamah a maan’ zawh kum li ciangin Seraiah leh kumpipa Babilon-ah a pai uh hi. Tua hun laitakin kamsangpa Jeremiah in Seraiah thu a vaikhak hi,
Jeremiah in Babilon khua tawh kisai-in Babilon khua-a a tung ding gimna khempeuh laibu khat sungah a gelh hi.
Jeremiah in Seraiah’ kiangah, “Babilon khua na tun’ ciangin hih thute khempeuh na sim ding a,
tua ciangin, ‘Topa aw, hih munah mihing hi taleh, ganhing hi taleh bangmah teeng lo a, a tawntunga a kinusia gam a suah nadingin na suksiat nading na genkhia khin zo hi,’ ci-in thu gen in.
Hih laibu mite’ zakin na sim khit ciangin suang khat tawh hen khawm in la, Eufrates gun sungah paai in. Tua khit ciangin,

‘Babilon khuapi’ gitlohna hangin a tungah gimna ka tung sak ding a, tu-a bangin Babilon khuapi zong tum sukin a hong dawkto kik nawn kei ding hi,’ ci-in gen in” a ci hi. Jeremiah’ thugenna tu-a ciang ahi hi.
Zedekiah kumpi a suahin kum sawmnih leh kum khat a pha a, Jerusalem khua-ah kum sawm leh kum khat sung a maang hi. A nu’ min Hamutal hi a, Libnab khua-a teeng Jeremiah’ tanu ahi hi.
Amah in Jehoiakim kumpipa mah bangin Pasian’ hoih sak lohte hong sem hi.
Topa in Jerusalem khua leh Judah mite ama’ kiang panin a hawlkhiatna zah ding dongin a hehna a lian hi. Zedekiah kumpipa in Babilon kumpipa a langpan’ hi.

Tua ciangin amah kumpi a suah zawh a kum kua kum, a kha sawmna, a ni sawm ni-in Babilon kumpipa Nabukhadnezzar in a galkap khempeuh tawh Jerusalem khua sim dingin hong kuan uh a, khuapi kimkotah galdalna a phut uh hi.
Zedekiah kumpipa a maan’ zawh kum sawm leh kum khat a phak dong khuapi a kisim hi.
A kha lina, a ni kua ni ciangin khuapi sungah kial nasia lua ahih manin, mite in an nek ding nei nawn lo uh hi.

Tua ciangin khua kulhpi kiphutlet a, khuapi kimkotah Khaldea mite om napi-in, galkapte in zan laitak-in kumpipa’ huan gei-a kulh tegel kikal-a kongpi tawnin a taikhia sim uh a, Arabah leizang lam a manawh uh hi.
Ahih hangin Khaldea galkapte in Zedekiah kumpipa a nungdelh uh a, Jerikho leizang-ah a phak uh ciangin a galkap khempeuh in kikhen thangin amah a taisan uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in kumpipa a mat khit uh ciangin Hamath gam Riblah khua-ah Babilon kumpipa kiangah a puak uh a, amah in thukhenna a pia hi.
Riblah khua-ah Babilon kumpipa in Zedekiah’ muh mahin a tate a thahlup sak a, Judah gam kumpi ulian khempeuh zong a thatlum hi.
Babilon kumpipa in Zedekiah’ mittang a khelsak khit ciangin kol a bulh a, Babilon khuapi-ah paipihin a sih mateng thong sungah a koih hi.
Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar a maan’ zawh kum sawm leh kum kua a phak kum, a kha ngana, a ni sawm ni-in Babilon kumpipa a cing galkap mangpa Nebuzaradan, Jerusalem khua sungah hong lut hi.
Amah in Topa’ biakinnpi akipan kumpipa’ inn leh Jerusalem khua-a inn lian khempeuh a hal hi.
Amah tawh a omkhawm Khaldea galkap khempeuh in Jerusalem khua kimkot a, kulh khempeuh a susia uh hi.

Kumpi cing galkap mangpa Nebuzaradan in, mizawngpen pawlkhat tawh, khuapi sunga a kinusia lai mite tawh, Babilon kumpipa’ lam-a tai mite tawh, khutsiam mi a om lai teng tawh sal dingin a paikhiat pih hi.
Ahih hangin kumpipa a cing galkap mangpa Nabuzaradan in leenggah lo cing ding leh lokho dingin gam sunga a zawngpente pawlkhat a nusia lai hi.
Khaldea mite in Topa’ biakinnpi sunga a om sumngo khuamte, sumngo tuikuang leh a din’nate suzangawp uh a, sumngo khempeuh Babilon-ah a la uh hi.
Tua banah, biak piakna-a kizang belte, vut luahnate, taitehte, kuangte, sikkeute leh biakinn kikhopna-a kizang sumngo tawh a kibawl kuangte khempeuh zong a la uh hi.

Biak piakna-a kizang keu neute, meiam luahna kuang daite, kuangte, belte, khuaimeivak vakna khuamte, sikkeute leh tui buah nadinga kizang keute zong a la uh hi, Kham tawh a kibawl nate kham dingin ahi zongin, ngun tawh a kibawl nate ngun dingin ahi zongin kumpi cing galkap mangpa in a lakhia hi.
Solomon kumpipa in Topa’ biakinnpi adingin a bawl khuampi nih kuangpi khat leh tua nuai-a a pua, sumngo bawngtal sawm leh nih leh a din’nate sunga om sumngote a gihna kiteh zo lo hi.
Tua khamte khat ciangin tong sawm leh tong giat sang a, a kimkot tong sawm leh tong nih pha a, a sahna zung li pha-in a sung hawm hi.
A tunglam tong nga ciang sumngo hi-in tua mun teng a kimkotah sumngo tawh a kibawl mangkawlsing lim a kisuai hi.
Mangkawlsing a vekpi-in a kimkotah zakhat om a, sawmkua leh guk bek kilang hi.
Kumpi cing galkap mangpa in siampi lianpenpa Seraiah tawh, siampi lian a nihna Zefaniah leh kongpi uk biakinn upa thum tawh a paipih a,

khuapi sung panin galkapte a uk galkapmang khat leh khua sunga a kimu kumpipa’ uliante sagih tawh, galkap zum lai a kem galkap mangpa’ lai-atpa tawh, a khua sunga kimu midang sawmguk tawh, khua sung panin a paikhiatpih hi.
Kumpi cing galkap mangpa Nebuzaradan in amaute paipihin Riblah khua-ah Babilon kumpipa’ kiangah a tun’pih hi.
Babilon kumpipa in zong Hamath gam Riblah khua-ah amaute sat-in a thatlum hi. Tu-a bangin Judah mite a gam panun sal dingin a kila khia hi.
Nebukhadnezzar in sal ding a, a paipih mi phazah in hih bang ahi hi: a kum sagih kumin Judah mi tulthum sawmnih thum,
a kum sawm leh giat kumin Jerusalem khua panin Nubukhadnezzar in mi zagiat sawmthum-nih sal dingin a paipih a;
Nebukhadnezzar a maan’ zawh a kum sawmnih leh thum kumin kumpi cing galkap mangpa Nebuzaradan in sal dingin Judah mi zasagih sawmli-nga a pai khiatpih hi. A vekpi-in mi tulli leh zaguk a pha hi.

Judah kumpipa Jehoiakhin a saltan’ zawh kum sawmthum leh sagih kum ciangin Babilon-ah Evil-merodak kumpi a suak hi. Tua kumpipa in Judah kumpipa Jehoiakhin hehpih a, tua kum kha sawm leh kha nihna, ni sawmnih leh ni nga ni-in thong sung panin a suakta sak hi.
Hoih takin a hopih a, Babilon khua-a a ompih kumpi dangte sangin a sangzaw tutna a pia hi.
Tua ahih manin Jehoiakhin in a thong puante a suahkhia hi. A nuntak hun sung teng khempeuh kumpipa’ sabuai-ah ni simin an a ne hi.
A sih ni a tun’ mateng a nuntak hun sung tengin ni simin a kisapna bangin kumpipa in a pia tawntung hi.

Khat vei lai-a mi a dim taka a teen’na Jerusalem khuapi in bang zah ta-a gamdai ahi hiam? Leitung bup in a zahtak khuapi tu-in meigong tawh a kibang hi. Leitung khuapi khempeuhte’ lak panin a thupipen tu-in sal-in a kiman khin zo hi.

Amah zan khuavakin kap a, a khitui a biang tungah a tak kauhkauh hi. Amah a it ngeite khempeuh a hehnem ding khat beek a om nawn kei hi. A kipawl pihte khempeuh in kheemin, tu in a langpan’ khin ta uh hi.
Judahmite, a huh ding nei lo silate bangin a inn panun a kihawl khia hi. Amaute gamdang ah teeng uh a, amau gam ding a om kei hi. Galte in umcih uh a, a suahtak theih na’ng uh lampi a om kei hi.

Ni siangtho ni cianga a bia dingin Biakinnpi ah kuamah a pai nawn kei hi. Tua lai-a lasa numeite in gimna thuak uh a, siampite a tau uh hi. Khuapi kongpi-ah kuamah om nawn lo a, Jerusalem khuapi in gimna a thuak hi.
A galte gualzo uh a, amaute a nuaisiah gawp uh hi. Mawhna tampi a neih manun, Topa in tua bangin gimna a thuaksak hi. Naupangte nangawn sila dingin a kipua khia hi.
Jerusalem minthan’na teng a maimang zo hi. A makaite uh, lonona mun mu lo a, a vak kawikawi, sabengte a muh cianga taai lahpi-a a taai teitei sazuk tawh kibang uh hi.
Tu in Jerusalem kisia zo ta a, nidanga a thupitnate a nung phawk kik uh hi. Galte in a sim lai takin a huh ding khat beek a om kei hi. Guallel ahih manun a galte in a nuihsan uh hi.
A minthan’na teng a bei hi, a guaktang in om ahih manin a maizum hi. Thuum in tau a, a zum manin a mai a hum hi. Jerusalem in mawhna lian bawl ahih manin a kihhuai mahmah hi.

A kihhuaina teng kimu khia pah hi napi, gimna thuak ding ahih lam bang mah a awlmawh thei tuan kei hi. Tua ahih manin gimna a thuakna lian lua mahmah a, kuamah in a hehnem zo kei hi. A galte in zo ahih manin Topa kiangah hehpihna a ngen hi.
A galte in a neih a lam khempeuh a laksak hi. Biakinnpi sungah lut uh a, Topa in Gentailte pai nading a khamna munah a lut uh a mu uh hi.
Amaute in thuum kawmsa-in annek zong dingin a paikhia uh hi. A nuntak theih nadingun a sum a pai uh tawh an a khek uh hi. Khuapi in “Hong en in Topa aw, ka thuakna teng hong mu in” ci-in a kiko hi.
A kim a pama pai mi khempeuh kiangah, “Hong en in, kei’ thuak zah a gimna a thuak, Topa in a heh lai taka a hong thuaksak gimna a thuak kei longal midang kuamah om lo hi” ci-in a kiko hi.
Amah in vantung panin meikuang hong khia a, ka sung lam a hong kang hi. Amah in thang hong siah a, awk-in lei lakah ka kipuk hi. Tua bangin natna ka thuak tawntung hi.

Amah in ka mawhnate khempeuh ciamteh a, hen-in lom khat suahin ka ngawng zangah hong khih a, gik lua mahmah ahih manin ka taang zo peuhmah kei hi. Topa in ka galte khut sungah hong pia ahih manin bang mah ka hih thei nawn kei hi.

Topa in ka galkap thahatpente nuihsan lel a, Amah in kei do ding leh ka khangnote susia dingin, galkap honpi a hong kuansak hi. Amah in ka mi thahatpente lenggah gawi zan bangin a hong gawizan sak hi.
Tua ahih manin ka mit sung pan khitui a dim letin a luang hi. Hong hehnem ding leh hong hanthawn ding kuamah a om kei hi. Galte in hong zo khin a, ka mite a cimawh uh hi.
Hong huh un ci-a khut ka vanvan hangin kuamah in a hong huh nuam kei hi. Topa in mun khempeuh panin galte hong paisak a, amaute in a kihhuai na khat bangin a hong gimneih uh hi.

Topa in a thutang ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in ama thu a mang lo ka hi hi. Mun khempeuh-a a om mite aw ka thu genna hong ngai un. Ka thuaknate hong mu dih un. Ka khangno numei pasalte sal-in a kipua khia hi.
Ka kipawl pihte ka sapsap hangin a hong huh nuam kei uh hi. A nuntak nading uh an a zon’na lamun siampite leh makaite kongzing lakah a si uh hi.
Topa aw, ka thuaknate, ka lung gimnate hong en in. Ka mawhna hangin dah ka hih manin ka lungtang a kitam hi. Kongzing lakah kithahna om a, innsung nangawn ah sihna a om hi.

Ka tauna hong ngai in, hong hehnem ding kuamah dang a om nawn kei hi. Gimna nong thuaksak manin ka galte lungdam lua uh hi. Na ni ciam ni hong tungsak in la, kei thuak bangin ka galte zong thuaksak in.
A gitlohna hangun amau tungah thukhen in. Ka mawhna hanga daan nong piak mah bangin amaute zong daan pia in. Gimna ka thuak manin ka tau a, ka lungtang a gim hi.
Topa in a heh manin khuamial tawh Jerusalem a tuamcip hi. A vantung minthan’na teng uh kisiatna a suaksak hi. Amah in a heh ni-in a Biakinnpi nangawn a susia hi.
Topa in Judah gama khuate khempeuh hehpih loin a susia hi. Amah in a galdalna kulhpite khempeuh balzan gawpin a gam leh a gam ukte a maizumsak hi.
A hehna tawh Israelte’ tha hatnate hong suksiatsak gawp a, gal in a hong sim ciangin Amah in eite a hong huh nuam kei hi. Meikuang tawh kibangin eite langah hong pang a, na khempeuh a susia hi.
Amah in galte bangin a thalpi tawh hong ngim a, i lungdamna teng leh i kisak theihpih teng a hong thah khit sak hi. I inn sung tekah a hehna meikuang i mu thei hi.
Topa in galte bangin Israelte a susia hi. Amah in kulhpite leh kumpi innte a siasa-in a nusia hi. Amah in a bei thei lo dahna Judah gam sungah a tungsak hi.
Amah i biakna Biakinnpi a zan gawpsak hi. Amah in ni siangtho nite leh sabbath nite a beisak hi. Kumpite leh siampite in a nasia Ama hehna a thuak khawm uh hi.
Topa in a siangtho biakinnpi leh a biakna tau deih nawn lo a, biakinn kulhpi galte a susiasak hi. Lungdamna tawh Amah i biakna munah, amaute gal zoin a kiko uh hi.
Topa in Jerusalem kulhpi a kipuk ding a ngaihsun khin zo hi. Amah in a vekpi in a kisia khin dingin a sehzo hi. Tausangte leh kulhpite tu-in a kisia khin pikpek ta hi.

Kulh kongpite cim gawpin lei in vukcip a, kongpi kalhna zawlte a kitan gawp hi. Kumpipa leh miliante salin a om khin uh hi. Thukham kihilh nawn lo a, kamsangte in Pasian kiang pan mang a mu nawn kei uh hi.
Jerusalem puteekte in pau loin leilakah tu uh a, dahna lim lahna in ippi puan silhin a lu zang uh leivui a buak uh hi. Jerusalem nungak note in a kun ngelhngalh uh hi.
Ka kah kahna-in ka mit paat gawp a, ka lungsim a gim lua mahmah hi. Ka mite kisiatna hangin dahin husamin ka bah gawp hi. Naupangte leh naungeekte kongzing lakah a sibup uh hi.
Gilkial dangtaakin nu aw, ci-in kapkap uh a, a liam a bai bangin kongzing tengah a tuk pekpak uh hi. Tua bangin damdamin a nute uh ang ah a si uh hi.

Ka it Jerusalem khuapi aw, bang ci ding ka hi hiam? Bang hong ci hehnep thei ding ka hi hiam? Nang thuak banga thuak kuamah a om kei hi. Na tuahsiatna in tuipi cia pha a, a lamet huai bangmah a om nawn kei hi.

Na kamsangte un zuau thu longal thudang gen ding nei lo uh a, a thu hilhna uh khemna thu bek ahih manin, a khial na hih lam uh a hong hilh tel kei uh hi. Amaute in lam hong lak khial uh a, kisikkik theih na’ng hun a hong pia kei uh hi.

Tua khuapi siatna a mu peuh in awi-in khut a betsan uh hi. A kisia Jerusalem a muh uh ciangin awi-in, a lu uh pei-in a nuihsan uh hi. “Khuapi it huai i cih hih maw, leitung bup kisak theihpih hih khua maw?” ci-in a nui uh hi.
Na galte in hong simmawh uh a, muhdahna tawh a hong siik-et uh hi. “Khuapi susia zo ta hang! I suksiat zawh mateng i cihcih niloh mah hi” ci-in a hagawi uh hi.

Topa in a sehna bangin a tawp khakna ah a hong bawl hi. Sau veipi lai-a a hong hilhkholhsa bangin hong hehpih nawn loin a hong susia hi. Galte gualzawhna pia a, ei hong guallel sak a, amaute a lungdamsak hi.
Jerusalem aw, na kulhpite mahmah Topa tungah kiko sak in! Sun-le-zanin na khitui guntui luang bang sak in. Dahna leh kahna tawh na hun beisak in.
Zanin tho themthum in la, Pasian tungah kiko in. Na tate in hehpihna ngah nadingin na lungsim khempeuh pia in. Kongzing khempeuh ah naupangte puksi khin dektak uh hi.
Topa aw hong en in. Na bawlsiat mite hong en dih in. Nupite in a it a tate’ sa uh ne tanghial uh hi. Siampite leh kamsangte in Biakinnpi sung mahmah ah thahna thuak uh hi.
Khangno leh khanghamte kongzing tengah si uh hi. Galte in nungak tangval teng namsau tawh a thatlum uh hi. Amaute hehpih loin na heh ni-in na thatlum sak hi.
Kei hong dipkua sak dingin ka galte pawisiim ding bangin na sam a, amaute in hong umcih uh a, na heh ni-in a suakta zo khat beek a om kei hi. Ka hawmthawh ka it ka tate hong thahsak uh hi.
Pasian in daan hong piakna zia a thuak khinpa in keimah ka hi hi.
Amah in a thuk semsem khuamial sungah a hong hawlkhia hi.
Hong hehpih loin a khut tawh a hong tum niloh hi.
Amah in a liam a bai guh kitan sa-in a hong nusia hi.
Amah in lunggimna leh gentheihna thonginn sungah a hong kalhkhum hi.
Amah in sihna khuamial uih sungah a teeng dingin aana tawh thu a hong pia hi.
Amah in kol hong bulh a, taikhiat zawh lohna kulhpi sungah a hong koih hi.
Hong huh un ci-a ka kiko hangin ka kikona aw a pua lamah a kiza zo kei hi.
Hoi dangdang ka hih manin suang kulhpite ka kantan zo kei hi.
Amah in vompi bangin hong buk a, humpinelkai bangin a hong bawh hi.
Amah in lam pamah hong delh khia a, a hong balnen khit ciangin a hong nusia hi.
Amah in a thalpi kek a, thaltang tawh kap dingin a hong ngim hi.
Amah in a thaltang a thuk tum theithei dingin a hong kap hi.
Mite in sun tawntung hong nuihsan uh a, leitung bup in ciamnuihna-in a hong nei uh hi.
Amah in ut lopipi-in tuikha hong dawnsak a, ka duh lohpipi in an kha a hong nesak hi.
Amah in ka maitang lei ah hong hiat a, suang tungah ka ha a hong tahtan sak hi.
Lungnopna, cidamna, kipahna cihte bang ahi hiam cih mel ka thei nawn kei hi.
Sau vei nuntak zawh lai na’ng ka nei nawn kei a, Topa tunga ka lametna teng a bei ta hi.
Gimna ka thuak nate leh inn leh lo nei lo-a ka omna in gu kha bang hi a,
tua in a tawntung lungkiatna ahi hi.
Ahi zongin ka phawk giugiau thu khat in lametna khat hong nei theisak hi.
A bei thei lo Topa hong itna leh a hehpihna in a kizom paisuak hi a,
zingsang nisuak bangin thak tawntunga, ni a hong suah pelmawh mah bang ahi hi.
Topa longal neih dang nei lo ka hih manin, Ama tung bekah lametna ka nei hi.
Amah a muang khempeuh adingin Topa in a hoih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin thuakzawhna tawh ngak kenkan zo leng hoih pen hi, a hong hotkhiat nadingin Amah ngak ni.
Na khangno’ lai-in thuakzawh hat ding kisin leteh hoih pen hi.
Gimna i thuak ciangin damtakin tu hithiat-in i thuak zo ding hi.
Lametna om thei lai ahih manin phunphun huai pah deklo hi.
Guallel-in bawlsiatna thuak taleng tua banga om lel ding ahi hi.
Topa in hehpihna tawh kidim ahih manin hong nial paisuak lo ding hi.
Dahna hong thuaksak thei ding hi, ahih hangin eite a hong itna in muanhuai in a kip tawntung hi.
Dahna gimna a hong thuaksak ciangin amah lungdam pah sam lo hi.
Topa in thong sunga lunggimna i thuaknate a hong thei hi.
Mite in Pasian thusim lo-a, i hamphatnate hong paihkhiatsakin,
zum thukhenna ah a maan-a thu a kikhen loh ciangin, Amah in a hong thei veve hi.
Topa deihna bang bekin na khempeuh a piang hi.
Ama thu piakna bangin a sia ahi-a a pha ahi zongin a piang hi.
I mawhna hanga daan i thuak ciangin bang hanga phunphun ding i hi hiam?
I gamtatna sate ki-en pha kikin Topa lamah kihei kik ni.
Vantunga a om Pasian tungah i lungsim pia-in thungen ni.
“Topa aw ka khial khin uh a, nang hong lehdo kha ka hih manun ka mawhna uh na hong maisak kei hi.
Kote nong nungdelh a, na hong that khin zo hi. Heh na hih manin na hehpihna a kisel cip hi.
Na hehna in meiipi zahin sah lua ahih manin, ka thungetna uh na kiang a hong tung zo kei hi.
Hi leitungah kote a kihhuai nahteh muat bangin na hong bawl hi.
Ka galte khempeuh in hong simmawhin a hong zahpih uh hi.
Siatna bekbek tawh kidimin, kihtakna leh launa tawh ka nungta uh hi.
Ka mite a kisiat manin, ka khitui guntui luang a bang hi.
Ka khitui kang thei loin luitui bangin luang tawntung a,
vantung panin Topa in hong en sukin a hong muh matengin;
ka khuapi kisiatna in ka lungsim a kitam khamsak hi.
A thu om lopi in ka galte in hong mudah uh a, vasa siah bangin thang a hong siah uh hi.
Leihawm thukpi a kawt sungah hong hing khiat uh a, suangtumpi tawh a hong sincip uh hi.
Tui in hong tumcip gawp ahih manin a si khin ta-in ka kingaihsun hi.
Topa aw, leihawm thukpi taw panin ka hong kiko to hi.
Kong thuumna hong ngai in ci-a kong thuum ciangin na hong za hi.
Na hong dawng a, lau lo dingin thu nong pia hi.
Topa aw, nangmah in nong huh a, na hong nungtasak hi.
A mawkna-a hong kimawhsaknate thei khin na hih ciangin thu hong khen in la, hong gum in.
Ka galte’ hong muhdahna leh a vaihawm simna thute uh na thei khin zo hi.
Topa aw amau’ hong simmawhnate na thei zo a, a ngimnate khempeuh uh zong na thei zo hi.
Sun tawntung kei bawlsiat nading bekbek kamkumin vai a hawm tawntung uh hi.
Zingsang a kipan nitak dong a hong zahpih uh hi.
Topa aw, amau gamtatna bangin thukkik in.
Amaute phuisam in la, a cimawh dingin hawlkhia in.
Amaute delh kek in la, leitung panin nuaimang gawp in.
Biakinnpi kisia a, suang kiciangte kongzing lakah a kithehthang hi. Khamtui tawh a kizut a tee daldalte a mualmang khin zo hi.
Kham banga manpha Jerusalem tangval note, tu-in leibeel bang lel-in a kibawl hi.
Keivompi nangawn in zong a note a nawi pia thei buang napi, ka mite in kalaoh vasa bangin a tanote a sugawp hi.
Amaute in a tangeekte uh gilkial dangtak-in sisak uh a, naupang note anngen dingin vaksak uh a, kuamah in an a pia kei hi.
An limpen a ne ngeite kongzing lakah puksi uh a, nuamsa a, khangkhia mite in nin buakna lak thai-in an a zong uh hi.
Jerusalem’ mawhna in Sodom khuapi mawhna sangin lianzaw ahih manin, thakhatin Pasian khut sungpan kisiatna a ngah uh hi.
Pasian’ mi dinga kipia Nazir-te in amau pumpi uh a siasak lo, vuuk banga ngo, a cidam, a thahat mite ahi uh hi.
Tu-in amaute kuama theih lohin kongzing lakah tuk pekpak uh a, a si dingin a mai uh dup khin a, a vun uh sing bangin keu gaw-in, a guh guakin a om uh hi.
Nek ding nei lo-a puksih sangin galsunga site hampha zaw lai hi. Annek ding nei lo-a site a puksi ahi uh hi.
Ka mite a cihmawh lai takun, itna a nei nupite nangawn in, a tanote uh goin beel sungah a huan uh hi.
Topa in a hehna khempeuh siit nawn loin hong buakhia-a, meikuang tawh Jerusalem hong hal ahih manin a kangtum hi.
Namdangte’ gam ukte leh mi khempeuh in, Jerusalem sim zo ding kuamah om lo ding hi ci-a up lai takun;
Hih thu a hong piang hi. Kamsangte leh siampite in mawhna a bawl manun mi siangtho midikte’ sihna a hong piang hi.
Amaute mittaw bangin kongzing lakah vak uh a, kuama lawn’ngam loh dingin si-le-nai tawh a dim uh hi.
Mite in “Paikhia un mi ninte aw, hong lawng kha kei un” ci-in a kiko uh hi. Tua bangin minam khat khit nam khat kiangah pai kawikawi uh a, ahih hangin kuamah in amaute a ngai kei uh hi.
Topa in amaute a zat nopna om nawn lo ahih manin a thehthang hi. Amah in i makaite leh i siampite a awlmawh nawn kei hi.
Huhna ngenin ka khawdakdak uh a, khawdak zo nawn lo zah dongin ka om uh hangin bangmah ka ngah kei uh hi. A hong pia zo lo ding minamte tungah huhna ka ngenngen kha uh hi.
Galte in hong vilsim uh ahih manin kongzing lakah ka vakkhia ngam kei uh hi. Ka hun uh a beita hi. A beina hun a tung zo hi.
Mu ak bawh sanga manlang zawin, amaute in a hong delh uh hi. Amaute in mualtung panin hong nawhsuk uh a, theihkholh lohin a hong man khin uh hi.
Amaute in galte khut sung pana a hong hu zo dinga ka up uh, Pasian’ teel a muanhuai kumpi a hong matsak uh hi.
Edom leh Uzmite aw nuinui mai un, ahih theih laiteng kipak un. Bang hang hiam cih leh siatna hun hong tung ding a, a hong tun’ ciangin na guaktangun om-in, maizum-in na om ding uh hi.

Jerusalem in a mawhna thaman a sang khin zo hi. Ka thuak ding uh a nasiapen pen teng ka thuak khin zo uh hi. Ahih hangin Edom aw, Topa in nang daan hong pia ding a, na mawhna a hong pholak sak ding hi.
Topa aw, kote tunga, thupiangte hong phawk in. Hong en in la, ka maizumna uh hong mu in.
Ka neihsa teng uh gamdang mite’ khut sung tung khin a, ka innsung uhah gamdang mite a teeng uh hi.
Ka pate uh gal in hong thahsak khin a, ka nute uh a meigong khin uh hi.
Ka tuidawn ding uh lei ding kul a, ka sing cih ding uh lei ding a kul hi.
Kalaoh van pua leh la van pua bangin nakpi takin a hong kihawl gawpgawp hi. Gim mahmah hi napi, tawlngak na’ng hun a hong kipia kei hi.
Ka nuntak theih nadingun Assiria leh Izipt-te kiangah an ngen dingin ka pai uh hi.
Ka pute ka pate un mawhna a bawl manun a si khin uh hi. Amau’ mawhna kote in ka thuak uh hi.
Silate sanga a zahpih huaizaw mite in hong uk tazen uh a, kuamah in amau khut sung panin a hong honkhia thei kei hi.
