Gamsung tengah misuamte dim ahih manin, luang kham zen mahin an zong dingin ka pai uh hi.
Gilkial luat manin cisa-in ka nattun uh a, ka pumpi uh mei-amsa a bang hi.
Zion mual-ah ka zite uh hong kibuansak a, Judah khua khempeuh ah ka ta nungakte uh a hong kibuansak hi.
Makaite hong kikhailupsak a, puteekte hong kithusimsak kei hi.
Tangvalte sila bangin aana tawh an kigawi sak a, naupangnote sing kitomsakin a lelhpipi-un a kipuasak hi.
Puteekte khuapi kongpi ah tu nawn lo uh a, khangnote in la a sa nawn kei uh hi.
Lungnopna teng bei khin a, lungdamna teng lungkhamna a suak hi.
Kisak theih nading bang mah om nawn lo-a, mawh i hih manin gimna i thuak hi.
I lungsim mahmah cina a, khitui in i mit hong mialsak hi.
Zion mual in gamdaihna-ah kinusia khin ahih manin se-alte a kawivak uh hi.
Ahih hangin Topa aw nang na hih leh a tawntung kumpipa na hi a, huntawp dongin na uk ding hi.
Bang hanga sau veipi hong pampaih na hi hiam? Kote hong phawkkik nawn lo ding na hi hiam?
Topa aw kote hong kaikhawm kik in! hong kaikhawm kik in! A beisa sau veipi lai mah bangin hong thaksuaksak kik in.
Kote hong nial tawntung takpi ding na hi hiam? Na hehna in ciangtan hun nei thei lo ding ahi hiam?

Kum sawm thum ka phak kum, a kha lina, a ninga ni-in Babilon gam-a om Khebar Gun gei-ah sal-a om Judah midangte tawh ka om lai takin maang ka mu hi. Tua ka maang muhna-ah van hong kihong a, Pasian ka mu hi
Tua hun pen Kumpi Jehoiakhin sal-in a kimat zawh a kum ngana, tua kha sungah a ni nga ni mah ahi hi.
Tua Babilon gam Khebar Gun gei-ah ka om lai takin siampi Buzi’ tapa keimah Ezekiel in Topa’ hong thugenna ka za a, ama vangliatna zong kei tungah hong tun’na ka phawk hi.

Ka khuadak leh, leilu lam panin huihpi hong nung ka mu hi. Tua huihpi tawh a hong ton meiipi lak panin khua hong phia a, a kimkot teng taang pempam hi. Tua khua phiatna mun pen sumngo tawh kibangin taang hi.
Tua huihpi laizangah ganhing li a om tawh a kibang pian ka mu hi. Tua ka muhte in mihing lim pua napi-in,
maitang li leh kha li nei ciat uh hi.
A khete uh mam zeza a, ahi zongin a khepeekte uh bawng khe tawh kibang hi. Tua ganhingte pen a kinawtngil sumngo tawh kibang uh hi.
Maitang li leh kha li ciat a neih ban uhah, a khaphung nuai a pangpi uh panin a mengkhia mihing khut tawh a kibang li ciat mah nei lai uh hi.

Tua ganhing lite in a kha nih ciat uh zalin, a mong leh a mong kimatsak uh a, ki-umcihin sikli nei-in kimu hi. Amaute a gamtat ciangin a li-in tat khatin tang uh ahih manin a pumpi uh kituam hei lo hi.
Tua ganhingte in maitang li ciat nei uh hi. Maitang ngeina lamah mihing mai, taklam pangah humpinelkai mai, veilam pangah bawngtal mai, a dek lamah muvanlai mai nei ciat uh hi.
Tua ganhingte in a kha nih ciat uh zal-in a zom-a omte’ kha mong dawn tawh kimatsak uh a, a om lai a kha nihte gel ciat uh khupin a pumpi uh tuam uh hi.
Tua ganhingte in maitang li ciat nei-in mun khempeuh a maingatsa suak uh ahih manin, kha in a pai sak nopna peuhpeuh ah, a pumpi uh kihei kul loin a pai thei pahpah uh hi.
Tua ganhingte lakah meikuang tawh a kibang a phia niloh om hi. Tua meikuang pen kuang pha mahmah a, khua phiasak zaizai hi.
Tua ganhingte zong khuaphia mah bangin kin zalzal kawikawi uh hi.
Tua ganhing lite ka et lai takin amaute in leengpei khat ciat a neih lam uh ka mu a, a leengpeite leilak ah kinga hi.
Tua leengpeite a vekpi-in kibang kim a, suangmanpha bangin tee uh hi. Tua leengpeite in a kikantan lamin pei khat ciat nei thuah uh ahih manin,
a utna lam peuhpeuh ah pai thei uh hi.
Tua leengpei kualte tungah mittang vive a dimin om hi.
Tua ganhingte a kin ciangin leengpeite tawh kinkhawm a, leilak panin tua ganhingte van lamah kangin a kahtoh ciangin a leengpeite tawh zong kangto khawm hi.
Amau’ utna peuhpeuh uhah tua ganhingte pai uh a, tua leengpeite pen a ganhingte’ khutnuai ahih manin, ganhingte’ paina peuhpeuh ah pai uh hi.
Tua leengpeite pen ganhingte’ khut nuai-a om ahih manin ganhingte pai leh pai-in, khawl leh khawlin, van-ah kahto leh kahto-in; a ganhingte’ tat bang teekteekin ta uh hi.
Tua ganhingte’ lu tung san-ah limlang tawh a kibawl a kuum kiukiau pian khat om hi.
Tua a kuum nuai-ah, ganhingte in a kizompih ciatte lamah a kha nihte ciat zal uh a, a kha nih ciat uh tawh amau pumpi ciat tuam uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute’ leen’na a khaging uh ka za hi. Tua a khaging in tuipi ging, galkap honpi huging, leh Vanglian Pasian’ awgingte tawh kibang hi. A leen’nawn loh uh ciangin a kha uh khup a,
ahi zongin amaute’ lu tung san-a om a kuum tung san panin awging kiza lai hi.
Tua a kuum tung zangah, sapfeiros suangmanpha tawh a kibawl kumpi tokhom bang pian khat om a, tua tokhom tungah mi tawh a kibang pian lim khat tu hi.
Tua tokhom tunga tu ka muh pen, meikhuk sunga a kihalsan sumngo bangin taang heuhau a, a kimkot khempeuh zong tua mah bangin taang pempam hi.

Tua a taang khuavak in meii lakah sakhituihup kai-in a neih mel nam tuamtuam khempeuh nei kim hi. Topa’ vangliatna lim pen tu-a ka gen bang ahi hi; Hih bang ka muh ciangin lei lakah ka bok suk a, tua ciangin awging khat ka za hi.
Tua awging in, “Mihing ahi Ezekiel aw, ding to in. Nang tungah thu kong gen nuam hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua bangin thu hong gen lai takin Pasian’ Kha ka sungah hong lutin ka khe-in hong ding to sak hi. Tua ciangin awging kizom lai-in kei kiangah,
“Ezekiel aw, kei hong langpan’ in a hong lehdo Israel minamte kiangah nang a hong sawl ka hi hi. A pu a pate uh mah bangin amaute in tu dongin kei hong lehdo uh hi.
Amaute a lungsim uh khauhin paupeng uh hi. Keimah Topa Pasian in amaute tungah ka gen ding thute a va gen dingin a hong sawl ka hi hi.
Amaute in nangma thu hong mang a, hong mang kei zongin, amaute lakah kamsang khat a om khit lam tak thei ding uh hi.

Ahi zongin Ezekiel aw, amaute ahi a, a thugente uh ahi zongin na kihta kei ding hi. Amaute in nang ling hong kaihnelh ding a, mom-ai laka om na bang ding hi. Tua bang hita se leh, hih a lehdo thei mite’ maipuakzia leh amaute’ kampaunate hangin lau tuan kei in.
Amaute in hong mang a, hong mang kei zongin, nang tungah kong gen khempeuh amaute tungah va gen in. Amaute pen a lehdo thei mi ahihna uh phawk in.
“Ezekiel aw, nang tungah kong gen thute ngai in. Amaute bangin hong langpang kei in. Na kam ka in la, tu-in ka hong piak ding na ne in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei lamah khut khat hong kizan a, tua khut in laizial tawn khat a tawi ka mu hi.
Tua ciangin tua khut in tua lai kizial hong phel a, a lang nih tuakah lai kigelhin, dahna kahna thu leh thuumna tauna thute vive a kigelh ka mu hi.
Tua ciangin amah in kei kiangah, “Ezekiel aw, nang tungah ka hong piak hih laizial ne in. Tua ciangin va pai in la, Israel mite kiangah thu va gen in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ahih manin kei zong ka kam ka ka a, ka nek dingin a laizial hong pia hi.
Amah in, “Ezekiel aw, ka hong piak laizial ne in la, na gilpi dim takin ne in,” hong ci hi. Kei zong tua laizial ka ne a, khuaizu tawh kibangin khum ka sa mahmah hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Ezekiel aw, Israel mite kiangah pai in la, nang tungah kong gen khempeuh, amaute tungah va gen in.
Pau na theih loh minam dangte kiangah a hong sawl ka hi kei hi; na mipih Israel mite kiangah a hong sawl ka hi hi.
A pau na theih loh, pau haksa a zang minam liante kiangah nang hong sawl hi leng, amaute in na thugen hong mang ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin Israel mite khat beek in na thu hong ngai lo ding hi; keima kam teekteek nangawn ngai lo ding uh hi. Amaute a lungsim uh khauh a, dem nopna lungsim nei uh hi.
Tu-in amaute mah bangin a khauh mahmah, a duai mahmahin nang kong bawl ding hi.
Suang khempeuh sangin a sakzaw, diamond suang zahin a sakin na lungsim kong bawl ding hi. Tua ahih manin hih a lehdo thei mite kihta kei in,” hong ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in thu hong gen thuah lai a, “Ezekiel aw, nang tungah kong thugen khempeuh lim takin ngai in la, ciamteh in.
Tua ciangin amaute in na thu hong ngai a, hong ngai kei zongin, sal-a a om na mipihte kiangah va pai in la, nang tungah kong thugen khempeuh amaute tungah va gen in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ Kha in hong paipih to a, ziin’ liing zahin a gin’ ngaih awging khat ka nungah ka za a, “Vantungah a om Topa, ama minthan’na hangin phat un,” ci-in a kiko hi.
Ganhingte in huih lakah a kha zapna leh leengpei gingte ka za a, ziin’ liing zahin gin’ ngaih mahmah hi.
Pasian’ Kha in hong pai khiatpih lai takin ka lungkim het loin ka heh suak mahmah hi. Ahi zongin Topa’ vangliatna in kei hong zo zaw hi.
Tua ahih manin ka mipih salte’ omna, Khebar Gun gei-a om Telabib munah ka va tung a, ka muhsa thute ngaihsunsunin tua lai a, amaute lakah ni sagih sung ka om hi.
Ni sagih a cin’ khit ciangin Topa in kei hong hopih a,
“Ezekiel aw, Israel minamte’ galvilpa dingin nang kong koih hi. Nangma tungah ka hong gen hilhkholhnate khempeuh amaute tungah na gen sawn ding hi.

Mi gilopa khat pen, ‘Na si taktak ding hi,’ ci-in ka gen ciangin, amah kikhelin a nuntak theihna dingin thu na hilhkholh kei leh, tua mipa pen mawhnei mahin si ding a, ahi zongin ama sihna sisan thu ahih leh nang kong ngawh ding hi.
Mi gilo khat hilhkhol napi-in a mawh bawlna a tawp nop kei leh, mawhnei mah in si ding a, ahi zongin nangma nuntakna suakta ding hi.

“Mi hoih mahmah khat in gamtat siat ding hong kipan leh a lauhuaina munah amah ka koih ding hi. Amah hilhkhol kei lecin, si ding hi. Ama mawhna hangin si ding a, ama gamtat hoihsate phawkin ka nei kei ding hi. Ama sihna sisan thu nang kong ngawh ding hi.
Ahi zongin a khialh loh nadingin mi hoih khat na hilh a, na thu hong mangin mawhna a bawl kei leh amah nungta ding hi. Nang zong na suakta ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Ka sungah Topa’ vangliatna hong om lamtak ka phawk a, amah in kei kiangah, “Ding in la, kuam sungah va pai in. Tua lai mun panin nang kiangah thu kong gen ding hi,” hong cihna ka za hi.
Tua ahih manin kei zong kuam sungah ka va pai a, Khebar Gun gei-a ka muh bang teek mahin tua lai-ah Topa’ minthan’na ka mu hi. Kei zong lei-ah ka bok suk a,
ahi zongin ka sungah Pasian’ Kha hong lutin ka khe-in hong dingsak hi. Tua ciangin amahin, “Inn-ah ciah in la, inn kikhaknelh in.
Ezekiel aw, khauhual tawh nang hong kikhih ding a, mite kiangah na paikhia thei kei ding hi.
Na leii ka zawsak ding a, hih a lehdo thei mite na thuhilh thei kei ding hi.

Ahi zongin nang kong hopih kik ciangin kong pausak thei kik ding a, amaute kiangah, “Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi,’ na ci ding hi. Tua ciangin mi pawlkhat in na thu hong ngai ding a, ahi zongin amaute pen a lehdo thei minam ahih manin pawlkhat in na thu hong ngai lo ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin, “Ezekiel aw, leisek khat la-in na mai-ah koih in la, Jerusalem khuapi lahna-in tua leitsek tung git in.
Tua ciangin tua khuapi a kiumcihna na lah nadingin a kiim-ah dumte, phungte, galpan’na phualte leh kulh sukkhap nading molhtumte bawl in.

Tua ciangin sikpeek khat la in la, nang leh tua khuapi kikal-ah kulh lim dingin koih in. Tua ciangin khuapi lam en in. Tua khuapi a kiumcih hi-in, nang pen a umcihte’ lim ding na hi hi. Hih in Israel mite’ adingin lim hi ding hi.
“Tua ciangin na veilam pang delhphahin lum in. Israel minamte’mawhna daan nangma tungah kong nga ding hi. Tua lai munah lumin amaute’ mawhna
ni zathum leh ni sawmkua sung na thuak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ daan thuak ding kum khat sung tang dingin ni khat, amau’ thuak ding kum zah nangmah in a ni-in na thuak ding hi.

Hih bangin na gamtat khit ciangin na taklam delhphahin na kihei leuleu ding a, Judah mite’ mawhna daan ni sawmli sung na thuak leuleu ding hi. Nangma thuak ni khat pen amau’ thuak ding kum khat tang ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Jerusalem khuapi a kiumcihna sal gega in. Na puan-ak ban zialto in la, tua khuapi siat nading thu genkhol in.
Nang pen khauhual tawh kong hencip ding a, tua khuapi umcihna a kiman mateng na kihei thei kei ding hi.

“Tu-in, mangbuh, mangbuhham, belawi, beli, taang, leh mangbuhman pawlkhat la in la, tuate helkhawmin anlum-in bawl in. Na veilam delhphahin na lup hun ni zathum leh ni sawmkua sung tua na bawl anlum na ne ding hi.
Nek khat-in anlum shekel sawmnih gik bek na ne ding a, ni khat-in khat vei bek na ne ding hi.
Tui zong duh zahzah hi loin, ni khat-in thawl khat bek na dawn ding hi.
Na nek ding anlum pen mite’ muh-in mihing’ ek keu khawmin tuate mei-in na cih khit ciangin tua sungah na em ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Israel mite, gamdangah ka thehthang hun ciangin thukham in nek dingin a kham an ninte tu-a mah bangin ne ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

Ahi zongin kei zong ka dawng kik a, “Topa Pasian aw, cik mah-in kei ka kininsak ngei kei hi. Ka neu tunga kipan tu dongin ama thu-in a si tawm ganhing sa ahi a, gamsate’ nekbaang ahi zongin ka ne ngei kei hi. A nin-a a kiseh an khat peuhpeuh ka ne ngei nai kei hi,” ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Tua ahih leh pha hi. Mihing’ ek tangin bawng’ ek na zang ding a, tua bawng-ek am sungah na anlum na em ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in thu hong gen thuah lai a, “Ezekiel aw, Jerusalem khuapi sungah an ka beisak ding a, mite in lunghihmawhna tawh a annek a tuidawnte uh ciangtan ding uh hi.
An leh tui loin amaute om ding uh a, amaute lunggimin, a tawpna-ah a mawhna hangun beimang ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, Ezekiel aw, namsau hiam khat la in la, na sam leh na khamul kiat khia in. Tua ciangin a multe tawi tehin seh thum suah in.

Umcihna lim na man ciangin khuapi lim sungah seh khat haltum in. Tua ciangin seh khat la leuleu in la, khuapi kiim-ah na pai kawmin na namsau tawh satnen in. A om lai seh khat pen huih lakah lawn in. Keimah in namsau tawh ka sat ding hi.
Tua ciangin a multe tawmno khat la in la, na puanmongteep-ah tun in.
Tua ciangin na tunsate sung panin tawmcik khat la leuleu in la, meikuang sungah lawnin kangtum sak in. Tua sung panin mei hong kipanin Israel minam buppi hong lawh ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “Hih Jerusalem khuapi lim en in. Leitung laizangah ka koih a, a kimkotah gamdang khempeuh ka omsak hi.

Ahi zongin Jerusalem in ka thupiakna lehdo-in, minam dangte sangin a gilo zaw hong suak a, a kiim-a om gamdangte sangin a thumang lo zaw hong suak hi. Jerusalem in ka thupiakte nialin ka thukhamte zui nuam lo hi.

Jerusalem aw, tu-in Topa Pasian ahi keima thugente ngai in. Ka thukhamte zui loin, ka thupiakte ngai lo na hih manin na kiim-a om minam dangte sangin siatna tamzaw na piangsak hi. Minam dangte’ gamtat ngeinate na zui hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa Pasian ahi keimah in nang kong langpan’na thu a hong gen ka hi hi. Minam dang khempeuhte muh-in nang tungah thu kong khen ding hi.
Ka deih loh hih nate khempeuh na gamtatna hangin cikmah-in ka hih ngei loh, cikmah ciangin zong ka hih nawn loh ding thu tawh nang Jerusalem kong daantat ding hi.

Tua kong daantahna hangin nang Jerusalem khuapi sungah pate in a tapate’ sa ne-in, tapate in a pate uh’ sa ne ding uh hi. No a mite kong daantat ding a, a suakta kha sunsunte nangawn mun khempeuh ah kong thehthang gawp ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keimah in a nungta ka hih mah bangin, note in siatna nam khempeuh leh a muhdahhuai gamtatna tawh ka biakinn ninsak na hih manun cikze het loin note kong sukmang taak kei leh, ci-in ka kiciam hi.

Note seh thum suah seh khat pen cina leh gilkialin khuapi sungah na si ding uh hi. Seh thum suah seh khat, khuapi kiim-ah namsau-in na si ding uh hi. A om lai seh thum suah seh khat ahih leh mun khempeuh ah hong thehthangin namsau tawh kong delh ding hi.

“Ka lung a kim dongin kong hih ding a, ka hehna leh ka sinsona teng na thuak ding uh hi. Note tungah hih thute hong tun’ ciangin, note cihtaklohna hangin deihsakluatna tawh a hong heh pau ka hihna na phawk ding uh hi.
Na kiim uh a, om minamte in note hong muh khak uh ciangin hong phitsanin hong pelh ding uh hi.
Note tungah hehin sinsona tawh daan kong piak ciangin na kiim uh a, om minam dangte khempeuh lau ding uh hi. Amaute in note hong muhdah etin hong simmawh bawl ding uh hi.
Na annek ding uh hong khaktan sakin note kong puksi sak ding hi. Note susia ding thaltang’ kap khak bangin gilkialna pen na na sa velval ding uh hi.

Na tate uh a sisak dingin kialpi hong tungsakin, a that dingin gamsate kong paisak ding a, natna, gal kidona leh gal kikapnate in note hong sisak ding hi. Topa ahi keimah in hih thu kong gen khin hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, Israel mualsang dawnte en in la, amaute tungah kong thupiak gen in.

Topa Pasian ahi keimah in mual liante, mual neute, guam thukte, leh kuampite kiangah ka gen ding thute, Israel mualte in a ngaih nading uh gen in. Mite milim a biakna munte a vat gawp dingin namsau khat kong kuansak ding hi.
Biakna taute kiphelkeek ding a, paknamtui taute kisatkham ding hi. Tua lai-a om mi khempeuh kithatin, a milimte uh mai-ah kipaithang gawp ding hi.
Israel misi luang hawmte ka thehthang gawp ding a, a guhte uh biakna tau kiim-ah ka lawnthang gawp ding hi.

Israel khuapite khempeuh beimang ding a, milim a biakna uh mun khempeuh kisusia ding hi. Tua ahih manin a biakna taute uh leh a milimte uh vut-le-vai suakin, a paknamtui taute uh kisatvui gawp ding ahih manin milim biak nadinga a bawlsa khempeuh uh maimang ding hi.
Mun citeng-ah mi kithatlum ding a, a suakta sunsunte in kei pen Topa ka hih lamtak hong phawk ding uh hi.
“Tua banga kihon thahna panin pawlkhat ka suakta sak ding a, minam dangte lakah thehthangin,

salin om ding uh hi. Tua bangin sal-a a omna uh mun panin, amau’ lungsim cihtak lohna hangin kei hong nusiatna uh leh keimah sangin milim a deih zawkna uh hangin a maizum nadingun a daantat ka hih lamtak thei-in kei hong phawk ding uh hi. Amau’ gitlohna leh a haitatnasate uh hangin amau mahmah kimudah tawm ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin kei pen Topa ka hih lamtak thei ding uh a, amaute daantah ding ka genkholhnate a mawk pau ka hih loh lam phawk ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “Israel mite’ gitlohna leh a muhdahhuai a gamtatnate uh khempeuh hangin na khut singin lei tuan in la, a dahin kap in. Amaute gal sung leh kial leh natna hangin si ding uh hi.
A gamla-a omte cina-in si ding uh a, a nai-a omte gal sungah si ding uh hi. A om lai sunte gilkialin puksi ding uh hi. Amaute in keima hehna thuak ding uh hi.

Milimte lak leh biakna tau kim-ah siluang hawm kithehthang ding a, mual sang tung teng, mualdawnzang teng, singniim nuai citeng, tawsaw kung lian nuai khempeuh, leh milim biakna-in paknamtui a halna uh mun khempeuh ah siluang hawm om ziazua kawikawi ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hih lamtak mi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi.

Keimah in ka khut zanin a gam khempeuh uh ka susia ding hi. Leitaw lam gamlak pana kipanin leilu lam Riblah khuapi dongin, Israel mite’ omna mun khempeuh, siit nei loin ka vatmai ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hih lamtak mi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, Topa Pasian ahi keimah in Israel leitang tawh kisai-in ka gen thu in hih ahi hi: A beina hita! Gam buppi a beina hita hi.

Israelte aw, tu-in na bei nading uh hong tung ta a, note in ka hehna tu-in na thuak ta ding uh hi. Na gamtatnasa uh tawh kizui-in thu kong khen ding a, na gamtatsiatna uh tawh kizui-in daan kong tat ding hi.
Note kong zah kei ding a, zong kong khasiat kei ding hi. A muhdahhuai na gamtatnasa uh tawh kizui-in daan kong tat ding a, tua ciangin Topa ka hih lamtak na thei ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa Pasian in a gen thu in, “Note tungah haksatna khat khit khat a ban banin hong tung thuahthuah ding hi.
A beina hong tung ta hi. Note a man na hita uh hi.
Israel gam sungah a teeng note’ bei nading hong tung ta ding hi. Mualsang dawn citeng-a biakna munte ah lungdamna om nawn loin buaina bek a omna ding hong nai ta hi.
A sawt loin ka hehna thu na thuak ding uh a, na gamtatnasate uh hangin thu hong khenin, a muhdahhuai na gamtatnate uh hangin daan kong pia ding hi.

Note kong zah kei ding a, zong kong khasiat kei ding hi. A muhdahhuai na gamtatnasate uh hangin daan a hong pia ding ka hi hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hihna leh note a hong daantatpa ka hihna na thei ding uh hi.
“Siat nading hun hong tung ta hi. Na ngongtatna uh khang a, na kiphatsakna uh lian hi.
Mi gilote’ hauhna leh lungmuan’ nate haksa loin beimang ding hi.
A hun hong tung ta a, a ni hong nai zo hi. Mi khempeuh tungah ka hehna hong tung ta ding ahih manin sumlei sumzuak nasepna in a kiman’na om nawn lo hi.
A neihsa a zuak khiapa in a nuntak sungin a zuaksa van ngah kik lo ding hi. Mi khempeuh tungah hehna hong tung ahih manin a mawhna hangin kuamah nungta lo ding uh hi.
“Amaute in gal peengkul tum uh a, a vekpi-in kiging uh hi. Ahi zongin mi khempeuh tungah ka hehna tung kim ding ahih manin galsim dingin kuamah kuan khia lo ding hi.
Khua pua lamah gal kidona om a, khua sungah cinatna leh gilkialna om hi. Gamlak-a om mi khempeuh gal sungah si ding uh a, khua sunga om khempeuh cina leh gilkialin si ding uh hi.
Mi pawl khatte in vakhu lau bangin mualtung tuh ding uh a, ahi zongin amau’ mawhna hangin si veve ding uh hi.
Mi khempeuh’ khut zaw dakdakin, a khuk uh liing kelkel ding hi.
Amaute dahna limin puanhampi silh ding uh a, pumliin’ gawp ding uh hi. A sam uh kimettolsak ding a, a min uh dai ding hi.

Topa’ hehna amau tungah a tun’ ni ciangin, a ngun a khamte un amaute suahtak thei lo ahih manin, a ngun a khamte uh nin bangin kongzing lakah pai ding uh hi. A gilkial uh ciangin zong an bangin tuate ne thei lo uh hi. Ngun leh khamte in amaute mawhna sung tumpih zaw hi.
Amaute in a kiphatsakpih uh kizepna a manphate, a muhdahhuai milim dingin bawl uh hi. Tua ahih manin amaute’ hauhna pen amau mah in a kih dingin ka bawl hi.
Amau’ nate, gamdang mite ka sutsak ding a, a neihsa khempeuh uh migilote sutsak in, ka ninsak ding hi.
Ka biakinn a kinitsak ciangin ka kho kei ding hi. Gutate in ka biakinn luhin ninsak ding uh hi.
“Na khuttum uh zial un. Bang hang hiam cih leh gam sungah mi kithahna dim a, khua sungah ngongtatna dim hi.
Minam gilo pente hong paipihin na innte uh ka luahsak ding hi. Minam dangte in na biakna mun ngeite uh a nitsak ciangin mi thahat-a a kineite’ kimuan’na beita ding hi.
Lungkhamna na tuah uh ciangin lungnopna na zong ding uh a, ahi zongin na mu kei ding uh hi.

Lungkhamna khat khit khat a ban banin na tuak ding uh a, thusia bekbek na za za ding uh hi. Kamsangte kiangah thu na dong ding uh hi. Siampite in mite tungah hong hilh ding thu thei lo ding uh a, upate in hong gen ding mel thei lo ding uh hi.

Kumpipa dahin thuum ding a, ulian penpa a cih nading thei loin om cipin, mi khempeuh lau-in liing ding uh hi. Na gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in daan kong pia ding a, midangte tungah thu na khen bangun note tungah thu kong khen ding hi. Hih bangin kong hih ciangin Topa ka hih lamtak na thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Sal-a ka om uh kum guk a phak kum, a kha gukna, a ni nga ni-in sal-a om Judah makaite tawh ka inn sungah thu genin ka tut lai takun, thakhatin Topa Pasian’ vangliatna ka sungah hong tum hi.
Ka khuadak leh, mihing tawh a kibang pian khat ka mu hi. A kawng nuaisiah ding teng meikuang tawh kibang a, a kawng tungsiah ding teng sumsan kinawtngil tawh kibangin san heuhau hi.

A khut ding tawh a kibang pian khat in hong sawkin ka sam-in hong man hi. Tua ciangin hih ka maang sungin, Pasian’ Kha in vanah hong leen’pih to-in Jerusalem khuapi hong tun’pih hi. Tua lai panin, Pasian a hehsuahna ahi milim a omna mun, biakinn tual sungnung lutna, leilu lam kongpi-ah hong paipih hi.
Kuam sungah ka maang-a ka muh bang teekteekin, tua sanah Pasian’ minthan’na ka mu hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, “Ezekiel aw, leilu lamah khuadak in,” hong ci hi. Kei zong ka khuadak leh, kongpi kianga biakna tau kiangah, Pasian’ hehsuahna milim ka mu hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Ezekiel aw, amaute’ gamtatnate na mu hiam? Israel mite in a bawl uh a muhdahhuai gamtatnate, ka mun siangtho panin a gamla semsem-ah kei hong nawhkhiatnate en in . Hihte sangin a mindaihuai zaw nangawn na mu lai ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin biakinntual puanung lutna gei-ah hong paipih a, tua lai-ah kulh a van’na mun khat hong lak hi.
Amah in, “Ezekiel aw, hih kulh tovang in,” hong ci hi. Kei zong kulh ka tovang a, kongkhak khat ka tuak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “A sungah tum in la, a muhdahhuai a gitloh gamtatnate uh va en in,” hong ci hi.
Kei zong a sungah tumin ka khuadak hi. Kawm tung khempeuh ah gul lim, adang ganhing ninte lim, leh Israel mite’ biak milim khempeuh a kisuai ziazua ka mu hi.

Tua lai-ah Israel minam makai sawmsagih na om a, tuate lakah Shafan’ tapa Jaazaniah zong na om hi. Amaute in paknamtui halna kuang khat ciat tawi uh a, paknamtui hal khute van lamah kahto biaibuai hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Ezekiel aw, Israel mite in a kimu lo mun-a a gamtatnate uh tu-in na mu hiam? Amaute in milim a dimna inn sungah biakna bawl uh hi. Amaute in, ‘Topa in hong mu lo hi. Topa in hih gam nusia khin ta hi,’ ci-in paulap zong uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin, “Hihte sangin a muhdahhuai zaw a gamtatna uh zong na mu lai ding hi,” hong ci thuah lai hi.
Tua ciangin leilu lam-a om biakinn kongpi-ah hong paipih a, Tammuz a cih uh pasian a sihna hangin dahin a kapin a om numeite hong lak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Ezekiel aw, na mu hiam? Hihte sangin a muhdahhuai zaw na mu lai ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin biakinntual sungnung ah hong paipih hi. Tua lai-ah biakinn kongkhak gei, biaknatau leh innlim kikal san-ah mihing sawmnih leh nga khawng na om a, biaknatau nung ngatin nisuahna lam nga-in ni suak tuung na bia uh hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Ezekiel aw, huate na mu hiam? Hih Judah mite in na muhsa a muhdahhuai a gamtatte uh tawh lungkim nai lo uh a, gam sung khempeuh ah ngongtatna dimsak uh hi. Tua banah ka heh semsem nadingin hih bangin gamta uh hi. A siathei tawpin hih bangin kei hong simmawh bawlna mu in!

Tua ahih manin amaute in ka heh mahmahna thuak ding uh a, amaute ka zah kei ding a, zong ka khasiat kei ding hi. Amaute in a tha neih tawpun kei tungah thu hong nget uh hangin amaute’ thungetna ka ngai kei ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian hong kiko a, “Hih khuapi a susia ding no mihingte hong pai un la, na hiam zat ding ciat uh zong hong keng un,” ci-in sam hi.

Leilu lam biakinn kongpi pua lam panin thakhatin mihing guk hong pai a, hiam khat ciat hong tawi uh hi. Saihadial puan a silh, laigelh nading a tawi mi khat tawh zong hong paikhawm uh hi. A vekpi-un sumngo biaknatau gei-ah hong ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin ama omnasa kherubte tung panin Israelte’ Pasian minthan’na hong pai-in biakinn kongah hong om hi. Tua ciangin amah in saihadial puan a silh, laigelh nading a tawipa samin,
“Jerusalem khua sung khempeuh ah pai kawikawi in la, hih khuapi sungah a muhdahhuai gamtatnate a kisepna hangin dahin a lungkham mi khempeuhte’ taltang-ah ciamtehna va bawl in,” ci-in sawl hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in a midangte kiangah, “Khua sung khempeuh ah amah va zui un la, mi va that un. Kuamah hingkhawi kei un la, kuamah khasiat kei un.

Puteek, nungak tangval, numei naupang dong takin va that un la, ahi zongin a taltangah ciamtehna a nei peuhmah su kei un. Hih ka biakinn mahmah panin kipan pah un,” a cihna ka za hi. Tua ahih manin tua biakinn sunga ding Israel makaite, kipatna in nei pah uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, “Biakinn ninsak un. A tual tengah siluang hawm dimsak un. Tu-in kipan un,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute kuan khia-in khua sungah mite thah ding kipan uh hi.

Tua bangin mi a kithah lai takin keimah guak ka om hi. Kei zong lei-ah bokin, “Topa Pasian aw, Jerusalem tungah na hehna hangin Israel mi a omlai sun khempeuh that mang khin ding na hi hiam?” ci-in ka kiko hi.

Tua ciangin amah in hong dawng a, “Israel mite leh Judah mite’ mawhna nak liat mahmah hi. Gam sung khempeuh mi thahna tawh kidimsak uh a, Jerusalem khuapi, siatna namkim tawh kidimsak uh hi. Amaute in, ‘Topa in i gam susia khin a, Topa in eite hong mu lo hi,’ ci uh hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute kuamah ka zah kei ding a, kuamah ka khasiat kei ding hi. Amaute’ gamtatna, amaute tung mah ka tusak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin saihadial puan silhin laigelhna a tawi mipa in Topa kiangah thu hong zasak kik a, “Nong sawl bangin ka sem khin zo hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kherubte’ lu tung sanah a om a kuum ka et leh, sapfeiros suangmanpha tawh a kibawl kumpi tokhom bang pian khat, tua a kuum tungah om hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in saihadial puan a silhpa kiangah, “Na khut dimin mei-am tawi in la, kherubte nuai-a om leengpeite kikal-ah va om in. Tua ciangin khuapi tungah a mei-amte theh in,” ci-in sawl hi. Kei zong ama pai ka en gige hi.
Tua mipa a pai lai takin kherubte pen biakinn leitaw lamah na ding uh a, biakinntual sungnung teng dimin meiipi kai hi.
Kherubte’ tung panin Topa’ minthan’na hong pai khia-in biakinn kongah va om hi. Tua ciangin biakinn sungah meiipi hong kai a, biakinntual ah Topa’ minthan’na taang zeizai hi.
Kherubte’ khazap ging pen biakinntual puanung ciang dongah kiza a, Vanglian Pasian a pau ciangin a awging tawh kibang hi.
Kherubte’ nuai-a om leengpeite kikal panin mei a la dingin Topa in saihadial puan silhpa a sawl ciangin tua mipa zong va pai-in leengpei khat gei-ah va ding hi.

Tua ciangin kherub khat in a khut zanin amaute’ kikal-a om meikhuk sawkin mei-am pawlkhat la a, saihadial puan a silhpa’ khut sungah koih hi. Saihadial puan a silhpa in zong tua mei-amte tawi-in paikhia hi.
Tua kherubte in a kha nuai ciat uhah mihing khut tawh a kibang nei ciat uh hi.
Tua kherubte gei-ah leengpei khat ciat omin, tua leengpeite suangmanpha bangin tee hi.
Tua leengpeite a pianzia kibang kim a, leengpei khat in a kikantanin peei dang khat ciat nei thuah uh hi.
Tua kherubte a pai ciangin kihei kul loin a utna lam peuhpeuh ah pai thei uh hi. A pai nading lam a nga a pei’ paipaina-ah adangte in zui-in kihei tuan lo uh hi.
A leengpei kualte, a pei kan’na khaute leh a pei buppi dimin mittang om hi.
Hih leengpeite pen maang ka muhmasakna sungate mah tawh kibang hi.
Tua kherubte in maitang li ciat nei uh hi. A maitang khatna bawngtal maitang, a nihna mihing maitang, a thumna humpinelkai maitang, a lina muvanlai maitang tawh kibang hi.
Hih Kherubte pen Khebar Gun gei-a ka muh ganhingte mah ahi hi. Tua ciangin hih kherubte leeng to uh a,
amau a kin uh ciangin a leengpeite in zong zui uh hi. A leeng dingin a kha a zal uh ciangin zong leengpeite in zui lai uh hi.
Kherubte a khawl ciangin leengpeite khawl a, kherubte a leen’ ciangin leengpeite in zong zui uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua leengpeite pen kherubte’ khut nuai-a om ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin biakinn kong panin Topa’ minthan’na paikhia-in kherubte’ tung sanah va om hi.

Tua banga ka et lai takin kherubte in zong a kha uh zalin lei lak panin leeng to uh a, leengpeite in zong zui uh hi. Biakinn nisuahna lam kongpi-ah khawl uh a, amaute tung sanah Israel Pasian’ minthan’na zong hong khawl hi.
Hih kherubte pen, Israel Pasian a kumpitokhom tawh a pua, Khebar Gun gei-a ka muh ganhingte mah hi, ci-in ka thei hi.
Amaute in maitang li, kha li, leh a kha nuai ciat uhah mihing khut tawh a kibang khut nei ciat uh hi.
Amaute’ maitang pen Khebar Gun gei-a ka muhsa maitangte mah tawh kibang teekteek a, a pai uh ciangin a mailam ciat mah-ah tang takin pai thei uh hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian’ Kha in biakinn nisuahna lam kongpi-ah hong paipih hi. Tua kongpi gei-ah mihing sawmnih leh nga na om a, tuate lakah minam makai ahi nihte, Azzur’ tapa Jaiazaniah leh Benaiah’ tapa Pelatiahte zong na kihel uh hi.
Pasian in kei kiangah, “Ezekiel aw, hih mite pen khuapi sungah thu hoih lo a gen migilote ahi uh hi.

Amaute in, ‘A sawt loin innlamna panin a meet i ngah ding hi. Hih khuapi in anhuanna beel tawh kibang a, eite in a sunga om sa kihuan tawh i kibang hi. Eite pen mei in hong kang thei lo ding hi,’ ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Ezekiel aw, hih mite tungah thukhenna thu gen in,” hong ci hi.
Topa’ Kha ka sungah hong lutin hih bangin mite tungah thugen dingin hong sawl a, “Israel mite aw, na thugente uh leh na ngaihsutnate khempeuh uh ka thei hi.
Hih khua sungah mi tampi tak that na hih manun kongzing khempeuh ah siluang hawm kidim hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keimah in note kiangah kong gen thu in: Hih beel tawh kibang hi, na cih uh man hi. Beel sunga om sa pen na thahsa uh misi luanghawmte ahi hi. Ahi zongin note ahih leh khuapi sung panin kong lawnkhia ding hi.
Note in namsau na kihta uh hi. Ahi zongin namsau tawh note a hong sat ding mi kong paisak ding hi.
Khuapi sung panin note hong la khia-in gamdang mite khut sungah kong pia ding hi. Note a si dingin thu kong khen khin hi.
Na gam sung uhah galin na si ding uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hih lamtak mi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi.
Note in beel sunga sa na hi kei uh hi. Hih khuapi in note hong hu lo ding hi. Israel gam sung na omna peuhpeuh uhah daan kong pia ding hi.

Note’ kiim-a om minam dangte’ ngeinate zui-in na om lai takun, keimah in Topa ka hihna thu, na palsat uh thukhamte keima thukham ahihna, leh na zuih loh uh thupiaknate keima thupiak ahihna na thei ding uh hi,” ci-in gen in hong ci hi.

Tua bangin mailam thupiang ding genin ka om lai takin Benaiah’ tapa Pelatiah hong din’sih hi. Kei zong lei-ah bok sukin ka kiko a, “Topa Pasian aw, Israel gam sunga a om lai mi khempeuh thah khit sawm na hi hiam?” ka ci hi.
Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,

“Ezekiel aw, Jerusalem khua sunga teeng mite in nang leh sal-a om na Israel mipihte’ thu gen uh a, ‘Sal-a om mite pen Topa tawh kigamla om lua khin ta uh hi. Amah in eima luah dingin hih gam hong pia khin ta hi,’ ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin na salpihte kiangah hih bangin keima thugente va gen sawn in: A gamlapi gamah a teeng dingin puak khia-in, gam dangah a thehthangpa in keimah ka hi hi. Ahi zongin amaute’ omna gam dangah tawl khat sung bek kei a hong bia dingin ka om sak ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa ahi keimah in amaute kiangah ka gen thu va gen in. Amaute ka thehthangna gam panin khawm kikin, amaute tungah Israel gam ka pia kik ding hi.
Amaute hong ciahkik ciangin a nin nate khempeuh leh a muhdahhuai milimte khempeuh a nilkhia ding ahi uh hi.
Amaute tungah kithu tuakin thumanna lungsim thak ka pia ding hi. Amaute’ suang lungtang paihkhiatsakin mihing lungtang ka guan ding hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in ka thukhamte zui-in ka thupiak khempeuh citakin mang ding uh hi. Amaute in keima mi hi-in, keimah in amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding hi.
Ahi zongin a nin a muhdahhuai milim bia nuamte ahih leh daan ka pia ding hi. Amau’ gamtatna tawh kizui-in daan ka pia ding hi. Topa Pasian ahi keimah in hih thu ka hong gen hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kherubte in leeng dingin a kha zal uh a, a leengpeite in zong zui hi. Israelte’ Pasian’ minthan’na amaute tung sanah om hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ minthan’na zong khuapi sung panin paikhia-in khuapi nisuahna lam-a om mual tungah om hi.
Tua ciangin ka maang sung mahin Pasian’ Kha in hong leen’pihin Babilon gama sal-a omte kiang hong tun’pih kik hi. Tua ciangin ka maang muhna hong bei a,
Topa in kei hong muhsaksa thute khempeuh, sal-a om mite kiangah ka gen hi.
Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, a lehdo thei mite lakah a teeng na hi hi. Amaute in mit nei napi-in khua mu lo uh a, bil nei napi-in bangmah za thei lo uh hi. Amaute pen a lehdo thei mite ahihna hang uh ahi hi.

Ezekiel aw, tu-in galtai dingte’ gamtat bangin na van puak ding guang in la, suntangpi-in paikhia in. Na omna panin na paikhiat lam mi khempeuh musak in. A lehdo thei mi ahih tei hangun a thu thei thei kha ding uh hi.
Khuavak lai-in mite’ muhin sal-a pai dingin na van guang in, nitak ciangin sal-a pai ding bangin na pai khiatna mite musak in.
Tua bangin amaute in hong et lai takin na kawm sulet in la, tua vang panin na van la khia in.

Amaute’ muhna ah na van na liangko-ah kisuanto in la, na pai nading mun na muh theih loh nadingin mit tunsa-in khuamial lakah paikhia in. Hih banga na gamtatna pen Israel mite’ adingin hilhkholhna khat hi ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Kei zong Topa’ hong sawl bangin ka gamta hi. Galtaite’ hih ding bang teekin tua sunin ka van guangin, tua nitak khua a mial ciangin ka khut tawh kawm ka sulet hi. Amaute’ muh mahin ka liangko-ah van kisuanin ka paikhia hi.
A zingsang ciangin Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, a lehdo thei Israel mite in na gamtatna thu nang hong dong hi.
Topa Pasian ahi keimah in amaute kiangah ka gen thu tu-in gen in. Tua thu in Jerusalem khua sung a uk ulianpa leh Jerusalem khua sunga teeng mi khempeuhte’ ading ahi hi.
Na gamtatnasate pen amaute tunga thu piang ding lahna lim ahihna thu gen in. Amaute pen a kiman mi, sal a suak ding ahi uh hi.

Amaute a uk ulianpa in khuamial lakah ama van a liangko-ah pua-in paikhia ding hi. Ama paikhiat nadingin amaute in kulh tawhvang sakin tua panin amah suakta ding hi. Amah in a mai humcip ding ahih manin a paina mun mu thei lo ding hi.
Ama pai nading munah ka ngenthang ka zak ding a, amah awk ding hi. Tua ciangin Babilon khuapi-ah amah ka paipih ding a, a khuapi mu lopi-in tua lai-ah si ding hi.
A ulianpite, a thu lamlakte, leh amah a cingte, mun citengah ka thehthang ding a, amaute a that dingin namsau ka nung delhsak ding hi.
Minam dangte lak leh gam dangah amaute ka thehthang ciangin Topa ka hihna thu amaute in phawk ding uh hi.

Ahi zongin gal sung, kialpi leh natna sung panin tawm khat ka suaktasak dinga minam dangte’ lak-a a omna mun panun a gamtatnasate uh a muhdahhuaina phawkin, keimah in Topa ka hihna thu hong thei ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, lau mahmahna tawh a liing kawmsa-in an ne-in tui dawn in.

Hih banga na gamtatna pen, amaute gama om lai ahi Jerusalem khua mite tungah Topa Pasian’ thugenna ahihna thu va gen in. Amaute in launa liin’na tawh an ne-in tui dawn ding uh hi. Amau’ gam sunga teengte a gamtat hoih khat beek om lo ahih manin, a gam sunga om khempeuh kipaikhiatpih mang ding hi.
Mihing a dimna khuapite kisusia ding a, gamsung khempeuh gamkhing suak ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hihna thu hong thei ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, bang hangin ‘Hun beibei a, genkholhnate a tung om lo hi,’ cih paunak pen Israel mite lakah zat belin kinei ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keimah in tua tawh kisai-in ka thugenna amaute kiangah gen in. Hih paunak ka beisakta ding a, Israel mite in genin a nei nawn kei ding uh hi. Tu-in a hun a naina leh genkholhnate a manin a tun’ nading thu amaute kiangah gen in.
Israel mite lakah maangmuhna man lo ahi a, genkholhna man lo ahi zongin om nawn lo ding hi.

Topa ahi keimah in amaute tungah thu ka gen ding a, ka gen bangin tung takpi ding hi. Tu-in zekai nawn lo ding hi. A lehdo thei mihingte aw, hih dinga ka gen bangin nomau nuntak sung mahmahin ka tungsak ding hi. Topa Pasian ahi keimah in thu ka gen khin zo hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen leuleu a,
“Ezekiel aw, na maang muhnate leh na thugen kholhnate pen mailam hun saupi ciangin a piang pan dingin Israel mite in ngaihsun kha uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keima thu genna: ‘Zekai cih om nawn lo ding a, ka gensa bangin tung ding hi. Topa Pasian ahi keimah in ka gen khin zo hi,’ ci hi,’ ci-in gen in hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, Israel kamsangte mawhsakna gen in. “Topa’ thugen ngai in,’ ci khemin amau’ lungsim bangin thu a gente’ tungah gen in.
Topa Pasian’ thugen in hih bang ahi hi: hih kamsang haite in gimna thuak ding uh hi. Amaute in amau’ lungsim bangin thugen tawmin, maangmu kineih uh hi.
Israel mite aw, na kamsangte uh ahih leh inn sia lak-a om ngiate tawh kibang uh hi.
Amaute in kulh a kicipna munte cing lo uh a, a kicimte ciangkik lo uh ahih manin Topa’ ni-in gal hong tun’ ciangin Israelte hu zo lo uh hi.

Amaute’ maangmuhnate in zuaupi hi a, a thugen kholhnate uh zong thu zuau ahi hi. Keimah in amaute sawl lo napi-in, amaute in, ‘Topa in hih bangin gen hi,’ ci khem uh hi. Tua bang hi napi-in amaute’ thugente ka tun’sak ding a lamen lai uh hi.

Tua ahih manin amaute kiangah ka gen thu in: ‘Na maangmuhnate uh zuaupi hi a, na thugen kholhte uh thu zuau ahi hi. Note kiangah keimah in thu hong gen lo napi-in keima gen bangin na gen uh hi,’ ka ci hi,’ hong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in amaute kiangah, “Na thugente uh zuaupi hi a, na maangmuhnate uh zuaupi ahi hi. Tua ahih manin note kong langpan’ hi.

Zuau thu tawh maangmu kineihin, mite a khialh theih nadingin zuau thu a gen khol no kamsangte daan a hong pia ding ka hi ta hi, Ka mite a kikhop uh ciangin tuate lakah na kihel kei ding uh a, Israel mite’ min a kigelhna lakah note’ min kigelh lo ding hi. Na gam uhah na ciahkik ngei kei ding uh hi. Tua ciangin Topa Pasian ka hihna thu na thei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh thu hoih lo napi-in hoih hi, ci khemin ka mite lam na kai khial uh hi. Ka mite in kulh dingin suang a cian’ uh ciangin no kamsangte in a tungtham buan tawh na zut uh hi.
Tu-in na kulh zut uh kicim ding hi. Tu-in guahpi ka zusak ding a, gialpite in tua kulh kha-in huihpi hat in mutgawp ding hi.
Tua bangin kulh a kicip ciangin na kulh zut uh bang phattuamna om ahi hiam, ci-in mite in hong dong ding uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa Pasian ahi keima thugen in: Ka hehna tawh huihpi nungsakin, guahpi zusakin, gialpi kiasak in, tua kulhpi ka susia ding hi.

A tungtham na zut uh kulh sukhamin, thehthangin, a bul dawksak ding a sawm ka hi hi. Tua bangin ka suksiat ciangin note a hong deng lum ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hihna thu mi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi.
Tua bangin kulh leh a zut note in ka hehna na thuak ding uh hi. Tua ciangin keimah in, ‘Tu-in kulh maimang ta a, tua mah bangin kulh a zut mite—
thu hoih lo napi-in, thu hoih hi, ci-in Jerusalem a lungmuan’ nadingin thu a gen kamsangte zong bei khin ta hi,’ ka ci ding hi. Topa Pasian ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Ezekiel aw, na mite’ laka om a thugen ding uh a phuak tawm numeite en in. Amaute’ gamtatna hangin mawhsakna thu gen in la,

Topa Pasian ahi keimah in amaute tungah ka gen thu hih bangin gen in: No numeite in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Mi khempeuh in a khut-a a bulh ding uh leh a lu tungah a khip ding uh aite na bawl uh a, tua nate in mite’ lungsim uk hi. Note’ phattuam nadingin sihna ding leh hin’ nading vangliatna thu, ka mihingte tungah na zang nuam uh hi.

Mangbuhham khut khat dim leh anlum them tawm khat na ngah theih nadingun ka mite mai-ah kei nong minsiasak uh hi. A si dingin a kilawm lopite na that nuam uh a, a hing dingin a kilawm lopite na hingsak nuam uh hi. Tua bangin ka mite tungah zuau thu genin, amaute in note’ thugen hong um uh hi.
Topa Pasian ahi keimah in ka gen thu in: Sihna leh hin’na ukna-in na zat uh na aite uh ka deih kei hi. Note’ khut panin tuate hong bawhkhiatsakin, ukcip dingin na hanciam uh mite ka khahkhia ding hi.
Na ai khipte uh zong hong hawkkhiatsakin note’ khut sung panin ka mite ka suaktasak paisuak ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hihna thu na thei ding uh hi.
Keima gen hilo pi-in, na thu zuau gen teng uh tawh mi hoihte na lunggimsak uh a, mi gilote a nuntak theih nadingun hong kihei loh nadingin na lehhanthot zawsop uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in na zuau maangmuhnate uh leh mi lam a khialsak thei na thugen kholhnate uh bei ta ding hi. Note’ khut sung panin ka mite ka honkhia ta dinga tua ciangin Topa ka hihna thu na thei ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi makai pawlkhat kei kiangah hong pai-in Pasian’ deihna bang hiam, ci-in hong dong uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, hih mite in milim bia uh a, milim in mawhna sungah amaute tun’ pih hi. Amaute’ thu theih nopte a gen dingin hong um uh ahi hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keimah in amaute tungah ka gen hih thute gen in: Milim bia-in, mawhna sungah milimte kitun’sak a, tua khit ciangin kamsangte tungah thu dongin hong pai Israel mi peuhmah in keima thu dawn’na kam ngah ding uh hi. Tua thu dawn’na pen a milim tampite un a zak ding uh a, a kilawm dawn’na hi ding hi.
Tua milimte in keima kiang panin Israel mite pai khiatpih uh a, ahi zongin tua bangin ka dawn’na tawh kei lamah ka mite ngahkik dingin ka kilamen hi.
”Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keima thugen pen Israel mite tungah gen in: Hong kihei kik un la, na milimte uh nusia un.

Israel mite khatpeuh peuh ahi a, Israel mite lakah a om gamdang mi khatpeuh peuh in ahi zongin, kei kiang panin pai khia-in milim bia-a, milim in mawhna sungah a tun’pih khit ciangin kamsangpa tungah thu dong dingin a pai leh, Topa ahi keimah in ama thu theih nop ka gen ding hi.
Amah nialin, midangte’ etteh dingin ka bawl ding hi. Keima mite lak panin amah ka la khia ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hihna thu na thei ding uh hi.
Kamsang khatpeuh peuh kikhemin a man loin thu hong dawn’ leh, Topa ahi keima’ khem hi ding hi. Israel mite lak panin tua kamsangpa ka la khia ding hi.
Kamsangpa leh kamsang thu a dongpa a daantuahna uh kibang ding hi.

Israel mite in kei hong nusiat loh nading leh a mawhna uh tawh a kinitsak loh nadingun hih bangin ka hih ding hi. Amaute in keima mi hi ding uh a, keimah in amaute’ Pasian ka hi ding hi. Topa Pasian ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, gam khatpeuh peuh in khialhna bawlin kei tungah hong thuman kei leh keimah in a annek ding teng uh ka susia ding hi. Kialpi tungsakin a mihing a ganhing-in ka siasak ding hi.
Noah, Daniel leh Job, hih mihing thumte nangawn, amaute’ lakah a om hi leh, amaute’ hoihna in amau’ nuntakna ciat bek mah suaktak zo ding uh hi. Topa Pasian in ci hi.
Mite a that dingin gamsa kihtakhuaite khah khia-in, kuamah khual a zin ngam lo dingin tua gam sung a lauhuai-in om leh

tua gam sungah hih mihing thumte nangawn a om bang hi leh, amaute’ tanute leh tapate nangawn uh suahtak zo loin, amaute’ nuntakna ciat bek mah suahtak zo ding uh a, tua gam in gamkhing suak takpi ding hi, ci-in a nungta Topa Pasian ka kiciam hi.
Tua gam sungah gal tungsakin, mihing ganhing a siaksiang dingin a husia galhiamte kizang leh,
tua sungah hih mihing thumte a om hangin amau’ pumpi ciat cih sim loh, amau’ tate nangawn suahtak zo tuan lo ding hi, ci-in a nungta Topa Pasian ka kiciam hi.
Tua gamah pulpi tungsakin, ka hehna tawh mihing ganhing sisak leng,
tua sungah Noah, Daniel, leh Jobte a om ahi zongin, amaute’ hoihna in amau’ nuntakna ciat bek a hut zawh cih loh, amaute’ tate nangawn hu zo het lo ding hi, ci-in a nungta Topa Pasian ka kiciam hi.
“Topa Pasian’ thugen in hih bang ahi hi. Mihing ganhing a sumai dingin daan nasia pen li ahi gal, kialpi, a kihtakhuai gamsate, leh natna, Jerusalem ah ka tungsak ding hi.

A tanute a tapate a paikhiatpih dingin mi khatpeuh peuh a suakta zo kha a om a, nang kiangah hong pai leh, amaute’ omzia na en in. Amaute’ gitlohna zia na mu ding a, Jerusalem daan ka piakna a kilawm a thuman mah ahihna na phawk ding hi.
Amaute’ gitlohna zia na muh ciangin ka hihnate khempeuh a kilawm mah ahihna na phawk ding hi. Topa Pasian in thu hong gen khin ta hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, leenggui pen singkung tawh bangci kiteh theih ding ahi hiam? Tulak-a om singkungte tawh tehna-in leenggui hiangte banga kimang ahi hiam?
Leengguite na-in kizang thei ahi hiam? Vankhaina-a zat dingin singzum khet dingin kimang thei ahi hiam?
Mei tawh nading bekin kimang hi. A mong tuak a kattum khit ciangin a om lai a zul kat teng, bangin kimang nawn ahi hiam?
A kat ma-in zong bangmah in kimang lo ahih manin, kangin a vom khit ciangin a kiman’na om lo semsem hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Tu laka om singte kiman’na nei hi. Ahi zongin leengguite kila-in a kihaltum mah bangin Jerusalem-a teeng mite, la khia-in,
daan ka pia ding hi. Mei panin khat vei a suahtak khit hangin, tu-in mei in amaute kangtum ding hi. Amaute daan ka piak ciangin Topa ka hihna thu na thei ding hi.
Kei tungah amaute hong citak lo uh ahih manin gam sung teng khempeuh gamkhing ka suaksak ding hi, Topa Pasian in ci hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen kik a,
“Ezekiel aw, a mudahhuai in a gamtatna thu Jerusalem tungah gen in.
Topa Pasian in Jerusalem tungah ka gen hih thute gen in: Jerusalem aw, nang in Kanaan gam pan-a piang na hi hi. Na pa in Amor mite hi a, na nu in Hit mite ahi hi.
Nang na suah lai-in kuamah in hong don lo hi. Na lai hong kitansak lo a, hong kisil lo a, ci tawh zong hong kizut lo a, puan tawh zong hong kitun lo hi.
Hihte khempeuh a hong hih dingin kuamah in nang hehpihna lungsim hong nei lo hi. Na suah lai-in kuamah in nang hong it lo ahih manin gamlakah nang hong kipaidak lel hi.
“Tua ciangin na kiangah kong pai kha a, sisan naisan lak-a na kitomtom kong mu hi. Tua bangin na om lai takin na sih loh nadingin thu kong pia hi.
Singkung hoih bangin nang kong khangtosak hi. Nang cidamin nong khangto a, nungak nong suak hi. Na nawite zong hoih tak mahin hong bawk a, na mul zong hong po ta hi; ahi zongin guaktang-in na om hi.

“Nang kong muhkhak kik ciangin pasal nei thei ding hun na hita hi. Na pum guak-a a om kimlai, ka puan tawh kong khuh a, na zumhuaina teng hong seelsakin, teen’pih dingin kam kong ciam hi. Kong kamciamna tangtung sakin nang in keima aa nong suak hi,’ Topa Pasian in ci hi.
Kei zong tui la-in na tunga si baang teng kong sawpkhiatsak a, oliv thau tawh kong zut zol hi.
Puanphan kizem hoihte tawh nang hong zemin, savun hoihpen tawh a kibawl khedap hong bulhsakin, saihadial puan hong khimsakin, naipuan tungsilh kong silhsak hi.
Kizepna a manphate nang kong pia a, tau hong butsakin, khainiang kong oksak hi.
Nakbahte, bilbahte leh na khuk ding kumpi lukhu hoih kong guan hi.

Tua bangin kham leh ngun kibawl kizepnate tawh na kizem a, saihadial puan, naipuan, leh a kiphan a kizem bek na silh tawntung hi. Annel hoihpen pawl a, kibawl anlum ne-in, nek ding khuaizu leh oliv thaute na kitasam ngei kei hi. Na hoihna a kigen thei lo zahin hong om a, kumpinu na suak hi.
A paubaang het lo dingin nang hong bawl ka hih manin na meel hoihna gam khempeuh ah kithang kawikawi hi, Topa Pasian in ci hi.
“Ahi zongin na meel hoihna leh na minthan’na a sia lamin zangin, na tuah peuhpeuh luppih ding zolna-in na zang hi.
Na puan pawl khatte, na biakna mun zep nadingin na zang a, numei paktat bangin mi citeng tungah na pumpi na pia hi.
Nang kong piaksa kham leh ngun kibawl kizepnate, pasal limin na bawl a, tuate tawh paktatna na gamta hi.
Nang ka hong piak, a kizem a kiphan puan hoihte la-in milimte na silhsak a, nang ka hong piak oliv thau leh paknamtuite, milim biakna-in na zang hi.
Na nek dingin a limci pen annel, oliv thau, leh khuaizu kong pia a, ahi zongin milim maipha zon’ nadingin biakna-in tuate na zang hi.
“Tua ciangin kei tawh na neih na tanute leh na tapate la-in milim biakna-in haltum dingin na pia hi. Kei tungah na cihtaklohna thuneu lua sa a,
milim biak nadingin ka tate pia thuah lai na hi hiam?
Hih bangin numei paktat nuntakna tawh a mindai huai-in na om lai takin na neu lai thu, tangguakin na om lai, sisan naisan lak-a na kitomtom lai thu na phawk kha kei hi.
Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Gimna na thuak ding hi. Hih bang siatna nam khempeuh na gamta khin a,
lam gei khempeuh ah milim biak nading mun bawlin, paktatna na gamta hi.
Na meel hoihna beelmang na kizutnelh hi. Na kimuhpih peuhpeuh tungah na pumpi na kipia a, a ni ni-in na paktatna na khan’ semsem hi.
A lan mahmah na veng Izipt mite na luppih a, na paktatna tawh kei nong hehsak hi.

“Tu-in nangmah daan a pia ding leh na nopsakna teng a la khia dingin ka khut ka liik khin hi. Nang hong mudahin, na gamtat hoih lohna hangin nang a hong hua Filistia mite khut sungah nang kong pia zo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh adangte tawh lungkim zo nai lo na hih manin Assiria mite na nungdelh lai hi. Tuate tawh na paktat a, ahi zongin na lungkim zo nai sam kei hi.
Sumbawl Babilon mite tawh na paktat a, ahi zongin tuate tawh zong na lungkim zo tuan sam kei hi.
“Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: A bangci lawmlawm na hi hiam? Zumna mel thei loin hih bangin na paktat hi.
Kongzing citengah milim biak nading mun na bawl a, paktatna na gamta hi. Ahi zongin numei paktat dangte bangin sum a ngah zong na hi kei hi.
A pasal it zaw loin, gamdang mite tawh mawhna a bawl numei tawh na kibang hi.
Numei paktatte sum tawh kiguai a, ahi zongin nang in na lunggulhte tungah letsong pia zaw sopin, nang hong luppih dingin mun khempeuh panin mi na guai zaw hi.

Nang in a tuampian numei paktat na hi hi. Kuamah in na tuaci gamtat nadingin hong zol lo hi. Nang tungah sum tawh guaihna hong kipia loin nang in na pia zawsop hi. Tua ahih manin a tuampian mahmah na hi hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin numei paktat aw, Topa’ thu ngai in.
Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Nang in na puante suahkhia-in, numei paktat bangin na pumpi na lunggulh mite leh na milimte tungah kipia-in, milim biakna-in na tate that na hih manin,

na lawm luite khempeuh—na itte hita leh, na mudahte hita leh, a vekpi-in ka kaikhawm ding hi. Na kimkot-ah amaute omsakin, tua ciangin na puan teng kong hawkkhiatsak ding a, na guaktangin na omna ka en sak ding hi.
Midang tawh na mawhna hang leh na mi thahna hangin thu kong khen ding a, ka hehna tawh sihdaan kong pia ding hi.

Na lunggulh mite’ khut sungah kong pia ding a, na paktat gamtatna munte leh na milim biakna munte, amaute in susia gawp ding uh hi. Na puante leh a manpha na kizepnate hong lakkhiatsakin, na guaktangin hong koih ding uh hi.
Amaute in mihonte hanthawnin, tua mihonte in suang tawh nang hong deengin, a namsau uh tawh hong satzan ding uh hi.
Amaute in na innte hong haltum sakin, na daantuahna, numei honpi en sak ding uh hi. Numei paktat na hihna kong khawlsak ding a, na mawhpih ding pasalte sum tawh na guaihna kong khawlsak ding hi.
Tua ciangin ka hehna dam ding a, dai takin ka om ding hi. Na tungah ka heh nawn kei ding a, zong kong aam nawn kei ding hi.

Na neu lai-a kong bawlna teng na mangngilh a, hih bang tenga na gamtatnate tawh kei nong hehsak hi. Tua ahih manin na gamtatna tawh kizui-in kong thuk hi. A muhdahhuai na gamtat dangte banah bang hangin hih paktatna gamta thuah na hi hiam, Topa in ci hi.
Topa in, “Jerusalem aw, ‘Tanu in a nu sun,’ cih paunak pen mite in nang tungah hong zang ding uh hi.

Nang pen na nu’ ta taktak na hi hi. Na nu in a pasal leh a tate mudah hi. A pasalte uh leh a tate uh a mudah na sanggam numeite mah tawh na kibang hi. Nang leh na sanggam numei khuapi dangte in nu-in Hit mi nei-in, pa-in Amor mi na nei uh hi.
Na u nu in leilu lam-a om Samaria leh a khuaneute ahi hi. Na nau nu in leitaw lam-a om Sodom leh a khuaneute ahi hi.
Amaute’ khekhap zui-in a muhdahhuai amaute’ gamtatnate bek tawh na lungkim zo nai kei lai a, tawmvei sungin na gamtatna khempeuh ah amaute sangin na sia zaw hi.
Keimah in a nungta Topa Pasian ka hih takpi mah bangin kong cihin ah: Nang leh na khuaneute gamtat siat zahin na sanggamnu Sodom leh a khuaneute gamtat sia ngei nai lo hi.
Na sanggamnu’ mawhna in: Amah leh a tanute in nek ding tampi nei-in nuamsa mahmahin dai takin om uh ahih manin amaute kiphasak uh a, a zawng a cimawhte don lo uh hi.
Amaute kihisakin ka deih loh nate gamta uh ahih manin, na theih mah bangin amaute ka susia hi.

Samaria in nangma gamtatsiat zah lang zong gamta lo hi. Na sanggamnu sangin gamtat sia zaw mahmah na hih manin, nang leh na sanggam numei dangte i etkak ciangin, amaute a mawh mah hi napi-in a mawh lo zah phialin hong kimu hi.

Tu-in na mindaina teng na thuak kul hi. Na sanggam numeite’ mawhna sangin nangma mawhnate nak siatzaw lua ahih manin nang kiang panin amaute a mawh lo tawh kibang phial hi. Na sanggam numei dangte a siangtho bangsak phial na hih manin zahla in la, maizum in.
“Ahi zongin, Sodom leh a khuaneute, leh Samaria leh a khuaneute a cithei-in ka bawl kik ding hi. Tua mah bangin nang Jerusalem zong kong citheisak kik ding hi.
Na gamtatnasate hangin na maizum ding a, tua na maizumna in na sanggam numei dangte maingalsak tuam ding hi.
Na sanggam numei Sodom leh a khuaneute, leh Samaria leh a khuaneute cithei kikin a ngei uh bangkik ding uh a, nang leh na khuaneute zong na cithei kik ding uh hi.

56-57 Nangma siatna teng hong kipholak ma, na kiphatsak om hun lai takin na sanggamnu Sodom simmawh bawl hilo na hi hiam? Tu-in na simmawh ngei na sanggamnu mah na bang teekteek hi. Edom mite, Filistia mite, leh na kiim-a om nang hong mudahte in hong simmawh bawl hi.
Na gamtat hoih lohna, na zumhuai gamtatna teng na thuak kul hi, Topa in ci hi.
“Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi. Nang in i kamciamna leh i thuciamna don lo na hih manin nangma gamtatna bangin nang tungah kong gamta hi.
Ahi zongin na neu lai-a nang tawh i thuciamna lenkipin, a kimang tawntung ding thuciamna nang tawh ka bawl ding hi.
Na u nu leh na nau nu na ngahkik ciangin na gamtatnasa teng phawk kikin na mai a zum ding hi. Nang tawh i thuciamna sungah a kihel loh hangin amaute pen nangma tanu bangin hong om ding uh hi.
Nang tawh ka thuciamna ka bawl pha ding a, tua ciangin Topa ka hihna thu na thei ding hi.
Na gamtatnasa khempeuh kong maisak khit ciangin na gamtatnasa khempeuh na phawkkik ding a, maizum lua-in cihna ding mel thei loin na om ding hi, Topa Pasian in ci hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, Israel mite kiangah thugentehna khat gen in la,

Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Muvanlai a gol mahmah, a khate zong golin a kizal deda khat om hi. Tua muvanlai in khaveng hoih mahmah nei hi. Lebanon Mual tungah va leengin taamtaak kung khat a dawn va kuaitan a,
sumbawlte omna gamah pua-in sumbuk bawlte khuapi sungah koih hi.
Tua ciangin Israel gam panin leenggui no khat la-in, a khan’ theih nadingin tui a om tawntungna lei hoih mun khatah suan hi.
Tua leenggui no hong khangin a hiangpha leengguipi hong suak hi. A hiangte pen muvanlai lamah zaam a, a zungte in lei sung thukpi-ah zung kha hi. Tua leenggui in hiang leh teh tampi tak nei hi.

“Tua ciangin a gol mahmah, a khate golin a mul a pha mahmah muvanlai dang khat om hi. Tua ahih manin tua leenggui in ama kisuannasa mun-a tui a ngahsa sangin tui a tamzaw pia zo ding ci-in lametna tawh tua muvanlai lamah a zung kha-in a tehte zong tua lam mah ngasak hi.
Ahi zongin tua leenggui pen, a teh no-in, a gah gah thei-in leenggui lianpi a suah theih nadingin lim takin tui a ngah theihna mun lei hoihna sungah a kisuan khinsa ahi hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keimah in ka dot nop thu in, ‘Hih leenggui hingin khang zo ding ahi hiam? Muvanlai masa pen in zung bawhin, a gahte zut khia-in, a hiangte kuaitanin, keutumsak ding hilo ahi hiam?’ cihna ahi hi. Tua leenggui bawh khiatna dingin thahatna ahi a, minam lianpi ahi zongin kisam lo hi.

Hih leenggui pen a kisuan hi mah hi. Ahih zongin hingin khang zo ding ahi hiam? Nisuahna huihpi in a mutkhiat ciangin keutum ding hilo ahi hiam? Tua a kisuanna munah keutum lel ding hilo ahi hiam?” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei tungah,
“Hih a lehdo thei mite in hih thugentehna a khiatna a thei uh hiam, dong in, Babilon Kumpipa Jerusalem khua-ah hong pai-in a kumpipa leh a uliante manin Babilon-ah a ciahpihna thu gen in.
Amah in kumpipa’ innkuanpih mite khat la-in, amah tawh thuciamna khat bawl a, ama tungah a thuman taktakna dingin kiciamna bawlsak hi. Tua gam-a mi liante ciahpih hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua minamte in lehdo kik nawn loin, a thuciam bawlna uh a kizuih nading a deihna ahi hi.

Ahi zongin Judah Kumpipa in amah lehdo veve a, sakol galkapte leh galkap honpite a ngen dingin Izipt gamah mi paisim sak hi. A deihna bangin tangtung ding ahi hiam? Tua banga a gamtatna tawh suakta zo ding ahi hiam? A thuciamna palsat napi-in daan thuak loin om thei ding ahi hiam?
Keimah in a nungta Topa Pasian ka hih mah bangin, kumpi tokhom tungah a tusak, Babilon Kumpipa tawh a thuciamna palsat ahih manin Babilon gamah hih kumpipa si ding hi.
Babilon mite in mi tampi a thah theihna dingun kan bawlin dum a tawh uh ciangin a thahat Faro’ galkap honpite nangawnin amah huh zo lo ding uh hi.
Amah in a kiciamna leh a thuciamnasa palsatin hih bangin gamta khin ahih manin, amah suakta ngei lo ding hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin keimah in a nungta Topa Pasian ka hih mah bangin a zuih dingin keima min tawh a kiciam thukimna palsat ahih manin daan ka pia ding hi.
Amah a awk theih nadingin ngenthang ka zak ding a, amah ka awksak ding hi. Kei tungah amah hong thutak lo ahih manin Babilon-ah paipihin tua lai-ah daan ka pia ding hi.
A galkap muanhuai pente, gal sungah si ding a, a suakta sunte zong mun citengah kithehthang ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa ahi keimah in thu a gen ka hih lam na phawk ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in, “Keimah in taamtaak sangpi a dawn khat la-in, a dawnngeek khat ka satkhia ding a, mual sangpi dawn khatah ka suan ding hi.
Israel mual sang pen dawn-ah suanin, a hiang zai-in a gah luai ding a, taamtaak lianpi khat suak ding hi. Tua tungah vasa nam khempeuh tawlnga ding a, bu bawlna munin nei ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin singkung sangte phukin, singkung neute a liansakpa, singkung hingte keusakin, singkung keute a hingsak kik Topa ka hihna thu gam sunga om singkung khempeuh in thei ding uh hi. Topa ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khin a, hih dingin ka gen bangin ka gamta ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen leuleu a,
“Israel gam sungah mite in zat bel-a a neih paunak, ‘A pate in leenggah thuk ne a, a tate’ ha kim,’ cihna pen bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?
Keimah in a nungta Topa Pasian ka hih mah bangin kong genin ah: Israel gam sungah hih paunak na zang nawn kei ding uh hi.
Mi khempeuh in keima aa hi a, pate ahi a, tate ahi zongin keima aa ahi hi. A mawh mipa bek si ding hi.
“Gentehna-in mi a hoih mahmah, a thuman, a diktat mi khat om hi.

Amah in Israel mite’ milim biakte biakpih lo a, milim biakna pia lo ding ci-in a kikhamna mun-a milim biakna sate zong ne lo hi. Midangte’ zi zong luppih dingin zol lo a, numei in nin a neih lai takin zong luppih lo hi.
Kuamah khem lo a, kuama’ na zong sut lo hi. Sum leitawi a lapa in khapna van a apte zong pia kik hi. Gilkialte an vakin, puan nei lote puan guan hi.
A meet bekbek lunggulhna-in sum leitawi pia lo hi. Gamtat siat ding ut lo a, mite’ thu a manin khensak hi.
Amah in ka thupiakte mangin, ka thukhamte hoih takin zui hi. Tua bang mi in mihoih ahih manin nungta ding hi, Topa Pasian in ci hi.
“Tua ciangin gentehna-in hih mi hoihpa in tapa khat nei a, tua tapa in mi’ na gu-in mi that a, a pa’ gamtat ngei loh a sia teng gamta hi.
Amah in milim biakna pia lo ding a kici mun-a kipia biakna sate ne a, midangte’ zite zolin luppih hi.
Mizawng mi cimmawhte khem-in, mi’ na sut a, sum leitawi a lapa in khapna-a a piak nate pia kik loin kem suak hi. Milim bia-in a zumhuai-in gamta hi.

A meet lunggulhna-in sum leitawi pia a, a meet zong a kilawm loin tampi tak la hi. Hih bang mipa nungta ding ahi hiam? Nungta het lo ding hi. Hih bangin a mindai huaite khempeuh gamta ahih manin tuate’ hangin amah si ding hi. Ama sihna in ama mawhna hang ahi hi.
“Gentehna-in hih mihoih lopa in tapa khat hong nei hi. Tua a tapa in a pa’ gamtat hoih lohna teng mu a, a pa’ gamtat bangin gamta lo hi.
Israel mite’ milim biakte biakpih lo a, a kikhamna mun-a biakna-a a kipia biakna sa zong ne lo hi. Midangte’ zi zong zol lo, luppih lo hi.
Kuamah bawlsia lo a, kuama na zong sut lo hi. Sum leitawi a lapa in khapna van a apte zong pia kik hi. Gilkialte an vak a, puan nei lote puan guan hi.

Gamtat siat ding ut lo a, a meet bekbek lunggulhna-in sum leitawi pia lo hi. Ka thukhamte zui-in ka thupiakte mang hi. Tua ahih manin hih mipa pen nungta ding a, a pa’ mawhna hangin si het lo ding hi.
A pa in ahih leh mi’ na sutin, mite tungah a sia gamta tawntung hi. Tua ahih manin ama mawhna hangin amahmah si hi.

“Ahi zongin, ‘Bang hangin a pa’ mawhna a tapa in thuak lo ding ahi hiam?’ nong ci kha ding hi. A tapa a hoih, a manin a gamtatna hang ahi hi. Amah in ka thukhamte kemin hoih takin zui hi. Tua ahih manin pel loin amah nungta ding hi.

A si dingpa pen a mawh mipa ahi hi. Ta in pa’ mawhna thuak lo ding a, tua mah bangin pa in ta mawhna thuak lo ding hi. Mi hoihpa in a hoihna thaman ngah ding a, mi gilopa in a gitlohna thaman thuak ding hi.
“Mi gilo khat in a mawh bawlna khawlin ka thukham zui hen la, a hoih a manin gamta leh, tua mipa si lo ding hi; pel loin nungta ding hi.
Ama mawhnasa khempeuh kimaisak ding a, amah a manin a gamtat manin nungta ding hi.
Mi gilo khat a si ka muh ciangin a lungdam dingin hong ngaihsun na hi hiam? Ka lung dam het lo hi. Amah hong kisikin a nuntak ding pen keima deih ahi zaw hi.

Ahi zongin mihoih khat in a gamtat hoihna teng khawlin, migilote’ gamtat bangin a mindaihuai, gamtat siate gamtat ding hong kipan leh, amah nungta paisuak ding ahi hiam? Nungta het lo ding hi. A hoih ama gamtatnasate kiphawksak lo ding hi. Ama cihtaklohna leh ama mawhna hangin si ding hi.
“Ahi zongin note in, ‘Topa’ hihna zia man lo hi,’ na ci uh hi. Israel mite aw, ka thugen hong ngai un. Keima hihna zia a man loin ngaihsun na hi uh hiam? A man lo pen nomau’ ngaihsutna zia hi zaw hi.
Mihoih khat in a gamtat hoih khawlin mawhna a bawl ciangin si ding hi. Ama sihna pen a gamtatsiatna hang ahi hi.
Mi gilo khat in a gitlohna panin khawlin a hoih a manin gamta leh ama nuntakna a suahtak ahi hi.
Amah in a gamtatna phawkin a mawh bawlna khawl hi. Tua ahih manin amah si het lo ding a, nungta paisuak ding hi.
Ahi zongin no Israel mite in, ‘Topa’ hihna zia man lo hi,’ na ci uh hi. Israel mite aw, keima’ hihna zia man lo ahi zenzen hiam? A man lo pen nomau’ ngaihsutna zia hi zaw hi.

“Topa Pasian ahi keimah in note kiangah kong genin ah: Israel mite aw, na gamtatnasa bang ciatun thu kong khen ding hi. Kisik kikin na gamtatsiatna khempeuh panun khawl un la, na mawhna bangun kisiasak kei un.
Na gamtatnasa uh mawhna khempeuh nusia un la, na lungsim leh na ngaihsutna uh thaksuahsak un. Bang hangin no Israel mite si nuam na hi uh hiam?
Kuama’ sih ding ka deih kei hi. Tua ahih manin na mawh gamtatna uh khawl un la, nungta un. Topa Pasian in ci hi,” hong ci hi.
Israel uliante hih bangin tamlawh in hong ci hi.
Na nu uh, humpinelkai tawh kibang! Humpinelkai dangte tawh kikhawlin, a note khoi hi.
A note khat thuhilh a, hong khang cing hi. Sabet zong hong siam a, mi hong ne hi.
Mite in tua thu za uh a, gum sungah awksak uh hi. Bawm sungah khum uh a, Izipt gamah paipih uh hi.
A pi’ lametna teng bei ta hi, a no dang khat pantah leuleu a, a khangcing khat suah hi.
Amah hong khangcing a, adangte tawh kikhawl hi. Sabet zong hong siam a, mi hong ne hi.
Kulhpite sugawp a, khuapite siasak hi. Hawk zelzel a, a za mite lau mahmah hi.
Amah hih dingin mite kikaikhawm a, mun khempeuh panin hong kuan uh hi. A ngenthang uh zak uh a, a thang-ah awksak uh hi.
Bawm sungah khum uh a, Babilon kumpipa kiang tun uh hi. Israel mual tungte ah a hawkna a kizak nawn loh nadingin kikhumcip hi.
Na nu uh, lui tui gei-a a kisuan, leenggui tawh kibang hi. Tui tampi ngah a, a teh, a gah, pha hi.
A gui hiangte hong lian a, kumpi ciangkhut hong suak hi. Leenggui khang a, van hong ban hi. A teh pha-in sang mahmah a, mi khempeuh in mu kim hi.
Ahi zongin hehna tawh leenggui kizung bawh a, leilak kiden’na hi. Nisuahna huihpi hong nung a, a gah teng keutumsak hi. A hiangte kikuai-tan a, keu-in kihaltum hi.
Tui om lohna lei keu gamah tu-in hih leenggui kituah hi.

Hih leenggui mei in kang a, a hiang a gah kangtum mang hi, a hiangte lian kik nawn lo ding a, kumpi ciangkhut suak kik ngei nawn lo ding hi. Hih a tunga pen tamlawhna hi a, a kisa zelzel mun khat ahi hi.
A kum sagih kum, a kha ngana, a ni sawm ni-in Topa’ kiang panin thu a dong dingin Israel makai pawlkhat ka kiangah hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,

“Ezekiel aw, Topa Pasian ahi keimah in amaute tungah ka gen, ‘Kei tungah thu a dong dingin hong pai na hi uh hiam? Keimah in a nungta Topa Pasian ka hih mah bangin note’ thudotin ka om het kei ding hi, ci-in gen in,’ hong ci hi.
“Ezekiel aw, amaute tungah thukhen dingin na kiging nai hiam? Na kigin’ khit leh amaute tungah thu khen in. A pu a pate uh’ gamtat hoih lohna teng amaute phawksak in.

Amaute tungah keima thugente gen in. Israel mite ka teel lai takin amaute tungah thuciamna khat ka bawl hi. Izipt gam sungah amaute tungah ka kilang a, keimah in Topa note’ Pasian ka hi hi, ci-in ka kigen hi.

Izipt gam panin amaute paikhiatpihin, amaute’ adingin ka zon’ khiatsak, bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na gam ahi, gamsung khempeuh panin a hoih penna munah amaute ka tun’pih nading thu tua ni teek mahin ka ciam hi.
Keimah in Topa amaute’ Pasian ka hih manin a muhdahhuai a milim itte uh paikhia-in, Izipt mite’ pasian manlote tawh a kinitsak loh nading uh ka gen hi.

Ahi zongin amaute in kei hong demin, ka thugen hong ngai lo uh hi. A muhdahhuai a milimte uh paikhia tuan lo uh a, Izipt pasiante zong nusia lo uh hi. Tua hi a, ka heh mahmahna teng Izipt gam sungah thuaksak gawp ning ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.–

Ahi zongin, Izipt gam panin no Israel mite kong paikhiatpih ding hi, ci-in amau’ ompih mite’ zakin gen khin ka hih manin, tua bangin daan thuaksak leng, keima min a kidaisak suak ding cih ngaihsutna hangin daan ka pia kei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Izipt gam panin amaute pai khiatpihin gamlak ka tun’pih a,
a zui peuhpeuh a nuntak theih nadingin ka thukhamte leh ka thupiaknate ka hilh hi.
Topa ahi keimah in amaute pen misiangtho in ka bawlna thu a phawk nadingun kote’ kikalah thukimna limin sabbathte tan’ ding thu ka pia hi.

Ahi zongin Israel mite in gamlak nangawn-ah kei hong dem uh a, a zui peuhpeuh in nuntakna a ngah nading uh ahi keima thukhamte leh ka thupiaknate nial uh hi. Ka sabbathte zong nakpi takin siasak uh hi. Tua ahih manin amaute a maiman’ nadingin ka hehna teng gamlakah a thuaksak gawp dingin ka kithawi hi.
Ahi zongin Izipt gam panin amaute ka pai khiatpihna minam dangte in hong mu khin ahih manin tua bangin gamta leng, keimah mindai nading mah hi zel ahih manin amaute bangmah ka cih kei hi.
Tua ahih manin bawngnawi leh khuaizu a luan’na gam hoihpen ahi, amaute tungah ka piaksa gamah amaute ka paipih loh nading thu, gamlakah ka kiciam hi.

Tua bangin kiciamna ka bawlna pen, amaute in ka thupiaknate nialin, ka thukhamte zui lo uh a, ka sabbathte siasak uh hi. Amaute in kei hong biak ding uh sangin milim biak ding ut zaw uh ahihna hang ahi hi.
Ahi zongin amaute ka khasiat a, gamlakah amaute ka susia kei a, ka maimangsak kei hi.
A tate uh kiangah, ‘Na pu na pate uh in a bawl thukhamte zui kei un la, amaute’ tat ngeinate zui kei un. A milim biaknate uh tawh zong kininsak kei un.
Keimah in Topa ahi note’ Pasian ka hi hi. Ka thukhamte zui un la, ka thupiakna bangin, gamta un.
Keimah in Topa ahi note’ Pasian ka hihna na phawk nading uh leh note tawh i bawlsa thukimna lim dingin sabbathte na siangthosak un,’ ka ci hi.

“Ahi zongin a tate nangawn un kei hong dem uh hi. A zuite in nuntakna a ngah nading ahi ka thukhamte palsatin, ka thupiaknate mang lo uh a, sabbathte siasak uh hi. Tua ahih manin, ka hehna teng gamlakah thuaksak gawpin, amaute a sumai dingin ka kithawi hi.
Ahi zongin tua bangin hih leng, Izipt gam panin Israel mite ka pai khiatpih hong mu mite lakah ka min dai ding ahih manin amaute ka susia kei hi.
Tua ahih manin amaute leitung gam khempeuh ah ka thehthang gawp nading thu, amaute tungah kiciamna dang khat tua gamlakah ka bawl leuleu hi.
Hih bangin kiciamna ka bawlna pen, amaute in ka thupiaknate nialin, ka thukhamte zui lo uh a, ka sabbathte siasak uh hi. Tua banah a pu pate un a biak milimte mah a biakna hang uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih manin kei zong amaute adingin nuntakna a piangsak lo thukhamte leh thupiaknate amaute tungah ka pia hi.

Amaute’ biak piaknate mah tawh amau mah kinin sakin, a tapa upapente uh zong biakna-in ka pia sak hi. Hih banga ka hihna pen amaute daan piakna leh keimah in Topa ka hihna thu a theih nading uh ahi hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Ezekiel aw, Topa Pasian ahi keima thugen pen Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in:” A cihtaklohna uh tawh na pu na pate un ka min hong daisakin kei hong hehsak uh hi.

Amaute tungah piak dingin ka ciamna gamah amaute ka paipih hi. Amaute in mual sang ahi a, singniim khatpeuh peuh ahi zongin a muh uh ciangin tua bang mun khempeuh ah biakna pia uh hi. Meihal biakna a piakna uh leh tuiphih biakna a piaknate uh tawh kei hong hehsak uh hi.
Amaute kiangah, ‘Na paina uh mun sangte bang ahi hiam?’ ci-in ka dong hi. Tua ahih manin tua hun-a kipanin tua munte pen ‘Mun Sang’ kici hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite tungah Topa Pasian ahi keima thugen hih bangin gen in: Na pu na pate un a bawl mawhnate mah note in zong bawlin a milimte mah uh sul zuih ding na hi uh hiam?

Tu ni ciang dongin note in a kipia ngei letsongte mah puakin tua milimte mah biakna-in na tate uh na hal uh ciangin no leh no a kininsak tawm na hi uh hi. Tua bangin na gamtat khit uh ciangin no Israel mite in kei kiangah thu a dong dingin nong pai lai uh hi. Keimah in a nungta Topa Pasian ka hih mah bangin, note’ thudotin ka om het kei taktak ding hi.
Note in na lungsim ngaihsutna uh khentat khinin, gam danga a teeng minam dangte mah bangin sing leh suang na bia nuam uh hi. Ahi zongin note’ ut bang hi thei ngei lo ding hi.
“Keimah in a nungta Topa Pasian ka hih mah bangin, khut khauh tak leh ka vangliatna leh ka hehna tawh note kong uk gawp taktak ding hi.
Gam khempeuh-a note kong thehthangna panin kong kaihkhop kik ciangin note tungah ka vangliatna leh ka hehna kong lak ding hi.
Note pen minam tuamtuamte’ gamah kong paipih ding a, tua munah maitang kituahin note tungah thu kong khen ding hi.
Izipt gamsung Sinai gamlakah na pu na pate uh tungah thu ka khen mah bangin tu-in note tungah thu kong khen ding hi, Topa Pasian in ci hi.
“Note khauh takin kong uk ding a, thuciamna kong zuisak ding hi.

Note lak panin a lehdo thei mite leh kei tungah hong mawh mite ka la khia ding hi. Tu lai takin a om pakna uh gam panin ka la khia ding a, ahi zongin Israel gamah ka ciahsak kik kei ding hi. Tua ciangin Topa ka hihna thu na thei ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Topa Pasian in, “Israel mite khempeuh aw, na milimte uh bia un! Ahih hangin tu-a kipanin keima thu nong man’ uh kul ding a, na milimte uh letsong piakna tawh ka min siangtho na daisak nawn kei ding uh hi,” hong ci hi.

Topa Pasian in, “Ka mual siangtho, Israel mual sang tungah Israel mite khempeuh in kei nong bia ding uh hi. Note tungah kong lungdam ta ding a, biak piaknate, a limcipen piaknate, leh na letsong siangthote uh kong lamen ta ding hi.

Na kithehthangna uh gam tuamtuam panin note kong kaihkhop khit ciangin a namtui na biak piaknate uh kong sang ding hi. Note in kei nong biak manun minam dangte in a siangtho ka hihna hong thei ding uh hi.
Na pu na pate uh tungah piak dingin ka ciam Israel gam sungah note kong tun’pih ciangin Topa ka hihna thu na thei ding uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin a kilawm loin na gamtatnate khempeuh uh leh nomau mah na kinitsak tawmna thute uh na phawk ding uh a, na gamtat siatnasate uh hangin nomau mah na kimudah tawm ding uh hi.

Na gitlohna, na gamtatsiatna uh tawh kizui-in note tungah hong bawl loin, ka min a dai khak ding khualna tawh note tungah hong gamta ka hih manin keimah in Topa ka hihna thu no Israel mite in na thei ding uh hi, Topa Pasian in ci hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, Leitaw lam gam en in la, Leitaw lam gam siatna ding thu genin, Leitaw lam gam tulakte a siat nading thu genkhol in.

Leitaw lam tulakte kiangah thu gen in la, Topa’ thugen ngai un. Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: ‘En un, tu-in gam hal a kipan ding ka hi a, na sunga om singkung a hing, a keu-in kangtum mang ding hi. Kuamah in tua meikuang phelh zo lo ding hi. A taw panin a khung dongin kangtum mang ding hi.
Hih gamsung a halpa in Topa ahi keimah ka hihna thu leh kuamah in a phelh zawh lohna thu mi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi,’ ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong, “Topa Pasian aw, mi khempeuh in kei pen khiatna nei-a thu gen theipa hi, ci-a hong ngaihsut uh ka hi hi,” ka ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, Jerusalem khuapi, leh mite in biakna a piakna uh mun tuamtuamte mawhsakna thu gen in.
Israel gam mite tungah Topa ahi keima thugen, hih bangin gen in: ‘Note ka hong langpan’ hi. Ka namsau dokin, note a sia a pha a kibangin kong that mang khin ding hi.
Tua bangin kong thah nadingin leitaw lam pan leilu lam dongin mi khempeuh tungah ka namsau ka zang ding hi.
Topa ahi keimah in namsau ka dawh khitna leh a paai-ah ka siatkik loh nading thu mi khempeuh in thei ding uh hi,’ ci-in gen in.
Tua ahih ciangin Ezekiel aw, a lungkham mahmah bangin khuisa in la, mi khempeuh’ muh dingin thuumin tau in.

Tua bangin na omna thu mite in hong dot ciangin mai lama thupiang ding hangin a tuaci om na hihna gen in. Tua hun ciangin a lungsim uh launa tawh kidimin, launa hangin a khut uh liingcipin, a han’na lungsim uh bei-in, lau-in a khuk uh a liin’ kelkel nading thu leh, tua hun ding pen tu-in a hong tung ta, ahihna thu gen in,” Topa Pasian in hong ci hi.
Topa in kei kiangah thu hong gen a,
“Ezekiel aw, mailam thu hong genkhol in la, Topa in hih bangin ci hi, ci-in gen in: Namsau khat kitat hiam a, hoih takin kipuah kilkel hi.
Mi thah nadingin kitat hiam sitset a, khuaphia bangin a tee zialzial dingin kipuah hi. Note in thuhilhna ngai nuam lo na hih manun, kuamah in tua namsau kho thei lo hi.
Tua namsau limtakin kipuah a, zat pah lian dingin kikoih hi. Mi that dingpa’ zat dingin, kitat hiamin kipuah siang hi.
Ezekiel aw, awng in la, kiko in, hih namsau pen, ka mihingte leh Israel makai khempeuh a kisawmna ahi hi. Amaute pen, ka mite khempeuh tawh, a kithat khawm ding uh hi. Dahna tawh na dip hum in.
Note hong kize-et ahi hi. Note in thuhilhna nial lailai le uh cin, hih thute khempeuh piang loin om ding ahi hiam, Topa Pasian in ci hi.
“Ezekiel aw, tu-in mai lam thu ding gen khol in. Na khut beng in. Namsau in sat sat ding hi. Tua namsau in mi that namsau, mi lausak namsau, mi a lom lomin a that namsau ahi hi.
Tua namsau in ka mite meidawi sakin puk sak hi. Khuaphia bangin a tee zalzal, mi that dinga a kithawi ka namsau tawh a khuapi uh ka ngim hi.
A hiam namsau aw, na ziat na vei vat gawp in! Na ngatna san peuhpeuh vat gawp in.
Kei zong ka khut ka beng ding a, tua ciangin ka hehna dam ding hi. Topa ahi keimah in hih thu kong gen khin hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen kik a,

“Ezekiel aw, Babilon kumpipa a namsau tawh hong kuan theih nading lampi nih ciamtehna bawl in. Tua lampi nihte pen gam khat panin kipan khawm ding ahi hi. Tua lampi a katna munah ciamtehna khat phut in.
Tua lamka khat in Ammon mite khuapi Rabbath-ah kumpipa a tun’ theihna dingin lak ding a, a khat pen in Judah gam sunga om Jerusalem khuapi sung teek a tun’ nadingin lak ding hi.

Lamka a tun’ ciangin Babilon kumpipa khawl phot ding hi. A tot ding lampi a theihtheih nadingin ai nam tuamtuam saan ding a, a thaltangte sing seuhseuh-in, innsung pasian milimte thu dongin, biakna-in a gawh ganhing sin vel ding hi.

Jerusalem ah a pai ding ai a phatna a lak a thaltangte a taklam khutah tawi hi. Tua ai in Jerusalem ah a pai nading, gal nan’ nading phung a cian’ nading galsim nadingin a kiko nading, kulhpite satkham nading molhtumte a bawl nading, kidal nading phung bawlin dumte a tawh nading gen hi.

Jerusalem khua mite in khat leh khat a kihuh nading uh midangte tawh thukimna nei khin uh ahih manin hih bangin amau’ khuapi a kisawmna thu um lo uh hi. Ahi zongin hih bangin ai a kisan’na in amau’ mawhna a phawk theih nading uh leh amaute a kiman ding ahih lam a theih nading uh lim khat ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian ahi keimah in ka gen thu in; Na mawhna teng uh tu-in hong kipholak hi. Na mawhna uh mi khempeuh in thei hi. Na gamtatna panun na mawhna uh kilang hi. Mawhsakna a thuak ding na hita uh a, na galte uh khut sungah a hong pia ding ka hi hi.
A gilo, a siangtho lo, Israel gam uk mi gilopa aw, nang’ hun zong hong tung ta a, na daantuah ni ding hita hi.
Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Na kumpi lukhu leh na dial khip la khia in. Nidang bang nawn lo ding hi. Mi neute hong lian ding a, Miliante hong neu ta ding hi.
Siacip! siacip! Hih khuapi ka siacimitsak ding a, a mel a mang zong kimu lo ding hi. A uk dingin a kilawm mipa hong om ciang bekin ama khut sungah ka pia ding hi.

“Ezekiel aw, mailam thu gen in la, Topa Pasian ahi keimah in Israel mite a simmawh bawl Ammon mite tawh kisai-in ka thugen, hih bangin amaute kiangah gen in: A vatlum dingin namsau khat a baihsa-in om a, mi thah nadingin kinawtngil a, khuaphia bangin a tee zialzial dingin kibawl hi.
