Tua kongpi lampi tun’ nadingin kahlei cial sagih mah om a, a inndei golzaw pen a nawlnung mahah omin a tual lam nga hi. Lampi omna lam pang, kawm sungnungte’ tungah nisuh kung lim mah kibawl hi.
Hih lai-ah zong tual sungnung paina kong lampi khat mah om hi. A mipa in kong leh kong kikal a teh ciangin tong za khat pha hi.
Tua ciangin Leitaw lam kongpi tawnin tual sungnungah hong paipih hi. A lampi a teh ciangin a dangte mah tawh kikim hi.

29-30 A galvilna inndei neute, a inndei golzaw, leh kawm sungnungte pen, kongpi dang-ate mah tawh kibang hi. Hih kongpi lam-a om inndei neute-ah zong kongvangneute om hi. A lampi tong sawmnga sau-in, tong sawmnih leh nga zai hi.
A inndei golzaw pen in tual puanung lam nga hi. Lampi pang tuaka kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl a, hih kongpi lampi tun’ nadingin kahlei cial giat om hi.
Tua ciangin nisuahna lam kongpi tawnin a tual sungnung-ah hong paipih hi. A lampi a teh ciangin a dangte mah tawh kikim hi.

A galvilna inndei neute, a inndei golzaw, leh a kawm sungnungte zong, kongpi dang-ate mah tawh kikim hi. A kimkotah kongvangneute om a , a inndei golzaw ah zong om hi. A lampi tong sawmnga sau a, tong sawmnih leh nga zai hi.
A inndei golzaw pen a tual puanung lam nga hi. Lampi pang tuaka om kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl a, hih kongpi lampi tun’ nadingin kahlei cial giat om hi.
Tua ciangin leilu lam kongpi lampi-ah hong paipih a, a teh ciangin a dangte mah tawh kibang hi.
A dangte mah bangin hih in zong galvilna inndei neute, kawm sung lam tung kizemte, inndei gol zaw pen, leh a kimkotah kongvangneute nei hi. A lampi tong sawmnga sau a, tong sawmnih leh nga zai hi.
A inndei golzaw pen a tual puanung lam nga hi. Lampi pang tuaka om kawmte tungah nisuh kung lim kibawl a, hih kongpi lampi tun’ nadingin kahlei cial giat om hi.
Tual puanung sungah lampi tawh a kimatin inndei gol khat om a, a inndei pen a tual lam nga hi. Hih lai munah biakna-in a pum a, a hal ding uh ganhing luangte silsiang uh hi.

Hih inndei gol sungah sabuai li om a, a lang tuakah nih tuakin kikoih hi. Meihal biakna-a piak ding ahi a, mawhna leh khialhna hanga biakna-in piak ding ganhingte ahi zongin, hih sabuaite tungah go uh hi.
Hih inndei pualam, leilu lam kongpi lutna pang tuakah zong sabuai nih tuak, a vekin sabuai li mah om hi.
Tua ahih manin inndei sungah sabuai li, a pua-ah sabuai li, a vekpi-in giat om a, hih sabuaite pen, biakna-in piak ding ganhingte gawhna-a kizang ahi hi.

Meihal biakna-in piak ding ganhingte bawl nadinga kizang sabuai lite pen suang a kiseek ahi hi. Tua sabuaite tong khat sang a, a dung a vai tong khat leh a lang tuak ahi hi. Biakna-in piak ding gangawhna-in a zat uh na khempeuh, hih sabuaite tungah koih uh hi.
Hih sabuaite kimkotah khut peek cia bang a zai geihual kibawl hi. Biakna-in piak ding sa khempeuh hih sabuaite tungah kikoih hi.

Tua ciangin a pualam panin a tual sungnungah hong paipih a, a tual sungnungah inndei nih na om hi. Khat pen leilu lam kongpi lam pangah omin leitaw lam nga a, a khat pen leitaw lam kongpi lam pangah omin leilu lam nga hi.
A mipa in kei kiangah hih bangin hong gen hi: Leitaw lam a nga inndei pen biakinn sungah na a sem siampite’ ading hi a,

leilu lam a nga inndei pen biakna tau-ah na a sem siampite’ ading ahi hi. Tua siampite khempeuh pen Zadok’ suan Levi mite vive ahi uh hi. Ama na a sem dingin Topa’ omna-ah amaute bek kipaisak hi, hong ci hi.
A mipa in hih tual sungnung a teh ciangin a dung a vai tong za khat tuak pha hi. A biakinn mai-ah biakna tau khat om hi.
Tua ciangin biakinn sung lutna inndei-ah hong paipih hi. Amah in a sung lutna lampi teh a, tong nga sau-in, tong sawm leh li zai a, a pang tuaka kawmte tong thum tuak sah hi.
Innsung lutna inndei pen tong sawmnih sau a, tong sawm leh nih zai a, tua lai tun’ nadingin kahlei cial sawm om hi. Innsung lutna inndei pang tuakah khuampi khat tuak om hi.
Tua ciangin a mipa in a laizanga om inndei-ah hong paipih hi. Tua inndei lutna lampi teh a,
tong sawm zai a, a pang tuaka om kawmte tong nga tuak sah hi. A laizanga om inndei sung a teh ciangin tong sawmli sau a, tong sawmnih zai hi.
Tua ciangin inndei tawngnungah amah pai a, tua sung lutna lampi a teh ciangin tong nih sau-in tong guk zai a, a pang tuaka om kawmte tong sagih tuak sah hi.
Tua inndei tawngnung a teh ciangin a dung a vai tong sawmnih tuak pha hi. Tua ciangin amah in kei kiangah, “Hih lai in Siangthopen Mun ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in biakinn kawm puanung teh a, tong guk tak sah hi. Hih kawm tawh a kimatin biakinn kimkotah inndei neuneu om a, tuate tong li vive zai hi.

Hih inndei neute dawl thum pha a, dawl khat gual paiphei suak-ah inndei neu sawmthum om hi. Tua inndei neute a dawl san’na tawh kizui-in a biakinn kawm pa to tektek a, tua inndei neute a nang dingin khuam a tuamin kul loin a biakinn kawm kimang toto hi.

Tua biakinn kawm pang bel-a kibawl inndei neute sungah kahlei om to a, a dawl nuainung panin a tungnung dongin kizom to hi. A inndei neute a dawl a san’na lamah a biakinn kawm a paat tektek mah bangin a sang lama om inndei neute a sung zai semsem hi.
Biakinn kimkot teng a lei kitawito a, a mun dangte sangin tong gukin sangto zaw hi. Tua mun panin biakinn kawm leh a kimkota inndei neute kipan to pan hi.
Inndei neute a kawm sahna tong nga pha a,
biakinn kimkotah suangphah bangin a kitawito-a kibawl a zaina in tong sawmnih ahi hi.
Biakinn kimkot-a om inndei neute-ah paina ding kongvang, leilu lamah khat omin, leitaw lamah khat om hi. Tua biakinn kimkotah tong nga paisuak a zai cial khat om leuleu hi.
Tua ciangin nitumna lamah biakinn lam a nga inn khat om hi. A inn dung tong sawmkua hi a, a vai tong sawmsagih hi a, a kimkota a kawm tong nga sah hi.
Tua ciangin mipa in biakinnpi teh a, tong za khat pha hi. A kimkota mun awng, a innsung leh a kawm tawh kigawmin tong za khat ahi hi.
Nisuahna lam pang biakinn mai lam a vai lamin a mun awng tawh kigawmin tong za khat mah ahi hi.

Tua ciangin biakinn nitumna lam pangah a om, a tual lam a nga inn a sauna teh a, a kawm tegel tawh kigawmin tong za mah pha hi. Biakinn sung lut nading inndei, leh a inndeipi, leh Siangthopen Mun sungte pen
a sual panin a kongvangneute ciang dong singpeek tawh kidap hi. A kongvangneute pen a pualam a kihui-a kibawl ahi hi.
Biakinn sung lam kawmte pen kongkhak zang ciang dong lim kibawlte tawh kidim a,

nisuh kungte leh kherub limte vive ahi hi. Amasa-in nisuh kung, tua ciangin kherub, nisuh kung, kherub cih bangin a kimkot khempeuh ah kihelh to dimdiam hi. Tua kherubte in maitang nih ciat nei uh hi.
A mihing maitang in a pang khat lama om nisuh kung lam nga a, a humpinelkai maitang in a pang lang khat lama om nisuh kung lam nga hi. A biakinn sung kimkotah hih bangin kibawl a,
sual panin kongkhak zang kikal sung khempeuh ah a dimin om hi.
Biakinn deipi kongkhak khuamte pen a siik kikim vive ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Siangthopen Mun mai-ah sing tawh a kibawl biakna tau tawh a kibang pian khat om hi. Tong thum sang a, a dung a vai tong nih ahi hi. A khete, a kingaknate leh a zawlte sing tawh a kibawl ahi hi. A mipa in kei kiangah, “Hih in Topa’ mai-ah a kikoih sabuai ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Inndeipi sung lut nading leh Siangthopen Mun lut nading ah kongkhak om hi.
Tua kongkhakte pen a laizang-a kituah, kongkhak peek nih nei-a kibawl ahi hi.

Biakinn sung kawmte tungah a kibawl mah bangin hih biakinn deipi sung lutna-a kongkhakte tungah nisuh kung leh kherub limte kibawl hi. Kongkhak pualam, innsung lut nading inndei tung san-ah singpeek tawh liimsun khat kibawl hi.
Hih inndeipi sung kawmte tungah a pualam a kihui kongvangneute om a, nisuh kungte tawh zepna zong kibawl hi.
Tua ciangin mipa in a tual puanungah hong paipih a, biakinn nitumna lam mong-a om inn tawh a kigamla lo, biakinn leilu lam-a om inn khat hong tun’pih hi.
Leilu lam pang hih inndung tong za khat hi a, a vai tong sawmnga ahi hi.

Tua inn pang khat in biakinn gei-a mun awng tong sawmnih a zai a omna lam nga a, a pang lang khat in tua puanung a suangphah lam nga hi. Tua inn pen cial thum a pha a kitawito tungah kilam a, a tunga cialte pen a nuai-ate sangin neu to zaw tektek hi.
Hih inn leilu lam pangah tong sawm zai-in, tong za a sau lampi khat tung a, lutna kong zong tua lam mahah om hi.
A cial tungnung-a om inndeite pen a nuai-ate sangin neuzaw hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen a sangto zaw, a kawcik zaw-ah om uh hi.
Biakinn tual-a inn dangte mah bangin tua inndei dawl thumte pen a cial tungah kinga uh a, a tuamin khuam nei lo uh hi.

7-8 A cial nuainung-a inndeite pen tong sawmnga sau a, tua lai panin tua inngualte tawh a paikhawm hilhel tong sawmnga mah a sau kulh khat om hi. Tua ciangin biakinn galkhat lam-a om kulh pen tong za khat sau hi.
9-10 Tua ciangin biakinn nitumna lam mong a, om ahi, kulh a kipatna mun a inn nisuahna lam mongah kongkhakte om hi.
Leilu lam pang-a om mah bangin hih inndeite mai-ah zong lampi khat om hi. A sauna, a zaina, a pianzia leh a kongte zong leilu lama om mah tawh kibang hi.
Nisuahna lam pang-a kulh a kipatna mun a inn leitaw lamah kongkhakte om hi.

Tua ciangin a mipa in kei kiangah, “Leilu lama om leh leitaw lama om hih inn nihte pen biakna inn siangtho ahi hi. Topa’ omna-ah a lut siampite in biakna-in a kipia a siangthopente, hih innte sungah ne uh hi. Hih inndeite a siangtho ahih manin, a kipia nate an tawh biaknate leh mawhna leh khialhna hangin biakna-in a kipia sate, a sungah koih uh hi.

Siampite in Topa tungah biakna pia-in biakinn sungah a lut khit uh ciangin a pualamah a pusuah nop uh leh, Topa tungah biakna a piak lai takun a silh uh puante suahin hih inndeite sungah koih ding uh hi. Tua lai panin puan dang silhin mihonte omna-ah pai thei pan uh hi,” hong ci hi.
A mipa in biakinn sung lam teng a teh a zawh khit ciangin nisuahna lam kongpi tawnin hong pusuahpih a, biakinn pualam teng teh hi.
Amah in tehna piciang la-in nisuahna lam pang teh a, tong za nga pha hi.
17-19 Tua ciangin leilu lam pang, leitaw lam pang, leh nitumna lam pang teh a, a thumin a sauna kikimin tong za nga pha hi.

Tua ahih manin a umna tua kulh a pang li-in a teh khit ciangin a pang li mah-in kikim a, pang khat ciangin tong za nga vive pha a, tua deina kulh pen biakna-a a siangtho leh a mawkmawkte khenna ahi hi.
Tua khit ciangin a mipa in biakinn nisuahna lama om kongpi-ah hong paipih a,
nisuahna lam panin Israelte’ Pasian’ minthan’na hong pai ka mu hi. Pasian’ awging pen tuipi ging tawh kibang a, ama minthan’na in leitung taangsak lela hi.
Hih ka maang muhna pen, Pasian in Jerusalem khuapi susia dingin a pai lai-a ka muh leh Khebar Gun gei-a ka muh tawh kibang hi. Tua ciangin thakhatin leilak kiden’na-in ka boksuk hi.
Topa’ minthan’na in nisuahna lam kongpi tawnin biakinn sungah lut hi.
Tua ciangin Kha in hong la-in a tual sungnungah hong paipih a, tua lai panin, Topa’ minthan’na tawh biakinn sung a kidimna ka mu hi.
Tua lai mun panin kei kiangah a mipa a din’ lai takin biakinn sung panin Topa in kei hong hopihna ka za a,

“Ezekiel aw, hih lai munah ka kumpi tokhom om hi. Israel mite lak hih lai munah ka teeng ding a, amaute ka uk tawntung ding hi. Israel mite leh a kumpite un pasian dang biakna tawh ahi a, a kumpi sisate uh phawk nading mual bawlna tawh ahi zongin ka min siangtho daisak ngei nawn lo ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a kumpite un a kongkhuam uh leh a kongzawlte uh keima biakinn kongkhuam leh kongzawlte tawh kimatin bawl uh a, ka kikal uh kawm bek in hong hal hi. A muhdahhuai a gamtatnate khempeuh uh tawh ka min siangtho hong daisak uh a, kei zong ka heh manin amaute ka susia mang hi.

Ahi zongin tu-in amaute in pasian dangte bia nawn loin, a kumpi sisate uh phawkna a mual uh a phiat ding uh ahi hi. Tua bangin a gamtat nak uh leh amaute lakah ka teeng paisuak tawntung ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in a thugen hong zom lai a, “Ezekiel aw, Israel mite tungah biakinn thu leh a geelna khempeuh a cing takin lak in la, amaute’ mawh gamtatna hangin maizum sak in.

Amaute a gamtatnasate uh hang hong maizum theih uh leh, biakinn geelna, a lim, a lutna leh a pusuahna, a buppi lim, a na khempeuh a kigeelna, leh a zat dan ding khempeuh a cing takin amaute tungah lak tel in la, amaute in a kigeelnate thei-in a zat dan ding bangin a zuih theih nadingun amaute’ adingin lai-in gelhsak in.
Biakinn tawh kisai ngeina-in: Mual tunga om biakinn kimkot mun khempeuh pen biakna tawh kisai-in a siangtho ahi hi.

“Biakna-tau golna pen hih bang hi ding hi. A teh nadingin biakinn tehna-a kizang ngeite mah hi ding hi. A biaknatau bul kimkot pen tong khat sangin, tong khat zai ding a, a tua kimkotah khap khat a sangin geivial nei ding hi.
A tau bul panun a tau zawl nuainung ciang tong nih hi ding a, a sahna tong khat hi ding hi. Tua ban siah tong li sangto ding a, tong khat sah ding hi.
A tungnung pen, ganhing kihalna mun in tong li sang ding a, a kiu li-ah tong khat a sang ki om ciat ding hi.
A biaknatau dawn zang pen a dung a vai a kikim hi ding a, tong sawm leh nih sau-in tong sawm leh nih zai ding hi.

Biakna tau a paito a laizang san teng pen a dung a vai a kim, tong sawm leh li hi ding a, a nuai dawl sangin khap khat pai-in neuzaw ding hi. Tua a din’na a nuai gual kimkot tong khat pai-in zai ding hi. Biakna tau tung kah nading kahlei pen nisuahna lam pangah om ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in kei kiangah, “Ezekiel aw, hih biakna tau zat nading ngeinate in hih bang hi ding hi: Biakna tau a kizawh khit ciangin a tungah meihal biakna piakna leh biakna piakna ganhing site thehna tawh apna a bawl ding na hi hi.

Zadok suan leh khak ahi Levi siampite pen keima na a sem dingin ka omna-ah a hong pai dingte ahi uh hi. Topa Pasian keimah in hih thu kong pia hi. Mawhna hangin biakna-a piak dingin amaute tungah bawngtal khat na pia ding hi.

Nangmah in a sisan pawlkhat la-in biaknatau kiu li-a om ki lite, biakna tau paito a laizang kiute, leh a kimkot-a om a geihualte na nuh ding a, hih bangin hihna tawh biakna tau sian’ suahin na ap ding hi.
Mawhna hangin biakna-in a kipia bawngtal pen la-in biakinn huang pualam, a mun hong kigenna sanah a hal ding na hi hi.
A zing ciangin pauban’na a om lo keeltal khat la-in mawhna hangin biakna-in na pia ding hi. Bawngtal si tawh na sian’ suah mah bangin hih keeltal si tawh zong biakna tau na sian’suah ding hi.
Hih bangin sian’suahna na man khit ciangin, paubanna a om lo bawngtal khat leh tuutal khat na la ding a,
Topa ahi keima kiangah nong paipih ding hi. Siampite in tua ganhingte tungah ci thehin, keimah hong biakna-in tua ganhingte hal ding uh hi.
Mawhna hangin biak piakna-in ni sagih sung nisimin, paubanna a om lo keeltal khat, bawngtal khat, leh tuutal khat a pia ding na hi uh hi.
Siampite in ni sagih sung biakna tau apna bawlin zat theih dingin a baihsa-in omsak ding uh hi.

Hih bangin ni sagih sung a hih khit uh ciangin, a ni giat ni-a kipanin siampite in meihal biakna leh thunuam-a biak piaknate, biakna tau tungah piak ding kipan ding uh hi. Tua ciangin note tungah kei ka lungkim ding hi. Topa Pasian keimah in hih thu ka gen khin hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin a mipa in nisuahna lam biakinn huang kongpi pua-ah hong paipih a, a kongpi na kikhak hi.

Topa in kei kiangah, “Hih kongpi kikhak paisuak ding a, kihong kik ngei lo ding hi. Israelte’ Topa Pasian keimah in hih kongpi tawn khin ka hih manin kuamah dang in tawn thei nawn lo ding a, a kikhak den ding ahi hi.

Ahi zongin hih lai-ah gam-uk na a sem laitak ulianpa pen keima omna-ah biakna an siangtho a ne dingin hong pai thei ding hi. Amah hong pai ciangin inndeipi tawnin inndei sungnung kongvangah hong lutin tua lai mahah pusuak ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin a mipa in leilu lam kongpi tawnin biakinn mai-ah hong paipih a, ka khuadak leh, Topa’ biakinn sung khempeuh, ama minthan’na tawh na kidim hi. Kei zong leilak kiden’na-in ka boksuk hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in kei kiangah, “Ezekiel aw, tu-a na muh ding nate leh na zak ding thute khempeuh hoih takin ciamteh in. Ka biakinn a kizat nading ngeina om khempeuh tu-in a hong gen ding ka hi hi. Biakinn sunga pai thei dingte leh Siangthopen Munah a pai thei lo dingte khempeuh lim takin ciamteh in.
A lehdo thei hih Israel mite’ tungah Topa Pasian keimah in ka gen thute, hih bangin gen in. No Israel mite aw, a beisa hun-a a muhdahhuai na gamtatnate khempeuh uh khawl un.

Keimah biakna-in sathaute leh sasite nong piak uh ciangin, keima thu a mang lo, vun a ki-at lo gamdang mite a sungah na lutsak uh a, ka biakinn na ninsak uh hi. Tua bangin a muhdahhuai na gamtatnate uh tawh ka thuciamna na siasak uh hi.
Ka biakinn sungah biakna ngeinate na zui kei uh a, ka biakinn sungah gamdang mite peuh na na semsak uh hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Topa Pasian in tu-in kong genin ah: Vun ki-at lo gamdang mite peuhmah ka biakinn sungah lut lo ding uh a, note lakah a teeng gamdang mite nangawn lut lo ding uh hi.
No Israel midangte tawh kei hong nusia khawmin milim a bia Levi mite in zong daan thuak ding uh hi.

Amaute in biakinn kong cin’ leh biakinn sung nasepte sem thei ding uh hi. Meihal biakna-a kipia ganhingte leh mite in biakna-in a piak ganhingte go thei ding uh a, mite’ na a sepsak dingin tavuan la ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin amaute in milim biakna lamah Israel mite makaih-in mawhna sungah Israel mite tun’pih uh ahih ciangin, amaute daan ka piak ding, Topa Pasian keimah nakpi takin ka kiciam hi.

Amaute in keima siampi na sem loin, keima biakna na a siangtho nate nai-ah pai thei loin, Siangthopen Munah zong lut thei lo ding uh hi. Hihte pen, a muhdahhuai a gamtatnasate uh hangin a daan uh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin biakinn sunga nasep a kisam dangte a sem dingin amaute ka seh thei ding hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in kei kiangah, “Zadok suan leh khak Levi mi siampite ahih leh, Israel mi adangte in kei hong nusiat lai takun, amaute in citakin biakinn sungah keima na hong sem uh ahih manin, tu-in amaute in keima na hong semin, keimah biakna-in sathaute leh sasite keima kiangah hong pia ding uh hi.
Ka biakinn sungah amaute lutin, ka biakna tau-ah nasemin, biakinn sunga biaknate-ah makai ding uh hi.
A tual sungnung paina kongpi-ah a lut uh ciangin saihadial puan silh ding uh hi. Tual sungnung sung leh biakinn sungah na a sep lai takun samul puan peuhmah silh lo ding uh hi.
Amaute in saihadial puan khimin, saihadial puan tengin, khua-ul a suaksak thei kawnggak gak lo ding uh hi.

Mi dangte a omna biakinntual puanung ah a pusuah ma-un, biakinn sungah na a sep lai takun a zat uh puante suahin inndei siangtho sungah nusia ding uh hi. Tua lai panin amaute in puan dangte silhin pusuak ding uh hi. Tua hi kei leh a biakna puan siangte un mi dangte lawh kha ding hi.
“Amaute in a sam uh mettol lo ding uh a, a sau lua-in zong hawi lo ding uh hi. A kilawm ciang bek khat-in met ding uh hi.
Biakinntual sungnung ah a lut ma-un siampite in leenggahzu ne lo ding uh hi.
Meigong numei ahi a, a kimasa numei ahi zongin zi-in nei lo ding uh a, Israel nungak, ahih kei leh siampite’ zi meigongte ten’pih ding uh hi.
“Amaute in ka mite tungah, biakna na a siangtho leh a mawkmawk nate, leh a nin leh a siang nate a kilamdan’na hilh ding uh hi.
Thu nei khatpeuh peuh a om ciangin, keima ngeina omsa tawh kizui-in thu khen ding uh hi. A kiseh pawite a ngeina omsa bangin bawl ding uh a, sabbathte siangthosak ding uh hi.

Siampite pen misi lawn’na tawh kininsak lo ding uh hi. Ahi zongin, a nu uh ahi a, a pa uh ahi a, a sanggam pasal uh ahih kei leh pasal a nei nai lo a sanggam numeite uh hangin kininsak thei ding uh hi.
Amaute a kisian’suah khit uh nipi kal khat khit ciang bekin,
biakinntual sungnung ah pai-in biakinn sungah na a sep kik theih nadingun kisian’suahna biakna pia ding uh hi. Topa Pasian in hih thu ka gen khin hi.

“Israel mite tungah ka piak, khang khat pan khang khatah a kiluah suksuk ding sung panin siampite’ tanh in siampi nasepna za ahi hi. Amaute in Israel mite lakah neihsa gamh nei lo ding uh hi. Amaute’ kisapna khempeuh ah kei a kicing khin ka hi hi.
An tawh biakna, mawhna leh khialhna hanga biakna, leh Israel mite lak panin keima adingin a kipia khiate khempeuh amaute in ne ding uh hi.

Anpal sung panin a limcipen teng leh kei tungah hong kipia na khempeuh, amaute in tang ding uh hi. Israel mite’ inn sungah ka thupha a tun’ theihna dingin amaute in anlum a em simun, biakna-in siampite tungah a em masak penpen uh pia ding uh hi.
Siampite in vasa ahi a, ganhing ahi zongin, sa nek baang hita leh ama thu-in a si tawm mawkte hita leh, ne lo ding uh hi.

“Israel minamte tungah piak dingin leitang a kihawm ciangin, Topa tanh dingin seh khat kituam koih ding hi. Tua a kituam koih leitang in a dung tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga hi ding a, a vai tong tul sawmnih hi ding hi. Tua sung khempeuh a siangtho biakna leitang hi ding hi.
Hih leitang sung panin biakinn ding tawh kisai-in a dung tong za nga, a vai tong za nga mah kisehin, tua banah a kimkot tong sawmnga paisuak mun awng tawh hi lai ding hi.
Hih biakna leitang siangtho sung panin siangthopen mun leh biakinn mun dingin a sau lam tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga, a zai lam tong tul sawm kisehkhia ding hi.

Hih a kisehkhia mun sung teng pen biakna leitang siangtho hi ding a, Topa’ biakinn sungah na a sem siampite ading hi ding hi. Hih mun sung teng pen siampite’ inn lam nading mun leh biakinn lam nading mun siangtho hi ding hi.

Hihte banah, a dung tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga, a vai tong tul sawm a pha seh khat kibawl leuleu ding a, biakinn sungah na a sem Levi mite’ ading hi ding hi. Tua sung tengah amaute’ ten’ nading khua om ding hi.

Khuapi huang sung dingin a dung tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga, a vai tong tul nga a pha leitang khat kiseh khia ding hi. Hih mun pen a siangtho leitang tawh kizom pah ding a, Israel mite khempeuh ading hi ding hi.

“Gam sung a uk uliante’ adingin zong leitang kiseh khia ding hi. A siangtho leitang leh khuapi huang panin kipanin nitumna lamah gamgi ciang, nisuahna lamah zong gamgi ciang mah hi ding a, nitumna pan nisuahna lam gamgi pen Israel minamte khat in a ngah zah tanh mah hi ding hi.

Hih mun teng pen Israel gamsung panin a uk uliante’ neih hi ding hi. Tua ahih manin amaute in Israel mite bawlsia nawn lo ding uh a, mun a om lai teng khempeuh, a minam zui-in Israel minamte tangsak ding uh hi.

“Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: No Israel a uk uliante aw, na mawh gamtatna uh sau vei lua zo ta hi. Na ngongtatnate uh leh mi na nenniamnate uh khawl un la, thuman thutangin na sem un. Amau leitang panun ka mite notkhia nawn kei un. Topa Pasian keimah in hih thu kong gen hi.
“Mi khempeuh in tawisuang man leh tehna man zang ding uh hi.
An tehna bung leh tui tehna bung kikim ding a, a kizang ding etkakna pen beem hi ding hi. Beem khatah an bung sawm, tui bung sawm mah hi ding hi.
A gik tehna pen, gerah sawmnih ciang shekel khat, shekel sawmguk ciangin mina khat hi ding hi.
“Biakna na piak nading zia uh pen, mangbuh na neih zah uh pan seh sawmguk suah sehkhat, mangbuhham zong seh sawmguk suah sehkhat mah,
sathau na neih sung uh pan seh za-ah khat (bung tawh teh-in bung sawm ciangin beem khat-a seh),

tuu na neih sung uh pan za nih ciangin khat hi ding hi. Hihte pen an tawh biakna, meihal biakna, thunuam-a biak piaknate hi a, na mawhnate uh a mai theih nading ahi hi. Topa Pasian in hih thu kong pia hi.
Israel mi khempeuh in hihte pen biakna-a piak dingin, amau a uk ulianpa tungah puak ding uh hi.

Gam uk ulianpa in meihal biakna-a piak ding ganhingte, an tawh biakna-a zat dingte, leh pawi khempeuh, kha det ni, sabbath nite-in Israel mibuppite’ adingin tuiphih biaknate a piak ding ama nasep ahi hi. Israel mite’ mawhna a mai theih nadingin mawhna hanga biakna, an tawh biakna, meihal biakna, leh thunuam-a biak piakna-a zat dingte khempeuh amah in a sikh ding ahi hi.
“Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi. Kha khat a, a ni masa ni-in pauban’na a om lo bawngtal khat biakna-in pia-in biakinn a siangsak ding na hi uh hi.
Siampipa in mawhna hanga biak piakna ganhing si pawlkhat la-in biakinn kongkhuamte, biakna tau kiu lite, leh tual sungnung lutna kongkhuamte nuh ding hi.
Tua mah bangin tua kha a ni sagih ni-in zong, tup lohpi leh theih lohna hangin a khial kha mite’ adingin sian’ suahna a bawl ding na hi uh hi. Tu-a bang danin biakinn na siangthosak ding uh hi.
A kha masa a ni sawm-le-li ni-in Paisan Pawi bawl na kipan ding uh a, mi khempeuh in ni sagih sung silngo sawhloh anlum na ne ding uh hi.
Tua pawi bawl a kipat ni-in gam uk ulianpa in amah leh gamsung mi khempeuh adingin mawhna hanga biak piakna-in bawngtal khat pia ding hi.

Tua pawi ni sagih sung ni simin pauban’na a om lo bawngtal sagih leh tuutal sagih la-in Topa tungah meihal biakna-in pia ding a, tua ban-a mawhna hanga biakna-in nisimin keeltal khat zong a pia ding ahi hi.
Bawngtal leh tuutal a kipia zah tawh kizui-in an tawh biak nadingin an bung khat pai leh sathau bing khat pai tawh piakhawm ding hi.

A kha sagihna a ni sawm-le-nga ni-in nipi kal khat sung a kibawl ding Buk Pawi kipan ding a, mawhna hanga biak piakna, meihal biakna, leh an tawh biakna-a piak dingin an leh sathaute, nisimin a kisam zah, gam uk ulianpa in pia ding hi.
“Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Nisuahna lama om, tual sungnung kongpi pen nasep ni guk hun sung teng kikhakcip ding a, ahi zongin sabbath ni leh kha det ni-in kihong ding hi.

Siampite in meihal biakna leh thunuam-a biakna a piak lai takun, gam uk ulianpa pen tual puanung lam panin inndei lianpi kongpi-ah pai-in kongpi khuamte gei-ah ding ding a, tua kongpi ah bia-in tua khit ciangin pusuak kik ding hi. Nitak mateng tua kongpi kikhak lo ding hi.
Sabbath ni leh kha det ni simin mi khempeuh in zong tua kongpi mai-ah Topa bia-in kun ding uh hi.
Gam uk ulianpa in sabbath ni-in meihal biak nadingin pauban’na a om lo tuuno guk leh tuutal khat pia ding hi.

Tua ganhingte tawh a piak khawm ding an tawh biak piak nadingin zong, tuutal khat ciangin an bung khat kizuisak ding a, tuunote tawh piak khop ding pen ama piak nop zahzah hi ding hi. An bung khat a piakna-ah sathau bing dim khat tawh kizuisak ding hi.
Kha det ni ciangin pauban’na a om lo bawngtal khat, tuuno guk, leh tuutal khat hi ding hi.

Tuate tawh piakkhop dingin an tawh biak piak nadingin bawngtal, tuutalte khat ciangin an bung khat pai, leh tuunote tawh piakkhop ding pen ama piak nop zahzah hi ding hi. An bung khat a piakna-ah sathau bing dim khat tawh kizuisak ding hi.
Gam uk ulianpa in a kuan lama a tot lampi teng mah, a ciah ciangin tawnin, inndeipi kongpi mah-ah pusuak ding hi.

“A kiseh pawi hunte-ah Topa bia dingin hong pai mite khempeuh pen a lutna kongpi zui-in kileh kik lo ding uh a, tang takin paisuak ding uh hi. Leilu lam kongpi panin a lutte, leitaw lam kongpi-ah ciah ding uh a, leitaw lam kongpi panin a lutte, leilu lam kongpi-ah ciah ding uh hi.
Gam uk ulianpa zong mihonte mah tawh lutin, amaute mah tawh pusuak khawm ding hi.

Pawi nite leh a kiseh pawi hunte-ah an tawh biakna-a piak ding pen, bawngtal ahi a, tuutal ahi zongin khat ciangin an bung khat in zui ding a, tuunote tawh piakkhawm ding pen a mite’ piak nop zahzah hi ding hi. An bung khat a kipiak ciangin sathau bing dim khat in zui ding hi.

Gam uk ulianpa in ama ut thu-in biakna pia a,meihal biakna ahi a, thunuam-a biakna ahi zongin khatpeuh peuh a piak ciangin, ama lut nadingin nisuahna lama om tual sungnung kongpi kihon’sak ding hi. Amah in sabbath ni-a biakna piakna a bawl mah bangin pia ding hi. Amah a ciahkik khit ciangin a kongpi kikhak ding hi.
“Gam uk ulianpa in meihal biakna-a piak dingin pauban’na a om lo kum khat a pha tuuno khat, zingsang simin Topa tungah biakna-in pia ding hi. Hih pen nisimin a kipia ding ahi hi.
Mangbuhnel lawh dim khat leh a meek khoppih ding sathau hai khat tawh, an tawh biakna-in zong, ni simin pia ding hi. Hih meihal biakna piakna ngeina in a kip paisuak ding ahi hi.
Tua bangin tuuno, mangbuhnel, leh sathau, zingsang simin Topa tungah meihal biakna a kipia ngitnget ding ahi hi.
“Topa Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: Gam uk ulianpa in ama neihsa leitang mun khatpeuh peuh, a tapate khatpeuh peuh tungah a piak leh, tua leitang ngah a tapa in a luah gamh-in nei paisuak ding hi.

Ahi zongin gam uk ulianpa in ama nasemte khatpeuh tungah leitang a piak leh, suahtakna kum a tun’ ciangin tua leitang pen a pia gam uk ulianpa’ neihsa suak kik ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua leitang in ama neihsa hi a, amah leh a tapate bek in nei paisuak thei ding uh hi.

Gam uk ulianpa in mi dangte’ neihsa leitang laksak ngei lo ding hi. Ama tungah a kipia leitang sung panin a tapate khenkhia bek ding hi. Ka mite’ leitang laksakin, bawlsia lo ding hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin a mipa in biakinn tual sungnung leitaw lama om kongpi gei-a inndeite-ah hong paipih hi. Hih inndeite pen siampite’ zat ding a siangtho inndeite ahi hi. Amah in tua inndeite omna nitumna lam pang mong hong kawk a,

“Hih mun pen, siampite in mawhna leh khialhna hangin biakna-in a kipia sate a huanna mun, leh an tawh biak piaknate a em nading mun ahi hi. Hih pen, tual puanung ah biakna sa leh ante paipih kha loin, tua a siangtho nate tawh tual puanung-a om mite a lawhsak khak loh nading uh ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin tual puanung-ah hong pusuahpih a, a tual kiu lite hong lak hi. Tua tual kiu lite munah tualno khat ciat na om hi.
Tua tualnote tong sawmli sau-in tong sawmthum zai a, a vekpi-in a golna kikim hi.
Tua tualno lite a umna kawm dingin suang kiciang ciat a, tua a kawmte belin meikhuk om hi.
A mipa in, “Hihte pen, mite in biakna-in a piaksate, biakinn sung nasemte in a huanna anbuk ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin biakinn lutna kongkhak-ah hong paipih kik hi. Biakinn kongkhak sangkil nuai panin tui luang a, biakinn ngatna nisuahna lamah luang sukin, biaknatau leitaw lam pang tawnsuk hi.
Tua ciangin a mipa in a leilu lam kongpi tawnin hong pusuahpih a, nisuahna lam kongpi pua lamah hong paipih hi. Leitaw lam kulhkongpi-ah a tui hong luangkhia hi.
A mipa in a tehna piciang tawi-in a tui luan’na nisuahna lam tong tul khat ciang dong teh suk a, a tui kei hong ngaptan sak hi. A tui pen siakmit ciang bek thuk hi.
Tua ciangin tong tul khat ciang teh suk leuleu a, tua lai-ah a tui hong ngaptan sak a, khuk ciang tum hi. Tong tul khat ciang teh suk leuleu-in a tui hong ngaptan sak a, ka kawng ciang tum hi.
Tua ciangin tong tul ciang mah teh suk lai leuleu a, a lui tui thuk lua ta ahih manin ka ngap zo kei hi. Thuk lua ahih manin a tui i peek loh buangin a kikantan zo ding hi lo hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Ezekiel aw, hihte khempeuh hoih takin ciamteh in,” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin a mipa in tua gungei mahah hong paipih kik a,
tua lai mun ka tun ciangin a gun lang nih tuakah singkung tampi tak a po ka mu hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, “Hih tui pen nisuahna lam manawhin gam sung nawkin Jordan Kuam-ah luang sukin Si Tuipi sung tung hi. Si Tuipi a tun’ ciangin hih tui in tuipi tui pen, tuisiang suaksak kik hi.
Hih tui a luan’na mun peuhpeuh ah ganhing namkim leh ngasa tampi om hi. Hih tui in Si Tuipi tui siangsak kikin, a luan’na peuhpeuh ah nuntakna omsak kik ding hi.

En-gedi khua panin En-eglaim khua ciang dong tuipi dungah ngasa bengte omin, tua dungah a ngen uh zalin pho keu ding uh hi. Mediterranean Tuipi sungah ngasa om zah mah bangin ngasa nam tampite om ding hi.
Ahi zongin tuipi dunga om nawng lakte leh bualte-a om tuite siang lo ding a, cikhuk dingin tuaci-in om lai ding uh hi.

Hih gun pang tuakah a gah nek dingin singkung nam khempeuh po ding hi. A tehte pulh ngei lo ding a, a gah tawh zong kilawi ngei lo ding hi. Biakinn panin a luangkhia tui ngah ding uh ahih manin kha simin a gah thak gah tawntung ding uh hi. A singgahte an ding hi ding a, a tehte zatui in kizang ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa Pasian in kei kiangah, “Israel minam sawm leh nihte’ gamh dingin leitang hawm ding gamgi in hih bang hi ding hi. Josef minamte in a dangte’ ngah zah nih ngah ding uh hi.
Hih gam amaute’ tanh dingin ka piak nading thu, na pu na pate uh tungah thupi takin ka kiciam khin zo hi. Tua ahih manin tu-in note lakah a kikim dimdiamin hawm un.
“Leilu lam gamgi pen, Mediterranean Tuipi panin kipanin Hethlon khuapi-ah, Hamath khua lutna-ah, Zedad khuapi-ah,
tua panin Berothah leh Sibraim khuapite-ah (hih khuate pen Damaskas kumpi gam leh Hamath kumpi gam kikalah om hi), tua panin Hazerhattikon khuapi (Hauran kumpi gam gamgi gei-a om) hi ding hi.
Leilu lam gamgi pen Mediterranean tuipi-a kipanin nisuahna lam manawhin Damaskas leh Hamath gamgi-a om Hazarenan khuapi ciang hi ding hi.

“Nisuahna lam gamgi pen, Damaskas leh Hauran gamgi kituahna panin hong kipan sukin, Jordan Gun zuisuk a, Jordan Gun nitumna lam pang Israel gam hi-in, nisuahna lam pang Gilead gam hi a, tua panin Si Tuipi kimang sukin Tamar khuapi ciang hi suk ding hi.
“Leitaw lam gamgi pen, Tamar khuapi panin hong kipanin Meribathkadesh bual hong nawk a, tua panin sak nitumna lam manawhin Izipt gamgi zui toin Mediterranean Tuipi sun ding hi.
“Ni tumna lam gamgi pen, Mediterranean Tuipi hi toin Hamath khua lutna tawh a kitang ciang hi to ding hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin hih gam sung teng, no Israel minamte lakah hawm un.

Note adingin na neih kip tawntung ding uh gamh hi ding hi. Hih leitang na hawm uh ciangin note lakah hong teengin ta a nei khinsa minam dangte zong note mah bangin tanh na pia ding uh hi. Amaute pen Israel minam taktakte mah bangin na ngaihsun ding uh a, Israel minam dangte mah bangin leitang hawmna-ah aii sawk thei ding uh hi.
Note’ lakah a teeng gamdang mite in amau’ ten’na minamte tawh leitang ngah khawm ding uh hi. Topa Pasian in hih thu kong gen khin hi.

“Leilu lam gamgi pen, Mediterranean Tuipi panin kipanin Hethlon khuapi-ah, Hamath khua lutna-ah, tua panin Damaskas leh Hamath gamgi kituahna san a, om Hazarenan khuapi ciang sun ding hi. Minam khat in leitang khen khat ciat ngah ding uh a, a kikal uh gamgite pen gambup nisuahna gamgi panin gambup nitumna gamgi ciang hi ding a, leilu lam panin a hawm uh kipan suk ding uh hi. Leilu lam a khungnungpen ah Dan minamte,
a zomah Asher minamte,
a zomah Naftali minamte,
a zomah Manasseh minamte,
a zomah Efraim minamte in nisuahna pan nitumna dongah Manasseh tawh kigamgi ding uh hi,
a zomah Reuben minamte,
a zomah Judah minamte, hi ding hi.

“Tuate zomah, Pasian’ adingin a kipia leitang hi ding a, a zaina pen leilu lam panin a kipan leitaw lam tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga hi ding hi. A dung lam pen gambup nisuahna gamgi panin gambup nitumna gamgi dong, minam dangte’ ngah zah tanh mah hi ding a, a laizang sanah biakinn om ding hi.
Topa’ adingin a kipia leitang in a sauna tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga hi ding a, a zaina tong tul sawmnih hi ding hi.

Siampite in hih a siangtho leitang sung panin tanh ngah ding uh a, leilu lam pang leh leitaw lam pang tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga tuak hi-in, nisuahna lam leh nitumna lam pang tong tul sawm tuak hi ding hi. Siampite’ ngahna sung hih leitang laizangah Topa’ biakinn om ding hi.

Hih mun teng pen Zadok’ suan leh khak siampite ading ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite in Israel midangte a gamtat khialh uh ciangin Levi midangte bangin va zui lo uh a, citakin keima na hong sem uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Levi midangte’ zomah hih bangin a mun tuam diak khat nei ding uh a, tua mun in a siangthopen mun khat hi ding hi.
Hih siampite’ zomah Levi mite in leitang ngah ding uh a, a sauna tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga hi-in, a zaina tong tul sawm hi ding hi.

Topa tungah a kipia hih leitang siangtho pen, leitang khempeuh panin a hoihpen hi a, hih leitang sung panin mun khatpeuh peuh zuak thei lo, adang tawh zong kheek thei lo, midang tungah zong pia thei lo ding hi. Hih leitang in a siangtho leitang hi a, Topa’ aa ahi hi.

“A om lai leitang, a sauna tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga, leh a zaina tong tul nga pen a siangtho leitang hi loin a mawkmawk leitang hi ding a, mite’ taang zat ding mun hi ding hi. Ten’ nading leh a mun awngthawl hi ding a, a laizang-ah khuapi om ding hi.
A khuapi golna in a dung a vai-in a kikim hi ding a, a pang li-in pang khat ciangin tong tulli leh tong za nga hi ding hi.
Khuapi kimkot pai suak-ah tong za nih leh tong sawmnga paisuak a zai mun awng om ding hi.
Khuapi a kilam khit ciangin a siangtho leitang lamah a awng lai, nisuahna lam tong tul sawm, nitumna lam tong tul sawm a om lai teng pen khuapi sungah a teengmite in a khawh ding leitang hi ding hi.
Khuapi sunga nasem-a om mi peuhmah in Israel minam sung panin kuamah deidanna om loin hih leitang kho thei ding uh hi.
Hih a kisehkhia leitang buppi pen a pang li-in tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga pai hi ding a, hih pen leitang siangtho leh khuapi huam sung kigawm hi ding hi.

21-22 A pang li-in tong tul sawmnih leh tul nga paisuak a pha, Topa adingin a kipia leitang leh khuapi huam teng a kilak khiat khit ciangin, a pang tuaka om lai leitang, nitumna lamah tuipi dong, nisuahna lamah gambup gamgi dong, gam uk uliante ading hi ding hi. Hih leitang kipia kikal sungah, biakinn, Topa tungah a kipia leitang, Levi mite a kipia leitang, leh khuapi huam leitangte om ding a, gam uk uliante’ leitang in hihte laitaak ding hi. Hih gam uk uliante’ leitang pen leilu lamah Judah Minamte’ aa, leh leitaw lamah Benjamin Minamte’ aa kikal-ah om ding hi.

“Hih leitang panin leitaw lam pangah, Israel minam a om laite in leitang ngah ding uh a, a kikal uh gamgite pen gambup nisuahna gamgi panin gambup nitumna gamgi ciang hi ding a, leilu lam panin a hawm uh kipan suk ding uh hi. Leilu lam a khungnung penah a ngah ding Benjamin minamte,
a zomah Simeon minamte,
a zomah Issakhar minamte,
a zomah Zebulun minamte,
a zomah Gad minamte, hi ding hi.

Leitaw lam panin Gad minamte a kipia leitang banah gambup gamgi om ding a, Tamar khuapi panin kipanin Meribath-kadesh bual nawk ding a, tua panin sak nitumna lam manawhin Izipt-te tawh gamgi zui ding a, Mediterranean Tuipi-ah tawp ding hi.
Tu-a ka gen bangin Israel minamte in a khang khangin a luah suksuk ding uh leitang dingin amaute tungah a kipia ding leitang ahi hi. Topa Pasian in hih thu kong gen khin hi.

30-34 “A khuapi sungah lut nading kulh kongpite om hi. A khuapi kulh pang lite, pang khat ciangin tong tul li leh za nga sau a, pang khatah kulh kongpi thum ciat om a, Israel minamte khat ciat’ min tam ding hi. Leilu lam pang-a om kulhkongpi thumte in Reuben, Judah, leh Levi tam hi; nisuahna lam pang-a omte in Josef, Benjamin, leh Dan tam hi; leitaw lam pang-a omte in Simeon, Issakhar, leh Zebulun tam hi; nitumna lam pang-a omte in Gad, Asher, leh Naftali tam uh hi.
Khuapi kimkot a sauna tong tul sawm leh tul giat pha a, tu-a kipanin hih khuapi min in, ‘Hih lai-ah Topa om hi,’ (Jehovah Shammah) kici ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehoiakim kumpi a suah zawh a kum thumna kumin, Babilon kumpipa Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem khuapi simin a umcih hi.
Topa in, Jehoiakim kumpipa leh biakinnpi’ na manphate Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa a mansak hi. Amah in a mi matte Babilon gam ama pasian biakinnah paipih a, na manpha a matte sum koihna innah a koih hi.
Kumpipa in Israel salte sunga kumpi nam leh mi lian namte lak pan mi pawlkhat a teel khia dingin innsung mang lianpen Ashpenaz thu a pia hi.

Tua mite in kumpi inn sunga nasem siamte a suah theih nadingun a mel hoih, pumpi tung poina neilo, a navak, hoih taka pilna kisinsak, na a thei baih lungsim navakte ngentang ding ahi hi. Ashpenaz in amaute Babilon lai leh pau a hilh ding ahi hi.

Amaute in kumpi inn sunga nasem dangte mah bangin ni simin an leh leenggahzu tawh vak dingin kumpipa in thu a pia hi. Tua banga kumthum sung sinna a neih khit uh ciangin amaute kumpipa’ mai-ah a kilak kik ding uh ahi hi.
Tua banga a kiteelte in Judah mi vive ahi Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael leh Azariahte ahi uh hi.
Innsung mang lianpenpa in amaute minthak phuah a, Daniel’ min dingin Belteshazzar, Hananiah min dingin Shadrak, Mishael min dingin Meshak, Azariah min dingin Abednego a phuak hi.

Daniel in kumpi inn sunga an leh leengahzu tawh a pumpi a thanghuai sak loh nadingin a lungsim a khentat hi. Amah in innsung mang lianpen Ashpenaz kiangah tua bang an a kipiak loh nadingin a ngen zaw hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Ashpenaz in Daniel tungah maipha leh hehpihna a neih theih nadingin a bawlsak hi.

Ahih hangin Ashpenaz in Daniel kiangah, “Kumpipa in na an nek ding uh leh na dawn ding uh sehsa-a nei khin zo ahih ciangin, khangno dangte ban zo kei kha zenzen leteh a hong thah ding ka lau hi” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Daniel in Ashpenaz in amah leh a dang thumte cing dinga a koihpa kiangah a pai hi.
Amah in, “Nisawm sung hong encik in, anteh bek hong nesak in la, tui bek hong dawnsak in.
Tua ciangin kumpi’ an ne khangnote tawh hong enkak khawm in la, nong muhna bang bangin thukhen ta in,” a ci hi.
Amah in amau nget bang mangin nisawm sung etcik dingin a thukim hi.
Nisawm a cin’ khit ciangin amaute kumpi’ an nete sangin cidam zaw uh a, a ci a sa uh a hoih zaw hi.
Tua ciangin a cingpa in kumpi’ an leh lenggahzu pia loin amaute anteh an a pia hi.
Pasian in tua khangno lite lai theih siamna leh pilna thukte a pia hi. Daniel pen mangmuhna leh mang khiat siamna a pia hi.
Kumpipa sehsa kumthum a cin’ khit ciangin Ashpenaz in khangnote khempeuh kumpipa kiangah a paipih hi.
Kumpipa in amaute khempeuh hopih a, Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael leh Azariahte adang teng khempeuh sangin a hoih zawk tuan lam uh a mu hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpi inn-a vaihawm pawl a suak uh hi.
Kumpipa in bangbang thu haksa nono a dot hangin, hi mi lite in ama gamsung khempeuh a, mitphial siamte leh aisan theite khempeuh sangin a zah sawmin a siamzawk lam uh a mu hi.
Sairas, Babilon kumpi a suah dong kumpi innah Daniel a om to paisuak hi.
Nebukhadnezzar kumpi a suah zawh a kumnih lai takin mang khat a man’ hi. A lungsim patau lua mahmah ahih manin a ihmu thei kei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin bang mang man’ cih a hilh dingin mitphial siamte, mi bum theite, leh khongkhai siamte a samsak hi.
Amaute hong pai uh a, kumpipa mai-ah a din’ uh ciangin kumpipa in, “Mang khat ka man a, tua ka mang pen bang hiam cih thei nuam ka hih manin ka lungsim a patau mahmah hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in Aram pau tawh, “Kumpipa aw, na khan’ sau ta hen! Na mang hong gen leteh a khiatna kong gen ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Kumpipa in, “Ka mangmat leh a khiatna nong gen theih kei uh leh note kong semnen gawp ding a, na inn uh suksiat gawp dingin ka ngaihsun khin zo hi.

Ahi zongin ka mangmat leh a khiatna nong gen theih uh leh, letsong leh minphatna lianpi ka hong pia ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka mangmat bang hi a, a khiatna bang ahi hiam cih hong gen un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Kumpipa aw, na mang hong gen phot leteh a khiatna ka hong gen ding uh hi,” ci-in a dawngkik uh hi.
Kumpipa in “Ka ngaihsutna sa teng hong zasak khin zo ka hih manin hunsau theihtheih nang a zong na hih lam uh tel takin kithei hi.

Ka mangmat nong gen kei uh leh note khempeuh thukhenna khat bek ka hong pia ding hi. No teng khempeuh in lungsim kikhat in zuau thu gengen leng a ngaihsutna hong kikhel ding hi a ci nuam na hi tazen uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka mangmat hong gen phot un, tua hi leh a khiatna zong hong gen thei ding ci-in ka hong muang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Khongkhai theite in, “Kumpipa aw, na deihna bang a hong gen thei ding hih leitungah mihing khat beek om lo hi. Kumpi gen loh mi lianpen leh mi thupi pen khat beek in aisan theite, mitphial siamte leh khongkhai theite’ tungah tua bang thu a dong ngei kuamah om nailo hi.
Kumpipa’ thu dotna pen haksa lua mahmah ahih manin, mihing ahi lo pasiante longal a gen thei ding kuamah om lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua thu hangin kumpipa heh mahmah a, Babilon sunga kumpi’ thudot mi pilte khempeuh thahlup khit dingin thu a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi pilte khempeuh thahlup khit nang thu kipia a, tua thahlup dingte sungah Daniel leh a lawmte teng zong a kihel uh hi.
Tua ciangin Daniel in Babilon gamsunga mipil teng that lum dinga a kisawl kumpi cing Ariok kiangah kampau kidawm takin a va pai hi.
Amah in Ariok kiangah, “Bang dinga kumpipa in hi zah taka thu khauh suaksak ahi hiam? ci-in a dong hi. Ariok in thu piang khempeuh a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Daniel kumpipa’ kiangah pai a, a mangmat a khiatna a hilh theih nadingin, hun tawmvei sung a kingak lai nadingin phalna a ngen hi.
Tua ciangin Daniel innah ciah a, thu piang teng khempeuh a lawmte Hananiah, Mishael leh Azariahte kiangah a ko hi.
Amah in vantung Pasian in amaute hehpih a, tua thu thukpi genkhia thei a, Babilon gamsunga mipil dangte tawh thahna a thuak khawm loh nadingun thu i ngen ding hi ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin tua zanin tua thu thukpi mangmuhna tawh Daniel’ tungah kihilh a, amah in vantung Pasian’ min a phat hi.
“Pasian min kiphat tawntung ta hen; amah pilin a vanglian hi.
Amah in hun leh khuahunte kheel; kumpite a koih a, lah a lakhia hi. Amah in mite pilna leh theihna a pia hi.
Amah in thu thukpite leh thu simte a lakkhia hi. Amah in khuamial sunga kiselte thei a, amah khuavak in a umcih hi.
Nang ka pu ka pate’ Pasian na hi a, Ka hong phat a, ka hong zahtak hi. Nangmah in pilna leh thahatna na hong pia zo hi; thungetna zong za a, kumpipa kianga ka gen ding thu nong lak zo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Daniel in kumpipa in Babilon mipilte that dinga a sawlpa Ariok kiangah pai a, “Babilon gamsunga mipilte that kei in. Kumpipa kiangah hong paipih in, tu-in a mangmat a khiatna ka gen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ariok in thakhatin Daniel kumpipa kiangah paipih pah a, “Kumpipa aw, na mangmat a khiatna a hong gen thei ding Judah salte khat ka va mu hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Kumpipa in Belteshazzar a kici Daniel kiangah, “Ka mangmat bang hi a, a khiatna bang hiam cih hong gen thei ding na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
Daniel in, “Kumpipa aw, tua na theih nop thu a hong gen thei ding khongkhaithei, mitphial siam, aisan siam kuamah om lo hi.
Ahih hangin thusim a lak thei vantungah Pasian khat a om hi. Amah in mai lamah bang thu hong piang ding cih nangmah Nebukkhadnezzar kumpipa tungah a hong hilh zo hi.
Kumpipa na ihmut lai takin mai lama hong piang ding mang khat na man’ a, thu thukpi a lakkhia Pasian in a piang ding thu a hong lakkhol zo hi.
Tu-in midangte sangin ka pil zawk mana kei tungah tua a hong kilak hi loin, Kumpipa in na mangmat a khiatna leh na ngaihsut thu na theih nadingin a hong kilak ahi zaw hi.
“Kumpipa aw, na mangin a tee daldal milim lian mahmah khat na mu a, kihtak huai mahmahin na mai-ah a ding hi.
Tua milim lutang pen kham hoih mahmah tawh a kibawl hi. A awm leh a bante ngun tawh kibawl a, a gil leh a pheite sumngo tawh a kibawl hi.
A khete sik tawh kibawl a, a khepekte khenkhat sik leh khenkhat tungman kigawm ahi hi.
Tua banga na et lai takin, kuama khuk lohin mual tung pan suangtumpi khat hong tuk a, sik leh tungman kigawm milim khete deng tanin a kithehthang hi.

Thakhatin sik, tungman, sumngo, ngun leh khamte kitam nen gawp a, khualkhal hun-a ansi zap bangin a lengmang hi. Huih in leen’ mangkhin ahih manin them kha beek a kimu nawn kei hi. Ahih hangin tua suangtum hong khangkhanga mual cia hong phain leitung khempeuh a dim hi.
“Na mangmat pen tu-a teng ahi hi. Tu-in a khiatna ka hong gen ding hi.
Kumpipa aw, kumpi khempeuh lak pan nang a lianpen na hi hi. Vantung Pasian in nang kumpi-in hong koih a, ukna, vangliatna, thahatna leh minthan’na hong pia hi.
Amah in mi’ teen’na leitung teng, ganhing teng leh vasate uk dingin a hong koih hi. Tua kham lutang in nangmah na hi hi.
Nang khit ciangin nang sanga neuzaw kumpi gam adang khat hong piang ding a, tua khit ciangin sumngo ahi kumpigam thumna in leitung khempeuh a uk ding hi.
Tua khit ciangin kumpi gam lina hong piang ding a, sik bangin a khauh ding hi. Sik in na khempeuh sat nen a, a gawivui bangin, amasa kumpi gam teng khempeuh a sukham ding hi.

A khepek leh a khemete khen khat sik leh khen khat tungman kigawm ahi na mu hi. Tua in kumpigam kikhenthang ding hi cihna ahi hi. Tungman leh sik kigawm ahih mah bangin sik bangin a hoih khop khat khauhna ciang a nei ding hi.
Khemete khenkhat sik hi a, khenkhat tungman ahih mah bangin kumpi’ gam khenkhat thahatin khenkhat a thahat kei ding hi.

Sik leh tungman kigawm na muh mah bangin tua kumpi gam’ukte in kigawm ding hanciamin zi leh ta-in a kiman ding uh hi. Ahih hangin sik leh tungman a kimat theih loh mah bangin a kigawm thei kei ding uh hi.

Tua kumpite a maan’ lai takun, vantung Pasian in a bei thei ngei lo ding kumpigam a hong phut ding hi. Tua kumpigam kuamah in zo zo lo ding a, tua gam in gam dang khempeuhte zo gawpin, a kip tawntung ding hi.

Kuama lawn’ loh a, mualtung pan hong tuksuk suangtum in sik, sumngo, tungman, ngun leh kham tawh kibawl milim a den paih na mu hi. A lian Pasian in mai lamah bang hong piang ding cih Kumpipa a hong hilh hi. Na mangmat pen ahi bang tektekin kong gen a, a khiatna zong a maan bangin kong gen zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa in Daniel’ mai lei lakah kun sukin, Daniel tungah sagawh biakna leh namtui biakna piakna bawl dingin thu a pia hi.
Kumpipa in, “Hih thu thukpi hong gen thei na hih manin na Pasian in thu thuk a lak, pasian khempeuh sung pan a lianpen, kumpite tunga Topa ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Daniel letsong hoih tampi pia a, a za liansak a, Babion gam teng uk sakin, Babilon mipil thu dotte ukpipa dingin a koih hi.
Kumpipa in Daniel’ ngetna mah bangin Shadrak, Meshak, leh Abednego-te Babilon gam khawk uk dingin koih a, Daniel pen kumpi inn sungah a omsak hi.
Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa in a dung tong sawmguk a sang, a vai lam tongguk a gol kham milim pi khat bawl saka Babilon gamsung Dura zanglei-ah a koih hi.

Kumpipa in a milian khempeuh, kumpi tapate, gam ukpite, gam ukpi huhte, mangpite, sumkem mangte, thukhen mangte, khuapi uk mangte leh milian dangte khempeuh, Kumpipa’ milim bawl apna-a paikim tek dingin sapna thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin tua mangliante khempeuh milim apna dingin milim mai-ah a ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin “Mi namkimte, minam tuamtuamte leh paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh aw!

peengkul ging na za ding uh a, tua khit ciangin tamngaite, laiza lasakna gingte, harp lasakna gingte, gawsemte leh tum theih a tuamtuamte a hong kitum ciangin Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa’ koih kham milim mai-ah kunin na bia ding uh hi.
Kun-a a bia lo peuhmah thakhat thu-in mei phualpi sungah kikhul pah ding hi,” ci-in ngaih takin kitangko hi.
Tua mah bangin minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte leh paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in tum theih gingte a zak khit phetun, kun sukin Nebukhadezzar Kumpipa’ kham milim koih a bia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Babilon mite pawl khat pai-in Judah mite a hek sim uh hi.
Amaute in Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa kiangah, “Kumpipa aw, na khan sau hen!
Kumpipa in, tum theihte a hong kitum khit phetin mi khempeuh kham milim mai-ah kunin bia ding uh hi ci-in thu na pia khin zo hi.
Tua milim mai-ah kun loin a bia lo khempeuh mei phualpi sungah kikhul ding hi.

Babilon gam khawk uk dinga na koih Shadrak, Meshak, leh Abednego kici Judah mi pawlkhat a om uh hi. Amaute in kumpipa’ thupiakna a mang kei uh hi. Amaute in na pasiante bia nuam loin, na milim koih mai-ah a kun nuam kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua thu hangin kumpipa heh mahmah a, tua mi thumte ama mai-ah a kipaipih nadingin thu a pia hi.
Amah in “Shadrak, Meshak leh Abednego aw, ka pasian bia nuam loin, ka kham milim koih mai-ah kun nuam lo na hi uh hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin tu in peengkulte, tamngaite, laiza lasakna gingte, harp lasakna gingte, gawsem leh tum theih dang gingte na zak khitphet uh ciangin kunin milim na bia ding uh hi. Na biak kei uh leh thakhatin mei phualpi sungah hong kikhul ding ahih ciangin a hong honkhia zo ding pasian peuhmah omin na um uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Shadrak, Meshak leh Abednego-te in Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa kiangah, “Kumpipa aw, hi thu kong dawng kei ding uh hi.
Mei phualpi sung panin hong honkhia thei pasian a om leh ka biak ka Pasian uh hi ding a, na khut sung panin a hong honkhia ding hi.
Kumpipa aw, a hong hotkhiat kei zenzen taak leh zong, na pasian lah ka bia tuan kei ding uh a, na kham milim mai-ah zong ka kun kei ding uh hi ci-in thei ta in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa in Shadrak, Meshak leh Abednego-te tungah heh mahmah ahih manin a mai a san pempam hi. A sat ngeina zah sagih vei a sazaw meiphualpi cih dingin a mite thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin a galkap thahat penpente in Shadrak, Meshak leh Abednego a hencip ding leh mei phualpi sunga khul dingin thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin amaute puanak leh puan tualpi silhsa leh lukhu khusa-in hencip uh a, mei phualpi sungah a khul uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa’ thupiakna lah kinawh lua mahmah a, mei phualpi lah sa lua mahmah ahih manin a khulte nangnawn meikuang in a hul lum hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Shadrak, Meshak leh Abednego hencip sa-in meikuangpi laizangah a kiasuk uh hi.

Tua ciangin Nebukhadnazzar in lamdang sa mahmahin a ding vat hi. Amah in a thudotte kiangah, “Mihing thum hencipsa-in mei phualpi sungah khul hilo i hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Amaute in, “Himah hi, Kumpipa aw,” ci-in a dawng kik uh hi.

“Tua ahih leh bang hanga meikuang sungah mihing li a kawi paipai mu ka hi hiam? Amaute lah kihen cip lo a, liam zong liam tuak beek lo uh hi — a lina penpa hoh pasian khat tawh a kibang hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Nebukhadnezzar mei phualpi kong gei-ah paito a, “Shadrak! Meshak! Abednego! Sangpen Pasian’ nasemte hong paikhia un,” ci-in a sam hi. Tua ciangin amaute zong thakhatin a hong paikhia pah uh hi.

Kumpi tapate, gam ukpite, gam ukpi huhte, leh kumpipa thudotte khempeuh kikhawm uh a, mei in a kat loh mite a en uh hi. A sam uh zang khat beek mei in kanghul lo a, a puan uh zong kang loin meikhu gim zong a nam beek kei uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in “Shadrak,’ Meshak,’ Abednego’ Pasian phat un. Amah in a vantungmite sawl a, amah a muang ama nasem hih mite a honkhia hi. Amaute in ka thupiakna mang loin, amau’ Pasian longal pasian dang mai-ah kunin bia nuam lo uh ahih manin mei phualpi sunga khul ding a ut zaw uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tu-in minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte, paunam tuamtuamte mi khat peuhpeuh in Shadrak,’ Meshak,’ Abednego-te’ Pasian gensiatna kam pau a om leh kibalnen gawp ding a, a inn uh a kisuksiat sak ding hi ci-in thukhamna ka bawl hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hi banga hon thei pasian dang peuhmah om lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Shadrak, Meshak leh Abednego-te Babilon gam khawk tungah a golzaw ukna za a pia hi.
Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa in leitunga om minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte, paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh tungah a nuai-a thute a khak hi: “Note tungah nopna om ta hen!
Sangpen Pasian in kei tunga lim leh nalamdang a hong lahna thute ka hong gen nuam hi.
Pasian hong lah nalamdangte, bang zahin lian ahi hiam! A bawl nalamdangte, bang zahin vanglian ahi hiam! Pasian in a tawntungin kumpi hi ding a, Amah in a tawntungin a uk ding hi.
“Keimah Nebukhadnezzar in dai takin kumpi innah ka teeng a, nuamsa mahmahin ka om hi.
Ahih hangin ka ihmut lai takin a lauhuai mang khat ka man a, a dipkuat huai mang ka mu hi.
Ka mangmat a khiatna a hong hilh dingin, Babilon gam kumpi thudotte khempeuh a hong pai nadingun thu ka pia hi.
Tua ciangin aisan theite, mitphial siamte, khongkhaitheite, aksi et siamte khempeuh hong pai uh a, amaute kiangah ka mang ka gen hi. Ahih hangin a khiatna a hong gen thei kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Daniel (a min dang Belteshazzar ka pasian min tam a, kiphuakpa) a hong pai hi. A siangtho pasiante’ kha ama sungah om ahih ciangin, ama kiangah ka mangmat ka gen hi.
Ama kiangah, aisan theite laka alianpen Balteshazzar aw, a siangtho pasiante’ kha na sungah om ahih manin thu thuk khempeuh na theihtheih lam ka thei hi. Hih ka mang a khiatna hong gen in, ka ci hi.
Ka ihmut lai takin mangmuhna khat ka nei a, leitung laizangah a po singkung sang mahmah khat ka mu hi.
Tua singkung pen khangkhangin gol semsema, vantung dong banto ahih ciangin leitung mi khempeuh in a mu thei uh hi.
A tehte hoih mahmah a, leitung bup kham khop ding zahin gah a gah hi. Gamsate in a liim bel uh a, vasate in a hiangah bu bawl uh a, a nungta thei khempeuh in a gah a ne uh hi.
Ka mangmuhna ngaihsuna ka om lai takin ka khuadak leh, a vil tawntung vantungmi khat vantung pan a hong tuaksuk ka mu hi.
Amah in nakpi-in kiko-in, “Singkung phuk in la, a hiang teng sattan in; a teh teng heuh siang in la, a gah teng thehthang in. A nuai-a ganhing teng leh a hiang tunga vasa teng hawlkhia in,
Ahih hangin a bul leh lei sunga a zungte nusia in. Sik leh sumngo kual tawh vial in la, gamlak lopate tawh nusia khawm in. Hi mipa tungah daitui kai hen la, ganhingte leh lopate tawh teeng khawm hen.
Amah in mihing lungsim nei nawn loin, kumsagih sung ganhing lungsim a nei ding hi.

Hih in a vil tawntung vantungmi’ thukhenna ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin mun khempeuh ah a om mi khempeuhte in, Sangpen Pasian in mite’ kumpi gamah vai a hawm hi cih a thei ding uh hi. Amah in a teel peuhpeuh a neupente nangawn kumpi a suaksak thei hi.

Keimah Nebukhadnezzar Kumpipa in, Belteshazzar aw, ka mangmat pen hi bang ahi hi. Tu’n a khiatna hong gen in. Ka thudot mite khat beek a khiatna a hong gen thei a om kei uh hi. Ahi zongin nang sungah a siangtho pasiante’ kha om ahih manin na hong gen thei ding hi,’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Belteshazzar zong a kici Daniel in a lungmang lua ahih manin tawmvei sung bangmah gen thei loin a om hi. Kumpipa in, “Belteshazzar aw, mang leh a khiatna huhau in na lung mangsak zenzen kei in,” a ci hi. Belteshazzar in, “Kumpipa aw, na mangmat leh a khiatna pen na galte tungah tungzaw hen.
Singkung sang mahmah na muh pen hong khangkhangin khauh mahmah a, vantung dong banto-a leitunga teeng mi khempeuh in a mu thei uh hi.
A tehte hoih mahmah a, leitung bup a vak zo ding gah a gah hi. Gamsate in anuai-ah tawlnga uh a, vasate in a hiangah bu a bawl uh hi.
Kumpipa aw, nangmah in tua singkung na hi hi. Nang na lian a, na thahat hi. Nakpi takin khanga lian mahmah na hih manin vantung dong na banto a, na vangliatna in leitung khempeuh ah a kizel hi.

Kumpipa in na et lai takin, vantungmi khat vantung panin hong paisuk a, ‘Singkung phuk in la susia in, ahih hangin lei sungah a bul leh a zungte nusia in. A bulah sik leh sumngo kual vial in la, gamlak lopate tawh nusia khawm in. A tungah daitui kia hen la, kumsagih sung ganhingte tawh omkhawm ta hen,’ a ci hi.
Kumpipa aw, a khiatna pen hi bang ahi hi. Sang pen Pasian in na tunga hong tung ding a thukhennasa a hong lak ahi hi.

Mite sung panin hong kihawlkhia ding a, gamsate tawh na teeng khawm ding hi. Bawngtal bangin lopa na ne ding a, pua lamah lumin, kumsagih sung na tungah daitui a hong kia ding hi. Tua ciangin Sangpen Pasian in mihingte’ kumpigam uk a, a teel mi peuhpeuh kumpi a suaksak thei hi na ci ding hi.
Vantungmi in singbul leh a zungte lei sungah nusia dingin thu a pia hi. Tua in, Pasian in leitung khempeuh uk hi, cih na theih ciangin kumpi na suakkik ding hi a cih nopna ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa aw, kong thuhilhna hong mang in. Mawhna bawl nawn kei in la, dik takin gamta in. Mizawngte hehpih leteh, tua in a sia a na gamtatna sate hong puahsak dinga na nuamsa toto ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hi thu teng khempeuh Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa tungah a hong tung hi.
Tua zawh khasawm leh khanih khit ciangin kumpipa in Babilon khua kumpi innkhum zang huan sungah vak a,
“Babilon khua bang zah takin lian ahi hiam! Kumpi ding leh, ka vangliatna ka thahatna kilat nadinga ka lam ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua thute a kamsung pan a pusuah ma-in vantung panin aw khat hong ging a, “Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa aw, ka thu gen na ngai in. Na kumpigam a hong kilakkhiat sak zo hi.

Mite sung pan hong kihawlkhia ding a, gamsate tawh na teeng khawm ding hi. Bawngtal bangin kumsagih sung lopa na ne ding hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in mihingte’ kumpigam uk a, a teel mi peuhpeuh kumpi a suaksak thei hi na ci ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua hun lianin Nebukhadnezzar tungah tua thukhenna a hong tung hi. Mite lak panin Nebukhadnezzar kihawlkhia a, bawngtal bangin lopa a ne takpi hi. A pumpi tungah daitui kia a, a sam kelmul bangin sau a, a khutcinte muvanlai’ khecin bangin a hong sau hi.

A kisehsa hun a cin’ ciangin keimah Nebukhadnezzar in vantung lam ka ento a, ka khua theihna a hong tungkik hi. A nungta tawntung Sangpen Pasian’ min phatin, zahtakna leh minthan’na hih bangin ka pia hi: “Amah in a tawntungin uk ding a, a gam in a kip tawntung ding hi.
Amah in leitung mite bang mahin a sim kei a; vantung mite leh leitung mite in, ama’ khut nuai ahi hi. Ama deihna kuamah in nial thei lo a, A bawl nate kuamah in ahang a kan thei kei hi.

Ka khua theihna a hong tun’ kik ciangin ka kumpi-za ka minthan’na leh, ka gam minthan’nate a hong kipia kik hi. Ka u liante leh ka thudot mite in hong muak uh a, nidang sanga lianzaw minthan’na leh ka kumpi za a hong kipia kik hi.
Tu in keimah Nebukhadnezzar in Vantung Kumpipa phatin, zahtakin a min ka thangsak hi. A bawlna khempeuh a man hi. Amah a tawntungin thuman a, kiphasak-a gamtate a neusak hi.”
Belshazzar in kumpi a suah ciangin pawi lianpi bawl a, u liante tulkhat samin amaute tawh zu a dawn uh hi.

Zu a nek lai takun, Belshazzar in a pa Nebukhadnezzar in Jerusalem biakinnpi pana a puakkhiat ngunhai, khamhai leh kuangte va la dingin thu a pia hi. Kumpipa in a miliante leh a zite leh, a zi neute in tua haite tawh zu a dawn theih nadingun hai la dingin thu a pia hi.
Thakhatin khamhai leh kuangte hong paipih uh a, a vekpi-un tua haite tawh zu a dawn uh hi.
Amaute in zu dawn uh a, kham tawh, ngun tawh, sumngo tawh, sik tawh, sing tawh, suang tawh kibawl pasiante a phat uh hi.
Thakhat thu-in kumpi inn sung meivak tan’ penna lam kawm tungah mihing khut khat hong kilang a, lai a hong gelh hi. Kumpipa in tua khut in lai a gelh laitak a mu hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa lau lua mahmah a, a mai daang gawpin a khut a liing kauhkauh hi.

Amah in mitphial siamte, aisan siamte, aksi et siamte va sam pak un ci-in Babilon mipilte kiangah a gen hi. Tua mite a hong tun’ uh ciangin kumpipa in, “Hih laigelh a sim thei, a khiatna a hong gen thei peuhmah kumpi puanpi san silh sakin, minphatna khamkhi a ngawngah ka ok sak ding a, kumpi gam sungah a za lian thumna-in ka koih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa’ thudot mite hong tung uh a, ahih hangin tua lai a sim thei leh kumpipa tunga a khiatna a gen thei kuamah a om kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Belshazzar kumpipa a lungkham mahmah a, a mel daang semsem a, a u liante in a cih nading meel a thei kei uh hi.
Kumpipa leh a u liante gamlum ngeingai-a a om lai takun, kumpinu pawi inn sungah hong lut a, “Kumpipa aw, sau veipi nungta in. Bang hangin lungkham lua-in na mel daangsak ngeingai zenzen na hi hiam?

Na gam sungah a siangtho pasiante’ kha a nei mi khat a om hi. Na pa kumpi ahih lai takin, tua mipa in pasiante’ pilna tawh a kibang pilna, theihna leh lungsim navakna a nei hi. Tua hi a, na pa Nebukhadnezzar kumpipa in tua pa aisan theite, mitphial siamte, khongkhai siamte leh aksi et siamte’ ukpi dingin a koih hi.

Amah in a kan zaw siamna nei a, mang khiat siamna, thu dotna haksa nonote dawn’ theihna leh thu thukpite gentel theihna a nei hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa in Belteshazzar ci-a a kiphuakpa Daniel sam sak in, tua hi leh amah in a khiatna a hong gen thei pah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Daniel thakhatin kumpipa kiangah a paipih uh hi. Kumpipa in, “Nang Daniel pen ka pa kumpipa in Judah gam pana a hong lakkhiat Judah salte khat hilo na hi hiam?
Na sungah pasiante’ kha om ahih manin siamna na nei a, lung pilna leh theihna na neih lam ka thei hi;
Ka thudot mite leh mitphial siamte in hih lai kigelh sim ding leh a khiatna gen dinga hong pai uh hi napi, a khiatna a thei zo kei uh hi.

Ahih hangin nangmah in thu thukpi leh kuama theih zawh loh thute gen thei hi ci-in kong za zo hi. Hi lai kigelh na sim theih a, a khiatna nong gen theih leh, kumpi puanpi san kong silhsak ding a, minphatna khamkhi na ngawngah hong ok sakin, kumpigam sungah a za lian thumna-in ka hong koih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Daniel in kumpipa kiangah, “Letsong pen kei hong pia kei in la, midang khatpeuh pia zaw in. Ahi zongin tua lai kigelh kong simsak ding a, a khiatna kumpipa kong hilh ding hi.
Sangpen Pasian in na pa Nebukhadnezzar kumpi lianin koih a, zahtakna leh vangliatna a pia hi.

Amah lian lua mahmah ahih manin gam khempeuh, nam khempeuh, pau khempeuhte in kihta in a liing uh hi. Mi khatpeuh a thah nop leh that a, a nuntak sak nop leh a nungta sak hi. A ut leh mi khatpeuh pahtawi-in, a ut leh a daisak thei hi.
Ahih hangin amah a lungkhauhin kiphasak a, gilo lua ahih manin a kumpi tokhom panin kilakhia a, a minthan’na a taan hi.

Amah mihingte lak panin kihawlkhia a, ganhing lungsim a nei hi. Gam sakolte tawh teeng khawmin, bawngtal bangin lopa ne a, daitui dal ding nei loin a pua lamah a lum hi. A tawp khakna ah Sangpen Pasian in mihingte’ kumpi gamte uk a, a teel peuhpeuh kumpi a suak hi ci-in a phawk thei hi.
Ahih hangin a tapa ahi nang mah Belshazaar in hih thu khempeuh na theih hangin na kiniamkhiat tuan kei hi.

Vantung Topa langah na pang hi. A biakinnpi hai leh kuangte la-in sabuai tungah nangmah tawh, na u liante tawh, na zite leh na zi-neute uh tawh zu dawnna-in na zang uh hi. Theihna a neilo, a mu thei lo, khua a za thei lo, ngun, kham, sumngo, sik, sing leh suang tawh a kibawl pasiante’ min na phat uh hi. Na nuntakna leh na hihna khempeuh a hong uk Pasian na zahtak kei hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in hih lai malte tua khut a hong gelhsak hi.
Tua a kigelh laimal in hi bang ahi hi: MENE, MENE, TEKEL, PARSIN,
A khiatna in: MENE: Pasian in na gam ukna nite hong sim sak a, a beisak zo hi.
TEKEL: nang a hong kitawikhai a, na leek zo kei hi.
PARSIN: na gam kikhen kham a, Media leh Persiate a kipia zo hi,” ci-in a dawng kik hi.
Tua ciangin Belshazzar in Daniel kumpi puansan silhsak dingin thu pia pah a, minphatna khamkhi a ngawngah a oksak hi. A gam sunga a za lian thumna dingin a koih hi.
Tua zan mahmah in Babilon kumpipa Belshazzar kithat a,
Media mi Darias kumpi a suak hi. (Tua lai takin, Darias kum sawmguk leh kumnih a pha hi).
Darias in a gamsung khempeuh a uk dingin gam ukpi za leh sawmnih koih dingin a ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua gam ukpite tunga vaihawmpi ding leh kumpi deih bang a sem dingin Daniel leh adang mi nih a teel hi.
Daniel in gam ukpi dangte leh vaihawmpi dangte sangin nasep a siam zaw diak se hi. Tua banga siam zaw diak se ahih manin kumpipa in gam buppi uk a, koih dingin a ngaihsun hi.

Tua ciangin vaihawmpi dangte leh gam ukpi teng in Daniel’ nasepna en cikin a mawhna zon’ ding a hanciam uh hi. Ahih hangin Daniel pen a thuman leh a citak khat ahih manin a mawhna leh a simtatna a mu zo kei uh hi.
Tua banga nasep kizen’ lohna leh a tatkhialhna a muh loh uh ciangin, “Hih Daniel pen a biakna tawh kisai-a thu i muh kei ngal leh mawhsak nading dang i mu kei ding hi,” ci-in a kikum uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute kumpipa kiangah pai uh a, “Darias kumpipa aw, sau veipi nungta in!

Na gam sung nasem ko vaihawmpite, gam ukpite, gam ukpi huhte leh kumpipa thudot mite khempeuh in, Kumpipa in ngat taka zuih ding thukham khat na bawl ding ka thukim uh hi. Tu zawh ni sawmthum sungin nang kumpipa’ kiang longal, pasian kiang ahi a, midang khatpeuh kiang ahi zongin thungen om thei lo ding hi ci-in na kham ding hi. Hih na thupiakna a mang lo peuhmah humpinelkai koihna khuk sungah kikhia ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa aw, thupiakna lai hawmkhia in la, a tungah na min gelh in. Tua hi leh Mediate leh Persiate’ upadi pen kikhel thei lo ding a, ngat taka a kizuih kul ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua mah bangin Darias kumpipa in a min gelhin thu piakna lai a hawmkhia hi.

Daniel in tua bang thu piakna lai kihawm khia khin zo ta hi cih a theih ciangin a innah a ciah hi. A inn tungnung dei sungah Jerusalem lam a nga kongvang neu thum a om hi. Tua lai takah kongvang neu honsa-in ahih ngei bangin khukdin’ in, ni khatin thum vei ta Pasian kiangah thu a ngen hi.
Tua ciangin amah a encik mite in Daniel in pasian kianga thu a nget a mu uh hi.

Amaute khempeuh kumpipa kiangah Daniel hek dingin a pai uh hi. Amaute in “Kumpipa aw, tu zawh ni sawmthum sungin kumpipa kiang longal, pasian kiang ahi a, mi khatpeuh kiang ahi zongin thungen a om leh, humpinelkai koihna khuk sungah kikhia ding hi ci-in thu piakna lai hawmkhia in na min gelh hilo na hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Hi mah hi, Mediate leh Persiate’ upadi bangin a kikhel thei lo ding a ngat thu piakna ka bawl hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in kumpipa kiangah, “Judah salte khat ahi Daniel in kumpipa hong zahtak lo a, na thu piakna a mang nuam kei hi. Ni simin thum vei ta thu a ngen tawntung hi,” a ci uh hi.
Kumpipa in hi thu a zak ciangin lungmang a, Daniel a suahtak theih nading lampi hanciamin ni tum dong a ngaihsun hi.
Tua ciangin tua mite kumpipa’ kiangah hong paikik uh a, “Kumpipa aw, Mediate leh Persiate’ upadi bangin kumpipa in a hawm khiatsa thupiakna kikhel kik thei lo hi cih na thei hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Daniel humpinelkai koihna khuk sunga khiat dingin thu a pia hi. Amah in Daniel kiangah, “Thuman taka na biak tawntung na Pasian in hong honkhia ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin humpinelkai koihna khuk sungah Daniel a khia uh hi.
Amaute in suangtum khat la uh a, humpinelkai koihna khuk gong a hu uh hi. Kumpipa in ama ciamtehna leh a u liante ciamtehna tawh kuamah in Daniel a hotkhiat theih loh nadingin a ciamteh hi.
Kumpipa a innah ciahkik a, tua zan tawntung an ngawl a, gualnopna zong a bawl kei hi. Tua zanin a ihmu thei peuhmah kei hi.
Zingsang khuavak tung phetin kumpipa tho a, humpinelkai koihna khukah a va pai pah hi.

Humpinelkai koihna khuk a tun’ dektak lai takin aw liing kawmin, “Daniel, a nungta Pasian nasempa! Thuman taka na biak tawntung na Pasian in humpinelkai’ kam sung panin a hong honkhia thei hiam?” ci-in a kiko hi.
Daniel in, “Kumpipa aw, sau veipi nungta in.

Pasian in a vantungmi hong sawl a, ka liam loh nadingin humpinelkaite’ kam a humcip sak hi. Kumpipa aw, mawhna ka bawl loh lam leh, nang tunga zong khialhna ka bawl lohna amah in hong thei ahih manin tua bangin a hong bawl hi,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa a lungdam mahmah a, humpinelkai koihna khuk sung pan Daniel kaihkhiat dingin thu a pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin Daniel kaikhiato uh a, liamna themcik zong a neih loh lam a mu uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Pasian a muang hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in a hek teng khempeuh a zi a ta tek uh tawh humpinelkai koihna khuk sunga khiat dingin thu a pia hi. Amaute humpinelkai khuk taw a tun’ ma-un humpinelkai in bak khat suahin a guh a taang-in a balzan gawp hi.
Tua ciangin Darias kumpipa in leitunga om minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte leh paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh tungah lai khak a: “Na tung uhah nopsakna om ta hen.

Ka gam sunga om mi khempeuh in Daniel’ Pasian kihta-in a zahtak nadingun thu ka pia hi. “Bang hang hiam cih leh, Amah in a nungta Pasian hi a; atawntungin a uk ding hi. Ama gam in kisia ngeilo ding a, a vangliatna a bei ngei kei ding hi.
Amah in gumkhiapa leh tankhiapa hi a, vantung leh leitungah, lim leh nalamdangte a bawl hi. Humpinelkaite’ thahatna panin, Daniel a suakta sak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih manin Darias kumpi ahih laitak leh Persia mi Sairas kumpi ahih lai takin, Daniel nuamsa-in a om hi.

Belshazzar in Babilon kumpi a suah zawh a kum masa kumin keimah Daniel in ka lup sungin, mang khat ka man a, zanin maang ka mu hi: Ka mangmat lai-in ka gelh a, tua zana ka mangmuhnate ka ciamtehna hi bang ahi hi.
Vantung kui li panin huihpi hong nunga tuipi tung a seem gawp hi.
Tua ciangin tuipi sung panin a kibang lo sapi gol li a hong pusuak to uh hi.

Amasa pen humpinelkai tawh kibang a, ahi zongin muvanlai’ kha tawh a kibang kha a nei hi. Ka et lai takin a kha tegel a hong kibotkhia hi. Tua ganhing leitung panin kidom kaang to a, mihing bangin a khe nih in kiding sak a, mihing’ lungsim ama tungah a kipia hi.
Tua ciangin a nihna sapi vompi tawh a kibang khat ka mu hi. A nunglam khe tawh ding-in a kam sung a ha kikalah nakguh thum pet a, “Tho in la, sa tampi ne in,” cihna aw khat a hong ging hi.
Ka et lai leh kamkei tawh a kibang sapi dang khat ka mu hi. A nungzangah vasa-kha tawh a kibang kha li a nei hi. Tua sapi in lutang li nei a, ukna aana ama tungah a kipia hi.

Ka et lai leh sapi lina ka mu hi. Tua sapi kihtak huai mahmah a, lipkhap huai-in a thupi mahmah hi. Amah in a gol mahmah sik-ha a nei hi. Amah in nene in a nek val teng a khe tawh a tuancil gawp hi. Amah in sapi dangte tawh kibang loin ki sawm a nei hi.
Tua kite ka et lai takin a dang kineu khat hong po a, a omsa ki thumte a bot khia hi. Tua ki tungah mihing’ mittang tawh a kibang mittang leh kam om a, kiphatsakna kam tampi a pau hi.

Ka et lai takin kumpi tokhomte a hong kikoih hi. A nungta tawntung mi Pa khat in tua tokhomte khat tungah a tu hi. A puante vuk bangin ngo a, a samte tuumul hoih tawh a kibang hi. A tokhom in meikuang lengpei tungah kinga-in meikuang zuazua a;
tua sung panin meikuang gunpi a hong luangkhia hi. Ama nasem ding mihing tulza om a, a mai-ah mihing tul zasawm a ding uh hi. Thukhen nading hun kipana laibute a kiphen hi.
Ka et lai takin tua kineu in kiphatsakna kamsia a pau ka za hi. Ka et lailai leh tua sapi lina kithat a, a pumpi meikuang sungah kikhulin a kisia hi.
Sapi dangte ahih leh a vangliatna uh kilakkhiat sak a, ahih hangin a nuntak lai nading uh hun ciangtan’ khat a kipia hi.
Zan ka mangmuh hun sungin ka khuadak leh mihing tapa tawh a kibang mi khat meii tunga hong pai ka mu hi. A nungta tawnung mipa’ kiangah pai-in, ama kiangah a kipia hi.

Amah in vangliatna, minthan’na leh kumpi za ngah ahih manin, minam kimte, minam tuamtuamte, paunam tuamtuamte khempeuh in ama na a sem ding uh hi. Amah in a tawntungin uk ding a, a kumpi gam a bei ngeikei ding hi.
Ka mangmuhnate in hong linglawng sakin a hong patausak mahmah hi.
Ka pam-a ding mite khat kiangah pai-in hihte khempeuh a khiatna hong hilh in ci-in ka dong hi. Tua ciangin amah in a khiatna a hong hilh hi.
“Hih sapi lite in leitung pana hong khangkhia ding kumpi gam li ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Sangpen Pasian’ mite in kumpi za a ngah ding uh a, a tawntungin a nei tawntung ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a dangte tawh a kibang lo a kihtak huai sik-ha leh sumngo khecin a nei sapi lina thu ka thei nuam hi. Amah in nene-in na khempeuh a tuancil gawp hi.

Tua ciangin a lutanga ki sawm leh, a nung ciangin ki khat hong po-a, ki thum a kitanna thu ka thei nuam hi. Amah in mittang leh kiphatsakna kam sia pau na’ng kam a nei hi. A dangte sangin nakpi takin a kihtak huaizaw hi.
Ka et lai takin, tua ki in Pasian’ mite gal-in do a, amaute a zo gawp hi.
Tua ciangin a nungta tawntung mipa hong pai a, Sang pen Pasian’ mite ading a hoih thukhenna a hong gen hi. Pasian mite in kumpi za a ngah nading uh hun a hong tung hi.

Hih hilhtelna kei a hong kipia hi: “Sapi lina in leitung-a hong om ding kumpi gam lina ding hi a, kumpigam dangte tawh a kilamdang mahmah ding hi. Amah in leitung buppi valhtum ding a, tuancil gawpin a sukham ding hi.

Ki sawmte in tua kumpigam sung pana hong piang ding kumpi sawmte ahi uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpi dang khat hong piang leuleu ding a, amah in a om sate tawh kilamdang mahmahin kumpi thum a nuaisiah ding hi.

Amah in Sangpen Pasian langpan’ in thu gen ding a, Pasian’ mite a bawlsia ding hi. Amah in amaute’ biakna tawh kipawl thukham leh pawi bawlna hunte kheel sak ding hanciam ding a, Pasian’ mite in ama khut sungah kumthum leh a lang a om ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin thukhenna hun hong kipan ding a, ama vangliatna lakkhiat sakin, amah a kisusia maimang ding hi.

Hih leitung kumpigam leh, vangliatna leh liatna khempeuh Sangpen Pasian mite tungah a kipia ding hi. Amau’ kumpi za in cikmah hunin bei ngeilo ding a, leitung ukna za a nei khempeuhte in a thu uh mangin amau’ na a sem ding uh hi.
Hih tangthu a beita hi. Hih thu ka ngaihsut ciangin kei, Daniel ka lau mahmah a, ka meel a daang gawp hi. Ahih hangin hih thu keima lungsim sung bekah ka koih hi.
Belshazzar kumpi a suah zawh a kum thumna kumin keimah Daniel in a nih veina maang ka mu hi.
Ka mangmuhna-ah thakhatin Elam gam khen sung Susa khuapi kulh sunga a om-in ka kingaihsun a, Ulai gun gei-ah ka ding hi.
Ka khuadak toh leh gun gei-ah tuutal khat ding-a om ka mu hi. Amah in a sau mahmah ki nih nei a, a ki po nunung pen a po masa sangin a sauzaw hi.

Tua tuutal in a ki tawh, nitumna lam, sak lam, khang lam a si kawikawi ka mu hi. Ama ut bangin kiphasak-in gamta ahih manin, amah a kho zo ding leh a thahatna pan a suakta zo ding ganhing khat beek a om kei hi.

A bangci hi ding hiam ci-a ngaihsun thei lo-a ka om lai takin, ni tumna lam panin keeltal khat a hong tai veva hi. Hat lua mahmah ahih manin a khe in lei a sukha kei hi. A mit tegel kikal-ah a tuam pian ki lamdang khat a nei hi.
Ki nih a nei gun gei-a ding ka muh tuutal kiang a hong phak ciangin a tha neih zahin a sii hi.
Heh lua mahmah ahih manin tua tuutal tuangawp a, a ki tegel a suktan sak hi. Tuutal in a nan’ zawh na’ng thahatna nei lo ahih manin lei kiden’na a, a huh zo ding kuamah a om kei hi.
Tua keeltal a thahatna hong khangto semsem a, ahih hangin a thahatpen lai takin a ki a kitan hi. Tua ki pona munah a lamdang ki li hong po to kik a, vantung kiu lite a kawk hi.
Tua ki lite lak pan khat tungah kineu dang khat hong kipan a, a vangliatna khang lam, ni suahna lam leh, Thuciamna Gam lamah a vangliatna a khang hi.
Amah in vantung galkapte nangawn dong a ban dingin a thahatna hong khangto a, aksi pawl khatte leitungah lawnkhia-in a tuancil gawp hi.
Amah in vantung galkap kumpipa nangawn do-in ama tunga kipia nisim biakna piaknate nangawn khawlsakin, biakinnpi biaknate a beisak hi.
Nisim biakna piaknate-ah mawhna dim a, biakna maan lei lakah a kipaikhia hi. Ahihna peuhpeuhah tua ki a thahat mahmah hi.

Vantungmi khat in a dang vantung mi khat kiangah thu a dot ka za a, “Hih mangmuhna a tangtun’ nading bang tan vei sawt ding a, a muhdah huai mawhna in nisim biakna piakna bang tan vei khak ding hiam? Vantung galkapte leh biakinnpi bang tan vei kituancil ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Zingsang leh nitak biakna piakna tulnih leh zathum vei a cin’ khit ciangin biakinnpi kipuahkik ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
Keimah Daniel in mangmuhna a khiatna thei nuamin ka hanciam hi. Thakhat thu-in mihing meel tawh a kibang khat ka mai-ah a hong ding hi.
Ulai gungal panin mihing’ aw khat hong kiko a, “Gabriel aw, ama kiangah a muh nate a khiatna hilh in,” cihna ka za hi.

Gabriel hong pai-in ka kiangah hong ding a, lau lua mahmah ka hih manin lei tungah ka puk hi. Amah in, “Leitungmi aw, a khiatna thei in. Mangmuhna pen hun beina ding lahna ahi hi,” ci-in ka kiangah a hong gen hi.
Amah in thu a hong gen lai takin, sibupin lei lakah ka tuk hi. Ahih hangin amah in hong domto-in a hong dingsak kik hi.
Amah in, “Pasian’ hehna hanga a kisehsa hun a, thupiang dingte ka hong lak ding hi. Mangmuhna in hun bei nading lahna ahi hi.
Na muh ki nih a nei tuutal in Media leh Persia gam kumpite a cih nopna ahi hi.
Keltal in Grik kumpi gam hi a, a mit kikal-a po ki in kumpi masapen a cih nopna ahi hi.
Ki po masapen a kitan’ khit ciangin a nunga hong po ki lite in, tua gam panin kumpi gam li hong piang ding cih nopna ahi hi. Ahih hangin tua gamte in a masapen kumpi zahin a thahat kei ding uh hi.

Tua kumpi gamte a bei ding a nunung zaw hun a nai ciangin, gilo lua mahmah ding uh ahih manin daan a kipia ding hi. Tua ciangin ama thu bek thu a sa, mawhna pawlpawl tawh kidim, hehmel a pua kumpi khat a hong om ding hi.

Amah thahat mahmah ding a, ahih hangin ama thahatna ahi kei ding hi. Amah in a dipkuat huai siatna piangsak ding a, a hihna khempeuh ah a thahat mahmah ding hi. Amah in mi thahatte leh Pasian mite a susia ding hi.

A lungsim daplan lua ahih manin zuau phuah siamna tawh a hih peuhpeuh a tangtun’ ding hi. Amah kiliansak lua-in, theihkholh lohin mi tampi susia-in, a lianpen kumpite’ kumpipa nangawn a langpan’ ding hi. Ahih hangin mihing thahatna kizang loin amah a kisusia ding hi.
Hih zingsang leh nitak biakna piakna mangmuhna thu a hong kihilhtelna in a maan ahi hi. Tu in hih mangmuhna thu a hong tun’ ding hun sawtpi hi lai ahih manin imcip phot in,” hong ci hi.

Keimah Daniel in, ni tawmvei sung thazaw gawpin ka ci a na hi. Tua ciangin tho-in, ka nasep ngei semkik dingin kumpi innah ka pai hi. Ka mangmuhna thu thei zo lo ka hih manin cih nading meel thei loin dap takin ka om hi.
Media mi ahi Ahasu-eras’ tapa Darias in Babilon gam teng a uk hi.
Amah kumpi a suah zawh a kum masa kumin keimah Daniel in, Topa in kamsang Jeremiah tunga Jerusalem kum sawmsagih sung kisia ding hi, ci-a a genna laibute simin, tua thute ka ngaihsun hi.
An ngawlin, ippi puan silhin, vut lakah tu-in, Topa’ kiangah deihtakin thu ka ngen hi.
