Note in na lungsim sung uhah, “I ante i zuak theih nadingin, zumkhak hun sung i ngak lah hi. I mangbuhte i zuak theih nadingin, cik ciangin sabbath ni bei ding hiam? I an tehna seu neu seekin, sum tampi i ngen nuam a, tawi khaina man lo zangin, a hong leite i khem nuam hi.
Khedap bu khat man dingin, mizawngte sila-in i zuak nuam a, i mangbuh hoih lote, sum tampi i khawng nuam hi,” na ci uh hi.
Topa, Israel Pasian in ama min liatna tawh kiciam a, “Na gamtat siatnate uh ka mangngilh ngei kei ding hi.
Tua ahih manin ziin hong liing ding a, leitunga om mi khempeuh kap ding uh hi. Nail Gunpi bangin leitung khempeuh khang toin kiamsuk ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin sun kim laipi mahin ni ka tumsak ding a, sunkim laipi mahin leitungah khua ka mialsak ding hi. Topa Pasian ahi keimah in hih thu kong gen khin hi.

Na lungdam pawite uh dahna ka suaksak ding a, na lasaknate uh kahna awging ka suaksak ding hi. Dahna limin puanhampi na silh ding uh a, na sam uh zong na mettol ding uh hi. A tapa khat neihsun a sihsuah nupa na bang ding uh hi. Tua hun in a tawp dongin nasia semsem ding hi.

Keimah in leitungah kial kong tun’sak hun hong tung ding hi. Tua kialpi in an leh tui duhna kial hi lo ding a, Topa’ thu zak nop mahmahna kial hi ding hi. Topa Pasian ahi keimah in hih thu kong gen khin hi.
Mihingte, leilu pan leitaw dong, nisuahna pan nitumna dong, Topa’ thu kanin vak kawikawi ding uh a, ahi zongin mu zo lo ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin nungakte leh tangvalte, dangtakin puk ding uh hi.

Samariah milim pasian Ashimah min tawh kiciam a, ‘Dan khuapi pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin,’ a ci mite leh ‘Beersheba khuapi pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin,’ a ci mite pukin thokik nawn lo ding uh hi,” ci hi.

Biaknatau gei-ah Topa a ding ka mu a, hih bangin thu a pia hi: “Biakinn lim khempeuh a kilin’ theih nadingin biakinn khuampi luzang satgawp in. Tuate satkham in la mite’ luzang tusak in. Tua lai panin a suakta kha teng, gal sungah ka sisak ding hi. A taikhia, a suakta, kuamah om lo ding hi.
Lei to sukin misite omna Leinuai-ah a va tun uh hangin tua lai-ah amaute ka su ding a, vantungah a kah toh uh hangin zong, tua lai mahah amaute ka su veve ding hi.
Karmel mual dawnah a buk uh hangin, amaute zongin ka man khia ding a, kei kiang panin tuipi tawng sungah bu ta le uh zong, tuipi gulpite in a tuk nading thu ka pia ding hi.
Galte in sal dingin hing mat ta le uh zong, namsau tawh a thah nadingun thu ka pia ding hi. Amaute’ hoih nading ngaihsun het loin, amaute suksiat ding ka sawm hi,” ci hi.
Mihonpite’ Topa Pasian in, leitung lawngin leitung in tuisuak a, leitunga teeng mi khempeuh kap uh hi. Nail Gunpi bangin leitung buppi khang toin kiamsuk ding hi.
Topa in vantungah a inndeite bawl a, vankuumpi tawh leitung a khuhsuk hi. Amah in tuipi panin tuite samkhia a, lei tungah tua tuite sung hi. Hih bangin a bawlpa’ min in Topa ahi hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Israel mite aw, Ethiopia mite tawh a kibangin note ka hong bawl a, Izipt panin note ka hong paikhiatpih bangin, Kaftor gam panin Filistia mite ka paihkhiatpih a, Kir gam panin Siria mite ka paikhiatpih hi.
Keimah in hih a khial Israel kumpigam ka encik a, hih leitung panin amaute ka susia ding hi. Ahi zongin a vekpi-un susia mang loin, pawlkhat ka siit lai ding hi.
Keimah in thu ka pia ding a, anhaihna ciang tawh an a kihaih mah bangin keimah in Israel mite ka lok niloh ding hi. A hoih lo teng a kipaihkhiat theih nadingin minam dangte lakah ka haih ding hi.
Keima mite sung panin, “I tungah siatna hong tung ngei lo ding hi,” a ci mawh neite khempeuh, gal sungah si ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin inn tawh kibangin a siasa David innkuan, keimah in ka puahkik ding a, a vang teng hu-in, a sia teng ka puahkik ding a, nidanga a ngeina lui mah uh ka bangsak kik ding hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mite in, Edom gam a, om lai teng leh keima mi ahi ngei minam khempeuh zo-in ngah kik ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: An a kihauh luat manin, anlak a kizawh ma-in lo khawhkik hun tungin, leenggahte, leenggahzu-a bawl a kizawh ma-in, a suankik hun hong tun’ ding hun nuam hong tung ta ding hi. Mual lian khempeuh panin leenggahzu khum hong taak khia-in, mual neu khempeuh tungah leenggahzu luang ding hi.

Ka mi Israelte, amaute’ gam ka tun’ kik ding a, a kisia a khuapite uh lampha kikin, a sungah teeng ding uh hi. Amaute in leenggui suanin, a zu dawn ding uh a, huan bawlin, a sunga piangte ne ding uh hi.
Amau adingin ka piak gam sungah amaute ka koih kik ding a, tua ka piaksa gam panin kuamah in amaute lakhia kik nawn lo ding hi, Topa, note’ Pasian in ci hi, a ci hi.
Obadiah gen kholhna: Edom mite gam tawh kisai-in Topa Pasian in hih bangin a gen hi. Minamte lakah kamtai khat kisawl zo a, “Kithawi un! Edom mite do dingin kuankhia ni” a cihna thu ka za zo hi.
En in, minamte lakah note kong neusak ding a, nakpi takin a hong kisimmawh ding hi.
Na lungsim kiphatsakna un note a hong khem zo hi. Note in suang kulhpi beelin, mual dawnah na teen manun, “kua in a hong kiasak zo ding hiam?” ci-in na ngaihsun uh hi.
Muvanlai bangin sangpi-ah lengin, aksite lakah bu na bawl hangun, No kong khiasuk veve ding hi, Topa in a ci hi.

Zan-in na kiangah gutate leh misuamte a hong pai a, supna tampi na thuak hangin; a deih teng bek hong guksak ding hilo ahi hiam? Lenggah late na kiangah a hong pai leh a sanghte nusia lai teei uh hilo ahi hiam?
Ahih hangin Esau, kibuluh khin zo a, a sum a pai khempeuh a kilak sak zo hi!

Na pawl teng in hong khem zo uh a, gamgi ciang dong a hong hawlkhia zo uh hi; na pawlte teng in a hong zo khin ta hi. Na ankuang umpihte in na nuai-ah thang siah khin uh a, “A pilna koi-ah a om hiam?” a hong ci uh hi.
Topa in: “Tua ni ciangin Edom sungpan a mipilte ka susia ding a, Esau mualah pilna ka siit nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Teman khua aw, Esau mual ah mi khempeuh a kithahlup khit nadingin, na galhangte a thanem ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, na sanggampa Jakob bawlsia-a na thahna hangin; mai zumna in nang hong khuh ding a, na khan tawnin na mangthang ding hi.
Lang khata na gaaldin’ ni-in, Namdangte in a neihsa teng a puak khiat ni-in; gamdang mite a kongpi sungah lut-a Jerusalem ading ai a san’ ni-in, nang zong a thukimpih na hi hi.
Na sanggamte a tuahsiat ni-un munuam dah hoh un. Judah mite a kisiat ni-un nuam kei un. A kisiat ni-un lungdam kei un. A cihmawh ni-un nuihsan kei un.
Ka mite in haksatna a tuah ni-un a kongpi sungah tum kei un. A tuahsiat ni-un a thuaknate uh munuam kei un. A tuahsiat ni-un a sum a paite laksak kei un.
A suakta sunte khaktan dingin lamka lai-ah na ding kei ding hi. A cihmawh ni-a a hing lai sun teng, a galte khut sungah na pia kei ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh minam kimte tunga ka thukhen nading ni a nai zo hi. Na bawl bangin nangma tungah a hong kibawl ding hi. Na hih bangin na lu bukah a hong tu kik ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh, ka mual siangtho tunga na thuak mah bangun; na kim na pama mi namte khempeuh in zong ka daan piakna a thuak ding uh hi. Thuak tawntung ding uh a, a piang ngei lo mah a bang ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Zion mualah pawlkhat a suakta ding uh a, mun siangtho a suak ding hi. Jakob innkuante in amau gam mah a luah kik ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jakob innkuante mei ahi ding uh a, Josef innkuante meikuang ahi ding uh hi. Esau innkuante niinpa ahi ding uh a, amaute in a hal ding uh hi. A kangtum khin ding uh a, Esau innkuante khat beek a suakta kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa in a gen zo hi.
Negeb gam mite in Esau mual a luah ding uh a, Shefelah mite in Filistia gam a luah ding uh hi. Amaute in Efraim gam leh Samaria gam a luah ding uh a, Benjamin in Gilead gam a luah ding hi.
Israel mi sal-a omte in Kanaan gam Zarefat ciang dong a luah ding uh a, Jerusalem mi Sardis khua-a sal-a omte in, Negeb gam khuapite a la ding uh hi.
Esau mual-a thukhen ding, a honkhia ding mite Zion mualah hong paito ding uh a, tua gam in Topa’ gam ahi ding hi.
Topa in Amittai’ tapa Jonah tungah,
“Kithawi in la, a lian mahmah Nineveh khuapi-ah va pai-in va thu hilh in; bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gitlohna thu ka za khin zo hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Topa kiangpan Jonah tai khia-in Tarshish khua lamah taisim dingin a kithawi zawsop hi. Joppa khua-ah a paisuk-a Tarshish khua a zuan ding teembaw khat a mu hi. A sap man pia-in a tungah kah a, Topa kiang pan taikhia dingin teembaw hawlte tawh Tarshish khua-ah a pai hi.
Ahih hangin Topa in tuipi tungah huih nakpi-in nung sak-a huihpi hat lua ahih manin teembaw a kisia dekdek hi.

Tua ciangin teembaw hawlte lau uh a, a pasian ciat uh kiangah a kiko ciat uh hi. Teembaw a zan’ tuam nadingin a sung-a vante tuipi sungah a paai uh hi. Tua bang hi napi-in Jonah in teembaw sung a tawng lamah na lutsuk a, a na ihmu hithiat hi.
Teembaw ukpa in amah a muh ciangin, “Ihmu pa aw, bang na cihna hiam? Tho in la, na pasian kiangah thu ngen in! I sih loh nadingin amah in eite hong ngaihsun kha thei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua khit ciangin teembaw hawlte in, “Hong pai dih un. Kua’ hangin hih gimna ei tungah hong tung hiam, cih i theih nadingin ai san dih ni,” ci-in khat-le-khat a kikum uh hi. Ai a san uh leh Jonah tung a tu hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Kua hangin hih gimna ei tungah hong tung hiam, hong gen in. Na nasep bang hiam? Koi lai pan-a hong pai na hi hiam? Na gam bang hiam? Kua minam na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in, “Keimah in Hebru mi ka hi hi; tuipi leh leitung a bawl, vantungte’ Pasian ahi Topa ka bia hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin tua mite a lau mahmah uh a, “Bang hangin hih bangin hih mawk na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa kiangpan amah a taikhia sim ahih lam a gen khit sa ahih manin a thei khin zo uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, “Ei adingin tuipi a hong daih theih nadingin nang bang kong cih ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh huihpi a lauhuai semsem hi.

Amah in, “Hong domto un la tuipi sungah hong khia un; tua hi leh no adingin tuipi a hong daai ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh hih huihpi na thuakna uh keima’ hang ahi hi, cih ka thei hi,” ci-in a dawng kik hi.
Tua bang a cih hangin amaute in teembaw khawl sak dingin hahkatin lei lamah a hot teeiteei uh hi. Ahih hangin a hih zo kei uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh huihpi a hat semsem hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Topa’ kiangah kiko-in, “Topa aw, hih mipa ka sihsak manun kote hong sisak kei in la, mi that hi, ci-in hong ngawh kei ta in, ci-in kong thuum uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Topa aw, nangmah in pha na sak banga na bawl ahi hi,” ci-in thu a ngen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jonah dom to-in tuipi sungah a khiat uh leh tuipi a daai pah hi.
Tua ciangin tua mite in Topa a kihta mahmah uh a, Topa’ tungah biakna pia-in thuciamna a bawl uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jonah a nawmvalh dingin Topa in ngapi khat a geelkholh sa hi a, tua ngapi’ gil sungah Jonah sun thum leh zan thum sung a om hi.
Tua ciangin Jonah in tua ngapi gil sung panin Topa a Pasian’ kiangah thu ngen a,
“Ka cihmawhna panin Topa ka sam a, amah in hong dawng hi; Sihna gam Sheol panin ka kiko-a, nangmah in ka aw nong za hi.
Nang in tuipi thuk sungah nong khia-a, tui in kei hong tumcip hi; na tuihualte khempeuh in kei hong tum hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, ‘Na omna panin kei hong kihawl khia hi; na biakinn siangtho hong koici et kik thei ding ka hi hiam?’ ka ci hi.
Tui in ka tungah hong tuamcip a, ka kimkot-ah hong umcih hi. Tuipi tunga lopate in ka lu hong vialcip hi.
Mualte’ bul tuipi taw dong ka va pai suk a, kongkhak hong kikhak nelh tawntungna mun ka tun’ hangin tua lei sung Hawmpi sung panin a nungta-in nong la to veve hi, Topa, ka Pasian aw,
Kei ka lung a kiat ciangin, Topa ka phawk a; ka thungetna, na biakinn siangtho sung, nangma kiang hong tung hi.
Kiman’na nei lo milim a biate in nangmah hong tai san uh hi.
Ahih hangin keimah in ka hih leh lungdamna aw tawh biakna kong pia ding hi; ka ciamsa ka tangtung sak ding hi. Gupkhiatna in Topa’ aa ahi hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in tua ngapi sawl a, amah in lei keu tungah Jonah a luakhia hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in Jonah tungah a nih veina thu gen a,
“Kithawi in la, a lian mahmah Nineveh khuapi-ah va pai-in kong gen sa thu va tangko in,” a ci hi.
Jonah zong kithawi pah-a Topa’ cih bangin Nineveh khua-ah a pai hi. Nineveh khua pen khuapi lian mahmah khat hi a, nithum sung tak kikantan hi.
Jonah zong khua sung lam manawh-in kipan-a, nikhat sung lam a pai khit ciangin, “Ni sawmli khit ciangin Nineveh khuapi a kisusia ding hi,” ci-in a kiko hi.
Nineveh khuamite in kisik kik-in Pasian a um uh a, antan’ nading thu thang sakin, a golpen pana kipan a neupen dongin ippi puan a silh uh hi.
Nineveh khua kumpipa in tua thu a zak ciangin a kumpi tokhom tung pan ding khia-in, a kumpi puan suah khia-a, ippi puan silhin vut lakah a tu hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Nineveh khua sung khempeuh thu thang sak-in a tangko sak a, “Kumpipa leh uliante’ thu tawh: Mihing ahi-a ganhing ahi zongin, bawng hon ahi-a tuu hon ahi zongin, bang mah ciam thei lo ding, an ne thei lo ding, tuidawn thei lo ding uh hi.
Mihing leh ganhingte in ippi puan silhin Pasian tungah nakpi-in kiko ta uh hen. Hi hi, mi khempeuh in a khialhnate uh leh a gitlohnate uh panin kihei ta uh hen.
Eite i sih loh nadingin Pasian kisik kik-in a hehna damsak lo ding hi, kua in ci thei na hi uh hiam?” a cisak hi.
Pasian in amau’ hihnate mu a, a khialhnate uh panin a kihei uh a muh ciangin kisik kik a, amaute tungah hih dinga a cihsa siatna a tungsak nawn kei hi.
Ahih hangin tua thu hangin Jonah lungkim het loin a heh hi.

Topa’ kiangah thungen a, “Kong ngen hi, Topa aw, ka gam sungah ka om lai pekin hi ci mah in teh, ci hilo ka hi hiam? Tarshish khua-ah hanciam-a ka tai simna zong tua hang mah ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in a hehpih thei Pasian, a heh hak, a migi mahmah, siatna tun’ sak nading a kisik kik nuam Pasian na hihna kong thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa aw, tu-in ka nuntakna hong la in, ci-in kong thuum hi: bang hang hiam cih leh ka nuntak sangin si leng kei adingin a hoih zaw hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in zong, “Na heh ding kilawm na sa hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin khuapi pua lamah Jonah paikhia-a nisuahna lamah tu-in tua lai-ah ama ading bukno khat a lam hi. Tua khuapi bang hong ci ding hiam, cih en dingin a liim nuai-ah tu-in a ngak hi.
Topa Pasian in zong Jonah a liah ding leh a lungkhamna a tawldamsak dingin umgui khat a tungah a zaamsak hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua umgui hangin Jonah a lungdam mahmah hi.
Ahih hangin a zingsang khuavak ciangin Pasian in tua umgui lungno khat nesak-a a keu hi.

Ni hong suah ciangin Pasian in nisuahna lam panin huih a sa mahmah nungsak a, ni in zong Jonah lu zang kapsuk veva ahih manin a gim mahmah hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka nuntak sangin si leng kei adingin a hoihzaw hi,” ci-in a sih nading thu a ngen hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in Jonah kiangah, “Tua umgui hangin na heh ding kilawm na sa hiam?” a ci hi. Jonah in, “Ka heh ding kilawm sa tham loin heh lua-in ka si zongin kilawm ka sa veve hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in, “Nang in na gimpih lohpi, na khan’ sak lohpi, zan khat thu-a hong piang-a zan khat thu mah a, a si tua umgui pammaih na sa hi.

Tua ahih leh keimah in ganhing tampi thamlo, a taklam khut leh a veilam khut nangawn a khen thei nai lo naupang tulza leh tulsawmnih sanga tam zawte’ teen’na, a lian mahmah Nineveh khuapi pammaih sa lo ding ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dawng kik hi.
Judah gam kumpi Jotham, Ahaz, leh Hezekiahte’ hun laitakin, Moresheth khuami Mikah tungah Topa in hih bangin thupia hi. Samaria leh Jerusalem tawh kisai-in Topa in Mikah tungah hih thute lak hi.
No minam khempeuhte aw, hih thu za un. Leitunga teeng mi khempeuh aw, hih thu ngai un. Note’ lang khatah Topa Pasian in teci pang a, a vantung biakinn panin thu hong gen hi.
Ama mun siangtho panin Topa hong pai a, amah in leitung mualsang dawnte hong siksuk ding hi.
Meikhuk sunga khuainun kikoih bangin, ama khe nuai-ah mual liante tuisuak ding a, mual tung panin tui a luan’sak bangin, guam sungah tua mualte luang suk ding hi.

Pasian tungah Israelte’ mawhna leh khialhna hangin hih thute khempeuh piang hi. Israelte’ khialhna kua ngawh ding i hi hiam? Samaria mite ngawh ding ahi hiam? Judah gam sungah milim bia-a khial kua ahi hiam? Jerusalem mite ahi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Samaria khuapi, gamlaka ninkholna mun, leenggui suan’na mun lel dingin ka bawl ding hi. A khua sunga suangte zong guam sungah ka nil suk ding a, a khuapi bulpite ka dawksak ding hi.

A milim manphate khempeuh kisuzanin, mei tawh kisusia ding hi. Pasian tungah a thuman lohna hangun mihingte in hih milimte nei uh ahih manun, a paktatna uh tawh kizui-in tu-in thuak kik ding uh hi, ci hi.
Tua ahih manin kei kapin ka thuum ding a, ka dahna thu ka lah nadingin khe guak leh guaktangin ka vak ding hi. Gam-ui bangin ka ham ding a, kalaoh-vasa bangin ka tau ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Samaria’ meima kidamsak thei lo a, Judah in zong tua bangmah a thuak ding ahi ta hi. Ka mite’ teen’na Jerusalem khua kongpi mahmah, tua siatna in hong ban ta hi.
I guallelhna, Gath khuamite theisak kei un la, na kahna uh amaute musak kei un. Bethle-afrah khua sungah na lungkhamna uh langsakin, leivui lakah kikhuk un.

Shafir khua-a teeng mite aw, guaktangin maizumna tawh salin pai un. Za-anan khua-a teeng mite, a hingin paikhia ngei lo ding hi. Beth-ezel khuamite kahna leh thuumna na zak uh ciangin, tua khua sungah belh ding munmuanhuai a om lohna na thei ding uh hi.
Topa in Jerusalem kulh kongpi ciang dongah, gimna lianpi tungsak ta ahih manin Maroth khuamite in thuhoih lamenin gim uh hi.
Lakhish khua-a teeng mite aw, na sakol galkapte uh a leng bulh pak un. Note in Zion tanute’ khialhna teng zui kha na hih manun, Jerusalem zong a khialsakte na hi uh hi.
Tu-in no Judah mite aw, Moreseth-gath khua, mangpha khak un. Israel kumpite tungah Akzib khua in a zuauthei khat ahi hi.
Mareshah khuamite aw, note a hong zo dingpa ka hong paisak ding hi. Topa in ci hi. Adullam leihawm sungah Israel kumpipa bu ding hi.
Judah mite aw, na it mahmah uh na tate uh, sal-in hong kilaksak ding ahih manin, amaute hangin na dahna lim-un na sam uh met un la, musane bangin na lu uh tolsak un.
A lupna tungah lumin gitlohna a geelgeelte in gimna ngah ta hen. Zingsang khua a vak ciangin, a hih theih ding hun a ngah phetun, a ngaihsutsa uh gitlohnate semkhia uh hi.
Lo deih le uh, mi’ aa sut uh a, inn deih le uh, mi’ aa mah sut uh hi. Mite bawlsia-in, a inn leh a neihsa sut uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Note tungah gimna tun’sak ding ka ngaihsun a, tua gimna tawh na kipelh thei kei ding uh hi. Note’ adingin hun hoih lo hi ding ahih manin, na kiphatsak gamtat nawn kei ding uh hi.

Tua bang hun hong tun’ ciangin, mite in note’ gim ngahna thu gentehna-in zangin, dah la phuakin sa ding uh a, “Eite i sia khin taktak hi. Topa in i gam hong laksak a, ei hong mante tungah hong piaksak hi,” ci ding uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Topa’ mite lakah leitang a kihawm ciangin, kuamah in aisaanna tawh leitang na ngah kha kei ding uh hi.
Amaute in kei kiangah, “Tua bang thu hong gen kei in. Tua bang thu gen dingin kilawm lo hi. Tua bangin Pasian in hong minsiasak lo ding hi,” ci uh hi.
Israel mite aw, “Topa a lungtom ta a, hihte, ama hong bawlna mah ahi hiam?” na cih ding uh kilawm lo hi. Ka thugenna kammalte in a thuman mite adingin a hoih hilo ahi hiam?
Ahi zongin Topa in hih bangin hong ci hi: Note in ka mite’ gal na suak uh a, gal sung panin a hong ciahkik, lungmuanga a om mite’ puantualpi ngahte na sut uh hi.
Ka mihingte’ numeite amau’ inn nuam panin na hawlkhia uh a, a tate un a ngah ding keima thuphate na taan paisuak sak uh hi.
Tu-in ding un la paikhia un. Na khialhna hangun a lauhuai suksiatna tuak ding na hih manun, hih lai mun in note adingin tawlngakna mun hi lo hi.
Zuau genin khemna tawh thu gen kawikawi a, “Note adingin leenggahzu leh kham theih zu tampi tak hong om ding hi,” a hong ci kamsangte pawl note’ deih kamsangte ahi hi.

Ahi zongin no Israel mi a om laite khempeuh pel loin kong kaikhawm kik taktak ding hi. Tuubuk sunga tuu khum bangin, gankhawk sunga tuuhon kaihkhop bangin, note kong kaikhawm kik ding a, na gam sung uh, mi tampite’ husa tawh kidim kik ding hi, ci hi.
Pasian in lampi hong hon’sakin, na maiah hong paikhiatpih ding hi, Salsuahna khuapi kulh kongpi panin paikhia-in na suakta ding uh hi. Kumpi ahi Topa mahmah in hong makaih ding hi.
Israel a uk makaite aw, hih thu ngai un. Note in thutang thuman a deih dinga kilawm hi napi-in,
thuhoih deih loin thusia na deih zawsop uh hi. Note in mite vun na hing hawkkhiat uh a, a guh uh na hing kheuh uh hi.
Ka mite’ sa na netum uh hi. A vun uh hawkin, a guh uh na satkham uh a, beel-a meh huan ding bangin na satnen gawp uh hi.
Topa tungah huhna ngenin na kiko hun uh hong tung ding a, ahi zongin amah in note hong dawng lo ding hi. Note gamtatsia na hih manun, na ngetna uh hong ngai lo ding hi.
Sum a pia zo mite kiangah thunuam gen a, a pia lo mite kiangah, gal tuah ding a gen, kamsangte in mite lam khialsak uh hi. Topa in tua bang kamsangte kiangah,

“Ka mite lam khialsak na hih manun, mailam thugen theihna maang na mu nawn kei ding uh a, bangmah na genkhol thei nawn kei ding uh hi. Kamsangte aw, note’ hun bei ta ding a, ni in hong tumsan ta ding hi,” ci hi.
Kamsanngte in maizumna thuak ding uh a, thu-mu theite in zumna thuak ding uh hi; amaute in a muk uh hum ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian’ dawnna om lo hi.
Ahi zongin kei ka hih leh, Israel mite tungah a mawhna uh a gen khia dingin, Topa’ Kha vangliatna tawh kidimin, thutang gen ngamna lungsim ka nei hi.
Ngai un! Israel a uk makaite aw, Note in thutang deih loin, thuman kimlai a khialin na hei uh hi.
Mi thahna leh thuman lohna tawh, Pasian’ khuapi, Jerusalem na lam uh hi.

Khuapi ukte in sumgolh ngah nading bekin thu khenin, siampite in sum ngah nading bekin thu gen uh a, kamsangte in zong sum ngah theih nading bek mahin, mailam thu genkhol uh hi. Tua bang hi napi-in amaute in Topa, muan’in nei uh a, “Topa in eite hong ompih a, i tungah siatna hong tung lo ding hi,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih manin note hangin, lo khawh bangin Zion kikho-in, Jerusalem, nin kipaihna phualpi suak ding a, biakinn omna mual, gamlak suak ding hi.
Mai lam hunah, Topa’ biakinn a omna mual, a sang pen mual hong suak ding a, minam tampi in hong zuan ding uh hi.

Minam tampite hong pai-in, “Jakob’ Pasian’ biakinn, Topa’ mualah va paito ni. Tua lai-ah ama deihna hong hilh ding a, ama deihna bangin i gamta ding hi,” ci ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Zion panin thuhilhna hong ging khia a, Jerusalem panin Topa’ thu hong pai khia hi.

Amah in minam tampite’ thu khensak ding a, Israel gam panin a gamla peka om, minam vangliante’ thu khensak ding hi. Amaute in a namsaute uh lo khawhna tu-in seek ding uh a, a teipite uh singhiang heuhna temkawi-in seek ding uh hi. Minam khat leh khat kido nawn lo ding uh a, gal kidona thei kha nawn lo ding uh hi.
A kuamah peuh lungnuamin, a leenggui phung leh a theikung nuai-ah ta hithiat ding a, kuamah in patausak nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa’ kam mahmah in hih thu gen khin ta hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh in, amau’ pasian ciat bia-in a thu mang ding uh a, ahi zongin eite in i hih leh i Topa Pasian a tawntungin bia-in a thu i mang ding hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Tua ni ciangin keimah in khebaite kaikhawmin, a kihawlkhiate leh gimna ka thuaksak mite ka kaikhawm ding hi.
Khebaite ka om sak lai ding a, a kipaikhia mite a thahat minamte ka hisak ding hi. Tua hun akipan a tawntungin, Zion Mual panin amaute ka uk paisuak ding hi.
Pasian in a mite a etna Jerusalem khuapi aw, nidang a, na vangliatna ngah kikin, kumpi khuapi na suak kik ding hi.
Bang hangin tu-in nakpi-in kap a, numei nausuak ding bangin na sa na hi hiam? Kumpi nei lo a, na thulamlakte si ahi hiam?

Jerusalem khuamite aw, numei nausuak ding bangin tha saan un. Tu-in khuapi nusia-in, gam sung khua-ah a teeng ding na hi ta uh a, Babilon khuapi a zuan ta ding na hi uh hi. Ahi zongin tua lai-ah note hong kihonkhia-in, na galte uh khut sung panin Topa in hong tankhia ding hi.
Note a sim dingin minam tampi hong kikhawm uh hi. Amaute in, “Jerusalem kisusia ding a, a mit in hih khuapi a siasa-in mu ding hi,” ci uh hi.
Ahi zongin hih minamte in Topa’ lungsim tawng thei lo uh a, ancilna phualah anphalte kaihkhop bangin, kaikhawmin a cil gawp ding ahih lam phawk lo uh hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Jerusalem khuamite aw, kipan un la, na galte uh sugawp un. Sumngo khe leh sik ki a nei bawngtal bangin note kong thahatsak ding hi. Minam tampite’ na sugawp zo ding uh a, amau’ neihsa teng keima aa na suaksak ding uh a, amau’ hauhna teng, leitung khempeuhte’ Topa’ neihsa na suaksak ding uh hi.
Jerusalem khuamite aw, na kulh sung uhah lut un. Eite hong ki-umcih a, Israel makaipa’ biang ciang tawh sat ding uh hi.
Bethlehem Efrathah khua aw, nang in Judah gamah khuaneupen khat na hi a, ahi zongin nang’ sung panin Israel a uk ding khat ka piangsak ding hi. Ama gui in nidang lai, taangtawng pek tawh kizom hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, numei naupai nu, a nau a suah khit mateng, amau’ galte khut sungah Topa in amaute pia phot hi. Ama hong khan’ ciangin, sal-a om a gam mite, a mipihte uh tawh hong kigawm kik ding hi.

Amah in Topa’ thahatna tawh a tuute uk ding a, Topa ama Pasian’ min vangliatna tawh uk ding hi. Leitung mi khempeuh in ama liatna phawk ding uh ahih manin, ama mite lungmuang takin om thei ding uh hi.
Amah in lungnopna hong omsak ding hi. Assiria mite in i gam hong simin, i gal dalna teng hong suk ciangin amaute a do dingin, i makai hatpen teng i sawl ding hi.
A namsau uh tawh Assiria gam zo-in Nimrod gam zo ding uh a, Assiria mite in i gamgi dong hong sim ciangin amaute’ kiang panin eite hong honkhia ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin a om lai Israel mite pen, Topa in minam tampite’ adingin a piak, zing daitui, lopate a khangsak guahtui bang ding uh hi. Amaute in mihing muanin nei loin Pasian bek muang ding uh hi.
A om lai Israel mite pen minam dangte lakah, gamlakah sa a beng, tuute a tuah ciangin manin balnen gawp a, a kam sung pan a honkhia zo a om lo, humpinelkai bang ding uh hi.
Israel mite in a galte’ tungah a khutte uh lamto-in, a gal khempeuh uh zo gawpin susia mang ding uh hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Tua hun ciangin na sakolte uh hong paihkhiatsakin, na leengte uh ka susia ding hi.
Na gam sung uh-a khuapite susia-in, na galpan’na munte uh ka phelkhia ding hi.
Na mitphial siamnate uh susia-in, ai saan thei kong omsak nawn kei ding hi.
Note in na biak uh milimte leh na biakna songte ka susia gawp ding a, note’ bawlsa nate na bia nawn kei ding uh hi.
Na gam sung uhah a om Asherah biakna songte botkhia-in na milimte uh ka susia ding hi.
Ka thu hong mang lo minamte tungah hehna tawh phu ka la ding hi.
Topa leh Israel a kitotna ngai un. Topa aw, kipan in la, mual liante leh mual neute mai-ah, na thu sung in.
No mual liante leh a kip tawntung leitung bulpite aw, Topa a kinialna thu ngai un. Topa in ama mite tawh thu nei a, Israel tawh thu kisel ding hi.
Topa in hih bangin thu sung a, “Ka mite aw, note bang hong cih kha ka hi hiam? Bang thu-ah note hong lunggimsak ka hi hiam? Tu-in hong dawng dih un!
Bang hang hiam cih leh, Izipt gam panin note kong paikhiatpih a, salsuahna panin note ka hong tankhia hi. Note hong makai dingin, Moses, Aaron, leh Miriam ka hong sawl hi.

Ka mite aw, Moab Kumpi Balak in note suk nading a vaihawmna teng, leh Beor’ tapa Balaam in ama nget bangin a sepna teng, limtakin phawk kik un. Note hotkhiat nadingin ka sepna thu na theih nadingun, Shittim leh Gilgal kikal-a thu piangte ngaihsun kik un,” a ci hi.
Vantung Pasian ahi Topa mai-ah bang va keng ding ka hi hiam? Amah biakna-in hal dingin kum khat a pha bawngno thaute paipih ding ka hi hiam?
Topa kiangah, tuu a tul tulin va puakin, gun tui bangin sathau va luangsak leng, tuate tawh amah lungdam ding ahi hiam? Ka mawhnate maisak nadingin ka ta upa pen tawh va bia ding ka hi hiam?

Mun khempeuh-a om no mihingte aw, Topa in a hoih nate hong gen khin zo hi. Topa in note tung panin hong kalh nate in: thuman thute sem ding a, itna kip nei tawntungin, kiniamkhiatna tawh Pasian’ thu man’ ding ahi hi.
Khuapi lamah Topa kiko hi; mipil in ama min a zahtak ding ahi hi: Aw, minamte leh khuapi-a kikhawm mite in za un!
Thuman lopi-in a ngah uh, migilote’ inn sunga van omte, leh ka deih loh tawitehna man lo zatnate, mangngilh thei ding ka hi hiam?
Tawi khaina man lo leh tawisuang man lo a zangte, khahkhong ding ka hi hiam?
Na mi haute uh mi zawngte tungah tatsia mahmah in, na khua sung mi khempeuh uh zuau gen vive hi uh a, a kam un khemna thu bekbek gen hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na mawhna hangun, note kong suksiat ding ka kipan ta hi.
An na nek hangun na kham kei ding uh a, na gil uh kial lai veve ding hi. Nate na koihcing uh hangin phatuam lo ding hi. Galte in tua na koihcing uh nate susia veve ding hi.
Khai na tuh uh hangin a gah na at kei ding uh hi. Oliv gah na cil uh hangin a thau na zang kha kei ding uh a, leenggah na cil uh hangin a zu na dawn kha kei ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpi Omri’ gamtatna teng zui-in, ama tapa Kumpi Ahab’ sep khempeuh na sem uh a, amau’ gamtat khempeuh na zui uh hi. Tua ahih manin note kong susia ding hi. Minam dangte in note hong nuihsanin, amaute’ simmawhna na thuak ding uh hi.
Kei a kamsia hi’ng! Singgah leh leenggah a heu laitak, a gilkial mipa tawh ka kibang hi. Leenggah nek ding om nawn lo a, ka lunggulh theigah beita hi.
Leitungah mihoih teng bei khin ta a, Pasian tungah a thuman mi kuamah om nawn lo hi. Mi khempeuh in mi thah ding bek ngaihsun uh a, a kuamah peuh in a sanggampa ngen tawh beng hi.
A sia lam-a gamtat ding siam mahmah uh a, uliante leh thukhente in sumgolh ngenin, mi liante in amau’ deih teng pulak uh a, kipawlin vaihawm khawm uh hi.

Amaute lakah a hoih pen a, kineite lingkung bang hi a, a thutang pen a, kineite, linghiam bang hi lel uh hi. Pasian in amaute a hilhkholh bangin, a daan piak ding hun hong tung ta a, a lungman’ ding hun uh hi ta hi.
Na vengte’ thu up-in nei kei in la, na lawmte zong muan’in, nei kei in. Na ang-a lum na zi kiang nangawn ah thu na gen ding kidawm in.
Tu hunin tapate in pate hai bawlin, tanute in nute langpan’ uh a, mote in a teeknu uh lang neih uh hi. Mi khat adingin ama innkuanpihte mah a gal suak mawk hi.
Ahi zongin kei ka hih leh Topa ka en ding a, kei hong suaktasak Pasian ka ngak ding hi. Ka Pasian in ka thu hong ngai ding hi.
Ka galte aw, kei tungtang ah lungdam kei un. Ka puk hangin ka thokik ding hi. Khuamial sungah ka om hangin Topa in khuavak hong pia ding hi.

Amah in ka thu hong sun’sakin, kei adingin thu hong khensak mateng Topa’ hehna ka thuak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ama’ tungah ka mawh khin zo hi. Amah in khuavak ah hong paipih ding a, ama’ hotkhiatna ka mu ding hi.

Tua hun ciangin ka galte in hih thu mu ding uh a, “Na Topa Pasian koi-ah om hiam? ci-in hong tawng ka galte maizum ding uh hi. Amaute guallel ding a, kongzing buan bangin a kisik gawp mu-in kei ka nuam ding hi.
Jerusalem khuamite aw, na khuapi kulh uh a kician’ kik ding hun hong tung ding a, tua hun ciangin na gamgi uh nakpi takin kikhan’ ding hi.
Nisuahna lam Assiria gam pan hita leh, leitaw lam Izipt gam pan hita leh, a gamlapi tuipi khen’ pan leh a gamlapi mualte, mun khempeuh panin na mite uh hong ciahkik ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin a tunga teeng mite’ gitlohna hangin, leitung in sehnel gamkhing suak ding hi.
Topa aw, nangma tuu ahi na mite na ciangkhut tawh hong cing in. Gamnuam lei hoihna sungah amau guakin om uh hi. Taanglai huna mah bangin, Bashan leh Gileah gam nuamah tasak in.
Izipt gam pan na paikhiat hun lai uh mah bangin, amau’ adingin a lamdang nate ka bawl ding hi.
Minam dangte in hih thu mu ding uh a, minam thahat hi napi-in maizum ding uh hi. Lamdang sa-in kam khat zong pau lo ding uh a, hih thu a zakzakna-un a bil uh ngong liang ding hi.
Amaute in gul bangin leivui liakin, a bokvak ganhing bangin hong awmtal ding uh a, a bukna uh mun muanhuaite panin lau-in a lingsa-in hong pusuak ding uh a, Topa Pasian hong kihta ding uh hi.
Topa aw, nang tawh a kibang Pasian dang om lo a, a om lai na gamluah mite’ mawhna na maisak hi. Nang na heh paisuak kei a, na itna kip nong lak hi.
Kote nong khasiat kik ding a, ka mawhnate uh hong sawpkhiatsakin, tuipi taw-ah nong paihsak ding hi.
Ka pu ka pate uh tungah nidang lai a, na ciamsa bangin, Abraham’ suan-le-khak ahi nangma mite tungah na cihtakna leh nong itna kip nong lak ding hi.
Hih in Nineveh khua tawh kisai thugenna hi a, Elkosh khuami Nahum’ mangmuhna a kiciamtehna lai ahi hi.
Topa Pasian in amah a demte koihkhong lo a, amah a langpangte daantatin, a galte thukkik hi.
Topa a lungduai mahmah a, a vang zong lian a, ahih hangin mimawhte khahkhong ngei lo hi. A paina peuhpeuh ah huihpi nungin, pingpei kipei a, ama paina hanga leivui leeng in meiipite ahi hi.
Amah in tuipi a taii ciangin tuipi kangcip pah a, gunpite zong kangcip sak hi. Bashan gam keu gawpin, Karmel Mual kausan a, Lebanon Mual-a pakpalhte vul hi.
Ama mai-ah mualliante liing a, Mualneute tuisuak hi. Ama mai-ah leitang kicim a, leitung leh a tunga om khempeuh liing uh hi.
Ama hehna kua in nang zo ding a, a lunghamna kua in thuak zo ding ahi hiam? A hehna meikuang bangin hong khahkhia a, ama mai-ah suangtumpi kitamzan hi.
Topa hoih hi; lungkham hunin a mite huh a, amah a bel mite lim takin kem hi.
Tuikhang in a suksiat bangin a langte susiagawp a, a galte, khuamial sungah nawhkhia hi.
Bang hangin Topa sawm ngam na hi hiam? Amah in nang hong susia ding hi. A su peuhpeuh a dingkik zo om ngei lo hi.
Amaute, linglom bangin om uh a, zu leh sa tawh kidiahin a om lai takun ham bangin kihaltum ding hi.
Nineveh khuapi aw, gitlohna tawh thu vaihawmin, Topa a sawm, nang’ sungah mi khat om hilo ahi hiam?

Topa in ama mite tungah hih bangin thu gen a, “Assiria mite thahat-in a tam mahmah hangin, amaute kisusia-in maimang ding hi. No ka mite na hih uh leh, khat vei kong gimsak khit hangin, kong gimsak kik nawn kei ding hi.
Note tungah Assiria mite’ aana neihna ka beisak ta ding a, note hong khihna sikkhaute ka sutat ding hi,” ci hi.

Topa in Assiria mite tawh kisai-in hih bangin thu pia hi: “Note na cimang ding uh a, note’ pasiante’ biakinn sunga om milimte ka susia ding hi. Note siahuai lua na hih manun, na hankhuk ding uh a bawlbawl ka hi ta hi,” ci hi.

En un, mual tungah kamtaipa hong tai a, gualzawhna thupha hong gen ding ahi hi. Judah mite aw, pawi bawl un la, Pasian’ tunga na ciam bangun gamta un. Bang hang hiam cih leh mi gilote kisusiacip khin a, na gam uh hong simkik ngei nawn lo ding uh hi.
Nineveh khuapi aw, nang hong kisim ta a, nang hong sugawp dingpa hong tung ta hi. Na kan uhah pang un la, lampi vil un. Kithawi un la, galdo dingin kiging un.
(Israel mite, a galte’ sukgawp ma, a nidang ngeina bangun, Topa in a om sakkik ding a kipan ahi hi).
A galkapte in lum san hong keng uh a, puan zong a san mah hong silh uh hi. A sim dingin hong kipan uh a, a sakol leengte uh khuaphia bangin, a sakolte uh hong koplen hi.
Sakol leengte kongzing lakah, kisuk leh kito leh uh a, lamkabom khempeuh nawkin leeng kawikawi uh hi. Meikuang bangin kikhawh uh a, khuaphia bangin leeng uh hi.
Galkap mangte kikaikhawm a, a galkapte uh thupia hi. Amaute, kan phung lam kiden’na uh a, a lum uh tawh kidal uh hi.
Tui luan’ na gei-a kulh kongpite kisatkham a, kumpi inn sungah patauhna om hi.
Kumpinu kimanin kipua khia a, a nasemte thuumin kap uh a, dahin a dip uh hum uh hi.
Tuibeem kitam pan-a tui luang khia bangin, Nineveh khuapi panin mite taikhia uh hi. “Khawl un, khawl un,” a kicih hangin, khat beek nunghei lo uh hi.
Ngunte la un! Khamte la un! Khua sungah sum manpha bei cih om thei lo a, van manpha bei cih om thei lo hi.
Nineveh khuapi kisusia-in kinusiacip a, gamkhing suak hi. Launa lungsim tawh kidimin khukte liing kelkel a, mi khempeuh lunggimin a mai-ah si teeng lo hi.
Humpinelkai note an a kivakna mun, humpinelkai leh a note lung muanga a omna mun, humpinelkaite’ kua koi-ah om ta ahi hiam?
Humpinelkai in sa manin, a zi leh a tate’ adingin balnensak a, a kua sung, sa kibalnen tawh kidimsak ngei hi.

Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Keimah in note’ gal ka hi a, na sakol leengte uh ka haltum ding hi. Na humpinelkai note uh namsau in vattum ding a, midangte’ na na suh teng uh ka susia mang khin ding hi. Na kamtaite uh awging koimah ah kiza nawn lo ding hi,” ci hi.
Zuauna leh mithahna tawh a kidim khuapi, van top ding tampi a omna khuapi, tu-in a siacip ding hi ta hi.
Ngai un; sakol kisatna a ging, leh leengpei kigawi sakol kop taina khe ging, leh sakol leeng tuan lauhlauh gingte;
sakol tung tuangte’ galsimna, namsau phe zalzal, teipi te zalzal! Siluang hawm sim zawh ding hi lo, kiciangin vum venvan. Tua tung mah tawnin gal kido!
Nineveh khuapi in a paktatna hangin daan thuak hi. Ngaih baang mel pua-in bum siamna nei a, minamte zolin a khem hi.

Tua ahih manin Vanglianpen Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Nineveh khuapi aw, daan kong pia ding hi. Na nik kong hawkkhiatsak ding a, minamte in guak tanga na omna hong mu ding a, na zumhuaina teng mu ding uh hi.
Nang hong huat bawlin, ninbulom tawh kong dimsak ding a, mite in lamdang sakna tawh hong en ding uh hi.
Nang hong mu khempeuh nungkik gaih-in, ‘Nineveh khuapi siacip ta hi; kua in khasiat ding hiam?’ ci ding uh hi. Ahi zongin nang hong hehnem nuam kuamah om lo ding hi,” ci hi.
Nineveh aw, a kimkot ah tui in a umcih a, amah a dal dingin tuipi nei a, a kulh dingin a kimkot ah tui a om, Thebes khuapi sangin gina zaw kisa zenzen na hi hiam?
Nail Gun dung, gam khempeuh uk khin ahih manin, gen zawh lohin a vanglian hi. Put mite leh Libia mite zong ama pawl ahi hi.
Tua bang hi napi-in, Thebes khuamite kipua khia-in sal suak uh hi. Konglak mun citengah a tate uh kisatlum hi. A miliante, sikkol kibulhin kipua khia a, amau a man galte in hawm uh hi.
Nineveh khuapi aw, nang zong zukham bangin khua na phawk kei ding a, na galte kiang panin tai-in bukna na zong ding hi.
Na kulh muan’huaite pen a gah a zun theikung tawh kibang ding a, a kung sing lecin, a gah na kam sung hong tu tawh kibang ding hi.
Na galkapte, numei bang hi lel ding a, na galte a lut zawh lohna dingin, na gamsung kihu zo lo ding hi. Mei in na kulh kongpi zawlte kangtum ding hi.
Hong ki-umcihna na nan’ nadingin tui tawi-in, na kulhte cian’beh in la, Leiseek seek dingin buan cilin, leiseekna kuang a baihsa-in nei ta lecin zong,
tua bang na hih laitakin mei in hong kangtumin, galte in hong vatlum ding hi. Kauphe honpite in an a nek tum bangin, nang na beimang ding hi. Kauphe bangin tampitak na pha khin uh hi.
Van-a aksi sangin a tam zaw-in, sum bawl mi na om khin ta uh hi. A kha zalin a leengmang kauphe hon bangin, tu-in amaute om nawn lo uh hi.
Na uliante uh ahih leh, phalbi lai-in kulh tungah a bawm miamua, ni a suah ciangin leeng khia mangin, a omna mel a kithei lo kauphe hon tawh kibang hi.
Assiria kumpipa aw, na gamsung a ukte si ta a, na uliante ihmu paisuak uh hi. Na mite, mualtung tengah kithehthang a, inn-ah a kaikhawm ding kuamah om lo hi.

Na liammate a dam theihna ding om lo a, na meimate a dam thei lo pawl ahi hi. Na thuakna thu a za mi khempeuh in lungdamin a khut uh beng ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na gitlohna a thuak kha lo kuamah om lo hi.
Hih in kamsang Habakkuk tungah Topa in mangmuhna sungah a gen ahi hi.
Topa aw, bang tan vei huhna hong ngen ding a, hong za lo niloh ding na hi hiam? Gimna thuak ung, ci-in bang tan vei hong kiko ding a, hong hon loin om niloh ding na hi hiam?
Bang hangin hih bang siatnate leh lungkhamnate hong musak na hi hiam? Kisuksiatna leh kisukgawpna in hong umcih a, kitotna leh kiseelna, mun citeng ah om hi.
Thukham in thu nei zo loin a mawkna suak a, thu a manin kisem ngei lo hi. Thutang thute kileh hei-in, migilote in thuman mite zo zawsop hi.

Tua ciangin Topa in a mite kiangah thu gen a, “No, a thuman lo ka minamte aw, na kiim uh a, om minam dangte en dih un, lamdang na sa mahmah ding uh hi. Note kiangah hong kigen ciangin na up zawh het loh ding uh thu khat, tu-in a bawl ding ka hi hi.
A om khong thei lo, a kihtak-huai, Khaldea mite ka vang liansak ding a, leitung khempeuh ah amaute pai-in, gam khempeuh zo mang khin ding uh hi.
Amaute, lauhuai-in, kihtak-huai mahmah uh a, a gen khempeuh uh nial theih hi lo hi.

A sakolte uh, kamkei sangin tai hatzaw a, keivom gilkial sangin kihtakhuai zaw hi. Gamlapi pek panin a sakol tung tuangte hong kipan uh a, a sakolte un lei-ah a khe phut uh hi. Muvanlai in sa a bawh bangin, a galte len’lak uh hi.
A susia gawp dingin hong kuankhia uh a, a sukkhak ding uh mi khempeuh lau mahmah uh hi. A gal matte uh tam mahmah a, sehnel zahin kisim zo lo hi.
Kumpite simmawh bawl uh a, uliante, nuihsan lel uh hi. Kulh muan’huaite zong nuihsan lel uh a, a kulh pua-ah lei sung vumin, tua tung tawnin khuapi la uh hi.
Tua ciangin huih nung bangin paisuak uh a, amau’ hatna bek suang uh hi,” ci hi.

Topa aw, a cil pek-a kipan a tawntungin Pasian na hi a, nang in tawntung keima Pasian, a Siangtho Pa na hi hi. Topa aw, kote daantat dingin amaute na seh hi bek a, ka belh Suangpi aw, kote nong thuhilhna ding bekin amaute vang a pia pak bek na hi hi.

Ahi zongin hih a gilo zuautat mite bangci thuak zawh na hi hiam? Hih bang siatna a mu dingin na mit siangtho lua a, a gamtat sia mite na thuak zo kei hi. Tua ahih manin, amaute sangin a dikzaw mite a suksiatna-ah, bang hangin daicip na hi hiam?
Bang hangin tuipi ngasa bang lelin mihingte bawl a, a uk ding om lo ganhingnote bangin om sak na hi hiam?
Amaute in ngasa mat bangin sikkawi tawh mite man uh a, a ngen uh tawh khuhin manin, a ngenpi uh tawh kaikhia a, tua banga a matna hangun lungdamin awng uh hi.
A ngente un amau’ deih peuhpeuh ngahsak ahih manin, amaute in a ngente uh bia-in, biak piakna zong pia uh hi.
Amaute in a namsau uh zangin, hehpihna mel nei loin mi thatthat ding uh ahi hiam?
Ka khuadakna tausang tungah kahin, Topa in kei tungah bang hong gen ding a, ka lungkim lohna teng bang hong ci dawn’ hiam, cih ka ngak ding hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in hih bangin hong dawng a, “Nang ka hong muhsak thu khempeuh, a sim nop mahmah dingin tungman peek tungah gelh in.

Hih thu a tun’ nading hun hi pah nai lo ahih manin, lai-in ciamteh in. Ahi zongin hong tung baih ta ding a, kong lah khempeuh a manin hong tung ding hi. A tung hak tawh a kibang kha ahi zongin ngak keikai in. Ka seh hun a cin’ ciangin hong tung takpi ding a, hong zekai lua nawn lo ding hi.
Tua a hong tung ding thu in, ‘A gilo mite suakta lo ding a, ahih hangin thuman mi in ama upna tawh a nungta ding hi,’” hong ci hi.

Hauhna in zuaupi hi a, a huaiham mi in kiphasakin omkhong thei lo a, hankhuk mah bangin, pha zo, cih om sak thei lo a, lungkim hun cih nei thei lo hi. Tua ahih manin minam dangte a ban banin simin uk hi.

A zawhna gam mite in amau a zo mite simmawh bawlin, “No aa a hilopi kim lai no’ aa dingin na la uh hi; ahi zongin tu-in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Note tungah lei hong bate khem bawlin bang tan vei na hauhna uh behlap nuam lai na hi uh hiam?” ci ding uh hi.
Note in na phawk ma-un, no mahmah leiba neite na suak ding uh a, na leiba uh a meet hong kisungsak ding hi. Galte in note hong liingsak keuhkeuh ding a, na nate uh hong laksak mang khin ding hi.
Note in minam dang tampite’ na na sut uh a, tu-in a om lai mite in note’ na hong sut ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note in mite thatin, khuapite leh a sunga teeng mite na bawlsia uh hi.
Mi’ van na suhna uh tawh na mite uh hausakin, lauhuaina leh siatna a ngah loh nadingin na inn uh bawl na hih manun, gimna na ngah ding uh hi.
Note’ vaihawmna mah in na mite uh tungah maizumna hong tun’ a, minam dangte na suksiatna uh tawh, note mahmah siat nading a bawl na hi uh hi.
Note hong langpan’ dingin kulh suangte nangawn kiko ding a, innkamte in zong kikopih ding uh hi.
Note in mi thahna tawh khuapi satin, mawhna tawh khuapi phut na hih manun, gimna na ngah ding uh hi.
Na zawh uh minamte’ nasepna sate a mawkna suakin, amau’ sepsa teng a khu-in leng mang hi. Hih thu in Vanglianpen Topa’ pian’sak ahi hi.
Tuipi in tui tawh a kidim mah bangin, leitung in Topa’ minthan’na theihna tawh kidim ding hi.
Na hehna uh tawh na gam vengte uh niamkhiatin na mindaisak uh a, zukham bangin amaute hoisak na hih manun, gimna na ngah ding uh hi.

Tua ahih manin note in zong minthan’na ngah loin, maizumin mindaina tawh na kidiah ding uh hi. Note mahmah in na hoi dongun na dawn ding uh hi. Topa in daanpiakna hai, note hong dawnsak ding a, na minthan’na uh mindaina suak ding hi.

Note in Lebanon gam singkungte phuk na hihmanun note zong hong kiphuk ding a, a ganhingte zong that na hih manun, tu-in ganhingte in note hong lausak ding uh hi. Gam sung khempeuh ah mi thatin na bawlsiatna hang uh, leh khuapite leh a sunga teengte na suksiatna hangun, note tungah hih bangin a hong piang ding ahi hi.
Milim, banga kimang ahi hiam? Mihingte’ bawl na khat hi lel a, thuman hong gen thei lo hi. Tua bang a pau thei beek lo pasian khat, a bawlpa in muan’in a neih bang phatuam ahi hiam?

Sing a kibawl na khat kiangah, “Khanglo in,” ci-in, a pau thei lo suangtum kiangah, “Tho in,” ci na hih manun, gimna na ngah ding uh hi. Hih bang milim in na hong hilh thei ding ahi hiam? Ngun leh kham tawh a kizut hangin, a sungah nuntakna om lo hi.
Topa, a biakinn siangtho sungah om hi; leitung mi khempeuh, ama mai-ah dai dide-in om ta hen.
Kamsang Habakkuk in hih bangin thu ngen hi:
Topa aw, nangma sepsa thute ka za a, lamdang ka sa mahmah hi. Na hih ngeisa na liante, ko’ hunin zong hong hih kik in. Na heh hun ciang nangawnin zong, hehpihna lungsim hong nei in.
Teman khua panin Pasian hong pai a, Paran Mual panin Siangtho Pa hong pai hi. Ama minthan’na in vanpi tuam a, leitung khempeuh, amah phatna tawh kidim hi.
Khuaphialep taang bangin hong pai a, a khut sung panin khuavak taang khia hi; tua in a vangliatna a koihna mun ahi hi.
Ama mai-ah cinatna tungsak a, tua nungah sihna zuisak pah hi.
Amah a khawl ciangin leitung liing a, a et ciangin minam khempeuh liing uh hi. Taangtawng lai-a a totsa, taanglai mualliante kitamkham a, a om tawntung mualneute kimetcip hi.
Kush gam mite a lau mahmahna, leh Midian gam mite a liin’na uh ka mu hi.
Topa aw, na sakolte tungah nang hong tuangin, na gualzawhna leengte tawh nong pai nadingin, gunpite tungah na hehsuak a, tuipi tungah na thangpai ahi hiam?
Na thal lawn dingin na kithawi a, na thallawng sungah thaltang a dimin om hi. Tuipi tawh leitung na phelkhap hi.
Mualliante in nang hong muh ciangin liing uh a, van panin guah tampi hong zu hi. Lei nuai-a om tuite ging zuazua a, a tuihualte in sangpipi banto hi.
Na thaltang leeng a muh ciang, na teipi tee zalzal a muh ciangin, ni leh kha a omna san-ah khawlcip uh hi.
A hehsa-in leitungah na pai a, a sinsosa-in minamte na tuancil hi.
Na mihingte a honkhia dingin na paikhia a, na teel kumpipa, a honkhia dingin na kuankhia hi. Mi gilote a makaipa na sugawp a, a nungzui khempeuh tawh zong na sumai hi.
Mi cimawhte, mun simtham ah a sugawpte bangin, kote hong suthang dingin huihpi bangin hong pai laitakin, na thal tawh, a galkapmangpa na kaplet hi.
Nangmah in na sakolte tawh tuipi na tuancil a, tui lianpite phuan zuazua hi.

Hih thute khempeuh ka zak ciangin ka liing gawp a, lau lua-in ka muk liing sapsap hi. Ka guh ka taang hong zen a, guh nei lo bangin ka pukcip suk hi. Ko hong simgawp mite Pasian in a daan piak ding hun, dai takin ka ngak khikhe ding hi.
Thei gahte hut khin a, leengguite a gah kei zongin, olive kungte gah lo a, lo-ah an a piang kei zongin, tuu khempeuh si khin a, ganbuk khempeuh a hawm khin zongin,
Topa Pasian in keimah hong honkhiapa ahih manin, lungdamin ka kipak lai veve ding hi.

Topa Pasian in keima thahatna ahi hi; sakhi khe bangin ka khe hong zaptelsak a, mun sangna ah, lungmuang takin hong paisak hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in khausai lasakna vante tawh tum theihte hong makaihpa ahi hi).

Amon’ tapa Josiah in Judah gamah kumpi ahih lai takin, Topa in Zefaniah’ tungah hih thu pia hi. Zefaniah’ pa Kushi hi a, Kushi’ pa Gedaliah hi a, Gedaliah’ pa Amariah hi a, Amariah’ pa in Kumpi Hezekiah ahi hi.
Topa in hih bangin thu gen a, “Leitunga om na khempeuh ka susia ding hi.

Mihing leh ganhing, van-a leeng vasa leh tui sunga ngasa, a vekpi-in ka susia ding hi. Mi gilote ka susia ding a, leitunga om mihing khempeuh ka susia ding hi. Topa ahi keimah in hih thu ka gen khin hi.

Judah gam mi khempeuh susia-in, Jerusalem khua-a teeng mi khempeuh ka sumai ding hi. Baal milim biakna a them bang lai khempeuh leh tua milim na a sem siampite hih mun panin, a vekpi-in ka sumai ding hi.

Innkhumzang ah kahto-in, ni, kha leh aksi a bia mi khempeuh ka susia ding a, keimah hong bia-in, keima tungah thuman ding gen napi-in, Milkom pasian’ min tawh a kiciam teiteite zong, ka susia ding hi.
Lam pial a, kei hong zui nawn lote, thu dong dingin kei kiangah hong pai lote, ka susia ding hi,” ci hi.
Topa Pasian’ mai-ah gamdai takin om un! Topa’ ni hong nai ta hi. Topa in biakna-a sa gawh bangin a mite a go dingin kithawi a, a gawh ding mite sian’suah khin hi.
Topa in hih bangin thu gen a, “Tua banga mite a kigawh ni-in, uliante leh kumpipa’ tapa, leh gamdang mite’ ngeina a zuite khempeuh, daan ka pia ding hi.
Midangte’ sangkil kanin zawhthawh bawl a, khemna leh thahna tawh a ngah uh vante tawh, a Topa uh inn a dimsakte khempeuh, tua ni mahin daan ka pia ding hi,” ci hi.

Topa in hih bangin thu gen a, tua ni-in “Jerusalem khua Ngasa Kulh kongpi-ah mite’ kikona na za ding uh a, tua khuapi Veng Nihna sungah mite’ kahna, leh mual neute tungah a puak zaizai-a ging na za ding uh hi.
Khuapi Veng Nuainung sunga teeng mite aw, hih bang gamlumna na zak uh ciangin kapin thuum un. Bang hang hiam cih leh sumbukte khempeuh kisia ding uh hi.

Tua hun lai takin Jerusalem khua sung, meivak tawh ka zong ding a, thu phawk loin amau’ ngeina bang bangin om cip a, ‘Topa in a pha hita leh a sia hita leh, bangmah bawl ngei lo hi,’ a ci mite, daan ka pia ding hi.
Amau’ neihsa khempeuh kisut ding a, a innte uh kisuksiatsak ding hi. Inn a lam hangun a sungah teeng kha lo ding uh a, leenggui a suan hangun leenggahzu dawn kha lo ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Topa’ ni hong nai ta a, nai mahmahin hong tung hathat hi. Tua Topa’ ni hong tun’ciangin, galhang pente nangawn cimawhin kap ding uh hi.
Tua ni in heh mahmah ni, lungkham sinkham ni, tuahsia-in kisuksiat gawp ni, khua ziingin maimial ni, meiipi kai-in huihpi nun’ ni,
galdo nading peengkul a kitum ni, leh kulh nei khuapite leh a tausangte a kisimna-a galkapte’ kiko ni, hi ding hi.

Topa in hih bangin thu gen a, “Mihingte tungah lungkhamna lianpi ka tungsak ding a, amaute in mittaw bangin khua zawt ding uh hi. Keima tungah amaute hong khial uh ahih manin, tui bangin a sisan uh kithehthang ding a, a luanghawm uh, leilakah muatcip ding hi,” ci hi.

Topa’ heh thukna ni hong tun’ ciangin, amau’ ngun leh amau’ khamte in honkhia zo lo ding hi. Ama hehna meikuang in leitung khempeuh kangtum ding a, thakhat thu-in leitunga teeng mi khempeuh sumai ding hi.
A maizum thei lo minam aw, hoih takin thu ngaihsun in.
Ansi bangin hong kizapkhiat ma, Topa’ hehna na tungah hong tuk ma, Topa in a hehna hong lah ni hun a tun’ ma-in, thu ngaihsun in kikheel in.

Kiniamkhiatin, Topa’ thupiakna a mang, Judah gam mi khempeuh aw, Topa’ kiang zuan un. A manin gamta un la, kiniamkhiat un. Tua hi leh, Topa’ hehna hong kilat ni ciangin, tua hehna daan panin na peng thei ding uh hi.
Gaza khuapi-ah kuamah om nawn lo ding a, Ashkelon khuapi kinusia ding hi. Ashdod khuamite, sun tangpi-in kihawlkhia ding a, Ekron khuamite kipaikhiatpih mang ding hi.

Tuipi gei-a gual teen, no Filistia gam mite aw, gimna na ngah ding uh hi. Filistia mite’ ten’na Kanaan leitang aw, Topa in nang tungah thu hong khen zo hi. Mi khempeuh a bei mang dongin, hong susia ding hi.
Tuipi gei-a om leitang aw, tuute’ gamtatna mun, gamlak na suak lel ding hi.

Judah mi a om laite in na gamsung luah ding a, amaute in tuu cin’na-in hong nei-in, Ashkelon khua sunga innte sungah zanin lum ding uh hi. Topa ahi amaute’ Pasian in amaute ompih ding a, amaute, citheisak kik ding hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in hih bangin thu gen a, “Moab mite in ka mite a simmawhna, Ammon mite in ka mite a zahkona, leh ka mite’ gam sutgawp dingin, a kisaktheih paunate uh ka za khin hi.

Keimah in a nungta Israel Pasian ka hih mah bangin, Moab mite, Sodom khuamite bangin kisusia-in, Ammon mite, Gomorrah khuamite bangin kisusia-in, a gam sung uhah lingkung bek po zoin, a gam uh cikhuk tawh kidimin a sia tawntung suakin, a suakta lai ka mite in a neihsa uh sutin, a gam uh a laksak tak kei leh, ci-in ka kiciam hi,” ci hi.
Amaute in Vanglianpen Topa’ mite, simmawhin kihisak uh ahih manin, a kiphatsakna hangun Moab mite leh Ammon mite in hih bangin daan thuak ding uh hi.
Topa in amaute lausak gawp ding a, leitung pasiante, neu bawl gawp ding hi. Tua ciangin, minam khempeuh in amau’ gam ciat panun amah bia ding uh hi.
No Ethiopia mite zong, Topa in namsau tawh hong that ding hi.
Topa in leilu lamah a khut hong zanin, Assiria gam susia ding a, Nineveh khuapi susia gawpin, sehnel gamlak suaksak ding hi.

Tuuhon leh bawnghonte, tua khua sungah lumin, ganhing namkim phualpi suak ding hi. Gunva leh gunvapite, bangtung zawl-ah tuang ding uh a, kongvangneu-ah keising khuang-in, sangkil tungah va-ak ham ding hi. Taamtaak sing tawh a kilam innte maimang ding hi.

A vangliatna a kisak theihpih, lungmuang taka om khuapi tungah, tu-a bangin piang ding hi. Leitungah amau’ khuapi a lianpenin ngaihsun uh hi. Tua hi napi-in gamlak suakin, gamsate’ omna suak ta hi. A mu mi khempeuh in lamdang sa-in ciksa ding uh hi.
Ama mite mah nengniamin, thumang loin a tatsia, Jerusalem khuapi in gimna ngah ding hi.
Topa’ thu ngai nuam lo a, a thuhilhna sang nuam lo hi. Topa muang nuam lo a, a Pasian naih nuam lo hi.
A uliante, a hawk thei humpinelkai gilkial bang a, a thukhente, keivom gilkial bang uh hi. Zing khuavak mateng a saguh nek a nusia nuam lo, a huaiham gamsate tawh kibang uh hi.
A kamsangte kihisak uh a, kamsang citak hi lo uh hi. A siampite in a siangtho nate ninsak a, amau’ angsung ding bek khualna-in Pasian’ thukham lehhei uh hi.

Ahi zongin tua khuapi sungah Topa om a, a thuman na bek semin, a khial-in gamta ngei lo hi. Zingsang simin mihingte tungah pelh ngei loin thutang lak hi. Ahi zongin tua lai-a mihing thuman lote, a sia-in gamta teitei uh a, maizumna meel thei thei lo uh hi.

Topa in hih bangin thu gen a, “A kiphasak mite ka nilkhia a, a gal panmunte uh ka susia hi. A kongzing lampite uh ka kinusiacip sak a, kuamah in tua lampi tawn nawn lo hi. A khuapi uh kisia gawpin kinusia a, a sungah kuamah om nawn lo hi.
Tua ahih manin ka mite in kei hong zahtakin, amau ka thuhilhnate mangngilh lo ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi. Ahi zongin a gamtatsiat ngei bangin gamta lai veve uh hi,” ci hi.

Topa in hih bangin thu gen a, “Tua ahih ciangin minamte ka mawhsak ni hun dong kei hong ngak phot dih un. Minamte leh kumpi gamte kaikhawmin, ka hehna ka thuaksak ding, ka lungsim ka khentat khin hi. Ka heh luatna meikuang tawh, leitung khempeuh kangtum ding hi.
Tua ciangin minamte’ lungsim ka hei ding a, amaute in Topa tung bekah thu ngenin, lungsim kikhatin Topa’ na sem ding uh hi.
A gamlapi Ethiopia gam peka om, a kithehthang ka mite nangawn in biakna hong puak ding uh hi.

Tua hun ciangin, ka mite in kei nong lehdona hangun, maizumna ding bangmah om nawn lo ding hi. Note’ lak panin a kiphasak a kihisak mite ka hawlkhia ding a, Jerusalem khua a, ka mual siangtho tungah kei nong lehdo nawn kei ding uh hi.
Note lakah a kiniamkhiat, mi lungnemte bek, ka suakta sak lai ding a, keima min suangin thu hong ngen ding uh hi.

Israel mi a om lai sunte, midang tungah gilo nawn lo ding a, zuauthu gen nawn loin, mi kheem ding zong ngaihsun nawn lo ding uh hi. Amaute cithei-in lungmuangin om ding uh a, kuamah kihta nawn lo ding uh hi,” ci hi.
Zion’ tanu aw, nakpi takin la sa in la, Israel aw, lungdamin kiko in, Jerusalem tanu aw, na lungsim khempeuh tawh lungdam in.
Topa in na galte hong paihkhiatsak khin a, hong langpang khempeuh hong hawlkhiatsak khin hi. Topa ahi Israel Kumpipa in nang tawh hong om a, na lau nading thu om nawn lo hi.
Tua ni ciangin Jerusalem khuapi kiangah, “Lau kei in, Zion aw, Na khut thazaw sak kei in,” kici ding hi.
Topa na Pasian un note hong ompih a, ama vangliatna in hong gualzo sak hi. Note tungah Topa lungkim ding a, ama itna tawh hong thak bawl ding hi. Note hangin Topa lungdamin la sa ding a,
pawi hun sunga mi lungdamte bang ding hi. Topa in hih bangin thu gen a, “Note adingin a lauhuai thu ka beisak khin a, na mindai nading teng uh kong paihkhiatsak khin hi.

En un, tua hun ciangin no hong bawlsiate, daan ka pia ding a, a khebaite honkhia-in, a kipaikhiatpih mite ka ciahpih ding hi. Amau’ maizumna, minthan’na ka suaksak ding a, mi khempeuh in amaute phat ding uh hi.
Tua hun ciangin, a kithehthang na mite uh kong kaikhawm ding a, leitung mi khempeuh in note hong pahtawi-in hong phat ding uh hi. A tawpna-ah note na cithei kik ding uh hi,” Topa in ci hi, a ci hi.

Persia gam uk kumpi Darias in a uk a kum nihna kum, a kha gukna a ni masa ni-in, kamsang Haggai tungah Topa in thu gen hi. Tua a thu gen pen, Shealtiel’ tapa Zerubbabel, Judah gam ukpa, leh Jehozadak’ tapa Joshua, siampi lianpa tungah gen ding ahi hi.
Vanglianpen’ Topa in thu gen a, “Hih mite in, biakinn lamkik ding hun nai lo hi, ci uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kamsang Haggai tungah Topa in hih bangin thu gen a,
“Ka mite aw, ka biakinn a siacipin a om lai takin, inn hoihpipi sungah note na om ding uh kilawm ahi hiam?
Tu laitak-a na omzia uh lim takin ngaihsun un.

Khaici tampi na tuh uh hangin an tawm bek na la uh a, an nek ding na neih tei uh hangin na kham ding uh na nei kei uh hi. Dawn ding leenggahzu na neih tei uh hangin na kham ding uh na nei kei uh hi. Puan silh ding na neih tei uh hangin a lum khop ding na nei kei uh hi. Sum thalawhte in zong a khamkhop ding uh thalawh zo lo uh hi.
Tu laitak-a na omzia uh lim takin ngaihsun un.
Tu-in mual tungah kuanto un la, sing sui un. Tua singte tawh biakinn lamkik le uh cin, kei ka lungdam ding a, nong biak ding uh akilawm bangin kei nong bia thei ding uh hi.

An hau dingin na kilamet uh hangin tawmcik bek na nei uh hi. Na neihsunte nangawn uh inn na tun’pih uh hangin kong mutkhiatsak mang khin hi. Bang hangin hong tua cih ka hi hiam? Note khempeuh, nomau’ inn ding ciat lamin na manlah uh a, ka biakinn a siapi-in na koihdakna hang uh ahi hi.
Tua thu hangin guah zu lo a, leitang panin bangmah khangkhia zo lo hi.

Keimah in gam sung teng, mual tung khempeuh, lo khempeuh, leenggui lo khempeuh, oliv cin’na lo khempeuh, leitang pan-a piang kung khempeuh, mihing, ganhing, leh mite’ nasepna khempeuh ah keuna ka tungsak hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Shealtiel’ tapa Zerubbabel, Jehozadak’ tapa Joshua ahi siampi lianpa, leh salsuahna panin hong ciahkik mi khempeuh in Topa ahi amau’ Pasian’ thu mang uh a, Topa Pasian’ kamtai ahi kamsang Haggai’ gen bangin gamta-in, Topa zahtakin lau uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ kamtai Haggai in mite tungah Topa’ thugente gensawn a, “Topa in note kong ompih hi, ci hi,” ci-in gen hi.

Tua hi a, Topa in Judah gam ukpa Zerubbabel, siampi lianpa Jehozadak’ tapa Joshua leh salsuahna panin a hong ciahkik mi khempeuh’ sungah biakinn lam nopna lungsim a guan hi. Topa, amau’ Pasian’ biakinn lam dingin hong kithawi uh a,
Darias in kumpi a sep a kum nihna kum, a kha gukna a ni sawmnih leh ni li ni-in biakinn lam hong kipan uh hi.
Tua kum mah, a kha sagihna a ni sawm nih leh ni khat ni-in kamsang Haggai tungah Topa in thu gen a,
Judah gam ukpa Zerubbabel, siampi lianpa Jehozadak’ tapa Joshua leh sal suahna panin hong ciakkik mi khempeuh tungah thu a gen dingin sawl a,
“Ni danga biakinn a hoihna dan a ciamteh thei lai na om uh hiam? Tu-in bangci na sa uh hiam? Note’ muhna-ah a gen taak het lo tawh kibang ding hi.
Tu-in Zerubbabel aw, thahat in Siampi lianpa, Jehozadak’ tapa Joshua aw, thahat in gam sunga om mi note khempeuh aw, thahat un Topa in ci hi. Note tawh hong omkhawm ka hih manin nasep kipan un.
Izipt gam panin na paikhiat lai un, note kong ompih tawntung nading thu kong ciam hi. Tu-in zong ka lungsim in note hong ompih lai ahih manin lau kei un.
A sawt loin vanpi leh leipi, tuipi leh leitung ka lokgawp ding hi.
Minam khempeuh lokgawp ding ka hih manin, a neihsa uh sum leh paiite, hih munah hong kipuak ding a, biakinn sungah a dimin van hong om ding hi.
Leitunga om ngun leh kham khempeuh in keima aa ahi hi.
Biakinn thak in a lui sangin hoih zawin thupizaw ding hi. Hih biakinn-ah cihtheihna leh nopsakna kong pia ding hi,” ci sak hi.
Gam uk kumpipa Darias in a uk kum nihna mah, a kha kuana a ni sawmnih leh nili ni-in kamsangpa Haggai tungah Topa in thu gen leuleu a,
“Hih thu tawh kisai-in siampite’ ngaihsutna dong in:

Mi khatpeuh in biakna-a kipia sa siangtho them khat, a puantualpi thep kawm-ah pua kha hen la, tua a puantualpi tawh anlum khatpeuh peuh ahi a, a kihuan an khat peuhpeuh ahi a, leenggahzu, ahih kei leh oliv thau, ahih kei leh an nam khatpeuh peuh ahi zongin su kha leh, tua a sukkhak an pen biakna an siangtho a suak ding hiam?” ci-in dong sak hi. Tua bangin a kidot ciangin siampite in, “Tua puantualpi in a sukkhak ante, biakna an siangtho suak tuan lo hi,” ci-in dawng uh hi.

Tua ciangin Haggai in, “Mi khat in misi tawh a kisukkhak manin mi nin a suah khit ciangin hih ante khatpeuh peuh lawng kha leh tua a lawn’ khak ante a nin a suak ding hiam?” ci-in dong hi. Siampite in, “A nin suak ding hi,” ci-in dawng uh hi.

Tua ciangin Haggai in thu gen a, “Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Tu-a nong dawn’na uh mah bangin hih mite’ sepna khempeuh ah tua bangin piang ahih manin, biakna tau tungah a piak uh na khempeuh a nin suak hi.
Note tungah a piangsa thute lim takin ngaihsun un. Topa’ biakinn lam ding na kipat ma-un bangci na hi uh hiam?

An seu sawmnih pha ding ci-in ansal-ah na pai uh ciangin seu sawm bek na pha a, leenggahzu thawlpi sawmnga pha ding ci-in leenggahzu kholna beelpi ah na pai uh ciangin thawlpi sawmnih dim bek a na pha hi.
Na an ciin’ khempeuh uh cingteek sakin ka kausansak a, tuate nangawn a susia dingin gialpi ka kiatsak hangin note na kisik nuam kei lai lai uh hi, Topa in ci hi.
Tu-in, kha kuana a ni sawmnih leh nili ni, biakinn bulpi a kiphuh khit, tu ni-a kipanin lim takin ngaihsun un.

Na ansal uh ah na upmawh zah sangun an na tawm zaw lai ding ahi hiam? Leenggui leh theikung, mangkawlsing leh oliv kungte, gah nai lo lai ding ahi hiam? Tua bang hi nawn lo ding a, tu ni-a kipanin note thupha kong pia ding hi, ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua kha a ni sawmnih leh nili ni mahin Topa in Haggai tungah a nih veina thu gen kik a,
“Vanpi leh leipi a lokgawp ding ka hihna thu, Judah gam ukpa Zerubbabel kiangah gen in.

Kumpi gam khempeuh lumletin a vangliatna uh a beisak ding ka hi hi. Leengte leh leeng hawlte ka lawnthal ding a, sakol leengte leh a tung tuangte puk ding uh a, amaute khat leh khat kithat lum ding uh hi.

Ka nasem Zerubbabel aw, tua ni ciangin nang hong la-in ka min gelhna zungbuhin kong bawl ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in ka hong teelpa na hi hi, Vanglianpen Topa in ci hi, ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Persia gam uk Kumpipa Darias in a uk a kum nihna kum, a kha giatna sungin, Topa in kamsang Zekhariah tungah thu gen hi. (Zekhariah in Berekhiah’ tapa hi a, ama pu in Iddo ahi hi.)
Topa in Zekhariah kiangah, “Mite tungah hih bangin thu gen in la, ‘Na pu na pate uh tungah Topa ahi keimah ka heh mahmah hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in kei kiangah hong ciahkik le uh cin, kei zong note kiangah kong paikik ding hi.

Na pu na pate uh bang nawn kei un. Nidanga kamsangte in amaute kiangah ka thu gen uh a, gamtatsia gamta loin, a mawh nawn lohna ding uh hilh uh hi. Ahi zongin amaute in ka thu ngai nuam loin, ka thu hong mang lo uh hi.
Tu-in na pu na pate uh koi-ah om ahi hiam? Tua kamsangte nungta lai sa na hi uh hiam?

Ahi zongin ka nasem ahi kamsangte’ tung tawnin ka hilhkholhna leh ka thupiaknate in note dongin hong su kha lo ding sa na hi uh hiam? Tua ahih ciangin a tawpna-ah amaute kisik uh a, hih dinga ka lungsimah ka geelsa bangin amau’ gamtatna tawh kizui-in daan ka piakna thu phawk uh hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Darias in a uk a kum nihna kum, kha sawm leh kha khatna ahi Shebat kha ni sawmnih leh ni li ni-in Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a, zanin mang hong musak hi.
Topa’ vantungmi khat, sakol san khat tungah a tuang ka mu hi. Kuam sunga om mui singkungte lakah amah khawl a, ama nungah sakol dang a san, a gial, a kang om hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in, “Sia aw, hih sakolte bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi. Vantungmi in hong dawng a, “Bang a cih nopna hiam cih kong lak ding hi.
Hih sakol tung tuangte pai kawikawi-in leitung a en dingin Topa in a sawl ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin mui kung lakah a khawl Topa’ vantungmite kiangah amaute in, “Leitung khempeuh ka en kawikawi khin uh a, leitung khempeuh khua phawk loin nuam takin om uh hi,” ci-in thu zasak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in, “Vanglianpen Topa aw, Jerusalem khuapi leh Judah gam khuapite tungah kum sawmsagih sung na heh khin ta hi. Amaute hehpih loin bang tan vei om lai ding na hi hiam?” ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in dikna leh hehnepna kam tawh vantungmi dawng a,
Vanglianpen Topa in ama tungah a gensa thute keimah in ka taangko sawn nadingin tua vantungmi in kei hong sawl a, “Ka khuapi siangtho Jerusalem, nakpi takin itin ka lunghimawh hi.
Tua banga nuam taka a om hithiat minamte tungah ka heh mahmah hi. Ka mite tungah ka hehna ki-ip tentanin ka om lai takin, hih minam dangte in ka mite’ gimna nasiasak semsem uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem khuapi tungah ka hehpihna a lak dingin ka hong paikik hi. Tua khuapi sungah ka biakinn kilam kik ding a, khuapi kulh zong kiciang kik ding hi, Topa in ci hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.

Tua ciangin vantungmi in ka taangko nading hong genkik leuleu a, “Ama khuapite nakpi takin cithei kikin, Jerusalem khuapi a hehnep kik nading, leh ama khuapi-in Zion a neihkik nading, Topa in gen hi, ci-in gen in,” hong ci hi.
Ka khuadak leh saki li ka mu hi.

Bang a cih nopna ahi hiam, ci-in vantungmi kiangah ka dong hi. Amah in hong dawng a, “Judah mite, Israel mite, leh Jerusalem mite a theihthang gawp leitung vangliatnate saki a cih nopna hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin Topa in sek tawi mihing li hong lak hi.

Hih mite a bang hih ding ahi hiam, ci-in ka dong hi. Amah in hong dawng a, “Hih saki lite in Judah mite thehthang gawp a, a lang uhah kuamah pang ngam lo ahih manin, tu-in hih sek tawi lite in Judah gam sugawpin a mite a thehthang gawp minamte lau sakin a lawnthal ding ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Ka muhna dang khat leuleu-ah, a khut sungah tehna khau a tawi mi khat ka mu hi.
“Koi-a pai ding na hi hiam?” ci-in ka dong a, amah in “Jerusalem khuapi a sauna leh a zaina ka theih nadingin a teh dingin a pai ding ka hi hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantung mipa hong paikhia a, vantungmi dang khat in amah na dawntuah hi.

Tua ciangin vantungmi a masapa in a dawntuahpa kiangah, “Va tai in la, tehna khau a tawi tangvalpa kiangah hih thu va gen in, Jerusalem khua sungah mihing leh ganhing tam mahmah ding ahih manin Jerusalem kulh huam sungah ta zo lo ding uh hi.
Tua khuapi a hu dingin meikulh bangin Topa mahmah a om nading, leh tua khua sungah a minthan’na tawh a teen’ nading thu, Topa in kamciam zo hi, ci-in va gen in,” a ci hi.
Topa in ama mite kiangah, “Mun khempeuhah note kong thehthang khin hi. “Hong pai un! Hong pai un! Saklam gam panin taikhia un.”
Babilon-ah a om ka mite aw, Zion-ah tai un,” ci hi.

Hih bangin mang ka muh khit ciangin, ama mite’ na a sut gawp minam dangte kiangah thu a gen dingin Vanglianpen Topa in kei hong sawl a, “Topa’ mite a su mi peuhpeuh in a mit nauta banga a na manpha pen khat a su ahi hi.

Topa mahmah in note hong su ding a, ni danga note’ na hong sepsak mite in tu-in note’ nate hong lehsuh kik ding uh hi,” hong cisak hi. Hih bangin thu hong pian’ ciangin Vanglianpen Topa in kei hong sawl lam tak na thei ding uh hi.
Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Jerusalem mite aw, lungdamin la sa un. Note tawh hong omkhawm ta ding ka hi hi,” ci hi.
Tua hun ciangin Topa kiangah minam tampi hong pai ding uh a, ama mite suak ding uh hi. Topa in note hong ompih ding a, tua ciangin note kiangah kei a hong sawlna thu na thei ding uh hi.
Judah mite in gam siangtho sungah Topa’ neihtuam mite hong suakkik ding a, Jerusalem khua pen a it penpen khuapi hong hi kik ding hi.
Mi khempeuh aw, Topa’ mai-ah gamdai-in om un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a siangtho ama omna mun panin amah hong paikhia ta hi.
Topa in mang hong musak a, Topa’ vantungmi mai-ah siampi lian Joshua ding-in, a mawhna a zong dingin a kiangah Satan zong a om ka mu hi.
Topa’ vantungmi in Satan kiangah, “Satan aw, Topa in nang hong taai hi. Jerusalem a it Topa in nang hong taai hi. Hih Joshua pen, meikhuk sung panin a kiteenkhia singkhuah tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
Joshua ahih leh vantungmi’ mai-ah ding a, puan a nin mahmah silh hi.

Vantungmi in ama sawltak van mi dangte kiangah, “Hih mipa’ silh a puan ninte suah khiatsak un,” ci-in thu pia hi. Tua ciangin vantungmi in Joshua kiangah, “Na mawhna teng kong paih khiatsak khin a, tu-in na silh dingin puan thak ka hong pia ding hi,” ci hi.

Tua ciangin a sawltak vanmite thu pia a, Joshua’ lu tungah dial siangtho a khipsak ding uh sawl hi. Topa’ vantungmi tua munah a din’ sung mahin, amaute in zong Joshua, dial siangtho khimsakin, tua khit ciangin puan siangtho zong silhsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Topa’ vantungmi in Joshua kiangah lim takin thu gen a,

Vanglianpen Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Ka thukhamte zui a, kong sawl thute na sep leh, ka biakinn sung leh biakinn huang sung teng na uk ding a, hih ka kianga om vantungmite’ thu ka ngaih bangin nangma thu zong ka ngai ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin siampi lian Joshua aw, ngai in; ama siampi pih ahi no adangte in zong ngai un. Note in mai lam thu hoih nadingin lim na hi uh hi. Sing bangin A Sel ka nasempa khat kong paisak ding hi.
Joshua’ omna mai-ah, mittang sagih a nei suang khat ka koih hi; tua suang tungah lai ka gelh ding a, ni khat sungin hih gam mite’ mawhna ka paihkhiatsak ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin note khempeuh in leenggui leh theikungte hau-in nuam na sa ding uh a, na veengte ciat un hong nekpihin hong lungdampih nadingun na sam ding uh hi, Vanglianpen Topa in ci hi,” a ci hi.
Kei tawh a kiho vantungmi mah hong paikik a, a ihmu kimlai a kiphong bang keekin kei hong khanglosak hi.

Amah in, “Bang na mu hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Kei zong, “Kham tawh a kibawl meivakkhuam khat ka mu hi. Tua meivakkhuam in meivak sagih nei a, meivak tui koih nading hai khat zong a khuam dawnah om hi. Tua meivak sagihte in meivakkhau nei ciat uh hi.
Meivakkhuam gei-ah oliv kung nih zong om a, meivakkhuam lang tuakah om uh hi,” ci-in ka dawng hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong vantungmi kiangah, “Sia aw; hihte bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dot ciangin,
amah in, “A cih nopna thei lo na hi hiam?” ci-in hong dong a, kei zong “Sia aw, ka thei kei hi,” ci-in ka dawngkik hi.

Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “Topa in Zerubbabel’ tungah hih bangin thu gen hi; Thagum hat hang hi lo, vangliatna hang zong hi lo, keima tung panin na ngah Kha hang bek tawh na ma na tun’ zo ding hi.

Thu haksa pente nangawn in na ma hong khaktan zo lo ding hi. Biakinn na lamkik ding a, mite in, ‘Hoih mahmah hi,’ ci-in a ot ngeii-ngai lai takin a khupna suang na ciang ding hi, hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen hi.
Amah in, “Zerubbabel in biakinn bulpi phut khin a, biakinn lam zong zo ding hi. Tua ciangin ka mite in, amaute kiangah nang kong sawlna thu thei ding uh hi.

A ma uh a telh loh manin ka mite lungkia uh a, ahi zongin Zerubbabel in biakinn lam nasep a makaihna a muh uh ciangin a lung uh damkik ding hi,” hong ci hi. Vantungmi in, “Meivak sagihte in, leitung khempeuh a etna Topa’ mittang sagih ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei zong ama kiangah, “Meivakkhuam pang tuak-a om oliv kung nihte bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?
Oliv thau a luan’ khiatna kham tuizawl nihte’ gei-a om oliv hiang nihte bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi.
Amah in, “Thei lo na hi hiam?” ci-in hong dong a, kei zong, “Sia aw, thei kei ing,” ci-in ka dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Leitung khempeuh’ Topa’ na a sem dingin Pasian in teelin sathau a nilh mi nihte a cih nopna ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Ka khuadak kik leh huih lakah a leeng laizial khat ka mu hi.
Vantungmi in, “Bang mu na hi hiam?” ci-in hong dong a, kei zong, “Laizial a leeng khat ka mu a, a dung pi sawmthum pha-in, a vai pi sawm leh pi nga pha hi,” ci-in ka dawng hi.

Tua ciangin amah kei kiangah, “leitung gam khempeuhah a pai ding hamsiatnate, hih lai tungah kigelh hi. Guta khempeuh, gam sung panin kisiak khia mang ding hi, ci-in laizial dal lang khatah kigelh a, a man lopi-in ka min tawh thuciam mi khempeuh zong kisiak khia mang ding hi, ci-in a lang khatah kigelh hi.

Vanglianpen Topa in hih samsiatna a khahkhiatna ding thu gen a, guta mite khempeuh leh a man loin ka min tawh thuciam mite khempeuh’ inn sungah lut ding hi. Tua bang mite’ inn sungah a tawntungin hamsiatna omin, amaute-a kipan a sing a suang, a vekpi-in kisumai ding hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi hong kilang kikin kei kiangah, “Tu-a hong pai ding en in,” hong ci hi.
Kei zong, “Bang ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi. Amah in hong dawng a, “Tua in ciangpi hi a, gamsung khempeuh’ mawhna lim ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua ciangpi a sin in haknaw kibawl ahi hi. Tua banga ka et lai takin haknaw kibawl tua ciangpi sin pen kidomto a, tua ciangpi sungah numei khat tu hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Hih numei in gitlohna lim ahi hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin vantungmi in ciangpi sungah tua numei hensuk kik a, a sin tawh tua ciangpi sinkik hi.
Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh numei nih ka mu a, tui-vapi bangin kha nei-in, keima lamah hong leeng uh hi. Van lamah tua ciangpi leh’pih to uh hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi kiangah, “Koi lai-ah len’pih ding ahi uh hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi.
Amah in, “Biakinn khat a lamsak dingin Babilon gamah a len’pih ding ahi uh hi. Biakinn a lamsak uh a zawh uh ciangin, biak dingin tua ciangpi kikoih ding hi,” ci-in hong dawng hi.
Mang adang khat ka mu leuleu hi. Sumngo mual nih kikal panin sakolleeng li hong paikhia ka mu hi.
A leeng masa pen sakol san in kai a, a nihna, sakol vom in kai a,
a thumna, sakol kang in kai a, a lina, sakol gial in kai hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi kiangah, “Sia aw, hih sakolleengte bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi.
Tua ciangin amah in hong dawng a, “Hihte in vantunga om kha lite a cih nopna hi a, leitung khempeuhte’ Topa kiang panin a hong paikhia ahi uh hi,” hong ci hi.
Sakol vomte in a kaih leeng pen leilu lam Babilon gamah a pai ding hi a, sakol kangte nitumna lam, sakol gialte leitaw lam, sakol sante nisuahna lam gamah a pai ding ahi hi.
Tua sakolte, pai khia-in leitung teng a et ding uh ngaklah mahmah uh hi. Tua ahih manin vantungmi in, “Pai un la, leitung teng va en un,” ci-in thu pia hi. Amaute zong pai-in va en uh hi.
Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei hong otsan a, “Leilu lam Babilon gamah a paite in Topa’ hehna damsak hi,” hong ci hi.
Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen hi.
Amah in, “Babilon gam salsuahna pan a hong ciahkik Heldai, Tobijah, leh Jedaiahte’ hong piak letsongte la in la, tua na lak ni mahin, Zefaniah’ tapa Josiah’ innah paipih in.
Amaute’ hong piak ngun leh khamte zangin kumpi lukhu khat bawl in la, Johozadak’ tapa, siampi lian a sem Joshua khusak in.
Ama kiangah, ‘Topa in hih bangin ci hi: “Hih mipa in sing bangin A Sel a kici mipa ahi hi. A omna peuhpeuh-ah amah cithei ding a, Topa’ biakinn lamkik ding hi.

Amah in Topa’ biakinn a lam dingpa hi a, kumpite’ ngah theih minliatna ngahin, ama mite uk ding hi. Ama kumpi tokhom gei-ah siampi khat om ding a, kithutuakin kilemin na semkhawm ding uh hi,” ci hi,’ va ci in.
Tua kumpi lukhu pen Heldai, Tobijah, Jedaiah, leh Josiahte pahtawi-in phawk nadingin biakinn sungah om ding hi,” hong ci hi.

Gamlapi-a teeng mite hong pai-in Topa’ inn lam nasep hong huh ding uh hi. Tua biakinn a kilam kik ciangin Vanglianpen Topa in note kiangah kei a hong sawlna thu na thei ding uh hi. Topa na Pasian uh’ thupiaknate cing takin na zuih nak uh leh tu-a ka gen bangin hong piang ding hi.
Kumpi Darias in a uk a kum lina, a kha kuana Khislev kha a ni li ni-in Topa in Zekhariah tungah thu gen hi.

Beth-el khuamite in Topa tung panin thupha a ngen ding, leh Topa’ biakinn sunga om siampite leh kamsangte tungah “A beisa kum tampi sung ka hih ngeisa uh mah bangin biakinn siatna hangin kapkap lai-in, kha ngana sungin an na tangtang lai ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong dingin Sharezer leh Regemmelek, leh a mite uh na sawl uh hi.
Tua ahih manin Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
“Gam sung mi khempeuh leh siampite tungah hih bangin gen in: Amaute in a beisa kum sawmsagih sung kha ngana leh kha sagihna sungin an tangin a kahna uh, kei hong pahtawina uh hi lo hi.
A an nek a tui dawnte uh zong amau’ duh man bek hi,” hong ci hi.

Jerusalem cithei-in a khua sungah mi tampi omin, leitaw lam gam, nitumna lam gam, a kim a pam khuapite-ah mi tampi teengin a om hun lai takin, tu-a mah bangin Topa in a kamsang masate’ tung tawnin a gensa thu ahi hi.
Topa in Zekhariah tungah thu gen a,
“Note in thu a tangin khenin, khat leh khat tungah itna leh hehpihna kilakin,
note lakah a om meigong, tagah, gamdang mite, ahih kei leh mi zawngte gim pia loin, khat leh khat kisiatsak nading na ngaihsut loh nading uh thu ka hong pia zo hi,” ci hi.
Ahi zongin amaute in mang nuam het lo uh a, hih thute ngaihsutin zong nei nuam lo uh hi.
Amaute in a lungsim uh suangtum bangin saksak uh a, Vanglianpen Topa in taanglai kamsangte tung tawnin a Kha Siangtho tawh a gen thuhilhnate ngai nuam lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin Topa heh mahmah hi.
Amaute ka hopih ciangin hong ngai nuam lo uh hi; kei zong amaute’ hong thungetna ka ngai kei ding hi, Topa in ci hi.

Tua ahih manin Topa in “Huihpi’ mut khiat bangin amaute thehthang gawpin, a theih ngei lohna uh gam dangah amaute teeng ding uh hi. Amau’ nusiat leitang hoih in zong gamkhing suak ding a, a sungah kuamah om nawn loin daicip ding hi,” a ci hi.
Vanglianpen Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
amah in, “Jerusalem mite ka it luatna hangin Jerusalem khuapi ka huh nuam mahmah a, hih ka it luatna in a galte tungah ka heh hong suaksak hi.
Ka khuapi Zion ah ciahkikin Jerusalem ah ka teeng ding hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem pen a citak khuapi ci-in minthang ding a, Vanglianpen Topa’ mual in mual siangtho kici ding hi.
Jerusalem khuapi kongzing leh lamkabomte-ah a tu dingin puteekte omkik ding a, teek lua kisa-in ciangkhut khunin pai ding uh hi.
Kongzing khempeuh ah numei naupang kimawlin phezaizai ding uh hi.
Tu-in a om lai note adingin hih thu a hi thei lo ding tawh a kibat hangin kei adingin ahi mawh ding thu hi lo hi.
Nisuahna leh nitumna gamte panin ka mite ka honkhia ding a,
Jerusalem khua sungah ka tun’pih kik ding hi. Amaute in keima mi hi-in, kei in amau’ Pasian ka hi ding a, amau tawh ka thuciamnate uh lim takin ka zui ding uh hi.
“Thakhauhin lungsim hang un. Ka biakinn a kilamkik nading a bul a kiphuh lai takin kamsangte in a gen thute mah a za na hi uh hi.
Tua hun ma-in mi ahi a, ganhing ahi zongin na a sem dingin kuamah in cial zo lo a, galte kihtakna hangin kuamah a ut utin om thei lo hi. Mi khat leh khat ka kidosak hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in a suakta lai hih minamte, ni danga-te ka bangsak kei ding hi.
Lungnuam takin lo kho sing pua-in nuamsa ding uh hi. Leengguite gah pha-in, lo-ah an tampi piang-in, guah tampi zu ding a, a suakta lai ka minamte tungah hih bang thupha khempeuh ka tungsak ding hi.

A beisa hun-ah, Judah gam mite leh Israel gam mite pen, minam dangte in hamsiatna kamin zang uh a, ‘Judah leh Israelte thuak bangin thuak un,’ kici uh hi. Ahi zongin note kong honkhia ding a, tu-in midangte in, ‘Judah leh Israel bangin thupha ngah un,’ ci-in thupha piakna-in kinei ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin na lungsim uh hangsak un la lau kei un.
“Na pu na pate un kei hong hehsak ciangin amaute tungah siatna tun’sak ding ka ngaihsun a, ka lungsim ka khiam het kei hi.
Ahi zongin tu-in Jerusalem khuamite leh Judah gam mite tungah thupha piak ding ka ngaihsun hi. Tua ahih ciangin lunghimawh kei un.
Note, hih bangin gamta un: Note khat leh khat tungah thuman thutak kam kipau un. Thukhenna zumah, kilemna a piangsak ding thutang zang un.
