Ling lakah a kiate ahih leh, thu a zak ciangin leitung lunghihmawhna, sum leh pai khemna in depgawp uh a, a gah zo lote ahi hi.
Lei hoihna ah a kiate in, thu a zak ciangin a khiatna thei-in a zah zakhat, a zah sawmguk, a zah sawmthumin a gah theite ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Thugentehna khat in, “Vantung Gam in khaici hoih a vawh mi tawh kibang hi.
Mite ihmut kalun a galpa pai a, tahum tang, taang lakah a vawh khit ciangin a paikhia hi.
Taang po a, hong vuih khit ciangin tahum zong hong kilang hi.

A nasemte in a topa uh kiangah pai a, ‘Topa aw, lo lai-ah khaici hoih vawh hilo na hi hiam? Tahum in koi pan a hong piang hiam? ci-a a koh uh ciangin a topa un, ‘Hih thu in galte hong bawlna thu hi,’ a ci hi.
A nasemte in, “Tahum kungte va bot le-ung nong awi hiam?’ a cih uh leh, a topa un,
‘Bot nai kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na bawh uh leh, taang kung tawh na botkhawm kha ding uh hi.

Taang lak hun matengin a nam nihin khangkhawm tadih hen. Taang lak hun hong tun’ ciangin, lopa teng bot masa un la, mei ah hal dingin lom hen un. Taang ahih leh, ka sal sungah hong koih un,’ ci-in taang late ka vaikhak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Thugentehna adang inah, “Vantung Gam in, mi khat in lo lai-ah a cin’ ankamtang tawh kibang hi.
Ankamtang in tang khempeuh lakah a neupen hi. Ahih hangin a khan’ khit ciangin, ankung khempeuh sangin golzaw a, vana vasate in leengin a hiangah a tuang thei uh hi,” a ci hi.
Thugentehna adang a geninah, “Vantung Gam in numei khat in buhnel seeng thum a tawk khit matengin a sawh, silngo tawh kibang hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in tuate khempeuh thugentehna tawh mihonpite a hilh hi. Thugentehna loin thu a hilh kei hi.
Bang hang hiam i cih leh; “Ka kam ka-in thugentehna-in ka hilh ding hi. Lei pian’cil a kipan, thu ki-im khempeuh ka pulak ding hi,” ci-a Pasian’ kamsangte tungah a gensa a tun’ nading hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in, mihonpi lak pan paikhia-in, inn sungah a lut khit ciangin, a nungzuite a kiangah va pai uh a, “Lo lai-ah a po tahum kung gentehna thu a khiatna ko hong hilh tel in,” ci-in a dot uh leh, Zeisu in,
“Khaici vawhpa in Mihing Tapa hi.
Lo lai in leitung mite hi. Khaici hoih in Gam sung tate ahi uh hi. Tahum tang in gilomi’ tate ahi uh hi.
Tahum tang vawh galpa in dawimangpa hi. Taang lak hun in leitung bei nading hi. Taang la mite in vantungmite ahi uh hi.
Lopa kungte botkhia a, mei tawh a hal uh mah bangin, leitung a bei ciangin a piang ding hi.
Mihing Tapa in ama vantungmite sawl ding a, a khialte leh a puksakte khempeuh a Gam sung pan nilkhia-in,
meiphual sungah a khul ding uh hi. Kahna leh ha gawina a om ding hi.
Tua lai takin miphate in amau Pa’ Gam sungah ni bangin a taang ding uh hi. Zak nading bil a nei teng in na za ta un!”
“Vantung Gam in lo lai-ah a kiseel sum tawh kibang hi. Tua sum a mupa in khatvei seel kik a, lungdam mahmahin pai a, a neih khempeuh zuakin tua lo a va lei hi.”
“Vantung Gam in suang manpha a zong, sum zuakpa tawh kibang hi.
Tuapa in suang manpha pen a muh ciangin ciah a, a neih khempeuh a zuak khit ciangin tua suang manpha va lei hi.”
“Khatvei, Vantung Gam in tuili a, kipaai, ngasa nam tampi a awk thei ngeen tawh kibang hi.
Ngasa a dim tak a awk ciangin, ngabengte in tui geiah kaikhia uh a, tu-in nga a hoihte teelin bawm sungah a guang uh hi. Ngasa a hoih lo teng a pam khawng ah a paii uh hi.
Tua mah bangin leitung a bei ciangin, vantungmite hong kumsuk ding uh a, mi siangthote lakah a gilo teng lakhia-in meiphual sungah a khul ding uh hi.
Kahna leh ha gawina a om ding hi,” a ci hi.
“Hih thu khempeuh note’n na thei uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Ka thei khin uh hi,” a cih uh leh,
Zeisu in, “Tua ahih leh, Vantung Gam thuzui a suak laithei khempeuh in sumkholna pan a thak leh a lui a lakhia thei inn teekpa tawh kibang uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in tua bang thugentehna khempeuh a hilh khit ciangin, tua mun pan a paikhia hi.
Ama khua-ah a tun’ ciangin, kikhopna inn sungah thu hilh hi. Khuapihte in lamdang a sa uh hi. “Hihpa in hih bang pilna leh vangliatna koi pan a ngah hiam?
Amah in khutsiampa’ tapa hilo ahi hiam? A nu min Mari hilo ahi hiam? Ama sanggamte in Jakob, Josef, Simon, Judah te hilo ahi uh hiam?
Ama sanggamnute in i kiangah om hilo ahi uh hiam? Tua ahih leh, amah in hih thute khempeuh koi pan a ngah hiam?” ci-in a kidong uh hi.
Amaute in amah hanginah a lungkia uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Pasian’ kamsangpa in ama khua, ama inn longal mun dangah minthan’na ngah loin om lo hi,” ci-in amaute kiangah a ci hi.
A khuapihte in a thu um lo uh ahih ciangin tua san takah nalamdang tampi a bawl zo kei hi.
Tua lai takin Herod Kumpipa in Zeisu thu a zak ciangin,
“Tua pa in Baptaizpa Johan ahi hi. Amah in sihna pan a tho kik zo hi. Tua ahih ciangin, hih vangliatna in ama tungah ahih hi,” ci-in a nasemte kiangah a ci hi.
Herod in a nau Filip’ zi Herodias thu hangin Johan a matsak khit ciangin, henin, thong sungah a khia hi.
Bang hang hiam i cih leh, Johan in, “Tua numei na teen’pih ding kilawm lo hi,” ci-in Herod kiangah a hilh hang hi.
Herod in Johan a thah nop hangin mihonpite in Johan Pasian’ kamsangpa hi sa uh ahih ciangin a lau hi.
Tua nung ciangin Herod a suah ni a tun’ ciangin pawi kham a, Herodias’ tanu in pawi khamna-ah a lam ciangin, Herod a nuam hi.
“Na hong nget peuhpeuh kong pia ding hi,” ci-in thu a ciam hi.
Tua numei in a nu hilhna bangin, “Baptaizpa Johan’ lutang dalkuang sungah hong pia in,” ci-in a ngen hi.
Kumpipa a dah hangin a kiciam zawhna leh, sabuaiah a tut khawmpihte a zahtak manin, “Pia ta un,” ci a,
mi khat sawl a, thong sungah Johan’ ngawng a tan sak hi.
A lutang dalkuang sungah koih a, tua numeino a piak leh, numeino in a nu kiangah a paipih hi.
Johan’ nungzuite hong pai-in a luang a la uh a, a vui khit uh ciangin Zeisu a ko uh hi.
Zeisu in a zak ciangin, gunkuang tungah tuangin gam daihna munah amah bek a pai hi. Mihonte in a theih uh ciangin khuapi, khuaneu panin paikhia uh a, lei lamah a delh uh hi.
Zeisu paikhia a, mihonpi a muh ciangin hehpih huai sa a, cinate khempeuh a damsak hi.
Nitak ciangin a nungzuite in Topa kiangah va pai uh a, “Hih lai tak in gampa lak ahi hi. Ni lah a tum zo hi. Hih mihonte khua sungah an lei dingin paisak ta in,” a va ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Ka paisak nuam kei hi; amau nek ding an note’n na pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in, “Khomun pum nga leh ngasa tawn nih longal a dang nek ding bangmah ka nei kei uh hi,” a cih uh ciangin,
Zeisu in, “Tua khomun leh ngasa hong paipih un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin, “Mihonte lopa tungah tusak un,” a cih khit ciangin Zeisu in khomun nga leh ngasa tawn nih la a, vantung lam ento-in hehpihna a phat khit ciangin, khomun leh ngasa balnenin a nungzuite a pia hi. A nungzuite in zong mihonte a lui uh hi.
Mi khempeuhte in a ne uh a, a kham khit uh ciangin, khamval a neng a themte tawm uh a, seeng sawm leh seeng nih dim a ngah uh hi.
An ne mite in numei leh naupang sim loh pasal tul nga bang pha hi.
Zeisu in mihonte a paikhiatsak lai takin, a nungzuite gunkuangah thakhatin tuang sakin, a gal khatah a paisak masa hi.
Zeisu in mihonpite a paikhiatsak khit ciangin, thu ngen dingin mual tungah amah guak kahto a, nitak dongin a va om hi.
Gunkuang ahih leh, tuili laizangah om a, a deih lohna uh lam panin huih in lehmut ahih ciangin, tui nakpi-in kilok a, gunkuangah a tuangte in a gim uh hi.
Zingsang khuavak ma nai thum ciangin, Zeisu in tuili tungah a nungzuite kiangah va pai hi.
Tui tungah a pai, a nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin, “Sikha hi,” ci-in lau-in a kiko uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Na lungdam ta un; keimah ka hi hi, na lau kei un,” a cih pah leh,
Piter in, “Topa, nang na hih leh, kei zong nangma kiangah kong tun’ nading, tui tungah hong pai theisak in,” ci-in a nget ciangin,
“Hong pai in,” Zeisu in a ci hi. Piter gunkuang sung pan kum a, Zeisu kiang zuan dingin tui tungah a pai hi.
Ahih hangin huihpi nung a muh ciangin lau a, a tum dektak ciangin, “Topa aw, hong hon in,” ci-in a kiko hi.
Zeisu in thakhatin a khut zan a, Piter lenin, “Upna neupa aw, bang hangin um khial na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Gunkuang tungah a kahtoh ciangin, huih nung a dai hi.
Gunkuang sungah a omte in, “Pasian’ Tapa na hi takpi hi,” ci-in bokin a bia uh hi.
Tua gal khatah a kah khit uh ciangin, Gennesaret gamah a tung uh hi.
Tua munah a om mite in Topa’ meel thei uh ahih ciangin, a kimkot gam khempeuhah mi sawl uh a, cina khempeuh a samsak uh hi.
Cinate in Zeisu’ puan mongteep a lawn’ nadingun a ngen uh hi. A lawng khempeuhte in cidamna a ngah uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin, Jerusalem khua panin Farisaite leh laitheite Zeisu kiangah va pai uh a,
“Tanglai upate’ ngeina, na nungzuite in bang hangin palsat ahi uh hiam? Khut sil loin an a ne uh hi,” ci-in a ko uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Note in tanglai ngeina zui-in Pasian’ thukham bang hang palsat na hi uh hiam?
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian in, ‘Na nu leh na pa na zahtak in. A nu a pa a gensiate in sihna thuak ta hen,’ a ci hi.
Note na hih uh leh, ‘Keima kiangah na zat theih keima sum, Pasian ka pia zo hi,’ ci-in mi khat in a nu a pate zahtak kei ta hen,’ na ci uh hi.
Na tanglai ngeina uh zui-in, Pasian’ thukham na valmawk sak uh hi.
Isaiah in mi simtat note tungah a kituakin a gen khol hi. Isaiah a genna in:
“Hih mipawlte in amau’ kam uh tawh kei hong zahtak uh hangin, A lungsim uh, kei tawh kigamla hi.
Mite’ thukham a hilh uh a, A mawkna-in kei hong bia uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin Zeisu in mihonpite sam a, “Note in ngai un la, na thei ta un.
Kam sungah a tumte in mi a ninsak kei hi. Kam sung pan a paikhiate in mi a ninsak thei hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite’n va nai uh a, “Tua thugentehna Farisaite in a zak uh ciangin, a lungmang uh na thei hiam? a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Vantungah a om ka Pa in a suan loh kung khempeuh kibotkhia ding hi.
Tua mite amau ut bangin om sak un. Amau in mittaw lamhilhte ahi uh hi. Mittaw leh mittaw lam kihilh leh, a nih un leihawm sungah a kiakhawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Piter in, “Tua thugentehna kote hong hilh in,” ci-in a dot ciangin
Zeisu in, “Note in zong lungpilna nei nai lo na hi uh hiam?
Kam sungah a lut khempeuh in gil sungah tumsuk a, gilpi sung pan a kithakhia, thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Kam sung pan a paikhiate in lungsim sung pan paikhia ahih ciangin mi a ninsak thei hi.
A hoih lo ngaihsutna, mithahna, mi’ zi tungah mawhna, numei tawh mawhna, mi’ sum gukna, zuauthu teci pan’na, mi gensiatna, tuate in lungsim sung pan a paikhia hi.
Tuate in mi a ninsak thei hi. Khut sil loin an nekna in hong ninsak thei lo hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in tua mun pan paikhia a, Tai-ar khua leh Sidon khua nai lamah a pai ciangin,
Kanaan numei khat in tua gam panin paikhia a, “David’ Tapa aw, kei hong hehpih in. Keima tanu in dawi’ bawlsiatna nakpi-in a thuak hi,” ci-in a kiko hangin, Zeisu in kam khat beek a dawng kei hi.
A nungzuite in a kiangah va nai uh a, “Tua numei na paikhiasak ta in. I nung hong zui-in hong kiko hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Israel pawl a mangthang tuute longal adang mipawlte kiangah kei hong sawl lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua numei in va nai a, “Topa aw, hong huh in,” ci-in a bia hi.
Zeisu in, “Tate an nek ding la a, uite piak ding kilawm lo hi,” a cih leh
numei in, “Ahi mah hi, Topa aw, uite in a topa sabuai panin anneng kiate a ne uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Numei aw, na upna a lian hi. Nangma deih bangin na tungah hong piang ta hen,” a ci hi. Tua lai tak akipan tua numei’ tanu a cidam hi.
Zeisu in tua gam pan paikhia a, Galile tuipi gei a tun’ ciangin mualah kahto-in a tu hi.
Mi tampi a kiangah va tung uh a, khezawte, mittawte, mi pautheilote, mi cingtak lote a kipan, adang cinatna a vei khempeuh hong paipih-in Zeisu kiangah a nga uh hi.

Zeisu in cinate a damsak hi. Mi pautheilote a pau thei uh hi; mi cingtak lote a cingtak uh hi; khezawte in lam a pai thei uh hi; mittawte in khua a mu kik thei uh, mihonpite in a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh a, Israel pawlte’ Pasian’ min a phat uh hi.

Tua lai takin Zeisu in a nungzuite sam a, “Hih mite hehpih huai ka sa hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ni thum tawntung kei tawh a omkhawm uh a, an nek ding a nei kei uh hi. Lampi ah a gim ding uh, ka lunghihmawh manin, an ne loin ka paisak nuam kei hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in, “Mi hih zahpi kham ding khomun, hih gampa lakah ko bang lak pan ngah ding ka hi uh hiam?” a cih uh ciangin
Zeisu in, “Khomun pum bangzah na nei uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amaute in, “Pum sagih leh ngasa tawm a om hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Mihonpi lei tungah tusak un,” ci-in sawl hi.
Tua ciangin, khomun pum sagih leh ngasa la a, hehpihna a phat khit ciangin khomun leh ngasa balnenin a nungzuite a pia hi.
A nungzuite in mihonpi a lui uh hi. Tua a om khempeuh in a ne uh a, a kham khit uh ciangin, a khamval a neng a themte tawm uh a, seeng sagih a ngah uh hi.
A ne mite in numei leh naupang sim loh, pasal tul li pha hi.
Amah in tua mihonpi a paikhiatsak khit ciangin, gunkuang tungah tuangin Magadan gamah a pai hi.
Tua lai takin Farisaite leh Saddusite in, Zeisu ze-et dingin va nai uh a, “Vantung panin lim hong lak in,” ci-in a ngen uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Note in nitak ciangin, ‘Meii san ahih ciangin khua a pha ding hi,’ na ci thei uh hi.

Zingsang ciangin, ‘Khua nim a, van vom ahih ciangin, tu ni-in huih nung a, guah hong zu ding hi,’ na ci thei uh hi. Note in van maitang na khen theih uh hangin, leitung hunte a lim na khen thei kei uh hi.
Gilo a pangtat khang mite in lim a nget uh hangin, Pasian’ kamsangpa Jonah lim longal lim dang a kilak kei ding hi,” a cih khit ciangin tua mite’ omna pan a paikhia hi.
A nungzuite gal khatah a pai uh ciangin, khomun puak ding a mangngilh uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Farisaite leh Saddusite’ silngo kikeem un la, tang un,” a cih ciangin
a nungzuite in, “Eite in khomun i pua kei hi,” ci-in khat leh khat a kikum uh hi.
Zeisu in a theih ciangin, “Upna neu mite aw, khomun na neih loh manun, bang hangin khat leh khat na kikum uh hiam?
Khomun pum nga mi tul nga in a kham val seeng bangzah na khawm uh hiam?
Khomun pum sagih, mi tul li in a kham val, seeng bangzah na khawm uh hiam ci-in note in phawk nawn lo a, thei nai lo na hi uh hiam?
Khomun gen ka hih loh lam bang hangin thei lo na hi uh hiam? Farisaite leh Saddusite’ silngo na tang un, kong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin amaute in, Khomun leh silngo tang un, a ci kei hi; “Farisaite leh Saddusite’ thuhilhna na tang un,” a ci ahih lam a thei uh hi.
Zeisu in Filippi-Kaisaria khua a tun’ ciangin, “Mite in kei, Mihing Tapa kua mi hi hong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a nungzuite a dong hi.
Amaute in, “Mi kimkhat in, ‘Baptaizpa Johan,’ a ci uh hi. Kimkhat in, ‘Elijah’ a ci uh hi. Midangte in, ‘Jeremiah akipan Pasian’ kamsangte khatpeuh hi,’ a ci ciat uh hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Note in kei kua mi hi nong ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin
Simon Piter in, ‘Nangmah in a nungta Pasian’ Tapa, Khazih na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Jonah’ tapa Simon aw, thupha na ngah ding hi. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, hih thu, si-le-sa in nang hong hilh ahi kei hi. Vantunga om ka Pa in hong theisak hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, nang, Piter na hi hi. Hih suang tungah ka pawlpi ka lam ding hi. Hel khua kongkhakte in tua pawlpi a zo kei ding uh hi.
Vantung Gam kong hon’nate nang kong pia ding hi. Nang in leitungah na hen khempeuh, vantung gamah kihen ding hi. Leitungah na phel khempeuh, vantungah zong a kiphel ding hi,” a cih khit ciangin,
amah Khazih ahi, ci-in kuamah kiangah gen lo dingin a nungzuite a kham hi.

Zeisu in Jerusalem khuapi pai dinga upate, siampi liante laitheite khut tungah gimna tampi a thuak khit ciangin, thahna zong thuak ding a; ni thum ni-in a thokik ding hi, ci-in tua huna kipanin a nungzuite kiangah a pulak hi.
Tua lai takin Piter in Zeisu sam sim a, “Topa aw, hih thu bangin piangsak kei ta in! Hih thu in nangma tungah a tung kei ding hi,” ci-in seel ding a kipat ciangin,
Zeisu kihei a, “Satan aw, ka nungah kinkhia in. Nang in keima suih khak nading na hi hi. Nang in Pasian thu na ngaihsun kei hi; mite thu bek na ngaihsun hi,” ci-in Piter a taai hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Mi khatpeuh in kei hong zuih nop leh, a pumpi nial a, ama singlamteh pua-in hong zui ta hen.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ama nuntakna a gum nuamte in a nuntakna a mangthangsak ding hi. Kei hangin a nuntakna a mangsakte in nuntakna a ngah kik ding hi.
Mi khat in leitung khempeuh a ngah hangin ama nuntakna mangthang leh, bang phattuamna ngah ding ahi hiam? Mi khat in ama nuntakna bang sum tawh lei kik thei ding ahi hiam?
Mihing Tapa in, a Pa vangliatna nei-in, vantungmite tawh hong paikhawm ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh a gamtatna ciat uh bangin a thuksak ding hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, Mihing Tapa, ama Gam sungah hong pai kik, hih san takah a ding mi kimkhat in a muh matengun a si kei ding uh hi,” ci-in a nungzuite kiangah a gen hi.
Ni guk khit ciangin Zeisu in Piter, Jakob leh a nau Johan-te samin, mualsang tungah, gam daihna munah paipih a,
amaute mai-ah a meel kilamdang a, a maitang ni bang tang a, a puan in khuavak tawh kibangin a ngo hi.
Amau kiangah Moses leh Elijah kilang a, Zeisu tawh a kiho uh hi.
Tua lai takin Piter in, “Topa aw, hih lai takah kote kong om uh a hoih hi. Nang ading buk khat, Moses ading buk khat, Elijah ading buk khat, buk thum ka hong lam ding na ut hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
A dot lai takin meii ngo khat in amau tuam a, “Hihpa in, ka lung hong damsak ka it ka Tapa ahi hi. Ama thu na ngai ta un,” ci-in meii lakah aw khat a ging hi.
A nungzuite in tua thu a zak uh ciangin lau mahmahin a bok uh hi.
Zeisu hong pai a, a khutin lawng a, “Tho un, lau kei un,” a cih ciangin
amaute a khuadak uh leh, Zeisu longal kuamah dang a mu kei uh hi.
Amaute mualtung pan a kumsuk lai takun Zeisu in, “Mihing Tapa in sihna pan a thawhkik matengin, tua mangmuhna thu kuamah kiangah na gen kei un,” ci-in a nungzuite a kham hi.
A nungzuite in, “Elijah hong pai masa ding hi,’ ci-in laitheite in bang hangin a gen uh hiam?” ci-in a dot uh leh
Zeisu in, “Elijah hong pai takpi ding a, na khempeuh a bawl kik ding hi.

Ke’n kong cih-inah Elijah hong tung zo a, mite in amah a theih loh manun, ama tungah ahih nop bangun ahih zo uh hi. Tua mah bangin Mihing Tapa in zong tua mite khut tungah a thuak ding hi,” a cih ciangin,
Baptaizpa Johan a cihna ahih lam a nungzuite in a thei uh hi.
Mihonpi omna-ah a tun’ uh ciangin mi khat in, Zeisu kiangah va nai-in khukdin’ a,
“Topa aw, ka tapa hong hehpihsak in. Amah in sibup natna vei-in a gim mahmah hi. Meikhuk sung leh tui sungah, tam veipi a puk ngei zo hi.
Na nungzuite kiangah ka paipih hangin, amau in a damsak zo kei uh hi,” ci-in a ko hi.
Zeisu in, “Upna nei lo, a lungkhauh pawlte aw, kei note tawh bang tan vei omkhawm ding ka hi hiam? Note bang tan vei hong thuak zo ding ka hi hiam? Tua naupang ka kiangah hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in tua dawi a taai ciangin, naupang sung pan paikhia a, tua hun akipanin naupang a dam hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite in gamdaihna mun, Zeisu kiangah va nai uh a, “Kote in tua dawi bang hangin hawlkhia zo lo ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot uh leh,
Zeisu in, “Na upna uh a neu hang hi. Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, note in ankamtang khat cia bang upna nei le-uh teh hih mual kiangah, “Kinkhia in,’ na cih uh leh, kikhin ding hi.
Note in upna nei le-uh teh, bawl zawh loh na khat beek na nei kei ding uh hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
Galile gamah a om lai takun Zeisu in, “Mihing Tapa mite khut tungah a kipia ding hi.
Tua mite in amah a that ding uh hi. Ni thum ni-in a thokik ding hi,” ci-in a nungzuite a hilh ciangin, amaute a dah mahmah uh hi.
Kapernaum khua-ah a tun’ ciangin, biakna innpi siahdongte Piter kiangah pai uh a, “Na Siapa in biakna innpi siah hamu liau lo ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin,

Piter in “A liau hi,” a ci hi. Piter inn sungah a tum ciangin Zeisu in, “Simon aw, nang bangci ngaihsut na hi hiam? Leitung kumpite in kua kiangah phiangsiah a dong uh hiam? Amau tate tungah a dong uh hiam? Midangte tungah a dong uh hiam? ci-in a dot leh,
Piter in, “Midangte tungah dong ahi uh hi,” a ci hi. Zeisu in, “Tua bang ahih leh, a tate a peng uh hi.

Ahih hangin, tua mite in eite’ hangin a puk loh nadingun, tuili-ah pai in la, nga thang va siah in. Nga na mat masak la in la, a kam na phen ciangin peekkhat na mu ding hi. Tua dangka la in la, kei ading leh nang adingin siahdongte na pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin a nungzuite in Zeisu kiangah va nai uh a, “Vantung Gam sungah kua a lian bel ding hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Zeisu in naupang khat samin, amaute laizang ah a koih khit ciangin,
“Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah na kikheel uh a, hih naupangno bang na suah kei uh leh, Vantung Gam sungah na tum zo kei ding uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, naupang mah bangin lungsim a kiniamsakte in, Vantung Gam sungah a lianbel ahi ding hi.
Keima min hangah hih bang naupangno khat a ngai peuhmah in kei zong hong ngai hi.”
“Kei hong um hih naupang khat a puksak mi peuhmah in, a ngawng ah an gawina suang lian khat khih-in, tuipi thuk sungah a tumcip leh, amah ading a hoihzaw ding hi.”
“Puk nading om ahih ciangin, leitung mite in gimna a thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, puk nading thu a om hi. Ahih hangin, a puksakpa in gimna a thuak ding hi.

Na khut ahi zongin, na khe ahi zongin, hong puksak leh, na khut na khe sattan in la, paii in. Khut leh khe kim nei-in tawntung meikuang sungah khulna na thuak sangin, khut bui, khe bui, a poi sa-in nuntakna sungah na tum leh, nang ading a hoihzaw ding hi.
Na mittang in hong puksak leh, khelkhia in la, paai in. Na mittang kim nei-in meikuang sungah khulna na thuak sangin, mittang khat guak tawh nuntakna sungah na tum leh, nang ading a hoihzaw ding hi.”
“Note in hih naupangte khatpeuh mah na simmawh loh nadingun na kikeem un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh, amau’ vantung mite in, vantungah a om ka Pa’ maitang a mu niloh uh hi, ka ci hi. (Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh Mihing Tapa in a mangthang mite gumkhia dingin hong pai ahi hi).
Bangci na lungngai uh hiam? Tuu zakhat a neipa in, a tuu khat mangthang leh, tuu sawmkua-le-kua nusia a, mualtungah a mangthang tuu khat zong thei hilo ahi hiam?
A muh leh, a mangthang lo tuu sawmkua leh kuate sangin, a mang tuu pen tungah a lungdam zaw hi, aman takpi-in kong ci hi.
Tua mah bangin vantungah a om na Pa un, tua naupangte khat a kisiat nading a ut kei hi.”
“Na u na nau in na tungah hong khialh leh, ama kiangah pai in la, no gel bek omin ama mawhna pulakin thu hilh in. Amah in na thu hong man’ leh, na u na nau na ngah zo hi.
Nangma thu hong man’ nop kei leh, teci nih bang thum bang kampauna tawh thu khempeuh a kip theih nadingin, midang nih bang thum bang samin paipih in.
Amah in tua mite’ thu a man’ nop kei leh, pawlpite kiangah na ko in. Pawlpite’ thu a man’ kei leh, amah Gentail leh siahdongte bangin na ngaihsun in.”
“Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, leitungah na hen peuhmah, vantungah a kihen ding hi. Leitungah na phel peuhmah vantungah a kiphel ding hi.
Khatvei kong gen kikinah, leitungah note nih kithutuak a, thu na nget uh leh, na nget khempeuh vantung khua-ah a om ka Pa in hong pia ding hi.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, nih bang thum bang ka min tawh a kikhop uh ciangin, amau laizangah ka om hi,” ci-in Zeisu in a gen hi.
Tua khit ciangin Piter in va nai a, “Topa aw, ka u ka nau in kei tungah hong khial leh, ama mawhna bangzah vei ka maisak ding hiam? Sagih vei dongin ka maisak ding hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin
Zeisu in, “Sagih vei dong maisak in kong ci kei hi. Sawm sagih mun sagih vei dongin maisak in kong ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, Vantung Gam in ama nasemte ciamtehna lai a en nuam kumpipa khat tawh kibang hi.
A ciamtehna lai a et lai takin, talen tulsawm a ba nasempa khat a mai-ah hong paipih uh hi.
Tua pa in a leiba loh nading nei lo ahih ciangin, ‘Amah a kipan, a zite, a tate, a sum khempeuh zuakin a leiba hong loh ta hen,’ a topa in a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, tua nasempa in a mai-ah bokin, ‘Topa aw, kei hong hehpih in la, na ngak lai in, ka leiba khempeuh kong loh ding hi,’ a cih leh,
a topa in hehpih a, a leiba khempeuh maisakin a khah hi.
Ahih hangin, tua nasempa paikhia a, ama dangka zakhat a ba, ama lawmpa’ nasem khat a muh ciangin a gawl meekin, ‘Na leiba hong loh in,’ a ci hi.
Tua nasempa bokin, ‘Kei hong hehpih in la, na ngak lai in, ka leiba khempeuh kong loh ding hi,’ ci-in a thuum hangin,
sum neipa in hehpih nuam lo a, a leiba khempeuh a loh khit matengin thong sungah a khum hi.
Tua thu adang nasemte in a theih uh ciangin, a dah uh a, a gamtatna thu khempeuh a topa uh kiangah ko uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a topa un leibapa sam a, ‘Gilo nasempa aw, nang in kei kiangah nong thuum ciangin, na leiba khempeuh kong maisak hi.
Kei in nang ka hong hehpih bangin, nang zong tua na lawmpa hehpih thei lo na hi hiam?’ ci-in heh mahmah a,
a leiba a loh khit matengin mi bawlsiate’ khut sungah a pia hi.
Note in zong na u na nau uh’ khialhna na lungsim panun maisak kei le-uh teh, vantung khua-ah a om ka Pa in tua kumpipa mah bangin, note khempeuh tungah hong bawl ding hi.” a ci hi.
Tua thu Zeisu in a hilh khit ciangin, Galile gam panin pai a, Judah gam Jordan gun gal khatah a tung hi.
Mi tampite in a nung zui uh a, tua munah cinate a damsak hi.
Farisaite in a kiangah va nai uh a, “Thu khempeuh hangin zi a mak tuak hiam?” ci-in a ze-et nadingin a dot uh ciangin,
Zeisu in, “A piangsakpa in a kipat cilin, numei leh pasal a piangsak hi.
‘Tua ahih ciangin pasal in a nu a pa nusia-in, a zi a bel ding hi. Tua nihte in sakhat, pumkhat a suak ding uh hi,’ a cihna thu Lai Siangtho sungah sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in nih hi lo, khat bek ahi uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in a gawm khawmsate mite in kikhensak kei uh hen,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Tua bang ahih leh, kikhenna lai pia-in, a zi ma hen,’ ci-in Moses in bang hangin thu a pia hiam?” ci-a a dot uh ciangin,
Zeisu in, “Note na lungsim uh khauh lua ahih ciangin, a zi a mak theih nadingin Moses in thu a pia hi. Ahih hangin a kipat cilin tua bang ahi kei hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, adang pasal tawh a mawh longal, thu dang hangah ama zi ma a, numei dang tawh a kiteengte in angkawm ahi uh hi. A maksa numei a teen’pihte in mi’zi tawh a mawh hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in, “Nupate thu in hih bang ahih leh, kiteeng kei leeng a pha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Hih thu mi khempeuh in mang zo lo ding uh hi.
A nu sung pan geh bang mi a om hi. Midangte in a geh bang a om hi. Vantung Gam hangah geh bang a suak zong om hi. Hih thu a mang zote in na mang ta un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin naupangte tungah a khut nga a, thu a ngetsak nading deihin, Zeisu kiangah paipih uh a, a nungzuite in a kham uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Naupangte omsak ta un. Ka kiangah hong pai ding uh kham kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Vantung Gam in tua bangte gam ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Naupangte tungah a khut a ngak khit ciangin, tua mun panin a paikhia hi.
Tua lai takin mi khat in Zeisu kiangah va nai a, “Sia aw, nuntak tawntungna ka ngah nadingin, a pha bang ka bawl ding hiam?” ci-a a dot ciangin,
Zeisu in, “Bang hangin kei kiangah phatna thu hong dong na hi hiam? Mipha khat bek a om hi. Ahih hangin nuntakna sungah na tum nop leh, thukhamte na tang in,” a ci hi.
Tangvalpa in, “Bang thukhamte tang ding ka hi hiam?” a cih kik ciangin Jeus in, “Mi na that kei in. Mi’ zi tawh na mawh kei in. Mi’ sum na gu kei in. A hi lo teci na pang kei in.
Na nu leh na pa zahtak in. Na pumpi na it bangin na lawmte zong na it in,” a ci hi.
Tua tangvalpa in, “Tua thu khempeuh ka tang zo hi. Bang sam lai ka hi hiam?” a cih kik ciangin,
Zeisu in, “Nang a siangtho nuam na hih leh, pai in la, na neihsa teng zuakin mizawngte na pia in. Tua ahih leh, vantung gam sungah sum na nei ding hi. Tua khit ciangin ka nung hong zui in,” a ci hi.
Tua tangvalpa in tua thu a zak ciangin lungkim loin a paikhia hi. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, sum tampi a nei hi.
Zeisu in, “Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, sumhaute in Vantung Gam sung lut nading a haksa mahmah hi.
Khatvei kong cih kikinah, sai khat in phim bil vangah a khumhak sangin, sumhau mite in Pasian’ Gam sungah lut nading a haksa zaw hi,” ci-in a nungzuite kiangah a gen hi.
A nungzuite in tua thu a zak uh ciangin, lamdang mahmah a sa uh hi. “Tua bang ahih leh, kua in gupna ngah zo ding hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute enin, “Hih thu mite in ahih zo kei uh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in na khempeuh ahih thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin Piter in, “Kote in ka neihsa khempeuh uh nusia-in, nangmah ka hong zui uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang ka ngah ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.

Zeisu in, “Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, na khempeuh a thak kibawl kik a, Mihing Tapa in vangliatna tokhom tungah a tut ciangin ka nung hong zui note in thukhen tokhom sawm leh nih tungah tu-in, Israel mipawl sawm leh nihte tungah thu na khen ding uh hi.
Kei min hangin a inn, a sanggampa, a sanggamnu, a nu a pa, a tate, tua teng a nusiate khempeuh in a zah zakhat ngah a, nuntak tawntungna a luah ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin, a masate tampi in a nunung ding uh hi. A nunung tampite in a masa ding uh hi.”
“Vantung Gam in leenggah lo sungah nasem dingte cial dingin zingsanga a kuankhia inn teekpa tawh kibang hi.
Amah in, ‘Ni khatin peek khat hong pia ning, ci-in nasem dingte tawh a kiciam khit uh ciangin, leenggah lo-ah a sawl hi.
Nai kua ciangin kuankhia leuleu a, midang kimkhat nasem loin sumbuk ah a ding mawkte a muh ciangin,
‘Note zong ka leenggah lo-ah va pai un. A kituak zah ka hong pia ding hi,’ ci-a tua mite a kuan uh hi.
Sun lai tak khatvei, nitak nai thum ciangin khatvei pai kik a, ahih ngei bangin ahih hi.
Nitak nai nga ciangin kuankhia leuleu a, midang nasem lo-a ding a muh ciangin, ‘Note in ni khat tawntung nasem loin bang hangin hih lai-ah ding-in na om uh hiam,’ ci-a a dot ciangin,
tua mite in, ‘Kote kuamah in hong cial lo hi,’ a cih uh ciangin, ‘Tua ahih leh, no zong ka leenggah lo-ah pai un,’ a ci hi.
Nitak ciangin, leenggah lo neipa in, ‘Nasemte samin a tum nunungpen pan a kipanin, a tum masate dongin thaman na pia in,’ ci-in, sumkeempa kiangah thu a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, nitak nai nga lai takin a cialte in hong pai uh a, peekkhat tek a ngah uh hi.
A tum masate in ‘Eite in a tamzaw i ngah kha ding hi,’ ci-a a ki-upmawh uh hangin, peek khat tek mah a ngah uh hi.
Amaute in a ngah khit uh ciangin, inn teekpa a gensia uh hi.
‘A tum nunungte in nai khat bek na a sem uh hi. Sun nilohin nakpi na sem a, nisa thuak kote tawh hong kibangsak hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Inn teekpa in tuate khat kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, nangma tungah ka khial kei hi. Note in kei tawh dangka peek khat piak ding i kiciamna mang hilo na hi uh hiam?
Na sum uh la un la, pai un. A tum nunungte note tawh a kikim ka pia nuam hi.
Ka sumte ka ut bangin zang thei lo ka hi hiam? Ahih kei leh, kei mipha ka hih ciangin, hong mudah na hi uh hiam?’ a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin, a nunungte in a masa ding uh hi. A masate in a nunung ding uh hi,” ci-in a hilh hi.
Zeisu Jerusalem khuapi-ah a pai lai takin, a nungzui Sawm-le-nihte gam daihna-ah sam a,
“Eite Jerusalem khuapi ah i pai ding hi. Mihing Tapa in siampi liante leh laitheite khut tungah a kipia ding hi.
Amaute in amah a sih nading thu a khen khit uh ciangin, zahko-in sat uh a, singlamteh tungah thah dingin Gentailte’ khut tungah a pia ding uh hi. Ni thum ni-in a thokik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin Zebedi’ tapate, a nu leh a tate tawh Zeisu kiangah paikhawm uh a, thu khat a ngen uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Bang deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Topa na Gam sungah ka tapate, na taklam khat, na veilam khat a tut theih nadingun thu hong pia in,” ci-in a ngen uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Note in na hong ngetna uh na thei kei uh hi. Ka dawn ding hai dawn zo ding na hi uh hiam?” a cih ciangin, “Ka dawn zo ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Ka dawn ding hai na dawn takpi ding uh hi. Ahih hangin, ka taklam leh veilam ah tut nading, ke’n thu ka hong pia thei kei hi. Ka Pa in ngah dinga a bawlsate in a ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzui sawmte in a zak uh ciangin, tua unaute gel tungah a heh uh hi.
Zeisu in a nungzuite sam a, “Gentailte a hausate in amau tungah a mang uh a, miliante in amaute a uk uh note in na thei uh hi.
Note laka tua bang ahi kei hi. Note laka milian a suak nuamte in nomau’ na sem uh hen.
Note lakah makai a suak nuamte in note sila suak uh hen.
Tua mah bangin, Mihing Tapa in midangte na sem sak dingin hong pai ahi kei hi. Midangte’ na sem ding a, mi tampi tankhia ding leh, a nuntakna pia dingin a hong pai hi,” a ci hi.
Jerikho khuapi pan a paikhiat lai takun, mi tampi in Zeisu nung a zui uh hi.
Zeisu hong pai thu a zak uh ciangin, lam gei-ah a tu mittaw nih in, “David’ Tapa Topa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Mihonpite in a tawp nadingun tuate a taai uh hangin, “David’ Tapa aw, kote hong hehpih in,” ci-in a kiko sawnsawn uh hi.
Zeisu ding-in mittawte sam a, “Note ading bang kong bawl ding deih na hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin,
“Topa aw, ka mittang uh hong vaksak leteh ka ut uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in hehpihhuai sa a, amau’ mittang a khut tawh a lawn’ ciangin, thakhatin amau in khua mu thei uh a, a nung a zui pah uh hi.
Amaute in Jerusalem khuapi a naih uh a, Oliv Mual tungah a om Bethfage khua-ah a tun’ uh ciangin, Zeisu in a nungzuite nih sawl a,
“Na mai-uh ah a om khua-ah pai un. Tua khua-ah khau khihsa a om, la nuta thakhatin na mu ding uh hi. La khau sut un la, ka kiangah hong paipih ta un.
Mi khatpeuh in na kiang uhah thu khat peuhmah hong gen leh, ‘Topa in a deih hi,’ ci le-uh teh amau in thakhatin hong khah ding uh hi,” ci-in a vaikhak hi.
Tua bang hihna in, Pasian in a kamsangpa tungah a genkholhsa bang a tun’ nading ahi hi. A genna in:
“En in, na Kumpipa, lungsimniam tawh, Lapi’ ta lano leh la tungah tuangin, Na kiangah hong pai ding hi,’ ci-in, Zion’ tanu kiangah na gen ding hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
A nungzuite in Zeisu’ vaikhak bangin a pai uh a,
la nuta hong paipih uh a, a tung uhah amau puante a phah khit uh ciangin, Topa a tuang sak uh hi.
Mihonpite in lampi-ah amau puante a phah uh hi. Adangte in singhiang satin lampi-ah a phah uh hi.
A mai pai, a nung a zui mihonpite in, “David’ Tapa tungah Hosanna! Pasian’ min tawh hong paipa in thupha ngah ta hen! Van a sangbelna-ah Hosanna!” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Jerusalem khuapi a tun ciangin, khua zangpi-in kising hehu uh a, “Hihpa in kua mi ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh leh,
mihonte in, “Hihpa in Galile gam Nazareth khua kamsangpa Zeisu hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in Pasian biakna innpi sungah a lut ciangin, biakna innpi sungah sumzuakte leh sumleite khempeuh hawlkhia in, dangka kheekte’ sabuaite leh vakhu zuakte’ tutphahte sawnthal sak a,
“Ka inn in thungetna inn a kici ding hi,’ ci-in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh hangin, note in guta buluhte omna na piangsak tazen uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin, mittawte leh khe-baite, biakna innpi sungah Topa kiangah a pai uh ciangin amaute a damsak hi.
Nalamdangte a bawl leh, naupangnote in, “David’ Tapa tungah Hosanna!” ci-in biakna innpi sungah kiko uh siampi liante leh laitheite in a zak uh ciangin, a heh uh hi.

“Hih naupangte in bang thu a gen uh cih na za hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin Zeisu in, “Ka za hi. ‘Naupangte leh nawi nete kam sung pan Nang in minphatna na piangsak hi,’ a cihna thu, note in khatvei beek sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin, amaute paisanin khua sung pan paikhia a, Bethani khua tungin tua san takah a giak hi.
Zing ciangin khuapi sungah a pai kik lai takin, Zeisu a gil kial hi.
Lampi geiah theikung khat a muh ciangin a kiangah a va pai leh, a teh longal bangmah a mu kei hi. Zeisu in, “Tu-a kipan gah loin om tawntung in,” a cih ciangin theikung dinggaw pah hi.
A nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin, “Hih theikung thakhatin a dinggaw hi,” ci-in lamdang a sa uh hi.

Zeisu in, “Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, note in um khial loin upna taktak na neih uh leh, hih theikung tungah ka hih bangin na bawl thei uh tham loin, hih mual kiangah, ‘Na omna pan na kinkhia in la, tuipi sungah na kipaai in,’ ci le-uh teh na cih uh mah bangin a piang ding hi.
Upna tawh thu na nget uh leh, na nget khempeuh uh na ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu biakna innpi-ah lut a, thu a hilh lai takin siampi liante leh upate a kiangah pai uh a, “Hih nate bang thuneihna tawh bawl na hi hiam? Hih thu kua in hong pia ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot uh ciangin,
Zeisu in zong, “Note ke’n kam khat kong dong ding hi. Na hong dawn’ theih uh leh, hih nate kua thu tawh ka bawl kong gen ding hi.

Johan’ baptaizna thu in koi panin hong piang ahi hiam? Vantung pan hong piang ahi hiam? Mi tung pan hong piang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Vantung pan hong pai hi,” ci leeng, ‘Note in ama thu bang hangin um lo na hi uh hiam?” ci-in hong dong zel ding hi.
“Mi tung pan hong piang hi,’ ci leeng, mite i kihta hi. Bang hang hiam i cih leh mi khempeuh in Johan kamsangpa a sa uh hi,” ci-in khat leh khat a kikup khit uh ciangin,
“Ka thei kei uh hi,” ci-a a gen uh ciangin Zeisu in, “Tua mah bangin hih nate kua thu tawh ka bawl, kong gen kei ding hi.”
“Note in bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam? Mi khat in tapa nih a nei hi. Tua pa a ta lianpen kiangah pai a, ‘Ka ta aw, tuni-in ka leenggah lo-ah kuanin va sem in,’ a cih ciangin,
a ta upa bel in, ‘Kei kuan kei ning,’ a cih hangin, a nung ciangin kisikkik a, a kuan hi.
A pa a tapa neu kiangah pai a, a sawl masak bangin a sawl kik ciangin, a ta in, ‘Va kuan ning, pa aw,’ a cih hangin a kuan kei hi.

Tua tate gel koi pen in a pa’ deihna banga ta ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin amaute in, “A tapa upa pen a ta hi,” a ci uh hi. Zeisu in, “Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, phiangsiah dongte leh numei gilote in Pasian Gam sungah note sangin a lut masa zaw ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh, Johan in thuman lam tawh na kiang uhah hong pai hangin, ama thu na um kei uh hi. Siahdongte leh numei gilote in ama thu a um uh hi. Note in tua thu na muh uh ciangin, Johan’ thu um dingin na kisik kei uh hi,” ci-in a gen hi.

“Adang thugentehna khat na ngai un: Inn neipa khat in lo lai-ah leenggah kungte suan a, gawlin a um khit ciangin, leenggah cil nading to a, tausang buk khat a lam khit ciangin, lo khote khawh lawhsakin khual a zin san hi.
A gah hun a tun’ dektak ciangin, a gah ngah dingin lo neipa in a nasemte, lo khawh lawhte kiangah a sawl hi.
Tua lo khawh lawhte in a nasemte a mat khit uh ciangin, khat sat, khat that, khat suang tawh a deeng uh hi.
Khatvei a masa sang a tam zaw nasemte a sawl kik ciangin, lo khawh lawhte in amasa bangin ahih zel uh hi.
A nunung pen ciangin lo neipa in, ‘Tua mite in ka tapa a zahtak ding uh hi,’ ci-in a tapa a sawl hi.
Ahih hangin, lo khawh lawhte in a tapa a muh uh ciangin, ‘Hihpa in a inn luah dingpa ahi hi. Hong pai un, amah thatin a sum luah ding teng eite in tang ni,’ ci-in khat leh khat a kikum uh hi.
Lo neipa’ tapa a mat khit uh ciangin leenggah lo nawlah paikhiatpihin a that uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, lo neipa a tun’ ciangin, lo khawh lawhte tungah bangci a bawl ding hiam?’ a ci hi.
‘Tua migilote sugawp ding a, a gah a tun’ ciangin a gah a pia ding lo kho dangte a khawh lawhsak ding hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.

Tua ciangin Zeisu in: “‘Inn lamte’n a nilkhiat suang in, A nung ciangin innkiu suang a piang hi. Tua thu Pasian in bawl a, Eite mai-ah a lamdang hi,’ a cihna Lai Siangtho sungah note in khatvei beek sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin, ke’n kong cih-inah Pasian Gam note kiang pan kilakhia ding a, tampi gah a gahsak thei mipawl dangte kipia ding hi.
Hih suang tungah a kiate in a kitan ding hi. A tungah hih suang kia a, a deen’ khak peuhmahte kizangawp ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua thugentehna Farisaite leh siampi liante in a zak uh ciangin, amau cihna a, a gen ahih lam a thei uh hi.
Amau in Zeisu mat dingin a zon’ uh hangin mihonpi a kihta uh hi. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, mi khempeuh in Topa in Pasian’ kamsangpa hi a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in mihonpite kiangah thugentehna a genkik inah:
“Vantung Gam in a tapa ading molakpawi a kham kumpipa tawh kibang hi.
Amah in a nasemte sawl a, a khohsate a sapsak hangin a hawh nuam kei uh hi.

Khatvei, adang nasemte sawl a, ‘Kei ka pawikham nading ka kisa khin zo hi. Ka bawng leh bawngno thaute kigo khin zo hi. Na khempeuh a baihsa-in a om hi. Mopina pawi sungah hong hawh ta un,’ ci-in ka khohsate va hilh kik un,’ ci-in a sawl hi.
Ahih hangin a sapte in thusim lo uh a, khat lo a kuan hi; khat sumzuakin a pai hi.
A om laite in a nasemte manin, bawlsia-in a that uh hi.
Kumpipa in a zak ciangin, heh mahmah a, a galkapte kuan sakin tua mi thatte khempeuh thatin a khua uh mei-in a halsak hi.
Tua laitakin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘Ka mopina pawi ding teng a baihsa-in a om hi. Ahih hangin ka sapsate a kilawm kei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lamka-ah pai un la, na muh khempeuh uh hong sam un,’ a ci hi.
A nasemte in lampi-ah paikhia uh a, a gi, a gilote, a muh khempeuh a kikhawmsak uh a, mopina pawi sungah mi a dim hi.
Kumpipa in a hawhte en dingin a lut ciangin, molakna puan silh lo-a om mi khat a mu hi.
‘Zawl aw, molakna puan silh loin, bang ding hong lut na hi hiam?’ ci-in a dot ciangin tua pa in a dawn’ nading a thei kei hi.
Tua laitakin kumpipa in, ‘Tua pa a khut leh a khe hen un la, pua lam khuamialna sungah na paaikhia un,’ ci-in a nasemte a sawl hi. Kahna leh hagawina a om ding hi.
A kisam mite a tam hangin, a kiteel mite a tawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua laitakin Farisaite paikhia uh a, “Bangci leeng Zeisu kam tawh i siah zo ding hiam” ci-in a kikup khit uh ciangin,
amau’ nungzuite leh Herod’ nungzuite, Zeisu kiangah sawlin, “Sia aw, nang in thutak genpa na hi hi. Kuamah na kihta kei a, mi maitang zahtak loin Pasian thu a tangtakin na hilh cih ka thei uh hi.
Tua bang ahih ciangin, Sia aw, bangci ngaihsut na hi hiam? Kaisar kumpipa siah piak tuak ahi hiam, piak tuak lo ahi hiam hong hilh in” ci-in a dongsak uh hi.
Zeisu in amaute gitlohna a theih ciangin, “Mi simtatte aw, bang hangin kei hong ze-et na hi uh hiam?
Phiangsiah dangka hong lak un,” a cih leh denarias peek khat hong paipih uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Hih kua min, kua lim ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin,
“Kaisar kumpipa lim leh min hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Kaisar kumpipa’ sum Kaisar kumpipa na pia un. Pasian’ sum Pasian na pia un,” a ci hi.
Amaute in tua thu a zak uh ciangin lamdangsa-in a kiang pan a paikhia uh hi.
“Misite’ thawhkikna om lo hi,” a ci Saddusite in,
tua ni-in Zeisu kiangah va pai uh a, “Topa aw, mi khat in ta nei loin a sih leh, ama zi a nau in luah hen la, a u’ khang a man’ loh nadingin kizom ta hen,’ ci-in Moses in thu a pia hi.
Kote lakah unau sagih a om uh hi. A upa pen in zi nei a, a si hi.
Ta a neih loh manin ama zi a nau tawh a nusia hi. Tua mah bangin a nihna leh a thumna a kipan a sagihna dongin ahi uh hi.
A nunung penin a numei zong a si hi.
Tua bang ahih leh, thawhkik ni ciangin tua numei in unau sagih lakah kua pen’ zi hi ding hiam? Bang hang hiam na cih leh, amaute a vekpi un tua numei tawh a kiteeng uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Note in Lai Siangtho ahi zongin, Pasian vangliatna ahi zongin thei lo na hih uh ciangin, na um khial uh hi.
Thawhkik ni ciangin kipina, kiteen’na om lo ding hi. Amaute in vantungmite tawh kibang ding uh hi.
Thawhkikna thu panin Pasian in,
‘Kei in Abraham’ Pasian, Isaak’ Pasian, Jakob’ Pasian ka hi hi,’ a cihna thu note in sim ngeilo na hi uh hiam? Pasian in a site’ Pasian hi lo, a nungtate’ Pasian ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Mihonte in tua thu a zak uh ciangin a thuhilhna lamdang a sa uh hi.
Saddusite kam Zeisu in a dongkhak, Farisaite in a zak uh ciangin kikhawm uh a,
amau laitheipa khat in Zeisu ze-et a,
“Sia aw, Thukhamnate lakah bang thukham lianbel ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin,
Zeisu in, “Na Topa Pasian na lungsim khempeuh, na kha khempeuh, na pilna khempeuh tawh na it in.
Hih thukham in a masapen leh a lianpen thukham ahi hi.
Na pumpi na it bangin na lawmte zong na it in, a cihna thukham nihna in tua a masa thukham tawh kibang hi.
Hih thukham nih in, Thukhamna khempeuh leh Pasian’ kamsangte thuhilhna khempeuh a meen’na bulpi hi,” a ci hi.
Farisaite a kikhop lai takun Zeisu in, “Note in Khazih kua hi ci-in na um uh hiam?
Kua ta hi na ci uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “David’ Tapa hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Tua ahih leh, David in Kha Siangtho tawh, ‘Topa hi,’ bangci-a ci thei ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
David cihna in: “Topa in, ‘Na galte na khe nuai-ah ka koih matengin, Ka ziat lamah na tu in,’ ci-in, ka Topa kiangah a ci hi,” ci-in David in a ci hi.
Tua mah bangin David in, ‘Khazih, Topa hi,’ ci ahih ciangin bangci-in ama ta hi thei ding ahi hiam?” ci-a a dot ciangin,
kuamah in kamkhat beek dawng kik thei lo a, tua ni a kipanin kuamah in thu a dong ngam kei uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin Zeisu in mihonpi leh a nungzuite thu a hilhinah,
“Farisaite leh laitheite in Moses’ tokhom tungah a tu uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, amau thukham khempeuh na zui un la, na tang un. Ahih hangin a gamtat uh bangin na ta kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, amaute in a hilh bangun a gamta kei uh hi.
A gik mahmah, a puak hak van guangin, midangte’ liangko tungah a suat uh hangin, a khutme nangawn uh tawh khin nuam lo uh hi.
Amaute gamtatna khempeuh, mi mai-ah a kilat nadingin ahih uh hi. Amaute in a taubuh leh baanbuh liansak uh a, a puan mong teepkai a sausak uh hi.
Pawikhamna sungah tutna phabel leh kikhopna inn sungah tokhom a sangbel a deih uh a,
sumbukah zahtakna tawh hopih ahi zongin, ‘Rabbi aw,’ cihna ahi zongin a deih uh hi.
Note in, ‘Rabbi,’ hong cih ding na ut kei un, Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na to uh khat bek a om hi. Note khempeuh in unau pawlkhat na hi uh hi.
Leitungah kuamah, ‘Pa,’ na ci kei un, Vantungah a om na Pa uh khat bek a om hi.
‘Topa,’ hong cih ding na deih kei un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Khazih ahi, na Topa uh khat bek a om hi.
Note lakah a lianpen in, na nasem uh ahi ding hi.
Ama pumpi a kilamsang peuhmah in niamkhiatna a thuak ding hi. A kiniamkhiat peuhmah a kilamsang ding hi.”
“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Vantung Gam kongkhak mi mai-ah na khak uh hi. No lah lut loin, a lut nuamte zong na kham uh hi.”
“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, meigongte’ neihsa teng na nektumsak uh a, kineihna tawh saupipi thu na ngen uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin thukhenna lauhuaizaw na thuak ding uh hi.

“A simtat Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, mi khat na nungzui uh na suahsak nadingun, lei lam leh tui lam na pai kawikawi uh a, na ngeina uh hong zuite, note mah bangin, a nihvei khang dongin hel khua’ ta na suaksak uh hi.”

“Lamhilh mittawte aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ‘Biakna innpi tawh thu kiciam peuhmah in, a ciamna a pelh leh phamawh lo hi. Biakna innpi’ kham tawh a kiciam peuhmah in, leiba a nei hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Mihai mittawte aw, koi lianpen ahi hiam? Kham in lianzaw ahi hiam? Tua kham a siangthosak biakna innpi lianzaw ahi hiam?
‘Biakna tau tawh a kiciam peuhmah in, a ciamna a pelh leh phamawh lo hi. Biakna tau tungah a om piakna tawh a kiciam peuhmah in leiba a nei hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Mittawte aw, koi pen lianzaw ahi hiam? Biakna tau lianzaw ahi hiam? Tua biakna tau a siangthosak piakna lianzaw ahi hiam?
Tua ahih ciangin, biakna tau tawh a kiciamte in biakna tau a kipan, biakna tau tungah a om khempeuh tawh a kiciam hi.
Biakna innpi tawh a kiciamte in biakna innpi ahi zongin, innpi sungah a teengpa tawh ahi zongin a kiciam hi.
Vantung gam tawh a kiciamte in, Pasian’ tokhom tungah a tu mipa tawh a kiciam hi.”

“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, leengmasel, anis leh, kummin, sehsawm suah sehkhat na piak uh hangin, thuman thukhenna, midangte hehpihna, gamtatna phate ahi Thukham sungah a lianpen thute na tang kei uh hi. Adangte sangin, hihte na tan’ ding uh a kilawm zaw hi.
Thuhilh mittawte aw, note in thovai om loh nadingin tui na khaih uh hangin, saipi na valh uh hi.”

“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, note in hai leh dalkuangte a pualam na silsiang uh hangin, a sung lamah han’ sanna leh huaihamnate a dim hi.
Mittaw Farisaite aw, hai leh dalkuang pualam a sian’ nadingin a sunglam sil siang masa un.”

“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, suangkangtui a kizut, han tawh kibang na hi uh hi. Tua hante a pualam a hoih uh hangin, a sungah misi guh leh kihhuaina khempeuh tawh a kidim hi.
Tua mah bangin note zong, na pualam uh mi mai-ah misiangtho bangin na om uh hi. Na sung lam uh simtatna leh gitlohna tawh na dim uh hi.”
“A simtat laitheite leh Farisaite aw, note in gimna na thuak ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian’ kamsangte’ han na bawl uh a, miphate’ han na zeem uh hi.
Note in, ‘Ka pute ka pate’ khanglai-in om le-ung Pasian’ kamsangte thahna-ah ka kihel kei ding uh hi,’ na ci uh hi.
Tua bang na hih uh ciangin, note in Pasian’ kamsangte a that mite’ tate na hi uh a, no langkhatah teci na pang uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, na pute na pate’ mawhna tehna seeng na dimsak un.
Mualtan’ suante aw, note in hel khua khiat ding thu tan’na bangci na suakta thei ding uh hiam?

Tua ahih ciangin, kamsangte, lungpilte, laitheite, na omna uhah kong sawl ding hi. Note in tuate kimkhat na that ding uh a, kimkhat singlamteh tungah na khai ding uh hi. Kimkhat na kikhopna inn sung uhah na sat ding uh a, khua khat pan khua khatah bawlsia-in na hawlkhia ding uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin, mipha Abel’ si pan akipan biakna innpi leh biakna tau kikal a, na thah uh, Barakhiah’ tapa Zekhariah’ si dongin leitungah a kibuasa miphate’ si khempeuh in, note tungah hong tung ding uh hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, hih thu khempeuh in hih khang mite tungah a tung ding uh hi.”

“Pasian’ kamsangte that a, na omna ah hong kisawlte zong suangtum tawh a deeng Jerusalem khuapi aw, akpi in a nongeekte a kha nuai-ah a khop bangin, na tate tamveipi ka khawm nuam zo a, nang na ut kei hi.
En un, na inn uh mi omlo gam simthamin kinusia ding hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, ‘Pasian min tawh hong paipa in thupha ngah ta hen,’ na cih matengun, tu-a kipan kei nong mu kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in biakna innpi pan a paikhiat lai takin, a nungzuite in biakna innpi lak dingin a kiangah va nai uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Hihte khempeuh mu hilo na hi uh hiam? Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, a kiphelkhia loin suang khat tungah suang kiciang khat beek a om kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua lai takin Zeisu in, Oliv Mual tungah tu-a a om lai takin a nungzuite in a kiangah va pai sim uh a, “Tua thute in cikciang a hong piang ding hiam? Topa, nong kum ding ahi zongin, leitung bei ding ahi zongin, bang limin hong kihil ding cih hong hilh in,” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Kuamah in hong khem zawh loh nadingin na kikem un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, mi tampi in, ‘Kei Khazih ka hi hi,’ ci-in keima min tawh hong pai-in mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.

Galdona thu leh galkap nading thu na za ding uh hi. Ahih hangin na lunghihmawh loh nadingun na kingaihsun un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, tua thu khempeuh a piang ding uh hi. Ahih hangin, a beina a tung nai kei ding hi.
Mi nam khat leh nam khat, gam khat leh gam khat hong kido ding uh hi. Mun khat khatah kial hong tung ding a, ziin hong liing ding hi.
Tuate khempeuh in gimna kipat cilna ahi hi.”
“Tua ciangin amaute in note hong bawlsiat nadingun hong pia ding uh a, hong that ding uh hi. Keima min hangin mi khempeuh in note hong mudah ding uh hi.
Tua lai takin mi tampi a puk ding uh a, khat leh khat a kiheek ding uh hi, khat leh khat a kimudah ding uh hi.
Kamsang zuautheite hong piang ding uh a, mi tampi a khem ding uh hi.
Gitlohna thu tam ding ahih manin, mi tampite’ ki-itna uh a kiam ding hi.
A bei dongin a kipte in gupna a ngah ding uh hi.
Mi namkimte tungah teci a pan’ nadingin leitung khempeuhah Lungdamna Thu kihilh ding hi. Tua khit ciangin beina a piang ding hi.”
“Tua ahih ciangin kamsangpa Daniel a hilh ngei bangin, a kisia thei kihhuaina in a siangtho munah ding-a a om note in na muh uh ciangin, (Lai Siangtho a sim theite in thei ta hen.)
Judah gamah a omte in mual tungah tai ta hen.
Innkhum tungah a omte in zong a inn sungah sum la dingin kumsuk kei hen.
Lo lai-ah a omte in zong puan la dingin ciahkik kei hen.
Tua lai takin naupai numeite leh naungeek nei numeite in gimna a thuak ding uh hi.
Na tai uh a hun ding in phalbi laitak leh, Nipi ni a, a hong tun’ loh nadingin thu na ngen un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, lei a pian’cil pan akipan tudongin a piang ngei lo, a nung ciang a piang nawn lo ding gimna lianpi tua lai takin a piang ding hi.
Tua nite a kitomsak kei leh kuamah suakta zo lo ding hi. Ahih hangin a teelsate adingin a kitomsak ding hi.
Tua lai takin mi khatpeuh in, ‘Hih lai-ah Khazih a om hi; hua lai-ah a om hi,’ hong cih leh um kei un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, zuauthu gen kamsangte leh Khazih zuautheite hong piang ding uh a, a teelsate nangawn a khem zawh leh a khem nadingun, lim leh nalamdang a liante hong lak ding uh hi.
En un, tua thu kong genkhol zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, amaute in, ‘Khazih gam lakah a om hi,’ hong cih uh hangin pai kei un. ‘Inndei sungah a om hi,’ hong cih uh hangin um kei un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, khuaphialep in nisuahna lam pan phia a, nitumna lam dongin a taang mah bangin, Mihing Tapa hong kumna a piang ding hi.
Sapul omna peuhah musanete hong kikhawm ding uh hi.”
“Tua gimna ni khit ciangin thakhatin ni hong mial ding a; kha a hong taang nawn kei ding hi; aksite hong kia ding uh a, vanah a om vangliatnate a kiliing ding uh hi.
Tua lai takin van panin Mihing Tapa’ lim a kilang ding hi. Leitung minam khempeuh a kap ding uh a; vangliatna leh minthan’na tawh, Mihing Tapa in meii tungah tuanga hong kumsuk a mu ding uh hi.
Amah in peengkul nakpi-in tumsak ding a; ama vantungmite sawlin, amaute in a teelsa mite, lei kiu li pan, van mong khat pan mong khat dongin a kikhawmsak ding uh hi.”
“Theikung kiangah thugentehna na sin un. Theikung a hiang meeng a, a teh a no ciangin khuakhal a nai zo ta hi,’ ci-in na thei uh hi.
Tua mah bangin ka gensa khempeuh na muh uh ciangin, Mihing Tapa kongbiang dongin hong nai zo hi, ci-in na thei ta un.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, hih khang mite a beima-in, hih thu khempeuh hong piang ding uh hi.
Van leh lei a mangthang ding hi; ka thu ahih leh a mangthang ngei kei ding hi.”
“Tua ni leh tua hun kuamah in thei lo hi. Vantungmite in thei lo uh hi. Mihing Tapa in zong thei lo hi. Pa khat bek in a thei hi.
Noah khan’ lai bangin Mihing Tapa hong kum ciangin hong piang ding hi.
Tuiciin a tun’ ma-inah, Noah teembaw sungah a lut ni dongin mite in an ne, tui dawnin, kipi, kiteengsakin a om uh hi.
Tuiciin a tun’ ciangin mi khempeuh a suksiat mateng, bangmah ngaihsun loin a om uh bangin, Mihing Tapa hong pai ciangin a om ding hi.
Tua tak ciangin, lo lai-ah a om mi nih in khat kila a, khat kinusia ding hi.
Angawi khawm numei nih in khat kila a, khat kinusia ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin ngak un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na Topa uh hong pai ding ni na thei kei uh hi.
Gutate hong pai ding hun inn neipa in theikhol leh, ama inn a suksiat loh nadingin a pang ding hi, ci-in na thei ta un.
Tua ahih ciangin note in zong kigingkhol un. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, na ngaihsut loh lai takun Mihing Tapa hong tung ding hi.”
“A topa in a hun a tun’ cianga a innkuanpihte annek tuidawn a hawmsak ding a koih, a diktat, a lungpil nasempa kua ahi hiam?
A topa hong ciah ciangin tua banga a om a muh nasempa in thupha a ngah ding hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, a topa in a sum khempeuh tua nasempa a uksak ding hi.
Ahi zongin nasem gilopa khat in, ‘Ka topa hong pai hak ding hi,’ ci-in a lungsim sungah ngaihsun a;
nasem dangte satgawp a, zukhamte tawh an ne, zu dawn khawm a,
khuadon lo leh a theih loh kalin a topa hong tung ding a;
tua nasempa vua-in misimtatte tawh a omkhawmsak ding hi. Kahna leh ha gawina a om ding hi.”
“Tua ahih ciangin Vantung Gam in zipipa dawn dingin, a meivak tawi kawma paikhia nungak sawm tawh kibang hi.
Tua nungak lakah nga a pil uh hi, nga pil lo uh hi.
A pil lo nungakte in meivak a tawi uh hangin namgimtui a pua kei uh hi.
A pilte ahih uh leh, meivak leh thawl sungah namgimtui a tawikhawm uh hi.
Zipipa a tun’ma kikalin tua nungakte a vekpi-un lusu-in a ihmu uh hi.
Zankim lai takin, ‘En un, zipipa hong pai zo hi. Dawn dingin hong paikhia un,’ ci-in a kiko ciangin;
tua nungakte tho-in a meivak ciat a bawl uh hi.
A pil lote in, ‘Ka meivak uh a mit zo hi. Na namgimtui uh hong hawm un,’ ci-in lungpilte kiangah a ngen uh hi.
A pilte in, ‘Kong piak uh leh, no ading leh ko ading namgimtui a kicing kei ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin, namgimtui zuakte kiangah va pai un la, no ading va lei le-uhcin a hoihzaw ding hi,’ a ci uh hi.
Amaute in namgimtui lei dingin a va pai lai takun, zipipa hong tung a; a baihsa a om nungakte tawh mopina pawi sungah a lut khawm khit uh ciangin, kong a khak uh hi.
Tua nung ciangin, namgimtui lei dinga pai nungakte hong pai uh a, ‘Topa aw, Topa aw, kote zong kong hong hon’ in,’ ci-in a ngen uh hi.
Topa in, ‘Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, note kong thei kei hi,’ a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, a ni ahi zongin, a hun ahi zongin, thei lo na hih uh ciangin ngak ta un.”
“Tua thu in mi khat gam dangah pai ning a cih lai takin a nasemte sam a, sum a keemsakpa tawh kibang hi.
Tua mi in a lungpilna uh tawh kituakin khat talen nga, khat talen nih, khat talen khat a piak khit ciangin a paikhia hi.
Talen nga a sangpa in a metbawl leh, adang amet talen nga a ngah hi.
Tua mah bangin talen nih sangpa in zong, adang amet talen nih mah a ngah hi.
Talen khat a sangpa in pai-in, lei a tawh khit ciangin a topa’ dangka a seel hi.
A sawtvei ciangin tua nasemte’ topa hong ciah a, amaute sum ciamtehna lai a en hi.
Talen nga a sangpa in va nai a, adang talen nga paipihin, ‘Topa aw, talen nga nong pia hi. En in, adang talen nga amet ka ngah hi,’ a ci hi.
A topa in, ‘Thuman, mi diktat nasempa aw, a pha hi. Nang thuneute tungah na diktat zo hi. Thu tampi nang kong uk sak ding hi. Na topa tawh lungdam khawm in,’ a ci hi.
Talen nih a sangpa in zong va nai a, ‘Topa aw, talen nih nong pia hi. En in, adang talen nih amet ka ngah zo hi,’ a ci hi.
A topa in, ‘Thuman, mi diktat nasempa aw, a pha hi. Nang thuneute tungah na diktat zo hi. Thu tampi nang kong uk sak ding hi. Na topa tawh lungdam khawm in,’ ci-in a gen hi.
Talen khat sangpa in zong va nai a, ‘Topa aw, nang mi haksa na hi a, na vawh lohna, na suan lohna munah na at hi; na pawi lohna munah na khopna ke’n ka theih ciangin,
kong kihta a, mun dangah pai-in na talen khat lei sungah ka seel hi. Tu-in na sum na la in,’ a ci hi.
A topa in, ‘Gilo, mi thadah nasempa aw, keimah in ka pawi lohna munah ka khawm hi, ci-in thei na hi hiam?
Ka dangka sumsinte pia leteh kong paikik ciangin, ka dangka teng leh amet ka ngahkhawm thei ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, talen khat ama khut sung pan lakhia un la, talen nga keempa pia un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, a neite khempeuh kipiak beh ding a, a hau ding hi. A nei lote kiang pan a neihsa nangawn kilakhia ding hi.
Na-a kimang lo nasempa khuamial pua lamah hawlkhia un,’ a ci hi. Kahna leh ha gawina a om ding hi.”
“Mihing Tapa in a minthan’na tawh, vantungmite tawh hong paikhop ciangin, minthan’na tokhom tungah hong tu ding hi.
A mai-ah mi namkim kikhawmsakin gancingpa in tuu leh keelte a tuam khen mah bangin, mi khempeuh a tuam tuakin hong kikhensak ding hi.
Tuute a ziatlam, keelte a veilam a koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin a ziatlamah a omte kiangah Kumpipa in, ‘Ka Pa kiangah hehpihna ngahte aw, leitung pian’cil akipan, note ading a kibawlkholsa Gamah hong pai un la hong luah un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ka gilkial lai takin nong vaak uh hi. Ka dangtak lai takin tui nong pia uh hi. Khualzin ka hih lai takin zin nong do uh hi.
Puan nei lo-a ka om lai takin puan nong silhsak uh hi. Cina-a ka om lai takin nong veh uh hi. Thong sungah ka om lai takin ka kiangah nong hawh uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Miphate in, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial lai takin cika hong mu a, an hong pia ka hi uh hiam? Na dangtak lai takin cika hong mu a, na dawn ding tui hong pia ka hi uh hiam?
Zin na hih lai takin cika hong mu a, zin hong do ka hi uh hiam? Puan na neih loh lai takin cika hong mu a, puan hong silhsak ka hi uh hiam?
Cina-a na om ahi zongin, thong sungah na om ahi zongin, cika hong mu a, na kiangah hong pai ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi.
Kumpipa in, ‘Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, note in ka sanggamte ahi hih mineupen khat tungah na bawl uh ciangin, kei tungah zong hong bawl na hi uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Tua ciangin, a veilamah a omte kiangah Kumpipa in, ‘Ciamsiatna a thuak mite aw, dawimangpa leh ama nungzuite ading a kibawl meikuang tawntung sungah kei kiang panin paikhia un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, ka gilkial lai takin nong vaak kei uh hi. Ka dangtak lai takin ka dawn ding tui nong pia kei uh hi.
Zin ka hih lai takin nong do kei uh hi. Puan nei loin ka om lai takin puan nong silhsak kei uh hi. Ka cinat laitak ahi zongin, thong sungah ka om laitak ahi zongin nong veh kei uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.

Amaute in, ‘Topa aw, na gilkial laitak, na dangtak lai tak, khualzin na hih lai tak, puan na neih loh lai tak, na ci nat lai tak, thong sungah na om lai takin cika hong mu a, hong keem hong khoi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ a ci ding uh hi.
Kumpipa in, ‘Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, hih mite laka a neupen khat tungah na bawl loh uh ciangin, kei tungah zong hong bawl lo na hi uh hi,’ a ci ding hi.
Tua mite in tawntung gimna thuak dingin a paikhia ding uh hi. Miphate ahih uh leh, nuntak tawntungna ngah dingin a paikhia ding uh hi,” ci-in thu a hilh hi.
Zeisu in tua thu khempeuh a hilh khit ciangin a nungzuite kiangah,
“Ni nih khit ciangin Paisan pawikhamna hong tung ding cih na thei uh hi. Tua lai takin Mihing Tapa in singlamteh tungah thah dingin kipia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin siampi liante leh upate in Kaiafas kici, siampi ukpa’ inn tualah kikhawm uh a,
Zeisu bangci kheembawlin, a mat khit uh ciangin thatlum thei ding ci-in a vaihawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin, “Mihonpi a gamlum khak ding a lau manunah pawikham laitak hih kei ni,” a ci uh hi.
Bethani khua-ah miphak Simon’ inn sungah Zeisu a om lai takin,
numei khat in a manpha mahmah paknamtui suangngo thawl khat a kiangah paipih a, Topa sabuaiah a tut lai takin, a lu tungah a buak hi.
A nungzuite in a muh uh ciangin heh uh a, “Bang dingin a mawkna-in a kizangsak hiam?
Tua paknamtui man tampi-in zuakin mizawngte a kipia thei hi,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in a theih ciangin, “Tua numei bang hangin bawlsia na hi uh hiam?
Amah in kei tungah thupha hong bawl zo hi. Mizawngte in no kiangah a om tawntung ding uh hi. Kei ka hih leh, no tawh omkhawm tawntung ding ka hi kei hi.
Hih paknamtui ka pum tungah a hong buakna in keima luang vui ding a hong bawl khol zo hi.
Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, hih Lungdamna Thuhilhna mun leitung khempeuhah hih numei a kiphawk nadingin ama hong bawlna thu kigen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua lai takin sawm-le-nihte laka Judas Iskariot in siampi liante kiangah va pai a,
“Kei in no khut sungah Zeisu kong piak leh, bangzahin nong guai ding uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, amau in dangka peek sawmthum ama ading a tawikhai uh hi.
Tua a kipan Judas in amaute khut sungah Topa a piak theih nading a zong hi.
Silngo om lo Khomun nek kipat ni-in, a nungzuite Zeisu kiangah va pai uh a, “Paisan pawi na nek theih nadingin koi lai tak hong bawlsak le-ung na deih hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Khua sungah hih bang mi khat kiangah pai un la, ‘Sia in, Ka hun a nai zo hi. Nangma innah ka nungzuite tawh Paisan pawi ka ne ding hi, ci-in hong vaikhak hi,’ va ci un,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite in Zeisu cih mah bangin ahih uh a, Paisan pawi nek nading a bawl khol uh hi.
Nitak ciangin Zeisu in a nungzuite Sawm-le-nih tawh sabuai ah an ne-in a tukhawm hi.
An a nek lai takun Zeisu in, “Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, note lakah khat in kei hong lehheek ding hi,” a ci hi.
A nungzuite dah mahmahin, “Topa aw, kei ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dong tek uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Kei tawh kuang sungah an ka sawk khawmpihpa in kei hong lehheek ding hi.

Mihing Tapa in Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh kholsa mah bangin a pai ding hi. Ahih hangin Mihing Tapa a lehheekpa in gimna a thuak ding hi. Tua mipa in a nu sung pan suak kei leh, amah ading a hoihzaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu a lehheekpa Judas in, “Topa, kei ka hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin Zeisu in, “Nang cih bang ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amau in an a nek lai takun Zeisu in khomun la a, hehpihna a phat khit ciangin khomun balnenin, “Hih khomun in ka pumpi ahi hi. La un la, ne un,” ci-in a nungzuite a pia hi.
Hai zong la a, hehpihna a phat khit ciangin amau pia a, “Note’n na vekpi-un dawn un.
Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, hih in mi tampite’ mawhna kimaisak nading a kibuasa, thuciamna thak ka sisan ahi hi.
Ke’n kong cih-inah, leenggahtui ka Pa’ Gam sungah no tawh ka dawn thak ni matengin, tu-a kipan ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in la a sak khit uh ciangin, Oliv Mualah a paikhia uh hi.

Tua lai takin Zeisu in, “Tuucingpa ka satlum a, tuu honpite a kithehthang ding uh hi,’ ci-a Lai Siangtho sungah a kigelh bangin note na vekpi-un kei hangin, tuzan ciangin na lungkia ding uh hi. Ahih hangin ka thawhkik khit ciangin note maiah Galile gamah ka pai ding hi,” a cih ciangin
32-33 Piter in, “Hih mi khempeuh in nang hangah a lungkia uh zongin keimah in ka lungkia ngei kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Ke’n aman takpi kong cih-inah, tuzan ak a khuan ma-in thumvei kei na hong nial ding hi,” a ci hi.
Piter in, “Nang tawh ka si khawm zongin, nangmah kong nial ngei kei ding hi,” a ci kik hi. A nungzuite khempeuh in zong tua mah bangin a ci uh hi.
Tua lai takin Zeisu in amaute tawh Gethsemane kici mun khatah a tun’ uh ciangin, “Keimah hua lam pai a, thu ka nget lai takin, hih lai takah na tu un,” ci-in a nungzuite kiangah a cih khit ciangin,
Piter leh Zebedi’ tate nih sam a, a lungdahna leh lungman’na a kipan hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Si dek takin ka dah hi. Hih san takah kei tawh ngak un,” ci-in thu a pia hi.

Zeisu mai lamah tomkha pai-in boksukin, “Ka Pa aw, hih hai in kei tawh a kipelh zawh leh, hong kipelhsak in. Ahih hangin keima deihna bang hi kei hen. Nangma deihna bang hi ta hen,” ci-in thu a ngen hi.
A nungzuite kiangah a pai kik leh, amaute ihmu a, om uh a muh ciangin, “Note in nai khat nangawn kei tawh ngakkhawm zo lo na hi uh hiam?
Kheemna tawh na kipelh theih nadingun thu ngen un la, ngak un. Lungsim a ut hangin pumpi a thazawng hi,” ci-in Piter kiangah a gen hi.
Nihveina va pai a, “Pa aw, hih hai kei dawn lohin kei tawh a kipelh theih kei leh, nangma deihna bangin hi ta hen,” ci-in thu a ngen kik hi.
A hong pai kik ciangin a nungzuite ihmu a, om uh a mu hi. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, a mit uh a kham hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, amaute omsak a, khatvei va pai kikin a masa-a a nget bangin thumveina thu a ngen hi.
A nungzuite kiangah pai kik a, “Tu-in nuam takin ihmu un. En un, Mihing Tapa in migilote’ khut sungah hong lehheek ding a hun hong tung zo hi.
Tho un, pai ni. Kei hong lehheekpa hong nai zo hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in a gen lai takin a nungzui sawm-le-nihte khat ahi Judas hong pai a, siampi liante leh upate’n a sawl mi honpite in, namsau leh molhtumte tawi-in amau tawh hong tonkhawm uh hi.
Zeisu lehheekpa in, “Ka nappa in Zeisu ahi hi. Tua pa na man un,” ci-in amaute kiangah a lim a hilhkhol hi.
Topa kiangah thakhatin va pai a, “Topa aw, nang na cidam ta in,” ci-in a nam hi.
Zeisu in, “Lawm aw, bawl dinga na hong paina thu na bawl in,” a cih ciangin amaute hong pai uh a, Zeisu a mat khit uh ciangin a kai uh hi.
Tua lai takin Zeisu a tonpihpa khat in a khut zan a, namsau a dawh khit ciangin siampi lian ukpa’ nasem khat a sat leh, a bil a satkhia hi.
Tua ciangin Zeisu in, “Na namsau a paai sungah siat kik in. Namsau tawite namsau-in a si ding hi.
Tu nangawnin ka Pa kiangah ngen leng vantungmi kuan sawm leh kuan nih sanga tamzaw ka kiangah hong sawl ding um lo na hi hiam?
Tua bang ahih leh, hih bang a piang ding hi, ci-a Lai Siangtho sungah a om bangci a tung ding hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua lai takin Zeisu in, “Note in galgu mat bangin kei man dingin namsau leh molhtum tawi-in hong pai na hi uh hiam? Keimah in nisimin biakna innpi sungah tu a, thu ka hilh lai takin na hong man kei uh hi.
Hih thute khempeuh in Pasian’ kamsangte’ gelhsa Lai Siangtho hong tun’ nading ahi hi,” ci-in mihonpite kiangah a gen hi. Tua ciangin, a nungzuite khempeuh in Topa a taisan uh hi.
Zeisu a mante in upate leh laitheite’ kikhopna, siampi ukpa Kaiafas’ innah a paipih uh hi.
Piter in siampi ukpa’ inntual dongin gamla sim a kihalin Zeisu zui a, hih thu a tawpna a theih nadingin inntualah lut a, palikte tawh a tukhawm hi.
Siampi liante leh upate in Zeisu thah nadingin thuzuau teci a zong uh hi.
Thuzuau teci pangte tampi hong pai uh hangin amah thah theih nading teci a mu zo kei uh hi. A nung ciangin thuzuau teci nih hong pai uh a,
“Hihpa in, ‘Keimah in Pasian biakna innpi ka susia ding a, ni thum khit ciangin ka lam kik zo ding hi,’ a ci hi,” ci-in teci a pang uh hi.
Siampi ukpa ding a, “Nang kam khat beek dawng kik lo na hi hiam? Hih mite in nangma lang khatah teci bangci-a pang uh hiam? ci-in Zeisu kiangah a cih leh,
Zeisu pau loin a om hi. Siampi ukpa in, “Nang, Pasian’ Tapa Khazih na hi hiam, na hi kei hiam kote kiangah nong gen nadingin a nungta tawntung Pasian min tawh ka hong sawl hi,” a ci hi.
Zeisu in, “Nang gen bangin ka hi hi. Tua tham loin, ke’n kong cih-inah, tunung ciangin Mihing Tapa in Vanglian Pa’ ziat lamah tu a, meii tungah hong tuangsuk note in na mu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua tak ciangin, Siampi ukpa in a puan balkeek a, “Hih mipa in Pasian tungah a pau khial zo hi. Adang bang teci deih lai i hi hiam? Pasian tungah ama paukhialhna thu na za zo uh hi.
Bangci ngaihsut na hi uh hiam? a ci hi. Amau in, “Hih mipa thahlup dingin a kilawm hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua lai takin amau in Zeisu’ maitang cil tawh phih uh a, khut tumin a tum uh hi. Kimkhat in khutpeek-in a beeng uh hi.
“Khazih aw, nang kua in hong beeng hiam? ci-in kamsangte bangin hong gen in,” a ci uh hi.
Piter inntualah a tut lai takin numei khat a kiangah pai a, “Galile mi Zeisu tawh na kipawl hi,” a cih ciangin
Piter in, “Nang na cih pen ka thei kei hi,” ci-in mi khempeuh mai-ah a nial hi.
Tua nung ciangin Piter inn liimah a paikhiat khit ciangin numei adang khat in mu a, tua munah a om mite kiangah “Hihpa zong Nazareth mi Zeisu tawh a kipawl hi,” a cih ciangin
Piter in, “Tua pa ke’n ka thei kei hi,” ci-in kiciamin a nial hi.
Tua nung a sawt nai loin tua munah a dingte in Piter kiangah hong pai uh a, “Hua mite khat na hi takpi hi. Na pau in hong kitheisak hi,” a cih uh ciangin
Piter in, “Tua pa ke’n ka thei kei hi,” ci-in hamsia tawh a kiciam khit phetin ak a khuang pah hi.
Piter in, “Ak khuan’ ma-in nang in thumvei nong nial ding hi,” Zeisu in a cihna thu a phawk ciangin pusuak a, nakpi-in a kap hi.
A zingsang ciangin siampi liante leh upate khempeuh in Zeisu thah dingin a vaihawm uh a;
khau tawh a hen khit uh ciangin Pilat mangpa kiangah a paipih uh hi.
Tua lai takin a lehheekpa Judas in, Zeisu a sih nadingin thu a kikhen a theih ciangin kisikkik a, dangka sawmthum siampite leh upate kiangah va pia kik a;
“Ka khial zo hi, mawh nei lo’ si kong pia kha zo hi,” a ci hi. Amau in, “Kote in bang hong kuppih thei ding ka hi uh hiam? Hih thu nangma thu hi ta hen,” a ci uh hi.
Judas in biakna innpi sungah dangka paai a, mun dangah a pai khit ciangin a awklum hi.
Siampite in dangka la uh a, “Si man sumpi kholna sungah koih ding kilawm lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
A vaihawm khit uh ciangin zinte vui nading beel seekpa’ lei khawk khat a lei uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tudongin tua lei in ‘Si Lei’ a kici hi.
Pasian in kamsangpa Jeremiah tungah, “Israel mite in a man a tansa mipa man dangka sawmthum a la uh a,
Pasian in kei kiangah a hong cih mah bangin, beel seekpa’ leikhawk khat a lei uh hi,” a cihna tua lai takin a tangtung hi.
Zeisu in mangpa mai-ah a din’ ciangin mangpa in, “Nang, Judah Kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot leh, Zeisu in, “Na cih mah bangin ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Siampi liante leh upate in amah a mawhsak uh ciangin, Zeisu in kamkhat beek a dawng kei hi.
Tua lai takin Pilat in, “Nang lang khatah hih zah tak teci pangte thu za lo na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin,
Zeisu in kamkhat beek a dawn’ kik loh mangpa in lamdang a sa mahmah hi.
Pawikham ciangin mangpa in mihonpite deih bangin, thong sungah a kikhum mi khat a khah khiat nading ngeina khat a om hi.
Tua lai takin Barabbas kici misuam minthang khat thong sungah a kikhum hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, mi a kikhop lai takun Pilat in, “Note in kua khah leng na ut uh hiam? Barabbas na ut uh hiam? Ahih kei leh, Khazih a kici Zeisu na ut uh hiam?” ci-in mite a dong hi.
Bang hanga hih bang dong ahi hiam i cih leh, amaute in Zeisu a een’ man-unah a piak uh a thei hi.

Pilat in thukhenna tokhom tungah a tut lai takin a zi in ama kiangah mi khat sawl a, “Tua miphapa tawh bangmah kikumin na hih kei in. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, tuni-in ka mang sungah tua pa hangin gimna nakpi-in ka thuak hi,” ci-in kam a khak hi.
Barabbas ngen a, Zeisu a siatsak nadingun siampi liante leh upate in mihonpi a hansuah uh hi.
Tua ciangin mangpa in, “Tua mi tegel kua pen khah leng na ut uh hiam?” ci-in a dot kik ciangin, “Barabbas khah in,” a ci uh hi.
Pilat in, “Tua ahih leh, Khazih kici Zeisu bang ka ci hih ding hiam?” ci-in a dot leh, mihonpite in, “Tuapa singlamteh tungah si ta hen,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
Pilat in, “Bang hang hiam? Amah in mawhna bang ta khial ahi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Singlamteh tungah sihna thuak ta hen,” ci-in mi khempeuh in nakpi-in a kiko semsem uh hi.

Pilat in kham zo lo tham loin mi’ gamlumna a khangto semsem a muh ciangin, tui la-in mihonpite maiah a khut silin, “Hih miphapa’ si tungah kei ka mawh kei hi. Hih thu note thu thu hi ta hen,” a ci hi.
Mi khempeuh in, “Ama si in ko tung leh ka tu ka tate tungah om tawntung ta hen,” a ci uh hi.
Pilat in amaute kiangah Barabbas khah a, Zeisu ahih leh, a satsak khit ciangin singlamteh tungah thah dingin a pia hi.
Tua lai takin mangpa’ galkapte in manginn tualah Zeisu paipih uh a, galkap khempeuh a kikhawmsak khit uh ciangin,
Zeisu puan suahkhia uh a, puansan khat a silhsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin ling tawh kigan lukhu a khusak uh a, pumpeeng khat a tak lamah a tawisak khit uh ciangin, ama maiah khukdin’in, “Judah kumpipa aw, nang na ci dam ta hen!” ci-in a zahko uh hi.
Zeisu cil tawh phih uh a, pumpeeng la-in a lutang a sat uh hi.
Tua bangin Zeisu a khelbawl khit uh ciangin puansan suahkhia uh a ama puan a silhsak kik khit uh ciangin, singlamteh tungah thah dingin a paipih uh hi.
A paikhiat lai takun a min Simon kici, Sairin mi khat mu uh a, zawhthawh bawlin Zeisu singlamteh pua dingin a zuisak uh hi.
“Lutang guh’cih nopna Golgotha kici mun a tun’ uh ciangin,
zatui kha tawh kihel leenggahtui a dawn dingin Zeisu a piak uh hangin, a ciap ciangin a dawn nuam kei hi.
Zeisu singlamteh tungah a khai khit uh ciangin lai aisaanin a puante a hawm uh a,
tua san takah tu-in a en uh hi.
‘HIH PA IN JUDAHTE’ KUMPIPA ZEISU HI,’ ci-in a mawhsakna lai a lu tungah a suang uh hi.
Tua lai takin Topa tawh misuamte nih, a veilam khat, a ziatlam khat singlamteh tungah a khaikhawm uh hi.
Lampi-ah a pai mite in, “Biakna innpi susia a ni thum sunga a lam kik theipa aw, nangma pumpi na kigum in.
Pasian’ Tapa na hih takpi leh, singlamteh tung pan hong kumkhia in,” ci-in a lu uh pei-in a zahko uh hi.
Tua mah bangin siampi liante, laitheite leh upate in,
“Hih mipa in midangte a gup theih hangin ama pumpi kigum zo lo hi. Israel Kumpipa ahih takpi leh, tu mahmahin singlamteh tung pan hong kumsuk ta hen. Hong kum leh, ka um ding uh hi.
Amah in Pasian a muang hi. Pasian in amah a deih leh, tu mahmahin amah hong gum ta hen. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, amah in, ‘Pasian’ Tapa ka hi hi,’ a ci hi,” ci-in a zahko uh hi.
Tua mah bangin singlamteh tungah Zeisu tawh kikhai khawm misuamte in zong a zahko uh hi.
Sun laitak nai sawm leh nai nih pan a kipan, nai thum dongin leitung khempeuhah khua mial hi.
Nai thum lai takin Zeisu in, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakthani,” ci-in nakpi-in a kiko hi. A khiatna in, “Ka Pasian, ka Pasian aw, bang dingin kei hong paisan na hi hiam?” a cihnopna hi.
Tua munah a ding mi kimkhat in a zak uh ciangin, “Amah in Elijah a sam hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amaute khat in thakhatin va tai a, tui hupna la-in tuithuk sungah a diah khit ciangin, pumpeeng dawnah suangin Zeisu tawp dingin a pia hi.
Midangte in, “Om dih ni, Elijah in amah gum dingin hong pai ding, hong pai lo ding en dih ni,” a ci uh hi.
Zeisu in khatvei nakpi-in a kiko kik khit ciangin a si hi.
Tua lai takin Pasian biakna innpi’ dalna puan a tung lam pan a nuai lam dongin phel nih kisuah hi. Ziin liinga suangpite zong a kitam hi.
Hante kihong a, a sisa misiangthote’ luang tampi hong tho kik uh a,
a thawhkik khit ciangin han sung pan a paikhia uh a, khua siangtho-ah a lut uh a, mi tampi maiah kilang uh hi.
Zeisu a cing galkap mangpa akipan amah tawh a omkhawmte in ziin liing a muh uh ciangin lau mahmah uh a, “Hih pa in Pasian’ Tapa taktak ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.
Galile gam ah Zeisu a vak lai-a a nung a zui numei tampite in zong a gamla panin a gal et uh hi.
Tua numeite lakah Magdala khua Mari leh Jakob leh Josef nu Mari leh Zebedi’ tate’ nute zong a om uh hi.
Nitak ciangin Arimathea khuami Zeisu’ thu zui, a min Josef kici sum haupa khat,
Pilat kiangah va pai a, Zeisu’ luang a ngen hi. Pilat in, “A luang pia un,” a ci hi.
Josef in Zeisu’ luang la a, a siangtho saihadial puan tawh a tun khit ciangin;
suang kikhuak ama han thak sungah sial a, han kong vangah suangpeek lian khat lik a, a khak khit ciangin a pai hi.
Magdala khua Mari leh a dang Mari-te han kongah tu-in a om uh hi.
Kigin-ni khit a zing ciangin, siampi liante leh Farisaite in Pilat mangpa kiangah kikhawm uh a,
“Topa aw, tua mi khempa in, ‘Ni thum ni-in ka thokik ding hi,’ ci-in a nun’tak lai-in a cih tu-in ka phawk uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ama nungzuite in zanin pai uh a, a luang a gukkhiat khit uh ciangin, ‘Amah in sihna panin thokik zo hi,’ ci-in mite kiangah gen le-uh khialhna masa sangin khialhna nunung a lianzaw ding hi, ci-in lunghihmawhna thu om ahih ciangin, han ni thum sung a kicin’ nading thu hong pia in,” ci-in a ngen uh hi.
Pilat in, “Note in micing pawlkhat na nei uh hi. Pai un la, na hih zawh zahun cingsak un,” a ci hi.
Tuate in micing pawlte tawh pai uh a, han khakna suang a ciamteh khit uh ciangin a cingte koihin han a bit tak-in a bawlsak uh hi.
Nipini khit ciangin, ni sagih lakah ni kipat ni, khua a vak pat lai takin Magdala khua Mari leh adang Mari-te in daihawh dingin a pai uh hi.
Tua lai takin lei nakpi-in a liing hi. Bang hang hiam i cih leh, Pasian’ vantungmi khat in vantung panin hong kumsuk a, han kong khakna suangpi a likkhiat khit ciangin a tungah a tu hi.
Ama meel in khuaphialep bang hi a, a puan zong vuuk bangin a paak hi.
Hancingte in zong vantungmi kihta-in liing uh a, misi tawh kibangin a sibup uh hi.
Vantungmi in, tua numeite kiangah, “Lau kei un; singlamteh tunga kithat, Zeisu na zon’ uh ke’n ka thei hi.
Hih lai takah om nawn lo hi. A hong hilhkholh bangin a thokik zo hi. Hong pai un la, Topa lupna hong en un.

Pai mengmeng un la, ‘Sihna pan thokik a, na mai uhah Galile gamah a pai ding hi. Tua san takah Topa na mu ding uh hi,’ ci-in a nungzuite kiangah na hilh un. Ke’n kong gen zo hi,” ci-in tua numeite a sawl hi.
Tua numeite in launa tawh, nuamna tawh han panin a nungzuite thu ko dingin a tai mengmeng uh hi.
Tua lai takin Zeisu in lampi-ah va dawn a, “Note na cidam ta un,” a cih ciangin numeite in va nai uh a, a khe lenin a bia uh hi.
Zeisu in, “Lau kei un, Pai un la, ka sanggamte kiangah, ‘Galile gamah na pai un. Tua san takah kei hong mu ding uh hi,’ a ci hi, ci-in va gen un,” a ci hi.
Tua numeite a pai lai takun hancingte kimkhat khua sungah lut uh a, thupiang khempeuh siampi liante a zasak uh hi.
Siampite leh upate kikhawm uh a, a vaihawm khit uh ciangin galkapte dangka tampi a pia uh a;
“Zan a, ka ihmut kal-un a nungzuite hong pai-in a luang hong gu uh hi,’ ci-in mite kiangah va gen un.
Hih thu mangpa in a theih leh, note hong mawhsak loh nading, mangpa a lungkim nadingin ka na genpih ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Galkapte in dangka sang uh a, thu a kihilh bangin a gen uh a; tua thu Judah mite lakah kizelin tudongin a um uh hi.
A nungzuite sawm-le-khat in Zeisu in a vaikhakna mualah a pai uh hi.
Topa tawh a kimuh uh ciangin a bia uh a, ahih hangin kimkhat in a um khial lai uh hi.
Zeisu in amau kiangah va pai a, “Vantungah ahi zongin, leitungah ahi zongin, vangliatna khempeuh kei hong kipia zo hi.
