Tua lai takin tuipi in a sungah a om mi site a puak hi, Sihna leh Sihna Gam in a sung uhah a om mi site a puak uh a, mi khempeuh in a gamtatnate bangin thukhenna a thuak uh hi.
Sihna leh Sihna Gam mei li sungah a kiasuk hi. Tua mei li in nihna sihna ahi hi.
Nuntakna laibu sungah a min om lo mi peuhmah tua mei li sungah a khiasuk hi.
Tua nung ciangin van thak leh lei thak ka mu hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, a masa van leh lei a mang uh hi. Tuipi zong om nawn lo hi.
Tua lai takin Jerusalem khua thak ahi Khuapi Siangtho in a pasal ading a kizeemsa-in a om, a kipi mo bangin kiging kholin Pasian kiang vantung pan hong kiasuk ka mu hi.

Kumpi tokhom sung pan zong, “En in, Pasian buk mite lakah om a, amah in amaute tawh a omkhawm ding hi. Amaute in zong Topa’ mipawlte suakin, Pasian mahmah in amaute tawh omkhawmin amaute Pasian ahi ding hi.

Amaute mittang uh pan khitui khempeuh a nul siang ding hi. Sihna zong a nung ciangin a om nawn kei ding hi. Tua tham loin, thuumna, kahna, natna zong a om kei ding hi. A masa nate mangthang khin zo uh hi,” ci-in nakpi-in aw tawh kiko ka za hi.
Tua nung ciangin tokhom tungah a tu mi in, “En in, na khempeuh ka bawl thak hi,” hong ci hi. Tua tham loin, “Gelh in Hih thute a dikin a man hi,” ci-in thu hong pia hi.
“Tua bangin a piang khin zo hi. Keimah in Alfa leh Omega, a kipatna leh a tawpna ka hi hi. Tuiduh mite nuntakna ciktui man nei loin ka pia ding hi.
A zo mi in hih nate luahin, kei in ama Pasian ka hi ding a, amah in ka ta ahi ding hi.

Lau-in a um lo mi, a kihhuai mi, mi that thei mi, nu leh pa mawhna a bawl mi, mi bum thei mi, milim bia mi, zuauthu gen mi khempeuh ahih uh leh, nihna sihna ahi kat leh mei lipi sungah a kituakin a thuak ding uh hi,” ci-in keima kiangah hong gen hi.

Tua lai takin a nunung bel gimna pawl sagih a omsa hai sagih a tawi vantungmi sagihte khat hong pai-in, kei kiangah, “Hih lai-ah hong pai in. Tuuno’ zi ahi mo kong lak ding hi,” hong cih khit ciangin,
Kha Siangtho tawh kei a sang mual lian dawnah hong paipih a, Pasian kiang vantung pan Pasian’ vangliatna pua-in hong kiasuk Jerusalem Khuapi Siangtho hong lak hi.
Tua khuapi a taan’na a vang in kristal bangin jasper suangmanpha bangin a om hi.
Tua khuapi kimah a lian a sang khua kulh, khuapi kong vang sawm leh nih, tua kong vangte ah vantungmi sawm leh nih a om tham loin, Israel mipawl sawm leh pawl nihte’ minte zong kigelhin a om hi.
Khuapi ni suahna lamah kong vang thum, sak lamah kong vang thum, khang lamah kong vang thum, ni tumna lamah kong vang thum a om uh hi.
Khuapi kulh nuai-ah a nuaiphah sawm leh nih om a, tuate tungah Tuuno’ sawltak sawm leh nihte’ minte kigelh hi.
Kei tawh kiho mi in khuapi tawh, khuapi kong vangte, kulhte teh nadingin kham pumpeeng khat a tawi hi.
Tua khuapi in kiu li nei-in om a, a dung a vai a kikim hi. Tua pumpeeng tawh khuapi a teh ciangin tai tulkhat leh zanga a pha hi. Khuapi a dung, a vai, a san’na a kikim hi.
Khuapi kulh a teh ciangin mi’ tong tawh kibang vantungmi’ tong za leh sawmli leh li a pha hi.
Tua khuapi kulh pen jasper suangmanpha tawh kibawl hi. Khuapi in a siangtho limlang tawh kibang kham taktak ahi hi.

Khuapi kulh nuaiphahte suangmanpha a pawlpawl tawh kizeem hi. A masa bel nuaiphah in jasper suangmanpha, a nihna in sapfeiros suangmanpha, a thumna in khalsidoni suangmanpha, a lina in emerald suangmanpha,

ngana in sardonik suangmanpha, a gukna in sardius suangmanpha, a sagihna in khrisolait suangmanpha, a giatna in beril suangmanpha, a kuana in topaz suangmanpha, a sawmna in khirsoprase suangmanpha, a sawm-le-khatna in jakinth suangmanpha, a sawm-le-nihna in amethist suangmanpha ahi uh hi.
Khuapi kong khak sawm leh nih in, suangmanpha peek sawm leh nih ahi hi. Kongkhak khempeuh in suangmanpha khat tek ahi uh hi. Khuapi sung lampi in a siangtho limlang tawh kibang kham taktak ahi hi.
Tua khuapi sungah biakinnpi ka mu kei hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Vanglianpen Topa Pasian leh Tuuno in tua khuapi biakinnpi ahi uh hi.
Ni tan’na, kha tan’na zong tua khuapi-ah a kisam kei hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Pasian’ vang in tua khuapi a tangsak a, Tuuno in zong tua khuapi’ meivak ahi hi.
Mipawl pawl khempeuh in tua khuavak tawh lam pai-in leitung kumpite in tua khuapi sungah amaute vangliatna pua-in a tung uh hi.
Tua san takah zan om lo hi. Sun lai takin kongkhak kikhak ngei lo hi.
Mipawl pawl khempeuh in a vangliatna leh phatna tua khuapi sungah a paipih ding uh hi.
A kihhuainate-a kipan muhdahhuai, thuman lo nate a bawl mi khat beek tum thei ngei lo ding hi. Tuuno’ nuntakna laibu sungah a kigelh mite bek in tum theihna thu a ngah ding uh hi.
Tua nung ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah kristal suangmanpha tawh kibangin tangin, Pasian leh Tuuno’ tokhom pan pusuakin, khuapi lampi laizang tawntungah a luang nuntakna gun hong lak hi.
Tua gun lang tuakah nuntakna sing kung khat om a, tua kung tungah a gah pawl sawm leh pawl nih, kha khatin pawl khat ciat a gah thei hi. A tehte in zong mipawl pawlte natna dam nading ahi hi.
Hamsiatna cikmah hunin omkik lo ding hi. Pasian leh Tuuno’ silate in Topa bia-in,
a maitang a mu ding uh hi. A min zong amaute taltang tung uhah a om ding hi.

A nung ciangin zan om nawn lo ding hi. Amaute in meivakna ahi zongin, ni tan’na ahi zongin a kisam kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam na cih uh leh, Topa Pasian in amau khuavakna a pia ding hi. Amaute in zong a tawntungin a mang ding uh hi.
Tua lai takin vantungmi in, “Hih thute a dikin a man hi. Kamsangte’ khate a uk Topa Pasian in a sawt loin a piang ding nate a silate hilh dingin a vantungmi khat a sawl hi.
En in, a manlangin ka hong pai ding hi! “Hih laibu-ah a om, a nung ciangin a piang ding nate genkholhna thute a zui mi in thupha ngah mi ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
Tua nate a za, a mu mi in keimah Johan ka hi hi. Ka zak ka muh lai takin a hong lak vantungmi bia dingin a khe kiangah ka boksuk leh,

vantungmi in, “Kei hong bia kei in! Kei in nanga kipan na u na nau na sanggam kamsangte tawh ahi zongin, hih laibu-ah a om thute a zui mite tawh ahi zongin a sila ka hi khawm hi. Pasian bia in,” hong ci hi.
Tua nung ciangin amah in, “Hih laibu sungah thu genkholhnate imcip kei in. Bang hang hiam na cih leh, a hun a hong tung dektak zo hi.
A thuman lo mi in thuman loin omsuak hen, a kihhuai mi in kihhuai lai ta hen, a dik mi in a dikin gamta lai ta hen, a siangtho mi in siangtho lai ta hen.
“En in, kei a manlangin ka hong pai ding hi! Mi khempeuh a gamtatnate tawh kituakin pia dingin thaman ka hong pua hi.
Keimah in Alfa leh Omega, a masa bel, a nunung bel, a kipatna leh a tawpna ka hi hi.
“Nuntakna kung kiangah pai ding kilawm a, khuapi sungah khuapi kongpi pan tum theih nading thu ngah nadingin, amau puan uh a sawpsiang mite in thupha ngah mite ahi uh hi.
Pua lamah ahih leh, uite, mi bum theite, nu leh pa mawhna a bawl theite, mi that theite, milim biate leh a man lo nate deihin a gamta thei mite a om uh hi.
“Pawlpite ading hih thute teci pang dingin kei Zeisu in ka vantungmi nangma kiangah kong sawl hi. Kei in David’ bulpi leh David’ suan, a taang khuavak Zingsol ka hi hi,” ci-in thu hong pia hi.
Kha Siangtho leh a kipi Mo in, “Hong pai in!,” ci-in a gen uh hi. A za mi in zong, “Hong pai in,” ci ta hen. A dangtak mi hong pai ta hen. A dawn nuam mi in nuntakna tui man pia loin dawn ta hen.

Hih laibu-ah a om thu genkholhna thute a za mi khempeuh kiangah teci ka pan’na in, kua mi kua mi hi taleh, hih laite belapin a guan’ beh leh, hih laibu sungah a kigelh gimnate tua mi’ tungah Pasian in a koih thuah ding hi.

Tua genkholhna thu tawh kipawl hih laibu sungah a om thute kua mi hi taleh, a paihkhiat leh zong laibu sungah a kigelh nuntakna kung leh Khuapi Siangtho pan tua mi’ ngah ding khempeuh Pasian in a lakkhiatsak ding hi.
Hih thute teci a pang Topa in, “A man takin a manlangin ka hong pai ding hi,” ci-in thu hong pia hi. Amen. Topa Zeisu aw, hong pai ta in!
Topa Zeisu’ hehpihna thupha misiangthote tawh omkhawm ta hen. Amen.
